A tungin Pathianin lei leh van a siam.
Huan, lei a siaa a vuak kia ahi; tui thukpi tung a mialin a mial hi.
Pathian khain tui tungte a opkhum hi.
Huan, Pathianin, Vak hongom hen, a chi a: huchiin vak a hongomta hi.
Huan, Pathianin, Vak a ena, hoih a sa mahmah; huchiin Pathianin vak leh mial a khenta hi.
Huan, Pathianin vak, sun, achia, mial, jan, a chi hi: huchiin nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, a ni khatnaah.
Huan, Pathianin, tui leh tui kalah vansin om henla, huaiin tui leh tuite khen hen, a chi.
Huchiin, Pathianin, vansin a bawla, vansin nuaia tui omte leh vansin tunga tui om a khenta: huchibang a honghita hi.
Huan, Pathianin vansin, Van, achia.
Huchiin nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, a ni nihnaah.
Huan, Pathianin, Van nuaia tuite mun khatah om khawm uhenla, gam keu hongdawk hen, a chi a; huchiin huchibang a honghita hi.
Huan, Pathianin, gam keu, Lei, achia; tui om khawmte, tuipite, a chi hi: huan Pathianin huai a ena, hoih a sa mahmah hi.
Huan, Pathianin, leiin loupate, anteh chi nei te, thei sing, lei amau chi omdan ding banga gah, agah sunga a chi omte omsak hen, a chi a, huchiin huchibang a honghita hi.
Huchiin, leiin loupate, anteh amau chi omdan ding banga chi neite, sing a mau chi omdan ding banga gah, a gah sunga chi omte a omsakta hi: huan Pathianin huai a ena, hoih a sa mahmah hi.
Huchiin, nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, a ni thumnaah.
Huan, Pathianin, sun leh jan khenna dingin vansin ah tanvakte om u henla, huaite chiamtehnate, hunbite, nite, kumte, theihna ding hi uhen:
Lei tanvak dingin van vansin tanvakte din om uhen, a chi a: huchiin, huchibang a honghita.
Huchiin, Pathianin tanvak thupipi nih a bawlta; tanvak thupi zopen sun vaihawm dingin, tanvak thupi lou zopen jan vaihawm dingin, a bawl hi: aksite leng a bawl hi.
Huan, Pathianin huaite lei tanvak dingin van vansin ah a koihta,
Sun tunga leh jan tunga vaihawm ding leh vak leh mial khen dingin: huchiin, Pathianin huai a ena, hoih a sa mahmah hi.
Huchiin, nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, a ni linaah.
Huan, Pathianin, tuiten thilsiam tangthei henna neite tampi pawtsak uhenla, vasate leng van vansin hawm heuhou ah, leitungah leng uhen, a chi hi.
Huchiin, Pathianin tuipi thil thupi lian pipite a siama, thil hing tangthei chiteng, tuiin a pawt sak, amaute chi omdan ding bangin a siam hi: Pathianin huai a ena, hoih a sa mahmah hi.
Huan, Pathianin, Chi tampi suangin hongpung unla.
Tuipi tuite dimsak unla, vasate leng lei ah pung uhen, chiin a vualjawl hi.
Huchiin, nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, a ni ngana ah.
Huan, Pathianin, Leiin thil hing amau chi omdan ding bang chiatin; gante, ganhingte, gamsate, amau chi omdan ding bang chiatin pawtsak uhen, a chi a: huchiin, huchibang a honghita hi.
Huchiin, Pathianin gamsa amau chi omdan ding bang chiatin, gamte amau chi omdan ding bang chiatin, leia thil khupboha paite tengteng amau chi omdan ding bang chiatin a bawla: huan, Pathianin huai a ena, hoih a sa mahmah hi.
Huan, Pathianin, I kibatpihin, ei mahmah bangin, mi I bawl dia, amau tuipia ngasate tungah, tunga leng vasate tungah, gan tungah, leitung tengteng tungah thu I neisak ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, Pathianin amah kibatpihin mi a siama, Pathian kibatpih mahmahin ahi a siam; pasal leh numei a siamta hi.
Huan, Pathianin amau a vualjawl a: Pathian mah in a kiang uah, Chi tampi suang dingin hongpung unla, lei luah dim unla, na thuthu un omsak un; tuipia ngasa tungah, tunga leng vasate tungah, thil hing leitunga khupboh a paite tengteng tungah leng thu nei un, a chi hi.
Huan, Pathian mahin, ngai un, leitung tengtenga anteh chinei om chiteng leh sing chiteng, sing chinei gah omnate, ka honpia hi; na an ding uh ahi ding:
Huan, leia sa chiteng kiangah, tunga leng vasa chiteng kiangah, thil, leitunga khupboha pai, henna nei chiteng kiangah a an ding un loupa hing chiteng ka pia hi, a chi a: huchiin, huchibang a honghita.Huan, Pathianin a thil bawl khempeuh a ena, ngaiin, hoih a sa mahmah, Huchiin, nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, ani gukna ah.
Huan, Pathianin a thil bawl khempeuh a ena, ngaiin, hoih a sa mahmah, Huchiin, nitaklam a oma, jinglam leng a om, ani gukna ah.
Huchiin, lei leh van a tung ua omte tengteng toh zoh ahita hi.
Huan, Pathianin ni sagih niin a nasep a zoua; ni sagih niin a nasep tengteng a khawl santa hi.
Huchiin, Pathianin ni sagih ni a vualzawla, atangta hi: huai nia Pathianin a siam leh a bawl a nasep tengteng a khawl san jiakin.
Lei leh van a bawla a om lai ua a suante uh hiaite ahi uhi, Toupa Pathianin lei leh van a bawl niin.
Huan, leia loupa himhim leiah a om naikei ua, leia anteh himhim leng a pou naikei uhi; Toupa Pathianiin lah leitungah vuah a zu sak nai keia, leilet dingin pasal leng a om nai sam kei hi;
A hihhangin leia kipanin mei a hongsuaka, leitung tengteng a nom sak hi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin leitunga leivuiin mi a bawla, a nakvangte ah hinna hu a ha luta; huchiin, mi mihing a hong hita hi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin suahlamah, Eden ah, huan a bawla; a pasal bawl huaiah a omsakta hi.
Huan, leitunga kipanin Toupa Pathianin sing mithip tak leh nek tuak chiteng a pou saka; hinna sing leng huan laizangah a pou sak hi, a sia leh a pha theihna sing leng.
Huan, Eden akipanin huan nomsak dingin lui a luang paisuaka; huaia kipanin a ka jaka, ka li a hong hita hi.
A khatna min Pison ahi: huaipen Havila gam tengteng kualkhumlui ahi, huailaiah dangkaeng a om;
Huai gama dangkaeng hoih taka hi; huailaiah bedolak leh onik suang a om.
Huan, lui nihna Gihon ahi; huaimah Kus gam tengteng kualkhumlui ahi.
Huan, lui thumna min Hiddekel ahi; huai bel Assuria gam suahlama luang ahi.
Huan, lui lina tuh Euphrates ahi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin pasal a pia, Eden huanah a kem ding leh a veng dingin a koihta hi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin, pasal kiangah, Huana sing chiteng gahte na utut na ne thei hi;
A sia leh a pha theihna sing gah bel na ne ding ahi kei; na nek leh na nek ni mahin na si ngei ding ahi, chiin, thu a pia.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin, Pasal amah kiaa a om a hoih kei; amah panpaih ding a kithuahpih dia kilawm ka bawlsak ding, a chi a.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin leitung akipanin gam sa chiteng leh tunga leng vasa chiteng a bawlta; a min ding ua bang sak ding ahia chih theihna din Adam kiangah a honpi khawm hi: huan, thil hing chiteng a min uh Adam in a na phuah a min uh ahi den hi.
Huchiin, Adam in gan tengteng, tunga leng vasa tengteng gamsa chiteng a min uh a phuahsak chiat hi: a hihhangin Adam adingin panpih a kithuahpih dia kilawm a om kei hi.
Huchiin, Toupa Pathianin nuamtakin Adam a ihmu saka, huchiin a ihmutaa; huan, a nakguh khat a laa, atang dingin sa a pang dimsak hi:
Huan, Toupa Pathianin, Adam akipana a lak nakguh numei dingin a bawla, Adam kiangah a honpita hi.
Huan Adamin, hiai hial jaw ka guh bang guh neia, ka sa bang sa nei ngei ahi; pasal akipana lak khiak ahih jiakin, Numei, chih ding ahi ding, a chi hi.
Huaijiakin pasalin a nu leh a pa a paisan dinga, a ji lamah a belh ding: huchiin sa khat a hong hita ding uh.Huan, Adam leh a ji a nih un vuaktangin a om ua, a zum tuan kei uh.
Huan, Adam leh a ji a nih un vuaktangin a om ua, a zum tuan kei uh.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin gam sa a bawl tengteng lakah gul a gitlouhpil pen hi, Huchiin, aman numei kiangah, Pathianin, Huana sing gah himhim na ne ding uh ahi kei, chi ahi maw? a chi a.
Huan, numeiin gul kiangah chilou e, huana sing gahte nethei mah ung:
Huan laizanga sing gah bel Pathianin, Na ne ding uh ahi kei, khoih leng na khoih ding uh ahi kei, huchilouinjaw na si ding uh chi aka, a chi a.
Huan, gulin, numei kiangah, Si zenzen lou e:
Na nek ni ua pat na mit uh hongvak dia, a sia leh a pha theiin Pathian bangin na hongom ding uh chih Pathianin thie kilkel eive, a chi a.
Huchiin, numeiin, sing gah nek theih ahi chih leh, mithip tak ahi chih leh, mi pilsak dinga sing gah etlahhuai ahi chih a theihin a gah khenkhat a loua, a neta; huan, a pasal kiangah leng a pia hi, aman leng a ne teita hi.
Huchiin, a nih un a mit uh a hongvaka, vuaktang ahih uh a hongkitheita ua; huchiin theipi nah a khuikhawm ua, puan a kibawl tawm uhi.
Huan, Toupa Pathian, huana nitklam ni nema vak aw a ja ua; huchiin, Adam leh a jiin huana sing lakah Toupa Pathian ana kibuk santa uh.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin Adam a sama, a kiangah, kaw om na hia? a chi hi.
Huan, aman, Huana na aw ka jaa, vuaktanga om ka hih jiakin ka laua; huchiin ka buta hi, a chi hi.
Huan, aman, vuaktang na hih kuan honhilh ahia?
Sing gah nek louh hial ding ka chih ne na hita maw?
A chia.
Huan, Adam in, Honompih dinga non numei piakin sing gah a hon piaa, ne kei ve, achi a.
Huai, Toupa Pathianin, numei kiangah, Na thil hih hi bangchidan ahia?
A chi a.
Huan, numeiin, gulin honkhema, ne kei ve, a chi hi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin, gul kiangah, hichibanga na hih jiakin gan tengteng leh gam sa chiteng lakah hamsiatin na om tuanse dinga, khupbohin na pai gige ta dia, na dam sungin leivui na nek ding ahi;
Huan, nang leh numei ka hon kidou sak dinga, na suante leh a suante leng ka kidou sak lai ding; huaiin na lutang a sidup sak dinga, nang a khetul na sidup sak ding, a chi a.
Numei kiangah, Na haksatna leh na naupaina nakpiin ka pungsak dinga; haksa takin ta na nei gige dinga; himahleh na deihlam na pasal lam ahi dinga, aman na tungah thu a nei gige ding, a chi hi.
Huan, Adam kiangah, Na ji thu na mana, sing khat, A gah na ne ding ahi kei, chia Ka hon thupiak, a gah na nek jiakin leitung nang jiakin hamsiatin a omta hi; na dam Sung tengin gim taka semin a gah na neta ding;
Ling leh loulingneite leng a hon omsak ding; huan, leia anteh na neta ding
Hun, leitunga na kiknawn masiah na maia kho-ul luang puappuapin an na neta ding; leitunga kipana lak khiak lah na hi ngala: leivui na hi a, leivui ah na kiknawn ding ahi, a chi hi.
Huan, Adamin a ji, mi hing tengteng nu a hih jiakin, a min dingin Evi a sa hi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin, Adam ading leh a ji a dingin savun puannaktualte a bawlsaka, a silhsak hi.
Huan, Toupa Pathianin, Ngai un, pasal a sia leh a pha theiin ei bang a hong hita; tuin a khuta sawkin, hinna sing gah loua nein, khantawnin a hing kha ding, a chi a,
Huaijiakin, Toupa Pathianin amah a lak khiakna lei let dingin Eden huan akipan a sawlkheta hi,Huchiin pasal a delhkhetaa; huan, hinna sing lampi veng dingin Eden huan suahlam pangah Cherubimte leh mei namsau kilek jualjual a omsakta hi.
Huchiin pasal a delhkhetaa; huan, hinna sing lampi veng dingin Eden huan suahlam pangah Cherubimte leh mei namsau kilek jualjual a omsakta hi.
Huan, Adamin a ji Evi a ompiha; huchiin a gaia, Kaina a nei hi, Toupa panpihin pasal kon nei ta, a chi a.
Huan, a nau Abel a honnei nawn hi.
Huan, Abel belam chingmiin a oma.
Kaina bel leilet miin a om
Huan, a nungin hichi a hong hia, Kainain Toupa kianga a lat din loua piang a hontawi a.
Huan Abelin leng a belam hon laka piang masapente leh, a thau a hontawi sama, huan, Toupan Abel leh a thillat a kipahpiha:
A hihhangin Kaina leh a thillat bel akipahpih kei.
Huchiin, Kaina a heh mahmaha, a mel a liapta hi.
Huchiin, Toupa, Kaina kiangah, bangdia heh na hia?
Bangdia na mel liap ahia?
Thil hihhoih lechin pahtak na loh kei dia hia?
Na hih hoih keia a hihlebel khelhna kongkhak bulah a kual nilouh hi: a deihlam nangmah kiang lam ahi dinga, a tungah thu na nei ding hi a chi a.
Huan, Kainain a nau Abel a houpiha: huan, hichi ahia, loua a om lai un Kainain a nau Abel a suala, a thatta hi.
Huchiin, Toupan, Kaina kiangah, na nau Abel ko omta ahia?
A chi a.
Huan aman, ka theikei: ka nau donpa ka hi ahia?
A chi hi.
Huan, aman, bang hih na tamaia?
Na nau sisan awin leitung akipanin lah a hon sama.
Huaijiakin, lei, na khuta kipana na nau sisan sang dinga a kam naka akipan hamsiat na hita hi;
Leitung na lehin leng ahoihna a honpe phal nawn kei ding; a chi a.
Huan, Kainain, Toupa kiangah, non gawtna a na mahmaha, ka thuak zou kei ding.
Ngaiin, tuniin leitunga kipan non delhkheta ngala; na mit muh phak louha sela om ding ka hita; lei ah tai mang leh vakvai hi ding lah ka hita ngala; huchiin hichi ahi dinga, kuapeuh honmuin a hon that mai ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Toupan, a kiangah, huchi ahihleh, kuapeuh Kaina that amun sagihin a tungah phu a la ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, min amah a muh ua a thah louhna ding un Toupan Kaina achiamtehta hi.
Huchiin, Kaina Toupa kianga kipan a pawta, Eden suahlama Nod gamah a omta hi.
Huan, Kainain aji a ompiha; huchiin, a gaia, Enok a nei hi: huan, khua a sata, a kho min dingin a tapa tam sakin, Enok a chi hi.
Huan, Enokin tapa Irad a neia: Iradin tapa Mahujael a neia: Mahujaelin tapa Methusael a neia; Methusaelin tapa Lamek a ni hi.
Huan Lamekin ji nih a neia: khat min Adia ahi, khat min Zillai ahi.
Huan, Adaiin Jabal a neia; amah bel puanina om gan vulmite suangpa ahi.
A nau min Jubal ahi: amah bel kaihging leh tamngai tummite tengteng suangpa ahi.
Huan Zillain leng Tubal-Kaina, dal leh sik tuzatheizat chiteng sekmi, a neia: huan, Tubal- Kaina sanggamnu Naamai ahi.
Huan, Lamekin, ajite kiangah: Adal leh Zillai te aw ka aw ja unla; Lamek jite aw, ka thugen ngai un: honliamsak jiakin mi ka thata, honsidupsak jiakin mi ka that hi:
Kaina phu bawn amun sagiha la ding ahih uleh Lamek phu amun sawm sagih leh sagihin a la ngei ngei ding uh, a chi hi.
Huan, Adamin a ji a ompih nawna; huchiin aman tapa anei nawna, a min din Seth a saa: Pathianin Abel sikin chi suah ding honseh sakta; Kaina in lah amah a that ngala, achia.Huan, Sethin, amah mahin tapa a neitaa; a min din Enosa a sa hi; hualaiin miten Toupa min a na lou pan uh.
Huan, Sethin, amah mahin tapa a neitaa; a min din Enosa a sa hi; hualaiin miten Toupa min a na lou pan uh.
Hiai Adam suante tuan na laibu ahi.
Pathianin mi a siam niin Pathian batpihin amah a bawla;
Pasal leh numeiin amau a siama; amau a vualzawla, a min uh Adam, a chi, amau siama a om ni un
Huan, Adamin, kum ja leh kum sawmthum ahihin, amah bang mahmah, amah kibatpih ngei tapa a neia; a min din Seth a sa hi;
Huan, Seth a neih nungin Adam kum za giat a dam laia: tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huchiin, Adam dam sung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm thum ahia; huan a sita hi.
Huan, Sethin, kum ja leh kum nga ahihin, tapa Enosa a neia:
Huan, Enosa a neih nungin Seth kum za giat leh kum sagih a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi:
Huchiin, Seth dam sung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm leh kum nih ahia; huan, a sita hi.
Huan, Enosain, kum sawm kua ahihih, tapa Kenan a neia:
Huan, Kenan a neih nungin Enosa kum za giat leh kum sawm leh kum nga a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn laia:
Huchiin, Enosa dam sung tengteng kum za kua kum nga ahi a: a sita hi.
Huan, Kenanin, kum sawm sagih ahihin, tapa Mahalalel a neita:
Huan, Mahalalel a neih nungin Kenan kum za giat leh kum li a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi:
Huchiin, Kenan dam sung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm ahia: huan, a sita hi.
Huan, Mahalalel, kum sawm guk leh kum nga ahihin, tapa Jared a neia:
Huan, Jared a neih nungin Mahalalel kum za giat leh kum sawm thum a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn laia:
Huchiin, Mahalalel dam sung tengteng kum za giat leh kum sawm kua leh kum nga ahia: huan, a sita hi.
Huan, Jared in, kum ja leh kum sawm guk leh kum nih a hihin, tapa Enok a neia:
Huan, Enok a neih nungin Jared kum za giat a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn laia:
Huchiin, Jared dam sung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm guk leh kum nih ahi: huan a sita hi.
Huan, Enokin, kum sawm guk leh kum nga a hihin, tapa Methusel a neia:
Huan, Methusel a neih nungin Enok kum za thum sung teng Pathian toh a omkhawm ua, tanu leh tapate a nein awn laia:
Huan, Enok dam sung tengteng kum za thum leh kum sawm guk leh kum nga ahia:
Huan, Enok Pathian toh a om khawm ua: huan a omta keia; Pathianin a la mang ta ahi.
Huan, Methusel, kum ja leh kum sawm giat leh kum sagih a hihin, tapa Lamek a neia:
Huan, Lamek a neih nungin Methusel kum za sagih leh kum sawm giat leh kum nih a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn laia:
Huchiin Methusel dam sung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm guk leh kum kua ahia: huan, a sita hi.
Huan, Lamekin, kum ja leh kum sawm giat leh kum nih a hihin tapa a neia:
Huan, hiai ngeingeiin Toupa hamsiat khum leitung jiaka a nasepna leh khuta I sepgimnaah honlungmuan ding, chiin, a min din Noa a sa hi.
Huan, Noa a neih nungin Lamek kum nga leh kum sawm kua leh kum nga a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nein awn laia:
Huan, Lamek dam sung tengteng kum za sagih leh kum sawm sagih leh kum sagih ahia; huan a sita hi.Huan, Noa kum za ngaa a upa ahi: Noain tapa Sem te Ham te leh Japheth te a nei.
Huan, Noa kum za ngaa a upa ahi: Noain tapa Sem te Ham te leh Japheth te a nei.
Huan, hichi ahia, leitungah mi a hongpung ua, tanute a honnei chiat ua.
Pathian tapaten mite tanute mel hoih takin a mu ua; huchiin, a deihlam chiatte uh ji dingin a honnei jel uhi.
Huchiin, Toupan, ka khain mi khantawnin a sual nilouh louh kei ding, amaute lah sa ahi ngal ua: ahihhangin kum ja leh kum sawmnih a dam ding uh, a chi a.
Huai, lain miliante leiah a om ua; huai nungin leng Pathian tapaten mite tanute a kithuahpih ua, amau toh tate a neih jel laiun, huaite nidanglaia mihat, mi minthangte ahi uh.
Huan, Toupan, leiah mi gitlouhdan thupi ahi chih leh, a lungtang lunggeldan gilou ngen ahi ngitnget chih a na thei hi.
Huchiin, leitunga mi a bawljiakin Toupa a kisika, lunggimnan a neih loh hi.
Huchiin, Toupan, Ka mi siam leitung akipan ka hihmang mai ding; mite, sate, ganhingte tunga leng vasa te tannin; ka bawl jiakin ka kisik ahi, a chi hi.
Noain bel Toupa hehpihna a mu hi.
Noa suan hiaite ahi uh.
Noa midik ahia, a dam tonpihte lakah gensiatbei ahi: Noa Pathian toh a om khawm uh.
Huan Noain tapa thum Sem, Ham, leh Japheth a nei.
Huan, Pathian mitmuhin lei a se khintaa, lei hiamgam nain a dim khinta hi.
Huan, Pathianin lei a en a, huan ngaiin, a se khinta; sa tengtengin lah leitungah a omdan uh a hihse khinta ngal ua.
Huan, Pathianin Noa kiangah, sa tengteng beina ka maah a hongtungta; amaute jiakin lei hiamgam nain a dim khinta ngala; huchiin, ngaiin a lei nasanin ka hihmang ding.
Nang dingin meilah singin long bawlin; longah dantante na bawl ding ahi.
A sunglam leh a pawlam meilah naiin na jut vek ding ahi.
Huan, hiai na bawl dingdan ahi: Long dung lam tong za thum hi henla, a vailam tong sawm nga hi henla, asanlam tong sawm thum hi hen.
Longah tohlet na bawl dinga, a tunglam tong khat chianga na zoh ding ahi; huan, long kongkhak a pangah na bawl ding a; chial nuainung leh chial nihna leh chial thumna nei in na bawl ding ahi.
Huan, Ngaiin, kei mahmahin, sa tengteng, hinna hatna pai khempeuh, van nuaia kipan hih mangthang dingin, leitungah tuichim ka tungsak ding hi; leia thil chih om a si ve ding uh.
Ahihhangin ka thukhun na tungah kakipsak zo dinga, longah na lut ding ahi; nang na lut ding ahia, na tapate leh na ji leh, na tapate jite leng na kiangah a lut sam ding uh ahi.
Huan, sa tengtenga thilhing chiteng laka pat, chichih nihnihin, na kiangah hinsak dingin longah na pi lut ding ahi: a nu leh a pa jel a hih ding uhi.
Vasate amau chi omdan bang chiatin, gante amau chi omdan bang chiatin, chi chih nin nihin, na hinsak dingin, na kiangah a hongpai ding uh ahi.
Huan, na annek tengteng uh la inla, na kiangah koih khawm in; huchiin, nang leh amau adin an ahi ding uh, a chi hi.Huchibangin Noain a hih a; Pathianin a kianga thu a piak tengteng bangin a hihta hi.
Huchibangin Noain a hih a; Pathianin a kianga thu a piak tengteng bangin a hihta hi.
Huan, Toupan, Noa kiangah, nang leh na inkuanpihte tengteng longah lut un; nang jaw tulai khangthak lakah ka mitmuhin mi diktat na hihna ka honthei hi.
Sa siang chiteng lakah, a pa leh a lawmnu, kop sagih jelin: sa sianglou laka, a pa leh a lawmnu chiat toh, kop khat jel, na kiangah na pi ding hi;
Tunga leng vasa laka zong, a nu leh a pa chiat, kop sagih jelin, leitunga chi khah dinga hinsak dingin.
Ni sagihin a sam laia, huai khit chiangin leitung ah ni sawm li leh jan sawm li sungteng vuah ka zu sak dinga; ka thil hing bawl chiteng leitung akipan ka hihmang ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, Noain Toupan a kianga thu a piak tengteng bang jelin ahihta.
Huan, leitunga tuichim a hongtun lain Noa kum za guka upa ahi.
Huan, tuichim a tun ding jiakin Noa longah a luta, a tapate leh a ji leh a tapate jite leng a kiangah a lut sam uh.
Sa siang laka leng, sa sianglou laka leng, vasa laka leng, leitunga khupboha pai chiteng laka leng,
Pathianin Noa kianga thu a piak bangin, a nu leh a pa chiat, a kop kopin, Noa kiangah longah a luta uh.
Huan, ni sagih nungin leitung ah a tungta.
Noa kum za guk a hih kum, a kha nihna ni sawm leh ni sagih niin, huai ni mahin tui thuk zapi nak tengteng a hongpuak jaka, van tohlette leng a hong kihongta hi.
Huan, ni sawm li leh jan sawm li sung teng leitungah vuahpi a zutaa.
Huai ni mahin Noa te, Noa tapa Sem te, Ham te, Japheth te, Noa ji te longah a luta ua, a tapa jite thum leng a kiangah a lut sam ua;
Amaute a lut ua, sa chiteng amau chi omdan bang chiatin, ganhing leitunga khupboha pai chiteng amau chi omdan bang chiatin, vasa chiteng, amau chi omdan bang chiatin, vasa chiteng, kah nei chiteng leng a lut uh.
Huchiin, sa tengteng hinna hatna pai himhimte, a kop kopin Noa kiangah longah a luta uh.
Huan, a lutte Pathianin a kianga thu a piak bangin sa tengteng laka a nu leh a pa jelin a lut uhi: huan Toupan amah a khak khumta hi.
Huan, tuichim leitung ah ni sawm li sung teng a tunga; tui a hongkhanga, long a lama, leitung tunglamah a dom kangta hi.
Huan, tui a hong om juajua a, leitung tunglamah a khanin a hong khangta hi, long tui tungah a kilam jel hi.
Huan, leitung tunglamah tui nakpiin a hongom juajua taa; van nuaia tang sang tengteng a tumkhin vekta hi.
Tong sawm leh tong nga hiala sangin tui a hongom zeizoia; tangte tupmangin a omta uhi.
Huchiin, sa leitunga tangthei tengteng, vasate, gante, sate, ganhing leitunga khupboha pai chitengte, mi chitengte toh a si khinvekta uh:
A nak ua hinna kha hatna omna tengteng, gama om khempeuh te, a si khin vekta uh.
Huchiin, leitunga thil hing chiteng omte, mite, gante, ganhingte, tunga leng vasate toh hihmanin a om uh; lei akipan hihmanin a omta uh: Noa longa a kianga omte kia hawiin a om uhi,Huan, tui tuh ni ja leh ni sawm nga sungteng leitungah a omta hi.
Huan, tui tuh ni ja leh ni sawm nga sungteng leitungah a omta hi.
Huan, Pathianin, Noa leh longa a kianga thil hing chiteng leh gan tengteng omte a theigigea: huan, Pathianin leitung lamah huih a nungsak a, huchiin tui a hongdai panta hi.
Tui thukpi nakte leh van tohlette leng a hongkikhakta a, van akipana vuah hongju leng theu sakin a hong omta a;
Huchiin, tui lei apan a kiam giaigiai taa; huchiin, ni ja leh ni sawm nga a man nungin tui a hong tawm deuhta hi.
Huchiin, long a kha sagihna ni sawm leh ni sagih niin Ararat tangah a hong kingata hi.
Huan, tui a kha sawmna tannin a kiam giaigiai jela; huan, kha sawmna ni khat niin mual vumte a hongkimuta hi.
Huan, ni sawm li nungin hichi ahia, Noain a long tohlet bawl a hongta a;
Huan, va ak khat a khah kheta a; huai a pawt kheta a, lei akipan tui a kan khit masiah a vial lenlen hi.
Huan, leitungah tui a tawmta hia tawm nailou chih theihna dingin vakhu a khah khe nawna;
Himahleh vakhuin tukna ding him him a mu keia, a kiangah longah a kik nawna, tui lah leitung pumpiah a om lai ngala: huchiin, polamah a khut a golh khiaa, a man a long sungah a kiangah a la lut nawn hi.
Huan, ni sagih dang a ngak nawn laia; huan, vakhu long akipanin a khah khe nawna;
Vakhu nitaklamin a kiangah a honglut nawna; huan, ngaiin, a mukin olive nah loh tung a hontuaha; huchiin, Noain leiah tui a tawmta chih a theita hi.
Huan, ni sagih dang a ngak nawn jela; huan, vakhu a khah khe nawna; huan, a kiangah a hong kik nawn ta kei hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, a kum za guk leh kum khatnaah, a kha khatna ni khat niin, tui lei a kipan a kangta: huchiin, Noain, long khuhna a koihsuana, a ena; huan, ngaiin leitung a hulta hi.
Huan, a kha nihna ni sawm nih leh ni sagih niin lei a hulta hi.
Huan, Pathianin Noa kiangah thu a genna,
Long akipan pawtin, nang pawt inla, na ji leh na tapate leh na tapate jite leng na kiangah pawt uhen.
Sa tengteng laka thil hing chiteng na ompih te, vasate, gante, ganhing leitunga khupboha pai chiteng te toh na kiangah pikhiain, leitungah chi pha taka chi tampi suanga a hongpunna ding un, chiin.
Huchiin, Noa a pawta, a tapate leh a ji leh a tapate jite leng a kiangah a pawt uhi;
Sa chitengte, ganhing chitengte, vasa chitengte, leitunga tangthei peuhmah te amau chi omdan bang chiatin long akipan a pawta uhi.
Huan, Noain Toupa dingin maitam a bawla; huan, sa siang chiteng laka leh vasa siang chiteng laka a laa, maitamah halmang pumpiaknate a lanta.
Huan, Toupan tua namtui a jaa; huan, Toupan, a lungsimin, Mi jiakin leitung ka hamsiat nawn kei ding, mi lungsim ngaihtuahnate lah naupang neu a hih a pana gilou ahi ngala; tua ka gawt bangin thil hing chiteng leng ka gawt non sam kei ding.Lei om laiteng buh leh buh lak te, kho vot leh kho lum te, nipi leh phalbi te, sun leh jan te a bei kei ding, a chi hi.
Lei om laiteng buh leh buh lak te, kho vot leh kho lum te, nipi leh phalbi te, sun leh jan te a bei kei ding, a chi hi.
Huan; Pathianin Noa leh a tapate a vualjawla, a kiang uah chi tampi suang dingin hongpungin, lei luah dim un;
Nou kihtakna leh launa leia sa chiteng leh tunga leng vasa chitengin a nei ding uh; huaite leh, leia khupboha pai tengteng leh tuipi ngasate tengteng na khut ua piak ahita uh;
Thil hing tangthei chitengte noua dingin nek ding ahi ding ua; anteh hing kon piak bangin bangkim ka honpe vek hi;
Ahihhangin, sa a hinna, a sisan toh na ne khawm ding uh ahi kei;
Huan, na sisan uh, na hinnate uh sisan phu, ka la ngei ngei ding; sa chiteng lakah ka la ding: mi lakah leng.
Mi chih a unaute uh lakah, mi hinna phu ka la chiat ding;
Kuapeuh mi sisan suahmi mi mahin amah sisan a suah sam ding ahi: Pathian batpiha mi lah bawl ahi ngala.
Huan, nou chi tampi suangin hongpung un; leiah tampi nei unla, a tungah hongpung un, a chi hi.
Huan, Pathian, Noa kiang leh a kianga om a tate kiangah,
Huan, ngai un, lei mahmahin na kiang uah leh nou nunga na suante kiang leng ka thukhun ka hihkip hi;
Na kiang ua thil hing chiteng om, na ompih uh vasate, gante, na ompih uh leia sa chitengte kiangah leng; long akipana hong pawt tengteng, leia sa chiteng kiang nangawnah.
Huan, na kiang ua ka thukhun hihkip ding; sa tengteng leng tuichima hihmanin a omta kei ding uh; lei hihse dingin tuichim a tung nawn sam kei ding hi, chiin, a gen hi.
Huan, Pathian mahin, keileh nou leh na kiang ua thil hing chiteng omte kala, suan tawp neiloua om jel te dingin, hiai ka thukhun chiamtehna ahi ding:
Meiah ka sakhituihup ka jamsaka, huai kei leh lei kala thukhun chiamtehna ding ahi ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, leitunga mei ka kaisakin sakhituihup meiah a kimu ding,
Kei leh nou leh sa tengteng laka thilhing chitengte kala ka thukhun om ka theigige ding; huchiin, tui sa tengteng hihmang dingin a let nawnta kei ding.
Huan, sakhituihup meiah a jam jel ding; huchiin, Pathian leh leitunga sa om tengteng laka thil hing chiteng kala khantawn thukhun om ka theihgige theihna dingin ka en jel ding, a chi a.
Huan, Pathian mahin, Noa kiangah, huai kei leh leitunga sa om tengteng kala ka thukhun hihkip chiamtehna ahi, a chi nawn hi.
Huan, Noa tapa long akipana pawtte Sem te, Ham te, Japheth te ahi uh: Ham Kanaan pa ahi.
Huai mi thumte Noa tapate ahi uh: amaua kipana pawtten lei pumpi a jel suak uhi.
Huan, Noa lounei miin a hong om pana, grep gui huan a bawla:
Uain a dawna, a khama; huchiin a puanin ah a lum khialta hi.
Huan, Ham Kanaan pain, a pa lumkhial a mua, inpuaa a naute nih a hilha.
Huchiin, Sem leh Japhethin puan ala ua, lianga kijawnin a nungpai ua, a pa uh lumkhial a khuhta ua; a mai uh lehlam ngain a oma, a pa uh lumkhial a mu kei uhi.
Huan, Noa uain kham tuh a honghalha, a tapa naupangpenin a tunga ahihdan a hontheita hi.
Huan, Kanaan hamsiatin omhen; a unaute sikhate sihka ahi ding, a chi hi.
Toupa, Sem Pathian phatin omhen; Kanaan a sikha in om hen.
Pathianin Japheth hihlian henla, huan, Kanaan a sikhain om hen, achi lai hi.
Huan, Noa tuichim tun nungin kum za thum leh kum sawm nga a dam.Huchiin, Noa damsung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm nga ahi.
Huan a sita hi.
Huchiin, Noa damsung tengteng kum za kua leh kum sawm nga ahi.
Huan a sita hi.
Huan, hiaite Noa tapa Sem te, Japheth te suante ahi uh: tuichim tun nungin tapate bang a nei chiat uhi.

Huan, Gomer tapate Askenazi te, Riphath te, Togarma te ahi uh.
Huan, Javan tapate Elisa te, Tarsis te leh Kittim te, Dodanim te ahi uh.
Huaite akipanin ahi, Jentelte tuikulh gamtea amau gama a kikhenjak uh; amau pau bang jel leh amau nam bang jelin, amau chite lakah.
Huan, Ham tapate Kus te, Mizraim te, Phut te, Kanaan te ahi uh.
Huan, Kus tapate Seva te, Havela te, Sabta te, Raam te, Sabtek te ahi uh: huan, Raam tapate Sheba leh Dedan ahi uhi.
Huan, Kusin tapa Nimrod a neia.
Amah lei ah mi hattak a hong hi panta hi.
Toupa maah sabengmi hattak ahia; Huaijiakin ahi, Toupa maa sabeng hattak Nimrod bang ahi, a chih nak uh.
Huan, a lal kipatna Sinar gama, Babel khua te, Erek khua te, Akkad khua te, Kalneh khua te ahi.
Huai gam akipanin a pawta, Assuria gamah a luta, Ninevi khua te, Rehob-Ir khua te, Kala khua te.
Ninevi leh Kala kikalah Resen khua te a sata!
Huai Resen khua kho thupi ahi.
Huan, Mizraimin Ludte, Anamte, Lehabte, Naphtuhte,
Pathruste, Kasluhte (Philistinte pawtna) te a suangta hi.

Jesbuste, Amorte, Girgaste;

Huan, Kanaante gamgi zidon khua akipanin, Gerar lam juanin, Lasa khua tannin ahi.
Huaite Ham suante ahi uh, amau namte bang jel leh amau pau bang jelin amau gam lamahte lah amau chite lakah.
Huan, Sem, Ever tate tengteng suangpa, Japheth uin leng tate a nei hi.
Sem tapate Elam te, Assur te, Arpaksad te, Lud te Aram te ahi uh.
Huan, Aram tapate Uz te, Hul te, Gether te, Mas te ahi uh.

A omna uh Mesa akipanin, suahlam tang Sephar lam juanin ahi.

Huan, Kisa un; teklei I bawl dia, hoih takin I hal ding, a kichita uhi.
Huchiin, suang sikin teklei a nei ua, suanghukna sikin, longnai a nei uhi.
Huan, Kisa un, khopi i bawl dia, insang a vum van sun dingin I bawl dia, I min I thangsak ding uh; huchilouin jaw lei pumpiah hihdalhin I omkha ding, a chi uh.
Huan, Toupa mite taten khopi leh insang a lam khawng uh en dingin a hoh suka.
Huan, Toupan ngai dih ua, mipi te pumkhat ahi ua, a vek un lah pau khat a nei ngal ua; hiai thil a hih pan uhi; tun jaw a thilhih tup himhimte uh leng kham vual a hita kei ding.
Kisa un, I va hoh suk ding, pau a kitheituah theihlouhna ding un, huailaiah a pau uh I vasuklamdangsak ding, a chi a.

Hiai Sem suante ahi uh.
Sem kum ja a upa ahi, tuichim tun nung kum nih nungin tapa Arpaksad a nei hi.

Huan, Arpaksadin, kum sawmthum leh kum nga a hihin, tapa Selah a neia:
Huan, Selah a neih nungin Arpaksad kum zali leh kum thum a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Selahin, kum sawm thum ahihin, tapa Eber a neia:
Huan, Eber a neih nungin Selah kum zali leh kum thum a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Eberin, kum sawm thum leh kum li a hihin, tapa Peleg a neia:
Huan, Peleg a neih nungin Eber kum zali leh kum sawm thum a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Pelegin, kum sawm thum ahihin, tapa Reu a neia:
Huan, Reu a neih nungin Peleg kum zanih leh kum kua a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Reuin, kum sawm thum leh kum nih a hihin, tapa Serug a neia:
Huan, Serug a neih nungin Reu kum zanih leh kum sagih a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Serugin, kum sawm thum ahihin, tapa Nahor a neia:
Huan Nahor a neih nungin Serug kum zanih a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Nahorin, kum sawm nih leh kum kua ahihin, tapa Terah a neia:
Huan, Terah aneih nungin Nahor kum za leh kum sawm leh kum kua a dam laia, tanu leh tapate a nei nawn lai hi.
Huan, Terahin, kum sawm sagih ahihin tapa Abram te, Nahor te, Haran te a nei hi.
Huan, hiaite Terah suante ahi uh.
Terahin tapa Abram te, Nahor te, Haran te a neia; huan, Haranin tapa Lota a nei.
Huan, Haran a pianna gama, kaldaite khua Ur ah, apa Terah main a si hi.
Huan, Abram leh Nahorin ji a nei ua; Abram ji min Sarai ahia: Nahor ji min Haran tanu Milka ahi, Haran Milka pa leh Iska pa ahi.
Huan, Sarai a chiinga; ta himhim a neikei.
Huan, Trahin tapa Abram te, a tapa tapa (Haran tapa) Lota te, a mou, a tapa Abram ji Sarai te a pia; huan, Kanana hoh dingin Kaldaite khua Ur akipanin a pawt khawmta uhi; huan, Haran khua a hongtun un, huailaiah a tengta uh.Huan, Terah damsung kum za nih leh kum nga ahi a: huan, Terah Haran khuaah a sita hi.

Huan, Toupan, Abram kiangah, na kha lama kipan leh na tanaute laka kipan leh na pa in akipan pawt inla, gam ka honetsak ding lamah pain:
Huchiin, chi thupi mahmahin ka honbawl dinga, vual ka hon jawl dinga, na min ka hih thupi ding; huan, nang vualjawlna hiin:
Huan, nang hon vualjawl peuhmah ka vualjawla dinga, hon hamsiat peuhmah ka hamsiat ding: nangah leia nam chih a nuamsa ding uh, achia.
Huchiin Abram Toupan a kianga a gen bangin a kuantaa; Lota leng a kiangah a kuan sam hi: huan, Abram Haran khua akipan a pawt laiin kum sawm sagih leh kum nga a upa ahi.
Huan, Abramin a ji Sarai leh, a nau tapa Lota leh, a sum kaihkhawm tengteng uh leh, Haran khua a a mi neihte tengteng uh a pi a; Kanan gam a hoh dingin a pawtta ua; huan, Kanan gam a tungta uhi.
Huan, Abram huai gamah Sekem mun phain, Moreh tosaw tanin, a pai jela.
Huailaiin, Kanante huai gamah a om uh.
Huan, Toupa Abram kiangah a kilaka, hiai gam na suante kiangah ka pe ding, achia: huchiin, huailaiah, a kianga kilak Toupa adingin, maitam a dohta hi.
Huan, huai a kipanin Bethel suahlam a tang ah a kisuana, huai laiah a puanin a kaita a, a tumlamah Bethel a oma, a suahlamah Ai khua a om hi: huailaiah Toupa a dingin maitam a doh nawna.
Toupa min a lou hi.
Huan, Abram Sim gam lam juanin a kisuan lailai hi.
Huan, huai gamah kial a keta a: huan, huai gam a nak kial mahmah jiak un, Abram Aigupta gama om tadih dingin a paisukta.
Huan, hichi ahia, Aigupta gam a lut dinga a kisak laiun, a ji Sarai kiangah, ngaiin, numei melhoih tak na hi chih ka thei hi:
Huchiin, hichi ahi ding Aiguptaten nang a honmuh ding un, hiai a ji eive, a chi ding ua: huan, kei a hon that mai ding uh, nang bel a honhawi ding uh.
Nang jiaka hoih taka ka om theihna dingin leh nang vanga ka hin theihna dingin, asanggamnu ka hi, hehpihtakin chi jelin a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Abram Aigupta gam alut leh, Aiguptaten numei a mu ua, a mel hoih a sa mahmah ua.
Pharo mi lianten leng a mu ua, Pharo kiangah a hoihdan a gen uh: huchiin, numei Pharo in ah a pi lutta uh.
Huan, aman Sarai jiakin Abram hoih takin a hiha: huchiin belamte, bawngte, sabengtungpate, sikhapate, sikhanute, sabengtungnute, sangawngsaute a neih lohta hi.
Huan, Toupan Abram ji Sarai jiakin Pharo leh a inkuante bawl namaiin a bawlta kei hi.
Huchiin, Pharoin Abram a sama, ka tunga na thilhih bangchidan a maia?
Na ji ahi chih bang dia honhilh lou na hia?
Ka sanggam nu ahi, bangdia chi na hia?
Huaijiakin akeimaw ka ji dinga ka naneih hial: ahihleh, tuin enin na ji, pi inla, pai mangin, achia.Huan Pharoin a tungthu ah mi kiangah thu a piaa, huchiin amah a vakhata ua, a ji toh, a neih tengteng toh.
Huan Pharoin a tungthu ah mi kiangah thu a piaa, huchiin amah a vakhata ua, a ji toh, a neih tengteng toh.

Huan, Abram gante, dangkate, dangkaengtein a hausa mahmaha.
Huan, Sim gam akipanin Bethel tan a pai jela, Bethel leh Ai kho kikala, a tunga a puanin omna ah;
Atunga a maitam dohna mahmahah; huan, huaiah Abramin Toupa min a lou hi.
Huan, Lota Abram kianga pai samin, belam honte, bawnghonte, puaninte a ni sama.
Huan, a omkhawmna ding un gam a kichingta kei hi: a van neih ulah a thupi mahmah ngala, huchiin a om khawm thei nawn mahmah kei uh,
Huchiin, Abram gan pute leh Lota gan pute kalah kiselna hongpawtta a: huai laiin Kanante leh Peizte huai gamah a om uh.
Huchiin, Abram, Lota kiangah, hehpihtakin, nang leh kei kalah, na gan pute leh ka gan pute kalah zong kiselna om kei hen; unau lah I hi ngal ua.
Gam a pumpiin a om ka hia?
Hehpihtakin ka kianga kipan tuam om maiin: nang veilama na pai leh, kei taklamah ka pai ding; ahihkeileh, nang taklama na pai leh, kei veilamah ka pai ding, achia.
Huchiin, Lota a daka, Zoar kho lam juanin, Jordan phaijang tengteng, Toupa huan bang, Aigupta gam bangin, gam chiha tui tampi omna ahi chih a theia, Toupan Sodom leh Gomorra khua a suksiat ma lah ahi ngala.
Huchiin Lotain Jordan phaijang tengteng a telta a; huan, Lota suahlamah a kisuana; huchiin a kikhenta uh.
Abram bel Kanan gamah a oma, Lota bel phaijang khuate ah a oma, a puanin Sodom kho phain a suan jeljel hi.
Huan, Sodom mite Pathian mitmuhin nakpi taka hoihlou leh khialin a om uhi.
Huan, a kianga kipana Lota a om tuam nungin, Toupan Abram kiangah, dak inla, na omna akipanin mallamte, simlamte, suahlamte, tumlamte enin;
Na gam muh tengteng na kiangah leh na suante kiangah khantawn a dinging ka honpe ding ahi.
Huan, na suante leia leivui bang maiin ka bawl ding; huchiin min leia leivui a sim seng uleh, na suante leng sim seng ahi ding uh.
Thou inla, gam a dung a vaiin pal suakin; na kianga honpe ding ka hi, a chi a.Huchiin, Abramin a puanin a suana, Hebron a om Mamre tosaw kiangah a tengta a, huaiah Toupa a dingin maitam a doh hi.
Huchiin, Abramin a puanin a suana, Hebron a om Mamre tosaw kiangah a tengta a, huaiah Toupa a dingin maitam a doh hi.
Huan, Sinar kho kumpipa Amraphelte, Ellasar kho kumpipa Ariokte, Elam kho kumpipa Kedorlamomerte, Goiim kho kumpipa Tidalte dam laiin hichi ahia.
Amau bel Sodom kho kumpipa Bera a sim uh.
Gomorra kho kumpipa Birsate, Admah kho kumpipa Sinabte, Zeboiim kho kumpipate Smeberte, Bela kho kumpipate leng a sim ua, (huai tuh Zoar ahi).
Huan hiai tengteng Siddim guam ah a pang ua, (huai guam Tuipi Al ahita).
Kum sawm leh kum nih singin Kedorlaomer nuaiah a om ua, a kum sawm leh kum thumna ah a helta uh.
Huchiin, a kum sawm leh kum lina ah Kedorlaomer leh a kianga kumpipa omte a hong ua, Asteroth-karnaim khua ah Rephaimte a that ua, ham khua ah Zusimte a that ua, Kariathaim jangah Emimte a that ua,
A omna Seir tangah Elparan phain, Horte a that ua, (El-paran gamdei juala om ahi).
Huan, a kik nawn ua, Enmispet a tungua (huai Kades ahita), Amelekte gam a mi teng leh, Amorte, Hazazontamar khua a omte leng, a that nawn uh.
Huchiin, Sodom kho kumpipate, Gomorra kho kumpipate, Adma kho kumpipate, Zeboiim kho kumpipate, Bela kho kumpipate a pawt ua, (Bela khua Zoar khua ahita); huan, Siddim guam ah amau sual dingin a pangta uhi.
Elam kho kumpipa Kedorlaomerte, Goiim kho kumpipa Tidalte, Sinar kho kumpipate Amraphelte, Ellasa kho kumpipa Ariokte sual dingin; kumpipa li in kumpipate nga a sual uh.
Huan, Siddim guam longnai khukin a dim a; huan, Sodom leh Gomorra kho kumpipate a taikek ua, huai laiah a kia ua, ke valte tang ah a tai touta uhi.
Huchiin, Sodom leh Gomorra mite sum tengteng leh a nek ding tengteng uh a la ua, a paita uh.
Lota, Abram unau tapa, /Sodom khua a om, a sumte toh a la ua, a paita uhi.
Huan, mi khat taikhia a hongpaia, Hebru mi Abram a hilha; amah bel Amor mi Mamre tosaw kiang khawngah a om.
Mamre Eskol unau leh Aner unau ahia; huai mite Abramte toh pangkhawm ahi uh.
Huan, Abramin a ta salin a pi uh chih a jak takin, a inna piang, amah mi, chilsiamsa, za thum leh sawm leh giat a pi khia a, Dan kho phain a delhta.
Huan, jan in amau sual dingin amah leh a sikhate a kihawmjak ua, (Hoba Damaska kho mallamah a om).
Huan, sum tengteng a honla kik nawn vek a, a ta Lota leh a sum tengteng a honla kik nawn veka, numeite leng a honpi nawna mi dang tengteng toh
Huan, Kedorlaomer leh a kianga kumpipa omte that a pai nungin Sodom kumpipa Save guamah Abram dawnin a hoh suka, (Save guam kumpipa guam a hita).
Huan, Salem kho kumpipa Melkisedekin tanghou leh uain a honla a; amah bel Pathian Tungnungpen siampu ahi.:
Huan, aman Abram a vualjawla.
Lei leh van neipa, Pathian Tungnungpen Abram vualjawlin omhen:
Na melmate na khuta honpepa, Pathian Tungnungpen, phatin om hen, achia.
Huan, Abramin amah bangkim sawm a khat a pia hi.
Huan, Sodom kho kumpipan Abram kiangah, mite honpia inla, sumte jaw nang kineih maiin, a chi.
Huan, Abramin, Sodom kumpipa kiangah, lei leh van neipa, Toupa, Pathian Tungnungpen lamah ka khut ka jakta hi.
Khauzang khat kia leng, khedap khau khat kia leng, na neih himhim kala kei ding, huchilouinjaw, Abram jaw kei hauhsak ahi, na chi kha ding:Tangvalte nek mang leh, ka mi paipihte tantuan kia loujaw kala kei ding; Anerte, Eskolte, Mamreten a tantuan uh la uhen, a chi hi.
Tangvalte nek mang leh, ka mi paipihte tantuan kia loujaw kala kei ding; Anerte, Eskolte, Mamreten a tantuan uh la uhen, a chi hi.
Huai thilte khitin, Abram lau ken, kei na phaw leh na kipahman thupitak mai ka hi, chiin, Toupa thu Abram kiangah mang bangin a hongtunga.
Huan, Abramin, Aw Toupa Pathian, bang non pe dia, ta neilouin ka om den sina, ka goukempa lah Damaska khuaa Eliezer ahi ngala?
A chi a.
Huan, Abram mahin, ngaiin, chi himhim lah non suahsak ngal keia: enin, ka in a piang ka gouluahding ahi, achia.
Huan, ngaiin, huai mi na gouluahding ahi kei ding; nangmah gila honggah ding ngei na gouluahding ahi zo ding, chiin, Toupa thu a kiangah a tunga.
Huan, amah inpuaa ah a pi khiaa, Van lam en inla, aksite na sim theih leh sim himin, achia.
Huan, amah mahin, a kiangah, Na suante huchibang ahi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman Toupa a ginga, huchiin, amah huai a diktatnain a sehsakta hi.
Huan, a kiangah, hiai luah dinga honpe dia Kaldaite khua Ur akipana honpi khia huai Toupa ka hi, achi a.
Huan, aman, Toupa Pathian aw, ka luah ding chih bangchin ka thei ding? a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, bawngla kum thum a upa, kelpi kum thum a upa, vakhu leh vapal nou honlain, a chi a.
Huchiin, huai tengteng a honla, a lai takah a phelkhap chiata, a phel khat a phel khat lam dohin a koih chiat jela; vasate bel a phelkhap kei hi.
Huan, vasa sasial nete saluangte tunga atuk chiangin Abramin a hawlkhe jel hi.
Huan, ni tum dia a kisak sialsial laiin, Abram a na ihmu hithita; huan, ngaiin, a mial a mial, thil mulkimhuai petmahin amah a honkhuha.
Huan Pathianin Abram kiangah, na suante amau gam louah mikhual in a om ding uh, a na uh a sepsak ding uh chih teltakin theiin; huan, kum za li a hihgenthei ding ua;
Huan, a na uh a sepsakte chi uh leng ka ngaihtuah ding: huan, huai khit chiangin sum tampi neiin a hongpawt ding uhi.
Nang bel na pipute kiangah lungmuang takin na pai dinga; na lu a kelsam pou vekin a honvui ding uh.
Huan, suan lina ah hiailaiah a hongpai nawn ding uh; Amorte khelhnate lah a kim nai ngal keia, a chi a
Huan, hichi ahia, ni tuma, khua a hongmialin, ngaiin, halzulna meikhu lunglung leh meisel kuang luahluah huai sa phelkhapte kala paipai a hongoma.
Huai niin Toupan, hiai gam, Aigupta lui akipan lui lianpi (Euphrates lui) phain, na suante kiangah ka peta:
Kente, Kenizte, Kadmonte,
Hitte, Perizte, Rephaimte,Amorte, Kanante, Girgahte, Jebuste toh leng ka pe laia, chiin, Abram kiangah thu a khungta hi.

Huan, Sarai Abram jiin ta himhim a neihsak keia; huan, Saraiin Aiguptami sikhanu khat a neia, huai mi min Hagar ahi.
Huan, Saraiin, Abram kiangah, ngai dihve, Toupan lah ta ka neih honphal loua; hehpihtakin ka sikhanu kithuahpih in; amah laka kipana tate ka neih khak leh, achia.
Huchiin, Abramin Sarai thu a juita.
Huchiin, Abram ji Saraiin Abram Kanan gama kum sawm a om nungin, a sikhanu Aiguptami a pia, a pasal Abram kiangah a ji kia om dingin a pia hi.
Huan, Hagar a kithuahpiha; huan amah a gaita: huan, a gai chih a kitheih takin a pi a simmoh maimaha.
Huchiin, Saraiin, Abram kiangah, ka thil thuak nang a mohpua in; ka sikhanu na kawi dingin kon piaa; huan, a gai chih a kitheih takin a hon simmoh maimah hi: Toupan nang leh kei thu ngaihtuah hen, a chi a.
Abramin bel, Sarai kiangah, Ngaiin, na sikhanu na khuta om ahi; nang pha na saksak a tungah hihin, a chi a.
Huchiin Saraiin a hihgenthei mahmaha, Huaijiakin a taimangsanta hi
Huan, Toupa angelin gamdai tui khuk kiangah, Sur zotna lampi a tui khuk kiangah, a na mu a.
Huan, a kiangah, Hagar, Sarai sikhanu aw, koia kipana hongpai na hia, koia hoh dia kisa na hia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, ka pi Sarai kianga kipana taimang ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, Toupa angelin, a kiangah, na pi kiangah kik nawn inla, a thuthuin omin, a chi a.
Huan, Toupa angelin, a kiangah, Na suante simsenglouh khop hiala tamin ka hihpung ding, a chi nawna.
Huan, Toupa angel mahin, a kiangah, Ngaiin, nau na paita, tapa na nei dinga; Toupan na gimthuakna a jak jiakin a min dingin Ismael na sak ding ahi.
Amah mi laka gamsabengtung bang ahi ding; aman mi chih a dou dinga, mi chihin leng amah a dou ding uh; a unau tengteng kiang chinah a om ding, a chi nawn laia.
Huan, Hagarin amah houpiha Toupa min din, Nang muthei Pathian na hi, chih a saa, aman lah, Pathian mua hing nalai ka hi maw?
A chi ngala.
Huaijiakin tuileh Beerlahai-roi sak ahita; ngaiin, Kades leh Bered kho kikalah a om.
Huan, Hagarin Abram tapa a neih saka; huan, Abramin a tapa Hagar neih a min dingin Ismael a sata hi.Huan, Hagarin Abram dinga Ismael a neih laiin Abram kum sawm giat leh kum guk a upa ahi.

Huan Abram kum sawm kua leh kum kua a upa a hihin, Toupa Abram kiangah a hong kilaka, a kiangah, kei Pathian bangkim hihthei ka hi; ka maah om inla, hoihkimin omin.
Huchiin, nang toh I kalah thu ka khung dinga, nakpi takin kon pungsak ding, achia.
Huan, Abram a khupboha; huan, Pathianin amah a houpiha,
Ngaiin, ken jaw, ka thukhun na kiangah ahi ka khun, huchiin, chi tuamtuam suangpa na hita ding.
Na min leng Abram ahi nawnta kei dinga, na min Abraham ahi zota ding; chi tuamtuam tampi suangpa dia ka hon bawltak jiakin.
Huan, nakpi takin chi ka hon suangsak dinga, nang ah chi chih tham ngialngialte ka bawl dinga, nang a kipanin kumpipate a hong om khe ding uh.
Huan, kei leh nang leh na nunga na suante suante suan sawnsawnte tanin leng ka thukhun nang a ding leh na nunga na suante adinga a Pathian uh hi dingin, khantawn thukhun dingin ka hihkip ding.
Huan, na kiangah leh na nunga na suante kiangah mikhual na hihna gam, Kanan gam tengteng, khantawn gou dingin ka honpe ding hi; huan, kei a Pathian uh ka hi ding, achia.
Huan, Pathian mahin Abraham kiangah, huan, nang jaw ka thukhun na jui ding ahi; nang na jui ding ahi.
Na nunga na suante a suan sawnsawnte uh tanin leng a jui sam ding uhi.
Hiai kei leh nang leh na suante kala ka thukhun na juih ding ahi; na lak ua pasal peuhmah zeksum ding ahi.
Huchiin, na zekvun sa uh zeksumin na om ding uhi; huai nang toh I kala thukhun chiamtehna ahi ding.
Huchiin, na lak na, kuapeuh ni giat a upa, na suan sawnsawn tan un zong, na suan hi chiatchiat lou leng na in a piang hiam, mikhual kuapeuh a kipana dangka suma lei hiam leng, pasal peuhmah zeksum ding ahi.
Na in a piang leh na dangka suma na lei leng zeksum ngeingei ding ahi: huchiin, ka thukhun khantawn thukhun dingin na sa ah a omta ding.
Huan, pasal zeksum leh, a zekvun sa a zeksum a omlou jaw, huai nei a chipihte laka pat hihman ahi ding; aman ka thukhun hihsia ahi, a chi nawna.
Huan, Pathian mahin, Abraham kiangah, Na ji Sarai, a min Sarai na chi nawnta kei dinga, a min Sara a hizota ding.
Huan, amah ka vual jawl dinga huailou leng amah ah tapa ka honpe ding: ahi, amah ka vualjawl dinga, chi tuamtuam suangnu a hita ding; nam tuamtuam kumpipate amah apanin a hongom ding uh, a chi nawn leuleu a.
Huchiin, Abraham a khupboha, a nuia, a lungsimin, mi kum ja a upain ta a nei ding maw?
Sara kum sawm kua a upain ta a nei ding maw?
A chi a.
Huan, Abraham mahin, Pathian kiangah, Ismael na maah om thei le aw, achia.
Huan, Pathianin, hilou e, na ji Sara in tapa a hon neihsak taktak ding; a min dingin Isaak na sa ding hi; huan, ka thukhun, a nunga a suante dingin khantawn thukhun dingin, a kiangah ka hihkip ding.
Ismael tungthu leng ka hon ngaihkhiak sak hi: ngaiin, amah ka vualjawlta a. chi tampi ka suangsak ding, nakpitakin leng ka pungsak ding; aman kumpipa sawm leh nih a suang dinga, amah chi thupi takin ka bawl ding.
Ka thukhun bel Isaak, Sarain nikum hichi hun taka hon neihsak ding kiangah ahi, ka hihkip ding, achia.
Huchiin, a kianga thugen a tawpa huan, Pathianin Abraham a tungkah santa hi.
Huan, Abrahamin a tapa Ismael leh, a ina piang tengteng leh, a dangka suma a lei tengteng, Abraham inkuante laka pasal peuhmah, a pi a, Pathianin a kianga a gen bangin, huai ni mahin a zekvun sa uh a sumsakta hi.
Huan, Abraham a zekvun saa a zek a sum lai un kum sawm kua leh kum kua a upa ahi.
Huan, a tapa Ismael a zekvun saa a zek a sum lai un kum sawm leh kum thum a upa ahi.
Huai ni mahin Abraham leh a tapa Ismael zeksum a hita uh.A inkuanpihte laka pasal tengteng, a ina piangte leh mikhual laka dangka suma a leite leng, amah toh zeksum ahi vekta uh.

Abraham, sun ni sat laitaka puanin kongkhak bula, a tut laiin, Toupa Mamre tosaw kiangte ah a kiangah a hong kilaka;
Huan, a daka, a ena, huan ngaiin, a kiangah mi thum a na ding ua; huan, amuh takin puanin kongkhak a kipan a mau kipahpih dingin a vataia, lei siin chibai a buka,
Ka Toupa, non hehpih theih leh hehpihtakin na sikha honkheng mahmah ken:
Tui tawm chik bek honla henla, na khete uh sil unla, sing nuaiah khawl tadih un:
Tanghou tawm chik bek ka vala dinga, na lungtang uh halhsak un; huai khit chiangin pai jel nani uteh: huai ding jiak na sikha kianga hongpai na hi peuhmah ding ua a chi a.
Huan, amau, Na chih bangin vahihin, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Abraham, Sara kiangah puanin sungah a lut paha, tangbuang nel mahmah tehna thum bawl inla, mek inla, tanghoupeiin bawlin, a chi a.
Huan, Abraham bawnghon manin a taia, bawngnou hoih tak a honla, sikha kiangah a piaa; huan aman a bawl mengmenga.
Huan, nawitui date, nawituite, bawngnou sa bawlta a laa, ama uah a valuitaa; huan, singnuaiah a kianguah a ding nilouha, amau a neta uhi.
Huan, amau, akiangah, Na ji Sara koia om ahia? a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Pama puanin ah, a chi a.
Huan, aman hun a hongchin nawn peuhpeuh chiangin na kiangah ka hong nawn ngeingei dinga, huan ngaiin, na ji Sarain tapa a nei ding, a chi a.
Huan, a nunga puanin kongkhak bul a kipanin Sarain a na jaa.

Huchiin, Sarain tektak hih nungin kipahna ka nei diam maw, ka toupa lah a upata ngala?
Chiin, a lungsim in a nuia.
Huan, Toupan, Abraham kiangah, bang achia Sarain Kei pitekin ta ka nei tel diam maw?
Chia nui ahia?
Toupa adingin thil himhim a haksa lua ahia?
Hun sehin, ahun a hongtun chikchikin, na kiangah ka hong nawn dinga, huan, Sarain tapa a nei ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, Sarain, ka nui kei, chiin a kijuka, a lau jiakin.
Huan, aman, Juau juau ahi; na nui tawk ve, a chi a.
Huan, mite bel huai akipan a ding ua Sodom kho lam a en ua: huan, Abraham amau kah dingin a kiang uah a pai hi.
Huan, Toupan, ka thilhih ding Abraham ka im diam aw;
Abraham lah chi thupi leh thilhihthei tak a hong hi ngei dinga, amah ah lah khovel a chi chih navaka om ding ahi ngal ua.
Toupa lampi a zuih theihna ding un, a nunga a tate leh a inkuanpihte, thil kizen taka hihding leh vaihawm banga hih dinga, thu a piak theihna dingin amah lah ka septa ngala; huchiin a tungthu a genpa Toupan Abraham tunga a tunsak theihna dingin, a chi a.
Huchiin, Toupan, Sodom leh Gomorra khua kikou ging a thupi ngeia, a gilou mahmah ngei uh;
Tuin ka hohsuk dinga, a kikou ging uh ka kianga hongtung bangbangin a hih uhia hihlou ka en dinga; a hih kei uleh ka thei mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, mite huaia kipan a kihei ua Sodom kho lam a juanta ua; Abraham bel Toupa maah a ding lailai hi.
Huan, Abrahamin a nanaiha, Mi diktatte mi khialta laka hihmang tel ding na hi maw?
Kho sung ah mi diktat sawmnga bek a om kha ding uh: a sunga mi diktat sawm nga omte jiakin a khua hawi louin na hihmang ding maw?
Nang telin Huchibangin, mi diktatte mi gilou banga a om sam nadingua mi diktatte mi giloute laka hihlup sam jaw, na hih tel kei ding hi: lei tengteng Vaihawmpain diktat takin a hih kei dia hia? a chi a.
Huan, Toupan, Sodom kho sunga mi diktat sawmnga ka muh leh amau jiakin kho pumpi ka hawi ding, achia.
Huan, Abrahamin, Ngaiin,. kei leivui leh meivu lelin Toupa ka honhoupih theia:
Mi diktat nga in sawm nga ching lou ahi kha ding ua; ngaa a chinlouh jiak un kho pumpi na hihmang ding maw? achia, a dawnga.
Huan, aman, huailaia, sawm li leh nga ka muh leh ka hihmang kei ding, achia.
Huan, aman, amah a houpiha jela, Huailaiah sawm li kia na mu ahi kha dia, achia.
Huan, aman, sawm li jiakin leng ka hihmang dah mai ding, achia.
Huan, aman Toupa aw, heh ken, kon gen nawn ding: huailai ah sawm thum lel na mu ahi kha ding, a chi.
Huan, aman, huailaia sawm thum leng ka muh leh ka hihmang kei ding, achia.
Huan, aman, Ngaiin, Toupa ka honhoupih theita; huailaiah sawm nih kia na muh ahi kha ding, a chi a.
Huan, aman, sawm nih jiakin leng ka hihmang kei ding, achia..
Huan, aman, Toupa aw, heh ken, khatvei kia kon gen nawn ding, huailaiah sawm kia na mu ahi kha ding, a chi a.
Huan, aman, sawm jiakin leng ka hihmang kei ding, a chi a.Huchiin, Toupa Abraham toh a kihou khit tak un a paita; huan, Abraham amah omna lamah a kik nawnta hi.
