Huan, angel nihin nitaklamin Sodom khua a va pha suk ua; Lota Sodom kho kulh kongkhak ah a na tua: huan, Lotain amau a na mua, kipahpih dingin a dinga; huan, a mai a leisiin chibai a buka;
Huan, Ngai un, ka toupate aw, hehpihtakin na sikha uh in ah lut phot unla, giak unla, na khete uh sil un; huchiin na thou baih ding ua, na pai nawn na ding uh, achia.
Himahleh amau, hi lo e, kholak ah ka giak zo ding uh, a chi ua.
Ahihhangin aman a jawl jawla; huchiin a kiangah a pi ua, a in ah a lut ua; huan, aman meh a bawl a, tanghou silngou sohlouh a kanga, huan, a neta uh.
Himahleh, a lup ma un khua a mi, Sodom khuaa mite ngeiin veng tenga mi tengteng a tek akhangin, a in a um kimvelta ua;
Huan, Lota kiangah, Tujana na in a mi honglutte koia om uh ahia? amau ka kituahpih theihna ding un ka kiang uah honpi khiain, a chi ua.
Huan, Lota kongkhak bul ah a kiang uah a vapawta, kongkhak a khak nawna.
Huan, Ka unaute aw, hehpihtakin hichitelin gilou dah ve ua.
Ngai un, pasal kithuahpih ngei nailou tanu nih ka nei ahi; honhehpih unla, amau na kiang uah kon pikhe ding, hoih na sak bangun a tunguah na hih nading uh; hiai mite tungah jaw bangmah hih mahmah kei un, Huaijiakin ahi, ka in sunga a honglut uh, achia.
Huan, amau, honhon maiin, a chi ua, Huan, amau mahin, hiai mi soplai hiaia om dingin a hong pem luta, vaihawmpa a om a tum viala: tunjaw amau tunga hih sangin na tungah a hih hoih semsem ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan, mi (Lota) a bohta ua, kongkhak suse dingin a honnaih ua.
Himahleh miten a khut uh a golh khia ua, Lota a kiang uah in sungah a kailut ua, kongkhak a khak bikbek uh.
Huan, kongkhak bula mite, a lian a neuin, a mit uh a tosak ua, huchiin kongkhak a muzou kei uhi.
Huan, miten, Lota kiangah, hiai mite lou hiaiah inkuanpihte dang na nei hia? na makpapa leh, na tapate leh, na tanute leh, kho sunga na neih peuhmahte khua akipanin pi khiain:
Toupa maa a kikou husa a nathupi jiakin hiai khua hihmang ding ka hi uh; hihmang dingin Toupan lah a honsawl ngala, a chi ua.
Huchiin Lota a pai khiaa, a tanute kitenpih, a makpate kiangah a vagena, thou unla hiai khua akipan pawt un, Toupan khua hihmang sin ahi, achia.
Himahleh a makpate ngaihin chiamnuih thugen bang lel ahi.
Huan, phalvakin, angelten, Thou inla, na ji leh hiaia na tanu nih omte piin; huchilouin jaw hiai kho gawtna ah na mang tel kha ding uh, chiin, Lota a nohta ua.
Himahleh a awltat mahmah lai ngala; huchiin, Toupan amah a hehpih jiakin miten a khut leh, a ji khut leh a tanu nihte khut a len ua: huchiin a pikhia ua, kho polamah a koihta uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, polamah a pikhiak khit un, Na hinna dingin taikhiain; na nunglam nga kenla, Phaijang himhim ah leng khawl ken; hua tang sang ah suahtak sanin, huchilouinjaw na mang tek kha ding hi, achia.
Himahleh Lotain a kiang uah, ka Toupa, huchijaw hi kei hen:
Ngaiin, na sikhain na hehpihna a mua, nang na chitna na liansaka, huai chitna ka hinna humbitin ka tungah na langsak ahi; hua tang sang ah jaw ka tai theikei ding, thil hoihlou takin a honphain ka si kha ding:
Ngaiin, hua khua taina dingin a nai pena, kho neu chilik leng ahi ngala: aw, huailaiah (kho neu chilik ahi ka hia?) hontai sak jawin, huchiin ka hing ding hi, achia.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Ngaiin, huai thil tungtangah leng kon mang hi, na kho gen ka hihmang dah ding.
Kin inla, huailaiah taiin; huailai na tun mateng lah bangmah ka hih thei sin ngal keia, achia.
Huaijiakin huai kho min dingin Zoar a sata uh.
Lota Zoar khua a tunin leitungah ni a hongsuak khinta.
Huan, Toupan Sodom leh Gomorra kho tungah van a Toupa kianga kipanin kat leh mei a zu saka;
Huchiin, huai khuate leh, Phaijang tengteng leh, khua a mite tengteng leh, leitunga thil poute a hihmang vek hi.
A ji bel Lota nung lama kipanin a lehngata, chi khuam a hongsuakta hi.
Huan, Abraham bel takin Toupa maa a dinna munah a hohtou a:
Huan, Sodom leh Gomorra kho lam leh Phaijang gam tengteng lam a ena, a en gigea; huan, ngaiin, huai gam a meikhu halzulna meikhu bang maiin khu tou ngoingoi hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, Pathianin Phaijang khuate a hihman laia, Lota manthatna laka kipanin a sawlkhia hi.
Huan, Lota Zoar khua akipan a pai toua, tangah a oma, a tanu nihte leng a kiangah a om uh.
Zoar khua ah lah a om ngam ngal kei ua; huan, amah leh a tanu nihte kohawm ah a omta uhi.
Huan, a upa jawin, a naupang jaw kiangah, I pa a upataa, khovel tengteng dan banga honkithuahpih dingin lei ah lah pasal khat lel leng a om nawn ngal keia:
Kisain, I pa uain I dawnsak dia, huchiin I pa chi suan bei loua I bawl theihna dingin a kiangah I lum ding, achia.
Huchiin, huai janin a pa uh uain a dawnsakta ua: huan, a upa jaw a luta, a pa kiangah a valuma; huan, aman a lup lam a phawk keia, a thoh nawn lam leng a phawk sam kei hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, a jingin a upa jawin a naupang jaw kiangah, ngaiin, jan janin ka pa kiangah ka luma; tu janin leng uain I dawn sak nawn dia; huan, nang lut inla, I pa chi suan bei loua I bawl theihna dingin a kiangah valum samin, achia.
Huchiin, huai janin leng a pa uh uain a dawn sak nawn ua: huan, a naupang jaw a thou a, a kiangah a valumtaa; huan, aman a lup lama phawk keia, a thoh nawn lam leng a phawk sam kei.
Huchibangin Lota tanu nihten a pa uh lakah nau a pai tuaktuak uhi.
Huan, a upa jawin tapa a nei a, a min din Moab a sa: huai mi tulaia Moabte suangpa ahi.Huan, a naupang jawin leng tapa a neia, amin dingin Ben-Ammi a saa: huai mi tulaia Ammon suante suangpa ahi hi.
Huan, a naupang jawin leng tapa a neia, amin dingin Ben-Ammi a saa: huai mi tulaia Ammon suante suangpa ahi hi.
Huan, Abraham huaia kipanin sim gam lam juanin a kisuana, Kades khua ah a omta dih laia.
Huan, Abrahamin a ji Sara, ka sanggamnu ahi, achia: huchiin, Gerar kumpipa Abimelekin mi a sawla, Sara a vapi sakta.
Himahleh, Pathianin janin a mangin Abimelek kiangah a honga, a kiangah, Ngaiin, na numei pi jiakin misi phet na hita, mi ji lah ahi ngala, achia.
Abimelekin bel, a kithuahpih nai tadih keia; huchiin, Toupa, chi diktatte leng na hihlum sin ahia?
Amah mahin, ka kiangah, ka sanggamnu ahi, a chi alah?
Huan, amah ngeiin leng, ka sanggampa ahi, a chi behlap ngala: lungtang hoihtak pu leh khut siangthou tak nei kawmin hiai ka hih ahi, achia.
Huan, Pathianin a mangin, ahi, hiai lungtang hoih tak pu kawma na hih ahi chih ka theia, huchiin ken leng ka tunga na khelh ding kon kham ahi: Huaijiakin ahi, amah na khoih ka phal louh.
Huchiin tuin huai mi ji pe kik nawnin; amah lah jawlnei ahi ngala, a honthum sak dinga, huan, na dam ding hi: na piak kik nawn kei le jaw, na si ngei ding chih thei maiin, nang leng na neih tengteng toh achia.
Huchiin, Abimelek bel takin a thoua, a sikhate tengteng a sama, a bil uah huai thu tengteng a hilha: huan, miten a lau mahmah uh.
Huchiin, Abimelekin Abraham a sama, a kiangah, ka tung ua na thil hih bangchidan ahia oi?
Bang lamah ahia na tunga ka khelha, kei leh ka khua leh tuite tunga thil gilou thupi tak na hon tut?
Thil hih tuak louh tak ka tungah na hihta, achia.
Huan, Abimelek mahin Abraham kiangah, Bang na mua, hichibanga thil na hih maijen?
A chi nawna.
Huan, Abrahamin, hiai khau ah Pathian kihtakna a om hetkei ngei dinga, ka ji jiakin a honthat mai ding uh chih ka ngaihtuah jiak ahi.
Huailouin ka sanggamnu leng ahi hima, ka pa tanu ahi a, ka nu tanu bel ahi kei; huan ka jiin a hong omta ahi:
Huan, hichi ahia, Pathianin ka pa in akipana a honvakvaihsak laiin, a kiangah, hiai na hehpihna ka tunga na latsak ding ahi; ka tunna peuhmah uah, Ka sanggampa ahi, honchi jelin ka chi him ahi, achia,
Huan, Abimelekin belamte leh bawngtalte leh, sikhapate leh sikhanute a pia, Abraham kiangah a piaa, a ji Sara leng a pe kik nawnta hi.
Huan, Abimelekin, Enin, ka gam a ja akei hiam, na utna peuh ah omin, achia.
Huan, Sara kiangah, Enin na sanggampa dangka sang khat ka peta a: ngaiin, na kianga om tengteng lakah nang din mit khuhna ding ahi; na tung thu himhim ah na dik nawn vekta ahi, achia.
Huchiin, Abraham Pathian kiangah a thuma: huan, Pathianin Abimelek leh a ji leh a sikhanute a damsak nawna; huchiin tate a nei nawnta.Abraham ji Sara jiakin Toupan Abimelek inkote tengteng lah a chingsa vekta ngala.
Abraham ji Sara jiakin Toupan Abimelek inkote tengteng lah a chingsa vekta ngala.
Huan, Toupan a gensa bangin Sara a veha, Toupan a gensa bangin Sara tungah leng a hihsaka.
Huchiin, Sara a gaia, Pathianin a kianga agen hun seh takin Abraham a tek nungin tapa a neihsakta hi.
Huan, Abrahamin, a tapa neih, Sarain a neihsak, amin dingin Isaak a saa.
Huan, Abrahamin, Pathianin a kianga thu a piak bangin a tapa Isaak ni giat a chinin a zek a sumsaka.
Abraham a tapa Isaak a neih laiin kum ja a upa ahi.
Huan, Sarain, Pathianin honnuisakta; a ja mi chihon honnuihpih ding uh, achia.
Huan, amah mahin, Sarain naungekte a honpom ding chih, kuan ahia Abraham kianga genna dan thei ding? a tek nungin tapa ka neihsakta achia.
Huan, naungek a hongkhangliana, a nawinek a tawpsakta ua: huan, Isaak a nawinek a tawpsak ni uh Abrahamin ankuang thupi a luita hi.
Huan, Aiguptami Hagar tapa, Abraham a dinga a neihpan, a nuihsan lai Sarain a mua.
Huaijiakin Abraham kiangah, hiai sikhanu leh a tapa delhkhia in: hiai sikhanu tapa ka tapa Isaak gouluah pih ding ahi theikei ding, achia.
Huan, hiai thu a tapa jiakin Abraham ngaihin thil hoihlou tak ahi.
Himahleh Pathianin Abraham kiangah, Naupang tungtang thu leh na sikhanu tungtang thu na ngaihin thil hoihlou tak hi kei hen; Sarain na kianga thu a gen tengteng juiin; Isaak ah na suante a chi ding uh la ahi ngala.
Huan, sikhanu tapa ah leng, na suan a hih jiakin, chi chih tham ngial ka honbawl ding, achia.
Huchiin, Abraham bel takin a thoua, tanghou leh tuithawl tui a dim a laa, Hagar kiangah a piaa, a liangkolou ah a suansaka, naupang mah leng, a paisak taa; huchiin a paia, Beer-seba gamdai ah a vak a vakta hi.
Huan, tuithawl a tui a hong omta keia, huchiin naupang loubuk munkhat ah a koihta mai hi.
Huan, Naupang si ding ka en ngam kei, a chih jiakin a paia, gamla kuamah, thal kap phakna ding bangah, a majawn ah a vatuta khong khonga.
Huchiin, a majawn ah a tua, ngaihtakin a kapta hi.
Huan, Pathianin naupang aw a jaa; huan, Pathian angelin van akipanin Hagar a sama, a kiangah, Bang na chia ahia Hagar?
Lau ken: na omna naupang aw Pathianin a ja hi.
Thou inla, huai naupang phong inla, na khutin lenin, amah chi thupi taka bawl ding ka hi, achia.
Huan, Pathianin a mit a hihvak saka, tuileh a muta hi; huchiin a vapaia, tuithawl ah tui a dim dima, naupang a dawnsakta hi.
Huan, naupang kiangah Pathian a om jela, a hong khanglian jela; gamdai ah a om tou jela, thalkap siam a honghita.
Paran gamdai ah a oma; huan, anun Aigupta gam akipanin ji a guan hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, huailai khawngin Abimelek leh a sepaih pawl heutu Phikolin Abraham kiangah, na thil hih peuh Pathian na kiangah om jeljela:
Huchiin tuin hiailaiah Pathian min lou inla, kei leh ka tapa leh ka tapa tapa leng khem louin, ka honna hehpih khittaksa bangin kei leh na omna gam hehpih thuk sam dingin ka kiangah kichiam ve leh! chiin a gena.
Huan Abrahamin, Ka kichiam ding, achia.
Huan, Abimelek sikhaten tuileh a suh jiak un Abrahamin Abimelek a sala.
Huan, Abimelekin, hiai thil hihpen kua ahia, ka thei himhim kei: nang lah non hilh ngal keia, tuni ngallouin ka za nai himhim kei, achia.
Huchiin, Abrahamin belamte leh bawngtalte a pia, Abimelek kiangah a piaa; huan, a nih un thu a khungta uhi.
Huan, Abrahamin a belam hon laka belamnou a nu sagih a koih tuama.
Huchiin, Abimelekin, Abraham kiangah, Belamnou a nu sagih a tuama na koih bang achia ahia? achia.
Huan, aman, Hiai tuileh kei leh ahi chih na hontheihpihna dingin hiai belamnou a nu sagih ka khut akipan na lak ding ahi, achia.
Huaijiakin huailai mun Beer-seba ahia; huailaia a nih ua kichiam jiak un.
Huchiin, Beer-seba ah thu a khungta uh; huan, Abimelek a thoua, a sepaih pawl heutu Philok toh, Philistinte gamah a pai nawnta uh.
Huan, Abrahamin, Beer-seba ah meilah sing a suana, huaiah Toupa khantawn Pathian min a loua.Huchiin, Abraham Philistinte gamah sawtpi a om.
Huchiin, Abraham Philistinte gamah sawtpi a om.
Huan, hichi ahia, huai thilte nungin Pathianin Abraham a zeeta, a kiangah, Abraham, achia; huan, aman, Hiaiah ka om hi, achia.
Huan, aman, Na tapa, na tapa neih sun, na ittak, Isaak mah, pi inla, Moria gamah pai inla, huai ah kon hilh ding tang khat ah halmanga pumpiakna a dingin lanin, achia.
Huan, Abraham bel takin a thoua, sabengtung a bawla, a kiangah sikha tangval nih a pia, a tapa Isaak toh, huan, halmanga pumpiakna a dingin sing a eka, a thoua, Pathianin a hilhna mun lamah a paita hi.
Huan, ni thum niin Abraham a daka, a mun gamla piah a mu a.
Huchiin, Abrahamin a sikha Tangvalte kiangah, hiaiah sabengtung toh na om unla, kei leh naupang hua pamah ka vahoh ding ua; huan, Pathian ka vebe ding ua, na kiang uah ka hong kik nawn ding uh, achia.
Huan, Abrahamin halmanga pumpiakna sing a laa a tapa Isaak a posaka; aman mei leh temta a tawia; huchiin a nih un a pai khawmta uh.
Huan, Isaakin a pa Abraham a houpiha, Pa, achia; huan, aman, bawi, hiaiah ka om, achia.
Huan, aman endih, mei leh sing lah a oma; hileleng halmanga pumpiakna ding belamnou lah koiah? achia.
Huan, Abrahamin, bawi, Pathianin amah adinga halmanga pumpiakna ding belamnou a ngaihtuah tawm nakeh, achia: huchiin a nih un a pai khawm jel uh.
Huan, Pathianin a hilhna mun a vatungta uh; huan, Abrahamin huailaiah maitam a doha, sing achiang khawma, a tapa Isaak a gaka, maitama sing tungah a lumsaka
Huan, Abrahamin a khut a lika, a tapa thahna dingin temta a laa.
Huan, Toupa angelin van akipanin amah a samta.
Abraham, Abraham, achia: huan, aman, hiaiah ka om, achia.
Huan, aman, naupang tungah na khut kha ken, amah bangmah chih sam ken: na tapa, na neihsun mahmah leng na it louh jiakin Pathian na kihta chih tuin ka theita ahi, achia.
Huan, Abraham a daka, a ena, huan, ngaiin, a nunglamah belampa a ki a singbawka awk a na om a oma: huchiin, Abrahamin belampa a vamana, huai a tapa sikin halmanga pumpiakna dingin a lan zotaa.
Huchiin, Abrahamin huai lai mun min dingin Jehova-jire a saa: tuni tanin, Toupa tangah ngaihtuah hina ve, a chih jel bangun.
Huan, Toupa angelin a nihveina dingin van akipanin Abraham a sam nawna.
Hiai thil na hih jiak leh na ta neih sun na it louh jiakin; kei mahmahin ka kichiam, Toupan a chi:
Ka honvualjawl ngeingei dinga, vana aksi zah leh tuipi piaua piaunel zahin na suante ka pungsak ngeingei ding; na suanten a doute uh kulh kongkhak a neihsak ding uh;
Ka thu na man jiakin na suan ah khovel a chi chih a na vak ding uh, chiin,
Huchiin Abraham sikha Tangvalte kiangah akik nawna, huan, a thou ua, Beer-seba ah a om nilouh uhi.
Huan, hichi ahia, huai thilte nungin, min Abraham kiangah, Ngaiin, Milkain leng na nau Nahor tate a neihsakta ve, chiin, a hilh ua;
A ta masa Uz ahi a; a nau Buz ahi a, Kemuel Aram pa toh;
Chesedte, Hazo, Pildaste, Jidlapte, Bethuelte leng ahi uh.
Huan, Bethuelin tanu Rebeka a neia; huai giatte Milkain Abraham nau Nahor a neihsak ahi.A mei, a min Reumain leng Tebahte, Gahamte, Tahaste, Maakte leng a nei hi.
A mei, a min Reumain leng Tebahte, Gahamte, Tahaste, Maakte leng a nei hi.
Huan, Sara damsung kum ja leh kum sawm nih kum sagih ahi: huaite Sara damsung kum ahi.
Huan, Sara Kanan gama Kiriatharba khuaah a sia, (huai Hebron khua ahi): huan, Abraham Sara tunga om kitum ding leh kap dingin a honga.
Huan, misi luang maa kipan a thoua, Heth suante kiangah,
Na lak uah mikhual leh pemta lel ka hi a; ka misi luang ka muh louh dinga ka vui theihna dingin na lak uah vuina mun gou dingin honpia un, chiin a gena.
Huan, Heth suanten Abraham a dawng ua, a kiangah,
Ka toupa, hon ngaikhiain, nang ka lak ua lal thupitak na hia: ka han uah na deihna penpenah na misi viin: na misi na vuina dingin ka lak uah kuamahin ka han uh honpiak ka it kei ding uh, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Abraham a thoua, huai gam mi, Heth suante, chibai a buka.
Huan, ka misi ka muh louh dinga ka vui pha na sak uleh, honngaikhia unla, Zohar tapa Ephron kiangah honnget sak un,
A lou tawa om, a neih, Makpel kokhuk honpe dingin, na lak ua vuina mun ding gou dingin aman hun na sak zahzah uh la henla honpe leh, chiin, a houpiha.
Huan Ephron Heth suante lakah a tu nilouha: huchiin, Hit mi Ephronin Heth suante theihin, a kho kulh konga lut peuhmah nangawn theih in,
Hilou e, ka toupa, hon ngaikhiain: lou ka honpia, a sunga kokhuk om leng ka honpia; ka chipihte tate mitmuhin ka honpia hi: na misi vuiin, chiin, Abraham a dawnga.
Huan, Abraham huai gama mite maah a kuna, chibai a buka.
Huan, huai gama mite theihin Ephron kiangah, Pha na sak phot leh hehpihin hon ngaikhiain; lou man pen jaw kon pe ding; keia kipanin la inla, tualai kia ah ka misi ka vui ding hi, chiin, a gena.
Huan, Ephronin Abraham a dawnga, a kiangah,
Ka toupa, hong ngaikhiain: leimun, dangka sekel za li hu lel jaw, nang leh kei adingin gen tham ahi ahia? na misi vui maiin, achia.
Huchiin, Abrahamin Ephron thu a juita a; huan, Abrahamin, Heth suante theihin Ephronin dangka a gen zah, dangka sekel za li, sumsinte zat jel, a buk a, Ephron kiangah a peta hi.
Huchiin, Ephron lou, Mamre toh kijawn Makpel gam a om, a lou toh, a sunga kokhuk om toh, lou a sing om tengteng toh, a lou gi kim tengtenga sing omte toh.
Heth suante mitmuhin, a kho kulhkonga lut peuhmahte mitmuhin, gou dingin Abraham kiangah piak kipin a omta hi.
Huai nungin Abrahamin a ji Sara Kanan gam a Mamre toh kijawn (huai Hebron khua ahia) Makpel lou a kokhuk ah a vuita hi.Huchiin, lou leh a sunga kokhuk om vuina mun gou dingin, Abraham kiangah Heth suanten a pe kipta uh.
Huchiin, lou leh a sunga kokhuk om vuina mun gou dingin, Abraham kiangah Heth suanten a pe kipta uh.
Huan, Abraham a hong upataa, a hong tek mahmah taa: huan, Toupan Abraham thil bangkimah a vualjawl hi.
Huan, Abrahamin, a sikha, a inkuanpihte laka upapen, a neih tengteng tunga thuneipa kiangah, Hehpihtakin na khut ka pheipi nuiah golhin:
Huchiin, Toupa, van Pathian leh lei Pathian louin, ka omna Kanan mite nungak laka mi ka tapa ji dinga neihsak lou dingin, ka hon kichiamsak ding ahi:
Ka gam lama, ka tanaute kianga hoha, ka tapa Isaak ji na neihsak zo ding ahi, achia.
Huan, sikhain, a kiangah, Numeiin hiai gam lamah honjui nuam khol kei dia: na tapa na hong pawtna gam lamah ka pi kik nawn ding ahi diam?
A chia.
Huan, Abrahamin, a kiangah, ka tapa huailaia pi kik nawnlou dingin pilvangin.
Toupa van Pathian, ka pa in akipan leh ka pianna gam a kipan hon pikhepa leh hon houpihpa leh, hiai gam na suante kiangah ka pe ding, chia, ka kianga kichiampan, amah ngeiin a angel na maah a paisak dinga, huai akipanin ka tapa ji na hon neisak ding hi.
Huan, numeiin a hon zuih nop kei leh, ka kianga na kichiamna thu ah na siang mai ding; a bang a bang hitaleh, ka tapa huailaiah na pi kik nawn ding ahi kei, achia.
Huchiin, sikhain a khut a pu Abraham pheipi nuaiah a golha, huai thu ah a kiangah a kichiamta hi.
Huan, sikhain a pu sangawngsau laka sangawngsau sawm a kaia, a pu thil hoih chiteng tawiin, a pawttaa: huchiin a thoua, Mesopotamia gam a, Nahorte khua aha hoha.
Huan, nitaklama, numeite tuitawi dinga a kuan hun lai tak un, dainawla tuileh kiangah a sangawngsaute akhukdinsak a.
Huan, Aw Toupa, ka pu Abraham Pathian, hehpihtakin tuniin hon lohchingsak in, ka pu Abraham tungah hehpihna langsakin.
Enin, tuikhuk kiangah ka dinga, khua a mite tanute leng tuitawi dingin a hongkuan uh:
Huchiin, hichi hihen, nungak kuapeuh kianga, hehpihtakin ka dawn dingin na tui bel niamsak dih ve, ka chiha, huan, aman, Dawnin, na sangawngsaute leng dawn ding ka pe ding, chi peuhmah, huai mi ngei na sikha Isaak a dinga na mi seh hihen; huan huaiah ka pu tungah hehpihna na langsak chih ka thei ding hi, a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, a gen khit main, ngaiin, Abraham nau Nahor ji Milka tapa Bethuel tanu Rebeka tui bel a liangjang a puain a hongkuana.
Huai nungak a mel a hoih mahmaha, nungak siangthou ahi a, pasal himhimin a kithuahpih ngei hetkei uh.
Huan, tuikhuk ah a pai suka, a tuibel a dimsaka, a pai tou nawna.
Huan, sikha amah tuak dingin a taia, Hehpihtakin na tuibel a tui tawm chik hondan sak ve, achia.
Huan, aman, dawn ve, ka toupa, achia; huan, kintakin a tuibel a khut in a dom khe suka, a dawnsak hi.
Huan, a dawn nungin, na sangawngsaute dingin leng a dawn kham masiah uh ka tawi jel ding, achia.
Huan, kintakin a tuibel a gan kuangah a teia, tui tawi dingin tuileh lamah a tai nawna, a sangawngsau tengteng a dingin leng a tawitawi hi.
Huan, sikhain a lohchingsak leh saklouh theihna dingin a dai didea.
Huan, hichi ahia, sangawngsauten a dawn kham takun sikhain dangkaeng bilbah makhai buk leh, a khut a dinga tau nih dangkaeng dangka sawm buk a suaha;
Huan, a kiangah, kua tanu na hia?
Hehpihtakin hin hilh in.
Na pa in ah ka giahna ding uh mun om ding hia? achia.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Bethuel, Milka tapa, Nahor adinga neihsaknu tanu ka hi, achia.
Huan, amah mahin, a kiangah, buhpawl leh gan an ka hau tuaktuak ua, giahna mun leng ka nei uh, achia.
Huchiin, sikhain a lu a kunsaka, Toupa chibai a buk hi.
Huan, ka pu tunga a hehpihna leh a takna tawp tuanlou, toupa, ka pu Abraham Pathian, phatin om hen: kei leng, Toupan ka pu unaute in lamah hon na pi eive, achia.
Huan, nungak a taia, huai thute a nu inkuanpihte a vahilh hi.
Rebekain sanggam pasal a neia, a min Laban ahia: huchiin, Laban a pawta, tuikhuk lamah, mi kiangah a vatai taa.
Hichi ahia, bilbah leh a sanggamnu khut a taute a mua, min huchi khachiin honchi, chia, a sanggamnu Rebeka thu gente a jak takin, huai mi kiangah a hohta a; huan, ngaiin, amah tuikhuka sangawngsaute kiangah a na ding gige a.
Huan, Labanin, nang Toupa vualjawl pa, hong inla, ka in ah lutin; bangdia inpua a ding nilouh? in leh sangawngsaute adingin mun ka bawl khinta, achia.
Huan, huai in ah a luta, huan Labanin sangawngsau van a phela; huan, sangawngsaute adingin buhpawl leh gan an apia a, akhe leh a lawmte khe silna dingin tui a pia hi.
Huan, Abraham sikha maah nek ding a lui ua; himahleh, aman, ka hong na san thu kagen mateng ka ne kei ding, achia.
Huan, aman, gen ve, achia.
Huan, aman, Abraham sikha ka hi.
Huan, Toupan ka pu nakpiin a vualjawla, mi liantak a honghi a: Toupan a kiangah belam honte, bawng honte, dangkate, dangkaengte, sikhapate, sikhanute, sangawngsaute, sabengtung te leng a pia.
Ku pu ji Sarain tek ningin ka pu adingin tapa a neia: amah kiangah a neih tengteng a pe vek hi.
Huan, ka puin, ka omna gama Kanante nungak laka ka tapa ji dinga na neihsak ding ahi kei:
Ka pa in lamah, ka tanaute kiangah hohin, ka tapa dingin ji na neihsak zo ding ahi, chiin, hon kichiamsaka.
Huan, ken ka pu kiangah, Numeiin honjui nuam kei kha ding, ka chia.
Huan, aman, ka kiangah, Toupa a maa ka om jelnain a angel na kiangah honsawl dinga; na hohna dingah hon lohchingsak ding; huchiin, ka tapa dingin ka tanaute leh ka pa inkuanpihte laka ji dingin na neihsak ding hi:
Ka tanaute kiang ngeia na tun chiangin ka kianga na kichiamna apat na siang ding; nungak a honpiak kei uleh ka kianga na kichiamna akipan na siang ding, achia.
Huchiin, tuniin tuikhuk ka hongtunga, Aw, Toupa, ka pu Abraham Pathian, ka paina ah na hon lohchinsak ding leh, enin, tuikhuk kiangah ka ding hi:
Huan, hichi hi hen, nungak tui tawi dinga hongkuan, kuapeuh kianga, hehpihtakin dawn dingin na tuibel a tui tawm chik honpe ve, ka chih a;
Huan, aman, ka kianga, dawnin, sa sangawngsaute ading leng ka tawi ding, chi peuhmah, huai mi ngeingei ka pu tapa adinga Toupa numei seh hihen, ka chia.
Huan, ka lungsim a ka gen khit main, ngaiin, Rebeka a tuibel puain a hongkuana; huan, tuikhuk ah a paisuka, tui a tawia; huan, a kiangah, hehpihtakin tui hondawnsak ve, ka chia.
Huan, aman kintakin a liangjang akipan tuibel a dom khiaa, dawnin, na sangawngsaute leng dawn ding ka pe ding, achia: huchiin ka dawna, sangawngsaute leng a dawnsaka.
Huan, ken, kua tanu na hia? chiin, ka donga.
Huan, aman, Bethuel, Nohar tapa, Milkhain a neihsakpa tanu, achia: huan bilbah abil ah ka batsaka, taute leng a khut ah ka bunsak.
Huan, ka lu ka kunsaka, Toupa chibai ka buka, Toupa, ka pu Abraham Pathian, ka pu unaupa tanu a tapa adinga ji dia neisak dinga lampi diktaka honpipa, ka phat hi.
Huchiin, tuin ka pu na hehpih ua, a tunga chihtak peta na hih ding uleh honhilh un; na hih kei ding uleh leng honhilh un; huchiin taklam hiam, veilam hiam, ka nga thei ding hi, achia.
Huan, Laban leh Bethuel in a dawng ua, hiai thil Toupa kianga kipana pawt ahi: a sia a pha leng na kiangah ka gen theikei uh.
Enin, Rebeka na maah a om hi, pi inla, pain, Toupan a gensa bangin na pu tapa ji dingin om hen, a chi ua.
Huan, hichi ahia, Abraham sikhain a thu uh a jak takin lei siin Toupa chibai a buk hi.
Huan, Abraham sikhain dangka suang kizepnate leh, dangkaeng kizepnate leh, silh leh ten a lakhia a, Rebeka kiangah a pia a: a sanggampa kiangah leh a nu kiangah leng thil manpha pipi a pia hi.
Huan, amah leh a lawmten a ne ua a dawn ua, a giakta ua; huan, jingsangin a thou ua ka pu kiangah honpaisakta un, achia.
Huan, a sanggampa leh a nuin, naunu ni sawtlou chik ni sawm lel bek, ka kiang uah om tadih hen; huai khit chiangin a kuan nading, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, hon zekai sak kei dih ua, Toupan leh ka hohna ah hon lohching sakta ngala; ka pu kianga ka pai theihna dingin, honsawl zomai ve ua, achia.
Huan, amau, naunu ka sam ding ua, amah kam mahmah kihoupih leh, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Rebeka a sam ua a kiangah, hiai mipa kiangah na pai nuam maw a chi ua, huan, aman, pai nuam ve ning e, achia.
Huchiin, a sanggamnu uh Rebeka leh, a donnu leh, Abraham sikha leh a lawite a paita uhi.
Huan, Rebeka a vualjawl ua, a kiangah, ka sanggamnu uh aw, nang sing ngenta sang tampi nu honghi inla, na suanten amau hote kulh kongkhak neihsak uhen, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Rebeka a thoua, a sikhanute toh, sangawngsaute tungah a tuang ua, mi a juita uh; huchiin Abraham sikhain Rebeka a pi a, apaita.
Huan, Isaak Beer-lahai-roi lam akipan a honga, Sim gama om ahi ngala,
Huan, Isaak nitaklam pawnah kingaihtuah dingin a pawtkhia a: huan a daka, a ena, huan ngaiin, sangawngsau hongpaite a mu hi.
Huan, Rebeka a daka, Isaak a muhtakin sangawngsau tunga kipan a kuma.
Huan, Abraham sikha kiangah, pawna hondawn dinga hongpai kua ahia?
Achia.
Huan, sikhain, ka pu eive, achia: huchiin a kikhuhna puan a laa, a kikhuhta hi.
Huan, sikhain a thilhih tengteng Isaak a hilha.Huan, Isaakin Rebeka a nu Sara puan in ah a pi luta, huan, Rebeka a la a, a ji a honghita a; huan amah a it mahmah a: huchiin Isaak a nu sih nungin leng a hong lungmuang theita hi.
Huan, Isaakin Rebeka a nu Sara puan in ah a pi luta, huan, Rebeka a la a, a ji a honghita a; huan amah a it mahmah a: huchiin Isaak a nu sih nungin leng a hong lungmuang theita hi.
Huan, Abrahamin ji dang a neia, amin Ketura ahi.
Huan, aman Joksante, Jedante, Midiante, Isbakte, Suahte a neihsaka.
Huan, Joksan in tapa Sheba leh Dedan a neia.
Huan, Dedan tapate tuh Assurim te, Letusim te ahi uh.
Huan, Midian tapate Ephate, Epherte, Hanokte, Abidate, Eldate ahi uh.
Huai tengteng Ketura tate ahi uhi.
Huan, Abrahamin aneih tengteng Isaak kiangah a pia.
A mei tapate kiangah bel Abrahamin kipahmante a pia a; huan, amah a damlai in a tapa Isaak kianga kipan suahlam ah suahlam gamah, a pai mangsak hi.
Huan, Abraham damsung kum za khat leh kum sawm sagih leh kum nga ahi.
Huan, Abrahamin a kha a khahta hi, lu a kelsam pou vekin putek pi, tekkuna damin a sia, a chipihte kiangah piin a om samta hi.
Huan, a tapa Isaak leh Ismaelin Hit mi Zohar tapa Ephron loua, Mamre phak maa Makpel kokhuk ah a vuita ua;
Huai lou Abrahamin Heth suante akipana a leisa ahi: huailaiah Abraham a vui ua, a zi Sara toh.
Huan, hichi ahia, Abraham sih nungin, Pathianin a tapa Isaak a vualzawla; huan, Isaak Beer-lahai-roi kiangah a om hi.
Huan, hiaite Abraham tapa Ismael, Sara sikhanu Aigupta mi Haharin Abraham a neihsak suante ahi uh:
Hiaite a min chiat uleh a suante uh bang jelin Ismael tapate min ahi uh: Ismael ta upapen Nabaioth ahia; a naute Kedarte, Adbeelte, Mibsamte.
Mismate, Dumate, Massate ahi ua;
Hadadate, Temate, Jeturte, Naphisate leh Kedemte leng ahi uh:
Tuate Ismael tapate ahi uh: huaite a khua uh bang leh a giahbuk uh bangjela a min uh gelh ahi; achi uh bangjelin kumpipa sawm leh nih ahi uh.
Huan, Ismael damsung kum hiai zah ahi; kum ja leh kum sawm thum leh kum sagih; huan, a kha akhah a, a sia, a chipihte kiangah piin a om samta.
Huan, a tapate Havila gam akipanin Assuria gam lamsanga Aigupta gam phak maa Sur tanin a om ua: a unau tengteng kiang nai ah a om hi.
Huan, hiaite Abraham tapa Isaak suante ahi uh: Abrahamin tapa Isaak a neia:
Isaak in Paddan-aram gama Suria mi Bethuel tanu, Suria mi Laban sanggamnu Rebeka a ji dinga a neih laiin kum sawm li a upa ahi.
Huan, a ji a chin jiakin Isaakin Toupa a ji adingin nget petmahin a ngetsak a: huan, Toupan a ngetna a ngaihkhiak saka, huchiin a ji Rebeka a gai.
Huan, a nau paite a sungah a kisual ua; huan, aman, hichi bang ahih ngal leh, bangjiakin ahia ka hin leh?
Achia.
Huchiin Toupa dong dingin a kuantaa.
Huan, Toupan, a kiangah, Na sul ah chi nih a om uh, na gil sunga kipanin nam nih a kikhen ding uh: nam khat nam khat sangin ahatzaw dinga; huan, a upa jawin a naupangjaw na a sem ding achia.
Huan, a nau neih a hunin, ngaiin, a sul ah phik a hong omta ua.
Huan a masajaw a sana san seksawk, puan mulbanga mul thiapthuapin a hongpawta, huchiin amin dingin Esau a sa uh.
Huai nungin a nau a pawt nawna, a khut in Esau khetul a len gige a; huchiin amah min dingin Jakob a sa uh: huan, Rebekain amaute a neih laiin Isaak kum sawm guka upa ahi.
Huan, naupangte a hongkhangliana ua: huan, Esau sabet siam, gammi ahi a; Jakob bel mi mawl, puanin a teng mi ahi.
Huan, Isaakin, a sakhi sa a nek jel jiakin, Esau a ita; Rebekain bel Jakob a it jaw hi.
Huan, Jakobin be a huana; huan, Esau gam kuan a hongtunga, a tawl mahmaha:
Huan Esauin Jakob kiangah, hehpihtakin na be huan hon nesak in; ka bah mahmah mai, achia.
Huaijiakin ahi, a min dia Edom a chih uh.
Huan, Jakobin, na ta masa hihna honleisak phot lechin, achia.
Huan, Esauin, Ngaiin, si dekdek ka hi ngala: ta masa hihna kia kei dingin bang a phatuam dia?
A chia.
Huan, Jakobin, Tuniin ka kiangah kichiam photin, achia; huan, a kiangah a kichiama: huchiin ata masa hihna Jakob kiangah a khawng maimah ta.Huan, Jakobin Esau tanghou leh a be huan a piaa; huchiin a ne a, a dawna, a thoua, a paita; Huchibangin Esauin a ta masa hihna a ngaineu hi.
Huan, Jakobin Esau tanghou leh a be huan a piaa; huchiin a ne a, a dawna, a thoua, a paita; Huchibangin Esauin a ta masa hihna a ngaineu hi.
Huan, huai gamah, Abraham damlaia kial ke masapen chih louh, kial a hong ke nawna.
Huchiin, Isaak bel Philistinte kumpipa Abimelek kiangah Gerar khua ah a vahoh suka.
Huan, Toupa a kiangah a hong kilaka, Aigupta gamah hohsuk ken; kon gam hilh dingah om in.
Hiai gamah om tadih inla huchiin na kiangah ka om dinga, honvualjawl ding ka hi; hiai gam tengteng na kiangah leh na suante kiangah pia in, na pa Abraham kianga ka kichiamna ka hihkip ding hi;
Huan, van a aksi zahin na suante ka pungsak dinga, hiai gam tengteng na suante kiangah ka pe lai ding; huan, na suan ah khovela chi chih a hong navak ding uh;
Abrahamin ka thu a manga, ka thuhilhte Ka thupiakte, ka thusehte, ka dante leng a zuih bangin, achia.
Huchiin, Isaak Gerar khuaah tenna a bawlta:
Huan, huai khua a miten a ji tungtang a dong ua; huan aman, kasanggamnu ahi, achia: a mel a hoih jiakin, hiai khua a miten Rebek jiakin a honthat kha ding uh, chiin, ka ji ahi, chi ngam lou hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, huailaia sawtpi a om nungin, Philistinte kumpipa Abimelek tohleta kipanin a ena, huan, ngaiin, Isaakin a ji Rebeka a thoh lai a muta hi.
Huchiin, Abimelekin Isaak a sama, ngaiin, na ji a hina hi: bangdia, ka sanggamnu ahi, chi maimah na hia? achia.
Huan, Isaakin a kiangah, Amah jiakin ka si kha ding, ka chih jiak ahi, achia.
Huan, Abimelekin, Ka tung ua na thilhih bangchidan ahia? mite laka mi kuapeuh in na ji luppih kha thei uh a kei maw, huchiin, ka tunguah siamlouhna na hontungsak ahi ding hi, achia.
Huan, Abimelek mahin, Kuapeuh hiai mi hiam, a ji hiam, khoih hihlup ngeingei ding ahi, chiin mi tengteng thu a pia hi.
Huan, Isaak huai gamah buh a ching sama, huai kumin amun ja a neia: Toupan lah a vualjawla,
Huchiin amah a hong thupi mahmaha, nakpitaka mi thupi hongsuak hialin a honglian huaihuai hi:
Belam honte leh, bawnghonte a neia, inkuan leng tampi a nei hi: huchiin Philistinten a haja uh.
Huan, a pa Abraham damlaia, a pa sikhaten tuileh a toh tengteng uh Philistinten ahudim ua, leiin a hihdim vekta uhi
Huan, Abimelekin, Isaak kiangah, ka kiang ua kipanin pai mangin, kou sangin lah na hatzo ngala, a chi hi.
Huchiin, Isaak huaia kipanin a pawta, Gerar guamah a puanin a kaia, huailaiah a tengta.
Huan, Isaakin apa Abraham damlaia a tuileh tohte uh a tou nawna; Abraham sih nungin Philistinten la a nahudim vek ngal ua: huan, a pan a min a nasak bangbangin a min a sa chiat hi.
Huan, Isaak sikhaten guamah a tou ua, huailaiah tuileh naknei a mu uhi.
Huchiin, Gerar khuaa ganputen, Kou tui ahi, chiin, Isaak ganpute toh a kisel uh: huchiin amah toh a kisel jiak un tuileh min din Esek a sata hi.
Huan, tuileh dang a tou nawn ua; huai leng tuh tumin a kisel nawn ua; huchiin a min din Sitna a sa nawn hi.
Huailaia kipanin a kisuana, tuileh dang a tou nawna; huaijaw tuh tumin a kiselta kei uh: huchiin, tun Toupan mun lianpi a honbawlsak ta a, hiai gamah chi tampi i suangta ding hi, chiin, a min din Rehoboth a sa hi.
Huan, huai akipanin Beer-sebaah a hohtou a.
Huai jan mahin Toupa a kiangah a hong kilak a, Kei na pa Abraham Pathian ka hi: lau ken, na kiangah ka om hi, kon vualjawl ding a, ka sikha Abraham jiakin na suante pungsak ding ka hi, achia.
Huchiin, huailaiah maitam a doh a, Toupa min a loua, huailaiah a puanin leng a kai hi: huan, Isaak sikhaten huailaiah tuileh a tou nawn uh.
Huan, Gerar khau akipanin Abimelek a lawm Ahuzaath toh, sepaih pawl heutu Phikol toh, a kiangah a hoh ua.
Huan, Isaakin, a kiangah, Non ngai kei ua, na kiangua kipanin non pai mang sak ngal ua, bangchidan in ahia ka kianga na hong uh?
A chia.
Huan, amau, Toupa na kiangah a om chih chiantakin ka thei ua, huchiin I kikal uah, kou leh nangmah kal ngei ah, thu I khung ding;
Na jakdah ka hih ngeilouh bang ua, thil hoih kia loungal na tung himhim a ka hih louh ua, hoih taka ka honpai mangsak bang un, kou leng ka siatna dingin; tuin nang jaw Toupa vualjawl na hita hi, a chi ua.
Huan, aman amau adingin ankuang a luisak a, huchiin a ne ua a dawn uhi.
Huan, jingsangin beltakin a thou ua, a kichiam tuah ua: huan, Isaakin amau a paisaka, huchiin a kianga kipanin hoihtakin a pawtta uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, huai ni mahin Isaak sikhate a hong ua, tuileh toh thu a honghilh ua, a kiangah, Tui ka muta uh, a chi uh.
Huchiin, huai tuileh Seba a chi uh: Huaijiakin huai tuileh Seba a chi uh: Huaijiakin huai kho min tutanin Beer-seba ahi laia hi.
Huan, Esau kum sawm li a upa a hihin, Hit mi Beeri tanu Judith leh, Hit mi Elon tanu Basemath ji in a neia:Huaite Isaak leh Rebeka lungtang hih gentheite ahi uh.
Huaite Isaak leh Rebeka lungtang hih gentheite ahi uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, Isaak a hong teka, khomu theilou khopa a mit a hong mialin, a tapa upajaw Esau a sama, a kiangah, ka tapa, achia: huan, aman a kiangah, hiai ah ka om, achia.
Huan, aman, ngaiin, ka tek mahmaha, ka sih ni ding lah ka theikei a.
Huchiin tuin hehpihtakin na vanzat, na thal bawm leh na thalpeu, tawi inla, va gamvak inla, sakhi hon vamat sakin;
Huan, kasih ma a kon vualjawl theihna dingin, ka deihlam takin meh dingin limtakin honbawl sak inla, ka nek ding ka kiangah hontawi in, achia.
Huan, Isaakin a tapa Esau a houpih lai Rebekain a naja a.
Huan, Esau sakhi benga honpo dingin a gamvakta hi.
Huan, Rebekain, a tapa Jakob kiangah, ngaiin, na pan na u Esau kianga thu agen ka ja,
Sakhi honpuakin, ka neka, ka sih ma a Toupa ma a kon vualzawlna dingin, meh limtakin honbawl sakin, chiin.
Huchiin, ka tapa, tuin kon thupiak bangin ka thu juiin.
Gan hon lakah vahoh inla, kelnou nih hoih tak, huai a kipan in, honla in; huchiin huai a deihlam takin na pa adingin meh limtakin ka na bawl ding:
Huan, a sih ma a honvualjawl sak dingin, a nek dingin na pa kiangah na vahohpih ding ahi, chiin, a gen a.
Huan, Jakobin, a nu Rebeka kiangah, ngaiin, ka u Esau mi mulhau ahia, kei bel mi nel ka hi,
Ka pan a honna jawt vialvial kha dinga, huchiin amah adingin khempa bang ka honghi dinga, vualjawl gentaklouhin hamsiat kizon lel ka hi kei ding maw, achia.
Huan, a nu in, a kiangah, ka tapa, na hamsiat muh ding ka tungah om hen: ka thu jui inla, hon valakin, achia.
Huan, a kuana, a vala a, a nu kiangah a honpai piha huchiin, a nu in a pa deihlam takin meh limtakin a bawl hi.
Huan, Rebekain a tapa upa Esau puansilh hoihtak, inna a kianga om a la a, a tapa naupang jaw Jakob a silhsak a:
Huan, kelnou vunte leng a khut ah leh a ngawng nelna khawngah a phah a;
Huan, meh limtak leh tanghou a bawlte a tapa Jakob khut ah a pia hi.
Huan, amah a pa kiangah a hoha, Pa aw, achia: huan, aman, hiai ah ka om; ka tapa, kua zopen na hia? achia.
Huan, Jakobin, a pa kiangah, na tapa upajaw Esau ka hi; non sawl bangin ka hihkhinta: hehpihtakin thou inla, non vualjawlna dingin tu inla, ka sakhi sa nein, achia.
Huan, Isaakin, a tapa kiangah, ka tapa, bangchidan ahia, hong man gang na tel chia?
A chia.
Huan, Isaakin, Jakob kiangah, ka tapa, hehpihtakin hongnai dih ve, ka honna jawt vialvial ding, ka tapa Esau na hina na ngel hiam, achia.
Huan, Jakobin a pa Isaak a vanaih a; huan, aman a najawt vialviala, a aw lah Jakob aw hiven, a khut khawng lah Esau khut hiven achia.
Huchiin, a u Esau khut bangin a khut a mul jiakin amah a theikei hi: huchiin a vualjawlta hi.
Huan, ka tapa Esau ngei na hi maw? achia.
Huan, aman, hi e, a chi hi.
Huan, aman, hontawi naiin, huchiin ka hon vualjawlna dingin ka tapa sakhi sa ka nane ding, achia.
Huan, a hontawi naia, a neta a: uain leng a honlaka, huai leng a dawn hi.
Huan, a pa Isaakin, a kiangah, ka tapa, hongnai in, hon tawpin, achia.
Huan, a vanaih a, a tawpa, huan, aman a puansilh gim a ja a, a vualjawl hi, enin, ka tapa gim Toupa vualjawl gam gim bang ahi:
Huchiin, Pathianin van daitui leh, lei hoihna leh, buh tampi leh uain tampi hon pia hen:
Nam tuamtuam ten na nasem u henla, chi tuamtuam ten chibai honbuk uhen: na unaute tungah kumpipain om inla; na nu taten chibai honbuk uhen: honhamsiatte hamsiatin om uhenla, honvualjawl peuhmah vualjawlin om uhen, a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, Isaak in Jakob a vualjawl zoh takin, Jakob a pa Isaak kianga kipan a pawt khe man lela, a u Esau sabeng a hong tunga.
Huan, aman leng mehlim takin a bawla, a pa kiangah, Pa, thou inla, non vualjawlna dingin na tapa sakhi sa nein, achia.
Huan, a pa Isaakin, a kiangah, kua na hia?
Achia.
Huan, aman, na tapa, na tapa upajaw, Esau ka hi, achia.
Huchiin Isaak nakpiin a ling zungzunga, sakhi man, ka kianga a sa hontawi, na hongtun ma a ka nanek khit veka, ka vualjawlpa kua ahia?
Ahi, amah vualjawlin a omta himhim ding achia.
Esauin a pa thugen a jakin nakpi tak leh khase mahmahin a kapta a, a pa kiangah, pa aw, kei, kei leng honvualjawl mahmah ve aw, achi hi.
Huan, aman, na nauin a hong khema, nang vualjawlna a honlaksakta hi, achia.
Huan, aman, a min dia Jakob a chih uh dik mahmah hi lou hia?
Nihvei a honsuanta; ka ta masa hihna a honlaksaka; huan, ngaiin, tuin kei vualjawlna a honlaksak nawnta hi, a chi a.
Huan, amah mahin, vualjawlna kei dia honsit saklou maw? a chi a.
Huan, Isaakin a dawnga, Esau kiangah, Ngaiin, amah na kumpipain ka bawla, a unau tengteng leng a sikha dingin ka pe veka, buh leh uain leng ka vakta; nang a din, ka tapa, bang honhihsak ding ka hia? a chi a.
Huan, Esauin, a pa kiangah, Pa, vualjawlna khat kia ahi maw na neih?
Pa aw, kei leng honvualjawl mahmah ve, achia.
Huan, Esau ngaihtakin a kapta, huan, a pa Isaakin a dawnga, a kiangah, ngaiin, na omna ding lei hoihna tak leh, tunglama kipana van daitui kiakna ah ahi, na om ding;
Na namsauin ahi, na hin ding, na nau na leng na sem ding; huan, hichi a dinga, na kitutkhiak hun chiangin a hakkol na ngawnga kipanin na singkhe ta ding, a chi a.
Huan, Pa in a vualjawl jiak in Esauin Jakob a mudah a: huan, Esauin a lungsim in, ka pa sunni ding a nai ta a, huai hun chiangin ka nau Jakob ka that mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, atapa upa jaw Esau thugen Rebeka kiangah a hilh ua; huchiin, mi a sawla, atapa naupang jaw Jakob a sama, a kiangah, ngaiin, na u Esau in na tungthu ah, nangmah honhihlup tumin ka kinem ahi.
Huchiin, ka tapa tu in ka thumangin; thou inla, Haran khua a ka sanggampa Laban kiangah taimangin;
Na u hehna a daih mateng a kiangah ni bangjah hiam va om phot in:
Na u hehna na tunga adaih a, a tunga na thilhih a mangngilh ma teng: Huan, adaih a, a mangngilh chiangin mi ka sawldinga, huai a kipan ka hong pi khesak ding: bang dingin ni khat a na nih ua hon tan ding ka hia? a chi a.Huan, Rebeka in, Isaak kiangah, Heth tanu te jiakin hin ka chimtak mahmah: Jakobin, hiai gam nungak, hiai Heth tanu te laka te bang, ji dia a neih nawn ngial le jaw, kei dingin hin bang a phatuam dia?
A chi a.
Huan, Rebeka in, Isaak kiangah, Heth tanu te jiakin hin ka chimtak mahmah: Jakobin, hiai gam nungak, hiai Heth tanu te laka te bang, ji dia a neih nawn ngial le jaw, kei dingin hin bang a phatuam dia?
A chi a.
Huchiin, Isaak in Jakob a sama, a vualjawla, thu leng a pia a, a kiangah, Kanan gam nungak te laka mi ji dingin na nei ding ahikei.
Thou inla, Paddan-aram gama na nu pa Bethuel inn ah hoh inla, huai a kipan, na nu sanggam pa Laban tanu te laka ji dingin va nei in.
Huan, Pathian bangkim hih theiin hon vualjawl in, nam om khawm te na hong hih theihna dingin chi tampi hon suang sakin, hon pungsak hen;
Na mikhual na gam, Pathianin Abraham kianga a piak na luah na dingin Abraham vualjawlna leng hon tangsak hen, nang leh na suan te leng, achia.
Huchiin, Isaak in Jakob a paimangsaka: huan, Paddan-aram gama, Jakob leh Esau nu Rebeka sanggam pa Suria mi Bethuel tapa, Laban kiangah a pai ta hi.
Huan, Esau in, Isaak Jakob a vualjawla, ji nei dingin Paddan-aram gamah a pai mangsak chih leh, a vualjawl laia, Kanan gam nungak te laka mi ji dingin na nei ding ahi kei;
Chiin thu a pia chih leh, Jakobin a nu leh a pa thumangin Paddan-aram gamah a paita chih a theia:
Huchiin, Esauin Kanan gam nungak ten a pa Isaak lung a hihkim uh chih a theita;
Huchiin Esau Ismael kiangah a vahoha, Abraham tapa Ismael tanu Mahalath, Nebaioth sanggamnu, a ji dingin a ji neihsate a vaneih behlap nawna.
Huan, Jakob Beer-seba akipanin a pawta, Haran khua lam a juanta.
Huan, koilai mun hiam khat a tunga, ni a tum khit jiakin huailaiah a giakta hi; huan, huailaia suang khat a laa; lukhamin a neia, huailaiah ihmu dingin a lumta hi.
Huan, mang a neia, ngaiin leitung ah lei a hongkidoha, a dawnin van a suna; huan, ngaiin, a tungah Pathian angelten a kah un a kum uhi.
Huan, ngaiin, a dawn ah Toupa a dinga, Kei Toupa, na pu Abraham Pathian leh Isaak Pathian, ka hi: na lupna gam na kiangah leh na suante kiangah kon pe ding;
Huan, na suante leia leivui zahin a om ding ua, tumlam khawngah, suahlam khawngah, mallam khawngah, simlam khawngah na dalhjak dinga: huan, nangah leh na suanah khovela namchih anavak ding uh.
Huan, ngaiin, na kiangah ka oma, na paina peuh ah kon veng jel ding, hiai gamah ka honpi kiknawn ding; na kianga ka gen ka hih masak kei leh ka honnuse kei ding, achia.
Huan, Jakob ihmua hong khangloua, Hiai mun ah Toupa a om ngeingei hi; ken lah ka na theikeia, a chi a.
Huchiin, a laua, Hiai mun lauhuai namah e!
Hiai mun dang hilou hi, Pathian in nahi ei ve, hiai van kongpi nahi eive, a chi a.
Huan, Jakob jingkhangin a thoua, a suang lukham a laa, suangphuh dingin a phuta, a dawn ah sathau a buak hi.
Huan, huai mun min dingin Bethel a saa: a kho min bel a tungin Luz ahi.
Huan, Jakobin, Pathian ka kianga a oma, hiai ka paina lampia a honvena, nek ding tanghou leh silh ding puansilh TOUPAN a honpiak ding leh,
Ka pa in a lungmuangtaka ka pai nawna dingin, Toupa ka Pathian ahi dinga,Hiai suang, suangphuh dinga ka phut leng, Pathian in ahi ding: huan, ka kianga na honpiak ding tengteng ah sawm a khat ka honpe ngeingei ding, chiin thu achiamta hi.
Hiai suang, suangphuh dinga ka phut leng, Pathian in ahi ding: huan, ka kianga na honpiak ding tengteng ah sawm a khat ka honpe ngeingei ding, chiin thu achiamta hi.
Huai nungin Jakob a pai jela, suahlam tate gam a tungta hi.
Huan, a et leh, ngaiin, pawn ah tuileh a na oma, kiangah belam hon thum a kual uh: huai tuileh akipan belam honte tui a dawnsak jel uhi: tuileh konga suang om a lian mahmah.
Huan, huailaiah belam hon tengteng a paikhawm jel ua: huan, tuileh kong akipan suang a khuk suan ua, suang tuileh konga a omna ngeiah a koih jel uh.
Huan, Jakobin, a kiang uah, ka unaute aw, koi lama mi na hi ua? achi a.
Huan, amau, Haran kho lam mi ka hi uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Nahor tapa Laban na thei uhia?
A chi a.
Huan, amau, Thei e, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, A damlai ahi na hia? a chi a.
Huan, amau, Adamlai himah: enin, a tanu Rakil leng belam pi dingin a hongkuan, a chi ua.
Huchiin, aman, Ngai un, ni sang lai mahmah hi, gan pi khawm leng a hun nai kei: belamte tui dawnsak unla, vakhah un, a chi a.
Huan, amau, Ka hih theikei ding uh, belam hon tengteng a paikhawm ua, tuileh kong akipan suang a khuk suan mateng un huai khit chiangin belamte tui ka dawnsak jel uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, amau a houpih laiin Rakil a pa belamte piin a hongtungta; aman a ching jel hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Jakobin a nu sanggampa Laban tanu Rakil leh a nu sanggampa Laban belam hon a muhin Jakobin a vanaih a, tuileh kong akipan suang a khuk suana, a nu sanggampa belamte tui a dawnsak hi.
Huan, Jakob in Rakil a tawpa, ngaihtakin a kapta.
Huan, Jakob in a pa tupa ahihleh Rebeka tapa ahi chih Rakil a hilha: Rakil a taia, a pa a vahilhta hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, Labanin a sanggamnu tapa Jakob tanchin a jaktakin, a dawn dingin a taia, huan, a poma a tawpa, a inah a pita.
Huan, Jakob in huai thu tengteng Laban a hilh.
Laban in, a kiangah, kaguh leh ka sa mahmah na hi, achia.
Huan, kha khat a kiangah a omta hi.
Huan, Laban in, Jakob kiangah, ka tupa na hih jiakin a mawkin kana na sem ding ahi maw?
Bang na loh dia?
Honhilh in, achia.
Huan, Labanin tanu nih a neia: a upajaw min Lea ahia, a naupang jaw min Rakil ahi.
Huan, lea mit a nou a, Rakil bel chinou hoihtak ahia, a mel leng a hoih mahmah.
Huan, Jakob in Rakil a ita, huchiin, na tanu naupang jaw Rakil toh kiteng dingin kum sagih na na ka sem ding, achia.
Huan, Laban in, amah ahihleh midang kianga ka piak sangin na kianga ka piak mah hoihzo ve: ka kiangah om nilouhin, achia.
Huchiin, Jakob in Rakil a kitenpih dingin kum sagih a na a sepsak ta a; himahleh a it mahmah jiakin ni sawtlou chik bangin a thei hi.
Huan, Jakob in Laban kiangah, ka kithuahpih theihna dingin ka ji hon peve leh, ka hun lah a kimta ngal a, achia.
Huchiin, Laban in huai khua a mi tengteng a kaikhawm veka, ankuang a luita hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, khomial tungin a tanu Lea a pia, Jakob kiangah a piluta; huan, amah ana kithuahpih a.
Huan, Laban in a sikhanu Zilpa a tanu Lea kiangah a sikhanu dingin a pia hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, jingsang a hong hihin, ngaiin, Lea a nahita a: huchiin Jakob in, Laban kiangah, ka tunga na thilhih bangchidan ahia?
Rakil toh kiteng dingin na na ka sem kahia?
Bangjiaka honkhem maimah na hia?
Achia.
Huan Laban in, ka gam uah huchibanga ta upajaw ma a a naupang jaw paisak dan ahi kei hi.
Hiai minu ni sagih zou tadih inla, huchiin, kum sagih dang kana nasep sikin midang nu leng ka hon pe ding uh, achia.
Huchiin, Jakob in Huchibangin a hiha, ni sagih a zou ta a; huchiin, a tanu Rakil ji dingin a peta hi.
Huan, Laban in a sikhanu Bilha a tanu Rakil kiangah a sikha dingin a pia hi.
Huan, Rakil leng a kithuahpih a, Lea sangin Rakil a it jaw a, Laban na kum sagih dang a sem ta.
Huan, Toupan Lea pen huatin a om chih a theia, huchiin a sul a honsaka; Rakil bel a chiing a.
Huan, Lea a gaia, tapa a neia, amin dingin Reuben a sa a: Toupan ka gimdan a muh jiak ahi: tunjaw ka pasal in a honit ta ding, achia.
Huan, a gai nawna, tapa a nei nawna; Toupan huatin ka om chih a jak jiak in hial leng a honpia hi, achia, huchiin a min dingin Simeon a sa a.
Huan, a gai nawna, tapa anei nawna; tu in tapa thum ka neihsak jiakin, ka pasal in a hon juita ding, achia: huaijaikin a min dingin Levi a sa a.Huan, a gai nawna, tapa a nei nawna a: tu nung in jaw toupa ka phat ding, achia: huaijaikin amin dingin Juda a sa a; huan, ta a nei nawn tadih kei.
Huan, a gai nawna, tapa a nei nawna a: tu nung in jaw toupa ka phat ding, achia: huaijaikin amin dingin Juda a sa a; huan, ta a nei nawn tadih kei.
Huan, Rakil in Jakob ta himhim a neihsak kei chih a kitheih in a sanggam nu a haja ta a; huan, Jakob kiangah, tate hon pia in, huchilouin jaw ka si ding, achia.
Huan, Rakil tungah Jakob a heh guih a: huchiin, na gila gah phallou Pathian sik a ka hi ahia?
Achia.
Huan, aman, enin, ka sikha nu Bilha, amah kithuahpih in; huchiin ken leng amah a kipan a tate ka neihsam theih na dingin ka phei tungah ta honnei ding ahi, achia.
Huchiin, a sikha nu Bilha a ji dingin a pia a: huan, Jakob in amah ana kithuahpih a.
Huan, Bilha a gai a Jakob ta a neihsak ta.
Huan, Rakil in, Pathian in a hon ngaihtuah a ka aw leng a ja a, tapa honpia ahi, achi: huaijaikin amin dingin Dan a sa a.
Huan, Rakil sikha nu Bilha a gai nawna, Jakob tapa dang a neihsak nawn a.
Huan, Rakil in Pathian buan in ka sanggam nu ka buan a ka jouta, achia: huchiin a min dingin Napthtali a sa a.
Huan, Lea in ta dang anei nawn tadih kei lai chih a kitheih in, a sikha nu Zilpa a pia a ji dingin Jakob kiangah a pia hi.
Huchiin, Lea sikha nu Zilpa in Jakob tapa a neihsak a.
Huan, Lea in vangphat huai mah ei achia: huchiin amin dingin Gad a sa a.
Huan, Lea sikha nu Zilpa in Jakob tapa dang a neihsak nawn a.
Huan, Lea in, hampha natel ing e!
Numei ten hampha hon chiding uh eive, achia: huchiin amin dingin Aser a sa hi.
Huan, a buh lak laiin Reuben in jawl ai gamlak ah ava mu a; anu Lea kiangah hon tawi a.
Huchiin, Rakil in Lea kiangah, hehpihtak in na tapa jawlai a khen honpe dih ve, achia.
Huan, aman, ka kiangah, ka pasal non suh thil duai ahi hia? ka tapa jawl ai leng hon suh na tum nawn lai maw?
Achia.
Huan, Rakil in, ahihkeileh, n tapa jawl ai sikin tu jan in a hon lupih ding achia.
Huan, nitaklam in Jakob gamlak a kipan hong tunga, huan Lea a dawn dingin a kuan a, non kithuahpih ding ahi; ka tapa jawl ai in kon khel ta ngal a achia.
Huchiin, huai jan in a lupih ta hi.
Huan, Pathian in Lea thumna a ngaikhia a, huchiin a gaia, Jakob tapa ngana a neihsak nawna.
Huan, Lea in, ka sikha nu ka pasal kianga ka piak jiakin Pathianin ka loh honpia eive, achia; huchiin a min dingin Essakar a sa hi.
Huan, Lea a gai nawna, Jakob tapa gukna a neihsak nawna.
Huan, Lea in, Pathianin van hoih tak a hon neisak a; tuin jaw ka pasal, tapa guk ka neihsak tak jiakin, ka kiangah a teng ta ding, achia: huchiin, amin dingin Zebulun a sa a.
Huan, huai nungin tanu a nei nawna, amin dingin Dina a sa hi.
Huan, Pathianin Rakil a theigige a, huchiin Pathianin a thumna a ngaikhia a, a sul a honsak hi.
Huchiin a gaia, tapa a neia: Pathianin ka minsia a la mang, achia:
Huan, Toupan tapa dang honpiak beh hen, chiin, a min dingin Joseph a sa hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, Rakil in Joseph a neih nungin Jakob in, Laban kiangah, kei ka omna ngei ah, ka gam lam ua ka pai na dingin hon paisak ta in aw.
Na na ka sep san ka jite leh ka tate honpia inla, hon paisakin: na na kon sepsak dan leh na thei ngala, achia.
Huan, Laban in, a kiangah, na honhehpih theih leh, om tadih lai ve: Toupan nang vangin a honvualjawl chih aisan in ka thei hi, achia.
Huan, amah mahin, na loh ding sep inla, honhilh dih, huchiin ka honpe ding hi, achia.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, bangchin na na ka sema, bangchin na gan ka kiangah a om ua na thei akei hiam.
Ka hong main tawm chik kia na neia, tuin jaw tampi a hong phata uhi; ka kalsuanna lam peuh ah Toupan nang a honvualjawl jel hi: Ahihhangin chik chiangin ahia kei inkuante adia ka sep khiak sam ding?
Achia.
Huan, aman, bang ka hon pe dia?
Achia.
Huan, Jakobin, bangmah na honpiak ding ahi kei: Hiai thil na hon hihsak leh na gan hon ka khah dia ka ching nawn ding.
Tuniin na gan hon ka va enkhe vek dia, belam laka a vom gial petmah a gial leh a voma gial zekzek leh a vom peuhmah, kel laka a kanga gial petmah a gial leh a kanga gial zekzek te huaia kipan ka pi tuam jel dinga: huan, tuban huchibanga hong piang peuhmah ka loh ding ahi takei dia leh.
Huchiin, tuban, na mit muha khelha ka omna thuah na hongpai hun chiangin, ka diktatna in a hondawnsak mai ding: kel laka a kanga gial petmah a gial lou leh, a kanga gial zekzek lou leh, belam laka a vom lou ka kianga na muh peuhpeuh ka guk in na sep mai ding ahi, achia.
Huan, Labanin, ngaiin, na gen bang tak hile ake, achia.
Huchiin, huai nitak in kel tal a kanga gial tan leh a kanga gial zekzek teng leh, kelnu a kanga gial petmah a gial leh a kanga gial zekzek teng a kanna om peuhmah, belam, belam laka a vom tengteng toh a pi tuama, a tapate khut ah a pia a;
Huan, amah leh Jakob kalah ni thum lam a om saka; huan, Jakobin Laban ganhon dang tengteng a khah nawnta.
Huan, Jakobin hiangjau sing leh makha sing leh sesing chiang hing a laa, a hawng a khok ngou chiata, chiangte ah a ngoute a kilangsaka.
Huan, achiang hawng khohte gan honten, a hong dawn jelna tuikuangte ah, tui luannate ah, gan honte ma jawn jelah a koihta; huan, tui dawn dinga a hongpai chiang ua a gaina ding un.
Huchiin, ganhonte chiang jawnah a gai panta ua, a gial tante, gial petmah a gialte, a gial zekzek te a honnei jel uh.
Huan, Jakob in belamnou te khawng a koih tuma, huan, ganhonte Laban gan hon laka a gial tan leh a vom tengteng lam a ngasak jela; amah gan honte a koih tuam jela, Laban gan lakah a koih kei.
Huan, hichi ahi a, gan hat deuhte a hong gai pat peuh chiang un chiang laka a gai pat theihna ding un, Jakob in tui luanna ah, gan mitmuhin, chiangte a koih jela;
Ahihhangin gan a hat kei leh, a koih kei jel: huchiin a nou hat lou deuhte jaw Laban a ahi jela, a hat deuhta bel Jakob a ahi jel hi.Huchiin, Jakob nakpiin a hongpung a, ganhon hon thupi tak, sikhanute, sikhapate, sangawngsaute, sabengtungte a neita hi.
Huchiin, Jakob nakpiin a hongpung a, ganhon hon thupi tak, sikhanute, sikhapate, sangawngsaute, sabengtungte a neita hi.
Huan, aman, Laban tapaten, Jakob akipanin ahi, hiai thupina tengteng a muh, a chih uh a na zata a.
Huchiin Jakob in Laban mel a ena, huan, ngaiin tumalam bangin a tungah a hoih nawnkei chih a theia.
Huan, TOUPAN, Jakob kiangah, na pipute gamah leh na tanaute kiangah pai nawn ta in; na kiangah ka om jel ding hi, a chi a.
Huchiin, Jakob in mi a sawla, gamlaka a gan hon om nalamah Rakil leh Lea a sama, huan, a kiang uah,
Na pa uh mel ka muhin tumalam bangin ka tungah a hoih nawn kei chih ka theia; himahleh ka pa Pathian ka kiangah a om gige.
Nou leng na pa uh na ka theihtawpin ka sem chih na thei uh.
Himahleh na pa un honkhema, ka loh lah sawm veitak a hih lamdanga; himahleh Pathianin ka siatna ding a khoih a phal kei hi.
Gial petmaha gialte na loh ahi ding, a chih leh, gan tengtengin gial petmaha gialte a nei jel ua; huan, a gial tante na loh ahi ding, achih leh, gan tengtengin a gial tante a nei jel uh.
Huchibangin Pathianin na pa gante a laksaka, kei kiangah a hon peta hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, gante a gai pat lai un, ka mangin ka daka, huan, ngaiin, a pa, gan honte, a gial tante, gial petmaha gialte, a giala gial iakuakte ahi uh chih ka mu a.
Huan, ka mangin Pathian angelin, Jakob, honna chi a: huan, ken, Hiaiah ka om, ka chi a.
Huan, aman, Dak inla, en in, apa gan honte tengteng, a gial tante, gial petmaha gialte.
Agiala gial iakuakte ahi uh: Labanin na tunga a thilhih tengteng ka mu hi.
Kei, suangphuha sathau na nilha, ka kianga thu na chiamna Bethel, huai Bethel Pathian ka hi: tuin thou inla, hiai gam akipan pawt inla, na pianna gamah pai nawnta in, a chi a, achia.
Huan, Rakil leh Lea in a dawng ua, a kiangah, Ka pa uh in ah kou dingin tantuan leh gouluah ding a om lailai ahia?
Aman mikhual bang lela honsim hita lou hia?
A hon khawng khinta a, ka man ulah a ne khinta ngala.
Pathianin ka pa uh akipana sum a laksak tengteng ei leh I tate a ahi hi: huchiin Pathianin na kianga a gen peuhmah hihin, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Jakob a thoua, a tapate leh a jite sangawngsau tungah a tuangsaka;
Huan, Kanan gama a pa Isaak kianga pai dingin a gan tengteng leh a sum khol tengteng, a gan muhte, Paddan-aram gama a kholte, a paipih veka.
Huan, Laban bel a belam mulmet dingin a pimang hi: huan, Rakilin a pa milimte a guksak.
Huan, Jakob Suria mi Laban theihlouh kalin a guk pai mang hi: a paimang ding thu a hilh kei hi.
Huchiin a neih tengteng toh a tai mangta a; huan, a thoua, luipi a kana, Gilead tang lam juanin a pai jel hi.
Huan, a ni thum niin Jakob a taita chih Laban a hilh ua.
Huchiin a unaute api a ni sagih lamtan a delh a; Gilead tangah a delh phata hi.
Huan, Suria mi Laban kiangah janin a mangin Pathian a honga, a kiangah, Jakob kiangah a sia a pha a bangmah mah gen lou dingin pilvangin, a chi.
Huan, Labanin Jakob a delh phata hi.
Huan, Jakobin a puanin tangah a kai khina: huan, Labanin leng a unaute toh Gilead tangah a kai uh.
Huan, Labanin, Jakob kiangah, na thilhih hi bangchidan ahia oi ka theihlouh kala na guk pai manga, namsau salte bang maia ka tanute na pi mang?
Bang ding a hon taimang sana, hon guk paisan a, nopsaknate toh, late toh, khuangta te toh, kaihgingte toh ka hon khak theihna dia na hon hilh louha;
Ka tute leh ka tanute ka tawn phal lou oi?
Haihuai takin ahi thil na hih.
Hon hihse thei ka hi a; himahleh, na pa Pathianin, tu janin, Jakob kiangah a sia a pha bangmah mah genlou dingin pilvangin, chiin a honhoupih hi.
Huan, na pa in na ngaih mahmah tak jiakin, pai ut hi tawk lechin zong, bangdia ka Pathian te hon guksak na hia? achia.
Huan, Jakobin a dawnga, Laban kiangah, ka lau jiak ahi; na tanute non laksak teitei kha ding, ka chi a ahi.
Kuapeuh na Pathian te na muh na a hing kei ding uh: I unaute mitmuhin nanga ka kianga om en chian inla, la ve, a chi a.
Rakilin a na gu chih lah Jakobin a thei ngal keia.
Huan, Laban bel Jakob puaninte ah, Lea puaninte ah, sikhanu nihte puaninte ah a lut jela; himahleh a mu kei.
Huan, Lea puanin akipana pawta, Rakil puanin ah a lut nawna.
Huan, Rakilin milimte a na laa, sangawngsau van lakah a na koiha, a na tutkhuma.
Huan, Labanin a puanin sung tengteng a mai suak veka, himahleh a mu kei hi.
Huan, aman, a pa kiangah, Na maa ka din ngap louh jiakin ka toupa, hehken aw; numei omdan ngeina ka tunga a om laitak lah ahi ngala, achia.
Huchiin a zongzong a, himahleh milimte a mu zo ta kei hi.
Huan, Jakob a hehta a, Laban a salta: Jakobin Laban kiangah bangah ka taleka, bangah ka khial a, hon delh na hia?
Ka van tengteng na mai nung inleng, na insung van himhim banga na muh?
Kou nihte non ngaihtuah theih na dingin ka unaute leh na unaute maah koihin.
Kum sawm nih vengveng na kiangah ka omta; na belam pite leh na kel piten nou a nei khial ngei kei ua, na belam hon laka pate leng lah ka ne ngei ngal keia.
Gamsa keih leng lah na kiangah ka hontun ngeingal keia: ken a mang sikin ka thuak zaw jela; suna guk hiam, jana guk hiam lah ka dit na phut ngitnget a.
Hichibangin ka om jel; sun a nisa leh jan a khovot in a hon hihgim thei mahmaha; ihmut leng ka mu ngeikei hi.
Huan, kum sawm nih sung teng na in ah ka oma; na tanu nihte loh dingin kum sawm leh kum li na na ka sema, na gante loh dingin kum guk ka sem nawna; ka loh lah sawm vei tak na hihlamdang ngal a.
Ka pa Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isaak kihtak, ka kianga om lou hi ngial lehouh, tuin vuaktang lela honpaisak ngeingei ding na hi.
Pathianin ka haksat thuakdan leh ka sepgim dan a mua, Tujana honvau ahi, achia.
Huan, Labanin a dawnga, Jakob kiangah, tanute kei tanu ahi ua, naupangte kei naupangte ahi ua, gante kei gante ahi ua, na muh tengteng keia vek ahi uh: tuniin hiai ka tanute tungah leh a ta neihte uh tungah bang ka hih thei dia?
Kisain, kei leh nang thu I khung ding; huai kei leh nang kalah theihna hi hen, a chi a.
Huchiin, Jakobin suang a laa, suangphuh dingin a phuta.
Huan, Jakobin a unaute kiangah, suang la khawm un, a chi a; huan, suang a la ua, achiang ua: huan, suangchian khawm kiangah an a ne uh.
Huan, Labanin huai suang chian khawm, Jegarsahadutha, a chi a; Jakobin bel Galeed, a chi hi.
Huan, Labanin, hiai suang chian khawm tuiin kei leh nang kikalah theihna ahi, a chi a.
Huaijiakin a min dingin Galeed chih a hita:
Mizpa chih leng ahi, Labanin, kikhen a I om hun chiangin TOUPAN honveng tuaktuak hen,
Ka tanute na suk gentheiha, ka tanute lou ji dang na neih leh, kuamah i kiangah a om kei na ua, enin, Pathian kei leh nang kal hontheihpihpa ahi, a chi ngala.
Huan, Laban mahin, hiai suang chian khawm en lechin, keimah leh nangmah kikala hiai suang ka phuh leng enin.
Poi kikhoihsak dingin kei hiai suang khengin na kiang lamah ka hongpai kei ding, chih leh, nang leng hiai suang chian khawm leh hiai suang phuh khengin kei kiang lamah na hongpai kei ding chih, hiai suang chian a theihna hi henla, hiai suangphuh leng a theihna mah hi hen.
Abraham Pathian, Nahor Pathian, a pa uh Pathianin I kalah thu ngaihtuah hen, a chi nawna.
Huan, Jakobin a pa Isaak kihtak louin a kichiamta.

Huan, Jakob in, Seir gam a, Edom pawn lamah, a u Esau kiangah a maah thangkoute a paisaka.
A kianguah, ka toupa Esau a kiangah hichiin na gen ding uh, na sikha Jakobin hichiin a chi hi: Laban kiangah mikhual ka hia, tu tanin ka om nilouha:
Bawngtalte, sabengtung leh belamte, sikhapa leh sikhanute khawng ka neia; hichiin na hehpihna ka muh theihna dingin ka toupa hilh dingin mi ka honsawl ahi, a chi a, chiin, amau thu a pia hi.
Huan, thangkoute Jakob kiangah a hong kik nawn ua, Na u Esau kiang ka va tung ua, huan, mi za li honpiin hongdawn dingin a hongpai hi, chiin, a gen ua.
Huchiin, Jakobin a lau mahmah a, a lungkhamta a: huchiin a kianga mi omte, belam honte, bawng honte, sangawngsaute pawl nihin a khen a;

Huan, Jakob mahin, aw Toupa, na gam lamah leh na tanute kiangah pai nawnta in, huchiin ka honhih hoih ding, honchipa:
Na sikha tunga hehpihna tengteng na muhsak leh thutak tengteng na muhsak laka, a neupen leng mu tuak ka hi kei hi; hiai Jordan lui ka chiang kia toh ka kana; tuin jaw pawl nih hial ka honghita hi.
Hehpihtakin ka u khut akipan, Esau khut akipan, hon humbit in; numei naupang takna honthah lah ka lau ngala.
Nang, ka hon hihhoih ngeingei dinga, na suante tuipi a piaunel sim zohlouh tan hiala tam bangin ka bawl ding na chi a, a chi a.
Huan, huai jan in huailaiah a giakta a; huan, a neih laka kipan a u Esau adingin kipahman a lakhia;
Kelpi zanih, keltal sawmnih, belampi zanih leh belampa sawmnih,
Sangawngsau zatlai sawmthum a noute utoh, bawngpi sawmli leh bawngtal sawm, sabengtungpi sawm nih leh sabengtung nou sawm.
Huan, huaite pawl chih a tuam chiatin a sikhate khut ah a kemsaka; huan, a sikhate kiangah, ka maah pai galkah unla, pawl chih kal nei sak jel un, a chi a.
Huan, a makai pa kiangah, ka u Esauin hontuaha, na kianga, kua na hia? kaw hoh dek na hia? na maa omte kuaa ahi ua? chia a hondot leh,
Na sikha Jakob a ahi uh; ka pu Esau, nanga dia kipahman dinga honkhak ahi: ngaiin, amah hua ka nung uah a om, chiin, thu a pia hi.
Huan, a zom leh a zom nawn leh, gan hon hawlte tengteng kiangah leng, Esau na muh hun chiang un huchibang mahin na gen ding uh ahi.
Huan, ngaiin, na sikha hua ka nung uah a om, chi chiat un, chiin thu a pe chiat hi.
Kipahman ka maah pai leh a lung ka damsak ding a, huai nungin a mel ka mu ding; huchiin, a honna kipahpih kha ding, a chi ahi.
Huchiin, kipahman a maah a pai galkah saka; amah bel, huai janin a pawlte lakah a giak hi.
Huan, janin a thoua, a ji nih leh, a sikhanu nihte leh a ta sawm leh khat te a pi a, Jabbok lui ngahna ah a pita.
Huchiin, a mau a pi a, lui a kan ua, a neih tengteng leng a kansak vek hi.
Huan, Jakob amah kia in a omta; huan, mi khat toh phalvak tan a kibuan buan

Huan, aman, hon khah in, phalvak ding a hita, a chi a.
Huan, aman, na hon vualjawl keileh ka hon khah kei ding, achia.

Achia.
Huan, aman, Jakob a chi a

Achia.
Huan, huailaiah a vualjawlta.
Huan, Jakobin huailai mun ding in Peniel a chi a: Pathian a ma chin mahmah ah ka mu a, ka hinna hon hawisak jiakin a chi a.

Huan, Jakob a daka, hua, ngaiin, Esau a kianga mi zali toh a hongpaia.
Huchiin, a tate Lea kiangah te, Rakil kiangah te, sikhanu kiangah te a om khipkhep ua.
Huan, sikhanute leh a tate uh a makai penin a koiha, Lea leh a tate a zomin a koiha, Rakil leh Joseph bel a nanung penin a koih hi.
Huan, amah a ma uah a paia, a u kiang chin a tun masiah sagih vei lei siin chibai a buk hi.
Huan, Esau amah kipahpih dingin a taia, a poma, a ngawnga kunin, a tawpa: Huan, a kap khawm uhi.
Huan, Esau a daka, numeite leh naupangte a mua; huchiin, non pite kuate ahi ua? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Pathianin hehpihtaka na sikha kianga a piak naupangte ahi uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, sikhanute, amau leh a tate uh toh a hongpai ua, a kun ua, chibai a buk uh.
Huan, Lea leng a tate toh a hongpai naia, a kun ua, chibai a buk uh; huan, huai nungin Joseph leh Rakil a hongpai nai ua, a kun ua, chibai a buk sam uhi.
Huan, Esauin, ka gan hon kituahpih tengpi bangchidan ahia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Ka toupa, na hehpihna ka muh theihna dingin ka chi a ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Esauin, ken leng hau veng e, bawi aw, na neih tengteng nanga hi hen, a chi a.
Huan, Jakobin, Hilou e, non hehpih theihna leh, hehpihtakin kon kipahman piakte hon sansak in: Pathian mel mu bangin na mel ka mu a, ka tungah lah na kipak ngala.
Pathianin hon hehpih jiak leh, ka hauh jiakin ka hon thilpiakte sangin, a chi a.
Huchiin a kunkun a, a sangta hi.
Huan, Esauin, Kisain, I pai ding, ma kon kaihsak ding, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, naupangte a neu lai dan u leh, belam hon ka kianga omte a nou a hih dan uh, ka toupa, na thei hi; khat lel leng hat lua a a hawl uleh, ganhon tengteng a si mai ding uh.
Ka toupa, hehpihtakin na sikha maah pai inla: Ken bel Seir tang ah, ka toupa, na kiang ka tun mateng, ka ma a gan pai a pai theih hun bangbang u leh, naupangte pai theih hun bangbangin, awlawl in ka hon masuan jel ding hi a chi a.
Huan, Esauin, ka kianga om mi khenkhat te hon nutsiat beh leng ake, a chi a.
Huan, aman, bang a chi chitchiat a?
A chia.
Huchiin, Esau huai ni mahin Seir tang lam juanin a kiknawnta hi.
Huan, Jakob Sukkoth min ah a paia, amah ading in a lama, a gante ading leng bukta te alama; huaijiakin huailai mun min dingin Sukkoth a chita hi.
Huan, Jakob Paddan-aram gam akipan a honga, lungmuang takin Sekem khua, Kanan gam a om, a tunga, dainawla ah a puanin a jakta hi.

Huan, Lea tanu Dina, Jakob a neihsak, huai gam nungak te mu dingin a pawtkhia.
Huan, Hiv mi Hamor, huai gam lal tapa Sekemin amah a na mua; a mana, a luppih a, a ninsak hi.
Huan, a lungsim Jakob tanu Dina tungah a om bikbeka, huai nungak lah a ita, amah kamsiam takin a houpiha.
Huan, Sekem in a pa Hamor a houpiha, huai nungak ji dingin honnei sakin, a chi a.
Huan, Jakobin a tanu Dina a ninsak khin chih a ja a; a tate gamlak ah a gan lak uah a om ua: huchiin, a hongtun mateng uh Jakob a dai dide hi.
Huan, Sekem pa Hamor Jakob houpih dingin a kiangah a hoha.
Huan, Jakob tapaten a jak tak un gamlak akipanin a hongpaita ua: huan, Jakob tanu luppihin Israelte laka thil gilou haihuaitak, thil hih hetlouh ding, a hih jiakin a lungkham ua, a heh mahmah uh.
Huan, Hamorin a mau a houpiha, ka tapa Sekem lungsim na tanu uh tungah a om bikbeka: hehpihtakin ji dingin nei sak ve ua.
Huchiin, ki la tuah ve ni e; na tanute uh hon lasak unla, ka tanute uleng lasam un.
Huchiin, ka kiang uah na om ding ua; gam leng a kiching gige ding: hiai khawngah om unla, sum sin unla, hiai khawngah kihih inbul un, a chi a.
Huan, Sekemin nungak pa leh a sanggampa te kiangah, honhehpih ve ua, ka kianga na gen peuh uh ka honpe ding.
Man leh thilpiak jaw bang zah bang zah ngen le uchin, na chih bangbang un k a honpe ding: abang hileh, nungak pen ji dingin hon neisak phot un, a chi a.
Huan, Jakob taten, a sanggamnu uh Dina a nitsak jiakin.
Sekem leh a pa Hamor zekhemna in a dawng ua, a gen sam ua, a kiang uah.
Hiai thil zeksumloute kianga ka tanu uh piak pen ka hih theikei ding uh; huailah kou dingin minsiatna ahi ngala:
Hichibanga kichiam kiain na thu bang uh pha ka sa ding uh: na lak ua pasal peuhpeuh zeksumin kou bangin om unla;
Huchiin ka tanute uh kon neisak ding uh, kou leng na tanute uh ka nei sam ding uh, huan, na kiang uah ka om ding ua, chi khat hi ding I hi.
Himahleh, zeksum thu a ka thu uh na zuih kei ding u leh ka tanu uh ka pi ding ua, kapai mai ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan, a thu un Hamor leh Hamor tapa Sekem a kipaksak hi.
Huchiin, tangval in bel Jakob tanu a deih mahmah jiakin, huai thil sawt hallou in a hih tamai hi: amah a pa inkuante inkuan tengteng laka mite zahtak pen ahi hi.
Huan, Hamor leh a tapa Sekem in a kho kulh kongkhak uh a pha ua, a khuate uh a houpih ua,
Hua jite hon kituahpih takin a om ua; huaijiakin hiai gamah omin, hiai khawng ah sumsin uhen; ngai un, amau dingin gam lah a za hun ngal a; a tanute uh ji dingin nei lehang, i tanute leng neisak sam ni.
Himahleh chi khat i hong hihna dinga I kianga om hichibanga I chiam kia in hua miten pha a honsakpih ding uhi, zeksum a hih uh bangin I lak ua pasal peuhpeuh zeksum hong hita lehang.
A gante uh, a sum te uh, a sa tengteng uh eia ahi vek kei dia hia?
A thu uh pha sakpih mai ve ni, huchiin I kianga om ding uhi, achi ua.
Huan, Hamor leh a tapa Sekem thu a kho kulh kongkhak a pawt tengteng in a jui ua; a kho kulh kongkhak a pawt tengteng pasal peuhpeuh, zek a sumsak uhi.
Huan, hichi ahia, a ni thum ni in, a gim laitak un, Jakob tapate laka mi nih, Dina sanggampa Simeon leh Levi in a namsau uh tawi tuaktuak in a gukin khua a sualta ua, pasal tengteng a that gam uh.
Huchiin, Hamor leh a tapa Sekem namsau hiam in a that ua, Sekem in akipan in Dina a pi ua, a pawt uh.
Jakob tapaten a mi thah te uh a va pha nawn ua, a tanu uh a nitsak jiak un huai khua a lokta uhi.
A belam honte uh, a bawng honte uh, a sabengtung te uh, a khua ua thil omte, a lou ua thil omte a laksak ua:
A sum tengteng u leh, a ta a nau neu chik chik leh a jite tengteng, in sunga om peuhmah a man ua, a lok uhi.
Huan, Jakob in Simeon leh Levi kiangah, nou hiai gam a omte laka, Kanan te leh Periz te lakah, huat non posak ua non lungjing sak mahmah uh: kei tawmchik ka hih jiakin honsual dingin a kikhawm khawm ding ua, hon that mai ding uh; huchiin, hih mangin ka om dinga, kei leh ka inkuanpihte toh, achia.Huan, amau, ka sanggamnu uh kijuak bawl bangin a bawl ding ahi diam?
A chi uhi.
