A chi uhi.
Huan, Pathianin, Jakob kiangah, thou inla, Bethel ah hohtou in, huailaiah om in: huan, na u Esau kianga kipan a na tai mang laia na kianga kilak Pathian a dingin huailaiah maitam dohin, achia.
Huchiin, Jakob in a inkuanpihte leh a kianga om tengteng kiangah, na lak ua mi dang Pathian omte koih mang unla, ki hih siangthou unla, na puansilh te uh kheng un:
I thou ding ua, Bethel ah I paitou ding uh; huchiin, ka lungjin laia hon dawng, ka paina a ka kianga omjel Pathian a dingin maitam ka doh ding hi, achia.
Huchiin, mi dang Pathian a khut ua om tengteng leh a bil ua bilbah a bah tengteng uh Jakob kiangah a pia ua; huan, Jakob in Sekem kho kianga tosaw nuaiah a selta hi.
Huan, a pai ua: a kim ua khuate un a kihta mahmah ua, Jakob tapate a delh kei uh.
Huchiin, Jakob Kanan gama Luz khua a tunga, amah leh a kianga om tengteng toh (Luz Bethel ahi).
Huan, huaiah maitam a doha, a u kianga kipana a taimang lai in huailaiah Pathian a kianga a kilak jiakin, huai mun El-Bethel a chita hi.
Huan, Rebeka honnu Debor a si a, Bethel nuaia tosaw nuaiah a vui ua; a tosaw min Allonbakuth a chi uh.
Huan, Jakob Paddan-aram gam akipana a hongtun in Pathian a kiangah a kilak nawna, a vualjawla.
Pathianin a kiangah, na min Jakob ahi a; na min Jakob ahi nawnta kei ding, na min Israel a hizota ding, achia: huchiin, a min dingin Israel a chita hi.
Huan, Pathian mahin a kiangah, kei Pathian bangkim hihthei ka hi: chi tampi suangin hong pungin; chi chih tham ngial leh chi tuamtuam om khawm leng nangah a hong om ding ua, na khal a kipanin kumpipate leng a hongpawt ding uh;
Huan, Abraham leh Isaak kianga ka gam piak na kiangah ka honpe ding, na om louh nung chianga na suante kiangah leng gam jaw ka pe jel ding, achia.
Huan, Pathianin amah a houpih na mun a kipan in Jakob a paitouh santa.
Huan, a houpih na mun ah Jakob in banghiam a suana, (suang ahi, a phuh): a tungah thil lat, dawn chi, a buaka, a tungah sathau leng a buak hi.
Huan, Jakob in, Pathian in a houpih na mun min dingin Bethel asa hi.
Huan, Bethel akipan in a pai ua; huan, Ephrath kho tunna ding gamla tak ahi laia: huan, Rakil in nau a veia, a nak vei mahmah a.
Huan, hichi ahia, a gim laitakin nau dom miin, lau ken: tapa dang na nei dinga hi, achia.
Huan, hichi ahia, a kha a pawt dek laiin (a sita ngala) a min dingin Ben-oni a sa a: a pan bel Benjamin a sa hi.
Huchiin, Rakil a sia, Ephrath lampi ah a vui ua (Ephrath khua Bethlehem khua ahi).
Huan, a han tungah Jakob in suang a phuta: huai tutanin Rakil han suangphuh ahi lai hi.
Huan, Israel bel a pai jela, Migdol Eder khen lamah a puanin a kaia.
Huan, hichi ahia, Israel huai gama om laiin Reuben in a pa mei Bilha a valuppiha: huan, Israel in huai a ja a.
Huan, Jakob tapate sawm leh nih ahi ua: Lea tapate Reuben (Jakob ta masa) te, Simeon te, Levi te, Juda te, Issakar te, Zebulun te ahi uhi:
Rakil tapate Joseph leh Benjamin ahi ua:
Rakil sikhanu Bilha tapate Dan leh Napthali ahi ua:
Huan, Lea sikhanu Zilpa tapate Gad leh Aser ahi ua: huaite Jakob tapa, Paddan-aram gama a neihte ahi uh.
Huan, Jakob Kiriath-arba khua a Abraham leh Isaak omna Mamrea a pa Isaak kiang a tungta.
(Kiriath-arba khua Hebron ahi).
Huan, Isaak damsung kum ja leh kum sawm giat ahi.Huan, Isaakin a kha a khah a, upapi tek kuna damin a si a, a chipihte kiangah piin a om samta: huan, a tapa Esau leh Jakob in a vuita uhi.
Huan, Isaakin a kha a khah a, upapi tek kuna damin a si a, a chipihte kiangah piin a om samta: huan, a tapa Esau leh Jakob in a vuita uhi.
Huan, hiaite Esau suante ahi uh (Esau Edom ahi).
Esauin a jite Kanan gama nungakte laka a neih ahi; Hit mi Elon tanu Ada leh, Hiv mi Zibeon tanu, Ana Tanu Oholibamte ahi uh;
Ismael tanu, Nebaioth sanggamnu Basemath toh.
Huan, Ada in Eliphaz Esau a neihsaka; Basemath in Reuel a neia;
Oholibam in Jeus leh Jalam leh Korah a neia; huaite Esau tapa, Kanan gama a neihte ahi uh.
Huan, Esauin a jite leh, a tapate leh, a tanute leh, a in a mi tengteng leh, a gante leh, a sa tengteng leh, a sum tengteng, Kanan gama a muhte a paipih, a nau Jakob kianga kipan gamdang ah a pai mangta hi.
A thilneihte uh a thupi lua a, a om khawm theikei uhi; a gante jiakin mikhual a a omna gam un lah a chinta kei hi.
Huchiin, Esau tangah a omta: Esau tuh Edom ahi.
Huan, hiaite Seir tang a Edom te suangpa Esau suante ahi uh:
Hiaite Esau tapate minte ahi: Eliphaz Esau ji Ada tapa Reuel Esau ji Basemath ta.
Huan, Eliphaz tapate Tamante Omarte, Zephote, Gatamte, Kenazte ahi uh.
Huan, Timna tuh Esau tapa Eliphaz mei ahia; aman Eliphaz Amalek a neihsaka: Huaite Esau ji Ada suante ahi uh.
Huan, hiaite Reuel tapate ahi uh; Nahath leh Zerahte, Samma leh Mizzate: huaite Esau ji Basemath suante ahi uh.
Huan, hiaite Zibeon tanu Ana tanu Esau ji Oholibam tapate ahi uh: aman Esau Jeus leh Jalam leh Koran a neihsak hi.
Hiaite Esau tapate laka heutute ahi uh: Esau ta chil Eliphaz tapate; heutu Temante, heutu Omarte, heutu Zephote, heutu Kenazte,
Heutu Korah te, heutu Gatamte, heutu Amalek te: huaite Edom gam a Eliphaz akipana pawt heutute ahi uh; huaite Ada suante ahi uh.
Huan, hiaite Esau tapa Reuel suante ahi uh; heutu Nahath te, heutu Zerahte, heutu Samma te, Heutu Mizzate: huaite Edom gam a Reuel akipana pawt heutute ahi uh; huaite Esau ji Basemath suante ahi uhi.
Huan, hiaite Esau ji Oholibam suante ahi uh; heutu Jeus te, heutu Jalam te, heutu Korah te: huaite heutu Ana tanu Esau ji Oholibam suante ahi uh.
Huaite Esau tapate ahi uh, huaite a lak ua heutute ahi uh: Esau tuh Edom ahi.
Hiaite Hor mi Seir tapa huai gama omte ahi uh; Lotan te, Sobal te, Zibeon te, Ana te, Dison te, Ezer te, Disan te,
Huaite Edom gama Seir ta Horta laka kipana pawt heutute ahi uh.
Huan, Lotan tate Hor leh Hemam ahi uh.
Lotan sanggamnu Timna ahi.
Huan, hiaite Sobal tate ahi uh; Alvan te, Manahath te, Ebalt e, Sepho te, Onam te.
Huan, hiaite Zibeon tate ahi uh; Aia leh Ana: hiai Ana ahi, apa Zibeon sabengtungte a khah laia gamdaia tui sa khuk te mukhepa.
Huan, hiaite Dison tate ahi uh; Dison leh Ana tanu Oholibam.
Hiaite Disan tate ahi uh; Uz leh Aran.
Hiaite Horte laka kipana pawt heutute ahi uh; heutu Lotan te, heutu Sobal te, heutu Zibeon te, heutu Ana te,
Heutu Dison te, heutu Ezer te, heutu Disan te: huaite Seir gama a heutu uh dan banga Horte laka kipana pawt a heutute ahi uh.
Hiaite, kumpipa kuamah in Israel suante tunga vai a hawm ma ua, Edom gama vaihawm kumpipate ahi uhi.
Huan.
Beor tapa Velin Edom gama vai a hawma; a khopi min Dinhaba ahi.
Huan, Vel a si a, Bozra khua a mi Zerah tapa Jobab in a sikin vai a hawm ta.
Huan, Jobab a si a, Timante gam a mi Husam-in a sikin vai a hawm ta a.
Huan, Husam a si a, Bedad tapa Hadad, tapa Hadad, Moab pawn a Midiante that pan, a sikin vai a hawma: a khopi min Avith ahi.
Huan, Hadad a si a, Masrek mi Samla in a sikin vai a hawm.
Huan, Samla a si a, Luipi gei a Rebototh khua a mi Saula in a sikin vai a hawm hi.
Huan, Saula, a si a, Akbor tapa Baal-hanana in a sikin vai a hawm ta hi.
Huan, Akbor tapa Baal-hanana a si a, Hada in a sikin vai a hawma: a khopi min Pau ahi; a ji min Hehetabel ahia, amah Mesahaba ta Matred tanu ahi.
Huan, hiaite a inkuan uh bang jel leh, a mun bang jel u leh a min bang jel Esau suan heutute min ahi; heutu Timna te, heutu Alva te, heutu Jetheth te;
Heutu Oholibamte, heutu Elate, heutu Pinonte;
Heutu Kenazte, heutu Temante, heutu Mibzarte;
Heutu Magdiel te, heutu Iram te; huaite a gam neih uah a omna uh bang jelin Edom suan heutute ahi uh: huai Edom Edomte suangpa Esau ahi.
Heutu Kenazte, heutu Temante, heutu Mibzarte;Heutu Magdiel te, heutu Iram te; huaite a gam neih uah a omna uh bang jelin Edom suan heutute ahi uh: huai Edom Edomte suangpa Esau ahi.
Heutu Magdiel te, heutu Iram te; huaite a gam neih uah a omna uh bang jelin Edom suan heutute ahi uh: huai Edom Edomte suangpa Esau ahi.
Huan, Jakob a pa mikhuala a omna gam, Kanan gamah, a om a.
Hiaite Jakob suante ahi uh: Joseph, kum sawm leh kum sagih a upa ahihin, a ute toh ganhon a khak ua; amah naupang ahi laia, a pa jite Bilha leh Zilpa tapate kiangah a om a; huan, Joseph in a gitlouh thuthang uh a pa uh kiangah a tun a.
Huan, Israel in Joseph, a teklam ta ahihjiakin a tate tengteng sangin a it jaw a: huchiin, puannak tual ze tuamtuam a gial abawl saka.
Huan, a pa un amah bel a ute tengteng sangin a it jaw chih a uten ana theita ua; huchiin, amah amudah mahmah uh, kam hoih himhim in a houpih thei takei uhi.
Juan, Joseph in mang a neia, a ute a hilha: huchiin, amah a mudah semsem uh.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, hehpihtakin ka mang thu ngai dih uh:
Ngai un, lou ah buhphalte I na gak ua, huan, ngai un, kei buhphal a hong thou a, a ding nemnom a; huan, ngai un, nou buhphalten a hong um ua, kei buhphal chibai a buk chiat uh, achia.
Huan, a uten, a kiangah, nang soplaiin ka tunguah vai na hawm mahmah ding maw?
Nang soplaiin ka tunguah thu na nei mahmah ding maw? achi ua.
Huchiin, a mang jiakin amah a mudah semsem uh.
Huan, mang dang a nei nawn a, a ute ahilh nawna, ngai un, mang ka nei nawna; ngai un, ni khawng, kha khawng, aksi sawm leh khat ten chibai a honna buk zenhouh uh ka chi, achia.
Huan, a pa a hilh a, a ute leng; huchiin, a pan a tai a, akiangah, mang na neih bangchi mang ahia?
Kei leh na nu leh na uten leisiin chibai kon buk mahmah ding u maw?
Achia.
Huan, a uten amah a haja ua; a pa bel a thugen a lungsim in apai nilouh hi.
Huan, a ute Sekem ah apa uh ganhon khak in ahoh ua.
Huan, Israel in, Joseph kiangah, na uten Sekem ah a hina maw ganhon a khak uh?
Hongpai dih, a kiang uah ka honsawl ding, achia.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, na ute a dam dam na uhiam, ganhon leng a dam dam na uhiam ve en inla, a tanchin uh honghilh nawnin, achia.
Huchiin, Hebron guam a kipan a sawl khia a, huan, aman Sekem a vapha hi.
Huan, mi kuahiam in amah a mua, ngaiin, pawn ah a vakvak a: huchiin, miin, bang zong na hia? chiin, a donga.
Huan, aman, Ka ute zong ka hi: hehpihtakin, ganhon a khah na uh honhilh ve, a chi a.
Huan, miin, hiai akipana pawt hive un: Dothan ah I hoh ding uh, a chih uh ka ja, achia.
Huan, Joseph in a ute a delh a, Dothan ah a vamu hi.
Huan, amau, gamla pia kipan a na gal muh ua, huchiin, a kiang nai uh a tun main, amah thah ding thu a phial uhi.
Huan, amau, En un, mang neipa a hong.
Khai, I that dia, kokhuk khatah I khe ding uh, huan, sahangin a kei, chi nani; huchiin a mangte bangchi bangin a oma chih I thei mai ding uh, a kichi ua.
Reuben in huai a na jaa, a khut ua kipanin a hong kheta; a thah jaw I that tel kei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Reuben mahin, apa uh kianga pi theihna dinga a khut ua kipana a hotkhiak theihna dingin, a kiang uah, sisan jaw suah kei un, gamdai ah kokhuk ah khia unla, khut jaw a tungah kha kei un, a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Joseph a ute kiang a tunin, Joseph a puannaktual, a puannaktual ze tuamtuama gial a silh, a na suahsak uh;
Huan, a pi ua, kokhuk ah a kheta uhi: kokhuk a vuak ahi, tui om nawn louhna ahi.
Huan, an ne dingin a tu chiat ua: huan, a dak ua, a en ua; huan, ngaiin, Ismael khualzinte Gilead gam akipana a sangawngsau ua banghiam namtui leh singnai damdawi leh murra pua Aigupta gam a paisuk dingte a hong pai ua.
Huan, Juda in a unaute kiangah, I nau uh I thah ua, a sisan suak I im un bang phattuamna om ding ahia?
Khai, a tunga khut kha louin, Ismael te kiangah I juak zo ding uh; amah lah I nau uh, I sa ngeingei uh lah ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, a unauten a thu a juita uh.
Huan, Midiante, sumsinte, a hong pai ua; huchiin Joseph kokhuk akipan a dok khia ua, Ismael te kiangah Joseph dangka sawm nih in a khawngta uhi.
Huan, Joseph Aigupta gamah a pi uh.
Huan, Reuben kokhuk ah a hongpai nawna, huan, ngaiin, Joseph kokhuk ah a na om ta kei a: huchiin, a puansilhte a botkekta hi.
Huan, a naute kiangah a hoh nawna, I nau uh a om nawn kei; kei koi a paita ding ka hia oi?
A chi a.
Huan, Joseph puannaktual a la ua, keltal a gou ua, a si-ah a puannaktual a diah uh;
Huan, puannaktual ze tuamtuama gial akhak ua, a pa uh kiangah a honla ua; huan, hiai lel ka mu ua, na tapa puannaktual ahi hia, hi lou en dih, a chi ua.
Huan, aman a na thei paha, Ka tapa puannaktual ei ve; sahangin kei eive; Joseph boh nen veka om hi mahmah ding eive, a chi a.
Huchiin, Jakob in a puansilhte a bot kek a, saiip puan a tenga, ni sawtpi a tapa a sun hi.
Huan, a tapate tengteng leh tanute tengteng amah lungmuang dingin a thou ua; himahleh aman lungmuang a ut kei a; sun kawmin han ah ka tapa kiangah mual ka khum ding, a chi a.Huchiin, amah ngaiin apa a kapkap hi.
Huan, Midian ten Joseph bel Aigupta gamah a lut pih ua, Pharo nuaia heutu khat vengmi pawl heutu Potiphar kiangah a khawng uh.
Huchiin, amah ngaiin apa a kapkap hi.
Huan, Midian ten Joseph bel Aigupta gamah a lut pih ua, Pharo nuaia heutu khat vengmi pawl heutu Potiphar kiangah a khawng uh.
Huchih laiin, hichi ahia, Juda bel a unaute kianga kipanin a pai suka, Adullam mi khat a min Hira a vebelta hi:
Huan, Juda in huailaiah Kanan mi khat tanu a min Suah a mua; huan, amah a kitenpih a, a kithuahpih ta.
Huchiin a gaia, tapa a neia; huan; Juda in amin dingin Er asa hi.
Huan, a gai nawna, tapa a nei nawna; huan, a nuin a min dingin Onan asa hi.
Huan, tapa a nei nawn jela, a min ding Sela asa a; amah a neihlaiin Juda Chezib khua ah a om hi.
Huan, Juda in a ta masa Er a dingin ji api saka, a min Tamar ahi.
Huan, Juda ta masa Er Toupa mitmuh in gilou ahia; huchiin, Toupan amah a si saka.
Huan, Juda in, Onan kiangah, na u ji kithuahpih inla kitenpih inla, na u a dingin chi khahsakin achia.
Huan, Onan in chi suah ding pen amah suan ahikei ding chih athei a, huchiin hichi ahia, a u ji a kithuahpih tengin a u a dinga chi a suahsak louh na dingin leiah a kesak jel hi.
Huan, a thil hihdan Toupa mitmuh in giloutak ahi: huchiin amah leng a sisak ta.
Huan, Juda in amou nu Tamar kiangah, ka tapa Sela a pichin mateng na pa in lamah pasal neilou in na om tadih in, achia.
Huchilou in jaw amah leng a ute bangin a si kha ding hi, achi ahi.
Huchiin, Tamar apa in lamah ava omte hi.
Huan, a nungin Suah tanu Juda ji a si a; huan, Juda in a ngaih a daita a, Timna khua ah a belam mulmet mi te kiang lamah amah leh a lawm Adullam mi Hira a hoh tou uh.
Huan, mi in, Tamar, na pu a belam mulmet dingin Timna khua ah a hohtou dek, chiin, a hilh ua.
Huchiin, aman a pasal sunna puansilh te a suah a, kikhuh na puanin a kikhuh a, a kituam bikbek a, Timna kho lampi ah Enaim kulh kongpi ah ana tu a; Sela lah a piching ta ngala, apan aji dingin amah api sak kei chih a thei hi.
Huan, Juda in amah amuh in kijuak hiinteh achia; amai lah akikhuh bikbek ngala.
Huchiin, lampi gei ah huai numei lam ava juan a, kisa in hehpihtakin I lumkhawm ding, achia: amou mah ahi chih lah athei ngal kei a.
Huan, aman, hon luppih bang non pe dia?
Achia.
Huan, aman, ganhon laka kipan kelnou ka hon khak ding, achia.
Huan, aman huai na hon khak ma a kana let ding banghiam bek non pe diam?
Achia.
Huan, aman, let ding bang ka hon pe dia?
Achia.
Huan, aman, na min sawnna leh na tau, na chiang tawi toh, achia.
Huchiin, apia a, a luppih ta, huan, amah a kipan apaita hi.
Huan, a thou a, a kikhuhna puan a suah a, a meithaina puansilh te a silh non ta hi.
Huan, a thillet numei khut a kipana la dingin a lawmpa Adullam mi khut ah kelnou a khak a: himahleh aman ava muzou takei hi.
Huchiin, numei omna mun a mite kiangah, lampi gei a Enaima kijuak nu koi a om ahita a?
Chiin a dong a.
Huan, amau, kijuak mawngmawng hiai laiah a om kei hi, achi ua.
Huchiin, Juda kiangah a kik nawn a, amah ka muzou kei; amun a miten leng, kijuak mawngmawng hiai laiah a om kei, ana chih behlap uh, achia.
Huan, Juda in, neiden maileh huchilouin in jaw I zahlak kha ding; ngaiin, hiai kelnou khak hi inga, amah lah mu zoulou chin na, achia.
Huan, kha thum hiam tak nungin, min Juda, na mounu Tamar in tangval a ngai a; huailou leng, ngai in sawn a pai hi, chiin, ahilh ua.
Huan, Juda in pi khia unla, hal lup in om heh, achia.
Huan, a pi khiak uleh, Tamar in, hiai thil te neipa lakah ahi nau ka pai, chiin, a pu kiangah mi a sawl ta a; amah mah in, hehpihtakin hiai min sawn na te, tau te, chiang te, kua a ahia, en chian dih ve, achia.
Huan, Juda in huai thilte amah a ahi chih ana thei a.
Kei sang amah diktat jaw ahi; ka tapa Sela lah amah toh kana kiteng sak ta kei a, achia.
Huan, Juda in amah a kithuahpih nawn hetkei.
Huan, nau a vei laiin hichi ahia, ngai in, a sul ah phik ana om ua.
Huan, hichi ahia, nau avei laiin khat in a khut a hon golh khia a: huchiin nau dom mi in, hiai a pawt masa jaw ahi, chiin ana len a, a khut ah khau san a bunsak hi.
Huan, huchi ahia, khut a laklut nawn laiin, ngaiin, a unau a hongpawt ta a: huchiin naudom miin, bang dia pawtna kibawl na hia?
Achia, huaijiakin a min dingin Perez a sa uh.Huan, huai nungin a unau, huai nungin a unau, huai a khut a khau san bunpen, a hongpawt nawna: a min dingin Zera a sa uhi.
Huan, huai nungin a unau, huai nungin a unau, huai a khut a khau san bunpen, a hongpawt nawna: a min dingin Zera a sa uhi.
Huan, Joseph Aigupta gamah a pisuk ua; huan, Pharo nuaia heutu khat, vengtu pawl heutu, Aigupta mi, Potiphar in, huai ahon pisuk Ismael te khut a kipan a leita hi.
Huan, Toupa Joseph kiangah a om a, huchiin, amah mi lamzang tak ahia; huan, a pu Aigupta mi ah a om hi.
Huan, a puin, Toupa a kiangah a om a, a thilhih peuhmah Toupan a khut ah a lohchingsak chih a thei a.
Huchiin, Joseph in a pu hehpihna a mu a, a na a sem jela: huan, aman a inkuante tungah heutu in a bawla, a neih tengteng a khut ah a koih vek hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, a in ah heutu in a bawla, a neih tengteng tunga heutu a abawl nungsiah Joseph jiakin Toupan Aigupta inkuanpihte a vualjawlta hi; in lam leh gam lama a neih tengteng Toupa vual a jawl jel hi.
Huchiin a neih tengteng Joseph khut ah a koiha, a kianga thil om himhim a theihpih hetkei hi, a annek kia loungal a theikei hi.
Huan, Joseph lah mi hoih mahmah ahia, a mel mah leng a hoih hi.
Huan, huai nungin hichi ahia, a pu ji in Joseph a ngaih eta; huan, hon luppih in, achia.
Himahleh a ut keia, a pu ji kiangah, ka pu in hiai inn ah ka kiangah bangbang a om a chih lah a thei ngal keia, a neih tengteng ka khut ah a koih veka;
Hiai in ah kei sanga lian jaw kuamah a om kei uh; a ji na hihjiakin amah kia loungal ka lakah bangmah it a neikei hi; huchiin bangchin hiai khelhna liantak hihin Pathian tungah thil ka hihkhial thei dia?
Achia.
Huan, hichi ahia, ni tengin Joseph houpih jel mah leh, amah luppih lamthu hiam, amah kianga om lamthu hiam a limsak nuam kei hi.
Huan, huchilai khawngin hichi ahia, ana sem dingin in sungah a va luta; huan, huai laiah in a mi himhim kuamah a om kei uhi.
Huchiin, aman honluppih in, chiin, a puansilh in ana mana: huan, aman a puansilh a khut ah a taisan a, a taikheta hi.
Huan hichi ahia, a puansilh a khuta nusia in a taikhia chih a theih takin,
A ina mite a sama, a kiang uah, en un, hon zahlak sak dingin Hebru mi khat I kiangua honpi eita ve; hon luppih tumin ka kiangah a honglut a, huchiin ngaihtakin ka kikou ta hi:
Huan, hichi ahia, aw suaha ngaihtaka ka kikou a jak takin hiai ka kiangah a puansilh a taisana, a taikheta hi, achia.
Huan, Joseph pu a hongtun masiah a puansilh a kiangah ana koih gige hi.
Huan, a kiangah hichibang thu ana gena, Hebru sikha I kianga na honpi, hon zah laksak tumin ka kiangah a hong luta:
Huan, hichi ahia, aw suaha ka kikou takin hiai a puansilh ka kiangah nusiain a taikheta hi, achia.
Huan, hichi ahia, Joseph puin, a jiin a kianga, na sikha in hichiin a honbawl, chia, a thugen a jakin, a heh guiha.
Huchiin, Joseph puin amah a pia, suangkulh ah, lal suangkulh tang hena a omna uah a khumta a: huchiin huaiah suangkulh ah a omta hi.
Ahihhangin, Toupa bel Joseph kiangah a om jela, a tungah a chinga, suangkulh vengmi mah leng a hehpihsak a.
Huchiin, suangkulh vengmiten suangkulha tang omte tengteng Joseph khut ah a kemsak tavek ua; huchiin, huailaia a hihpeuh uh Joseph bel a hihpa ahi jela.Toupa Joseph kiangah a oma, a thilhih peuhmah Toupan a lohchinsak nak jiakin suangkulh vengmi in a khut a thil om himhim a en nuam takei hi.
Toupa Joseph kiangah a oma, a thilhih peuhmah Toupan a lohchinsak nak jiakin suangkulh vengmi in a khut a thil om himhim a en nuam takei hi.
Huan, huai thil khitin hichi ahia, Aigupta kumpipa uain pepa leh a tanghou bawlpan a pu uh Aigupta kumpipa a lungkimlousak ua.
Huchiin, Pharo bel a sikha heutu nih tungah, a uain pia heutupen tungah leh a tanghou bawl heutupen tungah a hehta a.
Huchiin vengmi pawl heutu in ah, suangkulh, Joseph hena a omna ah, a tangsakta hi.
Huan, vengmi pawl heutu in Joseph bel amau a kemsaka, huchiin amau a na a sepsak ua, huan, ni bangzah hiam tak a tang uhi.
Huan, suangkulh a hena om, Aigupta kumpipa uain pepa leh tanghou bawlpa in, jan khat mang khiakna tuamtuam tuak a nei ua.
Huan, a jingin Joseph a kiang uah a valut a, amau a hong mu a, huan, ngaiin, a na lungkham mahmah uhi.
Huchiin, aman, bang achia ahia tuniin lungkham mel po natel uchia?
Chiin, Pharo sikha heutu, a pu inn a tang teita, a donga.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, mang ka nei ua, hon hilh chiansak thei kuamah lah a om ngal keia ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, Joseph in, a kianguah, mang hilhchetna te Pathian a ahi ka hia?
Hehpihtakin honhilh dih ua, achia.
Huchiin, uain pia heutu penin a mang Joseph a hilha, a kiangah, ngai dih, ka mangin, ka maah grepgui a hong om a;
Grepgui ah ka thum a oma: huan, selnou bangin a hong om a, a pakte a hong om khia a; a pak bomten grep minte a hon omsak ua:
Huan, Pharo nou ka khut ah a hong om a; huchiin, grep, gahte ka loua, Pharo nou ah ka suak a, huai nou Pharo khut ah ka na pia a, achia.
Huan, Joseph in, a kiangah, a hilhchetna hiai ahi: ka thumte ni thum ahia:
Tua kipan ni thumin Pharo in na lutang a domkang dinga, na nasep mah a honsemsak nawn ding: huchiin a uain pepa na nahin laia na piak ngeina bangin, Pharo nou a khut ah na pe nawn ding hi.
Ahihhangin na hong hamphat nawn chiangin hon theigige inla, hehpihtakin hehpihna ka tungah hon kilangsak inla, Pharo kiangah ka tungtang hon gen inla, hiai in a kipan honpi khia in:
Hebru te gam a kipan min a guka a honguk mang uh ka hia: hiai gamah leng khuk sunga a honkhum na ding in bangmah ka hihkhial kei hi, achia.
Tanghou bawlpain hilhchetna a hoih chih a theih in, Joseph kiangah, ken leng mang ka neia, ngaiin, tanghou ngou lohbeu thum ka luin kana pua a:
Huan, lohbeu tungnung penah Pharo an, tanghou bawlpa bawl, chi chih ana om a; huan, huaite vasaten lohbeu ka lu a ka puaka kipan a nane souhsouh ua, achia.
Huan, Joseph in a dawnga, hiai a hilhchetna ahi: Lohbeu thum ni thum ahi;
Tua kipan ni thum in Pharo in na pumpi akipanin na lutang a domkang dinga, sing dawn ah a hon khai ding; huchiin, vasaten na sa a ne souhsouh ding uh, achia.
Huan, hichi ahia, a ni thum ni, Pharo pian tanphak niin, aman a sikha tengteng a dingin ankuang a luia: huan, a sikhate laka uain pia heutupen lutang a domkang ta a.
Huan, uain pia heutu pen uain pemi mah in apangsak nawna; huchiin, nou Pharo khut ah a peta a:
Ahihhangin, Joseph in amau a hilhchet bangtakin, tanghou bawl heutupen bel a khaita hi.Himahleh, uain pia heutu penin Joseph a theigige zenzen kei a, a mangnghilh maimah.
Himahleh, uain pia heutu penin Joseph a theigige zenzen kei a, a mangnghilh maimah.
Huan, kum nih vengveng nungin hichi ahia, Pharo in mang a neia; huan, ngaiin, lui gei ah ana dinga.
Huan, ngaiin, bawngpi sagih hoih taktak thau taktak tui akipan in a hongpawt khe tou ua, loupa nou lakah a hongta uh.
Huan, ngaiin, bawngpi dang sagih kil theuthou gawng gemgom a hongpawt khe tou nawn ua, bawngpi dangte kiangah lui gei ah a hong ding uhi.
Huan, bawngpi kil theuthou ten bawngpi hoih taktak thau taktak te a gai maimah uhi.
Huchiin, Pharo a khangloua a.
Huan, a ihmu nawna, mang a nei nawn a: huan, ngaiin, buh a kung khat a h vui sagih lian pipi hoih liahliah a hong om khia a.
Huan, ngaiin, huai nungin vui sagih ngat gigeuh suahlam huih nuai ek a hing om khe nawna,
Huan, vui ngat gigeuh ten vui sagih lian pipi hoih liahliah te a valh khin maimah ua.
Huan, Pharo a khangloua a; huan, ngaiin, mang ana hi hi.
Huan, a jingin hichi ahia, a lungsim a buai mahmah a; hichiin, mi a sawl a, Aigupta gama mitkhialdawi siam tengteng leh mipil tengteng a sam khawm a: huan, Pharo in a mang amau a na hilh a; himahleh Pharo hilhchian thei kuamah lah a om ngal kei ua.
Huchih laiin uain pia heutupen in Pharo kiangah, tuni in ka mohdan te ka honthei kheta:
Pharo a sikhate tungah a heh a, huchiin vengmi pawl heutu in ah kei leh tanghou bawl heutupen a hon tangsak a:
Huan, kei leh aman jan khat mang ke nei ua, mang khiakna tuam tuak ahi ka mat uh.
Huan, huailai ah ka kiangah vengmi pawl heutu sikha, Hebru mi, tangval khat a om a; huan, amah ka hilh ua, aman ka mangte uh a hilhchian ta hi; ka mang bang tuaktuak un ahi a hon hilhchet.
Huan, hichi ahia; kei bel ka nasep mah a hon semsak nawn a, amah bel a khaita a, achia.
Huchiin, Pharoin Joseph a samsak pah ngala, huchiin kintakin kokhuk akipan a pikheta ua: huan, a kimet ngila, a puansilh a kheka, Pharo kiangah a valutta hi.
Huan, Pharo in Joseph kiangah, mang ka neia, a hilhchian thei kuamah a om kei ua, nang bel mang a thu na theih leh na hilhchian thei chih na tungtang mi gen ka naja a, achia.
Huan, Joseph in Pharo a dawnga, huai ahihleh keia om ahikei hi, Pathianin Pharo lungmuanhuai takin a dawng zaw ding, achia.
Huan, Pharo in Joseph kiangah, ka mangin, ngaiin, lui gei ah ka na dinga:
Hua, ngaiin, bawngpi sagih thau taktak hoih pipi tuia kipan in a hongpawt khetou ua, loupanou lakah ana ta ua:
Huan, bawngpi dang sagih ginalou leh deih huailou leh gawng siatsuat, huchibang tela hoihlou Aigupta gam tengteng a leng ka muh ngeilouh, nung uah a hong pawt khetou nawn ua:
Huan, bawngpi gawng siatsuat deih huailou pipiten bawngpi sagih thau taktak hongpawt masa te a hon gai maimah ua:
Huan, a gaih khit nung un leng a ne uh chih a kithei tuan keia: a tunglai mah bangin deih huailou takin a om lailai uhi.
Huchiin ka khangloua ta hi.
Huan, ka mangin, ngaiin, buh kung khat ah vui sagih lian pipi, hoih pipi a hong om khia a:
Huan, ngaiin, huai nungin vui sagih vuai niangnuang, neu chikchik, suahlam huih in a nuai a hong om khe nawn ua:
Huan, vui ngat ngingeuh ten vui sagih hoih taktak te a valh khit maimah uh ka mu a: huan, mitkhialdawi siamte ka hilh a, himahleh hon hilhchian thei lah kuamah a om tuan ngal kei ua, chiin, a gen hi.
Huan, Joseph in, Pharo kiangah, Pharo mang jaw khat ahi: Pathian in hih dia a kisak Pharo theisak eive.
Bawng sagih hoih taktak te kum sagih ahi ua; vui sagih hoih taktak te leng kum sagih ahi uh: mang bel khat ahi hi.
Huan, a nung ua bawng sagih tek taktak deih huailou taktak hongpawt khetou te kum sagih hi ua, vui sagih a hawm ngen suahlam huih nuaite toh; huaite kial kum kum sagih ding ahi.
Huai ahi Pharo kianga ka gen: Pathian in hih dia a kisak Pharo kianga a theihsak ahi.
Ngaiin, Aigupta gamsung tengteng ah niang leh tai a om kum kum sagih a hongtung ding;
Huai nungin kial kum kum sagih a hong om nawn ding; huchiin niang leh tai a omna Aigupta gamah mangngilh vek ahita ding; kial in gam a ne gawp vek ding hi;
Niang leh tai, a honjui kial jiakin, hiai gamah a thei nawnta kei ding uh; a thupi sin mahmah ngala
Huan, mang Pharo nihvei a neih tuansakna ahihleh hiai jiak ahi, thil hih ding Pathianin a hihkipa, Pathian mahin a tunsak pah ding jiakin.
Huchiin tuin Pharo in mi khat tei tak pilsak mai zong khia henla, Aigupta gam tungah heutuin omsak hen,
Pharoin huai hih henla, huan, gam tungah heutute sep henla, niang leh taia om kum kum sagih sung Aigupta gam buh mun nga a khena mun khat jel khon hen,
Huchiin, amau huai kum hoih kum hongtung dinga buh tengteng kaikhawmin Pharo nuaia om dingin khuate ah tununga nek dingin buh sungkhawm henla, khol khawm hen.
Huchiin, kial jiaka gam a man louhna dingin, buh bel kial kum kum sagih, Aigupta gam a hongtung ding a dingin, hiai gam adingin kiginkholhna ding ahi ding, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu Pharo leh a sikhate tengtengin hoih a saklam tak uh ahi.
Huan, Pharoin, a sikhate kiangah, hichibang, Pathian kha omna mi, I mu zou ding ua hia? a chi a.
Huan, Pharo mahin, Joseph kiangah, Pathianin huai tengteng a hon theisak jiakin, nang banga tei leh pil himhim a om kei uhi:
Nang ka inkuanpihte tungah heutu in na om dinga, ka khua leh tui tengteng na thu bang jelin a om ding uh: laltutphah a tut thu ah kia nang sangin ka lal ding, a chi a.
Huan, Pharo mahin, Joseph kiangah, enin, Aigupta gam tengteng tungah heutuin ka honbawl hi, a chi a.
Huan, Pharoin a khut a kipanin a min sawmna zungbuh a tola, Joseph khut ah abunsaka, puan malngata bawl puansilhte a silhsaka, a ngawngah dangkaeng khainiang a oksaka.
Huan, a kangtalai neih nihna ah a tuangsaka: a maah, khukdin un, chiin, a kikou jel ua: huchiin, Aigupta gam tengteng tungah heutu in a bawlta hi.
Huan, Pharo in, Joseph kiangah, kei Pharo ka hi, na thu louin Aigupta gamsung tengteng ah kuamahin a khut uh hiam, a khe uh hiam a lik kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Pharoin Joseph min dingin Zaphenathpaneh a sata: On kho siampu Potipher tanu Asenath a ji dingin a piaa, Huan, Joseph a pawta, Aigupta gam a tuansuak hi.
Huan, Joseph Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharo maa a din laiin kum sawm thum a upa ahi.
Huan, Joseph Pharo kianga kipanin a pawta, Aigupta gam tengteng a siksuak hi.
Huan, hoih kum kum sagih sungin lei in tam pipiin buh a tungsak hi.
Huan, Aigupta gam a kum hoih kum kum sagih hong tunga buh tengteng a dong khawma, buh khuate ah a sung khawmta: kho chih a kima lou a buh chiat a sung khawm jel hi.
Huchiin, Joseph in buh tampi tuipi piaunel zah bangin a sung khawm venvon a, a sim mah leng a tawpta hiala; simzoh vual lah a hita ngal keia.
Huan, kial hongtun main Joseph in tapa nih a neia, huaite On kho siampu Potipher tanu Asenath in a neihte ahi uh.
Huan, Joseph in a ta masa min ding Manassi a sa a: Pathian in ka sep gimna tengteng leh ka pa inkuanpihte tengteng lah a hon mangngilhsak ta ngala, achia.
Huan, ata nihna min dingin Ephraim asa a: Pathian in ka gimthuakna gamah chi lah a honsuangsak ta ngala, achia.
Huan, kum hoih kum, kum sagih Aigupta gama hongtung a hong beita hi.
Huan, kial kum, kum sagih ding, Joseph gen bangbang in a hong tung panta a gam chih ah kial a hong keta a; Aigupta gamsung tengteng ah bel nek ding a om hi.
Huan, Aigupta gam a mi tengteng a kial tak un Pharo kiangah nek ding ngenin a kikou ua: huan, Pharo in, Aigupta mi tengteng kiangah, Joseph kiangah hoh unla; na kiang ua a gen peuhmah hih un, achia.
Huan, kial leitung pumpi ah a keta hi: huchiin, Joseph in sunkhawmna in tengteng a hong a, Aigupta gamah lah kial a nak kiak mahmah a.Huan, leitung pumpi a kial a nak kiak jiak in gam chiha mite buh lei dingin Aigupta gamah Joseph kiangah a hong jel uhi.
Huan, leitung pumpi a kial a nak kiak jiak in gam chiha mite buh lei dingin Aigupta gamah Joseph kiangah a hong jel uhi.
Huan, Jakob in Aigupta gamah buh a om chih a theia, huchiin Jakob in a tapate kiangah, bang dia ki en maimah na hi ua?
Achia.
Huan, amah mahin, ngai un, Aigupta gamah buh a om chih ka ja hi: silou a I hinkhiak theihna dingin huaiah vahoh suk unla, huai a kipanin ei a dingin valei un, achia.
Huchiin, Joseph unau sawmte Aigupta a kipan a buh lei dingin a vahoh sukta uh a.
Joseph nau Benjamin bel Jakob in a ute kiangah a hohsak keia; tuahsia avatuak kha ding, achi hi.
Huchiin, Israel tapate mi hohte lakah buh lei dingin a hoh ua: Kanan gamah leng kial lah a ke sam ngala.
Huan, Joseph Aigupta gam tungah heutu ahia; amah lah huai gam mi tengteng kiangah a khawngpa ahi: huchiin Joseph ute a hongpai ua, lei siin amah chibai a buk chiat ua.
Huan, Joseph in a ute ana mu a, amau ana theilai hi, himahleh a kiang uah midang bangin a kibawla, khauh takin amau a houpih a; huan, a kiang uah, koia kipana hong nahi ua?
Achia.
Huan, amau, buh lei dinga Kanan gam akipan a hongpai ka hi uh, a chi uh.
Huan, Joseph in a ute ana thei lai a, amau bel amah a theikei uh.
Huan, Joseph in amau tungtang thu manga amat te a thei kheta a, a kiang uah, galgukte na hi uh; gam vuak dan en dinga hongpai na hi lim uh, achia.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Toupa, hilou e, na sikhate buh lei dinga hongpai ka hi uh.
Mi khat ta vek ka hi uh; mi diktak ka hi ua, na sikhate jaw galguk ka hi zenzen kei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman a kianga uah, ka taksang kei, gam vuak dan en dinga hongpai hi mah uteh, achia.
Huan, amau, kou na sikhate jaw unau sawm leh nih, Kanan gama om mi khat ta ka hi uh; huan, ngaiin, ka nautumpen uh tuin ka pa uh kiangah a oma, khat ahihleh a om nawnta kei hi, achi ua.
Huan, Joseph in a kiang uah, galguk te na hi uh ka honchih na hi mahmah uh:
Hichibanga ettel in na om ding uh: na nautumpen uh hiailaia a hongpai kei leh Pharo hinna kichiamin hiai a kipan na pawtkhe kei ding uh ka honchi ahi.
Nou ah thutak a om hia omlou chetna dingin na lak ua khat sawl unla, na nau uh honpi hen, nou bel henin nana om phot ding uh: huchilou in jaw Pharo hinna a kichiam in, galguk te na hi mahmah uh, ka honchi ding hi, achia.
Huan, a vek un ni thum a tangsak chiata.
Huan, a ni thum niin Joseph in a kiang uah, hichiin hih le uchin na hing ding uh; Pathian ka kihta ngala:
Mi diktak na hih uleh na unau lak uah khat na suangkulh tanna in uah henin om hen:
Huan, na nautumpen uh ka kiangah honpi un; huchiin na thu uh a tel dinga, na si kei ding uhi, achia, Huchiin huchibang in a hihta uhi.
Huan, amau, I nau tunga I thilhih uh moh petmah I hi, hehpih dinga a hon nget ngitnget laia a lungtang mangbat dan mu napia I ngaihkhiak sak noplouh; huaijiak in hiai mangbatna in hon buak ahi, a kichi ua.
Huan, Reuben in, naupang tungah thi hihkhial kei un, chiin, na kiang uah ka gen kei maw?
Na ngaikhe nuam kei ua ahi: huaijiakin, ngai un, a sisan phu la uh ahi, chiin, amau a dawnga.
A kal ua pauletmi a om jiakin Joseph in a thugen uh a thei chih a theikei uh.
Huan, aman amau a lehngat sana, a kapta hi; huan, a kiang uah a hong kik nawna, amau a houpih a, a lak ua kipanin Simeon a pi tuam a, a mitmuh un amah gakta hi.
Huan, Joseph in a ipte uh buha hihdim ding leh, a dangkate uh a ip ua koih nawn chiat dingin leh, lampi a dinga nek ding pe dingin thu a pia a: huchiin huchibangin a hihsak hi.
Huan, a buh uh a sabengtung te uh a posak ua, huai a kipan a pawt kheta uhi.
Huan, a lak ua mi khat in a giahbuk ua a sabengtung an pe dinga a ip a hon leh, a dangka a muta a; ngaiin, a ip gong bul ah a na omta hi.
Huchiin, a unaute kiangah, ka dangka na koih nawn uh hi ve e; ngai un, ka ip ah na om zenhouh ve e, achia: huan, a lunglel ua, Pathianin hichi banga honbawl bangchidan ade aw?
Chiin, ling kawmin a kien uhi.
Huan, Kanan gama a pa uh kiang a hongtung ua, atung ua thil tung tengteng a hilh uh;
Huai mi a gam heutupa un, khauh takin a honhoupih a, galguk hi dingin hon gingta.
Huan, kou bel, a kiangah, mi diktak ka hi uh; galguk ka hi zenzen kei uh:
Unau sawm leh nih ka hi ua, ka pa uh tapate ka hi vek ua; khat bel a om nawn keia, ka nautumpen uh tuin Kanan gamah ka pa uh kiangah a om, ka chi uh.
Huan, huai mi, a gam heutupa un, ka kiang uah, hichiin mi diktak na hi uh chih ka honthei ding; na unau khat uh ka kiangah nusia unla, na inkuanpih kialte a dingin buh pua unla, paita un:
Huan, na nautumpen uh ka kiangah honpi un: huchiin galguk na hi kei ua, mi diktak na hi jaw uh chih ka thei ding: huchiin na unaupa uh ka honpe nawn dinga, hiai gamah sum na sinta ding uhi, hon chia, a chi ua.
Huan, hichi ahia, a ipte uh a butkhiak lai un, ngaiin, a dangka tun chiat uh a ip uah na om chiata: huan, amau leh apa uh a dangka tunte uh a muh un a lau mahmah uhi.
Huan, a pa uh Jakob in, a kiang uah, nouten ka tate hon tansak na hi uh: Joseph a om nawn kei, Simeon lah a om nawn kei, Benjamin nasan lah pi mang na tum nawn jel ua: huai thil tengteng in hon kiakkhum eita ve, achia.
Huan, Reuben in, apa kiangah, na kianga ka honpi nawnkei leh ka tapa nihte that maiin: amah ka khut ah honkem sak inla, na kiangah ka honpi nawn mai ding, chiin, a gena.Huan, aman, ka tapa jaw na kiang uah a hong suk kei ding; a u a sita a, amah kia lah ahita ngala: na paina lam lak uah tuahsia tuak leh, ka lu kang lungkhamna in han ah na tumsak ding uh ahi, achi hi.
Huan, aman, ka tapa jaw na kiang uah a hong suk kei ding; a u a sita a, amah kia lah ahita ngala: na paina lam lak uah tuahsia tuak leh, ka lu kang lungkhamna in han ah na tumsak ding uh ahi, achi hi.
Huan, huai gamah kial anak kiak mahmaha.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Aigupta gama kipana buh puak touh uh a gaih nung un, a pa un, a kiang uah, kuan nawn unla buh tawm chik bek ei a dingin va lei nawn un, a chi a.
Huchiin, Juda in, a kiangah, huai miin, na nau uh non tonpih kei u leh ka mel na mu kei ding uh, chiin, hon kalh ngiungeu hi.
Ka nau uh non zuihsak ding leh, buh kon va leisak ding uh;
Non zuihsak kei lejaw ka hoh kei ding uh: huai miin ka kiang uah, na nau uh non tonpih kei u leh ka mel na mu kei ding uh, a chita ngala, chiin a gena.
Huan, Israel in, bangjiakin ahia nau dang na neih lai tantan ua na hilh chitchiat uh, kei a dinga hoihlou na hih uh?
A chia.
Huan, amau, huai miin, na pa uh hing lai hia? unau dang na nei lai u hia?
Chiin, I tanchin leh I tanaute tanchin a hon dong ngala; huchiin huai a hon thudot bang jelin ka hilh uh ahi: Na nau uh honpi suk un, a chi ding chih kuan a thei chitchiat dia? a chi ua.
Huan, Juda in, a pa Israel kiangah, ka nau uh hon juisakin, huchiin ka ding ding ua, ka kuan mai ding uh; kou leh nang leh ka ta neu chikchikte u leng siloua I hin theihna ding un.
A tungtang thu ahi keimahin a bultum na ning; kei lak mahmah ah amah honphutin: amah na kianga ka honpi nawn keia, na maa ka hon dinsak nawn kei leh, a moh khantawnin ka po ding hi;
Om sawt lou hi le ung tuin a nihveina leng ka hongtung nawn khinta ding uh ahi, achia.
Huan, a pa uh Israel in, a kiang uah, huchibang a hih vanglak leh hichiin hih un; na seng un hiai gama thil hoih khenkhat singnai damdawi te, khuaiju te, namtui banghiam te, Murra te, theihawksak te, makha te, neukha chiat in huai mi adingin kipahman dingin tawi suk un.
Huan, dangka a mun nihin tawi unla, na ip gong bul ua a hon dangka piak nawn leng tawi nawn un; a muhkhelh ahi kha ding;
Na nau u leng pi unla, thou unla, huai mi kiangah vahoh nawn un:
Huchiin, na unau khat pen u leh Benjamin a hon khahsakna dingin Pathian bangkim hihtheiin huai mi hon hehpihsak hen.
Huan, ka tate tan a hih leh tan ka hi mai kei ding hia, a chi hi.
Huchiin, amau kipahman a tawi ua, dangka leng a mun nih a tawi ua, Benjamin leng a pi uh; huan, a thou ua, Aigupta gamah a hoh suk ua, Joseph maah a ding nawn uhi.
Huan, Joseph in Benjamin a kiang ua om a muh takin a in kemmi kiangah, huai mite in sungah pi lut inla, sa gou inla, bawlin, huai miten sun chiangin ka kiangah ann a ne ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, aman Joseph thupiak bangin a hihta hi; Joseph in ah amau a pi lut a.
Huan, Joseph in a pi luta a om jiak in a lau ua, hoh masak laia I ip ua dangka hon kiknawnte jiakin eive a honpi lut uh; I tung ua siatna zonga, hon sualin, ei leh I sabengtungte toh sikha dinga hon mat tum eive, a chi ua.
Huan, Joseph in kemmi kiangah a vahoh ua, kong bul ah a houpih ua,
Pu aw, ka hong masak lai ua buh lei ding lela hongsuak ka hi ua:
Huan, hichi ahia, giah buk ka tun un ka ipte uh ka hong ua, huan, ngaiin, ka dangka chiat uh ka ip gong bul uah a na om chiata, ka dangka uh a buk ngeingeiin a na om a: huchiin ka hontawi uhi.
Huan, buh leina dingin dangka dang ka hontawi ua: ka dangka u lah kuan ahia ka ip ua koih ka thei ngal kei ua, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, lungmuangtakin om unla, lau keiun: na Pathian, na pa uh Pathianin na ipte uah gou a honpia ahi mai ve: na dangka ulah ka mu ngala, achia.
Huan, Simeon a kiang uah a honpi khia ua.
Huan, Joseph in sungah amau a pi lut ua, tui a pia a, a khe uh a silta ua; a sabengtung u leng an a pia.
Huan, a kipahman tawi uh Joseph sunan nea a hongpai main a na bawlkhol ua: huailaiah an a ne sin uh chih lah a za ngal ua.
Huan, Joseph a in a hongpai takin, a khut ua kipahman om in sungah a kiangah a tawi lut ua, leisiin chibai a buk chiat uh.
Huan, aman a tanchin uh a donga, na pa uh a tanchin na gen uh, huai putek a damdam na hia?
A hing lai hia? a chi a.
Huan, amau, na sikha ka pu uh a dam lai ahi, a hing lai hi, a chi ua.
Huanm a lu uh a kun ua, chibai a buk nawn ua.
Huan, amah a daka, a nau Benjamin, a nu tapa a mua, hiai na nautumpen uh, a tanchin na honhilh uh hia? a chi a.
Huan, amah mahin, Ka tapa, Pathian honhehpih hen, a chi a.
Huan, Josephin a nau a muhin a khase mahmaha, kintakin kahna ding mun a zong paha, a dantan sungah a luta, huailaiah a kap kheta hi.
Huan, a mai a phiata, a va pawt nawna, a kidek teiteia, Annek bawl un, a chi a.
Huchiin amah ading a tuamin, amau a ding a tuamin, Aigupta mi a nekpihte a ding a tuamin a bawlta ua: Aiguptaten lah Hebrute a nekpih thei ngal kei ua; huchibang hih lah Aiguptate adingin a siang keia.
Huchiin, upa pen ta masa a hihna bangin, naupang pen nautumpen a hihna bangin Joseph maah a tu jel ua; huchiin lamdang asa chiat uh.Huan, Josephin a maa mite akipanin tantuan an a ban piaksaka, Benjamin tantuan ngial houh amaute tantuan tengteng sangin amun ngain a tam tuam hi.
Huan, uainte a dawn ua, nuam asa chiat mahmah uh.
Huan, Josephin a maa mite akipanin tantuan an a ban piaksaka, Benjamin tantuan ngial houh amaute tantuan tengteng sangin amun ngain a tam tuam hi.
Huan, uainte a dawn ua, nuam asa chiat mahmah uh.
Huan, aman a in kemmi kiangah, huai mite ip a puak zoh zahzah un buhin dimsak unla, a dangka chiat uh a ip gong bul chiat uah koih un.
Huan, ka nou, huai dangka nou, a naupangpenpa uh ip gong bulah koih un, a buh man dangka toh, chiin, thu a pia.
Huchiin, aman Joseph thu gen bangin a hihta hi.
Huan, khua a vak takin amau, a sabengtungte utoh, a paisakta ua.
Huan, khua akipan a pai khiak ua gamla a tun maun, Josephin a in kemmi kiangah, thou inla, huai mite vadelhin; huan, na vaphak takin a kiang uah, bangchidana thil hoih thil hoihloua thuk na hi ua?
Huai ka pu uain dawna leh a aisanna mahmah hilou ahi maw? hichibang na hih uh na gilou uh ahi, chiin, a chi a.
Huan, a delh phaa, huai thute a kiang uah a gena.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Pu, bangchidan ahia hichi thu na gen?
Na sikhaten huchibang thil ka hihlouh ding dan uh.
Ngaiin, ka ip gong bul ua dangka ka muhte uh leng Kanan gam akipanin na kiangah ka hon tawi ve ua oi: bangchidanin na pu in a dangka hiam dangkaeng hiam ka gu thei maijen ding ua?
Na sikhate lakah kuapeuh na muhna penpen si hen, kou leng ka pu uh sikhain ka om mai ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, hi hen, na thu bang jel un hi leh ake: Ahihhangin kuapeuh ka honmuhna penpen ka sikhain om hen; noute ahihleh gensiat beiin na om ding uh, a chi a.
Huaitakin amau ip chiat kintakin lei ah a nga khe chiat ua, amau ip chiat a hong ua.
Huan, aman, a upapen uah apana, a naupang pen uh phain a zonga: huchiin Benjamin ip ah nou a muta hi.
Huaitakin a puansilhte uh a botkek ua, amau sabengtung chiat a posak nawn ua, khua ah a kik nawnta uhi.
Huan, Juda leh a unauten Joseph in a vapha ua; amah lah huailaiah a na om lailaia: huan, a maah a khupboh chiat ua.
Huan, Josephin, a kiang uah, bang thil ahi maia na hih uh?
Kei miin aisan a siam teitei uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Achia.
Huan, Judain, pu na kiangah bang ka genta ding ua?
Bang ka honhilhta ding ua?
Bangchibangin ka kigenvengta ding ua?
Pathianin na sikhate tatlek na mu kheta hi: Ngaiin, pu, na sikhate ka hita mai uhi, koute leh a khut a nou a muhnapen uh leng, a chi a.
Huan, aman, huchibanga ka hihlouh dingdan: a khut a nou a muhnapen kia uh ka sikhain a om ding; nou jaw lungmuangtakin na pa uh kiangah pai tou ta un, a chi a.
Huaitakin Judain Joseph a vanaiha, Pu aw, hehpihtakin, pu, kei na sikha na bila na jak dingin thu kamkhat hon gen sak inla, na hehna na sikha tungah kuangsak ken: nang la Pharo bang hial na hita ngala.
Pu, nang, Pa hiam unau hiam na nei uhia?
Chiin, na sikhate na hon donga.
Huan, pu, kou, na kiangah, Pa putek tak leh, teklam ta, naupang chik, ka nei uh; huai mi u a sia, a nu neih lakah amah kia a om laia, a pain lah amah a it mahmah hi, ka chi ua.
Huan, nang, na sikhate kiangah, amah pen ka mit a ka muh theihna dingin ka kiangah honpi suk un, na chi a.
Huan, pu, kou na kiangah, ka nau un a pa a nuse theikei ding; a pa pai san leh a pa lah a si mai ngal sina, ka chi ua.
Huan, nang, na sikhate kiangah, na nautumpen uh non tonpih kei uleh, ka mel na mu nawn kei ding uh, na chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, na sikha ka pa uh kiang ka vatun un, pu, na thu ka hilh ua.
Huan, ka pa un, Kuan nawn unla, buh tawm chik bek ei a dingin va lei nawn un, a chi a.
Huan, kou, ka hoh suk thei nawn kei ding uh; ka nautumpen uh a hong ding lebel ka va hoh suk mai ding uh: ka nautumpen uh a hong kei leh huai mi melmu theilou ding ka hi uh, ka chi ua.
Huan, na sikha ka pa un, ka kiang uah, ka jiin tapa nih a honneisak chih na thei ua:
Huan, a khat pen ka kianga kipan a pai khiaa, boh jan veka om hi ngei ding ahi, ka chi a; huai nung siah amah mu lou vengveng ka hi:
huchiin, hiai mi leng ka kianga kipanin na pi man ua, tuahsia vatuak leh ka lu kang lungkhamnaa han a tumsak ding na hi uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, ka nauin kou honjui loua, na sikha ka pa kiang vatung leng, a hinna ka nau uh hinna toh a kizop jiakin;
Hichi ahi dinga, naupan a honjui kei chih a theih tak chiangin a si mai ding: huchiin na sikhaten na sikha ka pa uh lu kang lungkhamnaa han a tum sak ding keita ve ua.
Na sikhain, na kianga ka honpi nawn keileh, a moh khantawnin ka pa lakah ka po ding, chiin, ka pa kiangah ka nau uh tungtang thuah a bul tumpain ka kibawlta ngala.
Huchiin, hehpihtakin na sikha ka nau uh sikin, pu, na sikhain honom sak inla, ka nau a ute jui tou sakin.Ka nauin honjui louin bangchiin ka pa tunga siatna tung ding mu ding ka kei hiam, a chi hi.
Ka nauin honjui louin bangchiin ka pa tunga siatna tung ding mu ding ka kei hiam, a chi hi.
Huan, Joseph a kianga ding te ma ah a kidekzou takei a, mi tengteng ka kianga kipan pawt khe sak vek un, chiin, a kikou a.
Huchiin, Joseph a unaute kianga a kigen sung teng a kiangah kuamah a ding kei uh.
Huan, a kap loloih a, huchiin, Aigupta ten a ja ua, Pharo inkuanpih ten leng a ja uhi.
Huan, Joseph in a unaute kiangah, Joseph ka hi; kapa a damlai na maw?
Achia.
Ahihhangin a unauten a dawng theikei ua, a maah buaitakin a omta uhi.
Huan, Joseph, mahin, a unaute kiangah, hehpihtakin honnaih un, achia.
Huchiin a vanaih ua.
Huan, aman, na unaupa uh Joseph, Aigupta gam a lutpih dinga na khot uh ka hi.
Ahihhangin hiailaia pai dinga non khot jiakun lungkham kei unla, ki hehkhum tuan kei un: mite hinna hondam dingin Pathianin na ma ua hinna sawl masa ahi.
Hiai kum nih sungin hiai gamah kial a hongketa a: kum nga in a sam laia, huai sungin leileh a om kei ding, buhlak leng a om sam kei ding.
Huchiin, lei a suante nou honhawi sak ding leh, hotdamna thupi taka hingdam a ka hon omsak na dingin Pathianin na ma uah a honsawl masa ahi.
Huchiin, hiai a honsawl nou na hijaw kei ua, Pathian ahi jaw hi: aman Pharo pain leh a inkuanpihte tengteng heutu in leh Aigupta gam tengteng vaihawm tu in a honbawlta a.
Kintakin ka pa kiangah vahoh unla, a kiangah, na tapa Joseph in hichiin achia, Pathian in Aigupta gam tengteng heutuin a honbawl ta: ka kiangah hongpai sukin, sawt honhal ken:
Huchiin, Gosen gamah na om dinga, ka kiang ngeiah na om ding, nang leh, na tate leh, na tute leh, na belam honte leh, na bawng honte leh, na neih tengteng toh.
Huailaiah keiman ka honvak ding; kial na ding lah kum nga a omlai ngala; huchilouin jaw na genthei kha ding, nang leh, na inkuanpihte leh, na neih tengteng toh, honchi un.
Huan, ngai un, noumau mit ngei leh ka nau Benjamin mit ngeiin keimah kam mahmah in a genlai na mu kilkel uhi.
Huan, Aigupta gama ka thupina tengteng thu leh, na thil muh tengteng thu uh kapa na hilh ding ua; kapa kintakin hiailaiah non pi suk pah ding uh ahi, achia.
Huan, a nau Benjamin ngawnga kunin a kapta a; Benjamin a ngawng kunin a kapta.
Huan, a unaute tengteng a tawpa, a kah khum chiata: huai khitin a unauten thuvantang a genpih uhi.
Huan, Joseph unaute a hong uh chih thu thuthang Pharo inn ah ana zata ua: huaiin Pharo leh a sikhate a kipak sak mahmah.
Huan, Pharoin, Joseph kiangah, na unaute kiangah, hichiin hih un; na sate uh buh posak unla, pawt unla, Kanan gamah pai un;
Huan, napa uh leh, na inkuanpihte uh pi unla, ka kiangah hongpai un; huchiin, Aigupta gam a thil hoihte ka honpe dinga, hiai gam a thil om hoih pente na ne ding uh, chiin.
Thu ka honpia hi, hichi ahi, hichiin hih un; nata neu chikchik te uh ding leh na jite uh ding Aigupta gam akipan in kangtalai te la unla, na pa uh pi dingin va kuan un.
Na van uh leng ngaihtuah nuam dah un, Aigupta gam tengteng thil hoih peuhmah lah nou a ahi ngala, achia.
Huchiin Israel taten huchibangin a hih ua: huan, Joseph in Pharo thupiak bang in kangtalai te a kianguah a pia a, lampi a dingin nek ding leng a pia hi.
A vek ua kiangah puansilh kikhenna ding a pe chiat a; Benjamin kianga ngialah houh dangka za thum leh puansilh kikhenna ding nga a pia a.
Huan, a pa kiangah hichibang a khak a: Aigupta gam a thil hoih pua sabengtung sawm leh lampi a apa a ding buh leh tanghou leh nek ding pua sabengtung nu sawm a khak hi.
Huchiin a unaute a sawlkhia a, a paita ua; huan, aman a kianguah, lampia kinalou dingin pilvang un, achi hi.
Huan, Aigupta gam akipan a pai tou ua, Kanan gama apa Jakob kiang a vatung ua.
Huan, a kiangah, Joseph a hinglaia, Aigupta gam tengteng heutu ahi, chiin, a hilh ua.
Huan, a thugen uh a gintak louh jiakin, a lungtang a bahta.
Huan, a kiang ua Joseph thugen tengteng a hilh ua; huan, a tuanna ding kangtalai Joseph in a khakte a muh in Jakob lungtang a halh nawn hi:Huan, Israel in a hunta; ka tapa Joseph hingdama na om ei ngut ve: ka sih ma in amah ka vamu ding, achi hi.
Huan, Israel in a hunta; ka tapa Joseph hingdama na om ei ngut ve: ka sih ma in amah ka vamu ding, achi hi.
Huan, Israel a neih tengteng toh a pawta, Beer-seba a tunga, a pa Isaak Pathian kiangah kithoihnate alan.
Huan, Pathianin jana a mangin Israel a houpih a, Jakob, Jakob, achia.
Huan, aman, hiaiah ka om, achia.
Huan, aman, kei Pathian, na Pathian, ka hi: Aigupta gama hoh suk lau ken; huailaiah chi thupi takin ka honbawl ding hi:
Aigupta gamah na kiangah ka hong dinga; huan, ka honpi tou nawn ngeingei ding: huan, Joseph in na sih hun chiangin na mit a honbawl sak ding hi, achia.
Huchiin, Jakob Beer-seba akipanin a pawta: Israel taten a pa uh Jakob leh a ta neu chikchik te uhleh a jite uh tuanna dinga Pharo in kangtalai a khak te ah a tuang sak uhi.
Huchiin, Jakob leh a suante tengteng in kanan gama a lamkhiak uh, a gante u leh a vante uh, a tawi ua, Aigupta gama tungta uh:
A tapa te, a tupa te, a tanu te, a tunu te, a suante tengteng, Aigupta gamah a lut pihta hi.
Huan, hiaite Israel suan Aigupta gama lut, Jakob leh a tapate min ahi: Reuben Jakob ta masa.
Huan, Reuben tapate Hanok te, Pallu te, Hezron te, Karmi te ahi uhi.
Huan, Simeon tapate Jemuel te, Jamin te, Ohad te, Jakin te, Johat te, Kanan numei laka a tapa Saula te ahi uhi.
Huan, Levi tapa te Gerson te, Kohat te, Merari te, ahi uhi.
Huan, Juda tapate Er te, Onan te, Sela te, Perez te, Zerah te ahi ua: Er leh Onan bel Kanan gamah a sita ua.
Perez tapate Hezrun leh Hamul ahi uhi.
Huan, Issakar tapate Tola te, Puva te, Ioba te, Simron te ahi uhi.
Huan, Zebulun tapate Sered te, Elon te, Jhaleel te ahi uhi.
Huaite tengteng Lea tapa, a tanu Dina toh, Padanaram gama Jakob a neihsakte ahi uhi: a tapate leh a tanute tengteng sawm thum leh thum ahi uhi.
Huan, Gad tapate Ziphion te, Haggi te, Suni te, Ezbon te, Eri te, Arobdi te, Areli te ahi uh.
Huan, Aser tapate Imna te, Isva te, Isvi te, Beria te ahi uh, a sanggamnu uh Sera toh: huan, Beria tapate Beber leh Malkiel ahi uhi.
Huaite Zilpai Laban in a tanu Lea kianga a piakpa tapa te ahi ua, huaite Jakob a neihsaka, mi sawm leh gukte.
Huan, Jakob ji Rakil tapate Joseph leh Benjamin ahi uhi.
Huan, Joseph in Aigupta gamah tapa Manassi leh Ephraim a neia, huai mite On kho siampu Potipher tanu Asenathin amah a neihsak ahi.
Huan, Benjamin in tapate Bel te, Bekor te, Asbel te, Ger te, Naaman te, Ehi te, Ros te, Muppim te, Huppin te, Ardi te ahi uhi.
Huaite Rakil tapa Jakob a neihsakte ahi uh: a vek un sawm leh li ahi uh.
Huan, Dan tapa Husim ahi.
Huan, Naphtali tapate Jahzeel te, guni te, Jezer te, Sillem te ahi uh.
Huaite Bilhai Laban in a tanu Rakil kianga a piakpa tapate ahi uh, huaite Jakob a neihsaka: a vek un sagih ahi uh.
Jakob tapate jite simlouh in Jakob kianga Aigupta gama lut a khala pawt tengteng a vek un sawm guk leh guk ahi uhi;
Huan, Joseph in Aigupta gama tapa a neihte nih ahi ua: Jakob inkuanpihte tengteng, Aigupta gam a lutte, sawm sagih ahi uh.
Huan, Jakob in, Gosen gam lam lampi na nakawk muh dingin, Juda bel Joseph kiangah a hoh masa saka;
Huchiin, Gosen gamah lutta uh.
Huan, Joseph in a kangtalai a bawlkhola, Gosen gamah a pa dawn dingin a hih tou hi; huan, a kiangah a kigena, a ngawnga kunin a kap nilouh hi.
Huan, Israel in, Joseph kiangah, dam dama na oma, na mel ka muh nawn jiak in tun jaw ut leh sita leng le, achia.
Huan, Joseph in, a unaute leh apa inkuanpihte kiangah kava hoh tou dia, Pharo ka hilh dinga, a kiangah, ka unaute leh ka pa inkuanpihte, huai Kanan gama omte, ka kiangah a hongtung ta uh;
Amaute ganvulmi ahihjiakun belam chingmite ahi uh; a belam honte u leh a bawng honte uh leh a neih tengteng uh ahonpo vek hi, chiin, kava gen ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, Pharo in nou a honsapa, bang nasem na hi ua? a honchih hun chiangin,Nou, na sikha te, honsuangte akipan, naupang chik ka hihlai ua kipan in tu tanin gan vulmi ka hi uh, na chi ding uh: huchiin, Gosen gamah na om thei ding uhi, achia.
Belam chingmite himhim lah Aigupta mite kih lamtak ahi ngal ua.
Nou, na sikha te, honsuangte akipan, naupang chik ka hihlai ua kipan in tu tanin gan vulmi ka hi uh, na chi ding uh: huchiin, Gosen gamah na om thei ding uhi, achia.
Belam chingmite himhim lah Aigupta mite kih lamtak ahi ngal ua.
Huchiin, Joseph in Pharo a vahilh a, a kiangah, kapa te, ka unaute, a belam honte uh, a bawng honte uh, a neih tengteng u toh Kanan gam akipan a hongtung sukta ua: huan, ngaiin, Gosen gamah a om uh, achia.
Huan, a unaute laka kipan mi nga a pia, Pharo a theisak a.
Huan, Pharo in, a unaute kiangah, bang na sem na hi ua?
Achia.
Huan, amau.
Pharo kiangah, na sikhate, kou honsuangte akipan, belam chingmite ka hi uh, ach ua.
Huan, amau mahin, Pharo kiangah, hiai gam a om tadih dinga hong ka hi uh; ka gam uah lah na sikhate belam honte a dingin nek ding a om nonta keia; kial lah Kanan gamah a nak kiak mahmah ngala; huchiin hehpihtakin na sikhate Gosen gamah hon omsakin, achi ua.
Huan, Pharo in, Joseph a houpiha, na pa leh na unaute na kiangah a hongta ua:
Aigupta gam a kiching mahmah hi; na pa leh na unaute gam hoihna tata ah tengsak ve: huan, a lak ua mi thilhihthei tak theihna nei ngial om lehouh ka gan tunga heutu dingin bawl in, achia.
Huan, Joseph in apa Jakob a pi luta, Pharo maah a dingsak a: huchiin Jakob in Pharo a vualjawl a.
Huan, Pharo in Jakob kiangah, kum bangzah na hita a?
Achia.
Huan, Jakob in, Pharo kiangah, ka khualzin nung jaw kum ja leh kum sawm thum ahia: ka damsung kumte khawng a tomin, a haksa ahi, a honsuangte a khualzin lai ua a damsung kum u leng pha zou kei ing achia.
Huan, Jakobin Pharo a vualjawl nawna, Pharo kianga kipanin a pawtta hi.
Huchiin, Joseph in apa leh a unaute tenna a bawlsaka, Pharo thupiak bangin Aigupta gama, gam hoihpen takah, Ramases gam a gou dingin a peta hi.
Huan.
Joseph in apa leh a unaute leh apa inkuanpihte tengteng a inkuan u bangjelin nek ding a pia a, a vakta hi.
Huan, huai gam tengteng ah nek ding himhim a om takei a; kial lah a nak kiak mahmah ngala, huchiin kial jiakin Aigupta gam leh Kanan gam a bahta hi.
Huan, Joseph in, a buh leina man un, Aigupta gam leh Kanan gam a dangka om tengteng a khawmsak veka; huan, Joseph in huai dangka Pharo in ah a tawi a.
Huan, Aigupta gam leh Kanan gama dangka tengteng a zat bei khit un, Aigupta mi tengteng Joseph kiangah a hong ua, nek ding honpia in aw; na ma a si maimah ding ka hi ding uam?
Dangka lah om nawnta ngal kei a, achi ua.
Huan, Joseph in, na gante uh honpe mei un; dangka a om nawn kei leh na gan man un nek ding ka honpe ding, achia.
Huchiin, a gante uh Joseph kiangah a honpi ua: huan, Joseph in huai sakol man ding leh, belam hon man ding leh, bawng hon man ding leh sabengtung man dingin dek ding a pe jela: huai kumin a gan tengteng uh man in nek ding a pia a, a vak chiat hi.
Huan, huai kum a bei a, kum a hong thak nawn in a kiangah a hong nawn ua, a kiangah, ka dangka tengteng uh ka zat beitak dan u leh, pu aw, ka ganhon te uh nanga a hihtak dan bang, pu aw, nang lakah ka im kei ding uh; pu aw, na mit muhin ka pumpi u leh ka gamte uh kialou bangmah a omta mahmah kei hi:
Na ma ah kou leh ka gam uh mangthang maimah ding hi ve ung maw?
Koumau mah ka gam u toh nek dingin honlei maiin, huchiin, koumau leh ka gam uh Pharo sikhate hi mai nung: huan, silou a mi hinga dama ka om theihna ding un, gam a siatlouh na ding, buh chi honpia in, achi ua.
Huchiin, Joseph in Pharo a dingin Aigupta gam tengteng a leisak ta a; kial a tung ua a nak tun mahmah jiakin Aigupta miten lah a lou uh a juak chiat ngal ua; huchiin gam Pharo a ahi vekta.
Mite Aigupta gamgi tawp khatlam a kipanin khatlam tawp phain, khuate ah a kisuansakta a.
Siampu te gam kia a lei keia: siamputen Pharo akipan tantuan a nei ua, Pharo in a piak atantuan uh a ne jel ua; huaijiak in a gam uh a juak kei uhi.
Huai nungin, Joseph in, mite kiangah, ngai un, tunin na gam utoh noute Pharo a dingin ka honleita a: hiai, hiaiah nou a dingin buh chi a om, lei ah na ching ding ua.
Huan, buh lak hun chiangin hichi ahi ding.
Pharo a dingin sehnga suah seh khat jel na pe ding ua, a sehli noumau a ahi ding, huaibel lou a chin nawn dingin, noumau leh na inkuanpihte uh nek dingin, na tanu neu chikchik te uh nek ding ahi ding hi, achia.
Huan, amau, nang ka hinna uh na humbitta: pu aw, honhehpih inla, Pharo sikhate ka hi mai ding uh, achi ua.
Huchiin, Joseph in Pharo in seh nga suah seh khat a muh jel ding thu, Aigupta gam a dingin tutanin danin a bawlta hi: siampute gam kia ahi, Pharo a hilou.
Huan, Israel in Aigupta gama, Gosen gamah tenna a bawlta a: huailaiah a kihih-inbul ua, chi tampi a suang ua, nakpi takin a pungta uh.
Huan, Jakob bel Aigupta gamah kum sawm leh kum sagih a om a: huchiin, Jakob damsung kum kum ja leh kum sawm li leh kum sagih a hita hi.
Huan, Israel sihna hun a hiongnaita a: huchiin, a tapa Joseph a sama.
A kiangah, na honhehpih theih leh, hehpihtak in huai na khut ka pheipi nuaiah golh inla, hon hehpihin, ka tungah chihtaktakin hih in: hehpihtakin Aigupta gamah honvui mahmah ken;
Hon suangte kianga ka ihmut hun chiangin, nang Aigupta gam akipan na hon jawngkhe dinga, amaute vuina mun ah na honvui zaw ding ahi, achia.
Huan, aman, na chih bangin ka honhih ding hi, achia.Huan, aman, ka kiangah kichiamin leh, achia: huchiin, a kiangah a kichiamta hi.
Huan, Israel lukhung siin a kunta a.
Huan, aman, ka kiangah kichiamin leh, achia: huchiin, a kiangah a kichiamta hi.
Huan, Israel lukhung siin a kunta a.
Huan, huaite nungin hichi ahia, Joseph kiangah, ngaiin, na pa a chi ana, achi ua.
Huchiin, a tapa nihte Manassi leh Ephraim a kiangah a tonpiha,
Huan, Jakob kingah, ngaiin, na tapa Joseph na kiangah a hong hi, chiin.
A hilh ua: huchiin, Israel a kihalhsaka, lupna ah a tuta a.
Huan, Jakob in, Joseph kiangah, Pathian bangkim hihthei Kanan gama Luz khua ah ka kiangah a kilaka, a honvualjawla,
Ka kiangah, chi tampi ka honsuangsak dinga, ka honhihpung lai ding, chi tuamtuam omkhawm in ka honbawl ding; huan, hiai gam na nunga na suante kiangah khantawn gou dingin ka pe ding, honchi a.
Huan, na tapa nihte, Aigupta gama na neihte, keia ahi uh; Ephraim leh Manassi, Reuben leh Simeon bangmah in, keia ahi ding uh.
Huan, hiai mite nunga ta ne neihte nanga ahi ding uh, a goutan uah a ute uh min a kikoppih mai ding uh.
Huan, kei tungthu ahihleh, Paddan gam a kipana ka hong laiin Rakil pen Kanan gamah lamkalah, Ephtath khua a gamla kuam ahihlaiin, ka kiangah a si a: huailaiah Ephrath kho lampi ah ka vuita, (huaibel Bethlehem khua ahi), achia.
Huan, Israel in Joseph tapate a ena, hiaite kuate ahi ua? achia.
Huan, Joseph in, apa kiangah, hiaite ka tapa, Pathian in hiai laia honpiak te ahi uh, achia.
Huan, aman, hehpihtakin ka kiangah honpiin, amau kana vualjawl ding, achia.
Israel mit bel a upat jiakin a chim nawn kei a, huan, aman ana tawp a, ana pom a.
Huan, Israel in, Joseph kiangah, na mel muh ka lamen nawn keia, himahleh, ngaiin, Pathian in, na suante mel nangawn a honmusakta hi, achia.
Huan, Joseph in amau apa pheikal akipan a kai khia a, a maia lei siin chibai a buka.
Huan, Joseph in a nih un a kai a, Ephraim pen a khut taklamin Israel khut veilam pangah a kai a, Manassi pen a khut veilamin Israel khut taklam pangah a kai a, honpi nai a.
Huan, Israel in a sawk kalh teitei a, a khut taklam in a sawka, Ephraim a naupang jaw siipah a nga a; Manassi lah ta masa ahi ngala.
Huan, Joseph a vualjawla, honsuangpa Abraham leh Isaak ama a a om jelna Pathian, tuni tana ka damsung tengtenga honvakpa Pathian,

Huan, Joseph in apan akhut taklam Ephraim sipa a ngak a muhin a lungkim takei a; huchiin apa khut Ephraim sipa kipan Manassi sipa suan dingin a domkanga.
Huan, Joseph in, apa kiangah, pa, hichibang ding ahi kei: hiai ahi ta masa, na khut taklam a siipah nga jaw in, achia.
Himahleh, apa a ut keia, ka thei hi, ka tapa aw, ka thei hi: amah leh nam a gen thamin a om sam dinga, amah leng a thupi sam ding: Ahihhangin a naupa amah sangin a thupi zo dinga, a suante leng chi tuamtuam tamtak a hong hi ding uh, achia.
Huchiin, Jakob in, Israelten, Ephraim leh Manassi bangin Pathianin nang honomsak hen, chiin, noumau min louin ahon vualjawl jel ding uh, chiin huai niin, amau a vualjawl a: huchiin Ephraim Manassi maah a omsakta hi.

Na pa Pathian, nang honpanpihpa dinga-Bangkimhihtheipa, tunglam van vauljawlnate, nuailam bok gige tui thuktak vualjawlnate, nawite leh sul vualjawlnate, nangmah honvualjawl dingpa ngei hihhatin a om hi.
