Huchiin, Pathianin Mosi kiangah, KA HIH KA HI: a chi a: huan, huchibangin Israel suante kiangah na vachi ding, KA HI in na kiang uah a honsawl hi, a chi a.
Huan, Pathianin Mosi kiangah hichiin a chih behlap a, Israel suante Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, Jakob Pathian in na kiang uah a honsawl; hiai ka min ahi gige a, huan suan tengteng tani ka theigige na ahi.
Kuan, inla, Israel upate kaikhawm inla, a kiang uah hichiin chiin, Na pipute uh Toupa Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian leh Jakob Pathian ka kiangah a hongkika, hichiin a chi, ka hongveh peuhmaha, Aigupta gama na tung ua hihte ka muta hi:
Huan, hichiin ka chita, Aigupta gimna kipanin Kanante, Hitte, Amorte Perite, hivite leh Jebuste gam, bawngnawi leh khuaijua luangah ka honla khe ding.
Na aw a ngai khe ding: huchiin na kuan dinga, nang leh Israel upate, Aigupta kumpipa kiangah na hoh ding uh, a kiangah hichi bang in na chi ding uh, Hebru te Toupa Pathian in hon kimuhpih a: tu in, ka hon ngen uhi, hon paisak in, gamdai a ni thum lama, Toupa ka Pathian uh kianga ka ki thoih theih na ding un.
A hia Aigupta kumpipan a hon paisak kei ding chih ka theitel hi, a ban thahat in hilou in.
Huchiin, ka ban ka jak dinga, a lak ua ka hih ding ka thil lamdang te tengteng in Aigupta gam ka gawt ding: huan, huai nung chiangin a hon paisak ding hi.
Huan, Aigupta te mitmuh in hiai mite deihsak na ka pe ding, huchiin hichi ahi dinga, na pai chiang un a vuak in na pai kei ding uh:Numei teng in a innveng leh a inn a nituang nu a kipan in, dangka suangmantam te, dangkaeng suangmantam te leh puansilh te a leitawi ding: huchiin huaite na tapa te uh na silhsak ding ua, na tanu te uh na silhsak ding uhi; huchiin Aigupta te na gallak ding uhi.
Numei teng in a innveng leh a inn a nituang nu a kipan in, dangka suangmantam te, dangkaeng suangmantam te leh puansilh te a leitawi ding: huchiin huaite na tapa te uh na silhsak ding ua, na tanu te uh na silhsak ding uhi; huchiin Aigupta te na gallak ding uhi.
Huchiin, Mosi in a dawnga, a hina a, ngai in, a hon um kei ding ua, ka aw leng a ngai khe sam kei ding uh: Toupa na kiangah a kilak kei, a chih ding jiak un, achia.
Huan, Toupan a kiangah, na khut a bang ahia?
Achia.
Aman, chiang, achi.
Huan, aman, leiah khia in, achia.
Huchiin, leiah a khia a, gulpi a hong suaka; huan, Mosi ama a kipan in a taita hi.
Huan, Toupa Mosi kiangah, na khut zan inla, gul a mei in la in, achia: (a khut a zana, gul amei in a manta a, a khut ah chiang a hong suak nawn leuleu hi):
Hichia apipute uh Toupa Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian leh Jakob Pathian, na kiangah a kilak chih a up na ding un, achi hi.
Huan, Toupan a kiangah, tu in na khut na angah koih in, a chi nawn a.
Huchiin, a khut a angah a koih a: a zan khiah takin, ngaiin, a khut vuk bangin a phak ta hi.
Huan, aman, na khut na angah koih nawnin, achia.
(A khut a angah a koih nawna: a anga kipan a khah kheta, ngaiin, a khut khatlam bang a hongsuak nawn hi).
Hichi ahi dinga, a hon gintak kei ua, chiamtehna khatna aw leng a ngaihkhiak sam kei uleh, chiamtehna nanung aw a up ding uh ahi ding.
Hichi a honghi dinga, hiai chiamtehna nihte a up kei lai ua, na aw leng a ngaihkhiak sam kei uleh, lui tui akipan na la dinga, gam keu ah na sung ding: huan, lui akipana na tui lak khiak gam keu ah sisan a honghi ding hi, a chi a.
Huchiin, Mosiin Toupa kiangah, Aw Toupa, mi dangnal ka hi kei, chiklai mahin, na sikha kianga thu na gen nungsangin leng: mi dangawk leh pau zekai ka hi jaw hi, a chi a.
Huan, Toupan a kiangah, mi kam bawl kua ahia?
Ahihkeileh pautheiloute, bengngongte, muhnate, mittawte kua bawl ahia?
Kei Toupan ka bawl ahi kei maw?
Huaijiakin tuin kuan inla, na kam ka ompih ding, na gen ding ka honhilh ding hi, achia.
Huan, aman, Aw Toupa, sawlin, kon ngen hi, na sawldingpa khutin, a chi a.
Huchiin, Mosi tungah Toupa hehna a soutaa, Aron na unaupa a om kei maw?
Hoihtakin thu a gen thei chih ka thei.
Huailouin, ngaiin, nang kimuhpih dingin a hongpai khia: a hon muh chiangin a lungtangin a kipak ding hi.
A kiangah thu na gen dinga, a kamah thute na guang ding: na kam ka ompih dinga, na hih ding ka honhilh ding hi.
Huchiin amah mite kianga na thugenpa ahi ding: amah nang dingin kam tang ahi dinga, huan nang amaha dingin Pathian tang na hi ding hi.
Huan, chiamtehnate na hihna dingin, na khutin hiai chiang na tawi ding hi, a chi a.
Huchiin, Mosi a kisa a a sungpa Jethro kiangah a kika, a kiangah, ka hon ngen hi, hon paisak inla Aigupta gama om ka unaute kiangah ka kik ding, a dam lailai na u hiam kava thei ding, achia.
Huan, Jethro in Mosi kiangah, damtak in vahoh in, achi hi.
Huan, Toupan Midian gam Mosi kiangah, pai inla, Aigupta gamah kik nawn in; thah hontum pasal te teng lah a sita ngal ua, achia.
Huchiin, Mosi in a ji leh a tate a pi a, sabengtung tungah a tuangsak a Aigupta gamah a kik nawnta hi; huan, Mosi in a khutin Pathian chiang a tawi hi.
Toupan Mosi kiangah, Aigupta gama kik dinga na kuan chiangin, na khuta ka koih huai thil lamdangte tengteng Pharo maah hih ngei-ngei in: a hihhangin a lungtang ka saksak dinga, huchiin mite a paisak kei ding hi, achia.
Huan, Pharo kiangah, hichiin Toupan, Israel ka tapa ahi, ka ta masapen pen, achi:
Ka honchi ahi, na honsepsak theihna dingin, ka tapa paisakin: paisak na nial leh, ngaiin, na tapa ka that ding, na ta masapen mahmah, na chi ding.
Huan, lampia khualbukah hichi a hong hita, Toupan amah ana tuaka, thah dingin a zongta hi.
Huchihlai in Zipporain suanghiam a la a, a tapa zek mukvum a atkhia a, a khe bulah a khia a, kei dingin si kai pasal na hi mahmah hi, achia.
Huchiin amah a paisaka: huan, zekvum jiak in, sisan kai pasal na hi, achia.
Huan, Toupan Aron kiangah, Mosi tuak dingin gamdai ah hoh in, achia.
Huchiin, a hohta a, Pathian tangah amah a tuaka, a tawpta hi.
Huan, Mosiin amah sawl Toupa thu tengteng Aron a hilh a, amah a piak chiamtehna tengteng toh.
Huan, Mosi leh Aron a paita ua Israel suante upate tengteng a kaikhawm vek ua:
Mosi kianga toupan thu a gen tengteng leh, mite mitmuh achiamtehna a hih tengteng Aron in a genta hi.Huchiin miten a gingta uh: huan, Toupan Israel suante a hongveha, a gimna uh a mute chih a jaktakun, a lu uh akun ua, a beta uhi.
Huchiin miten a gingta uh: huan, Toupan Israel suante a hongveha, a gimna uh a mute chih a jaktakun, a lu uh akun ua, a beta uhi.
Huan, huai nungin Mosi leh Aron a lut ua, hichibangin Israelte Toupa Pathian in achi, gamdai a kei dia ankuang luina a bawl theih na ding un, ka mite paisakin, chiin, Pharo a hilh ua.
Huan, Pharo in Israel te paisak dinga a aw ka man ding, Toupa kua ahia?
Tua toupa ka theikei, Israel te leng ka paisak kei ding, achia.
Huchiin amau, Hebru te Pathian in hon kimuhpih a: gamdai ah ni thum lamah, hon paisak in, ka hon ngen uhi, Toupa ka Pathian kianguah hin kithoihsak in; hi hiam, namsau hiam in a hon gawt kha ding hi, achi ua.
Huan, Aigupta kumpipan a kianguah, bang dinga, Mosi leh Aron, a nasepte ua mite khawlsak na hia?
Na puakgik te uh pua un, achi hi.
Huan, Pharo in, ngai un, gama mite tuin a tam ua, a puakgik ua kipan in na khawlsak uh, achia.
Huchiin, Pharo in huai ni mah in mite nasem heutute leh upate thu a pia a,
Tuma siah a bangin teklei bawl na dingin mite pawl na pe nawn kei ding uh: kuan uhenla, pawl va kilak uhen.
Tumasiah a a teklei bawlsa te tengteng uh, a tunguah na koih ding ua; huai a kipan in bangmah na kiamsak kei ding uh: a tha uh a dah kha dinga; huchiin kapin, ka Pathian kianguah hon paisak in hon va kithoihsak in, a chi kha ding uh.
Na tam sem a tunguah guan unla, huaia a sepgim theih na ding un; huan thu ginalou limsak kei un, chiin.
Huchiin, mite nasem heutute a pai khia ua, a upate u toh, mite kiangah thu a gen ua, hichibang Pharo in, pawl ka honpe kei ding, a chi hi.
Nou kuan unla, na muh theih theihna uah pawl kilak uh: himahleh na nasep uah bangmah a kikiamsak kei ding, a chi ua.
Huchiin mite pawl hi jawlou in buhbul lakhawm ding in Aigupta gam tengteng ah a vak jakta uhi.
Huan, nasem heututen amau a noh ua, na nasep uh zou un, na niteng sepdingte uh pawl a omlai ngalin, chiin.
Huchiin, Israel suante upate, Pharo nasem heututen a tung ua a koihte uh, a vua ua, bangdia tumasiah a banga janleh tuni a na teklei bawl uh zoulou na hi ua?
Chiin, a hap uh.
Huaitakin Israel suante upate a hong ua, Pharo kiangah a kap ua, bangdia na sikhate hichi bawl tel na hia?
Na sikha ten lah pawl honpe lou ua, amau lah ka kiang uah, teklei bawl un, achi ua: ngaiin, na sikhaten honvua uh; ahia, mohna na mite ngei ah a om hi, chiin.
Ahihhangin aman, thadah na hi uh, thadah na hi uh: huaijiakin, honpaisak inla, Toupa kiangah hon va kithoihsak un, na chi uh.
Huaijiakin kuan unla; na va sem un; pawl hong kipe kei ding, a hihhangin teklei bikhiahzah na piak khiak ding uh ahi, achi hi.
Huchiin, na niteng nasep ua na teklei te ua kipan bangmah na kiamsak ding uh ahi kei, a kichih nungin, Israel suante upaten thu a sia a a omdan uh a theita uhi.
Huan, Pharo a kipan a hongpai khia a, lampia ding, Mosi leh Aron a kituahpih ua:
A kianguah, Toupan nou hon ena, vai a hawm; Pharo mit leh a sikhate mita ka gimnam uh kih huaia na bawl ua, kou hon that dinga a khut ua namsau na koihtak jiak un, achia ua.
Huchiin, Toupa kiangah Mosi a kik nawna, Toupa, bang dinga hiai mite hichibang gilou suaksak na hia?
Bangdia kei honsawl na hia?Na mina thugen kia Pharo kianga ka vahoh nungsiah lah, aman hiai mite kiangah gilou a bawlta ngala: na mite leh na pi khe het kei hi, achia.
Na mina thugen kia Pharo kianga ka vahoh nungsiah lah, aman hiai mite kiangah gilou a bawlta ngala: na mite leh na pi khe het kei hi, achia.
Huchiin TOUPA'n Mosi kiangah, Tuin Pharo kianga bang ahia kahih ding na mu ding: khut thahat in amaute a paisak dinga, khut thahat in amaute a gama kipanin a hawlkhia ding ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan Pathianin Mosi kianga thu genin, a kiangah, TOUPA ka hi:
Thilbangkimhih thei Pathian minin Abraham kiangah, Isaak kiangah, Jakob kiangah, ka kilakta, a hihhangin ka min JEHOVAHIN a lak ua theih ka hi kei hi.
Amaute Kanan gam, mikhuala a omna gam uh, a khualzinna gam uh, pe ding in amau toh ka thukhun leng ka hihkiptaa.
Huan Aiguptaten koltannaa a tansak un, Israel suante mauna te leng ka zata; huchiin ka thukhun ka theigige.
Huaijiakin Israel suante kiangah, TOUPA ka hi, chih gen inla, Aiguptate puakgikna nuai a kipan ka hon pi khe dinga, a koltanna ua kipan in ka hon suaktasak ding, ban jakin ka hon tan ding, vaihawmna thupi te toh.
Mipite dingin kong kilak ding a, nou dingin Pathian ka hi ding: huchiin Aigupta te puakgikte nuai a kipan a hon lakhe pa TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Gam a tungtangthu Abraham kiang, Isaak kiang leh Jakob kianga pe ding aka chiam, gamsungah ka hontun ding: huchiin, gou luah ding inka hon pe ding: TOUPA ka hi chiin.
Huchiin Mosiin Israel suante kiang ah huchibangin thu a genta: ahihhang inlungsim dahna ziak leh koltanna haksatna ziakin Mosi a ngaikheta kei uh.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thugenin,
Lutin, a gam akipan Israel suante a pai khiak sak na ding in Pharo kiangah thu genin, chiin.
Huchiin Mosiin TOUPA ma ah thu a genta a, ngaiin, Israel suanten hon ngaikhe kei uh; kei, muk sumlouh, bangchiin Pharo in a hon ngaikhe dia? chiin.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiang leh Aron kiang ah thua gena, Aigupta gam a kipan Israel suante pi khe ding in Israel suante lam leh Aigupta kumpipa lamah amau thu a peta hi.
Hiaite a pate innkote lupente ahi ding uh: Reuben Israel ta masa pen; Hanok, leh Pallu, Hazron, leh Karmi: hiaite Reuben inkote ahi uh.
Huan, Simeon tapate; Jemuel, leh Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Zohar, Shaul Kanan numei tapa: hiaite Simeon inkote ahi uh.
Huchiin a khang uh dungzuiin hiaite Levi tapate a min tea hi uh; Gerson, leh Merari: huan Levi damsung kumte kum za leh sawmthum leh sagih.
Gerson tapate; a inko dungzui un, Libni leh Simi.
Huan Kohath tapate; Amran, Izhar, Hebron, Uzziel: huan Kohath damsung kumte kum za leh sawmthum leh thum ahi.
Huan Merari tapate; Mahali leh Musi: a khang uh dungzui in hiaite Levi inkote ahi uh.
Huchiin Amramin a pa sanggamnu Jodebed jiin a neia; Aron leh Miso a neihsaka: huan Amram damsung kumte kum za leh sawmthum leh sagih ahi.
Huan Izhar tapate; Kora, Nepheg, leh Ziri
Huan Uzziel tapate; Mikael, Elzaphan, leh Ziri.
Huchiin Aron in Amminadab tanu, Nason sanggamnu, Eliseba jiin a neia, Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, leh Ithamar a neihsak hi.
Huan Kora tapate; Assir, Elkana, Abiasaph; hiaite Kora innkote ahi uh.
Huchiin Eleazar Aron tapa in Putiel tanute laka khat jiin a neia; Phineha a neihsak: a inko dungzui un hiaite Levite pate ahi uhi.
Hiaite TOUPAN Aron leh Mosi kianga A sepaihte uh dungzuiin Aigupta gama kipanin Israel suante honpi khia un, a chih te uh ahi uh.
Hiaite amau Aigupta kumpipa Pharo kianga Aigupta akipana Israel suante pi khe dinga: thugente ahi uh: hiaite huai Mosi leh Aron te ahi uh.
Huchiin hichi ahia Aigupta gama Mosi kianga TOUPAN thu gena,
Kei TOUPA ka hi: na kianga ka chih tengteng Aigupta kumpipa Pharo kiangah genin, chiin.Huan, Mosiin TOUPA maah.
Ngaiin, muk sumlouh ka hia, bangchiin Pharoin a honngaikhe dia? a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin TOUPA maah.
Ngaiin, muk sumlouh ka hia, bangchiin Pharoin a honngaikhe dia? a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Enin, Pharo adingin Pathianin ka hon bawlta: huchiin na unaupa Aron na jawlnei ahi ding, a chi a.
Thu kon piak tengteng nag en ding: huchiin Aron naunaupa in a gama kipana Israel suante a sawl khiak dingin, Pharo kiangah a gen ding.
Huchiin Pharo lungtang ka khauhsak dinga, Aigupta gama ka chiamtehnate leh ka thillamdangte ka khangsak ding.
Himahleh, Aigupta tunga ka khut ka ngak theihna ding leh, ka seppihte leh ka mi Israel suante, vaihawmna thupitea Aigupta gama kipan ka honpi khiak theihna dingin, Pharoin nang a hon ngaikhe kei ding hi.
Huchiin, Aigupta tunga ka khut ka honlik khiaka, a lak ua kipana Israel suante ka honpi khiak chiangin, Aiguptaten kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Huan Mosi leh Aronin, amau TOUPAN thu a piak bangin a hihta ua, huchiin a hihta uhi.
Mosi kum sawmgiat leh thuma upa ahi.
Pharo kianga thu a gen lai un
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiang leh Aron kiangah thu a gena,
Pharoin na kiang ua thu gena, Nou a dingin thillamdang suah un: a chih chiangin: huai chiangin Aron kiangah, Na chiang la inla, Pharo maah khiain, huchiin gul a hong hi ding, na chi ding hi, chiin,
Huchiin Mosi leh Aron Pharo kiangah a lut ua, TOUPAN thu a piak bangin a hihta uh: pharo maah leh, a sikhate maah Aronin achiang a khia, gul a hong hi.
Huchiin Pharoin leng mipilte leh bumsiamte a sama: huchiin Aigupta mitkhialdawi tawite, amitkhialdawi un amau leng huchibang mahin a hihta uhi.
Amau leng michihin achiang uh a khia ua, huchiin gulte a honghi ngal ua: ahihhangin Aron chiangin achiangte uh a valhta hi.
Huchiin Pharo lungtang a khauhsaka, huan amau thu a ngaikhe kei, TOUPAN a chih bangin
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Pharo lungtang a khauhtaa, mite paisak a nial.
Jingsangin Pharo kiangah hohin; ngaiin tuiah a hoh.
A hong pai ngakin lui geiah na ding ding; huan na khutin huai chiang gul hong suak na tawi ding hi.
A kiangah, Hebrute TOUPA Pathianin na kiangah honsawla, Gamdaia ka naa sep theihna ding un ka mite paisakin: huan, ngaiin, tumasiahin na ngeingaih kei, a chi, chiin.
Hichibangin TOUPAN a chi, Hiaiah TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding; ngaiin, Ka khuta chiangin luia om tuite ka sat dinga, sisan a hongsuak ding uh.
Huchiin luia om ngasate, a si ding ua, huan lui a uih dinga; huchiin Aiguptaten luitui a dawn kei ding uh, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena, Na chiang la inla, Aigupta Tuite tungah, a tuinakneite uh tungah, a luite uh tunga, a tuichinte uh tungah, a tui lite uh tungah, sisan a honsuah theihna dingin, Aigupta gam pumpia singhawmte leh suanghawmtea sisan a om theihna dingin na khut lik khiain, Aron kiangah, chiin, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPA thupiak bangin, Mosi leh Aronin a hih uh; achiang alik tou a, Pharo mitmuhin, leha sikhate mitmuhin, luia om tuite a satta; huchiin luia om tuite sisan a hongsuak vek uh.
Huan luia om ngasa a si a; lui laha uiha, huan Aiguptaten lui tui a dawn theita kei ua, huchiin Aigupta gam pumpiah sisan a omta.
Huchiin Aigupta mitkhialdawitawiten leng a mitkhialdawitawi un huchimahbangin a hih uh: huan Pharo lungtang a khauh a, TOUPAN a chih bangin amau a ngaikhe sam kei hi.
Huan Pharo a kiheia a inah a paitaa, huan thil nangawn leng a lungtang ah a koih samsam kei hi.
Huan Aiguptate tengtengin dawn ding zongin luikim khawng a khuat ua; luitui lah a dawn thei ngalkei ua.Huchiin TOUPAN lui a gawt nung ni sagih a hongchingta hi.
Huchiin TOUPAN lui a gawt nung ni sagih a hongchingta hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena, Pharo kiangah hoh inla, a kiangah hichiin chiin, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Ka na hon sepsak theihna din gun, ka mite paisak in.
Amau paisak na nial leh, ngaiin, uin na gam tengteng ka gawt ding:
Huchiin lui in ute a tama tam, a honsuah khe ding ua, huaite a hong paitou ding ua, na in ah a honglut ding ua, na lupna dan sung, na lupna tungah, na sikhate in ah, na mite tungah, na thuk ah leh, na tangbuangbawlna ah:
Huan ute nang tungah leh, na mite tungah leh, na sikhate tungah hongkha ding uh. a chi, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aron kiangah, luinak neite tung leh, luite tung leh, tuichinte tungah na chiang toh na khut lik inla, Aigupta gam tungah ute honpai tou sakin, chiin, a chi hi.
Huchiin Aron in Aigupta luite tungah a khut a lika; huan ute a hong paitou ua, Aigupta gam a tuamta uhi.
Huchimahbangin mitkhialdawitawiten a mitkhialdawi un a hih ua, Aigupta gamtungah ute a honla tou uhi.
Huaitakin Pharoin Mosi leh Aron a samsaka, Kei leh ka mite a kipana ute a lak mang theihna dingin, TOUPA ngen un; huchiin mite ka paisak ding, TOUPA kiang a kithoihna a bawl theihna ding un, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin Pharo kiangah, Ka tungah kiuangsakin: nang ding leh, na sikhate ding leh, na mite dinga nang leh na inte ua kipana, lui kiaa a om theihna ding ua ute hihgawp ding chikchiangin ka ngen dia? a chi a.
Huan aman, Jingchiangin, a chi a.
Huchiin, aman, Na thu bangin hi hen: TOUPA ka Pathian bang uh kuamah a om kei chih na theihna dingin.
Nang leh, na inte uh leh, na sikhate, leh, na mite akipanin ute a pawtkhe ding ua; luiah kia a omta ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin Mosi leh Aron Pharo kianga kipanin a pai khia ua: huan Pharo gawtna dia ute a koih ziakin TOUPA kiangah Mosi a kapta hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi thu bangin a hihta; inte akipan, khuate akipan leh loute akipanin ute a sita uhi.
Huchiin a kaikhawm ua a vum uh: huan gama uihta hi.
Himahleh Pharoin hungaihna a om chih a theihin, a lungtang a khauhsaka; amaute a ngaikhe kei; TOUPA gen bangin.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aron kiangah, Na chiang lik inla, gama leivui satin, Aigupta gam pumpia hik a honghihna ding un, chi in, a chi a.
Huchibangin, a hih ua; Aronin lah achiang toh a khut a lika, leia leivui a sata, mi ah leh sa ah hik a honghita ngal ua; gama leivui teng, Aigupta gam pumpiah hik a honghi suak vekta hi.
Mitkhialdawitawitenleng a mitkhialdawitawi un hikte hon-omsak dingin huchibangin ahih ua, himahleh a hih theikei uh: huchiin mi tung leh sa tungah hikte a om uhi.
Huaitakin mitkhialdawitawiten Pharo kiangah, Hiai Pathian khutzung ahi; a chi ua; huan Pharo lungtang a khauha, amau a ngaikhe kei; TOUPAN a chih bangin.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Jing khangin thou inla, Pharo maah dingin; ngaiin tui lam juan in a hong; a kiangah, Huchibangin TOUPAN achi, ka na a sep theihna din un, ka mite pai sakin a chi.
Huchiloua, ka mite na pai sak keileh, ngaiin, na tungah leh na sikhate tungah leh, na mite tungah leh, na in sungah thou honpi ka sawl ding: huchiin Aiguptate inte thou honpiin a dim ding, a omna lei uh toh.
Huan huai ni chiangin ka mite tenna, Gosen gam ka sat khen ding, huailaia thou honpi a om louhna dingin; a tawpa lei laka kei TOUPA ka hi chih na theihna dingin.
Huan ka mite leh na mite kikalah kikhenna ka koih ding: zingchiangin hiai chiamtehna a om ding hi, chiin.
Huchibangin TOUPAN a hiha; huchiin Pharo in sung leh, a sikhate in sungah leh, Aigupta gam tengteng ah, thou honpi lungkhamhuai a hongpaitaa: thou honpi jiakin a gam a segawpta hi.
Huan Pharoin Mosi leh Aron a sam saka, Pai unla, gamsungah na Pathian kiang uah vakithoih un, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin, Huchibanga hih a kilawm kei; TOUPA ka Pathian uh kiangah Aiguptate jakdah kithoihna lan ding ka hih jiak un: ngaiin, a muh ua Aiguptate jakdah kithoihna lan ding ka hi uh maw, suangin a hondeng kei ding ua hia?
Gamdai ah ni thum lamah ka pai ding uh, a honthupiak ding banga TOUPA ka Pathian uh kianga kithoihna bawl dingin, a chi a.
Huan Pharoin, Gamdaia TOUPA na Pathian uh kianga na kithoih theihna ding un ka honpaisak ding; gamla pi pai kei peuhle uchin: kei dingin honnget sakin, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin, Ngaiin, nang a kipanin ka paikhe dinga, Pharo akipan, na sikhate akipan, na mite akipan jingchianga thou honpi a pai mang theihna ding un TOUPA ka ngen ding: ahihhangin TOUPA kianga kithoihn dinga mite paisak dingin Pharo lepchiah takin gamta nawn kei heh, a chi a.
Huan Pharo akipanin Mosi a pawt khetaa, TOUPA a ngenta hi.
Huchiin Mosi thu bangin TOUPAN a hihta; huan Pharo akipan, a sikhate akipan thou honpi a lamangta; khat lel leng a om nawn kei hi.Hiai hun inleng Pharoin a lungtang a khauhsaka, mite leng a paisak nuamta kei hi.
Hiai hun inleng Pharoin a lungtang a khauhsaka, mite leng a paisak nuamta kei hi.
Hualaiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Pharo kiangah va lut inla, TOUPA Hebrute Pathianin, Ka na a sep theihna ding un, ka mite paisak in.
Amaute paisak na niala, amau na let lailai leh,
Ngaiin, TOUPA khut loua om na bawnghonte tungah, sakolte tungah, sabengtungte tungah, sangawngsaute tungah, bawngtalte tungah leh belamte tungah a tu ding: hi se mahmah a om ding.
Huan TOUPAN Israelte bawnghon leh Aiguptate bawng hon a sat khen ding; Huchiin Israel suante alam bangmah si a om kei ding, a chi, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPAN hun biseh a septa, Jingchiangin TOUPAN gamsungah hiai a hih ding, chiin.
Huan a jingin TOUPAN huai thil a hiha, Aigupta bawnghon tengteng a sita ua,; himahleh Israel suante bawnghonte bel khat lel leng a si kei.
Huchiin Pharoin mi a sawla, ngaiin, Israel bawnghon lakah khat lel leng a si kei hi.
Huan Pharo lungtang a khauha, mite a paisakta kei hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi leh Aron kiangah, Meiphualpi vut na khut dim uh kilak unla, Pharo muhin Mosiin van lam ah theh hen.
Aigupta gam tengteng ah leivui nen a hongsuak dinga, Aigupta gamsung tengah, mi tung leh, sa tungah, meima bawkin meimatum a honghi ding, a chi a.
Huchiin meiphualpia vut a la ua Pharo maiah a dingta uh: Mosiin van lamah a theh tou a; mi tung leh, sa tungah, meima bawkin meimatum a honghita hi.
Huchiin meimatumte jiakin mitkhialdawitawite Mosi maah a ding theita kei ua; mitkhialdawitawite tung leh, Aiguptate tungah lah meimatum a om ngala.
Huan TOUPAN Pharo lungtang a khauhsaka, amau thu a ngaikhe kei; Mosi kianga TOUPAN a gen bangin.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Jingkhangin thou inla, Pharo maah ding inlan, a kiangah, TOUPA Hebrute Pathianin hichiin a chi, Ka na a sep theihna ding un ka mite paisakin.
Hiai huna na lungtang tung leh, na sikhate tung leh, na mite tunga ka gawtnate tengteng hontun ding ka hi ngala; lei pumpi ah kei bang kuamah a om kei chih na theihna dingin.
Hia nang leh na mite ka hon gawt theihna dingin, tuin lah ka khut zan ding ka hita hi; huchiin lei akipana sat khiakin na om ding:
Huan chihtaktakin hiai ziakin ahi nang ka hontun ding, nangmaha ka thilhihtheihna ensak dingin; huchia lei pumpia ka min a kigenkhiak theihna dingin.
Amaute pai sak lou dingin, ka mite demin nang leh nang na kiliansak nalai maw?
Ngaiin, jingchiang tu hunin a piangtunga kipana tutanna om ngeilou Aigupta gamah, gialpi petmah ka zusak ding hi.
Huaijiakin tuin mi sawl inla, loua na neih tengteng leh, na gantate kai khawmin; michih tung leh sa loua kimu tungah, in lama hongkihawllou tungah, amau tungah gial a honke suk dinga, a si ding uh, a chi, chiin.
Kuapeuh Pharo sikhate laka TOUPA thu lauten a sikhate leh a ganta uh insung ah a hawllut uh:
TOUPA thu khawksa louten a sikhate uh leh a gantate uh louah a nusia uhi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aigupta gam tengtenga, mi tung leh sa tung leh Aigupta gam tengtenga loua haichi tung tenga gial a om theihna dingin, van lamah nakhut zan khiain, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin van lamah achiang a zan khiaa: huchiin TOUPAN van ging lehgial a honsawla, mei leitung juiin a taita a; huan TOUPAN Aigupta gam tungah gial a ju sakta hi.
Huchiin gial a oma, mei gial toh hel, thupi mahmah, nam a hih nung siah Aigupta gam tengtenga, huchibang om lou.
Huan gialin Aigupta gam tengtenga lou a om tengteng a dengtaa, mi leh sa; loua haichi chih gialin a dengtaa, gama sing chih a kitan sakta hi.
Israel suante omna, Gosen gamah kia, gial a om kei hi.
Pharoin mi a sawla, Mosi leh Aron a samsak a, a kiang uah, Tutungin ka khialta: TOUPA a diktat, kei le ka mite ka gilou uh.
TOUPA ngenin (a hunta ngala) van ging thupi leh gial thupi a om nawn louhna dingin; ka honpaisak dinga, na om nawn kei ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin Mosiin a kiangah, Khopi a kipan ka pawt khiak takin TOUPA lamah ka khutte ka jak biambuam ding; huchiin vanging a daiding, gial lah a om nawn sam kei ding; huchia lei TOUPA a hihdan na theihtheihna dingin.
Ahihhangin nang leh na sikhate a hihleh, TOUPA Pathian na lau nai samkei ding uh chih ka thei hi achi a.
Huan pat leh barli-buh denin a om: barli-buh lah a tuipumtaa, pat a gah takta ngala.
Ahihhangin huitbuh leh buhman jaw denin a om kei; a nou lai jiak un.
Huan Pharo akipanin Mosiin khopi a pawtkhiat santaa, TOUPA lamah a khutte a jak biambuam: van ging leh gial a daia, huchiin lei ah vuah buakin a omta kei hi.
Huchia Pharoin vuah leh gial leh van ging a tawpta chih a theihin, a khial tam sema, a lungtang a khauh saka, amah leh a sikhaten.Huchiin Pharo lungtang khauh sakin a oma, Israel suante lah a paisak nuam kei; Mosi kama TOUPAN a gen bangin.
Huchiin Pharo lungtang khauh sakin a oma, Israel suante lah a paisak nuam kei; Mosi kama TOUPAN a gen bangin.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Pharo kiangah lut in: amaa hiai ka chiamtehnate ka ensak theihna dingin a lungtang ka khauhsaka, a sikhate lungtang toh:
Huchia na tapa bil leh, na tapa tapa bila, Aigupta gama bang thil ahia ka bawl, a lak ua chiamtehna ka hihte na gen theiha TOUPA ka hi chih na theihna ding un, a chi a.
Huan Mosi lah Aron Pharo kiangah a lut ua, a kiangah, Hebrute TOUPA Pathianin hichibangin a chi, Bangtan vei ka maa kiniamkhiak nial ding na hia?
Ka na a sep thihna ding un, ka mite paisakin.
Huchi a hihkei a, ka mite paisak na nial leh, ngaiin, na tuipiau ah jingchiangin khaukhup ka hon la ding hi:
Huan lei mai a tuam ding ua, huchiin min lei a mu theikei ding; a suakta bang a ne ding ua, gialin a honhawisak teng, lou a kipana nang dinga sing poute chiteng a ne ding uh:
Huan na inte uah a dim ding ua, na sikhate tengteng inte, leh Aigupta tengteng in; leitunga a om ua kipan tuni tan na pate, na pa uh pate un a muh ngeilouh uh, a chi ua.
Huchiin a kiheia, Pharo akipanin a pawt kheta hi.
Huan Pharo sikhaten a kiangah, Bangtan hiai mipa ei dia thang hi ding ahia?
Mite paisak in, TOUPA a Pathian uh na a sem thiehna ding un: Aigupta suksiatin a om chih thei nailou na hi hia?
A chi ua.
Mosi leh Aron Pharo kiangah a honpi nawn ua; aman a kiang uah, Pai un, TOUPA na Pathian uh na sem un: ahihhangin a pai dingtekuate ahi ua?
A chi a.
Huan Mosiin, Ka naupangte u toh, ka tekte utoh, ka tapate uleh ka tanute uh, ka ganhonte u leh ka belamhonte utoh ka pai ding uh; TOUPA kianga ankuangluina neiding ka hih jiak un, a chi a.
Huan aman a kiang uah, Huchibangin TOUPA na kianguah om hen, kon paisak bangin, leh na naute uh: kiveng un, na ma uah gilou a om jiakin.
Huchi hi lou e: nou pasal pichingteng kuan unlan, TOUPA na vasem un; huai lah na ut ngal ua, a chi a.
Huchiin Pharo maa kipan delhkhiakin a omta uhi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aigupta gam tungah khaukhupte a dingin na khut zan khiain, Aigupta gam a hongpai touh ua, gama haichi teng, gial nutsiatte nei, a nek theihna ding un, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin achiang Aigupta gam tungah a lika, huan TOUPAN huai ni nitumin leh huai jankhuain suahlam huih a nungsaka; jingsang a honghihin suahlam huihin khaukhup a hontunta hi.
Huchiin Aigupta gam tengteng tungah khaukhupte a paitou ua, Aigupta tuipiau tengah a khawl ua: chimtakhuai mahmah uhi; ama lam uah huchibang khaukhup amau bangin a om keia, anunglam un leng huchibang a om samkei ding hi.
Lei mai tengteng a tum jiak un, gam a mialta hi; huan gama haichi chih a ne ua, gialin a hawi singte gahte teng toh: huchiin singte ah hiam, loua haichite ah hiam zong thil hing a omte keia, Aigupta gamsung tengah.
Huaitakin Pharoin kintakin Mosi leh Aron a sam saka; TOUPA na Pathian leh nou tungah ka khialta hi,
Huaijiakin tuin, kon ngen hi, hiai tutunga lel ka khelhna ngaidam inla, hiai sihna kia keia kipana a lakmang theihna dingin, TOUPA na Pathian ngen in, achia a.
Huchiin Pharo a kipanin a paikhetaa, TOUPA a ngenta.
Huan TOUPAN suahlam huih hat mahmah a khahtaa, huaiin khaukhupte a lamanga, Tuipi San ah a lawn lutta; huchiin Aigupta luipiau tengteng ah khaukhup khat leng a omta kei hi.
Ahihhangin TOUPAN Pharo lungtang a khauh saka, huchiin Israel suante a paisak nuamta kei hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aigupta gam tunga khomial a omtheihna dingin, khomial theih theih ding ngei, van lam ah na khut lik khiain, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin vanlam ah a khut lik a khiaa; huchiin ni thum Aigupta gam tengteng ah khomial bikbek a omta hi:
Akuakuamah a kimu kei ua, a omna a kipanin ni thum kuamah a thou kei uh: a hihhangin Israel suante tengtengin a tenna uah vakna nei uhi.
Huan Pharo in Mosi a sama, pai un, Toupa na sem un; na bawnghonte uleh na ganhonte uh kia om uhen: na naute un leng hon jui uhen, a chi a.
Huan Mosiin, TOUPA ka pathian uh kianga ka kithoih theihna ding un, kithoihnate leh halmang thillate leng na honpiak ngeingei ding ahi.
Ka bawnghonte un leng a honzuih ding uh ahi; nunglamah chin khat lel leng nawtsiat louh ding; huaite akipana TOUPA ka Pathian uh nasepna dia ka lak ding uh a hihjiakin; tualai ka tun masiah uh, bangin ahia TOUPA na ka sep ding uh ka theikei uh, a chi hi.
A hihhangin TOUPAN Pharo lungtang a khausaka, amau a pai sak nuam kei hi.
Huchiin Pharoin a kiangah, Ka kianga kipan paimang in, kiveng in, ka mel mu nawn ken; ka mel na muh ninia si ding na hih jiakin, a chi a.Huan, Mosiin, Na gen hoih e, na mel ka mu nawnta kei dinghi, a chi hi.
Huan, Mosiin, Na gen hoih e, na mel ka mu nawnta kei dinghi, a chi hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Pharo tung leh, Aigupta gam tungah gawtna khat ka tun lai ding; huai khit chiangin hiai akipanin a hon paisak ding; a honpai sak chiang in, hiaia kipanin a honsawn khe siang sipsip petmah ding hi.
Tuin mite bil ah thugen inla, pasal cihin a inveng lakah ngen hen, numei chih in a inveng lakah ngen hen, dangka suangmantamte leh dangkaeng suanmantamte, a chi a.
Huchiin TOUPAN Aiguptate mitmuhin mite deihsakna a pia.
Huailouin Aigupta gamah leh, Pharo sikhate mitmuh in leh, mite mitmuhin huai mi Mosi a thupi mahmah hi
Huan, Mosiin, Hichibangin TOUPAN a chi, Jankim khawng chiangin Aigupta gamlaiah kapai khe ding;
Huchiin Aigupta gamah ta masa tengteng, a laltutphaha tu Pharo ta masapen a kipan, khawl liaha om sikhanu ta masapen tanpha hialin si ding uh; gan ta masa tengteng toh.
Aigupta gam tengtengah kahna thupi a om dinga, huchibang om ngei nailou, huchibang om ngei nawn lou ding.
Himahleh Israel suante laka kuamah siatna dingin uiin a lei a tangsak kei ding, mi hiam gan hiam siatna ding: Huchia TOUPAN Aiguptate leh Israel a khentuam dan na theih theihna ding un.
Huan hiai na sikhate tengteng ka kiangah a hongsuk ding ua, ka kiangah a khupboh ding ua, Pawt khia inla, nang honjui mite tengteng leng: huan huai khit chiangin ka pai khe ding, chiin, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Ka thillamdangte Aigupta gama a khanna dingin Pharoin a honngaikhe kei ding, a chi a.Huan Mosi leh Aronin Pharo maah hiai thillamdang tengteng a bawlta ua: huchiin TOUPAN Pharo lungtang a khauhsaka, gam akipanin Israel suante a paisak nuamta kei hi.
Huan Mosi leh Aronin Pharo maah hiai thillamdang tengteng a bawlta ua: huchiin TOUPAN Pharo lungtang a khauhsaka, gam akipanin Israel suante a paisak nuamta kei hi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Aigupta gamah Mosi leh Aron kiangah thu a genta,
Hiai kha nou adingin khate kipatna a hiding: nou adingin kum khata a kha masapen ahi ding,
Israel khawmpi tengteng kiangah thugenin, Hiai kha ni sawmniin a pipute uh in bang jelin, mi chihin amau a dingin belamnou a kilak chiat ding ua, in khatjet adingin belamnou khat jel:
Belamnou adia inkuan a tawmluat leh, a mi zah dungjuiin amah leh a in zoma a inveng toh la khawm hen; mi chih a kham ding bang jelin belamnou na sim ding uh.
Na belamnou uh gensiatbei, a pa kum khatna ahi ding: belamhon lak hiam kelte laka kipanin hiam na la khe ding uh:
Huai kha mah a ni sawmlehli chiang na kem ding ua: nitaklamin Israel khawmpi omkhawm tengtengin a gou ding uh.
Huan a sisan a la ding ua, a nekna ding in kongkhak biang khuam nihte ah leh kongkhak tungah na tat ding uh.
Huai janin sa mei a hai, tanghou silngou sohlouh toh na ne ding uh; lou kha toh na ne ding uh.
Sial nek kei unla, tui huan het kei un, meiin na hai zo ding uhi; a lutang a khete toh, leh huaia a sungkua toh.
A jingchiang tanin a bangmah na valsak kei ding uh; huan a jingchiang tana omlaite meiin na hal ding uh.
Huan hichibangin na ne ding uh; na kong uh gaksain, na khedap uh na khe ua bulhsain, na khut ua na chiangkhun uh tawi sain; na kin nek ding ua: TOUPA paikan ankuang ahi.
Tujan chiah Aigupta gam tawnsuak dinga, sunga piang masa tengteng, mi leh gan that ding ka hih jiakin; huan Aigupta pathian tengteng siatna dingin vaihawmna ka bawl ding: kei TOUPA ka hi.
Huan sisan nou adingin na omna inte uah chiamtehna ahi ding: huchia sisan ka muh chiangin, ka hon paikan dinga, Aigupta gam ka gawtlaia, nou hon hihse dingin na tunguah tua gawtna a om kei ding.
Huchiin tuni nou a dingin theihgigena ahi ding; na khang teng un TOUPA kianga ankuang luinain na nei ding ua; khantawnin dana ankuangluinain na nei ding uh.
Ni sagih tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding ua; ni masapen ni ngeiin na inte ua kipanin silngou na koihmang ding uh: ni masapen a kipan a ni sagih ni tana tanghou silngou soh ne peuhmah, huai mi Israel a kipan sat khiak ding ahi ngala.
Huan ni masapen niin kikhopna siangthou a om dinga, a ni sagih ni in nou dingin kikhop na siangthou a om ding: huai nitea nasep himhim bawl louh ding ahi, michih a nek ngeingei dingte chih louh, huai kia na hih thei ding uh.
Huchiin tanghou silngou sohlouh ankuangluina na tang ding ua; hiai ni maha Aigupta gama kipana na mite uh ka pi khiak jiakin: huaijiakin khantawnin na khang un danin hiai ni na tan ding uh ahi.
A kha khatnaah, huai khaa a ni sawmlehli ni, nitaklamin, tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding ua, huai kha nitaklam a ni sawmnih leh khat matan.
Na in sung uah ni sagih silngou muhin a om ding a hikei: kuapeuhmah silngou soh ne, huai mi ngei Israel khawpia pat satkhiatding ah ngala, mi khual hiam hiin, a gamsunga piang hi mahleh.
Silngou soh bangmah na ne dinguh ahi kei: na tenna peuhmah uah tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uh, a chi, chiin.
Huchiin Mosiin Israel upate a sam saka, a kianguah, Na inkuan bang jel un belamnou kai khia unlan kilak unla, paikanna gou un, a chi a.
Hussop gaklop na la ding ua, belkuang sunga om sisanah na diah ding ua, belkuang sunga om sisanin kongkhak biang khuam tuak leh kongkhak tungna jep ding ua; jingsang masiah na lak ua kuamah a in kongkhak ah a vapawt khe ding ahi kei hi.
Aiguptate that dinga TOUPA hongpai suak ding ahih jiakin; huchia kongkhak tunga leh kongbiang khuam nihtea sisan a muh chiangin TOUPAN huai kongkhak a paikan dinga, honthat diangin na in sung uah hihse mi a honglut a phal kei ding hi.
Huchiin khantawnin na tapate uh ding leh nou dingin danin hiai thil na tang ding uhi.
Huan achiam banga, nou a honpiak ding gam, na tun chiangun, hichi ahi dinga, hiai silbawl na jui ding uhi.
Huan hichi a honghi dinga, na tate un na kiang ua, Hiai silbawl bang na chihna uh ahia?
A honchih chiangun,
Aiguptate a thaha, ei inte a tatkhiak laia, Aigupta gama Israel suante inte paikan pa, TOUPA paikanna kitheihna ahi, na chih ding uh, chiin.
Huan miten a lutang uh a kunsak ua a beta uhi.
Huan Israel suante a pai mang ua, TOUPAN Mosi lehAron thu a piak bangin a hih ua, Huchiin a hihta uhi.
Huan hichi a hitaa, jankim laiin TOUPAN Aigupta gam a piang masa tengteng a thatta, a laltutphah tunga tu Pharo ta masapen akipanin suangkulh sunga om sal ta masapen tanin; ganhon nou masapenpen tengtoh.
Huchiin janin Pharo a thou a, amah leh, a sikhate leh, Aiguptate tengteng; huchiin Aigupta gamah kahna thupi a omta; in khat mahmah mi khat sih louhna om louh jiakin.
Huan janin Mosi leh Aron asam saka, Thou unla, ka mite laka kipanin paikhia un, nou gel leh Israel suante, paiun, na gensa bang un, TOUPA na vasem un.
Na bawnghonte uleh na ganhonte u leng, na chih bang un, pi unla, pai un; huchiin kei leng honvualjawl un, a chi a.
Huchiin kin taka gama kipana a sawl khiak theihna ding un Aiguptaten mite a noh mahmah ua; Mi sisa hi vek ding i hi uh, a chih tak jiak un.
Hichiin miten a tangbuang uh silngou soh main a la ua, a liangjang uah a tangbuanghaihnate uh puana khihsawnin.
Huchiin Mosi thu bangin Israel suante a omta ua; Aiguptate dangka suangmantam leh dangkaeng suangmantam leh puansilh a ngen uh:
Huan Aiguptate mitmuhin TOUPAN mite deihsakna a piaa, huchiin a deih bang un huchibang thilte a kiang uah a pia uh.
Huchiin Aiguptate a lok uh.
Huan Israel suante Rameses akipan Sukkoth atung ua, naupangte simlouh pasal ngen khea pai nuai guk khawng ahi uh.
Huchiin mihelten leng amau a jui tou uh; bawnghonte leh, ganhonte, ganta tampi mahmah leng.
Silngou sohlou ahih jiakin, Aigupta gama kipana honpuak uh tangbuang tanghou beu silngou sohlouhin a kang uh; Aigupta gam akipana sawn khiaka a om ua, a tam theih nawn louh jiak un, annek bangmah a kibawl kholh man kei himhim uhi.
Huchibangin Aigupta gama teng, Israel suante tam sung, kum za li leh sawmthum ahi.
Huan kum za li leh sawmthum tawpin hichi ahia, huai ni ngeiin hichi a hong hia, Aigupta gam akipanin TOUPA mi tengteng a pai kheta uh.
Aigupta gam akipana amau a honpi khiak jiakin TOUPA adia huaijan nakpi taka tan ding ahi: hiai TOUPA jan Israel suanten a khangkhang ua a tan ding uh ahi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi leh Aron kiangah, Hiai Paikan ankuang dan ahi: huaia mikhualin a nek louh ding:
Himahleh michih sikha suma leisa, a zek na sum nungin, huaichiangin huaia aman a ne ding hi.
Gamdangmi leh sikha goihin huaia ne ding ahi kei hi.
In khata nek ding ahi; in akipanin saa bangmah na la thang ding ahi kei; huaia a guh leng na sutan ding uh ahi kei.
Israel khawmpi tengtengin a zuih ding uh ahi.
Huan na kiang ua mikhual a om ua, TOUPA adia paikan ankuang a um ding uleh, a pasal tengteng zeksum ding ahi, huai khit chiangin hongpai nai henla, um hen; huan amah gamsunga piang tobang ahi ding: mi zeksum louhin hua a nek louh ding a hih jiakin.
Khotualmi ading leh, na lak ua mikhual tam adingin dan khat a om ding hi, a chi.
Huchibangin Israel suante tengtengin a hih ua; TOUPAN Mosi leh Aron thu a piak bangin, huchibangin a hih uh.Huai ni mahin hichi ahi a, TOUPAN Aigupta gama kipanin Israel suante a pawlpite un a pi kheta ngei hi.

Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena,
Piang masapente tengteng, Israel suante laka sul hong peuhmah, mihing lam leh ganta lam, honpekhia in; keia ahi, chiin.
Huchiin Mosiin mite kiangah, Hiai ni theigige un, Aigupta gama kipana na hongpawt khiak ni uh, saltannain akipana na hongpawt khiak ni uh; khut hatnain TOUPAN hiai mun a hontun lah ahi ngala: tanghou silngou soh nek ding a om kei ding.
Hiai niin Abib khain na hongpai khia uhi.
Hichi ahi ding TOUPAN Kanante, Hitte, Amorte, Hivte leh Jebuste gam nou honpiak dinga na pipute uh kianga a kichiamna, bawngnawitui leh khuaijua luang gam a hontut chiangin, hiai silbawl hiai khain na hih ding uh.
Ni sagih tanghou silngou soh louh na ne ding ua, a ni sagih niin TOUPA adingin ankuangluina a om ding.
Ni sagih tanghou silngou sohlouh a kine dia; na kiang uah tanghou silngou soh a kimu ding ahi kei, na omna tengteng uah leng silngou muhin a om ding ahi sam kei hi.
Huai ni chiangin na tapa na ensak ding, Aigupta gama kipana ka hongpai khiak laia TOUPAN ka tunga huai a hih jiaka hiai hiha om ahi, chiin.
Huan na banah nang adingin chiamtehna ding ahi dia, na mite kikala theihgigena, huchia na TOUPA dan a om theihna dingin TOUPAN ban thahata Aigutpa gama kipan nou a honpi khiak jiakin.
Huaijiakin kum tengin a hunbiin hiai dan na jui ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga TOUPAN, nang kiang leh na pipute kianga a kichiam banga, Kanante gam a hontut chiangin, huai a honpe ding.
TOUPA adingin sul hong tengteng nakoih tuam ding, na neih ganta akipana hongom a nou masapen teng; a pa te TOUPA a ahi ding uh.
Huan sabengtung nou masapen teng belamnouin na tan dinga; huchia na tat keileh, a ngawng na hektan ding: huan na tate laka mihing ta masa tengteng na tan ding hi.
Hun hongtung dingah hichi ahi dinga na tapain, Hiai banga hia? chia a hondot chiangin, nang a kiangah, Banthahatin TOUPAN Aigupta gam akipan, koltanna ina kipan a hon lakheta, a kiang ah na chi ding:
Huan, hichi ahia, Pharoin a honpai sak nop ngel louh laiin, TOUPAN Aigupta gama piang masa tengteng na thata, mihinga piang masate leh gantaa piang masate: huaijiakin sul hong tengteng, pasal hiin, TOUPA kiangah ka kithoihnaa; himahleh ka tate laka a piang masa tengteng ka tan hi.
Huchiin na khutah theihna ding ahi dinga, na mitte kikala khaukhip ding, ahi ding: TOUPAN Aigupta gama kipana ban thahata a hon pi khiak jiakin.
Huan, hichi ahia, Pharoin mite a paisak laiin, Pathianin, naijaw mahleh, Philistinte gam lam kanin amaute a pi kei; Pathianin, Kidouna a muh chiang un mite a kisik kha ding ua, Aigupta gam lamah a kihei kha ding uh, a chih jiakin:
Himahleh Pathianin mite a pi kawia, Tuipi San gamdai lampi lam kanin; huchiin Aigupta gama kipanin kigalvansain Israel suante a paitou ta uhi.
Huchiin Mosiin Joseph guhte a kipuaka: Pathianin pellouin a honveh dinga: hiai akipanin ka guhte na kipuak ding uh ahi, chia Israel suante kianga chihtaktaka a kichiam jiakin.
Huchiin Sukkoth akipan a zin khe ta ua, gamdai jul ah, Etham mun ah a giakta uhi.
Huan TOUPA a ma uah sunin meipi dingin, a maute lampia pi dingin, a paia; janin mei dingin, amaute vakna pe dingin; sun leh jana pai dingin:Mite maa kipanin suna meipi ding hiam, a hihkeileh jana mei ding hiam a la mang kei hi.

Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena,
Israel suante kiangah thugen inla, kihei uhenla Pi-hahiroth maah, Migdol leh tuipi kalah, Baal-Zephon jawn takah giak uhen: a maah tuipi kiangah na giak ding uhi.
Pharo lah Israel suante tungtang thu, Gam sung ah a tang uh, gamdaiin a umsuak, chi ding ahi ngala.
Huchiin amaute nungjui dingin Pharo lungtang ka khauhsak ding; Pharo tung leh, a sepaihte tungah zahtakin ka om ding; huchia Aiguptaten TOUPA ka hihdan a theihna ding un, Huan, huchibangin a hihta uhi.
Huchiin mite a lalta uh chih Aigupta kumpipa a hilh ua: huan Pharo lungtang leh sikhate lungtang mite siatna dingin heiin a oma, Eite na a sepna ua kipana Israel i paisak uh, bangdia hiai hih i hi ua! a chi uh.
Huchiin a kangtalai mansaka, a mite a tonpihta hi:
Huan kangtalai deihdeih za guk a kenga, Aigupta gama kangtalai tengteng leh, huaite chiata heutute toh.
Huan TOUPAN Aigupta kumpipa Pharo lungtang a khauhsaka, huchiin Israel suante a nungdelhta hi: huan Israel suante khuttungtawiin a pai kheta uhi.
Himahleh Aiguptaten a nung uah a delh ua, Pharo sakol tengteng leh kangtalai tengteng, a sakol tungtuangmite leh a sepaih pawlte Baazephon maa, Pi-hahiroth pama tuipi kianga a giahna uah a phata uh.
Huchia Pharoin a honnaih laiin, Israel suante a dak tou ua, huan, ngaiin, Aiguptaten amau a hondelhta uhi: huchiin a lau mahmah uh: huan Israel suante TOUPA kiangah a kap kheta uhi.
Huan, Mosi kiangah, Aigupta gama han a om louh jiaka gamdaia si dinga honpi khia na hi maw!

Huan Mosiin mite kiangah, Lau kei unla, ding dinden un, TOUPA hotdamna tunia nou a honet sak ding, en un: thunia Aiguptate na muh uh khantawna mu nawnlou ding na hih jiak un.
TOUPAN nou din a hondou sak dinga, na pau kei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Bangachia ka kianga kap na hia! malama a pai na ding un, Israel suante kiangah thugenin.
Huan na chiang lik inla, tuipi tungah na khut zan khia inla, satin: huchiin Israel suante tuipi laizang ah lei hul tungah a pai suak ding uh.
Huan, ken, ngaiin, ken Aiguptate lungtang ka khauhsak ding, huan amau amau te a delh jui ding ua: huchiin Pharo tung, a kangtalaite tungah leh a sakol tungtuangmite tungah zahtakna ka kimuh ding hi.
Huchiin Aiguptaten Pharo tung, a kangtalaite tung leh a sakol tungtuangmite tungah zahtakna ka kimuh chiangin, TOUPA ka hih dan a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Israelte giahbuk maa pai, Pathian angel a kisuana, a nunglam uah a paia; huan meipi ding a mai lam ua kipan a kisuana, a nunglam uah a dingta hi:
Huchiin, Aiguptate giahbuk leh Israelte giahbuk kikalah a hongomtaa; huan meipi ahi a, amau adingin khomial ahi, himahleh janin hiaite adingin vakna a piaa: huchiin khat jankhuain a dang kiang naihin a hongpai kei hi.
Huan Mosiin tuipi tungah a khut a zan khiaa; huchiin TOUPAN jankhuain suahlam huih hatin tuipi a pai kik saka, tuipi gam hulin a bawla, tuite a kikhenta hi.
Huchiin tuipi laka lei hul tungah Israel suante a pai ua: huan a khut taklam uah leh a khut veilam uah amau adingin tuite bang a honghita hi.
Huan Aiguptaten a delh ua, tuipi lakah amau nungah a pai lut ua, Pharo sakol tengteng, a kangtalai tengteng, leh a sakoltungtuang mite tengteng nangawn.
Huan hichi ahia, jingsang venhunin TOUPAN mei ding leh meipi ding kawmah Aigupta sepaihte lam a ena, Aigupta sepaihte a hihbuaita.
A kangtalai khete uh a lakkhiak saka, huchiin haksa piin a hawl ua; huchiin Aiguptaten, Israelte maa kipanin taikek ni; amaute adingin TOUPAN lah Aiguptate siatna dingin a dou sak ngala, a chi uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aiguptate tung leh, a kangtalaite tung leh, a sakol tungtuangmite tunga tuite a hongpai nawn theihna ding, tuipi tungah na khut zankhiain, a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin tuipi tungah a khut a zan khiaa, jingsang a honghihin tuipi a hatnaah a hongkiknawna; huchiin Aiguptate a lakah a taikek ua; huan tuipi lak ah TOUPAN Aiguptate a thal paihta hi.
Huan tuite a hong kik ua, kangtalaite, sakoltungtuangmite leh Pharo sepaih a nung ua tuipi honglutte tengteng a khuhta hi; a lak ua khat lel leng om a omta kei uhi.
Ahihhangin tuipi lakah gam hul tungah Israel suante a pai ua; huchiin a khut taklam uleh, a vei lam uah tute amau adingin bang a hita hi.

Thupi taka a vualzoh jiakin, TOUPA kiangah la ka sa ding: sakol leh a tunga tuangmi tuipi ah a paikheta.

TOUPA aw, na khut taklam thilhih theihna ah thupi a honghi: TOUPA aw, na khut taklamin melma a gawi jan ta hi.

Lunglut taka TOUPA na Pathian aw na ngaihkhiaka, a mitmuha dik na hiha, a thupiakte bil na doha, a thusehte na zuih leh, Aiguptate tunga ka tut, huai hite laka a bangmah na tungah ka koih kei ding: nang honhihdampa TOUPA ka hi ngala, a chi hi.Huan, Elim, tui khuk sawm leh nih omna leh, tum sing sawmsagih omna a hongtung ua: huchiin tuite kiangah huailaiah a giakta uhi.

Huan gamdai ah Israel suante omkhawm Mosi leh Aron demin a phun uh:

Huailaiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Ngaiin, nou adingin van akipan tanghou ka honzu sak ding; huchiin mite a pai khe ding ua, ni tengin a biin bangzahzah hiam a lakhawm ding ua, ka danah a om uhiam om lou, amaute ka etchian theihna dingin.

Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena.

Huchiin Mosiin a kiang uah, Hiai TOUPAN a honpiak na nek ding uh tanghou ahi.

Huchiin Mosiin maitam a doha a minin Jehovanissi a chi;Akhang akhanga TOUPAN Amalek toh kidouna a neih ding thua TOUPA a kichiam jiakin, a chih jiakin.
Akhang akhanga TOUPAN Amalek toh kidouna a neih ding thua TOUPA a kichiam jiakin, a chih jiakin.
Jethro, Midian siampu, Mosi sungpan, Mosi ading leh a mi Israelte adinga Pathianin a hih tengteng leh Aigupta gama kipan a TOUPAN Israelte a pikhiak dan a jak laiin.
Huailain Jethro, Mosi sungpan, Zippora, Mosi ji, a sawlkik nungin a laa;
Zippora tapa nihte toh; huai nih laka khat min Gersom ahi; Melmak gamah mikhual ka nahia, a chih jiakin:
Huan a dang min Eliezer ahi; Ka pa Pathian hon panpihpa ahia, Pharo namsau akipana a hontatkhiak jiakin a chi hi!
Huchiin Jethro, Mosi sungpa a tapate leh a ji toh gamdaiah Mosi kiangah a hong ua, Pathian tanga a puanin kaihna munah:
Huan Mosi kiangah, Kei na sungpa Jethro na kiangah ka hong, na ji leh a kianga a tapa nihte toh, achia.
Huciin Mosi a sungpa dawn dingin a pawt khiaa, a kuan, amah a tawpa; bang na chia uhiam chiin a kidong ua; huan puanin sungah a lut uhi.
Huchiin Mosiin a sungpa Pharo tung leh Aiguptate tunga Israelte jiaka TOUPA thilhih tengteng leh, lampia haksatna a tung ua hongtung tengteng leh huaite a kipan TOUPAN a tatkhiat dante a hilh hi.
Huan Aiguptate khuta kipana a tatkhiak, Israelte tunga TOUPAN a hih hoihna tengteng jiakin Jethroin nuam a sa hi.
Huan Jethroin, Aiguptate khuta kipan leh, Pharo khuta kipana hontankhepa, Aiguptate khut nuaia kipana mite tankhepa TOUPAN nuamsa hen,
Tuin pathiante tengteng sangin TOUPA a thupijaw chih ka thei: kisathei taka a hihna thil ua amah huaite tunga a om jiakin, a chi a.
Huchiin Jethro Mosi sungpan, halmang thillat leh kithoihnate Pathian adingin a lana: huchiin Aron a honga, Israelte upate tengteng toh Pathian maa Mosi sungpa toh tanghou ne dingin, a hong uh.
Huan hichi ahia a jingin Mosi mite vaihawm dingin a tu a: huchiin mite jingsang akipan nitaklam tanin Mosi kiangah a ding uh.
Huchia Mosi sungpan mite kianga a hih tengteng a muhin, Mite kianga hiai thil na hih bang ahia? tang tut na chia, bangdia jingsang akipan nitaklam tana mite na kianga ding uh ahia? a chi a.
Mosiin a sungpa kiangah, Pathian tanchin dong dinga mite a hong jiak un:
Thu a neih chiang un, ka kiang ah a hong ua; khat leh a dang kikalah vai ka hawma, Pathian thusehte leh a dante ka theisak hi, a chi hi.
Huan Mosi sungpan a kiangah, Na thil hih a hoih kei.
Na se gawp mahmah ding, nang leh na kianga om hiai mite: nang adingin hiai thil a gik luat jiakin; nang kiain na hih theikei hi.
Tuin ka aw ngaikhiain, ka hon thuhilh ding hi, huan na kiangah Pathian a om ding: Pathian lamah mite ading hiin, Pathian kianga a jiakte na tut theihna dingin:
Thusehte leh dante amau na chil dia, a paina ding lam uh na ensak dia, a nasep ding uh toh.
Huailouin mite akipanin mi hithei, Pathian kihtakdan siamte, thutak mite, enna hote, na tel khe ding; huchibangte a tunguah na koih ding, sang tampi vaihawmte, za tampi vaihawmte, sawmnga tampi vaihawmte leh, sawm tampite vaihawmte hi dingin:
Huan hun tengtengin mite vaihawm sak uhen: huan hichi ahi ding. thu lian chiteng nang kiang a tun ding ua, thu neu chiteng bel amau a ngaihtuah ding uh: huchiin nanga dingin a baihlam jaw dinga, huan puakgik a honpuak pih ding uh.
Hiai thil na hiha, huchibang Pathianin thu a honpiak leh, huaichiangin na pang zou dinga, hiai mite leng lungdamin a mun uah a pai ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin Mosiin a sungpa aw a ngaihkhetaa, a gen tengteng a hihta hi.
Israelte tengteng akipanin Mosiin mi hitheite a tel khiaa, mite tunga lutangin a bawlta, sang tampite vaihawmte, za tampite vaihawmte, sawmnga tampite vaihawmte leh sawm tampite vaihawmtein.
Huan hun tengtengin mite vai a hawmsak uh: thu haksate Mosi kiangah a tun ua, thu neu chik bel amau a ngaihtuah uh.Huchiin Mosiin a sungpa a paisaka; amah gam lamah a pai vengveng hi.
Huchiin Mosiin a sungpa a paisaka; amah gam lamah a pai vengveng hi.
Aigupta gam akipan Israel suante a pai khiak lai uh; a kha thumnain, huai ni mahin Sinai gamdai a hongtung uh.
Rephidim akipana pawt khiain, Sinai gamdai hongtungun, gamdai ah a giak ua; huchiin huailaiah Israelten tang majawn ah puanin a kaita uhi.
Huan Mosi Pathian kiangah ahoh toua, huchiin TOUPAN tang akipanin amah a sama, Hichibangin Jakob inkuanpihte kiangah na chi dia, Israel suante na hilh ding:
Aiguptate tunga ka hih na muta ua, muvanlai khaa kon tuah a keimah kiang ngeia kon tut dan.
Huaijiakin tuin, ka aw na man taktak ua, ka thukhun na zuih taktak uleh, huchiin mite sangin kei dingin nou gou lamdang na hi ding uh lei tengteng keia a hih jiakin;
Huan kei dingin siampute lalgam leh nam siangthou na hi ding uh.
Hiai thute Israel suante kianga na gen dingte ahi uh, chiin.
Huchiin Mosi a honga mite upate a samsaka, TOUPAN amah a piak hiai thute tengteng amai ma uah a luita hi.
Huan mite tengtengin kituakin a dawng ua, TOUPA tungen tengteng ka hih ding uh, a chita uhi.
Huchiin Mosiin mite thu TOUPA lakah a tun nawn hi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Ngaiin na kiang ah meipi sahin ka hong, huchia na kianga thu ka gen chianga miten a jak theih ua, chiklai peuh a nang a hon gintak theihna ding un, a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin mite thu TOUPA a hilh a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Mite kiangah hoh inla tuni leh jingchiang adingin amaute siangsakin, a puante uh sawp uhen.
A nithumni adingin mansain om uhenla: a ni thum nia mite tengteng muha Sinai tang tunga TOUPA a hongpai suk ding jiakin.
Huan mite kimvel ah dai na kai dia, tang a hoh tou lou dingin pilvang un, ahihkeileh tang kim khoihlou dingin pilvang un: kuapeuhmah tang khoih sihsaka om ngeingei ding uh ahi:
Khut peumahin a lawng ding ahi kei, suanga den lupin a om zo ngeingei ding, ahihkeileh kap pailetin; sa hiam mi hiam hi zong leh, a hing kei ding: pengkul sawtpi a gin chiangin, tanga a hong touh ding uh ahi, a chi hi.
Huchiin tanga kipanin mite kiangah Mosi a pai suka; huan a puante uh a sawp uhi.
Huan aman mite kiangah, Ni thum nia dingin mansain om unla: numei naihin hong kei un, a chi a.
Huchiin a ni thum niin jingsangin hichi ahi a, vanpi gingte leh khophiate, tang tunga meipi sah, pengkul aw a ngaih a ngaih ahongomtaa, huchiin giahbuk sunga om mite tengteng a lingta uhi.
Huan Mosiin giahbuk akipanin mite Pathian toh kimu dingin a honpi khiaa; amau tang nuailamah a ding uh.
Huan TOUPA meia tang tunga a hongkum jiakin Sinai tang a pum khut vekta hi: huan huaia meikhu meipi khu bangin a tungkaha, huchiin a tang pumpi a ling zungzung.
Huan sawtpi pengkul aw a gina a ngaih semsem laiin Mosiin thu a gena, huan awin Pathianin amah a dawng hi.
Huchiin Sinai tang tungah TOUPA a hongpai suka, a tang vum tungah: huan a tang vum tungah TOUPAN Mosi a sam tou a; Mosi a hoh tou.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Pai suk inla, mite hilhin, en dingin TOUPA lam a honphu vang kha un, huchiin a lak ua tampi a mangthang kha ding uh.
TOUPA kianga hongpai, siampute leng, kihihsiangthou uhen, huchilouin jaw a tunguah TOUPA a puakjak kha ding, a chi hi.
Huan Mosiin TOUPA kiangah, Sinai tangah mite a hong tou theikei ding uh: Tang kimvelin dai kai inla, hihsiangthouin chia, non hilh jiakin, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN akiangah, Pai in, kum sukin, na hong tou dinga, nang leh Aron na kiangah: ahihhangin siampute leh mite TOUPA kianga hong dingin honphu vang kei uhen, huchilouin jaw amaute tungah a puakjak kha ding, a chi a.Huchiin Mosi mite kiangah a hoh suka, a kiang uah thu a genta hi.
Huchiin Mosi mite kiangah a hoh suka, a kiang uah thu a genta hi.
Huan Pathianin hichia chiin, hiai thute tengteng a gena,
Kei TOUPA na Pathian Aigupta gama kipan, koltanna in akipan, honlakhepa, ka hi.
Keimah loungal pathian dangte na nei ding ahi kei.
Milim gelh himhim ahihkeileh tung vana om thil himhim kibatpih mawngmawng hiam nuai leia om, hiam leinuaia tui sunga om kibatpih na kibawl ding ahi kei.
Amaute kiangah na kun ding ahi kei, ana uh leng na sem ding ahi kei; kei lah TOUPA na Pathian mullithat Pathian amau kei honhote khang thumna leh khanglina tana, pate gitlouhna tate tunga thuk ka hi ngala:
Kei honita, ka thupiakte juite laka sang tampite kianga chitna pia ka hi.
TOUPA na Pathian min na mawk gen ding ahi kei; amin mawk gen ding ahi kei; a min mawk genmi lah TOUPAN a mohlou sak ngal keia.
Khawlni theigige in, tang siangthou dingin.
Ni guk na na sem dinga, na nasep tengteng na hih ding:
Ahihhangin a ni sagihna TOUPA na Pathian khawlni ahi: huaiah na himhim na hih ding ahi kei, nang, na tapain leng na tanuin leng, na sikhapa hiam, na sikha nu hiam, na ganta hiam, na huang sunga om na mikhual hiamin leng;
A ni guk niin lah TOUPAN lei leh van, tuipi, a sung ua om tengteng, a bawla, a ni sagih niin a khawl ngala: huaijiakin TOUPAN khawlni a vualjawla a hihsiangthou hi.
Na nu leh na pa zahtakin: TOUPA na Pathianin a honpiak gama na nite a sawt theihna dingin.
Tual na that ding ahi kei.
Ang na kawm ding ahi kei.
Na gu ding ahi kei.
Na inveng siatna dingin palai taklou na hi ding ahi kei.
Na inveng in na eng ding ahi kei, na inveng ji na eng ding ahi kei, a sikhapa leng, a sikhanu leng, a bawngtal hiam, a sabengtung hiam, thil himhim na invenga peuhpeuh.
Huchiin mi tengtengin vanpi gingte, khophiate, pengkul husa te leh tang kang khu a mu ua: huan miten a muh un, a kisuan ua, gamla pi ah a ding uh.
Huchiin Mosi kiangah, Ka kiang uah thugen inla, kon ngaikhe ding uh: ahihhangin Pathianin honhoupih kei hen, ka sikha ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan Mosiin mite kiangah, Lau kei un: amah launa na mai ma ua a oma, na khelh louhna ding un, Pathian nou honenchian dinga hong ahi, a chi a.
Huan mite gamla takah a ding ua, huchiin Pathian omna mun mial bikbek lamah Mosi a vapai naia.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Israel kiangah.
Hichibangin na chi ding, Van akipana nou kon houpih na muta uh.
Kei toh dangka pathiante na bawl kei ding ua, dangkaeng pathiante leng na kibawl sam kei ding uh.
Kei dingin lei maitam na bawl ding, huaiah na halmang thillatte leh na lepna thillatte, na belamte leh na bawngtalte na lan ding: mun tengteng ka min ka khumnaah nang kiangah ka hong dinga, ka honvualjawl ding.
Suang maitam na honbawl sak leh, suang seka na bawl louh ding: suang tunga na vanzat na lik leh, na hihbuahta ahi ngala.Huailaia na vuaktanna a kimuh khiak louhna dingin, ka maitam ah akalbiin na hoh tou sam kei ding hi.
Huailaia na vuaktanna a kimuh khiak louhna dingin, ka maitam ah akalbiin na hoh tou sam kei ding hi.
Huchiin hiaite vaihawmna a ma ua na ngak dingte ahi uh.
Hebru sikha na lei leh, kum guk na a sep ding: a kum sagihnaah bangmah louin nuamlenin a pawt khe ding.
Amah tuma honglut leh, amahtumin a pawt khe ding: ji a nei a hihleh, huchiin a jiin amah a jui khe ding.
A puin ji apiaka, tapate hiam tanute hiam a neihsak leh, ji leh a tate a pua ahi ding ua, amah tumin a pawt khe ding.
Sikhain teltaka, Ka pu ka it, ka ji, leh ka tate ka it; nuamlenin ka pawt khe kei ding, a chileh:
Huchiin a puin vaihawmte kiangah amah a pi dia; kongkhak chiangah hiam kongkhak khuam chiangah hiam a pi ding; huan a puin vuhnain a bil a vut pailet ding; huchiin aman a pu na a sem tawntung ding.
Huan pasalin a tanu sikhanu dingin juak leh, sikhapate bangin a pai khe keiding.
Amah khampa a pu a lungkimsak keileh, a tansak ding hi: a lakah kheltat takin a hihta chih theiin, melmak nam kianga juak dingin thuneihna a neikei.
Huan a tapa dinga a kham leh, tanute bawl dandanin amah a bawl ding hi.
Zi dang a neihsak leh; a annek, a puansilh, leh a kitenna man a sukniam louh ding.
Huan a tunga hiai thumte a hih keileh, sum leh pai louin amah nuamlenin, a pawt khe ding hi.
A sihna dinga, mi vua peuhmah, sih sak ngeingei ding ahi.
Huchiin min buk kei henla, Pathianin amah a khut ah tankhe zota leh, huchi a hihin a taina ding mun ka honseh sak ding hi.
Ahihhangin zekhema amah hihlum dingin, mi a insakinkhang tungah maingal takin honggamta leh; a sihna dingin, amah ka maitam akipanin na la ding hi.
Huan kuapeuhmahin a pa hiam, a nu hiam vua leh, sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Huan kuapeuhin mi guin, juak leh, a hihkeileh a khuta muh khiakin om leh, amah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Huan kuapeuhin a pa hiam, a nu hiam hamsiatlohta leh sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Huan mite kisual uhenla, khatin khat suangin deng hiam, a khuttum hiamin tum henla, si louin, lupna ngak ta leh;
Thou nawnin, chiangkhun khunin kholak vak leh, a vawpa a hul dia; a hun sukbei man a pe dinga, amah a dam siang sak sipsip ding hi.
Min a sikhapa hiam, a sikhanu hiam chiangin vua henla, a khut lumin sileh: amah gawt ngeingei ding ahi.
Ahihhang in nikhat hiam ni nih hiam apaisuak leh, gawt louh ding ahi: amah sum leh pai ahih jiakin
Mite kisualin, numei naunei hihnain, amaha kipanin a gah paihkhiain, a hihhangin siatnain jui kei leh: numeinu pasalin a tunga a chihbangbanga amah gawt ngeingei ding; vaihawmten a lep bang ua a liau ding ahi.
Huan siatna mawngmawngin juita leh, huchiin hin tanga hin a piak ding ahi.
Mit tanga mit, ha tanga ha, khut tanga khut, khe tanga khe,
Hal tanga, hal, liam tanga liam, pawn tanga pawn.
Min a sikha mit hiam, a sikha nu mit hiam suk sakin, seta leh: a mit jiakin nuamlenin a khah ding ahi.
Huan a sikhapa ha hiam, a sikhanu ha hiam sukhe taleh; a ha jiakin nuamlenin amah a khah ding ahi.
Bawngtalin pasal hiam numei hiam siin, si leh uh: huchiin bawngtal denlup ngeingei ding ahi, huan a sa nek louh hial ding: ahihhangin a bawngtal neipen a hul ding.
Ahihhangin huai bawngtal a malamin a kia phut hat na hitaleh, a neipen kianga hilhsa hiin, amah khumta keileh, himahleh pasal hiam numei hiam na thatta leh; bawngtal den lup ding ahia, a neipen leng sihsak ding ahi.
A tungah dangka sum kikoih leh, huan a tunga kikoih peuhpeuh a hinna tatna man din a pe ding.
Tapa hiam, tanu hiam na nasita leh, hiai vaihawmna bangin a tunga hih ding ahi.
Bawngtalin sikhapa hiam sikhanu hiam phu leh; a pu uh kiangah dangka sekel sawmthum a piak dinga, bawngtal a denlup ding uh ahi.
Pasalin kokhuk bawl henla, a hih keileh pasalin kokhuk tou henla, sin kei henla, huaiah bawngtal hiam sabengtung hiam ke leh,
Kokhuk neipenin a bawl hoiha, amau neipa kianga dangka sum a piak ding; huchiin a gan si amaha ahi ding.
Mi khat bawngtalin midanga hihna henla, si leh; a bawngtal hinglai pen a juak ding ua, a sum a kihawm ding uh; huan a bawngtal sipen leng a kihawm ding uhi.Ahihkeileh a malamin huai bawngtal phut hat ahi chih a kitheiha a neiin a khum kei chih a kitheih leh; bawngtal tanga bawngtal a piak ngeingei ding; huchiin a gan si amah tuam a hih ding ahi.
Ahihkeileh a malamin huai bawngtal phut hat ahi chih a kitheiha a neiin a khum kei chih a kitheih leh; bawngtal tanga bawngtal a piak ngeingei ding; huchiin a gan si amah tuam a hih ding ahi.
Min bawngtal hiam, belam hiam guin, gouin, hiam juak leh; bawngtal khat gunin bawngtal nga, belam khat gunin belam li a piak nawn ding ahi.
Guta inluh kimuin, a sihna dingin kivota leh, amah jiaka sisan suah ding ahi kei hi.
A tungah ni suak leh, amah jiakin sisan suah ding ahi: bangmah a neih keileh, huchi a hihleh aguktak jiakin amah juak ding ahi.
Van guk a khutah a hingin teltakin kimu leh, bawngtal hiin, a hihkeileh sabengtung hiam, a hihkeileh belam; a munnih a piak nawn ding ahi.
Min lou hiam, grephuan hiam nekin om sakin, a gan lut sakin, midang lou ah taleh; amah lou hoihna pen leh amah grephuan hoihna pen akipanin ditna a bawl ding ahi.
Mei hongkangin, ling lak hongkuangin, huchiin buhvumte, hiam a hihkeileh buhdinglaite, a hihkeileh lou huaiin kangse taleh; a meikhahpan ditna a bawl ngeingei ding.
Min a invengpa kep dingin dangka sum hiam van hiam pe khia henla, huai mi ina kipan kigu taleh; guta a kimuh leh a zahnihin pia hen.
Guta a kimuh keia ahihleh, in neipa vaihawmte kianga pi ding ahi, a invengpa van tungah a khut a kha na hiam chih thei ding in.
Tatlekna chi tengteng, bawngtal thu ah hiam, sabengtung thu ah hiam, belam thu ah hiam, puansilh thu ah hiam, van mang dan himhim hiam, huai midangin keia ahi a chih leh, a lang tuak thu vaihawmmite maa tut ding ahi; huan vaihawmte mohpaihpan a invengpa azahnih a piak ding ahi.
Min a invengpa kiangah kep dingin sabengtung hiam, bawngtal hiam, belam hiam gan himhim hiam pekhia henla: si hiam, liam hiam, hawl mang hiama omin, kuamahin muta kei leh:
Huchiin TOUPA kichiamna amaute gel kalah a om ding: a invengpa van tungah a khut a kha kei chihna; huchiin a van neipan huai a pom dinga, a din kei ding hi.
Amah akipana guka a om leh, huai bel a neipa kiangah ditna a bawl ding ahi.
Boh nenin na omta leh, huchiin theihpih dingin hontawi henla, huan bohnen a ompen a din kei ding hi.
Min a invengpa banghiam leitawi henla, liamin, hiam si leh, huaiah a neipa a kiangah om keileh, a dit ngeingei ding ahi.
Ahihhangin a neipa a kianga a om leh, a din kei ding: van khelh a hihleh, a khelh dia hongom ahi hi.
Khamsa hilou pasalin nungak khem henla, luppih leh, a ji dinga a neih ngeingei ding ahi.
A numei pan a kianga a piak a nial bilbel leh, nungak siangthoute man dungjuiin sum a pe ding.
Numei mitkhialdawitawi a hin na phal ding ahi kei.
Ganta luppih peuhmah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
TOUPA kianga kia loungal, pathian himhim kianga kithoih peuhmah siat gamsak ding ahi.
Mikhual na subuai hiam, na nuaisiah hiam ding ahi kei hi: Aigupta gama mikhual na hihtak jiakun.
Meithai hiam, naupang paneilou hiam nahihgenthei ding uh ahi kei.
Bangchipeuha amau na gentheihsaka, ka kianga a kah peuhmah uhleh, a kahna uh ka ngaikhe ngeingei ding;
Huan ka thangpaihna a sou dinga, namsauin nou ka hon that ding; huchiin na jite uh meithai ahi ding ua, na tate uh paneilou ahi ding uh.
Na kiang ua om genthei na mite laka kuapeuh sum na leitawi sak leh, amah adinga punna bawlpa na hih louh dinga, a tunga punna na bawl louh ding ahi.
Khamna dinga na inveng puansilh na lak himhima leh, ni a tumin a kianga na vapiak nawn ding ahi.
Huailah a kikhuhna sun ahi ngala, a vun adinga a puansilh ahi: bangin a ihmu dia? huan hichi ahi dinga, ka kianga a kah chiangin a kap ka za ding; hehpihthei ka hih jiakin.
Pathiante na kou ding ahi keia, na mite vaihawmmi leng na hamsiat ding ahi kei hi.
Na thei min masate, na uaina pan lan dingin na zekai ding ahi kei, na tapate laka piang masapen kei non piak ding ahi.
Huchibang mahin na bawngtalte lakah leng na hih ding, na belamte lakah; ni sagih sung a pi kianga a om ding; ni giat nia kei non piak ding ahi.Huan keidingin mi siangthoute na hi ding ua; gamlaka gamsa thah sa himhim na nek louh ding uh; uite kianga na paih ding uh.
Huan keidingin mi siangthoute na hi ding ua; gamlaka gamsa thah sa himhim na nek louh ding uh; uite kianga na paih ding uh.
Thutut zuau na ngaihtuah ding ahi kei: theihpih diktatlou hi dingin giloute toh na khut koih ken.
Gilou hih dingin mipi na jui ding ahi kei; vaihawmna kai kawi dingin tampi nung jui dingin a panna uah thu na gen ding ahi sam kei:
Mi genthei leng a pannaah na deihsak ding ahi kei.
Na melma bawngtal hiam sabengtung hiam a taimang na tuah leh a kianga na koih nawn ngeingei ding ahi.
Amah nang honhua sabengtung a vanpuak nuaia lum na muha amah panpih a ut leh, amah na panpih teitei ding ahi.
A pannaa na migenthei vaihawmna na hekkawi ding ahi kei.
Thil taklou akipana gamla pi ah omin; huan, misiangte leh midikte that ken: giloute siam ka tansak louh ding jiakin.
Huchiin thilpiak na la ding ahi kei: thilpiakin mipilte mit a tosaka, midiktatte thute a kaihkawi jiakin.
Huailouin mikhual na nuaisiah ding ahi kei: mikhual lungtang na theih jiakin, Aigupta gamah mikhualin na om uh chih theiin.
Huan kum guk na gamah chi na tuh dia, huaiah gahte na la khawm ding:
Himahleh a kum sagihna na omsak kinkena, na khawlsak ding ahi; na mite laka gentheiten a nek theihna ding un: huan a nutsiat peuh uh gamlak saten a ne ding uh.
Huchibangmahin na grephuan, leh na oliv huan tungah na hilh ding hi.
Ni guk na na sem dinga, a ni sagih niin na khawl ding: na bawngtal leh na sabengtung a khawl ua, na sikha tapa leh mikhual, a halhhuai theihna ding un.
Huchiin na kianga ka gen thil tengtenga na ngentel theihna dingin: huan pathian dangte min gen ken la, na kam akipanin leng jak in om sak ken.
Kum khat sungin ka lakah ankuangluina thumvei na bawl ding.
Tanghou silngou soh louh ankuangluina na jui ding: (kon thupiak bangin, Abib khaa hun sehsain, ni sagih sung tanghou silngou soh louh na ne ding: huaia Aigupta akipana na hongpai jiakin: huan ka maa kuamah khutvuaka a hongkilat ding uh ahi kei: )
Huan pawltak ankuangluina, na sepgim na gahte, loua na tuh: huan puaklutna ankuangluina, loua kipana na sepgimnaa na puaklut khit chianga, kum tawpa om.
Kum khat sungin thumvei na pasalte tengteng uh TOUPA PATHIAN maa a kilat ding uh ahi.
Ka kithoihna sisan tanghou silngou soh toh na lat ding ahi kei; ka kithoihna thau a jingsang chiang tanin a om ding leng ahi kei hi.
TOUPA na Pathian in ah nagam gah masapenpente laka a masapente na lak lut ding ahi.
Kelnou a pi nawi nelai na tokbuai ding ahi kei.
Ngaiin, lampia nang honkem ding leh, ka mun bawlsaa nang hontun dingin, na maah Angel ka sawl hi.
A lakah pilvang inla, a aw mangin, hehsak ken: na tatleknate a ngaihdamlouh ding jiakin: ka min lah amah ah a om ngala.
Himahleh a aw na man taktaka, ka gen tengteng na hih leh; huchiin na melmate tunga melma ka hi dinga, nang hon doute tungah doumi ka hi ding hi.
Ka angel lah na maa pai dinga, Amorte, Hitte, Perizte, Kanante, Hivte leh Jebuste laka nang hon pi lut ding ka hi ngala; huan amau te ka sat khe ding hi.
A pathiante uh lakah na kun ding uh ahi kei, a na uh leng na sem ding uh a hikei: a thilhih bangte uh leng na hih ding uh a hikei: ahihhangin amaute na zou siang sipsip ding ua, a milimte uh na hihjan dimdem ding uhi.
Huan TOUPA na Pathian uh na na sem ding ua, aman na annek u leh na tuidawn uh a honvualjawl ding hi; huchiin na lak ua kipanin chinatna ka la mang ding hi.
Kuamahin a naupangte a pain, a hut kei ding uh, na gamsung uah: na nite zah ka piching sak ding hi.
Kei kihtakna na maah ka sawl dinga, na hong tuna mite tengteng ka hihse vek dinga, huchiin na melmate tengteng nang kon nungngatsan sak ding hi.
Huan na maah khuai janta ka sawl dinga, huaiin Hivte, Kanante, Hitte na ma ah a hawl khe ding hi.
Kum khat sungin amaute na maa kipanin ka hawlkhe kei ding; a gam a hongse kha dia, gamsa na siatna dingin a pung kha ding hi.
Na hongkhana, a gam na luah ma teng, na maa kipanin amaute tawm khakhain ka hawl khe ding.
Tuipi San akipan Philistinte tui pha hialin, gamdai akipanin lui chiang phain na gamgi ka khung ding: Na khuta a gam luah mite ka honpiak khiak ding jiakin: huchiin na maah amaute na hawlkhe ding hi.
Amau toh, hiam a pathiante utoh hiam leng thukhun na bawl ding ahi kei hi.Na gamsung ah a teng ding uh ahi kei, nang ka tungah a honkhialsak kha ding uh: amaute pathiante na sep leh, nanga dinga thang a hih mahmah ding jiakin.
Na gamsung ah a teng ding uh ahi kei, nang ka tungah a honkhialsak kha ding uh: amaute pathiante na sep leh, nanga dinga thang a hih mahmah ding jiakin.
Huchiin aman Mosi kiangah, TOUPA kiang lamah hong touin, nang leh Aron, Nadab leh Abihu, leh Israel upate laka sawmsagihte; huchiin gamla taka kipanin bia un:
Huan Mosi kia TOUPA kiangah a hongpai ding: himahleh amau a hongpai nai louh ding uh ahi; mite leng amah toh a hohtouh louh ding uh ahi, mite leng amah toh a hohtouh louh ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan Mosi a honga, TOUPA thute leh vaihawmna tengteng mite a hilhta hi: huan miten aw kituakin a dawng ua TOUPAN a chih thute tengteng ka hih ding uh, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPA thute tengteng Mosiin a gelha, jingsangin beltakin a thoua, tang nuaiah maitam a bawla, Israel nam sawm leh nih dung juiin, khuam sawm leh nih a bawl hi.
Huchiin TOUPA kianga bawngtala halmang thillat lan leh lemna thillat bawl, Israel suante laka tangval te a sawlta a.
Huan Mosiin sisan kimkhat a laa, kuangkum sungah a koiha: huan sisan kimkhat maitam tungah a theh.
Huan thukhunna laibu a laa, mite jiakin a sim: huan amau, TOUPAN a chih tengteng ka hih un, ka thumang ding uh, a chi uhi.
Huchiin Mosiin sisan a laa mite tungah a theha, Thukhunna sisan en un, hiai thute tengteng thua TOUPAN a khun, chiin.
Huchiin Mosi a hoh toua, Aron, Nadab leh Abihu leh, Israel upate laka sawmsagihte.
Huan Israel Pathian a muta uh: huan a khepek nuaiah saphir suangmantama bawl hileh kilawm a om.
Israel suante laka upate tungah a khut a nga kei: amau leng Pathian a muta ua, a ne ua a dawn uh.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Tangah ka kiangah hongtou inla, huan huailaiah omin: huchiin suangpekte leh, dan leh thupiakte ka gelhsa ka honpe ding; amaute na sinsak theihna dingin, a chi.
Huan Mosi a thoua, a nasem Joshua leng: huchiin Pathian tangah Mosi a hohtouta hi.
Huan upate kiangah, Hiai laiah honna ngak unla, na kiang ua ka hongpai nawn matan in: huan, ngai un, Aron leh Hur na om pih uhi: mi kuapeuhin thubuai bangpeuh hih ding na na neih uh leh, amah amau kiangah hong hen, a chi a.
Huchiin Mosi tangah a hoh toua, huan meipiin tang a khuhta hi.
Huan Sinai tang tungah TOUPA thupina a oma, huchiin meipiin niguk sung a khuh hi: huan a ni sagih niin meipi laka kipanin Mosi a samta hi.
Tang vum tunga TOUPA thupi na muh Israel suante muh in mei kangmangthei bang ahi.Huan meipi lakah Mosi a lut taa, tangah a vahoh tou hi: huchiin Mosi tangah ni sawm li leh jan sawm li a vaomta hi.
Huan meipi lakah Mosi a lut taa, tangah a vahoh tou hi: huchiin Mosi tangah ni sawm li leh jan sawm li a vaomta hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena,
Thillat a hontawi theihna ding un, Israel suante kiangah thu gen in: michih lungtanga ut taka piate a kipanin thohlawm na la ding.
Huan amau akipana thohlawm na lak ding hichibang ahi: Dangkaeng leh, dangka leh dal;
Leh puan malngat dum, sandup, leh sanau leh hoih, kel mul,
Belampa vun sansaksa leh ngalvang vunte leh singgi;
A vakdingin sathau, thaunuh dingin gimlim, gim namtui ading tohin;
Onik suangte, siampupuan leh awmtuama siat ding suangte.
Huan mun siangthou hon bawl sak uhen; a lak ua ka ten theihna ding in.
Nang ka honetsak bangbangin, biakbuk lim bangin leh, huaia vanzat tengteng lim bangin, huchibang bangin na bawl ding hi.
Huan singgi sing thukhun bawm a bawl ding ua: huai dunglam tongnih leh a kim ahi dinga, huai vailam tong khat leh a kim ahi dinga, huai sanlam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding.
Dangkaeng takin na luan dinga, a sunglam leh a polam na luan dinga, huchiin a kim a velah dangkaeng lallukhu bawlin a tungah na bawl ding hi.
Huan a sikkual dangkaengin li na sung dia, huan huaia a ning liteah na bulh ding; huchiin sikkual nih a pang khatah a om ding ua, sikkual nih a pang dangah a om ding uh.
Huan singgi sing chiang na bawl dinga, dangkaengin na luan ding hi.
Huchiin thukhunna bawm sika sikkualte sungah chiangte na thun lut dinga, huaitea thukhunna bawn jawn a hihtheihna dingin.
Chiangte thukhunna bawm sikkual sunga a om ding uh ahi.
Huan thukhunna bawm sungah ka honpiak ding theihsakna na koih ding.
Huan dangkaeng takin chitna tutphah na bawl ding: huaia dunglam tong nih leh a kim ahi dinga, huaia vailam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding.
Chitna tutphah mong nihte ah, dangkaengin cherubte na bawl dia, huaite nasep toh helin na bawl ding.
Huan cherub khat a mong khat ah na bawl dia, cherub khat a mong khat lamah: huaia a mongnihte ah chitna tutphah ngeiah cherubte na bawl ding hi.
Huchin cherubten tungsang lamah a khate uh a jak khe ding ua, a khate ua chitna tutphah tuamin, a mai un a kien tuah ding ua; cherubte maite chitna tutphah lamah a om ding.
Huchiin thukhunna bawm tungah chitna tutpha na koih ding; huan thukhunna bawm sungah ka honpiak ding theihsakna na koihding hi.
Huchiin huailaiah kon kimuhpih dinga, huchiin chitna tutphah tunga kipan, theihsakna thukhunna bawm tunga om cherub nihte kikala kipanin, Israel suante kianga thupiaka ka honpiak ding thil tengteng thuah, ka honhoupih ding hi.
Singgiin dohkan leng na bawl ding; huaia dunglam tongnih ahi ding, huaia vailam tong khat, huaia sanlam tongkhat leh a kim ahi ding.
Dangkaeng takin na luan ding, huaiah a kim a velin dangkaeng lalukhu na bawl ding hi.
Huan akim a velin huaiah khut chia a gei na bawl ding, huan akim avelin huaiah a geiah dangkaeng lallukhu na bawl ding.
A sikkhual ding in dangkaengin li na bawl ding, sikkualte a ninglite huaia khap li tunga omte ah na koih ding.
Dohkan puakna dingin chiangte omna dingin a gei chinah sikkualte a om ding uhi.
Huan singgiin chiangte na bawl dia, dangkaengin na luan dia, huaitea dohkan a kipuak theihna dingin.
Huan huaia kuangte, huaia keute, huaia sinte, huaia noute, a sitna dingin na bawl ding hi: huaite dangkaeng takin na bawl ding hi.
Ka maah dohkan tungah tanghou sawm leh nih na koih gige ding hi.
Huan dangkaeng takin khawnvak koihna na bawl ding: khawnvak koihna nasep tohhelin na bawl ding; a kungpi leh ahiangte, a pakmum leh a pakte, a kibang mahin:
Huchiin a pangte a kipanin hiang guk a ka khe ding; khawnvak koihna pang khata kipanin hiang thum, khawnvak koihna pang danga kipanin hiang thum:
Belkuang thumte makha banga bawlte, hiang khata pakmum leh pak; huan hiang danga belkuang thumte makha banga bawlte, pakmum leh pak: huchibangin khawnvak koihna akipana hongsuak hiang gukte:
Huan khawnvak koihna ah belkuang li makha banga bawl a om ding, a pakmumte leh pakte utoh:
Huchiin huai maha hiang nihte nuaiah pakmum khat a om dia, huan huai maha hiang nihte nuaiah a pakmum khawnvak koihna akipana hongsuak khia hiang gukte dung juiin.
A pakmumte leh ahiangte uh akibang ding ua: a vekin dangkaeng taka nasep tohhel ahi ding hi.
Huan huaiah khawnvak sagih na bawl dia: huchiin huaiah khawnvakte a de ding ua, a panga vakna a piak theihna ding un.
Huaia taitehte leh, huaia a meivukuangte, dangkaeng tak ahi ding uh.
Hiai belsuante tengteng toh dangkaeng tak talent khatin a bawl ding ahi.Tanga honetsak uh, a lim dungjuia bawl dingin pilvangin, a chi hi.
Tanga honetsak uh, a lim dungjuia bawl dingin pilvangin, a chi hi.
HUAILOUIN biakbuk puanmalngat hoih koptah puanjak sawm toh na bawl ding, a dum leh a sandup leh a sanau: siamtaka bawl cherubte toh na bawl ding hi.
Puanjak khat saudan tong sawmnih leh giat ahi ding, huan puanjak khat zatdan tong li; huchiin puanjak chihin tehna khat a nei ding ahi.
Puanjak ngate a ki thuap khawm chiat ding uh ahi; huan puanjak nga dangte a kithuap khawm chiat ding uh ahi.
A kithuahnaa a kipehna a kipanin puanjak khat gei ah a dumin vang na bawl dinga; huchibangjelin, puanjak dang mong chin mahmahah, a nihna kithuahna ah na bawl ding.
Puanjak khatah vang sawmnga na bawl ding, a nihna kithuahnaa om, puanjak mongah vang sawmnga na bawl ding; huchia bangte a kimat chiat theihna ding un.
Huan dangkaeng in kilhna sawmnga na bawl dia, kilhnatein puanjakte nihnihin na kilh khawm ding: huchiin biakbuk khat ahi ding.
Biakbuk tunga khuhna dingin kel mul puanjakte na bawl ding; puanjak sawmleh khat na bawl ding.
Puanjak khat dunglam tong sawmthum ahi ding, puanjak khat vailam tong li; huan puanjak sawm leh khat tehna khat ahi vek ding uhi.
Huan puanjak ngate amau mahin na thuap khawm dia, puanjak gukte amau mahin, huan biakbuk maiah puanjak gukna na khep ding.
A thuahnaa puanjak ponung penpen mongah vang sawmnga na bawl ding, huan a nihna thuahna puanjak mongah vang sawmnga.
Huan dalin koihna sawmnga na bawl dia, kilhnate vangah na guang dia, puanin khat a hih theihna dingin, na thuap khawm ding hi.
Huan puanin puanjak val omlai pen, puanjak tum khat omlaipen, biakbuk phaitama khai ding ahi.
Puanin puanjakte dunglama omlaite pang khat lamah tong khat, a khuhna dingin hiai lam pang leh, huailam panga biakbuk pangtea khai ding ahi.
Huchiin puanin adingin khuhna belampa vun sansaksa na bawl ding, a tungsawn khuhna dingin ngalvang vunte.
Biakbuk adingin singgi sing pek tun chiatin na bawl ding.
Singpek khat dunglam tong sawm ahi ding, sing pek khat vailam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding hi.
Singpek khatah keihna nih a om ding, kikei tuah ding dana seh: huchibangin biakbuk singpekte tengteng a dingin na bawl ding hi.
Huchiin biakbuk adingin singpek na bawl dinga, simlam pang simlam sangah pek sawm nih.
Singpek sawm nih nuaiah dangkain kingakna khuakkuak sawmli na bawl ding; a kikeihna nihte adingin singpek khat nuaiah kingakna khuakkuak nih, a kikeihna nihte adingin singpek dang khat nuaiah kingakna khuakkuak nih:
Biakbuk pang nihna adingin singpek sawmnih a om ding a mallam pangah:
Huan a dangka kingakna khuakkuak sawmlite; singpek khat nuaiah kingakna khuakkuak nih, singpek dang khat nuaiah kingakna khuakkuak nih.
Huan biakbuk pangte tumlama te dingin singpek guk bawlin.
Pang nihah biakbuk ningte adingin singpek nih na bawl ding.
