Huchiin a nuailamah a kithuah khawm ding ua, sikkual khat ah a tung lam ah a kithuah khawm ding uh: huchibangin amau tuak adingin ahi ding; ning nihte ading ahi ding uh.
Huchiin singpek giat a om dinga, a dangka kingakna khuakkuakte uh, kingakna khuakkuak sawm leh gukte; kingakna khuakkuak nihte leh, singpek dang khat nuaia kingakna khuakkuak nihte.
Singgi sing chiangtawn na bawl dinga: biakbuk pang khata singpekte dinga,
Biakbuk pang dang khata singpekte dingin chiangtawnnga, biakbuk panga singpekte, tumlam sik nihte adingin, chiangtawn nga.
Huan singpekte laitaka chiangtawn laitain tawp khat akipan tawp khat tan a phak ding ahi.
Huchiin singpekte dangkaengin na luan dinga, chiangtawnte adingin dangkaeng sikkualte a munte adin na bawl ding.
Huchiin tanga a bang a honetsak uh dungjuiin biakbuk na ding sak ding hi.
Huan puanjak a dum, a sandup a sanau leh puan malngat hoih kopatah siam taka hih na bawl ding: cherubte toh bawl ding ahi:
Dangkaenga luan singgi sing khuam lite tungah na jak ding: a bannate dangkaeng ahi dinga, dangka kingakna khuakkuak lite tungah.
Huan puanjak kilhnate nuaiah na khai dia, huchia huailaia theihpihna bawm na hon lak lut theihna dingin: huan puanjakin nang din mun siangthou leh mun siangthou pen kikal a khen ding hi.
Huchiin mun siangthoupenah theihpihna bawm tungah chitna tutna tutphah na koih ding.
Huan puanjak polamah dohkan na tung ding, simlamah biakbuk sik ah dohkan ngaiin khawnvak koihna na koih ding: huan mallam sik ah dohkan na tung ding hi.
Huan Puanin kongkhak adingin puankhai na bawl ding, puan malngat hoih koptah, phima khui, a dum, a sandup leh a sanau.A khaina dingin singgi sing khuam nga na bawl dinga, dangkaeng a luan, a ban na te dangkaeng ahi ding uhi; huaite adingin dal kingakna khuakuak nga na sung ding hi.
A khaina dingin singgi sing khuam nga na bawl dinga, dangkaeng a luan, a ban na te dangkaeng ahi ding uhi; huaite adingin dal kingakna khuakuak nga na sung ding hi.
Huchiin singgi maitam na bawl ding, tong ngaa sau, tong ngaa ja; maitam detdou ahi ding: huai san lam tong thum ahi ding hi.
Huan huaiah a ning lite tungah a kite na bawl ding: a kite a kibang ding ua: dalin na luan ding hi.
A meivu dohna ding a belte na bawl dia, a luahnate leh a belbak leh, a sakaihna leh, a meibeldai: huaia a belsuan tengteng dala na bawl ding ahi.
Huaia dingin dalin singkhul ding koihna len bangin na bawl ding: leh tungah huaia a ning lia dal sikkual lite na bawl ding hi.
Huan huai a nuailama maitamhuapna nuaiah na koih dia; huchia maitam laizanga a len a kikim theihna dingin.
Maitam adingin chiangte na bawl dinga, singgi sing chiangte dalin na luan ding hi.
Huan chiangte sikkual sunga thunlut ding ahi huan chiangte maitam sik nihte tungah a om ding, a puakna dingin.
Tanga a honetsak bang un, singpekte ah hawm na bawl dinga, huchibangin a bawl ding uh.
Huan biakbuk huangsung na bawl ding: simlam sanga dingin simlam manohin puankhai huangsung adingin puanmalngat hoih sik khat ading tong jaa sau a om ding:
Huchiin huaia khuam sawm nihte leh a kingakna khuakkuak sawmnihte dal ahi ding ua; khuamtea khainate leh puanduangte dangka ahi ding uhi.
Huchimahbangin mallam panga a saulam tong jaa sau puankhai a om ding, huan dal khuam sawmnihte leh a kingakna khuakkuak sawmnihte uh; dangkachi khuama khaina leh puanduangte.
Huchiin tumlam sanga huangsung vailam adingin puankhai tong sawmnga a om ding: a khuamte uh sawmleh a kingakna khuakkuak sawm.
Huan suahlama suahlam panga huangsung vailam tong sawmnga ahi ding.
Kongpi sik khatlama puankhaite tong sawm leh nga ahi ding: a khuamte thum, a kingakna khuakkuak thum.
Huan langkhat lampang ah puankhai tong sawm leh ngate a om ding: a khuamte thum, leh a kingakna khuakkuak thum.
Huchiin huangsung kongpi adingin puankhai tong sawmnih a om dinga, a dum, a sandup, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah, phima bawl: huan a khuam uh li ahi dinga, a kingakna khuakkuak li.
Huangsung kimvela khuamte tengteng dangka puanduanga gak ding; a bannate dangka ahi dinga, a kingakna khuakkuak dal ahi ding hi.
Huangsung dunglam tong zakhat ahi ding, a vailam tong sawmnga koipeuhah, huan a san lam tong nga puanmalngat hoih koptaha bawl, huan a kingakna khuakkuak dal.
Biakbuka vanzat tengteng huai a nasepnaa tengteng leh, huaia pin tengteng leh, huangsunga pin tengteng, dal ahi ding hi.
Huchiin Israel suante meivak dingin oliv thau taka bawl hontawi dingin thu na pe ding, khawnvak kuangsak gigena dingin.Puanjak, theihpihna maa om, polama kikhawmte biakbuk ah, Aron leh a tapaten TOUPA maah nitaklam akipan jingsanglam tannin thu a pe ding uh: Israel suante jiakin a khangkhang un khantawn adingin thuseh hi ding hi.
Puanjak, theihpihna maa om, polama kikhawmte biakbuk ah, Aron leh a tapaten TOUPA maah nitaklam akipan jingsanglam tannin thu a pe ding uh: Israel suante jiakin a khangkhang un khantawn adingin thuseh hi ding hi.
Huan na kiangah Aron na unaupa, leh amah toh a tapa, Israel suante laka kipanin kilak inla, aman siampu nasepnamuna ka na a sep theihna dingin, Aron ngei, Nadab leh Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar, Aron tapate.
A thupina ding leh a kilawmna dingin na unaupa Aron adingin na puan siangthou na bawl ding hi.
Pilna khaa ka dimsaksa, mi lungtang pilte tengteng kiangah thu na gen ding, amau Aron puan amah hihsiang dinga a bawl theihna ding un, huchia aman siampu nasepnamuna ka na a septheihna dingin.
Huan a puan bawl dingte uh hiaite ahi: awmtuam, siampupuan, puanaktual, puanakjem, lukhu leh kawnggak: huan na unaupa Aron adingin a tate ading puan siangthoua a bawl ding uh ahi, huchia aman siampu nasepnamuna ka na sep theihna dingin.
Huan dangkaeng leh, dum leh sandup leh, sanau leh puan malngat hoih a la ding uh.
Huchiin dangkaeng, dum, sandup, sanau leh puanmalngat koih koptahin, hoih taka bawlin, siampupuan a bawl ding uh.
Huaia a liang nihte huaia a gei nihte ah a kimat ding ua; huchiin a kimat ding uh.
Huan, siampupan kongak lamdang a tunga om, huaia nasep bangin, akibang ding hi; dangkaengin, a dum leh, a sandup leh, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptahin.
Huan onik suang nih na la dia, huaite tungah Israel suante min na na gelh ding:
Suang khat tungah a minte uh laka guk, suang dang tungah, a om laite min guk dangte, a pianna bang jel un na delh ding.
Suanga gelhmi nasep toh, chiamtehna gelhna bangin, Israel suante adingin theihgigena suang dingin siampupuan liangjangah na koih ding: huaite dangkaeng bulhin na bawlding ahi.
Huan huai suang nihte Israel suante adinga theihgigena suang dingin siampupuan liangjangah na koih ding: huchiin theihgigena dingin Aronin a liangjang nih tungah TOUPA maah a minte uh a po ding hi.
Huan dangkaeng bulhna na bawl ding;
Huchiin a mongtea dangkaeng tak khainiang nihte; pakkhi banga bawlin na bawl dia, a kibulhnate ah huai pakkhi bang khainiangte na khih ding hi.
Huan vaihawmna omtuam siamtaka bawlin na bawl dinga; siampupuan bawl dangiin na bawl ding; dangkaengin, dumin, sandupin, leh sanauin, leh puan malngat hoih koptahin, na bawl ding hi.
Linvuallouha kip thuah nih ahi ding; huaia a dunglam khap khat ahi ding, huaia a vailam khap khat ahi ding.
Huchiin huai suang bulhte na bulh ding, suang vual li hialin: a vual khatna sardi suang, topazi suang leh karbunkul suang ahi ding: huai a vualkhatna ahi ding hi;
Huan a vual nihna emeraldi suang, sapphirei suang, leh diamond suang ahi ding hi;
Huan a vual thumna lingure suang, a gate suang leh amithisti suang ahi ding.
Huchiin a vual lina beril suang leh onik suang leh jasper suang ahi ding hi: a bulhna uah dangkaeng bulh ding ahi.
Huan suangte Israel suante min toh a kithuah ding uh, a min uh dungjuiin, sawm leh nih, chiamtehna gelhte bangin; michih a min toh nam sawm leh nihte dungjuiin ahi ding uhi.
Huan awmtuam tungah pakkhi banga bawl mongte ah dangkaeng khainiang na bawl ding.
Huan awmtuam tungah dangkaeng sikkual nih na bawl ding, huai sikkual nihte awmtuam mong nihte tungah na koih ding hi.
Huchiin awmtuam mongte tunga om sikkual nihte ah dangkaeng pakkhi bang nihte na koih ding.
Huan pakkhi bang khainiang nihte mong nih dangte bulhna nihteah na khih dinga, a maa siampupuan liangjangte ah na koih ding hi.
Huan dangkaengin sikkual nih na bawl dia, huan huai a geia siampupuan mong nihte tungah na koih ding, a sunglama siampupuan geia ompen ah.
Huan dangkaengin sikkual dang nihte na bawl dia, siampupuan geih nihte nuailama a tungah na koih ding, huai a malam sangah, huaia a kikhepna jawn takah, siampupuan konggak lamdang tung takah.
Huaia sikkual in awmtuam siampupuan sikkualah puanduang dum toh na hen ding, huchia siampupuan kawnggak lamdang tunga a om theihna dingin leh siampupuan akipan awmtuam a kiphel louhna dingin.
Huan Aronin, TOUPA maa theihgige tawntungna dinga, mun siangthoua a hoh chiangin, a lungtang tungah vaihawmna omtuamah Israel suante minte a po ding hi.
Huchiin vaihawmna omtuamah Urim leh Thumim na koih ding; TOUPA maa a valut chiangin, Aron lungtang tunga a om ding uh ahi: huchiin Aronin TOUPA maah a lungtang tungah Israel suante vaihawmna a po gige ding hi.
Huan siampupuan puannak tual a dumin na bawl ding.
A khungah a awng a om ding lu adin, huai a lai takah: a awng kimvel ah nasep gatin khihna a om ding, siklen puannak banneilou hileh kilawm, a kek louhna dingin.
A gei tung nuaiah, a dumin, a sandupin, leh a sanauin na bawl ding, huai a gei kimvelin; huan dangkaeng dakte a kimvelin a kikal jel uah na bawl ding:
Dangkaeng dak leh pomgrenet, dangkaeng dak leh pomgrenet, puanaktual gei tungah a kivelin.
Huan huai Aron tungah a om ding nasem dingin: huchiin TOUPA maa mun siangthou a lut chiang leh, a hongpawt chiangin a din a kiza ding, a sih louh theihna dingin.
Huan dangkaeng takin kuang na bawl dia, a tungah na gelh ding, chiamtehna gelhnate bangin TOUPA LAMA SIANGTHOUNA.
Lukhu tunga a om theihna dingin puanduang dum tungah na koih ding; lukhu malam tungah a om ding hi.
Aronin thil siangthou, Israel suanten a thilpiak siangthoute tengteng uha a siansak ding uh, gitlouhna a puak theihna dingin, Aron taltang tungah a om ding hi; TOUPA maa pom a hihtheihna ding un, a taltang tungah a om gige ding hi.
Huan puan malngat hoih puanak na gan dinga, puan malngatin lukhu na bawl dia, khuinasepin kawnggak na bawl ding hi.
Huan Aron tapate adingin puanakte na bawl dia, kawnggakte bawlsak ding, thupina ding leh kilawmna dingin lukhute amau adingin na bawl ding hi.
Huan huaite na unaupa Aron tungah leh, a kianga a tapate tungahna koih ding; amau thau a nilh dia, na sehtuam dia, na siangsak dinga, siampu nasepna muna ka na a sep theihna ding un.
Huan a vuaktanna uh khuh dingin puan pheitawm zumte na bawlsak dinga; tai akipanin phei chiang a tun hial ding uh ahi:Huan kihoupihna puanina a lut chiang un, hiam ahihkeileh mun siangthou nasem dinga dohkan kianga a hongpai chiang un, Aron tung leh a tapate tungah a om ding, uhi; huchia gitlouhnate a puak louhua a sih louhna ding un: huchiin amaha ding leh a nunga a chite a dia khantawna thuseh ahi ding hi.
Huan kihoupihna puanina a lut chiang un, hiam ahihkeileh mun siangthou nasem dinga dohkan kianga a hongpai chiang un, Aron tung leh a tapate tungah a om ding, uhi; huchia gitlouhnate a puak louhua a sih louhna ding un: huchiin amaha ding leh a nunga a chite a dia khantawna thuseh ahi ding hi.
Huan hiai thil ahi a kiang ua na hih ding, siampu nasepna kei adia nasem dinga, amau kisiangsak dingin: bawngtal nou khat leh belampa nih gensiatbei la inla,
Huan tanghou silngou sohlouh, tanghou beu silngou sohlouh thaua jut, tanghou pek silngou sohlouh thaua jut: buh tangbuangin huaite na bawl ding hi.
Huchiin huaite loh sung khatah na koih dia, bawngtal leh belampa nihte toh, lohin non tawi ding.
Huan kihoupihna puanina kongkhak ah Aron leh a tate non pi dia, tuiin amau na sil ding.
Huchiin puante na la dia, huan puanaktung leh, siampu puan puanaktual leh, siampupuan leh awmtuam Aron tungah na koih dia, siampupuan kawnggak lamdangin amah na gak ding:
Huan a lu tungah lukhu na koih dia, huan lukhu tungah lallukhu siangthou na koih ding hi.
Huchiin thau nilh chi na la dia, a lu tungah na buak dia amah na nuh ding hi.
Huchiin a tapate non pi dia a tunguah puanaktungte na koih ding.
Huan kawnggak in amau na gak dia, Aron leh a tapate, a tunguah lukhubem na koih ding: tangtuanthuseh adingin siampu nasepna amaua ahi ding: huchiin Aron leh a tate na hihsiangthou ding hi.
Huan kihoupihna puanin maah bawngtal na kai sak dinga: huan Aron leh a tapaten bawngtal lu tungah a khutte uh a koih ding uh.
Huan kihoupihna puanin kongkhak kiangah, TOUPA maah bawngtal na gou ding.
Huchiin bawngtal sisana na la dinga, na khutzungin maitam kite tungah na koih dinga, sisan tengteng maitam bul sikah na sung ding hi.
Huan a sunglam tuam a thau tengteng na la dia, a sin tunga a lam om leh, a kaileng nihte, leh a tung ua a thau huaite maitam tungah na lah ding hi.
A bawngtal sa leh, a vun leh a ek jaw, khopo lamah mei in na hal ding hi, khelhna thillat ahi.
Belampa leng khat na la dia: belampa lu tungah Aron leh a tapate a khut uh a koih ding ua.
Huan belampa na that dia, a sisan na la dia, maitam kimvelin na theh ding hi.
Huan belampa na at nen dia, a sunglam na sawp dia, a khete huaite a nente leh a lu toh na koih ding.
Huchiin belam a vekin maitam tungah nahal ding: TOUPA adia meia thillat kibawl ahi.
Huan belampa dang na la dia; belampa lu tungah Aron leh a tapaten a khut uh a koih ding uh.
Huchiin belampa na gou dia Aron bil taklam dawnah leh, a tapate bil taklam dawnah leh a khut taklam khutpi uah, a khe taklam khepi uah, a sisan na la dia, na nuh ding, huan maitam kimvelah sisan na theh ding hi.
Huan maitam tunga om sisan na la dinga, nuhtheih thau toh, Aron tungah leh, a puan tungah leh, a tapate tungah leh a kianga a tapate puan tungah na theh ding: huchiin amah hihsiangthou ahi ding, a puante leh a tapate leh a kiang a a tapate puante.
Belampa akipanin a thau leh amulmat, a sung thau, a tuap tunga bawk, leh a kaileng nihte, leh a tung ua thau omte leh a taklam liangte leng na la dia; kipumpiakna belampa a hih jiakin.
Huan tanghou beu khat leh sathau tanghou pei khat leh, tanghou pekkhat tanghou silngou sohlouh TOUPA maa om loha kipanin:
Huan huaite tengteng Aron khutah leh, a tapate khutah na koih dia; huaite TOUPA maah vei thillat dingin na vei ding hi.
Huan amau khuta kipanin huaite na sang dia, halmang thillat na dingin maitam tungah huaite na hal ding hi, TOUPA maa gimlim hi ding in: TOUPA adia meia thillat bawl ahi.
Huan Aron hihsiangthoua belampa om na la dia, TOUPA maah vel thillatna dingin na vei ding: huchiin huai na tan ahi ding.
Vei thillat om leh, khai thillat liang, vei khitsa, khai touhsa, hihsiangthouna belampa, na hihsiangthou dia, Aron ading pen leh a tapate ading penpente:
Israel suante akipan khantawn adia thusehin huai Aron leh a tatea ahi ding: khai thillatna a hih jiakin: Israel suante lemna thillat akipana khai thillat ahi ding.
TOUPA kianga a khai thillat pen uh.
Huan Aron puansilh siangthoute amah nungin a tapate a ahi dinga, huaiah thaunilh ding ahi, amau ah hihsiangthou hi dingin.
Huchiin huai tap amah muna siampu hiin, mun siangthoua na sem dia kihoupihna puanin sunga a hongpai chiangin, ni sagih a silh ding ahi.
Huchiin kihihsiangthouna belampa na la dia, mun siangthou ah a san a tuihuan ding.
Huan Aron leh a tapaten belampa sa leh loh sunga om kihoupihna puanin kongkhak kianga tanghou a ne ding uh.
Huan amau hihsiangthouna ding leh sianna dingin, tatna kibawlna huai thilte a ne ding uh: a siangthou jiak un, mikhualin jaw a nek louh ding ahi.
Huan kihihsiangthouna sa, hiam tanghou hiam a jingsang tana om na omta leh, huchi a hih injaw meiin a valte na hal ding hi: a siangthou jiakin nek louh ding ahi.
Huchibangin thu ka honpiak bangbangin Aron kiangah leh a tapate kianga na hih ding: ni sagih amau na hihsiangthou ding ahi.
Huan lemna dingin ni tengin bawngtal khelhna thillat dingin na la ding hi: huai dia lemna na bawl zoh chiangin, maitam na susiang dia, thau na nilh dia, na siangthou sak ding.
Maitam adingin ni sagih lemna na bawl ding, huan na hihsiangthou ding, maitam siangthou penpen ahi ding: kuapeuh maitam khoih a siangthou ding hi.
Huchiin hiai ahi maitam tunga na lat ding; a ni simin belamnou nih kum khatna ahi ngitnget ding.
Belamnou khat jingsangin na lan dia; belamnou khat dang nitaklamin na lan ding:
Belamnou khat lakah tangbuang tan sawmna thau toh hina seh lina toh; huan dawn thillat dingin uain hina a seh lina.
Huan belamnou khat dang nitaklamin na lan dia, hiai tangbuang thillat dungjuiin, leh huai dawn thillat dungjuiin gimlim dingin, na hih dia, TOUPA adia meia thillat bawl na lan ding.
Na khang na khang un hiai TOUPA maa kihoupihna puanina kongkhaka halmang thillat ahi nilouh ding hi: huaiah na kiang ua thugen dingin, ka hon kituahpih ding hi.
Huchiin huaiah Israel suante ka kituahpih dia, ka thupina in biakbuk hihsiangthouin a om ding hi.
Huchiin kihoupihna puanin leh maitam ka hihsiangthou ding: siampu nasepnaa kei dia nasem dingin Aron leh a tapate leng ka hihsiangthou tuaktuak ding hi.
Huchiin Israel suante lakah ka teng dinga, a Pathian uh ka hi ding.Huchiin TOUPA a Pathian uh, a lak ua ka ten theihna dinga, Aigupta gama ki pana amau pikhepa ka hihdan a thei ding uh: TOUPA a Pathian uh ka hi.
Huchiin TOUPA a Pathian uh, a lak ua ka ten theihna dinga, Aigupta gama ki pana amau pikhepa ka hihdan a thei ding uh: TOUPA a Pathian uh ka hi.
Huan gimlim halna ding maitam na bawl ding: singgi singin na bawl ding hi.
Huai saulam tong khat ahi ding, huai zatlam tong khat: kim taka bawl ahi ding: huai sanlam tong nih ahi ding: huai kite a kibang ahi ding hi.
Huan dangkaeng takin na luan ding, huai tung, huai sikte a kimvelin, huai kite: huaiah a kimvelin dangkaeng lallukhu na bawl ding hi.
Dangkaeng sikkual nih a lallukhu dangah, huai a ning nihteah na bawl dinga, a sik nihte tungah na bawl ding; a puakna ding chiangte adia mun ahi ding uhi.
Huchiin singgi singin chiang na bawl dia, dangkaengin huaite na luan ding hi.
Ka honkituahpihna ding mun, theihsakna tunga om chitna tutphah ma, theihpihna bawm kianga om puanjak maah na koih ding.
Huchiin jingsang tengin huai tungah Aron in gimlim a hal ding; khawnvakte a bawl chiangin, a tungah gimlim a hal ding.
Huan nitaklama Aronin khawnvakte a det chiangin, a tungah gimlam a hal ding, na khang na khang un TOUPA maa gimlim hi ni louhlouh dingin.
Huaiah theihlouh gimlim, hiam halmang thillat hiam, tangbuang thillat hiam, na lan ding uh ahi kei hi; huailouin huai ah dawn thillat leng na sung ding uh ahi kei hi.
Huchiin kum khatin khatvei Aronin lemna khelhna thillat sisanin a kite tungah lemna a bawl ding: na khang na khang un kum khatin khatvei a tungah lemna a bawl ding hi; TOUPA adia siangthou penpen ahi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena,
A zah uh dungjui a Israel suante gawmkhawm na lak chiangin, amau na sim laiin, huaichiangin mi chihin TOUPA kianga a kha tatna ding a piak ding uh ahi; na sim chianga na lak ua gawtna a omlouhna dingin.
Hiai a pe ding uh, sima omte laka michih paisuakte, munsiangthoua sekel dungjuiin sekel kimkhat: (sekel khat gera sawmnih ahi: ) sekel kimkhat TOUPA dia thillat ahi ding.
Sima omte laka paisuak peuhmah kum sawmniha upa leh a tunglamin TOUPA kiangah thillat a piak ding uh.
Na kha ua dinga lemna bawlna dinga, TOUPA kianga thillat a piak chiang un, ahaute leh ajawngten sekel kimkhat sanga tamjaw leh tawmjaw a piak louh ding uh ahi.
Huchiin Israel suante lemna sum na la dinga, kihoupihna puanina nasepna adingin na sep ding hi; na kha uh tatna dinga, TOUPA maa Israel suante adia theihgigena a hih theihna dingin.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena
Silna dingin tuikuang dalin na bawl lai dinga, a khe leng dalin: huan kihoupihna puanin leh maitam kikalah na koih ding, huchiin huaiah tui na koih ding hi.
Aron leh a tapaten a khutte uh leh a khete uh huaia a sil ding jiak un:
Kihoupihna puanina a lut chiang ua, a sihlouhna dingun a khutte uh leh a khete uh a sil ding uh ahi: ahihkeileh TOUPA dia thillat meia bawl hal dinga, nasem dia maitam kianga a hongpai chiang un:
Huchia a sihlouhna ding un a khutte uh leh a khete uh a sil ding uh ahi: khantawnin amau adingin thuseh ahi ding, a khang a khang un amah ading leh a chite ading nangawnin, chiin.
TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gen nalaia,
Gimlim mahmah leng kilak inla, murra tak sekel zanga leh singguithak lim huai kimkhat, sekel zanih leh sawmnga sialluang khum sekel zanih leh sawmnga,
Singguithak sekel zanga, mun siangthou sekel dungjuiin, oliv thau hin khat:
Huan nuhtheih siangthouin thau na bawl dinga, nuhtheih damdawimi siamna banga gawm: nilhtheih thau siangthou ahi ding.
Huaia kihoupihna puanin na nuh ding, theihpihna bawm toh,
Huan a dohkan leh a belsuan tengteng, leh khawnvak koihna leh a belsuan tengteng leh gimlim maitam toh,
Huan halmang thillatmaitam leh a belsuante tengteng leh, tuikuang leh a khe.
Huchiin huaite na hihsiangthou ding, a siangthou penpena ding un; bangpeuh huaite khoih a siangthou ding uh.
Huan Aron leh a tapate thau na nilh dinga, amau na siangsak ding, siampu nasepna muna kei dia na a sep theihna ding un.
Huan Israel suante kiangah thu na gen dia, na khang na khang un kei dingin hiai thaunilh siangthou ahi ding hi.
Mi sa tunga buak louh ding ahi, a kibatpih dang himhim leng bawllouh ding, a gawmkhawmte bangin: a siangthou a, nou adingin a siangthou ding ahi.
Kuapeuh huai banga gawm, hiam kuapeuh mikhual tunga huai koih himhim, a mite laka kipana sat khiak ding ahi, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Gimlim kilak inla, stakte leh onicha leh, galbanum; hiam gimlimte begaw toh: huaite leng a giklam uh kibang ding ahi.
Huan namtuiin na bawl dia, damdawimi siamna banga chikhum, helkhawm, a tak leh a siangthou:
Huan a khenkhat na gawi jan mahmah dia, huai bel kihoupihna puanin sunga theihpihna maah na koih dinga, huailaiah ka hon kimuhpih ding hi: nang adingin siangthou penpen ahi ding hi.
Huan huai na bawl ding gim namtui ahihleh, a helkhawm na bangin na kibawl kei ding hi: TOUPA jiakin nanga dingin siangthou ahi ding hi.Kuapeuh huai toh kibang bawl, nap ding lel, a mite laka kipanin satkhiakin a om ding hi, a chi a.
Kuapeuh huai toh kibang bawl, nap ding lel, a mite laka kipanin satkhiakin a om ding hi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena,
Enin, Juda nam, Hur tapa, Uri tapa Bezaleel a minin ka samta;
Pathian khain, pilna leh, theihtheihna leh, theihna leh, nasepsiamna lam chitengin amah ka dim sakta hi.
Nasep pilhuai gel ding, dangkaeng leh, dangka leh, dala sem dingin,
Suang sekna ah, lem dingin, leh sing gelhah, nasepsiamna lam chitenga sem dingin.
Huan, ken, ngaiin, Dan nam, Ahisamak tapa, Aholiab a kiangah ka peta; kon thupiak tengteng a bawl theihna ding un, mi pil tengteng lungtangah pilna ka koihta hi.
Kihoupihna puanin leh, theihpihna bawm leh, huai tunga om chitna tutphah leh, Puanin vanzat tengteng;
Dohkan leh a vante leh, khawnvak koihna a van tengteng toh, gimlim maitam;
Halmang thillat maitam a van tengteng toh, tuikuang leh a khe;
Nasepna puante leh, siampu Aron puan siangthoute leh, a tapate puansilhte, siampu nasepnamuna nasem dingin;
Huan nilhtheih thau leh mun siangthou ading gimlim: nang kon thupiak tengteng dungjuiin a hih ding uh, chiin.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah thu a gena,
Hichia chiin, Israel suante kiangah leng thugenin, chihtaktakin ka khawlni na tan ding uh ahi: na khang ua kei leh nou kala chiamtehna a hih jiakin; nou honhihsiangthou TOUPA ka hihdan na theihna ding un.
Huaijiakin khawlni na tang ding ua; nou adia siangthou a hih jiakin: kuapeuh huai hihbuah sihsak mahmah ding ahi: kuapeuh huai nia na sem, huai mi a mite laka kipana sat khiak ding ahi.
Ni guk sung na sep theih ahi dia; himahleh ni sagihna chihtaka khawlna khawlni ahi, TOUPA dia siangthou: khawlnia kuapeuhin bang a na peuh a sep leh, sih sak ngeingei ding ahi.
Huaijiakin Israel suanten khawlni a tang ding ua, thuchiam tawntung dingin, a khang a khang un khawlni a tang ding uhi.
Khantawnin kei leh Israel suante kikala chiamtehna ahi: ni guka TOUPAN lei leh van a bawla, a ni sagih nia khawla, a tawldam jiakin, chiin.Huchiin Sinai tang tunga Mosi toh kihoupihna a tawpsak laiin Mosi kiangah, theihsakna pek nih, suang pekte, Pathian khutzunga gelh, a pia hi.
Huchiin Sinai tang tunga Mosi toh kihoupihna a tawpsak laiin Mosi kiangah, theihsakna pek nih, suang pekte, Pathian khutzunga gelh, a pia hi.
Tang akipana Mosi a hongpai suk pah louh miten a theih un, mite Aron kiangah a hongkikhawm khawm ua, a kiangah, Kisain, ka ma ua pai ding, pathiante honbawl sakin; hiai Mosi, Aigupta gam akipana honpi khepa lah, bang chita ahia ka thei ngal kei ua, a chi ua.
Huan Aronin a kiang uah, Na jite uh bila om, natapate uh bila om, na tanute uh bila om, dangkaeng bilbahte khong khia unla, ka kiangah huaite hontawi un, a chi a.
Huchiin mite tengtengin a bil ua om dangkaeng bilbahte a khong khia ua, huaite Aron kiangah a tawi uhi.
Huan aman a khut ua kipanin huaite a laa, bawngnou suna a bawl zohin, gelhna vanin a bawlta hi: huan Israel aw, hiaite na pathiante, Aigupta gama kipan a honlakhete hi uhen, a chi uh.
Aronin huai a muh takin, a maah maitam a bawla, huan Aronin thuphuanna a neia, Jingchiang TOUPA dia ankuangluina ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin a jingin beltakin a thou ua, halmang thillat a lan ua, lemna thillat a tawi uh: huan mite ne ding leh dawn dingin a tu ua, mawl dingin a ding uh.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Paiin, kumsukin, na mi Aigupta gama kipana na pi khiakte, a kihihsiat jiakun:
Amau ka lampi hilhna akipanin a pial pah manhial uhi: bawngnou sun a kibawl ua, huai a bia ua, huaia kithoihin, Israel aw, hiaite na pathiante, Aigupta gama kipana honkhete hi uhen, a chi uh, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Hiai mite ka mutaa, ngaiin, mi genhakte ahi uh:
Huaijiakin tuin a tung ua ka thangpaihna a puah jaka, amaute ka hul theihna dingin honomsak maimai un: huchiin nam thupiin ka honbawl ding a chi a.
Huan Mosiin TOUPA a Pathian a ngena, TOUPA, thilhihtheihna thupi leh, ban thahata Aigupta gama kipana na pi khiaksa, na mite tungah bang dinga na thangpaihna puakjak ding ahia?
Bangdingin ahia Aiguptaten thu gena, Siatna dinga amau pi khia eive, tangtea amau that ding leh, lei tengtenga kipana amaute hul dingin? chiin, Na thangpaihna thupi la kik inla, na mite tunga hiai gilou kikhel sakin.
A kiang ua, Vana aksite bangin na suante ka puangsak dinga, na suante kianga a thu ka gensa hiai gam tengteng ka honpe ding, huchiin khantawnin a luah ding uh, a chi a, nangmah ngeia na kichiamna, na sikhate, Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob theigigein, a chi hi.
Huchiin a mite tunga gilou hih dinga a ngaihtuah TOUPAN a kikhel sakta hi.
Huan Mosi a kiheia, tang akipan a pai sukta, a khutah theihpihna suangpek nihte a om: suang pekte a langnih tuaka gelh ahi, khat lam leh langkhat lama gelh ahi uh.
Suangpekte Pathian thilhih ahi a, a gelhte leng Pathian gelh ahi, suangpekte tunga gelhte.
Huchia Joshuain mite akikou husa uh a jakin Mosi kiangah, Giahbuk ah kidouna husa a om, a chi a.
Huan a man, Tungnun kithua kikou te aw ahi keia, nuaisiaha om jiaka kapte aw leng ahi sam kei: lasate husa ahi jaw ka jak, a chi a.
Huan hichi ahi a, giahbuk kiang a hongtun takin, bawngnou leh lam a mutaa: huchiin Mosi hehna a sou a, a khuta kipanin suangpekte a paia, tangnuaiah a keksakta hi.
Huan a bawngnou bawl uh a laa, meiah a khula, a gawi nena, tui tungah a theha Israel suante a dawnsak hi.
Huan Mosiin Aron kiangah, Hiai miten bang ahia na kianga a hih uh, a tung ua hichitela khelhna thupi na tun sak? a chi a.
Huan Aronin, Ka pu hehna puak jak kei hen: mite na thei hi, siatna a zon dan uh.
Ka ma ua pai ding, pathiante honbawl sakin: hiai Mosi Aigupta gama kipana honpi khetoupa lah, bang suakta ahia ka thei ngal kei ua, ka kianga a chih jiak un.
Huchiin ken a kiang uah, Dangkaeng neipeuhin, khong khia un, ka chi a.
Huchiin amau kei a honpia ua: huan ken mei ah ka khiaa, huan hiai bawngnou a hongsuakta hi, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi in mite vuaktang a om a muh in; Aron in lah a melmate uh lak a a zahlakna ding un, amau a vuaktang sak ngal a:
Huailai in giahbuk kongpi ah Mosi a ding a, TOUPA lam a pang kua ahia? ka kiang ah hong pai heh, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang ah Levi tate tengteng a kikhawmkhawm ta uh.
Huan aman a kiang uah, Israel TOUPA Pathian in hichi in a chi, Michih in a pang ah a namsau kuah henla, giahbuk tuansuak in kongpi khat a kipan kongpi dang ah, lut in pawt henla, michih in a sanggampa that henla, michih in a lawmpa, michih in a innveng, chi in.
Huan Levi taten Mosi thu dungzui in a hih ta uh: huchi in huai ni in mite lak ah mi sangthum khawng a puk uh.
Mosi in lah, Tuni in TOUPA lam ah kihih siangthou un, michih a tapa tungah leh, a unaupa tungah; tuni a na tung ua vualzawlna a honpiak theihna ding in, a na chi ta ngal a.
Huan a zing in hichi ahi a, Mosi in mite kiang ah, Khelhna thupi na khial ta uh: huchi in tu in TOUPA kiang ah ka hohtou dia; na khelhna uh a ding in lemna ka bawl khamai ding, achi a.
Huan Mosi TOUPA kiang ah a kik nawn a, Aw, hiai mite'n khelhna thupi a khial uh, dangka-eng pathiante a kibawl ta uh
Ahi a lah tu in, a khelhna uh na ngaihdam leh; na ngaihdam kei ding leh, na gelhsa na laibu a kipan, hon siakmang in, ko'n ngen hi, achi a.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Kuapeuh ka tung a khial, huai ka laibu a kipan ka siakmang ding.
Huaiziak in tu innkuan inla, na kiang a ka genna mun ah mite pi in: ngai in, na ma ah ka Angel a pai ding: akoi-abang hileh ka veh ni chiang in a tunguah a khelhna uh ka veh ding, achi hi.Huchi in Aron bawl bawngnou a bawl ziak un, TOUPA'N mite a gawt ta.
Huchi in Aron bawl bawngnou a bawl ziak un, TOUPA'N mite a gawt ta.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Kuan inla, hiailai a kipan in paitou in, nang leh Aigupta gam a kipan a na pikhiak mite, Na suante kiang ah ko'n pe ding, chi a, Abraham kiang, Isaak kiang leh Jakob kiang a ka kichiamna gamah;
Huan na ma ah angel ka sawl ding; huchi in Kanan-te, Amor-te leh, Hit-te leh, Periz-te, Hiv-te leh Jebuste ka hawlkhe ding:
Gam bawngnawitui leh khuaizu a luang ah: kei na lak uah hohtou lou ding ka hih ziak in; mi genhakte na hih ziak un: huchi lou in zaw lampi ah ko'n hul kha ding hi, a chi.
Huchi a mite'n huai tanchin hoihloute a zak un, a thuak uhi: huchi in kuamah a kivatna ua kivan a om kei uh.
TOUPA'N lah Mosi kiang ah, Israel suante kiang ah, Mi genhakte na hi uh: mitphial kal lou in na lak uah ka hongtou dia, ko'n hul ding: huaiziak in na tung ua bang ahia ka hih ding ka theihna ding in na kivatna uh suah un, chi in, a na chi ta ngal a.
Huchi in Israel suante'n Horeb tang tang kiang ah a kivatnate uh a kisuah vek ta uhi.
Huan Mosi in puan inn a sut a, giahbuk po lam ah a kai a, giahbuk a kipan gamla pi ah, Kihoupihna puan inn, a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, michih TOUPA zongte kihoupihna puan inn, giahbuk po lam a om ah, a hoh uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, puan inn lam a Mosi a paikhiak lai in, mite a vek un a ding ua, michih a puan inn kongkhak bul ah a ding uh, huchi in puan inn a lut mateng Mosi a enzui uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Mosi puan inn a a lut leh, meikhuam a hong kum a, puan inn kongkhak bul ah a ding a, huchi in TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih ta hi.
Huchi in mi tengteng in puan inn kongkhak bul a ding meikhuam a mu ua: huchi in mi tengteng a ding ua a bia uh, michih a puan inn kongkhak sung chiat uah.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi, mi'n a lawm a houpih bang mai in, kimaituah in a houpih ta hi.
Huchi in giahbuk a nungngat a; himahleh a sikha Josua, Nun tapa, tangval, puan inn a kipan a paikhe kei.
Huan Mosi in TOUPA kiang ah, En in, hiai mite hon pitou in no'n chi a: huan ka kiang a na sawl ding kua ahia non theisak kei.
Hinapi in lah, Na min in ka hon thei a, ka mitmuh in hehpihna leng na mu hi, na chi ngal a.
Huaiziak in tu in, ka hon ngen hi, na mitmuh a hehpihna ka muh leh, ka hon theih a, na mitmuh a hehpihna ka muh theihna ding in, tu in na lampi hon en sak in: huan hiai nam na mite ahi chih ngaihsun in, a chi a.
Huan aman, Ka ompihna nang toh a ton dia, khawlna kon pe ding hi, a chi a.
Huan aman a kiang ah, Na ompihna kei toh a ton kei ding leh, hiai a kipan in kou hon pitou ken.
A ziak, kei leh na miten hiai lai ah na mitmuh in hehpihna ka mu ta uh chih koi a kithei ding ahia? kou kiang ah na pai hi lou hia? huchi in leitung pumpi a teng mi tengteng a kipan in khen in ka om ding uh, kei leh na mite, a chi hi.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Hiai thil na gensa leng ka hih ding: ka mitmuh a hehpihna na muh a, min a nang ka hon theih ziak in, a chi hi.
Huan aman, Ka hon ngen hi, na thupina hon en sak in, a chi a.
Huan aman, Na ma ah ka hoihna tengteng ka pai sak dia, na ma ah TOUPA min ka tangkoupih ding: huan ka hehpihpih ka hehpih ding a, chitna ka etsaksak chitna ka ensak ding hi, a chi a.
Huchi in aman, Ka mai na mu theikei ding: mi kei hon mu a, hing a omlouh ding ziak un, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA'N, En in, ka kiang ah mun a om, huchi in suangpi tungah na ding ding:
Huan hichi ahi ding a; ka thupina in a hon khen sung in ka khut in ka hon khuh ding:Huan ka khut ka lamang dia, huchi in ka nung lam na mu ding: himahleh ka mai a kimukei ding, a chi a.
Huan ka khut ka lamang dia, huchi in ka nung lam na mu ding: himahleh ka mai a kimukei ding, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, A masa bang in suangpek nih kibawl inla: huan hiai suangpekte tungah, na hihsiat suangpek masa pente a om thute ka gelh ding.
Huchi in zingsang in mansa in om inla, huan zingsang in Sinai tang ah hongtou inla, tangvum ah ka kiang ah hong kihil in.
Huan na kiang a kuamah a hongtouh louh ding uh ahi, tang kimvel a leng kuamah himhim muh a a om louh ding uh; tang ma zawn lam a bawng hon leh belam hon leng a gamtat louh ding uh, a chi.
Huchi in aman suangpek nihte a bawl a, a masapen bang in; huan zingkhang in Mosi a thou a, TOUPA'N thu a piak bang in, Sinai tang lam ah a hohtou hi, a khut in suangpek nihte a tawi.
Huan, TOUPA meipi ah a hong kum a, huailai ah a kiang ah a hong ding ta a, TOUPA min a genkhe ta hi.
Huchi in a ma ah TOUPA a paisuak a, TOUPA, TOUPA Pathian, chingthei leh hehpihthei, dohthei leh, hoihna leh thutak a hau;
Sang tampite a dia chitna nei, mohte bangchi mah a hihveng lou ding, gitlouhna leh tatlekna leh khelhna ngaidam; pate gitlouhna tate tung leh, tate tate tung, a khang thumna leh a khang lina tan a thuk, chi in a genkhia a.
Huan Mosi a kinoh a, lei lam ah a lu a kun a, a be ta hi.
Huan aman, Tua na mitmuh a hehpihna ka muh leh, TOUPA aw, ka hon ngen hi, ka lak uah ka TOUPA pai hen; mi genhak a hih ziak un: ka gitlouhna uleh ka khelhna uh ngaidam inla na gouluah ding in hon la in, a chi hi.
Huan aman, Ngai in, thuchiam ka bawl; lei tengteng a hih a om ngeilou, koi nam a leng hih a om ngei lou, thillamdangte na mite tengteng in TOUPA thilhih a mu ding uh: na lak a ka hih ding thil lauhuai a hih ziak in.
Nang tuni a kon thupiak chiamteh in; ngai in na ma uah Amorte, leh Kanante leh, Hitte leh Perizte leh, Hiv-te leh Jebus-te ka hawlkhia hi.
Na zohna lam gam ua tengte toh thuchiam na bawlkha ding, kiveng in, huchilou in zaw na lak ua thang ahi ding hi:
A maitamte uh na hihsia un, a milimte uh na sukgawp sak un, Asete uh na phuk sak zaw ding uh:
Aziak, Pathian dang na be ding uh ahi kei: TOUPA, a min mullit hat Pathian a hih ziak in:
A gam a pathiante uh kiang ah kithoihna a bawl un, khattei in nang a hon sam in, a kithoihna uh na ne kha ding hi;
Huan na tapate uh a ding in a tanute uh na pi kha ding ua, huchi in a tanute uh a pathiante uh lak a kizuak un, a pathiante uh lak a na tapate uh kizuak ding in a bawl kha ding uhi.
Pathian sunte na kibawl ding ahi kei.
Tanghou silngou sohlouh a annkuangluina na nei gige ding.
Thu ka hon piak tak bang in, Abib kha in, ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uh: Abib kha a Aigupta a kipan a nong paikhiak ziak un.
Sul hong tengteng kei ahi a; huan na ganhon lak ua ta masapen, bawngtal hi in belam hileh, a pa peuhpeuh.
A hihhang in sabengtung nou masapen belam nou in na tan ding: huan na tat kei leh, na gawng na hektan ding.
Na tapate tengteng lak a piang masapen na tan ding hi.
Huan vuaktang in ka ma ah kuamah hong kilang kei ding uh.
Ni guk sung nna na sem ding, himahleh ni sagih ni in na khawl ding: haichi pawi hun leh pawltak hun in na khawl ding.
Nipi kalte a annkuangluina, huitbuh pawltak gah masa annkungluina, kumtawp a koihkhawmna annkuangluinate na tan ding ahi.
Kum khat in thumvei na pasal naupangte tengteng uh TOUPA Pathian, Israel Pathian ma a a kilat ding uh.
Na ma a namte ka delh khiak a, na gamgite ka suklet ding ziak in: kum khat thumvei TOUPA na Pathian ma a kilang ding a na paitouh chiang in, kuamah himhim in na gam a deih kei ding uhi.
Ka kithoihna sisan silngou toh na lan ding ahi kei; paikan annkuangluina kithoihna leng a zingchiang tan in nutsiah in a om ding ahi kei.
Na gam a gah masapente a masapen TOUPA na Pathian in ah non tawi ding.
Kelnou a nu nawi ne lai na mawk suknuak ding ahi kei, a chi hi.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Hiai thute gelh in: hiai thute omdan zui a nang leh Israel toh thuchiam ka bawl tak ziak in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA kiang ah ni sawmli leh zan sawmli a om a; ann lah a ne kei a, tui lah a dawn kei hi.
Huan suangpek tungah thuchiam thute a gelh a, thupiak sawmte.
Huan hichi a hong hi a, Mosi Sinai tang a kipan a khut a theihpihna suangpek nihte toh, tang a kipan a a hong paisuk lai in, amah a houpih sung in a mai vun a tang chih Mosi in a theikei hi.
Huchi a Aron leh Israel suante tengteng in Mosi a muh un, ngai in, a maivun a tang a; amah naih a hon pai a lau ta uhi.
Huchi in Mosi in amau a sam a; huan Aron leh khawmpite vaihawmte tengteng a kiang ah a kik ua; huchi in Mosi in amau a houpih ta hi.
Huai nung in Israel suante tengteng a hong pai nau ua; huan Sinai tang a a kiang a TOUPA'N a gen tengteng thupiak in amau a pe ta.
Huchi in Mosi in amau a houpih khit mateng, a mai maituamna in a tuam hi.
Himahleh Mosi TOUPA ma a amah houpih ding a a lut lai in, a hong pawtkhiak tan, maituamna a la khia a; huan thu piak a a omdan Israel suante kiang ah gen hi;Huchi in Israel suante'n Mosi mai a mu ta ua, Mosi maivun a tandan: huan Mosi in, amah houpih ding a a lut nawn tan in a mai maituamna in a tuam nawn.
Huchi in Israel suante'n Mosi mai a mu ta ua, Mosi maivun a tandan: huan Mosi in, amah houpih ding a a lut nawn tan in a mai maituamna in a tuam nawn.
Huan Mosi in Israel suante khawmpi tengteng a khawmkhawm a, a kiang uah, Hiaite, na hih ding ua, TOUPA'N a piak thute ahi.
Ni guk sung in nnasep zoh ahi dia, a hihhang in ni sagih ni in ni siangthou a om ding, TOUPA a dia chiktak a khawlna khawlni, nou a dia inn om ni: huaini a kuapeuh nnasem sih hi.
Khawlni na omna tengteng uah mei na chih louh ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan Israel suante khawmpi tengteng kiang ah Mosi in thu a gen a, Hiai thil TOUPA thupiak ahi.
Na lak ua kipan in TOUPA kiang a thillat kilak un: utna lungtang nei kuapeuh in, TOUPA thillat, hon tawi hen; dangka-eng leh, dangka leh daal;
A dum leh, a sandup leh, a san-au leh, puan malngat hoih, leh kel mul;
Leh belampa mul diahsan, leh ngalvang vun leh, singgi sing;
Leh khawnvak a ding thau leh, thaunilh ding in gimlim leh hal namtui ding in;
Onik suangte, siampu puanak a siat ding suangte leh awmtuam a ding in.
Huan na lak ua lungtang pilte na hong ding ua, TOUPA'N thu a piak tengteng na bawl ding uh;
Biakbuk, a puan inn, a khuhna, a sik kawi, a singpekte, a sik tawnte, a khuamte, leh a kingakna khuak kuakte;
A bawm leh huai a achiangte, chitna tutphah leh khuhna puanzak;
Dohkan leh, achiangte leh, a tui-um-belsuante leh tanghou koih;
Khawnvak a ding in khawnvak koihna leng, a vante, a khawnvakte, a vakna thau;
Huan gimlim maitam leh, achiangte, nilh theih thau, gimlim leh, biakbuk lutna a kongkhak a dia puankhai.
Halmang thillatna maitam, a dal vutluah, achiangte leh a tui-um-belsuan tengteng, tuikuang leh a khe;
A huangsung puankhaite, a khuamte, a kingakna khuak kuakte, huangsung kongkhak a dia puankhai;
Biakbuk pinte, huangsung pinte leh a khaute uh;
Nnasepna puante, mun siangthou a nnasepna hih ding in siampu Aron puan siangthoute, a tapate puante, siampu nnasepna mun a sem ding in, chi in.
Huchi in Israel suante khawmpi tengteng Mosi omna a kipan in a paita uhi.
Huan michih a lungtang in a tohhalh peuhmah leh michih a kha in a utsakte, a hong pai ua, kihoupihna puan inn nnasepna ding in TOUPA thillat a hon tawi ua, a nnasepna tengteng a ding leh a puan siangthou a ding in.
Huchi in, pasalte leh numeite, a hong pai tuaktuak ua, lungtang a utna nei zahzah, taute leh, bilbahte leh, zungbuhte leh, saiha peite, dangka-eng mantamte; huchi in michih a lanten TOUPA kiang ah dangka-eng thillat a lan uhi.
Huchi in michih, a dum, a sandup, a san-au, puan malngat hoih, kelmul, belampa vun, ngalvang vun neiten, huaite a hon tawi hi.
Michih dangka leh daal lat lanten TOUPA thillat a hon tawi ua: huan michih, nnasepna hihna ding himhim singgi sing a hon tawi uhi.
Huchi in numei tengteng lungtang pilten a khut un khau a khek ua, huai a kheksa uh hon tawi ua, a dum, a sandup, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih.
Huchi in numei tengteng a lungtang uh pilna a tohthoh a omten kel mul a khek uhi:
Huan vaihawm miten onik suangte, suangte, siampu puan leh, awm tuam a siat dingte a hon tawi uhi:
Namtui, khawnvak a dia, thau nilh theih leh, gimlim toh,
Israel suanten TOUPA kiang ah ut tak in thillat a hon tawi ua, pasal chih leh numei chih, nnasep tuamtuam teng a ding in, TOUPA'N Mosi khut a bawl ding a thu a piakte, a lungtang ua hon tawi ding a utsak a omten.
Huan Mosi in Israel suante kiang ah, En un, TOUPA'N Bezaleel, Uri tapa, Hur tapa, Juda nam a mi min in a sam hi;
Huchi in pilna in, theihtheihna in leh, theihna in leh, nnasep siamna chiteng in amah a dimsak hi;
Huchi a nnasep lamdang gelkhe ding, dangka-eng a thilhih ding leh, dangka thil hih ding leh daal thil hih ding in,
Suangsek ahte, lepkhawm ahte, sing gelh ahte, nnasep pilhuai chiteng bangpeuh bawl ding in.
Huan a sinsak theihna ding in a lungtang ah a koih a, amah leh, Aholiab, Ahisamak tapa, Dan nam a mi.Nnasep chiteng hih ding, gelhmi nnasep, nnasem pilmi nnasep sepdan siam mi nnasep, a dum, a sandup, a san-au, leh puan malngat hoihte hih ding in puan ganmi nnasep, na himhim hih mite nnasep nangawn leh, nnasep pilhuai ngaihsunte nnasep.
Nnasep chiteng hih ding, gelhmi nnasep, nnasem pilmi nnasep sepdan siam mi nnasep, a dum, a sandup, a san-au, leh puan malngat hoihte hih ding in puan ganmi nnasep, na himhim hih mite nnasep nangawn leh, nnasep pilhuai ngaihsunte nnasep.
Huchi in Bezaleel leh Aholiab in a hih ua, michih lungtang pil, amau a TOUPA'N mun siangthou a nnasepna dan chiteng bangchi bang a sep ding ahia chih thei dia pilna leh theihna a koihnate, TOUPA'N thu a piak tengteng bang in.
Huchi in Mosi in Bezaleel leh Aholiab leh, michih lungtang pil nei, a lungtang ua TOUPA'N pilna a koihnate, michih a lung ua nnasepna hong kuan a hih ding a tohthoh a omte ngei a sam ta hi:
Huan Mosi a kipan in thillat tengteng, Israel suanten mun siangthou a nnasepna ding a a hon tawi uh, huai nnasepna ding a la ua.
Huan zingsang teng in utthu a piak thillatte a kiang ah a hon tawi nalai uhi.
Huan mun siangthou a nnasep tengteng hih, mi pil tengteng, michih a thilhih a bawl ua kipan a hong pai ua;
Mosi kiang a thugen in, Miten nnasepna a sepna hunzah sang a tamzaw a hon tawi uh, chi in.
Huan Mosi in thupiak a pia a, giahbuk teng ah a tangkou pih ua, pasal hileh numei hileh mun siangthou a thillat ding in thilhih bawl neikei un, chi in.
Huchi in, mite hon tawi lou ding a kham in a om ta uhi.
Mun siangthou bawl ding a nnasepna khempeuh a ding in a van neihsa uh lah a kiching in, a tam lo ta ngal a.
A lak ua lungtang pil michih biakbuk nnasep hihten puan malngat koptah hoih puanzak sawm, a dum, a sandup, a san-au a bawl uh: khutsiam a hih cherubte toh huaite a bawl uh.
Puanzak khat dung lam tong sawmnih leh giat ahi, puanzak khat vai lam tong li; puanzak tengteng let lam kibang chiat ahi uh.
Huan puanzak ngate a kithuah in a khep hi.
Huan puanzak a dang ngate leng a khep a.
Huchi in a kithuahna ah mong khepna a kipan in puanzak khat gei ah a dum in bate a bawl; huchimah in a nihna khepna ah, puanzak dang gei chin ah a bawl hi.
Puanzak khat ah ba sawmnga a bawl a, a nihna kikhepna a puanzak gei ah ba sawmnga a bawl: bate a kizawn geihgeih in a om uhi.
Huan dangka-eng in kilhna sawmnga a bawl a, kilhnate in puanzakte a gawmkhawm: huchi in biakbuk khat a hong hi hi.
Huan puan inn biakbuk tung a ding in kel mul in puanzak a bawl a: huan sawm leh khat a bawl hi.
Puanzak khat dung lam tong sawmthuam ahi a, puanzak khat vai lam tong li ahi: puanzak sawm leh khatte a leh lam kibang vek uh ahi.
Huchi in puanzak ngate amau in a khep tuam a, puanzak gukte amau in khep tuam hi.
Huchi in a kikhepna ah puanzak mong chin ah ba sawmnga a bawl a, puanzak a nihna thuahna pen mong ah ba sawmnga a bawl hi
Khat a hih theihna ding in puan in kaihkhawmna ding in dal in kilhna sawmnga a bawl hi.
Puan in khuhna ding in belampa vun diahsan in a bawl a, hual tungah ngalvang vun in khuhna a bawl.
Huchi in singgi sing in biakbuk singpek ding a bawl a, tun thoh in.
Singpek sau lam tong sawm ahi, singpek zat lam tong khat leh a kim.
Singpek khat in atgek nih a nei, a kigamlatdan uh kikim in: huchi bang in biakbuk singpek tengteng a ding in a bawl.
Huchi in biakbuk a ding in singpek a bawl; sim lam sang a sim lam pang a ding in singpek sawmnih:
Singpek sawmnih nuai ah dangka-eng in kingakna khuakkuak sawmli a bawl; a atgek nihte a ding in singpek khat dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih, a atgek nih a ding in singpek dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih.
Huan biakbuk pang khat lam a ding in, a mal lam ning a om a ding in, singpek sawmnih a bawl,
A dangka-eng kingakna khuakkuak sawmlite toh; singpek khat dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih, huan singpek dang khat dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih.
Huchi in tum lam biakbuk pang ate ding in singpek nih a bawl.
A pang nihte ah biakbuk ningte a ding in singpek nih a bawl.
Huchi in a nuai ah a kithuah ua, huai a a tungah, sikkual khat ah a kikaikhawm: huchi bang in a ning tuaktuak ah a hih tuaktuak hi.
Huan singpek giat a om; a kingakna khuakkuak uh dangka bawl kingakna khuakkuak sawm leh guk ahi ua, singpek chih dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih.
Huan singgi sing chiangtawn a bawl; biakbuk pang khat a singpekte a ding in nga,
Biakbuk pang dang a singpekte a ding in chiang tawn nga, tum lam pang a biakbuk singpekte a ding in chiangtawn nga.
Huchi in chiangtawn laita pen singpekte khat a kipan a dang kap paisuak in a bawl hi.
Huchi in singpekte dangka-eng in a luan a, a dangka-eng sikkualte uh chiangtawn omna ding in a bawl a, chiangtawnte dangka-eng in a luan hi.
Huan a dum, a sandup, a san-au leh puan malngat koptah hoih in puankhai a bawl a: khutsiam tak in huai cherubte a bawl hi.
Huchi in huai ah singgi sing in khuam li a bawl, dangka-eng in a luan: a bannate uh dangka-eng a bawl ahi: huan huaite a ding in dangka in kingakna khuakkuak li a sung hi.
Huchi in biakbuk kongkhak a ding in a dum in, a sandup in, a san-au in leh puan malngat hoih koptah, phim a hih in puankhai a bawl a:Huan a khuam ngate a banna utoh: huchi in, a zingte uleh a puanduangte dangka-eng in a luan a: himahleh a kingakna khuakkuak ngate uh dal ahi.
Huan a khuam ngate a banna utoh: huchi in, a zingte uleh a puanduangte dangka-eng in a luan a: himahleh a kingakna khuakkuak ngate uh dal ahi.
Huan Bazaleel in singgi sing in bawm a bawl a: tong nih leh a kim a dung lam ahi a, huan tong khat leh a kim a vai lam ahi, tong khat leh a kim a san lam:
Huan dangka-eng tak in a sunglam leh a po lam a luan a, dangka-eng lal lukhu akim-avel in a bawlsak hi.
Huan dangka-eng sikkual li a sun sak a, a ning lite a bulh ding in: a pang khat a sikkual nih, a pang khat lam ah sikkual nih.
Huan singgi sing in chiang a bawl a huai dangka-eng in a luan a.
Huchi in chiangte bawm pang a sikkual sung ah, bawm puakna ding in a thun lut.
Huan dangka-eng tak in chitna tutphah a bawl: tong nih leh a kim a dung lam ahi a, tong khat leh a kim a vai lam ahi.
Dangka-eng in cherub khiak in huaite a bawl a, chitna tutphah mong nihte tuak ah;
Hiai lam pang mong ah cherub khat, huai lam pang mong ah cherub dang: chitna tutphah a kipan in a mong lang nihte ah cherubte a bawl hi.
Huan cherubte'n tunglam ah a khat uh a zak ua, chitna tutphah tunglam ah, a mai uh kingattuah in, a kha un a khuh ua; chitna tutphah lam ah cerubte mai a om hi.
Huchiin singgi sing in dohkan a bawl a: tong nih a dung lam ahi a, tong khat a vai lam, tong khat leh a kim a san lam:
Dangka-eng tak in a luan a, akim-avel in dangka-eng lal lukhu a bawl sak hi.
Huai lou in huai ah akim-avel in khutpek chia in a gei a bawl: akim-avel in huai ah a gei ding in dangka-eng lal lukhu a bawl hi.
Huchi in dangka-eng sikkual li a sung a, huan huai a a khe lite a om a ning lite tungah sikkualte a bulh.
A gei chin ah, dohkan puakna ding chiangte a ding in mun, sikkualte a om uhi.
Huan singgi sing in chiangte a bawl a, dohkan puakna ding in, dangka-eng in a luan hi.
Huan dohkan tung a om tui-um-belsuante a bawl a, a kuangte leh, a sikkeute leh, a noubemte leh, a khuhna ding a singte, dangka-eng tak in a bawl hi.
Huchi in khawnvak koihna dangka-eng tak in a bawl: nnasep hel in khawnvak koihna a bawl hi; akungpi, ahiang, a noubemte, a mumte, a pakte, kibang chiat in;
Huai a pangte a kipan in hiang guk a kakhia a; khanvak koihna hiang thum a pang khat a kipan in huan, a pang dang a kipan in khawnvak koihna hiang thum:
Noubem thum makha gah bang a bawl hiang khat ah, a mum leh a pak; huan noubem thum makha gah bang a bawl hiang dang ah, a mum leh a pak: huchi in hiang gukte teng ah khawnvak koihna a kipan in.
Huan khawnvak koihna makha gah bang a bawl noubem li a om, a mumte leh a pakte;
Huan kibang in hiang nihte dang ah mum khat, kibang in hiang nihte dang ah mum khat, huan kibang in hiang nihte dang ah mum khat, hiang gukte bang zel in a kakhia uhi.
A mumte uh leh a hingte kibang ahi ua: a vek un dangka-eng tak a nnasep hel ahi.
Huan a khawnvak sagihte, a meihalnate leh a meivu kuangte, dangka-eng tak in a bawl hi.
Dangka-eng tak talent khat in a bawl a, tui-um-belsuan teng toh.
Huan gimlim maitam singgi sing in a bwla: a dung lam tong khat ahi, a vai lam tong khat; kiptak a bawl ahi a; a san lam tong nih ahi; huai a a kibang vek uh.
Huchi in dangka-eng tak in a luan a, a tung leh akim-avel in a pangte, a kite: huai lou leng akim-avel in in dangka-eng lal lukhu a bawl sak hi.
Huan huai lai a lal lukhu nuai ah dangka-eng in sikkual nih a bawl sak a, a ning nihte kiang ah, a sik nihte tungah, a puakna ding chiangte omna ding in.
Huchi in singgi sing in chiangte a bawl a, huaite dangka-eng in a luan hi.Huchi in nilhtheih thau siangthou, gimlim namtui siangthou, damdawi mi hih bang in, a bawl.
Huchi in nilhtheih thau siangthou, gimlim namtui siangthou, damdawi mi hih bang in, a bawl.
Huchi in singgi sing in halmang thillat maitam a bawl a: a dung lam tong nga ahi a, a vai lam tong nga: kip tak a bawl ahi; a san lam tong thum.
A ning lite ah a ki a bawl a; huai a kite a kibang vek uh; dal in a luan hi.
A tui-um-belsuan tengteng, maitam, belte, vutluahte, salu kuangte, sa thuknate, leh meibelte: huai a tui-um-belsuante tengteng dal in a bawl hi.
Huan a laizang tak nuai ah a mong dang ah dal hakvang a maitam a ding in a bawl.
Chiangte omna ding in, dal hakvang mong lite a ding in sikkual li a sung.
Huchi in singgi sing chiang a bawl a, huaite dal in a luan hi.
Huan a puakna ding in, maitam pang a sikkualte sung ah chiangte a thun a; maitam singpek in a kohawm sak hi.
Huan dal in tuikuang leh dal in a khe a bawl a, numei kikhawm, kihoupihna puan inn kongkhak a kikhawmte, limlangte.
Huan huangsung a bawl a: sim lam pang sim lam ah huangsung puankhai, puan malngat hoih koptah, tong zakhat a om hi:
A khuamte uh sawmnih ahi ua, a dal kingakna khuakkuakte uh sawmnih; khuam a bannate leh a dangka puanduangte uh.
Huan a mal lam pang a ding in puankhaite tong za khat ahi ua, a khuamte uh sawmnih leh, a dal kingakna khuakkuakte uh sawmnih; khuamte a bannate leh dangka duangte.
Huan a tum lam pang a ding in tong sawmnga a sau puankhaite a om ua, a khuamte uh sawm leh a kingakna khuakkuak uh sawm; a khuamte a bannate leh a dangka duangte uh.
Huan a suah lam pang suah lam a ding in tong sawmnga.
Kongpi sik khat a puankhaite tong sawm leh tong nga ahi ua; a khuamte uh thum, a kingakna khuakkuakte uh thum;
Hiai lam sang leh huai lam sang a, huangsung kongpi sik khat lam pang a ding in puankhai tong sawm leh tong nga ahi uh; a khuamte uh thum, a kingakna khuakkuakte uh thum.
Huangsung akim-avel a puankhai tengteng puan malngat koptah hoih ahi uhi.
Khuam a kingakna khuakkuakte dal ahi ua; khuam a bannate leh a danka duangte uh; dangka a a zingte uh luanna; huangsung khuam tengteng dangka in a duang a kibawl hi.
Huangsuang kongpi a puankhai phim a khui, a dum, a sandup, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih koptah ahi: huan a dung lam tong sawmnih ahi a, a pek san lam tong nga ahi, huangsung puankhaite toh kituak.
Huan a khuamte uh li ahi a, a kingakna khuakkuakte li, dal a bawl: a bannate dangka a bawl, dangka a bawl a zingte leh a dung luante.
Huan biakbuk a pinte tengteng leh huangsung kimvel a pinte dal ahi uh.
Hiai biakbuk van kim, sim a a om bang in, theihpihna biakbuk ate ngei, Levite nnasep na a ding a, siampu Aron a dia tapa, Ithamar khut a bawl, Mosi thupiak bang zel in.
Huchi in Bazaleel, Uri tapa, Hur tapa, Juda nam a mi in TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak tengteng a bawl ta hi.
Amah toh sem gelhsiam, nnasep siam, a dum leh, a sandup leh san-au leh puan malngat a zebawl siam, Holiab, Ahsamak tapa, Dan nam a mi ahi.
Dangka-eng tengteng mun siangthou a nnasepna teng a sepna ding a zat, thillat dangka-eng nangawn, talent sawmnih leh kua leh, sekel, mun siangthou a sekel dungzui in, za sagih leh sawmthum ahi.
Huan dangka khawmpi a simte a talent zakhat leh sekel sangkhat leh zasagih leh sawmguk ahi, mun siangthou a sekel dungzui in.
Michih a ding in beka khat, huai bel, sekel kim ahi, mun siangthou a sekel dungzui in, michih siam omte a ding in, kum sawmnih a upa leh a tung lam, pasal nuaiguk leh sangthum leh zanga leh sawmngate.
Huan dangka talent za mun siangthou a kingakna khuakkuak a ding in a sung ua, puanzak a kingakna khuakkuakte toh; talent zakhat a dia kingakna khuakkuak zakhat, kingakna khuakkuak khat a dia talent khat zel.
Huan sekel sangkhat za sagih leh sawmsagih leh nga in khuam a bannate a bawl a, a zingte luan in a kimatsak hi.
Huan thillat dal talent sawmsagih leh, sekel sangnih leh zali ahi.
Huaite in kihoupihna puan in kongkhak kingakna khuakkuak a bawl a, dal maitam leh dal hakvang a bawl, maitam tui-um-belsuan tengteng toh.Huangsung kimvel a kingakna khuakkuak, huangsung kongpi kingakna khuakkuak, biakbuk pinte tengteng leh, huangsung kimvel a pinte tengteng leng.
Huangsung kimvel a kingakna khuakkuak, huangsung kongpi kingakna khuakkuak, biakbuk pinte tengteng leh, huangsung kimvel a pinte tengteng leng.
Huan a dum leh a sandup leh a san-au in, nnasepna puan a bawl ua, mun siangthou a nnasep hih ding in, Aron a ding in puan siangthou a bawl uh; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan a dum leh, a sandup leh, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih koptah in dangka-eng in siampu puan a bawl a.
Huchi in dangka-eng kuang pain a sek ua, sikkhau in a bawl uh, a dum leh, a sandup leh, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih a, nnasep siam a sepna ding in.
A khep khawm na ding in, liangbelh a bawl ua: a gei tuak ah a kikhep khawm hi.
Huan, a tung a om, a siampu puanak kawnggak lamdang leng a kibang mah in ahi, huai a nnasep dungzui in; dangka-eng, a dum, a sandup, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih koptah: TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak dungzui in.
Huan onik suang a bawl ua, chiamtehna gelhna a gelh, dangka-eng bulhna a bulh in, Israel suante min bangzel in.
Huan huaite siampu puanak liangzang ah a koih a, Israel suante a ding a theih gigena suangte a hihna ding un: TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huchi in khutsiam tak in awmtuam a bawl a, siampu puan bawl bang in; dangka-eng a dum leh a san leh a sandup leh, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih koptah in.
Adung-avai kikim ahi; awmtuamna thuahnih in a bawl uh; a sau lam khap khat ahi a, a vai lam khap khat, thuahnih ahi.
Huai ah suang vual li in a siat ua; a vual khatna sardi suang, topazi suang leh karbunkil suang: hiai a vual khatna ahi.
A vual nihna, emeraldi suang, sapphir suang leh suangmantam ahi.
Huan a vual thumna, liguri suang, agate suang leh amithist suang ahi.
A vual lina, beril suang, onik suang leh Jasper suang: a phuhna uah dangka-eng bulhna a siatlut ahi uh.
Suangte Israel suante min bangzel in ahi, a hihzah uh bang zel in, sawm leh nih, chiamtehna gelhnate bang in, michih a min toh nam sawm leh nihte bangzel in.
Huan a mongte ah awmtuam tungah khainiang, dangka-eng tak pakkhia bawl in a bawl uhi.
Huchi in dangka-eng bulhna nih a bawl ua, dangka-eng sikkual nih toh: awmtuamna mong nihte ah sikkual nihte a koih uhi.
Huchi in awmtuam mongte ah sikkual nihte sung ah dangka-eng khainiang nihte pak bang a bawl a thun uh.
Huan pak khainiang nihte mong nihte suangmantam bulhna nihte ah a koih ua, a ma ah siampu puan liangzang thuahna ah a koih uhi.
Dangka-eng in sikkual nih a bawl ua, awmtuamna mong nihte tungah a koih ua, a gei ah, siampu puanak sung lam pang a om ah.
Huchi in dangka-eng sukkual nih dang a bawl ua, nuai lam ah siampu puanak mong nihte a koih uh, a ma lam sang ah, a kikhepna zawn tak ah, siampu puanak kawnggak lamdang tungah.
Huan gakna dum in siampu puanak sikkualte ah a sikkualte ah a kikkualte in awmtuam a gakden ua, siampu puanak a kipan a awmtuam a kiphel theihlouhna ding in; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Siampu puanak puanaktual gatthoh, a dum vek ahi;
Puanaktual laitak ah vang a om a, sikpuanak ban bei vang bang in, a keklouhna ding a, a vang kimvel a kaihna khau bang in.
Huan puanaktual mongte ah pomgranet, a dum, a sandup, a san-au leh puan malngat hoih in a bawl uh.
Huchi in dangka-eng tak in dak a bawl ua, dakte puanaktual mong a pomgranette kikal ah, pomgranette kikal zel ah a khaisuak uhi;
Dak leh pomgranet, dak leh pomgranet, nnasepna ding a puanaktual mong kimvel a; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan Aron a ding leh a tate a ding in puan malngat puanak tung gatthoh a bawl ua,
Puan malngat hoih in lukhu leh puan malngat hoih in lutuam leh puan malngat hoih koptah in puan pheituam gek a bawl uhi.
Huan kawnggak puan malngat hoih koptah, a dum, a sandup, a san-au, khuithoh in a bawl ua: TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huchi in dangka-eng tak in lal lukhu siangthou kuang a bawl ua, a tungah laigelh, chiamtehna gelhnate bang in, TOUPA LAM A SIANGTHOUNA, chih a gelh uhi.
Huan huai ah khauduang dum a khih ua, lukhu tung lam gak touh pek ding in; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Hichi bang in khawmpite puan inn biakbuk nnasep tengteng bang zel in a hih ta ua, huchi in a hih ta uhi.
Huchi in puan inn Mosi kiang ah a hon tawi ua, puan inn, leh a van tengteng, a kibatnate, a singpekte, achiangte leh, a khuamte leh a kingakna khuakkuakte;
A khuhna belampa vun diahsan leh, a khuhna ngalvang vun leh, a khuhna puanzak;
Theihpihna bawm leh, achiangte leh, chitna tutphah;
Dohkan leh, a tui-um-belsuante tengteng leh tanghou sawm leh nihte;
Khanvak koihna tak, khawnvakte ngei, leh a tui-um-belsuan tengteng leh khawnvak a dia thau;
Dangka-eng maitam leh, nilhtheih thau leh, gimlim leh, puan in kong a ding a puankhai;
Dal maitam, a dal hakvang, achiante, leh a tui-um-belsuan tengteng tuikuang leh a khe;
Huangsung puankhaite, a khuamte leh, a kingakna khuakkuakte, leh huangsung kongpi puankhai, a khaute, a pinte, leh biakbuk nnasepna tui-um-belsuante tengteng, kihoupihna puan inn a ding a:
Mun siangthou a nnasepna hihna ding a nnasepna puan, hoih tak a bawlte, siampu Aron a ding a puan siangthoute leh, a tapate puante, siampu nnasepna mun a nnasepna ding.
TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in, huchi bang in Israel suante'n nna tengteng a hih uhi.Huan Mosi in nnasep tengteng a en a, huan, ngai in TOUPA thupiak bang in a hih uh, huchi bang tak in a hih ta uhi: huchi in Mosi in huaite a vualzawl ta hi.
Huan Mosi in nnasep tengteng a en a, huan, ngai in TOUPA thupiak bang in a hih uh, huchi bang tak in a hih ta uhi: huchi in Mosi in huaite a vualzawl ta hi.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah thu a gen a,
Kha masa pen a ni masa pen kihoupihna puan inn biakbuk na ding sak ta ding.
Huan huai sung ah theihpihna bawm na koih dia, bawm puanzak in na khuh ding hi.
Huan dohkan na la lut dia, a tungah thil a kizomzom a koih dingte a kizom in na koih ding; huan khawnvak koihna na la lut dia, a khawnvakte na de ding hi.
Theihpihna bawm ma ah gimlim a ding a dangka-eng maitam na koih dia, kongkhak puankhai biakbuk ah na koih ding hi.
Kihoupihna puan inn biakbuk kongkhak ma ah halmang thillat maitam na koih ding hi.
Huan kihoupihna puan inn leh maitam kikal ah tuikuang na koih dia, huai ah tui na koih ding hi.
Akim-avel in huangsung na bawl ding a, huangsuang kongpi ah puankhai na khai dingtou ding hi.
Huan thaunilh na la dia, biakbuk na nilh ding, huai sung a om tengteng toh, na hih siangthou dia, huai a tui-um-belsuan tengteng: huchi in a siangthou ding hi.
Halmang thillat maitam na nilh ding, a tui-um-belsuan tengteng toh, maitam na siangthou sak ding: huchi in maitam siangthou penpen ahi ding hi.
Huan tuikuang leh a khe na nilh dia, na siang sak ding.
Huan kihoupihna puan in kongkhak ah Aron leh a tapate na hon pi dia, tui in na sawp ding hi.
Huan Aron puan siangthoute na silhsak dia, na nilh dia, na siangthousak ding; siampu nnasepna mun a ka nna a sep theihna ding in.
Huan a tapate non tonpih dia, puanak tung na silhsak ding hi:
A pa uh na nilh bang in amau siampu nnasepna mun a ka nna a sep theihna ding un na nilh ding hi: a thaunilhna uh akhang-akhang ua siampu hihna a hih taktak ding ziak in, chi in.
Tuachi bang in Mosi in a hih ta: TOUPA'N amah thu a piak bangzel in, huchi bang in a hih ta hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, a kum nihna a kha masa pen, a kha a ni masa pen ni in, biakbuk dinsak in a om ta hi.
Huchi in Mosi in biakbuk a dingsak ta a, a kingakna khuakkuakte a hen a, a singpekte a tung a, achiangte a thunlut a, a khuamte a ding sak hi.
Huan biakbuk tungah puan inn a zalh ta, a tung lam ah puan inn khuhna a koih; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huchi in theihpihna a la a bawm sung ah a koih a, chiangte bawm tungah a koih, huchi in bawm tung lam ah chitna tutphah a koih hi:
Huan bawm biakbuk sung ah a tawilut a, khuhna puanzak a zak ta, theihpihna bawm a khuh hi; TOUPA'N Mosi thu apiak bang in.
Huan kihoupihna puan inn sung ah dohkan a koih a, biakbuk pang mal lam, puanzak po lam ah.
Huchi in TOUPA ma ah dohkan tungah tanghoute kizom in a koih; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan kihoupihna puan inn sung ah khawnvak koihna a koih a, dohkan zawn ah, biakbuk sik sim lam pang ah.
Huchi in TOUPA ma ah khawnvakte a de ta hi; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan paunzak ma ah kihoupihna puan inn sung ah dangka-eng maitam a koih:
Huai tungah namtui a hal: TOUPA'N Mosi thu a pak bangin.
Huan Biakbuk kongkhak ah puankhai a khai hi.
Huchi in kihoupihna puan inn biakbuk kongkhak kiang ah halmang thillat leh tangbuang thillat a lan; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan kihoupihna puan inn leh maitam kikal ah tuikuang a koih a, huai ah tui a koih a, kisawpna ding in.
Huchi in Mosi leh Aron leh a tapate un a khutte uh leh a khepekte uh huai ah a sawp uh;
Kihoupihna puan inn sung a a hoh ua, maitam kiang a a hong pai nai ua a kisawp uh; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan biakbuk leh maitam kimvel in huangsung a bawl a, huangsung kongpi puankhaite a khaita hi.
Huchi bang in Mosi in nnasep a zou ta hi.
Huailai in meipi in kihoupihna a tuam a, TOUPA thupina in biakbuk a dimsak hi.
Huchi in kihoupihna puan inn sung ah Mosi a lut thei ta kei, a tung a meipi a kai ziak in leh, TOUPA thupina in biakbuk a dimsak ziak in.
Huan biakbuk tung a kipan meipi laktouh a a om chiang in, Israel suante a khualzinna uah mal lam ah a paizel uhi:
Himahleh meipi laktouh a a om louh chiang, kilaktouh louh ni in a zin kei uh.TOUPA meipi sun chiang a biakbuk tung a a om a, zan chiang a biakbuk tung a mei, a zin sung teng ua Israel innkuanpihte tengteng mitmuh a a om ziak in.
TOUPA meipi sun chiang a biakbuk tung a a om a, zan chiang a biakbuk tung a mei, a zin sung teng ua Israel innkuanpihte tengteng mitmuh a a om ziak in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a sam a, kihoupihna puan inn a kipan in a houpih a,
Israel suante houph inla, a kiang uah, Na lak ua kuapeuh in thillat TOUPA kiang a na lat un, gan, bawng hon leh belam hon lak ate, na lat ding uh ahi.
A thillat pen bawng hon lak ate, haltum thillat a hih leh a pa, gensiatbei a lat ding ahi: amah TOUPA ma a pom a hih theihna ding in kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul a lat ding ahi
Huan, haltum thillat lu tungah a khut a koih ding a; huchi in amah a ding in lemna bawlna ding in pomsak ahi ding.
Huan, TOUPA ma ah bawngpa a gou ding a; huan, Aron tapa, siampute'n sisan a lan ding ua, kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul a maitam sisan in a theh ding uh ahi.
Huan, haltum thillat a lip ding a, a sem ding ahi.
Huan, siampu Aron tapate'n maitam ah mei a koih ding ua, mei tungah sing achiangkhawm ding uh:
Huan, Aron tapa, siampute'n sabakte, a lute, a thaute maitam a mei tungah sing ah kilawmtak in a koih ding uh:
A sungkuate leh a khete bel tui in a sil ding: siampu in TOUPA a ding gimlim tak, mei a lat haltum thillat ding in a pum in maitam ah a hal ding ahi.
Huan, a thillat haltum thillat ding a gan hon lak ate, belam hiam, kel hiam a hih leh, a pa, gensiatbei a lat ding ahi.
Huan, maitam sik, mal lam pang ah TOUPA ma ah a gou ding a: huan, Aron tapa, siampute'n maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uh ahi.
Huan, a sem ding a, alu toh, a thau toh; huan, siampu in maitam tung a mei tung a sing ah a koih hoih ding:
A sungkuate leh a khete bel tui in a sil ding: huan, a pum in siampu in a lan ding a, maitam ah a hal ding ahi: TOUPA a ding a gimlim tak, mei a lat haltum thillat ahi.
Huan, TOUPA a dia thillat vasa lam haltum thillat a hihleh, a thillat ah vakhute hiam, vapal noute hiam a lat ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in maitam ah a hon tawi ding a, a lu a hektan ding a, maitam ah a hal ding; huan, a sisan maitam pang ah a takkang sak ding;
Huan, a gongkholh a mul toh a pai ding a, maitam kiang, suah lam pang a meivu koihna mun ah a pai ding:Huan, a khate a bottol ding a, a tak botzak lou in: huan, siampu in maitam ah, mei tungah a hal ding; huai bel TOUPA a ding a gimlim tak, mei a lat haltum thillat ahi.
Huan, a khate a bottol ding a, a tak botzak lou in: huan, siampu in maitam ah, mei tungah a hal ding; huai bel TOUPA a ding a gimlim tak, mei a lat haltum thillat ahi.
Kuapeuh thillat, tangbuang thillat TOUPA kiang a lat chiang in, a thillat tangbuang nel dimdem ahi ding; sathau a buak ding a, a tungah begaw a koih lai ding hi
Huan, Aron tapa, siampute kiang ah a papih ding a: huan, aman a pham khat in huai a tangbuang nel dimdem, a sathau toh, a begaw tengteng toh a lakhe ding; huan, siampu in maitam tungah theih gigena, TOUPA a ding in gimlim tak, mei a thillat ding in a hal ding:
Huan, tangbuang thillat lak a bangte Aron leh a tapate a ding ahi ding: huai bel TOUPA a ding a mei a thillatte a thil siangthou tak khat ahi hi.
Huan, tangbuang thillat, a kanna a kan thillat na lat leh, tangbuang nel dimdem, sathau a mek silngou hel louh tanghou hiam, sathau a zut, silngou hel louh tanghou pei pa hiam ahi ding hi.
Huan, na thillat, kuang a kan tangbuang thillat a hihleh, silngou hel louh, sathau a mek, tangbuang nel dimdem ahi ding ahi.
Na phelkhap ding a, sathau a na buah ding ahi: huai bel tangbuang thillat ahi
Huan, na thillat kan bel a kan, tangbuang thillat a hih leh tangbuang nel dimdem leh sathau a bawl ahi ding hi.
Huan, huai thil a bawl tangbuang thillat TOUPA kiang ah na hon tawi dia: huai bel siampu kiang a lat ahi ding a, aman maitam ah a hon paipih ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in tangbuang thillat a kipan theih gigena pen a lakhe ding a, maitam ah a hal ding: huai bel TOUPA a ding a gimlim tak, mei a thillat ahi.
Huan, tangbuang thillat lak bangte pen Aron leh a tapate a tuam ding ahi dia: huai bel TOUPA a ding a mei a thillatte siangthou pen ahi.
Tangbuang thillat himhim, Toupa kianga na lat ding uh silngou he a bawl ding ahi kei hi: Toupa adia mei a thillat ah silngou hiam, khuaizu hiam himhim na hel ding uh ahi kei.
Gah masa pen thillat bang in Toupa kiang ah na lan ding uh: gimlim ding in maitam a koih ding ahi kei hi.
Huan, na tangbuang thillat ah na Pathian thukhun chi na maih ding ahi kei: Na thillat tengteng ah chi na lat tel ding ahi hi.
Huan, gah masa pen tangbuang thillat Toupa kiang a na lat leh na buh thak masa pen ate, tangbuang thillat ding in thanghou pek na lan ding ahi.
Huan, sathau na buak ding a, a tungah begaw na koih dinga hiHuan, siampu in huai a theih gige, buh suk zan bangzah hiam toh, begaw tengteng toh a hal ding ahi: huai bel Toupa dinga mei a thillat ahi.
Huan, siampu in huai a theih gige, buh suk zan bangzah hiam toh, begaw tengteng toh a hal ding ahi: huai bel Toupa dinga mei a thillat ahi.
Huan, a thillat lemna thillat kithoihna a hih a, bawng hon lak a a lat leh, TOUPA ma ah gensiatbei a lan ding ahi.
A thillat lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, kihoupihna puan inn kongpibul ah a gou ding: huan, Aron tapa, siampute'n maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uh ahi.
Huan, lemna thillat kithoihna a TOUPA a dia mei a thillat a lan ding a: a sungkua thau leh a gilboh tengteng leh,
A kal nihte leh a tuam thau a phuk chin a om leh a sin tuam lam, a kalte toh kigawm in a suah ding ahi.
Huan, Aron tapate'n maitam ah, mei a sing om tung a haltum thillat tungah a hal ding uhi: huai bel TOUPA a ding a gimlim tak, mei a thillat ahi.
Huan, lemna thillat kithoihna a TOUPA a ding a a thillat belam hon lak ate a hihleh, a nu leng hita hen aw, a pa zong hita leh, gensiatbei a lat ding ahi.
A thillat a belamnou a lat leh TOUPA ma ah a lan ding a:
A thillat lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, kihoupihna puan inn kongpi ah a gou ding: huan, Aron tapate'n maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uhi.
Huchi in lemna thillat kithoihna ate, TOUPA ding a mei a thillat a lan ding a: a thaute, a mei thau mahmah a tawn in, a kawngguh tan in a la vek ding a; a sungkua thaute, a gil boh tengtengte,
A kal nihte leh a phuk chin a om a tuam thau leh a sin tuam a lap, a kalte nangawn toh a suah ding ahi
Huan, siampu in huai maitam ah a hal ding ahi: huai bel TOUPA a dia mei a thillat nek ding annsiah ahi.
A thillat kel a hih leh TOUPA ma ah a lan ding a:
Huan, a lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, kihoupihna puan in kong ah a gou ding a; huan, Aron tapate'n maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uh ahi.
Huan, huai a a thillat pen a lan ding a, TOUPA a dia mei a thillat tak; a sungkua thau leh a gilboh tengteng leh,
A kal nihte leh a phuk chin a om a tuam thau leh a sin tuam lam, a kalte toh nangawn in a suah ding ahi.
Huan, huai pen siampu in maitam ah a hal ding ahi: gimlim ding a mei a thillat nek ding annsiah ahi a; a thau tengteng TOUPA a tuam ahi.Sathau hiam, sisan hiam na ne ding uh ahi kei chih na suante uh ding a banban in na omna phot uah khantawn a thuseh ahi ding, chi in, chi in.
Sathau hiam, sisan hiam na ne ding uh ahi kei chih na suante uh ding a banban in na omna phot uah khantawn a thuseh ahi ding, chi in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, TOUPA'N thil hih louh ding a thu a piakte, a bangpeuh leng min na hihkhial kha in, a bangpeuh leng na hita leh,
Sathaunilh siampu in mipite tung a mohpaihna tungsak a a hihkhelh leh, a thilhih khelhsa khelh thoihna ding in TOUPA kiang ah bawng tuai gensiatbei, khelh thoihna ding in lan hen.
Bawng pen kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah TOUPA ma ah hon kai ding a, bawng lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, TOUPA ma ah huai bawng a gou ding ahi.
Huan, sathau nilh siampu in bawng sisan bangzah hiam a la ding a, kihoupihna puan inn ah a hon tawi ding a:
Huan, siampu in sisan ah a khut a diah ding a, a khenkhat TOUPA ma ah, mun siangthou puanzak bul ah sagihvei a theh ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in TOUPA ma ah kihoupihna puan inn a gimlim lim tak maitam kite ah sisan pen bangzah hiam a tat ding: huan, bawng sisan tengteng kihoupihna puan in kongpi kiang a haltum thillat maitam bul ah a sungkhe ding ahi.
Huan, khelh thoihna bawng thau tengteng a la vek ding a; a sungkua thau leh a gilboh tengteng,
A kal nihte leh a phuk chin a om a tuam thau leh a sin tuam a lam, a kal nihte nangawn toh a suah ding a;
Lemna thillat kithoihna bawngpa a kipan lak bang in, huan siampu in haltum thillat maitam ah a hal ding ahi.
Huan bawng vunte, a sa tengtengte, a lu toh, a khete toh, a sungkuate a ekte,
A bawng pumpi toh dainawl lam mun siang ah, vut paihna ah a paipih ding a, sing tungah a hal ding: vut paihna ah a hal ding hi.
Huan, Israel mipi tengteng in a sukhelh khak ua, mipi mitmuh a sel a hih a, TOUPA'N hih louh ding a thu a piakte, a bang mahmah a hih ua,
Siamlouh a tan ua, a thil gilou hih uh theih khiak a hong hih leh, mipi in khelh thoihna ding in bawng tuai a lan ding ua, kihoupihna puan inn kong ah a hong kai ding uh ahi.
Huan, nite upaten TOUPA maah bawng lu tungah a khut uh a koih ding ua; huan bawng tuh Toupa maah goh ding ahi.
Huan, sathau nilh siampu in kihoupihna puan inn ah bawng sisan bangzah hiam a hon tawi ding a:
Huan, siampu in sisan ah a khutzung a diah ding a, puanzak bul ah TOUPA ma ah sagih vei a theh ding ahi.
Huan, sisan pen kihoupihna puan inn a TOUPA ma ah maitam ki ah tamlou a tat ding a, sisan tengteng kihoupihna puan inn kongpi kiang a haltum thillat maitam bul ah a sungkhe ding ahi.
Huan, a thau tengteng a la vek ding a, maitam ah a hal ding.
Huchi bang in bawng tuh a hih ding a; khelh thoihna bawng a hih bang geih in hiai leng a hih ding ahi: huan, siampu in kilepna a bawl ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding uh.
Huan, bawng tuh dainawl lam ah a paipih ding a, bawng masa a hal bang in a hal ding ahi: huai bel mipi a dia khelh thoihna ahi.
Vaihawmtu in thil a hihkhelh a, TOUPA a Pathian in hih louh ding a thu a piak tengteng a bangmah a hih khak a, siamlouh a tan a,
A thil gilou hih theihsak a hih leh a thillat ding in kel, a pa, gensiatbei a hon kai ding a:
Kel lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, TOUPA ma ah haltum thillat a goh zel na uah a gou ding ahi: huai bel khelh thoihna ahi.
Huan, siampu in khelh thoihna sisan a khut zung in tamlou a pik ding a, haltum thillat maitam kite ah a tat ding a, haltum thillat maitam bul ah a sisan a sungkhe ding ahi.
Huan, a thau tengteng lemna thillat kithoihna thau a hal bang in maitam ah a hal ding ahi: huan, a khelhna tungthu ah siampu in kilepna a bawl saang ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding hi.
Huan, vantang lak a mi a kuamahmah in TOUPA'N hih louh ding a thu a piakte a bangmahmah hihkhial ka in, siamlouh na tang ta leh,
A thil gilou hih theihsak a hihleh a thillat ding in kel, a nu gensiatbei, a thilhih khelhsa khelh thoihna ding in a honkai ding ahi.
Khelh thoihna lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, haltum thillat na mun ah khelh thoihna a gou ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in sisan a khutzung in tamlou a pik ding a, haltum thillat maitam kite ah a tat ding a, a sisan tengteng maitam bul ah a sungkhe ding ahi.
Huan, a thau tengteng lemna thillat kithoihna thau lak bang un a la vek ding a; huan, siampu in TOUPA a ding in gimlim ding in maitam ah a hal ding ahi; huan, siampu in kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Huan, khelh thoihna ding a thillat ding belamnou a hon tawi leh, a nu, gensiatbei a hon tawi ding ahi.
Khelh thoihna lu tungah a khut a koih ding a, haltum thillat a gohna uah khelhna thoihna ding in a gou ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in khelh thoihna sisan a khutzung in tamlou a pik ding a, haltum thillat maitam kite ah a tat ding a, sisan tengteng maitam bul ah a sungkhe ding ahi:Huan, a thau tengteng, belamnou thau, lemna thillat kithoihna a lak bang in a la vek ding a; huan, siampu in TOUPA a ding a mei a thillat bang in maitam ah a hal ding ahi: huan, siampu in a thil hihkhelhsa tung thu ah a kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Huan, a thau tengteng, belamnou thau, lemna thillat kithoihna a lak bang in a la vek ding a; huan, siampu in TOUPA a ding a mei a thillat bang in maitam ah a hal ding ahi: huan, siampu in a thil hihkhelhsa tung thu ah a kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Kuapeuh a thil muh hiam, a thil zak hiam a theihpih a hih a, kichiamsakmi aw a zak a leng gen nuamlou a thil a hihkhelh leh a thulimlouhna moh a po ding:
Huan, kuapeuh in thil siangthoulou himhim, gam sa sianglou luang hiam, gan sianglou luang hiam, a vak a vak thoh ganhing sianglou luang hiam theilou a leng a khoih a, a hong sianthou kei leh siamlouh a tang ding:
Huan, mihing leng a sianthou louhna bangpeuh hihen aw, a sianthou louhna theilou a leng a khoih leh a theihkhiak hun chiang in siamlouh a tang ding:
Huan, kuapeuh in thil hoihlou hiam, thil hoih hiam hih ding a kam a theilou a leng a kichiam zialzial leh, akoi-abang hitaleh, a kichiam zialzialna theihkhiak hun chiang in siamlouh a tang ding:
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, hiai thilte khat a leng siamlouh a tan chiang in a khelhna a phuang ding a;
Khelh thoihna ding in belam hon lak a a nu, belamnou hiam, kel hiam a thil hihkhelhsa man ding in TOUPA kiang a lan ding in a khelhna thoihna a hon tawi ding a; siampu in a khelh tungthu ah kilepna a bawlsak ding.
A neih in belamnou a chinzoh kei leh TOUPA kiang a lat ding in a khelhman ding in a khelh thoihna ding in vakhu nih hiam, palva nou hiam a hon tawi ding ahi; khat khelh thoihna ding in, khat haltum thillat ding in.
Siampu kiang ah a hon tawi ding a, aman khelh thoihna ding in a lan masa ding a, phelsuahlou in a lu a ngawng ah a hektan ding hi:
Khelh thoihna sisan maitam pang ah tamlou a theh ding a, huan sisan omlai teng maitam bul ah a takkang sak ding uh ahi: huaibel khelh thoihna ahi.
Huan, a khatpen dan dungzu in haltum thillat ding in a lan ding a: huan, siampu in a thil hihkhelhsa tungthu ah lemna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Ahihhang in a neih in vakhu nih hiam, vapal nou nih hiam a chin kei leh a khelhman thillat ding in khelh thoihna ding in tangbuang nel dimdem, epha mun sawm a khen a mun khat a hon tawi ding a; sathau a buak ding ahi kei a, a tungah begaw a koih ding ahi sam kei a, khelh thoihna a hih ziak in.
Siampu kiang ah a hon tawi ding a, siampu in theih gigena ding in a pham khat a la ding a, maitam tungah TOUPA a di'n mei a thillat bang in a hal ding ahi: Huaibel tatlek-thoihna ahi.
Huan, huai thil lak a bangmah leng a hihkhelhsa tungtang thu ah siampu in kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding: a omlai teng tangbuang thillat bangmah in siampu tantuam ding, chi in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Kuapeuh in thil a hihkhelh a, TOUPA thil siangthoute tung a a khelh khak leh, a khelh thoihna, belam hon lak a belampa gensiatbei, mun siangthou sekel bang in, dangka sekel bangzah hiam gun a na ngaih, tatleek kithoihna ding in TOUPA ding in a honkai ding ahi:
Huan, thil siangthou tung a na hih dik louh khitsa tuh a din ding a, a mun nga a khen a mun khat a behlap ding a, siampu a pe ding ahi; huan, siampu in tatleek thoihna belampa in kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Kuapeuh in thil a hihkhelh a, hih louh ding a TOUPA'N thu a piakte a bangmah leng a hih leh, theikei mahleh siamlouh a tang himhim ding a, a thulimlouhna moh a po ding.
Huan, belam hon lak a belampa gensiatbei, na ngaih a kilawm hun, tatleek thoihna ding in siampu kiang a hon kai ding ahi: huan, siampu in theilou a a hihkhelh khak tungthu ah kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding:Huaibel tatleek thoihna ahi: TOUPA ma ah siamlouh tang ahi mahmah ahi, chi in.
Huaibel tatleek thoihna ahi: TOUPA ma ah siamlouh tang ahi mahmah ahi, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Kuapeuh in thil hihkhial in, TOUPA thu tatleek khum taleh, sum kepsak thu ah hiam, leep thu ah hiam, guktaak thu ah hiam a innsak-innkhangte khem in, a innsak-innkhangte zuaubawl taleh,
Ahihkei leh, van mangte mu in, khem in, zuau in kichiam leh, hiai thil tengteng a bangmah leng a hihkhelh leh,
Hichi ahi ding a, a khial ngei a hih a, siamlouh a tan leh a vangukte, khem a a thil lakte, a kiang a sum kepsakte, van mang a topte,
