Zuau a a kichiamna thil bangpeuh leng a ditnawn ding ahi; a kim sipsip in a din nawn vek ding a, a mun nga a khen a mun khat a val in a behlap ding: siamlouh a tan ni in, a neitu a pe ding ahi.
A tatleek thoihna, belam hon lak a, na ngaih a kilawm hun, belampa gensiatbei tatleek thoihna ding in TOUPA ding in siampu kiang ah a honkai ding ahi:
Huan, siampu in TOUPA ma ah kilepna a bawlsak ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding, siamlouh tanna ding a thil a hih peuhmah tungthu ahte, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Aron leh a tapate kiang ah, Hiai haltum thillat dan ding ahi: haltum thillat pen maitam tung a a halna ah zankhua in a zingchiang tan in a om ding a; huan, maitam a mei pen a am nilouh ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in a puanmalngat puansilh a silh ding a, a sa khuhna ding in a puan malngat khekol a teng ding a; huan, maitam a haltum thillat kang vute a la ding a, maitam pang ah a koih ding ahi.
Huan, a puansilh siangthou a suah ding a, puansilh dang a silh ding a, a vute dainawl lam mun siang ah a paipih ding ahi.
Huan, maitam tung a mei ap sak nilouh ahi ding a, a mit ding ahi kei; huan, siampu in zingsang teng in sing a khul ding a, haltum thillat a koih hoih ding a, huai ah lepna thillatte thau a hal ding ahi.
Maitam ah mei a am gige ding a, a mit ding ahi kei.
Huan, hiai hi tangbuang thillat dan ding ahi: Aron tapate'n maitam bul ah, TOUPA ma ah a lat ding uh ahi.
Huan, aman a pham khat in tangbuang thillat tung a begaw tengteng a lakhe ding a, huaibel TOUPA ding a gimlim tak, theih gigena ding in maitam ah a hal ding ahi.
Huan, lak bangte Aron leh a tapate'n a nek ding uh ahi: huaibel mun siangthou ah silngou soh louh in a ne ding ua; kihoupihna puan inn kongtual ah a ne ding uh ahi.
Silngou soh a kan ding ahi kei.
Mei a ka thillat a a tantuan ding ua ka piak ahi; huaibel khelh thoihna leh tatleek thoihna bang a thil siangthou tak ahi.
Aron suan pasal tengteng in a nek ding uh ahi.
Huaibel TOUPA a dia haltum thillat tungthu a na suante zel uh tan a khantawn dan ahi ding: kuapeuh huaite khoih peuhmah hihtuam ahi ding uh, chi in thu pia in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Sathau nilh a a om ni a Aron leh a tapate'n TOUPA kiang a a lat ding uh thillat pen hiai ahi; tangbuang thillat dia lat zel ding, tangbuang nel dimdem epha sawm a khen a mun khat, zingsang in a kim, nitak in a kim.
A kidiah suak khit chiang in na hon la lut ding a: a kitam nengneng in tangbuang thillat TOUPA a ding in gimlim di'n na lan ding ahi.
A tapate lak a a sik a pangmi, sathau nilh siampu in a lan ding a: khantawn dan ding bang in TOUPA a di'n haltum vek ahi ding ahi.
Siampu tangbuang thillat peuhmah haltum vek ding ahi a, nek hetlouh ding ahi, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Hiai hi khelh thoihna dan ding ahi: haltum thillat goh zelna ah khelh thoihna leng TOUPA ma a goh ding ahi: huaibel thil siangthou tak ahi.
Khelh thoihna lantu siampu in a ne ding a; kihoupihna puan in kongtual ah, mun siangthou ah nek ding ahi.
Kuapeuh huai sa khoih peuhmah a siangthou ding uh: huan, a sisan in pen bangpuan peuh leng a theh leh, a banna peuhmah mun siangthou ah na sawp ding ahi.
A huanna leibel pen sukkhap ding ahi: sum bel a huan a hih lebel nawt siang a khuah siang ding ahi.
Pasal siampu tengteng in huai a ne ding uh ahi: huaibel thil siangthou tak ahi.Khelh thoihna, a sisan, mun siangthou a kilepna bawlna ding a kihoupihna puan inn a hong kitawi pen nek ding ahi kei hi: mei a haltum ding ahi.
Khelh thoihna, a sisan, mun siangthou a kilepna bawlna ding a kihoupihna puan inn a hong kitawi pen nek ding ahi kei hi: mei a haltum ding ahi.
Huan, Hiai tatleek thoihdan ding ahi: thil siangthou tak ahi.
Haltum thillat a goh zelna ua tatleek kithoihna leng goh ding ahi: huan, a sisan a maitam theh kimvel ding ahi.
Huan, a thau tengteng a lat ding ahi: a mei thau takte, a sungkua thaute,
A kal nihte leh a boh thau, a phuk kiang a thau leh a sin tuam lap, a kalte nangawn in a suahkhe ding a:
Huan, siampu in TOUPA ding a mei a thillat ding in maitam tungah a hal ding ahi: huaibel tatleek thoihna ahi.
Pasal siampu tengteng in a ne ding ua: mun siangthou a nek ding ahi: huaibel thil siangthou tak ahi.
Tatleek thoihna pen khelh thoihna bangmah ahi a, dan khat ahi: huai a kilepna bawltu siampu in, huai a tan ding ahi.
Siampu, kuapeuh haltum thillat latsaktu siampu ngei in haltum thillat dia a lat vun a pumtan ding ahi.
Huan, a kanna a kan tangbuang thillat peuhmah, sikbel a kan leh kuang a kan tengteng a lantu siampu a tuam ding ahi.
Tangbuang thillat tengteng sathau a mek leng, a gaw leng a dang bang mah in Aron tapate tengteng in a kihawm dialdial ding uh ahi.
Huan, hiai pen mi'n TOUPA kiang a a lat ding, lepna thillat kithoih dan ding ahi.
Kipahthu genna dia a lat leh kipahthu genna kithoihna ding in sathau a zut silngou hel louh tanghou leh sathau a zut silngou hel louh tanghoupa didekte leh sathau a mek tangbuang nel mahmah kidiah suak a lat tel ding ahi.
Kipahthu genna ding a a lemna thillat kithoihna ah tanghou silngou hel a lat tel ding ahi.
Huan, huai a thillat teng a TOUPA a dia vei thillat a ding in khat chiat a lan ding a; lemna thillat sisan a thehtu siampu a tuam ding ahi.
Huan, kipahthu genna dia a lepna thillat kithoihna sa pen thillat a lat ni mah a nekgaih ding ahi a; a zingchiang tan a bangmah sit ding ahi kei hi.
Ahihhang in a thillat kithoihna pen thuchiam hiam, amah ut thu a thillat hiam ahih leh a kithoihna a lat ni mah a nek ding ahi: huan, nek bang a zingchia nek ding ahi:
Ahihhang in kithoihna sa a ni thum ni tan a om lailai bel hal ding ahi.
A lenna thillat kithoihna sa ni thum ni tan a a nek uleh, pomsak ahi kei ding a, a lantu leng a lan a sim ahi sam kei ding: thil kihhuai ahi ding a, kuapeuh a ne in a thulimlouhna moh uh a po ding uh.
Huan, sa, thil siangthoulou himhim toh kisukha nek ding ahi kei a, hal ding ahi.
Huan, sa a siangthou peuhmahte'n a ne ding ua, lemna thillat kithoihna sa, TOUPA a tuam, siangthoulou pi a netu bel, huai mi zaw a chipihte lak a kipan tuamkoih ding ahi
Huan, kuapeuh in thil siangthoulou himhim, mi siangthoulou hiam, gan siangthoulou hiam, thil kihhuai siangthoulou hiam himhim a khoih a, lemna thillat kithoihna sa, TOUPA a tuam a nek leh huai mi a chipihte lak a kipan tuamkoih a om ding ahi, chi in Aron leh a tapate houpih in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Bawng hiam, belam hiam, kel hiam thau na ne ding uh ahi kei.
Amah sih a si thau leh sa keih thau thil dang bang ding hiam a zat theih ahi ding: nek bel na ne himhim ding uh ahi kei.
Kuapeuh, TOUPA a dia min mei a thillat a lat uh sathau ne zaw, huai mi a netu a chipihte lak a kipan a tuamkoih ding ahi hi.
Na omna peuh uah sisan himhim, vasa hiam, gamsa hiam sisan na ne ding uh ahi kei.
Kuapeuh hita leh, sisan ne himhim zaw, huai mi zaw a chipihte lak a kipan a tuamkoih ding ahi, chi in Israel suante houpih in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
TOUPA kiang a lemna thillat kithoihna lan peuhmah in, TOUPA a ding a a thillat a lemna thillat kithoihna a kipan a hong lat ding ahi.
TOUPA a ding a mei a thillat amah khut mahmah in a hon tawi ding a; a thau a awm toh a hon la ding ahi, a awm pen TOUPA ma a vei thillat ding a vei a hih theihna ding in.
Huan, siampu in maitam ah a thau a hal ding a: a awm bel Aron leh a tapate a tuam ding ahi.
A liang tak lam pen kilepna thillat kithoihna a kipan vei thillat ding in siampu na piak ding uh ahi.
Aron tapate lak a lemna thillat sisan leh thau lantu kuapeuh in a tantuan ding in a liang tak lam a tan ding ahi.
A awm leh a liang a vei zel uh pen Israel suante a lemna thillat kithoihna a kipan ka la tuam a, Israel suante khantawn silbawl dan ding in siampu Aron leh a tapate ka pia ahi, chi in Israel suante kiang ah gen in chi in.
Hiai ahi siampu nna sem a TOUPA nnasem ding a a lat ni nungsiah a TOUPA ding a mei a thillat a kipan Aron tantuan leh a tapate tantuan ding;
Amau sathau a nilh ni a Israel suante'n a piak ding ua TOUPA'N thu a piak.
Hiai hi khantawn a a suante zel tan a a hih dan ding uh ahi.
Hiai hi haltum thillat, tangbuang thillat, khelh thoihna, tatleek kithoihna dan;Sinai gamdai a Israel suante'n thillat TOUPA kiang a lat ding a thu a piak ni a Sinai tang a TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak khum.
Sinai gamdai a Israel suante'n thillat TOUPA kiang a lat ding a thu a piak ni a Sinai tang a TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak khum.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Aron a tapate toh pi inla, puansilhte, nilhchi sathaute, khelh thoihna bawngpate, belampa nihte, tanghou silngou sohlouh bawm khat toh tawi inla;
Huan, mi tengteng kihoupihna puan inn kongpi kim ah omkhawm sak in, chiin.
Huan, Mosi in TOUPA'N thu a piak bang in a hih a; mi tengteng kihoupihna puan inn kongpi kim ah a omkhawm ua.
Huan, Mosi in kikhawmkhawmte kiang ah, Hiai ahi TOUPA'N hih ding a thu piak pen, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi in Aron leh a tapate a honpi a, a sil a.
Huchiin puanak a silhsak a, kawnggakna in a gak a, puanaktual a silhsak a, siampu puanak in a tuam a, siampu puanak gakna siam tak a gat in a gak a, huai in a gak belh.
Huan, awm tuamna a thuah a; huan, awmtuamna ah Urim leh Thumin a koih a.
Dial a khimsak a, huan, dial pang mal lam ah dangka-eng pek, hihtuam chiamtehna siangthou a thuah a, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan, Mosi in nilhchi sathau a la a, biakbuk leh a sung a thil om tengteng a nilh a, a siangthousak chiat a.
Huan, huai mah in sagihvei maitam a theh a, maitam leh a tui-um-belsuan tengtengte, maiphiatkuang leh a thunna siangthou sak ding in a nilh hi.
Huan, a siangthou na ding in nilhchi sathau Aron lu ah a buak a, a nilh a.
Huan, Mosi in Aron tapate a honpi a, puanak a silhsak a; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan, khelh thoihna bawngpa a hon kai a, Aron leh a tapate'n khelh thoihna bawngpa lu tungah a khut uh a koih uh.
Huan, a gou a; Mosi in sisan a la a, huaibel maitam a dia kilepna bawlna ding in a khutzung in maitam ki ah a kimvel in a tat a, maitam a siang sak a, maitam bul ah sisan a sung a, a siangthou sak hi.
Huan, a gilboh tengteng, a sin a lap, a kal nihte leh a thau a la a, maitam ah Mosi in a hal hi.
Bawngpa pen bel a vun toh, a sa toh, a ek toh, dainawl ah a hal a, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan, haltum thillat belampa pen a lan a, Aron leh a tapate'n belampa lu tungah a khut a koih uh.
Huan, a gou a: Mosi in maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh.
Huan, belampa a sem a, a lu leh a sabakte leh a thau a hal hi.
Huan, a sungkua leh a khete a sil a; belampa pen maitam ah a vek in a hal khin: huaibel gimlim ding a haltum thillat ahi a: TOUPA a dia mei a thillat ahi; TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan, belampa dang, hihtuamna belampa pen a hon lan nawn a: Aron leh a tapate'n belampa lu tungah a khut uh a koih uh.
Huan, Mosi in a gou a, a sisan a la a, Aron bil taklam dawn bang, a khut tak lam khutpi bang, a khe tak lam khepi bang a nuh hi.
Huan, Mosi in Aron tapate a pi a, a bil tak lam dawn bang, a khut tak lam khutpi bang, a khe tak lam khepi bang a nuh hi: huan, maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh hi.
Huan, a thaute, a mei thau takte, a gilboh tengteng a a sin tuampen a lapte, a kal nih leh a thau leh a liang tak lam a la a:
TOUPA ma a tanghou silngou soh louh bawm a kipan tanghou silnou soh louh khat leh sathau a mek tanghou pei khat leh tanghou pei pa khat a la a, sathau tung leh a liang tak lam tungah a khoih a:
Huan, a vek in Aron khutpek tungah leh a tapate khutpek tungah a koih a, TOUPA ma a vei thillat ding in a vei hi.
Huan, Mosi in a khut a kipan a la a, haltum thillat tungah maitam ah a hal a; huabel gimlim ding a a hihtuam na ahi: TOUPA ding a mei a thillat ahi.
Huan, Mosi in a awm a la a, TOUPA ma a vei thillat ding in a vei a: hihtuam na belampa a Mosi tantuan ahi, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan, Mosi in nilhchi sathau a kipan leh maitam sisan a a la a, huai in Aron leh a puansilh a theh a; a tapate leh a tapate puansilh a theh a; a tapate leh a tapate puansilhte leng; Aron leh a puansilh a hih siangthou a, a tapate leh a tapate puansilhte leng.
Huan, Mosi in Aron leh a tapate kiang ah, Kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah sa pen huan unla, Aron leh a tapate'n a nek ding uh ahi, chia thu ka piak bang in, huai ah hihtuamna bawm a tanghou toh ne un.
Huan sa leh tanghou nekbangte na hal ding uh ahi.
Na kihihtuam na ni uh chin masiah kihoupihna puan inn kongpi pawtsan lou in ni sagih na om ding uh ahi: ni sagih noute a hon hihtuam sin ngal a.
Tuni a hihsa bang in, nou a ding a kilepna hon bawlsak ding, hih ding in TOUPA'N thu a peta hi.
Kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah ni sagih, sun leh zan na om nilouh ding ua, na sih louhna ding un TOUPA thupiak na zuih ding uh ahi, huchi bang a thupiak a om ka hi.Huchi in TOUPA'N Mosi zang a hih ding a thu apiak tengteng Aron leh a tapate'n a hih uhi.
Huchi in TOUPA'N Mosi zang a hih ding a thu apiak tengteng Aron leh a tapate'n a hih uhi.
Huan, Hichi ahi a, a ni giat ni in Mosi in Aron leh a tapate leh Israel upate a sam a:
Huan, Aron kiang ah, Khelh thoihna ding in bawngnou a pa leh a haltum thillat ding in belampa gensiatbei tuaktuak kai inla, TOUPA ma ah lan in.
Huan, Israel suante kiang ah, Khelh thoihna ding in kelpa, huan haltum thillat ding in bawngnou leh belamnou kum khat a upa tuaktuak gensiatbei chiat.
Leh bawngpa leh belampa TOUPA ma a lepna thillat a lat ding in hon kai unla; huan, sathau a mek tangbuang thillat toh: tuni in na kiang uah TOUPA a hong lang sin ahi, chi in hilh in, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi in thu a piak bang in kihoupihna puan inn kong ah a hon kai ua; huan, mi tengteng in a va naih ua, TOUPA ma ah a va ding uh.
Huan, Mosi in, Hiai ahi na hih ding ua TOUPA'N thu a hon piak: huchi in TOUPA thupina na lak uah a hong lang ding, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi in Aron kiang ah, Maitam hon naih inla, na khelh thoihnate, na haltum thillatte lan inla, nang a ding leh mipite a ding in kilemna bawl in: huan, mipite thillat pen lan inla, amau a ding in kilepna bawl in, TOUPA thupiak bang in, a chi a.
Huan, Aron in maitam a va naih a, amah a tuam a khelh thoihna bawngnou a gou a.
Huan, Aron tapate'n sisan a kiang ah a lan ua, sisan ah a khutzung a diah a, maitam kite ah a tat a, sisan pen maitam bul ah a sung a:
Khelh thoihna thaute, a kalte, a sin tuam pen lapte bel maitam tungah a hal a, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in.
Huan, a sa leh a vun dainawl ah a hal.
Huan, haltum a thillat pen a gou a; Aron tapate'n sisan a pua ua, aman maitam kimvel in a theh.
Haltum thillat sabak khatkhat in a lu toh a pia ua, aman maitam ah a na hal a.
Huan, a sungkuate, a khete a sil a, maitam ah haltum thillat tungah a hal a.
Huan, mipite thillat pen a lan a, mipite khelh thoihna kel a kai a, a gou a, a ma a mah bang in khelh thoihna di'n a lan hi.
Huan, haltum thillat a lan a, a dan bangbang in a lan hi.
Huan, tangbuang thillat a lan a, huailai a a pham khat a la a, zingsang lam a haltum thillat chih louh leng maitam ah a hal lai hi.
Huan, mipte a tuam dia lepna thillat kithoihna bawngpa leh elampa leng a gou a; huan, Aron tapate'n a sisan a pia ua, maitam a kimvel in a theh hi;
Huan, bawngpa thau leh belampa thaute, a mei thau takte, a gilbohte, a kalte, a sintuam pen a lapte leng a pia ua:
A thau pen a awm tungah a koih ua, huan, aman a thau pen maitam ah a hal hi.
Huan, a awm leh a liang tak lam pen Aron in TOUPA ma ah vei thillat ding in a vei a; Mosi thupiak bang in.
Huan, Aron in mipi lam ah a ban a zak a, a vek un vual a zawl a; huan, khelh thoihna leh haltum thillat leh, lemna thillat a lat khit in a hon pai suk.
Huan, Mosi leh Aron kihoupihna puan inn ah a va lut ua, huan, a hong pawtkhe nawn ua, mipite a vualzawl ua; huan, TOUPA thupina mi tengteng ah a hong lang hi.Huan, TOUPA ma a kipan mei a hong pawtkhia a, haltum thillat leh thaute maitam ah a kangman ta a: huan, mipi tengteng in huai a muh un a kikou zuazua ua, a khupboh khekhup uhi.
Huan, TOUPA ma a kipan mei a hong pawtkhia a, haltum thillat leh thaute maitam ah a kangman ta a: huan, mipi tengteng in huai a muh un a kikou zuazua ua, a khupboh khekhup uhi.
Huan, Aron tapa, Nadab leh Abihute'n a mei lakna uh a la tuaktuak ua, huai ah mei-am a koih ua, gimlim a buak ua, a thupiak louh pi in TOUPA ma ah mei zat louhchi a lan uh.
Huchi in TOUPA ma a kipan in mei a hong pawtkhia a, amau a kanglum a, TOUPA ma ah a si ta uh.
Huchi in Mosi in Aron kiang a, Kei hon naih mite ah siangthou in ka lang ding a, mipite tengteng ma ah pahtawi in ka om ding, chia TOUPA'N a gen tak hiai ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Aron a dia dide.
Huchi in Mosi in Aron pangak Usiel tapa, Misael leh Elzaphante a sam a, a kiang uah, Hong pawtkhia un, a chi hi.
Huchi in a hong pai na ua, puanak silh kawm in dainawl ah a zawngkhia ua, Mosi thugen bang in.
Huan, Mosi in Aron kiang ah leh a tapa Eleazar leh Ithamarte kaing ah, Na sam uh khah kei unla, na puante uh leng botkek sam ke un, huchilou inzaw na si kha ding ua; mi tengteng tungah a heh kha ding: na unau uh, Israel innko pumpi in mei, TOUPA chih tak sun zaw uhen.
Huan, kihoupihna puan in kongpi a kipan na pawt ding uh ahi kei, huchilou in zaw na si ding: TOUPA sathau, nilhchi na tunguah a om ngal a, a chi a.
Huchi in Mosi thu bang in a hih uhi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Aron a houpih a,
Nang hiam, na tapate hiam in leng, kihoupihna puan inn sung a na pai lai un uain leh zu himhim dawn kei un, huchilou in zaw na si ding uh: na suan zelte uh tan a khantawn dan ding ahi ding hi;
Huaibel a siangthou leh a siangthoulou leh a siang leh a sianglou na khen theihna ding uh leh.
TOUPA'N Mosi zang a a kiang ua a gen, thupiak tengteng Israel suante na sinsak theihna ding uh ahi ding, chi in.
Huan, Mosi in Aron kiang ah leh a tapa damlai Eleazar leh Ithamarte kiang ah, TOUPA a dia mei a thillat a, tangbuang thillat lak bangte la unla, maitam bul ah silngou tellou in ne un: thil siangthou ahi ngal a:
TOUPA a dia mei a thillat a nang a tuam leh na tapate a tuam a chih ziak in mun siangthou ah na ne ding uh ahi: huchi bang a thupiak a om ka hi.
Huan, a awm vei leh a liang taklam vei pen mun siang ah na ne ding uh; nang leh na tapate leh na tanute toh: Israel suante lemna thillat kithoihna nang a tuam leh na tapate ding a seh ahi ngal a;
Liang vei leh awm vei pen TOUPA ma a vei thillat dia vei ding in mei a thillat thau toh hon tawi ding uh ahi: huaibel nang leh na tapate toh, khantawn a nou a tuam ding ahi ding, TOUPA thupiak bang in, a chi hi.
Huan, Mosi in khelh thoihna kel pen ngentel tak in a zong a, huan, ngaidih, a na halkhin tham uh ahi a: huchi in, Aron tapa damlai, Eleazar leh Ithamar tungah a heh a,
Bang ding a khelh thoihna mun siangthou a nelou na hi ua? thil siangthou, mipte thulimlouhna po ding a TOUPA ma a lemna bawlsakna ding a nou a hon piak ahi ngal a?
Ngaidih ua, a sisan pen mun siangthou ah na la lut sam ua: thu ka piak bang in mun siangthou a na nek ngeingei ding uh eive, chi in.
Huan, Aron in Mosi kiang ah, Ngaidih, tuni in TOUPA ma ah a khelh uh thoihna leh, a haltum thillat uh a lan uh ahi; hichi bang thil lah ka tungah a hong om ta mai ngal a; tuni in khelh thoihna na na ne ta leng, TOUPA ngaih in thilhih dia kilawmlou ahi kei dia hia? a chi a.Huan, Mosi in huai a zak in a lungkim ta hi.
Huan, Mosi in huai a zak in a lungkim ta hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
Israel suante houpih unla, Leitung a gamsa tengteng lak a na nek ding uh thilhingte hiai ahi.
Gamsa lak a chin ka, chin ka paisuak, eknel hai chi peuhmah na ne thei ding uh.
Himahleh eknel hai hiam, chin ka paisuak hiam lak ate hichibangte zaw na nek ding uh ahi kei; sangawngsau, eknel hai leleng, a chin a kak louh ziak in; nou ding in a nin ahi.
Huan, zupi, eknel a hai na a, a hihhang in a chin a kat louh ziak in; nou ding in a nin ahi.
Huan, zusapi, eknel a hai na a, a hihhang in a chin a kat louh ziak in, nou ding in a nin ahi.
Huan, vok, a chin a ka a, a ka paisuak na a, a hihhang in eknel a hai louh ziak in; nou ding in a nin ahi.
A sa uh na ne ding uh ahi kei, a luang uh leng na khoih ding uh ahi kei, nou ding in a nin ahi.
Tui sung a teng tengteng ah hiaite na ne thei ding uh: tuipite, luite, tui a om khate leh lipte nei photphot na ne thei ding uh.
Tui sung a teng tengteng leh tui a thil hing om tengteng lak ah tuipi ate, lui ate, khate leh lipte neilou photphot zaw, nou ding in thil kihhuai ahi a,
Nou ding in thil kihhuai ahi ding ua; a sa uh na ne ding uh ahi kei, a luangte uh thil kihhuai a na neih ding uh ahi.
Tui a khate leh lipte neilou photphot zaw nou ding in thil kihhuai ahi.
Huan, vasa lak ah hiaite thil kihhuai a na neih ding uh ahi; nek ding ahi kei hi, thil kihhuai ahi uh: muvanlai, musane leh tuivapi,
Muvompi, musi a chi himhimte;
Va-ak chiteng a chi himhimte;
Simbu, vabak, tuipi vasate, mu chi himhim;
Simbutanglip, ngagal, simbupi,
Tuivapi, vabukngak, musanepi,
Inntungva, dil vasa a chi himhim, huihtun leh bakte.
Kha nei khe li a pai chi peuhmah nou ding in thil kihhuai ahi.
Himahleh kha nei, khe li a pai chi leng leitung a tawmna ding a a khezung tung lam ua khe nei tengteng lak ah hiaite na ne thei ding uh;
Hiaite leng na ne thei ding uh: khau a chi himhim, ekkhingne khaupe a chi himhim, khuangbai a chi himhim leh khaupe a chi himhimte.
Himahleh kha nei, khe li nei, a pai a pai photphot nou ding in thil kihhuai ahi vek hi.
Huan, hiaite ziak in na buah ding uh: kuapeuh, sa luang khoih peuhmah nitak lam tan in a buah ding ua;
Huan, kuapeuh huai luang lami peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a buah ding uh.
Gamsa chin ka a, ka paisuaklou, eknel leng hailou chi tengteng nou a ding in thil nin ahi a; kuapeuh huaite khoih a nin ding uh.
Huan, bok a pai tengteng lak a khebom a pai peuhmahte nou ding in thil nin ahi a; a luang uh khoih peuhmah nitaklam tan in a nin ding uh.
Huan, a luang lami peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding uh ahi, nitaklam tan in a nin ding ua; nou ding in thil nin ahi.
Huan, lei a a vak a vakthoh chi lak a nou ding a thil nin hiaite ahi: buite, chikpite, thankikpi, a chi himhim,
Innhik, tangteuh, thankik dokdawn leh zusa.
Hiaite a vak a vak thoh chi tengteng lak a nou ding a thil ninte ahi uh: kuapeuh in a sisa hiaite a khoih uleh nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Huan, a sih ua bangpeuh a delhkhum uh, a nin zel ding; vanzat photphot sing a bawl tui-um-belsuan hiam, puan hiam, savun hiam, sai-ip hiam leng hi hen aw, tui a diah ding ahi, huan, nitak lam tan in a nin ding; huai khit chiang in a siangthou ta ding hi.
Leibel, a bang mahmah a kiakna peuhpeuh na hihtam zel ding uh ahi, a sung a om tengteng a nin ahi.
Huai bel a nek chi om tengteng leng huai a om tui a diahsa himhim, thil nin ahi ding; huan, dawn chi, dawn theih chi tengteng leng, huai bel a himhim zaw thil nin ahi ding.
Huan, thil bangpeuh a luang up a banglai peuh in a delhkhum sa photphot thil nin ahi zel ding; tanghou kanna hiam, kan lumna bel hiam leng hihtap vek ding ahi, a nin khin a, nou a ding in thil nin ahi ding.
Himahleh tuikhuk hiam, tuibem, tui chin khawm hiam a nin kei ding a, a luang uh sikkhak peuhmah a nin ding.
Huan, haichi, chin ding himhim zaw a luang uh a banglai peuh in na delhkhum ta leh, a nin kei.
Himahleh haichi, tui a diahsa a luang un a koilai peuh in delh leh, nou ding in thil nin ahi.
Gamsa na nek theih chi himhim u leng si leh, a luang khoih mi peuhmah nitak lam tan in a nin ding.
A sa ne peuhmah in a puante uh sawp ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding: huan, a luang lami in leng a puante a sawp ding ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding.
Huan, ganhing leitung a a bok a vak chi tengteng thil kihhuai ahi ua, nek ding ahi kei.
A tholh a kitholh chi leh khe li a pai chi hiam, khe tampi nei chi hiam, leitung a bok a vak chi himhim na ne ding uh ahi kei, thil kihhuai ahi ngal ua.
A bok a vak chi himhim in na kihihthanghuai ding uh ahi kei, na kihihbuah louhna ding un, huaite in na kihihnin ding uh ahi kei.
Kei zaw TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi ngal a; huaiziak in kisiangthou sak unla, siangthou in om un; kei lah ka siangthou ngal a, leitung a teng, a bok a vak, a bang chi mah in kihihbuah kei un.
N Pathian uh hi ding a Aigupta gam a kipan a nou hon pikhia TOUPA lah ka hi ngal a: kei ka siangthou ngal a, huaiziak in nou leng na siangthou ding uh ahi.
Hiai pen gamsa leh vasate leh tui a teng chi thil hing chiteng leh lei a a bok a vak chi chitengte tungthu a dan ding ahi.Siangthou leh siangthoulou khenna ding leh, gamsa nek theih chi leh gamsa nek theihlouh chi khenna ding in, chi in, chi in.
Siangthou leh siangthoulou khenna ding leh, gamsa nek theih chi leh gamsa nek theihlouh chi khenna ding in, chi in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante kiang ah, Numei in nau a pai a tapa a neih leh nisagih a nin ding a; numei dan ngeina hun lai a a nit bang in a nin ding hi.
Huan, a ni giat ni in a zek mong vun sum ding ahi.
Sisan ziak a kisiangsak in ni sawmthum leh ni thum a om naklai ding ahi; a kisiansak ni a kim mateng thil siangthou himhim a khoih ding ahi kei hi, mun siangthou a leng a lut ding ahi sam kei.
Nau numei a neih lebel numei dan ngeina hun lai a a nit bang in nipikal nih a nin ding; huan, sisan ziak a kisiangsak in ni sawmguk leh ni guk a om lai ding ahi.
Huan, tapa hiam, tanu hiam ziak a kisiansak ni a kim tak in haltum thillat ding in belamnou kum khat a upa leh khelh thoihna ding in vapal nou hiam, vakhu hiam kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah siampu kiang ah a hon tawi ding ahi:
Huan, aman TOUPA ma ah a lan ding a, kilepna a bawlsak ding a, huchi a sisan pawtna a kipan siangthou ahi ding.
Hiai pen pasal hiam, numei hiam neinu a dia dan ahi.Huan, a neih in belamnou a chin kei leh vakhu kop khat hiam, vapal nou kopkhat hiam a tawi ding ahi: khat pen haltum thillat ding in, khat pen khelh thoihna ding in: huan, siampu in kilepna a bawlsak ding a, huchi in a siangthou ta ding, chi in gen in, chi in.
Huan, a neih in belamnou a chin kei leh vakhu kop khat hiam, vapal nou kopkhat hiam a tawi ding ahi: khat pen haltum thillat ding in, khat pen khelh thoihna ding in: huan, siampu in kilepna a bawlsak ding a, huchi in a siangthou ta ding, chi in gen in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
Mi a sa vun a vun hiam, a khem hiam, a bol hiam, a vun a phak hileh kilawm a kimuh leh siampu Aron kiang ah hiam, a tapa, siampute lak a kuapen hiam kiang a pi ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in sa vun a hii pen a na en ding a, huan, a hii omna lai a mul a kaan a, a hii pen a sa vun sang a thuk a a kimuh leh phak hii ahi hi: huan, siampu in amah a na en ding a, mi nin a hih a phuang ding ahi.
A sa vun a bolte a kan a vun sang a thuk a a kimuh kei leh, a mul a kaan kei leh hii nei mi pen siampu in ni sagih a khumtuam ding a,
Huan, siampu in ni sagih ni in amah a en ding a: huan, ngaidih, a hii pen a ngeingei a a muh a, a hii pen vun a a zamzak kei leh siampu in ni sagih mah a khumtuam nawn ding a:
Huan, siampu in ni sagih ni in a en nawn ding a: huan, ngaidih, hii pen a mial a, hii pen a vun a a zamzak kei leh siampu in a siangthou chih a phuang ding ahi: a khem lel ahi: a puante a sawp ding a, a siangthou ding.
Himahleh a siansak na ding a siampu a ki-etsak nung a a khem pen a vun a a zamzak mahmah leh siampu a ki-ensak nawn ding ahi:
Huan, siampu in a na en ding a, huan, ngai in, a khem pen a vun a a zamzak leh siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding: phak ahi.
Mi'n phak hii a vom leh siampu kiang a pi ding ahi;
Huan, siampu in a na en ding a, huan, ngaidih, vun a a kang a om khiak a, a mul a kaansak a, a bawk dulh hethut a hih leh,
A sa a phak kumlui om ahi a, siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding a, khumtuam ding ahi kei a, nin ahi ngal a.
Huan, a phak pen vun a a zamzak mahmah a, a hii veimi a vun, a lu a kipan a a khe lek tan a siampu theihtheih chiang phak in a bop leh, sampu in a en ding a;
Huan, ngaidih, phak in a sa tengteng a bop suak sa a hihleh, hii veimi a siang chih a phuang ding ahi: a kaang khinta a, a siangthou ta ahi.
Himahleh a sa a dulh hethut leh, a nin ding a.
Siampu in sa dulh hethut a en ding a, a nin chih a phuang ding ahi: sa dulh hethut pen a nin ahi; phak ahi.
Hiamahleh sa dulh hethut pen a na lamdan nawn a, a na kaan nawn leh siampu kiang ah a hoh ding a,
Huan, siampu in a na en ding; huan, ngaidih, a hii a kan leh siampu in hii veimi a niin kei chih a puang ding ahi: a siangthou ta ahi.
Huan, sa vun a meimatum om, a dam a,
A meimatum a mun a na kan san hiam, kang san deuh a na bol hiam a hihleh, siampu in a et ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in a na en ding a, huan, ngaidih, vun sang a thuk a kimuh a, a mul a kaan leh siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding ahi: phak hii ahi a, meimatum in hong suakkhia ahi.
Himahleh siampu in a na et a, huan, ngaidih, mul kang a om louh a, a mial sim phet a hihleh, siampu in ni sagih a khumtuam ding a:
Huan, vun a a zamzak leh siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding ahi: hii ahi.
Himahleh a bol ngou pen a omna ngei a a om a, a zamzak kei leh meimatum pawn lel ahi a; siampu in a siangthou chih a phuang ding ahi.
Huan, vun a sa mei in kang leh, mei a a kat a sa hong pol leh, ngou-san sim hiam, ngou hiam in;
Siampu in a na en ding a, ngaidih, a polna lai tak a mul pen a kaan a, huchia vun sang a thuk a a kimuh leh phak ahi a, meikat a hong omkhia ahi: huchi in siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding ahi, phak hii ahi.
Himahleh siampu in a na et a, huan ngaidih, pol a mul kang a om kei a, vun sang a thuklou a, mial deuh lel a hihleh, siampu in ni sagih a khumtuam ding a;
Huan, siampu in ni sagih ni in amah a en ding a, vun a a zamzak mahmah leh siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding ahi, phak hii ahi.
Huan, a pol pen a omna ngei a a om thek a, vun a a zam zak kei leh, a mial deuh lel a hihleh meikat bawk lel ahi a, siampu in a siangthou chih a phuang ding ahi: meikang pawn ahi lel hi.
Huan, numei hiam, pasal hiam in a lu ah hiam, a khamul lak ah hiam hii a vei leh,
Siampu in hii pen a na en ding a; huan, ngaidih, vun sang a thuk a a kimuh a, mul eng ngat tak a om leh siampu in a nin chih a phuang ding ahi; meimasungtum ahi a, lu hiam khamul hiam phak ahi hi.
Huan, siampu in meimasungtum hii pen a et a, huan, ngaidih, vun sang a thuklou a a kimuh a, a mul vom a om keileh siampu in meimasungtum hii veimi pen ni sagih a khum tuam ding a;
Huan, ni sagih ni in siampu in hii a en ding a, huan, ngaidih, meimasungtum a zamzak louh a, mul eng a om kei leh, meimasungtum vun sang a a thuk a a kimuh keileh,
Met ding ahi a, meimasungtum laitak bel a met ding ahi kei; huan, siampu in meimasungtum neimi ni sagih dang a khum tuam nawn ding a;
Huan, ni sagih ni in siampu in meimasungtum a en nawn ding a: huan, ngaidih, meimasungtum pen vun a a zak louh a, vun sang a thuk a a kimuh leh, siampu in a siangthou chih a phuang ding ahi; huan, a puante a sawp ding a, a siangthou ta ding hi.
Himahleh meimasungtum pen a kisansak nung a a vun a a zamzak mahmah leh,
Siampu in amah a na en ding a, huan, ngaidih, meimasungtum pen vun a a zamzak leh, siampu a ding in mul eng zon a kipahmoh chitchiat kei ding; a nin ahi.
Himahleh meimasungtum pen a ngeingei a a muh a, mul vom a pou leh, meimasungtum a dam ahi a, a siangthou ahi; siampu in a siangthou chih a phuang ding ahi.
Huan, numei hiam, pasal hiam, a sa vun uah pol, pol ngou kilhkelh na om leh siampu in a en ding a;
Huan, ngaidih, a sa vun ua pol pen mialngou sim lel a hihleh pol lel ahi a, vun a hong suak ahi, a siangthou hi.
Mi a sam a pulh siang leh, lugiau ahi; himahleh a siangthou ahi.
A sip sam a pulh siang leh talngalh ahi; himahleh a siangthou ahi.
Himahleh lugiau hiam ah, talngalh hiam ah, hii san sim a ngou a om leh, a lugiau hiam, a talngalh hiam a hong om phak ahi hi.
Huchi in siampu in a na en ding a, huan, ngaidih, a lugiau hiam, a talngalh hiam a hii hong bawkkhia pen a ngou-san hehut a, sa vun a phak bang a a kimuh leh,
Mi phak ahi a, a nin ahi; Siampu in a sian louhna a phuan ngeingei ding ahi, a phakna a lu ah ahi.
Phak, hii vei zaw a puante bohkek ahi ding a, a samte a khah ding a, a muk tung lam a tuam ding a, Sianglou, sianglou, chi in a kikou ding ahi.
Phak in a bop sung teng a nin ahi ding a; a nin ahi a, a om tuam ding ahi; a omna ding dainawl ahi.
Puansilh leng, samul puan hiam khau zang ngat puan hiam leng; gat hiam, phan hiam leng; khau zang ngat hiam, samul hiam leng, savun hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl ah hiam leng;
Savun hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl ah hiam phak hii a om a, huai hii puansilh hiam, savun ah hiam,
Gat ah hiam, phan ah hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl ah hiam a hing sim hiam a a dawkkhiak leh, phak hii ahi a, siampu et ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in hii a na en ding a, hii omna ni sagih a khumtuam ding a;
Huan, ni sagih ni in hii a en ding a, hii pen puansilh, gat ah hiam, phan ah hiam, savun, bang ding peuh a leng a zat uh savunte ah hiam, a zam leh hii pen phak kip mahmah chi ahi a, a nin ahi.
Puansilh, gat hiam, phan hiam, samul hiam, khau zang ngat ham, savun a bawl chi himhim hiam, phak omna peuhmah a hal ding ahi; phak kip mahmah chi ahi ngal a, hal ngei ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in a na et a, huchia, ngai dih, puansilh, gat hiam, phan hiam, savun a bawl chi himhim ah leng hii pen a zam kei leh
Hii omna siampu in sawp thu a pe ding a, ni sagih dang a khum tuam nawn ding:
Huan, hii omna sawpkhit nung in siampu in a en nawn ding a, huan, ngai dih, hii lat dan a kidan keileh, hii pen zam kei mahleh, a siangthou tuan kei, mei a na hal ding ahi: a kip chi ahi; a sung lam hiam, a po lam hiam a giau zong hi heh.
Huan, siampu in a na et a, huchia, ngai dih, sawp khit nung a mial sim lel a hih leh puansilh a kipan hiam, savun a kipan hiam, gat a kipan hiam, phan a kipan hiam a botkhe ding a:
Huan, puansilh pen, gat ah hiam, phan ah hiam, savun bawl ahte hiam a lat lailai leh, a hong pawt nawn ahi; hii omna pen na hal ding ahi.
Huan, puansilh, gat hiam, phan hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl chi himhim hiam na sawp a, hii in a nutsiat leh sawp nawn ding ahi a, huchi in a hong siangthou ta ding hi.Hiai bel, puansilh, samul hiam, khau zang ngat hiam, gat hiam, phan hiam, savun a bawl chi himhim hiam a phak hii om a siangthou leh a siangthoulou phuanna dan ding ahi hi, chi in.
Hiai bel, puansilh, samul hiam, khau zang ngat hiam, gat hiam, phan hiam, savun a bawl chi himhim hiam a phak hii om a siangthou leh a siangthoulou phuanna dan ding ahi hi, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Hiai phak siansak ni a hihdan ding ahi ding: siampu kiang a pi ding ahi:
Huan, siampu dainawl ah a paikhe ding a; huan, siampu in a en ding a, huan, ngai dih, phak pen a phakna hii a dam leh
Siampu in a kisian sak ding mi tuh vasa hing siangthou nih leh sidar sing leh khauzang san leh husop tawisak ding in thu a pe ding:
Huan, siampu in vasa khat pen leibel ah lui tui tungah goh ding in thu a pe ding a:
Vasa hing pen, sidar singte, khauzang sante, husopte, vasa hing toh a tawi ding a, luitui tung a vasa gohsa sisan ah a diah vek ding a:
Huan, phakna lak a kisiangsak ding mi sagih vei a theh ding a, a siangthou chih a phuang ding, huan, vasa hing pen gamlak ah a khah ding hi.
Huan, a kisiangsak ding mi in a puante a sawp ding a, a kimet mai vek ding a, a kisil ding ahi; huchi in a hong siangthou ding: huan, huai khit chiang in giah phual ah a hoh ding a, himahleh a puan inn po lam ah ni sagih a om ding ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, a ni sagih ni in a lu sam tengteng leh a khamul leh a mit khu multe a met mai ding a, a mul tengteng a met mai ding: huan, a puante a sawp ding a, a kisil ding ahi: huchi in a hong siangthou ta ding.
Huan, ni giat ni in belamnou a pa nih gensiatbei leh belamnou a nu khat gensiatbei, kum khat a upa leh tangbuang thillat ding in tangbuang nel mahmah epha mun sawm a khen mun thum sathau a mek leh sathau log khat a tawi ding ahi.
Huan, a siang sakpa siampu in kisiang sak ding mi leh huai thil kihoupihna kongpi bul ah TOUPA ma ah a koih ding:
Huan, siampu in belamnou pa khat pen sathau log khat toh a la ding a, tatlek thoihna ding in a lan ding a, TOUPA ma a vei thillat ding in a vei ding ahi.
Huan, khelh thoihna leh haltum thillat a goh zelna mun uh, mun siangthou ah belamnou pa pen a gou ding ahi: khelh thoihna siampu a tuam ahi bangmah in tatlek thoihna leng siampu a tuam ahi ngal a: thil siangthou mahmah ahi hi:
Huan, siampu in tatlek thoihna sisan a la ding a, kisiang sak ding mi bil tak lam mongte, a khut tak lam khutpite, a tak lam khepite siampu in a nuh ding a;
Huan, sathau log khat a tuh siampu in a la ding a, amah khutpek vei lam ah a sung ding a;
Siampu in a khut vei lam a sathau ah a khut tak lam zung a diah ding a, sathau in TOUPA ma ah a khut zung in sagih vei a theh ding
Huan, a khut a sathau om laitengteng in kisiang sak ding mi bil tak lam dawn bang, a khut tak lam khutpi bang, a khe tak lam khepi bang ah tatlekna kithoihna sisan tungah a nuh ding ahi:
Huan, siampu in a khut a om laitengteng in kisiang sak ding mi lu a nuh ding a; huan, siampu in TOUPA ma ah kilepna a bawl sak ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in khelh thoihna a lan ding a, a siangthou louhna ziak a kisiang sak ding mi pen kilepna a bawl sak ding a; huan, huai khit in haltum thillat a gou ding;
Huan, siampu in haltum thillat leh tangbuang thillat maitam ah a lan ding a, siampu in kilepna a bawl sak ding hi.
Huan, mi genthei a hih a, huchi bang a chitkei leh, belamnou pa khat tatlek thoihna, kilepna bawl sakna ding a vei ding leh tangbuang thillat ding a tangbuang nel mahmah epha mun sawm a khen mun khat, sathau a zut, sathau log khat toh a tawi dia;
Huan, vakhu kop khat hiam, vapal nou kop khat hiam, a neih zoh zaw lamlam; khat pen khelh thoihna, khat pen haltum thillat ding ahi ding.
Ni giat ni in a kisian sakna ding in siampu kiang ah kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah TOUPA ma ah a hon tawi ding ahi.
Huchi in siampu tatlek thoihna belamnou leh sathau log khat a la ding a, huan, vei thillat ding in TOUPA ma ah siampu in a vei ding ahi;
Huan, tatlek thoihna belamnou pen a gou ding a; siampu in tatlek thoihna sisan a la ding a, kisiang sak ding mi bil tak lam dawn bang, a khut tak lam khutpi bang, a khe tak lam khepi bang a nuh ding hi:
Huan, siampu in sathau amah khutpek vei lam ah a sung ding a;
Huan, siampu in a khut vei lam a sathau khenkhat a khut tak lam in TOUPA ma ah sagih vei a theh ding;
Huan, siampu in a khut a sathau in kisiang sak ding mi bil tak lam dawn bang, a khut tak lam khutpi bang, a khe tak lam khepi bang ah tatlek kithoihna sisan tung tak ah a nuh ding hi:
Huan, siampu khut a sathau om laiteng in TOUPA ma a kilepna bawl sak ding in kisiang sak ding mi lu a nuh ding ahi.
Huan, vakhu hiam, vapal nou hiam, a neih zoh lamlam khat a lan ding a;
A neih zoh lamlam, khelh thoihna ding in khat, haltum thillat ding in khat, tangbuang thillat toh: huan, siampu in kisiang sak ding mi pen TOUPA ma ah kilemna a bawl sak ding hi.
Hiai bel phak hii vei, kisian sakna dan bang a chinloute a dia dan ahi, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
Luah ding a ka hon piak Kanan gam na lut chiang un, na luah ding uh gam koi inn pen ah leng phak hii ka koih leh,
Huai in neitu in, Hiai inn ah hii hileh kilawm tak om leh kilawm ka sa, chi in siampu a hong hilh ding ahi:
Huan, siampu hii en ding a a lut ma in inn sung a thil om tengteng a buah a suah louhna ding in inn pen a hihvuak ding in siampu in thu a pe ding a; huai khit in siampu in a en ding in a lut ding hi.
Huan, hii a en ding a, huan, ngai dih, hii in a hing lam sim hiam a san lam sim hiam a baang a nekkuak a, baang sang a kiam a a kimuh leh,
Siampu pen inn a kipan kongpi ah a pawt ding a, ni sagih in a khak ding:
Huan, ni sagih ni in siampu in a va en nawn ding a, huan, ngai dih, hii baang a a na zamzak leh hi omna suang tak lakkhiak a,
Dainawl a nin paihna mun a paih ding in siampu in thu a pe ding:
huan, inn sung lam a kiat kimvel sak ding a, huan, suang zutbitna a kiatkhiak uh pen dainawl mun nin ah a sung ding uhi:
Huan, suang dang a la ding ua, huai suangte mun ah a koih ding ua; huan, suang zutbitna dang a la ding a, inn a hu ding hi.
Huan, suang a lakkhiak a inn a kiat a a huk khit nung a hii inn a a hong dawk nawn leh, siampu a va lut ding a, va en nawn ding hi;
Huan, ngai dih, hii inn a a na zamzak leh huai inn a phak a kip chi ahi a, a nin ahi
Huai inn a phel dia, a suang khawng, a sing khawng, a suang zutbitna tengteng leng; huan, dainawl ah mun nin ah a nawnkhiak vek ding ahi.
Kuapeuh huai inn khak sung himhim a lut taphot nitak lam tan in a nin lai ding uhi.
Huan, kuapeuh huai inn a lum taphot in a puante uh a sawp ding uh.
Huan, kuapeuh huai inn a ann ne taphot in a puante uh a sawp ding uh ahi.
Huan, siampu a lut a, a et kimvel a, huan, ngai dih, huai in huk hoih a hih nung a hii a zamzak keileh, inn a siangthou chih siampu in a phuang ding, hii a kikhinmang tak ziak in.
Huan, inn sian sak na ding in vasa nih leh sidar sing leh khau zang san leh husop a tawi ding a;
Huan, vasa khat pen lei bel ah lui tui tungah a gou ding a;
Huan, Sidar sing leh husop leh khau san leh vasa hing pen a la ding a, vasa gohsa sisan ah leh lui tui ah a diah ding hi.
Huan, inn sagih vei a theh ding: huan, inn, vasa sisan bang, khau san bang in a siang sak ding:
Vasa hing pen bel khua a kipan in gamlak ah a lengkhe sak ding ahi: huchi in a hong siangthou ta ding hi.
Hiai pen phak hii chichih leh meimasungtum tungthu a dan ahi;
Puan a phak om leh inn ate a dia van,
Bawk bang, khem bang, pol bang a dia van,A sianthou louhna mun leh a sianthouna mun kawkmuh na ding in hiai phak tungthu a dan ahi, chi in.
A sianthou louhna mun leh a sianthouna mun kawkmuh na ding in hiai phak tungthu a dan ahi, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
Israel suante houpih unla, a kiang uah, Mi kua leng sa a thil a pawt leh a thil pawt ziak in a nin ahi.
A thil pawt sung teng a nin ahi: a sa ah a pawt gige hiam, pawt tawpta hiam zong hileh, a nin himhim ahi.
Thil pawt mi lupna a lupna peuhmah a nin ding; huan, a tutna peuhmah leng a nin lai ding a.
Huan, kuapeuh a lupna khoih peuhmahte'n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Thil pawt mi tutna a tu peuhmahte'n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Kuapeuh thil pawt mi sa khoih peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Huan, thil pawt mi in mi ninlou chil a siat leh a puante a sawp ding a, a ksil ding ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding.
Tuan na bangpeuh a leng thil pawtmi a tuan leh a nin ding.
Kuapeuh a kingaihna sa nung thil khoih peuhmahte nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh; huan, huai thil la suan mi peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding uh, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uhi.
Huan, kuapeuh thil pawt mi in a khut sillou a a khoih peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Huan, thil pawt mi leibel khoihsa zaw suktap ding ahi; huan, sing vanzat tengteng silsiang vek ding ahi.
Huan, thil pawt mi bel, a thil pawt hih siangthou a hih leh, a kisian sakna ding in ni sagih a kipe ding a, a puante a sawp ding a; huan, luitui ah a kisil ding a; huchi in a hong siangthou ta ding hi.
Huan, a ni giat ni in vakhu kop khat hiam, palva noukop khat hiam tawi in TOUPA ma ah kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah a hoh ding a, siampu a pe ding ahi:
Huan, siampu in khelh thoihna ding in khat, haltum thillat ding in khat a len ding hi; huan, siampu in a thil pawt thu ah TOUPA ma ah kilepna a bawl sak ding.
Kuapeuh kithuahna chi amah a kipan a pawt leh a pumpi in a kisil vek dia, nitak lam tan in a nin ding.
Huan, puansilh khawng, vun khawng kithuahna chi omna peuhmah sawp siang a silsiang vek ding ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding
Huan, numei a luppih leleng a nih ua a kisil tuaktuak ding uh ahi, huan, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Numei in thil pawt a neih a, a sa a thil pawt bel si a hihleh ni sagih sung a nin ding; huan, kuapeuh amah khoih taphot nitak lam tan in a nin ding.
Huan, a nit sung a lupna peuhmah a nin ding a, a tutna peuhmah leng a nin lai ding hi.
Lupna khoih peuhte'n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Kuapuah a tutna khoih peuhmahte'n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Lupna a thil om hiam, a tutna a thil om hiam khoih peuhmahte nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Kuapeuh in a luppih ua, a nitna a ban uleh ni sagih a nin ding ua; a lupna peuh uh lupna a nin ding hi.
Huan, numei a nit hun ngeina hilou a ni sawtkuam tak a si a pawt hiam, a nitdan ngeina sang a sawt a si a pawt hiam a hihleh, a nitna dan ngeina sung a a om zel bang in si pawtmi a nit sung teng in a om tei ding hi; a nin ahi.
A si pawt sung teng a lupna a lupna taphot a nitdan ngeina hun lai a a lupna bang ahi ding a; a tutna peuhmah a nitdan ngeina hun lai a a nit bang in a nin ding.
Kuapeuh huai thil khoih peuhmahte a nin ding ua, a puante uh a sawp ding ua, kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding uh.
Himahleh a si pawt pen hih siangthou a hihleh, ni sagih a kipe ding a, huai nung in a hong siangthou ta ding.
Huan, a ni giat ni in vakhu kop khat hiam, vapal nou kop khat hiam a tawi ding a, kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah siampu a hong pe ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in khelh thoihna ding in khat, haltum thillat ding in khat a lan ding ahi; huchi in siampu in si pawt mi a nitna thu ah TOUPA ma ah kilepna a bawl sak ding ahi
Hichi bang in Israel suante a nitna ua kipan na hih tuam ding uh ahi, a lak ua ka biakbuk a hih buah khak chiang ua leng a nitna ziak ua a sih louhna ding un.
Hiai bel thil pawt mite leh nit loh a kithuahna chi pawt mite a dia dan ahi;A nitna ziak a china nu bang, thil pawt nei mipa bang, numei-pasal, numei a nit lai ua luppihte a ding leng, chi in.
A nitna ziak a china nu bang, thil pawt nei mipa bang, numei-pasal, numei a nit lai ua luppihte a ding leng, chi in.
Huan, Aron tapa nihte'n TOUPA a va naih ua a sihloh nung un TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a;
TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Na unau Aron houpih inla, puanzak sung mun siangthou ah, bawm tung a chitna tutphah ma ah chiklai in leng hon lut hetkei heh, a si kha ding hi; chitna tutphah tungah, mei in ka hong kihil sin ahi.
Hichi bang in Aron pen mun siangthou ah a hoh ding ahi: khelh thoihna ding in bawng tuai, haltum thillat ding in belampa toh.
Puan malngat puannak siangthou a silh ding a, a sa khuhna ding in puan malngat pheitawm a bun ding, puan malngat dial a khim ding ahi: hiaite puansilh siangthou ahi a; a kisil masa dia, a silh phet ding ahi.
Huan, Israel suante mipi houna kelpa nih khelh thoihna ding in leh haltum thillat ding in belampa khat a tawi ding.
Huan, Aron in amah a tuam khelh thoihna bawngpa pen a lan ding a, amah leh a innkote a ding in kilepna a bawl ding.
Kel nih a kai ding a, kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul ah TOUPA ma ah a koih ding.
Huan, Aron in kel nih tungthu ah ai a san ding a, khat TOUPA a tuam ahi ding a, khat Azazel a tuam ahi ding.
Huan, Aron in TOUPA a tuam dia puk kel a la ding a, khelh thoihna ding in a lan ding hi.
Azazel a tuam dia pukpuk kel bel kilepna bawlna ding a Azazel a ding a khah ding in TOUPA ma ah a hing in a koih ding hi.
Huan, Aron in ama a tuam khelhna bawngpa pen a la ding a, amah leh a innkote a ding in kilepna a bawl ding a, amah a tuam khelh thoihna bawngpa pen a gou ding ahi;
Huan, TOUPA ma a maitam a kipan meilakna mei-am a khat a la ding a, gimlim mahmah gawizan ngingei pham khat toh puanzak sung lam ah a hon lupih ding a;
Gimlim khu in thu theihpihna tung a chitna tutphah a bopna ding in TOUPA ma a mei ah gimlim a buak ding a, sihna a tuah louhna ding in;
Huan, bawngpa sisan bangzah hiam a la ding a, a khut zung in chitna tutphah suah lam pang a theh ding a, a khut in chitna tutphah bul sisan in sagih vei a theh ding ahi.
Huan, mipi a tuam khelh thoihna kel pen a gou ding a, a sisan bawngpa sisan a bawl bang in a bawl ding a, chitna tutphah leh chitna tutphah bul a theh ding hi;
Israel suante nitnate ziak leh a nitnate uh, a khelhna tengteng uh ziak in mun siangthou a ding in kilepna a bawl ding: huaimah bang in, a nitnate uh lak a om, kihoupihna puan inn a ding in leng a bawl sam ding ahi.
Mun siangthou a kilepna bawl ding a a lut lai in, amah leh a innkote leh Israel mipte a ding in kilepna a bawl khit a a hong pawt khiak masiah kuamahmah peuh puan inn sung a a om ding uh ahi kei hi
TOUPA ma a maitam lam ah a pawt ding a, huai a ding in kilepna a bawl ding a, bawngpa sisan leh kel sisan bangzah hiam a la ding a, maitam kite ah a kimvel in a tat ding hi.
Huan, a khut in sagih vei a theh ding a, a siangsak ding a, Israel suante nitnate lak a kipan a hih siangthou ding.
Huan, mun siangthou leh kihoupihna puan inn leh maitam a ding a kilepna a bawl khit in kel hing pen a lan ding:
Aron in kel hing lu tungah a khut langnih a koih ding a, a tungah Israel suante ginatlouhna tengteng, a tatlekna tengteng, a khelhna tengteng uh tan in a samkhe ding a; huaite kel lu tungah a nga ding a, mi khat a sehkholhsa un gamdai lam ah a pi mang ding:
Huan, kel in a thulimlouhna tengteng uh luahlouh gamah a po ding a, kel bel gamdai ah a khah ding hi.
Huan, Aron kihoupihna puan inn ah a lut ding a, mun siangthou a lut lai a puan malngat puansilh a silh a suah ding a, huailai ah a nuse ding hi;
Huan, mun siangthou ah a kisil ding a, a puansilh a silh ding, a hong pawtkhe ding a, amah a tuam haltum thillat leh mipi a tuam haltum thillat a lan ding a, amah leh mipi a ding kilepna a bawl ding.
Huan, khelh thoihna thau maitam ah a hal ding.
Huan, Azazel a tuam kel khahmi kuapeuh in a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding ua, huai khit chiang in a omna mun lam uah a pai nawn ding uh ahi.
Khelh thoihna bawngpa leh khelh thoihna kel sisan kilepna a bawlna ding a mun siangthou a a lutpih uh dai po lam ah a paipih ding ahi; a vun, a sa, a ek a hal ding uh ahi.
A hal mi in a puan a sawp ding a, a kisil ding a, huai khit in om mun lam ah a pai nawn ding ahi.
Huan, hiai na khantawn dan ding uh ahi: kha sagihna, huai kha ni sawm ni in na lungsimte uh na gimsak ding ua, na gam ua mi him hiam, gamdang mi na lak ua teng hiam in nnasep bangmah a sep ding uh ahi kei hi:
Hiai ni in noute hih siangthouna ding in noute ding in kilepna bawl ahi sin hi; huchi in TOUPA ma ah na khelhna tengteng lak ua kipan na siangthou ding uhi.
Nou ding in khawl kinkenna ni ahi a, na lungsimte uh na gimsak ding uh; khantawn dan ding ahi.
Huan, siampu, a pa sik a siampu hi ding a sathau nilh ding leh hihtuam mi ding in kilepna a bawl ding a, puan malngat puansilh siangthou a silh ding a; mun siangthou a ding in kilepna a bawl ding; kihoupihna puan inn leh maitam a ding in kilepna a bawl sam ding hi;
Huan, siampute leh mipi hon a ding in kilepna bawl nawn lai ding.A khelh tengteng uh ziak a kum chih a khat vei Israel suante a dia kilepna bawl na khantawn dan ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Huchi in TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in a hih hi.
A khelh tengteng uh ziak a kum chih a khat vei Israel suante a dia kilepna bawl na khantawn dan ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Huchi in TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in a hih hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Aron leh a tapate leh Israel suante tengteng houpih inla, a kiang uah, Hiai TOUPA thupiak ahi:
Israel innko lak a mi himhim bawngpa hiam, belamnou hiam, kel hiam giahmun hiam, dainawl hiam a gou a,
TOUPA biakbuk ma a TOUPA a ding a thillat ding a kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul a hon tawilou peuhmah, huai mi sisan suah a ngaih ahi ding; sisan suah ngei ahi, huai zaw a chipihte lak a kipan tuamkoih a om ding ahi.
Huaibel, Israel suante'n a kithoihnate uh, gamlak a kithoihnate uh a honlak ua, TOUPA a ding ngei a kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul a, siampu kiang a ahon lak ua, TOUPA a dia lemna thillat kithoihna ding a kithoihna theihna ding uh ahi.
Huan, siampu in kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul a maitam sisan in a theh ding a, a thau TOUPA ding in gimlim tak in a hal ding ahi.
A angkawm sekna uh kelpa kiang a a kithoih nawn ding uh ahi ta kei, chih pen.
Hiai bel a suante uh zel tan a khantawn ding dan ding ahi.
Huan, a kiang uah, Israel innko mi himhim hiam, gamdang mi a lak ua tengte hiam in haltum thillat hiam, kithoihna hiam,
TOUPA kiang a kithoihna ding a kihoupihna puan inn kongpi bul a hon tawilou a om uleh huai mi a chipihte lak a kipan tuamkoih a om ding ahi.
Huan, kuapeuh Israel innko lak mi hiam, gamdang mi a lak ua teng hiam, bang sisan leng ne peuhmah, huai sisan ne mi tungah ka mai ka gumsak ding a, a chipihte lak a kipan in tuamkoih in ka omsak ding.
Sa hinna pen sisan ah a om ngal a: na hinna ding ua kilemna bawl ding a maitam tung a nou ka hon piak ahi: hinna ding a kilemna bawlna pen sisan mahmah lah ahi ngal a.
Huaiziak in Israel suante kiang ah, Kuamah in sisan na ne ding uh ahikei, gamdang na lak ua teng in leng sisan a ne ding uh ahi samkei, ka chi ahi.
Huan, Israel suante lak mi hiam, gamdang mi a lak ua teng hiam, gam va vak a sa hiam, vasa hiam a, nektheih chi a hon tut leh a sisan a pawt ding a, leivui a a vuh ding ahi.
Sa tengteng hinna thu ah a sisan leh a hinna kibang geih ahi; huaiziak in Israel suante kiang ah, Bang sa sisan mawngmawng na ne ding uh ahi kei, sa tengteng hinna a sisan ahi ngal a; kuapeuh a nene tuamkoih a om ding ahi.
Huan, amah sisih a si hiam, sa keih hiam nene, huai gam a mi him hiam leng hi hen aw, a puan uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitak lam tan in a nin ding ua; huaizoh in a hong siangthou ta ding uh.A sawp kei ua a kisil kei ngial uleh houh a thulimlouhna moh a po ding uh ahi, ka chi hi, chi in, chi in.
A sawp kei ua a kisil kei ngial uleh houh a thulimlouhna moh a po ding uh ahi, ka chi hi, chi in, chi in.
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Na omna masa uh Aigupta gam mite hih bang in hih kei unla, ka hon pilut na ding Kanaan gam mite hih bang in leng hih sam kei un.
Ka vaihawmte na pom ding ua, ka dante zui in na mang ding uh ahi: Kei bel TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Huaiziak in ka dan leh ka vaihawmte na mang ding uh ahi: huaibel mi'n a hihleh a hinloh ding hi: Kei bel TOUPA mah ka hi.
Kuamah in na tanau nute uh mawngmawng a vuaktanna uh lem ding in na zuan ding uh ahi kei: Kei TOUPA pen ka hi.
Na pa vuaktanna, na nu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei: na nu ahi a, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei.
Na pa zi vuaktanna na lem ding ah kei, na pa vuaktanna ahi.
Na sanggamnu, na pa tanu hiam na nu tanu hiam, na pianpih hiam, na pianpih louh hiamte vuaktanna leng na lem ding ahi kei hi.
Na tapa tanu hiam, na tanu tanu hiam vuaktanna, a vuaktanna uh na lem ding ahi kei.
A vuaktanna uh nang vuaktanna ahi ngal a.
Na pa zi tanu, na pa suan vuaktanna, na sanggamnu ahi, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei.
Na pa sanggamnu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei; na pa tanaunu nai ahi hi.
Na nu sanggamnu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, na nu tanaunu nai ahi ngal a.
Na pa sanggam a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, a zi na zuan ding ahi kei, na nu ahi hi.
Na mounu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, na tapa zi ahi a, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, na tapa zi ahi a, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei.
Na sanggampa zi vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, na sanggampa vuaktanna ahi.
Nutate vuaktanna na lem ding uh ahi kei; a vuaktanna lem ding in a tapa tanu hiam, a tanu tanu hiam na la ding ahi kei; na tanau naite ahi ua; gitlouhna lianpi ahi.
Na zi sanggamnu, a vuaktanna lem ding in na zi a damlai siah, na neih ding ahi kei.
Huan, numei a nitdan ngeina a a nit sung in a vuaktannna lem ding in na zuan ding ahikei.
A lak a kihihnin ding in na innvengpa zi na luppih ding ahi kei.
Molek a dia mei a lutsak ding in na gil a gah himhim na pe ding ahi kei a, na Pathian min na hihse ding ahi sam kei hi: Kei TOUPA ka hi hi.
Numei bang in pasal na kithuahpih ding ahi kei: thil kihhuai ahi.
Kihihnitna ding in ganta hinhim na kithuahpih ding ahi kei, numei himhim kithuahsak ding in ganta ma ah a ding ding ahikei hi; gitlouhna tungtuan ahi.
Hiaite ah, a bangmahmah ah kihihnin kei un; hiai thil tengteng ah na ma ua ka delhkhiak khitsa namte a na nin khin ta ua;
A gam leng a nin khin ta hi: huaiziak in huai a a thulimlouhna ka gawt a, gam in a sung a omte a lokhe khin vek hi.
Huaiziak in nou zaw ka dante, ka vaihawmte na zuih ding uh ahi, hiai thil kihhuai a bangmahmah na hih ding uh ahi kei, na gam ua mi him hiam, gamdang mi na lak ua teng hiam leng:
(Hiai thil kihhuai tengteng na ma ua hiai gam a omte'n a na hihkhin ua, gam mah leng a nin khin ta hi: )
Na ma ua om nam a lokhia mah bang in na hihnit ua gam in a hon luak tei louhna ding in.
Kuapeuh hiai thil kihhuai a bangmahmah hih mi zaw a chipihte lak a kipan koihtuam in a om ding uh.Huaiziak in hiai thil kihhuai na ma ua a chin bang uh na chin tei louh na ding un leh huai a na kihihnit louhna ding un ka thupiak na zuiah ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi, chi in, chi in.
Huaiziak in hiai thil kihhuai na ma ua a chin bang uh na chin tei louh na ding un leh huai a na kihihnit louhna ding un ka thupiak na zuiah ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi, chi in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suan, mipite tengteng houpih inla, a kiang uah, Na siangthou ding uh ahi: Kei, TOUPA na Pathian uh ka siangthou ngal a.
Mi chih in na nu uh leh na pa uh laudan na siam ding uh ahi, huan, ka khawlnite na tan ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA Na Pathian uh ka hi hi.
Milim lam ah awn kei unla, milim sun pathiante leng kibawltawm kei un: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Huan, TOUPA a dia kilepna thillat dia na kithoih hun uh pom tak hi ding in na lat ding uh ahi.
Na lat nitak un leh a zing a nek ding ahi: ni thum ni tan a om a om leh hal ding ahi.
Ni thum ni a nek a hih zenhouh leh thil kihhuai ahi a; pomsak ahi kei ding.
A ne kuapeuh in TOUPA thil siangthou a hihnit ziak in a thulimlouhna moh a po ding a, huai mi zaw a chipihte lak a kipan a tuam om zawk ding ahi.
Huan, na lou ua na buh na lak chiang un lounawl zulte uh tan in na lak vek louh ding uh ahi, a sang leng na zon ding uh ahi kei
Huan, na grep huan ua a sang na zon ding uh ahi kei, na grep huan ua a gah kia leng na tom khawm ding uh ahi kei, mi genthei leh gamdang mi di'n na hawisak ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi hi.
Guk na gu ding uh ahi kei, a taklou in thil na hih ding uh ah kei, zuai na kihilh ding uh ahi sam kei.
Na Pathian uh min hemsak in ka min in diklou tak in na kichiam ding uh ahi kei hi: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Na innsak-innkhangte na khem ding ahi kei, na guksak ding leng ahi kei.
Kilohmi loh zankhua in a zingsang tan in na kem ding ahi kei hi.
Nangong na hamsiat ding ah kei, mittaw ma ah pukna na koih ding ahi sam kei, na Pathian laudan na siam ding ahi: Kei TOUPA ka hi hi.
Vaihawm na ah diktatlou tak in na hawm ding uh ahi kei; mi genthei na khentuam ding ahi kei, mi thilhihthei na khentuam ding ahi kei, mi thilhihthei na zahtak tuan ding ahi kei, diktat tak in na innsak-innkhang vai na hawmsak ding ahi.
Na chipihte lak ah mite gensia in na vialvak ding ahikei, na innsak-innkhang sisan thu ah a hilou lam in na pang ding ahi sam kei: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Na lungsim in na unau na mudah ding ahi kei: na innsak-innkhang na taihilh ngeingei ding ahi, a gitlouhna a na hulna ding in.
Phu na la ding ahi kei, na chipih suante muhdahna na pai ding ahi sam kei, nang na ki-it bang in na innsak-innkhang na it ding ahi zaw: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Ka thupiakte na pom ding uh ahi.
Na ganta chituamtuam suangsak ke'n: na lou ah haichi chinih ching ke'n la, thil chituam nih gatpolh puan leng na silh ding ahi kei.
Kuapeuh bawinu, pasal khammi nei, tat nai louh, khah nai louh numei toh lum khawm peuhmah gawt ahi ding uh: hihlup ding bel ahi kei ding ua, amah pawt sak a hih nai louh jiakin.
Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bulah TOUPA kianga a tatlekna kithoihna, tatlek thoihna belampa a honkaih ding ahi.
Huan, a thil hihkhelhsa, a khelhnaah TOUPA maah tatlek thoihna belampain siampuin kilepna a bawlsak ding; huchiin a thil hihkhelhsa a khelhnaah ngaihdam ahi ding.
Huah, gam na valuah ua, nek dia thei kung chi chih na suan hun un a gah siang louin na ngai ding uh: nou din kum thum siang lou-a ngaih ding ahi; nek het louh ding ahi.
Himahleh, a kum li kumin a gah tengteng TOUPA phatna dingin amah atuam dia hihtuam ding ahi.
Huan, a kum nga kumin nou dia a pun jel theihna dingin a gah na ne ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
A sisan nangawn toh bangmah na ne ding uh ahi kei, bum khawng chingin ai khawng na san ding uh leng ahi kei.
Na baknel akipanin a kimvelin na lu na met ding ahi kei, na kha mul lang tuak leng na tan ding ahi sam kei.
Misi jiakin na sa uh na at ding uh ahi keia, na kigelh ding uh leng ahi sam kei: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Kijuak dia bawl dingin na tanu thanghuai sak ken; gam angkawmna gam a hongsuak dinga, thulimlouhnain a hongdim kha ding hi.
Ka khawlnite na tan ding uh ahi, ka mun siangthou na zahtak ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA ka hi hi.
Dawi aisansiam jawlte juan kei unla, bum siamte leng na nit louhna ding un amau zong khe kei un: Kei TOUPA ka hi hi.
Lu-a kelsam poute maa na din jel jel ding ahi a, tek mel na zah ding ahi, na Pathian laudan na siam ding a: kei TOUPA ka hi hi.
Huan, gam dangmi, na gama na teng sam a om uh leh na suksiat ding uh ahi kei.
Gam dang mi na lak ua tengte bel nou dingin na gam ua mi him bang ahi ding ua, nangmah na kiit bangin na it ding ahi: nou leng huai Aigupta gamah gam dangmi na nahi uhi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Vaihawm thu ah bang, tehna chiang ah bang, gikdan ah bang, tehna ah bang diktatloupiin na hih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Bukna dik, gikdan dik, epha dik, hin dik na nei ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi, Aigupta gam akipan nou honpi khepa ka hi hi.Huan, ka thupiak tengteng leh ka vaihawm tengteng na pom ding ua, na jui ding uhi; Kei TOUPA ka hi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, ka thupiak tengteng leh ka vaihawm tengteng na pom ding ua, na jui ding uhi; Kei TOUPA ka hi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante kiangah, Kuapeuh, Israel suante laka mi hiam, Israel gama teng gam dang mi hiam, a gil ua gah Molek pia peuhmahte hihlup ngeingei ding ahi; hiai gama miteng suanga a den lup ding uh ahi.
Huan, ken leng, ka mun siangthou hihnin ding leh ka min siangthou hihbuah dinga a gila gah Molek a piak jiakin huai mi tungah ka mai ka gum sak dinga, a chipihte laka kipan ka hihmangthang ding hi.
Huan, hiai gama miten a gil ua gah Molek a piak uh a kitheihmohbawl ua, a hihlup kei uleh amah leh;
A inkote tungah ka mai ka gum sak dinga, Molek laka angkawm dinga kei hon angkawmsan peuhmahte toh a chipihte uh laka kipan ka hihmangthang ding hi.
Huan, a lak ua angkawm dinga dawi aisansiam jawlte leh bumsiamte juanmi tungah ka mai ka gum sak ding, a chipihte laka kipan ka hihmang ding hi.
Huaijiakin kihihsiangthou unla, singthouin om un: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi ngala.
Ka thupiakte na pom un na jui ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA nou honhihsiangthoupa ka hi hi.
A nu hiam, a pa hiam hamsiat khum peuhmah hihlup ngeingei ding ahi: a nu hiam, a pa hiam hamsiat khum ahi a, a tungah a sisan moh a om ding ahi.
Mi ji ang kawm, a insakinkhang ji angkawm jaw a angkawmpa leh a angkawmnu hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Huan, pate ji luppih jaw, a pa vuaktanna lem ahi a, hihlup tuaktuak ding ahi uh, a sisan moh uh a tunguah a om ding ahi.
Min a mounu a luppih leh hihlup tuaktuak ding ahi uh; thulimlouhna tungtuan hih ahi ua, a sisan moh uh a tunguah a om ding hi.
Min numei a luppih banga pasal a luppih leh thil kihhuai mahmah a hih tuaktuak ahia, hihlup ngeingei ding ahi uh; a sisan moh uh a tunguah a om ding hi.
Min nuta jia a neih leh thulimlouhna mahmah ahi, na lak ua thulimlouhna a om louhna dingin amah leh amau nihte leng hihlup ding ahi.
Min ganta a luppih leh hihlup ngeingei ding ahi, ganta leng a hihlup ding uh ahi.
Huan, numeiin ganta a vanaiha, a kithuahsak leh numei na hihlup ngeingei ding uh ahi, ganta leng: hihlup ngeingei ding ahi ua; a sisan moh uh a tung ua a om ding ahi.
Min a sanggamnu, a pa tanu hiam, a nu tanu hiam a laka a vuaktanna a muha, aman leng a vuaktanna a muh leh thil zumhuai mahmah ahi, a chipihte uh suante mitmuha hihman ding ahi uhi; a sanggamnu vuaktanna a lem ahi, a tatlekna moh a po ding.
Huan, min numei a kizen louh laia a luppiha, a vuaktanna a lem leh a si pawtna lem ahi a, amah leng a si pawtna lem ahi a, huchiin a chipihte uh laka kipan hihman tuaktuak ding ahi uhi.
Huchiin na nu sanggamnu hiam, na pa sangnu hiam vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei; a sanggam nai vuaktanna bawl ahi: a thulimlouhna moh uh a po ding uh.
Min a pangak ji a luppih leh a pangak vuaktanna lem ahi; a khelh moh uh a po ding ua, suanlehpak beiin a si ding uh.
Min a unaupa ji a neih leh thil nin ahi: a unaupa vuaktanna lem ahi a, suanlehpak louin a om ding uh.
Huchiin ka thupiak tengteng, ka vaihawm tengteng na pom ding ua, na jui ding uhi: huchiin om dinga ka honpina gamin nou a honlo khe kei ding hi.
Na ma ua ka delhkhiaksa nam dangte na jui ding uh ahi kei: hiai thil tengteng a hih sek ua, huaijiakin ka kih ahi.
Ahihhangin nou kiang ajaw, A gam uh, nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gam na luah ding ua, na luah ding un ka honpe ding: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh, nam dangte laka honhihtuampa ka hi.
Huaijiakin sa siang leh sianglou leh vasa siang leh siang lou na khentuam ding ua; sa hiam, vasa hiam lei a a vaka vak thoh chi himhim hiam nou adia sianglou dia ka sehtuamtein na hinna uh na kihhuai sak ding uh ahi kei hi.
Keia dingin mi siangthou na hi ding uhi; Kei TOUPA lah ka siangthou ngala, keia na hihna ding un namdangte lakah nou ka honseptuama, ka nahihkhinta hi.Pasal leng numei leng dawi aisansiam jawl hiam, bumsiam hiam jaw hihlup ngeingei ding ahi: suanga denlup ding ahi uh hi: a sisan moh uh a tunguah a om ding hi, chi nawn laiin, chiin.
Pasal leng numei leng dawi aisansiam jawl hiam, bumsiam hiam jaw hihlup ngeingei ding ahi: suanga denlup ding ahi uh hi: a sisan moh uh a tunguah a om ding hi, chi nawn laiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Aron tapa, siampute houpih inla a kiang uah, A chipihte uh laka misi jiakin kuamah a kihihnin ding uh ahi kei;
A tanau nai, anu uh, a pa uh, a tapa uh, a tanu uh, a unau uh,
A sagngamnu uh, a ompih lai uh nungak, pasal nei nailoute jiakin a hihleh a kihihnin thei ding uh.
A chipihte uh laka a intekpen a hih jiak un a kihihinin un a thanghuai ding uh ahi kei hi.
A lu uh a met giau ding uh ahi kei, a kha mul sik tuak uh leng a tan ding uh ahi sam keia, a sa uh leng a at ding uh ahi kei lai hi.
A Pathian uh adingin mi siangthou ahi ding uh a, a Pathian min uh a hemsak ding uh ahi kei hi; TOUPA adia meia thillate, a Pathian uh a dia nek ding ansiah te a lan sek uh ahi: huaijiakin a siangthou ding uh ahi;
Numei, kijuak hiam, min hem hiam, a pasal maksa hiam a kitenpih ding uh ahi kei: a Pathian uh dingin mi siangthou ahi ngal ua.
Huaijiakin na siangthou ding ahi; na Pathian adia nek dingin ansiah a lan jel ngal ua, nanga dingin mi siangthou ahi ding uhi: Kei, TOUPA nou honhihsiangthoupa lah ka siangthou ngala.
Siampu kuapeuh a tanu kijuaka a kihihthanghuai leh a pa a hihthanghuai ahi a, hal ding ahi.
A unaute laka siampu lalpen, a lu sathau nilh chia nilhsa, puansilh silh dinga hihtuamsain a sam a khah ding ahi kei, a puante a bot kek ding ahi kei,
Misi luang omna ah a lut ding ahi keia, a nu hiam, a pa hiam jiakin a kihihthanghuai ding ahi sam kei.
Mun siangthou akipan a pawtkhe ding ahi keia, a Pathian mun siangthou a hihthanghuai ding ahi sam kei lai hi; a Pathian sathau nilh chia hihtuamna lah a tungah a om ngala: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Ji dingin nungak siangthou a kitenpih ding ahi.
Meithai hiam, maksa hiam, numei minhem hiam, kijuak hiam te jaw a kitenpih ding ahi keia, amah chipih, nungak siangthou ji ding in a kitenpih ding ahi.
Huan, a chipihte laka a suante a hihthanghuai ding ahi kei: Kei TOUPA, a hihsiangthoupa lah ka hi ngala, chiin, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Aron kiangah, A suante uh jel tana na suante uh laka paulam ding nei peuhmahin a Pathian nek ding ansiah lan dingin honjuan kei hen.
Kuapeuh paulam ding nei peuhmahin a honnaih hetlouh ding uh ahi: mittawte, kehbai te, nakpek te, akan avala om peuhmahte,
Khe kitante, khut kitante,
Nungkun te, mi neu luate, mit kizenzou loute, mi kijun loute, lip kaite, chiltang kitamte:
Siampu Aron suan gensiatding nei himhimin TOUPA adia meia thillat lan dingin a honnaih ding uh ahi kei: gensiatding nei ahi ua, a Pathian uh nek ding ansiah lan dingin a honnaih het louh ding uh ahi.
A Pathian uh nek ding ansiah, a siangthou leh a siangthou pen leng a ne thei tuaktuak ding uh.
Ahihhangin, gensiat ding nei a hih jiak un puanjak suangah hiam, maitam kiang naiah hiam jaw a hongpai theikei ding uh, ka mun siangthoute a hihthanghuai kha ding uhi; Kei TOUPA, amaute hihsiangthoupa lah ka hi ngala, chiin, chiin.Huchiin Mosiin Aron leh a tapate leh Israel suante tengteng kiangah a chita hi.
Huchiin Mosiin Aron leh a tapate leh Israel suante tengteng kiangah a chita hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Aron leh a tapate kiangah gen inla, Israel suante thil siangthou, kei dia a latte uh laka kituamjial uhen, ka min a hemsak kha ding uhi: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
A kiang uah, Na suante uh jel tana na suante uh tengteng laka mi, kuapeuh nin pipi-a Israel suanten TOUPA adia a lat uh thil sianthou a honnaih uleh kei akipan sat khiaka om ding ahi: kei TOUPA ka hi.
Aron suan kuapeuh phak hiam, thil pawt hiamin a sianthou masiah thil siangthoute laka a nek louh ding ahi.
Huan, misi hihnit hiam, chi amah akipana pawt khoih peuhmah.
A nit theihna, a vaka vak thoh thil himhim hiam, mi amaha kipana a nitna ban theihna hiam, nitna bangmapeuh nei hiam khoihtaphot,
Huchibang khoihmi jaw nitak lam tanin a nin dinga, huan, a kisil keileh thil siangthoute laka anek louh ding ahi.
Huan, ni a tum leh a siangthou ta ding hi: huai khit chiangin thilsiangthoute laka a ne theita ding, a nek ding a hih jiakin.
Kihihnitna dingin amah sih a si hiam, sa keih hiam a ne ding ahi kei: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Huaijiakin ka thupiak a pom ding ahi; huchilouinjaw a kihihthanghuaina uah a khelh moh uh a po ding uhi, a sih loh ding uh: Kei TOUPA, amaute hihsiangthoupa ka hi ngala.
Gam dang min thil siangthou a ne ding uh ahi kei; siampu kianga gamta hiam, kiloh hiamin thil siangthou a ne ding uh ahi kei.
Ahihhangin siampuin kuahiam amah sum a alei leh, huai miin a ne thei ding; huan, a ina piangten a nek ding a ne sam ding uh.
Siampu tanuin gam dang mi a kitenpih leh vei thillat, thil siangthoute laka a ne ding ahi kei.
Ahihhangin siampu tanu ta neilouin meithaiin hiam, mak hiama a oma, a pa in lama a kik nawn leh a nungak lai mah bangin a pa nek ding a ne sam ding hi; himahleh gam dang miin a ne ding uh ahi kei.
Min theilou-a thil siangthou a nek leh a mun ngaa khena mun khat a koih behlap dinga, thil siangthou pen siampun a pe ding ahi.
A thil siangthoute uh nein mohna tungsaktu, thulimlouhna moh kipsak dingin Israel suante thil siangthou,
TOUPA kianga a latte uh a hihbuah ding uh ahi kei; Kei TOUPA, amaute hihsiangthoupa lah ka hi ngala, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Aron leh a tapate leh Israel suante tengteng houpih inla, akiang uah, Israel laka om, gam dang mi hiam, kuapeuh a thillat uh, haltum thillat dia TOUPA kianga a lat uh, a thuchiamna uh hiam, mahni ut thua thillat hiam lan peuhmaten.
Santak na hih theihna ding un bawng hiam, belam hiam, kel hiam, a pa gensiatbei na lat ding uh ahi.
Gensiat kai himhim jaw na lat ding uh ahi kei; honpomsak tak lah ahi sin ngal keia.
Kuapeuh thuchiam hihbuching ding hiam, mahni ut thua-a thillat ding hiam lemna thillat kithoihna ganhon laka hiam, a belam hon laka hiam TOUPA kianga lantaphotin, pom tak a hih theihna dingin gensiatbei alat ding ahi; gensiat kaina himhim a om ding ahi kei hi.
A mittaw bang, a guh tan bang, a bai bang, meima nei bang, chibawk bang, phak bang, TOUPA kianga na lat ding uh ahi kei, meia thillat dingin TOUPA kiangah maitamah na lan ding uh ahi kei.
Mahni ut thu-a thillat dingin bawngpa hiam.
Belamnou hiam akan avala om hiam, tom lua hiam leng na lan thei ding uh; thuchiamna dingin bel pomsak ahi kei ding.
A chiltang sut dup hiam, sut jak hiam, sut tap hiam, keh hiam jaw TOUPA kiangah na lan ding uh ahi kei, na gam uah huchibang jaw ki thoihna dingin na zang ding uh ahi sam kei.
Gam dang mi akipana lain huaite laka himhim jaw na Pathian uh nek ding ansiah dingin na lan ding uh hi lou ahi, huaia siatna leh gensiat kaina a om jiakin; pom sak theih na hi kei ding uhi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Bawngpa hiam, belam hiam, kel hiam, a hongpian chiangin a pi kiangah ni sagih a om ding ahi, ni giat ni akipan huai nunglamin TOUPA adia meia thillat dingin pom theih ahi ding.
Bawngpi hiam, belampi hiam, anou toh ni khatin na gou ding uh ahi kei.
Huan, kipahthugenna kithoih dia TOUPA kianga na kithoih hun chiang un san tak na hih theihna ding un na kithoih ding uh ahi.
Huai niin nek bei ding ahi, a jingchiang tanin bangmah na sit ding uh ahi kei.
Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Huaijiakin ka thupiakte na pom ding ua, na jui ding uh ahi; Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Huan, ka min siangthou na hemsak ding uh ahi kei, Israel suante lakah pahtawiin ka om ding ahi.Kei noute honpahtawipa, na Pathian uh hi dinga Aigupta gam akipan noute honpikhia TOUPA ka hi.
Kei TOUPA ka hi. chiin.
Kei noute honpahtawipa, na Pathian uh hi dinga Aigupta gam akipan noute honpikhia TOUPA ka hi.
Kei TOUPA ka hi. chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, TOUPA ankuanglui hunbi hiaite ahi.
Ni guk nasep ding ahi a, ni sagih ni bel chiktaka laka khawlna, khawmpi siangthou ahi; bang nasep himhim na sep ding uh ahi kei: na omna peuh uah TOUPA adingin khawlni ahi.
TOUPA ankuanglui hunbi, khawmpi siangthou, a hun geihgeiha na bawl ding uh hiaite ahi.
Kha khatna, ni sawm leh ni li ni nitak lam TOUPA Paikan Ankuangluina ahi.
Huan, huai kha mah ni sawm leh ni nga ni TOUPA adia tanghou silngou soh louh angkuangluina ahi: ni sagih sung tanghou silngou soh louh na ne ding uh ahi.
A ni khat niin khawmpi siangthou na nei ding ua, nasep himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei.
Ni sagih sungin meia thillat TOUPA kiangah na lan ding ua: a ni sagih ni pen khawmpi siangthou ahia, na himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kon gam piak ding na va tun ua, huailaia buh khawng na lak hun chiang un, na buh thak masate uh phal khat siampu kianga nontawi ding uh ahi.
Huan, pom sak theih na hihna ding un, aman buhphal pen TOUPA maah a honnavei sak dinga; huan, khawlni jingchiangin siampuin a vei ding ahi.
Huan, buhphal na vei ni un belamnou a pa, gensiatbei kum khata upa haltum thillat dingin TOUPA kianga na lat ding uh ahi.
Huan, huaia tangbuang thillat bel tangbuang nel chi epha mun sawma khena mun nih sathaua mek TOUPA adia gim lim mahmah, meia thillat ahi ding ahi: huan, huaia dawn ding thil thillat a hihleh uain hin mun lia khena mun khat ahi ding ahi.
Na Pathian ading ua thillat na lat ma un, huai ma himhimin a tanghouin hiam, a kanin hiam, a vuiin hiam ane ding uh ahi kei: hiai bel na omna peuh ua na suante jel uh tana na khantawn dan ding uh ahi.
Khawlni jingchiang jingchiang nawn, vei thillat buhphal non tawi ni ua patin na sim ding ua, khawlni sagih vei a ching ding ahi:
Huan, khawlni sagihveina jingsang akipan ni sawmnga na sim ding ua, TOUPA kianga tangbuang thak thillat na lat ding uh ahi.
Na omna mun ua kipanin epah mun sawma khena mun niha bawl, tanghou beu vei ding nih, tangbuang nel chi, silngou toh kan, TOUPA dinga bawl masakpen lat ding na hontawi ding uh ahi.
Huan, tanghou lat toh kituakin belamnou sagih gensiat bei kum khata upa leh bawng tuai leh belampa nih na lan ding uh: huaite bel atangbuang thillat uh leh a dawn ding thillate utoh, TOUPA adia haltum thillat, TOUPA adia gimlim mahmah, meia thillat ahi ding hi.
Huan, khelh thoihna dingin kelpa khat leh kilepna thillat kithoihna dingin belamnou a pa nih kum khata upa na lat ding uh ahi.
Huan, siampuin bawl masakpen tanghou belamnou nih toh TOUPA maa vei thillat dingin a vei dinga: siampu atuam, TOUPA adia siangthou ahi ding.
Huan, huai ni mah na sep ding ua, nou adingin khawmpi siangthou ahi dinga, na himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei: hiai bel na omna peuh uah na suante jel uh tanin na khantawn dan ding uh ahi.
Huan, na lou ua buh na lak chiang un na lounawl jul uh la vek kei un, a sang leng na zong ding uh ahi kei: mi genthei leh gamdang mi adin na hawi sak ding uhi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kha sagihna huai kha ni khat ni nou dingin chiktaka lak khawlna, pengkul muta theihgigena, khawmpi siangthou ahi ding.
Na himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei; TOUPA adia meia thillat na lan ding uhi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Kha sagihna ni sawm ni bel kilemna ni ahi a: nou dingin khawmpi siangthou ahi ding, na lungsimte uh na hihgim ding ua; huan, TOUPA dingin meia thillat na lan ding uh.
Huai niin bang na peuhpeuh na hih ding uh ahi kei: TOUPA na Pathian uh maa lemna honbawlsak dinga kilemna ni lah ahi ngala.
Huai nia sukgima omlou kuapeuhmah, a mite akipan hihman hi ding ahi ngala.
Kuapeuh hi hen aw, nuai nia bang na peuh sem jaw, huai mite a chipihte uh laka kipan ka hihmang ding ahi.
Bang na himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei: hiai bel na omna peuh ua na suante jel uh tana khantawn dan ding ahi.
Nou dingin khawlni chiktaka lak khawlni ahi dinga, na lungsimte uh na hihgim ding uh ahi; huai kha ni kua ni nitaklam, huai kha nitak lam akipan nitak lam nawn tan khawlni dingin na zang ding uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kha sagihna ni sawm leh ni nga ni jaw TOUPA adingin ni sagih sung Bawkte Ankuangluina ahi hi.
A ni khatna pen khawmpi siangthou ahi dinga, na himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei.
Ni sagih sungin meia thillat TOUPA kiangah na lan ding ua, a ni giat ni bel nou dingin khawmpi siangthou ahi ding; meia thillat TOUPA kiangah na lan ding uh: khawmpi venna thupi mahmah ahi: na himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei.
Hiaite ahi, TOUPA ankuangluina hunbi, TOUPA adia meia thillat te, haltum thillat te, tangbuang thillat te, kithoihna te, dawn ding thillat te a ni tuam chiata lan dinga khawmpi siangthou na bawl ding te uh,
TOUPA khawlni te, na thilpiak te uh, na thuchiam tengteng uh, mahni ut thua thillat, TOUPA kianga na thillat jelte uh ban ah.
Huan, kha sagihna ni sawm leh ni nga ni-a na lou ua thil piang te na lak khit chiang un TOUPA ankuangluina ni sagih na zang ding ua: a ni khatna ni pen khawl kinkenna ni ahi dinga, a ni giat ni leng khawl kinkenna mah ahi ding.
M ni khat niin sing kung kilawm mahmahte gah khawng, tum hiang khawng, sing bawk pha hiang khawng, luia muisum te na tawi ding uh, TOUPA na Pathian un maah ni sagih nuamsain na om ding uhi.
Hiai ankuangluina bel TOUPA dinga kum chih ni sagih sung na hih ding uh ahi: hiai bel na suan te uh jel tana khantawn dan ding ahi: kha sagihnaa na nek jel ding uh.
Sawlbuk ah ni sagih na om ding ua, Israel gama mi himte bel sawlbuk ah na om vek ding ua;
Huchiin na suante un Israel suante Aigupta gam akipan ka pi khiak laiin sawlbuk ah ka omsak chih a thei thei ding uh: Kei TOUPA na Pathian ka hi, chiin, chiin.Huchiin Mosiin TOUPA ankuangluina hunbi bawlte Israel suante kiangah a phuangta hi.
Huchiin Mosiin TOUPA ankuangluina hunbi bawlte Israel suante kiangah a phuangta hi.
TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante, oliv thau chim tak, det dinga suk, khawnvak kuan sak gigena dingin na kianga honla dingin thupia in.
Kihoupihna puanina thutheihpihna puanjak po lamah nitak lam akipan jinglam tan adingin TOUPA ma ah Aronin koih hoih hen: hiai bel na suante jel uh tana khantawn dan ding ahi.
TOUPA maah khawnvak koihna siangthoutak tungah khawnvakte koih hoih jel heh.
Huan, tangbuang nel chi la inla, huai tanghou sawm leh nihin na bawl ding ahi: tanghou khat ah epha mun sawma khena mun nih zat ding ahi.
TOUPA maah dohkan siangthou tungah vual nihin, vual khata guk tuaktuakin na chiang ding ahi.
Tanghou tunga, a vual nih ah begaw chim tak na koih dia, theihgigena, TOUPA adia meia thillat bang a honghihtheihna dingin.
Khawlni tengin TOUPA maah a koih hoih jel ding ahi: khantawn thukhun, Israel suante a ding ahi.
Huan, Aron leh a tapate atuam ahi dinga, mun siangthou ah a ne ding uhi: khantawn dan dia TOUPA adinga meia thillatte laka, amah adia thil siangthou tak ahi, chiin.
Israel numei tapa, a pa Aigupta mi, mi khat Israel suante laka a vahoha: huai Israel numei tapa leh Israel mi, mi khat giahmun ah a kisual ua:
Israel numei tapain hamsiatin Pathian min a gensiaa; huchiin Mosi kiangah a honpi uh.
A nu min bel Selomit ahi a, Dan chi Dibri tanu ahi.
