TOUPA kam akipana thu pawt ngakna dingin suangkulh ah a khum uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Hamsiat loupa dainawl ah pi unla, a theihpihte tengtengin a lu ah a khut uh koih uhenla, mi tengtengin suangin deng uhen.
Huan, Israel suante houpih inla, a kianga uah, Kuapeuh a Pathian hamsiat loh peuhmahin a khelh moh a po ding.
Huan, TOUPA min gense peuhmah hihlup ngeingei ding ahi: mi tengtengin suanga a den ngeingei ding uh: TOUPA min a gensiat u leh gam dang mi leng, hiai gama mi him leng hihlup ding ahi.
Si khopa mi tunga khut kha peuhmah mi jaw hihlup ngeingei ding ahi;
Si khopa ganta tunga khut kha peuhmahin a dit ding ahi: hin sikin hin.
Huan, min a insakinkhang a melsiatsak leh a hih bang geih a tunga hih sam ding ahi;
Guh kitan sikin guh kitan, mit sikin mit, ha sikin ha; mi a hihmelsiat bangin a tungahleng hih sam ding ahi.
Ganta hihlum peuhmain a dit ding ahi; mi hihlum peuhmah hihlup sam ding ahi.
Gam dang mite ading leh hiai gama mi himte adingin dan kibang khat na neih ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian ka hi hi, na chi ding ahi, chiin.Huchiin Mosiin Israel suante a houpiha, hamse loupa pen dainawl ah a pi khia ua, suangin a deng uh, Israel suanten TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangin a hihta uh.
Huchiin Mosiin Israel suante a houpiha, hamse loupa pen dainawl ah a pi khia ua, suangin a deng uh, Israel suanten TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangin a hihta uh.
Huan TOUPAN Sinai tangah Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kon gam piak ding na vatun hun chiang un, TOUPA mina gam a khawl ding ahi.
Na lou ah kum guk sung thil na ching dianga, na grep huan kum guk sung na sat nou dinga, a gahte na la ding:
A kum sagih kumin bel gam khawl kinkenna, TOUPA mina khawlna ahi dinaga: na lou-a buh leh bal na chin ding ahi kei, na grep huan na sat nou ding ahi sam kei.
Na buh pou na la ding ahi kei, na kep louh grep na lou ding ahi kei: gam khawl kinkenna kum ahi ding hi.
Gam khawl kuma-te na nek tawm ding uh ahi dia; nang, na sikha leh na sikhanu ading, na kilohmi ading, na kianga teng gamding mi ading;
Na bawng hon ading, na gama ganta ading, huaia gah tengteng nek tawm ding ahi ding hi.
Huan, khawl kum kum sagih bel na sim dinga, kum sagin mun sagih ahi dinga; khawl kum kum sagih sung bel kum sawmli leh kum kua ahi dinga.
Huai khit kha sagihna ni sawm niin pengkul ngaihtak na vial mut sak dinga; kilemna niin na gam tengteng uah pengkul na vial mut sak dinga uh ahi.
Huan, kum sawmngana bel na kipahpih ding ua, gamsung teng teng ah, huaia om tengteng kiangah noplenna thu na phuang ding uh: nou ding in Jubili ahi dinga; mi chihin nou-a chiat na nei nawn ding uh; mi chih amah in sungkuan ah a om nawn ding.
Huai kum sawmngana pen nou dingin Jubili ahi dinga; bangmah na ching kei ding ua, a pou leng na la kei ding ua, grep kep louh gah leng na loh louh ding uh ahi.
Jubili ahi ngala; na kipahpih ding uh ahi; huan, na lou ua thil gahte na ne ding uhi.
Hiah Jubili kumin mi chihin amaha mah na nei nawn chiat ding uh.
Na insakinkhang kianga banghiam na khota, na insakinkhang kianga banghiam na leiin leng an kikhem ding uh hi lou ahi:
Jubili khit a kum zah bang jelin na insakinkhang thil na lei dinga, buhlehbal tun kum tam dan dungjuiin na kiangah a juak ding ahi.
A kum tam dan dungjui jelin aman na khangsak dinga, huan, a kum tawm dan dungjuiin aman na kiamsak dinga; buhlehbal tun kum tam dungjuiin na kianga juak ahi hi.
Na kikhem ding uh ahi kei, na Pathian laudan na siam ding u hi: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi ngala.
Huaijiakin ka thusehte na jui in ka vaihawmte na pomin laudan na siam ding ahi; huchiin tua gamah lungmuangin na teng ding hi.
Gamin a gah a suah dinga, niang leh taiin na ne un na ta ding ua, lungmuang takin na vateng ding uhi.
A hih leh, a kum sagih kumin bang ka neta ding ua?
Ngai dih, bangmah lah ka ching kei ua, ka thil tungte uh lah ka lasam kei ua, chi na hih uleh,
A kum guk kumin ka vualjawlna na tunguah ka tungsak dinga, kum thum sung adia gah a suah ding hi.
Huan, a kum giat kumin na ching ding ua, thil tung na kep uh, a luite na ne ding ua, kum kua kum tan, a hong thak nawn ma tanin na vom uh, a luite na ne ding uhi.
Khantawn adia gam pen khot den ding ahi kei, gam lah keia ahi ngala: mikhual, ka kianga teng lel na hi ngal ua.
Na gam luah tengteng uh, tat kik thepthup na phal ding uhi.
Na unau honggentheiha, a gam khenkhat a juak leh; a tanau naipen a hongkuan dia, a unau gam juaksa a tan ding.
Huan, min a tat sakmi ding a neih louha, a hong kitoha, a tatna khop a neih leh,
A khot kum sut henla, a khotnapa kiangah a val pe nawn hen; huchiin a gam a luah nawn ding.
A maha dia a tatkik nawn theih kei lebel a khotsa pen Jubili kum tanin a leipa khutah om hen; huan, Jubili kumin a pawt nawn dinga, aman a gam a luah nawn ding hi.
Huan, kulh nei khuaa in min a juak leh a juak akipan kum khat ngial sungin a tan nawn thei ding; kum khat vingveng sungin tat nawn theihna a nei ding.
Kum khat sunga a tat theih kei leh kulh nei khuaa in pen khantawnin a suante jel tanin leng a leimi-a ahi bikbek ding ahi, Jubili chiangin leng a pawt tuan kei ding.
Kulh neilou khuaa inte bel singtang gam banga seh ahi dinga, tat theih ahi dinga, Jubili chiangin a pawt ding.
Himahleh Levi-tepawl khua, a tantuam khua ua inte jaw Levi-tepawlin chiklai peuhin leng a tan thei ding uh.
Huan, Levi-tepawl laka min a tat kei leh juaksa in leh a tantuan khua pen Jubili chiangin a pawt ding: Levi-tepawl khuaa inte Israel suante laka a tantuam uh ahi ngala.
A khokim khawng ua loute bel juak theih ahi kei ding, a khantawn tantuan uh ahi ngal a.
Huan, na unau a hongentheiha, nang a hongbelh leh nana kep ding ahi; mikhual, na kianga teng banga na na ompih ding ahi.
Amah laka dangka hiam, thil hiam, a pung la ken, Pathian laudan siam jawin: na unau na kianga a teng theihna dingin.
A pung delhin na sum na leitawi sak ding ahi kei.
Kei na TOUPA na Pathian uh, Kanaan gam honpepa leh na Pathian uh hi dinga Aigupta gam akipana honpikhepa ka hi hi.
Huan, na unau a hongentheiha, na kianga a hong puk lut leh sikha banga na zat ding ahikei.
Kilohmi bang leh na kianga teng sam bangin na kiangah a om ding ahi: Jubili kum tanin na na a sem ding.
Huai khitin na kianga akipan a pawt dinga, amah leh a tate toh, huan, amau inkuanngei ah a lut nawn ding uh, a pi leh pute in leh lou a luah nawn ding uhi.
Aigupta gam akipana ka pi khiak, ka sikhate ahi ngal ua, sikha khota khot ding ahi kei uh.
Khel takin a lakah na om ding ahi kei, na Pathian laudan na siam jawk ding ahi.
Sikhanu leh sikhapa na neih dingte na kim ua nam laka mi, sikhanu leh sikhapa dingin na lei ding uh ahi.
Huan, na lak ua teng gam dang mi leh na gam ua piang a inkote uh laka mite leng na lei thei sam ding uh; huaite na mi na sa uh ahi ding uhi.
Huan, na nung ua na tate uh gouluah dingin, a mi a sa ua a neih ding un amau dingin na bawl ding uh; huai laka mite na khantawn sikha ding un na nei ding uh: himahleh na unau Israel suante laka khel takin na om ding uh ahi kei.
Gam dang mi hiam, na kianga teng kuahiam honkhophata, a kianga na unaupa a honggentheiha, na kianga gam dang mi hiam, na kianga teng kiang hiama, gam dang mite suan inko laka hiam a puk lut leh.
Khotsa a hih nungin tat nawn theih ding; a unaute laka khatin amah a tan thei ding.
A pangakin hiam, a pangak tapain hiam a tan thei ding; a chite laka a tanau naiin hiam a tan thei ding hi; huan, amah leng a hongphat nawn leh a kitanthei ding hi.
A puklut na pa toha puklut akipana Jubili kum nawn ding sut khawm uhenla a puklut man a kum omdanin ahi dinga; huan kilehmi dia goih sut bang jela sut sak ahi ding hi.
Kum tampi a om lai leh a tatna manpen a belh sung hu toh kituak man a piak kik nawn ding ahi.
Jubili kum tunna ding kum tawm chik kia om phet ahihleh sut khawm uhen; a om kum tamdan dungjuiin a tatna man a piak kik ding ahi.
Kum khat bi jela goih kilohmi bangin a bel ding hi: Na mitmuhin khel takin a bawl ding ahi kei.
Huchibang lama tat a hih kei lehleng, Jubili kumin a pawt dinga, amah leh a tate toh.Israel suante lah ka sikhate ahi ngala ua, Aigupta gam kipan ka pi khiak, ka sikhate ahi uh; Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Israel suante lah ka sikhate ahi ngala ua, Aigupta gam kipan ka pi khiak, ka sikhate ahi uh; Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi.
Milim na bawl ding uh ahi kei, milim bawl tawm hiam suang phuh hiam na dingsak ding uh ahi kei, biak dingin na gam uah milim tuanna suang na phut ding uh ahi sam kei: Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi ngala.
Ka khawlnite na tang ding ua, ka mun siangthou na zahtak ding uh ahi: Kei TOUPA ka hi.
Ka thusehte na mang ding ua, ka thupiakte na pom ua na man uleh vuahtuite a hun hunin ka kesak dinga,
Leiin thil a honpiang sak dinga, gama singten gah a suang ding uhi.
Na phual ua buhin grep loh hun aman pha dinga, na grep loh un thil chin hun a man pha ding; na tanghou uh nianglehtaiin na ne ding ua, na gam uah lungmuang takin na teng ding uh.
Hiai gam galmuang takin ka omsak dinga, na lum pihpeh ding ua, kuamahin a honlausak kei ding uh; gamsa hoihlou te hiai gam akipanin ka hawl jak dinga, namsauin na gam uh a tuansuak sam kei ding hi.
Na melmate uh na delh ding ua, na ma uah namsaua thahin a om ding uhi.
Mi ngain ja a delh ding ua, jain sing a delh ding uh: na melmate uh na ma uah namsaua thahin a om ding uh.
Huan, ka hondieh sak dinga, chi tampi ka hon suangsak ding hi; huan, na lak uah ka thukhun ka hihkip ding.
Huan, sawtpi na kepsa uh a luite na ne ding ua, a thak koihna dingin a luite na la khe ding uh.
Huan, na lak uah ka biakbuk ka omsak dinga: ka hinnain nou a honnungngatsan kei ding.
Na lak uah ka teng dinga, na Pathian uh ka hi dia, huan, nou leng ka mite na hi ding uh.
Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh, a sikha uh na hih louhna ding ua Aigupta gam akipana noute honpikhepa ka hi; na hakkolte uh ka hihtan dinga, ding tangin kahonpai sak ding.
Ahihhangin ka thu na pom kei ua, hiai thupiak tengteng na zuih kei ua, ka thusehte na deih kei ua.
Na hinna un ka vaihawmte a muhdaha, ka thupiak tengteng jui loua ka thukhun na bohsiat uleh ken leng na tunguah hiai ka hih ding;
Na tunguah thil lauhuai mahmah, na hinna uh netum leh na mit uh susia kumjawnna leh khodam khawng ka lengsak ding: huan, na haichite uh bangmah lou dia ching na hi ding ua, na melmate un a ne jel ding uhi.
Na tunguah ka mai ka gum sak dinga, na melmate uh ma ah na vuallel ding uh: nou honmudahten na tunguah vai a hawm ding ua, kuamah delh louhin na tai ding uh.
Huan, huchi pipi aleng ka thu na pom kei lai uleh na khelhnate uh jiakin sagih vei ka hon gawt lai ding hi.
Na hatna uh ki-otsakna ka su se dinga, na van uh sik bangin ka bawl ding, ne lei un sumsah bangin:
Huan, na tha uh na pai thawn lel ding ua: na gam un thil a piangsak kei dinga, gama singten gah a suang sam kei ding uh.
Kei kalhlama na om ua, ka thu na pom kei uleh na khelhna uh dung juiin a mun sagihin na tunguah gawtna ka tungsak ding.
Huan, na lak uah gamsate ka honpai sak dinga, huaiin na tate uh a honlaksak ding, na gantate uh a hon keih sak ding ua, kiamlam na manoh hiaihiai ding uh, na lampite uh ahontulta ding hi.
Huchi aleng ka thununna na pom tuan kei ua, kei honkalh lama na om lailai uleh kei leng nou kalh lamin ka om ding.
Kei mahmahin na khelhnate uh jiakin sagih vei ka hon gawt ding.
Na tunguah namsau ka leng sak dinga, huaiin thukun phu a la dinga, numau kho sung chiat ah na kibawm khawm ding ua: huan, na lak uah hi ka leng sak dinga, melmate khuta piak na hi ding uhi.
Na muanpi pen uh tanghou ka tawpsak hun chiangin numei sawmin omna khatah a om ding ua, na tanghou uh buk chitchiat jelin a honpe nawn ding ua; na ne ding ua, na kham tuan kei ding uh.
Huchi tengteng a leng ka thu na pom kei ua, kei kalhlama na om lailai uleh hehtakin noute kalhlamin ka om dinga;
Na khelhnate uh jiakin sagihvei, kei mahmahin ka hon gawt ding hi.
Na tate uh sa na ne ding ua, na tanute uh sa na ne nalai ding uh.
Huan, na mun sangte uh ka chimsak dinga, na milimte uh ka puksak dinga, na luang uh na milimte uh luang tungah ka pai ding; huan, ka hinna-in nou a honmu nuam kei ding.
Na khuate uh ka gamsak dinga, na mun siangthoute uh ka hawmsak dinga, na gimlimte uh ka dik kei ding.
Huan, gam ka hawmsak dinga; na melma uh huaia omten lamdang a sa ding uh.
Huan, nam dangte lakah ka hondalh sak dinga, nou hon delhjui dingin namsau ka phawi ding; huchiin na gam uh a hawm dinga, na khua te uh a gam ding.
Huan, gamin a hawm sung teng leh na melmate uh gama na om sung un a khawlnite ah nuam asa ding; huai hun chiangin gam a khawl dinga, a khawlnite ah nuam a sa ding hi.
A hawm sung tengin a khawl ding; na ten lai ua na khawlni ua khawl tei sek loute pen.
Huan, na lak ua mi om sunte, a melmate uh gamah a lungtang sung uah bahna ka omsak ding; huan, nahthel gingin leng a delh dinga namsau laka kipana taikek bangin a taikek ding ua, kuamah delh louhin a puk ding uh.
Kuamah delh khol louhin namsau delh bang maiin a kipal puk lemlum ding ua: na melmate uh na dal dingin hatna himhim na neikei ding uh.
Nam dangte lakah na mangthang ding ua, na melmate uh gamin nou a hon gai ding.
Huan, na lak ua om sunte na melmate uh gamah a thulimlouhna jiakun, a mui hiaihiai ding uh: a pi leh pute un a thulimlouhnate uh a muih loh ding bang un amau leng a muih loh sam ding uhi.
A khelh uh ka tunga a khelhna uh jiak leh a thulimlouhna uh leh a pi leh pute uh thulimlouhna leh kei honkalhlama a om jiak un,
Kei leng amau kalhlama ka oma, amelmate uh gama ka omsak dante a kitheihmohbawl kei ding ua; a lungtang ua sum louh a kiniamkhiak ua, a thulimlouhna uh jiaka gawtna a pom uh leh, Jakob kianga ka thukhun ka theigige ding;
Isaak leh Abraham kianga ka thukhunte leng ka theigige dinga;
Huan, a gam mah leng ka theigige ding hi.
Gam leng a kihep mang san ding ua, amau om loua a hawm sungin a khawlnite ah nuam a sa ding; ka vaihawmte a deihlouh jiak uh leh a hinna un ka thusehte a muhnop louh nak jiakin, a thulimlouhna uh gawtna a pom ding uh ahi:
Huchi pipiin leng a melmate uh amaute hihmang thang ding leh a lak ua ka thukhun bohsiain ka paikhe kei dinga, ka mudah sam kei ding: Kei TOUPA a Pathian uh ka hi ngala:
A Pathian uh ka hih theihna dinga nam chihta mitmuha Aigupta gam akipan ka pi khiak, a pipute uh thukhun amate jiakin ka theigige zo ding: Kei TOUPA ka hi, chiin, chiin.Hiaite Sinai tanga Mosi zanga amah leh Israel suante kala TOUPAN a bawl thupiak te, vaihawm te leh dante ahi hi.
Hiaite Sinai tanga Mosi zanga amah leh Israel suante kala TOUPAN a bawl thupiak te, vaihawm te leh dante ahi hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kianga uah, Min bang hiampoimoh tuam tungthu-a thu achiamleh a mihing na seh hun bangin TOUPA atuam ahi ding.
Pasal a hih leh na seh dan ding kum sawmnih akipana kum sawmguka upa mun siangthou sekel bang, dangka sekel sawmnga hu ahi ding.
Numei a hih leh na seh dan ding sekel swmthum ahi ding.
Huan, kum nga akipana kum sawmniha upa ahihleh, na seh dan ding pasal sekel sawmnih numei bel sekel sawm ahi ding.
Huan, kha khat akipana kum ngaa upa ahihleh, na seh dan ding pasal bel dangka sekel nga, numei bel dangka sekel thum ahi ding.
Huan, kum sawmguk akipan a tunglam a hihleh, na seh dan ding pasal bel sekel sawm leh nga, numei bel sekel sawm ahi ding.
Ahihhangin na seh sanga a gentheih leh siampu kiangah pi ding ahi dia, siampuin a nasep ding; thuchiammi zoh hun bang bang saimpuin a nasep ding.
Huan, thillat, TOUPA kianga a lat ding uh gan a hih leh kuapeuhin TOUPA adia huchibang a piak peuh uh thil siangthou ahi ding ahi.
A hih lamdang ding ahi kei, a sia a phain, a sia a hoih khen ding ahi sam kei: gan gan maha a khen teitei leh a nihin a khenna toh thil siangthou ahi ding ahi.
Huan, gan siangthou lou, TOUPA kianga lat ngei louh chi a hih leh, gan pen siampu maa a koih ding ahi;
Huan, siampuin a hoih dan bangin a man hun a nasep ding: nang siampuin na seh dan bangbang ahi jel ding.
Ahihhangin a tat nawn taktak sin leh na seh zah munngaa khena mun khat a behlap ding ahi.
Huan, min a in TOUPA tuam dia a lat ding leh a hoih leh hoih louh dungjuiin siampuin a seh ding ahi: siampu seh bangbang ahi ding.
Huan, a lanmiin a in pen a tat nawn ding leh a man dinga na seh zah mun ngaa khena mun khat a behlap ding ahi, huchiin amaha ahi nawn ding.
Huan min a gama lou akhen TOUPA tuam dinga a lat sin leh na seh dan ding a chi tuh dung jui jelin ahi ding.
Barli buh homer khat mun dangka sekel sawmnga man ahi ding.
A lou pen Jubili kum akipana lat a hih leh na seh bang ahi tou pek ding.
Jubili kum nunga a lat a hihleh bel siampuin aman Jubili tun nawnna ding kum dungjui jelin a sep dinga, na seh dan akipana a kiam hun bawl ahi ding.
A lanmiin a tat nawn taktak ding leh a man na seh zah mun ngaa khena mun khat a behlap dinga, amaha ahi nawn ding.
Lou pen a tat nop louh hiam, mi dang kianga a khot hiam a hih leh tat nawn theih a hita kei ding:
Jubili kuma a pawt nawn hunin lou pen TOUPA adia siangthou, amaha tuam siangthou bang ahi, siampu ading ahi ding.
Amah gama him hi lou, lou a leisa, min TOUPA kianga a lat leh,
Jubili kum tanin na seh dan bangain siampuin a man a seh sak dinga, na seh bangin TOUPA adinga thil siangthou dingin huai niin a piak ding ahi.
Huan, Jubili kumin a leina pa, a gamneipa mahin a tang nawn ding.
Na seh dan tengtengmun siangthou sekel bang jel ahi ding hi; sekel khat bel gera sawmnih ahi ding.
Ahihhangain ganta laka piang masapen, a pian masak pen jiaka TOUPA tuam dinga sehsa peuhmah jaw kumahin a lan ding ahi kei: bawngtal leng belam leng hi heh, TOUPA tuam ahi hi.
Huan, gan siangthou lou a hih leh na seh dan bangin tat ding ahi dia, ahuan, a mun ngaa khena mun khat a behlap dinga hi; huan, tat ahih keileh, na seh dan banga khot ding ahi.
Ahihhangin min a neih laka bangpeuh, mihing hiin, ganta hiin, a neihsa lou hitaleh, TOUPA kianga a piaksa juak ding ahi keia; tat ding leng ahi kei; tua bang thil peuhmah TOUPA adingin siangthou pen ahi.
Kuapeuh si dia vaihawmsak, mihing laka kipana manthatsak ding, tat ding ahi kei, amah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Gam sunga sawm-a-khat peuhmah, gamsunga haichi hitaleh, sing gah hitaleh, TOUPA-a ahi; TOUPA adia thil siangthou ahi.
Huan, min a sawm-a-khat a tat nop leh, mun ngaa khena mun khat a behlap ding ahi.
Bawng leh belam sawma khat thu-ah, ganvulmi chianga chiamtehsa nangawn leng, a sawmna jel TOUPA adia siangthou ahi ding.
Huai gan tuh a hoih hia, hoih lou, a enchian ding ahi kei, a khek ding leng ahi sam kei; a kheka ahihleh, a khek pen leh a khekna pen leng a nih un siangthou ahi ding ua; tat ding ahi kei hi.Hiaite Israel suante dinga TOUPAN Sinai tang Mosi kianga thupiak a piakte ahi uh.
Hiaite Israel suante dinga TOUPAN Sinai tang Mosi kianga thupiak a piakte ahi uh.
Aigupta gam akipan a hongpawt uh kum nih kum, kha nihna, ni khat niin Sinai gamdai ah kihoupihna puanin ah TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel saunte a omkhawm tengteng, a chi chiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizomdan bangjelin pasal tengteng sim vekin;
Kum sawmnih akipan tunglam Israel laka galkap thei chiang peuhmah nang leh Aronin a pawlpawlin na sim vek ding uhi.
Huan, na kiangah nam chih laka khat, inkuana lupen jel a om ding uh ahi.
Huan, hiaite na kianga om dingte min ahi: Reuben nama Sedeur tapa Elizur,
Simeon nama Zurisaddai tapa Selumiel.
Juda nama Amminadab tapa Nahson.
Isakar nama Zuar tapa Nethanel.
Zebulun nama Helon tapa Eliab.
Joseph tate, Ephraim nama Ammihud tapa Elisama: Manasseh nama Pedahzur tapa Gamaliel.
Benjamin nama Gideoni tapa Abidan.
Dan nama Ammisaddai tapa Ahiezer.
Aser nama Okran tapa Pagiel.
Gad nama Deuel tapa Eliasaph.
Naphtali nama Enan tapa Ahira.
Hiaite mipite tel, a pi leh pute uh nama lupen Israel inkuana lupente ahi uh, chiin.
Huchiin Mosi leh Aronin huai mi a min uh a lohte uh a pi ua:
Mipi tengteng kha nihna, ni khat niin a sam khawm vek ua; a chichiin, a inkuan kuanin, a min uh kizomdan bangjelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam teng a pipute uh min a taklang uhi.
TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangin Sinai gamdai ah a simta hi.
Israel tapa upapen, Reuben tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizomdan bangjelin pasal kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Reuben nam, a simte uh sing li leh sang guk leh za nga ahi uhi.
Simeon tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizomdan bangjelin pasal kum sawmnih akipan tunglam galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Simeon nam, a simte uh sing nga leh sang kua leh za thum ahi uh.
Gad tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizomdan bangjelin pasal kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Gad nama, a simte uh sing li leh sang nga leh za guk leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Juda tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizomdan bangjelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thie teng a sim ua;
Juda nama, a simte uh sing sagih leh sang li leh za guk ahi uh.
Isakar tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizom dan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Isakar nama, a simte uh sing nga leh sang li leh za li ahi uh.
Zebulun tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh kizom dan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Zebulun nama, a simte uh sing nga leh sang sagih leh za li ahi uh.
Joseph tate laka Ephraim tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh tamdan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Ephraim nama, a simte uh sing li leh za nga ahi uh.
Manase tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh tamdan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Manase nama, a simte uh, sing thum leh sang nih leh za nih ahi uh.
Benjamin tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh tamdan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Benjamin nama, a simte uh, sing thum leh sang nga leh za li ahi uh.
Dan tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh tamdan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Dan nama, a simte uh, sing guk leh sang nih leh za sagih ahi uh.
Aser tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh tamdan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Aser nama, a simte uh, sing li leh sang khat leh za nga ahi uh.
Naphtali tate suante a chichiin, a inkuankuanin, a min uh tamdan bang jelin kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei teng a sim ua;
Naphtali nama, a simte uh, sing nga leh sang thum leh za li ahi uh.
Huaite ahi uh, Mosi leh Aronin Israel lupen sawm leh nih, inkuana lupente toh a simte.
Huchiin Israel suan a inkuankuan ua kum sawmnih akipan tunglam, galkap thei chiang teng, Israel gamate sim ahi uh;
A simte teng uh nuai guk leh sang thum leh za nga leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Levite pipute jaw a simtel kei uh.
TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Levi chi jaw na simtel ding ahi keia, Israel mite lakah na simtel ding ahi sam kei:
Levite jaw theihsakna biakbuk kemmite leh van tengteng kemmite dia seh jawk ding ahi: biakbuka van tengteng a zong jel ding ua, a kem ding ua, tua biakbuk a kimvelin a omkhum ding uh.
Huan, biakbuk malama a pai chiangin Leviten a phel ding ua; huan, biakbuk kaih ding chiangin Levite mahin a kai nawn ding uh; nam dang a hongkigolh peuhmah hihlup ding ahi.
Huan, Israel suanten amau mun chiat ah, a pawlpawlin a tamdan uh dungjui jelin a puaninte uh a kai ding uh.
Leviten Israel suante khawmpi tunga hehna a omlouhna dingin theihsakna biakbuk kimvelah a akai ding uhi; Leviten theihsakna biakbuk a kep ding uh ahi, chia thu a nagentak jiakin,Huchibangin Israel suanten ahih uh; TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak tengteng bangin, huchibangin a hih uh.
Huchibangin Israel suanten ahih uh; TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak tengteng bangin, huchibangin a hih uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi leh Aron a houpiha,
Israel suanten a inkuan chiamtehna uh tak chiatin a pawl uh hihdan bangin a puanin uh a kaih ding uh ahi: kihoupihna puan ngat chiatin a kimvelin a kai ding uh.
Ni suahnalam suahlam panga a pawl uh tamdan dungjui jela puanin kai dingte Juda pawlte ahi ding uh; huan, Juda tate laka lupen ding jaw Aminadab tapa Nason ahi ding.
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing sagih leh sang li leh za guk ahi uh.
Huan, amah zoma puanin kai dingte Isakar chi ahi ding uh: Isakar tate laka lupen ding jaw Zuar tapa Nathanel ahi ding:
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan sing nga leh sang li leh za li ahi uh:
Huan, Zebulun chite: Zebulun tate laka lupen ding jaw Helon tapa Eliab ahi ding:
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing nga leh sang sagih leh za li ahi uh.
Apawl uh tamdan bang jelin Judate a simte uh nuai khat leh sing giat leh sang guk leh za li ahi uh.
Amauten ma a kaih jel ding uh ahi.
A pawl uh tamdan bangjelin a simlam pangah Reubente pawl a om ding uh; Reuben tate laka lupen Seduer tapa Elizur ahi ding.
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing li leh sang guk leh za nga ahi uh.
Huan, a zoma, kai dingte Simeon chi ahi ding uh: Simeon tate laka lupen ding jaw Zurisadai tapa Selumiel ahi ding:
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing nga leh sang kua leh za thum ahi uh:
Huan, Gad chite: Gad tate laka lupen ding Reuel tapa Eliasaph ahiding:
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing li leh sang nga leh za guk leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Reubente tamdan nuai khat leh singa nga leh sang khat leh za li leh sawmnga ahi uh; a pawl uh dungjuiin.
A zomin amau a pawtkhe ding uh uhi.
Huchiin kihoupihna puanin akipankhe dinga, Levite bel a laiah a om ding uah, a omna thuthu jelin a pawlpawlin a pai chiat ding uh.
A pawl tamdan thuthuin a tumlam pangah Ephraimte a om ding uh: Ephraim tate laka lupen ding jaw Amihud tapa Eliasam ahi ding.
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, singa li leh za nga ahi uh.
Huan, a zomin Manase chi ahi ding ua; Manase tate laka lupen ding Pedazur tapa Gamaliel ahi ding:
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing thum leh sang nih leh za nih ahi uh:
Huan, a zom nawmin Benjamin chite: Benjamin tate laka lupen ding Gideoni tapa Abidan ahi ding:
Huai sima om, a pawlte tamdan, sing thum leh sang nga leh za li ahi uh.
Huan, Ephraimte tamdan nuai khat leh sang giat leh ja ahi uh.
Huan a zom zom nawnin a paikhe ding uh.
A pawl uh tamdan bangjelin Dante a mallam pangah a om ding uh: Dan tate laka lupen ding Amisadai tapa Ahiezer ahi ding.
Huai sima omte, a pawlte tamdan, sing guk leh sang nih leh za sagih ahi uh.
Huan, a zoma puanin kai dingte Aser chi ahi ding uh: Aser tate laka lupen ding Okran tapa Pagiel ahi ding:
Huai sima omte, a pawlte tamdan, sing li leh sang khat leh za nga ahi uh:
Huan, a zom nawmin Naphtali chite: Naphtali tate laka a lupen ding Enan tapa Ahir ahi ding.
Huai sima omte, a pawlte tamdan, sing nga leh sang thum leh za li ahi uh.
Dante tamlam nuai khat leh sing nga leh sang sagih leh za guk ahi uh.
Huan, amauten a pawlpawla pawtkhiain nung a hondan jel ding uhi.
Hiaite Israel suante inkuan tenga ami simte uh, a tamdan uh nuai guk leh sang thum leh za nga leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Levite bel Israel suante laka sim ahi kei uhi, TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangin.Huchibangin Israel suanten a hih ua; TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangjelin a pawlpawlin puanin a kai uh; huan, huchi mahbangin a chichiin, a inkuankuan jel un a kipankhe sek uhi.
Huchibangin Israel suanten a hih ua; TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangjelin a pawlpawlin puanin a kai uh; huan, huchi mahbangin a chichiin, a inkuankuan jel un a kipankhe sek uhi.
Hiaite, Sinai tanga TOUPAN Mosi a houpih laia Aron leh Mosi suana mite ahi uh.
Aron tapate min a upapen Nabad, Abihu, Elearzer, Ithamar ahi uh.
Hiaite siampu dinga thuanilh, siampu na sem ding a hihtuam Aron tapate min ahi.
Huan, Nabad leh Abihu ahih uleh Sinia gamdaia mei zat louh ding chih, TOUPA maa a latlai un TOUPA maah a si ua, ta a neikei uh: Eleazar leh Ithamarin a pa uh Aron dam laiin siampu-nasep a sem uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Levi chite, siampu Aron kiangah pi inla, a na a sep theihna ding un a kianga-ah omsakin.
Huan amau biakbuka nasepna semin kihoupihna puanin chinah amah leh khawmpi tengteng tuam dingin na a sem ding uh.
Huan, kituahkhawmna puanin van tengteng a kem ding ua, Israel suante tuama biakbuk nasep na a sem ding uh.
Huan, Levite bel Aron leh a tapate kiangah na lan ding: Israel suante tuam din a kianga lat ahi uhi.
Aron leh a tapate bel na sep dinga, a siampu hihna uh a tang nilouh ding uh: Nam dang honkigolhte hihlup ding ahi uh, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Ngaiin, Levite Israel suante lak akipan Israel suante ta chil sul hong masapen siaka keimah ngeiin ka lak ahi uh: Levite keia ahi ding ua:
Tachil tengteng lah keia ahi ngal ua; Aigupta gama tachil tengteng ka hihlup niin Israelte laka tachil tengteng, a mihing a ganin ka tuam dingin ka khama ahi; keia ahi ding uh; kei TOUPA ka hi, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Sinai gamdai ah Mosi a houpiha,
Levi tate a inkuankuan un a khangkhang un sim inla: pasal peuhmah kha khat akipan tunglam an sim ding ahi, chiin.
Huchiin Mosiin a hih dinga thupiak bangin TOUPA thu bangin a sim chiata.
Levit tapate min Gerson, Kohath, Merari ahi uh.
Huan, amau suangpa Gerson tapate min Libni leh Simei ahi uh.
Amau suangpa Kohath tapate Amram, Izhar, hebron, Uziel ahi uh.
Amau suangpa Merari tapate Mali leh Musi ahi uh.
Hiaite a inkuan uh bangjela Levite suante ahi uhi.
Gerson bel Libnite leh Simeite suang pa ahi: hiaite Gersonte suante ahi uhi.
Pasal tengteng kha khat akipan tunglam a simte uh sang sagih leh ja nga tak a ching uhi.
Gersonte suanten a puanin uh biakbuk tumlam pangah a kai ding uhi.
Huan, Gersonte inkuana lupen Lael tapa Eliasaph ahi ding.
Gerson taten kihoupihna puanina a kep ding uh biakbuk leh puanin ahi ding, a tung khawng, kihoupihna puanina kongkhak puanjak khawng,
A intual jakte, biakbuk china a intual kongkhak puanjak khawng, maitam kima khawng, huailaia zat ding khau tengteng.
Huan, Kohath bel Amram te, Izhar te, Hebron te, Uziel te suangpa ahi: hiaite Kohath suante ahi uh.
Pasal tengteng kha khat akipan tunglam a simdan bang un sang giat leh za guk ahi un, mun siangthou kemmi ding.
Kohath tapate suanten biakbuk simlam pangah a puanin uh a kai ding uhi.
Kohathte suante inkuana lupen ding bel Uziel tapa Eliazaphan ahi ding.
A kep dingte uh, bawmte, dohte, sathau khawnvak koihna, maitam, mun siangthoua nasepna tuiumbelsuan tengteng, puanjakte, huailaia nasepna thil tengteng ahi ding.
Huan, siampu Aron tapa Eleazar bel Levite lupen ahi dinga, mun siangthou kemmite a heu ding hi.
Merari bel Malite leh Musite suangpa ahi.
Hiaite Merari suante ahi uh.
Pasal tengteng kha khat akipan tunglam a simdan bang un sang guk leh za nih ahi uh.
Merari suan inkuana lupen Abihail tapa Zuriel ahi: biakbuk mallam pangah a puanin uh a kai ding uhi.
Merari tapate kep dinga sehte biakbuk khuam lepkhawm bang, bang kal te, a khuamte, a kingakna khukkuakte, a vanzat tengteng, nasepna vanzat tengteng ahi uh;
A kongpi umna khuamte, a kingakna khuakkuakte, akilhbelhna leh a khaute toh.
Biakbuk suahlam pang kihoupihna puanin chin, ni suahnalam puanin kai ding bel Mosi leh Aron leh a tapa hi ding ua, mun siangthou ah Israel suante tuam dingin a kul peuhpeuh a sem ding uh.
Nam ding honkigolh peuhmah hihlup ding ahi, chiin,
TOUPA thupiaka Levite a inkuankuan ua pasal tengteng kha khat akipan tunglam Mosi leh Aronin a sim teng uh sing nih leh sang nih ahi uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Israel suante laka tachil, pasal kha khat akipan tunglam teng sim inla, a zah uh theiin,
Huan, Levite bel (TOUPA ka hi) Israel suante laka tachil teng sikin non laksak ding ahi; huan, Levite gante Israel suante gan teng piang masapen sikin, a chi a,
Huan, Mosiin TOUPAN thu a piak bangin Israel suante laka tachil teng a sim,
A min uh kizom bangjelin kha khat akipan tunglam tachil pasal teng a sim uh sing nih leh sang nih leh za nih leh sawmsagih leh thum ahi uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante laka tachil teng sikin Levite la inla, a gan uh sikin Levite gan; Levite keia ahi ding ua; kei TOUPA ka hi.
Huan, Levite sanga a tamna uh Israel suante tachil za nih leh sawmsagih leh thum tatna dingin,
Sekel nga chiat na la ding ahi; mun siangthoua sekel bangin na la ding hi, (sekel bel gerah sawmnih ahi):
Avalte tatna sum pen Aron leh a tapate na piak ding ahi, chiin,
Huan, Mosiin Leviten a tat ban ua a tatna sum uh a la a:
Israel suante tachil lak akipanin sum a la a; sum siangthou sekel bangin sang khat leh ja thum leh sawmguk leh nga a la hi:TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak, TOUPA thu bangin Mosiin tatna sum Aron leh a tapate a pia hi.
TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak, TOUPA thu bangin Mosiin tatna sum Aron leh a tapate a pia hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Levi tate laka Kohath tate, a khangkhang un, a inkuankuan un, sim vek in,
Kum sawmthum akipan tunglam, kum sawmnga tanin nasepna na, kihoupihna puanin a sem ding teng.
Kihoupihna puanin mun siangthou pen Kohath tapate nasep ding hiai ahi:
Ommun a suan ding teng un Aron a tapate toh a lut ding ua, mun siangthou puanjak a hawkkhe ding ua, huaiin thukun bawm a khuh ding uh;
Tuapen ngalvang vunin a khuh ding ua, huaipen puandum buangin a khuh ding ua, ajawnna chiang a thuah ding uh ahi.
Huan, etsakna tanghou dohkan tungah puandum buang a phah ding ua, huailaiah kuangte, keute, belhbute leh noute a but khiakna ding a koih ding uh ahi; huan, tatkakloua tanghou koih huailaiah a om ding ahi:
Tuapen puan sanin a khuh ding ua; a khuhna ngalvang vunin a khuh ding uh, a jawnna chiang a thuah ding uhi.
Huan, vaksak khawnvak koihna leh huai adinga a zat ding ua khawnvakte, a taitehte, a vu koihnate, thau bing tengteng puandum buangin a khuh ding uhi:
Huai leh a vanzat tengteng a khuhna ngalvang vuna khuhin a jawnna ah a koih ding uh ahi.
Huan, dangkaeng maitam puandum buangin a khuh ding ua, a khuhna ngalvang vunin a khuh nawn ding uh, a jawnna chiang a thuah ding uhi:
Mun siangthou, huailaia a vanzat uh, tuiumbelsuan tengteng a la vek ding ua, puandum buangin a tun ding ua, a khuhna ngalvang vunin a khuh ding uh, a jawnnna ah a koih uhi.
Huan, maitama meivu a la mang ding ua, a tungah puan sandup a phah ding uh:
Huan, a tungah a na sep vialvialna uh tuiumbelsuan tengteng, mei lakna te, sa thukna sikkhut te vutluahna te, tuikuang te, maitam tuiumbelsuan tengteng te a koih ding uhi; huan, a khuhna ngalvang vunin a khuh ding uh, a jawnna a bulh ding uh.
Huan, Aron leh a tapaten mun siangthou leh mun siangthou van tengteng ommun suan dinga akhuh khit chiang un; huai khit chiangin a jawng dingin Kohath tapate a hongpai ding uhi: ahihhangin thil siangthou himhim a khoih ding uh ahi kei, huchilouin jaw a si kha ding uhi.
Hiaite kihoupihna puanina Kohath tapate nasep ding ahi.
Huan, siampu Aron tapa Eleazar sep ding, det ding thau te, namtui te, tatlak loua tangbuang thillatte, sathau nilh chite, biakbuk, huailaia thil om tentengte, mun siangthou leh a vante ngaihtuah khawng ahi, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi leh Aron a houpiha,
Kohath suan inkuan jaw Levite lak akipan mang mai loua:
Thil siangthoute khoih loua si loua a om theihna ding uh hichibangin hihih: Aron leh a tapate lut uhenla, a sep ding uh leh a tantuam ding chiat uh seh sakin:
Ahihhangin thil siangthou en dingin sawt lou chik leng lut kei uhen, a lut uleh a si ding uh, chiin,
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Gerson tapate leng a inkuankuan un, a khangkhang un sim vekin;
Kum sawmthum akipan a tunglam kum sawmngaa upa tanin nasepna na kihoupihna puanina sem thei ding teng zah sim vekin.
Gerson suante tantuam naseplam leh puaklam ahi:
Biakbuk puanjakte, kihoupihna puanin te, a khuhna te, a tung khuhna ngalvang vunte, kihoupihna puanin kongkhak puanjakte;
Intual puanjak te, intual kongkhak puanjak te, abiakbuk leh maitam bula, akhaute, a vanzat tengteng uh toh a po ding ua, hih dia kiphamoh peuhmah a hih ding uh ahi.
Gerson suante nasep a naseplam uleh puaklam ah a tantuam tengteng uh Aron leh a tapate ahi ding; ahih ding uh banghiam nengneng tana sehsak dingin thu na neisak ding.
Huaite kihoupihna puanina Gerson suante nasep ahi: a hihding uh siampu Aron tapa Ithamar seh ding ahi.
Merari tapate, akhangkhang un, a inkuankuan un na sim ding ahi;
Kum sawmthum akipan tunglam kum sawmngaa upa tanin kihoupihna puanina sem ding zah na sim vek ding hi.
Kihoupihna puanina a nasep uh, a tantuan ding uh hiai ahi-biakbuk khuam lepkhawm te, a bangkal te, akhuam te, a kingakna khuakhuakte;
A intual umna khuamte, akingakna khuakkhuakte, a kilhbelhnate, a khau te, a vanzat tengteng leh a vanzat dang tengteng puak te: a min uh lou jel chiatin a tantuam ding uh na sehsak ding ahi.
Huaite amau siampu Aron tapa Ithamar heua khoupihna puanina Merari tapate suanten a hihding uh banghiam nengneng tana a nasep dan ding uh, chiin.
Huchiin Mosi leh Aron leh khawmpi laka lupenten Kohathte tapate a khangkhang un, a inkuankuan un a simta ua,
Kihoupihna puanina nasepnaa ding, mi chih nasem dia kisate, kum sawmthum akipan tunglam kum sawmngaa upa chiang:
Huaite a khangkhanga a sim uh sang nih leh za sagih leh sawmnga ahi uhi.
Hiaite ahi uh, kihoupihna puanina na sem jel Kohathte suan a simte uh Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiak banga Mosi leh Aronin a simte uh.
Huan, hiaite a inkuankuana, a khangkhang ua kisim, Gerson tate ahi uh,
Kum sawmthum akipan tunglam kum sawmngaa upa, kihoupihna puanin nasepna dinga, mi chih nasem jel dia kisate,
Huai a khangkhanga, a inkuankuan ua a simte uh sang nih leh za guk leh sawmthum ahi uh.
Huaite ahi uh, Gerson tapate suante, kihoupihna puanina nasemte teng, TOUPA thupiak banga Mosi leh Aronin a simte uh.
Huan, huaite a inkuankuan ua, a khangkhang ua, Merari tapa a simte uh ahi,
Kihoupihna puanin a sem dinga nasem zah ding, kum sawmthum akipan a tunglam kum sawmngaa upa chiang;
Huai a khangkhanga, a inkuankuana a simte uh sang thum leh za nih ahi uh,
Huaite ahi uh, Merari tapate suante a sim uh, Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiak banga Mosi leh Aronin a simte uh.
Mosi leh Aron leh Israelte lupenten a khangkhanga, a inkuankuana a simte uh avekun huaiteng ahi uh,
Nasem ding leh kihoupihna puanina puak chi pomi ding zah, kum sawmthum akipan a tunglam kum sawmngaa upa chiang,
Huai a simte uh sang giat leh za nga leh sawmgiat ahi uh.Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiak banga mi chih a sepding uleh a tantuam ding uh dungjui jela a sim ahi: huchibang takin TOUPA Mosi thu a piak bang sim ahi uhi.
Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiak banga mi chih a sepding uleh a tantuam ding uh dungjui jela a sim ahi: huchibang takin TOUPA Mosi thu a piak bang sim ahi uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante a giahna mun ua kipan phak tengteng leh sipawt tengteng leh misi jiaka buah peuhmahte pawtkhesak vek dingin thu piain;
Numei pasal na pawtkhe sakin dainawl ah na koih ding ahi; a laitaka ka om sek a gaihna mun uh a buahsak kha ding uh, chiin.
Huchiin Israel suanten huchibangin a hih uhi, dainawl ah a koihkhia ua; TOUPAN Mosi kianga a gen bangin Israel suanten a hih uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante kiangah gen inla, Pasal hiam, numei hiamin TOUPA tungah thil bangpeuh na hihkhialin mohta leh;
A hihkhelhna uah thupha a tawi ding uh ahi; huan, a hihkhelhna man pen kim takin dit ding ahi, huan, a mun nga akhena mun khat a hihkhelhnapa a piak behlap ding ahi.
Ahihhangin, khelh man huai miin tanau a neih kei leh, khelh man TOUPA kianga lat pen siampu tuam ahi dng; kilepna belampa sim louhin kilepna a bawl ding ahi ding.
Huan, Israel suante thil siangthou vei thillat tengteng, siampu kianga a lat peuhmah siampu tuam ahi ding.
Mi chih thil siangthou siampu tuam ahi dinga, min siampu a piak peuhmah a tuam ahi ding, chiin, a chi hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante kiangah gen inla, a kiang uah, Mi, a jiin kho tuamlam ngatsanin khial henla, min luppih henla, a pasalin lah theikei ngal leh,
Huchibanga a om nilouha, kihihthanghuai pipia kigenkhe nai lou lah hiin a thei lah kuamah omlou, mat louh lah hi ngal leh;
Huan, lungsim puin, a ji mullitin, amah lah na thanghuai leh; ahihkeileh mullitna lungsim puin, a ji na namullitin, amah lah na thanghuai kei leh:
Huchibang ahihleh huai miin amah adia thillat barley-buh tangbuang epha muh sawma khena mun khat tawiin a ji siampu kianga a pi ding ahi; sathau a buak ding ahi keia, begaw leng a nuh ding ahi sam kei; mullit thoihna tangbuang thillat, theihgigena thillat thulimlouhna theihkhiakna ahi ngala.
Huan, siampuin a honpi dinga, TOUPA maah a dingsak dinga:
Huan, siampuin leibelin tui siangthou a la dinga, biakbuk pialkhanga leivui a la dinga, tui ah a khe ding:
Huan, siampuin huai numei TOUPA maah a dingsak dinga, a sam a khahkhe mullitna sak dinga, theihgigena tangbuang thillat, huai thil thillat a tawisak dinga; siampuin hamse tungsak tui kha a tawi ding:
Huan, siampuin huai numei a kichiamsak dinga, numei kiangah, Na pasal hilou midang kuamahin honluppih keia, nitna lama na lampial kei leh hamse tungsak hiai tui kha akipan na honghul ding:
Ahihhangin khodang lam ngaa na nitna na pasal lou mi kuahiamin a honluppih leh na hul kei dinga, a chi ding:
Huan, siampuin numei a vau dinga, a kichiamsak ding, numei kiangah siampuin, TOUPAN na pheipi a jawtsaka, na gil a bawksak leh, TOUPAN na chipihte hamse thuakin nang honbawl hen;
Huan, hamse tungsak hiai tui na gil ah a lut dinga, na gil a bawksak dinga, na pheipi a zosak ding: huan, numeiin, Amen, Amen, a chi ding.
Huan, siampuin huai hamse thute laibu ah a gelh dinga, tui kha ah a diah ding hi;
Huan, numei hamse tungsak tui kha a dawnsak ding hi: huchiin hamse tungsak tui kha a gil sungah a lutdinga, a honkha ding.
Huan, siampuin mullitna thillat tangbuang numei khut akipan a la dinga; TOUPA maah huai tangbuang thillat a vei dinga, maitam ah a paipih ding hi.
Siampuin tangbuang thillat theihgigena pham khat a la dinga, maitam ah a hal dinga, huai khitin tui numei a dawnsak ding ahi,
Huan, tui a dawnsak leh hichi ahi dinga; a hongnit a, a pasal tunga thil a hihkhial a na hih leh hamse tungsak huai tui a gilsungah a lut dinga, a honkha dinga, a gil a hongbawk dinga, a pheipi a honzo dinga; huchiin numei a chipihte thuaksaknu a honghi ding hi.
Ahihhangin numei a nit keia, a siangthou leh a hul dianga, nau pai thei jel ahi ding.
Hiai, ji, khodang lam ngaa a pasal hilou midang toh kihihnin hiam, pasalin mullitna lungsim a hongputa;
Ji a mullit hiam chianga vaihawm dingdan ahi: huchiin TOUPA maah a pi dinga, huan, siampuin hiai dan tengteng bangin a tungah a hih ding.Huchiin pasal pen thulimlouhna ah a hul dinga, numeiin a khelhna moh a po ding hi, chiin, chiin.
Huchiin pasal pen thulimlouhna ah a hul dinga, numeiin a khelhna moh a po ding hi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante kiangah gen inla, akiang uah, pasal hiam, numei hiamin leng banghiam thuchiam tuam, TOUPA dinga kipiakna Nazirit thuchiam achiam laiin uain leh ju a ngawl ding ahi;
Uain thuk leng, ju thuk leng a dawn ding ahi kei, grep tui leng dawnin grep mindup hiam, minvuai leng a nek ding ahi samkei hi.
A kihihtuam sungteng grep guia a laia a tang leng, a hawng leng a nek ding ahi kei.
Kihihtuamna thu achiam sungteng a lu leng met louh hial ding ahi: TOUPA adia a kihihtuam sung ni a kim mateng hihtuam ahi dinga, a sam a hawi ding ahi.
TOUPA adia a kihihtuam sungteng misi luang a naih ding ahi kei.
A pa te, nu te, a unaupa te, a sanggamnu te hiam sih thu ah leng a kihihnin ding ahi kei, Pathian adia a kihihtuamnain a gak jiakin.
A kihihtuam sungteng TOUPA tuam ahi.
A kiangah mi hongsi guihin, a kihihtuamna lutang honhihninta bang hileh, a kisiansak ni, a ni sagih niin a lu a met ding ahi.
Huan, ni giatniin kihoupihna puanin kongkhak a siampu kiangah vakhu kop khat hiam, vapal nou kop khat hiam hontawi ding ahi:
Huan, siampuin khat khelh thoihna dingin a lan dia, khat halmang thillat dingin, misi jiaka a hihkhelhna ah kilemna a bawlsak ding; huan, huai ni mah in a lu a hihsiangthou ding ahi.
Huan, moh thoihna dingin belamnou apa kum khata upa hontawiin a kihihtuam nite TOUPA kiangah a hih hoih nawn ding: a kihihtuamna hihnit a hihtak jiakin a maa pen lah bangmahlou ahita ngala.
Huan, hiaia Naziritmi, a kihihtuamna ni bi uh a kim hun chia hih dan dinga hi: kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah pi ding ahi ding:
Huan, TOUPA dia thillat dingin belampa kum khata upa gensiatbei halmang thillat dingin khat, khelh thoihna dingin belamnou a nu kum khata upa gensiatbei khat, lemna thillat dingin belempa gensiatbei khat,
Silngou sohlouh tanghou leh tangbuang nel mahmah thaua mek tanghou leh tangbuang nel mahmah thaua mek tanghou beu leh thaua jut tanghoupek pa bawm khat, a tangbuang thillat ding uleh dawn ding thillat dingte toh a lat ding uh ahi.
Huan, siampuiin huaite TOUPA maah a lan dinga, a khelh kithoihna leh a halmang thillat a lan ding:
Huan, belampa pen bawma tanghou silngou sohlouhte toh lemna kithoih thillat adingte TOUPA kiangah a lan ding: siampuin tangbuang thillat leh dawnding thillat mahleng a lan tel ding hi.
Naziritmiin kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah a kihihtuamna lu a met dinga, kihihtuamna sam a la dinga, lemna kithoihna thillat nuaia mei ah a khul tum ding hi.
Huan, siampuin belampa liang huanmin leh bawma silngou sohlouh tanghou khat leh silngou sohlouh tanghou pek pa khat a la dinga, Naziritmiin a kihihtuamna lua a met khitin a tawisak ding:
Huan, siampuin vei thillat dingin TOUPA maah a vei ding ahi; hiai siampu tuam ahi ding, awm vei leh liang vei toh: huai khit chiangin Nazaritmiin uain a dawn theita ding hi.
Hiai ahi, Naziritmiin thuchiam dan leh TOUPA maa a thillat dan uh, amah utthua lat simlouhin: a kihihtuamna thuchiam dingjui jelin a hih ding ahi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Aron leh a tapate kiangah, hichibangin Israel suante na vualjawl ding ahi; a kiang uah,
TOUPAN nou honvualjawlin honveng jel hen:
TOUPAN a mel na tunguah vaksak henla, hohhehpih jel hen:
TOUPAN nou lam hongnga henla, lungmuanna nou honpia hen, chiin gen un, chiin genin.Huchibanga hihin Israel suante ka min tuansak ahi dinga, huan, ken ka vualjawl ding, chiin.
Huchibanga hihin Israel suante ka min tuansak ahi dinga, huan, ken ka vualjawl ding, chiin.
Huchia Mosiin biakbuk a lam khiata, thau a nilh khita, ahihsiangthou khita, a van tengteng leh a maitam leh a tuiumbelsuan tengteng thau nilha, ahihsiangthou niin hichi ahi a;
Israelte intekpen, a inkuan ua intekpenten thillat a lan ua, huaite bela nam ua intekpente, a simte uh tunga omte ahi uh:
A thillatte uh kangtalai tungnei guk leh bawngtal sawm leh nih, intekpen nihin kangtalai khat jel, khatin bawngtal khat jel TOUPA maah a hontawi ua, biakbuk bulah a honglan uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi houpiha,
Biakbuk nasep dingin a phatuam kha ding, nana la chiat un; Levite, a nasep uh dungjui bangjelin na pe chiat ding hi, chiin
Huchiin Mosiin kangtalaite leh bawngtalte a laa, Levite a pia,
Kangtalaite nih leh bawngtalte li Gerson tapate a nasep uh dungjui jelin a pia:
Huan, kangtalai li leh bawngtal giat, siampu Aron tapa Ithamar te Merari tapate a nasep uh dungjui jelin a pia,
Kohath tapate bel a pe tei kei; mun siangthou nasep amau tuam ahia, a zona zong sek ahi uh.
Intekpenten thaunilh niin maitam latna dinga a thillatte uh maitam bulah a lan uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Intekpen chihin maitam latna dinga thillat, a thillat uh amau tan hi jel dingin lan ding uhi, a chi.
Ni khat nia a thillat a lan ding mi Juda chi Aminadab tapa Nason ahi:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat dingin thau helsa tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat dingin bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata up khat;
Khelh thoihna dingin keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat dingin bawngtal nih, belamtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga: hiaite Aminadab tap Nason thillatte ahi uh.
Ni nih niin Isakarte intekpenten Zuar tapa Nathanelin a lana:
A thillat dingin dangkasik kuang khat a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dankasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat dingin bawngtal tuai khat belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna dingin keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoihna thillat dingin bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga a lana.
Hiai Zuar tapa Nathanel thillatte ahi.
Ni thum niin Zebulun tate intekpen Helon tapa Eliabin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat; tangbang thillat ding thau toh jel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna dingin keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat dingin bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi.
Hiaite Helon tapa Eliab thillatte ahi uh.
Ni li niin Reuben tate intekpen Sedeur tapa Elizurin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dankasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat dinga thau hel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata up khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kihthoihna thillat dingin bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi.
Hiaite Sedeur tapa Elizur thillatte ahi.
Ni nga niin Simeon tate intekpen Zurisadai tapa Selumielin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum; mun siangthou sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat; tangbuang thillat dingin thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat lat dingin bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi; hiai Zurisadai tapa Selumiel thillatte ahi.
Ni guk niin Gad tate intekpen Deuel tapa Eliasaphin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa, khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi.
Hiaite Deuel tapa Eliasaph thillatte ahi.
Ni sagih niin Ephraim tate intekpen Amihud tapa Eliasamin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, khat, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat; halmang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa, khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi: hiaite Amihud tapa Eliasam thillatte ahi.
Ni giat niin Manase tate intekpen Pendazur tapa Gamalielin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawnthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat; tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel, tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kihthoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi.
Hiaite Pendazur tapa Gameliel thillatte ahi.
Ni kua niin Benjamin tate intekpen Gideoni tapa Abidanin a lana;
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak.
Sekel sawm toh kima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belam nou a pa kum khat a upa;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoihna thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi: hiaite Gideoni tapa Abidan thillat ahi.
Ni sawm niin Dan tate intekpen Amisadai tapa Ahiezerin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, khat, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi: Hiaite Amisadai tapa Ahiezer thillatte ahi.
Ni sawm leh ni khat niin Aser tate intekpen Okran tapa Pagielin a lana:
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel sawmthum, khat, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangka keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khat upa nga ahi: hiaite Okran tapa Pagiel thillatte ahi.
Ni sawm leh ni nih niin Naphtali tate intekpen Enan tapa Ahirin a lana;
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel ja leh sawmthum, khat, mun siangthoua sekel sawmsagih toh kikima gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang toh hel tangbuang nel mahmaha dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou apa kum khata upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Huan, lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnou apa kum khata upa nga ahi: hiaite Enan tapa Ahir thillatte ahi.
Huan, maitam thau nilh nia Israel intekpente thillatte dangkasik kuang sawmlenih, dangkasik belhbu sawmlenih, dangkaeng keu sawmlenih ahi.
Dangkasik kuang sekel ja leh sawmthum toh kikima gik chiat ahia, belhbu sawmsagih chiat ahi: dangkasik tuiumbelsuan tengteng mun siangthoua sekel sang nih leh za li toh kikima gik ahi;
Gimlima dim dangkaeng keu sawm leh nih mun siangthoua sekel sawm toh kikima gik chiat ahi: dangkaeng keu tengteng sekel ja leh sawmnih toh kikima gik ahi:
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tengteng sawm leh nih ahia, belamtal sawmlenih, belamnou apa kum khata upa sawm leh nih, a tangbuang thillatte uh toh; huan, khelhna thoihna ding keltal sawm leh nih:
Huan, lemna kithoihna thillat ding bel bawngtal sawmnih leh li ahia, belamtal bel sawmguk, keltal bel sawmguk, belamnou apa kum khata upa bel sawmguk ahi.
Hiai thau nilh khita maitam latna dinga thilpiakte ahi.Huchiin biakbuka amah be dinga Mosi a lutin thukunna bawm tunga chitna tutphah tunglama cherub nihte kikal akipanin amah honhoupihin aw a ja a: huan a beta hi.
Huchiin biakbuka amah be dinga Mosi a lutin thukunna bawm tunga chitna tutphah tunglama cherub nihte kikal akipanin amah honhoupihin aw a ja a: huan a beta hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Aron houpih inla, a kiangah, Khawnvak na det chiangin khawnvak sagihten sathau khawnvak koihna ma lam a et ding uh ahi, chiin, chiin.
Huan, Aronin huchibangin a hiha; TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangin khawnvak koihna ma lamah khawnvakte a de hi.
Hiai khawnvak koihna dan ahihleh dangkaeng a sekthohchi ahi; a peu bul leh a pak tana sek ahi: TOUPAN a lim Mosi a etsak bang geiha khawnvak koihna bawl ahi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Levite Israel suante lak akipan hihtuam inla, hihsiangthouin.
Amaute hihsiangthou dingin hichibangin na hih ding hi: a tunguah sawpsiangna tui sung inla, a pumpi tengteng uh metsak inla, a puante uh sawpsak inla, kihihsiangthou sakin.
Huan, bawngtal tuai khat a tangbuang thillat thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah toh lasak inla, huan, khelh thoihna ding bawngtal tuai khat dang leng na kaih ding ahi.
Huan, Levite kihoupihna puanin bulah pi inla, Israel suante omkhawmte tengteng kigawmkhawm sak vekin:
Huan, Levite TOUPA kiangah na lan dinga; Israel suanten Levite tungah a khut uh a nga ding uh:
Huchiin Aronin Levite, TOUPA na a sep theihna ding uh Israel suante minin vei thillat TOUPA kiangah a lan ding.
Huan, Leviten bawngtal lute ah a khut uh a nga ding ua; huan Levite adinga kilemna bawlna dingin, khat khelh thoihna dingin, khat halmang thillat dingin TOUPA kiangah na lan ding hi.
Huan, Levite Aron leh a tapate maah na omsak dinga, TOUPA dingin vei thillat din na lat ding ahi.
Huchibangin Israel tate lak akipan Levite na hihtuam dinga, huchiin Levite keia ahi ding uh.
Huan, huai khiat chiangin Levite kihoupihna puanin na sem dingin a lut ding ua, huan, nang amaute na hihsiangthou ding, vei thillat dingin na lan ding hi.
Israel suante lak akipana ka tuam dinga seh lah ahi ngal ua; sul hong tengteng Israel suante ta masapen teng tangin ka tuam dingin ka neita ahi.
Israel tate laka ta masapen teng keia ahi him uh; Mihing toh ganta toh; Aigupta gama ta masapen teng la sihsak laiin ka tuam dinga ka sehsa ahi.
Huchiin Israel suante laka ta masapen teng tangin Levite ka neikhinta ahi.
Huchiin Israel suante tanga kihoupihna puanina na sem ding leh Israel taten mun siangthou a honnaih ua leng Israel tate laka hi a len louhna dinga lemna bawl dingin Israel tate lak akipan Levite Aron leh a tapate ka pia ahi, chiin.
Huchibangin Mosi te, Aron te, Israel suante omkhawm tengtengin Levite tungah a hih uhi.
Levite tungtang thu-a TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak tengteng bangin a tunguah Isreal suanten a hih uhi.
Huchiin Levite khelhna lakah a kisiangsak ua, a puante uh a sawp ua; huan, Aronin TOUPA maah vei thillat dingin a lan; huan, amau hihsiangthouna dingin Aronin kilemna a bawlsak hi.
Huan, huai zohin Levite Aron leh a tapate nuaia a nasepna uh sem dingin kihoupihna puanin sungah a lut uh: Levite tungtang thu-a TOUPA Mosi thu a piak bangin a tunguah a hihat hi.
Huan TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Levite tantuam hiaite ahi: kum sawmnih leh kum nga chiang tunglamin kihoupihna puanina nasepna a sem ding uh:
Kum sawmngaa upaten nasepna na a khawlsan ding ua, na a sem nawnta kei ding uh;Ahihhangin khawmpite biakbuk kepthu ah a unaute uh a huh liailiai jel ding ua, nasep jaw a sem nawn kei ding uh.
Hichibangin Levite a nasep uh na gelsak ding ahi, chiin.
Ahihhangin khawmpite biakbuk kepthu ah a unaute uh a huh liailiai jel ding ua, nasep jaw a sem nawn kei ding uh.
Hichibangin Levite a nasep uh na gelsak ding ahi, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Aigupta gam akipan a hongpawt nung uh kim nihna kha khatnain Sinai gamdai ah Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suanten paikan ankuangluina a hunbi jelin nei uhen.
A hunbiin, hiai kha ni sawm leh ni li nitaklamin na nei ding uhi: huaia hih ding seh bang tengteng leh adan bang bangin na nei ding uhi, chiin.
Huchiin Mosiin Israel suante paikan ankuangluina nei dingin a hilh.
Huchiin Sinai gamdai ah kha khatna, a ni sawm leh ni lini nitaklamin paikan ankuanluina a neita uhi: TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bang jelin Israel suanten a hih uh.
Huan, kuate hiam misiluang jiaka siangthoulou a naom ua, huai niin paikan ankuangluina ah a tel tei theikei uh; huchiin huai niin Mosi leh Aron maah a hoh ua:
Huaiten a kiangah, Misi luang jiakin ka siangthou kei ua; bangjiakin ahia Israel suante lakah a hunbia TOUPA kianga thillat ka lat sam uh non kham! a chi ua.
Huan, Mosiin a kiang uah, Na pau kei phot dih uh, na tungtang thu uah TOUPAN bangchibangin ahia thu a piak sin ka honza masa phot ding, a chi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante kiangah, Na lak ua kuapeuh, na suante uh laka kuapeuh, misiluang jiaka siangthoulou hiam, na zin mang hiam a om zenzen uleh TOUPA adin paikan ankuangluina na nei tei himhim ding uhi:
Kha nihna ni sawm leh ni li ni nitaklamin a nei ding uh ahi: tanghou silngou sohlouh loukha nah toh a nek ding uh ahi:
Ajing adingin a bangmah a koih ding uh ahi kei: a guh leng a hihtan ding uh ahi kei: paikan ankuangluina a hih ding seh bangjel a hih ding uh ahi.
Ahihhangin, siangthou ngala zin manga lah neilou paikan ankuangluinaa tel lou mawkmawk jaw a chihpihte lak akipanin huai mi satkhiak ding ahi ding: a hunbia TOUPA kianga thillat a lat louh jiakin huai miin a khelh moh a po ding hi.
Huan, nam dang mi na kiang ua omin TOUPA adinga ankuangluina a tel tei a ut uleh paikan ankuanluinaa hih ding seh leh a dan bangin a hih ding uh ahi, hiai gama mi mawng leh nam dang mite dingin dan kikhat na neih ding uh ahi, chiin genin, chiin.
Huchiin biakbuk lamkhit niin biakbuk theihsakna puanin pen meipin a tuam liailuaia, huan, nitaklamini biakbuk tungah meikuang bangbang a jingsang tanin a om hi.
Huchibangin a om nilouha: meipiin a tuam nilouha, jan chiangin mei bangin a kilang.
Meipiin Puan In a kikhinsan tengin Israel suanten pai ding vai a hawm jel uh: huan, meipi a khawlnamun peuh ah Israel taten giahbuk a sat uh.
TOUPA thupiakin Israel suante a pai jel ua, TOUPA thupiak mahin giahbuk a sat uh: biakbuk tunga meipi a om sungteng giahbuk ah a om nilouh uh.
Huan, biakbuk tunga meipi sawtpi a om leh Israel taten TOUPA thu a jui ua, a pai kei uhi.
Huan, akalkalin meipi biakbuk a sat ua, TOUPA thupiak bangin a pai jel uh.
Huan, akalkalin meipi nitaklam akipana jingsang phain a oma; huan, jingsanga meipiin a tungkah san leh a pai jel uhi, ni khat lel hiam, jan khat lel hiam oma meipiin a tungkah san leh a pai jel uh.
Biakbuk tunga meipi ni nih hiam, kha khat hiam, kum khat hiam zong a oma, huailaia a om nilouh leh Israel suante giahbuk ah a om nilouh ua, a pai kei jel uh; a tungkah san lebel a pai jel uh.TOUPA thupiakin giahbuk a sat jel ua, TOUPA thupiakin a pai jel uh: Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiakin TOUPA thu a jui uhi.
TOUPA thupiakin giahbuk a sat jel ua, TOUPA thupiakin a pai jel uh: Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiakin TOUPA thu a jui uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Dangka pengkul nih bawl inla; sekthohin bawlin: mipite sap khawmna ding leh pawtsakna dinga na zat ding ahi.
Huai a kimut chiangin mipi tengteng na kiangah kihoupihna puanin kongkhak bulah a hongkikhop vek ding uh ahi.
Huan, khat lel a mut uleh Israel mipite heutu intekpente kia na kianga a honpai khawm ding uh ahi ding.
Huan, gallau muta na mut uleh suahlam panga omte a pawt ding uh ahi ding,
Huan, gallau muta na mut nawm uleh simlam panga omte a pawt ding uh ahi; a pawtna ding un gallau mut banga a mut ding uh ahi.
Ahihhangin mipite hongpai khawmna dingin na mut peuhmah ding ua, gallau muta bel mut louin.
Aron tapa siamputen pengkul a mut ding uh ahi; huai nou dingin na suante uh tana khantawn dan ding ahi ding hi.
Na gam ua melma nou honnuaisiahte dou dinga na kuan chiang un gallau mutin pengkulte na mut ding uh ahi; huchiin TOUPAN na Pathian ma uah theihgige na hi ding uh, na melmate uh lakah humbit na hi ding uh.
Nuam na sak ni te un, a hunbia na ankuangluinate uah, na kha thakte uah na halmang thillat uahte leh na kilemna thillat kithoihnate uah pengkul na mut ding uh ahi; huchiin na Pathian ma uah noua dingin theihgigena ahi ding: kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi, chiin.
Huah, kum nihna kha nihna, huai kha ni sawmnih niin, hichi ahi, meipi meipi theihsakna biakbuk tung apat a tungkah sangta hi.
Huchiin Israel suante a paidan uh dungjuiin Sinai gamdai akipana a pawt uh; huan Paran gamdai ah meipi a khawlta.
Mosi zanga TOUPA thupiak bangin a pawt phot ua.
A masapenin Juda pawlte a pawl uh tamdan dungjui jelin a pawt ua: a heutu Aminadab tapa Nason ahi.
Isakarte heutu zuar tapa Nethanel ahi.
Zubulunte heute Helon tapa Eliab ahi.
Huan, biakbuk a phel ua, Gerson tapa leh Merari tapa biakbuk zongmite a pawt ua,
Huan, Reubente a pawl uh tamdan dungjuiin a pawt ua: a heutu Seder tapa Elizur ahi.
Simeonte heutu Zurisadai tapa Selumiel ahi.
Gadte heute Deuel tapa Eliasaph ahi.
Huan, Kohathten mun siangthou a zong ua, a pawt uh: huan a dangten a tun tak un biakbuk a nalam ua.
Ephraimte a pawl uh tamdan dungjuiin a pawt ua: a heutu Emihud tapa Elisam ahi.
Manasete heutu Pedazur tapa Gamaliel ahi.
Benjaminte heutu Gideoni tapa Abidan ahi.
Huan, a nanungpenin Dante a pawl uh tamdan dungjuiin a pawt uh: a heutu Amisadai tapa Ahiezer ahi.
Aserte heute Okran tapa Pagiel ahi.
Naphtalite heute Enan tapa Ahir ahi.
Huchibang ahi Israel suante a pawl uh tamdan dungjuia a paidan uh; huchibang takin a pawtta uh.
Huan, Mosi sungpa Midianmi Reuel tapa Hobab kiangah, Mosiin, Kon pe ding, TOUPAN a chihna munah ka hoh sin ua, ka kiang uah hong sam inla, hoihtakin na tungah ka hih ding uh: TOUPAN Israel suante tungtang thu lah hoihtakin a genta ngala, a chi a.
Aman a kingah, Ka hong dah mai ding, kou gama ah ka tanaute kiangah ka pai zo mai ding, a chi.
Huan, aman, Hongpai san mahmah ken, gamdai ah lah giahbuk satna ding na thei zo ngala, kou dingin mit na honghi ding hi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, ka kiang ua na hong tei aleh, ahi, hichi ahi dinga, TOUPAN thil hoih hohhihsak bangjelin ka honhihsak sam jel ding uhi, a chi a,
Huchiin TOUPA tang akipana ni thum lamah a pai uh; huan, TOUPA thukhun bawm amau adinga kingakna mun lem zongin a ma uah ni thum lam ah a na pai masa.
A buk ua kipan a pawt un TOUPA meipi sunin a tunguah a om jel hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, huai bawm a pawt sin peuhmah chiangin Mosiin, TOUPA aw, hongkisa inla, na melmate hawljak inla, nang honhote na maah taikek uhen, a chi jel a.Huan, a kingakna peuhin, TOUPA aw Israel mipite kiangah hongkik nawnin, a chi jel uhi.
Huan, a kingakna peuhin, TOUPA aw Israel mipite kiangah hongkik nawnin, a chi jel uhi.
Huan, Mippen TOUPA jakin phunhatte bangin thil hoihlou pipi a gen nak ua; huai TOUPAN a najakin a hehta hi; huchiin TOUPA mei a lak uah a hongkisaa, a giahna polam uh a kang juajua hi.
Huchiin mipiten Mosi a sam ua; huan, Mosi TOUPA kiangah a thuma, mei a mitta hi.
Huailai mun min Tabera a chi uh, TOUPA mei a lak ua a hongkak jiakin.
Huan, a lak ua nam dang toh kilaktenten sa lunggulhna a hon neita ua; Israel suan te leng a kap nawn ua, Kua ahia sa nek ding honpe ding?
Ut leh daha Aigupta gama ngasa i nek jelte I theigigea, tangmaite, mazelte, phulun sialnek chite, vaiphulunte, phulun ngoute leng;
Himahleh tuin I guhngek uh a keu khinta, bangmah lamet ding mahmah a omkei, manna lel loungal, a chi uh.
Manna bel koriander tang bang, a latdain jaw tuikepsuang bang ahi.
Miten a tom khawm ua, gawinelna ah a gawi nel ua, sumte bangah a su ua, belte bangin a huan ua, tanghoute bangin a bawl uh: nekin sathaua kan tanghou bang ahi.
Giahna muna jana dai a kiakin manna leng a hongkia.
Huan, mipite a inkuankuan un a puanin kongkhak chiat uah a kap uh chih Mosiin a naja a; huan, TOUPA a heh mahmaha; Mosi leng a lungkimkei hi.
Huchiin TOUPA kiangah, Bangjiakin ahia na sikha non sukgim, bangchidan ahia na mit ka tunlouhna, hiai mite tengteng puakgik ka tunga na ngak?
Hiai mipite tengteng ka suan ahi uh maw?
A pi leh pute uh kianga kichiama piak na chiam gama pi lut dingin, Naupommiin nawitui ne lai a pom bangin na angsungah pomin, na honchih dinga ka pikhiak hon?
Hiai mipi tengteng piak ding koi akipanin ahia sa ka neih ding?
Ka nek ding un sa honpiain, chia kapin lah a honsual ngal ua.
Hiai mipi tengteng keimah kiain ka po zou kei, kei dingin a gik lua hi.
Hichibanga honhih ding na hihleh, honhehpih inla, honsisak vanglakin, honhihgenthei nawn kei mahmahin, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Israelte upa, mipite upa leh a heutu uh hia na theih mi sawmsagihte ka kiangah honpi khawm inla, kihoupihna puanin ah nangmah toh ding khawm din honpiin.
Huchiin ka hongpawt dinga, huailaiah ka hon houpih ding: huan, nang a kha pen a tunguah ka koih ding; nang kian po louin mipite puakgik a hon puakpih ding uh.
Huan, nang mipite kiangah, Jingchiang adingin kihihsiangthou vek unla; huchiin sa na ne tawk ding uh: Sa nek ding kuan ahia honpe sin?
Aigupta gama nuam I saksak utoh, chiin TOUPA jakin na kap ua; huaijiakin TOUPAN sa nou a honpe ding hi, na ne tawk ding uh.
Nikhat kia, ni nih kia, ni sawm kia, ii, ni sawmnih kia leng na ne kei ding ua;
Himahleh kha khat pumlum, na nakvang ua a hongpawt khiaka nou dia kihhuai a honmghih matan na ne ding uh; na lak ua om TOUPA na deih louh ua, Aigupta gam akipan bangdia pai khia I hi ua?
Chia, a maa na kah jiak un.
Huan, Mosiin, ka ompih mipite khea pai thei ngen leng nuai guk ahi uh: kha khat pumlum nek ding sa ka pe ding, na chi a.
Belam hon leh gan hon zong gohsak lehang, a kham ding ua hia? tuipia ngasa tengteng leng matsak vek leng zong, a khamzou ding ua hia? achi a.
Huan, TOUPAN, Mosi kiangah, TOUPA khut a tomta ahia?
Na tungah ka thu banga a tun leh tun louh na thei mai ding, achi a.
Huchiin Mosi a pawta, TOUPA thu mipite a hilh hi: huan, mipite upa sawmsagihte a sam khawma, Puan in kimah a dingsak hi.
Huchiin, TOUPA meipi ah a hongsuka, a honghoupiha, amah a kha pen upa sawmsagihte tungah a koiha; huan, hichi ahia, kha a tung ua a koihtakin thu a gen bualbual ua; himahleh huchibang a hihhih nawnta kei uhi.
Himahleh buk ah mi nih a om lai ua khat min Eldad ahi, khatpen min Medad ahi: kha a tunguah a oma, simte laka tel ahi uh, kihoupihna puanin ah bel a hoh tei kei uh: buk ah thu a gen bualbual uh.
Huchiin tangval khat a vataia, Mosi a vahilha, Eldad leh Medadin buk ah thu a gen bualbual mai uh, achi a.
Huan, Nun tapa Josua, a tuailai akipana Mosi nasempan a dawnga, Ka pu Mosi, kham ve, a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin a kiangah, Kei jiakin thik na hi hia?
Pathian mi tengteng jawlnei hi vek le uh, TOUPAN a tunguah tua kha koih chiat leh chih laitaka!
A chi a.
Huchiin Mosi buk ah a lut nawna, amah leh Israelte upate toh.
Huan, TOUPA kiang akipanin huih a hongnunga, tuipi lam akipan vengkeng a honmut lenga, buk lehlamsang ni khat lam, a lehlamsang ni khat lam tuaktuak dimsuakin buk kima tong nih khawng dinga sangin a kesaka.
Huan, mipiten huai nitum leh jankhua leh, a jing nitumin vengkeng a vatom khawm uh: a tom tawmpenin leng homer sawm a tom: buk kimah amau achiat a phou uhi.
Huan, huai sa a nek lai uh, a nek khit ma un, mipite tungah TOUPA a heh mahmaha, mipite hipi thupi mahmahin TOUPAN a gawtta hi.
Huaimun min dingin Kibrot-hattava a chi uh; huaiah sa duhgawlna neite a vui jiakun.Huan, Kibrot-hattava akipanin mipite Hazeroth ah a pai ua; Hazeroth ah a omta uh.
Huan, Kibrot-hattava akipanin mipite Hazeroth ah a pai ua; Hazeroth ah a omta uh.
Huan, Miriam leh Aronin Mosiin Kus numei ji dia a neih jiakin a gensiaua; Kus numei bel a nei ngei ngala.
Amau, Mosi kiangah kia hia TOUPAN thu a gen tuam?
Ei kiangah leng a gen sam ka hia? a chi ua.
Huai TOUPAN a naiaa.
Mosi bel leitunga mihing tengteng dia migi petmah ahi.
Huan, Mosi leh Aron leh Miriam kiangah TOUPAN, Na thum un hongpai suk unla, kihoupihna puanin ah hongpai un, a chi guiha.
Huchiin a thum un a vahoh uh.
Huan, TOUPA meipi ding ah a hongpai suka, Puan in kongkhak ah a hong dinga.
Aron leh Miriam a sama; huan, a nih un a hongpai suk ua,
Huan, aman, Ka thu ngaikhia un; na lak ua jawlnei na om uleh amah kiangah kei TOUPA kilaknain ka kihil dinga, manglamin ka houpih ding.
Ka sikha Mosi jaw huchibang ahi kei; ka inkote tengteng ah jaw a muanhuai ahi.
Amah toh jaw paukamin thuguk om louin teltakin ka kihou ding ua; TOUPA mel leng a mu ding; huaijiakin ka sikha Mosi bangchidana gense ngam na hi ua? a na chi a.
Huchiin TOUPA a tunguah a heh mahmaha, a pai nawn ta hi.
Huan, puan in tunga meipi a kikhintaa; huan, ngaiin, Miriam vuk bang maia ngouin a hongphakta; Aroin Miriam a ena, ngaiin, phak a na hita mai hi.
Huchiin Aronin Mosi kiangah, ka pu aw, ka tunguah khelhna nga mahmah ken, haihuai takin ka na hih ua, ka na khialta uhi.
Mi a nu sul akipan a hongpawt tung akipana sisa phial mahmah bangin om mahmah kei hen, a chi a.
Huchiin Mosiin, Pathian aw, damsak nawn dihve, chiin TOUPA a ngen hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, A pan a mai chil a siat hilhialin leng ni sagih a zakta sin kei ding maw?
Dainawl ah ni sagih bu le uh, huaichiangin pi lut nawn hileh, achi.
Huchiin Miriam pen dainawl ah ni sagih a bu manga; Miriam a pi lut nawn ma un mipite a kisuan kei uh.Huai khintin mipite Nazeroth akipan a pawt ua, Paran gamdai ah giahbuk a sat uhi.
Huai khintin mipite Nazeroth akipan a pawt ua, Paran gamdai ah giahbuk a sat uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante ka piak, Kanan gam vaenkhe dingin mite sawl dih ve; a nam inko chih ua mi, a intekpapen lak ua mi khat chiat jel na sawl ding ahi, achia.
Huan, Mosiin Paran gamdai akipanin TOUPA thupiak bangin a kuansakta chiat hi; a vek un Israel suante laka intekpapen chiat ahi uhi.
Hiaite a min uh ahi; Reuben nam laka mi Zakur tapa samu.
Simeon nam laka mi Hori tapa Saphat.
Juda nam laka mi jephune tapa Kaleb.
Isakar nam laka mi Joseph tapa Igal.
Ephraim nam laka mi Nun tapa Hose.
Benjamin nam laka mi laka mi Raphu tapa Palti.
Aebulun nam laka mi Sodi tapa Gadiel.
Joseph nam (Manase nam a chih uh) laka mi Susi tapa Gadi.
Dan nam laka mi Gemali tapa Amiel.
Aser nam laka mi kikael tapa Sethur.
Naphtali nam laka mi Vopsi tapa Nabi.
Gad nam laka mi Maki tapa Geuel.
Hiaite gam enkhe dinga Mosiin a sawlte min ahi.
Nun tapa Hose Mosiin Josua a chi.
Huchiin Mosiin Kanan gam enkhe dingin amaute a sawla, a kiang uah, Simlam lampi ah pai phot unla, tangte khawng kahtou unla:
Huai gam bangchi bang ahia chihte, huaia teng mipite a hat uh hia hatlou chih te a tawm uleh a tam te uh;
A omna gam uh a hoih hia hoihlou chihte, a omna khuate uh bangchi bang ahia, puanin maimah hia kulh nei chihte,
Huan, huai gam lei hoih hia lei gawng, a gammang hia manglou chih te vaenkhia unla.
Huan, hangsan takin om unla, mi gam theigahte honpua un, a chi a.
Grep gah masa gah hun laitak ahi.
Huchiin a pawt touta ua, Huai gam Zin gamdai akipana Hamath lutna Rehob tanin a enkhe vek uh.
Simlam ah a hohtou phot ua, Hebron a vatung ua, huailaiah Anak suan Ahinamte, Sesaite, Talmaite a om uh.
(Hebron bel Aigupta gama Zoan kilam ma kum sagiha kilam khin ahi).
Huan, Eskil guam a vatung ua, huaiah grep gah bawm khat ahiang toh a sat tan ua, chiangin mi nihin a jawng uh: pomgranet theite leh theipite leng pua uh.
Huailai bel Eskol guam a chi ua; Israel suanten huai akipan grep bawm a sat khiak jiak un.
Huan, gam a vaetkhiakna uah ni sawmli a tam ua, a hongnawnta uhi.
Huchiin Paran gamdaia Kades ah Mosi leh Aron leh Israel suan mipi tengteng kiang a hongtung ua, a kiang uah leh mipi tengteng kiangah thu a hontun ua, huai gam theite a lak uhi.
Huan, a kiangah, Na honsawlna gamah ka hoh ua, bawngnawitui leh khuaiju luanna a nahi ngeingut; hiai a gama thei ahi.
Himahleh a gama mi omte mi hat pipi ahi ua, khuate leng kulhnei, thupi taktak ahi: huan, Anak suante leng ka mu uhi.
Amalekte Simlam gamah a gam ua; Hitte, Jebuste, Amorte, tanggam ahte a om uh: huan, Kanante bel tuipi gei leh Jordan lui dungah a om uh, chiin a hilh ua.
Huchiin Mosi maah Kalebin mipite a daisak khekhup a, Kisa tou zok ni, vala tou zok ni, I zou ngeingei ding uh, a chi a.
Himahleh a hohpihten, I vazou thei vek kei ding e, ei sangin lah a hat ngal ua, a chi ua.
Huchiin Israel suante kiangah a vagam etkhiak uh, Gam enkhe dinga ka vavakna uh, a sunga mi tengte nek khit hatmi ahi ua; huan, a mi om ka muhte uh mi awmkhauh pipi ahi uh.Huan, huaiah Anak suante, mi liante, awmkhauh pipi ka vamu u; khaupe bang lelin ka kimu ua, amau leng khaupe ek bang lelin a honmu uh, chiin a hoihlou lamin a gen uh.
Huan, huaiah Anak suante, mi liante, awmkhauh pipi ka vamu u; khaupe bang lelin ka kimu ua, amau leng khaupe ek bang lelin a honmu uh, chiin a hoihlou lamin a gen uh.
HUCHIIN omkhawmte tengteng aw suak hialin a kap ua; huai janin mite a kapkap uhi.
Israel suante tengteng Mosi tung leh Aron tungah a phun ua: omkhawmte tengtengin a kiang uah, Aigupta gamah pathianin honhihlum geih hileh aw!
Ahihkeileh gamdai ah honna hihlum geih hileh aw!
Bangachia namsaua si maimah dinga Pathianin hiai gama honpi ahi de aw?
I ji I tate lah mat maimah ding ahi ngal ua: Aigupta gama kik nawn eia dia hoihzo lou ding hia? a chi ua.
Huchiin a kihou khawm ua, Heutu bawl ni e, Aigupta gamah kik nawn ni, a chi ua.
Huchiin Mosi leh Aron Israel suante mipi omkhawm tengteng maah a khupboh uh.
Huan, Nun tapa Josua leh Jephune tapa Kaleb, gam vaenkhete laka telten a puan uh a botkek ua:
Israel suante omkhawm tengteng kiangah, Enkhe dinga ka vavakna gam uh gam hoihtak ahi.
I tung ua TOUPA a kipah leh huai gamah a honpi ding, honpe ding: huai nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gam.
TOUPA tungah hel kei phot leu chin, huai gama mite leng lau samkei un, I an ding uh ahi mai ua, a kihumbitna uh bangmah ahi kei; TOUPA I kiang uah a om hi, amau kihta kei un, chiin a gen uh.
Himahleh omkhawmte tengtengin suanga den a sawm uh.
Huchiin TOUPA thupina kihoupihna puanin Israel suante tengteng maah a honglangta hi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Hiai mipiten bangtan ahia honthuseh louh dina ua, a lak ua chiamtehna ka hih sek nangawna leng bangtan ahia hontaksan sin louh uh?
Hiin ka gawt dinga, ka in-gam sak dinga, nangmah ah a sang ua thupi leh thilhihthei jaw nam ka bawlkhe zo mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin TOUPA kiangah, Aigupta miten a za kha ding uh; hiai mite lah a lak ua kipana na thilhihtheihnaa na pikhiak ahi ngal ua;
Hiai gama mite a hilh ding ua: hiai mipite lakah na om chih a zata uh; kimaituah hialin lah a honmuta ngal ua, na meipi a tunguah a om sek a; huan, sunin meipi ding, janin meiin a ma uh lah na pi jel ngala.
Hiai mipite na thahgam leh na minthangna ja namten.
TOUPAN hiai mite kichiama achiam gama a pi theihlouh jiakin gamdai ah a hihlum ahi, chiin a hon genkhe ding uh.
Tuin ka honngen ahi, ka TOUPA thilhihtheihna hihthupiin om hen, thu a na gentak dungjuiin,
TOUPA jaw lungnel tak, migitna hau, thulimlouhna te, tatlekna te ngaidam sek; moha sehte khah ngeiloupa, pate thulimlouhna jiaka tate, tate ta nawnte, suan thumna leh suan lina tana leng gawt sek ahi na na chih.
Na migitna a thupi bang ngei leh Aigupta gam akipana tutana na ngaihdam bangin mipite thulimlouhna ngaidam dih ve, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPAN, Na thu bangin ka ngaidam hi:
Himahleh ka hinna leh TOUPA thupinain a hondimsak ding lei tengteng louin ka gen hi;
Aigupta gam leh gamdaia ka thupina leh ka thillamdang hihte mu a, huchi pipia leng sawm vei tak honzeet lailaia, ka thu jui lou lai mi tengtengin;
A pipute uh kianga kichiama ka chiam huai gam a mu kei hial ding uh; a lak ua kei honngaineute mawngmawngin leng a mu sam kei ding uh:
Ka sikha Kalebin bel lungsim dang a puta, a honzuih taktak jiakin, amah jaw a vahohna gamah ka pi ding, a suanten a luah ding uh.
Khaile, Amelekte leh Kanante huai gamah a om ua: jingchiangin kihei unla, Tuipi san lampi lam gamdai ah lut un, a chi hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi leh Aron a houpiha,
Hiai mi thulimlou omkhawmte, ka tunga phunphunte bangtan ahia ka dohtheih ding?
Israel suante phunna, ka tunga a phunnate uh ka ja hi.
A kiang uah, Ka hinna louin ka gen hi, ka bilbuk ngeia na gen bang un na tunguah ka hih ding:
Na luang uh gamdai ah a om dinga; na lak ua simsa mi tengteng, kum sawmnih akipan tunglam ka tunga phunphun teng,
Banjak hiala, Ka honomsak ding, ka chih gamah Jephune tapa Kaleb leh Nun tapa Josua kia loungal na lut kei ding uh.
Ahihhangin, Mat ding lel ahi ding uh, na chih uh na tate uh ka pi lut dinga, na dihlouh gam uh a thei ding uh.
Noubel na luang uh hiai gamdai ah a om ding.
Na tate uh gamdai ah kum sawmli a tamvak ding uh, gamdaia na luangte uh a mawk man masiah na kijuakna uh amau a thuak loh ding uh.
Gam na vaetkhiak ni zah uh, ni sawmli, ni khat tangin kumkhat jel, kum sawmli sung tak na tatlekna uh na thuak loh ding ua, huchiin ka tupdan ka hihlamdan na thei ding uh.
Kei TOUPAN mi ginalou omkhawm honnanga omkhawmte tungah hia ka hih ngei ding ka nachita a: hiai gamdai ah a mangthang ding ua.
Huailaiah a si ding uh, TOUPAN a chi, chi un, chiin.
Huan, gam enkhe dinga Mosi mi sawl hongkik nawnten, gam omdan a hoihlou lama genin amah tungah omkhawmte a phunsak hi,
Huai gam omdan a hoihlou lama gente ngei TOUPA maah hiin a sita uh.
Gam enkhe dinga hohte laka Nun tapa Josua leh Jephune tapa Kaleb bel a si tei kei uhi.
Huan, Mosiin huai thute Israel suante tengteng a hilha: huchiin mipite a lungkhamta mahmah uhi.
Huchiin jingpiinn a thou ua, mual vum ah a hohtou ua, Ngaiin, ka hongpai uhi.
