TOUPAN a honchiamna mun ah ka hoh ding uhi, ka na khialta uhi, achi ua.
Huan, Mosiin, Lamzanna ahi kei ding chih thei napia bangdinga TOUPA thupiak bohse himhim na hi ua?
Na lak uah TOUPA a om ngal keia, melmate hihlup lel dingin hohtou kei un.
Na ma uah Amalekte leh Kanante a om uhi, namsaua hihlup na hi phet ding uh: TOUPA na lehngatsantak jiak un na kiang uah TOUPA a om kei ding, a chi a.
Himahleh mualvuma hoh a tum teitei ua: ahihhangin TOUPA thukhunnabawm leh Mosi jaw buk akipan a pawt kei uhi.Huchiin huai muala om Amalekte leh Kanante a hongkuan suk ua, a sual ua, Horma tanphain amau a sat puk phengphung maimah uhi.
Huchiin huai muala om Amalekte leh Kanante a hongkuan suk ua, a sual ua, Horma tanphain amau a sat puk phengphung maimah uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Na omna ding uh gam kon piak na tun chiang ua,
TOUPA kianga meia thillat, halmang thillat hiam, thuchiam tangtung dinga na kithoihna uhiam, noumau utthu a thillat hiam, na ankuanglui hunbi uh hiam, ganhon laka hiam, belam hon laka hiam TOUPA adinga gimlim bawl ding hiama na lat chiang un:
TOUPA kianga thillat lanmi peuhin tangbuang thillat, tangbuang nelte epha mun sawma khena mun khat, sathau hin mun li akhena mun khata meka a lat ding ahi.
Huan, dawnding thillat dia uain hin mun li akhena mun khat halmang thillat hiam, kithoihna hiama belamnou min kima na bawl ding uh ahi.
Huan, belamtala tangbuang thillat, tangbuang nelte, epha mun sawma khena mun nih, sathau hin mun thuma khena mun khat mek na bawl ding uh ahi.
Huan, dawnding thillat dia TOUPA adinga gimlim dinga uain hin mun thuma khena mun khat na lat ding uh ahi.
Halmang thillat dinga hiam, thuchiam tangtun dinga kithoihna ding hiam, TOUPA kianga lemna thillat ding hiama bawngtal na hih chiang un:
Bawngtal lat toh kitonin tangbuang thillat tangbuang nelte epha mun sawma khena mun thum sathau hin kimkhata mek na lat ding uh ahi.
Huan, dawnding thillat dia uain hin kimkhat, TOUPA dinga gimlim meia thillat na lat ding uh ahi.
Huchibangin bawngtal te, belamte, belamnou apa te, kelnou te a min kim ua hih ding ahi.
A tamdan uh dungjui jelin na bawl ding ua, a tamdan uh bangjelin na lan ding uhi.
Huai gama piang tengtengin hichibang jelin TOUPA adia gimlim meia thillat a lat chiang un a hih ding uhi.
Huan, nam dang mi na kiang ua tengsa him hiam, kuapeuh na kiang ua teng jeljel dingte hiamten leng TOUPA adinga gimlim meia thillat lan nuam peuhin na hih bangbang ua a hih sam ding uh ahi.
Na suante u tan adinga mipite leh nam dang na kiang ua omte adin leng dan khat kia a om ding ahi; TOUPA maah nam dangte noumau bang geih ahi ding uh.
Nou ading leh na kiang ua nam dang omte adingin dan khat leh hindan kibang khat kia a om ding, chiin, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Hichi ahi dinga, ka honpina ding gam na vatun ua,
Huai gam tanghou na nek chiang un, TOUPA kiangah vei thillat na lan ding uh ahi.
Na tanghou mek masapen lak ua beu khat vei thillat dia na lat ding uh ahi: phuala vei thillat dia na vei bang un na vei ding uhi.
Na suante uh tanin na tanghou mek masapen uh TOUPA kianga vei thillat dinga na lat jel ding uh ahi.
Huan, hiai thupiak tengteng, TOUPAN Mosi kianga a gen, na zuih louh ua na bohsiat uleh,
TOUPAN thu a piak tung akipana na suante uh tan adia Mosi zanga thu a piak tengteng,
Hichi bang ahi dinga, omkhawmten theiloua a hihkhak uh ahihleh, omkhawm tengtengin halmang thillat TOUPA dinga gimlim dingin bawng tuai khat a lan ding ua, a dan ngeina bangin tangbuang thillat leh dawn ding thillat toh, khelhna kithoihna dingin keltal khat leng a lan tel ding uh ahi.
Huan, siampuin Israel suante omkhawm tengteng adingin lemna a bawl dinga, ngaihdam ahi ding uh, hihkhak ahihjiak leh a thillat uh.
TOUPA adia meia thillat leh a hihkhelh uh tanga khelhna kithoihna a lattak jiak un:
Israel suante omkhawm tengteng ngaihdam ahi ding ua, a lak ua nam dang omte leng; mipi tengtengin a hihkhak uh ahih jiakin.
Huan, min theiloua thil a hihkhelh leh khelhna kithoihna dingin kelnu khat kum khata upa a lat ding ahi.
Thei loua TOUPA maa hihkhialmi adingin siampuin lemna a bawl ding hi; huchiin ngaihdam ahi ding,
Thei loua hihkhialmi adin, Israel suante, huai gama piangte adin leh nam dangmi na lak ua omte dingin leng dan khat na neih ding uh ahi.
Himahleh a kisaktheih jiaka hih ahihleh, huai gama piang hiam, nam dang hiam leng hileh TOUPA gensia ahi a: huai mi a chipihte laka kipan satkhiak ding ahi.
TOUPA thu a musita, a thupiak a bohsiat jiakin, huai mi satkhiak geih mai ding ahi, a thulimlouhna moh aman a po ding, chiin, chiin.
Israel suante gamdaia a om lai un mi khat khawlnia singpua a mu ua,
A singpuak mumiten Mosi leh Aron leh mipite kiangah a pi uh.
Bangchia hih ding ahia chih genkhiak nailouh ahih jiakin tanna in ah a khum uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Huai mi hihlup ngeingei ding ahi, dainawl ah mipi tengtengin suanga a den ding uh ahi, a chi hi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Mosi thu a piak bangin mipi tengtengin dainawl ah a pi ua, suangin a denglumta uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Israel suante kiangah, a suante uh tanpha a a puan mong ua a gei bawl ding leh, a mong teng geia a dum khak dingin chiin:
Huai a mong na et ua, TOUPA thupiak tengteng na theihgige ua na zuihna ding un leh; kijuaka na om jel bang ua na lungtang uh deih leh na mit uh la lampeuh deiha na om louhna ding un:
Ka thupiak tengteng na theihgige ua na zuih ua, na Pathian ua dinga na siangthou theihna ding un ahi.Na Pathian uh hi dinga Aigupta gam akipan nou honpikhepa TOUPA na pathian uh ka hi.
Kei TOUPA na pathian uh ka hi, chiin.
Na Pathian uh hi dinga Aigupta gam akipan nou honpikhepa TOUPA na pathian uh ka hi.
Kei TOUPA na pathian uh ka hi, chiin.
Levi tapa Kohat, huai tapa Izar, huai tapa Kora pen Eliab tapate, Dathan leh Abiram leh Peleth tapa On, Reuben tate toh mite a pi ua:
Israel suante, mi langsal deuhdeuh mipi lak a heutu vaihawmmi dia telte lak a mi zanih leh sawmngate toh Mosi mah ah a va kisa ua:
Mosi leh Aron sawm in a kikhawm ua, a kiang uah, Na ut lua uh, Na ut lua uh, mipte lah a siangthou chiat ngal ua, TOUPA lah a lak uah a om ngal a: bangziak in ahia TOUPA mipi omkhawmte tung a na kikoih tungnun tuam uh?
A chi ua.
Mosi in huai a zak in a khupboh a:
Huan, Kora leh a pawlte tengteng kiang ah, Zingchiang in TOUPA'N amah ate leh a siangthoute a taklang ding; a kiang ah a hon pai naisak ding: a mi tel huai ngeingei a kiang ah a hon pai naisak ding.
Hichi in hih un, Kora leh a pawlte tengteng aw, zingchiang in meilakna khawng tawi unla;
Huai lai ah mei koih unla, TOUPA ma ah gimlim buak un: huan, TOUPA'N a tel peuhmah a siangthou ding: Levi tapate aw, na ut lua uh, chi in a gen a.
Huan, Mosi in Kora kiang ah, Nou Levi tapate aw, ngaikhia unla,
TOUPA biakbuuk nasep sem ding leh, khawmpi na sem dia khawmpite ma a ding a amah kiang a hon om naisak ding a, Israel Pathian in Israel khawmpite a kipan a nou a hon om sak, nou a dia thil neuchik phet a kilang hia;
Huan, amah kiang ah a hon om naisak ta a, na kiang a na unau Levi tapate tengteng: siamputna leng na zong uhia?
Huaiziak in nang leh na pawlte tengteng TOUPA nang in na kikhawm uh ahi.
Huan, Aron in bang a hih a ahia, a tung a na phun uh?, a chi.
Huan, Mosi in Elia tapa Dathan leh Abiram a sam sak a: amau, Kong paitou kei ding uh:
Gamdai a hon hihlum ding in nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gam a kipan no'n pikhiak thil neuchik hia?
Ka tunguah na kilalsak nawn ngal a
Nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gamah non pilut kei a, lou ding leh grep huan gou ding lah no'n pe kei: hiai mite mitte na mialsak sin ahia?
Ka hong paitou kei hial ding uh, a chi ua.
Huchi in Mosi a heh mahmah a, TOUPA kiang ah, a thillat uh sang ke'n: a sabengtung uh khat lel leng ka la kei ding, kuamah leng ka hihna kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi in Kora kiang ah, Zingchiang in nang leh na mi kikhawmte nang toh, amau toh Aron toh TOUPA ma ah na om un:
Huan, a meilakna uh tawi chiat uhenla, gimlim buak uhenla, TOUPA ma ah a meilakna uh hontawi uhenla, meilakna zanih leh sawmnga hontawi uhen; nang leh Aron in leng na meilakna uh tawi tuaktuak un, a chi hi.
Huchi in mi chih in a meilakna uh a tawi ua, mei a koih ua, gimlim a buak ua, Mosi leh Aronte toh kihoupihna puan inn kongkhak ah a va ding uh.
Huan, Kora in mipi tengteng amau nang in kihoupihna puan in kongkhak ah a omkhawm sak a: huan, mipi tengteng tungah TOUPA thupina mipite a hong langta hi.
Huch in TOUPA'N Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
Hiai mipi lak a kipan kihuikhia un, a hon hihman guih theihna ding in, chi in.
Huchi in amau a khupboh ua, Pathian aw, sate tengteng kha Pathian, mikhat khelh ziak in mipi tengteng tungah na heh dia hia?, a chi ua,
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Mipite kiang ah, Korate, Dathante, Abiramte buk a kipan dansan un, chi in gen in, a chi a.
Huchi in Mosi a thou a, Dathan leh Abiramte kiang ah a va hoh a; Israelte upate'n a zui uh.
Huan, omkhawmte kiang ah, Hiai migiloute puan in a kipan in pawtkhia un; a bangmah uh khoih kei un, huchilou in zaw a khelhna tengteng uah na pang kha ding uhi, chi in a gen a.
Huchi in Korate, Dathante, Abiramte buk a kipan a pawtkhe duamduam ua; huan, Dathan leh Abiram a puan inn ua kipan a hong pawtkhia ua, a puan inn kongkhak uah a zite uh, a tapate uh, a tanu neuchikchikte toh a ding ua.
Huan, Mosi in, Kei mah lungsim a pawtkhia a hih ahih kei a, hiai thil hih ding in TOUPA'N a hon sawl ahi chih hiai ah na thei ding uh.
Hiai mite mi tengteng dan bang lel mah a a sih ua, mi tengteng gawt bang lel a gawt a hih ua leh Pathian in hon sawl lou ahi ding
TOUPA'N thil thak a bawl a, lei in kam a ka a, amau leh amau a tengteng a valh a, Seol ah a hing a a lut ule bel hiai mite'n TOUPA ana ngaineu uh ahi chih na thei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai thu tengteng a gen khit in a nuai lei uh a hong khangkham phok mawk a:
Huchi in lei in a kam a ka a, a innkuan un Kora mite tengteng, a van tengteng utoh a valhkhin vek hi.
Huchi in amau-leh-amau a tengteng Seol ah a hing in a tum vek ua, lei in a kam a chih khum a, omkhawmte lak a kipan a mangthang ta uhi.
Huchi in a kim ua Israelte tengteng a kikou husa uah a taizak ua, Lei in ei leng hon valh kha ding, a chi uh.
Huan, TOUPA a kipan in mei a hong pawt khia a, gimlim lanmi zanih leh sawmngate a hong kanglum ta hi.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Nangman mei zaksak inla, siampu Aron tapa Eleazar mei a kipan a meilaknate lakhe ding in hilh in, thil siangthou ahi ngal a;
Amau hinna tung a giloute meilaknate ngei leng; huan, maitam khuhna kuang ding in sek hi hen: TOUPA ma a lat ahi a, huaiziak in a siangthou ahi, huai Israel suante a ding achiamtehna ahi ding chi in.
Huan, siampu eleazar in mi kangte dal meilaknate a la a; maitam khuhna ding in a sekta uhi:
Israel suante a ding a theih gigenate, Aron tate hilou nam dang himhim, TOUPA ma a gimlim hal ding a a hongpai nailouhna ding un; Mosi zang a a kiang a TOUPA'N a gen bang in.
Himahleh a zingsang in, TOUPA mite na hihlum uhi, chi in Israel suante mipi tengteng Mosi leh Aron tungah a phun uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Mosi leh Aron tung a mipi a phun khawm lai un, kihoupihna puan inn lam a nga ua; huan, ngai in, meipi in a hon khuh a, TOUPA thupina a hong lang hi.
Huan, Mosi leh aron kihoupihna kongkhak ah a hoh ua.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Hiai mipi lak a kipan kihemkhia un, ka hon hihmang guih theihna ding in, chi in.
Huan amau a khupboh ua.
Huan, Mosi in Aron kiang ah, Na mei lakna tawi inla, maitam a kipan mei koih inla; gimlim buak inla, mipi kiang ah paipih meng inla, amau a ding in lemna bawl in: TOUPA kiang a kipan hehna a hong suak ahi; hi a leng pan lellel hi, a chi a.
Huan, Aron in Mosi gen bang in a tawi a, omkhawmte lak ah a tailut a, huan ngai in, huai hi mipi lak ah a hong leng pan a; huan gimlim a buak a, mipi a ding in lemna a bawl hi.
Misi leh mihing kikal ah a ding a, hi a dang ta hi.
Huchi in Kora tungtang thu a simte simlouh in hia si tengteng singkhat leh sang li leh za sagih ahi uh.Huan Aron kihoupihna puan inn kongkhak ah Mosi kiang ah a kiknawn a, huchi in hi a bei ta.
Huan Aron kihoupihna puan inn kongkhak ah Mosi kiang ah a kiknawn a, huchi in hi a bei ta.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante houpih inla, a innkuan chih uh tuam ding in chiang khat chiat zel, a innkuan uh dungzui zel a a innteek pen tengteng zah, chiang sawm leh nih la lechin; huan, achiang uah a min uh gelh in.
Huan, Levi chiang ah Aron min gelh in: a innkuan chih uh a ding in chiang khat zel ahi ding ahi.
Huan, i kihouna, kihoupihna puan inn thutheihsakna ma ah na koih ding ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, mi ka tel ding chiang a sel ding a: huchi in Israel suante phunna, na tung a a phunna uh ka hihdai ding hi, chi in,
Huchi in Mosi in Israel suante a houpih a, a innteek pente tengteng un amau innkuan chih tuam ding in, innteek pen chih in chiang khat zel, chiang sawm leh nih a pia uh: Aron chiang leng achiang lak uah a tel sam hi.
Huchi in Mosi in thu theihsakna biakbuk ah TOUPA ma ah huai chiangte a koih hi.
Huan a zing in hichi ahi a, Mosi theihpihna puan inn ah a va hoh a; huan, ngai in, Levi innkuante a dia Aron chiang a sel a, pakmum a suah a, a pakpalh a, vaisuaklu min a suang hi.
Huan, Mosi in TOUPA ma a kipan chiang tengteng Israelte tengteng kiang ah a lakhia a; a na en ua, amau chiang khat a la uhi.
TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Helhat tate ahi uh chih theihsak zelna ding in Aron chiang thu theihsakna bul ah koih nawn in; huchi in ka tung a a helna uh na hihdaihsak thei ding hi, a sihlouhna ding un, a chi a,
Huchi bang in Mosi in a hih a: TOUPA'N thu a piak bang in a hih hi.
Huan, Israel suante'n Mosi kiang ah, Ngai in, mangthang ka hi uhi, ka segawp ta uhi, ka segawp khin vekta uhi.TOUPA biakbuk hon naih peuhmah a si zel ua; mangthang vek ding ka hi ding uam?
A chi uhi.
TOUPA biakbuk hon naih peuhmah a si zel ua; mangthang vek ding ka hi ding uam?
A chi uhi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Aron kiang ah, Nang leh na tapate leh na innkuan un mun siangthou thulimlouhna moh na po ding uh: huan, nang leh na tapate'n na siampu nna uh thulimlouhna moh na po ding uh.
Huan, Levi chi, na pa chi na unaute'n nang a hon zui tei ua, na nasepna a septheihna ding un na kiang nai ah omsak inla; himahleh nang leh na tapate thutheihsakna biakbuk bul ah na om ding uhi.
Na nasep a hon huh ding ua, Puan inn lam nasep tengteng a tang ding ua, himahleh mun siangthou tu-um-belsuan leh maitam pen hon naih kei uhen, a sih louhna ding un, amau hiam, nang hiam leng.
Puan inn nasepna tengteng ah kihoupihna puan inn nna pen a tang ding uh: nam dangten nou a hon naih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Huan, nang mun siangthou nasep leh maitam nasep pen na tang ding, Israel suante tung a hehna a om nawn louhna ding in.
Huan, ngai in, ke'n na unau Levite Israel suante lak a kipan ka tel khia a, kihoupihna puan inn nna sem ding in TOUPA kiang a piak, nang a dia thilpiak ahi ding uh.
Huan, nang leh na tapate'n maitam leh puanzak sunglam thu ah na siampu nasep uh na sem ding uh; huan nang nna na sem ding, siampu nasep na nasep ding in ka hon pia hi: nam dang hong kigolh peuhmah hihlup ahi ding uh, a chi hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Aron a houpih a, Ngai in, ken kei dia vei thillat, Israel suante thillat tengteng tan in nang leh na tapate khantawn a na tantuam ding un ka hon pia ahi.
Mei a hal val thil siangthoute nang a ahi ding a; a thillat chiteng uh, a tangbuang thillatte uh, a khelhna thoihna thillate uh, a mohna thoihna thillat uh ka kiang a a lat dingte uh tan in nang leh na tapate tuam ahi ding.
Thil siangthou ne in huai na ne ding ua, pasal teng in a ne ding uh; na tuam ahi ding.
Hiaite na tuam ahi ding: tangbuang thillat dia a thilpiak uh, Israel suante vei thillat tengteng tan in: nang leh na tapate leh tanute toh khantawn a na tantuam ding un ka hon pia ahi: na inn a mi siangthou tengteng in a ne thei ding uh.
Sathau hoih pente, grep hoih pente, buh hoih pente, gah masa pen TOUPA a ding a a piak uh ka hon pia hi.
A lou ua gah min masa pen TOUPA a dia a hon tawi uh nang a ahi ding a; na inn a mi siangthou tengteng in a ne thei ding uhi.
Israelte thillat tengteng nang a ahi ding.
TOUPA a dia a piak uh sul hong masa pen peuhmah mihing leng gan leng nang a ahi ding: a hihhang in a ta tung pen zaw na tat ngeingei ding ahi ding, gan siangthou lou nou suakkhe masa pen leng na tat ding ahi.
Kha khat a hih in tat dingte tatna man na sehdan bang in, mun siangthou a sekel hihdan bang a sekel nga a na tat ding ahi (sekel pen gera sawmnih ahi).
Himahleh bawngtal suakkhe masa pente, belam suak khe masa pente, kel suakkhe masa pente na tat ding ahi kei a: a siangthou uhi: a sisan uh maitam ah na theh ding a, TOUPA ding in gimlim di'n a thaute uh mei a thillat di'n na hal ding ahi
A sa uh nang a ahi ding, vei thillat om leh a liang taklam pang nang a ahi bang in,
Thil siangthou vei thillat, Israel suante'n TOUPA a ding a a latte uh khantawn a na tantuam ding uh ka hon pia hi; TOUPA ma a nang leh na tapate leh na tanute toh khantawn chi thukhun ahi ding, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA'N Aron kiang ah, A gam uah goutan na neikei ding ua, a lak uah leng tantuan na neisam kei ding uh; Israel suante lak a na tantuan leh na goutan kei ka hi.
Huan, Levi tate bel ngai in, nasepna, puan inn nasepsep a nasep man uh Israel gam a sawm a khat tengteng ka pia ahi.
Tua kipan in Israel suante'n kihoupihna puan inn a hon naih ding uh ahi kei; khelh moh pua in a si kha ding uh.
Levite'n bel kihoupihna puan inn nasep a sem ding ua; amau thulimlouhna moh a po ding uh, hiai na suante tan a dia dan ahi ding a: huan, Israel suante lak ah goutan a neikei ding uh.
Israel suante'n sawm a khat TOUPA a dia vei thillat dia a lat uh Levite goutan ding in ka pia ahi; huaiziak in a kiang uah, Israel suante lak ah goutan a neikei ding uh, ka na chita him hi, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Huai thu khawng lou ah leng Levite houpih inla, a kiang uah, Na goutan ding ua Israel suante sawm a khat ka hon piak na lak chiang un, huai sawm a khat a kipan sawm a khat TOUPA kiang ah vei thillat ding in na lan ding uhi.
Huchi in na vei thillat uh phual a buh leh uain tung masa pen ding a sim ahi ding.
Huchibang in Israel suante lak a sawm a khat na lak tengteng uate leng TOUPA vei thillat ding in na lan zui zel ding hi, huan huai TOUPA vei thillat pen siampu Aron na piak ding uh ahi.
Na thil dawn tengteng ua a hoih pen, a siangthou pen zel TOUPA vei thillat ding in na lan ding uhi.
Huaiziak in a kiang uah, Huai a hoih pen na vei chiang in Levite phual a tung leh uain tung bang a sim ahi ding.
Koilai peuh ah leng na ne thei ding uh, nou leh na innkuan pihte un leng; kihoupihna puan inn a na nasep man uh ahi ngal a.A hoih pen na vei uh leh a khelh moh na po kei ding ua, Israel suante thil siangthou na hih thanghuai kei ding ua, na si kei ding uhi, chi in, chi in.
A hoih pen na vei uh leh a khelh moh na po kei ding ua, Israel suante thil siangthou na hih thanghuai kei ding ua, na si kei ding uhi, chi in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
Hiai TOUPA thupiak dan ahi: Israel suante bawngla san, dem bei, gensiat bei, hakkol bulhsak ngei het louh hon kai ding in hilh in:
Huan, siampu Eleazar na pe ding a, huan, aman dainawl ah a pikhe ding a, a maah kua hiam in a hihlup ding ahi:
Huan, siampu Eleazar in a khut in a sisan a la ding a, kihoupihna puan inn malam ah a sisan sagih vei a theh ding.
Huan, kua hiam in huai bawngla a mit muh in a hal ding; a vunte, a sate, a sisante, a ekte toh a hal ding.
Huan, siampu in sidar sing leh husop leh khausan a la ding a, bawngla a hal uah a pailut ding ahi.
Huan, siampu in puansilhte a sawp ding a, a kisil ding a, huai khit in giahphual ah a hoh ding a, nitaklam tan in siampu a siangthou kei ding.
Huan, a hal mi in a puansilhte a sawp ding a, a kisil dinga nitaklam tan in a siangthou kei ding.
Huan, mi thanghuai lou in bawngla vu a lakhawm ding a, dainawl mun siang ah a koih ding a, Israel suante mipi suante ding in kisian sakna tui dia zat ding ahi: huai bel khelh thoihna ahi
Huan, bawngla vu hih khawm min a puansilhte a sawp ding a, nitaklam tan in a siangthou kei ding: hiai Israel suante ding in leh nam dang a kiang ua omte ding in khantawn dan ding ahi.
Kua luang leng a khoihmi peuhmah ni sagih a siangthou kei ding uh;
Huai mi a hihleh ni thum ni in a kisiangsak ding a, ni sagih ni in a siangthou ding; himahleh, ni thum ni a a kisiansak kei leh ni sagih ni in leng a siangthou kei ding hi.
Kuapeuh kua luang leng a khoih a, a kisiansak kei leh TOUPA biakbuk a hihnin ahi; huai mi pen Israel mite lak a kipan a satkhiak ding ahi; kisiansakna tui a tung a thehlouh a hihziak in a siangthou kei ding; a sianthou louhna a tungah a om lai ahi.
Puan inn a mi a sih leh hiai a dan ding ahi: puan inn a lut peuhmah leh puan inn sunga om peuhmah te ni sagih a siangthou kei ding uh.
Huan, tui-um-belsuan kihong, a sitna a sit louh peuhmah a nin ahi.
Huan gamlak ah nam kua thah hiam, misi luang hiam, mihing guh hiam, han hiam a khoih leh ni sagih a siangthou kei ding.
Huan, a siangthou loute tuam ding in khelh thoihna vu a la ding ua, bel ah tuikhuk tui toh a sung ding uh:
Huan, mi siang in, husop a la ding a, tui ah a diah ding a, puan innte, tui-um-belsuan tengtengte, huailai a om mi tengteng, guh hiam, thah luang hiam, misi luang hiam, han hiam khoih mite a theh ding a:
Huan, mi siang in ni thum ni leh ni sagih ni in mi siang lou a theh ding a, ni sagih ni in a hih siangthou ding a; a puansilhte a sawp ding a, a kisil ding a, nitaklam in a hong siangthou ta ding hi.
Mi siangthou lou kisiangsak lou in bel TOUPA mun siangthou a hihnit ziak in huai mi pen omkhawmte lak a kipan a satkhiak ding ahi; kisiansakna tui a theh louh ahi a, a siangthou lou ahi.
Hiai amau a ding in khantawn dan ding ahi: kisiansakna tui a theh peuhmah in a puansilhte a sawp ding ua; huan, a kisiansakna tui khoih peuhmah nitaklam tan in a siangthou kei ding uh.Huan, mi siangthou lou in a khoih peuhmah a siangthou kei zel ding a; huan, huai mi khoih mi kuapeuh nitaklam tan in a siangthou kei ding uhi, chi in.

Huan, Balaam kiang ah Pathian a hong a, Na kiang a mite kuate ahi ua? a chi a.

Ngai in, Aigupta gam a kipan a hong pai mipite'n lei tengteng a luahdim ua; hong pai inla, hamsia hong lohsak in, ka theih a ka delhkhiak theih zenzen khak leh, chi in mi a hon sawl hi, a chi a.
Pathian in Balaam kiang ah, A kiang ua na hoh ding ahi kei.
Huai mite na hamsiat ding ahi kei: mi hampha ahi uh, a chi a.
Huchi in Balaam a lak uah a thou a, Balak mi liante kiang ah, Na gam uah painawn ta un: TOUPA'N na kiang ua hoh ding a pawt a phal kei hi, a chi a.
Huchi in Moab mi liante a thou ua, Balak kiang ah a hoh ua, Balaam ka kiang ua hong pai a ut kei, a chi ua.
Huan, Balak in mi lian tamsem, a sang ua thupi zaw a sawl nawn a,
Huan, Balaam kiang a va tung ua, a kiang ah, Zippor tapa Balak in hichi in a chi ahi, Ka kiang a na hong bangmah in dal kei hen:
Mi thupi tak in ka hon bawl ding a, ka kiang a na gen peuhmah ka hih zel ding: huaiziak in hong pai teitei inla, hiai mite hong hamsiat mahmah mai in, a chi ua.
Huan, Balaam in Balak mite a dawng a, a kiang uah, Balak in a inn dangka leh dangka-eng a dim in hon pe sin mahleh, a bang mahmah TOUPA ka Pathian thu pel in ka hih theikei.
Huaiziak in TOUPA'N ka kiang ah bang chi in ahia a gen nawn sin, tuzan leng hiai lai ah giak peuhmah phot un, a chi a.
Huan, zan in Balaam kiang ah Pathian a hong a, a kiang ah, Hiai mite nang hong sam a hong a hih uleh, thou inla, a kiang uah hoh in; hmahleh na kiang a ka gen kia na hih ding ahi, chi a.
Huchi in Balaam zing in a thou a, a sabengtung a van a, Moab mi liante kiang ah a hoh ta hi.
Huan, a hoh ziak in Pathian a heh mahmah a, huan na lamdal ding in TOUPA angel lampi ah a na ding a.
A sabengtung tung a tuang ahi a, a sikhate nih leng a kiang ah a om tei ua.
Huan, sabengtung in TOUPA angel, namsau tawi a lampi a ding a mu a; huchi in sabengtung lampi a kipan a pialkhia a, gamlak ah a pai a.
Huan, Balaam in sabengtung lampi a kiksak tum in a khen a.
Huan TOUPA angel grep huan umna kikal kuak ah a ding a,
Huan, sabengtung in TOUPA angel a mu a, umna a va ngai a, Balaam khe umna toh a ngaiden a; huchi in a khen nawn hi.
Huan, TOUPA angel a pam deuh ah a pai a, mun kochik laitak, taklam hiam, veilam hiam a leng pialna omlouhna laitak ah a ding a.
Huan, sabengtung in TOUPA angel a mu a, Balaam a kualpih ta a; Huchi in Balaam a heh mahmah a, achiang in sabengtung a khen a.
Huchi in TOUPA'N sabengtung a pausak a, Balaam kiang ah, Bang kon chih a ahia? thumvei tak na hon huchi khet? a chi a.
Huan, Balaam in sabengtung kiang ah, No'n simmoh ziak in ahi: namsau houh na tawi hileng, ka hoh hihlum khinta hial ding, a chi a.
Huan, sabengtung in Balaam kiang ah, Tu tan a na tuanna ngitnget na sabengtung ka hi ka hia? hichi bang in ka hon hih ngei ahia? a chi a.
Aman bel, Hih ngeilou e, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA'N Balaam mit a vaksak a, huchi in TOUPA angel namsau tawi a lampi a ding a mu ta a, a kun a, mai a lei si in a khupboh a.
Huan, TOUPA angel in a kiang ah, Bang achia hichi bang a na sabengtung thum vei tak khen na hia?
Ngai in, na gamtatdan ka mitmuh a siat a hih ziak in hon na lamdal ding a hong pawtkhia ka hi:

Bangchi in Pathian hamsiat louh ka hamsiat dia?
Bangchi in Pathian nan louh ka nang dia?
Amau lah suangpi tung khawng a kipan in ka mu ngal a, tang a kipante khawng in amau ka mu a, tang a kipante khawng in amau ka mu a, ngai in, nam tuam petmah ahi uh, namte lak a sim louh ding ahi uh.

Mi diktat sih bang in si sam leng, ka tawpna bang hileh! a chi a.

Pathian zaw zuauhat mihing phet ahi kei, kisik hat mihing tapa leng ahi sam kei.
A gensa a hih kei dia hia?
A na gen sa a hih piching kei dia hia?
Ngai in, vualzawl ding in thu ka mu a, vual a zawl khin a, ka hih lamdang theikei.

Aigupta a kipan in Pathian in a pikhia a, gam bawngtal tha bang a nei ua,
Jakobte tungah bumhaina a om kei, Israelte tungah leng khimhaina a om sam kei.
Jakobte leh Israelte kiang ah Pathian thilhih hihlat zel ahi!

Beor tapa Balaam mit vak:
Pathian thute za a, Tungnungpen theihna a, Bangkim hihthei a kilakna mu, a khup a puk a mit hong vak ta in;
Amah ka mu a, tua a om bang hilou ka en a, nai chik a bang hilou in: Jakob a kipan in aksi a hong suakkhe ding a, Israel a kipan in lalchiang a hong dingkhe ding a, Moab gam tawn in a sun pailet ding a, buaina ta tengteng a hihniam ding hi.

Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Hiaite a min zah zel un gam hawm sak ding ahi.

Huan, Kohat in Amram a suang a, Huan, Amram zi min Jokebed, Levi tanu, Aigupta gam a Levi lak a piang ahi a, huan, aman Amram lak ah Aron leh Mosi leh a sanggamnu Miriam a suang hi.
Huan, Aron in Nadabte, Abihute, Eleazarte, Ithamarte, a suang hi.
Huan, Nadab leh Abihu in TOUPA zat louh ding chi mei a zat lai un a si uhi.
Huan, sim tengteng pasal kha khat chiang tung lam teng singnih leh sangthum ahi uh.
Israel mite lak ah gam hawm tang tei ding a hih louh ziak un Israel mite lak ah sim ahi kei uh.
Hiaite ahi uh Jeriko zawn, Jordan gei, Moab phai a Israel suante simpa Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in a sim uh.
Sinai gamdai a Israel mite Mosi leh siampu Aron in a simte khat lel leng a om ta kei.TOUPA'N, Gamdai ah a si ngeingei ding uh ahi, a na chi khin ta ngal a, Jephune tapa Kelep leh Nun tapa Josua loungal kuamah dam a omta kei uhi.
TOUPA'N, Gamdai ah a si ngeingei ding uh ahi, a na chi khin ta ngal a, Jephune tapa Kelep leh Nun tapa Josua loungal kuamah dam a omta kei uhi.
Huan, Joseph tapa Manase suan Manase ta Makir, huai mi ta Gilea, huai mi ta Hepher tapa Zelophehad tanute a hong pai ua: a tanute min: Mala bang, Nova ban, Hogla bang, Milka bang, Tirza bang ahi uh.
Huan, kihoupihna puan inn kongkhak ah Mosi leh Siampu Eleazar leh mi liante leh omkhawmte tengteng maitam ah a va ding ua,
Gamdai ah ka pu uh a si a, TOUPA sual ding a kikhawm pawl, Kora pawl ah tel tei kei: Himahleh amah khelh ziak in a si a, tapa a neikei hi.
Tapa a neih louh ziak lel in bang ding a ka pa uh min a suante lak a kipan mang ding ahia?
Ka pa unaute lak ah tantuan hon pia in, a chi ua.
Huan, Mosi in a thu uh TOUPA ma ah a tun a.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Zelophehad tanute'n a hihdik uhi: a pa uh unaute lak ah tantuan na bawl ngei ding ahi, a pa uh tantuan na piak ding ahi.
Huan, Israel suante'n a kiang ah, Mi, tapa neilou a a sih leh a gou a tanute na piak ding uh ahi.
Huan, tanu a neih kei leh a gou a unaute na piak ding uh ahi.
Huan, unaute a neih kei leh a gou a pa unaute na piak ding uh ahi.
Huan, a pa'n unaute a neih kei leh a gou a tanau na pe ding ua, aman a luah ding a: huan, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in Israel suante ding in dan thupiak kip ahi ding, chi in gen in, chi in.
Huan TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Abarim tang ah hohtou inla, Israel suante ka piak ding gam va en in.
Huan, na muh khit chiang in na unaupa Aron a chipihte kiang ah pi a hih mah bang in nang leng pi na hi ta ding hi!
Zin gamdai a a kikhawmte a phun lai ua a mitmuh ua tui a kei hon pahtawi ding a ka thu ka honpiak kalh a na hel ziak in, a chi a (Huaite Zin gamdai a Kadesa Mariba tuite ahi).
Huan, Mosi in TOUPA a houpih a,
Khawmpite tung a om ding mi khat, sa tengteng khate Pathian, TOUPA'N sep hen.
TOUPA mi khawmpite chingmi neilou belam bang a a om louhna ding un, a ma uh kai ding, amaute pikhia a pilut ding in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi kiang ah, Nun tapa mi lungsim neitak Josua pi inla, a tungah na khut nga inla:
Siampu Eleazar leh khawmpite ma ah ding sak inla, a mitmuh uah thuneihna pia in.
Huan, Israel suante omkhawm tengteng in thu a man theihna ding un a tungah na thupina nga in.
Huchi in amah siampu Eleazar ma ah a ding diing a, aman TOUPA ma ah Urmin thu a laksak ding a: a thu in a pawt ding ua, a thu in a lut ding ua, amah leh Israel suante tengteng, omkhawmte toh a chi a.
Huan, Mosi in TOUPA thupiak bang in a hih a: Josua a pi a, Eleazar leh omkhawmte ma ah a ding sak a:Huan, a tungah a khut a nga a, Mosi zang a TOUPA'N a gen bang in thuneihna a peta hi.
Huan, a tungah a khut a nga a, Mosi zang a TOUPA'N a gen bang in thuneihna a peta hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante thu pia inla, a kiang uah, Ka ann kei a dia gimlim mei a thillat, ka kiang ah thillat pen a hun geih zel chiah na lan ding uhi, chi in.
Huan, a kiang uah, Hiai mei a thillat TOUPA kiang a na lat ding uh ahi; belamnou a pa, kum khat a upa, gensiatbei, ni teng in nih, halmang thillat lan gige ding in.
Belamnou khat zingsang in na lan ding ua, khat nitaklam in na lan ding uh:
Tangbuang thillat ding in tangbuang nelte epha mun sawm a khen mun khat sathau suk hin mun li a khen mun khat a hel toh.
TOUPA ding a mai a thillat, gimlim ding a sinai tang a sehsa halmang a thillat lat gige ding chih ahi.
Huan, belamnou khat latna a dawn ding thillat, hin mun li a khen mun khat ahi ding ahi: TOUPA ding a uain, dawn ding thillat mun siangthou ah na bungkhe ding ahi.
Huan, belamnou khat nitaklam in na lan ding hi: zingsang lam in tangbuang thillat bang leh huai a dawn ding thillat bangbang TOUPA ding a gimlim di'n mei a thillat na lat ding ahi.
Huan, khawlni in belamnou, a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei nih leh tangbuang thillat ding in tangbuang nelte epha mun sawm a khen a mun nih sathau a helkhawm leh huai a dawn ding thillat toh na lat ding ahi;
Hiai khawlni teng a halmang a thillat lat gige leh huai a dawn ding thillat sim louh a halmanga thillat lat ding ahi.
Huan, na kha thak teng un TOUPA ding halmang thil na lat ding uh ahi; bawngtal tung nih leh belamtal khat leh belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sagih;
Huan, bawngtal chih ah tangbuang thillat ding tangbuang nelte sathau a helkhawm epha mun sawm a khen a mun thum; huan, belam khat ah tangbuang thillat ah tangbuang nelte, sathau a helkhawm mun sawm a khen a mun nih;
Huan, belamnou chih ah tangbuang thillat ah tangbuang nelte, sathau a helkhawm mun sawm a khen a mun khat: hiai halmang thillat gimlim TOUPA a dia mei a thillat ahi.
Huan, a dawn ding thillat uh bawngtal khat ah uain hin kimkhat ahi ding a belamtal khat ah hin mun thum a khen a mun khat, belamnou khat ah hin mun li a khen a mun khat: hiai kumtawn a kha teng halmang thillat ahi.
Huan, TOUPA kiang a khelh thoihna dia keltal khat na lat ding uh ahi; halmang a thillat lat gige leh huai a dawn ding thillat sim lou in.
Huan, kha khat na, ni sawm leh ni li ni TOUPA paikan ahi.
Huan, huai kha ni sawm leh ni nga ni annkuanglui ni ahi ding; ni sagih tanghou silngou soh louh nek ding ahi.
Ni khat ni in khawmpi siangthou a om ding a: bang nna mahmah na sep ding uh ahi kei;
Mei a thillat bel TOUPA kiang a na lat ding uh ahi; bawngtal tung nih leh belamtal khat leh belamnou a pa kum khat a upa sagih: na ngaihtuah ua gensiatbei ahi ding ahi:
Tangbuang nelte, sathau helkhawm, a tangbuang thillat utoh: bawngtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun thum belamtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun nih:
Belamnou sagih bel belamnou khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun khat ahi ding ahi;
Huan nou a ding a kilemna bawlna ding in khelh thoihna ding in keltal khat.
Hiaite zingsang a halmang thillat, halmang thillat lat gige leh huai a dawn ding thillat sim lou in
Hichibangin Toupa' dinga gimlim, mei a thillat nek ding ni tengin, ni sagih na lat ding uh ahi: halmang thilat lat gige leh huai dawn ding thillat sim lou in.
Huan, a ni sagih ni in khawmpi siangthou na nei ding ua, bang nna mahmah na sem ding uh hilou ahi.
Huan, na nipikal annkuang luina na buh thak tung annkuang luina TOUPA ding a thil thak tangbuang thillat na lat ni un leng khawmpi siangthou na nei ding ua; bang nna mahmah na sem ding uh ahi kei;
TOUPA ding a gimlim halmang thillat bel na lat ding uh ahi; bawngtal tung nih, belamtal khat, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa sagih;
A tangbuang thillat uh, tangbuang nelte sathau a helkhawm, bawngtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun thum.
Belamtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun nih, belamnou sagih, belamnou khat chiat ah mun sawm a khen a mun khat;
Nou a dia kilemna bawlna ding keltal khat toh.Halmang thillat gige leh huai a tangbuang thillat, huaite na lat ding uh ahi (na ngaihtuah ua gensiatbei ahi ding ahi), dawn ding thillat toh.
Halmang thillat gige leh huai a tangbuang thillat, huaite na lat ding uh ahi (na ngaihtuah ua gensiatbei ahi ding ahi), dawn ding thillat toh.
Huan, kha sagihna, a ni khat ni in khawmpi siangthou na nei ding ua; bang nna mahmah na sem ding uh ahi kei: nou a ding in pengkul mut ni ahi ding ahi.
TOUPA a ding in gimlim di'n halmang thillat na lat ding uh ahi, bawngtal tung khat, belamtal khat, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sagih:
A tangbuang thillat uh, tangbuang nelte sathau a helkhawm, bawngtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun thum, belamtal khat ah mun sawma khen a mun nih,
Belamnou sagih, khat chiat ah mun sawm a khen a mun khat:
Nou a dia kilemna bawlna di'n khelh thoihna keltal khat toh.
Kha thak halmang thillat leh huai a tangbuang thillatte, halmang thillat lat gige leh huai a tangbuang thillatte, dawn ding thillatte, a hihdan ngeina uh TOUPA ding a gimlim dia mei a thillatte sim lou in.
Huan, hiai kha sagihna, ni sawm ni in khawmpi siangthou na nei ding ua: na hihna uh na hihgim ding ua, bang nna mahmah na sep ding uh ahi kei;
TOUPA ding a gimlim dia halmang thillat bel na lan ding uhi; bawngtal khat, belamtal khat, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa sagih; na ngaihtuah ua gensiatbei ahi ding ahi;
A tangbuang thillat uh, tangbuang nelte sathau a helkhawm, bawngtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun thum, belamtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun nih.
Belamnou sagih, belamnou khat chiat ah mun sawm a khen a mun khat:
Khelh thoihna di'n keltal khat toh; kilemna ding a khelh thoihnate, halmang thillat lat gigete, huai a tangbuang thillat leh a dawn ding thillatte uh sim lou in.
Huan, kha sagihna, ni sawm leh ni nga ni in kikhawmpi siangthou na nei ding ua; bang nna mahmah na sem ding uh ahi kei, TOUPA ding in ni sagih annkuang na lui ding uhi;
Huan, TOUPA ding a gimlim dia mei a thillat, halmang thillat na lat ding uh ahi: bawngtal tung sawm leh thum, belamtal nih, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa sawm leh li: gensiatbei chiat a hih ding ahi:
A tangbuang thillat uh sathau toh helkhawm bawngtal sawm leh thum, bawngtal khat ah mun sawm a khen mun thum, belamtal nih, belamtal khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun nih;
Belamnou sawm leh li, belamnou khat ah mun sawm a khen a mun khat:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh; halmang thillat lat gige, huai a tangbuang thillatte, dawn ding thillatte sim lou in.
Huan, a ni nih ni in bawngtal tung sawm leh nih, belamtal nih, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sawm leh li na lat ding uh ahi;
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat a dan bang tak in a tamdan bang zel un bawngtal a ding bang, belamtal a ding bang, belamnou a ding bang;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh: halmang thillat gige bang huai a tangbuang thillatte, dawn ding thillatte sim lou in.
Huan, a ni thum ni in bawngtal sawm leh khat, belamtal nih, belamnou kum khat a upa gensiatbei sawm leh li,
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat a dan bang tak in a tamdan bang zel un bawngtal a ding bang, belamtal a ding bang, belamnou a ding bang:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh; halmang thillat lat gige leh huaia tangbuang thillat leh huai a dawn ding thillat sim lou in.
Huan, a ni li ni in bawngtal sawm, belamtal nih, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sawm leh li;
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat, a dan bang tak in a tamdan bang zel un bawngtal a ding bang, belamtal a ding bang, belamnou a ding bang:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh: halmang thillat gigete, huai a tangbuang thillat leh dawn ding thillatte sim lou in.
Huan, a ni nga ni in bawngtal kua, belamtal nih, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sawm leh li;
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat uh, a dan bang tak in a tam dan bang zel tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat uh, a dan bang tak in a tamdan bang zel un, bawngtal a ding bang, belamtal a ding bang, belamnou a ding bang:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh; halmang thillat lat gigete, huai tangbuang thillat leh huai dawn ding thillatte sim lou in.
Huan a ni guk ni in bawngtal giat, belamtal nih, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sawm leh li:
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat a dan bang tak in a tamdan bangzel un bawngtal a ding bang:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh; halmang thillat lat gigete, huai a tangbuang thillat leh huai a dawn ding thillatte sim lou in.
Huan, a ni sagih ni in bawngtal sagih, belamtal nih, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sawm leh li:
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat, a dan bang tak in a tamdan bangzel un, bawngtal a ding bang, belamtal a ding bang, belamnou a ding bang:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh; halmang thillat lat gigete, huai a tangbuang thillat leh huai a dawn ding thillatte sim lou in.
Huan, a ni giat ni in khawmpi thupi tak na nei ding ua: bang nna mahmah na sem ding uh ahi kei:
TOUPA a dia gimlim ding in mai a halmang thillat bel na lat ding uh ahi: bawngtal khat, belamtal khat, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa gensiatbei sagih:
A tangbuang thillat uh leh dawn ding thillat uh, bawngtal a ding bang, belamtal a ding bang, belamnou a ding bang, a dan bangtak in a tamdan bang zel un:
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat toh; halmang thillat lat gige leh huai a tangbuang thillat leh huai a dawn ding thillat sim lou in.
Na thuchiamte uh, utthu a thillatte, na halmang thillatte uh, na tangbuang thillatte uh, na dawn ding thillatte uh, na lemna thillatte uh sim lou in hiaite annkuangluina hunbi nei a na neihte uh ni in TOUPA kiang ah na lan ding uhi, chi in, chi in.Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak tengteng Israel suante Mosi in a hilh hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak tengteng Israel suante Mosi in a hilh hi.
Huan, Mosi in Israel suante namte inntek pente a houpih a, Hiai ahi, TOUPA'N thu a piaktak.
Mi'n TOUPA kiang a thu achiam hiam, a lungsim thuchiam a kigak ding a a kichiam hiam a thu a bohse ding ahi kei; kam a pawt bangbang a a hih ding ahi.
Numei in leng a nungak lai a a pa inn a a om lai in TOUPA kiang a thu achiam a, thuchiam a a kigak a;
A thuchiam leh thuchiam a a lungsim a gak a pa'n a zak a, a pa'n a daihsan maimah leh a thuchiam tengteng a piching ding: Huan, thuchiam chiteng a a lungsim a gaknate a om gige ding.
Himahleh a pa'n a zak ni a a phal kei leh a thuchiamte a kigakna thuchiamte a koi mahmah a piching kei ding: a pa'n a phallouh a hihziak in TOUPA'N amah a ngaidam ding.
Thuchiam in hiam, thu khual lou a a lungsim gakna in hiam a delh lai a pasal a neih a;
A pasal in a zak a, a zak ni a a daih dide leh a thuchiam a om gige ding a, a lungsim gakna khual lou a a thuchiam leng a om gige ding.
Himahleh a pasal in a zak ni a a phal kei leh a tung a thuchiam leh a lungsim gakna khual lou a a thuchiam a hihmang ding; TOUPA'N a ngaidam ding.
Himahleh huai meithai hiam, maak a omnu hiam thuchiam zaw, a lungsim a gakna tengteng in a delh gige ding.
Huan, inn a thu achiam a, kichiam a a lungsim gak ding a thu a khun a:
A pasal in a zak a leng a daih dide a, a phallouh kei leh a thuchiam tengteng a om gige ding a, a lungsim gak ding a a thuchiam chiteng leng a om gige ding.
Himahleh a pasal in a zak ni a bangmah lou a bawl a, a thihmang leh a thuchiam hiam, a lungsim gakna hiam thu a a kam a thu pawt peuhmah a om nawn kei ding: a pasal in a hihmang khin ahi: huan, TOUPA'N amah a ngaidam ding.
Thuchiam tengteng leh hinna hihgim ding a gakna kichiamna tengteng a pasal in a kipsak thei in a hihmang thei hi.
Himahleh a pasal in a zak ni a kipan a a deih den leh a thuchiam chiam tengteng leh a tung a gakna om tengteng a kipsak ahi a: a zak ni a kipan a a daihsan ziak in a kipsak ahi.
Himahleh a zak khit nung a bangmah lou a bawl a a hihman leh a thulimlouhna moh a puak ding ahi, chi in.Hiaite, pasal leh a zi kal leh a pa inn a om gige lai a kikal ua dan ding a TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piakte ahi.
Hiaite, pasal leh a zi kal leh a pa inn a om gige lai a kikal ua dan ding a TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piakte ahi.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Midiate tungah Israel suante phu la in: huai khit in na chipihte kiang a pi na hita ding, chi in.
Huchi in Mosi in mipite a houpih a, Midiate tung a TOUPA phulakna tangtun ding a Midiate sual kidou ding in na lak ua mi kigalvan uhen.
Israel nam tengteng lak a nam chih a mi sangkhat zel kidouna a na hoh ding uh ahi, chi in.
Huchi in Israelte sang tamtak lak a kipan, nam chih a kipan in sangkhat chiat, kidouna a hoh ding in sepaih singkhat leh sang nih a pekhia uh.
Huchi in Mosi in chichih lak a mi sangkhat chiat leh siampu Eleazar tapa Phineha mun siangthou a tui-um-belsuante, thupiakna ding khawng a pengkulte tawi in kidouna ah a hohsak a.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in Midiate a dou ua; pasal teng a that uh.
A mi thahte uh lak ah Midiate kumpipate leng a tel ua; Midiate kumpipa nga, Evite, Rekemte, Zurte, Hurte, Rebte: Beor tapa Balaam leng namsau in a that uh.
Huan, Israel suante'n Midiate naupang hon sal in a pi ua; huan, a gan tengteng uh, a belam hon tengteng uh, a van tengteng uh a gallak sum ding un a la uh.
A omna khua tengteng uh, a giahna mun tengteng uh a hal vek uh.
Huan, mihing leh gan, sal leh gallak sum tengteng a paipih vek ua.
Huan, salte, matte, gallak sumte Mosi leh siampu Eleazar leh Israel suante omkhawmte kiang ah, Jeriko zawn Jordan gei Moab phai a a giahna mun uh a hontun uhi.
Huan, Mosi leh siampu Eleazar leh omkhawmte inntek penpente'n khomual ah a na dawn ua.
Huan, Mosi bel sepaih heutu, sang tung a heutute leh za tung a heutute, kidouna a kipan a hong tungah a heh a.
Mosi in a kiang uah, Numei tengteng na hinghawi vek uh maw?
Ngai un, Balaam lem theih in Peor tungtang thu ah Israelte TOUPA tung a tatlekna tungsak mite hiaite ahi uhi, TOUPA mi kikhawmte lak ah hii a hong leng a kei maw.
Huaiziak in naupangte lak a pasal tengteng that unla, numei mi kithuahpih sa tengteng leng that un.
Numei naupang mi kithuahpih nailouh tengteng bel nou a ding in hawi un.
Huan, khomual ah ni sagih giak unla; kuapeuh mi that leh misi koih ni thum ni leh ni sagih ni in kisiangsak un, noumau leh na salte uleng.
Huan, van himhim leh savun a thilbawl tengteng kelmul a thilbawl tengteng, sing a thilbawl tengteng thu ah na kisiangsak ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan, siampu Eleazar in kidouna a hoh kidou mite kiang ah, Hiai TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak dan thuseh ahi:
Bangpeuh hi hen, dangka-engte, dangkasikte, dalte, sikte, langvate, ngente,
Bangpeuh mei a hal a se theilou peuhmahte mei ah na tholh paisuak ding ua, huchi in a hong siangthou ding: bangpeuh hi hen, silsiang na tui a hih siangthou ding ahi: huan, mei a hal thuak theilou peuhmah tui a na tholh paisuak ding uh ahi.
Huan, a ni sagih ni in na puan uh na sawp ding ua, huan, na hong siangthou ding uh, huai khit in giahna mun ah na hong lut ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Nang toh, siampu Eleazar toh, omkhawmte innkuan inntek pente toh gallak sum dia a lak uh mihing leh gante sim vek unla:
Huan, gallak sum mun nih ah khen unla, kidouna a hoh kidoumite ding leh omkhawmte ding in:
Huan, kidouna a hoh galkap mi a kipan in TOUPA ding a siah piak ding sepkhe zel unla, thil hing zanga zel ah khat, mihing a kipan bang, bawng a kipan bang, sabengtung a kipan bang, belam hon a kipan bang in:
Huaite a tan kimkhat ua kipan la unla, TOUPA a di'n vei thillat ding in siampu Eleazar pia un.
30 Huan, a kimkhat Israel suante tuam pen sawmnga a kipan khat sepkhe zel inla, mihing a kipan bang, bawng a kipan bang, sabengtung a kipan bang, belam hon a kipan bang, gan hon a kipan bang in; huan, huaite TOUPA biakbuk kem mi Levite pia in, a chi a.
Huchi in TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in a hih uh.
Sepaihte'n a mat uh gallak sum sim lou a a lak uh belam nuaiguk leh singsagih leh sangnga,
Bawng sing sagih leh sangnga,
Sabengtung singguk leh sangkhat,
Mihing bel numei, pasal kithuahpih nailouh sing thum leh sang nih ahi uh.
Huan, a kimkhat, kidouna a hohte tantuan pen, belam nuai thum leh singthum leh sang sagih leh sang sagih leh za nga ahi:
Huan, TOUPA siah belam pen zaguk leh sawm sagih leh nga.
Huan, bawng singthum leh sangguk ahi a; huai a TOUPA siah sawmguk leh khat ahi.
Huan, sabengtung sing thum leh zanga ahi; huai a TOUPA siah sawmguk leh khat ahi.
Huan, mihing singkhat leh sangguk ahi ua; huai a TOUPA siah mi sawmthum leh nih ahi uh.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang in siah, TOUPA vei thillat Mosi in siampu Eleazar a pia a.
Huan, Mosi in galkapmite a kipan a a hawm Israel mite tantuan kimkhat,
(Mipi tantuan kimkhat belam nuai thum leh singthum leh sangsagih leh zanga,
Bawng singthum leh sangguk
Sabengtung singthum leh zanga,
Mihing singkhat leh sangguk; )
Israel tantuan kimkhat a kipan Mosi in mihing leh gan sawmnga zel ah khat a la a, TOUPA thupiak bang in TOUPA biakbuk kem mi Levite a pia a.
Huan, sepaihte tung a heutu, sang tung a heutute, za tung a heutute'n Mosi a va naih ua;
Mosi kiang ah, Na sikhate'n ka khut ua om kidou mite ka sim ua, kuamah kimlou ka om kei uh.
Huan, ka hinna ua ding a TOUPA ma a kilemna bawlna ding in TOUPA ding a thillat mi'n a neihlam uh, dangka-eng a bawl zep hoih van, khe ngawng a bulhte, khut ngawng a bulhte, min sawnna zungbuhte, bilbahte, khite, ko'n tawi uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in dangka-eng a bawl van tengteng uh a na la ua.
Sang tung a heutute leh za tung a heutute dangka-eng TOUPA kiang a vei thillat dia a lat tengteng uh sekel singkhat leh sangguk leh zasagih leh sawmnga ahi.
(Galkap mite a gallak sum uh amau achiat dia la ahi uh).Huan, Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in sang tung a heutu leh za tung a heutute dangka-eng a la ua, Israel suante theih gigena ding in kihoupihna puan inn ah TOUPA ma ah a hon tawi uhi.
Huan, Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in sang tung a heutu leh za tung a heutute dangka-eng a la ua, Israel suante theih gigena ding in kihoupihna puan inn ah TOUPA ma ah a hon tawi uhi.
Reuben leh Gad tate'n gan a hau mahmah ua: huan, Jazer gam leh Gilead gam a muh un, a mun gan a dia mun hoih tak hi in a thei ua;
Huchi in Gad tate leh Reuben tate'n Mosi leh siampu Eleazar leh omkhawm mipite a va houpih ua,
Israel omkhawmte ma a TOUPA'N a daisak gam Atarotte, Dibonte, Jazerte, Nimrate, Hesbonte,
Elealete, Sebamte, Nebote, Beonte gan ding a hoih gamahi a, huan, na sikhate'n gan ka nei ua,
Hoih na sak lam a hihleh hiai gam ka luah ding un hon pia inla, Jordan lui hon pi galkah dah mai ve, a chi ua.
Huan, Mosi in Gad tate leh Reuben tate kiang ah, Na unaute uh kidouna ah a hoh ding ua, nou bel hiai lai ah na na om maimah ding uh maw?
Bang ding a TOUPA'N a piak gam a lut lou ding a Israel suante lungtang lunglel sak na hi ua?
Kades-barnea a kipan a gam va enkhe ding a ka sawl in hichi mah bang in na pute un a hih ua.
Eskol guam a tuntouh un gam a va mu ua, TOUPA'N gam a piak a lut nop louhna ding un Israel suante lungtang a lunglel sak uh.
Huchi in huai ni in TOUPA a heh mahmah a, a kichiam a,
Aigupta gam a kipan a hong pawt, kum sawmnih chiang tunglam mi himhim in Abrahamte, Isaakte, Jakobte, kiang a kichiam a ka piak gam kuamah in a mu kei ding uhi; a hon zuih taktak louh ziak un;
Keniz mi Jephune tapa Kaleb leh Nun tapa Joshuate kia lou ngal, amau TOUPA a zuih taktak ziak un, chi in.
Huan, Israelte tungah TOUPA a heh mahmah a, TOUPA mitmuh a thil hoihlou hih mi suan tengteng a man vek masiah uh gamdai ah kum sawmli a vak saksak a.
Huan, ngai un, Israelte tung a TOUPA hehna kihtakhuai tak behlap in nou gilou in na pute uh sik in na ding ta uhi.
TOUPA zui lou a na om himhim uleh aman amaute gamdai ah a omsak nawn mai sin ahi.
Hiai mi tengteng na hihmang mai kei ding umaw? a chi a.
Huan, a va naih ua, a kiang ah, Hiai lai ah ka gan ua ding in belam huangte leh ka tate uh a ding khua peuh ka bawl ding ua:
Kou bel a mun ding ka tun masiah uh Israel suante ma a pai zel ding in ka kigalvan ding uhi: hiai gam a mite ziak in ka tate uh kulh nei khuate ah a om ding uh.
Israel suante mi chih in a mun luah ding uh a luah chiat ma un ka inn lam uah ka pai kei ding uh.
Ka luah ding uh bel hiai lam gal Jordan suahlam a hih ziak in Jordan gal khat lam leh a khen lam zaw ka luahpih tei sin kei uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, Mosi in a kiang uah, Huchi bang a na chih ua, kidouna a TOUPA ma a hoh ding a na kigalvat ua, a ma a kipat melmate a delhkhiak a,
TOUPA ma a gam zoh a hih masiah na lak ua kigalvan tengteng TOUPA ma a Jordan na galkah vek uleh,
Denchiang in na pai ding ua, TOUPA tungah leh Israelte tungah na moh kei ding ua; huchi in hiai gam TOUPA ma a na luah ding uh ahi ding a.
Himahleh huchi bang a na hih kei uleh ngai un, TOUPA tungah na khial uh ahi ding a, na khelhna un a hon mukhe ngeingei ding chih thei un.
Na tate uh ding khuate bawl unla, na belamte uh ding in leng huante bawl unla, na gen bangbang un hih un, a chi a.
Huan, Gad tate leh Reuben tate'n Mosi kiang ah, Na sikhate'n ka pu uh thupiak bang in ka hih ding uh.
Ka zi, ka tate uh, ka belam honte uh, ka gan hon tengteng uh Gilead gam khuate ah a na om ding ua:
Himahleh na sikha, kidou ding a kigalvan tengteng in ka pu uh gen bang in TOUPA ma ah ka va galkah ding uhi, chi in, a gen uh.
Huchi in Mosi in, a tungtang thu uah siampu Eleazarte, Nun tapa Josuate, Israel nam innkuan inntek pente thu a pia a.
Huan, Mosi in a kiang uah, Gad tate, Reuben tate, kidou ding a kigalvan tengteng in TOUPA ma a Jordan lui a hong galkah pih ua, huai gam na zoh uleh Gilead gam pen a luah ding ua na piak ding uh ahi:
Himahleh kigalvan a hong galkah pih kei uleh Kanan gamah na lak uah a tel tei mai ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Gad tate leh Reuben tate'n, Na sikhate kiang a TOUPA'N a gen bang in ka hih ding uh,
Kigalvan a TOUPA ma a galkah in Kanan gamah ka lut ding uh, huchi in ka gam luah ding uh Jordan lui khenlam ah ahi lai ding, chi in a dawng ua.
Huan, Mosi in, Gad tate leh Reuben tate leh Joseph ta Manase suan nam kim khatte Amor kumpipa Sihon gamte, Basan Kumpipa Og gam, huai gamte a khua om tengteng toh, a kim gam khuate nangawn toh a pia a.
Huan, Gad tate'n Dibonte, Atarote, Aroerte;
Atrot-sophante, Jazerte, Jogbehte;
Betnimrate, Betharante a lam ua, khopi kulh neite, belam huangte toh.
Huan, Reuben tate'n Hesbonte, Elealete, Kiriathaimte, Nebote, Beal-meonte,
(A minte hihlamdan khit ahi) Sibmate a lam ua; a kho bawlte uh min dang a phuak uh.
Huan, Manase tapa Makir tate Gilead gamah a hoh ua, a la ua, Amorte huailai a omte a suhsak uh.
Huan, Mosi in Gilead gam Manase tapa Makir a pia; huai ah a om.
Huan, Manase tapa Jairin huai a khuate a vala a, Havot-jiar a sa hi.Huan, Nob in Kenat a vala a, khopelte toh, amah min tam in Nob a sa hi.
Huan, Nob in Kenat a vala a, khopelte toh, amah min tam in Nob a sa hi.
Mosi leh Aron makaih a Aigupta gam a kipan a a pawlpawl a a pawt ua, a pai zeldan uh hichi bang ahi.
TOUPA thupiak in a paikhia ua, a pai zel nate uh Mosi in a gelh a: a paikhak ua a pai nate uh hiaite ahi:
Kha khatna, kha khatna ni sawm leh ni nga ni in Ramase a kipan in a pawt ua; paikan annkuang lui zing in,
Aigupta mite mitmuh in, a ta masa pen teng uh TOUPA'N a hihlup sak a vui lai un Israel suante innbul tak in a pawt ua: TOUPA'N a pathiante uh leng a gawt,
Huchi in Israel suante Ramase a kipan in a pawt ua, Sukot ah giahbuk a sat ua.
Huan, Sukot a kipan in a pawt ua, gamdai phak tung Etham ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Etham a kipan in a pawt ua, Baal-z-ephon bul a Pi-hahirot lam ah a kinungkhin ua, Migdol chin ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Hahirot chin a kipan a pawt ua, tuipi a pal tan ua, gamdai ah a lut uh: huan, Etham gamdai ah ni thum lam a pai ua, Mara ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Mara a kipan in a pawt ua, Elim a tung uh: Elim ah tuinak nei sawm leh nih leh tum kung sawmsagih a om a; huai ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Elim a kipan n a pawt ua, Tupi San ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Tuipi San a kipan in a pawt ua, Sin gamdai ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Sin Gamdai a kipan a pawt ua, Dopka ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Dopka a kipan in a pawt ua, Alus ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Alus a kipan in a pawt ua, Rephidim ah giahbuk a sat ua, huai ah mipite dawn ding tui a om kei hi.
Huan, Rephidim a kipan a pawt ua, Sinai gamdai ah giahbuk a sat ua.
Sinai gamdai a kipan in a pawt ua, Kibrot-hattava ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Kibrot-hattava a kipan in a pawt ua, Heze-rot ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Haze-rot a kipan a pawt ua, Ritma ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Ritma a kipan in a pawt ua, Rimon-perez ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Rimon-perez a kipan in a pawt ua, Lebna ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Libna a kipan a pawt ua, Risa ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Risa a kipan a pawt ua, Kehelatha ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Kehelatha a kipan a pawt ua, Sepher tang ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Sepher tang a kipan a pawt ua, Harada ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Harada a kipan in a pawt ua, Makhe-lot ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Makhelot a kipan a pawt ua, Tahat ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Tahat a kipan a pawt ua, Tera ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Tera a kipan a pawt ua, Mitka ah giahbuk a sat uh;
Huan, Mitka a kipan a pawt ua, Hasmona ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Hasmona a kipan in a pawt ua, Moserot ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Moserot a kipan in a pawt ua, Bene-jaakan ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Bene-jaakan a kipan in a pawt ua, Hor hagidgad ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Hor hagidgad a kipan in a pawt ua, Jotbatha ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Jotbatha a kipan in a pawt ua, Abrona ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Abrona a kipan in a pawt ua, Ezion-geber ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Ezion-geber a kipan in a pawt ua, Zin gamdai ah giahbuk a sat uh (huai bel Kades leng a chi uh).
Huan, Kades a kipan in a pawt ua, Edom gam chin Jor tang ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, siampu Aron TOUPA thupiak in Hor tang ah a hohtou a, Israel suante Aigupta gam a kipan a a hong pawt uh kum sawmli kum, kha nga na, ni khat ni in huai lai ah a sita hi.
Huchi in Aron bel Hor tang a a sih in kum za leh kum sawmnih leh kum thum ahi.
Huan, Kanan mi, Kanan gam a Simlam a om Arad kumpipa'n Israel suante a hong uh a za a.
Huan, Hor tang a kipan a pawt ua, Zalmon ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Zalmon a kipan a pawt ua, Punon ah giahbuk a sat ua.
Huan, Punon a kipan in a pawt ua, Obot ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Obot a kipan a pawt ua, Moab gam naih Iym-abarim ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Iym a kipan a pawt ua, Dibongad ah giahbuk a sat ua.
Huan, Dibongad a kipan a pawt ua, Almon-diblathaim ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Almon-diblathaim a kipan in a pawt ua, Nebo chin a Abarim tang khawng ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Abarim tang a kipan in a pawt ua, Jeriko zawn, Jordan gei Moab phai ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Jordan gei Bet-jesimot a kipan Abel-sitim pha in Moab phai ah giahbuk a sat uh.
Huan, Jeriko zawn Jordan gei Moab phai ah TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel tate houpih inla, a kiang uah Jordan lui na kan ua, Kanan gam na lut chiang un,
Huai gam a om tengteng na delhkhe vek ding ua, a suang milim tengteng uh na hihse vek ding ua, a milim sunte uh na hihse vek ding ua, a mun sangte uh na hihse vek ding uhi:
Huan, gam na luah ding ua, huai ah na om ding uh: na luah ding ua gam ka hon piak sa na hi uhi.
Huan, a chi dungzui bangzel in aisan in gam na luah ding ua, a innbul deuhte gam za deuh na pe ding ua, a innbul lou deuhte gam neu deuh na pe ding uh: aisan na a pukna peuhmah a tuam uh ahi ding a; na pi-le-pute uh chi paidan bangzel in na luah ding uhi.
Himahleh huai gam a omte na delhkhiak kei uleh na omsakte uh na mit ua ding in sutna zum leh na chi ua ding in ling bang ahi ding ua, na omna gam uah hon hih nuammoh ding uhi.Huan, hichi ahi ding a, a tung a hih ka tup bang na tunguah ka hih ding, chi in, chi in.
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, a tung a hih ka tup bang na tunguah ka hih ding, chi in, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante thu pia inla, a kiang uah, Kanan gam na tun chiang un (Kanan gam, a gamgi dan dungzui zel a na luah ding gam uh),
Sim lam a na luah ding chiang uh Zin gamdai a kipan Edom gam zulzul ahi ding a, sim lam gamgi Tuipi Al tawp a kipan suah lam pang ahi ding.
Huan, na gamgi uh Akrabim tungkahna sim lam pang ah a kawi ding a, huan, a hong pawtna Kades-barnea sim lam ah ahi ding: huan, Hazar-adar ah a pai ding a, Azmon ah a pai zel ding:
Huan, gamgi Azmon a kipan in Aigupta lui tan in a kawi ding a, a tunna tuipi ah ahi ding.
Huan, tumlam pang ah tuipi zaa a gamgi ding in na tang ding a, hiai tum lam a na gamgi uh ahi ding.
Huan, hiai mal lam a na gamgi uh ahi ding: tuipi zaa a kipan in Hor tang huap in na bawl ding a:
Hor tang a kipan Hamat lutna tan in na bawl ding a, gamgi tunna bel Zedah ah ahi ding a;
Huan, gamgi Ziphron ah pai zel ding a, huan, a tunna Hazar-anah ah ahi ding; hiai mal lam a na gamgi uh ahi ding.
Huan, suah lam a na gamgi uh Hazar-enan a kipan a Sepham tan in na bawl ding a:
Huan, gamgi Sepham a kipan in Rebla tan in Ain suah lam pang ah a sukpai ding a; huchi in, gamgi a paisuksuk dia, Kineret tuipi suah lam pang a sun ding:
Huan, gamgi Jordan ah a paisuk ding a, huan, a tunna Tuipi Al ah ahi ding: hiai a kimvel a gamgi paidan bang in na gam uh ahi ding, chi in, chi in.
Huchi in Mosi in Israel suante thu a pia a, Hiai TOUPA'N nam kua leh a kimkhatte piak ding a thu a piak aisan a na luah ding gam uh ahi:
Reuben tate nam in a innkuan uh dungzui zel leh Gad tate nam in a innkuan uh dungzui zel leh Manase nam kimkhat in leng a gam luah ding uh a tang ta ngal ua:
Nam nih leh nam kimkhatte'n a gam luah ding uh ni suahlam Jeriko zawn Jordan gal suah lam ah a tangta uh, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Luah ding a gam hon khennen pihte min hiaite ahi: siampu Eleazar leh Nun tapa Josuate.
Huan, gam luah ding khen mi a ding in namchih lak a inntek pen khat chiat na tel ding ahi, chi in.
Huai mite min bel hiaite ahi: Juda nam a mi Jephune tapa Kaleb.
Huan, Simeon tate nam a mi Amihud tapa Semuel.
Huan, Benzamin nam a mi Kislon tapa Elidad.
Dan tate nam lak a inntek pen Jogli tapa Buki.
Joseph tate lak a mi, Manase tate nam inntek pen Ephod tapa Haniel:
Epharim tate nam lak a inntek pen Sitan tapa Kemuel.
Huan, Zebulun tate nam lak a inntek pen Parnak tapa Elizaphan.
Isakar tate nam lak a inntek pen Azan tapa Paltiel.
Aser tate nam lak a inntek pen Selomi tapa Ahihud.
Naphtali tate nam lak a inntek pen Amidhud tapa Padahel.Hiaite Kanan gam a Israel suante gam luah ding hawm ding a TOUPA'N thu a piakte ahi uhi.
Hiaite Kanan gam a Israel suante gam luah ding hawm ding a TOUPA'N thu a piakte ahi uhi.
Huan, Jeriko zawn Jordan gei, Moab phai ah TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante thupia inla, a gam uah Levite omna ding khuate bawlsak uhen; huan, a gante uh tatna ding in kho dainawl kim khawng Levite na piak ding ahi.
Khuate a omna ding uh ahi ding a, a kimte khawng bel bawng leh a gante uh, a gan vulh tengteng uh a ding ahi ding.
Huan, dainawl Levite na piak ding kho kulh a kipan tong sangkhat a sau ahi ding ahi.
Huan, kulh polam a kipan in na teh ding a, suah lam pang ah tong sangnih, mal lam pang ah tong sangnih, khua lai tak a om in.
Hiai amau dainawl tuam ahi ding.
Huan, Levite na piak ding khuate tualthatte taina ding kihumbitna khopi guk ahi ding a; huaite lou kho sawmli leh kho nih na piak lai ding ahi.
Levite na piak ding khua tengteng kho sawmli leh kho giat ahi ding: dainawl toh na piak ding ahi.
Israel suante luah khua na piakdan ding, a tam deuh a kipan in pe tam ding a, a tawm deuh a kipan in na pe tawm ding a, michih in a luah uh gam tamdan dungzui a khua Levite a piak ding ahi, chi in
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi a houpih a,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah,
Jordan lui na galkah ua Kanan gam na lut chiang un kihumbitna khua ding khua na seh ding uh ahi, tualthat kha mi taina ding in.
Huai khuate phula mi a kipan na kihumbitna khua uh ahi ding; omkhawmte ma a vaihawm sak ding a a din ma a tualthatmi a sih louhna ding in.
Huchi in, nou a ding a kihumbitna ding na sehte uh khopi guk ahi ding.
Jordan galah khopi thum na sep ding ua, Kanan gamah khopi thum na sep ding ua, kihumbitna khopite ahi ding uh.
Israel suante leh nam dang leh a kiang ua tengte di'n hiai khopi guk kihumbitna ahi ding; huai lai ah kuapeuh mi that kha a tai ding uhi.
Himahleh sik zang a mi a sual a, a sih leh tualthat ahi a: tualthat bel hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Huan, si khop a suang a mi a den a a sih leh tualthat ahi a, tualthat bel hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Huan, si khop a mi sing a a sat a, a sih leh tualthat ahi a, tualthat bel hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Sisan phula mi'n tualthat mi a that pah mai ding: a muh peuh chiang in a hihlum ding ahi.
Huan, mi a huat ziak a a sawm ek hiam, na guk tan a a den hiam a a sih in hiam,
Kiselna ziak a tuplup hiam a hihleh, a hihlum mi pen hihlup ngei ding ahi.
A hihhang in kisel ziak hi khol lou a sawm guih hiam, huan, tang hi khol lou a, mi a om uh chih leng theilou a,
A melma leng hi lou a, a poikhoih tum leng hi tuan lou a suang hiam a den a, mi a na sih a, a hih leh:
Omkhawmte'n hiai vaihawmna dan bang in a hihlum mi leh sisan phula mi vai a hawm sak ding uh ahi:
Huan, omkhawmte'n tualthat mi sisan phula mi lak a kipan a honkhe ding ua, omkhawmte'n a taina, kihumbitna khua ah a omsak nawn ding ua, sathau siangthou nilh siampu lian a sih mateng huailai ah a om ding hi.
Himahleh chiklai peuh in tualthat mi a tai na, a kihumbitna kho gamgi po lam a pai a;
Sisan phula mi in a kihumbitna kho po lam a a muh a sisan phula mi in a thah leh sisan ah moh a tang kei ding;
Siampu lian a sih mateng a kihumbitna khua om gige ding a hihziak in; siampu a sih nung in bel tualthat mi a omna gam a pai nawn ding ahi.
Hiai thilte na suante uh tan a na omna peuh ua na vaihawm dan ding uh ahi.
Kuapeuh in mi a thah leh tualthat mi pen theihpihte kam a kipan thupawt a hihlup ding ahi: himahleh theihpih khat zaw mi hihlupna ding in a hun kei.
Huan, tualthat mi zaw na tat ding uh ahi kei, sihna khop dia moh ahi a, hihlup ngei ding ahi zaw.
Huan, siampu sih ma in, a kihumbitna khua a tai, a gam a om nawn ding a tatna na lak ding uh ahi kei.
Huchi in na omna gam uh na hih thanghuai kei ding ua, sisan in gam a hih thanghuai leh sisan suahna gam hih thanghuai silna di'n a suahmi sisan kia lou lah zat theih ahi ngal kei a.Na omna gam uh, ka omna na hih thanghuai ding uh ahi kei; kei TOUPA lah Israel suante lak ah ka om ngal a, chi in, chi in.
Na omna gam uh, ka omna na hih thanghuai ding uh ahi kei; kei TOUPA lah Israel suante lak ah ka om ngal a, chi in, chi in.
Huan, Joseph innkuanpihte lak a mi, Manase ta Makir tapa Gilead tate innkuan inntek pente lak a mite'n a hon naih ua, Mosi leh heutu, Israel suante inntek pente ma ah thu a gen ua:
TOUPA'N ka pu Israel suante suante aisan a a luah ding gam uh pe ding in thu a pia a: huan, TOUPA'N ka pu, ka unaupa uh Zelophehad luah ding a a tanute pe ding in thu a pia a.
Huan, amau Israel suante lak a mi, nam dang kuapeuh tate leng neita leh, ka pi-le-pute uh gam a luah uh lak sak a, a va kigawmpihte uh nam gam toh gawm ding ahi ding a; huchi bang in ka gam tantuan ua kipan lakkhiak a hong hi ding a.
Huan, Israel suante Jubili a hong tun chiang in a gam uh a va kigawm pih peuhpeuhna dingte uh nam gam toh gawm ding ahi ding a: huchi in ka pi-le-pute uh nam gam a kipan a gam uh lak hek a hong hi sin hi, a chi ua.
Huan, Mosi in, TOUPA thu bang in Israel suante thu a pia a, Joseph tate nam in a gen dik uhi.
Zelophehad tanute tungtang thu a TOUPA'N thu a piak pen hichi in ahi, Hoih a saksak uh kitenpih uhen la, himahleh a pate uh nampih lak a mi ngei a kitenpih ding uh ahi, chi in,
Huchi in Israel suante gam pen nam dang kiang a suansuan ahi kei ding.
Israel suante'n a pi-leh-pu uh nam gam a neih gige ding uh ahi.
Huan, Israel suante lak a gouluah pen ding tanu peuhpeuh Israel suante'n a pi-leh-pute uh gam a luah chiat zel theihna ding un a pa nampih lak a mi ngei zi ahi ding ahi.
Huchi in gam bel nam dang namdang kiang ah suansuan ahi sin kei hi.
Israel suante'n amau gam chiat a tang gige ding uh ahi ngal a, chi in.
Huan, TOUPA'N Mosi thu a piak bang geih in Zelophehad tanute'n a hih uhi.
Zelophehad tanu Malate, Tirzate, Hoglate, Milkate, Novate'n a pa uh unau tapate a kitenpih uhi.
Joseph ta Manase tapate a kitenpih ua, a gam uh a pa uh nam in a om gige ahi.Hiaite TOUPA'N Mosi zang a Jeriko zawn Jordan gal a Moab phai a Israel suante a piak, thupiakte leh vaihawmdante ahi uhi.
Hiaite TOUPA'N Mosi zang a Jeriko zawn Jordan gal a Moab phai a Israel suante a piak, thupiakte leh vaihawmdante ahi uhi.
Hiai thu Jordan suah lam gamdai, Paran leh Tophel leh Laban leh Haze-roth leh Di-zahab kikal a Suph chin Arabaa Mosi in Israel mite tengteng kiang a a gen ahi.
Horeb tang a kipan in Kades-barnea bel Seir tang lam lampi ah ni sawm leh ni khat lam ahi.
Huan, kum sawmli kum, kha sawm leh kha khatna, huai kha ni khat ni in, hichi ahi a, TOUPA'N amau hilh ding a thu a piak tengteng Israel suante kiang ah Mosi in a gen a;
Hesbon a om Amorte kumpipa Sihon leh Edrei leh Astarot a om Basan kumpipa Og a thah nung in:
Jordan suah lam Moab gamah hiai dan Mosi in a genkhe panta hi.
TOUPA i Pathian un Horeb tang ah hon houpih a, Hiai tang ah na om sawt hunta uh:
Kisuan ta unla, paikhia unla, Amorte tang gamah leh a kimvel teng Araba ah khawng, tang gam te ah khawng, phai gamah te leh Lebanon ahte, luipi Euphrates tan in pai un.
Ngai un, gam ka hon pekhin a: na pu uh Abrahamte, Isakte, Jakobte leh amau nung a a suan sawnte uh kiang a kichiam a TOUPA'N a piak gam va luah un, chi in.
Huan, huai lai in na kiang uah, Kei kia in ka hon pozou kei a;
TOUPA na Pathian un a hon pung sak a, ngai un, tu in na tamdan uh van a aksi zah hial a hong hi ta uh.
TOUPA, na pi-le-pute un Pathian in tu sanga amun sang in hon pung sak henla, a hon chiam bang in hon vualzawl hen.
Bang chi in kei kia in na buainate uh, na puakgikte uh, na kihou theihlouhnate uh ka po zou dia?
Na nam lak ua mi, mi pil, theisiam mi, a dan ding theimi kitelkhia unla, na tung ua heutu ding in ka hon bawl ding, chi in a hon houpih a.
Huan, nou na thil gen kou a ding in a hoih mahmah, chi in no'n dawng ua.
Huchi in na nam heutute uh ka pom a, na nam lak ua mi, mi pil a dan ding thei mite na tung ua heutu ding in ka bawl a, sang tung a heutu, za tung a heutute, sawmnga tung a heutute, sawm tung a heutute, inntek pente toh.
Huan, huailai in na vaihawm mite uh, Na unaute uh kal a thu ngaihkhiak sak unla, unau leh unau kal ah leh gamdang mi, a ompih toh a kaal uah diktat tak in hawm un.
Vaihawmna ah deihsak tuam na neih ding uh ahi kei; mi neu leh mi lian kibang tak in na ngaihkhiak sak ding uh ahi; kuamah na lau ding uh ahi kei; vaihawmna lah Pathian a ahi ngal a: nou a ding a thu haksa luate ka kiang ah na hon tun zel ding ua, huan, huai ka ngaikhe zel ding, chi in thu ka pia.
Huan, huai lai in thil na hihdan ding tengteng uah thu ka hon pia hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N thu hon piak bang in Horeb tang a kipan in i pawt ua, Amorte tang gam lampi a gamdai zapi leh mulkimhuai tak na muh uh i kantan ua, Kadesbarnea khua I va tung ua.
Huan, na kiang uah, TOUPA i Pathian in a hon piak Amorte tang gam na hong tung ta ua.
Ngai dih ua, TOUPA na Pathian un gam a hon pekhin ta hi; hohtou unla, TOUPA na pi-le-pute uh Pathian in a na genkhitsa bang in va luahtou un; lau kei unla, lunglel sam kei un, ka hon chi a.
Huan, ka kiang ah na hong paivek ua, a gam khawng va enkhia in, i hohtouhna ding lampi leh i hohna ding kho tanchinte hong hilh nawn ding in i ma uah mi sawl leng, na chi ua:
Huai in hon kipaksak ngial a; huchi in na lak ua mi sawm leh nih, nam khat a khat zel ka tel a:
Huchi in a pawt ta ua, tang ah a kahtou ua, Eskol guam a va tung ua, a enkhe vek ua.
Huai gam a theite a lou ua, a hon puak ua, tanchin a hon tun ua; TOUPA i Pathian hon gam piak hoih petmah ahi, a chi ua.
Himahleh na hohtou nuam kei ua, TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiak na helsan ua:
Na puan innte uah na phun ua, TOUPA'N a hon huat ziak in hon hihmang ding a, Amorte khut a hon pe ding in Aigupta gam a kipan hon pikhia ahi.
Koi lai ah ahia i hoh touh ding?
I unaute'n, mihing ei sang in a lian ua, san leng a sang zaw ua; khuate khawng a lian a, van sun in kulh a nei uh; huan, Anakte tate leng i mu a, chi in i lungtang uh a kesak ua, na chi uh.
Huan, ke'n na kiang uah, Amaute kihta kei unla, lau leng lau sam kei un.
TOUPA na Pathian na makaipa un na mitmuh ua Aigupta gam a hon hihsak tengteng bang in a hon sual pih ding a;
Gamdai ah leng mi'n a ta a pua TOUPA na Pathian un hiai lai mun na tun tan un lam tawn a hon puakdan na mu ding uhi, ka chi a.
Himahleh hiai thil ah TOUPA na Pathian uh na gingta kei uh,
Na puan inn na zak ding uh hon zonsak ding leh na lampi uh hon kawkmuh ding a zan a mei a, sun a meipi a na ma uh pipa.
Huan TOUPA'N na thugen uh a na za a, a heh a, a kichiam a,
Hiai suan gilou tak lak a mi khat mahmah in leng na pi-le-pute uh pe ding a ka kichiamna gam hoih petmah a mu kei ding uh,
Jephune tapa Kaleb kia ngallou in; aman zaw a mu ding; a va sik gam amah leh a tate ka pe ding, aman TOUPA a pomkip ziak in, chi in.
Noute ziak in ka tungah leng TOUPA a heh a, Nang leng huai lai ah na lut kei ding a:
Na nnasempa Nun tapa Josua bel a lut ding; amah hasuan in, Israelte a lutsak sin ahi.
Na ta neute uh, Gallak in a la mai ding uh, na chih uleh, tua asia-apha thei nailou na tate uh a lut ding ua, amau zaw ka pe ding a, a luah ding uh.
Nou a hihleh kihei unla, Tuipi San lam ah gamdai ah hoh un, chi in.
Huan, Nou TOUPA tungah i na khial ta uhi, i hohtou ding ua, TOUPA i Pathan in thu a hon piak tengteng bang in i va sual ding uh, chi in no'n dawng ua, huchi in kidouna van in na kivan chiat ua, tang a hohtouh thil neuchik ding in na ngaihtuah ua.
Huan, TOUPA'N ka kiang ah, Hohtou kei un, va sual sam kei un, na lak uah lah ka om ngal kei a, na melmate un a hon na hihlum kha ding uh, a kiang uah chi in, a hon chi a.
Huai ka hon hilh a, na pom kei ua, TOUPA thupiak na helsan zo ta ua, tang ah na hohtou teitei uh.
Huan, huai tang ah Amorte'n a honna sual ua, khuai mi delh bang in a hon na delh ua, Seir a kipan in Horma tan in a hon that zel ua.
Huan, na hong kiknawn ua, TOUPA ma ah na kap ua; himahleh TOUPA'N na aw uh a ngaikhe nuamkei a, a bil leng a hon doh nuam sam kei hi.Huchi in huai a na om sung uh ngaihtuah in Kades ah sawtpi na om uhi.
Huchi in huai a na om sung uh ngaihtuah in Kades ah sawtpi na om uhi.
Huan, I kihei ua, TOUPA'N I kiang ua a gen bang in Tuipi San lam ah gamdai ah I lut ta ua; Seir tang sawtpi I vel ua.
Huan, TOUPA'N a hon houpih a,
Hiai tang na vel sawt hun ta uh; mal lam zuan in kihei un.
Mipite, Seir tang a om, Esau suan na unaute uh gamah na paisuak sin uhi; amau a hon na kihta ding ua; huaiziak in pilvang mahmah unla:
Kisual pih kei un; a gam uh, a koilai mahmah leng, khepek a sik khop lel leng nou ka hon pe dek het kei ahi; Seir tang zaw a tuam ding in Esau ka pe khin ta hi.
A ann uh sum in na lei ding ua na nek ding un, huan na dawn ding un a tuite uh leng sum in na lei ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian un na khut nasep peuhmah uah a hon vualzawl zel a, hiai gamdai zapi na totsuakdante khawng uh leng a thei hi; hiai kum sawmli sung teng in TOUPA na kiang uah a om a, bangmah na tasam kei uhi, chi in thupia in, chi in.
Huchi in Elat leh Eziongeber a kipan in Arba lamp a pai in Seir tang a om Esau suan i unaute gam i tawn paisuak uh.
Huan, i kihei ua, Moab gamdai lam ah i pai ua.
Huan, TOUPA'N ka kiang ah, Moabte hihbuai kei unla, gal sual in sual kei un; a gam uh na tuam ding un ka hon pe sin kei hi, Lot suante tuam ding in Ar ka pe khinta hi.
Tu malam in Anakte bang a milian leh tam leh mi sang pipi Emte a om ua:
Huaite leng Anakte bang mah a Ephate chih ahi uh; himahleh Maobte'n jo Emte a chi nak uhi.
Tuma lam in Seir tang ah Horte bang leng a om ua; himahleh Esau suante'n a luahsak uhi; a that ua, a mun uah a omta ua.
Israelte'n TOUPA'N amau tuam dia a piak gam chih bang mah un.
Huchi in thou unla, Zered lui kan dih ua, a chi a.
Huchi in Zered lui i kan ta ua.
Kadesbarnea a kipan I pawt leh Zered lui i kan ua, TOUPA'N a kiang ua a kichiam bang a mipi lak a huai mi suan a galkap thei mi tengteng a bei vek kikal uh kum sawmthum leh kum giat ahi.
Mipite lak a kipan a bei sisip ma uh amaute hihmang bei ding in TOUPA khut a tunguah a tu hi.
Huchi ahi a, huchi bang a mipi lak a kipan galkap thei tengteng a bei ua, a hong sih khit nung un,
TOUPA'N a hon houpih a,
Tuni in Moab gam, huai Ar na khen paisuak ding ahi:
Huan, Amon suante kiang chin na va tun chiang in leng hihbuai kenla, kisual pih kei in; Amonte gam na tuam ding in ka hon pe sin kei hi, Lota suante tuam ding in ka pekhin hi.
(Huai leng Rephate gam bang a sim ahi sam; huai ah tuma lam in Rephate a om uh; himahleh Amonte'n zaw Zemzumte a chi ua;
Anakte bang a mi lian leh tam leh mi sang pipi ahi ua; himahleh TOUPA'N a hihman sak a, amau a luah leuleu ua, a muh uah a om ta uhi:
Seir tang a om Esau suante Horte a hihman sak lai a a hih bang in; huchi in amau a luah ua, a mun uah tu dong in a om lai uhi:
Huan, Gaza tan a kho neu chikchik a om Avite Kaptor a kipan a hong pawt Kaptorte'n a hihmang ua, a mun uah a om uhi. )
Thou unla, paikhia unla, Arnon guam kan un; ngai dih ua, Amor mi Hesbon kumpipa Sihon leh a gam ka hon pe khinta hi; luah peuhmah unla, gal sual in sual un.
Tuni in, van nuai a nam chih tungah nang hon launa uh leh hon kihtakna uh ka om sak pan ding a, na tanchin a za ding ua, a ling ding ua nang ziak in gimthuak in a om ding uh, chi in.
Huan, Kedemot gamdai a kipan in Hesbon kumpipa Sihon kiang ah lemna thu pua in mi ka sawl a.
Na gamah hon paisuak sak dih ve; lamlian zel ah ka pai ding a tak lam ah hiam, vei lam ah hiam leng ka pial kei ding.
Ka nek ding in ann sum in no'n leisak ding a, ka dawn ding in tui leng sum mah in no'n leisak ding hi;
Jordan ka kan a TOUPA ka Pathian un a hon piak gam ka lut masiah Seira om Esau suante leh Ar a om Moabte hon paisuak sak bang un hon paisuak sak lel dih ve, chi in.
Himahleh Hesbon kumpipa Sihon in a gamah hon paisuak sak nuam kei a; TOUPA na Pathian un na khut ua a hon piak theihna ding in a lungsim a khauhsak a, a paupeng sak ahi, na theihsa uh bang in.
Huan, TOUPA'N ka kiang ah, ngai in, Sihon leh a gam ka hon pe ding a hita, a gam tang ding in luah peuhmah in, a hon chi hi.
Huchi in Sihon leh a mite tengteng Jahaz a hon sual ding in a hong kuan ua.
Huan, TOUPA i Pathian in a hon pia a; huchi in amah leh a tate leh a mite tengteng i that ua.
Huan, huai lai in a khua tengteng i la ua, huai khuate a mihing tengteng, numei leh a ta neu chikchikte uh tan in i hihmang vek ua, hawi mahmah i neikei ua:
I lak khua a gallak a i lak thil leh gante kia i tuam di'n i la uhi.
Arnon guam a om Aroer a kipan leh guam a kho om a kipan a Gilead pha in ei ding in kho sang lua a om het kei mai hi, TOUPA i Pathian in a hon pe vek ahi:Amon suante gam kia na naih kei uhi, Jabok lui khat lam gei tengteng leh tang gam a khuate leh TOUPA i Pathian in a hon khamna peuhmahte toh.
Amon suante gam kia na naih kei uhi, Jabok lui khat lam gei tengteng leh tang gam a khuate leh TOUPA i Pathian in a hon khamna peuhmahte toh.
Huchi in I kihei ua, Basan lampi ah i paitou ua: Basan kumpipa Og leh a mite tengteng Edrei a honna sual ding in a hong kuan ua.
Huan, TOUPA'N ka kiang ah, Amah kihta ke'n amah leh a mite tengteng leh a gam na khut ah ka hon pe khin ta hi; Hesbon a om Amorte kumpipa Sihon tung a na hih bang in amah tung a na hih ding hi, a chi a.
Huchi in TOUPA I Pathian in Basan kumpipa Og leng a mite tengteng toh i khut ah a hon pia a; huchi in khat lel leng hawi sak lou in i that vek hi.
Huai lai in a khua tengteng kho sawmguk, Basan a Og gam, Argob gam tengteng i la vek a: i lak sak louh kho khat lel leng a om kei.
Hiai khua tengteng kulh sang pipi, kongkhak leh kalhna nei chiat ahi a, kulh neilou kho tampi simsim lou hi'n leng.
Hesbon kumpipa Sihon tung a i hih bang in i hihmang sisip a, khua mihing tengteng i hihmang vek a, numei leh a ta neu chikchikte uh tan in.
Himahleh gan tengteng leh khua a gallak a i lak thilte zaw i tuam di'n I la ua,
Huai lai in Jordan gal a om Amorte kumpipa nih Kliut a kipan in Arnon guam a kipan Hermon tang pha in gam i la ua;
(Huai Hermon bel Zidonte'n Sirion a chi ua, Amorte'n Senir a chi uhi);
Phai gam a khua tengteng leh Gilead gam tengteng leh Basan gam tengteng toh, Basan gam a Og gam a khuate, Salek a leh Enderi tan in.
(Basan kumpipa Og kia ahi, Rephate lak a om sun; ngaidih, a lupna sik ahi a; Amon suante khua Raba ah tutan in a om ahi kei maw?
Mihing tong a teh in a dung lam tong kua, a vailam tong li ahi. )
Huai tung in huai gam i luah ua; Arnon guam kiang Aroer a kipan in Gilead tang gam kim khat tan in, huai lai a kho omte toh Reubente leh Gadte ka pia a:
Huan, Gilead gam omlai teng leh Og gam Basan tengteng Manase nam kimkhatte ka pia a; Argob gam tengteng leh Basan gam tengteng.
(Hiai bel Rephaimte gam a chi zel sam uh.
Manase tapa Jairin Argob gam tengteng Gesurte leh Maakatte gam tan in a la a, huaite, Basan pen, amah min tam in Havot-Jair a chi a, tutan in a chi lai uh. )
Huan, Gilead pen Makir ka pia a.
Huan, Reubente leh Gadte bel Gilead a kipan Arnon guam, guam lai tak tan in a gam uh chiang ding in ka pia a; Amon suante gamgi, Jabok lui tan in;
Huan, Araba leh Jordan leng gamgi ding in Kineret a kipan Pisga suah lam pang nuai a Tupi Al, Araba tuipi tan in.
Huan, huai lai in, TOUPA na Pathian un hiai gam na tuam ding un a hon pia hi, Israelte, na unaute uh ma ah na mi hangsan tengteng uh kigalvan in va hohtou sam uhen.
Himahleh, na zite uh leh na ta neu chikchikte uh leh na gante uh (gan na hau uh chih ka thei) na khua uah, ka hon piak sa ah na om le uh;
Nou bang a na unaute uh TOUPA'N galmuang a a bawl ma leh TOUPA na Pathian un Jordan gal a gam a piak a luah sam matan uh; huchi in na tuam chiat ding ua ka hon piak ah na hong pai nawn chiat ding ua, chi in thu ka hon pia a.
Huan, huai lai mah in Josua bel, TOUPA na Pathian un huai kumpipa nihte tung a thil a hih tengteng na mit in a mu vek a; huchi bang mah in na lutna ding gam tengteng tungah TOUPA'N a hih ding.
Amaute kihta ke'n; a hon sual pihpa lah TOUPA na Pathian uh ahi ngal a, chi in thu ka pia hi.
Huan, huailai mah in TOUPA ka ngen a,
TOUPA Pathian aw, na sikha kiang ah na thupidan leh na khut hat tak na kilang sak ahi peuhmah ngei a; van ah hiam, lei ah hiam na thil hih bang leh na thil hih thupi tak bang hih thei pathian kua a om a?
Hon galkah sak inla, Jordan gal a gam hoihtak, huai tang kilawm tak leh Lebanon hon mu sak dih ve, chi in.
Himahleh noute ziak in ka tungah TOUPA a heh mahmah a, ka thu a pom kei a; huchi in TOUPA'N, Hunta hen, hiai thu ah hon houpih nawn ke'n.
