Pisga tang vum ah va tuang inla, tum lam, mal lam, sim lam, suah lam na mit in en inla, en vialvial in; Jordan kan lou ding na hi.
A hihhang in Josua thu pia inla, hasuan inla, hat sak in; hiai mipite a pi galkah ding a, na va muh touh ding gam a luah ding ahi, a hon chi a.Huchi in Bet-peor kiang chin a guam ah i om ta uhi.
Huchi in Bet-peor kiang chin a guam ah i om ta uhi.
Khaile, Israelte aw, TOUPA na pi leh pute uh Pathianin a hon piak gam dama na luah theihna ding ua na zuih ding ua ka honhilh sek dante leh vaihawmte ngaikhia un.
TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiak ka honpiak na pom theihna ding un, ka honthupiak na behlap ding uh ahi keia, na kiamsak ding uh leng ahi kei.
Baal-peor ziaka TOUPA thilhih na mit un na mu ua: Baal-peor bemi tengteng TOUPA na Pathian un na lak ua kipanin a hihmang hi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh lenkip peuhmahte bel tutanin damin a om lai chiat uh.
Ngai un, na valuah ding gam ua leng na zuih jel ding un TOUPA ka Pathianin thu honpiak bang geihin dante leh vaihawmte ka honhilha.
Huchiin, pom unla, jui un; huai mahmah, hiai dan tengteng jaa, Hiai nam thupi tak mipil tak leh thil theisiammi tak ahi mahmah ngut uh, chih namte mitmuhah na pilna uh leh thil theisiammi na hihna uh ahi ding.
I sap peuhmaha TOUPA i Pathianin a honnaih banga amau naih sek pathian nei nam thupi kua a om tei ua?
Hichi taka dik, dante leh vaihawmte, tua na ma ua ka khun tengteng bang dan nei nam thupi dang kua a om teia?
Abangabang hi heh, pilvang unla, ngentel takin kikem peuhmah phot un; huchilouin jaw na mit un a thil muhte na mangngilh ding ua, na damsung un na lungtangua kipan a mang kha ding hi; na tate uh leh na tute uh sinsak un;
Huan, Horeb tanga TOUPA na Pathian uh maa na din ua, TOUPAN ka kianga, Mipite honsap khawm sakin, leitunga a om sung teng ua hon kihtak dan a kisin theihna ding uh leh a tate uh sinsak dingin ka thute ka hon na za sak ding, a honchih ni leng na mangngilh kha ding uhi.
Huchiin na hongnai ua, tang bulah na hong ding ua, van lakpi suin tang mial te, meipi te, mial bikbek te omsakin a kangtaa.
Huan, TOUPAN meia kipanin a honhoupiha; a thugen na ja ua, himahleh lim bangmah namu kei ua, aw lel na uhi.
A thukhun jui dinga nou thu a honpiak, thupiak sawm na kiang uah a genkhiaa, suang pek nihah a gelha.
Huan, huai laiin luah dinga na vagalkahna gam ua na zuih ding un dante leh vaihawm te sinsak dingin TOUPAN thu a honpiaa.
Huaijiakin pilvang mahmah un; Horeb tanga mei akipana TOUPAN nou a honhoupih niin lim bangmah lah na mu ngal kei ua:
Nou leh nou kihihsiain, milim gelh kibawlin, lim kibatpih, a pa lim hiam, a nu lim hiam,
Lei tunga am gamsa himhim kibatpih, huihkhuaa leng kha nei vasa kibatpih,
Leia vak thil himhim kibatpih, lei nuaia tuia om ngasa mawngmawng kibatpih na kibawl kha ding uh:
Van lam nanga un, ni te, kha te, aksi te, vana om tengteng khawng leng na mu un, TOUPA na Pathian un van nuaia mi tengteng a honsehsakte un a honhip un, na bia un, a na uh na sepsak kha ding uhi.
TOUPAN a mite, a gou hi dingin sik haltuina akipan, Aigupta gama kipanin nou a honpi khe zota ahi, tua na hih bang uh.
Huai kia leng hi louin, noute jiakin TOUPA ka tungah aheha, Jordan lui ka galkah louha, naluah ding ua gam hoih tak TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honpiak ua ka lut louhna dingin leng akichiam ahi:
Kei jaw hiai gama si ding ka hi a, Jordan lui galkah lou ding ka hi; nou bel nagalkah ding ua, hiai gam hoih tak na luah ding uhi.
Pilvang mahmah un, TOUPA na Pathian uh thukhun na kiang ua a khun na mangngilh ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian un bangmah kibatpih himhim bawl a phallouh milimte na kibawl tawm kha mahmah ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh lah katmanghatmei, mullit hat tak Pathian ahi ngala.
Tu leh tate na neih ua, huai gama sawt kuam na om nung ua, na kihihthulimlouh ua, banghiam kibatpihpeuha milimbawl tawm lelte na bawlkhiak ua, hih heh dinga TOUPA na Pathian uh mit muha thil hoih lou na hih maijen uleh:
Jordan kana na valuah ding uh gama kipan namangthang pah ding uh chih na tungtang thu ua hontheihpih dingin tuin lei leh van ka chial ahi; sawt na teng kei dingua, na mangthang vek mai ding uh.
TOUPAN nam chih lakah a hondalh sak dinga, TOUPAN a honpai mangsakna namte lakah tawm chik kiain na om ding uh.
Huai laiah, pathian sing leh suanga min a bawl uh, mu theilou peuh, za theilou peuh, ne theilou peuh, dik theilou peuh na be ding ua.
Himahleh huai lai maha TOUPA na Pathian uh na zon ua, na lungtang tengteng uh leh na lungsim tengteng ua na zon uh leh namu nawn ding uh.
Haksaa na om ua, na tung ua hiai thil tengteng a hongtun chiang in, TOUPA na Pathian uh lam na hongnga khongkhong ding ua, a thu na pomta ding uhi:
TOUPA na Pathian uh lah chitnaa dim Pathian ahi ngala; a hondonsakloukei dia, a honhihmang kei ding, na pi leh pute uh kianga kichiama a thukhun a mangngilh het kei ding.
Na om ma uh, nidanglai te khawng sui le uchin leitunga Pathianin mihing siam nungsiah van nuaiah, hichibanga thil thupi a om ngeiin, jak ahi ngei hiam?
Najak bang un, meia kipanin Pathian aw min aza ngei mawng-mawng un, lah a hing uhia?
Namdang laka kipan zeetna te, chiamtehna te, thil lamdang te, kidouna te, khut hat tak te, ban jak te, thil mulkimhuai tea TOUPA na Pathian un namit muh ua Aigupta gama a hih tengteng banga nam pi khe ngam Pathian a om ngei hia?
TOUPA bel Pathian ahi chih na theihtheihnading ua na kiang ua a hihlat ahia; amah loungal a dang himhim a om kei.
A honsinsak theihna dingin van akipanin a aw a honza saka, leitungah a mei thupi a honmu saka, meia kipana a thu naja uhi.
Na pi leh pute uh a it jiakin a nung ua a suante uh a hontela, a mitmuhin a thilhihtheihna thupi takin Aigupta gama kipan a honpi khiaa;
Nam dang nou sanga thupi leh thilhihthei jaw a hondelh khiak saka, a gam uh honluah saka honlut sak dingin, tua na hih bang uh.
Huaijiakin tuin na lungtanguah vom unla, tunglam vanah leh nuailam leiah TOUPA jaw Pathian ahi chih thei un; a dang himhim a om kei uh.
Khantawn adia TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honpiak gamah noumau leh na suante uh adia hoih ding leh na ten sawt theihna ding un a dante leh a thupiakte, tua ka honpiakte bang na zop ding uh ahi, chih.
Huchiin Mosiin Jordan gal, nisuahna lam pangah kho thum a sepa;
Tualthatmi, a insakinkhang, tu malama leng mudah khol louh that khami humbitna dingin; huai khua, khat peuhpeuha a tai leh humbitin a om ding:
Huaite bel Reubente tuam dia gadaia mual tama Bezer te, Gad te dia Gileada Ramot te, Manassete dia Basana Golan te ahi hi.
Huan, hiai Mosiin Israel suante a dan piak ahi:
Hiaite Mosiin Israel Aigupta gama kipana a hongpawt khiak nung ua Israel suante kianga a gen theihsakna te, dan te, vaihawm te ahi;
Jordan gala, Bet-peor jawn phaijanga, Hesbona teng Amorte, Aigupta gama kipana a hongpawt khiak nung ua Mosi leh Israel suanten a thahte kumpipa Sihon gamah:
A gam leh Basan kumpipa Og gam, Jordan gal nisuahna lama Amorte kumpipa nihte gam a luah ua;
Arnon dunga Aroer akipana Sidon tang (Hermon leng a chih uh) pha leh,Jordan gal suahlam pang Araba tengteng, Pisga tanghap nuaia Araba tuipi tanin.
Jordan gal suahlam pang Araba tengteng, Pisga tanghap nuaia Araba tuipi tanin.
Huan, Mosiin Israelte tengteng a samkhawma, a kiang uah, Israel mite aw, Na sin ua na zuih ding uh dante, baihawmte tunia na bil ua najak ua ka gen ngaikhia un.
TOUPA i Pathianin Horeb ah i kianguah thu a khunga.
TOUPAN hiai thu i pi leh pute kiangah a na khung keia, eite, tu tana hing dama omlaite tengteng kiangah ahi, a khun jawk.
TOUPAN tangah mei akipanin kimatuahin a honhoupiha,
(Huai laiin TOUPA thu nou honkawkmuh dingin TOUPA toh na kikal uah ka dinga; mei jiakin lah na lau ngal ua, tangah na hoh tou kei uh);
Kei TOUPA na Pathian, Aigupta gama kipan, sal akipan hon pikhepa ka hi.
Kei loungal pathain dang na nei ding ahi kei.
Milim bawl tawm, tunglam vana om hiam, nuai lam leia om hiam, lei nuai lama tuia om hiam, a koi batpih mahmah na kibawl ding ahi kei:
Huaite chibai na buk ding ahi keia, a na uh leng na sem ding ahi sam kei.
Kei TOUPA na Pathian jaw Pathian mullit hat, pate thulimlouhna jiaka tate gawt sek, honmudahte suan thumna leh suan lina tana gawt sek leh;
A honite ka thupiakte pommi sang tampite tunga hehpihna langsak sek ka hi hi.
TOUPA na Pathian min na lou mawkmawk ding ahi kei.
TOUPAN a min lou mawkmawkte moh lou sak louin lah a khah sin ngal keia.
TOUPA na Pathianin thu a honpiak bangin khawlni siangthou gige dingin tangin.
Ni guk sung na sem dinga, na nasep tengteng na sep ding ahi;
A ni sagih nin bel TOUPA na Pathian adin khawlni ahi; huai niin na himhim na sep ding ahi kei, nangleng, na tapain leng, na tanuin leng, na sikhapan leng, na sikhanuinleng, na bawngtalin leng, na sabengtungin leng, na gan laka a koi mahin leng, na ina gam dangmitein leng; nangmah mah banga na sikhapate, na sikhanute leng a khawl ding uh ahi.
Nang leng Aigupta gamah sikha na hi khina, TOUPA na Pathianin huaia kipan khut hat tak leh ban jaka a honpi khiak na hi chih theigigein; huaijaikin ahi, TOUPA na Pathianin khawlni tang dinga thu a honpiak.
TOUPA na Pathianin thu a honpiak bangin na nu leh na pa pahtawiin; huchiin TOUPAN gam a honpiak na ah na lamzang dinga, na dam sawt ding hi.
Tual na that ding ahi kei.
Ang na kawm ding ahi kei.
Na gu ding ahi kei.
Na insakinkhang tungah theihpih taklouin na pang ding ahi kei.
Na insakinkhangte ji na eng ding ahi kei, na insakinkhang te in hiam, a lou hiam, a sikhapa hiam, a sikhanu hiam a bawngtal hiam, a sabengtung hiam, na insakinkhang thil a bang mahmah na eng ding ahi kei. chiin.
Hiai thute, tanga mei te, meipite, mial sah bikbek a kipante khawngin TOUPAN aw ngaihtakin na vek ua kikhawmte kiangah a gena, a behlap nawn tuan kei hi.
Huaite suangpek nihah a elha. a honpia hi.
Huan, tang a kat laia, mial akipana aw na jak un hichi ahi a, na honnaih ua, na nam ua intekpen teng leh na upate un:
Huan, ngaiin, TOUPA i Pathianin i kiang uah a thupidan leh a letdan a langsaka, mei akipan a aw i ja ua; Pathianin mihing a houpiha leng sihna a hih tuan louhdan tuniin i na theita hi.
Huaijiakin bangdia si ding i hi ua? hiai mei thupi takin a honkangmang mai ding: TOUPA i Pathian uh jaw i jak nawn leh jaw i si mai ding uh.
Mei akipana Pathian hing aw i jak banga za sama lah hing ngal sa pumi tengteng lakah kua a oma?
Nang vanaih inla, TOUPA i Pathianin a gen ding tengteng vangaikhe dih ve; huan TOUPA i Pathianin na kianga a gen tengteng nang kou kiangah na gen dinga; huchiin ka nangaikhe ding ua, ka jui ding uh, na chi ua.
Huan, non houpih lai ua na thugen uh TOUPAN a najaa; huchiin TOUPAN ka kiangah, Hiai mi piten na kianga thu a gen uh ka najaa; a thugen tengteng uh a gen hoih ngel uhi.
Huchibang lungsim pu gige le uh aw, laudan a honsiam ding ua, ka thupiak a jui gige ding ua, amau leh a tate uh khantawnin a lamzang mahmah ding uh!
A kiang uah, Na puaninte uah paita un, chiin.
Nang bel ka kiangah hiaiah ding inla, luah dinga ka gam piaka a zuih ding ua na sin sak ding thupiak tengteng, dan te, vaihawm te ka honhilh ding, a chi a.
Huaijiakin TOUPA na Pathian un thu a honpiak banga hih dingin pilvang un; taklamah hiam, veilamah hiam na pial ding uh ahi kei.Na valuah ding uh gama na om ua, na lamzanna ding uh leh na ten sawt theihna ding un TOUPA na Pathian uh thu a honpiak lampi na zuih tawn suak ding uh ahi.
Na valuah ding uh gama na om ua, na lamzanna ding uh leh na ten sawt theihna ding un TOUPA na Pathian uh thu a honpiak lampi na zuih tawn suak ding uh ahi.
Huan luah dinga na vagalkahna gam ua na zuih ding ua TOUPA na Pathian un nou honsin sak dia thu a honpiak, thupiakte, thusehte leh vaihawmte hiaite ahi uh:
Nou leh na tapate uh leh na tupate un TOUPA na Pathian uh laudan na siam ua, na damsung teng ua a dan tengteng leh a thupiak ka honpiak na zuihna ding uh leh na hongten sawt theihna ding un.
Huajiakin, Israel mite aw, lamzanga, TOUPA, na pi leh pute uh Pathianin a honkamchiam bangin nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gama nakpi taka na hongpun theihna ding un ngaikhia unla, jui dingin pilvang un.
Israel mite aw, ngaikhia unla, TOUPA na Pathian kia TOUPA ahi a:
TOUPA na Pathian un na lungtang tengteng un, na lungsim tengteng un, na hatna tengteng un na it dinguh ahi.
Huan, hiai thu, tunia ka honpiak na lungtang uah a tam gige dinga;
Na tate uh phatuamngai takin na sinsak ding ua, na in ua na tut lai bang un, lapia napai lai bang un, na luplai bang un, na thoh chiang bang un na gen jel ding uhi.
Huan, chiamtehna dingin naban uah na vial ding ua, na mit kikal uah talgakna dingin a om dingin a om ding ahi.
Huan, na in kongkhak bianguahte, na kongkhak uahte na gelh ding uh ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian un na pu uh, Abraham te, Isaak te, Jakob te kianga kichiama a honpiak gam, na bawlkhiak uh hi hetlou,
Kho thupi leh kilawm taktakte, na hihdim uh hi het lou, thil hoih chitenga dim in te, na leh uh hi het lou tuikhuk lehsa te, na suan uh hi het lou, grep huan leh oliv sing te omnaa a honpi luta, na nek ua, na tai ngail chiang un, pilvang mahmah un;
Huchilouin jaw Aigupta gam akipan, sal akipana honpikhia TOUPA na mangngilh kha mahmah ding uh.
TOUPA na Pathian uh laudan na siam dingua, amah na na sem ding ua, a min louin na kichaim ding uh ahi.
Pathian, na kim ua mite pathiante na be dinguh ahi kei;
Na lak ua TOUPA na Pathian ujaw Pathian na mullit hat ahi; TOUPA na Pathian uh na tunguah a heh dinga, lei akipan a honhihmang kha zenhouh ding hi.
Massaha na zeet bang un TOUPA na Pathian uh na zeet ding uh ahi kei.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak, thupiak te, a thutheihsak te, a dan te pilvang takin na jui ding uhi.
TOUPA mitmuha a dik leh hoih na hih ding uh ahi: huchiin nou dingin a hoih dinga, TOUPAN na pi leh pute uh kianga achiam gam hoiha lutin, na luah thei ding uhi.
TOUPAN a gensa bangin, nama ua kipana na melmate uh tengteng hawlkhe dingin.
Huan, na tate un, TOUPA I Pathian un thu a honpiak thutheihsakna te, dan te, vaihawm te, bangchidan ahia?
Chi a tununglam chainga a hondot chiang un,
Nou na tate uh kiangah, Aigupta gamah Pharo sikha I hi ua, TOUPAN Aigupta gam akipan khut hat takin a onpi khiaa:
Huan, TOUPAN I mitmuhin Aigupta gam tungah te, Pharo tungah te, a inkuanpihte tengteng tungah te, chiamtehna leh thil lamdang thupi mahmahte a musaka;
Ei bel a honpiak dinga I pi leh pute kianga kichiama gam a honpiak theihna dingin huai akipan a honpi khiaa
Huchiin hiai dan tengteng jui ding leh I hoih tawntungna dingin TOUPA i Pathian laudansiam dingin TOUPAN thu a honpiaa, tuni banga mi hinga a honhawi theihna dingin.A thu honpiak banga TOUPA maa thupiak tengteng jui dinga I pilvan leh ei a dingin damna ahi ding hi, na chi ding uhi.
A thu honpiak banga TOUPA maa thupiak tengteng jui dinga I pilvan leh ei a dingin damna ahi ding hi, na chi ding uhi.
Na valuah ding uh gam lama TOUPA na Pathian un a honpi lut a, na ma ua nam tampi, Hit te, leh Girgas te, leh Amor te, leh Kanaan te, leh Periz te, leh Hiv te, leh Jebus te, nou sanga thupi jaw leh hatjaw nam sagihte, a delhkhiaka;
TOUPA na Pathian un amaute nou a honpiaka, na thahgam hun chiang un amaute na hihgam sisip dingua; amaute toh thukhun na bawl ding uh ahi kei:
Ji leh tain na nei ding uh ahi sam kei, na tanute uh a tapate uh toh na kiteng sak ding uh ahi keia, a tanute uh na tapate uh toh nakiteng sak ding uh leng ahi kei.
Na tapate uh, kei hon juilaite pathian dangte biakna lamah a pi kawi mai dinguh; huan, TOUPA na tunguah aheh dinga, a honhihmang pah ding hi.
A tunguah hichinbangin na hih zo ding uh ahi; a maitam khawng uh na hihchim dingua, a suangphuhte uh na kitam jan sak ding ua, a Aserte uh na phukl ding ua, a milim bawl tawmte uh nahal vek ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh adingin lah nam siangthou na hi ngal ua, leitung a nam tengteng tunga amah tuam hi dinga TOUPA na Pathian un a hontel na hi uh.
Nam dang sanga na tam jiak un TOUPAN na tunguah a itna a tusakin, a hontel ahi keia, nam dang tengtenga nam tawmpen na hi ngal ua;
TOUPAN nou a honit jiakin leh na pi leh pute uh kianga a nakichiamna tangtun a ut jiakin ahi jaw TOUPAN Aigupta kumpipa Pharo khut akipan khut hat mahmaha sikha akipan a hontatkhiak.
Huaijiakin TOUPA na Pathian uh Pathian ahi chih thei un; Pathian muanhuai, amamh ita a thu juimi tunga suan sang tana thukhun leh hehpihna jui gigea;
Amah hote hihmang dinga amau tung mahmaha thuk sek ahi; amah hote a halsawt kei dinga, amau tung mahmahah a thuk ding.
Huaijiakin thupiak te, dan te, vaihawm te, jui dinga tunia thu ka honpiak na zuih ding uh ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, hiai vaihawmte na ngaihkhiak ua, na zuih ua, na hih jiak un TOUPA na Pathian un na pi leh pute uh kianga a nakichiamna thukhun leh hehpihna na tunguah a jui dinga:
A honit dinga, a honvualzawl dinga, a honhihpung ding; piak dinga na pi leh pute uh kianga a kichiamna gamah na gil ua gah leh na lei gah uh leng a honvualzawl lai ding, nab uh te uh, na uain te uh, na thau te uh; na bawngnou uh leh na belam noute uh leng.
Nam tengteng tungah vualzawl na hi ding ua; na lak uah numei hiam pasal hiam ching himhim a om kei ding uh, nag an lak uah leng.
Huan, TOUPAN hi tengteng a hohhih then sak vek dinga, na theihsa uh Aigupta gam hite na tunguah a tungsak kei dinga, nou honhote tengteng tungah a tungsak zo ding hi.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak ding nam tengteng na hihmang vek ding uh ahi; na henpih ding uh ahi keia, a pathian uh na na sem ding uh ahi kei; noua dinga thang a hih sin jiakin.
Na lungsim ua, Hiai namte leh ei sangin a tam ngal ua, bangchiin I hawlkhe thei dia?
Chi na hih uh leh,
Amaute kihta kei unla: TOUPA na Pathian un Pharo leh Aigupta mi tengteng tunga a thilhihte theigige un:
Zeetna thupi tak na mit mahmah ua namuhte uh, chaimtehna te, thillamdangte, khut hat tak te, ban jak tea TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honpi khiak; huchibangin TOUPA na Pathian un na mi kihtakte uh tungah a hih jel ding.
TOUPA na Pathian un a lakuah tunpi a sawl behlap ding, a damlai, na lak ua bute a man vek tan un.
Amau na kihta ding uh ahi kei; TOUPA na Pathian uh lah na lak uah a om ngala, Pathian thupi tak, lauhuai tak mai.
TOUPA na Pathian un huai namte awlawlin a hondelh khiak sak geihgeih dia; amau na hihmangpah ding uh ahi kei, huchilouinjaw gamsaten nou a honbawm kha ding uhi.
A man masiah uh TOUPA na Pathian un a honpe dinga, hihbuai petmahin a hihbuai ding.
A kumpipate uh nakhut uah a honpe dinga, a min uh van nuaia kipanin nag it mang sipsip ding uh ahi; na hihman sipsip tan un a honlen ding kuamah himhim a om kei ding uh.
A pathian lim bawl tawmte uh nahal ding uh ahi; huaia dangkasik hiam, dangkaeng hiam na enlah ding uh ahikeia, noua ding in na lak ding uh ahi kei, huchilouinjaw na awk kha ding uhi; TOUPA na Pathian uh a dingin thil kihhuai lah ahi ngala:Na insung ua thil kihhuai la lutin huai thil bangin hamsiat thuak dingin na kibawl ding uh ahi kei; kih petmaha kihin na mudah mahmah ding uh ahi, hamsiat thuak thil lah ahi ngala.
Na insung ua thil kihhuai la lutin huai thil bangin hamsiat thuak dingin na kibawl ding uh ahi kei; kih petmaha kihin na mudah mahmah ding uh ahi, hamsiat thuak thil lah ahi ngala.
Chidam ludama na om ua, na hongtam semsem ua, nou honpe dinga na pi leh pute uh kianga TOUPAN a kichiamna gam na valuah theihna ding ua thupiak jui dingin na pilvang ding uhi.
Huan, a thupiakte na jui sin uhia sin lou, na lungsim uh theihna dia zeet ding leh hohhihgim dinga gamdaia kum sawmli nou a honpi na tengteng lampi theigige un.
Mihing tanghou kiain a hing kei a.
TOUPA kama thu chih pawtin a hing jaw chih nou a hontheihsak theihna dingin a honhihgima, na kial uh a phala, na theih ngei louh uh, na pi leh pute un leng a theih ngei sam louh uh manna in a honvak hi.
Hiai kum sawmli sungin na puansilhte uh na silh tul kei ua, na khete uh leng a bawk kei hi.
Huan, min a ta a sawi sek bangin TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honsawi sek ahi chih na lungsim un thei naknak un.
Huan, a lampi jui dinga amah laudansiam dingin TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiakte na jui ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian un guam leh tang akipana hongpawt lui tui te, tuikhuk leh tui thukpi omna gam
Buhte, barli-buh te, grep te, theipi te, pomgranet omna te gam, thaunei oliv leh khuaiju omna gam.
Tatlak loua tanghou na nek jelna ding gam uh, bangmah na taksap louhna dinguh, a suangte bang sik, a tangte dal laih khiak theihna gam hoih mahmahah lah nou a honpi lut sin ngala.
Na neih ua, na tai mahmah hun chiang un, gam hoih mahmah a honpiak jiakin TOUPA na Pathian uh na phat ding uh.
A thupiakte, a vaihawm te, a dan te, tunia ka honpiak jui louin TOUPA na Pathian uh namangngilh khamahmah ding uhi, pilvang un:
Huchilouinjaw na nek ua, na tai ua, in hoih taktak na lam ua, na luah chiang un;
Na gan hon te uh, na belam hon teuh a hongtama, na dangka te uh, na dangkaeng te uh a hongtama, na thil neih tengteng uh a hongtam hun chiangin na lungtang te uh a hongkisathei dinga;
Sal akipana Aigupta gama kipan nou honpikhepa TOUPA na Pathian uh na mangngilh mai kha ding uh;
Aman lah gamdai za pi leh mulkimhuai pi, gul gukhah te leh aikamte omna, tui om louhna, gam keuah a honpi paisuak a;
Meisahsuang suangpi akipanin tui a hongpawtkhe saka, na pileh puteuh theih ngeilouh, manna in nou a honvaka, tununglam chiang khualnaa na hoih theihna ding un nou a honhihgima, a honzeet theihna dingin:
Huan, Hiai I sum lehpaite eimah hatna leh i khut hatnaa sepkhiak ahi, na lungtang un na chi kha ding uh, pilvang un.
Tua a kip banga na pi leh pute uh kianga kichiama thu a khun a hihkipna dingin TOUPA na Pathian uh theigige un, sum leh pai muhkhiak theihna honpepa lah amah ahi jena.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathin uh na mangngilh ua, pathian dangte na zuih ua, a nate uh nasep ua, na biak himhim uleh, na mang ngeingei ding uh chih tuniin ka hon theisak ahi.Na ma ua nam dangte a hihmang bangin noute leng na mang ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian aw ngaikhe nuam lou nahih ding jiak un.
Na ma ua nam dangte a hihmang bangin noute leng na mang ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian aw ngaikhe nuam lou nahih ding jiak un.
Israelmite Aw, ngaikhia un: nou sanga thupijaw leh thilhihtheijaw namte, khopi van suna kulh daikaihte leh thupi luah dingin tuniin Jordan galkaha, na kuan ding uh ahi.
Mi lian leh sang, Anak suante, amau, Anak suante maah kua a ding thei dia?
A chih uh na theih uh, leh na jaksa uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPA na Pathian uh katmanghat mei banga na ma ua paijel ahi chih tuniin thei un; aman amaute a hihmang dinga, a honhihniam sak ding; huchiin TOUPAN na kiang ua gensa bangin, amau na delhkhe ding ua, na hihmang pah ding uh.
TOUPA na Pathian un a hondelhkhiak sak khit chiang in, I diktatna jiaka hiailuah ding TOUPAN honpi lut ahi, na lungsim un chi kei hial un; hiai namte a gitlouh jiakun ahi jaw, TOUPAN a hon delhkhiak sak sin.
Na diktat jiak uhiam, na lungsim uh dik jiak hiamin, a gam uh na luah sin kei ua, hiai namte gitlouh jiak leh TOUPAN napu Abraham te, Isaak te, Jakob te kianga a kichiamna hihkip dingin TOUPA na Pathian un amau a hondelhkhiak sak ahi jaw hi.
Huaijiakin hiai agam hoih mahmah na diktat jiak ua luah dingin TOUPAN a honpia ahi kei chih thei un; nam paupeng pi lah na hi ngal ua.
Gamdaia TOUPA na hehsak nakdante uh theigige unla, mangngilh kei un; Aigupta gam akipan na pawt ni ua kipanin hiai mun na hongtun tan un TOUPA tunga helhat na hi uh.
Horebah leng TOUPA na hihheh ua, nou honhihmang khop hial dingin TOUPA a heha.
Suangpek, na kiang ua TOUPAN thu a khunna suangpek la dinga tanga ka vahoh touh laiin ni sawmli leh jan sawmli tangah ka vaoma; tanghou lah ka ne keia, tui leng ka dawn sam kei hi.
Huan, TOUPAN suangpek nih, Pathian khut zunga gelh a honpiaa; huaiah na kikhop khawm ni ua tang tunga mei akipana TOUPAn na kiang ua thu a gen tengteng a tuang hi.
Huan, ni sawmli leh jan sawmli khitin hichi ahia, suangpek nih, huai thukhunna suangpek a honpia hi.
Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah, Thou inla.
Hiai akipan pai suk mengin, Aigupta gam akipana napikhiak na mite a kihihgawp khin uhi; zuih dinga thu ka honpiak lampi akipan a pial manhial uh, milim sun tawm a kibawl maimah uhi, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPAN, Hiai mite ka etet leh, ngaiin, nam paupeng ahi uh;
Amau hihmang ding leh van nuaia pat a min uh git mang dingin ka hihhihin ka hih mai ding: huan, nang amau sanga nam thilhihthei leh thupijawin ka honbawl ding, chiin leng a honhoupih lai hi.
Huchiin tang akipan ka kiheia, ka pai suka, tang a kang taa; thukhunna suangpek nihte ka khut lang nihin ka tawia.
Huan, ka ena, ngai un, TOUPA na Pathian uh tungah na nakhialta uh; bawngnou lim sun tawm na nakibawl ua; TOUPAn thu a honpiak lampi akipanin na pial manhial uh.
Huan, suangpek nihte ka doma, ka khut lang nih apat ka pai a, na mitmuh un ka hihkhama.
Huan, tumaa ka hih bangin ni sawmli leh jan sawmli TOUPA maah ka khupboha; amah hihheh dinga TOUPA mitmuha na thilhih khelhsa uh nakhelhna tengteng uh jiakin tanghou leng ka ne keia, tui leng ka dawn sam kei hi.
Nou honhihmang dinga TOUPA hehna, a thangpaihna leh lungkimlouhna mahmah lah ka lau ngala.
Himahleh huai laiin leng TOUPAN ka thu a honngaihkhiak saka.
Huan, TOUPA bel Aron hihmang nuam hial khopin aheha; himahleh Aron mahleng ka thum sak pah ngala.
Na khelhna uh jiaka nabawl uh bawngnou lim ka laa, ka hala, ka satjana, leivui bangin ka gawi nel dimdema; huan, a nel tang akipana lui hong luangah ka pai.
Tabera khawngah, Masa khawngah, Kibrot-hatava khawngah leng TOUPA n ahihheh uh.
Huan, TOUPAN, Ka hon gam piak valuah un, chia Kades-barnea akipan a honsawl laiin TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiak nahel san ua, amah na um kei ua, a aw lah na ngaikhe sam kei uhi.
Kon theih tunga kipanin TOUPA tunga hel hat mi na hi gige ua.
Huchiin TOUPAN, Ka hihmang sin, a honchih jiakin TOUPA maah ka khupboh a, Ni sawmli leh zan sawmli ka khup boh hi.
Huan, TOUPA kiangah ka thuma, TOUPA Pathian aw.
Na thupinaa tat, khuthat taka Aigupta gam akipana na tat khiak, namite leh na goutante hihmang ken.
Na sikha Abraham te, Isaak te, Jakob te theigige inla, hiai mite a phengphitdan uh, a gitlouhdan te uh a khelh dante uh en ken:
Huchilouinjaw na honpi khiakna gama miten, TOUPAN a gam chiama a pi theih louh jiak leh amuhdah jiakin gamdaiah thah dingin a pikhia, a chi kha dinguh.Na thilhihtheihna thupi tak leh na ban jaka na pi khiak, na mite leh na goutante lah ahi vanglak ngal ua, ka chi hi.
Na thilhihtheihna thupi tak leh na ban jaka na pi khiak, na mite leh na goutante lah ahi vanglak ngal ua, ka chi hi.
Huai laiin TOUPAN ka kiangah, Suangpek nih tumalamate bang sek nawn inla, tangah ka kiangah hong inla, sing kuang bawlin.
Huan, tumalama suangpek na hihkhaptea thu tuang suangpek teah ka gelh dinga, kuang ah nakoih ding, a chi a.
Huchiin singgi sing kuang ka bawla, tumalama bang suangpek nih ka seka, suangpek nihte tawiin tangah ka hohtoua.
Huan, suangpekte ah a maa gelh bang, nakikhop khawm ni ua tanga mei akipana TOUPAN n akiang ua a gen thupiak sawm a gelha, TOUPAN a honpia.
Huan, tanga kipan ka kiheisuk nawna, suangpek ka kuang bawlah ka koiha; TOUPAN thu a honpiak bangin huaiah a omta nilouh hi.
(Huan, Israel suante Beerot Benejaakan akipanin Mosera ah pai ua; huailai ah Aron a sia, huailaiah a vui ua; huan, a tapa Eleazarin a mun ah siampuna a sema.
Huai akipanin Gudgodaah a pai ua; huan, Gudgode akipanin tui luite gam Jotbatha ah a pai ua.
Huai laiin tu tana TOUPA thukhun kuang jawnga, TOUPA maa a na sema, a mina vualjawl sakmi hi dingin Levi chi a hihtuama.
Huaijiakin Leviin a unaute lakah leng tantuan, goutan leng a neikeia; TOUPA na Pathian un a kianga agen bangin TOUPA a goutan ahi. )
Huan, a malam mahbangin tangah, ni sawmli ka oma; huan, huailaiin leng TOUPAN ka thu a ngaikhiaa, TOUPAN nou a honhihmang nuamta kei hi.
Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah, thou inla, mipite makai in; amaute piak dinga a pi leh pute uh kianga kichiama ka chiam gam a luah ding uh ahi, a chi a.
Khaile, Israelmite aw, noua kipana TOUPA na Pathian un a honphut bang dang ahia, nahoihna ding ua TOUPA na Pathian uh laudansiama a lampi tengteng zuiha, amah ita, na lungtang tengteng u leh na lungsim tengteng ua TOUPA na Pathian uh na sepa,
TOUPA thupiakte, a dante zuih dinga tua thu ka honpiak pom hi lou maw?
Ngai un, van khawng, vante van leh lei leh a sunga om tengteng TOUPA na Pathian uh a vek ahi.
Himahleh na pi leh pute it ding bel akipahlam ahia, nam dang tengteng tungah noute amau nunga a suante uh a honna telta hi, tua na hih bang un.
Huajiakin na lungtang vun uh sum unla, genhak nawn kei un.
TOUPA na Pathian u lah, pathian te Pathian, heutute Heutu, Pathian thupi tak, hat tak, kihtakhuai tak, kuamah deihsaktuam neiloua, golhna leng la ngeilou lah ahi ngala.
Pa neiloute leh meithaite hoih takin vai a hawmsak nak-nak hi.
Huaijiakin gamdang mite it sam un; nou leng Aigupta gamah gam dang mi na hi uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh laudan na siam ding ua, amah na na sem ding ua; huan, amah nalen chinten dingua, a min louin na kichiam ding uh ahi.
Amah naphat dingpa uh ahi, hiai na mit ua na muh khitsa uh thil thupi tak leh mulkimhuai takte honhihsakpa na Pathian uh ahi.Na pi leh pute uh Aigupta gamah mi sawmsagih a pai suk ua; tuin bel tamlamin vana aksi zahin TOUPA na Pathian un hontam sakta hi.
Na pi leh pute uh Aigupta gamah mi sawmsagih a pai suk ua; tuin bel tamlamin vana aksi zahin TOUPA na Pathian un hontam sakta hi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA na Pathian uh nait un a thusehte, a dan te, a vaihawm te, a thupiak ten a jui gige ding uhi.
Tuin thei un, TOUPA na Pathian uh sawina te, a thupidan te, a ban hatdan te, a ban jak dan te,
A chiamtehna te, a thilhih, Aigupta gamsunga Aigupta kumpipa Pharo tung leh a gamsung tengtenga hihte;
Aigupta sepaihte leh a sakol leh a kangtalai tunga a thilhihte; nou hon delh jui ua, Tuipi San tuia a tum sakdan te, tutana TOUPAN a hihman dan te;
Hiai lain a tun masiah ua gamdaia na tung ua a thilhihtheih dante;
Reuben ta Eliab tapa Dathan leh Abiram te tunga a hih dan te; leiin a kam a kaa, Israel mite tengteng laka amaute leh a inkuanpihte uh leh apuaninte uh leh a gan pi tengteng uh a valh vek dante theilou na suante uh kianga gen ka hi keia:
Na mit ngei ua TOUPAN thil thupi tak, a hih tengteng mute kiangah ahi jaw hi.
Huaijiakin, na honghat ua, luah dinga na vazot gam uh na luah theihna ding un, tunia thupiak tengteng ka honpiakte na zuih ding uh ahi;
Nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gam, na pi leh pute leh a suante uh piak dung TOUPAN a kichiamna gama na ten sawt theihna ding un,
Huai na valuah ding uh gam, na hongpawtna uh Aigupta gam, haichi huana chi na tuh ua, na khe ua tui na buahna jel bang uh ahi keia:
Na valuah ding uh gam jaw, tang leh guam leh van vuahtui mu gamahi jaw hi:
TOUPA na Pathian uh zon khiak gamahi a: TOUPA na Pathian uh mit kum thak akipan a tawp phaa a tuk gigena gam.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian uh it ding leh na lungtang tengteng uh leh na lungsim tengteng ua a na sem dinga ka thupiak tua ka honpiak phatuamngai taka n azuih uleh,
Na gam vuahtui uh a hun geihgeihin, vuahtui ke masa leh vuahtui ke nanung ka honpe dinga, huchin na buh te uh, na uain te uh, a thau te uh na sek lut thei ding uh.
Na gante uh dingin leng na gam uah loupa khawng ka omsak lai dinga, nou leng na ne ding ua, na tai ding uh.
Pilvang un, huchilouinjaw na lungtang uh khemin a om dia, na pil ding ua, pathian dang napeuh na sem ding ua, na be maijen kha ding uh;
Na huchih uleh TOUPA na tunguah athangpai dia, vuah a ju kei dinga, leiin a gah a suak sak kei ding, huchiin TOUPAN honpiak, gam hoih pia kipan namang pah ding uh.
Huiajiakin hiai ka thute na lungtang u leh na lungsim uah khum unla, chiamtehna dingin na ban uah na vial ding ua, huan, na mit kikal uah talgakna dingin leng a om ding hi.
Huaite na tate uh na sin sak ding ua, na in ua na tut lai un, lampia na pai lai un, na lup lai un, na thoh chiang un na gen jel ding uhi.
Huan, na kong biangte uah, na kongkhakte uah na gelh ding uhi:
Huchiin, na pi leh pute uh piak dinga a kichiamna gamah na damsung ni uh leh na tate uh damsung ni leitunga van nite bangin a sausak ding.
TOUPA na Pathian uh it ding leh a lampi tengteng jui ding leh a mah lenchin ten dinga phatuamngai taka hiai thupiak nou ka honpiak tengteng na zuih peuhmah u leh;
TOUPAN hiai nam tengteng a hondelh khiak sak dia, nou sanga thupijaw leh thilhihtheijaw namte gam na luah ding uh.
Na khepek ua na sik peuh uh noua ahi dinga, gamdai akipan leh Lebanon tang akipana lui, Euphrates lui a kipanin tumlam tuipi phain nagam uh ahi ding.
Kuamah mahmahin honpha kei ding ua; TOUPA na Pathian un na kiang ua a gensa bangin na vasik ding uh gam tengteng ah noute kihtakna leh launa a om sak ding.
Ngai un, tuniin na ma uah vualjawlna leh hamsia ka koiha;
TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiakte tua ka honpiakte na zuih uleh, vualjawlna:
TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiakte na zuih kei uleh, na theih ngei louh uh pathian dangte be dinga tua ka hon thupiak na pialsan uh lebel, hamsia.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, na valuah ding uh gama TOUPA na Pathian un a honpi lut hun chiangin, vualjawlna Gerizim tangah na koih ding ua, hamsia Ebol tangah.
Ni tumna khen, Arabaa om, Kanante gam, Gilgal jawn More tosaw sik, Jordan galate ahi kei umaw?
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak gam valuah dingin Jordan na kan ding uh ahia, na luah ding ua, huaiah na om ding uh.Huan, tua na ma ua ka koih, dan leh vaihawm tengteng jui dingin na pilvang ding uhi.
Huan, tua na ma ua ka koih, dan leh vaihawm tengteng jui dingin na pilvang ding uhi.
TOUPA na pi leh pute uh Pathianin a honpiak gam na luah ua, leitunga na om sung ua pilvang taka na zuih ding uh dan te leh vaihawm dante hiaite ahi uh.
Na valuah ding uh gam namten tang lian khawng, tang neu khawng, sing hing chih nuai khawnga a pathiante uh na a sepna mun tengteng uh na hihsiat vek ding uh ahi:
A maitamte uh na chim sak dingua, a Aser te uh na hal ding uh ahi; a pathiam lim bawl tawmte uh na phuk sak ding ua, huaia a min uh na gitmang ding uhi.
Huchibangin TOUPA na Pathian uh tungah na hih ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian un na nam tengteng lak ua a min omna dia a mun seh ding na zon jawk ding uh, huaia nahoh ding uh ahi.
Huaiah na halmang thillat te uh, na thuchiam te uh, na ut thu ua thillat te, na gan hon uh leh nabelam hon lak ua piang masapente na hontawi ding ahi:
Huan, huaiah TOUPA na Pathian uh maah na ne ding ua, na khut koihnapeuh ua TOUPA na Pathian un vual a honjawlnaah nuamsa takin na om ding ua, na inkuan un.
Michih in amau chiat hoih sakdan banga tua i hih banga na hih ding uh ahi kei;
TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honpiak gam leh khawlna lah na tung naita dih ngal kei ua.
Jordan lui na galkah ua, TOUPA na Pathian un a honluah sak ding gama na om ua, bit taka na om theihna ding ua na kim ua melma tengteng laka a honkhawlsak chiangin bel hichi ahi dinga;
TOUPA na Pathian un a min omsakna ding a sehna muna hontawi dinga ka chih tengteng huaiah a hontawi ding uh ahi, na halmang thillat te uh, na kithoihnate uh, na sawm ua khat te, na ankuanglui-vei thillat te, TOUPA kianga na chiam hoih tatate uh;
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah nuamsa takin na om ding ua, noumau leh na tapate uh, na tanute uh toh, na sikhapate uh, na sikhanute utoh, na in ua om, Levite toh, amau lah na lak uah tantuan leh gam a nei ngal kei ua.
Mun na muh peuh ua na halmang thillatte uh lan mawkmawk lou dingin pilvang un:
Na namte uh laka TOUPAN a seh ding munah nahalmang thillat te uh na lan zo ding ua, huailaiah thu ka honpiak tengteng na hih ding uhi.
Ahihhangin TOUPA na Pathian un vual jawlna a hon muhsak bang jelin na hinna un a lunggulh gulh na in chiat uah na gou ding ua, a sa na ne thei ding uh; siangthou loute leh siangthouten leng sangai khawng, sakhi khawngbang a ne thei ding uh.
A sisan jaw na ne ding uh ahi kei; tui bangin lei ah na sung baw ding uhi.
Na in uah sawm khat, na buh te uh, na uain te uh.
Na thau te uh leh na ganhon uh leh belam hon laka piang masapen te, na thuchiam uate, na utthu ua thillat te, na ankuang-vei thillat te uh jaw na ne theikei ding uh:
TOUPA na Pathian un a mun seh dingah, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah na ne zo ding uhi, noute leh na tapate uh leh na tanute uh, na sikhapa te uh, na sikhanu te uh, na in ua om Levite toh; TOUPA na Pathian ma uah na khut ngakna peuhmah uah nuamsa takin na om ding uhi.
Na gam ua na om sung teng un Levite limsak lou lou dingin pilvang un.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honchiam banga na gam uh ahihzata, na hinna un sa nek aut jiaka, Sa ka ne ding, na chih hun chiang un, na hinna un a lunggulh lam peuhpeuh sa ne thei ding uh.
TOUPA na Pathian un a min omna a seh ding na gamlet luah uleh, thu ka honpiak bangin TOUPAN a honpiak na gan hon uleh na belam hon lak ua na gou dingua, na hinna un a lunggulh lampang na in uah na ne ding uhi.
Sangai sa bang, sakhi sa bang a kine bangin na ne ding ua, siangthou loute leh siangthoute leng kibangin na ne ding uhi.
Sisan jaw ne lou dingin pilvang un; sisan lah hinna ahi ngala; hinna nangawn toh sa na ne ding uh ahi kei.
Na ne mahmah ding uh ahi kei; tui bangin lei ah na sungbaw mai ding uhi.
Na ne ding uh ahi kei; huchiin TOUPA mitmuha thil dik na hih un noumau leh na nung ua na tate uh adingin a honghoih ding hi.
Na thil siangthou te uh leh na thuchiam uate kia tawi unla, TOUPAN a mun seh dingah hoh un:
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian uh maitamah na halmang thillat uh, a sa leh a sisan na lan ding ua; huan, na kithoihna sisante uh TOUPA na Pathian uh maitamah na sung khe ding ua, a sa na ne ding uh.
Hiai kon thupiak tengteng limsak unla, ngaikhia un, huchiin TOUPA na Pathian uh mitmuha thilhoih leh thil dik na hih un nou ding leh na nung ua na tate uh adingin khantawnin honghoih jelding hi.
TOUPA na Pathian un na vazoh ding uh namte a honhih man saka, a gam uh na luah ua, na ten huin chiang un;
Hihmana a omnabang ua na awk khak louhna ding un pilvang unla, Hiai namten bangchiin ahia a pathian na uh a sep uh?
A chih bang un en leng i chi tei dinguh, chiin a pathiante uh tungtang kan kei un.
Huchibangin TOUPA na Pathian tunguah na hih ding uh ahi kei; a pathian tunguah TOUPA theiha thil kihhuai chiteng, a huat mahmahte a hih jel ua; a tapate uh, a tanute ngei uh leng a pathiante uh dingin a hal jel uhi.Hih dinga ka honthupiak peuh na hih ding uh ahi; na behlap ding uh ahi kei, na tawmsak dinguh leng ahi kei.
Hih dinga ka honthupiak peuh na hih ding uh ahi; na behlap ding uh ahi kei, na tawmsak dinguh leng ahi kei.
Na lak ua jawlnei hiam, mangneimi hiam a hong om ua, chiamtehna hiam, thil lamdang hiam a honetsak ua,
Chiamtehna hiam, thil lamdang hiam a honet sak uh a hongtangtuna, na theih ngei louh uh, pathian dangte jui ni e, a na uh sem ni, na kiang ua a chih uleh;
Huai jawlnei hiam, mangneimi hiam thute na pom ding uh ahi kei, TOUPA na Pathian un na lungtang tengteng uh leh na hinna tengteng un TOUPA na Pathian uh na it uhia it lou chih theihtelna din a honzeet ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh na jui ding uh ua, amah laudan na siam ding ua, a thupiakte na jui ding ua, a thugente na pom ding ua, a na te na sem ding ua, amah na len chinten ding uh ahi.
Huan, huai jawlnei hiam, mangneimi hiam hihlup ding ahi, Aigupta gam akipana pi khiaa, sal apana nou hontanpa TOUPA na Pathian uh zuih ding thu a honpiak lampi akipan honpial sak dinga, TOUPA na Pathian uh tunga helna thu agen jiakin, Huchibangin na lakua thil hoih lou n ahih mang ding uh ahi.
U unaupa, na nu tapa hiam, na tapa hiam, na tanu hiam, na ji pom lai hiam, na lawm nangmah hinna bang hial hiam nangawnin leng, hon simkhema, Kisa ni, pathian dangte ma sem ni, a chih ua leh; nang hia, na pipute hiamin leng na theih louh uh pathiante;
Na kim na vel ua, na kiang chin ua omte hiam, na kigamlat pih deuh uhiam, kawlmong akipana kawlmong khatlam phaa mite pathiante;
Pha na sakpih ding uh ahi kei, amah na ngai khe ding uh ahi sam keia; na hehpih ding uh ahi keia, na hawi ding uh leng ahi sam kei, na im ding uh leng ahi sam kei;
Na hihlup ngeingei ding uh ahi jaw; hihlum dingin khut na kha masa dinga, huai khit chiangin mipite tengtengin.
Suanga na den lup ding uh ahi, Aigupta gam akipana sal apat honpikhepa TOUPA na Pathian uh kianga kipan honpialsakna ding a zon jiakin.
Huchiin Israel mi tengtengin a za ding ua, a lau ding ua, na lak ua huchibang tatsia himhim a chingta kei ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian un na omna dingua a honpiak na khua khat ua na lak ua pat mi ginalou khenkhat hongpawta,
Huai khopia mite na theih ngei louh uh pathian dangte be dingin a pi mang uh chih thu gen na jak u leh kan unla;
Ding khia unla, phatuamngai takin dongun; huan, ngai un, thudik a nahiha, huchibang thil kihhua nalak ua hih ahi chih theihtel a hih leh;
Namsauin huai khuaa omte na hihlup ngeingei ding uh ahi; a sunga om tengteng, gan honte toh namsauin na hihmang vek ding uhi.
Huan, gallak sum tengteng kholakah na la khawm ding ua, huan khua leh gallak sum tengteng TOUPA na Pathian uh kiangah pumhal thillat din na hal dingua, leivui lel ahi tawntung ding a, lam ahi nawn ta kei ding hi.
Gallak sum bel a bangmah mah na khoih ding uh ahi kei TOUPAN a heh mahmaha a kiheisan dia, chitna a honmu sak dinga a honhehpihdinga;TOUPA na Pathian uh mitmuha thil hoih hih dinga thupiak tengteng tua ka honpiak na zuih peuhmah uleh nou a hontam sak dinga, na pi leh pute uh kianga a nakichiam khit bangin.
TOUPA na Pathian uh mitmuha thil hoih hih dinga thupiak tengteng tua ka honpiak na zuih peuhmah uleh nou a hontam sak dinga, na pi leh pute uh kianga a nakichiam khit bangin.
TOUPA na Pathian uh tate na hi ua; mi si jiakin na ki-at ding uh ahi keia, na mit mul uh leng na met mai ding uh ahi tuan kei hi,
TOUPA na Pathian uh adingin lah nam siangthou na hi ngal ua, leitunga nam tengteng tungah amaha tuam mawng hi dinga TOUPAN a hontel na hi uhi.
Thil kihhuai himhim na nek ding uh ahi kei.
Hiai sate khawng ahi, nanek theih ding uh; bawngtal, belam, kel,
Sakhi, sangai, sakhi tal, sathak, gamkel, gamlawi gam belamte khawng.
Huan, sa chiteng, chin kaa chin kapaisuak, eknel hai chi peuhmah laka na thei ding uh,
Himahleh eknel leng hai ngala, a chin uh leng ka ngalte khawng, na nek ding uh ahi kei; sangawngsau zupi, zusapi, eknel a hai na ua, a chin uh a kat louh jiakin nou adingin a nin ahi:
Huan, vok pen a chin jaw a ka naa, eknel a hai louh jiakin nou adingin a nin ahi; a sa na nek ding uh ahi kei hi, a luang leng na khoih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Tuia tengte laka hiaite na ne thei dinguh; phe leh lip nei peuhmah na ne thei ding uh:
Phe leh lip neilou peuhmahte na ne theikei ding uh, nou adingin nin ahi.
Vasa siangthou tengteng na ne thei ding uh.
Hiaite jaw na ne ding uh ahi kei; muvanlai, mungawnggiau, mu-akla;
Mu sanete bang, mu meikate, mu a chi himhim;
Vaak chi himhim;
Simbu, janmu, mu chi himhim, tuipimu;
Simbu neu, simbu lian, simbutanglip;
Vatawt, musane, vangawngsau;
Tuipi, tuiva lian chi himhim, huihtun leh bak.
Khe nei khea pai chi himhim nou adingin thil nin ahi uh, nek ding ahi kei.
Vasa siangthou tengteng na ne thei ding uh.
Amah siha si bangmah na nek ding uh ahi kei; na ompih uh gam dang mite nek dingin na pe thei ding uh; nam dang mite kiang ah leng na juak thei dinguh; nou jaw TOUPA na Pathian uh a dingin nam siangthou na hi uhi.
Kelnou bang a pi nawituiin na huan ding uh ahi kei hi.
Kum chihin na lou ua an tung tengteng sawma khat na piak ngeingei ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh laudansiam nadan na hontheihgige theih na ding un sawma khat, na buh uh, na uain uh, na thau uh leh na bawng hon uh leh na belam hon lak ua piang masapente TOUPA na Pathian uh maah, a min omna dinga a seh dingah na nek ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honvualjawl chiangin, TOUPA na Pathian un a min omna ding a seh dinga a gamlat luat jiaka nou dinga lampi a sau luate na tawi theih kei uleh:
Paihsa na sa ding ua, paihsa na tawi ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian un a mun sehna ah na hoh ding uh ahi:
Huan, paihsa na lungsim ua na deihpen uh, bawngtal hiam, belam hiam, uain hiam, zupi hiam, na lungsim ua na lunggulh lah peuhmah uh dingin na zang ding ua; huaiah TOUPA na Pathian uh maah na ne ding ua, nuamsa takin na om ding uhi, noute leh na inkote utoh:
Na omna ua om Levite limsaklouin om het kei un; na lak uah lah tantuan leng, goutan leng a nei tei ngal kei ua.
Kum thum a chin kumin huai kuma na thil tung tengteng ua sawma khat pen n ala khawm vek ding ua, na omna ua na koih ding uh ahi:Huan, a omna ua om Levite leng, na lak ua tantuan, goutan leng nei tei loute leh gam dang mite leh pa neiloute leh meithaiten a ne ding ua, a hongkhosa thei sam ding uh; huchiin TOUPA na Pathian un na khut koihna tengteng uh a honvualjawl ding ahi.
Huan, a omna ua om Levite leng, na lak ua tantuan, goutan leng nei tei loute leh gam dang mite leh pa neiloute leh meithaiten a ne ding ua, a hongkhosa thei sam ding uh; huchiin TOUPA na Pathian un na khut koihna tengteng uh a honvualjawl ding ahi.
Huan, Kum sagih a chin kumkumin ngaihdamna na bawl ding uh ahi.
Ngaihdam dan bel hichibang ahi: leiba neimi peuhmahin a insakinkhangte a naleitawi sak a ngaihdam ding uh ahi; a insakinkhang leng, a u a nau leng a sik teitei ding ahi kei.
TOUPA ngaihdamna genkhiak a hih tak jiakin.
Nam dang mi a hihleh na sik teitei thei ding uh; ahihhangin noua bangpeuh na unaute un a nazat uh na ngaihdam ding uh ahi.
Mi genthei himhim na om kei ding uh, (TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga nou a honpiak gamah TOUPAN lah a honvualjawl sin ngei ngala; )
Hiai thupiak tunia ka thupiak tengteng pom dinga TOUPA na Pathian uh phatuamngai taka na zuih peuhmah uleh.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honchiam bangin a honvualjawl dinga, nam tampi na leitawi kei dinguh; nam tampi tungah vai na hawm ding ua, nou tungah bel amau vai a hawm kei ding uhi.
TOUPAN a hon gam piak na omna ua na unaute uh laka genthei a om uh leh na unau gentheite lakah na lungsim khauhsak kei unla, sumchit sam kei un.
A tunguah na thilphal ngeingei ding ua, a taksapna ua a taksapawng uh hukna khop na leitawi sak ding uh ahi.
Ngaihdam kum, kum sagihna a hongtung sinta, chiin, na unau gentheite mudaha bangmah pe nuam louin na lungtang uah diklou taka ngaihtuahna omlou dingin pilvang un: huchilouin jaw amau, na tungtang thu uah TOUPA a sam ding ua, nou adingin khelhna ahi kha ding.
Na piak ngeingei ding uh ahi; huan, napiak chiang un leng na lungtang uh a nuammoh ding ahi mahmah kei hi: huchibang thil jiakin ahi, TOUPA na Pathian un na thilhih tengteng ua leh na khut ngakna peuhpeuh uah a honvualjawl sin.
Huai gamah la mi gentheite om louh lai a om sin ngal keia; huaijiakin, Na gam ua na unaute uh tungah, tasamte tungah, na mi gentheite uh tungah, na thilphal ngeingei ding uh ahi, chia thu ka honpiak.
Na unau uh, Hebrupa hiam, Hebrunu hiam, na kiang ua a juak ua, kum guk na na uh a sep uleh kum sagih kumin nakhah ding uh ahi.
Huan, na khah chiang un a vuakin na pawtsak ding uh ahi kei:
Na belam honte ua kipan, na phual ua kipan, na uain sukna khuk ua kipanin it lou takin na pe ding uhi; TOUPA na Pathian un a hon vualjawl dan bang jelin na pe ding uhi.
Huai Aigupta gamah sikha na nahita ua, TOUPA na Pathian un a hontan chih na theigige ding uh ahi; huaijiakin ahi, tua hiai thu khawng kon piak.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, noute leh na inkuan uh a ngaih jiak uleh, na kihoutheih jiak ua na kiang ua, Ka hon pawtsan kei ding, a chih bikbek u leh;
Sik zum na la ding ua, a bil uh kongkhakah na vut pailet ding ua, hichiin khan tawnin na sikha uh ahi ding uh.
Huan, na sikhanu uh leng huchimah bangin na hih ding uhi.
Pawtsak thil haksa bangin na ngaihtuah ding uh ahi kei hi.
Kiloh sep zah nih semin kum guk na na uh a honsep sak khinta ngal ua; huan, TOUPA na Pathian un na thilhih peuh uah a honvualjawl ding hi.
Na gan honte uh, na belam honte uh laka a pa, piang masa penpente TOUPA na Pathian uh tuam dingin na pe ding uhi; na bawngtal uh a piang masepen na sem dingin na zang ding uh ahi kei, na belam honte uh laka piang masapen mul na met din guh ahi kei.
TOUPA na Pathian uh maah kum chihin TOUPAN a mun seh ding ah ne ne ding uhi, nou leh na inkote utoh.
Gensiatna om, a khebai hiam, a mittaw hiam, gensiatna om peuhmah jaw TOUPA na Pathian uh kianga kithoihna dingin na zang ding uh ahi kei hi.
Na omna mun uah na ne ding uhi; siangthou loute leh siangthoute leng hiai sangaite, sakhite bang na nethei ding uh.A sisan n ane mahmah ding uh ahi kei hi; tui banga leia na sun buak mai ding uh ahi.
A sisan n ane mahmah ding uh ahi kei hi; tui banga leia na sun buak mai ding uh ahi.
Abib kha tang unla, TOUPA Na Pathian uh adingin paikan ankuangluina dingin zang un: Abib khain ahi, TOUPA na Pathian un Aigupta gama kipan jana a honpi khiak.
TOUPAN a min omna mun dia a seh dingah TOUPA na Pathian kiang uah na belam hon lak ua leh na gan hon laka Paikan Ankuang dingin na kithoih dinguh ahi.
Tanghou silngou soh toh nane ding uh ahi kei; na damsung teng ua Aigupta gam akipana na pawt ni uhna theihgigena ding un ni sagih tanghou silngou soh louh, haksatna tanghou toh na nek ding uh ahi, Aigupta gam akipana kintaka pawt na hi uhi.
Na gamsung uah ni sagih sung, silngou mawngmawng a om ding ahi kei; huan, ni khat ni nitak lama na kithoihna sa uh jankhuain a jingsang tanin bangmah a om ding ahi kei.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak na omna uh koilai mahah Paikan Ankuang kithoihin na kithoih theikei ding ua:
TOUPA na Pathian un a min omna mun dia a seh dingah kia ahi ding; huaiah Aigupta gam akipana na hongpawt hun bang un nitaklamin Paikan Ankuang kithoihin na kithoih ding uhi.
Huan, na em ding ua, TOUPAN a mun seh dingah na ne ding ua, huan, jingsangin na pai nawn ding ua, na puanin uah na pai ding uhi.
Ni guk sung tanghou silngou soh louh na ne ding uhi; huan, a ni sagih nipen TOUPA na Pathian uh adin kikhawmpi siangthou ahi dinga, na na sem ding uh ahi kei.
Nipikal sagih na sim ding ua; na buh lak tung ua kipanin nipikal sagih na sim ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honvualzawl bang jelin na sep khiak uh laka noumau utthua thillat lanin TOUPA na Pathiana ding un nipikal ankuanglui na nei dinguh ahi:
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian un a min omna a seh dingah na sikhanute uh, na omna ua om Levite, na lak ua om gam dang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite toh TOUPA na Pathian uh maah nuamsa takin na om ding uh.
Huan, Aigupta gamah sikha n ahi uh chih na theihgige ding uh ahi; huan, hiai dante pilvang takin na jui ding uhi.
Na phual ua kipan leh na uain sukna khuk ua kipan na sek khawm khit un ni sagih sung bawkta ankuanglui na nei ding uhi.
Na ankuangluina uah nou toh, na tapa utoh, na tanu utoh, na sikhanu utoh, na omna ua om Levite, gam dang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite toh nuamsa takin na om ding uhi.
TOUPAN a mun seh dingah TOUPA na Pathian uh adin ni sagih ankuang na lui ding uhi; TOUPA na Pathian un thil tung tengtengah leh na khut ngakna tengteng uah a honvualjawl dinga, kipak tak ngenin na om ding uhi.
Kum chihin na pasalte tengteng uh thum vei TOUPA maah mun a honsehsak dingah a kilat ding uh ahi, tanghou silngou sohlouh ankuangah, nipikal ankuangah, bawkta ankuangah; huan TOUPA maah kuamah khutvuakin na kilat ding uh ahi kei:
TOUPA na Pathian un vualjawlna a honmuh sak bang jelin mi chihin a zoh hun bang un a pe ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak nakulh kongpi tengteng uah na nam bang jel un vaihawmte leh heutute na kibawl chiat ding ua, mipite vai hoihtakin a hawm sak ding uh ahi.
Dik lou takin vai na hawm ding uh ahi kei; kuamah deihsak tuam na neih ding uh ahi kei; thilpiak na la ding uh ahi kei hi; thilpiakin mipilte mit a tosaka, mi diktatte thu a hihsiat sak ngal naka.
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak gam dama na luah theihna ding un a dik kia na jui ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh maitam non bawl ding uh pangah sing bang chi bang chiin leng Aser na bawlkhe ding uh ahi kei.TOUPA na Pathian un a muhdahlam suang leng na phuh ding uh ahi sam kei hi.
TOUPA na Pathian un a muhdahlam suang leng na phuh ding uh ahi sam kei hi.
Bawngtal hiam, belam hiam, demna om leh hoih louhna himhim neiin TOUPA na Pathian uh kiangah na kithoih ding uh ahi kei; huai lah TOUPA na Pathian uh adingin thil kihhuai ahi ngala.
Na lak uah TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak na omna uh koi peuhah leng pasal hiam, numei hiam leng, thukhun bohsiaa pathian dang na va sema,
Ka thupiak louh, ni hiam, kha hiam, vanate himhim hiam, TOUPA na Pathian uh mitmuha thil hoih lou hih a om ua;
Ahonhilh ua, nang na najaka, phatuamngai taka na dot ua, huan, ngaiin, a dika, thu atel mahmaha, huchibang thil kihhuai Israelte laka hih a nahih leh;
Huai thil gilou hihmi, pasal hiam, numei hiam na kulh kongkhak polam uah pasal hiam numei hiam pen na pikhe ding ua, suangin na deng lum ding uhi.
Theihpih nih hiam, thum hiam kam akipanin si dingmi hihlup ding ahia, theihpih khat kam akipanin hihlup ding ahi kei hi.
Hihlup ding pa tungah theihpihten a khut uh hihlum dingin a kha masa ding ua, huai khit chiangin mipi tengtengin, huchibangin na lak ua kipan thil hoihlou na hih mang ding uh ahi.
Sisan kisuah thuah, sum leh pai thuah, kivuak thuah, na omna ua kiselna thu himhima nou adia vaihawm haksa lua a hongom leh, TOUPA na Pathian un a mun seh dingah na hoh ding;
Huai huna siampu Levite leh vaihawmte kiangahna hoh ding ua, na dong ding uhi; huan, amau thu hihpuk ding dan a honna kawkmuh ding uhi.
Huchiin nou TOUPAN mun a seh ding akipana thu hihpuk dan a honna kawkmuh bangun na hih ding ua, a honsin sak bang un pilvang takin na hih ding uhi.
Thu hihpuk dan a honna sin sak uh leh vaihawm dan a honna hilh bang jel un nahih dinguh: thu hihpuk dan a honna kawkmuh uh taklamah hiam, veilamah hiam na pialsan ding uh ahi kei.
TOUPA na Pathian uh maa nasema pang sek siampu leh vaihawmmi thu pom loua, engtat peuhmah, huai mi hihlup ding ahi: Israel laka kipan, huai thil hoih lou na hih mang ding uh ahi.
Huchiin mi tengtengin a za ding ua, a lau ding ua, a engtat nawnta kei ding hi.
TOUPA na Pathian un a hon gam piak ding na va tun ua, na valuah ua, na vaom ua, i gama nam tengteng bangin kumpipa i nei ding uh, na chih chiang un.
TOUPA na Pathian un a tel pen kumpipa dinga na neih ding uh ahi: na unau lak ua mi khat na kumpipa ding ua na bawl ding uh ahi; nam dang mi, na unau uh hi lou jaw nou hon uk dinga na bawl ding uh ahi kei hi.
Himahleh sakol a hau ding ahi kei dia, sakol a hauh theihna dingin Aigupta gama mite toh a kithutuah ding leng ahi sam kei hi: TOUPAN, Tuban huai lamah na kileh nawn ding uh a hita kei, na kiang uah a na chita ngala.
A lungsim a vakman louhna ding dingin ji leng a hau ding ahi keia, dangka leh dangkaeng leng a hau ding ahi sam kei.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, a gam laltutphaha a tut chiangin siampu Levite kep sak dan pen laibu ah a gelh sawn sak dinga:
A kem dinga, a damsung teng a sim jel ding ahi, hiai dan leh hiai thuseh tengteng poma, juia, hih dinga TOUPA a Pathian laudansiam a kisin theiha:A unaute tunga a lungtang a kisaktheih louha, taklamah hiam, veilamah hiam, thupiak pen a pialsan louhna ding leh Israelte laka amah leh a suante a gama a dam sawt lohna ding un.
A unaute tunga a lungtang a kisaktheih louha, taklamah hiam, veilamah hiam, thupiak pen a pialsan louhna ding leh Israelte laka amah leh a suante a gama a dam sawt lohna ding un.
Siampu Levite, Levi nam tengtengin Israelte lakah tantuan leh goutan a nei ding uh a hikeia; TOUPA kianga meia thillat leh atuam ua pen na ne ding uhi.
A unaute uh lakah goutan a nei ding uh ahi kei; a goutan ubel a kiang ua a gen bangin TOUPA ahi ngala.
Kithoihna lanpa mipite laka siampu tuam ding hiaite ahi ding-bawngtal leng, belam leng, a liang leh a biangtuai langnih leh a gilpi siampu a piak ding uh ahi.
Na buh na bal uh, na uain uh, na thau tung masa te uh, na belam mul met masakpen te uh leng na piak ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian un TOUPA mina nasema om tawntung dingin nam tengteng laka kipan a tel ahi ngal ua, amau leh a tapate utoh.
Huan, Levi mi kuapeuh a omna Israel gam na omna ua a koipeuh pawtsana, a lungsima kilawp taka TOUPAN a seh ding muna a hongpai leh;
Huai laia TOUPA maa om jel Levite, a unaute mah bangin TOUPA a Pathian minin na a sem ding ahi.
A siamput man uh sim louhin midang tuam nek ding a tang sam himhim ding uh.
TOUPA na Pathian it ding leh, a lampite-a pai dinga tunia kon piak, hiai thupiakte tengteng hih dinga na kep leh; huchiin hiai thumte chihlouh, khopi thum dang na ki behlap lai ding ahi.
Na lakah mi kuamah a tapa hiam a tanu hiam meia paisuak sak, mi kuamah aisan ching, mi kuamah mangsan ching, hiam khimmi hiam.
Mitkhialdawitawi hiam,
Jawl-aitawi hiam, kha dong mi hiam, mitkhialdawitawi hiam, misite donga aisan mi hiam na lak uah muhin a om ding uh ahi kei.
Hichibang thilhih chingte peuhmah TOUPA adingin mi kihhuai ahi ngalua: huan, hiai thil kihhuaite jiakin ahi, TOUPA na Pathian un amau a hon delh khiak sak,
TOUPA na Pathian uh maa na hoih buchin ding uh ahi.
Huai na valuah ding uh gama namten mitkhialdawi leh aisan chingmite a ngai khe jel ua; nou jaw TOUPA na Pathian un huchibang hih a honphal kei hi.
TOUPA na Pathian un kei bang na unaute uh laka mi jawlnei a honbawl sak ding hi: a thu na ngaikhe ding uhi;
TOUPA i Pathian aw jaw honza sak nawn kenla, hiai mei thupi honmu sak nawn kenla, ka si kha ding hi, chia Horeb tanga kikhop khawm nia TOUPA na Pathian uh na deihdan bang un.
Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah, A thu gen uh a gen hoih ngel uhi.
A unaute uh lakah nang bang jawlnei ka bawl sak dinga, a kamah ka thute ka koih dinga, a kianga ka thupiak peuhmah a kiang uah a gen ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, ka mina ka thu a gen pom lou peuhmah ka ngaihtuah ding.
Ka mina gen ding ka piak louh gen teitei jawlnei hiam, pathian dangte mina thugenmi jawlnei hiam, huai jawlnei hihlup ding ahi.
Huan, na lungtang ua, Bangchiin ahia a thu TOUPA gen ahi kei chih i theih ding?
Na chih uleh,Jawlneiin TOUPA mina thu a gena, a thil gen pen a hongtun keia a lohchin kei leh, huai tak ahi, TOUPA gen louh; jawlneiin kiuangsak takin a gen mawkmawk ahia, amah na kihta ding uh ahi kei, a chi a.
Jawlneiin TOUPA mina thu a gena, a thil gen pen a hongtun keia a lohchin kei leh, huai tak ahi, TOUPA gen louh; jawlneiin kiuangsak takin a gen mawkmawk ahia, amah na kihta ding uh ahi kei, a chi a.
TOUPA na Pathian un a gam uh nou a honpiak nam TOUPAN a hihmana na luah ua, a khua khawng ua, a in khawng ua na om chiang un;
TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga nou a honpiak na gam uah nou adingin khaw thum na sep ding uhi.
Mithat taphot a tai lutna ding un, TOUPAN a honluah sak ding gam seh thum na suah ding ua, na gamgite uh na bawl ding ua, lampite na bawl ding uhi.
Huan, mithatte huailaia tailut a bit theite bel hiaite ahi uhi; min a insakinkhang tumalama huatna leng nei khol loua that kha peuhmahte;
Mi a insakinkhang toh singphuk dinga gamlaka kuana singphuk dinga a heipia sata, heipi tang tolin a insakinkhang denglum khate bang, huaite lakah khua khatah a tai dinga, a bit ding:
Sisan phu lamiin a hehna apai laia mithatmi a delha, lampi a sau jiaka delhphain a vasat lum kha ding hi: tumalam a huatna na nei khol lou a hih jiakin si tak lah ahi ngal kei hi.
Huaijiakin, Kho thum nou adingin na sep ding uhi, chiin thu ka hon pia ahi.
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian un na pi leh pute uh kianga a nakichiam banga na pi leh pute uh piak a nachiam gam a honpiaka;
TOUPA na Pathian uh it ding leh a lampi jui gige dinga a thupiak tengteng, tua ka honthupiak na pom ua, na gam uh a hihlet leh hiai kho thumte sim louin nou adingin kho thum dang na behlap nawn ding ua:
TOUPAN luah dinga a honpiak na gamsung uah poi khoihlou sisan suah a om louha, na tung ua sisan a om louhna dingin.
Himahleh min a insakinkhang a huata, a tana, a suala, si khop hiala a vuaka, huai khote laka khata a tai leh;
A kho upate un mi sawl uhenla, huai akipan va pi uhenla, hihlup dingin sisanphuala mi khutah pe khia uhen.
Na hehpih ding uh ahi keia, nou dia hoih dingin Israel gam akipan poi khoihlou sisan suahna na hihmang ding uh ahi.
TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga a honpiak gam, na luah ding uh gama a maa a naphuhsa uh na insakinkhang uh gamgi na suan ding uh ahi kei.
Mi a thulimlouhna hiam, a khelhna himhim hiam theihpih khat a hun kei dinga; theihpih nih kam hiam, theihpih thum kam hiama thu hihkip ding ahi.
Theihpih diklouin mi thil diklou hih ahi chi dinga, dem dinga a kisak leh;
A kiselna uah a nih un TOUPA maah huai huna siampute leh vaihawmte maah a ding ding uhi;
Huan, vaihawmten ngentel takin thu a dong ding ua, huan, ngaiin, thu theihpihmi thutheihpih juau thei a hiha, a unau juaua ngoh a hihleh;
A unau tunga hih a natup bangin a tungah na hih ding uh; huchibangin na lak ua thil hoih lou na hihmang dinguh ahi.
A omlaiten a za ding ua, a lau ding ua, tunung chiangin huchibang thil hoih lou mawngmawng na lak uah a hih nawnta kei ding uhi. sNa hehpih ding uh ahi keia; hinna tangin hinna, mit tangin mit, ha tangin ha, khut tangin khut, khe tangin khe ahi ding.
Na hehpih ding uh ahi keia; hinna tangin hinna, mit tangin mit, ha tangin ha, khut tangin khut, khe tangin khe ahi ding.
Na Melmate uh dou dinga na kuan ua, sakol, kangtalai, mipi nou sanga tam na muh un, amau na kihta ding uh ahi kei; Aigupta gam akipan nou hinpi khepa TOUPA na Pathian uh lah na kiang uah a om ngala.
Huan, na kidou kuan un siampuin mipi vanaih henla, houpih henla, a kiang uah,
Israelte aw, j aun, tuin na melmate uh dou ding na hi ua, lau kei unla.
Kihta kei unla, ling sam kei un,. amaute kihta kei un:
Nou honhondam dinga na melmate uh honsual sak dia na kiang ua om jelpa lah TOUPA na Pathian uh ahi ngala, chi heh.
Huan, heututen mipite kiangah, In thak lama lan nai lou na om uhia?
A in ah pai nawn hen, kidounaah a vasi kha dinga, mi dangin a lan kha ding hi.
Huan, grep huan bawla, a gah ne nai lou na om uhia?
A in lam ah pai nawn heh, kidounaah a si kha dinga, mi dangin a ne kha ding uhi.
Huan, ji khama kiteng nai lou na om uhia?
A in lam ah pai nawn heh, kidounaah a sikha dinga, mi dangin a kitenpih kha ding uhi, chiin gen heh
Huan, heututen mipite kiangah, Lau leh kihta na om uhia.
A in lamuah pai uhen, a unaute uh lungtang amah lungtang bangin azul tei kha ding hi, chi lailai uheh.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, heututen mipite kianga thu a gen khit un mipite makai ding sepaih heutute a sep ding uhi.
Sual dinga khua na vanaih hun chiang un kituahna thu gen phot unla.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, a hon kituahpih ua, a nakipiak uleh hichi ahi dinga, huaia mi om tengteng nasem dinga na goih ding uh ahi dinga, na na uh a sem ding uh.
Huan, a honna kituahpih nop louh ua, a honna dou sin uleh na um ding ua:
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian un na khut ua a honpiak hun chiangin huaia pasal tengteng namsauin na hihlum vek ding uhi:
Numei leh a ta neu chikchikte uh, gante leh khuaa thil om himhimte jaw huaia gallak thil tengteng toh na tuam ding ua na lak ding uh ahi; huan TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak na melmate uh laka gallak thil na ne un na ta ding uhi.
Hiai namte khua hi lou, na omna ua kipana kho gamla tengteng huchibangin na hih jel ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga a honpiak hiai nam khuate jaw TOUPA na Pathian un thu a honpiak bangin a hing peuhmah bangmah na hawi ding uh ahi keia:
Hitte, Amorte, Kanante, Perizte, Hivte, Jebuste na hihmang vek ding uhi:
A pathiante uh tunga a hih sek uh thil kihhuai tengteng a honsin sak louhna ding un, huchilouinjaw TOUPA na Pathian tunguah thil na hihkhial kha ding uhi.
Lak tuma na sual uh a khua sawtpi na um un leng huaia singte jaw heipiin na phuk ding uh ahi keia, na nek ding uh ahi a, na phuk ding uh ahi kei: huai sing mihing ahi ua hia na um uh?A gah nek louh chi sing ahi chih na theihte ubel na hihsia un na phuk ding ua, a hondoute khua a siat masiah kulhin na umkhum ding uhi.
A gah nek louh chi sing ahi chih na theihte ubel na hihsia un na phuk ding ua, a hondoute khua a siat masiah kulhin na umkhum ding uhi.
TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga a honpiak gamah, gam lakah mi hihlupa na om bang hita leh, a hihlummi theih louh hita leh:
Na upate uh leh na vaihawmte uh a hongpai ding ua, a hihlup na kim khua akipanin a teh ding ua:
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, a luanga kipana kho naipen, huai kho upaten bawng hon laka bawngla, zat nai louh, hakkol po nai lou a kai ding ua:
Huan, huai kho upaten bawngla, tui luanna, leileh louh lai leh bangmah chin louhna guamah a kaisuk ding ua, guamah bawngla ngawng a tan ding ua:
Huan, Levi tapa siamputen a honjuan ding ua, amau TOUPA na Pathian un a nasemmi leh TOUPA mina vualjawlmi dinga a sehte lah ahi ngalua; thubuai leh kivuak thu agen bangbang uh ahi ding.
Huan, luang naihpen kho upate tengtengin guama bawngla ngawng a tan tunguah a khut uh a sil ding ua:
Ka khut un hiai sisan a suah keia, ka mit un leng a mu sam kei.
TOUPA aw, na tatkhiak na mi Israelte lakah poikhoih lou sisan suahna om phal ken, a chi ding ua, a pang ding uh ahi.
Huchiin sisan thuah ngaihdam ahi ding uh.
Huchibangin TOUPA mitmuha thil hoih hihin poikhoihlou sisan suahna na laka kipan na dangsak ding hi.
Na melmate uh sim dinga na kipatkhiak ua, TOUPA na Pathian un na khut ua a honpiaka, sala n api ua,
Sal laka numei melhoih tak, na mi deihlam uh, ji dinga na mi deihlam tak uh na muh uleh;
Huchiin na in uah na pi ding ua; a lu a met dinga, a khutchin a tan ding;
Huan, a sal puannak a suah ding ua, na in uah a om ding ua, kha khat mahmah a nu uh leh a pa uh a sun ding ua, huai khit chiangin, na kithuah pih ding ua, a pasal uh na hi ding ua, amau na ji uh ahi ding uhi.
Huan, amaua kipahna na neih kei uleh a ututna ua a pai uh na phal ding uh ahi, sum leh paiin na juak ding uh ahi kei hiala, sumsinnain na bawl ding uh ahi kei, na daisakta ngal ua.
Min ji nih nei bang hita leh, khatpen deihin khatpen hota leh, a deihnu leh a huatnuin ta suan sak tuaktuak ta leh; huan tapa upapen a huatnu ta hi taleh;
A gou neih a tapate a khopsak hun chiangin a deihpen tapa a tapa upa a huatpen ta sanga deihsakna a bawl ding ahi keia:
A huatpen ta, a ta upa pen, a neih tengteng akipan tan nih huai dinga a bawl ding ahi; a hatna bul ahi a, ta chil hihna a tuam ahi hi.
Min tapa phengphi tak, hel hat tak nei bang hita leh, a nu leh a pa thumang louin, a sawina uh limsakta keileh:
A nu leh a pan a kai ding ua, a kho upate uh kiangah a kho kulh kongpi bul uah a pi ding uhi;
Huan, a kho upate uh kiangah, Hiai ka tapa uh phengphi tak leh helhat tak ahi a, ka thu uh leng a mang nuam keia; kizat bei hat leh kham hat mi ahi, a chi ding uhi.
Huchiin khuaa mi tengtengin suangin a denglum ding uhi; huchibangin na lak ua kipan thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi; huan, Israel mi tangtengin a za ding ua, a lau ding uhi.
Huan, min sihna khop gilou a hiha, hihlup a hiha singdawna na khai uleh;A luang singah jankhuain a om ding ahi keia; huai ni mahmahin na vui ding uhi; singa khai peuhmah lah Pathian hamse thuak ahi ngala; TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga a honpiak na gam uh na hih nit louhna ding un.
A luang singah jankhuain a om ding ahi keia; huai ni mahmahin na vui ding uhi; singa khai peuhmah lah Pathian hamse thuak ahi ngala; TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga a honpiak na gam uh na hih nit louhna ding un.
Na unaute uh bawngtal hiam, a belam uh hiam mang na muh un na daihsan maimah ding uh ahi keia, na unaute inah na pi sak nawn ngeingei ding uh ahi.
Huan, na unaute uh in kiang naia om a hih kei ua, a neimi na theih louh uh hiam a hihleh, na in lam uah na pi tou ding ua, na kiang uah a om nilouh dinga, na unau un a zon hunhunin na nape nawn ding uhi.
A sabengtung uh leng huchimahbangin na hih ding uhi, huchimahbangin a puansilh te uh leng na hih ding uhi, huchimahbangin na unau thil mansak na muhpeuhmah uh na hih ding uh ahi, na daih beisan mawkmawk ding uh ahi kei.
Na unaute uh sabengtung hiam, bawngtal hiam, lampia puk na muh un na daihsan maimah ding uh ahi keia, na phot pih ngeingei ding uh ahi.
Numeiin pasal van a silh ding ahi keia, pasalin numei puansilh a silh ding leng ahi sam sam kei; kuapeuh huchibang hih jaw TOUPA na Pathian uh theihin mi kihhuai ahi.
Lampia vasa bu, singah hiam, leiah hiam, a nou hiam, a tui hiam om, a nou hiam a tui hiam, a piin a op lai na muh uleh a nou a pitoh na lak ding uh ahi keia:
A pi khah ngeingei ding ahi, a nou bel na la thei ding uh: huchiin nou adingin a hoih dinga, na damsawt ding uhi.
In khat na lam ua huaia mi a kiak ua na in uh sisan suahna in a hih louhna dingin na intung uh na um ding uh ahi.
Huan, na grep huan ua thil chi nih na chin ding uh ahi kei; huchilouinjaw na chi tuh uh leh na grep huan ua thil tung tengteng TOUPA tuam ahi mai ding hi.
Bawngtal leh sabengtung lei na let khawm sak ding uh ahi kei.
Samul leh pat gat khawm puan na silh ding ahi kei.
Na kituamna puan uh a gei li ah mongkhih na bawl ding ahi.
Min ji a neiha, a kithuahpiha, a muhdah nawn thepthupa,
Hiai numei ka kitenpiha, ka kithuahpiha, nungak siangthou a hihna ka mu keia, chia zahlak taka a bawla, a min a hihsiat leh,
Nungak nu leh pan kulhkongpiah huai kho upate kiangah nungak siangthou a hihna a hohhihlang ding uh;
Huan, nungak pan upate kiangah, Hiai mi ka tanu ka nei saka, a ho nawn thepthup ngala;
Huan, ngai un, Na tanu nungak singthou a hihna ka mu kei chiin zahlak takin a bawla, himahleh hiaite ka tanu nungak siangthou a hihna ahi hi, a chi ding hi.
Huchiin huai kho upate maah puan a phah ding uh.
Huan, huai kho upaten mi a gawt ding ua;
Israel nungak siangthou a suk minsiat jiakin dangka sekel ja a liau sak ding ua, nungak pa a pe ding uhi, amah ji ahi dinga, a damsungin a khen theikei ding.
Himahleh huai mi thu a na dika, nungak nungak siangthou a hihna a lat keileh:
Nungak a pain kongpiah a pi khe ding ua a omna khuaa miten suangin a denglum ding uh, a pa ina kijuaka Israelte laka thil gilou haihuai mahmah a hih jiakin; huchibangin na lak ua kipan, huai thil hoih lou na hihmang ding uhi.
Min pasal nei a luppih a muh uh leh a nih un a sih ding uh ahi, a lup pih pasal leh numei; huchibangin Israel laka kipan, huai thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uhi.
Nungak siangthou, mi zikham, min khuaa a muh ua, a luppih leh;
A nih un kho kulh kongpiah na pi khe ding ua, suangin na denglum ding uhi; numei pen, khuaa om ngala, a kikou louh jiakin; huan pasal pen, a insakinkhang ji ahihminsiat jiakin; huchibangin na lak ua kipan, huai thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi.
Himahleh min gamnuaiah nungak, mi kham a muha, a chih teiteia a luppih leh a luppih pasal kia hihlup ding ahi:
A nungak pen bangmah a chih ding uh ahi kei, nungak tungah jaw sihna khop khelhna a om kei; hichibang, mi a insakinkhang suala, that bang ahia:
Gamlakah a vatuak khaa, mi kham nungak a kikou a, panpih ding mi lah a om ngal kei ua.
Min nungak siangthou kham louh a muha, a mata, a luppih a muh uleh;
A luppih pasalin nungak pa dangka sekel sawmnga a pe ding ahi, huan, a mah ji ahi ding, a hihminsiat tak jiakin; a damsungin a khen theikei ding hi.Min a pa ji a kitenpih ding ahi keia, a pa nik a lem sak ding ahi kei hi.
Min a pa ji a kitenpih ding ahi keia, a pa nik a lem sak ding ahi kei hi.
Mi, a chiltang kitam leh a zahmoh tan khiak TOUPA mite kikhawm khawmte lakah a tel ding ahi kei.
Sawn jaw TOUPA mite kikhawm khawmte laka tel ding ahi kei: suan sawm tanin a suante TOUPA mite kikhawm khawmte laka tel ding ahi kei hi.
Amon te leh Moab te TOUPA mite kikhawm khawmte laka a tel ding uh ahi kei.
Suan sawmna tanin a lak ua mi TOUPA mite kikhawm khawmte laka a tel mahmah louh ding uh ahi:
Aigupta gam akipana na hongpawt lai ua tanghou leh tuia a honna dawn louh jiak un leh honhamsiat dinga Mesopotamia gama Pethor khuaa Beor tapa Balaam a lak jiakun.
Himahleh TOUPA na Pathianun Balaam thu a pom nuam keia, TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honit jiakin TOUPA na Pathian un huai hamsia nou adingin vualjawlna a suaksak jaw a.
Na damsung teng un amau toh kilepna leh alamzanna uh chik chiang maha na ngaihtuah pih ding uh ahi kei.
Edom te na kih ding uh ahi keia, na unaute uh lah ahi ngal ua; Aigupta mite na kih ding uh ahi kei, a gam ua na va mikhual tak jiak un.
A suante uh suan thumna akipanin TOUPA mite kikhawm khawmte laka a tel ding uh ahi.
Na melmate uh suala na giahna mun uah thil hoih lou chiteng laka na kihui khiak ding uh ahi.
Na lak ua kuapeuh jan chianga amaha thil pawt jiaka thanghuai na om uleh, giahmun apat a pawt ding dinga, giahmuna a lut nawn ding a hikei:
Himahleh ni a hongkai chiangin a kisil dinga: huan, nitum chiangin giahmunah a lut ding ahi.
Huan, giahmun polamah mun na sep ding ua, huaiah na hoh jel ding uh ahi:
Huan, na vanzat lak uah ninluah na nei ding ua; huan, hichi ahi dinga, na dailen chiangun, huaiin na khuak ding ua, na zun-ek nawn uh na vuk nawn ding uhi:
TOUPA na Pathian un lah na giahmun ua nou humbit ding leh namelmate uh honpe dingin a hongtel jel ngala; huaiziakin na giahmun uh a siangthou ding hi; huchilouinjaw na lak ua thil nin a mu dinga, a honpai san ding.
Na kiang ua sikha a pu hontai khiaksan jaw na pe kiknawn ding uh ahi kei:
Na omna ua a deihpen a tel peuhpeuh ah na lak uah a om tei ding mai ding ahi; na nuaisiah ding uh ahi kei.
Israel tanute lakah kijuak a om ding uh ahi keia, Israel tapate lakah leng pasal kijuak a om ding uh ahi kei.
Kijuak man hiam, tokaw man hiam thuchiamna din TOUPA na Pathian uh inah na tawi dinguh ahi kei; a koikoi leng TOUPA na Pathian uh theihin thil kihhuai ahi.
A pung delhin na unaute na leitawi sak ding ahi kei; dangka lama pung hiam, nek dinglama punghiam, bangpeuh a pung delha leitawi sak himhim:
Gamdang mite a pung delhin na leitawi sak thei ding uh: himahleh na unaute a pung delhin na leitawi sak ding ahi kei: huchiin na valuah ding uh gama na khut ngakna tengteng uah TOUPA na Pathian un a honvualjawl ding hi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh kianga thu na chiam un sawt hal louin piak pah ding ahi; TOUPA na Pathian un lah a honphut sin ngei ngala, nou adingin gilou a hong hi mai ding.
Thuchiam lama na kidek uleh nou adingin gilou ahi kei ding.
Na kam ua pawtsa na hih ngei ding uh ahi; ut thua thillat nakam ua na chiam uh TOUPA na Pathian uh kianga na chiam bangbang jel un.
Na insakinkhang te uh grep huana na hoh un na deih zah uh na ne thei uh, himahleh na seng ua na guan ding uh ahi kei hi.Na insakinkhangte uh buh ding lai muna na hoh un a vui na khiak thei ua; himahleh na insakinkhang uh buh dinglaiah kawite na zang ding uh ahi kei.
Na insakinkhangte uh buh ding lai muna na hoh un a vui na khiak thei ua; himahleh na insakinkhang uh buh dinglaiah kawite na zang ding uh ahi kei.
Min ji a neiha, a tunga thil kilawmlou banghiam a theih jiaka a mit a tun kei leh hichia hi dinga, kimakna lai a gelh sak dinga, a pe dinga, a in a kipan a pawt sak ding hi.
Huan, a in akipan a pawt nungin midang a vanei thei ding hi.
Huan, a pasal nanungpenin a jakdaha, kimakna lai a gelhsaka, a piaka, a ina kipan a pawt sak hiam, a pasal nanungjaw, jia neipa a si hiam a hih leh;
A pasal masa, amah paisakpan hihnitsa ahia, a nei nawn theikei ding; TOUPA theihin kihhuai ahi: TOUPAN luah dinga a honpiak gamah khelhna na lut sak ding uh ahi kei hi.
Mi zi nei tung sepaih dingin kuan ding ahi keia, bang nasem dingin phut ding ahi kei; a in lamah kum khat a ut bangbangin a om dinga, a ji toh nuamsa taka a om ding uh ahi.
Buh gawijanna hiam, a tunglam suang hiam kuamah ne let tang sak ding uh ahi kei, mi henna let tang sak ahi sin ngala.
Kuapeuh, Israel suan, a unaute laka mi gua, sal bawla bawl hiam, juak hiam theih khiak a hih uleh.
Huai gutapa hihlup ding ahi; huchibang na lak ua kipan huai thil hoihlou na hih mang ding uh ahi.
Phak hi tungtang thuah hoih taka et tela, siampu, Levite sin sak dan bang jela hih dingin pilvang un; amaute thu ka piak bangin pilvang takin na hih ding uh ahi.
Aigupta gam akipan na hongpawtna lampi un TOUPA na Pathian un Miriam tunga a hihdan theigige un.
Pangpeuh na insakinkhang uh na leitawi sak un a khamna la dingin a inah na lut ding uh ahi kei.
Inpuaah na ding ding ua, na leitawi sakmi un khamna inpuaah a honlak sak ding na hi uhi.
Mi genthei a hihleh a khamna na luppih ding uh ahi kei;
A puansilha lupa, a honphat theihna dingin a khamna na Pathian uh theihin nou dingin thil diktat ahi ding hi.
Na mi goih uh, mi genthei leh tasamte na unau uh hiam, na gam ua na omna ua om gamdang mi hiam leng hi leh na simmoh ding uh ahi kei;
A sep niin a loh na piak ding uh ahi, niin a tum khum ding ahi kei; mi genthei ahi a, huaiah a lungtang a koih nak hi; huchilouinjaw na tungtang uah TOUPA a sam dinga, nou dingin khelhna a honghi ding hi.
Tate jiakin pate hihlup ding ahi keia, pate jiakin tate leng hihlup ding ahi sam kei; mi chih amau chiat khelhna jiakin hihlup ding ahi.
Gam dang mite leh pa neiloute dik lou taka nag en sak ding uh ahi keia, meithai puan leng khamna dingin na lak sak ding uh ahi kei:
Nou leng huai Aigupta gamah sikha na hita ua, TOUPA na Pathian un huai akipana hontat na hi uh chih theigige ding uh ahi: hcuhiin TOUPA na Pathian un a khutngakna tengteng uah a honualjawl ding hi.
Na lou ua buh na lak un, buhphal na khop maihu leh na lak nawn ding uh ahi kei, gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite ading ahi; huchiin TOUPA na Pathian un na khut koihna tengteng uah a hon vualjawl ding hi.
Na Oliv sing uh na sat chiang un ahiangte na jaw na sat ding uh ahi khol kei, gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite ading ahi.
Na grep huan ua na loh chiangun a sang na zong ding uh ahi kei; gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite ading ahi.Huan, Aigupta gamah sikha na nahita uh chih na theigige ding uhi: huaijiakin ahi, hiai thil hih dinga thu ka honpiak.
Huan, Aigupta gamah sikha na nahita uh chih na theigige ding uhi: huaijiakin ahi, hiai thil hih dinga thu ka honpiak.
Mi a kinak ua, vaihawmna a hoh uleh, vaihawmten a nagensak ding ua, mi diktat siam a tangsak dingua, mi gilou moh a tangsak ding uhi:
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, mi gilou jep tuak mah a hih leh, vaihawmmin a lumsak dinga, a maah a jep sak ding ahi, a gitlouh dungjuiin jep ding zah khiah ahi ding.
Sawmli vei tana jep theih ahi dinga, huai val jaw hilouin: hiai sanga val a jep leh na unaupa uh na zahlaksak lo kha ding uh.
Bawngtalin buh a chil laiin a muk na gak ding uh ahi kei.
Unaute om khawn uhenla, tapa neilouin a lak ua mi si leh, a sipa jiin polama mi, midang a kitenpih ding ahi kei; a pasal unauin a luah dinga, jiin a nei dinga, pasal unau hih ding a tungah a hih ding ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, a tachil suan sakin Israel laka a min a man louhna dingin a unau si min a pu ding ahi.
Huan, aman a unaupa ji kitenpih a ut kei leh, a unaupa ji kulh kongpia upate kiangah a hoh tou dinga, Ka pasal unaupan Israel laka a unau min om sak jel a ut keia, pasal unaupa hih ding ka tungah a hih ding ka tungah a hih nuam kei, a vachi ding ahi.
Huchiin a kho upate un amah a sam ding ua, a houpih ding ua, huan, aman ka nei nuam kei hi, chia pan giugeu leh:
Huchiin a unaupa ji a kiangah upate maah a hongdia, upate maah a vanaih tou dia, a khedap a suah ding sak dinga, a maiah a chil a se dinga.
A unaupa inkuan khotuah nuamloupa tungah hichi banga hih hi ngeingei hen, a chi dinga.
Huchiin, Inkuan khedap suahsakpa, chiin Israelte laka a min put sak ding ahi ding.
Mi kilai uhenla, a khatpenpa jiin a kilaipihpa akipan a pasal honkhe dingin a zahmohin kaihsakta leh;
A khut na tan sak ding uh ahi, na hehpih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Na ip uah khaina suang chi tuamtuam, a gik leh ajang na nei ding uh ahi kei.
Na in uah tehna chi tuamtuam, a lian leh a neu na kem ding uh ahi kei.
Khaina dik tak leh hoih tak na nei ding uh hi.
Tehna dik tak leh hoih tak na nei ding uh hi; huchiin TOUPAN a hon gam piak ah na damsawt ding uhi.
Huchibang thil hihmi, diktatlou taka hihmi tengteng TOUPA na Pathian uh theihin kihhuai ahi uhi.
Aigupta gam akipana na hongpawt na lampi ua Amalekten a honna bawl dan uh theigige un;
Pathian leng kihta loua na na bah lai uh leh na nguai lai ua lampia a honna kithuahpiha, na lak ua a nanungpente, na nung lam ua hatloute, na bahlai leh na gim lai ua a honna sualdante khawng.Huaijiakin hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga gam a honpiak hun chiangin, na kim ua na melmate tengteng uh laka TOUPA na Pathian un galmuanna a honpiak hun chiangin vannuaia Amalekta theihgigena na hihmang geih ding uh ahi: na mangngilh ding uh ahi kei.
Huaijiakin hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian un luah dinga gam a honpiak hun chiangin, na kim ua na melmate tengteng uh laka TOUPA na Pathian un galmuanna a honpiak hun chiangin vannuaia Amalekta theihgigena na hihmang geih ding uh ahi: na mangngilh ding uh ahi kei.
Huan, hcihi ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian un gouluah lehg luah dinga gam a honpiak na valut ua, na vaom hun chiang un;
TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak na gam lei gah tung masapen chiat uh na hontawi ding ua; bawmah na koih ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian un a min omsakna dinga a seh dingah na hoh ding uhi.
Huan, huai huna siampu kiangah na hoh ding ua, a kiangah, Honpiak dinga i pi leh pute kianga achiamna gamah i hongpaita uh chih tuniin TOUPA na Pathian uh kiangah i hih lang uhi, na chi ding ua.
