Huan, siampuin na khut ua kipan bawm a la dinga TOUPA na Pathian uh maitam bulah a tung ding hi.
Huan, nou TOUPA na Pathian uh maah, Ka pu uh Suria mi mi vakvai ahia, Aigupta gamah a pai suka, a vatenga, tawm chik ahi ua; huan, huailaiah nam thupi tak, thilhihthei tak, tamtak a hong hita ua.
Huan, Aigupta miten honsimmoh ua, honhihgenthei ua, nasep haksa pipi honsem sak ua:
Huchiin TOUPA i pi leh pute Pathian i sam ua, TOUPAN i aw uh a najaa, i gentheihdan te, i gim dan te, nuaisiah i hihdan te a mua:
Huan, TOUPAN Aigupta gam akipan khut hat tak te, ban jak te, thil lauhuai tak te, chiamtehnate, thillamdangtein a honpi khiaa:
Hiai munah a honpi luta, hiai gam, nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gam a honpia hi.
Huan, ngaiin, TOUPA aw, nang na honpiak lei gah masapen chiatte ka hontawi uhi, na vachi ding uhi.
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah na vual ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah chibai bukin na kun ding ua:
Huan TOUPA na Pathian un na inkuan te, nou te, Levi mi te, na lak ua gam dang mite thil hoiha honpiak tengteng ah nuamsa takin na om ding uhi.
Huan, kum thum kum, sawma khat piak kuma na thil tung tengteng uh sawma khat na piak khit uleh, Levi mite, gam dang mite, pa neiloute, meithaiten na omna uah a ne ding uh, a hongkhosak theih samna ding un;
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah, Na thu honpiak, na thu honpiak tengteng bangin ka in ua kipanthil siangthoute ka koih khia ua, Levi mite, gamdang mi te, pa neiloute, meitheite ka peta uh; na thupiak a koi mahmah ka bohse kei ua, ka mangngilh kei uhi;
Ka dah lai un huaia ka ne kei ua, ka buah lai un ka thehthang sam kei ua, misi tuam dingin leng ka pe kei un; TOUPA ka Pathian uh aw ka dawp ua, na thu honpiak tengteng bangin ka hih uhi.
Na omna siangthou van akipan honen inla, nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gam, ka pi uh leh pute piak dinga na nakichiam sa bangin na mi Israelte leh na gam honpiak vualjawlin, na chi ding uh.
Tuniin TOUPA na Pathian un hiai dan khawng leh vaihawmte jui dingin thu a honpia hi; huaijiakin, nalungtang tengteng uh leh, na lungsim tengtengun na pom uh na jui ding uhi.
Tuniin TOUPA a lampite juia, a dante, a thupiakte leh a vaihawmte juia a awte dawp tumin na Pathian ding un na telta ua:
Huan, thu a honchiamsa bangin leh, a thupiak tengteng na zuihna ding un TOUPAN tuniin amaha dia mi lamdang hi dingin nou a honna telta;A na gensa banga TOUPA na Pathian uh adinga mi siangthou na hih theihna ding un leh nam a bawl tengteng tunga phat, min hoih, pahtawi na hihna dingun, a chi a.
A na gensa banga TOUPA na Pathian uh adinga mi siangthou na hih theihna ding un leh nam a bawl tengteng tunga phat, min hoih, pahtawi na hihna dingun, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi leh Israel upaten mipite thu a pia ua, Thupiak tengteng tunia ka honpiak pom un.
TOUPA na Pathian un a hon gam piaka hoh dinga Jordan na kan ni chiang un hichi ahi dinga, suang lian taktak na phut dingua, suanglou na nuh ding uh ahi:
Huan, na galkah khit chiang un a tungah hiai dan thu tengteng na gelh ding uh ahi; huchiin TOUPA, na pi leh pute uh Pathianin a honna chiamsa bangin nawitui leh khuaiju luanna gam, TOUPA na Pathian un a honpiak gamah na pai thei ding uh.
Huan, Jordan lui na galkah khit chiang un hichi ahi dinga, tunia ka hon thupiak bangin Ebal tangah suangte na phut ding ua, suanglou na nuh dinguh ahi.
Huan, huaiah TOUPA na Pathian uh adingin maitam, suang maitam na bawl ding uh ahi, vanzat dingin sik na zang ding uh ahi kei.
TOUPA na Pathian uh maitam suang sek louhin na bawl ding uh ahi; huaiah TOUPA na Pathian uh adingin halmang thillatte na lan ding ua:
Lepna thillatte bangin na kithoih ding ua, huailaiah na ne ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah nuamsa takin na om ding uh ahi.
Huan, suangte khawngah hiai dan thu tengteng teltakin na gelh ding uh ahi, chiin.
Huan, Mosi leh siampu Leviten Israel mi tengteng a houpih ua, Israel mite aw, hoih takin ngaikhia un; tuniin TOUPA na Pathian uh mite na honghita ding uhi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA na Pathian uh thu na man ding uh ahi, tunia ka hon thupiak, a thupiakte leh a dante na zuih ding uh ahi, chiin.
Huan, huai ni mahin Mosiin mipite thu a piaa,
Jordan lui gal na kah khit chiangun mipite vualjawl ding dingin Gerizim tanga hiaite a din ding uh ahi: Simeon nam te, Levi nam te, Juda nam te, Isakar nam te, Joseph nam te, Benjamin nam te;
Huan, hamsia dingin hiaite Ebal tanga a din ding uh ahi: Reuben nam te, Gad nam te, Aser nam te, Zebulun nam te, Dan nam te, Naphtali nam te.
Huan, Leviten a hon gen pan ua, Israel mi tengteng kiangah aw ngaihtakin.
Khutsiamte khutsuak TOUPA dinga kihhuai milim tunkhiak tawm hiam, guk kep peuhmah hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua.
Huan, mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding ua, a nadawng ding uh ahi.
A nu hiam, a pa hiam zahtaklou peuhmah hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua, Huan, mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
A insakinkhang gamgi suanmi hamse thuakin omhen, a chi ding ua.
Huan mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
Lampi akipana mittaw lampi loua paisakmi hamse thuakin omhen, a chi ding ua.
Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
Gam dang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite vai dik lou taka hawm sakmi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua.
Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
A pa ji luppihmi hamse thuakin om hen, a pa nik lem a hih jiakin, a chi ding ua.
Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a nachi ding uhi.
Bang gan peuhpeuh kithuahpihmi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua.
Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
A sanggamnu, a pa tanu hiam, a nu tanu hiam, luppihmi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua.
Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
A sungnu luppih mi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua, mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
A insakinkhang gukthahmi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua.
Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
Poikhoihlou thahna dia golhna lami hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua, Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a nachi ding uhi.Hiai dan thu pomkip pihloumi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua, Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
Hiai dan thu pomkip pihloumi hamse thuakin om hen, a chi ding ua, Mipi tengtengin, Amen, a na chi ding uhi.
Huan, hichi a honghi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian aw uh hoih taka na ngaihkhiak ua, tunia thu ka honpiak thupiak tengteng pilvang taka na zuih uleh, TOUPA na Pathian un khovel nam tengtenga tungnungpenin a honbawl dinga:
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian uhthu na pom peuhmah uleh hiai vualljawlna tengteng na tunguah a hongom dinga, a honjui jui ding hi.
In lam leh gam gam lamah vualjawlin na om ding uh.
Na gil ua gahte, na lei gah te uh, na ganhon pung, na bawngpi leh na belam hon pungte uh vualjawlin a om ding.
Na bawm uh leh na tanghou mekna kuangte uh vualjawlin a om ding.
Vak khete vualjawlinna om ding ua, in na hongte leng vualjawlin na om ding uh.
Na melma nou honsualte TOUPAN a honzoh sak dinga; nou honsual dingin lampi khatah a honglut ding ua, lampi sagihah a taikek ding uh.
TOUPAN na buh in tunguah, na khut koihna tengteng uah vualjawlna thu a pe dinga; TOUPA na Pathian un a hon gam piak ah vual a honjawl ding hi.
Na kiang ua a na kichiam bangin TOUPAN amah adingin nam siangthou din a honhihkip ding, TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiakte na zuih ua, a lampite na zuihphot uleh,
Huchiin khovel nam chihin TOUPA na hih uh a thei ding ua, a honlau ding uh.
Huan, nou piak dinga na pi leh pute uh TOUPAN a nachiam gamah na gil ua gahte, na gan hon pung uah, na lei gah uah TOUPAN nakpi takin a hoh hih pung ding.
TOUPAN a hun hih geihgeihin na gam uh vak ding vuahtui honpe ding leh na khut koihna tengteng ua honvualjawl dingin, van, a gou bawm hoihte a kihong sak ding hi; Huchiin nam tampi na leitawi sak ding ua, nou bel na lei tawi kei ding uh.
Huan, TOUPAN mei dingin hilouin lu dingin a honbawl dinga, a nuainung hilouin a tungnung jel na hi ding uh; TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiak juia, tua ka honpiak pilvang taka poma, tunia thu ka honpiak;
A thute a bangmahmah taklam hiam, veilam hiama pathian dangte jui leh nasem dinga na pial san kei peuhmah uleh.
Himahleh hichi a honghi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian uh aw hoih taka na ngaihkhiak louh ua, tunia thu ka honpiak thupiak tengteng pilvang taka na zuih kei uleh hiai hamsia tengteng na tunguah a hongom dinga, a honpha nawn ding hi.
In lam leh gam lamah hamsia na thuak ding uh.
Na bawm uh leh na tanghou meknakuangte uh hamse thuakin a om ding uh.
Na gil ua gahte, na lei gah te uh, na bawngpi uh leh na belam hon pungte uh hamse thuakin a om ding uh.
Na pawt khete uh hamse thuakin a om ding ua, a hongpaite leng hamse thuakin a om ding uhi.
TOUPAN na tunguah, na khut koihna tengteng uah hamsia te, buaina te, salhna te a honsawl dinga, na vuallel ding ua, na mangthang pah ding uh; na thilhih giloute uh jiaka kei non limsak louh jiakun,
Luah dinga na lutna gam ua kipan a honhihman that masiah TOUPAN hi a honvom sak ngitnget ding.
TOUPAN kumjawnna bang, khosik bang, bawkna bang, sat huthutna bang, namsau bang, keuna bang, muatna bangin a hon gawt dinga, na manthat masiah uh a hondelh delh ding hi.
Na tunglam ua na van uh dal ahi dinga, na nuai lam ua lei sik ahi ding.
Na gam vuah uh leivui leh leivui khu dingin TOUPAN a suak sak ding: na manthat masiah uh van akipanin na tunguah a hongkhe ding.
TOUPAN na melmate uh lakah a honhihniam dinga; amaute sual dingin lampi khat ah na kuan khe ding ua, lampi sagih ah na taikek ding uh; khovel nam chih lakah mun chih mual chih ah na vakvak ding uh.
Na luang uh tunga leng vasa tengteng leh gamsa tengteng an ahi dinga, a delh mangmi a om het kei ding uh.
Hihdam theih louh Aigupta meimatum, chithak, bawkna, vunthakin TOUPAN a hon gawt ding.
Haina, mittawtna, lunglelhna in TOUPAN a hon gawt ding:
Mittawin khomial a maimai bangin sun vak nasan ah leng na maimai ding ua, na khosakna lam uah na lamzang kei ding uh; huan, nuaisiah ding leh gallak ding phet na hi ding ua, honhonkhe ding kuamah a om kei ding uhi.
Ji na kham ding ua, mi dangin a luppih ding uh; na in uh na lam ding ua, mi luah kei ding uh; grep huan na bawl ding ua, a gah na ne kei ding uh.
Na mitmuhun na bawngtalte uh a honlak sak mawkmawk ding ua, a honpe nawn kei ding uh, na belamte uh na melmate uh piak ahi ding; gum ding kuamah na neikei ding uh.
Na tanute uh, na tapate uh nam dangte piak ahi ding ua, ni tumin amau ngaiin na en vungvung ding ua, na etetna lam un na mitte uh a vai ding; bangmah lah hih theih na neikei ding ua.
Na lei gahte uh na theih louh nam un a nekhin ding ua, simmon ding leh engbawl ding leltak na hi ding uh:
Huchiin huai thil na mu un na hai loh ding uhi.
TOUPAN na khuk uah, na khe uah, hihdam theih louh meimatum nate a honvei sak ding, na khepek ua kipan na sip pha un.
Nou leh na kumpipa uh nangawnin na pi leh pute tan ua na theih ngei louh nam kiangah TOUPAN a honpi dinga; huaiah pathian nang, sing leh suang nate na sem ding uh.
Huchiin, TOUPAN a honpi mangna ding nam tengteng lakah lamdang chih leh paunak leh a selama gentehna na honghi ding uhi.
Louah buh chi tampi na kuankhiak pih ding ua, tawm chik kia na la ding uh, khaupein a nekhin vek sin hi.
Grep huan na bawl ding ua, na kem ding ua, himahleh a uain na dawn kei ding uh, grep lah na lou sam kei ding uh, tangtelin a nekhin sin hi.
Na gam tengteng uah oliv sing na suan ding ua, himahleh a thau na nilh kei ding uh, na oliv gahte uh a pulh khin ding.
Tanu tapa na suang ding ua, himahleh noua ahi kei ding ua salin a pi sin uhi.
Na thei kung tengteng uh na lei gah uh khaupe tan ahi ding uh.
Gamdang mi na lakua omten a hon sansan hiaihiai ding ua, nou na niam giaigiai ding uh.
A honleitawi sak ding ua, nou jaw na leitawi sak kei ding uh.
Amau lu ahi ding ua, nou mei na hi ding uh.
Hiai hamsia tengteng na tunguah a hongom dinga, a hondelh dinga, a honpha ding, hihmanthata na om matan; a thupiak leh a dan honpiak jui dinga TOUPA na Pathian uh aw na ngaihsak louh jiakun:
Na tunguah leh na suante uh tungah khantawna dia chiamtehna leh lamdang chih dingin a om ding.
Thil bangkima na hongkiningchin ua leng TOUPA na Pathian uh lungsim kipak tak leh nuamsa taka na na sep louh jiak un:
Nou honsual dinga TOUPAN a honsawl ding na melmate uh na gilkial kawm leh, dangtak kawm leh vuaktang kawmin, thil bangkim tasam kawmin na sem ding uh; a honhihman masiah uh na ngawng uah sik hakkol a bang ding uh.
Gamla pia kipanin kawlmong apat nou honsual ding nam, TOUPAN muvanlai ngumkiakbangin a honsawl ding; a pau uh na theih louh un nam:
Nam, kihtakhuai melpu upa leng khawksa lou leh tuailaite leng deihsak tuan lou:
Huan, na gan hon pungte uh, na lei gahte uh, na manthat masiah uh a ne ding ua, buhte, uainte, thaute, na bawng pung te uh, na belam hon noute uh a honhawi sak kei ding uh, na manna uh a hontun sak pha un.
Na gam tengteng ua na muanpen uh, na kulh sang te uh a chip tanin na kulh kongpi tengteng uah a honum ding ua, TOUPA na Pathian un nou a honpiak na gam tengteng ua na kulh kongpi tengteng uh a honum ding uhi.
Na melmate un a honum chihna jiak un a honumna uh leh a honkhelh chipna uah na gil ua gah, TOUPAN a honpiak na tanute uh leh na tapate uh sa na ne ding uh.
Na lak ua mi omdan tang, mi phaten leng a unaupa te uh, a zi deih mahmahte uh, a ompih lai uh a tate uh ngialtak leng a enthei kei ding uh:
Bangmah a neih nawn louh jiak ua a tate uh sa a nek ding uh akuakua leng a pe kei ding uh; a honumna uh leh a khelh chip na uah, na melmate un na kulh kongpi ua a honkhelh chip jiak un.
Na lak ua numei chinou leh chingekte a chinouna uh leh a chingekna jiak ua lei leng sik nuam louten a pasal deih mahmahte uh, a tapte uh, a tanute uh;
A pom lai uh a ta sen leh a ta piang lai dingte uh leng a enmoh ding uh; bangkim a taksap khit jiak un a sim nek ding ua; a honumna uh leh a khelh chipna jiak un, na melmate unna kulh kongpi ua a honkhelh chipna jiak un.
TOUPA na Pathian uh min thupi tak leh lauhuai tak na lau theihna ding ua hiai laibua tuang thu tengteng pilvang taka na zuih kei uleh;
TOUPAN noute leh a suante tungah hi lamdang pi, hipi leng gige, damlouhna haksa pi leng gige chi a leng sak ding.
Na kihtak theih mahmah uh Aigupta gam hite na tunguah a lengsak nawn dinga, a honlen kip ding hi.
Hiai dan laibua tuang lou, damlouhna hi chiteng leng na manthat masiah uh TOUPAN na tunguah a leng sak ding.
Vana aksi zah hi sekte tawm chik kia na honghita ding uhi; TOUPA na Pathian uh aw naman louh jiak un.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, hohhihhoih ding leh honpungsak dinga TOUPA a kipak bangin, a honhihmang ding leh a honhihse dingin TOUPA a kipak dinga, na valuah ding uh na lutna gam ua kipan suanmang na hi ding uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN kawlmong akipan kawlmong langkhat tanin chichih lakah a honhihdalh dinga, huaiah sing leh suang, na pi uh leh pute uh tana na theih ngeilouh uh pathian dangte na na sem ding uh.
Huai nam lakah tawldamna himhim na mu kei ding ua, na khe ding un khawlna himhim a om kei dinga; huaiah, TOUPAN linna lungsimte, mit gimnate, nguina lungsim te nou a honpe zo ding hi:
Na hinna uh lauhthawng gigein a om dinga, sun leh jan kihta gigein na om ding ua, na hinna un kitheihchetna a neikei ding:
Jingsangin, Nitak hita leh aw! na chi ding ua, nitakin, Jingsang hite leh aw! na chi ding uh; thil kihtakhuai na lungtang un a kihtak ding jiak leh na mit ua na thil muh ding uh jiakin.Na mu nawnta kei ding uh, na kiang ua ka chih lampiah longin Aigupta gamah TOUPAN a honpi nawn ding: huan, huaiah na melmate uh sikhapa ding, sikhanu dinga juak nahi ding ua, kuamahin a hon deih sin kei uhi, chiin.
Na mu nawnta kei ding uh, na kiang ua ka chih lampiah longin Aigupta gamah TOUPAN a honpi nawn ding: huan, huaiah na melmate uh sikhapa ding, sikhanu dinga juak nahi ding ua, kuamahin a hon deih sin kei uhi, chiin.
Horeb tanga a kiang ua thu a khun sim loua TOUPAN Moab gama Israel suante kianga Mosi thu a khun sak, a thukhun thute hiaite ahi.
Huchiin Mosiin Israel mi tengteng a sama, a kiang uah, Aigupta gama Pharo tung, a mite tengteng tung, a gam tengteng tunga na mit muh ngei ua TOUPAN thil a hih tengteng na mu ua:
Zeetna thupi mahmahte, chiamtehnate, thillamdangte na mit mahmah ua na muh uh:
Himahleh TOUPAN tuni tanin theihsiamna lungtang te, muh theihna mit te, jak theihna bil te a honpiak nai louh na hi uhi.
Gamdai ah kum sawmli ka honpi a; na puansilhte uh na silh tul kei ua, na kehdap te uh leng na bun tul kei lai uh.
Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi chih na theih theihna ding un tanghou na ne kei ua, uain leng, zu khauh leng na dawn kei uh.
Huan, hiai mun na hongtun un Hesbon kumpipa Sihon leh Basan kumpipa Og hondou dingin a hongkuana, amau i na zou a;
Huan, a gam uh i la ua, Reuben te, Gad te, Manase nam kimkhat te luah dingin i pia hi.
Huchiin na thil hih tengteng ua na lamzan jel theihna ding un hiai thukhun thute pom unla, jui un.
Tuniin na vek un, na lupente uh, na namte uh, na upate uh, na heutute uh, Israel mite tengteng, TOUPA na Pathian uh maah na ding ua,
Na ta neu chikchik te uh, na jite uh, na omna ua gam dang mi na ompih uh, na singphukmi uh leh na tuitawi mite uh nangawnin:
TOUPA na Pathian uh kichiamna leh a thukhun tunia nou toh a bawla na lut theihna ding un:
Na pipu te uh Abraham te, Isaak te, Jakob te kianga a na kichiam bang leh na kiang ua a nagensa banga a mite adinga tunia a honhihkip theihna ding leh na Pathian uh a hih theihna ding in.
Hiai kichiamna leh thukhun thu na kiang kia ua khung kahi keia;
Tunia TOUPA i Pathian uh maa dingte leh tua i kiang ua om loute kiangah leng ahi.
(Aigupta gama i om dan bang, nam dangte pal paisuaka i pai dan bang uh na thei ua;
A lak ua a thil kihhuaite uh leh a milim uh, sing leh suangte, dangka chi leh dangkaeng te leng na mu ua: )
Huchilouinjaw na lak ua pasal hiam, numei hiam, inkuan hiam, nam hiam, huai pathiante be dingin a lungtang un tuin TOUPA i Pathian uh kiheisanin, na lakuah thil kha leh gamsai sel khiakna bul te na hongom kha ding uh;
Huan, huchi a hih lejaw hiai kichiam thu a jakin, Thil keua thil nom hihlup tum chih bangin, lungtang paupengin om mah lehang, lungmuanna i nei himhim, chiin a lungtangin a kivualjawl tawm behlap ding:
TOUPAN lah a ngaidam sin hetkeia, TOUPA hehna leh a mullitnain huai mi a khut dinga, hiai laibua hamse tuang tengteng a tungah a om dinga, TOUPAN van nuaia kipan a min a thai mang zo ding.
Hiai dan bua tuang hamse thukhun tengteng bangin Israel nam tengteng laka kipan hihtuamin thil hoih lou lamah TOUPAN a pangsak ding.
Huan, khangthak hongom ding, na nung ua na tate uh hongom ding leh, gam gamla pia kipana hongpai dingten, huai gama hi leh TOUPAN natna a veisakte;
A gam pumpi kat leh chi kanghawm, bangmah chin louhna, bangmah dawnkhia, louhna, loupate leng dawnkhiak louhna Sodom leh Gomora leh Adam leh Zeboiim hihsiat, TOUPAN thangpai leh heha a hihsiat banga hih siat ahi chih a muh hun chiang un, nam chihin.
Bangjiakin ahia hiai gam hichi banga TOUPAN a bawl?
Hiai thangpaihna am thupi bang chi dan ahia? a chi ding uh.
Huchiin, min Aigupta gam akipan a pi khiaklaia TOUPA, a pipute uh Pathian thukhun amau toh a khun a mang ngilh jiak un, a chi ding uh;
Pathian dangte, a theih ngei louh uh pathiante, aman a sehsak ahi loute na sep ua, a biak jiakun ahi:
Huaijiakin hiai laibuaa tuang hamsia tengteng tung sak dingin hiai gam tungah TOUPA a heh ahi;
Huan, thangpai leh heh leh thangpai mahmahin a gam ua kipan a kai khe veka, gam dangah a sawn luta, tua a omdan bang uh, a chi ding uh.Thil kiselte TOUPA i Pathiana ahi, thil hihlatte bel hiai dan thu tengteng i zop theihna dinga eite leh i suantea ahi ngit nget ding hi.
Thil kiselte TOUPA i Pathiana ahi, thil hihlatte bel hiai dan thu tengteng i zop theihna dinga eite leh i suantea ahi ngit nget ding hi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, hiai thil tengteng na ma ua ka omsak, vualjawlna leh hamsiate na tunguah a hong tuna, TOUPAN a hondelh jakna nam tengteng laka na theihkhiak nawn ua,
TOUPA na Pathian lam uh na ngat nawn ua, tua thu ka honpiak banga nou leh na tate utoh na lungtang tengteng uh leh na lungsim tengteng ua a aw na zuih hun chiang un;
TOUPA na Pathian un na salhihna uh a hihmang dinga, a honhehpih dinga, TOUPA na Pathian unnam chih laka a hondalh sakna akipan a honpi khawm nawn ding hi.
Na lak ua mi vantawp phaa delhkhiak a om uleh, TOUPA na Pathian un huai akipanin honpi khawm ding, huaia kipanin a honpi khe ding hi:
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian un na pi leh pute un a luah gam uah a honpi lut nawn dinga, na luah ding uh; aman honlamzang sak dinga, na pi leh pute uh khupin a honpung sak ding hi.
Huan, na hin theihna ding un TOUPA na Pathian un na lungtang tengteng uh leh na lungsim tengteng ua na it theihna ding un TOUPA na Pathian un na lungtang uh leh na suante uh lungtang a hontan sak ding hi.
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian un hiai hamsia tengteng a honsimmohte, na melmate uh leh a honhote tungah a omsak ding hi.
Huan, na hongkihei nawn ding ua, TOUPA aw na jui ding ua, tunia thu ka honpiak, a thupiak tengteng na jui ding uhi.
Huan, TOUPA na Pathian unna khut ngakna tengteng uah, na gil ua gahte ah, na pi leh pute uh tunga a kipah bangin na tunguah TOUPA a kipak nawn ding:
Hiai dan bua tuang a thupiakte, a dan te jui dinga TOUPA aw na zuih ua, na lungtang tengteng uh leh na lungsim tengteng ua TOUPA na Pathian uh lam na ngat photphot uleh.
Hiai thupiak, tua ka honpiak nou adingin a haksa lo keia, gamlat leng a hon gamlat kei hi.
I jak ua i zuih theihna dingin kua ahia vana honkah sak dinga, honlak sak ding? chih dingin vana om ahi keia,
I jak ua i zuih theihna dingin tuipi galah kuan ahia honvahoh sak dinga, honlak sak ding? chih dingin tuipi gala om leng ahi sam kei.
Na zuih theihna ding un thuin a honnaih mahmaha, na kam uah leh na lungtang uah a om hi.
Tuin na ma uah hinna leh hoihna, sihna leh thil hoihlou ka koiha;
TOUPA na Pathian uh it ding, a lampi zuih ding, a thupiak, a dan, a vaihawm, pom dinga tua ka hon thupiak na zop uleh hingin na om ding ua, na hongpung ding ua, na valuah ding gam uah TOUPA na Pathian un vual a honjawl ding hi.
Himahleh na lungtang uh kho dang a ngata, na ngaihkhiak kei ua, pimanga na om ua, pathian dangte na biak ua, a na uh na sep uleh;
Na mangthang ngeingei ding uh chih tuin ka honhilh ahi; Jordan lui kana, luah dinga na valutna gam uah na dam sawt kei ding uh.
Na ma uah hinna leh sihna, vualjawlna leh hamsia ka koih chih tuin na lungtang thu ua theihpih dingin lei leh van ka sam ahi: huchiin hinna pen tel un, na hin theihna ding un nouleh na suan te uh tawh;TOUPA na Pathian uh ita, a aw manga, amah len chintenin amah na hinna uh, na dam sawtna uh lah ahi ngala; huchiin na pu uh Abraham, Isaak, Jakob te kichiamna piak achiam gamah na om ding uhi, a chi a.
TOUPA na Pathian uh ita, a aw manga, amah len chintenin amah na hinna uh, na dam sawtna uh lah ahi ngala; huchiin na pu uh Abraham, Isaak, Jakob te kichiamna piak achiam gamah na om ding uhi, a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin, Israel mi tengteng kiangah hiai thu a gena.
A kiang uah, Tuin kum ja leh sawmnih ka nahitaa; ka vialvak thei nawnta keia; huan TOUPAN, Hiai Jordan lui na kan kei ding, a honchi a.
TOUPA na Pathian un na ma uh a pi dinga, hiai namte a honhihmangsak dinga, a gam uh na luah ding uh; huan, TOUPAN a nagensa bangin Joshuain na ma uh a pi ding hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Amorte kumpipa, Sihon leh Og leh a gam tung ua ahih bangin a tunguah a hih ding; amaute a hihmang ding hi.
TOUPAN amau a honpe dinga, thu ka honpiak thupiak tengteng a tunguah na hih ding uhi.
Kuhkal tak leh hang takin om unla, lau kei unla amau kihta kei un: na kiang ua piapa TOUPA na Pathian uh lah ahi ngala; a honvuallel sak kei dinga, pai leng a honpai san kei hial ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, Mosiin Joshua a sama, Israel mite tengteng mitmuhin a kiangah, Hat tak leh hang takin omin, hiai mite kiangah a pi uh leh pute uh TOUPAN kichiama piak a nachiamsa gamah na hoh ding ahi, amaute na luah sak ding ahi.
Huan, na ma pipa TOUPA ahi dinga, na kiangah a om jeljel dinga, a honvuallel sak kei dinga, pai leng a honpai san kei hial ding hi; lau kenla, lunglel sam ken, a chi hi.
Huan, Mosiin dan a gelha, TOUPA thukhun bawm jawng Levi tapa siampute leh Israel upate tengteng a pia.
Huchiin, Mosiin, amaute thu a piaa, Kum sagih kum, ngaihdam kum tenga bawkta ankuangluinaa,
Mun a seh dinga Israel mi tengteng TOUPA na Pathian uh maa a hongkilat hun chiang un hiai dan Israel tengteng jakin na sim ding ahi.
Mipite numei pasal, na taneu chikchikte uh, na ompih uh gam dang mite, amau a ngaihkhiak ua, a kisin ua, TOUPA na Pathian uh laudan a siam ua, hiai dan thu tengteng pilvang taka a zuih theihna ding uh leh;
A tate uh a thei nai louten leng a jak ua, Jordan lui kana na valuah ding uh gama na om sung tengteng ua TOUPA na Pathian uh laudansiam a kisin theihna ding un sam khawm un, chiin.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Ngaiin, na sih hun a hongnai ta; Joshua sam inla, kihoupihna puaninah vakihilin, amau thu ka pe sin hi, a chi a.
Huan, Mosi leh Joshua a hoh ua, kihoupihna puaninah a vakihil ua.
Huan, TOUPA puanin ah meipi dingin a kilaka; huan, meipi ding Puanin kongpi lu tungah a ding hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Mosi kiangah, Ngaiin, na pi leh pute kiangah na ihmu sinta hi, hiai mite a thou ding ua a vaomna dingte uh lakah huai gam pathiante lakah ang a kawm ding ua, honlehngatsan ding ua, ka thukhun a kiang ua ka khun a bohse ding uh.
Huchiin, hiai hun chiangin a tunguah ka heh dinga, ka lehngatsan dinga, ka buk mangsan dinga, amang ding ua, thil hoihlou leh mangbatna tampi a tunguah a tung ding; huchiin huai ni chiangin, I Pathian uh i lak ua a om louh jiakin hiai thil hoih lou i tunguah a hongtung ahi kei maw? a chi ding uh.
Pathian dangte lam ngaa thil hoih lou a hohhih ding tengteng uh jiakin huai niin ka bu ngeingei ding hi.
Huaijiakin hichibang la nang dinga phuah, Israel suante kisin sakin; Israel suante tungtang thuah hiai la kei dinga hontheihpihtu a hih theihna dingin vom sakin.
A pi leh pute uh kianga kichiama ka chiam, nawitui leh khuaiju luang gamah ka pia, ne leh taa a om ua, a tai ua, a hongthau hial uleh pathian dangte lam a nga ding ua, a nate a sem ding ua, kei a hon simmoh ding ua, ka thukhunte a bohseding uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, thil hoihlou leh mangbatna tampi a tung ua a hongtun hun chiangin hiai la a theikhesaktu ahi ding; a suante uh kama kipanin mangngilh theih lah ahi sin keia; tuin ka kichiam gama li pima himin leng a lunggel kawikawi dan uh ka theikhin pah hi, a chi a.
Huchiin Mosiin, huai la, huai ni mahmahin a phuaka, Israel suante a kisin sak hi.
Huan, Nun tapa Joshua a hasuana, Kuhkal tak leh hang takin omin; Israel suante a kiang ua kichiama ka chiam gamah na pi lut sin ahi; huan, na kiangah ka om jel ding, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Mosiin hiai dan thute laibua a gelh khita mansaa a om vek nungin,
TOUPA thukhun bawm jawng Levite Mosiin thu a piaa,
Hiai dan bu la unla, na tungtang thu ua theihpihtu dingin TOUPA na Pathian uh thukhun bawm sikah koih un.
Na helhat dan uh leh na paupendan uh ka thei hi; ngai un, tua ka hondam pih lai abawn TOUPA tunga hel naknak na hi ua; ka sih nung ngialin houh bangchiphetin a thupi de aw?
A bil ua jaka hiai thu ka gena, a tungtang thu ua theihpihtu dia lei leh van ka sap theihna dingin na nam ia intekpen tengteng, na heutute uh honsap khawm sak un.
Ka sih nung chiangin nakpi takin na kihihse ding ua, ka honthupiak lampi akipan na pial ding uh chih ka thei kilkel ahi; huan, a tawp chiang ngialin houh thil hoih louin a honbuak khum dinga; na khut thil hih ua hihheh dingin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou na hih sin jiak un, chiin.Huchiin, Mosiin, Israel kikhawm khawm tengteng bila jakin hiai la thu a tawp phain a gen veka.
Huchiin, Mosiin, Israel kikhawm khawm tengteng bila jakin hiai la thu a tawp phain a gen veka.
Bil na doh un vante aw, ka gen sin hi; ka paukam suak leiin ngai leh:
Vuahtui bangin ka thu a zu ding, daitui bangin ka thu gen a tak ding; loupa nou dipdip tunga vuah bang leh lounah tunga vuahphin bangin:
TOUPA min ka suah dinga: Thupina i Pathian pia un.
Amah suangpi ahi, a thilhih a dik kim sipsip; A om dan tengteng dan ahi; Pathian muanhuai, thulimlouhna neilou, diktat leh hoih ahi.
Hoihlou takin a tungah a hih ua, a tate ahi kei uh, gensiat a lohna uh ahi, suan ginalou leh genhak ahi uhi.
Mi hai leh pil loute aw, huchiin maw, TOUPA na thuk sin uh?
Nou honsuang, na pa uh ahi kei maw? a honbawla, a honding kip sak hi.
Nidanglai nite theigige inla, suan tampi kumte ngaihtuah dih: na pa dong inla, a honkawkmuh ding, na upaten leng, a hon hilh ding uh.
Tungnungpenin namte gam a piak laia, mihing tate a khen laiin namte gamgi a khunga, Israel suante zahin.
TOUPA tantuan jaw a mite ahi ua; Jakobte lah a goutan ahi uhi.
Gamdai gamah a mu ua, gamdai sia mau honhonah, a kim ua om khumin a kema, a mit- laivom bangin a kem:
Muvanlaiin a bua a nou a tok thoua, a nou tungah kha a japa, a khate a jaka, a tuaha, a khaa a puak jel bangin:
TOUPA kiain a pi jela, gam dang pathian hi louin.
Lei mun sangte ah a tuangsaka, loua thil tung a ne jela; suangpi akipanin khuaiju a kikhohkhesak jela, suang tak akipan thau toh;
Bawng nawitui khal, belam nawitui, belamnou thau te toh, Basan uain na dawn ding.
A hinnaa Jesurunte a hongthau ua, a hong kipek ua: na na thaua, na nasaphaa, na namaitaa; a bawlpa Pathian a lehngatsanta, hotdamna Suangpi a ngaineu.
Gamdang pathiante khawngin mullitna a tok thoua, thil kihhuaiin a hehsak.
Pathian hi lou, dawite kiangah theih ngei louh uh pathiante kiangah, hongkhonung om phing pathian thakte, na pi, na pute un a kihtak ngei louh uh kiangah.
Nang honsuang Suangpi na ngaisang kei, nang honbawlpa Pathian na mangngilh lai.
Huai TOUPAN a mua.
A mudaha, tanu leh tapate hih heh jiakin.
Ka buk mang san dinga, bang a chi om him ding ua, a chi: suan thulimlou ahi ua, muan chinglou tate.
Pathian hi lou thilin ka mullitna a tok thou ua; a thil ginalou un a hon heh sak uh; chia gen loutein ka mullit sak dinga, nam haitein ka hihheh ding hi.
Ka heh a kuanga, Sheol to khon a kang, lei, a thil tung toh a kang khin, tang kingaknate a kang.
A tunguah siatna ka chiang khawm dinga, a tunguah thal ka khah ding:
Gilkialin a gongthak ding ua, meipi leh siatna leh nakpiin a kang mang ding, a tunguah gamsa hate ka sawl dinga, leivuia kitholh pawlte gu toh.
Polamah namsauin a si ding ua, sung lamah launain, nungak tangval, nawi nelai, lua kelsam poute tan phain.
Ken, ka delh jak vek dinga, mihing laka amau theihgigena ka hihmang vek ding:
Melma thangpaihna lauthawng kei leng, a melmate un thei khialin, I khut uh tawisangin a omta, huaite tengteng TOUPA hih ahi kei, chi kha le uh, ka chi.
Pilna neilou namte ahi ua, amau ah theihsiamna a om kei.
Aw, pil le uh hiaite a theisiam ding ua, a tu nunglam thu uh ngaihtuah ding hive un!
Bangchiin khatin sang a delh dia, nihin sing a taikek sak ding uh, a Suangpi un amaute a khawngkhintaa, TOUPAN amau a piak khiak a hih kei ngal uleh?
A suangpi uh lah i Suangpi bang ahi kei, i melmate mahmah theih danin leng.
A grep phual uh Sodom grep phual, Gomora gama om ahi: a grepte grep sinkha ahi, a gahbomte a kha:
A uainte uh drakon gu leh gulgial gu kha tak ahi.
Huai ka kholkhawm ka goubawma bilh bikbek ahi kei maw?
Phulak leh thuk jaw kei hih ding ahi, a siksan uh a teu hun chiangin; a siatna ni uh a hongnaita, a tung ua thil hongtung dingte a hongtung ding zok ding.
TOUPAN a mite vai a hawm sina, a sikhate leng a hih sak ding, a thilhihtheihna uh beia, gakchih leh chihlouh kuamah mah om loua a muh hun chiangin.
Aman a pathian uh akoi ah, a muan suangpi ah loi ah;
A kithoihna thau uh netu, a dawn ding thillat uh uain dawnmite?
Hongthouin nou hong huh uhenla, nou honhuntu hi heh.
Kei, kei mahmah ka hih thei unla, pathian dang a om kei uh; ka hihlum jela, ka hihdam sam jel; ka khuta kipan honsut thei kuamah mah a om kei uh.
Van lamah ka khut ka jaka, ka hinna louin ka gena,
Ka namsaute ka tathiama, ka khutin vaihawmna a kep leh ka melmate tungah phu ka la dinga, kei honhote ka thuk ding hi.
Ka thalte sisan ka kham sak ding, ka namsauin sa a valh ding; thahte leh salte sisan toh melma heute lu akipanin, ka chi, a chi ding.
Aw, nou nam chihte aw, a mite toh kipak un; a sikhate sisan phu a la sin ahi; amah doute tungah phu a la sin, a gam leh a mite adingin kilepna buching a bawl ding.
Huchiin mipite jakin huai la thu tengteng Mosiin a vagena, amah toh, Nun tapa Hosia toh.
Huan, Mosiin huai thu tengteng Israel mi tengteng kianga a gen khitin, a kiang uah:
Tua na kiang ua ka honthu theihsak ah na lungtang uh koih kip unla, hiai dan thu tengteng pilvang mahmaha jui dingin na tate uh thu pia un.
Nou adingin thil bangmahlou lel ahi keia, na hinna uh lah ahi ngala; huan, hiai thil hihin luah dinga Jordan na vagalkahna gam uah na dam sawt ding uhi, a chi a.
Huan, huai ni mahin TOUPAN Mosi a houpiha,
Moab gama Jeriko jawna Abarim tangdunga Nebo tangah vahoh tou inla, Israel suante luah dinga ka piak Kanan gam va galetin:
Huchiin na unaupa Aron Hor tanga sia, a chite kianga pi a hite bang mahin na kah touhna tangah na si dinga, na chite kianga pi na hita ding hi.
Zin gamdaia Kadesa Meriba tuia Israel suante laka ka tunga na khelh jiakin leh Israel suante laka na honpahtawi louh jiakin.Tua gam na va galmuh dinga; himahleh Israel suante ka piak gamah na lut kei ding, chiin.

Hiai vualjawlnain ahi, Pathian mi Mosiin a sih maa Israel suante vual a jawl.
Sinai akipanin TOUPA a honga, Seir akipanin a kiang uah a thou khiaa, mi siangthou sang sawm laka kipanin a hongpai; a khut taklamah amau adingin dan kuang thei a om.
A hi, chi chihte a ita, mi siangthou tengteng nakhutah a om uh; a khebulah a tu ua; na thu a pom chiat ding uh.
Mosiin dan honpia, Jakob mipite dingin gouluah ding.
Jesurunah kumpipa ahia, mipite intekpen a kikhawm khawm ua; Israel chi tengteng a om khawm uh.
Reuben dam gige leh, silouin, a mite a hihleh tawm zo le uh, a chi a.
Huan, hiai Judate a vualjawlna ahi; TOUPA, Juda aw ngaikhia inla, a mite kiangah pi lutin; a khut amah adingin kiching henla, a melmate sualpihpa honghiin, chih.
Huan, Levite tungthu ah bel, Na Thumin leh na Urim na mi siangthou kiangah a om, Masa ah na zeeta, Meribe tui ahte na sual hi;
Ka nu leh ka pa ka theikei, chiin; a unaute leng a thei sam kei hi, amah tate ngei leng a thei tuan kei; na thu a pom ua, na thukhun a jui uhi.
Jakobte na vaihawmte a sin sak ding ua, Israelte, na dan; na maah gimlim a koih ding ua, na maitam ah pumhal thillat.
Vualjawlin, TOUPA, sum a pai, a khut nasepte nana pom inla; amah sualte kawng sat inla, amah hote kawng toh, a tat nawn louhna ding un, a chi a.
Huan, Benjaminte tungthu ah jaw, TOUPA deihtak jaw a kiangah bitin a om ding; nitumin a opkhum dinga, a po jel ding, a chi a.
Huan, Josephte tung thu ah jaw, A gam TOUPA vualjawlin om hen, van thil mantam daituitein, tui thuk mahmah nuai lama tuitein.
Ni gah suah thil mantam tein, khaten thil mantama suah tein.
Nidanglai tang tea thil deihhuai pentein, khantawn tanga thil mantamtein.
Lei leh a tunga thil mantam tein, loubuka ompa deihsakna in; vualjawlna Josephte lu tungah hongom hen, a unaute akipana hihtuama ompa sipah.
A thupina a bawngtal piang masa thupina bang ahi a, a ki gam bawngtal ki bang ahi; huaiin nam chih a si ding, kawlmong tanin; Ephraimte sangsawm ahi ua, Manaserte sang ahi uhi, a chi a.
Huan, Zebulunte tung thu ah bel, Kipakin, Zebulun, na vak khiaknate ah, huan, Isakar, na puaninte ah.
Tangah chi chih a sam ding ua, huaiah diktatna kithoihnate a lan ding uh; tuipi buchinna a ne sin ngal ua, piaunela gou kiselte toh, a chi a.
Gadte tungthu ah bel, Gadte hihzapa phatin om hen, humpinelkai bangin a tenga, ban a ham keka, ahi, lujang leng.
Amah adingin a hoihna pen a tela, vaihawmpa tantuan lah guanbehin a om ngala, Intekpente kiangah a hoha, TOUPA vaihawmna dik a juia; Israelte kianga vaihawmnate, a chi a.
Dante tungthu ah bel, Dan bel humpinelkai nou ahi a, Basan akipana hongtawm khia, a chi a.
Naphtalite tungthu ah bel, Naphtali aw, deihsaknaa lungkim, TOUPA vualjawlnaa tai, sim leh tum luahin, a chi a.
Aserte tungthuah bel, Aser bel tatea vualjawlin om henla, a unaute lakah tuitum henla; thau ah a kha diah heh.
Na painate sik leh dal ahi ding, na damsung ni bangin na hatna leng a om ding, a chi a.
Pathian bang kuamahmah a om kei uh, Jesurun aw, nang honpahpih dinga van a tuang, thupi taka vana tuang, thupi taka van a tuang.
Khantawn Pathian na omna ahi a, nuailamah khantawn ban a om, melmate lah a honsat mang saka, Hih mangin, a chi.

Nang hon honpanpihpa phaw, na thupina namsau a hi!

Nang hon honpanpihpa phaw, na thupina namsau a hi!
