Huchi in Uria kumpipa in a kipan a pawtkhia a, huan, kumpipa'n nekdingte khawng a delh zui sak hi.
Himahleh Uria bel a pu sikhate lak ah kumpipa in kongkhak bul ah a lum teita mai a, a in lam ah a paita kei hi.
Huan, Uria a in lam ah a paikei, chi a David a hilh tak un David in Uria kiang ah, Khualzin hongtung hilou na hi maw? bang dia na in lam a pailou na hia? a chi a.
Huan, Uria in David kiang ah, Pathian bawm te, Israelte leh Judate aidakbuk ah a om ua, huan, ka pu Joab leh ka pu mite gamlak ah a kikulh ua; kei ka in ah ka pai in ka ne in ka ta in, ka ji kiang ah ka lum sam ding maw?
Na hinna leh na kha hinna louin ka gen hi, huai zaw ka hih het kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, David in Uria kiang ah, Tuni leng hiai ah om lechin zingchiah na paina ding, a chi a.
Huchi in Uria bel huai ni leh a zingchiang Jerusalem ah a omta hi.
Huan, David in a sam a, a ma ah a ne in a dawn a; a kham sak ek a; huan, nitaklam in a in lam a pailou in a pu sikhate lak a lum ding in a pawtkheta hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a zingchiang in David in Joab lai a khak a, Uria a posak hi.
Huan, laikhak ah, Uria gal khawknalai pen ah, ma phusak unla, a thah ua a sihna ding in kikhin san un, chi in a gelh a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Joab in khua a um lai in, mi hangsansan omna hia a theih ah Uria a pangsak hi.
Huan, khua a mite a pawt ua, Joab a sual ua, mi khenkhat, David mite lak a mi ngei a si uh; huan, Hit mi Uria leng a si.
Huchi in Joab in mi a sawl a, kidou tungtang thulam tengteng David a hilh a;
Huan, a mi sawl kiang ah, Kumpipa kiang a kidou tanchin tengteng na gen khita,
A hong heh guih a, Bangdia sual ding a huchibang a kho bul chin a hoh na hi ua?
Kulh a kipan in a hon kap ding uh chih theilou na hi uh maw?
Jerubeseth tapa Abimelek that kua ahia? buh gawizanna suang tungnung pen numei in kulh a kipan in a tungah a khesuk a, Thebez ah a si a hikei maw? bangdia hichibang a kulh kiang chin a pai na hi ua? a chih leh, Na sikha Hit mi Uria leng si ei ve, na chi ding, chi in, thu a pia a.
Huchi in a mi sawl a kuanta a, a va tung a, Joab in a sawl san tengteng David a hilh hi.
Huan, a mi sawl in David kiang ah, Mite'n a hon zuan ua, pawn ah a hon sual ua, huan, kou a kho lutna kongkhak tan hial in ka nawtta uhi.
Huan, kapmite'n kulh a kipan in na sikhate a kap ua, huchi in kumpipa sikha khenkhatte a si ua, huan, na sikha Hit mi Uria leng a si a ka, a chi a.
Huchi in David in mi sawl kiang ah, Joab kiang ah hichi in va gen in, Hiaite'n na lungsim kipaklou sak tuankei hen, namsau in a kuamah a khentuam ngalkei a, nakzosem in khua sual unla hihsia un, chi in, hasuan in, a chi a.
Huan, Uria zi in a pasal Uria a si chih a zak in a pasal a sun.Huan, a sun hunbi a khen nung in David in a in lam ah a pia, a zi a hong hita a, tapa a suansak.
Himahleh David thilhih in TOUPA a lung hilou sak.
Huan, a sun hunbi a khen nung in David in a in lam ah a pia, a zi a hong hita a, tapa a suansak.
Himahleh David thilhih in TOUPA a lung hilou sak.
Huan, TOUPA'N David kiang ah Nathan a sawl a.
Huan, a kiang ah a hoh a, Khua khat ah mi nih a om ua; khatpen mi hausa ahi a, khatpen mi genthei ahi.
Mi hausa in belam hon tampi leh gan hon tampi a nei a:
Mi genthei in bel belamnou a nu neuchik khat a lei a, a vulh khat kia ngallou bangmah a neikei a: a kiang ah a tate toh khanglian ahi uh; a kuang sawk pih leh a nou kikoppih, a angsung a om, a tanu bang geih a a ngaihtuah ahi.
Huan, mi hausa kiang ah khualzinmi khat a vatung a; huan, amah kiang a mikhual tung amah belam leh gan goh phallou in mi genthei belamnou a kiang a hongpa a goh a, a chi a.
Huchi in huai mi tungah a hehta mahmah a, Nathan kiang ah, TOUPA hinna lou in ka gen hi, huai thil hih mi hihlup mai tuak ahi;
Huan, hichi bang thil ahih ziak leh hehpihna a neihlouh ziak in a belamnou a mun li in a dit ding ahi, a chi a.
Huchi in Nathan in David kiang ah, Nangmah na ka, TOUPA, Israelte Pathian in hichi in a chi, Israelte kumpipa ding in sathau ka honnilh a, Saula khut a kipan in ka hon honkhia a;
Huan, na pu in gou ka honluah sak a, na pu zite na angsung ah ka koih a, huan, Israel inkuante leh Judate ka hon pia a; huan, huaite a tawmluat lai uleh thil dangte leng hon piak beh lai ding ka kei maw.
Bangdia TOUPA thu ngaineu a, a mitmuh a thil hoihlou na hih maizen?
Hit mi Uria namsau in na hihlum a, a zi nang zi ding in na neihsak a, Amon suante namsau in na that.
Huaiziak in namsau in na inkote a ki khinsan hetkei ding; nang lah hon ngaineu in Hit mi Uria zi nang zi ding in na suhsak ngal a.
TOUPA'N hichi in a chi, Ngai in, nangmah inkuan lak a kipan mahmah in na tungah thil hoihlou ka suaksak ding a, na mitmuh mahmah in na zi ka hon laksak ding, na vengte ka pe dia, sun khovak in na zite a luppih ding uh.
Nang bel a guk in na hih a, ken zaw Israel mite tengteng mitmuh in sun khovak in ka hih ding hi, a chi a.
Huna, David in Nathan kiang ah, TOUPA tungah thil ka hihkhialta, a chi a.
Huan, Nathan in David kiang ah, TOUPA'N leng na khelhna a koihmang samta; na sikei ding.
Ahihhang in hiai na thilhih a Pathian gensiatna lemtang tak TOUPA melmate adia na bawl ziak in naupang na lak a piang a si ngeingei ding, a chi a.
Huchi in Nathan in a inlam ah a paisanta hi.
Huan, Uria zi in David a suansak tungah TOUPA'N a khut a kha a, a chi a na mahmahta hi.
Huchi in David in naupang a ding in Pathian kiang ah a ngen ngutngut a; huan, David in an bang a ngawl a, a lut a, zankhua in lei ah a lum.
Huan, a inkote lak a upate a thou ua, lei a kipan a kaithou ding in a kiang ah a ding ua; himahleh a thou nuamkei a, a kiang uah leng a nesamkei.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni in naupuang a sita.
Huan, David sikhate'n naupang a sita chih a hilh ngamkei ua, Ngai in, naupang a damlai in a kiang ah thu i gen ua, a ngaikhe nuam ngalkei a, naupang a sita chih bangchin i hilh ngam dia, bang chichi hiam in a kihih kha ding, a chi ua.
Himahleh David in a sikhate kisimhou a muh in naupang a sita chih a theita a; huan, David in a sikhate kiang ah, Naupang sita hia? a chi a.
Huan, amau, Sita, a chi ua.
Huchi in David lei a kipan a thou a, a kisil a, sathau a kinilh a, a puante a kheng a; huan, TOUPA in ah a hoh a, Pathian a bia; huan, a in lam ah a pai nawn a, huan, an a kan a, a ma ah a lui ua, a na neta hi.
Huchi in a sikhate'n a kiang ah, Na thilhihdan bangchidan ahia?
Naupang a damlai in an na ngawl a, na kap a, himahleh naupang a sihtak in na thou a, an khawng na ne mai ngal a, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Naupang a damlai in an khawng ka ngawl a ka kap ngut a; Naupang a dam theihna ding in TOUPA'N hon hehpih kha mohkei ding, kua ahia thei ding?
Ka chi a ahi.
Himahleh tu in a sita ngal a, bang din an ka ngawlta de?
Ka sam kik nawn thei dia hia?
A kiang ah kei ka pai khongkhong ding a, himahleh amah zaw ka kiang ah a hong kik nawnta kei ding, a chi a.
Huchi in David in a zi Bath-seba a lungmuan a, a kiang ah a lut a, a luppih a, huan, tapa a suang a, a min in Solomon a sa hi.
Huan, TOUPA'N amah a it a; huan, zawlnei Nathan a thukhak a, huan, aman TOUPA tam sak in amin ding in Jedidia a sata hi.
Huchi in, Joab in Amon suante khopi Raba a sim a, khopi a lata hi.
Huan, Joab in David kiang ah mi a sawl a, Raba ka sim a, ahi, tuite khopi ka lata hi.
Huchi in mi omlai teng kaikhawm inla, khopi sual tum in zuan inla, la in: ken khopi la leng ka min a pu kha ding, a chi a.
Huchi in David in mi tengteng a kaikhawm a, Rava ah a hoh ua, a vasim ua, a lata uh.
Huan, a kumpipa uh lallukhu khuk lai a laksak a, a gikdan dangka-eng talent buk ahi a, suangmantamte leng a tel a; huan, David a khusak uh.
Huan, khopi a gallak sum tampi a la hi.Huan, mipite a pikheta a, singatna te, leilehna sik zum te, sik heipite zang in na a sem sak a, lei haltakte a bawlsak a: Amon suante khopi tengteng huchibang in a hih.
Huan, David leh mi tengteng Jerusalem ah a pai nawn uhi.
Huan, mipite a pikheta a, singatna te, leilehna sik zum te, sik heipite zang in na a sem sak a, lei haltakte a bawlsak a: Amon suante khopi tengteng huchibang in a hih.
Huan, David leh mi tengteng Jerusalem ah a pai nawn uhi.
Huan, huai nung in hichi ahi a, David tapa Absalom in sanggamnu mel hoih mahmah a nei a, a min Tamar ahi.
Huan, David tapa Amnon in amah a it a.
Huchi in Amnon bel a sanggamnu Tamar ziak in a buai mahmah, a chi a nata a; amah lah nungak siangthou ahi ngal a; a tung a thil banghiam hih lah Amnon adia haksapi ahi.
Himahleh Amnon in lawm a nei a, a min Jonadab ahi, David unaupa Sime tapa ahi: Jonadab mipil gitlouhpil tak ahi.
Huan, kiang ah, Aw, nang kumpipa tapa bangchidan ahia a ni sim a na gawn hulhul mai?
Na hon hilh nuam sinkei ahia? a chi a.
Huan Amnon in a kiang ah, Ka unaupa Absalom sanggamnu Tamar ka it a ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Jonadab in a kiang ah, Na lupna ah lum thek inla, kichi nat bawl inla; huan, na pan a hong et chiang in a kiang ah, Hehpihtak in ka sanggamnu Tamar ka kiang ah hong henla, tanghou nek ding hong pia henla, huan, ka muh theih in ka mitmuh mahmah in nek ding hon bawlsak leh, a khut a ngei ka na ne ding, na nachi in, a chi a.
Huchi in Amnon a lum a, a kichina sakta; huan, kumpipa'n a va et in Amnon in kumpipa kiang ah, Hehpihtak in ka sanggamnu Tamar hong pai henla, ka mitmuh mahmah in tanghou pek nih in hiam hon bawlsak henla, amah khut mahmah a ka na ne ding, a chi a.
Huchi in David in Tamar kiang ah, Na sanggampa Amnon inlam ah hoh inla, nek ding va bawlsak dih ve, chi in a in ah mi a sawl a.
Huchi in Tamar a sanggampa Amnon inlam ah a hoh a; huan, amah a lum gige a.
Huan, tanghou diah a la a, a mek a, a mitmuh in tanghou pek a bawl a, a kang a.
Huan, a kanna a la a, a ma ah a bungkhia a; himahleh a ne nuamkei a.
Huan, Amnon in, Mi tengteng in hon pawtkhiaksan uhen, a chi a.
Huchi in a pawt khiaksan vek ua.
Huan, Amnon in Tamar kiang ah, Na khut a mahmah ka nek theihna ding in nek ding dantan ah honla ta aw leh, a chi a.
Huan, Tamar in a tanghou pek bawl a la a, a sanggampa Amnon kiang ah dantan ah a la lut a.
Nesak ding a a kiang nai a vahoh pih ana man a, a kiang ah ka sanggamnu, honglum mai dih, a chi a.
Huan, aman a dawng a, Hilou e, ka sanggampa, hon chi teitei ken, Israelte lak ah hichi bang thil hih ding a hikei hi; hiai thil gilou haihuaitak hih ken.
Huan, ken ka zahlakna koi ah ka ompih dia?
Huan, nang leng Israelte lak a mi hai a sim na hong hi maimah ding.
Huaiziak in kumpipa houpih zaw in, non neih a nialkei ding, a chi a.
Himahleh a thu a zuikei a, amah sang in a hatzaw ngal a, a chi teitei a, a luppihta hi.
Huchi in Amnon in lah huat chihtak in a haw thepthup zel ngal a; a huatna tuh amah a it lai a a itna sang a thupi in ahi a huat.
Huchi in Amnon in a kiang ah, Thou inla, paimang vengveng in, a chi a.
Huan, aman a kiang ah, Huchi ding a hikei, hichibang a diklou tak a non delh khiak ka tung a na gamtatsa sang in a hoihkei zaw hi, a chi a.
Himahleh a zui nuam tuankei hi.
Huchi in a sikha, a nektak bawl a sam a, Hiai numei ka kiang a kipan pawtsak inla, kong khak bikbek in, a chi a.
Puannak tual ze tuamtuam a gelh a silh a; huchibang puannak tual kumpipa nungak siangthoute'n a silh sek uh.
Huchi in a sikha in a pikhia a, kong a khak bikbek hi.
Huan, Tamar in a lu ah meivu a koih a, a puannak tual ze tuamtuam a gial a silh a botkek a, a sip ah a khut a koih a, ngaihtak a kap kawm zel in a paita hi.
Huan, a sanggampa Absalom in a kiang ah, Na sanggampa Amnon na kiang a hong lut ahi maw? himahleh dai mai in, ka sanggamnu, na sanggampa a ka, limsak dah in, a chi a.
Huchi in Tamar a sanggampa Absalom in ah nguitak in a kikhum maimah hi.
Himahleh kumpipa David in huai tengteng a zak in a heh mahmah hi.
Huan, Absalom in Amnon kiang ah a sia a pha, bangmah a gen nuamkei hi; Absalom in a sanggamnu Tamar a chih teitei ziak in Amnon a mudah mahmah a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, kum nih vengveng aman nung in Ephraim kiang a Baal-hazar ah Absalom in belam mul a metsak a; huan, Absalom in kumpipa tapate tengteng achial a.
Huan, Absalom kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, Ngai in, na sikha in belam mul a metsak a, kumpipa leh a sikhate na sikha kiang ah hoh le uh a kei dia, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n Absalom kiang ah, Hilou e, ka tapa, ka vek un hohlou e, kon hih tuailuai lo kha ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman achialteitei a, himahleh a ut tuankei a, vualzawl a hihleh a vualzawl hi.
Huchi in Absalom in, ahihkeileh ka unaupa Amnon bek ka kiang uah hong leh a ke, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n a kiang ah, Bang ding in a hoh tuamse dia?
A chi a.
Himahleh Absalom in Amnon leh kumpipa tapate tengteng bek a kiang a hoh sam ding in ngetsak teitei.
Huan, Absalom in, a sikhate, Ngai un, Amnon uain dawn a nuam a sak lai in na kiang ua, Amnon that unla ka hon chih leh, that unla, laukei un, thu ka hon pe khin ahi kei maw? kihangsak unla, kipasalsak un, chi in thu a pia a.
Huchi in Absalom sikhate'n Amnon tungah Absalom thupiak bang in a hih uh.
Huchi in kumpipa tapate tengteng a thou ua, a sabengtung uah a tuang chiat ua, a taimang uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, lam lak a a omlai un, Absalom in kumpipa tapate tengteng a that vek mawk a, khat lel leng a hawikei hi, chi in David kiang ah tanchin a na tung a.
Huchi in kumpipa a thou a, a puansilhte a botkek a, lei ah a lumta a; huan, a sikhate tengteng a puansilhte uh botkek in a kiang ah a ding ua.
Huan, David unau Sime tapa Jonadab in a dawng a, Ka pu in kumpipa tapa tangval tengteng a that vek uh hi chih umkei hen; Amnon kia ahi si; a sanggamnu Tamar a chih teitei nungsiah Absalom in hichibang a hih a tup him ahi.
Huaiziak in ka pu, toupa'n kumpipa tapate tengteng a si uh hiam chih um in lung himohkei heh, Amnon kia ahi si, a chi a.
Absalom bel a taimangta hi.
Huan, a gal vil tangval a dak a, a en a, huan, ngai in, a nunglam tang pang a lampi ah mi tampi apai ua.
Huan, Jonadab in kumpipa kiang ah, Ngai in, kumpipa tapate a hongpai uh, na sikha in a gen bang geih a na hina, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a gen khit tak in ngai in, kumpipa tapate a hongtung ua, a aw uh suah hial in a kap uh: huan, kumpipa leng a sikhate toh kah petmah in a kapta uhi.
Absalom bel a taimang a, Gesur kumpipa Amihud tapa Talmai kiang ah a hoh.
Huan, David in ni teng in a tapa a sun.
Huchi in Absalom bel a taimang a, Gesur gamah a hoh a, huai ah kum thum ava om.Huan, kumpipa David in Absalom kiang a hoh a ut mahmah a: Amnon tungtang thuah a lung a muangta hi.
Amah lah a sita ngal a.
Huan, kumpipa David in Absalom kiang a hoh a ut mahmah a: Amnon tungtang thuah a lung a muangta hi.
Amah lah a sita ngal a.
Huchi in, Zerui tapa Joab in kumpipa lungsim Absalom tungah a teng chih a na thei a.
Huchi in Joab in Tekia khua ah mi a sawl a, huailai a numei pil khat a va pisak a, a kiang ah, Lusun bang in kibawl unla, lusun puan silh inla, sathau leng kinilhlou in numei sawtpi misi sun bang in om in:
Huan, kumpipa kiang ah hoh inla a kiang ah hichi bang in thu va gen in aw, a chi a.
Huchi in Joab in thute tuh a kam ah a muam a.
Huan, Tekoa khua a numei in kumpipa kiang a thu a gen sin in mai a lei si in a khupboh a, chibai a buk a, TOUPA aw, hon huh in, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n a kiang ah, Bangchidan ahia? a chi a.
Huan, aman a dawng a, Meithai petmah ka hi a, ka pasal a sita.
Huan, na sikhanu in tapa nih a nei a, a nih un lou ah a kisual ua, kuamah phelh ding lah a omkei ua, a khatpen in a dang a sata a, a hihlumta a.
Huan, ngai in, a inkuan tengteng in na sikhanu a doukhawm ua, A unaupa thatpa a unaupa thah ziak a i thah tei theihna ding in hon pia in, huchi in gouluah ding pa leng ka hihmang pah ngal ding uh, a chi a: huchi bang in ka mei am omlai a mitsak ding ua, ka pasal min neilou leh leitung a suan himhim neilou a om maisin ahi, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n numei kiang ah, Na in ah pai inla, na tungtang thu ah thu ka pe mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, Tekoa khua a numei in kumpipa kiang ah, TOUPA aw, ka pu, thulimlouhna moh ka tung leh ka pa inkote tungah ke mai hen: huan, kumpipa leh laltutphah in moh pokei hen, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n, Kuapeuh na tung a banghiam gen peuhmah ka kiang ah honpi inla, a honkhoih nawn hetkei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Sisan suahmite tung a phulamite'n hihmang nawnlou ding in kumpipa'n TOUPA na Pathian thei gige hen aw, huchilou in zaw ka tapa a hih mangkha ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman, TOUPA hinna lou in ka gen hi, na tapa a samzang khat leng lei ah kekei ding, a chi a.
Huchi in numei in, Na sikhanu in toupa ka pu kiang ah thu kam khatkia kon gen nawn peuhmah ding aw, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Gen ve, a chi a.
Huan, numei in, A hihleh bang jiakin ahia Pathian mite doudal a hichi bang a hihtum na hia? hiai thu a kipan in kumpipa moh in a kilang ahi, kumpipa'n a mi, taimangpa a pi kik nawnlouh jiakin.
Ka si ngeingei ding ua, huan, tuisik lei a bosa a luahnawn theihlouh bang ka hi uhi: Pathian in hinna a la mang a hikei a, taimangpa amah lak a mituam a hihlouhna ding lunggel ahi zaw hi.
Huchi in toupa ka pu kiang ahiai thu gen ding a ka hong in leng mi ka kihtak ziak ahi: huan, na sikhanu in, kumpipa kiang ah ka gen phot ding a, kumpipa'n a sikhanu ngetna a lohchingsak kha mai deh.
Kumpipa'n kei leh ka tapa Pathian gouluahlou ding a hihman tummi lak a na sikhanu honkhe ding in a na ngaikhe ding ka chi a.
Huchi in na sikhanu a ding in, toupa, ka pu thu lungmuan huai tak hi henla; a sia a pha nakhen ding in toupa ka pu lah Pathian angel bangmai ahi ngal a: Huan, TOUPA Pathian na kiang ah om hen ka chi ahi, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n a dawng a, numei kiang ah, Kon dot peuhmah bangmah hon im ken aw, a chi a.
Huan, numei in, Toupa ka pu in gen leh a ke, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n, Hiai thu himhim ah Joab in panna a nei hia? a chi a.
Huan, numei in a dawng a, Toupa ka pu, na kha hinna lou in ka gen hi, toupa ka pu in a gensa kuamah in taklam ah hiam, veilam ah hiam a pel theikei ding ua: na sikha Joab in a hon sawl a, hiai thu tengteng na sikhanu a hon muam vek hi:
Thil omdan hihlamdang ding in hiai thil na sikha Joab in a hih ahi: huan, ka pu bel khovel a thil om tengteng thei thei in Pathian angel bang in a pil ahi, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n Joab kiang ah, Ngai in, ka hih samta hi, huaiziak in pai inla, tangval Absalom va pi nawn dole, a chi a.
Huan, Joab bel mai a lei si in a khupboh a, chibai a buk a, kumpipa a vualzawl a: huan, Joab in, Toupa ka kumpipa aw, toupa'n a sikha ngetna a lohchinsak ziak in tuni in na sikha in na mit ka tung chih ka natheita hi, a chi a.
Huchi in Joab a thou a, Gesur ah a hoh a, Absalom Jerusalem ah a pita hi.
Huan, kumpipa'n, Amah in lam ah pai henla, ka mel hong mu dah leh, a chi a.
Huchi in Absalom amah in lam ah a pai a, kumpipa mel a mutakei hi.
Israel tengteng lak ah Absalom bang a melhoih a phat loh kuamah a omkei uh: a khe lek a kipan in a sip pha in gensiatna himhim a omkei hi.
A sam a met in (kum kivei teng in a met sak a, a sam lah a giktheih ziak in a met sek hi. ) a sam a buk zel a, kumpipa bukdan in sekel nih a ching sek hi.
Huan, Absalom in tapa thum leh tanu khat a nei a, a min Tamar ahi a, mel hoihtak ahi.
Huchi in Absalom kum nih hilhial Jerusalem ah a om a; himahleh kumpipa mel himhim a mukei hi.
Huchi in Absalom in kumpipa kiang a sawl ding in Joab a thukhak a; himahleh a hoh nuamkei; huan, a thukhak nawn a, himahleh a hoh nuamsamkei hi.
Huchi in a sikhate kiang ah, I aw, Joab lou bel kei lou kiang ahi a, barli buh a nei a, va hal un, a chi a.
Huchi in Absalom sikhate'n lou a vahalta uh.
Huchi in Joab a thou a, Absalom kiang ah a in ah a hoh a, a Bangding a na sikhate'n ka lou hal ahi ua?
A chi a.
Huan, Absalom in Joab a dawng a, Ngai dih, Bangdia Gesur a kipan a hong ka hia?

Huchi in Joab kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, a hilh a; huan, Absalom a sam a, kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, huan kumpipa ma ah a mai a lei si in a khupboh a; huan, kumpipa'n Absalom a tawp hi.

Huan, na sikha Israel namte lak a nam khat ka hi, a chi zel uh.
Huan, Absalom in, I aw, na thu a hoih in a dik a; himahleh ngaihtuah mi ding kumpipa'n kuamah a sepkei, a na chi zel hi.
Huan, Absalom mah in, Michih thukhawk gen ding nei hiam, nget ding nei hiam peuhmah ka kiang a a hongpaina ding un, kei hiai vaihawmpa in hon bawl leh chi na tel ing e aw!
Huchi in dik tattak in vai hawm sek ding, bang leng a na chi zel a.

Huchi in a thou a, Hebron ah a hohta hi.

A thu sawm uh a thupi mahmah a; Absalom lam ah lah mipite a pung hulhul mai ngal ua.
Huan, David kiang ah, Israel mite lungsim Absalom lam ah a awn mahmah, chi in mi a hong a.
Huan, David in Jerusalem a mi tengteng kiang ah, Thou unla i tai khe ding uh, kuamah lah Absalom a kipan i suakta thei sin ngalkei ua: pawtkhe meng un, huchilou in zaw a hon phapeh mai ding, i tunguah thil hoihlou tak a hontun ding a, namsau in khua a hong sual kha ding, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa mite'n kumpipa kiang ah, Ngai in, na sikhate ka pu uh, ka kumpipa un a seh peuhmah hih ding in mansa in ka om gige uh, a chi ua.
Huan, kumpipa a pawt a, a inkote tengteng in a zui ua.
Huan, kumpipa'n in ngak ding in numei sawm, meite lawi a koih.
Huan, kumpipa a pawt a, mipi tengteng in a zui ua; huan, Beth-merhak ah a khawl tadih ua,
Huan, a mi tengteng in a kheng ua; huan, Kerit mi tengteng, Pelet mi tengteng, Git mi tengteng, mi zaguk Gath a kipan a amah hon zuite'n kumpipa a bel zel uhi.
Huchi in, kumpipa'n Git mi Itai kiang ah, Bangchidan ahiai ah nang na hong tei a? kik nawn inla, kumpipa kiang ah om in; nang zaw mikhual gam dang leng na hi ngal a, nang mah mun lam ah kik nawn mai in.
Zan zek a hong na hi a, tuni a ka kiang ua a suk a tou a hon zui sam ding in ka hon chi ding maw? ka pai theih theihna a pai ding ka hi, nang zaw kik nawn inla, na unaute tengteng pikik nawn in; hehpihna leh thutak na kiang ah om hen, a chi a.
Huan, Itai in kumpipa kiang ah, TOUPA hinna leh kumpipa, ka pu hinna lou in ka chi hi, kumpipa, ka pu na omnana ah, sih leh sih ahi ding a, dam leh dam ahi ding a, na sikha a om tei zel ding, a chi a.
Huan, David in Itai kiang ah, Pai unla, pai zel ua leh, a chi a.
Huchi in Git mi Itai a mite tengteng leh a tu a tate tengteng utoh a pai uh.

Huan, Zadok te Pathian thukhunna bawm zawng in Levite tengteng toh a kiang ah a pai ua; Pathian bawm a nga ua, mipi in khua a pawt khiaksan vek tan in Abiathar a hoh tou a.
Huan, kumpipa'n Zadok kiang ah, Pathian bawm pen khopi sung ah zawnglut nawn un: TOUPA mittung a ka om leh honpi kik nawn ding a, Pathian bawm leh a omna a honmu sak nawn ding;
Himahleh, Nang ah kipahna mahmah kaneikei, a chih leh, ngai in, hichi mai ka hi a, hoih a sak bangbang in ka tungah hih mai heh, a chi a.

Ngai in, kei zaw tanchin hongtheih sak ma siah uh gamdai a luikannate ah ka na om ding, a chi a.

Huan, David in a kiang ah, Ka kiang a na hong tei le zaw kei a ding in puakgik na hi mai ding;

Huailai ah na kiang ah siampu Zadok leh Abiathar leng a om tei uh ahi kei maw? huchi in hichi ahi ding a, kumpipa in a thu pawt na zak peuhmah siampu Zadok leh Abiathar na hilh zel ding.

Huan, kumpipa'n Ziba kiang ah, Hiaite bangchidan ahia? a chi a.

A chi a.

Ngai in, tu in leng koilai leihawm hiam ah, koilai mun ah hiam a bu thek ahi ding: huan, hichi ahi ding a, a kisual tung ua mi khenkhat a puk ua leh a zapeuh in, Absalom zuite a that ek uh, a chi mai ding uh.
Huchi in mi hangsan tak, humpinelkai lungsim bang pu mi hial leng a honglungke mahmah ding ua; Israel mi tengteng in lah na pa sepaih hang tak a hihdan leh a kiang a mi omte mi hangsan taktak a hihdan uh a thei vek ngal ua.
Kei hoihsak samdan, Israel mi tengteng Dan a kipan in Beerseba pha in tuipi a piaunel zah hial ding na kiang ah sam khawm vek le hang; huan, kidouna ah nang nangawn kuan lechin.

Huan, David in a melma tengteng khut a kipan leh Saula khut a kipan a TOUPA'N a hotkhiak ni in hiai la thu TOUPA kiang ah a gen a;
Huchi in aman, TOUPA ka suangpi leh ka kulhpi hon humbitpa ahi a, kei a ngei ahi;
Ka suangpi Pathian, amah ka muang ding; ka phaw leh ka hotdamna ki, ka insang leh ka ka kihumbitna ahi; ka hondampa, nang hiamgamna lak a kipan non hondam sek a.
Phat tuak TOUPA ka sam ding a: huchi in hondoute lak ah hotdam in ka om ding.
Sihna tui kihawt in hon um kimvel a, pathian limsaklouhna tui lian in hon lau sak.
Sheol khauhualte in a hon gak suak a: sihna thangte'n a hon awksak ua.
Ka lungzing in TOUPA ka sam zel a, ahi, ka Pathian ka sam sek hi: huan, aman a biakin a kipan in ka aw a za a, huan, ka kikou husa a bil ah a lut hi.
Huaitak in lei a ling a, a kisat.
A heh ziak in van kingaknate nangawn a kisat in a lingta hi.
A nak a kipan in meikhu a zamtou ngoingoi a, a kam a kipan a pawt mei in a kang zoizoi hi: huai in meihol a kuangsak zuazua.
Huan, aman vante leng a kunsak a, a hongsukta; a khe nuai khawng ah mial bebuk a hong om a.
Cherub tungah a tuang a, a lengta ahi, huih kha khawng a muh in a om hi.
Huan, khomial bel amah um kimvelna bukta ding a bawl a, tuite, van a meipi sah memouhte kaikhawm in.
A ma a vakna ziak in meiamte a kuang.
TOUPA van ah a hong ging dodop a, Tungnungpen in a aw a suaksak.
Huan, thalte a kap khiaa, amau a delh sak a; khuate a phe sak a a buai zak sak vek hi.
Huaitak in TOUPA salhna ziak a a nak a hu in a mut ek ziak in, tuipi lampi a hong kilang a, lei kingaknate hihlat in a omta.
Aman tunglam a kipan in a honsawk a, hon len a; tuipi a kipan a hon kaikhia a:
Kei hon dou hat tak lak ah a hon humbit a, kei hon hote lak ah leng; kei a ding in lah a hat lo ngal ua.
Ka tuahsiat ni in a hon sual ua, himahleh TOUPA ka kingakna ahi.
Aman mun awngthawl tak ah hon pikhia a: ka tung a a kipah ziak in a honna humbitta hi.
TOUPAN ka diktat dungzui in ka tungah a hih a; ka khutte a siangthoudan zui in a hon thuk ahi.
TOUPA lampite ka zui a, ka Pathian a kipan gilou tak in lah ka pai mang ngei ngalkei a!
A vaihawmna tengteng ka ma ah a om zel a: a thusehte lah ka kilehheisan ngei ngalkei hi.
Amah lak ah leng gensiat bei ka hilai a, ka thulimlouhna a kipan ka kihuikhe sek hi.
Huaiziak in TOUPA'N ka diktatdan bang zel in a honna thukta a; a mitmuh a ka siangthoudan bang zel in.
Chingtheite kiang ah chingthei in a kihihlang ding a, mi hoihkimte kiang ah hoihkim in a kihihlang ding;
Mi siangthoute kiang ah siangthou in a kihihlang ding a; huan, mi genhakte kiang ah genhak in a kihihlang ding.
Haksathuak mite na hondam ding a: mi kisatheite bel na niamsak theihna ding in a tungah na mit a tu gige.
TOUPA aw, ka khawnvak na hi ngal a.
TOUPA'N ka mialna a vak sak ding.
Nang hon panpih in lah gal ka boh ngal a: ka Pathian panpih mah in kulh ka tawmkan hi.
Pathian zaw a lampi a hoih kim a: TOUPA thu chiamtehsa ahi; amah muangte tengteng a ding in amah lum ahi.
TOUPA lou kua Pathian a om a? i Pathian lou kua suangpi a om a?
Pathian ka kulhpi kiptak ahi a: mi hoihkimte a lampi ah a pi sek.
Ka khepekte zukpi khepek bang in a bawl a: Ka mun sangte ah a hon omsak zel hi.
Ka khutte galkap ding in a sinsak a: huchin ka bante'n dal thalpeu a laizou hial hi.
Nang na hotdamna lum lah non pia a: na kiniamkhiakna in na hon bawl lianta hi.
Ka nuai a ka kalsuanna na lian sak a, huchi in ka khete a tolhkei ding.
Hondoute ka delhpha a, ka hihmang a; hihmanthat sipsip a a om masiah uh ka kik samkei.
A thohnawn theihlouhna ding un ka hihmang sipsip a, ka sat zan ngiingei a: ahi, ka khenuai ah a pukta uh.
Nang kisualna a ding in hatna in ka tai ah na hon gak ngal a: hon sualmite ka nuai ah na thalpaihta hi.
Hon hote ka hihmanthat theihna ding in, nang kei hondoute hon nungngat in na omsakta ngal a.
A dak vialvial ua, himahleh hondam ding kuamah a omkei uh; TOUPA mah a en ua, himahleh aman a dawngkei hi.
Huaitak in ken lei a leivui bang mai in ka khen nel dimdem a, kholak buannawi bang mai in ka tuanzak a, ka thehzak vek hi.
Nang ka mite kisualna a kipan in leng non humbit a; nam chih lutang hi ding in non kem hoih hi: ka theih ngeilouh nam in ka na a semta ding.
Namdangte ka kiang ah a kipe ding ua: ka tanchin a zak tak un ka thu a zui ding uh.
Nam dangte bel a tul ding ua, a insang ua kipan in ling kawm in a hongpai suk ding uh.
TOUPA a hing gige hi; ka suangpi phat in om henla; hon hotdamna suangpi, Pathian pahtawi in om hen:
Phu a hon laksakpa leh nam chih ka nuaia thalpaihpa Pathian ngeinei,
Hondoute lak a kipan a hon lakhepa: ahi, nang kei hon sualte tunglam ah non domkang a: hiamgam mi lak a kipan non humbit sek hi.
Huaiziak in aw TOUPA, nam chih lak a kipahthu ka hon hilh ding a, na min phat in la ka sa lai ding.Aman hotdamna thupi mahmah kumpipa a pe zel hi: a sathau nilhpa tungah, David leh a suante tung ngei ah khantawn in a siamdan a lang sak ding, a chi a.
Aman hotdamna thupi mahmah kumpipa a pe zel hi: a sathau nilhpa tungah, David leh a suante tung ngei ah khantawn in a siamdan a lang sak ding, a chi a.
Hiaite, David thugen nanungpen ahi.
Jesai tapa David, sang tak a dop sangpa, Jakob Pathian sathaunilhpa, Israelte la kilawm tak phuakpan a chi:
TOUPA kha in kei hon zang in a gen a, a thu ka lei ah a om.
Israelte Pathian in a gen a, Israelte Suangpi in: Mi tung a diktak a vaihawm sek pa, Pathian laudan siam kawm a vaihawmsekpa.
Ni a hong suah a mei om hetlou zingsang vak bang ahi ding, vuah zuk khit a kho hong siang a lei a loupa sel nou mimet bang ahi ding.
Ka inkuan Pathian a kipan ahi ka hia? khantawn thukhun ka kiang ah a khung a, bangkim kizen leh hihkip in; ka hotdamna kim leh deihdan kim, a dawnkhe sinkei ding maw?
Mi pathian limsakloute bel a vek a nil a nil mangzat, ling bang ahi uhi, khut a lakzat ahi ngalkei ua:
Himahleh amau khoih ding mi sik leh teichiang a a kivat ding ahi; huchi in a mun ua halmang vek ahi ding uh, chi in a hon houpih a, a chi a.
Hiaite David sepaih hangsante min ahi: Takemon mi Josep-basehebeth sepaih heutute lak a heutupa ahi a; amah khatvei thu a mi zagiat thatpa Eznit mi Adino a chih mah uh ahi.
Huan, amah zom in Ahohi tapa Dodai tapa Eleazar ahi: huai mi bel Philistia mite kidou ding a a kikaihkhawm ua, a tou ua.
Israel mite a pai mang vek lai ua David kiang a sepaih hangsan thumte lak a khat ahi:
Huan, amah a thou a, Philistia mite a khut a kham matan in namsau leng khahlou khop in a that a; huai ni in TOUPA'N nakpitak in a zouta a: huan, mipite a nung ah gallak thil la ding lel in a hong kik nawn uh.
Huan, amah nung in Har mi Age tapa Sama ahi.
Huan, be tampi omna lou ah Philistia mite lak tum in a kikhawm ua; huan, mipite'n Philistia mite a taikek san uh.
Himahleh amah bel huai lai mun ah a ding a, a veng a, Philistia mite a that a: huan, TOUPA'N nakpitak in a zoh sak hi.
Huan, sepaih hanghang sawmthum lak a thumte a hohsuk ua, buh lak laitak in David kiang ah Adulam kohawm ah a hoh ua; huan, Philistia sepaihte'n Rephaim kuam ah panmun a bawl uh.
Huan, huchihlai in David insung ah a om a, huchihlai mah in Philistia sepaihte Beth-lehem ah a om uh.
Huan, David in tui a lunggulh mahmah a, Beth-lehem a tuileh tui, kulh kongkhak kianga a dawn ding a hongpia om le uh aw! a chi a.
Huchi in sepaih hangsan thumte'n Philistia sepaihte a paltan ua, kulh kongkhak kiang a Beth-lehem tuileh a va tawi ua, a tawi ua, David kiang ah a paipih uh: himahleh a na dawn nuamkei a, TOUPA a ding in a bungkhe zaw hi.
Aw TOUPA, hiai ka hihlouh dingdan; sih ngap a kuante sisan ka dawn sin ahia? a chi a; huchi in a dawn nuamkei hi.
Huai thilte sepaih hangsan thumte'n a hih uhi.
Zerui tapa Joab unau Abisai bel thumte lak a a heutupen uh ahi.
A teipi in mi zathumte a sual a, a that a, thumte lak ah min hoih a loh hi.
Thumte lak ah pahtawi tuak pen ahi kei maw?
Huaiziak in a heutu ding un a bawl uhi: himahleh tungnungpen thum lak a simtei a kaikei hi.
Huan, Kebzeel mihang tapa Jehoiada tapa Benai thil thupi tak hihpan Moab mi Ariel tapate nih a that a; huan, a hoh suk a, vuk kiak hunlai in leikohawm ah humpinelkai leng a va that a:
Huan, Aigupta mi, mi lian tak a that: Aigupta mi in teipi a tawi a: himahleh aman chiang tawi in a va zuan a, Aigupta mi teipi tawi a va sut a, amah teipi in a sun lumta hi.
Jehoiada tapa Benai in huchi bang thil ahih ziak in sepaih hangsan thumte lak ah min hoih a loh hi.
Mi sawmthumte sang in pahtawi tuak ahi a; himahleh tungnungpen thumte lak a sim tel a kaikei hi.
Huan, David in amah vengpa heutu ding in a koih hi.
Joab unau Asahel bel sawmthum lak a khat ahi a: Beth-lehem khua a mi Dodo tapa Elhanan te;
Harod mi Sama te, Harod mi Elik te:
Pal mi Helez te, Teko mi Ikes tapa Ira te:
Anathot mi Abiezer te, Husat mi Mebunai te:
Ahomi Zalmon te, Netophat mi Maharai te:
Netophat mi Ban tapa Heleb te, Benjamin suan, Gebea khua a mi Ribai tapa Itai te:
Pirathon mi Benai te, Gassa luite a mi Hidai te;
Arbat mi Abi-albon te, Barhum mi Azmaveth te;
Saalben mi Eliab te, Jesen tapate lak a Jonathan te;
Harar mi Sama te, Arar mi Sarar tapa Ahiam te;
Mankat mi Ahasbai tapa Eliphelet te, Gilon mi Ahithophel tapa Eliam te;
Karmel mi, Hezre te, Arba mi Paarai te;
Zoba khua mi Nathan tapa Igal te, Gad mi Bani te;
Amon mi Zelek, Beerot mi Naharai, Zerui tapa Joab galvan tawite
It mi Ira, It mi Gareb;Hit mi Uria te ahi uh: a vek un sawmthum leh sagih ahi uh.
Hit mi Uria te ahi uh: a vek un sawmthum leh sagih ahi uh.
Huan, TOUPA hehna Iaraelte tungah a hongtung nawn guih a, Kuan inla, Israel mi leh Juda mite sim vek in, chi in David in amau tung a thusia bawl ding in a tok thou hi.
Huan, kumpipa'n a kiang a om sepaih heutu Joab kiang ah, Israel nam tengteng lak ah Dan a kipan Beer-seba pha in vialvak inla, mi bangzah ahi ua ka theihtheihna ding in sim vek un, a chi a.
Huan, Joab in kumpipa kiang ah, Toupa na Pathian in mipite pungsak in, bangzah a tam leng, a mun za leng, toupa ka pu in mu man heh; himahleh toupa kapu in bangding a huai theih ut ahia? a chi a.
Himahleh kumpipa thu in Joab leh sepaihheutute a zouta a.
Huchiin Joab leh sepaih heutute Israel mite sim dingin kumpipa kianga kipan a pai khe ta uhi.
Huan, Jordan gal a va kah ua, huan, Gad guam laitak taklam a kho om Aroer ah Jazer pha in om mun a bawl ua:
Huan, Gilead gam leh Tahtim-hodai gam a tung uh; huan, Dan-jaan, leh Zidon kimvel a tung ua.
Huan, Tura kulh leh, Hivmite khuate tengteng leh, Kanan mite khuate tengteng a va tung ua; Beer-seba a, Juda simlam ah a pai khia uh.
Huchi in gam tengteng a tot suah khit un kha kua leh ni sawmnih a bei in Jerusalem a hongtung uh.
Huan, Joab in mihing zah kumpipa a pia a; huan, Israel gamah namsau tawi mi mi hangsan nuai giat a om uh; huan, Juda mi bel nuai nga a om uh.
Huan, mihing a sim khit un David lungtang a nuam hetkei.
Huan, David in TOUPA kiang ah, Ka thilhih ah nakpi mahmah in ka nakhialta hi: himahleh tu in aw TOUPA, na sikha thulimlouhna koih mang ding in ka hon ngen hi; hai huai mahmah in ka na hihta hi, a chi a.
Huan, zingsanga David a thoh leh, David zawlnei Gad kiang ah Toupa thu a na tung a,
Kuan inla, David kiang ah, TOUPA'N hichi in a chi, Thil thum ka hontah a na tung a ka hih ding in khat tel in, a chi hi, chi in.
Huchi in Gad bel David kiang ah a hoh a, a hilh a, a kiang ah, Na gam a na tunga kum sagih kial a kiak hia, na melma ma a nang a hon delh sung ua kha thum nana taimang takdih hia, na gama ni thum hi honglen? honsawlpa bangchibang in ahia ka dawn ding kingaihtuah inla, hon hilh dih ve, a chi a.
Huan, David in Gad kiang ah, Ka lung a zing mahmah mai: TOUPA khut ah puk lut peuhmah phot leng; a chitnate lah a thupi mahmah ngala; mihing khut ah honpuk lut sak mahmah ken, a chi a.
Huchi in TOUPA'N Israel mite tungah zingsang a kipan in hun seh tan hi a lengsak a; huchi in mipi lak a mi Dan akipan in Beer-seba tan in mi sing sagih a si uh.
Huan, angel in hihse dinga Jerusalem lam a a khut a lik leh TOUPA'N thil hoihlou hih a tup a lungheithaka, mite hihmangpa angel kiang ah.
Hunta; na khut lik nawn ken, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA angel bel Jebus mi Araun phual chin ah a om.
Huan, David in mi hihlumpa angel a muh in TOUPA a houpih a, Ngai in, ka nakhialta hi, diklou tak in thil ka na hihta ahi; hizongleh, hiai belamte'n bang thil a hih ua? na khut in kei leh ka pa inkote hon khoih zaw hen aw, a chi a.
Huan, huai ni in Gad bel David kiang ah a hoh a, a kiang ah, Kuan tou inla, Jebus mi Arsun phual ah TOUPA a ding in maitam va bawl in, a chi a.
Huan, David TOUPA'N thu a piak bang a Gad in a hilh bang in a kuan touta hi.
Huan, Araun in malam a et leh, amahlam zuan a kumpipa leh a lawite hongpai a mu a; huchi in Araun a pawt a, a mai a lei si in kumpipa ma ah a khup boh a.
Huan, Araun in, Bang achia ahia toupa ka pu a sikha kiang a a hong? a chi a.
Huan, David in, mipite lak ahi a kikhin theihna ding a TOUPA adia maitam bawl ding a na phual lei ding in, a chi a.
Huan, Araun in David kiang ah, Toupa ka pu in kilawm a sak aleh la henla, lan leh a ke; en in, halmang a lat ding in bawngtalte a om uh, huan, sing ding in phual vanzatte leh bawng vante a om;
Aw toupa, hiaite tengteng Araun in kumpipa a pe vek hi, a chi a.
Huan Araun in kumpipa kiang ah, TOUPA na Pathian in honna dawng heh, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa'n Araun kiang ah, Hi lou e, a man neiin a lei mahmah in ka hon leisak ding ahi zaw; bangmah senna omlou in TOUPA ka Pathian kiang ah halmang thillatte ka lankei hial ding, a chi a.
Huchi in David in phual leh bawngtalte, dangka sekel sawmnga in a leita hi.Huan, David in huailai ah TOUPA adingin maitam a bawla, halmang thillatte leh lemna thillatte a lan hi.
Huchi in TOUPA a gam tunguah a lungkim a, Israel gam akipan hi a vengta hi.
Huan, David in huailai ah TOUPA adingin maitam a bawla, halmang thillatte leh lemna thillatte a lan hi.
Huchi in TOUPA a gam tunguah a lungkim a, Israel gam akipan hi a vengta hi.
Huan, David a hong upa a, a hong tek mahmah ta; huchiin puanin a khuh jel uh, himahleh lum asa thei tuan hetkei.
Huchiin, a sikhaten a kiangah, ka pu uh kumpipa adingin nungak zong le ungla: Kumpipa kiang chinah om gige henla, kem leh; huan, na ang sungah hong lum henla, ka pu uh Kumpipan lum a hon sathei ding hi, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Israel gam tengteng ah nungak melhoih a zong ua, Shunam mi Abisag a vamu ua, Kumpipa kiangah a pi uh.
Huai nungak a mel a hoih mahmah; Kumpipa a kema, a nektak a bawl sak sek hi; himahleh Kumpipan a kithuahpih kei.
Huchiin, Hagith tapa Adonija in, kei Kumpipa a pang ding keive, chiin a kingai thupi mahmaha: kangtalai leh sakol tungtuang mite, mi sawmnga ama a tai dingte toh a kisa saka.
A pan lah chiklaiin leng, bang dia hichibanga hih na hia?
Chiin a lungkhamsak ngeingal keia; huan, amah lah mel hoih mahmah ahi ngala, Absalom sang ahi.
Aman Zerui tapa Joab leh siampu Abiathar a thu a donga: amau Adonija lamah a pang ua, amah a panpih jel uh.
Siampu Zadok te, Jehoiada tapa Benai te, jawlnei Nathan te, Simei te, Rei te leh David pawla mi hangsante bel Adonija lamah a pang kei uh.
Huan, Adonija in belamte, bawngtalte, gan vak thaute Zoholet suangah a gou a, huai bel En-rogel kiang china om ahi; huan, kumpipa tapa, a unaute tengteng leh, Juda gama Kumpipa pipente tengteng achial a.
Jawlnei Nathan te, Benai te, mi hangsante leh a unaupa Solomon bel achial kei hi.
Huchiin, Nathan in Solomon nu Batseba kiangah, Hagith tapa Adonija I pu David theihlouh in vaihawmin a om chih za lou na hi maw?
Huchiin nang bitna ding leh na tapa Solomon bitna ding kon na hilh ding.
Kumpipa David kiangah valut inla, a kiangah, Aw Toupa, ka pu, na sikhanu kiangah na tapa Solomon, ka nungah a hong lal ngeingei sina, amah ka laltutphah ah a tu ngei sin hi, chiin na kichiam ahi kei maw?
Bang achia Adonija in vaihawm ahia?
Va chi dih.
Ngaiin, Kumpipa na vahoupih laitakin ken leng ka honjui lut tei dinga, na thugen ka honhihkip pih ding chiin a gen a.
Huan, Batseba Kumpipa kiangah indan ah a valuta; Kumpipa bel a upa mahmah taa, Shunam mi Abisag in Kumpipa nektak ana bawla.
Huan, Batseba in Kumpipa kunin chibai a buka.
Huan, Kumpipan, bang na deih a? ana chi a.
Huan, aman, Pu aw, Toupa na Pathian min louin na sikhanu kiangah, na tapa Solomon ka nungin a hong lal ngeingei ding, amah ka laltutphah ah hong tu ding, chiin na na kichiam khina.
Ngaiin, tuin Adonija lah a lal a; nang ka pu toupan lah na theikei a;
Bawngtalte, gan vak thaute, belamte a gou liapluapa, kumpipa tapate tengteng leh, siampu Abiathar leh, sepaih heutu Joab te achiala, na sikha Solomon bel achial kei.
Huchiin, pu aw, Toupa nunga a laltutphaha kua hongtu ding ahia chih na gen chiangin, Israelte tengteng mit nang ka pu, toupa, na tungah a tu chiat ahi.
Huchilouin jaw hichi ahi ding, pu aw, toupa apute kianga a ihmut sam hun chiangin, kei leh ka tapa Solomon thil hihkhialin a honsep mai sin uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan, ngaiin, huchia kumpipa a houpih lai takin, jawlnei Nathan a valut teia.
Endih, jawlnei Nathan a hong chiin kumpipa a hilh ua.
Huan, kumpipa kiang a vatunin, kumpipa maah a maia lei siin a khupboha.
Huan, Nathan in, Toupa aw, pu aw, ka nungah Adonija a lal dinga, ka laltutphah ah a tu ding na chi maw?
Tuniin a kuan suka, bawngtalte, gan vak thaute, belamte a gou zengzunga, kumpipa tapa tengteng, sepaih heutute, siampu Abiathar te achial a; huan, ngaiin, a ne un a dawn khawm ua, Pathianin kumpipa Adonija humbit hen, a chi uhi.
Himahleh kei na sikha ngei leh, siampu Zadok leh, Jehoiada tapa Benai leh na sikha Solomon te jaw hon chial kei hi.
Hiai toupa ka pu thu a hih a hih ngal leh toupa ka puin a nunga laltutphaha tu dingpa a kua pen ahia chih na sikhate na na hilh nai lou na hi ding maw? a chi a.
Huchiin kumpipa David in a dawnga, Bat-seba honsap sak dih ua, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa kiangah a vahoh a, kumpipa maah ava dinga.
Huan, kumpipa a kichiama, lungjinna tengtenga ka hinna humbitpa Toupa hinna louin,
Na kianga Toupa Israel te Pathian min loua, na tapa Solomon ka nungin a hong lal ngeingei ding, ka sikin ka laltutphah ah a hongtu sin hi, chia ka kichiam bangbangin, tuniin leng ka hih ding, achia.
Huchiin, Bat-seba bel a maia lei siin a khupboha, kumpipa chibai a buka, ka pu, kumpipa David khantawnin dam thek hen, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa David in, siampu Zadok leh, jawlnei Nathan leh Jehoiada tapa Benai hon vasap sak dih ua, a chi a, Huan, kumpipa ma lamah a vapai ua.
Huan, kumpipan a kiang uah, na pu uh sikhate pi unla, ka tapa Solomon keimah sabengtung mahmah ah tuangsak unla, Gihon mun ah va pi suk un:
Huan, siampu Zadok leh jawlnei Nathan in Israelte kumpipa dingin sathau vanilh heh: Huan, pengkul mut unla, Pathianin kumpipa Solomon humbit hen, chi un.
Huchiin amah na jui tou ding ua, ka laltutphah ah a hongtu ding hi; amah lah ka sika lal ding ahi ngala: huan, amah Israel gam leh Juda gam heutu dinga ka seh ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Jehoiada tapa Benai in kumpipa a dawnga, Amen; Toupa, ka toupa kumpipa Pathianin leng pha sa hen.
Toupa ka pu, toupa kianga a om sak bangin, Solomon kiangah leng om sam jel henla ka pu kumpipa David laltutphah sangin a laltutphah hih thupi jaw hen, a chi a.
Huchiin, siampu Zadok te, jawlnei Nathan te, Jehoiada tapa Benai te, Keret mite, Pelet mite a hoh suk ua, Solomon David sabengtung tungah a tuang sak ua, Gihon mun ah a pi uh.
Huan, siampu Zadok in puanin akipan sathau koihna a laa, Solomon a nilh hi.
Huan, pengkul a mut ua, huchiin mi tengtengin, Pathianin kumpipa Solomon humbit hen, a chi ua.
Huan, mipite tengtengin amah a jui tou ua, mipiten tamngai te a tum ua, a kipak mahmah ua, a husa ging un lei a kheng khama.
Huan, Adonija leh chialte a kianga omte tengtengin ankuang a lui khit un a ja ua.
Huan, Joab in pengkul mut ging a jakin, khopi sunga husa ging juajua bang chi dan ahia leh? a chi a.
Huchia a chih lai takin, ngaiin, siampu Abiathar tapa Jonathan a vahoh a: Adonija in, Hongpai dih ve, nang jaw mi kizen na hi a, tanchin hoih na hontun mahmah ding, a na chi a.
Huan, Jonathan in a dawnga, Adonija kiangah, tun keng e, pu aw, kumpipa David in Solomon kumpipa dinga bawlkhin hi;
Amah toh siampu Zadok te, jawlnei Nathan te, Jehoiada tapa Benai te, Keret mite, Pelet mite kumpipan a sawla, kumpipa sabengtung tungah a tuang sak uh:
Huan, siampu Zadok leh jawlnei Nathan in Gihon munah kumpipa dingin sathau a nilh ua: huai akipanin nuamsa takin a pai tou ua, huaiin khopi sung a thawn juajua hi.
Na husa jak uh huai ahi,
Huan, Solomon bel gam laltutphah ah a tuta hi.
Huan, kumpipa sikhate, Na Pathianin na min sangin Solomon min hihhoih jaw henla, na laltutphah sangin a laltutphah hih thupi jaw heh, chia ka pu uh kumpipa David kipahpih dingin a hoh ua; huan, kumpipa lupna siin a kuna.
Huan, kumpipan leng hichiin a chi, Toupa Israelte Pathian, tuni mahmaha ka laltutphaha tu ding hon seppa phatin om hen, ka mit mahmahin a muta hi, achia, achia.
Huan, Adonija mi chialte tengtengin a lauta ua, a thou ua, amau lampi pi uah a pai vek uh.
Huan, Adonija in Solomon a kihtaa, a thou a, maitam ki a valen a.
Huan, ngaiin, Adonija in kumpipa Solomon a kihta a; kumpipa Solomon in a sikha namsau a hihlum lou dingin ka kiangah kichiam phot heh chiin maitam ki a len hi, chiin Solomon a hilh ua.
Huan, Solomon in, mi ginom tak a hih a suklat peuhmah leh a sam zang khat leng leiah a ke kei ding; thulimlouhna a nei chih theihna om leh a si ding, achia.Huchiin kumpipa Solomon in mi a sawla, maitam akipan a vapi suk uh.
Huan, a vahoha, kumpipa Solomon chibai a buka: huan, Solomon in a kiangah, Na inah paita in, ana chi hi
Huchiin kumpipa Solomon in mi a sawla, maitam akipan a vapi suk uh.
Huan, a vahoha, kumpipa Solomon chibai a buka: huan, Solomon in a kiangah, Na inah paita in, ana chi hi
Huan, David sih hun a hongnaita a; a tapa Solomon thu a piaa,
Lei tengteng dan bangin ka pai tei sinta a: huchiin hat takin om inla, pasal pha takin om in;
Na thilhih peuhmah leh, na kiheina lam peuhmaha na lamzan theihna dingin Mosi dan a gelh bangin, Toupa na Pathianin a lampite jui ding leh a thuseh te, a thupiakte, a vaihawmte leh a thutheihsakte pom dinga thu a piakte jui in:
Toupa ka tungtang thua, Na suanten a lungtang tak uleh, a lungsim tak ua ka mitmuha thutaka om dinga a omdan ua a pilvang uleh Israelte laltutphaha tu ding mi na tatlak kei ding uh, chia a gen a hih kip sin ahi.
Huan, Zerui tapa Joabin a honbawlsdan, Israelte sepaih heutu nih Ner tapa Abner leh, Jether tapa Amasa te a bawldan na thei hi.
Huchia a thaha, kilep laia kidou sisan suaha a suaha, a taia a kawnggaka leh a khedap buta kidouna sisan a bansakdan.
Huchiin pha na sak dan bangin hih inla, a lu a kelsam pou hanah lungmuang takin tum sak ken.
Gilead mi Barzilai tate tungah bel hehpihna hihlangin, na dohkana an ummi dingin tel sakin; na unau Absolom akipana ka taimang laiin ka kiangah a hong ngala.
Huan, ngaiin Bahurim khuaa mi, Benjamin suan, Ger tapa Simei na kiangah a om a, aman mahanam muna ka hoh laiin hamse hoihlou pi a honloha, himahleh Jordanah hongdawn dingin a hong kuana, hauilaiah, namsauin ka honthatkei ding, chiin Toupa min louin a kiangah ka nakichiam ta hi.
Huchiin mohlou louin jaw khah ken, mi pil na hi ngala; a tungah bang chiin na hih dia chih a hih leh na thei mai ding; a lu a kelsam pou sisan toh hanah na tumsak ding ahi, achia.
Huan, David bel a pute kiangah a ihmu teitaa, David khopi ah a vui uh.
Israelte tunga David lal sung bel kum sawmli ahi: Hebron khuaah kum sagih a lal a, Jerusalem khuaah kum sawmthum leh kum thum a lal.
Huan, Solomon bel a pa David laltutphah ah a tu a; huchiin a gam nakpi taka hihkipin a hong omta hi.
Huan, Hagith tapa Adonija bel Solomon nu Bat-seba kiangah a hoha.
Aman, hoih lam thua hong na hi maw? achia.
Aman, hoih lam thu ah hi e, a chi a.
Huan, na kiangah banghiam gen ding ka nei hi, achi nawn a, aman, gen ve, achi a.
Huan, aman, gam keia a hita chih leh, Israelte tengtengin leng kumpipa dingin kei a hon en thek uh chih na theia: himahleh ka unaupa adingin gam a nahei nawn zota a: Toupa nana seh danin amaha ahi him ahi.
Tuin thil kahat honnget ding ka nei a, pha honsak sak lou mahmah ken, a chi a, huan, aman a kiangah, gen ve a chi a.
Huan, aman, hehpih takin kumpipa Solomon honhoupihsak inla (nang thu jaw a sel sin ngal kei a).
Shunam mi Abisag ji dingin honnei sakin, a chi a.
Huan, Bat-seba, hile ake, kumpipa ka honna houpihsak ding, achia.
Huchiin, Bat-seba bel Adonija a dia kumpipa Solomon houpih dingin a kiangah a hohta hi.
Huan, kumpipa amah kipahpih dingin a dinga, a maah a kuna, a laltutphah ah a tua, huan, kumpipa nu adingin laltutphah a tungsaka; a taklamah a tu ta hi.
Huchiin, thil khat neu chik petmah ka hon ngen ding; pha honsak lou sak mahmah ken, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipan a kiangah ngen ve nu: pha ka honsak lou sak het kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Shunam mi Abisag na unaupa Adonija ji dingin nei sakin, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa Solomonin a dawnga, a nu kiangah, bang chidana Shunam mi Abisag pen Adonija dia ngen na hia oi?
Gam leng nget sak vanglak tanla; amah ka u a vo oi; amah ading leh siampu Abiathar leh Zerui tapa Joab adingin leng ngen tan la, a chi a.
Huchiin, kumpipa Solomonin Toupa min louin, Adonija thil ngetin amah tunga sihna thu gen a hih kei himhim leh Pathianin a lohlohin honloh mai hen huai sanga thupijaw in leng.
Huchiin, Toupa, a thuchiam banga honhihkip, ka pa David laltutphaha hontusak, inkuan honna phuhkhiaksakppa hinna louin ka gen hi.
Adonija tuni mahmahin hihlup ngeingei sing ahi, chiin a kichiamta a.
Huchiin, kumpipa Solomonin Jehoiada tapa Benai a sawla, aman a vasuala, a thatta hi.
Huan, siampu Abiathar kiangah kumpipan, Anathoth khuaah nang in leh lou ah pai mang in, si pah dia kilawm na hipeuh mah hi: himahleh ka pa David maa Toupa Pathian bawn na najawn sek jiakin leh ka pa haksatna thuakna tengtenga na nathuak sam sek jiakin tuin jaw ka honhihlum tadih kei ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, Solomonin Abiathar Toupa siampu a hihna a tawpsak a, Toupan Silo khuaa Eli inkuante tungtang thu a gen a tun theihna dingin.
huan, huai thu Joab kiang a hongtunga, Joab bel Absalom lama pang jaw ahi keinaa, Adonija lama pang lah ahi ngala, huchiin, Joab Toupa Puanin ah a taia, maitam kite a lena.
Huan, Toupa puanin ah Joab a taia, ngaiin, maitam bulah a om, chiin kumpipa Solomon a hilh ua.
Huchiin kumpipa Solomon in Jehoiada tapa Benai, va sualin, chiin a sawl a.
Huan, Benai Toupa puanin ah a hoh toua, a kiangah, kumpipan hongpawt khia heh a chi, achia.
Huan, aman, hi lou e; hiaiah ka si mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, Benaiin, Joabin hichiin a nachia, hichibangin a honna dawng hi, chiin kumpipa kiangah thu a tun nawn a.
Huan, kumpipan a kiangah, a chih bangin hih inla, vasual inla, vuiin, a jiak om hetloua Joabin sisan a suahna akipan kei leh ka pa inkote na hulsak theihna dingin,
Huchiin, amah sanga mi kizen jaw leh hoih jaw mi nih, Ner tapa Abner, Israelte sepaih heutu leh Jether tapa Amasa, Judate sepaih heutu ka pa David theih louha suala, namsaua thah jiakin Toupan a san amah lu tungah a kik sak nawn ding.
Huchiin, a sisan uh Joab lu tungah leh, a suante lu tungah khantawnin a kik dinga: David tungah te, a suante tungah te, a inkote tungah te, a laltutphah tungah te bel Toupa kianga kipan lungmuanna khantawnin a om nilouh ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, Jehoiada tapa Benai a vahoh toua, a vasuala, a that; huan, gamdaiah amah inah a vui uhi.
Huan, kumpipan Jehoiada tapa Benai bel sepaihte tungah a sikin a pangsaka: huan, siampu Zadok bel kumpipan Abiathar sikin a pangsak hi.
Huan, kumpipan Simei a sam saka, a kiangah, Jerusalem ah in lam inla huaiah om inla, huaia kipan koi dang mahah pawt ken.
Na pawt ni, Kidron lui na kan ni niin na si ngeingei ding chih theiin: na sisan nangmah lutung mahah a om ding, a chi a.
Huan, Simeiin kumpipa kiangah, a dik hi: Toupa ka puin a gen bangin na sikhain a hih jel ding, a chi a.
Huan, Simei Jerusalemah sawt kuam tak a om a.
Huan, hichi ahia, kum thum a honghih nungin Simei sikhate laka nih Gath kho kumpipa Maak tapa Akis kiangah a tai ua; huan, ngaiin na sikhate Gath khuaah a om uh, chiin Simei a hilh ua.
Huan, Simei a thoua, a sabengtung a vana, a sikhate zong dingin Gath khuaah Akis kiangah a hohta: huan, Simeiin Gath khuaa kipan a sikhate a vapi hi.
Huan, Simei Jerusalem khua akipan a pawta, Gath khuaah a vahoha, a hong kik chih Solomon a hilh uh.
Huan, kumpipan Simei a samsaka, a kiangah, na pawt ni, gam danga na pawtkhiak ni niin na si ngeingei ding, chiin Toupa min louin ka honkichiamsakin, ka hontheisak ahi kei maw? huan, nangmah inleng ka kiangah, na thu gen ka jak a hoih hi, na chi a.
Bangdia Toupa kichiamna leh thu ka honpiak tangtun lou na hia? a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa mahin Simei kiangah, na lungtang sunggil ginatlouhdan, ka pa David tunga na gamtatdante na thei vek: huchiin Toupan na thulimlouhna nangmah lu tung ngei ah a kiksak nawn ding.
Kumpipa Solomon bel vualjawlin a om dinga, David laltutphah Toupa maa khantawna hihkip ahi ding, a chi a.Huchiin kumpipan Jehoiada tapa Benai thu a piaa; amah a kuana, a vasuala, a thatta hi.
Huchiin gam Solomon khuta hihkipin a omta hi.
Huchiin kumpipan Jehoiada tapa Benai thu a piaa; amah a kuana, a vasuala, a thatta hi.
Huchiin gam Solomon khuta hihkipin a omta hi.
Huan, Solomonin Aigupta kumpia Pharo toh kizolhna a bawla, Pharo tanu a kitenpiha, amah in leh Toupa in a lam ma leh, Jerusalem khua kulha a um suak ma siah David khopi ah a om sak hi.
Mipite lah mun sangte khawngah a kithoih mai nak ua, huai main Toupa min dinga in lam a om nai tak dih louh jiakin.
Solomonin Toupa a ita, a pa David thusehte a jui seka; mun sangtea kithoihin, gimlimte a nahal sek mawk naa,
Huan, kumpipa kithoih dingin Gibeon khuaah a hoha; huai lah mun sang poimoh tak ahi ngala: Solomonin huai maitam tungah halmanga thillat sangkhat tal alan hi.
Huan, Gibeon khuaah Toupa janin Solomon kiangah amangin a hongkihila: huan, Pathianin, ngen ve, bang ahia ka honpiak ding? a chi a.
Huan, Solomonin, na sikha ka pa David na mitmuha thutaka leh diktatna leh, lungtang dik tak puaa a om jel bangin nang a kiangah hehpihna thupi mahmah nalangsaka; nang hiai hehpihna thupi mahmah amah adingin na deihguana, nang a laltutphaha tu ding tapa na piaa, tunia a hongom petmah bangin.
Huchiin, aw Toupa ka Pathian, nang na sikha, ka pa David sikin kumpipa dingin na nabawltaa: kei jaw naupang lel ka hia; thu tung lam leh kuan lam leng ka theikei hi.
Na sikha na mite na telte, mi tampi, a tam jiak ua sim seng vual louh leh, a zah theih seng vuallouhte lakah a om hi.
Huchiin, na mite vaihawmsakna dingin na sikha theihna lungtang piain, a sia leh a pha ka khen theihna dingin; na mi hiai zahzah kuana hia vaihawm sak thei ding? a chi a.
Huan, Solomonin huai a nget jiakin huai thu genin Toupa a kipaksak mahmah mai a.
Huan, Pathianin a kiangah, nang dam sawtna kingetsak loua, huchibang na nget jiakin leh, hausaknate leng kingetsak loua, na melmate sihna leng ngen loua, vaihawm siamna na kingetsak jawk jiakin,
Ngaiin, na nget bangin ka hihta: Ngaiin, pilna leh theihna lungtang ka honpia; huchiin, na maah nang bang mahmah kuamah a om kei ua, na nungchiangin leng nang bang mahmah kuamah a hongom sam kei ding uh.
Huan, na ngetlouh, hausakna leh thupina leng ka honpe lai hi; huchiin na dam sungin kumpipate lakah nang bang mahmah a om kei ding uh.
Na pa Davidin a zuih banga ka thusehte leh ka thupiak te pom dinga ka lampite na zuih leh ka hondam sawt sak lai ding, achia.
Huan, Solomon a khanglou a, ngai in, mang ana hi: huan, Jerusalem ah a hoh a, Toupa thukhun na bawm maah a dinga, halmanga thillat leh lemna thillatte a lana, a sikhate tengteng a dingin ankuang a lui.
Huchiin numei nih, kijuak, kumpipa kiangah a hoh ua, a maah ava ding uh.
Huan, numei khat in, aw ka pu, hiai numei toh in khata teng khawm ka hi ua; huai inna ka om tei laiin nau ka nei a.
Huan, hichi ahia, ka nau neih nung ni thum nungin hiai numeiin leng a nei sama; om khawm ka hi ua; huai ina om kou tegel lou, huai in ah kuamah mikhual om a om kei uh.
Huan, hiai numei ta janin a nasi a; a delh lup ahi.
Huchiin, jan laiin a thou a, na sikhanu a ihmut kalin, ka sika ka tapa a la a, a poma, ata sipen ka angah ana sial.
A jingsanga ka ta nawi pe dinga ka thoh leh, ngaiin, a si ana hi nilouh mawk hi: himahleh jingsanga ka etchet leh ngaiin, ka tapa, ka suanpen ana hi hetkei hial hi, achia.
Huan, numei dangin, Hi lou e, a hingpen ka tapa ahi jaw, a sipen na tapa ahi, a chi tei a.
Khatin, Hi lou, a sipen na tapa ahi, a hing pen ka tapa ahi jaw, a chi chiltel sam a.
Huchibangin kumpipa maah a gentuaktuak uh.
Huchiin, kumpipan, Khatin, ahingpen ka tapa ahi: a sipen na tapa ahi, a chi a: huan, khatin, Hilou, a sipen na tapa ahi, a hingpen ka tapa ahi jaw, a chi jel ngala, achia.
Huan, kumpipan, namsau honva lak dih uh, a chi a, huchiin namsau kumpipa maah a honla ua.
Huan, kumpipan, naungek hingpen tum nih suah unla, a kimkhat khat pia unla, a kimkhat khat pia un, a chi a.
Huchiin, naungek hingpen nuin a ta a lainat mahmah mai ngala, kumpipa kiangah, Aw ka pu, naungek hingpen amah pe maiin, a thah a hihleh that mahmah ken, a chi a.
Khatpenin bel, keia lah hi tuan kenteh, nanga lah hi tuan ken teh: tumtan maiin, a chi a.
Huchiin, kumpipan a dawnga, naungek hingpen amah pia un, that het kei un: amah mah a nu ahi, a chi a.Huan, Israelte tengtengin huai thua kumpipa vaihawm dan ana ja ua; kumpipa akihtata mahmah mai uh: vaihawmna dingin Pathian pil na amah ah a om chi a thei ngal ua.
Huan, Israelte tengtengin huai thua kumpipa vaihawm dan ana ja ua; kumpipa akihtata mahmah mai uh: vaihawmna dingin Pathian pil na amah ah a om chi a thei ngal ua.
Huan, Kumpipa Solomon bel Israel te tengteng kumpipa in a oma.
Hiaite a milian neihte ahi uh: Zadok tapa Azaria siampu ahia;
Sisa tapa Elihoreph leh Ahija te leigelh mi ahi uh; Ahilud tapa Jehosaphat bel tanchin gelh mi ahia.
Jehoiada tapa Benai sepaih heutu ahi; Zadok leh Abiathar siampu ahi uh;
Nathan tapa Azaria heutute tunga mi ahia; Nathan tapa Zabud bel siampu leh kumpipa lawm ahi khawma;
Ahisar bel insung lam heutu ahia; Abda tapa Adoniram bel nasem dia goih teiteite heutu ahi.
Huan, Solomon in Irsael te tengteng tungah heutu sawm leh nih a nei, huaiten kumpipa a ding leh a inkote a dingin nek leh tak a ngaihtuah jel uh: mi khat in kum khat in kha khat jel nek ding tak ding a ngaihtuah ding ahi.
Hiaite a min uh ahi: Ephraim tang gamah Ben-hur:
Makaz khua ah te, Saalbim khua ah te, Bethsemes khua ah te, Elon-bethhanan khua ah te Ben-deker:
Arutboth gamah Benhesed; aman Soko leh Hepher gam tengteng a tang tela:
Dor kho zou gam tengteng ah Ben-abindab; aman Solomon tanu Taphath ji in a nei:
Taanak khua leh Meggido khua ah te, Jezreel kho nuai, Zarethan kho china om Beth-sean bial tengteng te ah, Beth-sean akipan Abel-mehola ah te, Jokmeam gam bul tanin Ahiluda tapa Baan:
Ramoth-gilead khua ah Ben-geber; aman Manasi tapa Jair khua, Gilead gama omte atang tela; Basan gama Argob bial, khoi thupi taktak kho sawmguk, kulh leh a kalhna dal tawn neite leng atang tela:
Mahanaim khuaah Iddo tapa Ahinadab:
Naphtali gamah Ahimaaz; a man leng Solomon tanu Basemath jiin a neia:
Aser leh Bealoth khuaah te Husai tapa Baan:
Issakar gamah Paru tapa Jehosaphat;
Benjamin gamah Ela tapa Simei
Amorte kumpipa Sihon leh Basan kumpipa Og gam, Gilead gamah Uria tapa Geber; huai gam heutu omsun amah ahi.
Judate leh Israelte tuipi piaua piaunel zah mahmahin a tam ua, a ne un a dawn ua, nuam takin a om jel uh.
Huchiin, Solomonin luia kipan Philistiate gam leh Aigupta gamgi phain gam tengtengah vai a hawm a: kipahmante a hontawi sek ua, Solomon dam sung tengin a na a sem jel uhi.
Solomon ni khat nek khop bel tangbuang nel mahmah pota sawmthum leh, tangbuang pota sawmguk ahi a:
Bawngtal thau tak sawm, bawngtal gamta chi sawmnih, belam ja toh; huaite lou leng sakhi te, sangai te, sakhi tal te, ak vak thaute leng.
Lui gal khen lam gam tengteng, Tipsa akipana Gaza tan, lui gal khen lama kumpipate tengteng tungah a lal hi: a kim a vela mi tengteng toh galmuangin a om chiat uh.
Huan, Solomon dam sungin Judate leh Israelte Dan akipan Beer-seba kho tanin mi chih amau grep chin uah leh amau theipi chin nuai uah bittakin a om chiat uh.
Huan, Solomonin akangtalai kai sakol in singli leh sakol tungtuang mi singkhat keh sangnih a nei a.
Huai, heututen amau tan kha khain Solomon leh kumpipa Solomon dohkan hongum teite tengteng nek ding a ngaihtuah jel uh; piak kim louh a nei ngei kei uh.
Mi chihin a hih ding ua seh bang peuhmah dungjuiin a omna ding munah sakolte leh gan tai hat mahmahte adingin barli-buh leh buhpawlte leng a honpo sek uhi.
Huan, Pathianin Solomon pilna leh theihna thupi mahmah leh lungsim letna tuipi piaua piaunel bang mai a pia a.
Solomon pilna in suahlam tate tengteng pilna leh Aigupta mite pilna tengteng a khup vek hi.
Mi tengteng sangin a pil a: Mahol tate, Ezra mi Ethan te, Heman te, Kalkol te, Darda te sangin leng: huchiin a kima nam tengtengte lakah a min a thang ta hi.
Paunak sangthum a gen a: huan, a late bel sangkhat leh nga ahi.
Sing tanchinte leng Lebanon tanga Sidar sing akipana kulh a hongselkhia hussop tanin a gen sek a, sa tanchin te, vasa tanchin te, bokvaka pai chi tanchin te: ngasa tanchin te leng a gen sek.Huchiin Solomon pilna tanchin zasa peuhpeuh khovel kumpipate tengteng akipanin chi chiha mi a pilna ngaikhe dingin a hongpai jeljel uh.
Huchiin Solomon pilna tanchin zasa peuhpeuh khovel kumpipate tengteng akipanin chi chiha mi a pilna ngaikhe dingin a hongpai jeljel uh.
Huan, Tura kumpipa Hiramin Solomon kiangah amite a sawla; a pa munah kumpipa dingin amah sathau a nilh uh chih lah a naja ngala; Hiram lah David it gigepa ahi hima.
Huan, Solomonin Hiram kiangah.
Ka pa David in Toupan a khepek nuaia a koih masiah a kim a vela mun chih mual chiha kidounate jiakin Toupa a Pathian min dingin in a lam theikei chih na thei thei a
Tuin bel Toupa ka Pathianin munchih mualchihah muanna a honna nei sakta a; melmate a om nawn kei ua, vangsiatna leng a om sam kei.
Huan, ngai dih, Toupan ka pa David kiangah, Na tapa, na sikha na laltutphah ka luahsak dingin ka min adin in a honlam ding, chia a na gensa bangin, Toupa ka Pathianmin dinga in lam ka tum hi.
Huchiin, Lebanon tanga sidar singte honphuk sak dingin thu pia inla, ka sikhate leng na sikhate lakah a hongtel tei ding uh; huan, na sikhate loh a hihleh na chih peuhmah bangin ka honpe jel ding: Zidon mite banga sing phuk siam ka lak uah kuamah a om kei uh chih na thei ngala, chiin ma a sawla.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Hiramin Solomon thu a jakin a kipak mahmah a, Hiai mi tampi tunga vaihawm dinga tapa pil tak David pepa Toupa tuniin phatin om hen, achia.
Huan, Hiramin Solomon kiangah, na hon thukhah ka naja a; sidar sing thu leh meilah sing thu na deih peuhmah kana hih ding.
Ka sikhaten Lebanon tang a kipanin tuipa phain a honla suk ding uh; Huan, non mun seh saka tuipia tolh dingin ka gak lom sakdinga, huan, huai laiah ka phel sak dinga, nang nana la ding hi: huan, nang leng ka inkote nek ding tumin ka deih non awnghuksak tei ding a kei deh, chiin mi a sawl hi.
Huchiin, Hiramin sidar sing leh meilah sing Solomon a deih peuhmah a piaa.
Huan, Solomonin Hiram bel a inkote nek dingin buh pota sing nih leh sathau suk pota sawmnih a pia: huai bel Solomonin kum tenga Hiram a piak sek dan ahi.
Huan, Toupan achiam bang takin Solomon pilna a piaa: huan, Hiram leh Solomon kalah kilemna aoma; a nih un thu a khung uh.
Huan, kumpipa Solomonin Israelte tengteng laka mi nasem dinga goih teitei pawl a bawla; goih teitei pawl mi sing thum ahi uh.
Lebanon ah kha khata kikheng jelin sing kha a sawl jela; kha khat Lebanon ah a om ua, kha nih amau inlamah: Adoniram bel nasem dia goih teiteite heutu a hi
Huan, Solomonin thil po mi sing sagih leh, suangsek mi sing giat tang khawngah a neia;
Huaite sim louin Solomonin a nasep tunga heutu tuam mawng, nasep vengmi sang thum leh za thum anei lai hi.
Huan, kumpipa thupiakin in suangphum suang seksaa lep dingin suang lian pipi, suangman tam pipi a hon pua uh.Huan, inlammite, Solomon mite leh Hiram mite leh Gebal miten suangte a sek ua, a in lamna ding un sing leh suangte a bawl uh..
Huan, inlammite, Solomon mite leh Hiram mite leh Gebal miten suangte a sek ua, a in lamna ding un sing leh suangte a bawl uh..
Huan, hichi ahia, Israel suante Aigupta gama kipan a pawt nung uh kum zali leh sawmgiatna kum, Israelte tunga Solomon a lal kum lina, Ziv kha, kha nihna khain Toupa in lam a pan.
Huan, Solomonin Toupa adinga a in lam a dunglam tong sawmguk ahia, a vailam tong sawmnih ahi, a sanlam tong sawmthum ahi.
Huan, huai ina mun siangthou ma lama inlim bel ain vailam tan tong sawmniha sau ahi a, a ma lamapen vailam bel tong sawm ahi.
Huan, in adingin tohlet neuchik vathangkalh omin a bawla.
Huan, a in bang kimvelin, biakin bang kimvelin leng, biakin mun bang kimvel leng huai in bang siin in chial nei a lam a;
Huan, a kimvel indantan a bawla: achialnuainungpen availam tong nga ahi a, a laia pen a vailam tong guk ahi a, a thumna a vailam tong sagih ahi: kalvaite bel in banga kigolh kiphamoh louin polamah a kimvelin bangah a kingakna bawl jiak ahi.
Huan, in, a lam lai un suang a laihna muna seksa veka bawl ahi: huchiin a lam sung un sek ging te, heipi ging te, sik vangzat ging himhim te huai in ah jak ahi kei.
Dantan laita pente kongpi bel huai in tklam pangah a oma: a laita ah kahna kivialin a kah tou ua, huan, a laita akipanin a thumnaah.
Huchiin huai in a honlama a zou a, in bel sidar inkam leh a pekin a khuh hi.
Huan, in chial neite a kisi vekin tong nga chiata sangin a lama: huaite in toh sidar singa peh ahi.
Huan, Solomon kiangah Toupa thu a hongtunga,
Hiai in na lam lai tak tungtang thu- ka thusehte na poma, ka vaihawmte na zuiha, ka thupiak tengteng jui dinga napom peuhmah leh, na pa David kianga ka chihsa, huai ka thu na tungah ka hihkip ding.
Huan, Israel suante lakah ka teng dinga, ka mi Israelte ka limsaklou kei ding, chiin.
Huchiin, Solomonin huai in a lama, a zouta hi.
In sung lam bang dingin sidar singpek a zanga; a pialkhang akipan tung lam bang phain a sung lamah sing a belh vek hi: a pialkhang dingin meilah singpek a phah beh a.
Huan, in phaitam lam tong sawmnih pen pialkhang akipana a bangte tanin sidar singpek vekin a bawl a: biakna mun, mun siangthoupen adingin leng a sung lamah a zang hi.
Huan, in biakna mun china biakin pen a dung lam tong sawmli ahi.
Huan, in sung lamah a pakmum leh a pak palh limgelh kilawm sidar sing a oma; a vekin sidar sing vek ahia; suang himhim a dawk kei.
Huan, Toupa thukhunna bawm koihna dingin huai in ah a sunga biakna lamah mun a bawl hi.
Huai, haui biakna mun sung bel a dung lam tong sawmnih, a vai lam tong sawmnih, a san lam tong sawmnih ahia, huai tuh dangkaeng hul ngenin a luana; huan, sidar maitam leng a luana.
Huchiin, Solomonin huai in sung dangkaeng hul ngenin a luana: huan, biakna mun ma lam bel dangkaeng khainiangin a daikaih; huai tuh dangkaengin a luan hi.
Huan, in tuh a veka a zoh phain a pumpiin dangkaeng in a luan tawmtawm hi: biakna mun maitam pumpi leng huai dangkaeng in a luan.
Huan, biakna munah tong sawm tuaktuaka sang, cherub nih oliv singin a bawl a.
Huan, cherub kha khat pen tong nga ahi a, cherub kha langkhat pen tong nga mah ahi: kha khat mong akipan a kha langkhat mong kikal tong sawm ahi.
Cherub khat leng tong sawm ahia: Cherub te a kikim geiha a kibang geih uh.
Cherub khat san lam tong sawm ahia, Cherub khat leng huai toh kikim mah ahi.
Huan, Cherub te in sunggil jaw ah a koih a; huan, cherubte kha a kijak a, khat kha in bang langkhat lam ava khoih a, huan, cherub khat pen kha in leng bang langkhat a khoih sama; huai in lai takah a kha u leh a kha uh a kikoih uh.
Huan, huai cherub te dangkaeng in a luan a.
Huan, in bang tengteng a kimvel in cherub te, tum sing leh pak palh limte gelh kilawm in sunglam leh polamah a bawl.
Huan, a in pialkhang sunglam leh polamah dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Huan, biakna mun lutna dingin oliv sing kongkhak a bawla: kongpi lutung leh kongpi biangte a bang seh nga suah sehkhat chia ahi.
Huchiin, oliv singin kongkhak nih a bawla; huaiah cherub te, tum sing leh pak palh lim te gelh kilawm in a bawla, huai tuh dangkaengin a luana; huan, cherub te leh tum sing te dangkaeng a nuh hi.
Huan, biakin lutna ding in a bang seh li suah seh khat chia in oliv kongpi khuam a bawl laia;
Meilah sing kongkhak nih toh; kongkhak khata pek nih bel khep theih ahia, kongkhak khata pek nih leng khep theih ahi.
Huaite ah cherub te, tum sing leh pak palh limte a gelh ua: huai gelh kilawm bel mam takin dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Biak in huangsung intual sung gil zopen suang sek chial thum leh, sidar singpek thuah khat in a bawl hi.
A kum lina, Ziv kha in toupa in suangphum lep ahi.Huan, kum sawm leh kum khatna, bul kha, kha giatna in huai in zuih ding bangbang a, bangkim mansa vek ahi hi.
Huchiin kum sagih a lam.
Huan, kum sawm leh kum khatna, bul kha, kha giatna in huai in zuih ding bangbang a, bangkim mansa vek ahi hi.
Huchiin kum sagih a lam.
Huan, Solomon in a in kum sawm leh kum thum a lama, a in a mansak vek a.
Lebanon Gam mang In, khuam vual li, khuam tunga sidar singpek tungah a lama; a dunglam tong ja ahia, a vailam tong sawmnga ahia, a sanlam tong sawmthum ahi.
Huan, huai bel khuama kinga dantan sawmli leh nga tung lamah sidar singphela khuh ahi; vual khat ah sawm leh nga jel.
Huan, vual thum in tohlet a om a, vak leh vak te bel vual thumin a kigalsai vek uh.
Huan, kongkhak leh khuam tengteng singpek in ning lia bawl ahia, vak leh vakte vual thum in a kigalsai vek uh.
Huan, Inlim khuam nei a bawla; a dunglam tong sawmnga ahi a, a vailam tong sawmthum ahi a, huan, huaite maah inlim a bawla; khuamte leh a maa lutna tungkah toh.
Huan, a vaihawmna ding laltutphah inlim, vaihawma inlim, a vaihawmna ding a bawla: huai bel pialkhang langkhat akipan langkhat phaa sidar singa khuh ahi.
Huan, a omna ding in, inlim nunga, huangsung intual dangnei om pen huchibang maha bawl ahi.
Huan, huai inlim mahbangin Pharo tanu Solomonin jia a neih in a lam sak lai hi.
Huaite tengteng suang man pha pipi, a hun geihgeiha sek jel suang, atnaa ata lam ahi, sunglam leng, polam leng a suangphum akipana a lek phain, huan, huchimahbangin polamah huangsung intual lianpi tan phain.
Huan, suangphum bel suang man pha pipi, suang lian pipi, suang tong sawm te, suang tong giat tea lep ahi a.
Huai tung lamah suang man pha pipi, suang a hun geihgeih jela sek, leh sidar sing ahi.
Huan, a kimvelin huang sung intual lian pi suang sek chial thum leh sidar singpek thuah khata um ahi: Toupa in huangsung intual sunggil jaw leh, in inlim mahbangin.
Huan, kumpipa Solomonin mi a sawla.
Tura khuaa kipan Hiram a sama.
Huai mi bel Naphtali nam meithai ta ahi, a pa Tura khuaa mi, dal sek mi ahi; amah bel dal sek lam himhim ah a pilin a theihsiamin a khutsiam petmah a.
Kumpipa Solomon kiangah a hoha, a na tengteng asep sak vek hi.
Huan, tong sawm leh tong giata sang dal khuam nih a bawla; a langkhat tong sawm leh tong nih ahi tuaktuak.
Khuam lu a koih ding dal sun bawk nih a bawla; bawk khat sanlam tong nga ahi a, huan, bawk khat sanlam leng tong nga ahi.
Khuam lu a bawkte dingin gial imiam leh kihek nginngiante a oma; bawk adingin sagih, huan, bawk khat adingin leng sagih mah.
Huchiin khuamte a bawla; huai khuam lua bawkte tuamna dingin gial imiam khat tungah a kimvel vual nih a oma: huan, huchimah bangin khat tungah leng a om lai.
Huan, inlima khuam dawna bawk ah lili lim a tuanga, tong li.
Huan, khuam nih dawna bawkte ah a gei ah, gial imiam chin ah pomgranet te a om a: huan, pomgranet bel huai bawkte ah zanih tuaktuaka volhin a om hi.
Huan, Biakin inlim ah khuamte a dingsaka: taklam khuam a dingsaka, a min dingin Jakin a sa a: huan, veilam khuam a dingsaka.
Amin dingin Boaz a sa hi.
Huan, khuam dawnah lili lim a tuanga: huchiin khuam lam nasep mansak ahi ta.
Huan, dal tuibem lianpi, tong sawm kia, a sanlam tong nga a sunga: a gei tong sawmthum kimkot ahi.
Huan, a gei nuaiah pakmum limin a kimvel veka, tong sawm ahi a, tuibem kimvelin a om: huai pakmumte bel vual nihin a om a, sun khawm pah ahi.
Huai bawngtal sawm leh nih tungah a kingaa, thum mal lam a nga ua, thum tum lam a nga ua, thum sim lam a nga ua, thum suah lam a nga uh.
Huan, tuibem a tunguah a kitunga, a mei lam un sunglam a doha.
Huchiin khutpek boka sah ahi; a gei lili pak bang, nou gei banga bawl ahi: bath sang nih takna ahi.
Huan, tun sawmna sawm dalin a bawla; tunsawnna khat saulam tong li ahi a, a vailam tong li mah ahi a, a sanlam tong thum ahi.
Huan, tunsawnna bawl dan bel hichibanga hi: huai in kuak a neia, a kuakte a geite kikalah a oma:
Huan, a geite kikal kuakte ah humpinelkaite, bawngtal te, cherub te a tuanga; a gei tungte ah tunsawnna a om a: huan, humpinelkai leh bawngtalte nuai lamah kilawmsakna te khawng a om dindian a.
Huan, tunsawnnate ah dal kangtalai li leh dal tungchih a om chiata: a ning li te ah kingakna a om chiat a: kisilna bel nuai lamah a kingakna sun a oma, a sik chiatah kilawmsakna a om chiat;
Huan, valh gong sung tong khat kia ahi: a kam a kimvelin valh banga bem ahi a, tong khat leh a kim ahi: huan, kam gei kimvel gial kilawm ahi a, a kuakte a hihleh ning li ahi a, a bem kei.
Huan, kangtalai lite a kuak nuai lamah a om a; huan, kangtalai tungchihte bel tunsawnna ah a om: kangtalai san dan tong khat leh a kim ahi.
Huan, huai kangtalaite bawl dan bel sakol kangtalai khe bawl dan bang ahi: a tungchih te, a valh te, a sutkalhna te, a lai bawkte a vek ua sun ahi.
Huan, tunsawnna ning li chiatah kingakna li a oma: huai kingaknate tunsawnna toh pumkhat vek ahi.
Huan, tunsawnna tungah valh, tong kimkhata sang a om a: tunsawnna tunga a tunna khete leh a kuakte pumkhat vek ahi.
Huan, a tunna khe pekte ah leh, a kuak ah te, a zat bang-bangin cherubte, humpinelkaite, tum sing te a tuang saka, a kimvelin kilawmsakna a om dindian hi.
Huchibang vekin tunsawnna sawmte a bawla; a vekin pumkhata sun ahi chiat a, kikim chiat, bawl dan kibang geih ahi chiat uh.
Huan, kisilna bel sawm dalin a bawla: kisilna bel khatin bath sawmli a donga: kisilna bel tong li chiat ahi: tunsawnna sawm tungah kisilna bel khat a kitung chiat hi.
Huan, tunsawnnate in taklam pangah nga a tunga, in veilam pang ah nga: huan, tuibem bel in taklam pangah suah lamah sim lam ngain a tung.
Huan, Hiramin kisilna belte, vutluahte, maiphiatkuangte a bawla, huchiin, Hiramin Toupa in dingia Solomon a bawl sak tengteng a man vekta a;
khuam nih te, khuam dawna bel banga bawk nih te khuam dawna bel banga bawk nih tuamna gial imiam nihte,
huai tuamna gial imiam nih adinga pomgranet za li te, khuam dawna bel banga bawk nih tuamna ding gial imiam tuaktuak dingin pomgranet vual nih te;
huan, tunsawnna sawm leh tunsawnna tunga kisilna bel sawm te;
tuibem khat leh tuibem nuaia bawngtal sawm leh nihte,
belte leh, vutluahte leh maiphiatkuang te toh: huan, tuiumbelsuante tengteng Toupa in adinga Hiramin kumpipa Solomon a bawlsak dal nawtteta bawl vel ahi.
Jordan phaijangah Sukkoth leh Zarethan kikal bellei omnaah ahi kumpipan a sun.
Huan, huai tuiumbelsuante tengteng a tam mahmah jiak un Solomonin buk khe louin a koih mawk hi: dal buk zah pen theih khiak vual ahi kei.
Huan, Solomonin Toupa ina tuiumbelsuan om tengteng a bawla; dangkaeng maitam leh tanghou koih omna dohkan dangkaengin;
Huan, mun siangthoupen maa khawnvak koihnate, taklama nga leh veilama nga bel dangkaeng siangin; pak te, khawnvak te leh taitehte bel dangkaengin;
Noute, khawnvak puan tehnate, maiphiatkuangte, keute, meilakna te dangkaeng siangin; in sung gil jaw, mun siangthou pen kongkhakte leh in (biakin) kongkhak bulhnate bel dangkaengin.Huchiin, kumpipa Solomonin Toupa in adinga a bawl tengteng a naman vek ta hi.
Huchiin Solomonin a pa Davidin a na lat khitsa-dangkachi te, dangkaeng te, tuiumbelsuante a la luta, Toupa ina goute lakah a koihta hi.
Huchiin, kumpipa Solomonin Toupa in adinga a bawl tengteng a naman vek ta hi.
Huchiin Solomonin a pa Davidin a na lat khitsa-dangkachi te, dangkaeng te, tuiumbelsuante a la luta, Toupa ina goute lakah a koihta hi.
Huchiin Solomonin Israel upate, a nam intekpen tengtengte Israel suante inkuan intekpente, Jerusalem khuaa kumpipa Solomon kiangah David khopi Zion akipan Toupa thukhunna bawm jawng tou dingin a kaikhawm vek a.
Huan, Israel mi tengteng Ethanim kha, (kha sagihnaah) ankuang luinaah kumpipa Solomon kiangah a kikaikhawm vek uhi.
Huan, Israel upate tengteng a hong ua, siamputen bawm a jawng uh.
Huan, Toupa bawm leh, kihoupihna puanin leh puanina tuiumbelsuan siangthou tengteng a jawng tou uh; huaite siampute leh Levi chiten a jawng tou ua.
Huan, kumpipa Solomon leh Israelte kikaikhawm tengteng a kianga hongkikhawmte bawm maah a om khawm ua, belam leh bawngtal a tam jiaka sim sen vual louh leh a zah theih seng vual louhin akithoih uhi.
Huchiin siamputen Toupa thukhunna bawm a omna dingah a la lut ua, in sunga biakna mun, mun, siangthoupen ah, cherubte kha nuaiah.
Cherubten bawm omna tung jawnah akha uh ajak gige ngal ua, cherubten bawm leh a jawnna chiangtawnte a huap vek hi.
Huan, a jawnna chiangtawn a sau mahmaha, ajawnna chiangtawn mongte biakna mun ma, mun siangthou akipanin a muh theiha; Ahihhangin inpo lamah jaw a dawk kei: tutan huai laiah a om nilouh hi.
Aigupta gam akipan apawt ua TOUPAN Israel suante kianga thu a khun laia Mosiin Horeb tanga suangpek nih a koihte kia loujaw huai bawm sungah bangmah dang a om kei hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, siampute mun siangthou akipan a hongpawt khiak tak un TOUPA in meipiin a hongdim meumou maia,
huchiin meipi jiakin siampute nasemin a om theikei zou uh: Toupa thupinain Toupa in lah a dimsak vek ngal a.
Huchiin Solomonin thu a gen a: TOUPAN, mial bikbek ah ka om ding, achi hima.
Na tenna dingin, khantawna na omna ding ka honnalamsak pet mah hi, achia.
Huan, kumpipa a kinungheia, Israelte kikaikhawm tengteng a vualjawla: huchiin Israelte kikaikhawm tengteng a ding dedup uh.
Huan, aman, Toupa, Israelte Pathian, ka pa David kianga amah kam mahmaha,
Aigupta gam akipan ka mi Israelte ka pi khiak ni akipanin Israelte nam laka koilai khua leng ka min omna ding in lamna ding ka natel ngei keia, ahihhangin ka mi Israelte heutu dingin David ka tel ahi, chia nagenpa, amah khut mahmaha honpichingsakpa phatin om hen.
Ka pa Davidin Israelte Pathian, Toupa min dinga in lam a lungsimin a na tum seka.
Himahleh TOUPAN ka pa David kiangah, na lungsimin ka min dingin in lam na tum seka, hichibang lungsim na naput na hih hoih hi:
Himahleh nang jaw in na lam kei ding: na tapa, na khala hongpawt khe dingin ka min dingin in a lam zo ding, a nachi hi.
Huan, TOUPAN a thu gen a honhihkipa; Toupa nana chiamsa bang ngeiin ka pa David mun ka honluahin, Israel laltutphah ah ka hongtu taa, Israelte Pathian, Toupa min ading in lah ka na lamta ngeia.
Huaiah bawm omna ding mun ka na sepa, huailai ah Aigupta gam akipana a pikhiak laia I pute uh kianga a nakhun, Toupa thukhun a oma, a chi a.
Huan, Solomon bel TOUPA maitam ma, Israel hongkikhawmte tengteng muhin a dinga, van lam sawkin a khut a jaka,
Aw TOUPA.
Israel Pathian, na sikha lungtang tengteng ua na mitmuha om sekte kianga thukhun tangtuna hehpihna hihlang sek, na sikha ka pa David kianga thuchiam tangtunpa, tunglam ah leh nuai lam lei ah nang bang mahmah Pathian dang a om kei:
Ahi, nang na kamin thu na gena, na khutin na honlohchingsaktaa, tuinia a hongomta ngei bangin.
Huchiin aw TOUPA, Israelte Pathian, na sikha ka pa David kianga, na suante ka mitmuha na om banga ka mitmuha om sam dinga a omdan ua a pilvang peuhmah uleh ka mitmuh ah Israelte laltutphaha tu ding na tatlak kei ding, chia na nachiam tangtunin.
Huchiin aw Israelte Pathian, na sikha ka pa David kianga thu na nagensa hehpih takin tungsak ngeiin.
Himahleh Pathian lei ah a om petmah dia eita maw?
Ngaiin, van leh vante vanah leng ta lou na hi a; hiai ka in lam ah nak tak tuak keina tel chia!
Himahleh aw TOUPA ka Pathian, tunia na sikhain a hon sapna thumnaa a thusam ngaikhiaksak in, na sikha thumna leh ngetna hon limsak in:
Hiai mun lam ngaa na sikhain thuma a thusam ding ngaikhiaa, nang, huailaiah ka min a om ding, na chihna mun ngeia in lama sun leh jana na mit na lensak gige sek theihna dingin.
Huan, na sikha leh nami Israelten hiai mun lam ngaa a thum chiang un a ngetnate uh na nangaihkhiak sak jelin; ahi, na tenna mun van ah na nangai khia inla; huan, na ngaikhiain ngaidamin.
Mi kuapeuhin avengte tungah thil hihkhialin, kichiamsak hial hongki phamoh leh, hiai ina namaitam maah hong kichiam henla,
Nang van ah na ngaikhia inla, gamtang inla, mi gilou pen amah lu tungah mah a omdan ngaa mohsak dingin mi diktat pen a diktatna bangbanga lohsaka siamtangsakin na sikhate vaihawmsak in.
Na mi Israelten na tunga thil a hihkhelh jiak ua melmate laka a navualleh ua nang lam a hongngat nawn ua, na min a phat ua, hiai ina thuma thil a hon nget uleh,
Nang van ah na nangaihkhiaksak inla, na mi Israelte khelhna ngaidam inla, a pute uh gam na piakah pi nawn in.
Na tunga thil a hihkhelh jiak ua van a bina, vuahte khawng a hongzuk louh hun chiangin, hiai mun lam ngaa a thum ua, na min a phat ua, amau na bawl gentheih jiaka a khelhnate uh a kisik uleh,
