Nang van ah na nangaikhia inla, na sikhate leh na mi Israelte khelhna ngaidam inla, apaina ding uh lampi hoih lah na kawkmuh sin ngala, huan, na mite a goutan dingun na piak na ah vuah honzusak in.
Ka gam ua kial khawng a hongkiaka, hi khawng a honglena, keuna hiam, muatna hiam, khaukhup hiam, lung hiam a hongoma, a melmate un a kongpi kim uate a homun ua, hi bangpeuh, chinatna bangpeuh a hongtun leh,
Na mi Israel tengteng laka amau lungtanga hi oma theia, hiai in lam ngaa khut a honjak peuhmah ua thumna leh ngetna honlat peuhpeuh uh:
Na omna van ah na ngaikhia inla, ngaidam inla, gamtang inla, nang amau lungtang theipa, mi chih a omdan bangbang un loh ching sakin; (nang jaw, nangmah kia mihing ta tengteng lungtang theipa lah na hingala: )
Ka pute uh na piakgama a om laiteng uh amau nang honkihtakdan a siam theihna dingun.
Na mi Israelte hi lou nam dang, na min jiaka gam gamla pia kipana hongpaite tungtang thu leng;
(Na min thupi mahmah te, na khut hat mahmah te, na ban na jak thu te a naza chiat sin ngal ua; ) huaiten hiai in lam ngaa a hongthum chiang un,
Nang na omna vanah na nangaikhia inla, nam dangin a honnget bang nana hihsak in, na mi Israelte bangmaha nam chihin na min a theih ua, laudan a honsiam ua, hiai ka in lamin na min pu ahi chih a hon theihtheihna dingun.
Na miten a melma te uh nasawlna lamlam ah na sual u henla, na khopi tel lam nga leh, na mindinga ka inlam lamngaa Toupa kianga a thum uleh,
A thumna u leh ngetna uh nang van ah nangaikhia inla, athu uah gamtang in.
Na tunga thil a hihkhelh uleh, (kuamah mah thil hihkhial lou lah a om ngal kei ua) a tung ua na hehna, melma gam gamla mahmah hiam, nai chik hiama leng sala a pi ua;
Sala a pina gam ua a ngaihtuah khiak ua, a kisik ua, Thil i nahihkhial hi, diklou mahmah leh gilpi, mahmahin I nagamta uh, chia sala pi mite gama nang a hon nget ule bel,
A melma amau sala pite gama a lungtang tak u leh a lungsim takua nang lam a hongngat ua, a pute uh na piak gam lam leh, na khopi tel lam leh na min adia ka in lam lam ngaa na kianga a thum uleh;
A thumna u leh a ngetna uh nang na omna van ah nangaikhia inla, a thu uah gamtang in:
Huan, na mi na tunga thil hihkhialte leh na laka a natatlekna uah a tatleknate tengteng uh ngaidam inla; sala piten amaute a hehpih theihna ding un hehpihna neihsakin:
Na mi na goutan, Aigupta gam akipana, sik haltuina sunga kipana na pi khiakte lah ahi ngal ua:
A honsap peuhpeuh chiang ua na nangaih khiak dinga na sikha ngetna leh, na mi Israel ngetna lama na mit na lensak theihna dingin.
Aw Toupa Pathian, ka pute uh Aigupta gam akipana na pi khiak laia na sikha Mosi zanga na gen bangin na goutan dingin khovel nam chih laka kipan na hihtuam lah ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Solomonin Toupa kianga a thumna leh ngetna tengteng a gen khitin, Toupa maitam maa khukdina, van lam sawka khut jaka omlai a thou a.
Huan, a dinga aw ngaihtakin Israel kikhawmte tengteng a vualjawla,
A thuchiam tengteng bang jela a mi Israelte khawlna pepa Toupa phatin om hen: a sikha Mosi zanga a thuchiam hoih tengteng thu khat leng a vuaksuak kei, chiin.
TOUPA I Pathian I pute kianga a om bangin I kiang uah om henla; honpaisanin, hondonsaklou kei hen:
Huchiin a lampi tengteng tawn ding leh, I pute a na piak khitsa banga athupiakte, a thusehte, a vaihawmte pom dinga I lungtangte amah lama a ngatsak theihna dingin.
A sikha thu ah leh, a mi Israelte thu ah a ni omdan bang jela a gamtat theihna dingin hiai ka thu gen, TOUPA maa ngetna ka tutte sun leh jan TOUPA I Pathian maah om gige hen:
Toupa Pathian ahi a, kuamah dang a om kei uh chih khovela nam chihin a natheih theihna ding un.
Huchiin a thuseh banga om ding leh a thupiakte jui dingin TOUPA I Pathian lamah na lungtangte uh hoih kim hen, tuni bangin.
Huan, kumpipa leh Israelte tengtengin TOUPA maah kithoihna a lan ua.
Huan, Solomonin TOUPA dinga alat kilepna thillat kithoihna dingin bawngtal sing nih leh sang nih leh, belam nuai khat leh singnih a lan hi.
Huchibangin kumpipa leh Israel suante tengtengin TOUPA in a lanta uhi.
Huai ni mahin kumpipan TOUPA inka jawna intual huang sung laitak a hih siangthou a; huaiah Toupa ma a dal maitam halmanga thillatte, tangbuang thillatte, kilepna thillat sathaute koihna dinga a neu luat jiakin halmanga thilatte, tangbuang thilatte, kilepna thillat sathaute lah a lan ngala.
Huchiin, huai tungin Solomon leh Israel te tengteng, mipi kikhawm khawm tampi, Hamath kho lutna a kipan Aigupta gam lui pha a mite Toupa I Pathian maah ni sagih leh ni sagih, ni sawm leh ni li sung tak ankuang a lui khawm uhi.Ani giat niin mipite a kikhensak a, huan, kumpi a vualjawl ua, huchiin Toupan a sikha David leh a mi Israel te tunga a hoihna huchi lawmlawm a a latsak jiakin lungsim nuamsa leh kipak mahmah in a inlam uah a paita uhi.
Ani giat niin mipite a kikhensak a, huan, kumpi a vualjawl ua, huchiin Toupan a sikha David leh a mi Israel te tunga a hoihna huchi lawmlawm a a latsak jiakin lungsim nuamsa leh kipak mahmah in a inlam uah a paita uhi.
Huan, hichi ahia, Solomon in Toupa in leh kumpipa in a lama Solomon in lunggulh taka a tup tengteng a hih khit vek nungin,
Gibeon khuaa a kianga a kilak bangin Toupa Solomon kiangah a hong kilak nawn a.
Huan, Toupan a kiangah, na thumna leh na ngetna ka ma a na hontut te kana ngaikhia a: hiai na inlam khantawna ka min omsakna dingin ka hih siangthou ta hi; ka mit leh ka lungtang huailaiah khantawn in a omta ding hi.
Huan, nang leng thu ka honpiak peuhmah banga hih dinga na pa David om banga lungtang hoih tak pu leh lungsim diktak pu a ka mitmuh a na oma, ka thuseh te leh ka vaihawmte na pom thek a leh,
Israel te tungah na gam laltutphah khawntawn a dingin ka hih kip ding; na pa David kianga, Israel te laltutphah a tu ding na tatlak kei ding, chia ka na chiamsa bangin.
Ahihhangin nang hiam in, na suante hiam in non zuih uh non kiksan ua, ka thupiak te leh ka thuseh te ka hon theihsak te na pom kei ua, Pathian dangte na nava sep ua, na biak u leh,
Israel te gam ka piak akipan ka hihmang dinga; huan, hiai inn ka min dinga ka hih siangthou sa ka mitmuh phaklouh ah ka suan mang ding; huchiin Israel te nam chihte lakah enghouna leh a se lam gentehna a zat a hong hi ding uh:
Huan, hiai in sang tawk leh leng, a kheng peuhmah in lamdang sa in a muk uh a tum ding ua, bangdia Toupan hiai gam leh hiai in hichi tela hih ade aw?
A chi ding uh.
Huan, miten, Toupa a Pathian uh, a pute uh Aigupta gama kipana pikhe pa a paisan ua, Pathian dangte a let ua, a biak ua, a nate uh a sep jiak uh ahi; huaijiakin Toupan hiai siatna tengteng a tunguah a hontungsakta ahi, chiin a dawng ding uh, achia.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Solomonin in nih, TOUPA in leh kumpipa in a lam sung, kum sawmnih a bei nungin
(Tura kumpipa Hiramin Solomon sidar singte, meilah singte, dangkaengte a kul peuhmah a tupsak vek ahi a), kumpipa Solomonin Hiram bel Galili gama kho sawmnih a pia hi.
Huan, Hiram bel Tura khua akipanin Solomonin a kho piakte en dingin a pawt khiaa; a deihlam ahi hetkei.
Huan, aman, Unaupa aw, hiai na hon kho piakte bangchibang khua ahi maijen ua? a chi a.
Huchiin tu tanin Kabul gam a chi uhi.
Huan, Hiramin kumpipa dangkaeng talent ja leh sawmnih a khaka.
kumpipa Solomonin nasem dia a goih teitei pawl a bawlna sanpen hiai jiak ahi: Toupa in leh amah in lam ding leh Millo te, Jerusalem kulh te, hazor khua te, Megiddo khua te, Gezer khua te bawl dingin ahi.
Aigupta kumpipa Pharo a hoh tou a, Gezer khua a valaa, a hala, huai khuaa om Kanaante a thata, a tanu Solomon ji bel kikhakna thilpiak dingin a na pekhin hi.
Huan Solomonin Gezer khua te, Beth-haron khangnungjaw khua te,
Baalath khua te, Israel gamdaia Tamar khua te,
Solomonin thil koih khawmna khua a neih tengteng te, a kangtalai koihna khua te, Jerusalem khuaah te, Lebanon ah te a vaihawmna gamsung tengtenga Solomonin lunggulh taka bawl a tup tengtengte a bawl hi.
Huan, Israel suante hi tei lou, Amorte, Hitte, Perizte, Jebuste om sun tengteng te;
A suan uh, huai gama om lai Israel suanten a hihman zoh vek theih louhte lakah Solomonin sikha, nasem dia goih teitei pawl a bawla, tutanin.
Israel suante bel Solomonin sikhain a bawl tei kei a: galkap mi te, a intekpa te, a mi lian te, a sepaih heutu te, a kangtalai leh a sakol tung tuang pawl heutute ahi jaw uhi.
Huaite Solomon nasep tunga heutu tuam, za nga leh sawmnga, nasep veng mite ahi uh.
Pharo tanu bel David khopi akipan amah in, Solomonin a lam sak ah apai tou a: huchiin Millo a bawlta hi.
huan, solomonin Toupa dinga a maitam bawl ah kum tengin thum vei halmanga thillat leh kilepna thil lat a lan jela, Toupa maa maitam ah gi, limte a hal tel jel hi.
Huchiin in mansak a hita.
Huan, kumpipa Solomonin Edom gama Tuipi san gei Eloth china om Eziongeber munah long hon a bawl hi.
Huan, Hiramin a sikha longmite, tuipia kiseksa, longa Solomon sikhate kiangah a sawl a.Huai mite Ophir ah a vahoh ua, huaia dangkaeng talent za li leh sawmnih a hon pua ua, kumpipa Solomon kiangah a hontun uh.
Huai mite Ophir ah a vahoh ua, huaia dangkaeng talent za li leh sawmnih a hon pua ua, kumpipa Solomon kiangah a hontun uh.
Huan, Toupa min dinga a thilhih tungtang thua Solomon minthan dan Seba kumpinun a najakin thu haksa pipi toh amah ettel tumin a kiangah a hoh a.
Huan, Jerusalem khua ah nungjuimi tampi piin, banghiam gimlimte leh dangkaeng tampi leh suangmantamte pua sangawngsaute tonpihin a hoha: huan, Solomon kiang a tunin a lungtanga a thu pai tengteng suah khe vekin a houpih a.
Huan, Solomonin a thu dot tengteng adawng veka; kumpipa theih louh, a hilhchet theih louh himhim a om het kei mai hi.
Huan, Seba kumpinun Solomon pildan tengteng, a in lam te,
A dohkana nek ding te, a sikhate tutdante, a nasemte nasep dan te, kivatdan te uh, a nou pe mi te, Toupa ina a lat halmanga thillatte a muhin lungsim chih leng a neita kei hi.
Huchiin kumpipa kiangah, na thilhihte leh na pildan te ka gama ka jak thuthang dik mahmah a na hi ngut hi.
Himahleh keimah ka mit mahmaha ka hongmuh masiah a gen uh ka um keia, huchiin ngaiin, a kimkhat leng a honna hilh sam ua, a gen uh ka najak sangin na pildan leh na hoihdan a nathupi hi.
Na mite, hiai na sikha, na kianga om gige na pilna thu ngaikhe gigete a hampha uhi!
Toupa na Pathian, na tunga kipak mahmah, Israelte laltutphaha hontusakpa phatin on hen: Toupan Israelte khantawnin a it a, huaijiakin diktat taka vaihawm dingin kumpipa din a honbawl hi, achia.
Huan, kumpipa dangkaeng talent ja leh sawmnih leh banghiam gimlim a tama tam leh suangmantamte a piaa: Seba kumpinun kumpipa Solomon banghiam gimlim a piak bang lawmlawma tam a lut ngeita kei.
Huan, Hiram longhon, Ophir akipana dangkaeng vapote leng Ophir akipanin almug sing tampi leh suangmantamte a hon pua uh.
Huan, kumpipan almug singte Toupa in leh kumpipa in umna dingin leh lasamite kaihging leh pekging bawlna ding nasanin a zanga: tutanin hichibang almug sing himhim a lutin, muh leng muh ahi nawnta kei hi.
Huan, a nget louh Solomonin a piakte chih louh leng kumpipa Solomonin Seba kumpinu a deih tengteng, a nget peuhmah a piaa.
Huchiin a omna gam lamah apai nawnta, a lawite toh.
Solomon kianga kum khat sunga dangkaeng lut gik dan dangkaeng talent za guk leh sawmguk leh guk buk ahi.
Sumsinmite laka leh thil juakmite, mi kitenhelte kumpipa tengtengte leh gam ukte laka lutte sim louhin.
Huan, kumpipa Solomonin dangkaeng sek pekin lum lian za nih a bawla: lum khatah dangkaeng sekel za guk a deih.
Huan, dangkaeng sek pekin lum za thum a bawla; lum khata dangkaeng maneh thum a deih a: huaite kumpipan Lebanon gammang In-ah a koih a.
Huan, kumpipan saiha laltutphah thupi mahmah a bawla, huai tuh dangkaenghoihpen tuiin a luana.
Laltutphah kaltouhnaah siksan guk a oma, huai laltutphah nung lam a hongkum phei kelkola: a tutna sik tuakah douna a om tuaktuak, huan, douna julte ah humpinelkai nih a ding uh.
Huan, siksan gukah, a sik tuakah humpinelkai sawm leh nih a ding ua: huchibang koi gamah leng a bawl ngei kei uh.
Kumpipa nou tengteng dangkaeng vek ahi a, huan, Lebanon Gammang Ina tuiumbelsuan tengtengte leng dangkaeng ngen mahmah ahi vek uh: dangkachi himhim a om kei; Solomon damlaiin huai jaw bangpiin a sim kei uh.
Kumpipan tuipi ah Hiram long hon kithuahpih Tarsis long hon a nei a: Tarsis long honin kum thum hal jelin dangkaeng te, dangkachi te, saiha te, jawng te, utong te leh a honpo sek jel ngala.
Huchiin kumpipa Solomonin khovela kumpipa tengteng hauh lam leh pil lamin a khup vek hi.
Pathianin a lungtanga pilna thu a koih sak ngaikhe dingin khovela mi tengtengin Solomon a hongjuan huthut jel uh.
Huan, michihin kipahman kum tenga piak bi neiin dangkachi tuiumbelsuan te, dangkaeng tuiumbelsuan te, puan te, galvan te, banghiam gimlim te, sakol te, sabengtung ta a hongpe jel uh.
Huan, Solomonin kangtalaite leh sakol tung tuang mite a kaikhawm ek a: kangtalai sang khat leh za li leh sakol tungtuang mi sing khat leh sang nih a nei a, huai te kangtalai koihnate ah, Jerusalem khuaa kumpipa omna ah te a om sak hi.
Huan, kumpipan Jerusalem khuaah a tam mahmah jiakin dangkachite suang bang maia seh khopin a om saka, sidar singte phaia theipi sing bang lela seh khopin a om sak hi.
Huan, Solomon neih sakolte Aigupta gam akipana hontolh khiak ahi; huan, kumpipa sumsinmiten huaite a honhonin a nakhak jel ua, a hona lei jel ahi.Aigupta gama kangtalai dangkachi sekel za guk jelin a hihtung sek ua, huan, sakol dangkachi sekel ja leh sawmnga jelin: huchibang mahin Hitte kumpipa tengteng leh Suria kumpipate leng a hihtun sak sek uhi.
Aigupta gama kangtalai dangkachi sekel za guk jelin a hihtung sek ua, huan, sakol dangkachi sekel ja leh sawmnga jelin: huchibang mahin Hitte kumpipa tengteng leh Suria kumpipate leng a hihtun sak sek uhi.
Solomonin Pharo tanu lou leng nam dang numei tampi Moab te, Ammon te, Edom te, Zidon te, Hitte numeite a ita;
Huai namte tungtang thu TOUPAN Israel suante kiangah, amau kithuahpih kei unla, amau leng honkithuahpih kei uhen: a pathiante uh lamah na lungtang uh lah a pi kawi ngei sin ua, chiin a nagen khin him a: huaite Solomonin itnain a len chinten hi.
Huchiin ji za sagih, kumpipa tanu a neia, mei za thum toh: huan, a jiten a lungtang a pi kawi sak uh.
Huan, hichi a honghi a, Solomon a hong upat nungin, a jiten Pathian dangte lamah a lungtang api kawi sak uh: huchiin a pa David lungtang bang in TOUPA a Pathian lamah a lungtang a honghoih kim ta kei hi.
Solomonin Zidonte pathiannu Astoreth leh Ammonte Pathian kihhuai mahmah Milkom a jui tei ta mawk hi.
Huan, Solomonin Toupa mitmuhin thil gilou a hihtaa, a pa David bangin Toupa a jui tettet ta kei hi.
Huchiin Solomonin Jerusalem china tangah Moabte Pathian kihhuai mahmah Memos ading leh, Ammon suante Pathian kihhuai mahmah Molek ading mun sang a nabawlta hi.
Huaibang mahin nam dang a jite tengteng a pathiante uh kianga kithoiha gimlim te halsekte adingin leng a bawl sak hi.
Huchiin, Toupa Israelte Pathian, a kianga nihvei kilakkhinsa a lungtangin a lehngat san jiakin Toupa tuh Solomon tungah a heh a,
Hiai thu, Pathian dangte a jui dimng ahi kei chih thu na pepa: TOUPAN thu a piak lah a pom tuan sam kei.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN Solomon kiangah, hichi bangin na omtaa, ka thukhun te leh ka thusehte pom dinga thu ka honpiak lah na pomta ngal keia, gam ka honsut ngeingei dinga, na sikha ka pe ding.
Ahihhangin na pa David jiakin na dam sung telin jaw ka hih tadih kei dinga: himahleh na tapa khuta kipan gam pen ahihleh ka honsut sin hi.
Gam tengteng bel ka hon sut vek kei dinga; himahleh ka sikha David jiak leh ka tel Jerusalem jiakin nam khat na tapa ka pe ding, a chi a.
Huan, Toupan Edom mi, Hadah Solomon melma dingin a honding khesaktaa: amah bel Edom gama kumpipa suan ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, David Edom gama a om laia, a mi thahte uh vui dinga sepaih heutu Joab a hoh touha, Edom mi pasal ta peuhmah a vathah khit nungin,
(Joab leh Israel mi tengteng kha guk tak Edom gama pasal tengteng a hihlup khit masiah a om uh ahi; )
Hadad bel a pa sikhate laka Edom mi khenkhatte toh Aigupta gama hoh dingin a tai ua; Hadad bel naupang nou ahi lai.
Midian gam akipan a pawt ua, Paran ah a hoh ua: huan, Paran akipanin mite a pi ua, Aigupta gam, Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharo kiang a tung suk ua; aman in a napia, nek ding te a na ngaihtuah saka, gamte leng a na pia a.
Hadadin Pharo mit a tung manmaha, huchiin a ji mahmah sanggamnu, kumpinu Tahpenes sanggamnu ji dingin a nei sak hi.
Huan, Tahpenes sanggamnuin tapa Gebubath a neihsaka, Tapenesin Pharo inah a nawi nek tawpna a bawl saka: huan, Genubath bel Pharo inah Pharo tate lak ah a omta.
Huan, Hadadin Aigupta gam akipana David a pute khawng kiang ah a ihmuta chih leh, sepaih heutu Joab leng a sitachih a na jak in, Hadadin Pharo kiangah, ka gam ua ka pai theihna dingin honpawt sak ve, a chi a.
Huchiin, Pharoin a kiangah, Ka kianga na omin taksap bang na nei a oi, ngaiin, huchia na gam lam ua pai nawn na tup mai mah? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Bangmah a hihleh neilou e: himahleh honpai sak himhim in, a chi a.
Huan, Pathianin a melma dingin Eliad tapa Rrzon, a pu Hadadezer, Zob kumpipa kianga kipana tai mangsa a honding sak nawna:
Davidin Zob khuaa mite a thahlai in aman a kiangah mite a kaikhawma, sepaihheutu dingin a napanga: huan, Damaska khuaah a hoh ua, huaiah a om ua, Damaska khuaah kumpipain a tuta.
Hadad hihgentheihna behlapin Solomon dam sung teng, Israelte melma ahi gige hima: Israelte a ho mahmaha, Suria gam tungah vai a hawm hi.
Huan, Nebat tapa Jeroboam, Zered khuaa Ephraim mi Solomon sikha mahin, (a nu min bel Zerui ahi a, meithai a hi), huai miin leng kumpipa tungah a khut a lik sama.
Kumpipa tunga a khut a honlikna san hichi bang ahi: Solomonin Milo a bawla, a pa David khua a siatna lailai a bawl hoih a.
Huai Jeroboam bel mi hat hangsan ahi: huchiin, Solomonin huai tangval bel mi thanuam tak hia a theih jiakin Joseph inkote nasep tengteng tungah heutu dingin a bawla.
Huan, Huai laiin hichi ahi a, Jeroboam Jerusalem khua akipana a pawt khiak laiin Silo mi jawlnei Ahijain lampi ah a namu a; Ahijain puan thak a silh a; amau gel kiain gamlakah a om khawm uh.
Huan, Ahijain a puan thak silh a laa, nen sawm leh nen nihin a botkekta.
Jeroboam kiangah, Nen sawm lain: Toupa, Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi a ahi: Ngaiin, gam Solomon ka sut dinga, nam sawm nang ka honpe ding:
(Ahihhangin ka sikha David jiak leh, Israel nam tengteng laka ka tel khopi, Jerusalem jiakin nam khat jaw nei na ve: )
Amau honpai san ua, Zidonte pathiannu Astoreth te, Moabte Pathian Kesmos te, Ammonte suante pathian Milkom te a biak jiak un leh ka mitmuha thil hoih hih ding leh ka sehte leh ka vaihawmte pom dinga a pa David banga ka lampite a zuih louh jiak un.
Gam pumpi jaw ka sut kei ding; ahihhangin ka thupiakte leh ka thusehte pompa, ka tel, ka sikha David jiakin a dam sungin kumpipain ka omsak lai ding:
Himahleh gam jaw a tapa ka sut dinga, nang ka honpe sin hi, nam sawmte.
Huan, ka sikha Davidin ka min omsak nadinga ka tel khopi Jerusalem ah ka maa khawnvak a neih gige theihna dingin nam khat bel a tapa ka pe ding.
Nang ka hon sep dinga, na ut utin vai na haawm dinga, Israelte kumpipa in na om ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, thu ka honpiak peuhmah na poma ka lampite na zuiha, ka sikha David banga ka sehte leh ka thupiakte jui dinga ka mitmuha thil hoih na hih leh na kiangah ka om jel ding, David adia ka dinkip sak bangin inkuan kip ka hondinkhiak sak dinga, Israelte ka honpe ding hi.
Huaijiakin David suan jaw ka hihgim sin hi, Ahihhangin khantawnin jaw ahi kei ding, a chi hi, chiin.
Huchiin Solomonin Jeroboam thath atuma, himahleh Jeriboam a dinga, Aigupta gamah, Aigupta gam kumpipa Sisak kiangah a taia, Solomon sih matan Aigupta gamah a omta hi.
Solomon tanchin dangte leh, a thilhih tengteng leh a pilna te Solomon thilhih gelhna bu ah atuang ka hia?
Solomonin Israel tengteng tunga Jerusalem khuaa vai a hawma sung kum sawmli ahi.Huchiin Solomon a pute kiangah a ihmua, a pa David khopi ah a vui uh; huan, a tapa Rehoboam a sikin a honglal ta hi.
Huchiin Solomon a pute kiangah a ihmua, a pa David khopi ah a vui uh; huan, a tapa Rehoboam a sikin a honglal ta hi.
Huan, Rehoboam Sekem khuaah a hoha; Israelte tengteng Sekem khuaah kumpipa dia amah bawl dingin a hohkhinta ngal ua.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Nebat tapa Jerobamin huai thu a najakin (kumpipa Solomon kianga kipana a tai mangna Aigupta gama omlai ahi a, huchiin Jeroboam Aigupta gama om lailai a vasam sak ua; )
Jeroboam leh Israel kikaikhawmte tengteng a hong ua, Rehoboam kiangah,
Na pan ka hakkol uh a giksak thei mahmaha: huaijiakin na pa honzat gimna leh, a hakkol gik tak ka tung ua a ngak honhih jang sak inla, huchiin na na kasem ding uh, chiin a hong gen ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Ni thum sung peuhmah va kikhin khe phot unla, huan, ka kiangah hongpai nawn un, a chi a, Huchiin mipite a kikhin khesakta hi.
Huan, kumpipa Rehoboamin a pa Solomon dam laia a kianga om sek upate, Hiai mipite ka dawn dan ding kizen bang non ngaihtuah pih ua oi? chiin a thu a dong a,
Huan, amau a kiangah, Tua hiaite sikhaa na oma, a na uh na sepa, amau dawna, a kiang ua thu hoih tak gen na tup leh, khantawnin na sikhain a om ding uh, chiin a gen ua.
Himahleh upate hoihsakpih a jui keia, amah toh kivual tangvalte, a kianga omsekte a thu uh adong zota hi.
A kiang uah, Hiai mipite, ka kianga, Na pan ka tung ua hakkol a ngak hon hihjangsak in, chia genmite ka dawn dan ding kizen bang non ngaihtuah pih ua oi? a chi a.
Huan, a khanvual tangvalten a kiangah, Hiai mipite, Na pan ka hakkol uh a gik sak thei mahmaha, nang honhihjang dih ve, na kianga chimite kiangah, hichibangin chiinla, hichibangin a kiang uah genin:
Ka pa kawng sangin ka khutme a lian jaw.
Ka pan hakkol gik tak a honna bat saka, ken na hakkol uh ka behlap sin lai hi: ka pan jepnain a honna sawi seka, ken ahihleh aikamin ka honsawi sin hi, chiin, a gen a.
Huchiin Jeroboam leh mipite tengteng kumpipan, Ni thum nung chiangin ka kiangah hong nawn un, chia ahilh bangin, a ni thum niin Rehoboam kiangah a vahoh ua.
Huan, kumpipan mipite khauh takin a na dawnga, jupate phatsak pihlah a pom keia:
Tangvalte hoihsak bangin, Ka pan na hakkol uh anagiksaka, ken na hakkol uh ka behlap lai sin, kapan jepnain a honna sawi seka, ken ahihleh aikamin ka hon sawi sin ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin kumpipan mipite thu gen a pom ta keia; huai bel Toupa jiak ahi.
Toupan Silo mi Ahija zanga, Nebat tapa Jeroboam kianga a thu gen a hihkip theihna dingin.
Huan, Israelte tengtengin kumpipan a thugen uh a pom kei chih a theih un, mipiten, David ah tantuan bang I nei ua?
Jesai tapa ah gouluah ding I nei sam kei uh: aw Israelte aw, na puanin lam uah pai un; Davad, na inkuan ngaihtuah maiin, chiin kumpipa a dawng uh.
Huchiin Israelte a puanin lam uah a paita uh.
Israel suan, Juda gam khua omte bel, a tunguah Rehoboamin vai a hawma.
Huchiin kumpipa Rehoboamin nasem dia a goih teiteite heutu Adoram a sawla; Israelte tengtengin suangin amah a deng ua, a si a.
Huan, kumpipa Jerusalem khua tai tumin a kangtalai ah a tuang zok a.
Huchiin Israelte David inkote tungah a nahelta uh, tutanin.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Israelte tengtengin Jeroboam a hong kik nawn chih a jak un, kikaihkhawmnaa hong dingin a sam sak ua, Israelte tengteng tungah kumpipain a bawlta uh: Juda nam lel lou David inkote jui kuamah a om kei uh.
Huan, Rehoboamin Jerusalem khua a tun takin Israel inkote doua Solomon tapa Rehoboam gam la nawn dingin Juda inkote tengteng leh, Benjamin nam, mi hangsan ngen a tel khiak, nuai khat leh sing giat tak a khawmkhawm a.
Himahleh Pathian mi Semai kiangah Pathian thu a hongtunga,
Juda gam kumpipa Solomon tapa Rehoboam kiangah leh Juda leh Benjamin inkote tengteng kiangah leh mipi dangte kiangah,
Toupan hichiin a chi, Vahoh tou kei un, Israel suan, na unaute vadou sam kei un; na in lam chiat uah pai nawn vek un; hiai hi kei hih ahi, chiin genin, chiin, Huchiin Toupa thu a mang ua, Toupa thu bangin a kik nawn ua, a pai nawn vek uh.
Huchiin Jeroboamin Ephraim tanggam ah Sekem khua a bawla, huaiah a oma; huan, huai a kipanin a pawtkhia, Penuel khua a bawl hi.
Huan, Jeroboamin a lungsimin, Gam David inkotea honghi nawn na mahmah inchia:
Hiai mite khawng Jerusalem khua Toupa ina kithoihnate lan dinga a hoh touh uleh hiai mite lungtangah a Toupa uh, Rehoboan, Juda gam kumpipa lamah a awn nawn mai ding; huchiin kei a honthat ding ua, Juda gam kumpipa Rehoboam lamah a belh nawn mai ding uh ka chi, a chi a.
Huchiin kumpipan mi a donga, dangkaeng bawngnou lim nih a bawla; a kiang uah, Nou dingin Jerusalem khuaa hoh touh a hak sa lotela; aw endih uh, Aigupta gam akipana honpikhepa na pathiante uh, a chi a.
Huan, khat Bethel ah a koiha, khat Dan ah a koih.
Huai thil bel khelhna a honghita hi: mipite lah a niha be dingin Dan phain a hoh ngal ua.
Huan, mun sang innte a lama, Levi tate hilou, vantang laka mi siampu ding bangin a bawl a.
Huan, Jeroboam in Juda gama ankuanglui a neih bangmah un kha giatna, huai kha ni sawm leh ni nga ni ankuanglui ni dingin a sep sama, maitamah a hoh tou a; Bethel ah a bawngnou lim bawl kianga kithoihin huchibangin a hih hi: huan, a bawl mun sang siampute Bethel ah a koih hi.Huan, aman a deih banga a seh kha mah, kha giatna, ni sawm leh ni nga niin Bethela a maitam bawl ah a hoh tou a; huan, Israel suante adingin ankuangluina a sepa, maitama gimlim hal dingin a vahoh tou hi.
Huan, aman a deih banga a seh kha mah, kha giatna, ni sawm leh ni nga niin Bethela a maitam bawl ah a hoh tou a; huan, Israel suante adingin ankuangluina a sepa, maitama gimlim hal dingin a vahoh tou hi.
Huan, ngaiin Juda gam akipan in Pathian mi khat, Toupa thu in Bethel ah a honga: huan, Jeroboam bel maitam chinah gimlim hal ding in ana dinga.
Huan, Toupa thuin matam a kikou khuma, maitam aw, maitam, Toupan hichiin a chi, ngaiin, David inkote lakah tapa a min Josia a hong piang dinga, na tunga gimlim hal sekpa, mun sang siampute na tunga kithoihna dingin a honlan dinga, na tungah mihing guhte a honhal ding uh chiin, achia.
Huan, huai ni mahin chiamtehna a pia a, hiai toupan chiamtehna ding a chih ahi: ngaiin, maitam a hong khangkham dinga, a tunga meivute a hong bo vek ding, chih, chiin.
Huan, hichi ahia, Pathian miin Bethel a maitam a kikou khum thu kumpipan a jakin, Jeroboam in, Man uh, chiin maitam akipan in a khut in a sawk a.
Huan, mat tuma a sawkna khut a zota a, huchiin a khut a kaikik nawn theita kei.
Pathian miin Toupa thua chiamtehna dinga a gen bangin maitam leng a khanga, maitam a meivute leng a bo vek.
Huan, Kumpipan a dawnga, Pathian mi kiangah, ka khut a hongdam nawn theihna dingin Toupa na Pathian hehpihna ngen inla, hon thumsak dih ve, achia.
Huan, Pathian miin Toupa kiangah a ngena, huan, Kumpipa khut a hongdam nawna, a malam bangmah in hong om nawnta a.
Huchiin, Kumpipan Pathian mi kiangah, ka in lamah ka kiangah pongpai inla, hongkhawl tawldam tadih ve, huan, kipahman ka honpe ding hi, achia.
Huan, Pathian miin kumpipa kiangah, na in kimkhat zah zong honpe sin mahle chiin, na kiangah ka hongpai tuan kei ding, hiai laiah tanghou ka nein tui himhim ka dawn sam kei ding:
Tanghou va nein tui himhim leng vadawn kenla, na vahohna lampi ah leng kik nawn ken, chia Toupa thua sawl ka hi, achia.
Huchiin lampi dangah a paia, Bethela a hongkuana lampi ah a paita kei hi.
Bethel khuaah jawlnei putek khat a oma; a tapa khatin huai nia Bethela Pathian mi thilhih tengteng a hilh vek a: kumpipa kianga a thu gente leng a pa uh a hilh lai ua.
Huan, a pa un a kiang uah, koilam lampi a tawna?
A chi a.
A tapaten Juda gam akipana hongpai Pathian mi pai nawna lampi a kawkmuh uh.
Huchiin a tapate kiangah, sabengtung honbawl sak dih uh, a chi a.
Huchiin sabengtung a bawl sak ua; huchiin a tuangta.
Huan, Pathian mi a delhtaa, toso sing nuaia a tu a vamua: a kiangah, nang na hi maw Juda gam akipana hong Pathian mi? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Hi e, a chi a.
Huchiin aman a kiangah, ka in lamah ka kiangah hong inla, tanghou hongne dih ve, a chi a.
Huan, aman, nang toh kik nawn thei kahi kei, na kianga hong thei leng ka hi sam kei: hiai laiah na kiangah thanghou ka nein tui himhim leng ka dawn sam kei ding:
Tanghou vanein, tui himhim leng vadawn ken la, na vahohna lampi ah leng kik nawn ken, chia Toupa thua hilh lah ka hi ngal a, a chi a.
Huan, aman a kiangah, kei leng nang bang maha jawlnei ka hi vo oi; angelin Toupa thuin, tanghoute nea tuite dawn dingin na in lamah pi kik nawnin, chiin a honhoupih hi, a chi a.
Himahleh a kiangah juau a gen ahi.
Huchiin a kiangah a kik nawna, a inah tanghoute a nein tui te a dawnta hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, dohkan a um lai un a pi kiknawnpa jawlnei kiangah Toupa thu a hongtunga:
Juda gama kipana hongpai Pathian mi kiangah, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Toupa thu gen na man louha, Toupa na Pathianin thu a honpiak na pom louh jiak leh,
Na vakik nawna, tanghou vanein tui himhim leng va dawm ken, a chihna mun mahmaha tanghou na neka, tui te na dawn jiakin na luang na pute hana koih ahi tei kei ding, chiin a gen kheta hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, tanghou te a neka, tuite a dawn zohin, jawlnei a pi kik nawnpa sabengtung a bawl saka.
Huan, a pai taa lam kalah humpinelkai toh a kituak ua, ana keita hi: huan, a luang lampiah lumlehin a oma, sabengtung a kiangah a dinga, humpinelkai leng luang chin mahah a ding thek.
Huan, ngaiin, mi ava hoh ua, lampia luang lumleha om leh, luang china humpinelkai ding thek a vamu ua: jawlnei putek pi omna khuaah a va gen uh.
Huan, lam kal akipan vapi kik nawnpa jawlneiin huai thu a najak takin, Pathian mi, Toupa thu gen mang nuam loupa ei ve: huchiin TOUPAN a kianga a gen, a thu bangbanga TOUPAN humpinelkai kianga pia a, a nahama, a nakeilumta ahi ve, a chi a.
Huan, a tapate kiangah, sabengtung honbawlsak dih uh, chiin a gen a.
Huan, a bawl sak ua.
Huan, a kuantaa, a luang lampia lumleha na om leh, sabengtung leh humpinelkai a luang china na ding thek a vamu a: humpinelkaiin luang a nane nai keia, sabengtung leng a nahihkeh kei.
Huan, jawlneiin Pathian mi luang a doma, sabengtung tungah a koiha, a kikpihtaa: huchiin jawlnei putek omna khuaah sun ding leh vui dingin a la luta hi.
Huan, a luang amah hanah a siala; huchiin, ka unaupa khawk hina mahmah e! chiin a kah uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, a vui khit nungin a tapate kiangah, ka sih chiangin Pathian mi vuina hanah honvui sam u: a guh chin ah ka guhte honkoih un.
Pathian thua Bethela maitam leh, Samari gam khopitea mun sang in tengteng a kikoukhumna thu hongtung ngeingei ding lah ahi ngala, chiin a gen a.
Huai thil zohin Jeroboamin a omdan dik lou a tawpsan tuan keia, vantang laka mi mun sang siampu dingin a bawl siampute a om theihna dingun a deihdeih a hihtuam jel hi.Huai thil Jeroboam inkuan khelhna amau ingamsaktu leh khovel akipan hihmagthang geihtu a honghi ta.
Huai thil Jeroboam inkuan khelhna amau ingamsaktu leh khovel akipan hihmagthang geihtu a honghi ta.
Huai laiin Jeroboam tapa Abija a china.
Huan, Jeroboamin a ji kiangah, thou inla, Jeroboam ji ahi chih a hon theih theihlouhna ding un kihihlamdang inla, Silo ah vahoh dih ve; ngaiin, huaiah jawlnei Ahija, hiai mite tunga kumpipa dia ka hongom ding ka tungtang thu genpa a om hi.
Huan, tanghoubeu sawm leh tanghou pei lianloute leh khuaiju thawl khat tawi inla, a kiangah vahoh dih: naupang omdan ding honna hilh ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jeroboam jiin huchibangin a hiha, a thou a, Silo ah a hoha, Ahija inah avahohta hi.
Ahijain khua a mu thei nawn keia; a upat jiakin a mit lah a mialta ngala.
Huan, TOUPAN Ahija kiangah, ngaiin, Jeroboam ji a tapa tungtanga thu hongdong dingin a hong; a chi a naa: hichibangin nahilh ding: hichi ahi dinga, a honglut chiangin numei dang hileh kilawm takin a hongkibawl sin ahi, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Ahijain huchia hongpi a honglut laia a khe sik ging a najak takin, nang Jeroboam ji, hong lut dih ve; bang achia ahia mi danga na kibawl?
Tanchin hoih lou tak nang honhilh dia sawl kei ve,.
Pai nawn inla, Jeroboam kiangah, TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi, mipite laka kipan ka hontawisanga, ka mi Israelte tungah heutuin ka honbawla,
David inkuante gam ka suta, huai nang ka honpia: himahleh nang ka sikha David bangin na om keia, aman jaw ka thupiakte a poma, ka mitmuha thil hoih kia hih tumin a lungtang tengtengin a honjui jela;
Nang bel na maa mite tengteng sangin thil nahihkhial mahmah sea, non hehsakna dingin Pathian dangte leh milim sunte na bawla, non nungngattaa:
Huaijiakin ngaiin, Jeroboam inko tungah thil hoih lou ka hontungsak dinga, Jeroboam akipanin ta pasal taphot Israel gama mi nehden leh den louh leng ka hihmang dinga, min ek a phiat siang sipsip bang maiin Jeroboam inkuan a gam vek ma siah kaphiat mang sin ahi.
Jeroboam inko laka mi, khopia si peuhmahte uiin a ne ding ua; huan, gama si peuhmahte tunga leng vasaten a ne dinguh: huai tuh TOUPAN a gen khin ahi.
Huchiin, thou inla na in lamah pai nawn maiin: khopi sung na sik takin naupang a si ding hi.
Huchiin Israelte tengtengin a sun ding ua, a vui ding uh; Jeroboam inkote lakah amah kia lah hana koih ding ahi sin ngala: Jeroboam inkuan lakah amah kiaa TOUPA Israelte Pathian tunga hoihna banghiam alat jiakin.
Huan, TOUPAN tu tawtawa Jeroboam inkuan honghihmangtu ding Israelte tunga kumpipa a kibawl ding: tuin leng bangchi ding a hita a?
TOUPAN lah tuia phaiphek lingling bangmaiin Israelte a honsatling dinga; huchiin Toupa hehsaka a Asehrte uh a bawl jiak un a pute uh a napiaksa, hiai gam hoih tak akipan Israelte a hon botkhe siang vek dinga, lui khen lamah a honhihjak vek ding.
Huan, Israelte thil hihkhialsaka ahih Jeroboam khelhnate jiakin Israelte a lehngatsan ding, chiin, a chi a.
Huan, Jeroboam ji a thou a, a pawtkhia, Tirza khua a vatunga: huan, in kongpi bul avatun takin naupang a sita hi.
Huan, TOUPAN a sikha Jawlnei Ahija zanga thu agen bang ngeiin Israelte tengtengin a vui ua, a sunta uhi.
Jeroboam tanchin dang- a gal sual thu te, a vaihawm thu te bel- ngaiin, Israel kumpipate vaihawm lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
Huchiin Jeroboam vaihawm sung kum sawmnih leh kum nih ahi: huan, a pute kiangah a ihmua, a tapa Nadab amah sikin a honglal ta hi.
Huan, Solomon tapa Rehoboam Juda gamah a lala.
Alal tung laiin Rehoboam kum sawmli leh kum khata upa ahi a, TOUPAN a min omsak nadinga Israel nam tengtengte laka a tel khopi Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum sagih a lala: a nu min Naama, Ammon mi ahi.
Judaten Toupa mitmuhin thil gilou a hih ua; apute uh thilhih tengteng khupin a khelhnate un a mullitna a tokthou sak ahi.
Tang sang tengah leh sing hing teng nuaiah suangphuh te phutin mun sangte leh Asehrte nangawn lah a bawl ngalua;
Huan, huai gamah pasal kijuakte leng a om ua: Israel suante maa TOUPAN a delhkhiak namte thilhih kihhuai chiteng bang a hih teita uhi.
Huan, kumpipa Rehoboam lal kum nga kumin hichi ahia, Aigupta kumpipa Sisakin Jerusalem khua a vasuala:
Toupa ina goute leh kumpipa ina goute a laa, a vekin a la khina: huan, Solomon dangkaeng lum bawl tengteng leng a la tel vek hi.
Huan, kumpipa Rehoboamin huaite tang dingin dal lumte a bawla, kumpipa in kongpi vengmi heutute a kem saka.
Huan, hichi ahia, kumpipa Toupa ina a lut peuhmah chiangin vengmiten a tawi ua, huan, dantanah a koih nawn jel uhi.
Rehoboam tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Juda kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang keimaw?
Rehoboam leh Jeroboam bel kidou himhimin a om nak ua.Huan, Rehoboam a pute kiangah a ihmua, David khopi ah a pute lakah a vuita ua: a nu min Naama, Ammon mi ahi.
Huan, a tapa Abijam a sikin a honglalta hi.
Huan, Rehoboam a pute kiangah a ihmua, David khopi ah a pute lakah a vuita ua: a nu min Naama, Ammon mi ahi.
Huan, a tapa Abijam a sikin a honglalta hi.
Nebat tapa kumpipa Jeroboam kum sawm leh kum giat a lal kumin Judate tungah Abijam a lal pana.
Jerusalem khuaah kum thum a lala: a nu min Maaka, Abisalom tanu ahi.
A maa apan thil gilou a hih tengteng a hih teia: a pu David lungtang bangin a lungtang Toupa a Pathian lamah a hoih kim tei kei hi.
Himahleh David jiakin Toupa a Pathianin a nunga a tapa hongdin khiakna ding leh Jerusalem khua ding kipsak dingin Jerusalem khuaah khawnvak anei saka;
Hit mi Uria tungtang chih louhin Davidin Toupa mitmuha thil hoih a hih sek jiaka leh a dam sung tenga hih dinga thu a piak peuhmah a sel ngei het louh jiakin.
Rehoboam bel a damsung teng Jeroboam toh a kidou ngitnget ua.
Abijam tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Juda kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna buah atuang ka hia?
Huan, Abijam leh Jeroboam a kidou sek uh.
Huan, Abijam bel a pute kiangah a ihmua; huchiin David khopi ah a vui uh; huan, a sikin a tapa Asa a lalta hi.
Israel kumpipa Jeroboam kum sawmnih a lal kumin Asa bel Judate tungah a lal pana.
Huan, kum sawmli leh kum khat Jerusalem ah a lala: a nu min Maaka, Abisalom tanu ahi.
Huan, Asain a pu David bang mahin Toupa mitmuhin thil hoih a hih jel hi.
Huan, pasal kijuakte gama akipan a delhkhia, a puten milim a nabawlte tengteng uh a thelthang sak vek a.
Huan, a nu Maaka leng, milim kihhuai mahmah Asehr a bawl sak jiakin, a kumpinu hih a tawpsaktaa; huan, Asain a milim bawl a satpuka, kidron luiah a hal hi.
Munsagte ahihleh a thelthang sak keia; himahleh Asa lungtang a damsung tengin Toupa lamah a hoih bukim hi.
Huan, a pan thil a nalatsate leh, a mah mahin analatsa, dangkachi te, dangkaeng te, tuiumbelsuan te Toupa inah a la lut hi.
Huan, Asa leh Israel kumpipa Baasaa lal sung teng un a kidou gige uh.
Huan, Israel kumpipa Baasain Judate a vasuala, Juda kumpipa Asa kianga lut ding leh pawtkhe ding dalna dingin Rama khua a bawl hi.
Huchiin Asain Toupa in leh kumpipa ina gou om lai dangkachi leh dangkaeng tengteng a laa, a sikhate a piaa; huan, kumpipa Asain Damaska khuaa om Suria kumpipa Hezion ta Tabrimmon tapa Benhadad kiangah,
Kei leh nang kalah lehkapa leh na pa kalah thukhun a om: ngaiin, kipahman dingin dangkachi leh dangkaeng ka hon khak hi; chih leh, Israel kumpipa Baasain hontawpsanna dingin a kianga na thukhun suse mai dih, chiin a khaka.
Huan, Benhadadin kumpipa Asa thu a napoma, huchiin Israel khuate sual dingin a sepaih heute a sawla, Ijon khua te, Dan khua te, Abel-bethmaaka khua te, Kinneroth bial tengteng, Napthali gam tengteng toh a suala.
Huan, hichi ahia, Baasa in huai thu ana jak takin Rama kho bawl a tawpa, Tirza khuaah a omta hi.
Huchiin kumpipa Asain Juda gam tengteng ah thu a thang sak vialvial a; kuamah awl mahmah a om kei uh: huchiin Baasain Rama kho bawlna ding a suang leh sing a zatte a nawn ua; huan, huaite zangin kumpipa Asa in Mizpa khua leh Benjamin gama Geba khua a bawl a.
Asa tanchin dang tengteng te, a thilhih te hihdan tengteng te, a thilhih tengteng te, a kho bawlte Juda kumpipate lal lei thu gelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Ahihhangin a tek lamin a khe ah hi banghiam a honveita hi.
Huan, a ihmu a, a pu David khopi ah a pute lakah a vui ua; huan, a tapa Jehosaphet a sikin a lal hi.
Huan, Jeroboam tapa Nadab Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum kum nihna ah Israelte tungah a lal pana, Israelte tungah kum nih a lal a.
Toupa mitmuh in thil hoihlou tak a hih seka, apa lampi a tawna, Isreal te thilhih a khialsaka a hihkhelhna pentak aman leng ahih tei hi.
Huan, Issakar inkuan te laka mi Ahija tapa Baasa in amah a guk sawma, Philistia te tan, Gebbethon khua ah Baasa in a thata; Nadab leh Israelte tengteng in Gebbethon khua a um lai uh ahi.
Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum thumna ah ahi Baasa in a thah a, asika a lal.
Huan, hichi ahia, kumpipa ahihtakin a hihchimih matan Jeroboam inkote tengteng a that a; a hing peuhmah khat leng Jeroboam a hawi sak kei; Toupa Silo khua a mi a sikha Ahija zanga ana gensa bangin:
Huai bel Israelte thil hihkhial saka ahih, Jeroboam khelhnate jiak leh Toupa, Israel te Pathian a hehsak jiak ahi.
Nadab tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Huan, Asa leh Israel kumpipa Baasa a lal sung teng un a kidou gige uh.
Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum thum na ah Ahija tapa Baasa Tirza khua ah Israel te tengteng tungah a lal pana, kum sawmnih leh kum li a lal hi.Toupa mitmuhin thilh hoihlou mahmah a hih seka, Jeroboam lampi zuih a jui tei a Israel te thil hihkhial saka a hih khelhna ahih tei hi.
Toupa mitmuhin thilh hoihlou mahmah a hih seka, Jeroboam lampi zuih a jui tei a Israel te thil hihkhial saka a hih khelhna ahih tei hi.
Huan, Baasa tungtang thu ah Hanani tapa Jehu kiangah Toupa thu a hongtunga:
Leivui a kipan ka hondom sanga, ka mite Israel te tungah heutu in ka hon bawla; huan, nang Jeroboam lampi tot na tawn teia, a khelhnate ua a hon hehsakna ding un ka mi Israel te thil na hihkhial saka;
Ngaiin, Baasa leh a inkote ka hihmang sin hi; huchiin Nebat Jeroboam inkote bangmai in na inkote ka bawl ding.
Baasa inkote laka mi khopi a si peuhmah te ui in a ne ding ua; huan a inko laka mi gam laka si peuhmah te tungleng vasa ten a ne ding uh, chiin.
Baasa tanchin dangte, a thilhihte a thilhih theihdan te Israel kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah atuang kei maw?
Huan, Baasa apute kiangah a ihmu a, Tirza khua ah a vui uh; huan, a tapa Ela a sikin a lal ta a.
Huan, Baasa leh a inkote tungtang thu ah khutsuak a Toupa hehsak na dia Jeroboam inkote batna nei a Toupa mitmuh a thil hoihlou mahmah a hih jiak leh amah a thah jiak in Hanani tapa jawlnei Jehu zanga a gen Toupa thu a hongtung hi.
Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmnih leh kum guk na ah Baasa tapa Ela Tirza khua ah Israel te tungah a lal pana, kum nih a lal hi.
Huan, a sikha Zimri, a kangtalai kimkhat tunga heutu in amah a guk sawma: huchihlai in Tirza khua ah, Tirza khuaa a insung lam heutu Arza inn ah ana kidawn khama:
Huan, Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmnih leh kum sagih kum in Zimri ava luta, a suala, a that a, a sikin a lal ta.
Huan, hichi ahia, a hong lal pana, a laltutphaha a hong tut takin, Baasa inkote tengteng a that veka: a tanaute leh a lawm te laka mi pasal ta photphot khat leng a hawi kei.
Huchiin, jawlnei Jehu zanga Baasa dema a gen, toupa thu bangin, Zimri in Baasa inkote tengteng a hih gawp vek hi.
Toupa, Israel te Pathian, a ginnat louh na ua hehsak dinga, a thohthoh ua, a hihkhelh uh, Baasa khelhnate leh Ela a tapa khelhna, huaia Israel te a hihkhelhsak na jiak un.
Ela tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna buah a tuang ka hia?
Juda kumpipa Asa lal kumsawm nih leh kum sagihna ah Zimri, Tirza khua ah ni sagih a lal a.
Philistiate tan, Gibbethon khua miten a um uhi,
Huan, a um miten Zimri in a guk sawma, kumpipa a that chih a gen uh ana ja ua; hichiin Israel te tengteng sepaih heutu, Omri, huai ni in a giahmun uah Israel te tunga kumpipa in a bawl uh.
Huan, Omri bel Israel te tengteng toh Gibbethon khua a kipan in ava hih tou ua, Tirza khua ava um uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, Zimri in khua ala uh chih a theih in, kumpipa ina kulh ah a tailuta, kumpipa innah a kibuhal a, a si ta.
Toupa mitmuh a thil hoihlou mahmah hiha a khelh nate jiak leh Jeroboam lampi tot tawn teia Israel te thil hihkhial saka a khelhna jiak in.
Zimri tanchin dang te leh, a sawm guk na thu te Israel te kumpipa te lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang ahi kei maw?
Huchiin Israel mite pawl nihin a hongkikhenta uh: mipi kimkhatin Ginath tapa Tibni kumpipa dinga bawl tumin a jui ua; huan, a kimkhatin Omri a jui uh.
Himahleh Omri juiten Ginath tapa Tibni juite a zou ua: huchiin Tibni a sia, Omri a lalta hi.
Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmthum leh kum khatnaah Omri Israelte tungah a lal pana, kum sawm leh nih a lala: Tirza khuaah kum guk a lala.
Huan, Semer ta Samari tang dangka talent nihin a leia; huan, tang ah khua a bawla, a kho bawl min dingin huai neipa Semer min tamin Samari a pu sak.
Omriin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou mahmah a hih seka, amaa mite tengteng sangin thil a hihkhial thupi tuamse hi.
Nebat tapa Jeroboam dan tengteng alaa, a ginnatlouhna jiak ua Toupa, Israelte Pathian hehsakna dinga Israelte thil a hihkhelhna bangin a khial teita ngala.
Omri thilhih tanchin dangte leh a thilhihtheihdan a hihlat thute Israel kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Huchiin Omri a pute kiangah a ihmua, Samari khua ah a vuita uhi; huan, a tapa Ahab a sikin a lal.
Juda kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmthum leh kum giatnaah Omri tapa Ahab Israelte tungah a lal pana: huan, Omri tapa Ahab Samari khua ah kum sawmnih leh kum nih Israelte tungah a lal.
Huan, Omri tapa Ahabin a maa mite tengteng sangin Toupa mitmuhin thil hoihlou mahmah a hih nak.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhna bang hih sam khawng bangmah loua ngai hileh kilawm takin, Zidonte kumpipa Eth-bal tanu Jezebel jiin a neia, Baal na te semin a be tei ta mawk a.
Huan, Samari khuaa Baal in a lamah Baal adingin maitam a bawla.
Huan, Ahabin Asehr a bawla; a maa Israel kumpipate tengteng sangin Ahabin Toupa, Israelte Pathian hehsakna thil a nak hih tungtuan hi.A lal laiin Bethel mi Hielin Jeriko khua a bawla; a tachil Abiram tanin a suangphum aphuma; huan, a nautum Segup tanin a kulh kongkhakte a dingkhe saka, TOUPAN Nun tapa Josua zanga a nagensa bangin.
A lal laiin Bethel mi Hielin Jeriko khua a bawla; a tachil Abiram tanin a suangphum aphuma; huan, a nautum Segup tanin a kulh kongkhakte a dingkhe saka, TOUPAN Nun tapa Josua zanga a nagensa bangin.
Gilead gama Tisbe khuaa mi Elijain Ahab kiangah, Toupa, a kianga ka om sekna Israelte Pathian hinna louin ka gen hi: kum bangzah hiam sungin ka thu louin dai leh vuah himhim a ke kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Toupa thu a kiangah a hongtunga,
Hiai akipan pawt inla, suah lam juanin pai inla, Jordan china om Kerith luiah vabu in.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga.
Huai lui tui na ne dinga; huai laia nang on vak dingin vaak thu ka pe khin hi, chiin.
Huchiin a kuan a, toupa thu bangin a hihta a: Jordan chin a om Kerith luiah ava omta hi.
Huan, vaak ten jing lamin tanghou leh sa a hong puak jel ua, nitaklam in tanghou leh sa hong puak nawn jeljel uh; huan, lui tui a ne a.
Huan, a nung deuh in hichi ahia, huai gama vuah himhim a zuk louh jiak in lui a hong kangtata.
Huan, Toupa thu a kiangah a hongtunga,
Thou inla, Zidon gama Zarephath khuaah hoh inla, huaiah omin: nang honvak dingin meithai khat thu ka pe khinta, chiin,
Huchiin a thou a, Zarephath khuaah a hohta a; huan, huai kho kulh kongpi ava tunin ngaiin, meithai khat sing tom ana om a; amah a sama, Belin tui neuchik honla dih ve, kana dawn ding, achia.
Huan, la dinga a kuan a sama, tanghou neuchik bek hontawi lechin, achia.
Huan, aman, Toupa na Pathian hinna louin, ka gen tanghou jaw ka neikeia, bel ah tangbuang pham khat lel leh, thawl ah sathau neuchik kia ka neia; huan, ngaiin, ka pai chia ka tapa a ding bawlna dingin singkang nih hiam leh ka tom a, huchiin ka ne ding ua, ka si mai ding uh, achia.
Huan, Elija in a kiangah, lau ken; na gen bangin va hih in: Ahihhangin huaiin tanghou neuchik petmah honbawlsak phot inla, huai hontawi inla, huai khit chiangin nanga ding leh na tapa ading na bawl na ke.
Toupa, Israel te Pathianin hichiin achia, Toupan leitung a vuah a honzuk sak masiah tangbuang bel pen a vuak tuan kei dinga, sathau thawl leng akang kei ding, chiin, achia.
Huchiin, Elija gen bangin ava hih a: huan, amah leh a inkote leh Elija toh ni bangzah hiamk tak ane uh.
Elija zanga a gen Toupa thu bangin tangbuang bel bel a vuak tuan keia, sathau thawl leng a kang sam kei hi.
Huan, huai thil nungin hichi ahia, in neinu, numei tapa achi a hong na a; a china a gim mahmah a, a nak a tawpta.
Huan, aman Elija kiangah, nang Pathian mi aw, nang leh kei bang ahia I hih uh? ka khelh na hon theikhe sak ding leh ka tapa honthah sak ding a hongpai nei ve!
Achia.
Huan, aman a kiangah, na tapa honpe dih ve leh, achia.
Huchiin a pom lai a laksak a, a omna dantan ah a pom tou a, a lupna ah a lumsak hi.
Huan, toupa a sama, Aw Toupa ka Pathian, ka tenna meithai nu tungah leng a tapa hihlup sakin thil hoihlou na hon tungsak ta ahia?
Achia.
Huchiin, naupang tungah thumvei a kijia a, toupa a sam, Aw Toupa ka Pathian, hehpihtakin hiai naupang hinna amah ah honom sak nawn in achia.
Huan, Toupan Elija thu ana ngaihkhiak saka; hichiin naupang hinna amah ah a hong om nawna, a honghalh nawnta.
Huan, Elija in naupang a pi a, dantan a kipanin in sungah a paipih suka, a nu a pia hi; huan, Elija in, enin, na tapa a dam nawnta hi, achia.Huan, numei in Elija kiangah tuin tuh Pathian mi na hia, na kama Toupa thu thutak ahi chih kana theita hi, achia.
Huan, numei in Elija kiangah tuin tuh Pathian mi na hia, na kama Toupa thu thutak ahi chih kana theita hi, achia.
Huan, ni sawt kuam tak nungin hichi ahia, a kum thum kum in Toupa thu Elija kiangah a hongtunga, Va kuan inla, Ahab kiangah va kihil in; huchiin leitungah vuah ka hon zusak sin, chiin.
Huan, Elija Ahab kianga kihil dingin a kuanta a.
Samari gamah kial a na mahmah mai hi.
Huan, Ahab in Obadia, a in sunglam heutu a sama.
(Obadia bel Toupa laudan siam mi tak ahi a;
Hichi ahia, Jezebel in Toupa jawlnei te a heuh a heuh laiin Obadia in jawlnei ja a pi a, kokhuk ah sawmnga nga in a sel a, tanghou leh tuiin a vak jel hi)
Huan, Ahab in Obadia kiangah, tui naknei tengteng leh luiguam tengteng omna lam gam va tuan vialvial dih ve; sakol leh sabengtung te I hut hing theih na dingin loupa te I muhsak thei kha hiam, huchilou in jaw gante I tan vek kha ding uh, achia.
Huchiin gam tot suak ding a kihawm ua: Ahab pen amah kia in lampi dangah a paia, huan, Obadia pen amah kia in lampidangah a pai hi.
Huan, huchia Obadia a pai laiin, ngaiin, Elija toh a kituak ua: huan, aman amah a thei laia, huchiin a khupboh a, nang na hi maw, ka pu Elija?
Achia.
Huan, aman a dawnga, hi e, kuan inla, ngaiin, Elija huaiah a om hi, chiin na pu va hilh in, achia.
Huan, aman, thil bang ahia ka hihkhelh a, na sikha thah dinga Ahab khuta piak na ut mawk?
Toupa na Pathian hinna louin ka gen hi, ka puin nang honzonsak louhna nam leh gam himhim neilou eive: Hiai ah a omkei, a chih chiang un nang a honmuh louhna thu uah gam leh nam pen a kichiam sak jel hi.
Tuin nang, kuan inla, ngaiin, Elija huaiah a om hi, chiin na pu va hilh in, na chi mawka.
Hichi ahi dinga, nang ka hon nutsiat takin Toupa kha in ka theih louhna ah nang a hongla mang dinga; huchiin Ahab kava hilh a, nang a hon muh theih ngal ken jaw kei a hon that mai ding hi: himahleh na sikha in ka valnou tunga kipan Toupa laudan siam sek ka hi ngala.
Jezebel in Toupa jawlnei te a thah laia ka thilhih, Toupa jawlnei te laka mi ja, sawmnga nga a kokhuk a, tanghou leh tuia ka vak dan te ka tapa hon hilhlou uhia?
Tuin nang, kuan inla, ngaiin, Elija huaiah a om hi, chiin na pu va hilhin na chi mawk a: a honthat mahmah ding achia.
Huan, Elija in, a kianga ka om sekna sepaih te Toupa hinna lou in ka gen hi, tuni in a kiangah ka kihil ngeingei ding hi, achia.
Huchiin Obadia Ahab houpih dingin a kuana, ava hilh ta a: Huan Ahab Elija muh tumin a kuanta hi.
Huan.
Hichi ahia, Ahab in Elija ava muhin Ahab in a kiangah, nang na hi maw, Israel te lunghimoh sakpa? achia.
Huan, aman a dawnga, Israel te ka lunghimoh sak kei hi; nang leh na pa inkote eive lunghimoh sak jaw, Toupa thupiak te lehngat sana, Baal na pom jawk na ah.
Huchiin tuin Israel te tengteng leh Baal jawlnei za li leh sawmnga leh, Asehr jawlnei, Jezebel dohkan a ankuang um jeljel na li te ka kiangah karmel tangah vasam khawmsak in achia.
Huchiin Ahab in Israel suante tengteng kiangah mi a sawla, jawlnei te karmel tangah a sam khawma.
Huan, Elija in mipi te tengteng a vanaih a, vang laka bangtan om sin na hia ua?
Toupa pen Pathian ahihleh, amah jui unla; huan, Baal ahihleh, amah jui un, achia.
Mipiten kam khat in leng a sawng kei uh.
Huchiin, Elija in mipite kiangah, Toupa jawlnei om sun kei kia ka hia; Baal jawlnei te bel mi za li leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Huchiin bangtal nih hong pia u henla; amauten bangtal khat amau tuam dingin tel u henla, sem hen u henla, sing tungah koih u henla, a nuaiah mei toh louin: huan, ken leng bawngtal khat ka bawl sam dinga, sing tungah ka koih dinga mei ka toh sam kei ding hi.
Huan, nou na Pathian min uh lou unla, ken leng Toupa min ka lou ding: huchiin meia hondawng Pathian pen Pathian hi hen, achia.
Huan, mi tengteng in a dawng ua, a dik hi, achi uh.
Huchiin Elija in Baal jawlnei te kiangah, nou bawngtal khat na tuam ding un tel unla, bawl masa un; nou na tam deuh ua; huan, na Pathian min uh lou unla, Ahihhangin a nuaiah mei toh kei un, achia.
Huan, bawngtal a tan pen uh a la ua, a bawl ua, Baal aw, hondawng in, chiin jingsang akipan sun tanin Baal min a lou ua, himahleh aw peuhmah a om kei a, dawngtu himhim leng a om sam kei.
Huan, a maitam bawl kim uah a tawmtawm mai mah ua.
Huan, sunlaiin hichi ahia, Elija in amau enghou in, kikou ngaih set ve ua: Pathian ahi ngala; a kingaihtuah tadih hiam, a bu tadih jual hiam, ava om mang jual hiam, ahihkeileh a ihmu zenzen a, khanloh sak ding hiam ahia hiin teh, achia.
Huan, a ngaih a ngaih in a kikou ua, a hih sek bang dan un temta leh teipi khawng in si pawt zungzung zou in a kivut ua.
Huan, ni a hong kihekin hichi ahia, nitaklam kithoih hun tanin la a sa ua; himahleh aw himhim a om kei a, dawngtu himhim hiam ana limsaktu himhim leng a om sam kei.
Huchiin Elija in mipi tengteng kiangah, hongnai dih ua, achia; huan, mipite tengteng in a naih ua.
Huan, Toupa maitam chipsaksa a bawl pha a.
Huan, na min Israel ahi ding, chia toupa thu na mupa Jakob tate nam zah suang sawm leh nih Elija in a la a,
Huan, suangte in maitam Toupa min in a bawla; huan, maitam kim buhchi tehna nih ta takin a tou kuak a.
Huan, sing a koih hoih sisip a, bawngtal a sem nena, sing tungah a koih a.
Huan, bel li tui in dim sak unla, halmang thillat leh sing buak un, achia.
Huan, buak nawn un achia; a buak nawn uh.
Huan, buak nawn un, achia; a buah behlap nawn ua.
Huan, tui maitam kimah a luang juajua hi; huan, toh kuak tuiin a dimsak lai hi.
Huan, nitaklam kithoih hun laiin hichi ahia, jawlnei Elija in ava naiha, Toupa aw, Abraham te, Isaak te, Israel te Pathian, nang Israel gama Pathian na hihleh, kei na sikha ka hih, hiaite tengteng nang thua ka hih tuni in theichiat uhen.
Honna ngaihkhiak sak inla, hiai mipiten nang Toupa Pathian na hi a, a lungtang te uh na kileh heisak nawnta ahi chih ana theihtheih na ding un Toupa aw, honna ngaihkhiak sakin, achia.
Huchiin, Toupa mei a hong kia a, halmang thillat te, sing te suang te, leivui te a kang manga, tohkuak a tui a hip kang khin vek hi.

Huan, Elija in a kianguah, Baal jawlnei te man unla, khat leng khah kei uh, achia.
