Toupa inkongpi sak nung jaw a bawl hoih hi.
Huchiin Jotham tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng Judate kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang ahi kei maw?
Huai laiin Suria kumpipa Rezin leh, Remulia tapa Peka bel Judate sual dingin Toupan a sawl pan hi.Huan, Jotham bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmu a, a pi pute lakah a pu David khopi ah a vui ua; huan, a tapa Ahaz a sikin a lalta hi.
Huan, Jotham bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmu a, a pi pute lakah a pu David khopi ah a vui ua; huan, a tapa Ahaz a sikin a lalta hi.
Remalia Tapa Peka kum sawm leh kum sawm leh kum sagih a lal kumin Juda Kumpipa Jotham tapa Ahaz a lal pana.
Ahaz a lal pattungin kum sawmniha upa ahi; huan, Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum guk a lala.
A pu David bangin TOUPA a Pathian mitmuhin thil hoih pipi a hih tei kei hi.
Israel kumpipate lampi tot a tawn teia, ahi, TOUPAN Israel suante maa a delh khiaksa namten thil kihhuai tak a hih jel bang un a tapa meiah a lutsak a.
Huan, mun sangte, tangahte, sing hing chih nuaiah te a kithoiha, gimlim a hal sek a.
Huchiin Suria kumpipa Rezin, leh Israel kumpipa Remalia tapa Peka bel Jerusalem sual dingin a kuan tou ua; Ahaz a vaum ua, himahleh a zou theikei uh.
Huai laiin Suria kumpipa Rezinin Elath khua Suria gam dingin a la nawna, Judate Elath khua akipan a delh khia; huan, Suriatein Elath khua a valuah ua, tutanin a om lai uh.
Huchiin Ahazin Assuria kumpipa Tiglath-pilezer kiangah.
Na sikha leh na tapa ka hi ka hia; kei honsual dinga hongkuan, Suria kumpipa khut akipan leh Israel kumpipa khuta kipan honhun khe dih ve, chiin mi a sawla.
Huan, Ahazia TOUPA ina dangka leh dangkaeng om peuhmah, kumpipa ina gou koihkhawmna toh a laa, Assuria kumpipa kiangah kipahman dingin a khaka.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan a thugen a na poma; huchiin Assuria kumpipan Damaska khua a vasuala, a laa, a mite Kir gamah salin a pi a, Rezin a that hi.
Huan, kumpipa Ahaz bel Assuria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser houpih dingin Damaska khuaah a hoha, Damaska khuaa maitam a vamu-a huchiin kumpipa Ahazin huai maitam lim leh a bawl dan bang geih uh enton dingin siampu Urija kiangah a khaka.
Huan, siampu Urijain maitam a bawla; kumpipa Ahazia Damaska khua akipana a khak bang geihin siampu Urijain Damaska khua akipana Ahaza hongpai nawn a nabawl khin keuhkeuh a.
Huan, Damaska khua akipan kumpipa a hongtun laiin maitam a mu a; huan, kumpipan maitam a naiha, a kah tou a.
Huan, maitamah a halmang thillat te halin a tangbuang thillat te a lana, a dawn ding thillat a sunga, a lemna thillat te sisan a theh hi.
Huan, TOUPA maa dal maitam, a maitam leh TOUPA in kikala, in majawna kipan a la suana a maitam mal lampangah a koih.
Huan, kumpipa Ahazin, Maitam lianpi ah jing lam halmang thillatte, nitak lam tangbuang thillat te, halmang thillat te, a tangbuang thillat te, I gam ua mipi tengteng halmang thillatte, atangbuang thillat te uh, a dawn ding thillat te utoh halin lan inla; huan, a tungah halmang thillat sisan tengteng leh, kithoihna sisan tengteng theh in; dal maitam bel kei houpihna ding ahi ding, chiin siampu Urija thu a pia hi.
Huchiin siampu Urijain kumpipa Ahaz thupiak bangbangin a hihta hi.
Huan, kumpipa Ahazin tunna kuakte a hihsiaih, kisilna bel a koih tuama; a tunna dal bawngtal akipanin loh a la khiaa, suanglep tungah a tung a.
Huan, khawlni adinga tung nei lampi ina a bawl u leh in polama kumpipa jiakin TOUPA in dingin a kheng geiha.
Huchiin Ahaz thilhih tanchin dangte bel Juda kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang ahi kei maw?Huan, Ahaz bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmu a, a pi leh pute lakah David khopi ah a vuita uh; huan, a tapa Hezekia bel a sikin a lalta hi.
Huan, Ahaz bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmu a, a pi leh pute lakah David khopi ah a vuita uh; huan, a tapa Hezekia bel a sikin a lalta hi.
Juda Kumpipa Ahaz kum sawm leh kum nih a lal kumin Ela tapa Hosia Israelte tungah Samari khuaah a lal pana, kum kua a lal.
Huan, TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou tak ahi seka, ahihhangin a maa Israel kumpipate bang jenin jaw ahih kei.
Assuria kumpipa Salmaneserin a vasima, huchiin Hosia a sikha a honghi a, siah te a pe sek hi.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan Hosia in a guka a sawm thu a na theikhiaa; Aigupta kumpipa So kiangah mi a sawla, kum china a piak sek bangin lah Assuria kumpipa siah a peta ngal kei behlapa; huaijiakin Assuria kumpipan suangkulhah hensain a khumta hi.
Huchiin Assuria kumpipan gam tengteng a tuan suak veka, Samari khuaah a hoh tou-a, kum thum a um hi.
Hosia kum kua a lal kumin Assuria kumpipan Samari khua a laa, Israelte Assuria gamah a pi a, Hala gamah khawng, Gozan gama Habor luiah te khawng, Mediate khuaah khawng a omsaka.
Huchibanga a na omna uh a jiak Israel suanten Aigupta kumpipa Pharo khut akipan, Aigupta gam akipana pikhepa TOUPA a Pathian uh tunga thil a hihkhelh ua, pathian dangte a khawksak jawk ua.
TOUPAN Israel suante maa a nadelh khiaksa namte thuzoh leh Israel kumpipate pom thusehte banga a om louh jiak uh ahi.
Huan, Israel suanten TOUPA a Pathian uh tungah thil hoih lou tak a gukin a hih sek ua, a khuate tengteng uah galvilmite in sang akipana kulh nei kho phain mun sangte a bawl uh.
Tang sang tengah leh sing hing teng nuaiah suangphuhte phutin Aser te a bawl ua;
Huai mun sang tengtengahte TOUPAN a ma ua a delh mangsa namte hih dan bangin gimlimte a hal sek uh; TOUPA hehna dingin thil gilou pipi a hih sek nalai uh;
TOUPAN a kiang uah, Hichi bang hih kei un, a chih milimte na leng a sem sek uh.
TOUPAN, Dan juih ding na pi leh pute uh ka piak leh ka sikha jawlneite zanga ka hontheihsak bang jelin, na omdan gilou uh lehngatsan unla, ka thupiakte leh ka thusehte pom un, chiin Israelte leh Judate jawlnei chih leh mutheimi chih zangin a theisak sek hi.
Huchipipiin leng a pom nuam kei ua, a pi leh pu uh, TOUPA a Pathian uh um nuam lou mite a paupeng sek bang un a paupeng uhi.
Huan, a thuseh te, a pi leh pute uh kianga a thukhun te, a kiang ua a thutheihsakte khawk a sa nuam kei ua; thil ginalou peuh a pom ua, bangmah lou phet a honghi uh: a tung thu ua TOUPAN, Amau bangin jaw hih kei un, a nachihsa, a kiang khawng ua namte hih dan a la tei uhi.
Huan, TOUPA a Pathian uh thupiak tengetengte a lehngatsan ua, bawngnou lim sun nih a bawl ua, huan, Asera a bawl ua, vana om tengteng a bia ua, Baal na a sem gige uh.
Huan, a tapate uh leh a tanute uh meiah a lut sak ua, aisan te leh bum te bang a ching ua, TOUPA hehna dingin a mitmuhin thil hoih lou pipi hih dingin a kijuak uhi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA Israelte tungah heh petmahin a heha, a muhphak louhna ding ah a suan manga; Juda nam kia loungal a omta kei uh.
Judaten leng TOUPA a Pathian uh thupiakte a jui kei ua, Israelte pom thusehte bangin a om jaw uh.
Huan, Israel suante himhim a deih ta keia, amau a hihgentheia, a muh phak louhnaah a suan mang masiah lok mite khut ah a pia hi.
Israelte lah David inkote a hihna uh a paih sakta ngala; huchiin Nebat tapa Jeroboam pen kumpipa din a nabawl ua; huan, Jeroboam in Israelten TOUPA a zuih uh a nahawl kawia, thil gilou thupi mahmah a hihsak hi.
Huan, Israel suanten Jeroboam thilhih khelh bangbang a hih tei ua; huaite a paisan kei uh;
TOUPAN a jawlneite tengteng zanga a nagensa banga a phak louhna dia a suan mang ma siah.
Huchiin Israelte bel amau gam akipan Assuria gamah a pi ua, tu tanin a om lai uhi.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan Babulon khuaa mite, Kuth khuaa mite, Ava khuaa mite, Hamath khuaa mite, Sepharvaim khuaa mite a thukhak khiaa, Samari gam khuate ah Israel suante mun a luah sak; huchiin Samari gam aluah ua, a khuate ah a om uhi.
Huchiin huai laia a om tung un hichi ahi a, TOUPA laudan a siam kei ua; huchiin TOUPAN a lak uah humpinelkaite a sawla, mi khenkhatte a kei uh.
Huchiin Assuria kumpipa kiangah, Na kaih mang namte, Samari gam khuaa na lut sakten hiai lai gam Pathian biak dan a theikei uhi, huaijiakin a lak uah humpinelkaite a sawla; huan ngai dih, hiai gam Pathian biakdan a theih louh jiak un a pet sek uhi, chiin a gen ua.
Huchiin Assuria kumpipan, Huaia sala na pite uh laka mi siampu khat pi unla, hongom sam leh, huai gam Pathian biak dan sinsak leh, chiin thu a pia a.
Huchiin Samari gam akipana a pite uh laka siampu khat Bethel khuaah a vaoma, TOUPA laudansiam dan ding a sinsak.
Himahleh nam chihin amau pathian chiat a bawl ua, Samari miten mun sang a nabawl in uahte nam chihin amau omna khua chiatah a koih uhi.
Babulon miten Sukkoth-benoth a bawl ua, huan, Kuthten Nergal a bawl ua, huan, Hamathten Asima a bawl ua,
Avaten Nibhaz leh Tartak a bawl uh, Huan Sepharvaim Sepharvaimte pathian Adrammelek leh Anammelek minin a tate uh a hal sek uhi.
Huchiin TOUPA laudan a siam ua, a lak ua mi mun sang siampute a bawl ua, mun sang inte ah mi a thoih jel uhi.
TOUPA laudan a siam ua, a pi khiakna gam ua mite nam hih dan bangin amau pathiante na a sem sek uh.
Tumalama a hih dan uh bangin tutanin a hih lalai uhi; TOUPA laudan a siam kei ua, TOUPAN Jakob suan Israelte chi-a a chihte kiangah,
Pathian dangte jaw laudan siam kei unla, amau chibai buk kei unla, a kiangah kithoih kei un;
TOUPA, thilhihtheihna thupi tak leh ban jak hiala Aigupta gam akipana nou honpi khepa amah laudan na siam jawk dinguh ahi, amah chibai na buk ding uh ahi a, amah kianga na kithoih ding uh ahi;
Huchiin thuseh te, vaihawm te, dan te, thupiakte a honna gelhsaksate khantawnin na pom thek ding uh ahi; pathian dangte laudan na siam ding uh ahi kei;
Huan, na kiang ua thu ka khunpen na mangngilh ding uh ahi kei; pathian dangte leng laudan na siam dinguh ahi sam kei;
TOUPA na Pathian ubel laudan na siam ding uh ahi; huchiin na melmate uh tengteng khuta kipan aman honhunkhe dinga, chi-a thu a khuna, amau adia TOUPA thupiakte, thuseh te, vaihawm te, dan bawlte, azuih tuan louh uh.
Bangchi mahin leng a jui nuam tuankei ua, tumalama a hih danbang un a hih lailai uh.Huchiin huai namten TOUPA laudan a siam ua, a milim bawl tawmte uh na leng a sem lai uh; huchi mah-bangin a suante uh leh a suante uh suante tan un leng tutanin a pi leh pute uh hih bangin a hih lailai uhi.
Huchiin huai namten TOUPA laudan a siam ua, a milim bawl tawmte uh na leng a sem lai uh; huchi mah-bangin a suante uh leh a suante uh suante tan un leng tutanin a pi leh pute uh hih bangin a hih lailai uhi.
Huan, Ela tapa Israel kumpipa Hosia kum thum a lal kumin hichi ahi a, Juda kumpipa Ahaz tapa Hezekia a lal pana.
A lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kumngaa upa ahi; huan, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh kum kua a lala; a nu min Abi, Zekaria tanu ahi.
Huan, a pu David thilhih peuhpeuh hih teiin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoihtak a hih sek hi.
Mun sangte a hihgawp a, suangphuhte a hihchima, Asera te a phuk a; huan, Mosi dal gul bawlte a kitam nen sak vek a; huai hun tanphain Israel suanten a kiangah gimlim a hal sek uh; huai bel Nehustan a chi uhi.
Aman TOUPA Israelte Pathian a muanga; huchiin a nunga Juda kumpipate tengteng lakah amah bang kuamah a om kei ua, a malamin leng a om sam kei uh.
TOUPA a lenchintena, amah a zuih a tawp nuam keia, a thupiak TOUPAN Mosi a piakte a jui hi.
Huchiin TOUPA a kiangah a oma; a vak khiakna peuhah a lamzang jel a; Assuria kumpipa tungah a hela, a na a semta kei hi.
Philistiate bel Baza kho tanin a gam chiang tengteng toh, galvilmite in sang akipana kulh nei kho tanin a zou vek hi.
Huan, kumpipa Hezekia kum li a lal kum, Israel kumpipa Ela tapa Hosia kum sagih a lal kumin hichi ahi a, Assuria kumpipa Salmaneserin Samari khua a suala, a um a.
Huan, kum thum a chin kumin a la ua; Hezekia kum guk a lal kum, Israel kumpipa Hosia kum kua a lal kumin ahi Samari khua a lak.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan Assuria gamah Israel a pi manga, Hala ah te, Habor ah te, Gozan lui tungah te, leh Mediate khuaah te a omsak ta hi:
TOUPA a Pathian uh thu a man nop louh ua, a thukhun a bohsiat jawk sop ua, TOUPAN a sikha Mosi thu a piak tengteng ngei a pom nop louh jiak un.
Huan, kumpipa Hezekia kum sawmleh kum li a lal kumin Asuria gam kumpipa Sennakerib bel Juda gama khua kulhpi nei tengteng sual dingin a hoh tou a, a la taa.
Huan, Juda kumpipa Hezekiain Lakis khuaa Assuria kumpipa kiangah, Thil ka na hihkhial a hita hi, chiin thu a khak a.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan Juda kumpipa Hezekia dangka talent zathum leh dangkaeng talent sawmthum a bikhiah saka.
Huchiin Hezekiain TOUPA ina dangka om tengteng leh kumpipa ina gou koihkhawmnaa tengteng a pia.
Huai tung mahin Hezekiain TOUPA biakin kongkhaka leh, Juda kumpipa Hezekiain dangkaeng a luante veka, Assuria kumpipa a pia hi.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan Tartan te, Rabsari te leh Rabsake te sepaih tampi toh Lakis khua akipanin Jerusalem khuaa kumpipa Hezekia kiangah a sawla.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a tung tou ua.
Huan, a tun touh un puansawpmi lam lian lampi-a dil saknung jaw tuilakna kiangah a ding uh.
Huan, kumpipa a sap uleh, in sung lam heutu Hilkia tapa Eliakim te, laigelhmi Sebna te, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joa te a kiang uah a pawt khia ua.
Huan, Rabsakein a kiang uah, Hezekia kiangah vagen dih ve ua, Kumpipa thupi tak Assuria kumpipain hichiin a chi, Na gina na muan bang ahia oi?
Kidouna adingin geldan siam leh hatna ka nei uh, na chia; himahleh huai jaw paukam lel ahi.
Kua ahia na muana ka tunga na hel mai jen?
Ngaiin, hiai sialluang chiang, Aigupta muang na hitaa; huaia mi a kiangaih leh a khut a sun ding; Aigupta kumpipa Pharo bel amah muangte tengteng tungah huchibang ahi naknak hi.
Ahihkeileh, Ka kiangah, TOUPA ka Pathian uh ahi ka muan uh, na chih uleh, amah pen Hezekiain Judate leh Jerusalem te kiangah Jerusalem khuaa hiai maitam maah na be ding uh ahi, chiin a mun sangte leh a maitamte a lak mang sakpa ahi ka hia? chiin.
Huchiin ka pu Assuria kumpipa toh thu kichiam dih ua, huchiin sakol sangnih ka honpe ding, a tunga tuangmi ding na muh theih peuhmah ding leh.
Bang chiin ahia kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuang mite thuin Aigupta tunga na muanna koihin, ka pu mite laka neupen heutu khat lel leng na nan kik zoh mahmah ding?
Huan, hiai gam TOUPA thu lou-a hihse dinga hongkuan tou ka hia hia?
TOUPAN ka kiangah, Huai gam vasual inla, hihsiain, chi ahi, chiin, a chi a.
Huan, Hilkia tapa Eiakim leh Sebna leh Joa ten Rabsake kiangah, Hehpih takin na sikhate Suria pauin honhoupih zota in; huailaiah ka thei thei ngal ua; kulh tunga mite jiakin Juda pauin honhoupih nawn ken, a chi ua.
Himahleh Rasakein a kiang uah, ka puin na pu uh kiang leh nou kiang kiaah hiai thu gen dingin a honsawl ahia?
Kulh tunga tute, noute leh amau a ek uh ne dingte kiangah leng a honsawl ahi kei maw? a chi a.
Huan, Rabsake a dinga, Juda pauin aw ngaihtakin a kikou-a, Kumpipa thupi tak Assuria kumpipa thu ngaikhia un.
Kumpipan hichiin a chi, Hezekia khemin om kei un; aman lah a khuta kipan nou a honhumbit thei sin ngal keia;
Hezekiain, TOUPAN a honhumbit ngei ding; huan, hiai khopi Assuria kumpipa khuta piak ahi kei ding, chiin, TOUPA ah honmuang sak kei heh.
Hezekia thu pom kei un: Assuria kumpipan hichiin a chi ahi, Honkilep pih unla, ka kiangah hongpawt khia un; mi chihin amah grep guia leh mi chihin amah theipi kunga ne chiat uhenla, mi chihin amah tuikhuk tui ne chiat uhen;
Noumau gam banga buh leh uain gam, tanghou leh grep huan gam, oliv leh khuaiju gam, si lou-a na hintheihna ding gam ua ka hon pi masiah: Hezekiain, TOUPAN honhumbit ding chi-a nou a honkhemin leng pom nuam kei un.
Nam chihte pathian mawngmawng laka himhimin a gam uh Assuria kumpipa akipan a humbit ngeita uh ahia?
Hamat leh Arpad pathiante koia omta uh ahia?
Sepharvaim te, Hena te, Ivva te pathiante len g koia om ta ahi ua?
Samari khua keia kipan a humbit uh eita?
Gam chih pathian tengtengte laka in kuate ahi ua a gam uh ka laka kipan humbita, TOUPAN Jerusalem khua keia kipan a humbit mahmah ding? chiin, a chi a.
Amau a dai sisip ua, Kamkhatin leng a dawng kei uh: kumpipa thupiak dan, Amah dawng ken, chih ahi ngala.Huchiin kumpipa in sung lam heutu Hilkia tapa Eliakim te, laigelhmi Sebna te, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Jo ate a puan silh bohkekte uh silhin Hezekia kiangah a hoh ua, Rabsake thu gente a hilh uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa in sung lam heutu Hilkia tapa Eliakim te, laigelhmi Sebna te, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Jo ate a puan silh bohkekte uh silhin Hezekia kiangah a hoh ua, Rabsake thu gente a hilh uhi.
Huan, kumpipa Hezekiain huai a jakin hichi ahi a, a puansilhte a botkeka, saiip puan a silha, TOUPA inah a lutta hi.
Huan, in sung lam heutu Eliakim leh laigelhmi Sebna leh, siampu upate saiip puan silhin Amoz tapa jawlnei Isai kiangah a sawl hi.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Hezekiain hichiin a chi, Tuni mangbatna leh salhna leh minsiatna ni ahi: naute lah a pian uh ahunta ngala, piangsak dingin lah hatna a om nawnta ngal kei a.
A pu Assuria kumpipan Pathian hing gense dia a sawl Rabsake thu gen tengteng, TOUPA na Pathianin a za dinga, a thu gen, TOUPA na Pathianin a thu a jak a na sal kha mai ding, huaijiakin a omlai mite thum sak in, a chi hi a chi ua.
Huchiin kumpipa Hezekia mite bel Isai kiangah a hoh uh.
Huan, Isaiin a kiang uah, Na pu kiangah hichiin genin, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Na jak, Assuria kumpipa miten hon gensiatnate uh kihta ken.
Ngaiin, a sungah kha ka omsak dinga, thuthang a za dinga, amah gamah a pai nawn ding; huchiin amah gam mahmah ah namsau puksakin ka om sak ding, a chi hi, chiin, a chi a.
Huchiin Rabsake bel a kik nawna, Assuria kumpipan Libna khua anasual lai vamu a; Lakis khua akipan a pawt chih a jaksa him ahi.
Huan, Ngaiin, Nang honsual dingin a pawtta, chi-a Tirhak Ethiopia gam kumpipa tungtang thu mi gen a najakin Hezekia kiangah mite a sawla.
Hichiin Juda kumpipa Hezekia kiangah na gen ding uh, Na Pathian na muanin Jerusalem khua Assuria kumpipa khutah piak ahi kei ding, chiin honkhem kei heh.
Ngaiin, Assuria kumpipaten gamtengteng hihse veka a tunga thil hih uh na jaa; nang humbit na hi tuan sin ahia?
Nam chih pathianten ka pi leh puten a hihman te uh a humbit ua hia?
Gozan te, Haran te, Reseph te, Eden ta Telasar khuaa om te khawng.
Hamath kumpipa te, Arpad kumpipate, Sephavaim khopi kumpipa te, Hena kumpipa te, Ivva kumpipa te koia om a hita ua? chiin, a chi a.
Huan, Hezekiain a mi sawlte khuta kipan lai a mu a, a sim a: huchiin Hezekia TOUPA inah a luta, TOUPA maah a jak.
Huan, Hezekia TOUPA maah a thum a, TOUPA aw, cherubte tunga tu, Israel Pathian, nang, nang kia leitung gam tengteng Pathian na hi; lei leh van nangmah bawlsa ahi.
TOUPA aw, na bil na doh inla, ngai dih ve; TOUPA aw, na mit hak inla, en dih ve; Pathian hing gense dinga Sennakeribin thu a honggen ngaikhe dih ve.
TOUPA, Assuria kumpipaten namte leh a gamte uh a hihse sek ngei ua, a pathiante uh meiah a pai sek uh:
Huaite bel pathian ahi kei him ua, mihing khuta bawl sing leh suang ahi jaw uhi: huaijiakin a hihmang uh ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA ka Pathian uh aw, nang, nang kia TOUPA Pathian na hi chih leitung luah gam tengtengin a theih theihna ding un a lakah honhumbit ngeingeiin, chiin.
Huai laiin Amoz tapa Isaiin Hezekia kiangah, TOUPA Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi hi, Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib siatna ding lama ka kianga na thum najaa, chiin a honsawl hi.
Hiai a tungtang thu TOUPAN a gen ahi: Zion tanu nungakin nang a honmusit ua, a honnuih-san ua; Jerusalem tanuin a lu a honsin khum.
Kua na minse saka, kua na gensiaa?
Kua tungah ahia na aw na puk sak, na mit na hah san?
Israelte Mi Siangthoupa tungah ahi.
Na mi sawlte zangin TOUPA na minsesaka, Ka kangtalai tampi toh Lebanon gam gil tang sangte ka hongtungtou ta; huaia Sidar sing sang pipite leh taksing hoih pipite ka phuk ding; a lei hoihna mun gammang a tenna mun gil penah ka lut ding.
Gam dang tui ka lai khiaa, ka ne jela, ka khepek nuaiah Aigupta lui tengteng ka kangsak vek ding, na chi a.
Keimahin nidang laia kipan huai ka hih a hihdan bang, malaia kipan huai ka bawl a hih dan bang na za ka hia?
Kho kulh neite in chim khawm lel banga hihsepa dingin nang ka honsepta ahi.
Huaijiakin a sunga omten hatna a neikei ua, a lauthawng ua, a hong zahlakta uhi; gamlak loupa bang leh, loupa hing bang leh, in tunga loupa bang leh, buh a let maa hai vuai bang ahi uh.
Ken bel na tut te, na lut leh na pawt leh ka tunga na heh te ka thei hi.
Ka tunga na heh jiak leh, uang taka na pau ka bila a honglut touh jiakin ka nakbulh na nak ah ka bulh dinga, ka sikbah na muk ah; na hongkuanna lampi mahmahah ka honkik sak nawn ding, chiin.
Huan, hiai nanga dinga chiamtehna ahi ding: tukumin buhsang na sen ding ua; kum nawn chiangin a sang mah; huan, kum thumnaah buh na tuh ding ua, at unla, grep huante bawl unla, a gahte ne un.
Huchiin Juda inkote laka dam lai omsunten a suk lamin zung a kai ding ua, a tou lamin a gah nawn ding uh.
Jerusalem akipanin a omsunte Zion tang akipan a damlaite a pawt khe sin uhi; TOUPA phatuamngaihnain huaite a chi hi.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN Assuria kumpipa tungtang thu hichiin a gen, Hiai khopi a hongtung kei ding, hiai laiah leng thal a kap sam kei ding, lum toh a kiangah lah a hongpai sam kei dinga, a kho julah lah lei a se sang kei ding uhi.
A hongpaina lampi ah, huai mahah a nungkik nawn dinga, hiai khopi a hongtung kei ding, TOUPAN a chi.
Kei jiak leh ka sikha David jiakin hiai khopi humbit dingin ka veng ding hi, chiin.
Huchiin huai janin hichi ahi a, TOUPA angel a kuan khiaa, Assuriate giahmun ah mi nuaikhat leh singgiat leh sangnga a thata; huan, jing khanga a hongthoh uleh, ngaiin, misi luang ngen ana om maimah.
Huchiin Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib apawta, a kik nawna, a pai nawn jela, Ninevi khuaah a omta hi.Huan a pathian Nisrok inah amah a biak laiin hichi ahia, Adrammelek leh Sarezer ten namsauin a that ua; huchiin Ararat gamah a tai lutta uh.
Huan, a tapa Esar-haddon a sikin a lalta hi.
Huan a pathian Nisrok inah amah a biak laiin hichi ahia, Adrammelek leh Sarezer ten namsauin a that ua; huchiin Ararat gamah a tai lutta uh.
Huan, a tapa Esar-haddon a sikin a lalta hi.
Huai Laiin Hezekia muanmohin a china a.
Huchiin Amoz tapa jawlnei Isai a kiangah a honga, a kiangah, TOUPA hichiin a chi, Na inkote omdan ding genin; na dam khe zou sin ngal keia, chiin, a chi a.
Huchiin bang lam ngain a kiheia, TOUPA kiangah,
TOUPA aw, na maa thutak leh lungtang hoih lungtang hoih kim pu-a ka om jeldan leh, na mitmuha thil hoih ka hih jeldan hehpih takin thei gige in, chiin a thum a.
Huan, Hezekia kah petmahin a kap a.
Huan, Isai khopi lai tak leng a tun main hichi ahi a, TOUPA thu a kiangah hongtunga,
Kik nawn inla, ka mite heutu Hezekia kiangah gen in, TOUPA, na pu David Pathianin hichiin a chi, Na thumnate ka jaa, na khitui kia leng ka mu hi; ngaiin, ka hondamsak ding; ni thum niin TOUPA inah na hoh tou ding.
Huan, na dam sung kumte kum sawm leh kum ngain ka sausak dinga; huan, nang leh hiai khopi Assuria kumpipa lakah ka humbit dinga; huan, keimah jiak leh ka sikha David jiakin hiai khopi ka hum ding, a chi, chiin.
Huan, Isaiin, Theipi gah beu khat honla un, a chi a.
Huchiin a honla ua, meimatum ah a tata, a hongdam nawn hi.
Huan, Hezekiain Isai kiangah, TOUPAN hondamsak dinga, TOUPA inah a ni thum niin ka hoh tou ding chih chiamtehna bang ahi dia? a chi a.
Huan, Isaiin, TOUPAN a thil gen ahi ngei sin chih hiai nanga dingin TOUPA laka chiamtehna ding ahi ding: lim kalbi sawm tana a kin touh hia na deih kalbi sawm tana a nungkin?
A chi a.
Huan, Hezekiain a dawnga, Lim kalbi sawm tana kin touh a baih tela, huai jaw hi kei hen, lim kalbi sawm tanin nungkik jaw heh, a chi a.
Huchiin jawlnei Isaiin TOUPA a sama; huan, Ahaz dakzahtheihnaa lim niamsa kalbi sawm tanin a kiksak nawn hi.
Huai laiin Baladan tapa Babulon kumpipa Merodak-baladanin laikhakte leh kipahman te Hezekia a khaka: Hezekia a chi a na chih a jak jiakin.
Huchiin Hezekiain amau a nakipahpiha, a thil manpha koihna in tengteng, dangka te, dangkaeng te, banghiam gimlim te, sathau manpha tak te, a galvan koihna in sung te, a gou om tengtengte a ensaka: a ina leh a gamsunga Hezekiain a etsak louh himhim a om kei.
Huai laiin jawlnei Isai bel kumpipa Hezekia kiangah a hoha, a kiangah, Huai miten bang ahia a gen uh? koia kipanin ahia na kianga a hong uh? a chi a.
Huan, Hezekiain, Gam gamla, Babulon akipana hong ahi uh, a chi a.
Huchiin aman Na in ah bangbang ahia a muh uh? a chi a.
Huan, Hezekiain, Ka in sunga om tengteng a mu vek ua, ka gou laka ka etsak louh himhim a om kei, chiin a dawnga.
Huan, Isaiin Hezekia kiangah, TOUPA thu ngaikhe dih ve leh.
Ngaiin, na in sunga om tengteng leh tuni tana na pi leh puten a nakhol khawmte uh Babulon khuaa a paipih nite uh a hongtung ding; bangmah himhim nutsiat a neikei ding uh, TOUPAN a chi.
Huan, na gila gah, na suan ding, na tate ngei laka mi leng a pai mangpih ding ua; Babulon kumpipa inah michilgeh ahi ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin Hezekiain Isai kiangah, Na gen TOUPA thu hoih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Ka dam sunga lemna leh thutak a om sin peuh leh, a chih behlap lai hi.
Huchiin Hezekia tanchin dangte, a thilhih theihdan tengtengte dil leh tuilakna a bawla, khopi sunga tui a lak lut thute Juda kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?Huan, Hezekia bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmuta hi; huchiin a tapa Manasi a sikin a lal.
Huan, Hezekia bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmuta hi; huchiin a tapa Manasi a sikin a lal.
Manasi A lal pattungin kum sawm leh kum niha upa ahia; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga leh kum nga a lal: a nu min Hephzi-bi ahi.
Huan, TOUPAN Israel suante maa a delhkhiaksa namten thil kihhuai tak a hih sekte uh bang, TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou pipite a hihsek a.
A pa Hezekiain a hihsiatsa mun sangte a dingsak nawna; Israel kumpipa Ahab hih bangin Baal maitamte a dingsaka, Asera te a bawla, vana om tengteng a biaa, a na uh a sem.
TOUPAN Jerusalem ah ka min ka omsak ding, a chihna TOUPA inah maitamte a bawla.
TOUPA in huang sung intual nih ah vana om tengteng adin maitam a bawl.
Huan, a tapa meiah a lutsaka, aisan te bang a chinga, bum te bang a hiha, dawi aisansiam jawlte leh bumsiamte a guaiguai hi: TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou thupi mahmah a hehsak dingin a hih nak sek hi.
Huan, TOUPAN David leh a tapa Solomon kianga, Hiai in leh Jerusalem khua, Israel chi tengteng laka ka telah ka min khantawnin ka omsak ding;
Thu ka piak tengteng leh ka sikha Mosiin dan a piak bang tengteng a pom peuh mah uleh a pi leh pu te uh ka piaksa gam akipan Israelte khete leng ka kalsuan khe sak nawn sam kei ding, ana chih khitsa inah Asera lim a bawl a koiha.
Himahleh apom nuamkei ua; Toupan Israel suante maa a delhkhiaksa namte hih sang thama thupizaw thil hihkhial ding in Manasiin mite a khemkhem a:
Huan, Toupan a sikha jawlneite zangin thu a gena;
Juda kumpipa Manasiin hiai thil kihhuai takte a hih a, aman Amorte sang thamin a hih khial thupi hi, Judate a milimtea thil hihkhelhsak jiakin:
Toupa, Israel Pathian in hi chi in achi: Ngai dih ua, Jerusalem leh Juda tungah a za peuhmahte bil langnih in khengzou khop thil hoih lou ka hontungsak sin hi.
Samari tehna khau leh Ahab inko ulum khai Jerusalem tungah ka khung ding a: huan, min a kuang a nula, a kilumlet sak bang mai in Jerusalem ka nul ding hi.
Huan, ka goutan om sun te ka pai khe ding a, a mel ma te uh khut ah ka pe ding:
Huchi in a pi-le-pu te uh Aigupta gama a hong pawt nung uh tuni pha a ka mit muh a thil hoih lou pipi ahih ua, hon heh sak jiakun a melma te uh tengteng mat ding leh gallak ding ahi ding uh, chi in a chi a.
Toupa mitmuh a thilhoihlou tak hih a Judate thil hih khial sak a khelhna simlou in Manasi in poikhoihlou sisan nakpi tak in a suah lai a, Jerusalem dung leh vai a dim hi.
Huchi in Manasi tanchin dang te, a thil hih teng teng, a thil hih khelh te Juda kumpipate lal lai thu gelh na bu ah a tuang ahi kei mo?
Huan, Manasi a pi-le-pute kiangah a ihmu a, Uzza huana amah in chin huan ah a vui ta uh; huchi in atapa Amon a sikin a lal ta hi.
Amon bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum nih a upa ahi; Jerusalem ah kum nih a lal a; a nu min Mesulemeth, Jotba khua a Haruz tanu ahi.
Huan, a pa Manasi hih bangmah TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou tak ahih sek nak hi.
A pa lampi tot tengteng a tawn teia, milim na a septe a sema, a be tei hi:
Huchiin TOUPA, a pi leh pute Pathian a paisan a, TOUPA lampi a tawn kei.
Huan, Amon sikhaten amah a guk sawm ua, kumpipa amah inah a hih lum uhi.
Himahleh huai gama miten kumpipa Amon guk sawmmite tengteng a hihlum thuk vek ua; huchiin huai gama miten a tapa Josia a sikin kumpipa dingin a bawl ta uhi.
Huchiin Amon thilhih tanchin dangte Juda kumpipate lal lai thu gelhna bu ah a tuang ahi kei maw?Huan, Uzza huana amah hanah a vui ua: huan, a tapa Josia a sikin alal pan hi.
Huan, Uzza huana amah hanah a vui ua: huan, a tapa Josia a sikin alal pan hi.
Josia A lal pat tungin kumgiat a upa ahi; Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh kum khat a lal a: a nu min Jedid, Bozkath khua a Adai tanu ahi.
Huan, TOUPA mitmuhin thil diktat tak a hih jela, a pu David lampi tot tengteng a tawn tei a, tak lamah hiam veilam ah hiam a pial kei hi.
Huan, kumpipa Josia a lal kum sawm leh kum giat kumin hichi ahi a, kumpipan Mesullam ta Azalai tapa lai gelhmi Saphan a sawl a,
Siampu lalpen Hilkia kiangah hoh tou inla, kongkhak vengmiten mite kiang a nalak khawmuh TOUPA in a dangka hong kikoih sim uh henla;
TOUPA in lam nasemmite pia uhen; huan, amau in se bawl TOUPA in a nasemte pia uhen;
Singlem bawlmi te, in lammi te, in sia bawlmiten in siatna tat a bawlna sing leh suang sek a lei theihna dingun, chiin TOUPA inah a sawl hi.
Ahihhangin dangka a piakte uh a etpih nawn tuan kei ua; muanhuai taka a hih sek jiak un.
Huan, siampu lalpen Hilkiain laigelhmi Saphan kiangah, TOUPA inah dan laibu ka tawm e, a chi a.
Huan, Hilkiain laibu Saphan a pia a, aman a simta hi.
Huan, Laibugelhmi Saphan kumpipa kiangah a hoh a, kumpipa kiangah thu a vatun nawn a, Na miten ina dangka om a pe khe vek ua: TOUPA in lam nasemmite a pe vek uh, a chi a.
Huan, laigelhmi Saphanin, Siampu Hilkiain laibu honna pia, chiin kumpipa a hilh.
Huan Saphanin kumpipa maah a sima.
Huan, Kumpipan dan laibu a thute a jakin hichi ahi a, a puante a bot kek a.
Huan, kumpipan siampu Hilkia te, Saphan tapa Ahikam te, Mikai tapa Akborte, laigelhmi Saphan te, kumpipa mi Asai te kiangah,
Kei leh, mipi leh, Judate tengteng hiai laibu tawpa thu tuang thu ah TOUPA honva dot sak dih uh; I chih ding ua hiai laibu-a gelh bang bang i pi leh puten a nazuih louh jiak un I tunguah TOUPA hehna a nakkuan mahmah ta hi, a chi a.
Huchiin siampu Hilkia te, Ahikam te, Akbor te, Saphan te, Asai te puansilh kempa Harhas ta Tikva tapa Sallum ji jawlnei Hulda kiangah a hoh ua; a vahoupih ua.
(Amah bel Jerusalem Misnea om a hi).
Huan aman a kiang uah TOUPA, Isarelte Pathian in hichi in a chi: Ka kianga nou honsawlpa hilh un, TOUPAN hichi in a chi hi:
Ngaiin, hiai lai mun ah leh, a sunga tengte tungah thil hoih lou tak ka hontungsak ding hi, Juda kumpipan laibu-a a thu sim tengteng bangin,
Honpaisan ua, pathian dangte kianga gimlim a hal ua, a khutsuak ua a honhihheh jiak un hiai lai mun ah ka hehna nakpiin a kuang sina, a mawk mit sin kei hi.
Himahleh TOUPA dong dinga nou honsawlpa Juda kumpipa kiangah hichiin na chi ding uh: TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi: na thu jak tungtang thu ah,
Hiai lai mun leh, a sunga tengte hihgam leh hamsiatin a hongom ding uh chih thu ka gen na najaa, na lungsimte a nema, TOUPA maa na kiniamkhiaka, na puante na boh keka, ka maa na kah jiakin, ken leng na thu ka naja, TOUPAN a chi hi.Huchiin ngaiin, na pi leh pute kiangah ka honpi dinga, na hanah lungmuang taka piin na om dinga, hiai lai muna thil hoih lou tak ka hontunsak ding na mitin a mu vek kei ding hi, a chi hi, chiin, a chi a.
Huchin thu tuh kumpipa kiangah a vatun nawn uh.
Huchiin ngaiin, na pi leh pute kiangah ka honpi dinga, na hanah lungmuang taka piin na om dinga, hiai lai muna thil hoih lou tak ka hontunsak ding na mitin a mu vek kei ding hi, a chi hi, chiin, a chi a.
Huchin thu tuh kumpipa kiangah a vatun nawn uh.
Huan, Kumpipan mite a sawl a, Juda gam leh Jerusalem khopi-a upa tengteng a kiang ah a vasam khawm.
Huan, kumpipa Juda gama mi tengteng toh, Jerusalem khua a mi tengteng toh, siampute leh jawlneite toh, mipi tengteng toh a neu a lianin TOUPA inah a hoh tou ua; huan, TOUPA ina a laibu top uh thukhun bu-a tuang tengteng a bil ua jakin a sima.
Huan, kumpipa khuam julah a ding a, huai laibu-a tuang thukhun thu hihkip dingin lungtang tengteng leh kha tengtenga TOUPA jui ding leh a thupiakte, a thu theihsakte, a thusehte pom dingin TOUPA maah thu a khung a; huan, mipi tengtengin leng a khunpih uh.
Huan, kumpipan siampu lalpen Hilkia te a zom siampu te, kongkhak vengmite TOUPA biakin sunga Baal leh, Asera leh, vana thil omte tengteng adia bawl tuiumbelsuan tengteng la khe vek dingin thu a pia a; huchiin Jerusalem po lam, Kidron, munah a hala, a vute bel Bethel ah a pai pih hi.
Huan, milim bia siampute, Juda kumpipaten Juda gam khopi mun sangte-a, Jerusalem kima gimlim hal dinga a naseh uh a tawpsaka; Baal adia, ni adia, kha adia, aksi adia van a omte tengteng adia gimlim halmite leng.
Huan, TOUPA ina Asera pen Jerusalem po lam Kidron luiah a la khia a, Kidron lui ah a hal a, a sik nen gawp a, a nen mi nazongte hanah a theh hi.
Huan, Asera puan gan numeite omna TOUPA ina pasal kijuakte omna inte a phel saka.
Huan, Juda khopi akipan siampu tengteng a pi khia a, siampute gimlim sangte Geba akipana Beer-seba phain a hihbuah vek a; khopi kongpi luta vei lamsang a, khopi ukpa Josua Kongpi luta konpite a mun sangte a chimsak hi.
Mun sang siampute bel Jerusalem a TOUPA maitamah a hoh tou tei kei na ua, a unaute uh lakah tanghou silngou soh louh ahihleh a ne jel sek uh.
Huan, kuamahin a tapa uh hiam, a tanu uh hiam Molek tuamdia meia a lutsak nawn louhna ding un, Hinnom suante guama Topheth a hihbuah hi.
Huan, TOUPA in lutnaa a in huang sung a kumpipa innvengmi Nathanmelek dantan china Juda kumpipaten ni a dia sakol a piakte uh a suan mang vek a; ni kangtalai a hal hi.
Huan, Ahaz in chial tunga Juda kumpipaten maitam a bawlte uh leh Manasiin TOUPA in huang sung intual nih a maitam a bawlte kumpipan a hihchim a, a hih nen vek a, a nente Kidron luiah a pai hi.
Huan, Jerusalem china ginatlouhna tang tak lamsang a Zidonte pathian kihhuai mahmah Astoreth adia, Ammon suante pathian kihhuai mahmah a dia, Israel kumpipa Solomon in mun sang a bawlte kumpipan a hihbuah hi.
Huan, suangphuhte a kitam gawpsak veka, Asera a hihpuka, huai munte ah mihing guh a koih hi.
Huan, huai lou leng Israelte thil hihkhialsakpa Nebat tapa Jeroboam in Bethel maitam leh mun sang bawk, huai maitam leh mun sang nangawn a chimsak lai a; huchiin mun sang a hala, a sik jan gawpa, Asera a hal hi.
Huan, Josia bel a kiheia, tanga hante a mu-a; huchiin hana guhte a vala sak a, huai thu nagenmi Pathian miin a nagen, TOUPA thu bang bangin maitam ah a hala, a hihbuah hi.
Huchiin aman, Hua kua suangphuh ahia ka muh? a chi a.
Huan khuaa miten, Pathian mi, Juda gam akipana hong pai, Bethel a maitam tung a tua na hih nanagen kholpa han eive, chiin a hilh ua.
Huan, aman, Bangmah chih kei un; kuamah in a guhte la suan kei uhen, a chi.
Huchiin a guhte Samari gama kipan jawlnei hongpaipa guhte toh bangmah a chih kei uh.
Huan, Israel Kumpipaten TOUPA hehsakna dia a lam uh Samari gam khua khawnga mun sang in tengteng leng Josiain a suan mang a, Bethel khuaa a hih bang geihin a hihsak hi.
Huchiin huai a mun sang siampu omte tengteng maitam tungah a that a, huaite ah mihing guhte a hala, Jerusalem ah a painawn ta hi.
Huan, kumpipan mi tengteng kiang ah, Hiai thukhun bu a tuang bang in TOUPA, na Pathian uh a din Paikan Ankuang bawl un, chiin in thu a pia a.
Israelte tunga vaihawmmiten vai a hawm ua kipan, Israel kumpipate tengteng, Juda kumpipate lal sung tengin huchi bang hial Paikan Ankuang a nei nai kei uh;
Kumpipa Josia kumpipa kum sawm leh kum giat kumin Paikan Ankuang Jerusalem khuaah TOUPA adin a nei phet uhi.
Huan TOUPA ina siampu Hilkiain a laibu-a a muh dan thu tuangte a kip sak theihna dingin dawi aisansiam jawlte, bumsiamte, pathian lim te, milim te Juda gam leh Jerusalem khua a thil kihhuai a muh sekte uh tengteng Josiain a hihmang vek hi.
Mosi dan tengteng bang a lungtang leh kha tengteng leh hatna tengteng a TOUPA pom amah bang mahmah a maa kumpipa kuamah a om nawn kei uh; A nungin leng amah bang kuamah a om nawn sam kei uhi
Huchipipiin leng TOUPAN a hehna thupi mahmah Manasiin a nahehsakna tengteng jiak in Juda tunga a hehna kuang a hihdai kei lai hi.
Huan, TOUPAN, Israel ka suan mang bangin Juda leng ka muh phak louhna ah ka suan mang sam ding a, hiai khua ka tel Jerusalem ngei leh, huailaiah ka min a om ding, ka chih in ka pai mang ding, a chi a.
Huchiin Josia tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng Juda kumpipate lal lai tanchin gelhna bu-ah a tuang ahi kei maw?
A lal lain, Aigupta kumpipa Pharoneko bel Assuria kumpipa sual dingin Euphrates luiah a hoh tou-a; huan, kumpipa Josiain amah a vasual a; huan aman amah a muh tak in Megiddo khuaah a that hi.
Huan, a miten Megiddo akipanin a luang kangtalaiin a paipih ua, Jerusalem ah a lutpih ua, amah hanah a vui uh.
Huchiin huai gam a miten Josia tapa Jehoahaz a pi ua, sathau a nilh ua, a pa sikin kumpipain a bawlta uhi.
Jehoahaz bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum thum a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kha thum a lal a: a nu min Hemutal, Libna khuaa Jeremia tanu ahi.
Huan, a pi leh pute hih dan bangbang TOUPA mitmuh in thil hoihlou mahmah a hih seka.
Huan, Pharo-nekoin Jerusalema vaihawm thei nawn lou dingin Hamath gama Ribla khuaah a koltang sak a; huan, a gam uh dangka talent zakhat leh dangkaeng talent khat a leiba sak hi.
Huan Pharo-nekoin Josia ta Eliakim a pa Josia sikin a lal saka, a min bel Jehoiakim chiin a khen saka; Jehoahaz bel a pi manga; Aigupta gamah a paia, huaiah a si hi.
Huan, Jehoiakimin dangka leh dangkaeng Pharo a pe phota; a gamte uh Pharo thupiak bangin a dangkaa pe dingin siah a leh liau sak a: Pharo-neko kianga piak dingin mi chih liau dinga a seh zah chiat bangin huai gama mitea dangka leh dangkaeng a liau sak hi.
Jehoiakim bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum ngaa upa ahi; Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum khat a lal a: a nu min Zebida, Ruma khua a Pedai tanu ahi.Huan, a pi leh pute hih dan bangbangin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou mahmah a hih sek hi.
Huan, a pi leh pute hih dan bangbangin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou mahmah a hih sek hi.
A Lal laiin Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar a honglian a, Jehoiakim bel a sikha in kum thum a oma; huainungin a lehngat sana, a tungah a helta hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Kaldai pawlte, Suria pawl te, Moab pawl te, Amoa suan pawlte amah sual dingin a sawl khiaa, a sikha jawlneite zanga a gen TOUPA thu bangin Juda gam hihse sak dingin a sawl hi.
Manasi khelhna, a thil hih tengteng jiaka, a muhphak louhna a amau te suan mang dingin, Juda tungah hiai TOUPA thupiak a hongtungpet mah a;
Mihoih sisan a suah jiakin leng; mihoih sisana Jerusalem a hihdim jiak in leng: TOUPAN lah amah a ngaidam nuam kei a.
Huchiin Jehoiakim tanchin dang leh a thil hih tengteng Juda kumpipate lal lai tanchin gelh na bu-ah a tuang ahi kei maw?
Huchiin Jehoiakim bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmu-a; huan, a tapa Jehoiakin a sikin a lalta hi.
Huan, Aigupta kumpipa a gam akipan a hongkuan khe nawnta kei hi: Babulon kumpipan Aigupta gam luita akipan Euphrates lui phaa kumpipa gam huap tengteng a lata ngala.
Jehoiakin bel a lal pattungin kum sawm leh kum giata upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kha thum a lal: a nu min Methusta, Jerusalem khuaa Elnathan tanu ahi.
Huan, a pa hih dan tengteng hihin, TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou mahmah a hih sek a.
Huchihlaiin Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar mite Jerusalem ah a hoh tou ua, khua a vaum uh.
Huan, huchia a miten a vaum lai un Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzer bel khuaah a vahoh tou a;
Huchiin Juda kumpipa Jehoiakin a nute, a mite, a miliante, a heutute toh Babulon kumpipa kiangah a va pawt khia ua: huan, a lal kum giat kumin Babulon kumpipan a man.
Huan, TOUPA gen bangin ina gou tengteng leh kumpipa ina gou tengteng a lakhina, TOUPA biakina Israelte kumpipa Solomonin dangkaeng tuiumbelsuan a bawl tengteng a sat gawp vek hi.
Huan, Jerusalema mi tengteng, mi lian tengteng te, mi hat hangsan hoih tengteng, singkhat hial, sal khutsiam leh siksekmi tengteng a pi veka; huai gama mi a gentheite chih louh kuamah a omta kei uh,
Huan, Jehoiakin bel babulon ah a pi a; huan kumpipa nu te, kumpinu te, a heutute, huai gama mi hatte Jerusalem akipanin Babulon ah salin a pi hi.
Huan, Babulon kumpipan pasal hoih tengteng sangsagih tak leh, khutsiam leh siksekmi sangkhat, mi hat hoih teng galkap thei mi ngen Babulon ah salin a pi vek hi.
Huan, a pa unau Mattania bel Babulon kumpipan a sikin a lalsaka, a min Zedekia chiin a khen sak hi.
Zedekia bel a lal pattungin kum sawm nih leh kumkhata upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum khat a lala; a nu min Hamutal, Libna khuaa Jeremia tanu ahi.
Huan, Jehoiakim hih dan tengteng bangin a hiha, TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou mahmah a hih nak hi.TOUPA hehna jiakin a muh phak louha a paih mang ma tanin Jerusalem leh Juda tungah thil a hongtung jel hi; huan, Zedekia bel Babulon kumpipa tungah a heltaa.
TOUPA hehna jiakin a muh phak louha a paih mang ma tanin Jerusalem leh Juda tungah thil a hongtung jel hi; huan, Zedekia bel Babulon kumpipa tungah a heltaa.
Huan, A lal kum kua kum, kha sawmna, ni sawm ni takin hichi ahi a, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a sepaihte tengteng toh Jerusalem a sual ua, ommun a vabawl ua; huan, kulhin a um suakta hi.
Hichiin kumpipa Zedekia lal kum sawm leh kum khatna tanin khua a um ua.
Kha lina, ni kua niin kha a kialta mahmaha, huaia mite adin nek ding mahmah a om kei hi.
Huan, khopi kulh a hihvang ua, huchiin janin galkap thei mi tengteng kumpipa huan chin, kulh bang nih kikala kulh kongpiah a tai kek vek ua: (Kaldaiten khua a um suak uhi: ) huan, kumpipa Araba lampi lamah a pai hi.
Himahleh Kaldai sepaihten kumpipa a delh ua, Jeriko phaijangah a pha ua; a sepaih tengtengin a tai jak san vek uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa a man ua, Babulon kumpipa kiangah Ribla khuaah a pi ua; huan a tungtang thu a ngaihtuah ua.
Huan, Zedekia tapate a mitmuh ngeiah a that ua, Zedekia mitte a khel khiak sak ua, kol a bun sak ua, Babulon ah a paipihta uhi.
Huchiin Babulon kumpipa, kumpipa Nebukadnezzar lal kum sawm leh kum kuana, kha ngana, ni sagih niin Babulon kumpipa mi vengmi pawl heutu Nebuzaradan Jerusalem ah a luta;
TOUPA in leh kumpipa in a hala; Jerusalem in tengteng, in thupi taktakte a hala.
Huan, vengmi pawl heutu kianga om Kaldai sepaihte tengtengin Jerusalem kima kulh a hihchim vek uh.
Huan, khopi sunga mi om laite, kipiate Babulon kumpipa kianga kipiate, mipi om laite vengmi pawl heutu Nebuzaradanin salin a pi veka.
Huai gama a genthei tatate laka mi bel vengmi pawl heutuin grep gui kem dingin leh lou neimi dingin a nusia hi.
Huan, TOUPA ina dal khuamte leh, TOUPA ina tunna leh dal loh Kaldaiten a hihkek gawp vek ua, a dal Babulon ah a paipih uh.
Huan, bel te, vut luahna te, khawnvak puan tehna te, keute leh dal tuiumbelsuan tengteng, nasepna dinga a zatte uh a la ua.
Huan, mei lakna te, maiphiatna te toh; vengmi pawl heutuin dangkaeng a bawlte bel a dangkaeng a laa, dangka siika bawlte bel a dangka a la hi.
Solomonin TOUPA in a dia bawl khuam nih leh dal loh leh tunnate; huai vanzat tengtenga dal buk zah theih vual ahi kei hi.
Khuam khat san dan tong sawm leh tong giat ahi a, a dawnah dal sunbawk a oma: huai sunbawk san dan tong thum ahi; sunbawk kim ah gial chiktek leh pomgranet a tuanga, dal vek ahi uh: huchimah bangin khuam khat leng gial chitek ahi.
Huan, vengmi pawl heutuin siampu lian Serai leh a zompa siampu Zephania leh kongkhak vengpa thum a mana:
Huan, galkap thei mite tung heutu khat toh, kumpipa mel mu pha sek khopi tunga om lai ngate toh, mipite min gelhpa sepaih heutute laigelhmi toh, khopi sunga om lai gama mi sawmguk toh khopi sunga kipan a man hi.
Huan, vengmi pawl heutu Nebuzaradanin a pi a, Babulon kumpipa kiangah Ribla khuaah a pai piha.
Huan, Babulon kumpipan Hamath gam, Ribla khuaah a nahihlum hi.
Huchiin Juda a gamsunga kipana sala pi khiakin a omta hi.
Huan, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin Juda gama a nutsiatte leng a tunguah Saphan ta Ahikam tapa Gedalia ukpa dingin a bawl hi.
Huchiin sepaih pawl heutu tengteng leh a heute uh Babulon kumpipan Gedalia ukpa dingin a bawl chih a jak un Mizpa khuaah Gedalia kiang ah a hoh ua, huaite bel Nathania tapa Ishmael te, Kare tapa Johanan te, Netopha mi Tanhumeth tapa Serai te, Maak mi tapa Jaazan te, a heute uh toh ahi uh.
Huan, Gedalia huai mite leh a heute uh kiangah a kichiama, a kiang uah, Kaldaite sikhaa om lau kei un: Hiai gamah om gige unla, Babulon kumpipa thu nuaiah om un, huchiin nou-a dingin a hoih ding hi, a chi a.
Himahleh kha sagihna ah hichi ahi a, kumpipa suan Elisam ta, Nathania tapa Ishmael bel mi sawm piin a kuana, Gadalia Mispa khuaa Judate leh Kaldaite a kianga omte toh a suala, a that vek hi.
Huchiin mi tengteng a lian a neuin sepaih heutute toh a pawt khia ua, Aigupta gamah a pai ta uh: Kaldaite lah a lau ngal ua.
Huan, Juda kumpipa Jehoiakin sala a tan kum sawmthum leh kum sagihna, kha sawm leh kha nihna, ni sawmnih leh ni sagih niin hichi ahi a, Babulon kumpipa Evil-Merodakin a lal pattung kumin Juda kumpipa Jehoiakin a tanna in akipan a pi khiaa,
A kiang ah hoih takin thu a gen a, Babulona kumpipa om teite laltutphah tungah a laltutphah a koih sang tuam se hi.
A tanna in puansilhte a khenga, a damsung tengin a kiangah ah a um gige samta hi.Huchiin a loh ding, kumpipan a piak loh tatlak lou a oma, a dam sung tengin, nitengin tantuan a bawl sak gige.
Huchiin a loh ding, kumpipan a piak loh tatlak lou a oma, a dam sung tengin, nitengin tantuan a bawl sak gige.
Adam, Set, Enos;
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared;
Enok, Methusela, Lamek;
Noa, Sem, Ham, leh Japhet;
Japhet tapate; Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal leh Mesek, leh Tira.
Huan Gomer tapate; Asikenaz, Diphat, Togarma.
Huan Javan tapate; Elisa, Tarsis, Kittim, Rodanim.
Ham tapate; Kus, Mizraim, Put, Kanaan.
Huan Kus tapate; Seba, Havila, Sabta Raama, Sabteka.
Huan Raama tapate; Seba, Dedan.
Huan Kusin Nimrod a suang; lei ah mi hat a honghi pana.
Huan Mizraimin Ludim, Anamim, Lahabim, Naphtuhim,
Pathrusim, Kasluhim (Philistinte hongkipatna) Kaptorim a suang.
Huan Kanaanin Zidon a ta masapen leh Het a suanga;
Huan Jebus mi, Amor mi Girgas mi;
Huan Hiv mi, Arki mi, Sin mi;
Huan Arvad mi, Zemar mi, Hamat mi.
Sem tapate; Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, Mesek.
Huan Arapaksadin Sela a suanga, huan Selain Eber a suang hi.
Huan Eber lakah tapa nih a piang ua: khatpen min Peleg ahi; a dam laiin lah lei a kikhen ngala; huan a unaupa min Joktan ahi.
Huan Joktanin Almodad, Selep, Hazarmavet, Jera;
Huan Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla;
Huan Ebal, Abimael, Seba;
Huan Ophir, Havila, Jabab a suanga.
Hiaite tengteng Joktan tapate ahi uh.
Sem, Arpaksad, Sela;
Eber, Peleg, Reu;
Seruk, Nahor, Tera;
Abram (huaimah Abraham ahi).
Abraham tapate; Isaak, Ismael.
Hiaite a khang uh ahi: Ismael, Nebaiot tamasapen; huchiin Kedar leh Adbeel, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Massa; Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphis, Kedema.
Hiaite Ismael tapate ahi uh.
Huan Ketura, Abraham mei, tapate: Zimran, Joksan, Medan, Midian, Isbak, Sua a nei hi.
Huan Joksan tapate; Seba, Dedan.
Huchiin Midian tapate; Epha, Epher, Honok, Abida, Elda.
Hiaite tengteng Ketura tapate ahi uh.
Huan Abrahamin Isaak a suang.
Isaak tapate; Esau, Israel.
Esau tapate; Elipha, Reuel, Jeus, Jalam, Kora.
Elipha tapate; Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, Amalek.
Reuel tapate; Nahat, Zera, Samma, Mizza.
Huan Seir tapate: Lotan leh Sobal leh Zibeon leh Ana, leh Dison leh Ezer Disan.
Huan Lotan tapate; Hori leh Homam: huan Timna Lotan sanggamnu ahi.
Sobal tapate; Alian leh Manahat leh Ebal, Sephi leh Onam.
Huan Zibeon tapate; Aia leh Ana.
Ana tapate; Dison.
Huan Dison tapate; Hamran leh Esban leh Ithran leh Keran.
Ezer tapate; Bilhan leh Zaavan, Jaakan.
Disan tapate; Uz leh Aran.
Huchiin hiaite Israel suante tunga vaihawm kumpipate himhim a om ma ua, Edom gama vaihawm kumpipate ahi uhi Bela Beor tapa; huan a khopi min Dinhaba ahi.
Huan Bela a sia, huchiin Bozraha Zera tapa Jobabin a sikin vai a hawm hi.
Huan Jobab a sia, Huchiin Teman mite gama Husamin a sikin vai a hawm hi.
Huan Husam a sia, huchiin Bedad, Moab gama Midian mi that, tapa Hadadin a sikin vaia hawma; huan a khopi min Avit ahi.
Huan Hadad a sia, huchiin Masrekaha Samlain a sikin vai a hawm hi.
Huan Samla a sia, huchiin lui kianga Rehobotha Saulin a sikin vai a hawm hi.
Huan Saul a sia, huchiin Akbor tapa Baal-hananin a sikin vai a hawm hi.
Huan Baal-hanan a sia, huchiin a sikin Hadadin vai a hawma; huan a khopi min Pai ahi: huan a ji min Mehetabel, Matred tanu, Me-zahab tanu ahi.
Huan Hadad a sia.
Huchiin Edom hausate a om uh; hausa Timna, hausa Alia, hausa Jethet;
Hausa Oholibama, hausa Ela, hausa Pinon;
Hausa Kenaz, Teman, hausa Mibzar;Hausa Magdiel, hausa Iram.

Hausa Magdiel, hausa Iram.
Hiaite Edom hausate ahi uhi.

Dan, Joseph leh Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad leh Aser.
Juda tapate; Er, leh Onan, leh Sela: huaite kanaannu Bath-sua akipana amah laka piang thumte ahi uh.
Huan Er, Juda ta masapen, TOUPA mitmuhin a giloua; amah a that hi.
Huchiin Tamar a tapa jiin Pharez leh Zera a suansaka.
Juda tapate tengteng nga ahi uh.
Pharez tapate; Hezron leh Hamul.
Huan Zera tapate; Zimri, leh Ethan leh Heman, leh kalkol leh Dara: a vek un nga.
Huan Karmi tapate; Akar thil siangthoua talekpa, Israel hihbuaipa,
Huan Ethan tapate; Azaria.
Hezron, amah laka piangte leng; Jerahmeel leh, Ram, leh Chelubai.
Huan Ramin Amminadab a suang; huan Amaminadabin Nahson, Juda suante lal, a suang;

A lina Nethanel, a ngana Raddai;
A gukna Ozem, a sagihna David:
Huan a sanggamnute uh Zeruia leh Abigail ahi uh.
Huchiin Zeruia tapate; Abisai leh Joab, leh Asahel, thum.
Huan Abigailin Amasa a suanga: huchiin Amasa pa Ismael mi Jether ahi.
Huan Jezron tapa Kalebin Azuba a ji, leh Jeriot lakah tate a suanga: huchiin hiaite a tapate ahi; Jeser leh, Sobab leh Ardon.
Huan Azuba a sia, Kalebin amah dingin Ephrat a pia, huaiin Hur a neihsak hi.
Huan Hurin Uri a suanga, huan Uriin Bezalel a suang.
Huainungin Jezron Gilead pa Makir tanu kiangah a luta; huai jiin a pia kum sawmguka upa a hih laiin; aman Segub a suan sak hi.
Huan Segubin, Gilead gama khopi sawmih lah thum nei Jair, a suansaka.
Huan Gesur leh Aramin amau akipan Jair khuate a la ua, Kenath leh, huaia kho neite, khopi sawmguk taktoh.
Hiaite tengteng Gileadpa Makir tapate ahi uh.
Huan huainung in Kalebephrathat ah Hezron a sia, huchiin Abija Hezron jiin Tekoa pa Asur a suansak hi.
Huan Hezron ta masapen Jerahmeel tapate Ram ta masapen, leh Buna, leh Oren, Ozem, Ahija ahi uh.
Huan Jerahmeelin ji dang a neia, a min Atara ahi; Onam nu ahi.
Huan Jerahmeel ta masapen Ram tapate Maaz, Jamin, Eker ahi uh.
Huan Onam tapate Sammai, Jada ahi uh: huan Sammai tapate; Nadab, Abisur.
Huan Abisur ji min Abihail ahi; huan Ahban leh Molid a suansak hi.
Huan Nadab tapate; Seled leh Appaim: himahleh Seled bel tate neilou in a si hi.
Huan Appaim tapate; Isi.
Huan Isi tapate; Sesan.
Huan Sesan tapate; Ahlai.
Huan Jada Sammai unaupa tapate; Jether, Jonathan: huan Jether tate beiin a si.
Huan Jonathan tapate: Peleth, Zaza.
Hiaite Jerahmeel tapate ahi uh.
Huchiin Sesanin, tanute chihlouh, tapate a neikei.
Huan Sesanin, Aigupta mi khat, sikha a neia, a min Jarha ahi.

Hiai David vaihawm tanphain a khopite uh ahi.

Huan huai kima khotate tengteng Baal phain ahi.
Hiaite a tenna uh ahia, huan khangthusuina a nei uhi.
Huan Mesobab, Jamel leh Amazia tapa Josa;
Huan Joel leh Josihibia tapa Jehu, Serai tapa, Asiel tapa;
Huan Elioenai, Jaakoba; Jesohai, Asia, Adiel, Jesimiel leh Benai;
Huan Siphi tapa Ziza, Allon tapa, Jedai tapa, Simri tapa, Semai tapa;
Hiai min lohte a inko sung ua lalte ahi uh: huan a pipute uh inkote a khang mahmah uhi.
Huan a ganhon uh adia loupanek zong dingin, guam suahlam pang tan pha hialin, Gedor lutna chiang phain a pai uhi.
Huan loupanek hoihna leh tamna a mu ua, gam ja leh, dai lah galmuang; tumaa huaia omte lah Ham akipan ahi ngal ua.
Huan hiai min gelhte Juda kumpipa Hezekia dam laiin a hongpai ua, a puaninte uh leh huaia om Meunin a sual ua, tuni tan nasanin, amaute a hihse vek ua, a mun uah a tengta uhi; huai laia a gante uh adia loupanek a om jiakin.
Huan a lak ua khenkhatte, Simeon tapate ngei, mi za nga, a heutute uh Isi tapate Pelati, Neari, Rephaia, leh Uzziel makaihin Seir mual ah a hoh uhi.Huan a suakta Amalek mite laka omlaite a sualua, tuni tanin, huailaiah a tengta uhi.
Huan a suakta Amalek mite laka omlaite a sualua, tuni tanin, huailaiah a tengta uhi.
Huan Israel ta masapen Reuben tapate, (amah lah piang masapen ahi ngala; himahleh a pa lupna a hihbuah jiakin, a upahihna Israel tapa Joseph tapate kianga piak ahi; huchiin upatna dungjuiin khangthu a kisim kei hi.
A unaute tungah Juda a vualzoua, amah akipanin lal a hongom ngala; ahihhangin upatna Josephaa ahi: )
Israel ta masapen Reuben tapate; Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, Karmi.
Joel tapate: Semai a tapa, Gog a tapa, Simei a tapa, Mika a tapa,
Reai a tapa, Baal a tapa;
Beer a tapa, Assurai kumpipa Tilgathpilneserin a pi mang; Reuben mite lal ahi.
Huan a khangthute uh khangthusutna a kisim laia a inkuankuan ua a unaute; hausapa, Jeiel, Zekaria,
Bela Azaz tapa, Sema Joel tapa, Aroera teng, Nebo leh Baal-meon pha hiala teng:
Suahlam ah luipi Euphrates akipan gamdai lutna pha hialin a tengta hi: Gilead gama a gante uh a pun jiakin.
Huan Saul dam laiin Hagri mite toh a kidou ua, huaite a zou a: huan Gilead suhlam gam tengteng ah a puaninte uah ateng uhi.
Huan Gad tapate amau jawn takah, Saleka tanin Basan gamah a teng uh:
Joel hausapa leh, a zom Sapham, leh Janai, leh Saphat Basan ah:
Huan a pipute uh inkote a unaute uh: Mikael leh, Mesullam leh, Seba leh, Jorai leh, Jakan, leh Zia, leh Eber, sagih.
Hiaite Huri tapa Abihail tapate ahi uh, Jaro tapa, Gilead tapa, Mikael tapa, Jesisai tapa, Jahdo tapa, Buz tapa;
Ahi Abdiel tapa, Gunni tapa, a pipute uh inkote hausapa.
Huan Basan a Gilead ah, a khopite, Saron huapkhate tengteng, a tanpha un, a teng uhi.
Hiaite tengteng Juda Kumpipa Jotham damlai leh Israel kumpipa Jeroboam damlaiin a khangthutein simin a om vek uhi.
Reuben tapate leh, Gad mite leh Manassi nam kimkhat mihang sante, namsau leh lum thuah thei mite, leh thalpeua kap ding, kidounaa siam, galkap dia kuan thei, sing li sang li za sagih leh sawmguk ahi uh.
Huan Hakri mite toh, Jetur toh, Naphis toh, Nodab toh a kidou uhi.
Huan amaute dou dingin panpihin a om ua, huchiin Hagri mite a khut ua piakin a om ua, a kiang ua omte tengteng toh; amau lah Pathian kiangah kidouna ah a kap ngal ua, Pathianin a ngetna uh a ja a; amaha a muanna uh a koih jiak un.
huan a gante uh a la mang ua; a sangawngsau uh sing nga, belam nuai nih leh sing nga, sabengtung za nih, mite nuai khat.
Kidouna Pathiana a hih jiakin, mi tampi petmah lah a puk ngal ua.
Huchiin saltanna tanphain a mun uah a tengta uhi.
Huan Manassi nam kimkhatte tate gamsungah a teng ua: Basan akipan Baalherom leh Senir leh Hermon mual tanin a pung uhi.
Huan hiaite a pipute uh lupente ahi uh: Epher, Isi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremia, Hodavia, Jahdiel, mi hat hangsante, miminthangte, a pipute uh inkote lupente.
Huchiin a pipute uh Pathian douin a talek ua, a ma ua Pathian in a hihsiat, gama mite pathiante lakah ang a kawm uhi.Huan Israel Pathianin Assuria kumpipa Pul kha leh, Assuria kumpipa Tilgathpilneser kha a tokthoua, huchiin amaute a pi manga, Reuben mite leh, Gad mite leh, Manassi nam kimkhatte mahmah, huan, tuni tanin Halah, leh Habor, leh Hara, ah amaute a pia, Gozan lui phain.
Huan Israel Pathianin Assuria kumpipa Pul kha leh, Assuria kumpipa Tilgathpilneser kha a tokthoua, huchiin amaute a pi manga, Reuben mite leh, Gad mite leh, Manassi nam kimkhatte mahmah, huan, tuni tanin Halah, leh Habor, leh Hara, ah amaute a pia, Gozan lui phain.
Levi Tapate; Gersom, Kohath, Merari.
Huan Kohath tapate; Amaram, Izhar, Hebron, Uzziel.
Huan Amram tate; Aron, Mosi, Miriam.
Huan Aron tapate; Nadab leh Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar.
Eleazarin Phineha a suanga, Phinehain Abisua a suanga;
Huan Abisuain Bukki a suanga, huan Bukkiin Uzzi a suanga;
Huan Uzziin Zerahia a suanga, Zerahiain Meraioth a suanga;
Meraiothin Amaria a suanga, Amariain Ahitub a suanga;
Ahitubin Zadok a suanga, Zadokin Ahimaaz a suanga;
Huan Ahimaazin Azaria a suanga, Azariain Johanan a suanga;
Huan Johanan in Azaria a suanga, (amah Jerusalema Solomonin a lam in siampu nasep sempa ahi: )
Huan Azariain Amaria a suanga, Amariain Ahitub a suanga;
Huan Ahitubin Zadok a suanga, Zadokin Sallum a suanga;
Huan Sallumin Hilkia a suanga, Hilkiain Azaria a suanga;
Huan Azariain Serai a suanga, Seraiin Jahozadak a suanga;
Huan Jahozadak saltanna lamah a pai hi, TOUPAN Nebukadnezzar khut a Juda leh Jerusalem a pi mang laiin.
Levi tapate; Gersom, Kahath, leh Merari.
Huan hiaite Gersom tapate minte ahi uh; Libni leh Simei.
Huan Kohath tapate Amram, Ezhar, Hebron, Uzziel ahi uh.
Merari tapate; Mahli leh Musi.
Huan hiaite a pipute uh inkote dungjuiin Levite inkuante ahi uh.
Gersom akipan; Libni a tapa, Jahath a tapa, Zimmah a tapa;
Joa a tapa, Iddo a tapa, Zera a tapa, Jeatherai a tapa.
Kohath tapate; Amminadab a tapa, Korah a tapa, Assir a tapa;
Elkan a tapa, Ebiasaph a tapa, Assir a tapa;
Tahath a tapa, Uriel a tapa, Uzzia a tapa, Shaul a tapa.
Huan Elkana tapate; Amasai, Ahimoth,
Elkan a hihleh: Elkan tapate; Zophai a tapa, Nahath a tapa;
Eliab a tapa, Jeroham a tapa, Elkan a tapa.
Huan Samuel tapate; ta masapen Joel, a zom Abija.
Merari tapate; Mahli, Libni a tapa, Simei a tapa, Uzza a tapa;
Sime a tapa, Haggi a tapa, Asai a tapa.
Huan hiaite Davidin thukhunna bawm a khol nunga, TOUPA in sunga la nasepna tunga heutua a koihte ahi uh.
Huan Jerusalema Solomin TOUPA in a lam khit masiah, kihoupihna puanin biakbuk maah lain na a sem uhi: huan a thupiak bang jel un a nasepna uh a hih uhi.
Huan hiaite a ngakte leh a tapate ahi uhi.
Kohath mite tapate ahihleh: Heman lasami, Joel tapa, Samuel tapa;
Elkan tapa, Jeroham tapa, Eliel tapa, Toa tapa;
Zuph tapa, Elkan tapa, Mahath tapa, Amasai tapa;
Elkan tapa, Joel tapa, Azaria tapa, Zephania tapa;
Tahath tapa, Assir tapa, Ebiasaph tapa, Korah tapa;
Ezhar tapa, Kohath tapa, Levi tapa, Israel tapa.
Huan a unaupa Asaph, a taklam panga dingpa, Asaph Berekia tapa mahmah, Sime tapa;
Mikael tapa, Bassei tapa, Malkija tapa;
Ethni tapa, Zera tapa, Adai tapa;
Ethan tapa, Zimma tapa, Simei tapa,
Jahath tapa, Gersom tapa, Levi tapa,
Huan a khut veilam ah a unaute uh Merari tapate: Etham Kisi tapa, Abdi Malluk tapa;
Hasabia tapa, Amazia tapa, Hilkia tapa;
Amazi tapa, Hani tapa, Semer tapa;
Mahli tapa, Musi tapa, Merari tapa, Levi tapa.
Huan a unaute uh Levi mite Pathian in biakbuka nasepna tengteng adinga seh ahi uhi.
Himahleh Aron leh a tapaten halmang maitam tungah, gimlim maitam tungah, mun siangthou pena nasepna tengteng adingin a lan ua, Pathian sikha Mosiin thupiak tengteng dungjuia, Israel adingin tatna bawl dingin.
Huan hiaite Aron tapate ahi uh; Eleazar tapa, Phineha a tapa, Abisua a tapa;
Bukki a tapa, Uzzi a tapa, Zerahia a tapa;
Meraioth a tapa, Amaria a tapa, Ahitub a tapa:
Zadok a tapa, Ahimaaz a tapa.
Huchiin hiaite a gamgite ua a puaninkaihnate uh dungjuia a tenna uh ahi: Aron tapate kiangah, Kohath mite inkotea, amaua lah inmun masapen ahi ngala.
Amau kiangah Juda gamah Hebron leh, a kim a vela a huapkhakte a pia uhi;
Himahleh huaia khopi munte leh khotate, Jephunne tapa Kaleb kiangah a pia uh.
Huan Aron tapate kiangah kihumbitna khopite a pia uh, Hebron; Libna leng a huapkhakte toh, Jattir, Estemo a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Hilen a huapkhakte toh, Debir a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Asan a huapkhakte toh, Bethsemes a huapkhakte toh:
Huan Benjamin nam akipan; Geba a huapkhakte toh, Allemeth a huapkhakte toh, Anathoth a huapkhakte toh.
A inkuante tengtenga a khopite tengteng uh khopi sawm le thum ahi hi.
Huan Kohath tapa omlaite kiangah aisana piak ahia, huai nam inkuan akipan, huai nam kimkhat akipan, Manassi kimkhat, khopi sawmte.
Huan Gersom tapate ahihleh, a inkuante uh dungjuiin, Isakar nam akipan, Aser nam akipan, Naphtali nam akipan, Basana Manassi nam akipan, khopi sawmlethum.
Merari tapate kiangah aisana piak ahi, a inkote uh dungjuiin, Reuben nam akipan, Gad nam akipan, Zebulun nam akipan, khopi sawm le nihte.
Huan Israel taten Levi mite kiangah khopite a huapkhakte uh toh a pia uhi.
Huan Juda tate nam akipan, Simeon tapa nam akipan, Benjamin tate nam akipan, hiai khopi minlohte, aisanin a pia uhi.
Huan Kohath tapa inkote laka khenkhatten Ephraim nam akipan amau gamgi khopite a nei uhi.
Huan amau kiangah bitna khopite a pia uh, Ephraim singtang gama Sekem a huapkhakte toh; Gezer leng a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Jokmeam a huapkhakte toh, Beth-horon a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Aijalon a huapkhakte toh, Gath-rimmon a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Manassi nam kimkhat akipan; Aner a huapkhakte toh; Bileam a huapkhakte toh, Kohath tapate inko laka omlaite din.
Gersom tapa kiangah, Manassi nam kimkhat inkuan akipana piak ahi, Basana Golan a huapkhakte toh, Astaroth a huapkhakte toh:
Isakar nam akipanin; Kedesh a huapkhakte toh, Daberath a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Ramoth, a huapkhakte toh, Anem a huapkhakte toh:
Huan Aser nam akipanin; Masal a huapkhakte toh, Abdon a huapkhakte toh;
Huan Hukok a huapkhakte toh, Rehob a huapkhakte toh:
Huan Naphtali nam akipanin; Galilia Kedesh a huapkhakte toh, Hammon a huapkhakte toh, Kiriathaim a huapkhakte toh.
Levi mite omlaite kiangah, Merari tapate, Zebulun nam akipana piak ahi, Rimmono a huapkhakte toh, Tabor a huapkhakte toh:
Huan Jeriko a Jordan khen, Jordan suahlam pang, Reuben nam akipana, amaute piak ahi, gamdaia Bezer a huapkhakte toh, Jahzah a huapkhakte toh,
Huan Kedemoth a huapkhkate toh, Mephaath a huapkhakte toh:
Huan Gad nam akipanin; Gilead a Ramoth a huapkhakte toh, Mahanaim a huapkhakte toh,Huan Hesbon a huapkhakte toh, Jazer a huapkhakte toh.
Huan Hesbon a huapkhakte toh, Jazer a huapkhakte toh.
Huan Isakar tapate; Tola, Puah, Jasub, Simron, Li.
Huan Tola tapate; Uzzi, Rephai, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam, Semuel, a pipute uh inkote lupente, huaibel, Tola akipan te; a khangte ua mi hat hangsante: David damlaia a zah uh sing nih leh sang nih leh za guk ahi uh.
Huan Uzzi tapate; Izrahia: huan Izrahia tapate; Mikael, Obadia, Joel, Issia, nga: avek un mipipente ahi uh.
Huan amau toh, a pipute uh inkote danin, a khangte un, kidouna dinga sepaih pawlte ahi uh, sing thum leh sang guk; ji leh tapa tampi a nei ngal ua.
Huan Isakar inkote tengteng laka, mi hat hangsante, a unaute uh a vek ua khangthusutnaa sutin, sang sagih leh sawmgiar ahi.
Benjamin tapate; Bela, Beker, Jediael, thum.
Huan Bela tapate; Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, Iri, nga; pipute inkote lupente, mi hat hangsante; huan khangthusutnaa simin sing nih leh sang nih leh sawmthum leh li ahi uh.
Huan Beker, tapate; Zemira, Joas, Elizer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abija, Anathoth, Alemeth.
Hiaite tengteng Beker tapate ahi uh.
Huan khangthu sutnaa sim ahi ua, a khangte uh dungjuiin, a pipute uh inkote lupente, mi hat hangsante, sing nih leh za nih ahi uh.
Huan Jediael tapate; Bilhan: huan Bilhan tapate; Jeus, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaan, Zethan, tarsis, Ahisahar.
Hiaite tengteng Jediael tapate ahi uh, a pipute uh inkote lupente dungjuiin, mi hat hangsan, sing khat leh sang sagih leh za nih ahi uh, kidouna adia sepaih pawla kuankhe thei dingte.
Suppim leng Huppim, Ir tapate, Husim, Aher tapate.
Naphtali tapate; Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, Sallum, Bilhah tapate.
Manassi tapate, Asriel, a jiin a suan: (a mei Aram numeiin Gilead pa Makir a suang hi;
Huan Makirin Huppim leh Suppim sanggamnu a min Maak jiin pi a; ) huan a nihna min Zelophehadin tanute a nei hi.
Huan Maak Makir jiin tapa a neia, a minin Peres a saa; huan a unaupa min Seres ahi; huan a tapate Ulam leh Rakem ahi uh.
Huan Ulam tapate; Bedan.
Hiaite Gilead tapate ahi uh Makir tapa, Manassi tapa.
Huan a sanggamnu Hammoieketin Ishbod, Abiezer, Mahlah a nei a.
Huan Semid tapate Ahian, Sekem, Likhi, Aniam ahi uh.
Huan Ephraim tapate; Suthelah, Bered a tapa, Tahath a tapa, Elead a tapa, Tahath a tapa,
Huan Zabad a tapa, Suthel a tapa, Ezer, Elead, a gante uh la mang dinga a hongpai suk gamsunga om Gath miten a thatta uh.
Huan a pa uh Ephraimin ni tampi a suna, huchiin a unaute amah lungmuan dingin a hong uh.
Huan a ji kiangah a hoha, nau a paia, tapa a neia, a insung a tuahsiat jiakin a min dingin Beria a sata hi.
Huan a tanu Sira ahi a, Beth-horon nuainung leh tungtung leh Uzzen-sera lamnu.
Huan Repha a tapa ahi, Reseph leng; Reseph tapa Tela, Tahan a tapa;
Ladan a tapa, Ammihud a tapa, Elisam a tapa;
Nun a tapa, Josua a tapa.
Huan a neihte uleh a tennate uh Bethel leh huaia khuate ahi, suahlamah Naaran, tumlamah Gezer, huaia khopite toh, huaia Azzah leh khopite tanin:
Huan Manassi tate gamgi chinah, Beth-sean leh, a khopite, Taanak leh a khopite, Megiddo leh a khopite, Dor leh a khopite, Hiaite ah Israel tapa Joseph tate a teng uhi.
Aser tapate; Imna, Isva, Isvi, Beria, Sera a sanggamnu uh.
Huan Beria tapate, Heber, Malkiel, Birzaith pa.
Huan Heberin Japhlet, Somer, Hotham, Sua a sanggamnu uh a suang a.
Huan Japhlet tapate; Pasak, Bimhal, Asvat.
Hiaite Japhlet tate ahi uh.
Huan Semer tapate; Ahi, Rohga, Jehubba, Aram.
Huan Helem a unaupa tapate; Zopha, Imna, Seles, Amal.
Zopha tapate; Sua, Hernephar, Sual, Beri, Imra;
Bezer, Hod Samma, Silsa, Ithran, Beera.
Haun Jether tapate; Jephunne, Pispa, Ara.
Huan Ulla tapate; Ara, Hanniel, Rizia.Hiaite tengteng Aser tate ahi uh, pipute inkote lupente, mihat, tel, hangsan, lalte laka lalte.
Huan kidouna nasepna dinga Khangthusutnaa simin amau zah sing nih sang guk ahi uhi.
Hiaite tengteng Aser tate ahi uh, pipute inkote lupente, mihat, tel, hangsan, lalte laka lalte.
Huan kidouna nasepna dinga Khangthusutnaa simin amau zah sing nih sang guk ahi uhi.
Huchiin Benjaminin a ta masa Bela, a zom Asbel, a thumna Ahar a suanga;
Nohah a lina, Rapha a ngana.
Huan Belain tapate a neia, Addar, Gera, Abihud;
Huan Abisua, Naaman, Ahoa;
Huan Gera, Sephuphan, Huram.
Huan hiaite Ehud tapate ahi uh: hiaite Gebaa tengte pipute inkote lupente ahi uh, huchiin amaute Manahath ah salin a pi uhi:
Huan Naaman, Ahija, Gera, amaute salin a pia; huan Uzza leh Ahihud a suang hi.
Huan Saharaimin amaute a sawl mang nungin, Moab mun ah tate a suanga; Husim leh Baar a jite ahi uh.
Huan a ji Hodes akipan, Jobaba, Zibia, Messa, Malkam a suang hi;
Huan Jeuz, Sakia, Mirma.
Hiaite pipute inkote lupente, a tapate ahi uhi.
Huan Husim lakah Abitub leh Elpaal a suang hi.
Huan Elpaal tapate, Eber, Misam, Semed, Ono leh Lod, huaia khopite toh lampa:
Huan Beria, Sema, Aijalona Gatha tengteng delhjakte tengtengte pipute inkote lupente ahi uh;
Huan Ahio, Saksak, Jeremoth;
Huan Zebadia, Arad, Edar,
Huan Mikael, Ispah, Joha Beria tapate;
Huan Zebadia, Mosullam, Hizki, Heber;
Huan Ismerai, Izlia, Jobab, Elpaal tapate;
Huan Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi;
Huan Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel;
Huan Adai, Berai, Simrath, Simei tapate;
Huan Ispan, Eber, Eliel;
Huan Abdon, Zikri, Hanan;
Huan Hanania, Elam, Anthothija;
Huan Ipdei, Penuel, Sasak tapate;
Huan Samserai, Seharia, Athalia;
Huan Jaaresia, Elija, Zikri, Jeroham tapate.
Hiaite a khangte ua pipute ankote lupente ahi uh, mi pipente: hiaite Jerusalem ah a teng uhi.
Huan Gibeon ah Gibeon pa a tenga, Jeiel, a ji min Maaka:
Huan a tapa masapen Abdon, Zur, Kis, Baal, Nadab;
Huan Gedor, Ahio, Zeker.
Huan Mikloin Simea a suang hi.
Huan a naute uh toh Jerusalem ah, a unaute uh jawnah a teng lai uhi.
Huan Nerin Kis a suanga; huan Kisin Saul a suang; huan Saulin Jonathan, Malki-sua, Abinadab, Esbaal a suang.
Huan Jonathan tapa Merib-baal ahi a; huan Merib-baalin Mika a suang.
Huan Mika tapate; Pithon, Melek, Tarea, Ahaz.
Huan Ahazin Jehoaddahin Alemeth, Azmavet, Zimri a suanga; huan Zimriin Moza a suang;
Huan Mozain Binea a suanga; Rapha a tapa ahi, Elesa a tapa, Azel a tapa:
Huan Azelin tapa guk a neia, a min uh hiaite ahi; Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Searia, Obadia, Hanan.
Hiaite tengteng Azel tapate ahi uh.
Huan a unaupa Esek tapate; Ulam a ta masa, Jeus a zom, Eliphelet a thumna.Huan Ulam tapate mi hat hangsan, thalkapmite ahi uh, tapate, tapate tapate tampi, za khat leh sawmnga a nei uhi.
Hiaite tengteng Benjamin tapate ahi uh.
Huan Ulam tapate mi hat hangsan, thalkapmite ahi uh, tapate, tapate tapate tampi, za khat leh sawmnga a nei uhi.
Hiaite tengteng Benjamin tapate ahi uh.
Huchiin Israel tengteng khangthu-a simin a om ua; huan, ngaiin, Israel kumpipate laibu ah gelhin a om uhi: huan a tatlekna jiak un Juda bel Babulon lamah sala pi mangin a om hi.
Huan amau tantea a khopite ua teng masapente bel, Israel, siampute, Levi mite, leh Nethinim mite ahi uh.
Huan Jerusalem ah Juda tate, Benjamin tate, Ephraim leh Manasi tate a teng uhi;
Uthai Ammihud tapa, Omri tapa, Imri tapa, Bani tapa, Perez tate ah Juda tapa.
Huan Silon mite; Asai piang masapen, a tapate.
Huan Zera tapate ah; Jeuel, a unaute, za guk leh sawm kua.
Huan Benjamin tapate ah; Sallu Mesullam tapa, Hodavia tapa, Hassenua tapa;
Huan Ibnei Jeroham tapa, Ela Uzzi tapa, Mikri tapa, Sallum Sephatia tapa, Reuel tapa, Ibnija tapa;
Huan a unaute uh, a khangte uh dungjuiin, za kua leh sawmnga leh guk.
Hiai mite tengteng a pipute uh inkotea pipute inkote lupente ahi uhi.
Huan siampute ah; Jedai, Jehoiarib; Jachin;
Huan Azaria Hilkia tapa, Mesullam tapa, Ahitub tapa, Pathian in a vaihawmpa;
Huan Adai Jeroham tapa, Pashur tapa, Malkijab tapa, Maasai Adiel tapa, Jahzera tapa, Mesullam tapa, Mesillemit tapa, Immer tapa;
Huan a unaute uh, a pipute uh lupente, sang khat leh za sagih leh sawmguk; Pathian ina nasepna thilhihna dinga mi hithei mahmahte.
Huan Levi mite ah; Hashub tapa, Azrikam tapa, Hasabia tapa, Morari tapate ah;
Huan Bakbakkar, Heres, Galal, Mattania Mika tapa, Zikri tapa, Asaph tapa;
Huan Obadia Semai tapa, Galal tapa, Jeduthun tapa, Berekia Asa tapa, Elkan tapa, Netophath mite khuatea tengte.
Huan kongkhak ngakmite; Sallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, a unaute uh:
Sallum bel a pipen ahi; kumpipa kongpi suahlam panga na ngak sek: Levi tate puanin adia kongkhakngakmite ahi uhi.
Huan Sallum Kore tapa, Ebiasaph tapa, Korah tapa, a unaute, a pa inkotea, Korah mite, nasepna thilhihnaa heutu ahi ua, biakbuk kongpite ngakmite: huan a pipute uh TOUPA puanin tunga heutu a na hi ua, lutna ngakmite;
Huan Phineha Eleazer tapa hun paisaah amaute tunga vaihawmpa ahi a, huan a kiangah TOUPA a om hi.
Zekeria Meselemia tapa kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ngakpa ahi a.
Hiaite tengteng kongpite kongkhakngakmite hi dia telte za nih leh sawmleh nih ahi uh.
Hiaite a khuate ua khangthu-a sim ahi ua, a sepding uh bawlsaa David leh jawlnei Samuelin a nahihkipsa uh.
Huchiin amau leh a tate un TOUPA in kongpite a kem ua, a dan danin, biakbuk in nasanin.
A pang lite ah, suahlam, tumlam, mallam, simlam ah kongkhakngakmite a om uhi.
Huan a unaute uh, a kallaklakin ni sagihnite tengin amau kianga om dingin a hongpai jel ding uh ahi:
Kongkhakngak pipen lite lah, Levi mite, sepding sehsaa om ahi ua, Pathian in sunga dantante leh sumkoihnate tungah heutu ahi uhi.
Huan huailaia thupiak amau tunga a om jiakin, Pathian in kimvelah a giak ua, huan jingsang tenga huai hon ding thu a mau nasep ahi hi.
Huan a lak ua kuate hiamin nasepna tuiumbel suante a kem ua; kikou-a lak lutin a om ua, kikou-a lak khiakin lah a om ngal ua.
A lak ua khenkhatte vante, mun siangthoupen tuium-belsuante, tangbuang nelte, uainte, sathaute begaw leh gimnamtuite kem ding a seh ahi uhi.
Huan siampute tapate laka khenkhatten gimnamtuite tohhel a bawl uh.
Huan Mattithia, Levi mite, Korah mi Sallum ta masapen, laka khatin belliangneite kan thilte tunga nasepna sehsa a nei hi.
Huan a unaute uh laka a khen, Kohath mite tapaten tanghou a kem ua, khawlni chiha bawl dingin.
Huan hiaite lasamite ahi ua, Levi mite inkote pipute inkote lupente, dantante sunga tenga, nasep dang a kipan awlte ahi uh: sun leh janin a nasepna ua zatin lah a om ngal ua.
A khang pumpite uah, hiaite Levi mite pipute inkote lupente ahi uhi, mi pipente: hiaite Jerusalem ah a teng uh.
Huan Gibeon ah Gibeon pa a tenga, Jeiel, ji min Maaka:
Huan a tapa masapen Abdon, Zur, Kis, Baal, Ner, Nadab;
Huan Gedor, Ahie, Zekaria, Miklot.
Huan Miklotin Simeam a suanga, Huan amau leng a unaute utoh Jerusalem ah, a unaute uh jawnah a teng uh.
Huan Nerin Kis a suanga; huan Kisin Saul a suang; huan Saulin Jonathan, huan Malki-sua, Abinadab, Esbaal.
Huan Jonathan tapa bel Meribbaal ahi; huan Merib-baalin Mika a suang hi.
Huan Mika tapate; Pithon, Melek Tahrea, Ahaz.
Huan Ahazin Jara a suanga; huan Jarain Alamet, Azmavet, Zimri a suang hi;
Huan Zimriin Moza a suanga: huan Mozain Binea a suang; huan Rephai a tapa, Eleasa a tapa, Azel a tapa:Huan Azelin tapa guk a neia, a min uh hiaite ahi; Azrikam, Bokeru, Ismael, Seriah, Obadia, Hanan: hiaite Azel tapate ahi uh.
Huan Azelin tapa guk a neia, a min uh hiaite ahi; Azrikam, Bokeru, Ismael, Seriah, Obadia, Hanan: hiaite Azel tapate ahi uh.
Huan Philistia miten Israel a dou ua; huchiin Israel mite Philistia mite maah a taikek ua, Gilboa mual ah thah pukin a om uhi.
Huan Philistia miten Saul leh a tapate a delh vengveng ua; huan Philistia miten Jonathan, Abinadab leh Malki-sua, Saul tapate a that uhi.
Huan kidouna Saul adingin a haksa mahmahtaa, thalkapmiten amah a phata uhi; huan thalkapmite jiakin a lungkham mahmah hi.
Huchihlaiin Saulin galvanpopa kiangah, Na namsau dok khia inla, huaiin hondawt pailetin; huchilouinjaw hiai zeksumlouhte hongpaiin bawl louhlouhin a hon bawl kha ding uh, a chi a.
Himahleh a galvanpopa a ut kei; a lau mahmah ngala.
Huajiakin Saulin a namsau a laa, kisatnan a neita hi.
Huan a galvanpopan Saul a sita chih a theihin, huaibangmahin aman leng a namsau kisatnain a zanga, a sita hi.
Huchiin Saul a sitaa, a tapa thumte; huan a inkote tengteng leng a si khawmvek uhi.
Huan guama om Israel mite tengtengin Sepaihte a taikek uh leh Saul leh a tapate a si uh chih a muh un a khopite uh a nusia ua, a taikekta uhi; huan Philistia mite a hong ua huaite ah a tengta uhi.
Huan a jingsangin hichi ahi a, thahsate suah dinga Philistia mite a hongpai lai un, Gilboa mual ah Saul leh a tapate a puk uh chih a mu uhi.
Huan amah a sual ua, a lutang a la ua, a galvan leng, a milimte uh kiang leh mite kiangah tanchin puak dingin Philistia mite gamsungah a khak kimvel vek uhi.
Huchiin a galvan a pathiante uh in ah a koih ua, Dagon in ah a lutang a tak uhi.
Huan Jabesh-gilead tengtengin Saul tunga Philistia mite thilhih tengteng a jak un,
Mi hangsante tengteng a thou ua, Saul luang leh, a tapate luang a vala mang ua, Jabesh ah a honpua ua, Jabesha toso sing nuaiah a guhte uh a vui ua, ni sagih an a ngawl uhi.
Huchiin TOUPA tunga tatlekna a hiha, TOUPA thu a zuih louh jiakin, Saul a sitaa; dawi-jawl aisansiam thu a dotjiakin,Huaia thukana, TOUPA akipan thu a kan louh jiakin: huaijiakin amah a thata, gam tuh Jesai tapa David lamah a peta hi.
Huaia thukana, TOUPA akipan thu a kan louh jiakin: huaijiakin amah a thata, gam tuh Jesai tapa David lamah a peta hi.
Huchiin Israel tengteng Hebron ah David kiangah a hongkikhawm khawm ua, Ngaiin, na guh leh na sa ka hi uh.
Tuma lamin, Saul mahmah kumpipa a hih laiin, Israel pi khiaa pi lut nang na hi a; TOUPA na Pathianin na kiangah, Israel ka mite na vak dinga, ka mite Israel tungah lal na hi ding hi, honchi a.
Huchiin Israel upate tengteng Hebron ah kumpipa kiangah a hong pai ua; huan Davidin Hebron ah TOUPA maah amau toh thukhun a bawla; huan Samuel khuate TOUPA thu bang jela, Israel tunga kumpipa dingin David a septa uhi.
Huan David leh Israel tengteng Jerusalem (huaimah tuh Jebus a hi) ah a hoh ua; huchiin Jebus mite, huai gama tengte, huailaiah a om uhi.
Huchiin Jebusa tengten David kiangah, Hiai lama na hong louh ding ahi, a chi ua.
Ahihhangin Davidin Zion kulh muanhuai a laa; huaimah tuh David khopi ahi.
Huan Davidin, Kuapeuh Jebus mite that masapenpen a lianpen leh heutu ahi ding, a chi a.
Huan Zerui tapa Joab a kuantou masapena, huchiin amah a lianpena bawlin a omta hi.
Huan David bel kulh muanhuai ah a tenga; huaijiakin David khopi a chi uhi.
Huchiin khopi a bawl suak veka, Millo kimvel akipan nasanin: huan Joabin khopi dang a bawlpha vek hi.
Huchiin David bel a hongthupi semsema; sepaihte TOUPA lah a kiangah a om ngala.
Huan hiaite David neih mi hatte laka a pipente ahi uh, Israel tungtanga TOUPA thu bang jela, amah kumpipa dia bawl dinga, Israel tengteng toh, a gamsunga amah laka a hatna uh taklangte.
Huan hiai Davidin a neih mi hatte zah ahi: Jasobeam, Hakmon mi tapa, sawmthumte laka pipen; za thumte dou dingin a teipi a leka khatvei thuin amaute a that hi.
Huan amah nungin Dodo tapa Eleazar, Ahoh mi, mi hat thumte laka khat ahi hi.
Pas-dammim ah David kiangah a oma, huan huaiah kidou tumin Philistia mite a kikhawm ua, barli-buha dimna mun takah; huan Philistia mite ma akipanin mite a taikekta uhi.
Huchiin huai mun laitakah a ding ua, a hum ua, a hum ua, Philistia mite a that uhi; huan TOUPAN zohna thupi takin amau a hondamta hi.
Huan mi pipen sawmthumte laka thum suangpi lamah David kiangah, Adullam kokhuk ah a hoh suk ua; huan Philistia mite tampiten Rephaim phaijang ah puanin a kai ua.
Huailaiin David bel kohawm sungah a om a, Philistia mite kulhpi bel Beth-lehem ah a om hi,
Huchiin David a lungjuanga, Aw kongpi kianga om, Beth-lehem tuihel tui dawn dinga hong pia mi khat om leh chi hinatel ing e! a chi a.
Huan huai thumten Philistia mite tampi lak a phu pai suak ua, Beth-lehem tuihel akipan tui a vatawi ua, kongpi kianga om, a honla ua, David kiang a hontun uhi: himahleh Davidin a dawn nuam keia, TOUPA adin a bung khe jawa.
Hiai ka hih, ka Pathianin honphal kei hen: a hinna uh lauhuainaa koih hiai mite sisan ka dawn ding hia? amau lah a hinna uh lauthawnna tohin a hontawi uh ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huaijiakin a dawn nuamta kei hi.
Hiai thilte huai mi hat thumten a hih uh.
Huan Abisai, Joab unaupa, huai thumte laka khat ahi: aman lah za thumte dou dingin a teipi a lika amau a thata, mi thumte lakah min a neita ngala.
Thumte lakah amah a zahtakhuai jaw hi nihte sangin huchiin a heutupa ding ua bawlin a om hi: hitamahleh thum masate jaw a pha kei hi.
Benai Jehoiad tapa, Kabzeela mi hangsan, thilhih thupite hihpa tapa, Moaba Ariel tapate nihte a thata: a pai suk laia, vuk kiak laiin kokhuk lakah humpinelkai a that hi.
Huan Aigupta mi a thata, mi lian mahmah, tong ngaa sang; huan Aigupta mi kha a teipi siamganmi chiam bang ahi; huchiin a kiangah chiang toh a hoh suka, Aigupta mi khut akipan teipi a laa, amah mah teipiin amah a hihlumta hi.
Hiai thilte Benai Jehoiad tapain a hiha, huchiin huai mi hat thumte lakah min a nei hi.
Ngaiin, sawmthumte sangin zahtakhuaui jawin a oma, himahleh thum masate jaw a pha kei hi: huchiin Davidin a galvil heutuin amah a koih hi.
Sepaih pawltea mi hatte leng; Asahel Joab unaupa, Elhanan Beth-lehema Dodo tapa;

Uria Hit mi, Zabad Ahlai tapa;
