Huchiin hiaite Ziklanga David kianga hongpaite ahi uh, Kis tapa Saul jiak maha a kihep chinten laiin: huchiin mi hatte lakah a om ua, kidounaa amah panpihmite.
Thaltein a kigalvan ua, suang kap leh thalpeua thal kapah khut taklam leh veilam a zangthei ua; amau Saul unaute Benjamin akipan ahi uhi.
A pipen Ahiezer ahi, huan Joas, Gibeath mi Sema tapate; Azmaveth tate Jeziel leh Pelet; Berka, Anathoth mi Jehu;
Huan Gibeon mi Esmai, sawmthumte laka mi hat, sawmthumte tungah; Jeremia, Jahaziel, Johanan leh Geerath mi Jozabad;
Eluzai, Jerimot, Bealia, Semaria, Sephatia Haruph mi;
Elkana, Isia, Azarel, Joezer, Jasobeam, Korahit mi;
Huan Joela, Zebadia, Gedora Jeroham tapate.
Huan Gad mite a hihleh gamdaia kulh ah David lamah a kituamseh ua, mi hangsan, kidouna adia chilsa, lum leh teipi khoih theite; a maitang uh humpinelkaite maitang banga, muala sajate banga kin;
Ezer a pipen, Obadia a zom, zom, Eliab a thumna;
Mismanna a lina, Jeremia a ngana;
Attai a gukna, Eliel a sagihna;
Johanan a giatna, Elzabad a kuana;
Jeremia a sawmna, Makbannai a sawmlehkhatna.
Hiai Gad tapate lakate sepaihhte heutute ahi uh: a neupen za khat toh a kikima, a lian penpen sang khat toh.
Hiaite a piaute a tup laia, kha khatnaa Jordan kana paite ahi ua; huchiin phaijangtea om tengteng, suahlam leh, tumlam tuaktuakte, delh jakte ahi uh.
Huan kulha David kiangah Benjamin leh Juda tate laka mi a hong ua.
Huchiin amaute tuak dingin David a pai khiaa, a dawnga a kiang uah, Hon panpih dia lemna deiha ka kianga hong na hih ua leh, nou adin ka lungtang phan khawm ahi ding; himahleh ka khut ah bangmah hiamgamna a om kei chih theia, ka galte adia kei honman dinga hongpai na hih uleh, ka pipute uh Pathianin huai en henla, sal hen, a chi a.
Huailaiin sawmthumte laka pipenpa, Amasai tungah kha a hongtunga, Nanga ka hi ua, David, huan nang lamah, nang Jesai tapa: muanna, na kiangah om henla, nang honpanpihmite kiangah muanna: na Pathianin lah nang a honpanpih ngala, a chi a.
Huailaiin Davidin amaute a nakipahpiha, pawl heutute dingin a bawlta hi.
Manasi akipanin leng khenkhatte, kidounaa Saul dou dinga Philistia mite toh a hongpaiin David lama a puk mang uhi; himahleh amau amaute a panpih kei uh: Philistia mite toupaten thuhilhin amah a sawl mang ngal ua, i lupente uh lauthawnghuaina dingin Saul a heutupa lamah a puk mang ding, chiin.
Ziklag a a hohin, amah lama Manasi akipan puk a om ua, Adna, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikael, Jozabad, Elihu, Zillethai, Manasi akipan sangte heutute.
Huan tam-vak-hat pawl dou dingin David a panpih uh: amau lah mi hat hangsante leh sepaih laka heutute ahi ngal ua.
Ni tengin David kiangah amah panpih dingin a hong hong ua, sepaih pawl thupi, Pathian sepaih pawl bang a honghih masiah.
Huan hiaite kidou dinga kigalvante huaite lupente zah ahi, TOUPA thu banga Saul gam amah kianga hei dia, Hebrona David kianga hongpaite.
Juda tate lum leh teipi tawi theite sang guk leh za giat, kidou dinga kigalvan.
Simeon tate ah kidouna dinga, mihat hangsante, sang sagih leh za khat.
Levi tate ah sang li leh za guk.
Huan Jehoiada bel Aron inkote pipa ahi a, amah toh sang thum leh za sagih a om uhi;
Huan tangval hat hangsan, Zadok, leh a pa inkote heutu sawmnih leh nih.
Huan Benjamin tate, Saul unaute, sang thum: amaute laka thupipenpenten lah Saul inko lamah a ginomna uh a na juita ngal ua.
Huan Ephraim tate ah sing nih leh za giat, mi hat hangsan, a pipute uh inkotea mi minthangte.
Huan Manasi nam kimkhatte sing khat leh sang giat, honga, David kumpipaa bawl dia, mina genkhiakte,
Huan Issakar tate, hunte theihsiamna nei mite, Israelin bang a hih dia chih thei ding; amaute lupente za nih ahi uh; huan a unaute tengteng uh amau thupiakin a om uhi.
Zebulun akipan, sepaih pawl kuan khe theite bang, kidouna van chichih toha, kidouna bawla thupe thei sing nga; kidouna bawla thupe thei, lung tuahnih neilou mite.
Huan Naphtali akipan heutu sang khat, amaute kiangah lum leh teipi sing thum leh sang sagih.
Huan Dan mite kidounaa thupe thei, sing nih leh sang giat leh za guk.
Huan Aser akipan, sepaih pawla kuan khe thei, kidouna a thupe thei, sing li.
Huan Jordan lehlam galah, Reuben mite leh, Gad mite, leh Manasi nam kimkhatte akipan, kidouna adinga kidouna vanzat chichih toh nuai khat leh sing nih.
Hiaite tengteng, kidou mi ngen hiin, kidouna thupe thei, lungtang hoihkim toh Hebron ah David Israel tengteng tunga kumpipa dia bawl dingin a hongpai ua: huan David kumpipaa bawl dingin Israel dangte tengtengin lungkhat a pu chiat uhi.
Huan huailaiah David kianga, ne leh dawnin, ni thum a om uh: a unaute uh lah amau adingin kisakna a bawl ngal ua.Amau kiang naia omten, Issakar leh Zebulun tantanaten, sabengtungte leh sangawngsaute leh sakol neuter leh bawngtaltein tanghou a honpua ua, an nek ding, theipigah beute, grepmin bomte, uain leh sathau, a tamatamin bawngtalte leh belamte: Israel ah lah nuamsakna a om ngala.
Amau kiang naia omten, Issakar leh Zebulun tantanaten, sabengtungte leh sangawngsaute leh sakol neuter leh bawngtaltein tanghou a honpua ua, an nek ding, theipigah beute, grepmin bomte, uain leh sathau, a tamatamin bawngtalte leh belamte: Israel ah lah nuamsakna a om ngala.
Huchiin David sangte leh jate heutute, makai chiteng ngei toh thu a kikum ua.
Huan Davidin Israel kikhawmte tengteng kiangah, Hoih na sak ua, TOUPA I Pathian ua kipan a hihleh, mun chitenga Israel gam tengteng nutsiata om i unaute kiangah thu I khak jak ding ua, loupa munte nei a khopite ua a kiang ua siampute leh Levimite om, huchia i kianga a hongkikhop khawm theihna ding un:
Huchiin I Pathian uh bawm i kilak nawn ding uhi: Saul hun laiin lah i nazong kei ua, a chi a.
Huan kikhawmpi tengtengin huchibangin i hih ding uh a chi ua: mi tengteng mit ah huai thil lah a dik ngala.
Huchiin Davidin Israel tengteng a kaikhawma, Aigupta gam luita Sihor akipan Hamath lutna chiang phain, Kiriath-jearim akipana Pathian bawm vala dingin.
Huan David a kuan tou-a, Israel tengteng leng, Baalah huaibel, Kiriath-jearim ah ahi, huaibel Judaa ahia, huai akipana Pathian, TOUPA Cherubimte tunga tupa, Aminlohna om vala tou dingin.
Huan Pathian bawm kangtalai thakin a pua ua, Abinadab in akipan a la khia ua: huchiin Uzza leh Ahioin a hawl uhi.
Huchiin David leh Israel tengteng Pathian maah a hatna tengteng un late, kaihgingte, pekgingguisawmmneite, khuangtate, dakkhutbette leh pengkulte ngei toh lopna bawlin om uh.
Huan Kidon buhchilna-phuala hongtun un, Uzzain bawm len dingin a khutin a sawka; bawngtalte lah a kipal ngal ua.
Huan Uzza tungah TOUPA hehna a soutaa, bawma a khut a koih jiakin, amah a hihlumta hi: huchiin huailaiah Pathian maah a sita.
Huan TOUPA Uzza tunga a puahkhap jiakin, David a lungkimkei hi: huan huailai tuni tanin, Perez-uzza a chita hi.
Huan huai niin Davidin Pathian a kihtaa, Bangchiin Pathian bawm in ka kitut dia?
Chiin.
Huchiin Davidin David khopi sungah bawm a kiangah a suanta keia, Git mi Obed-edom in sungah a tuam puak zota hi.Huan Pathian bawm bel kha thum Obed-edom inkote kiangah a in sungah a oma: huan TOUPAN Obed-edom leh, a neih tengteng a vualjawlta hi.

Huchiin Tura kumpipa Hiramin David kiangah sawltak mite a sawla, sidar singte, suangsekmite, khutsiammite, in lamsak dingin.
Huan Davidin Israel tungah TOUPAN amah kumpipain a koihkipta chih a theia, a gam lah, a mi Israelte vangin, sangpi-a tawisangin a om ngala.
Huan Davidin Jerusalem ah jite tamsem a pi a: huchiin Davidin tapate leh tanute tamsem a suangta hi.
Huan hiaite Jerusalema a neih tate minte ahi; Sammu, Sobad, Nathan, Solomon;
Huan Ibhar, Elisua, Elpelet;
Huan Nogah, Nepek, Japhia;
Huan Elisam, Beeliad, Eliphelet.
Huan Philistia miten David Israel tengteng tungah kumpipaa thaunilh ahi chih a jak un, David zong dingin Philiastia mite tengteng a kuan tou ua: huan Davidin huai a jakin, amaute dou dingin a kuan kheta hi.
Huan Philistia mite a hong ua, Rephaim phaijang a tuamta uh.
Huchiin Davidin Pathian a donga, Philistia mite dou dingin ka kuan tou diam? amau ka khut ah na honpe diam? chiin.
Huan TOUPAN a kiangah, Kuan touin; na khuta amau honpe ding ka hi ngala, a chi a.
Huchiin Baal-perzaim ah a hong tou ua, huan Davidin amau a thata; huchiin Davidin, Pathianin tui khak bangin ka khutin ka melmate a hihsia, a chi a.
Huaijiakin huai mun min dingin Baal-perazim a sa uh.
Huan huailaiah a pathiante uh a nusia ua; Davidin thupiak a piaa, meiin a hal uhi.
Huchiin Philistiaten phaijang a tuam nawn lai uhi.
Huan Davidin Pathian thu a dong nawna; huan Pathianin a kiangah, Amau delh dingin na kuan tou kei ding: amau kihei mangsan inla, mulberi singte jawn takah amau sualin.
Huan hichi ahi dinga, mulberi singte dawna tai ging na jak chiangin; huai chiangin kidou dingin na kuan khe ding hi: Philistia mite honpi that dingin na maah Pathian lah a kuankheta ngala, a chi a.
Huan Davidin Pathianin amah thu a piak bangin a hiha: huchiin Gibeon akipan Gezer phain Philistia mite honpi a thatta uhi.Huan David minthanna gam tengtengah a pai khiaa; huchiin TOUPAN amah launa nam tengteng tungah a tungsak ta hi.
Huan David minthanna gam tengtengah a pai khiaa; huchiin TOUPAN amah launa nam tengteng tungah a tungsak ta hi.
Huchiin David khopi sungah Davidin inte a kibawla; huan Pathian bawm adingin mun a bawla, puanin a kaih sakta hi.
Huailaiin Davidin, Levi mite chihlouhngal kuamahin Pathian bawm a po ding uh ahi kei: TOUPAN lah amau Pathian bawm po ding leh khantawna amah na sepsak dingin amaute a natelta ngala, achia.
Huan a mun, a bawlsaksaa TOUPA bawm honla tou dingin, Davidin Jerusalem ah Israel tengteng a kaikhawmta hi.
Huchiin Davidin Aron tapate leh Levi mite a khawma:
Kohath tapate lakah; Uriel a pipen leh a unaute ja leh sawmnih:
Merrari tapate lakah; Asai a pipen leh a unaute za nih sawmnih:
Gersom tapate lakah: Joel a pipen leh a unaute ja leh sawmthum:
Elizaphan tapate lakah; Semai a pipen leh a unaute za nih:
Hebron tapate lakah; Eliel a pipen leh a unaute sawmgiat:
Uzziel tapate lakah; Amminadab a pipen leh a unaute ja leh sawmlehnih.
Huan Davidin Zadok leh Abiathar siampute, Levi mite, Uri, Asai, Joel, Semai, Eliel, leh Amminadab a sam saka,
A kiang uah, Noute Levi mite pipute inkote lupente na hi ua: kihihsiang unla, nou leh na unaute uh, mun ka bawlsak saa Israel Pathian, TOUPA bawm na lak theihna ding un.
A masapena na puak louh jiak un, TOUPA i Pathian un i tunguah thuchiam a bawla, hihdingdan dungjuiin lah amah i zong ngal kei ua, a chi a.
Huchiin siampute leh Levi mite, Israel Pathian, TOUPA bawm la tou dingin a kisiangsak uhi.
Huan Mosiin TOUPA thu banga thu a piak bangin Levi taten a liang jang uah huaia chiang tawntein Pathian bawm a jawngta uhi.
Huan Davidin Levi mi pipente kiangah a unaute uh lasamite tum gingtheihte toh, pekging guisawmneite leh kaihgingte leh dakkhutbette, ngaihtaka ging leh nuamsaa aw suah ding sep dingin a hilh hi.
Huchiin Levi miten Joel tapa Heman a sep ua; huan a unaute lakah, Asaph Berekia tapa; huan Merari tapate a unaute uh lakah, Kusai tapa Ethan;
Huan amau toh a unaute uh pawl nihnnate, Zekaria, Ben, Jaaziel, Semiramot, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaia, Maasei, Mattithia, Eliphelehu, Miknei, Obed-edom, Jeiel, kongkhakngakmite.
Huchiin lasamite, Heman, Asaph, Ethen te sehin a omta ua, ngaihtaka tum ding, dal dakkhutbette toh;
Huan Zekaria, Aziel, Semiramot, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maasei, Benai, pekging guisawmneite Alamoth toh kituaka bawl toh;
Huan Mattithia, Eliphelehu, Minei, Obed-edom, Jeiel, Azazia, kaihgingte Seminit toh bawl, makai dingin.
Huan Kenania, Levi mite laka a pipen, lapuin a panga: a siam jiakin, la hilhin a pang hi.
Huan Berekia leh Elkana bawm adia kongkhak ngakmitein a om uhi.
Huan Sebania, Josaphat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zekaria, Benai, Eliezer, siamputen, Pathian bawm maah pengkulte a mut ua: huan Obededom leh Jehia bawm adinga kongkhakngakmitein a om uhi.
Huchiin David leh, Israel upate leh, sangte tunga heutute, Obed-edom in akipan TOUPA thukhunna bawm nuamna toh a vala tou dingin a kuanta ua;
Huan hichi ahi a, Pathianin TOUPA bawm jawng Levi mite a panpih laiin, amau bawngtal sagih leh belamtal sagihin a kithoih uhi.
Huan David puanmalngat hoih puannaktualin a kijema, huan bawm jawng Levi mite tengteng leh, lasamite leh, la heutupa Kenania lasamite toh: huan Davidin puanmalngat siampulian puannak a silh hi.
Huchibangin Israel tengtengin TOUPA thukhunna bawm kikou kawm leh, pengkul ging binei toh, pengkulte toh, dakkhutbette toh pekging guisawmneite leh kaihgingte ngaihtaka ging toh, a honla touta uhi.Huan hichi ahi a, TOUPA thukhunna bawm David khopi a hong tunin, Saul tanu Mikal tohlet ah a dak khiaa, David lam leh mawl a mutaa; a lungtangin a musitta hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, TOUPA thukhunna bawm David khopi a hong tunin, Saul tanu Mikal tohlet ah a dak khiaa, David lam leh mawl a mutaa; a lungtangin a musitta hi.
Huchiin Pathian bawm a honla lut ua, puanin Davidin a bawlsak, laizang ah a koihta uhi: huan Pathian maah halmang thillatte leh lemna thillatte a lan uhi.
Huan Davidin halmang thillat leh lemna thillatte a lat khitin TOUPA minin mite a vualjawl hi.
Huan Israel mi chih kiangah, pasal leh numei mi chih kiangah tanghou beu khat, sa bak khat, leh grepmingaw beu khat a hawma.
Huchiin TOUPA bawm maia nasem ding leh TOUPA, Israel Pathian kipahpih ding leh kipahthugen ding leh phat dingin Levi mite laka kuate hiam a septa hi:
Asaph a pipen, amah zomin Zekaria, Semiramot, Jeiel, Mattithia, Eliab, Benai, Obed-edom, Jeiel, Pekging guisawmneite leh kaihgingte toh; huan Asaph dakkhutbette, ngaihtaka ging toh;
Huan Benai leh Jahaziel siampute Pathian thukhunna bawm maa, om nilouhlouhte toh.
Huchiin huai niin Davidin, Asaph leh a unaute khutin, TOUPA kianga kipahthute gen ding a hihkip masapenpen hi.
Aw TOUPA kiangah kipahthute gen unla, a min lou un; mite lakah a thilhihte theisak un.
Amah lasaksak unla, phatnalate saksak un; a nasep lamdangte tengteng houlim un.
A min siangthou suang unla: TOUPA zongte lungtang kipak hen.
TOUPA leh a hatna zong unla; a mel zong nilouh un.
A hihkhitsa a thilhih lamdangte theigige unla; a lamdannate leh, a kama vaihawmte;
Aw nou a sikha Israel chi, nou a mitelte, Jakob tate.
Amah TOUPA i Pathian ahi: a vaihawmte lei tengtengah a om hi.
Khantawnin a thukhun theigige unla, suan sang khatte kianga a piak a thu;
Thukhun Abraham toh a bawl, huan Isaak kianga a thuchiam;
Huan huaimah thuseh dingin Jakob kiangah a hihkipa, Israel kiangah khantawn thkhun dingin:
Na kiangah Kanaan gam, na goutan tuan, konpe ding, chiin:
Hihzaha mi tawmchik phet na hih lai un; ahi, tawm chik mahmah, a sunga khualzinmite;
Nam dangdang kiangah a ban hoh ua, gam dangdang akipanin mi tuamtuamte kiangah.
Kuamah nuaisiah a phal keia; ahi, amaute jiakin kumpipate leng a sal hi;
Khoih kei unla, ka jawlneite poi himhim leng khoih kei un, chiin.
Leitung luahte tengteng aw, TOUPA pahtawiin lasa unla, ni tengin a hotdamna thu theisak un.
Nam chih lakah a thupidan gen unla, mi chihte lakah a thillamdang hihte gen un.
TOUPA lah a thupi-a, nakpi mahmaha phat ding a hih jiakin; pathian tengteng sanga kihtak ding ahi.
Mi chih pathiante lah milim ahi ngal ua; TOUPAN bel vante a bawl hi.
Pahtawina leh thupina a maah a oma; hatna leh kilawmna a mun siangthou-ah a om hi.
Mi chiha chi chihte aw, TOUPA kiangah pia unla, TOUPA thupina leh hatna pia un.
TOUPA a min thupina pia unla, thillat ding tawi unla, a maah hongpai un; siangthou kilawmnain TOUPA chibaibuk un.
Lei tengteng aw, a maah ling un; khovel a lin theih louhna dingin hihkipin a om hi.
Vante kipak takin om uhenla, lei leng nuamsa takin om hen; nam chih lakah, TOUPAN vai a hawm, chi uheh.
Tuipi leh a sunga thil om tengteng ging hon henla; gam leh a sunga om tengteng kipak takin om hen;
Huchih hun chiangin gamnuaia sing tengtengin TOUPA maah nuamsain la a sa ding ua, lei vaihawm dingin lah a hong pai sin ngala.
Aw TOUPA kiangah kipahthu gen un, amah lah a hoih ngala; a chitna khantawna om ding ahi ngala.
Aw, ka hotdamna uh Pathian, honhondam inla, na min siangthou phat ding leh, na phatna suang dingin, nam chih laka kipan honpi khawm inla, honhumbitin, chi un.
Israelte Pathian TOUPA phatin om hen, Khantawn akipan khantawn dongin.
Huan, mipi tengtengin, Amen, a chi ua, TOUPA a phatta uhi.
Huchiin huaia TOUPA thukhunna bawm maa ni teng a kuldan bang jela nasem dingin Asaph leh a unaute a koihtaa;
Obed-edom leh Hosa, a unau uh sawmguk leh giat te toh; Jeduthun tapa Obed-edom leh Hosa te kongkhakngakmi dingin ahi ua;
Huan Zadok siampu leh, a unaute siampute, Gibeona om mun sanga TOUPA biakbuk maa,
Jingsang leh nitaka halmangthillat maitam tunga TOUPA adia halmang thillatte lan gige dingin, Israel kiangah thupiaka piak, TOUPA dan sunga kigelh dungjuiin;
A chitna khantawna a om jiakin TOUPA kianga kipahthugen ding Heman leh Jeduthun leh mi dang min loha telkhiakte toh;
Heman leh Jeduthunin Pathian lasaklna dia vanzatte, pengkulte leh dakkhutbette, ngaihtaka ginsak dingte a nei ua; kongkhakngakmi ding Jeduthun tapate toh.Huchiin mipi tengteng amau in lam chiat ah a paita ua; huan David leng a inkote vualjawl dingin a pai sam hi.
Huchiin mipi tengteng amau in lam chiat ah a paita ua; huan David leng a inkote vualjawl dingin a pai sam hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, David a ina a om laiin jawlnei Nathan kiangah Davidin, Ngaiin, kei sadar sing in ah ka oma, himahleh TOUPA thukhunna bawm puanjak nuai maimahah a oma, a chi a.
Huan Nathanin David kiangah, Na lungsima na vei bang takin hih lechin ake; Pathian na kiangah lah a om ngala, a chi a.
Huan huai jan mahin hichi ahi a, Nathan kiangah Pathian thu a hong tunga,
Ka sikha David vahilhin, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Ka omna dingin nang in na honlamsak ding ahi kei;
Israel suante Aigupta gam akipan ka pi khiak akipan tutanin in ah ka om keia; puanin leh biakbuk ah ka om jel jaw hi.
Israelte tengteng toh ka paina himhim uah leng ka mite vak dinga thu ka piak Israelte vaihawmmite kiangah, Bangdia sidar sing in hon lamsak lou?
Ka chi ngei ahia?
Huaijiakin ka sikha David kiangah hichiin genin, Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi ahi, Belam tatna mun akipan na belam ching lai ka mi Israelte tunga kumpipa dingin ka honla a;
Huan, na paina peuhmahah na kinangah ka om jela, na melmate ka honhihmansak jel hi; leia mi thupi mahmahte bangin min thupi tak ka honbawlsak sin hi.
Huan ka mi Israelte adingin mun ka sep dinga, kisuan nawn lou-a amau tuam muna a om gige theihna ding un amau ka phut ding hi;
Tumaa ka mi Israelte tunga vaihawmmite ka seh laia thulimlouhna taten a hih sek bang un a hihgenthei nawn sam kei ding uh; na melma tengteng leng ka zahlaksak lai ding hi.
Huan huailou leng TOUPAN inkuan a hondinsak ding chih ka honhilh ahi.
Huan na ni a beia, na pi leh pute kianga na pai hun chiangin, hichi ahi dinga, na nunga na suan, na tate laka mi ka tungding dinga; huan a gam ka hihkip ding hi.
Aman in a honlamsak dinga; huan a laltutphah khantawnin ka hih kip ding.
Huchiin a pa ka hi dinga, amah ka tapa ahi dinga; ka chitna na maa ompa akipan a ka lak mang bangin, amah jaw ka lak mang sak kei ding hi;
Ka in ah leh ka gamah amah khantawnin ka ding kip sak digna, huan a laltutphah khantawna hihkip ahi ding hi, chiin.
Huai thute tengteng leh huai kilakna bang geihin Nathanin David kiangah a gen hi.
Huchiin kumpipa David bel a luta, TOUPA maah a tu-a, Aw TOUPA Pathian, kua ahia ka hiha, ka inkote leng kua ahia a hih ua, hichi tantan nonpi?
Aw Pathian, huaite leng nang mitmuhin thil neuchik phet jaw ahi a; himahleh aw TOUPA Pathian, na sikha inkuan hongom danding thu kum tampi sunga ding na nagentaa, mi lian bangin na honsep laia, aw TOUPA Pathian.
Na sikha pahtawia a om tungtang thu-ah Davidin na kiangah bang a gen tuan nawn mahmah dia? na sikha lah na theitel mahmah ngala.
Aw TOUPA na sikha jiakin nangmah lungsima pawt bang jelin hiai thil thupi mahmah theisak dingin thil thupi mahmahte na hita hi.
Aw TOUPA ka ka theih un nang bang mahmah a om kei ua, nang loungal Pathian himhim leng a om sam kei hi.
Aigupta gam akipan na tatkhiaka na mite maa nam dangte zahlaksaka, thil thupi tak leh lauhuai tak hiha min thupi tak bawl sak dinga Pathianin amah mite adia a hontatkhiak na mi Israelte bang mahmah khovel ah nam dang kua a om ua?
Na mi Israelte khantawna na mite dingin lah na nabawlta ngala; nang TOUPA a Pathian uh na nahita.
Huchiin aw TOUPA, na sikha tungtang thu leh a inkote tungtang thu na gen khantawn adin hihkip inla, na gensa bangin hihin.
Huan khantawnin na min hihkip leh hihletin om hen, Sepaihte TOUPA Israel Pathian, Israelte adia Pathian mahmah ahi, na sikha David inkote na maah hihkipin om uhen, chiin.
Aw nang ka Pathian, na sikha kiangah inkuan na dingsak ding chih na na phuangta ngala; huaijiakin na sikhain na kiangah ka thum ngam lai ahi.
Aw TOUPA, nang jaw Pathian na hi a, hiai thil hoih na sikha na nachiamtaa,Na sikha inkote na maa khantawn a om gige theihna ding un nana vualjawltaa; aw TOUPA, na vualjawl jaw khantawn vualjawlna ahi, a chi a.
Na sikha inkote na maa khantawn a om gige theihna ding un nana vualjawltaa; aw TOUPA, na vualjawl jaw khantawn vualjawlna ahi, a chi a.
Huan huai nungin hichi ahi a, Davidin Philistia mite a suala, a zou-a, Gath khua leh a khopelte Philistia mite a suhsaka.
Huan, Moabte a sual nawna, Moab mite David sikhate a honghita ua, siah bang a pe jel uhi.
Huan Euphrates luia a gam kipsak dinga David a pai kawmin Zoba kumpipa Hadadezar leng Hamat chinah a sual nawn hi.
Huchiin Davidin kangtalai sang khat leh sakol tungtuangmi sang sagih leh sepaih sing nih a matsaka; huan, Davidin kangtalai kai mi sakol tengteng a tha uh a sahsaka, kangtalai ja kai ding bel a hawi hi.
Huan Damaskaa Suria mite Zoba kumpipa Hadadezer hon dingin a hongkuana, huan, Davidin Suria mi sing nih leh sang nih a thata;
Huchiin Davidin Damaskaa Suria mite lakah a sepaih a koiha; huchiin Suria mite David sikhate a honghita ua, siah bang a pe jel uhi.
Huan Davidin Hadadezer pawlte dangkaeng lumte a laksaka, Jerusalem ah a paipiha.
Huan Hadadezer khua Tibhat leh Kun akipan Davidin dal tampi a puaa, huaitein Solomonin dal lohte, tunnate, dal tuiumbelsuante a bawla.
Huan Hamat kumpipa Touin Zoba kumpipa Hadadezer sepaih tengteng Davidin a zou chih ana jakin.
Hadadezer a sima, a thah jiaka chibai buk ding leh kipahpih dingin a tapa Hadoram David kiangah a sawla; Hadadezer leh Tou te lah nanakidou sek ahi ngal ua; dangkaeng leh damgka sik leh dal tuiumbelsuan chichih leng a tawisak lai hi.
Huaite leng gam dang a zoh tengtenga dangka sik leh dangkaeng a lakte toh Davidin TOUPA kiangah a lana; Edomte lakate, Moabte lakate, Amon suante lakate, Philistiate lakate, Amalekte lakate.
Huailou leng, Zerui tapa Abisaiin Edomte sing khat leh sang giat Chi guam ah a thata.
Huan Edom gamah sepaihte a koiha; huchiin Edom mi tengteng David sikhate a honghita uh.
Huan TOUPAN David a paina peuhah a zousak jel hi.
Huchiin Davidin Israel mi tengteng tungah vai a hawma; a mi tengteng tungah diktat takin vai a hawm hi.
Huan Zerui tapa Joab bel sepaih heutu pen ahi a; huan Ahilud tapa Jehosaphat bel tanchingelhpa ahi.
Huan Ahitub tapa Zadok leh Abiathar tapa Abimelek bel siampu ahi ua, huan Savsa bel laigelhmi ahi a;Huan Jehoiada tapa Benai bel Keret mi leh Pelet mite heutu ahi a, huan David tapate bel kumpipa kima pipente ahi uhi.
Huan Jehoiada tapa Benai bel Keret mi leh Pelet mite heutu ahi a, huan David tapate bel kumpipa kima pipente ahi uhi.
Huan, huai nungin hichi ahi a, Amon suante kumpipa Nahas a si a, a tapa a sikin a lal hi.
Huan Davidin, A pan honna hehpih jel jiakin ken leng Naha tapa Hanun ka hehpih sam ding, a chi a.
Huchiin Davidin a pa tungtang thu-a lungmuan dingin mite a sawl hi.
Huan David mite Amon suante gamah Hanun kiangah amah lungmuan dingin a vatung ua.
Himahleh Amon suan heututen Hanun kiangah, Davidin na pa a zahtak jiaka lungmuan ding mi na kianga honsawl hiin na um ahia?
A mite gam hihse dinga enchain leh enkhe dinga na kianga hongpai ahi kha kei ding uam maw?
A chi ua.
Huchiin Hanunin David mite a mana, a khamul uh a met maisaka, huan a puansilhte uh a lai takah a tobou uh khuh pha minmenin a tansaka, a paisak ta hi.
Huchiin kuatehiamin a mite a na hih dan David a vahilh ua.
Huan a dawnding mi a sawla; amau lah a zum mahmah ngal ua.
Huchiin Amon suanten David jakdahlam a na hihta uh chih anakitheih un, Hanun leh Amon suanten Mesopotamia gama mite, Aram-maakaa mite, Zobaa mite, kangtalai leh sakol tungtuag mite goihna dingin dangkasik talent sang khat a khak uh.
Huchiin kangtalai sing thum leh sang nih, Maaka kumpipa leh a mite toh a pi ua, Medeba chinah panmun a bawlta uh.
Huan Amon suante a khua ua kipante khawngin a pawt khia ua, a kikai khawm ua, kidou dingin a kuan uhi.
Huan Davidin huai a jakin, Joab leh sepaih hangsante tengteng a sawl khia.
Huan Amon suante a hongkuan ua, khopi kongpi chinah a kiphalh ua, huan, kumpipa hongtel teitei a tuamin pawnah a om uhi.
Huchiin a malam leh nunglamah a honsual sin uh chih Joabin a theihin Israel mite laka mi a hoih tata a tel khiaa, Suria mite sual dingin a nakijak uhi.
Huan mi dang tengteng bel a unaupa Abisai khut ah a koih veka.
Amon suante sual dingin amau leng a kizalh uh.
Huan aman, Suria mite ka zoh sin kei leh, nang honpanpihin; huan Amon suante na zoh sin kei leh ka honpanpih ding.
Hangsan takin om unla, i mite leh i Pathian khuate humin i kipasalsak ding uh; huan TOUPAN hoih a sak bang jelin hih hen, a chi a.
Huchiin Joab leh a kianga mite kidouna mun lama Suria mite a vanaih ua; huan, a maah a taikekta uhi.
Huan Amon suanten Suria mite a taikek uh chih a theih un amau leng a unaupa Abisai maah a taikek ta ua, khuaah a lut uhi.
Huchiin Joab Jerusalem ah a paita hi.
Huan Suria miten Israelte maah a pang theikei uh chih a natheih un, mi a sawl ua, Lui khenlama Suria pawlte a sam khia ua, huan Hadadezer sepaih heutu Sophak bel a heutu pen uh ahi.
Huan huai bel David a hilh ua; huan, aman Israel mi tengteng a sam khawma, Jordan lui a kan ua, a vamu ua, sual dingin a kiphalh uhi.
Huchiin Suriate kidoupih dia David a kisak khitin amah a kidoupihta uhi.
Huan Suria mite bel Israel maah a taikek ua; huan Davidin Suria mi, kangtalai sang sagih tunga tuang leh sepaih sing li a thata, huan sepaih heutu Sophak leng a that hi.Huchiin Hadadezer miten Israelte maah a pang theitakei uh chih a theih un, David toh kilepna a bawl ua, a sikhate dingin a omta uh; Suria miten leng Amon suante a panpih nuamta kei uh.
Huchiin Hadadezer miten Israelte maah a pang theitakei uh chih a theih un, David toh kilepna a bawl ua, a sikhate dingin a omta uh; Suria miten leng Amon suante a panpih nuamta kei uh.
Huan hichi ahi a, kum a hongbeia kumpipate kidou dinga a kuankhiak sek lai un, Joabin sepaih ahatahat a pi khiaa.
Amon suante gam a suhsaka, Raba khua a um uh.
David bel Jerusalem ah a om.
Huan Joabin Raba khua a suala, a lata hi.
Huan Davidin a kumpipa uh lallukhu khuk lai a laksaka, a gikdan dangkaeng talent khat ahi, suangmantamte leng a tela; huan, David a khusak ua; huan, khopi-a om gallak sum tampi a la hi.
Huan huailaia mipite bel a pi khiaa, singatnate, lei lehna sik zumte, heipitein na a semsaka.
Huchibangin Amon tate khopi tengtengte Davidin a hih hi, Huan David leh mi tengteng Jerusalem ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, huainungin, Philistia mite toh Gezer ah kidouna a oma; huchiin Husat mi Sibekaiin milian suante laka mi Sippai a thata; huan, a vuallelta uhi.
Huan Philistia mite toh kidouna a om nawna; huan Jair tapa Elhanin Git mi Goliath unaupa Lahmi a thata, a tei kung chiampek bang ahi.
Huan Gath khua ah kidouna a om nawna, huaiah mi sang mahmah, a khut khatlam khatlama khutzung guk, a khe khatlam khatlama khezung guk, a veka sawmnih leh li nei a oma; amah leng milian laka piang ahi.
Huan aman Israel mite a simmoha, David unau Sime tapa Jonathanin a nathat hi.Huaite Gath khuaa milian laka piang ahi uh; huaite David leh a mite khut ah a si uhi.
Huaite Gath khuaa milian laka piang ahi uh; huaite David leh a mite khut ah a si uhi.
Huan Setanin Israelte a suala, David bel Israelte sim utna a neisak hi.
Huan Davidin Joab leh a miliante uh kiangah, Kuan unla, Beer-seba akipan Dan tanin Israel mite sim unla, a zah uh ka theih theihna dingin honghilh nawn un, a chi a.
Huan Joabin kumpipa kiangah, toupa a mite a mun jain zong hihpung leh, kumpipa ka toupa, ka toupa mite mah hi lou uh ahi maw? bangdia ka toupan huai theih kilawp ahia? bangdia Israelte siamlouh tan lohna hi ding ahia oi? a chi a.
Huchiin Joab a pawt khiaa, Israel gam tentengah a paia, Jerusalem ah a pai nawna.
Huan Joabin mihing om zah David a hilha.
Israel gama namsau tawi mi tengteng maktaduai khat leh nuai khat ahi uh; huan Juda gama namsau tawi mi bel nuai li leh sing sagih ahi uh.
Levite leh Benjaminte bel a sim tel tei keia; kumpipa thu Joab jakdah lamtak ahi ngala.
Huan huai thilah Pathian a kipak ta keia; huchiin Israelte a gawtta hi.
Huan Davidin Pathian kiangah, Hiai thil ka nahihna ah nakpi takin ka nahihkhialta ahi; himahleh na sikha thulimlouhna hehpihtakin ngaidamin, haihuai takin ka nahihta ahi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN David jawlnei Gad kiangah,
Kuan inla, David kiangah, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Thil thum ka hontah: na tunga ka hih dingin a lak ua khat telin, a chi hi, chiin a gen a.
Huchiin David kiangah Gad a vahoha, a kiangah, TOUPAN hichiin a chi,
A koi ahia na deih telin; kum thum kial kiak hia, na melmate namsaua delh phaka oma kha thum na melmate vuallelhsak hia, ni thum hi, TOUPA namsaua TOUPA angelin Israel gam tengtenga mi hihmanthat jel? chiin.
Huchiin kei honsawlpa bang ka chi dawn dia, kingaihtuah inla, honhilh dih ve, a chi a.
Huan Davidin Gad kiangah, ka lungjing mahmah; TOUPA khut ah puklut peuhmah mail eng; a chitna lah a thupi mahmah ngala; mihing khut ah jaw honpuklut sak mahmah ken, a chi a.
Huchiin TOUPAN Israelte lakah hi a lengsakta.
Huan Jerusalem khua hihse dingin Pathianin angel a sawla; huan a hihsiat sin laitakin, TOUPAN a ena, thil hoihlou hih a tup khiama, mite hihmangthang angel kiangah, A hunta; na khut lik nawn ken, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA angel Jebus mi Ornan phual chinah a ding hi.
Huan David a dak tou a, TOUPA angel, namsau phawisaa Jerusalem lam ngima, lei leh van kikala ding a mu a.
Huchiin David leh a upaten saiip puan silhin leiah a khup bohta uhi.
Huan Davidin Pathian kiangah, keimah ka hi ka hia mipite sim ding chih thu pepa? keimah ka hi, thil nanahihkhiala, ginatlouhhuaitak thil nanahih; hiai belamten bang thil ahia a hih tei uh? aw TOUPA ka Pathian, keimah leh ka inkote tungah na khut kha jaw inla, na miten hi thuak nawn kei uhen, a chi a.
Huchiin TOUPA angelin Gad kiangah David vahoh tou-a, Jebus mi Ornan phuala TOUPA adia maitam vabawl dinga David hilh dingin thu a pia a.
Huan Gadin TOUPA mina a gen bangin David a hoh touta hi.
Huan Ornan a kilehheia, angel a mu a; huan, a tapa li a kianga om teite a buta uh.
Arnanin buh a nachil ahi.
Huan David Ornan kiang a tunin, Ornan a kiheia, David a mutaa, huan, phual akipan a pawt khia, a maia lei siin David maah a khupbohta hi.
Huchiin Davidin Ornan kiangah, Hiai phual TOUPA adia maitam ka bawlna din honpe dih ve; a man kim geih lain honpia in, mipite laka hi a kikhin theihna dingin, a chi a.
Huan Ornanin David kiangah, Tangin, TOUPA ka kumpipan pha a sak bangin hih hen; halmanga lat dingin bawngtal te, sing dingin phual vanzatte, tangbuang thillat dingin buhte hi; ka hontuahsak vek ding, a chi a.
Huan kumpipa Davidin Ornan kiangah, Hilou e; a man kim geihin ka lei zo ding, man beiin nanga TOUPA adin ka la kei ding, halmang thillat leng ka lan kei ding, a chi a.
Huchiin Davidin huai mun leinain Ornan dangkaeng sekel za guk a pia.
Huan Davidin huailaiah TOUPA dingin maitam a bawltaa, halmang thillatte, leh lemna thillatte a lana, TOUPA a sam; huan, amah maitam tunga meiin van akipanin adawngta hi.
Huan TOUPAN angel thu a piaa, a namsau a pai ah a thun nawnta hi.
Huan Davidin Jebus mi Ornan phual ah TOUPAN a hondawng chih a theihin huailaiah a kithoihta hi.
Huchih laiin Mosiin gamdaia Toupa biakbuk leh halmang thillatna maitam a bawl Gibeon khua mun sangah a om ahi.Himahleh David bel TOUPA angel namsau a kihtak jiakin Pathian dong dingin huailaiah a hoh theikei hi.
Himahleh David bel TOUPA angel namsau a kihtak jiakin Pathian dong dingin huailaiah a hoh theikei hi.
Huchiin Davidiin, Hiai jaw TOUPA Pathian in ahi hi; hiai jaw Israelte halmang thillatna maitam a nahi hi, a chi a.
Huchiin Davidin Israel gama nam dang omte sap khawm thu a piaa; huan, Pathian in lamna dingin suangsekmite suang a seksaka.
Huan Davidin intual kongkhak leh a bulh na ding kilhna ding sik tampi ana bawlkhola; dal tamtak buk senglouh toh; sidar sing simsenglouh toh;
Zidon mi leh Tura miten David kiangah sidar sing tampi a honla uhi.
Huan Davidin, ka tapa Solomon lah a naupang laiin, bangmah a thei nai keia, huan TOUPA in lam ding thupi tak, a min leh a thupina gam chiha thang khe ding ahi a; huaijiakin ka nakisakhol sin hi, a chi a.
Huchiin David a sih main ana kisakhol thupi mahmah hi.
Huchiin a tapa Solomon a sama, TOUPA Israelte Pathian in lam dingin thu a pia hi.
Huan Davidin a tapa Solomon kiangah, TOUPA ka Pathian min dingin in lam lungsimin ka nei gige;
Himahleh, Nang jaw sisan na naksuah tela, kidoute na uang tela; leitungah ka mitmuha sisan na nak suah jiakin, ka min adin in na lam kei ding;
Ngaiin, tapa na honnei dinga, amah kei hontuak mi ahi dinga, a kim gama a melmate tengteng lakah galmuanna ka pe ding; a min Solomon ahi dinga, amah vangin Israelte galmuang leh lungmuang takin ka omsak ding;
Aman ka min adin in a lam dinga, amah ka tapa ahi dinga, kei a pa ka hi ding; huan, Israelte tunga a gam laltutphah khantawn adin ka hih kip ding, chiin TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung hi.
Huchiin ka tapa, TOUPA na kiangah om henla, lamzang jel inla, na tungtang thu a nagen kholhsa bangin, TOUPA na pathian in lamin.
TOUPAN pilna leh theihnate honneisak peuhmah phot henla, Israelte tunga thuneihna honpia hen, huchiin TOUPA na Pathian dan na jui thei ding hi.
Huchiin Israelte tungtang thu-a thusehte leh vaihawmnate TOUPAN Mosi a piak na zuih leh, na lamzang jel ding; hat takin om inla, hangsan takin omin; lau kenla, lunglel sam ken.
Ngaiin, ka lungjin laiin TOUPA in adin dangkaeng talent nuaikhat leh, dangkasik talent maktaduai khat ka nakisakhol khina; huan dal leh sikte leng buk seng louh, tampi ahi; sing leh suang leng ka kisakhol khin ahi, huaite na sunzom theita ding.
Huan nasemmi, sing-atmi leh suang sekmi leh khutsiamna chiteng sem thei leng na hau hi;
Sim seng vual louh dangkaengte, dangkate, dalte, sikte leng; sual pah ngal maiin, TOUPA na kiangah om hen, a chi a.
Davidin Israelte makaite tengteng a tapa Solomon panpih dingin thu a piaa.
TOUPA na Pathian uh na kiang uah a om ka hia? mun chih mual chihah galmuanna a honpe ka hia? hiai gama mite ka khut ah a honpetaa, TOUPA ma leh a mite maah gam lak a hita.Tuin na tungtang u leh na lungsim uh TOUPA na Pathian uh zong dingin koihkip unla; huaijiakin thou unla, TOUPA mina in lam ding suang, TOUPA thukhunna bawm leh Pathian tuiumbelsuan siangthoute laklutna dingin, mun siangthou lam un, chiin.
Tuin na tungtang u leh na lungsim uh TOUPA na Pathian uh zong dingin koihkip unla; huaijiakin thou unla, TOUPA mina in lam ding suang, TOUPA thukhunna bawm leh Pathian tuiumbelsuan siangthoute laklutna dingin, mun siangthou lam un, chiin.
Huan David a nadam sawtin a na upa mahmah taa; huchiin a tapa Solomon Israelte kumpipain a bawlta hi.
Huan Israelte makai tengteng siampute leh Levite toh a sam khawma.
Huan, Levite kum sawmthum akipan tunglam sim ahi ua; a tamlam uh piching sing thum leh sang giat ahi uh.
Huaite laka sing nih leh sang li TOUPA in lamheutute heutu ding ahi ua; huan, sang gukte bel heutute leh vaihawmmite dingte ahi uh;
Huan sang lite kongkhakngakmite ding ahi ua, huan sang li te bel, Phatna dinga thil tumging chi ka bawl, Davidin a chihte zanga TOUPA phatmi dingte ahi uh.
Huan Levi ta Gerson te, Kahath te, Merari te zahin Davidin pawl a bawla.
Gerson mite Ladan leh Simei ahi uh.
Ladan tate pipente Jehiel te, Setham te, Joel te, thum ahi uh.
Simei tate Solomoth te, Haziel te, Haran te, thum ahi uh.
Hiaite Ladan suan inkote pipente ahi uh.
Huan Simei tate bel Juhath te Juhath te, Zin te, Jeus te, Beria te ahi uh.
Hiai lite Simei tate ahi uh.
Huan Jahath a upa pen ahi a, Ziza a sang ahi; Jeus leh Beriaten bel ta a hau kei ua; huaijiakin inkuan khat banga sim ahi uh.
Kahath tate Amram te, Izhar te, Hebron te, Uziel te, li ahi uh.
Amram tate Aron leh Mosi ahi uh; Aron bel amah leh a suante khantawna dinga thil siangthou takte hihsiangthou-a, khantawna TOUPA maa gimlim hala, a na sema, a mina vualjawlpa dinga hihtuam ahi uh.
Pathian mi Mosi bel, a tate Levi nam laka sim ahi uh.
Mosi tate Gersom leh Eliezer ahi uh, Gersom tate laka upa pen Sebuel ahi.
Huan Eliezer tate laka upapen Rehabia ahi.
Huan Eliezerin tapa dang himhim a neikei; Rehabia in bel tapa tampi a nei.
Izhar tapate; Selmoth a pipen.
Hebron tate laka pipen Jeria ahi a, a sang Amaria, a sang nawn Jahaziel, a sang nawn Jekameam ahi.
Uziel tate laka upajaw Mika ahi a, a sang Isia ahi.
Merari tate; Merari tate bel Mahli leh Musi ahi uh, Mahli tate, Eleazar leh Kis ahi uh.
Huan Eleazar a si a, tapate neilouin, tanute kia a nei a; huan Kis tapa a unaute un jiin a nei uh.
Musi tate Mahli te, Eder te, Jeremoth te, thum ahi uh.
Huaite Levi suan, a inkuan uh bang jela min gelha a sim uh inkuan pipen, TOUPA in lama kuan, kum sawmnih akipan tunglama sim tengte ahi uh.
Davidin, TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin a mite galmuang takin a omsaktaa, Jerusalem ah a om nilouha,
Leviten leng biakbuk leh a nasepna ding tuiumbelsuan tengteng a zon uh a kiphamohta kei hi, a chi ahi.
David thupiak nanung jiakin Levite kum sawmnih akipan tung lam tanin sim ahi ngal ua.
A nasep uh Pathian ina nasepa Aron tapate panpiha intual sung leh dantan sunga thil siangthou tengteng hihsiangthou-a, TOUPA ina nasep lah ahi ngala;
Tanghou koih ding te, tangbuang thillat dinga tangbuang nel mahmah, silngou hel louh tanghoupek hiam, bela uk hiam, kan hiam, a teh leh a letdan bang tengteng ding bawl khawng te toh;
Huan jingsang tenga TOUPA kianga kipahthu gen leh amah phatte toh, nitaka leng huchi mah;
Huan khawlni te-a, kha thak te-a ankuanglui neih te-a, a hihding seh bang jela TOUPA kianga halmang thillat tengteng TOUPA maa lat gige te toh;Huan kihoupihna puanin kep te, mun siangthou kep te, TOUPA ina nasema a unau Aron tapaten hih ding a seh peuhmah uh hih te toh.
Huan kihoupihna puanin kep te, mun siangthou kep te, TOUPA ina nasema a unau Aron tapaten hih ding a seh peuhmah uh hih te toh.
Huan, Aron tapate pawl khendan hichibang ahi, Aron tapate Nadab te, Abihu te, Eleazar te, Ithamar te ahi uh.
Nadab leh Abihu bel a pa uh sangin a si masa ua; ta a neikei uh; huaijiakin Eleazar leh Ithamar ten siampu na a sem ua.
Huan Davidin Eleazar tapa Zadok leh Ithamar tapa Ahimelek te toh a nasep danding uh a hawmsaka.
Huan Ithamar suante sangin Eleazar suan pipena pang a tamjaw uh; hichibangin a khen uh; Eleazar suan ah, inkuan pipen sawm leh guk ahi ua; huan, Ithamar suan ah, inkuan pipen giat ahi uh.
Huchibangin aisanin, ai khata kikain a khen ua; Eleazar suana mi leh Ithamar suana mite lakah, mun siangthou-a miliante leh Pathian miliante a om tuaktuak ngal ua.
Huan Levi mi, laigelhmi Nethanel tapa Semaiin kumpipate, miliante, siampu Zadok te, Abiathar tapa Ahimelek te, siampute leh Levite inko pipente mitmuhin a gelha; inkuanpipa khat tan Eleazar tungah a puka, khat bel Ithamar tungah a puk hi.
Huchiin aisan khatveina bel Jehoarib tungah a puka, nihveina Jedai tungah;
Thumveina Harim tungah, liveina Seorim tungah;
Ngaveina Makija tungah, gukveina Mijamin tungah;
Sagihveina Hakoz tungah, giatveina Abija tungah;
Kuaveina Jesua tungah, sawmveina Sekani tungah;
Sawm leh khatveina Eliasib tungah, sawm leh nihveina Jakim tungah;
Sawm leh thumveina Hupa tungah, sawm leh li veina Jesebeab tungah;
Sawm leh ngaveina Bilga tungah, sawm leh gukveina Immer tungah;
Sawm leh sagih veina Hezir tungah, sawm leh giatveina Hapizez tungah;
Sawm leh kuaveina Pethahi tungah, sawmnih veina Jehezkel tungah;
Sawmnih leh khatveina Jakin tungah, sawmnih leh nihveina Gamul tungah;
Sawmnih leh thmveina Delai tungah, sawmnih leh liveina Maazi tungah.
Huai bel TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin a pu uh Aron thu a napiak, TOUPA in sunga na a sep danding a na sehdan ahi hi.
Huan Levi suan dangte lakah; Amram tate lakah Subael ahi; Subael tate lakah Jedei.
Rehabi lamah; Rehabi-te lakah pipen Isai.
Izharte lakah Selomot; Selomot tapate lakah Jahat,
Huan Hebron tapate, a upapen Jeria ahi a, a sang Amaria, a sang nawn Jahaziel, a sang nawn Jokameam ahi.
Uziel tapate laka mi Mika; Mika tapate laka mi Samir ahi.
Mika unaupa Isai ahi a; Isai tapate lakah, Zekaria.
Merari tapate bel Mahli leh Musi ahi ua; Jaazi tapate laka mi Beno ahi.
Merari suante, Jaazi lakah Beno te, Soham te, Zakur te, Ibri te ahi uh.
Mahli lakah, Eleazar ahi a, aman tapa a neikei.
Kis lakah, Kis tapa Jerameel ahi.
Huan Musi suante bel, Mahli te, Eder te, Jerimot te ahi uh.
Huaite bel Levite suante laka a inkuan ua pipente ahi uhi.Amauten leng Aron ta a unaute uh bangin, kumpipa David te, Zadok te, Ahimelek te, siampute leh Levite inko pipente mitmuhin ai a san sam ua; inko pipen leh a unaute leng ai khatin a kikai uh.
Amauten leng Aron ta a unaute uh bangin, kumpipa David te, Zadok te, Ahimelek te, siampute leh Levite inko pipente mitmuhin ai a san sam ua; inko pipen leh a unaute leng ai khatin a kikai uh.
Huan Asaph te, Heman te, Jeduthun te tapa khenkhat kaihging te, pekgingte, dakkhutbette toh a la veka nasemmi dingin David leh sepaih heututen a hihtuam ua; Huan huchibang sem nasemmite tam la;
Asaph tapate laka mi Zakur te, Joseph te, Nethani te.
Asarel te ahi ua, amau bel Saph tapate, kumpipa thupiak banga lavek jel.
Asaph thuthu-a om ahi uh.
Jeduthun lakah; Jeduthun ta Gedali te, Zeri te, Jesai te, Simei te; Hasabi te, Matithi te, guk ahi uh; kaihging toha TOUPA kianga kipahthu gena leveka a pa uh Jeduthun thuthu-a om ahi uh.
Heman lakah; Heman ta Bukia te, Matania te, Uziel te, Seboelte, Jerimot te, Hanania te, Hannia te, Eliath te, Gidalti te leh Romamitiezer te, Josbekas te, Malothi te, Hothir te, Mahzioth te ahi hi;
Huaite tengteng Pathian lam thu-a kumpipa jawlnei Heman ta pengulkawi mutmi dingte ahi uhi.
Pathianin Heman tapa sawm leh li leh tanu thum a pia.
Huaite tengteng TOUPA ina dakkhutbet toh, kaihging toh, pekging toh, Pathian ina nasepna dinga la toh lemmite, a pa uh thuthu-a om ahi uh; Asaph te, Jeduthun te, Heman te bel kumpipa thupiaka om ahi leuleu uh.
Huan a tamlam uh, a unau, TOUPA dinga lasak kisin, siam khinsa tengtengte toh za nih leh sawmgiat leh giat ahi uh.
Huan a neu a lian, sinsakmi leh sinmiin a tan ding uh kibangsapin ai a san uhi.
Huchiin aisan khatveina Asaph tapa Joseph tungah a puka; nihveina Gedali tungah; amah leh a unaute leh a tapate sawm leh nih ahi ua;
Thumveina bel Zakur tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih ahi uh;
Liveina Izri tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih ahi ua;
Ngaveina Nethani tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Gukveina Buki tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sagihveina Jesarel tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Giatveina bel Jesai tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Kuaveina bel Matani tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawmveina Simei tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh khatveina Azarel tungah, a tapa leh a a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh nihveina Hasabi tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh thumveina Subael tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh liveina Matithi tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh ngaveina Jeremot tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh gukveina Hanania tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh sagihveina Josbekas tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh giatveina Hanania tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawm leh kuaveina Malothi tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawmnihveina Eliath tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawmnih leh khatveina Hothir tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawmnih leh nihveina Gidalti tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;
Sawmnih leh thumveina Mahazioth tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih;Sawmnih leh liveina Romamti-ezer tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih.
Sawmnih leh liveina Romamti-ezer tungah, a tapate leh a unaute sawm leh nih.
Kongkhak ngak pawl khendan: Kora mi bel Asaph tapate laka Kora tapa Meselemia ahi a.
Huan Meselemiain tapate a neia; a ta masa Zekaria ahia, a zom Jediael, a zomnawn Zebadia, a zomnawn Jathniel;
A zomnawn Elam, a zomnawn Jehohanan, a zomnawn Eliehoenai ahi.
Huan Obed-edomin tapate a neia; a ta chil Semai ahi a, a zom Jehozabad, a zomnawn Joa, a zomnawn Sakar, huan, a zomnawn Nethanel;
A zomnawn Amiel, a zomnawn Isakar, a zomnawn Peulethai ahi, amah bel Pathianin a vualjawla.
A tapa Semai akipan tapa, a inkote uh pipente leng a piang ua; mi hat hangsan ahi chiat uh.
Semai tapate Othni te, Rephael te, Obed te, Elzabad te ahi ua, a unau uh Elihu leh Semaki bel mi hat mahmah ahi uh.
Huaite tengteng Obed-edom suante ahi uh: amau leh a tapate uh leh a unaute uh nasepna lamsangah mi piching ahi uh; Obed-edom akipan mite sawmguk leh nih ahi uh.
Meselemiin tapa leh unau mi hat mahmah sawm leh giat a nei.
Huan Merari suante laka Hosa tapate a nei teia; Simri bel pipen ahi a, (ta chil ahi kei naa, a pan pipenin a bawl hi);
A zomin Hilkia ahi a, a zomin Tebali, a zomin Zekaria ahi; Hosa tapate leh a unaute a vek un sawm leh thum ahi uh.
Huai pipente laka mi a unaute uh banga TOUPA ina nasem thil bawla tantuan neia kongkhak ngakmi pawla a khente uh ahi hi.
A neu a lianin, a inko dungjui jel un kongpi chiha om ding zonnan ai a san uh.
Huan suahlam adia aisan pen Selemi tungah a puka, Huan vaihawmmi pil tak, a tapa Zekaria adin ai a san ua, mallam pen amaha tuamin a puk hi.
Simlam bel Obed-edom tuamin; huan thil koih khawmna un bel a tapate tuamin.
Tumlam bel a toupaina lampi a Saleket kongkhak venna toh, Suphim leh Hosa tuamin.
Suahlamah Levite guk a om ua, ni tengin mallam ah li, ni tengin simlamah li, huan, thil koihkhawmna in ah nih tuaktuak.
Tumlam in umsung adingin a lutnaah li; in umsungah nih.
Huaite ahi uh, Kora mi tapate leh Merari mi tapate kongkhakngakmi pawla a khente uh.
Huan a unaute uh Levite lakah Ahija Pathian sum koih khawmna in leh thil siangthou koihkhawmna in leh thil siangthou koihkhawmna in heutu ahi.
Ladan tapate; Gerson mite tapate Ladante ate, pipute inkote-a pipen Gerson mi Ladan ate; Jehieli.
Jehieli tapate; Zetham, Joel a unaupa, TOUPA ina sum koihkhawmna heutu ahi uh.
Amram mite akipan, Izhar mite akipan, Hebron mite akipan, Uzziel mite akipan:
Huan Sebuel Gersom tapa, Mosi tapa, sum koihkhawmna heutu ahi hi.
Huan a unaute bel Eliezer tapa Rahabi te, Jesai te, Joram te, Zikri te, Selomot te ahi uh.
Selomot leh a unaute bel kumpipa David leh a inkote uh pipen sepaih sang heutute leh ja heutute leh sepaih pawl heututen a hihsiangthousa uh, thil siangthou koihkhawmna in tengteng kemte ahi uhi.
Kidouna gallak thilte TOUPA in bawlphatna dingin a koih uhi.
Jawlnei Samuel te, Kis tapa Saul te, Ner tapa Abner te, Zerui tapa Joab ten a hihsiangthou tengteng uh, kuapeuhin thil a hihsiangthousa peuhmah uh Selomot leh a unaute kepvek ahi.
Izhar mi Kenani leh a tapate Israel gam polam tungtang thu-a heutute leh vaihawmmi ahi uh.
Hebron mi Hasabi leh a unau mi hangsan sang khat leh za sagih te Jordan gal tumlama Israel ukpa ahi uhi; TOUPA tengteng leh kumpipa nasepna lam na ah.
Huan Hebron mi Jerija bel a suan uh tungtang thu-a inko pipen lamah Hebronte pipa pen ahi.
David kum sawmli a lal kuma a zon un Gilead gama Jazer khua ah mi hat hangsan a mu khia uhi.Huan a unau mi hangsante sang nih leh za sagih ahi uhi.
Huaite inkuan pipen, kumpipa Davidin Pathian lam thil chiteng leh kumpipa na lam thu-a Reubente, Gadte, Manasite nam kimkhatte heutu dia bawlte ahi uh.
Huan a unau mi hangsante sang nih leh za sagih ahi uhi.
Huaite inkuan pipen, kumpipa Davidin Pathian lam thil chiteng leh kumpipa na lam thu-a Reubente, Gadte, Manasite nam kimkhatte heutu dia bawlte ahi uh.
Israelte a tamdan uh- inkuan papente, sepaih sang heutute, za heutute leh kumpipa nasemmite tengteng kum khat sunga kha chiha kikheng jeljel, pawl chiha mi sing nih leh sang li ahi uhi.
Pawl khatna kha khatnaa heutu Jebdiel tapa Jasobeam ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Amah perez suana mi, kha khatna a sepih heutu teng teng heutu pen ahi.
Huan kha nih na pawl heutu Aho mi Dodai ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha thumnaa sepaihte heutu pen siampu Jehoiada tapa Benai ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Hiai Benai ahi a, sawm thum te lak a mi hangsan, sawm thum te tung a mi pen; huan a pawl ah a tapa Amizabad a tel hi.
Kha li naa sepaih heutu Joab unaupa Asahel ahi a, a tapa Zebadi asik a pang ahi, huan a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha nga na sepaih heutu Izra mi Samhut ahi a, huan a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha guknaa sepaih heutu Teko mi, Ikes tapa Ira ahi a, huan a pawl ah sinh nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha sagihnaa sepaih heutu Ephraim suan Pelon mi Helez ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha giatnaa sepaih heutu Zera suan, Husat mi Sibekai ahi a, huan a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha kua naa sepaih heutu Benjamin suan Anathot mi Abiezera hi a, pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha sawm naa sepaih heutu zera suan Netophat mi maharai ahi a. huan a pawl ah sing nih sang li a om uh.
Kha sawm leh kha khatnaa sepaih heutu Ephraim suan Pirathon mi Benai ahi a, huan a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha sawm leh kha nihna sepaih heutu Othniel suan Netophet mi Heldai ahi a, huan a pawl ah sing nih sang li a om uh.
Huaite louleng, Israel namte tung a Reuben te laka Zikri tapa Eliezer vaihawmpa ahi a, Simeon te lakah Maaktapa Sephati ahi;
Levite lakah kumuel tapa, Hasabi; Aron te lakah Zadok;
Judate lakah David unaute lakah mi Elihu, Isakar te lakah Mikael tapa Omri;
Zebulunte laka Obadi tapa Ismai; Naphtalite lakah Azriel tapa Jeremot;
Ephraim suante lakah Azazia tapa Hose; Manasi nam kimkhat te lakah Pedai tapa Joel.
Gilead gama Manasi nam kimkhat te lakah, Zekaria tapa Ido; Benjamin te laka Abner tapa Jaasiel;
Dante laka Jeroham tapa Azariel.
Huai te Israel nam heutute ahi uh.
David in kum sawmnih a kipan nuailam a sim kei hi, Israel te bel vana aksi zahin a puang sak ding chih TOUPAN ana gen khit tak jiak in.
Zerui tapa Joabin a sim pana, himahleh a sim zou kei a, Israelte tungah leng hehna a hong tungta a; umpipa David lallai anchin elhna bu ah azah gelh leng ahi sam kei hi.
Huan kumpipan sum kempa Adiel tapa Azmavet ahi a; huan loulam khawng ah, khopi khawng ah, khopel khawng ah, in sangtea sum kempa bel Uzi tapa Jonathan ahi a.
Huan lou-a lei leh nasep sem kempa Kelub tapa Ezri ahi a;
Huan grep huan kempa Ramat mi, Simei ahi a, huan grep huan a uain suksa koih khawm kempa siphmite mi Zabdi ahi a.
Huan Phaiguam oliv sing leh theipi kungte kempa Geder mi Baalhanan ahi a, huan sathau koih khawmna kempa Joas ahi a.
Huan Saron-a ta ganhon kempa saron mi Sitrai ahi a, huan guam a gan hon kempa Adlai tapa Saphat ahi;
Huan sa ngawng sau kempa Isamel mi Obil ahi a, huan sa bengtung kempa Meronot mi Jehdei ahi a;
Huan belam hon kempa Hagar mi Jaziz ahi. huaite tengteng kumpipa David sum kem mite ahi uh.
Huan David panga, mipil, laisiam mahmah Jonathan bel thuthei pen ahi a, huan, Hakmoni tapa Jehiel bel kumpipa tapate sinsakpa ahi a;
Huan Ahithiphel kumpipa thutheihpihpa ahi a; huan Ariki mi Husai kumpipa lawm ahi a;Huan Ahithophel zomin Benai tapa Jehoiada leh Abiathar ahi uhi, huan kumpipa sepaih heutu bel Joab ahi hi.
Huan Ahithophel zomin Benai tapa Jehoiada leh Abiathar ahi uhi, huan kumpipa sepaih heutu bel Joab ahi hi.
Huan David in Israel heutu tengteng nam pi peen te, kumpipa nasema kikheng zelzel pawl heutu te, sepaih sang heutu te, A za heutu te, kumpipa leh a tapate sum leh thil neih teng teng tung a heutute, milian mi hat, mihat hangsan tengtengte toh - Jerusalem ah a sam khawm a.
Huchiin kumpipa David a ding a, ka unaute leh ka mite aw, ka thu nana ngai khia dih ua; ken TOUPA thukhunna bawm koihna leh I Pathian khe ngakna ding in lam lungsim in ka nei gige a; huan, lamna ding leng ka ngah khin sipsip a.
Himahleh, Pathian in ka kiang ah, Nang jaw kidoumi sisan suah mi na hih jiakin ka min a din na lam kei ding, a chi a.
Ahihhangin TOUPA Israelte Pathian in, kapa inkote tengteng lak akipan Israelte kumpipa dia khantawna om dingin a honna teltaa; Juda nampipen dingin a nateltaa; huan, Juda namte lakah ka Pa inkote; huan kapa tapa te lak a kipan Israel tengteng kumpipa din a honna tel khe tuamta hi.
Huan katapa tengteng lakah (TOUPAN tapa tampi a honpiaa) Israelte kumpipa dingin TOUPA gam laltutphaha tu ding in ka tapa Solomon a na telta hi.
Huchiin ka kiang ah, Na tapa Solomon in ka in leh ka inntualte a dingsak ding; ka tapa ding in ka teltaa, huchiin ah pa ka hi ding.
Ka thupiakte leh ka vaihawmte a pom gige leh-tua na hih gige bang un-a gam khantawn a din ka kipsak ding hi.
Huchiin TOUPA mipi, Israelte tengteng mit muh in leh I pathian zakin TOUPA na Pathian uh thupiak tengteng pom ding leh limsak ding in ka hon hasuan ahi; huchiin hiai gam hoih mahmah na luah ding ua, na nung uah na suante uh khantawn a din na luahtou sawnsak jel ding uhi.
Huan nang ka tapa Solomon napa Pathian thei inla, lungtang hoih bukim leh lungsim kilawptak in anasep sem in; TOUPAN lah lungtang a ensek a, lungsim a lungeel tengteng a thei vek hi; amah na zon leh na mu ding a, na leh ngatsan le bel khantawn in a honk hah khe ding hi.
Pilvangin; munsiangthou adia in lamding in TOUPAN nang ahon septa hi, hat tak in om inla, pangin, a chi a.
Huchiin David in a tapa Solomon kiang ah biakin inlim lim, a in lim, sum koih khawmna in lim, a dantan tungnung lim, a sung dantan lim, chitna tutphah lim.
A lungsima a lunggel bang tengteng, TOUPA in umsung intual lim, a kimdantan tengteng lim, Pathian ina sum koihkhawmna in lim, thil tan koih khawmna inlim a piaa;
Siampu te leh Levite a pawlpawla a omna ding uh lim, TOUPA ina nasepna lam ding tengteng lim, TOUPA in a nasepna lam ding tuiumbel suan teng teng lim leng.
Nasepna lam adia tuium belsuan chi chih, dangkaeng tuium beelsuan ding, dangkaeng zatzah ding,
Dangkaeng khawnvak koihna leh a khawnvak ding dangkaeng zat jel zah ding, khawnvak koihna leh a khawnvak tui dinga zat jel zah ding, khawnvak koihnaa mun kiphamoh chiat bang jel a dangkasik khawnvak koihna dinga dia zat jel zah ding toh;
Tanghou-at koihna dohkan ding, khat khat adia dangkaeng zat zah ding, dangkasik dohkan adia dangkasik zat zah ding, dangkaeng ngen sa thukna sik kuaika.
Mai phiatna kuang, noute toh; dangkaeng belhbu ding, belhbu khat jel adia zatzah ding.
Cherubte a kha uh jaka, TOUPA thukhunna bawm tuam tuanna lim bang bawlna ding dangkaeng te toh.
Davidin, Hiaite tengteng TOUPAN amah mah khuta hon gelh, hiai a lim tengteng hon theisak hiin ka thei hi, a chi a.
Huan David in a tapa Solomon kiang ah, Hattak leh hangsan tak in om inla, pangin; laukenla, lunglel sam ken; TOUPA Pathian ka pathian na kiang ah a on hi; TOUPA inlam nasep tengteng zoh ahihvek mateng ahon paisan in, a hon limsaklou keiding hi.Huan ngaidih, Pathian in na chih teng semmi pawl siampute leh Levite a om ua, bang na peuh a, banglam peuh a nasep siam, hattak chiat a nang hon panpih ding na kiang ah a om jel ding uhi; heutute leh mipi tengteng inleng na thupiak peuhmah a juijel laiding uhi, a chi a.
Huan ngaidih, Pathian in na chih teng semmi pawl siampute leh Levite a om ua, bang na peuh a, banglam peuh a nasep siam, hattak chiat a nang hon panpih ding na kiang ah a om jel ding uhi; heutute leh mipi tengteng inleng na thupiak peuhmah a juijel laiding uhi, a chi a.
Huan kumpipa David in mipi tengteng kiangah, Pathian telkhiak ka tapa Solomon a naupang lai in bangmah a theikei a, a sep ding lah a thupi ngala, biakin mihing a ding ahi keia, TOUPA pathian ading ahi jaw ngala.
Huchiin ka pathianin a dingin a dangkaeng lam thil a din dangkaeng te, dangkasik lam thil adin, dangkasik, dal lam thil a din dal, sik lam thil a din sik, singlam thil adin singte theih tawkin kana kisa khintaa, a zeh onik suang, suang kilawm, a silhding suang kilawm chi tuam tuam leh suang mantam chi chih leh suangpak suang tampite toh.
Huaikia louleng ka pathian in ka deihsak mahmah a, keimah sum dangkaeng leh dangka te leng, insiangthou a dia kana kisaksa tengteng chih louh in, ka Pathian in a dingin ka pia hi, huai bel bang khawng zutna ding Ophir dangkaeng,
Dangkaeng talent sangthum leh dangkasik siang thou talent sang sagih, zatna lam tuam tuam a misiam te zat dingin, dangkaeng zatna dinga dangkaeng te.
Dangka sik Zatna ding a dangkasikte ahi.
Tuni in TOUPA dinga kipak taka pephal kua na om ua?
A chi a.
Huchiin inkuan pipente, Israel nam heutute, sang heutute leh za heutute, kumpipa nasemte heutute toh kipak tak in apia ua;
Huan pathian in lam na ding dangkaeng talent sangnga leh darik singkhat, dangkasik talent sing khat leh dal talent singkhat leh sang giat, sik talent nuai khat a pia uh.
Huan suangmantam neiten Gerson mi Jeheil kep TOUPA sum ah a koih uhi.
Huchiin mipite akipak mahmah mai ua, lungsim munkhat pu-a kipak tak a TOUPA a piak jiak un, kumpipa David in leng nuamsak petmah in nuamsa hi.
Huchiin David in mipi tengteng ma ah TOUPA kiangah kipahthu gena,
Aw, TOUPA kapu uh Israel pathian, khantawn a phat in om hen.
Aw TOUPA thupinate, thilhihtheihna te, pahtawina te, zohnate, lalnate nanga ahi a, lei leh van a omtengteng lah nanga ahi ngala, Aw TOUPA, gam nanga ahi a, mitengteng a tungnung pen nahi.
Hausakna leh pahtawina te na kiang a kipan ahi, bangkim tungah thu na neia, huan thilhihtheihna ma khutah a om a, na khut a mi tengteng hih thupina leh hatna piaktheihna a om hi.
Huchiin ka pathian uh kipahthu ka hon hilh ua, na min thupi ka phat uhi,
Himahleh kua ahia ka hiha, ka mite leng kua ahia ahih ua, hichi bangte kipak taka ka honlat theih mahmah uh?
Thil tengteng na kianga kipana pawt ahi ua, nanga ka honpe nawn lel uh lah ahi ngala.
Ka pi leh pute uh bangin kou jaw na maah mikhual, mi kianga om tei lel bang ka hi ua; leitunga damsung nite jaw limliap bang lel ahi a, lamet ding himhim a om kei hi.
TOUPA ka pathian uh, na min siangthou dinga in ka honlamsakna dinga hiai thil ka na kisakna tengteng uh nangmah khutsuak ahi a, nanga vek ahi hi.
Ka Pathian, nang lungtangte na enchain seka, diktatnate na kipahpih nak chih leng ka thei hi.
Ken jaw lungsim taktak in hiai thil tengteng kipak mahmahin ka hon lan ahi, huan, hiailaia na mite leng kipak mahmaha na kianga honlanmite ka muh in ka kipak mahmah ahi.
Aw TOUPA, ka pu uh Abraham te, Isaak te Israel te Pathian, na miten hichibang lungsim a put gige theih na ding un a lungsim te uh nanga ding in hihkip inla;
Huan ka tapa Solomon na thupiak te, na thutheihsakte, na dante juia, huaite tengteng hih ding leh ka nakisakkholhna in lam dingin lungsim hoih kim hon pu sakin, Davidin a chi a.
Huan Davidin mipi tengteng kiangah, Khaile, TOUPA na Pathian uh phat un, a chi a.
Huchiin mipi tengtengin TOUPA, a pi leh pute uh Pathian a phat ua,. a kun ua, TOUPA leh kumpipa chibai a buk uh.
Huan a jingin TOUPA kiangah kithoihna ding leh TOUPA kianga halmang thillat dingin bawngtal sang khat leh belam sang khat leh belam nou sang khat, a dawn ding uh thillat toh Israelte tengteng a din kithoihna tampi a lan ua;
Huchiin huai niin TOUPA maah nuamsa takin a ne ua, a om chiat uh.
Huan, David tapa Solomon bel kumpipa dingin a bawl tuan nawn ua, TOUPA milian dingin sathau a nilh ua, huan, Zadok bel Siampu dingin.
Huchiin Solomon TOUPA laltutphah ah a pa David sikin kumpipain a tutaa, lamzang takin a oma; huan Israelte tengtengin a thu a jui uh.
Huan heutute tengteng leh mi hat hangsante leh kumpipa David tapa dang tengtengte kumpipa Solomon lakah a kipia uh.
Huan TOUPAN Solomon Israelta tengteng mitmuhin nakpitakin a hihthupi a, Israel gam a maa kumpipate lakah kuamahin a tan ngei-louh uh, kumpipa hihna thupi mahmah a tangta hi.
Jesai tapa David bel Israelte tengteng tungah a lala,
Israelte tunga a lal sung kum sawmli ahi; Hebron khua a kum sagih a lala, Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh kum thum a lala.
Huan, upa tak, tekkuna damin, hausa tak leh pahtawi lohin a si a; huan, a sikin a tapa Solomon a lalta hi.
Ngaiin, kumpipa David tanchin a tung a kipan a tawp tanin, jawlnei Samuel laibu-ah te, jawlnei Nathan laibu-ah te, jawlnei Gad laidu-ah te a tuanga,A lal thu te, a thilhihtheihdan tengteng te, amah leh Israelte tung leh gam tengteng tunga thil hongomdante toh.
A lal thu te, a thilhihtheihdan tengteng te, amah leh Israelte tung leh gam tengteng tunga thil hongomdante toh.
Huan, David tapa Solomon bel a gamsungah hatsakin a oma; TOUPA a Pathian a kiangah a oma, nakpi mahmah in a thupi sak hi
Huan, Solomonin Israelte tengteng, sepaih sang heutute, za heutute, vaihawm mite, Israel gam tengteng a milian, inkuan a intekpen tengteng a houpiha.
Huchiin, Solomon leh kikhawmte tengteng Gibeon khuaa mun sangah a hoh ua; huailaiah TOUPA sikha Mosiin gamdaia a bawl Pathian biakna buk a om hi.
Pathian bawm bel Davidin a nabawl khitsa munah Kiriathjearim a kipan in Davidin ana latou khina; Jerusalemah a koihna ding puanin anajak khitsa him ahi.
Huan, Hur ta Uri tapa Bazalel bawl dal maitam TOUPA biakna buk chinah a om behap a; huan, Solomon leh mipiten a vajuan ua.
Huan, Solomon bel kihoupihna puanin china dal maitam omna TOUPA maah a hoh tou a, halmang thillat sang khat a lana.
Huai janin Solomon kiangah Pathian akilaka, a kiangah, Bang ahia ka honpiak ding hon ngenin, a chi a.
Huan, Solomonin Pathian kiangah, Ka pa David kiangah hehpihna thupi tak nalangsaka, a sikin kumpipan non nabawltaa
Huchiin aw TOUPA Pathian, ka pa David kianga na thuchiam hihpichingin, nang leivui zah takmipite kumpipain non na bawlta a.
Huchiin hiai mipite maa lut leh pawta ka om theihna dingin pilna leh theihna hon piain; na mi hiai zahzah kua ahia vaihawm sak thei ding?
A chi a.
Huan, Pathianin Solomon kiangah, hichibang lungsim na puta, sum leh pai te, hausakna te, pahtawina te, nang honmudah te hinna te ngen loua, dam sawtna te leng ngen loua, a tung ua kumpipaa ka hon bawl na mite vaina hawm sak theihna dinga pilna leh theihna te na hon nget jawk jiakin, pilna leh theihna piak na hita hi:
Huan, na maa kumpipaten leng a naneih ngeingei louh uh, nang nunga leng a neih het louh ding uh sum leh pai te, hausakna te, pahtawina te ka hon pe lai ding, a chi a.
Huchiin Solomon mun sang china biakbuk omna Gibeon khuaa a zin Jerusalem ah apaia, Israel tungah vai a hawmta hi.
Huanm Solomonin kangtalaite leh sakol tung tuang mite a kaikhawm eka; kangtalai sang khat leh za li leh sakol tung tuang mi sing khat leh sang nih a neia, huaite kangtalai koihna khua ah te, Jerusalem khuaa kumpipa omna ah te a koih a.
Huan, kumpipan Jerusalem khua ah dangkaeng leh dangkasikte suang bang mai chih khopin a koih eka, sidar singte leng phaijanga theipi sing bang lela chih khopin a koih lai hi.
Huan, Solomon neih sakolte Aigupta gam akipana lak khiak ahi; kumpipa sumsinmiten huaite a honhonin a nakhak jel ua, a hona lei jel ahi.Aigupte gama kangtalaite bel dangkasik sekel za guk jelin a tungsak jel ua; huan, sakolte dangkasik sekel ja leh sawmnga jelin; huchibang mahin Hitte kumpipate tengteng leh Suria kumpipate leng a tutsak sek uhi.
Aigupte gama kangtalaite bel dangkasik sekel za guk jelin a tungsak jel ua; huan, sakolte dangkasik sekel ja leh sawmnga jelin; huchibang mahin Hitte kumpipate tengteng leh Suria kumpipate leng a tutsak sek uhi.
Huan, Solomonin TOUPA min dingin in lam a tuma, kumpipa in ding toh.
Solomonin van po ding mi sing sagih leh, muala sing phukmi singgiat leh amau vengmi sang thum leh zaguk a sepa.
Huan, Solomonin Tura kumpipa Huram kiangah, Ka pa David thil nahihsaka, a omna ding in lamna ding sidar te na nakup bangin, honhihsak sam tanla,
Ngai dih, TOUPA ka Pathian mina in amah adia lama, a maa gimlim hala, tanghou siah koih gige a, khawlni te, kha thak te, TOUPA ka Pathian ankuanglui nitea jingsang leh nitak a halmang thillat latna dingin ka lam sin ahi.
Hiaite Israelte adingin khantawn thuseh ahi hi.
Huan, ka in lam tup thupi mahmah ding ahi, ka Pathian uh Pathian tengteng sang a thupi lah ahi ngala.
Van, vante vanah leng ta lou ahi ngala, kuan ahia a in lam saktheih ding? kei, a maa gimlim halna ding lel chih louh ngal kei phiangsanin ka lam sak thei mahmah ding hia?
Huchiin Juda gam leh Jerusalem a mi khutsiamte ka pa Davidin a nazat sek tuin ka kianga omte laka sem tei dingin mi khat, dangkaeng te, dangkasik te, dal te, sik lam te khoih thei, puan sandup te, sanau te, dumbuang te bawl siam, gelh bangchibang peuh siam mi honsawl in.
Lebanona sidar sing te, meilah sing te, algum singte leng honkhak lechin; na miten Lebanona sing phuk a siam mahmah uh chih ka thei ngala; huchiin ngai dih, ka mite nang mite lakah tel sam le uh,
Sing tampi honngaihtuah sak ding: ka in lam tup lah a thupi sin mahmah ngal a.
Huan, ngai dih, na mi, sing phukmite huit buh pota sing nih leh barli buh pota sing nih leh uain bath sing nih leh thau bath sing nih ka pe ding, chiin mi a sawl a.
Huchiin Tura kumpipa Huramin, Topupan a mite a it jiakin a kumpipa ding ua nang honbawl eive, chiin Solomon lain a dawng hi.
Huramin, TOUPA, Israel Pathian, lei leh van bawlpa, TOUPA in leh kumpipa in lam dinga pilna leh theihna nei tapa pil tak kumpipa David pepa phatin om hen.
Mi khutsiam, theihtheihna nei, ka pa Hurama mahmah, ka honsawla,
Dan suana mi numei khat tapa ngei, a pa bel Tura khuaa mi, dangkaeng lam te, dangkasik lam te, dal lam te, sik lam te, suang lam te, sing lam te, puan sandup te, dumbuang te, puan malngat te, sandana te khoih sa, gelh bangchibang leng siam, siam chiteng siam ahia; nang mi khutsiamte leh ka pu na pa David khutsiamte lakah a hongsem tei ding,
Huchiin huit buh te, barli buh te, thau te, uain thute ka TOUPAN a gen a sikhate honkhak leh ake;
Huchiin kou Lebanona sing na deih zahzah ka naphuk ding ua, tuipi ah Jopa tanin ka hon tolh sak ding uh; huan, nang Jerusalem ah na nawn tou dinga, a chi a.
Huan, Solomonin Israel gama a pa Davidin a nasimsa, nam dang mi tengteng a sim a, nuai khat leh sing nga leh sangthum leh za guk ahi uh.Huan, van po ding mi sing sagih leh mual a sing phuk mi singgiat leh, mipite sep dan ngaihtuah sak mi ding sang thum leh zaguk a sep hi.
Huan, van po ding mi sing sagih leh mual a sing phuk mi singgiat leh, mipite sep dan ngaihtuah sak mi ding sang thum leh zaguk a sep hi.
Huchiin, Solomon in Jerusalemah, Moriah tang, apa David kiang a TOUPA kilakna, Jebus mi Ornan phualjang, David naseh saah TOUPA in alam panta hi,
Alal kumli kum, khanihna ni nihni in alam panta hi.
Pathian in lamdan ding Solomon in a ngaihtuah dan hichi bang ahi.
Adung lambel tong tehdan ngeina in tong sawmguk ahi a, a vai lam bel tong sawmnih ahi.
Amalam ah inlim dunglam pen in vailam tan mah tong sawmnih ahi a, asan lam bel ja leh sawmnih ahi a, a sung bel dangka eng chi keleu ngen in a luan hi,
Huan dantan lianjaw pen bangah meilah sing a thuap a, huai tuh dangkaeng chikeleu ngen in a luan a, huaiah tumsing leh khainiang lim a tuang sak hi.
Huan, a kilawmsak dingin in bel suangmantam in a jem a, dangkaeng bel Paravaim dangkaeng ahi.
In bel, kalkhang te, bangte, apialkhang te, kongkhakte dangkaeng in a luana; bangte ah cherub lim te a tuang sak ahi.
Huan, munsiangthoupen a bawla adunglam in vailam tanmah, tongsawmnih ahi a, a vailam bel tongsawmnih ahi a, dangkaeng chikeleu ngen in a luan a, talent zaguk a pha hi.
Huan, a kilhna gikdan dangkaeng sekel sawmnga ahi.
Huan, dantan tungnung te dangkaeng in a luan a.
Huan, insiangthou pen ah cherub lim nih a bawla, huaite dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Huan cherub kha ten tong sawmnih a; khak a cherub khat kha tongnga ahi a, bang ava pha a, huan, a kha langkhat leng tong nga mah ahi a, cherub khat kha ava pha hi.
Huan, cherub khat kha leng tong nga ahi a, bang ava pha a; huan, akha lang khat tong nga mah ahi a, cherub khat kha ava pha hi.
Huan cherub ten tong sawmnih khak in akha uh a jak ua, a ding ua, innsung lam nga in a ding uh.
Huan puanjak ding a dumbuangte, asan dupte, a sanaute, khauzang ngat mahmahte in a bawl a, huai ah cherub limte a tuang sak hi.
Huan, amailam ah tong sawmthum leh tong ngaa sang khuam nih a phuta, huaite dawn tong nga tuaktuak ahi.
Huailaiah khainiang a bawla, khuamdawnte ah a viala; huan, pomegranet ja a bawla, khainiang ah a khai hi,Huan, biakin mailam ah khuamte a phuta, khat taklam ah, khat veilam ah, huan, taklam a pen Jakin a chi a, veilam a pen boaz achi hi.
Huan, biakin mailam ah khuamte a phuta, khat taklam ah, khat veilam ah, huan, taklam a pen Jakin a chi a, veilam a pen boaz achi hi.
Huan, dal maitam, a dunglam tongsawmnih, availam tong sawmnih, asandan tong sawma bawl laia.
Dal loh bem lianpi, a gei leh agei kikal a tong sawm kia, a sandan tong nga a sung leuleua; a geia kimvel in tong sawmthum ahi,
Agei nuai pakmum limten a vel suak a, tong khat ah sawm sawm, dal loh kimvel in a om.
Pak mum limte vualnih ahi a, dal loh a kimata sun ahi.
Huan bel bawngtal sawm lehnih tungah a ki nga a, thum in mallam anga ua, thum in tumlam a nga ua, thum in simlam a nga ua, thum in suahlam a nga uh; huan, dal loh bel huaite tungah aki koih a, a nung lam a nga hi.
Huan, loh pen khutpek tan in asah a, a geibel nougei bang, lili pak bang a bawl ahi a, bath sangthum ta ahi.
Kisilna ding kuang jawn, sawm a bawl laia, taklam sangahnga a, tungah, veilam sanga nga a tungah; huaite bel haalmang thillat silna ding ahi; dal kuang jawn bel siampu te kisilna ding ahi.
Huan, abawl dan dinga seh bang in, dangkaeng khawnvak koihna sawm a bawl a, biakin sungah taklam sangah nga, veilam sangah nga a koih a.
Dohkan sawm a bawl lai in, biakin sung ah taklam sangah nga, veilam sang nga a koih a.
Huan, dangkaeng kuang jawn ja a bawl hi.
Huailou leng siampute huang leh huang za pite a uma, huang kongkhakte a bawl a, dal in a luan hi,
Huan, lohpen in taklam pang ah suahlam ah sim dohin a tunga.
Huan, Huramin belt e, vutluahnate, kuangjawnte a bawl.
Huchiin Pathian in adinga kumpipa Solomon a bawl sak Huramin a zouta a;
Khuam nih te, nou bemte khuam dawna zing nihte, khuam dawna nou bem nihte tuamna gial chitek nihte;
Huai tuamna gial chitek nih adinga pomgranet za lit e khuam dawna nou bial nih tuamna ding gial chitek tuaktuak dinga pomgranet vual nihte.
Kingakna te, kingakna tunga kuangjawnte leng a bawla;
Loh khat leh a nuaia bawngtal sawm leh nihte toh.
Belte, vutluahnate, sathuknate leh a tuiumbelsuan tengteng leng Huramin TOUPA in adia dal nawtteta kumpipa Solomon a bawl sak ahi.
Huaite Jordan phai jangah Sukoth leh Zered bellei mun ah kumpipan a sung hi.
Huchibangin Solomonin tuiumbelsuan tampi abawl a; dal bel buk seng vual ahi kei hi.
Huan, Solomonin Pathian ina tuiumbelsuan om tengteng abawl a, dangkaeng maitam te, tanghou koihna dohkan te.
Seh banga mun siangthou maia det ding khawnvak koihna te, a khawnvak nangawn toh, dangkaeng keleu ngenin a bawl hi;
Huan, pak te, khawnvak te leh taitehte dangkaeng, dangkaeng keleu ngenin a bawla;Huan, khgawnvak puan tehna te, maiphiat kuang te, keu te, meilakna te dangkaeng keleu ngen mahin; huan, in sung lut na, in sung gil jaw mun siangthou pen kongkhak te leh a in, Biakin kongkhak te dangkaengin a bawl hi.
Huan, khgawnvak puan tehna te, maiphiat kuang te, keu te, meilakna te dangkaeng keleu ngen mahin; huan, in sung lut na, in sung gil jaw mun siangthou pen kongkhak te leh a in, Biakin kongkhak te dangkaengin a bawl hi.
Huchiin Solomonin TOUPA in dinga a lam a zou vektaa; huan, Solomonin a pa David thil a nalatsa tengteng a la luta, dangkasikte, dangkaengte, vanzat tengtengte Pathian ina gou koihna ah a koihta hi.
Huchiin Solomonin Israel upate, a nam intek, Isarel suante inkuan intekte tengteng, David khopi Zion akipan TOUPA thukhunna bawm jawng tou dingin Jerusalem khuaah a kaikhawm a.
Huchiin Israel mi tengteng kha sagihnaa ankuangluinaah kumpipa kiangah a hohkhawm uhi
Huan, Israel upate tengteng a hong ua, Levite bawm a jawng uh.
Huan, TOUPA bawm leh, kihoupihna puanin leh Puan Ina tuiumbelsuan siangtouh tengteng a jawng tou ua; huaite siampu Leviten a jawng tou uh.
Huan, kumpipa Solomon leh Israelte paikhawm tengteng a kianga hongkikhawmte bawm maah a om khawm ua, belam leh bawngtal gen seng vual louh leh sim seng vual louhin a kithoih uhi.
Huchiin siamputen TOUPA thukhunna bawm a omna dingah a la lut ua, in sunga biakna mun, mun siangthou penah, cherubte kha nuaiah.
Cherubten bawm omna tung jawnah a kha uh a jak gige ua, cherubten bawm leh a jawnna chiangtawnte a khuh vek uh.
Huan, a jawnna chiangtawnte a sau mahmaha, a jawnna chiangtawnte kongte biakna mun mai, mun siangthou akipanin a muh theiha; ahihhangin polamah jaw a dawk kei hi: tu tana huailaia om nilouh ahi.
Aigupta gam akipan a pawt ua, TOUPAN Israel suante kianga thu a khun laia Mosiin Horeb tanga suangpek nih a koih kia lou ngal huai bawm sungah bangmah dang a om kei hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, siampute mun siangthoua kipana a hongpawt tak un, (siampu omte tengteng a kisiangsak ua, a paawlin a kibawl tuan kei ua;
Levite lasami tengteng leng a vek un, Asaph te, Heman te, Jeduthun te, a tapate uh leh a unaute uh toh, puan malngat silha kivanin dakkhutbete, pekgingte.
Kaihgingte toh, maitam suahlam sangah a ding ua, a lak uah siampu ja leh sawmnih pengkul mutin a om lai uhi: )
Hichi ahi a, pengkul mutte leh lasamiten TOUPA Phatna leh kipah thu genna dia a tum ging uh gingkhat bang mai a kijaa; pengkul leh dakkhutbet leh thil tum ging toh a aw uh a suah ua, Amah lah a hoih ngala; a chitna TOUPA a phat uleh, TOUPAin meipiin a dim meuhmouh maia,Huchiin meipi jiakin siamputen na leng a sem theikei zo jen ua; TOUPA thupinain Pathian in lah a dimsak vek ngala.
Huchiin meipi jiakin siamputen na leng a sem theikei zo jen ua; TOUPA thupinain Pathian in lah a dimsak vek ngala.
Huchiin Solomon in thu agen a, TOUPAN, Mial bikbekah ka om ding, a chi nguta,
Himahleh na tenna ding in, khantawna na om na ding ka honna lamsakta hi chiin.
Huan, kumpipa aki heia, Israel kikhawmte tengteng a vualjawla; Israel kikhawmte tenteng ading dedup uhi.
Huan, aman, TOUPA Israelte Pathian, a kapa David kianga amah kam mahmah a,
Aigupta gam a kipan ka mi Israelte ka pi khiak ni akipan in Israelte nam lak a koi khua mah ka min omna diing in lamna diing in ka tel ngei naikei a; ka mi Israelte tunga heutu diing mi kuamah ka tel ngei naisam kei;
Ahihhangin, ka min om na diingin Jerusalem kana tel taa, ka mi Israelte heutu diingin David kana telta ahi, chia nagen pa, amah khut mahmah a hon pichingsakpa phat in om hen.
Kapa David in Israelte Pathian, TOUPA min diinga in lam a ngaihtuah sek a
Himahleh TOUPAN kapa David kiangah, ka min diinga in lam na ngaihtuah sek a, hichi bang lungsim na naput na hih hoih hi; himahleh nang jaw in na lam kei diing;
Na tapa, na khala hong pawt diingin ka min diingin in a hon lam zou diing, a nachi ta hi.
Huan, TOUPAN a thugen atangtungsak taa: TOUPA chiamsa bang ngein kapa David mun ka hon luah a, Israel lal tutphah ah ka hong tu a, Israel pathian TOUPA min ding in kahon lamta ahi.
Huai laiah Israel suan te kiang a nakhun, TOUPA thukhun a bawm ka koihta ahi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA maitam bul ah Israel kikhawmte tengteng muh in a ding a, a baan a zak a,
(Solomon in dal dohkan a saulam tong nga, a zatlam tong nga, a san lam tong thum a bawl biakin huang laitak a tun tungah a tuang a, Israel kikhawm te tengteng ma ah a khuk din a, vanlam nga in a ban a jaka: )
Aw, TOUPA, Israelte pathian lei leh van ah nang mah bang mahmah Pathian a om kei uh, a lungtang tengteng ua na lampi tawnmi a sikha te tunga thukhun tangtung saka hehpihna kem,
Na sikha kapa David kiang a, na thu chiam na tangtung saka; ahi, na kama na gen san na khut in na loh ching saktaa: tuni in.
Huchiin aw TOUPA, Israelte pathian, na sikha kapa David kianga, Na suante na om banga omsam ding a omdan ua a pilvan peuhmah uleh, ka mit muh a isrealte laltutphah a tuding na tasam kei ding, chi a na na chiamsa tangtung sakin.
Huchiin TOUPA, Israelte Pathian, na sikha David kiang a, na thugen lohchingsak mahmah in
Ahihhangin, pathian leiah mihing lakah om petmah dia hia?
Ngain, van, vante van ah leng nata keia, hiai ka inlam ah takei sem natel ni chia!
Himahleh, aw TOUPA ka pathian na sikha in nang a hon sapna leh a thumna ngaihkhiaksak in, na sikha thumna leh ngetna hon limsak in.
Hiai mun lam ngaa na sikha a thumna ngaikhia a, Huai laiah kamin a om ding, na chih na mun mahmah, inlam ah sun leh jan a namit suan gige theih na dingin.
Huan, na sikha leh nami Israel ten hiai munlam nga a thum chiang un a ngetna te uh ana ngaihkhia sak jelin, ahi, na tenna mun vanah na na ngaikhia inla, huan na ngaikhia in, ngaidam in.
Mi kuapeuh in a innvengte tungah thil hih khial in, kichiamsak hong kiphamoh taleh, hiai in a na maitam ma ah hong kichiamhenla;
Nang vanah nangaikhia inla, gamtang inla, mi gilou a gitlouh mana, mohtangsakin, mi diktat a diktak mana dik tangsakin, na sikha te vaihawm sakin.
Na mi Israelten na tung a thil a hih khelh jiak ua melma te laka ana vuallelh ua, nang lam a hong ngat nawn ua, namin a gup ua, hiai in a thum a thil na kianga a hong nget uleh;
Nang vanah na ngaihkhiaksak inla, nami Israelte khelhna ngaidam inla, amau leh api leh pute uh napiak gamah pi nawn in.
Na tungah thil ahih khelh jiak ua vana hong bina, vuah a hong zuk louh a, hiai munlam nga a a thum ua na min a gup uh leh, amau na hih gim jiaka a khelhna uh a kisik uleh;
Nang vanah na ngaikhia inla, apaina ding uh lampi hoih kawkmuh in na sikha te leh nami Israelte khelhna ngaidam in namite a goutan ding ua na piak nagam ah vuah hon zusak in.
Ka gam ua kialte a hong kiak a, hi te ahong len a, keuna hiam, muatna hiam, khaukhup hiam, lung hiam a hong om a, a melmate un a khuate uh a hong um ua, hi bang peuh, natna bang peuh a hong tun leh ahi vei uhiam, a lungkham na uh hiam thei peuhmah in;
Hiai inlam ngaa banjak a mimal hiam, Israel mipi hon in hiam thumna leh ngetna a hon tut uh:
Na omna van ah na ngaikhia inla, ngaidam inla, mi chih a omdan bang chiat un lohchingsakin, a lungtang uh lah nathei ngala: (nang mah kia lah mihing tate lungtang theipa nahi ngala: )
Kapi leh pute uh napiak gama omsung teng ua nalampi tawn thei ding a nang laudan a hong siamna ding un.
Huan, na mi Israelte hilou, nam dang mi, namin thupi tak leh na khut hattak leh na banzak jiaka gam gamla taka kipana hongpai, hiai in lam nga a a hong thum hun chiang un:
Nang na omna van ah nangaikhia inla, namdang te leng nang hon sapdan uh dungzui in atung uah hih in, huchiin nami Israelte bangmah in khovel a namchih in nam a thei ding ua, nang laudan ahong siamding ua, hiai ka inlam in namin apu chih a thei ding uhi.
Namiten a melma te uh na sawlna lamlam a a sual ua na khopi tel leh namin adia in kana lam lam nga a na kiangah a thum uleh:
Nang a thumna uh leh a ngetna uh vanah na ngaikhia inla, a thu uah pi jelin.
Na tung a ahong khelh ua, (kuamah lah khial lou a omngal keia) a tungua na hehna, melma khut ah na piak a, gam gamla pi ah hiam, naideuh ah hiam sala a pi unleng,
Sal a api nagam ua aki ngaihtuah khiak ua, akisik ua, I nakhialta, diklou tak leh gitlouh huai tak in thil ina hihta, chia a tanna gam ua ngetna hon tut ua: a
Sal a amau api na ua, atanna gam ua a lungtang tak uleh a lungsim taktak ua nanglam a hong ngat ua, api leh pute uh gamlam leh na khopi tel leh namin dia ka inlam lam nga na kiangah a thum uleh:
A thumna uh leh a ngetna uh nang na omna vanah na ngaikhia inla, a thu uah pi jel inla, natung a nana khialta namite ngaidam in.
Aw ka pathian, hehpihtak in namit hong hakinla, hiai muna thumna ah na bil hon doh in.
Aw, TOUPA pathian, na omna mun ah paitou in nang leh na hatna bawm toh, aw, TOUPA pathian, na siampute hotdamna in van inla, na mi siangthou te hoihna in nuamsa sak in.Aw TOUPA pathian, na thau nilhpa mel leh ngatsak kenla, na sikha David thil hoih hih te thei gige in, a chi a.
Aw TOUPA pathian, na thau nilhpa mel leh ngatsak kenla, na sikha David thil hoih hih te thei gige in, a chi a.
Huan Solomon a thum khitin van akipanin mei ahong paisuk a, hal mang thillat leh kithoihna te a hong kangmangta a, huan TOUPA thupinain in hongdimta hi,
