TOUPA thupina in TOUPA in a dimsak jiakin TOUPA in ah siampute a lut theita kei ua.
Huan, Israel suante tengtengin van akipana mei hong pai suk leh in tunga TOUPA thupina a en nilouh ua, suang lep tungah maia lei siin khupboh ua.
Amah lah a hoih ngala, a chitna khantawn in a om ding hi, Chiin chibai a buk ua, kipahthu a gen uh.
Huchiin kumpipa leh mipiten TOUPA maah kithoihnate a lan ua.
Kumpipa Solomonin kithoihna bawngtal sing nih leh sang nih leh belam nuai khat leh sing nih a lana.
Huchibangin kumpipa leh mipiten Pathian in a lan uh.
Huan, siampute a mun chiat uah a ding ua; huan, Levite leng TOUPA kianga kipahthu genna dinga phuah, A chitna khantawnin a om ding hi, chia TOUPA phatna dia Davidin a zat sek, thil ging thei toh TOUPA lasain a ding ua; huan, siamputen pengkul a mut ua, Israel mi tengteng a ding diamduam uh.
Huan, Solomonin TOUPA in ma jawna umsung kong tual ah hih siangthou behlap a; huai ah halmang thillat te, lemna thillat thau te alan a; Solomon dal maitam bawl halmang thillat te, tangbuang thillat te, thau te latna dinga a neu luat jiak in
Huchiin, huai tung in Solomon leh Israel mi tengteng mipi kikaikhawm thupi tak hamath kholutna a kipana Aigupta gam lui pha a mi te toh ni sagih ankuang a lui uhi.
Huan, ni giat ni in kikhopna tak anei ua; maitam kipahpih na dingin ni sagih a zang ua, ankuang lui ni a dingin ni sagih a zang uhi.
Huan, kha sagih na ni sawmnih leh ni thum niin mipite a kikhensak a TOUPAN David leh Solomon leh a mi Israel te tung a ahoih na a lat sak jiak in nuamsa tak leh kipak tak in mite a in lam uah apai ta uhi.
Huchibangin, Solomonin TOUPA in leh kumpipa in a pichin ta a; Solomonin a lungsim a atup bangin TOUPA in leh amah in lamzang tak in a pichin ta hi.
Huan, jan in Solomon kiang ah TOUPA ahong kilak a, akiang ah, Na thumna ka najaa hiai mun kei adingin kithoihna in din ka sep khin hi.
Vante ka khak a, vuah te a zuk louh in hiam, khaukup ka sawl a, gam te ahih siat hiam ka mi te lak ahi ka lensak hiama;
Ka minpu ka mite kingai neu a athum ua, honzon ua, a om dan gilou te uh a leh ngat san uleh van a kipan in ka na ngai khe dinga, a khelhna uh ka ngaidam dinga, agam uh ka dam sak ding hi.
Hiai mun a thumna ka mit ka suan ding a, ka bil ka doh ding hi.
Huai a ka min khantawna aom theih na dingin hiai in ka sep a, ka hih singthou ta ahi: huaiah ka mit leh ka lungtang a om tawntung ta ding.
Huan, nang tungtang thu ah leng, na pa David bang a ka mitmuha na om a, thu ka hon piak bangbanga na om a ka thu seh te leh ka vaihawm ten a san leh:
Israelte lak ah vaihawm mi na tasam kei ding, chia na pa David kiang a thu ka khun bangin nagam lal tutphah ka kip sak ding.
Ahihhangin na kihei mang ua, ka thuseh te leh ka thu piak te na leh ngat san ua, Pathian dang ten na nasep ua, na biak uh leh:
Amau ka piak gam akipan ka hon hih mang kha ding a; huan, hiai in ka min ding a ka hih siangthou sa ka mit muh phak louh a ka suan mang vengveng dinga, namchih lak a paunak leh a selam a gen teh na dingin ka bawl ding hi.
Huan, hiai in sangpi a kiang a pai peuhin lamdang asa ding ua, bang chi ahiai gam leh hiai in TOUPAN hichi banga ahih ahia?
A chi ding uh.Huan, TOUPA, a pi leh pute uh Pathian, Aigupta gam akipan pi khe pa a leh ngat san ua, Pathian dangte a let ua, abiak ua, a n ate a sep jiak un hiai siat na tengteng a tunguah a tung ta ahi, ahon chi ding uh achi a.
Huan, TOUPA, a pi leh pute uh Pathian, Aigupta gam akipan pi khe pa a leh ngat san ua, Pathian dangte a let ua, abiak ua, a n ate a sep jiak un hiai siat na tengteng a tunguah a tung ta ahi, ahon chi ding uh achi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Solomon in TOUPA, in leh amah in alam sung kum sawmnih ahong bei in,
Huramin Solomon khua a piakte Solomon in a bawl a, Israel suante a omsak hi.
Huan, Solomonin Hamath-Zoba a sual a, a zou hi,
Huan, gamdai ah, Tadmor a bawl a, Hamatha van koihna khua te toh.
Huan, Beth- heron saknung jaw leh khangnung jaw leng, kulhte, kongkhakte, a kalhna te nei in a bawl beh a.
Huan, Baalath khuate, avan koihna khua tengteng te, a kangtalai koihna khua te, a sakol tungtuang mite omna khua te, Jerusalem leh Lebanon leh a gamsung tengteng ah Solomon in a deih bangbang a bawl hi.
Huan.
Israel suante hilou, Hit te, Amor te, Periz te, Hiv te, Jebus te suan a omlai mite tengteng;
Israel suanten ahihman louhte uh, huai gam a amaute nung a nutsiat a om a suante uh, tutan a, Solomon in sikha nasem dinga a goih teitei pawl din a bawl hi.
Israel suante bel Solomon in a nasem mi sikha ding in abawl tei keia, kidou mite a sepaih heutu te inntekte akangtalai leh a Sakol tungtuang mi heutu ahi jaw uh.
Huaite mipite heusek mi, Solomon inntek pente ahi ua, zanih leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Huan Solomon in Pharo tanu David khopi a kipan atuam a in alam sak ah a pitou a, ka ji Israel kumpipa David in a om ding ahi kei, TOUPA bawm hong tunna munsiangthou ahi, achi ahi.
Huchiin, Solomon in in lim mailam a abawl TOUPA maitam ah TOUPA ding in halmang thillat te alan a;
Mosi thupiak, niteng a, dinga bikhiah zah bangbang in khawlni ah te, khathak ni ah te, annkuang luihun nei, kumkhata thumvei, tanghou silngou sohlouh annkuang luina a te, nipi kal annkuang luia ah te, bawkte annkuang lui ah te,
Huan, apa David nanaseh bang in siampu pawlte leh Levi te atantuam chiat ua, niteng a sep kul dungzui jel a, phat ding te, siampute maa nasem ding khawng inasep a; huan, kongkhak tengah a pawlpawl a vengmite a sep laia; huchibangin Pathian mi David a nasep ahi.
Kumpipan siampu te, Levi te thu a piak bang chimah in sumthu a te leng a limsak lou hetkei uh.
Huan, TOUPA in a bawlkhiak tung ua, kipana a zohtan un, Solomon in ana suktuah sa bang geih ahi.
Huchiin TOUPA in pichiin a hita hi.
Huchiin Solomon bel Edom gama luipi gei a Ezion-Geber ah leh Eloth ah a hoha,Huan, Huramin a sikha tuipi a gamtang ngei mi, long te toh a kuansak a: Solomon sikha te toh Ophir ah a hoh ua, huailaiah dangkaeng talent za li leh sawm nga a hon tun ua, kumpipa Solomon kiang ah hon tun uhi.
Huan, Huramin a sikha tuipi a gamtang ngei mi, long te toh a kuansak a: Solomon sikha te toh Ophir ah a hoh ua, huailaiah dangkaeng talent za li leh sawm nga a hon tun ua, kumpipa Solomon kiang ah hon tun uhi.
Huan, Solomon minthandan Seba kumpinu in ana jak in Solomon thu haksa pipi a ettel tum in nungjui mi tampi pi in sa ngawngsaute a banghiam gimlim te leh dangkaeng tampi leh suangmanpha te pua in Jerusalem ah a hoh toua: huan, Solomon kiang a vatun touh in, a lungsim a om tengteng suahsiang vek in a houpih hi,
Huan Solomon in athu dot tengteng a dawng vek a: Solomon in a dawn theihlouh himhima omkei hi.
Huan, Seba kumpinun Solomon pilna leh a inlam, amuh in,
A dohkan a nekdingte, a sikha te tutdante, a nasemte nasep dante, aki vat dante uh, a nou pe mite leh a ki vat dante uh, TOUPA in a avahoh touhna te, a am ahai hial hi.
Kumpipa kiang ah, Na thil hih teleh na pildan thuthang ka gam a kanajak a dik mahmah ngut hi,
Himahleh keimah mit mahmah a ka hong muh masiah a gen kia uh ka um theikei a, ngai in, na pildan thupi kimkhat leng a honna hilh sam ua hia: na minthan kana jak dan nakpiin na khup ve.
Na mite nak hamphat na uh e, hiai nasikha na kiang a om gige a na pilna thu ngaikhe veute hampha hina tel uh e!
TOUPA na Pathian, na tung a pipak, a kumpipa dinga a laltutphah a hon tutsakpa TOUPA na pathian phat in om hen: na pathian in Israelte khantawn a hih kip ding in a it a, huaijiak in diktat taka vaihawm ding in a kumpipa ding ua nang hon bawl eive, achi a.
Huchiin kumpipa kiang ah dangkaeng talent ja leh sawmnih leh bang hiam gimlim tampi mahmah le suang mantam te apia a, Seba kumpinun kumpipa Solomon bang hiam gimlim a piak bang himhim a om kei hi.
Huan, Solomon sikha te leh Huram sikha te Ophir akipan a dangkaeng va po ten algum sing leh suangmantam a hon pua uh,
Huan, kumpipan Olgum sing TOUPA in leh kumpipa in umna ding leh lasa mite a dinga kaihging leh pekging dingin a bawl a: huchibang Juda gama tumalam in a mu ngeikei uhi.
Huan, Seba kumpinun a thil apiak simlouh in kumpipa Solomon in a deih a pesam a, huchiin a gam lamah heute toh apai nonta uhi.
Huchiin Solomon kiang a kumkhat sunga dangkaeng hong lut gikdan dangkaeng talent jaguk leh sawm guk leh guk buk ahi.
Mi ompolhte leh sumsinmi te hontawi sim hetlouh in: huan, Arabia kumpipa tengteng leh gam ukpa ten Solomon kiang ah dangkaeng te, dangkasik te a hon tawi sek uhi.
Huan, kumpipa Solomon in dangkaeng suk pekin lumlian chi zanih a bawl a lumlian khatin dangkaeng sekel jaguk a deih hi.
Huan, dangkaeng sukpek in lum ja thum a bawl a; lum khat in dangkaeng sekel ja thum a deih a; huaite Lebanon gammang In a koih hi.
Huan, kumpipan Saiha paak laltutphah thupi tak a bawl behlap a, dangka keleu ngen in a luan hi.
Laltutphah ah akal touhna siksan gukte, laltutphah toha zop, dangkaeng khe ngakna te, a ban ngakna bul a ding humpineilaki lim nih te a om hi.
Huan, siksanguk lang tuak tungah humpi nelkai sawm le nih a ding ua: huchi bang koilai gamah leng a bawl ngei kei uh.
Kumpipa Solomon nou tengteng dangkaeng vek hi a, huan, Lebanon Gammang Ino tuiumbelsuan tengteng leng dangkaeng keleu vek ahi; Solomon damlaiin dangkasik bangmah in a simkei uh.
Kumpipan long hon, Huram sikha te, Tarsis a hoh sek kikop pih anei a, kum thu m hal zeel in, Tarsis long honin dangkaeng te, dangkasik te, saiha te, jawng te, utong te, a hon paw sek hi.
Huchiin in kumpipa Solomon in khovel kumpipa tengteng hauhlam ah leh pil lam ah a khup vek.
Huchiin pathian in a lungtang a akoih, a pilnathu ngai khe ding in, kunpipa tangteng in Solomon ahon zuan huthut uhi.
Huan, kumteng a piak bikhiah nei in dangkasik tuium belsuante, dangkaeng tuiumbelsuante, puante, galvante, banghiam gimlimte, sakol te, sabentung te ahon pe chiat zel uh.
Huan, Solomon in Sakol leh kangtalai koihna mun sangli a nei a, huan sakol tungtuangmi sing khat leh sang nih a nei a, huaite kangtalai koihna khua te ah, Jerusalem kumpipa kiang te ah a omsak hi.
Huan, lui kipan Philistia gam leh Aigupta gam tana kumpipa tengteng tungah a lal hi.
Huan, kumpipan Jerusalem khua ah, atam mah mah jiak in dangkasik te suang bang mai a ngaih khop in a om sak a, sidar singte phaijang a theipi bang lel a, a ngaih khop in a om sak hi.
Huan, Solomon a dingin sakolte aigupta a kipan leh gamchih akipan inhon la jel uh.

Kapan hakkol diktak a honna posak a ken ahihleh na hakkol uh behlap lai sin kaka: kapan khetna in nou ahon sawi jel a, ken ahihleh aikam a hon sawi sin kaka chiin agen ua.

Huchiin Asain TOUPA in leh kumpipa ina gou dangkasik leh dangkaeng te ala khiaa, damaskaa Suria kumpipa Benhadad kiangah.
Ka pa leh napa kala thukhun a om bangmahin I kalah thukhun a oma, ngaidih, dangkasik leh dangkaeng ka honkhak ahi; kisa dih, Israel kumpipa Baasain a hontawpsan nadingin a kiangah na thukhun phel nawn mai ve, chiin a khak a.
Huan, Benhadadin kumpipa Asa thu a napoma; huchiin Israel khuate sual dingin sepaih heutute a sawla, Ijon khua te, dan khua te, Abelmain khua te, Naphtali gama van koihna khua tengteng a sual uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Baasain huai thu a najakin Rama khua a bawl lai a khawlsana, thilhih tup a ki khel sakta hi.
Huchiin, kumpipa Asain Juda mi tengteng apia.
Baasain Rama kho bawl nadinga suang leh sing a zatte a la vek ua, huaitein Geba leh Mizpa khua a bawl.
Huan, huai laiin jawlnei Hanani Juda kumpipa Asa kiangah a honga, a kiangah, TOUPA na pathian muanglouin Suria kumpipa na muanga, huaijiakin Suria kumpipa sepaih honte na khahte ahi hi.
Ethiopiate leh Lubte sepaih hon lian tak, kangtalai leh sakol tung tuangmite tampi ahi kei umaw? himahleh TOUPA na muan jiakin na khutah a honpia ahi.
A lama lungsim diktat pumite tunga a hatdan hihlang dingin khovel tengtengah TOUPA mit a vak dundun sek ahi.
Haihuai mahmahin thil nahih a hita; tuaban siah dou na nei gigeta ding a chi a.
Huchiin, Asa bel jawlnei tungah a heha, suangkulhah a khumtaa; a thu gen jiakin a heh mahmah mai hi.
Huan Asain mi khenkhatte leng a simmoh behlap lai hi.
Huan ngaidih ua, Asa tanchin a bul a kipana a tawp phain Juda leh Israel kumpipate tanchin gelhna bu ah a tuang ahi.
Huan, kum sawmthum leh kum kua a lal kumin Asa bel a khe a hongnataa; a natna thupi tak ahi; himahleh a natnaah TOUPA zong louin damdawi siamte a zong jawa.
Huan, Asa bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmua, kum sawmli leh kum khat a lal kumin a si a.Huan, David khopia amah tuama khuak, amah hanah a vui ua, gimlim lim tak, gimlim bawlmiten gimlim chi tuam tuam a bawl ua dim lupnaah a sial ua, amah tuam dingin meipi thupi mahmah a sep uh.
Huan, David khopia amah tuama khuak, amah hanah a vui ua, gimlim lim tak, gimlim bawlmiten gimlim chi tuam tuam a bawl ua dim lupnaah a sial ua, amah tuam dingin meipi thupi mahmah a sep uh.
Huan, a tapa Jehosaphat a sikin a lala, Israel mite dou dingin a kihihhata,
Huan, Juda gama kulh nei khua tengteng ah sepaih a koih a; Juda gam lah apa Asain a nalak Ephraim gama khuate ah galvilmi a koiha.
Huan, Jehosaphat kiangah TOUPA a oma; baal te zong loua a pu Davidin a tot masaksa lampi tawna.
Api leh pute uh pathian zonga, Israel mite hih bang hih loua a thupiakte a zuih jawk jiakin.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN a gam a khutah a hihkipa, huchiin Juda gam mi tengtengin Jehosaphet kipahman khawng a hongpia ua, a honghauin a hongthupi ngial hi.
Huan, a lungsim TOUPA lamah a awna; huan Juda gam akipana mun sangte leh Aserte a paimang vek lai hi.
Huan, kum thum a lal kumin a mi lian Benhail te, Obadia te, Zekaria te, Nathanel te, Mikaite, Juda gam khuatea mite sinsak dingin a sawl khe lai a;
Huan, Levi mi, Semai te, Nethani te, Zebadia te, Asahel te, Semiramoth te, Johonathan te, Adonija te, Tobija te, Tobadonija te a teltei ua, huan siampu Elisam leh Jehoram leng a tel uhi.
Huan, TOUPA danbu a tawi ua, Juda gam khua tengteng a tawn ua, mite a sinsak uh.
Huan, Juda gam kim gam tengtenga miten TOUPA laudan a siam ua, kuamahin Jehosaphet a dou ngam kei uhi.
Huan, Philistiami khenkhatin Jehosaphet kipahman a hongpia ua, siah dingin dangkasikte leng a pe lai uh; huan, Arabia miten leng gan hon, belamtal sangsagih leh za sagih leh keltal sang sagih leh za sagih a honkai uh.
Huchiin Jehosaphet bel a hongthupita mahmaha, Juda gamah kulhte leh thil koih khawmna khuate a bawla, Juda gam khuate ah nasep tampi a neihi.
Huan, Jerusalem ah sepaih mi hat hangsante a hau behlap laia.
Huan, a inkuan kuan ua a omdan uh hichibang a hi- Juda inkuana sang heutu te, heutu Adanin mi hat hangsan nuai thum a heua;
A zom Jehohanin nuai nih leh sing giat a heua;
Huan, a zomnawn Sikri tapa Amasi bel kiphal taka TOUPA dinga kipiain, mi hat hangsan nuai nih a heua;
Huan, Benjamin inkuante mihat hangsan Eliadin thal leh lum zang mi nuai nih a heua;
Azom Jehozabadin galkap dinga mansiangsa nuaikhat leh sing giat a heua.Hiai tengteng Juda gama kulh nei kumpipan a koihte simlouha kumpipa kianga om thekte ahi uhi.
Hiai tengteng Juda gama kulh nei kumpipan a koihte simlouha kumpipa kianga om thekte ahi uhi.
Huchiin Jehosaphat bel a honghauin hongthupita mahmaha, huan Ahab toh kizopna a bawla.
Huan, kum bangzah hiam tak nungin Samari ah Ahab kiangah a hoh suka, Huan Ahabin amah leh a heutu belam leh bawngtalte tampi a nagoha, Ramoth-gilead khuaa hoh touhpih dingin achiala.
Huan, Israel kumpipa ahabin Juda kumpipa Jehosaphet kiangah, Ramoth-gilead khuaa I hoh tou khawm kei dia hia? achia.
Huan, aman a dawnga, kei leh nang, ka mite na mite pumkhat I hi uh aka, gal I sual khawm kei ding ua, a chi a.
Huan, Jehosaphatin Israel kumpipa kiangah, TOUPA thu hungaih phot lechin lah, a chi a.
Huchiin Israel kumpipan, jawlneite mi za li a sam khawma, a kiang uah, Ramoth gilead khua sual dingin ka vakuan tou ding uam tou lou ding? a chi a.
Huan amau va kuan tou in, pathianin kumpipa khuta pe sin ahi, a chi ua.
Himahleh jehosaphatin, TOUPA jawlnei kuate hiam I dot ding a om kei ua eita aw? a chi a.
Huan, Israel kumpipa Jehosaphat kiangah, TOUPA hondot sak ding mi khat om ve e; himahleh amah bel ka muhdan lam tak ahi; ka tungtang thu a hoih lou lam kia loungal a hoih lam himhim a gen ngei ngal keia; huai mi bel Imla tapa Mikai ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin Israel kumpipan heutu khat a sama, Imla tapa Mikai honpi meng dih, a chi a.
Huan, Israel kumpipa leh Juda kumpipa Samari kulh kongpi lutna chin mun awng ah a lal puan ua kijemin a laltutphah tuaktuak uah a tu ua; huan jawlnei tengtengin a ma uah thtu a gen uh.
Huan, Kenaan tapa Zedakia in sik kite a bawla, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Hiaiten Suriate mangthang sipsip khopin na si ding, achi, achi a.
Huan, huchimahbangin jawlnei dangten leng, Ramoth-gilead ah hoh tou in la. valamzangin; TOUPAN kumpipa khutah a pe sin ahi, chiin a gen ua.
Huan, Mikai sam dinga a sawlpa un, ngai dih, jawlneiten kithutuakin a hoih lamin kumpipa kiangah thu a gen chiat ua; huaijiakin nangleng a chihsa bang un a hoihlamin vagen sam dih ve, chiin a gen a.
Huan, Mikaiin, TOUPA henna louin ka chi hi, ka pathianin a chih bang geihin ahi ka gen sin, a na chi a.
Huan, kumpipa kiang a tun touhin kumpipan a kiangah, Mikai Ramoth-gilead khua sual dingin ka kuan tou ding ua kuan tou lou ding? achi a huan, aman, kuan tou unla, va lamzang un, na khuta piak ahi sin hi, a chi a.
Huan kumpipan a kiangah, thu tak ke leu leu lou ka kiangah TOUPA mina gen lou dingin bangzahvei ahia nang kon kichiam sak ding? a chi a.
Huan, aman Belam chingmi neilou bangin Israelte tengteng tangah dalh jakin ka mu a; huan, TOUPAN, hiaiten heutu a nei te kei ua, amau in lamah lungmuang takin paidiam mai uhen, a chi ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Israel kumpipan Jehosaphat kiangah, ka tungtang thu jaw a se lam kia loungal a hoih lam himhim ahihleh a gen sam keiding chih ka hohilh ahi kei maw? a chi a.
Huan, Mikaiin, khai le, TOUPA thu ngaikhe dih ua leh, TOUPA bel a laltutphah a tua, van mipite tengteng a taklam leh a vei lama dingin ka mua.
Huan, TOUPAN Israel kumpipa Ahab Ramoth-gileada hoh toua, vasi dingin kua ahia khem sin? a chih hun chiangin khatin.
Huchi khachiin, a chi a, mi dangin, huchibang khachibangin a chi hi.
Huan, khakhat a hongpawt a, TOUPA maah a dinga, ken kakhem ding, a chi a, huan TOUPAN a kiangah, bangin eita? a chi a.
Huan, aman, ka vahoh dinga, jawlneite tengteng kamah kha juautheiin ka va suak ding, a chi a: Huan aman, na vakhem ngei dinga, loh leng nava lohching sam ding, va kuan inla, huchibangin vahihin, a chi a.
Huchiin ngai dih, TOUPAN hiai na jawlneite kamah kha juauthei a koiha; na tungtangthu TOUPAN a hoih lou lamin a genta ahi, a chi a.
Huai takin Kenaan tapa Zedakiain a vanaiha, mikai biangah a vabenga, na kianga thug en dingin TOUPA khain koi lama honpawtsan ahia? a chi a.
Huan Mikaiin, ngai dih, dantan sungilla bu dinga nalut ni chiangin na honthei ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, Israel kumpipan, Mikai pi unla, kho ukpa Amaon leh kumpipa tapa kiangah paipih nawn un,
Huan, kumpipan hichiin achia, hiai mi suangkulh ah khum unla, lungmuang taka ka hong nawn ma siah haksa an leh haksa tui nana pia un, a chi a na chi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Mikaiin, lungmuang taka na hongpai nawn peuhmah leh TOUPAN kei hongzangin thu a gen ka hi ve leh, a chi a huan amah mahin, nou mipi tengtengin leng na naja a un, a chi a.
Huan, Israel kumpipa leh Juda kumpipa Jehosaphet bel Ramoth gilead khuaah va hoh tou ua.
Huan, Israel kumpipan Jehosophet kiangah, ka kibawl lamdang dinga, kisualnaah ka hoh sam ding; nang jaw na kumpipa puan kisilhin, a chi a.
Huchiin Israel kumpipa bel a kibawl lamdanga, kisualnaah a hoh tou a.
Huan, Suria kumpipan a kangtalaite tunga heutute kiangah, Israel kumpipa loungal mi neu leng milian leng na sual ding uh ahi kei, chiin thu apia.
Huan, hichi ahi a, kangtalai tunga heututen Jehosaphet a muh uleh Israel kumpipa eive, a chi ua.
Huchiin Sual tumin a umta uh; himahleh Jehosaphet a vakikou a, huan, TOUPAN a panpihtaa, huchiin Pathianin amau amah a nusesak hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, kangtalai tunga heututen Israel kumpipa ahi kei chih a theih un delh louin a kiksan nawnta uhi.
Huan, mi khatin tup tuan nei tuanlou in a thalpeu a laia, Israel kumpipa a awmphaw leh a awmphaw kikalah a kap a, huchiin a kangtalai hawlpa kiangah, leh hawl inla, mipi laka kipan honpaikhialk pih dih ve, liamna na tak ka tuak hi, a chi a.Huan, huai niin kisualna a thupi mahmaha; huan Israel kumpipa bel Suriate lam ngain a kangtalaiah nitak lam tanpha in a dinga; huan ni tum kuan ding khawngin a sita hi.
Huan, huai niin kisualna a thupi mahmaha; huan Israel kumpipa bel Suriate lam ngain a kangtalaiah nitak lam tanpha in a dinga; huan ni tum kuan ding khawngin a sita hi.
Huan, Juda kumpipa Jehosaphat bel lungmuang takin Jerusalem a in ah apai nawnta hi.
Huan, Jawlnei Hanani tapa Jehuin a nadawna, kumpipa Jehosaphat kiangah, Mi gilou na panpihin TOUPA mudahmite na it sin ahi maw? hiai jiakin TOUPA hehna, na tungah a hongomta ahi.
Himahleh hiai gama kipan Aser na pai mang a, TOUPA na zon jiakin hoihna lam banghiam khat na nei lailai ve, a chi a
Huan, Jehosaphat bel Jerusalem ah a oma; huan Beer-seba akipan Ephraim tang gam phain a mite lakah a hoh nawna, TOUPA a pi leh pute uh Pathian lam ah aman a pi kik nawn veka.
Huan, khochih ah Juda gam kulh nei khua tengteng ah vaihawmmite akoih a, vaihawmmite kiangah,
Na thilhih uh hoih taka ngaihtuah in hih un, mihing adinga vaihawm na hikei ua, TOUPA ding ahizo ngala; vaihawmna ah na kiang uah a tel a tel zel ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA lau unla, pilvang takin hih un; TOUPA I Pathian uah gitlouhna leh khentuam neihna leh golh neknate a om kei ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Jehosaphatin Jerusalem ah TOUPA vaihawm ding leh thubuaite lemmi dingin Levite, siampute, Israel inko intekte a koih behlap hi.
Huan, TOUPA laudan siam kawm in muanhuai takin, lungsim diktak puin na hih ding uh ahi.
Koilai khua a mi inleng thubuai ahong gen ua, tualthah thu ah te, dan leh thupiak thu ah te, thu seh leh vaihawm thu ah te, a hong kilan uleh, TOUPA tungah thil a hikhelh louhna ding un amau pilvang in na hilh ding ua, nou leh na unaute uh tungah hehna a hongtung kha zenhouh ding hi; huchibangin hih le uchin, mohsak in na om kei ding uhi.Huan, Ngai dih ua, TOUPA lam thu tengteng siampu lalpen Amaria bel na heutu uh ahia; huan, kumpipa lam thu tengtengah Judate inko tunga vaihawmmi Ismael tapa Zebadia ahi: Levite leng na heutute uh ahi sam ding uh.
Hangtakin hih unla, mi hoihte kiangah TOUPA om hen, a chi a
Huan, Ngai dih ua, TOUPA lam thu tengteng siampu lalpen Amaria bel na heutu uh ahia; huan, kumpipa lam thu tengtengah Judate inko tunga vaihawmmi Ismael tapa Zebadia ahi: Levite leng na heutute uh ahi sam ding uh.
Hangtakin hih unla, mi hoihte kiangah TOUPA om hen, a chi a
Huan, hiai nung in hichi ahi a, Moab suante leh Amon suante bel Me-uninte khenkhat toh Jehosaphat sual dingin ahong kuan ua
Huchiin kuate hiamin Jehosaphat kiangah, Nang sual dingin mipi thupi mahmah, tuipi gal Suria akipan ahong kuan ek mai ua; ngaiin, Hazazon-tamar ah a omta uh, (huai bel Engedi leng a chi sam sek ua) chiin a gen ua.
Huan, Jehosaphat a laua, TOUPA zong dingin a kipiaa; Juda gam tengteng ah anngawl ding thu a thangsak hi.
Huchiin Judate bel TOUPA panpihna zong in a kikaikhawm ua; Juda kho chih akipan TOUPA zong dingin ahong pot khia uh
Huan, Jehosaphat TOUPA in ah, intual thak chinah Judate leh Jerusalemte kikaikhawm lakah a ding a;
Aw TOUPA ka pi leh pute uh Pathian, vana Pathian, vana Pathian na hi ka hia? nam chih tunga vaihawmpa na hi ka hia? na khutah thilhihtheih na leh hatna a oma, kuamah zoh vual na hikei a.
Awka Pathian uh, hiai gam a teng te a mi Israelte na delhkhiak sak a, na lawm Abraham suante khantawn adia na piak ahi kei maw?
Huan, hiai gamah ahong om ta ua, na min adin mun siangthou a honlam sak ua,
Ka tunguah thil hoihlou, namsaua vaihawmnate hiam, hi te hiam, kial te hiam a hong tun leh hiai in chin ah leh na maah ka hongding diing ua (hiai in ah lah na min a om ngal a) ka mangbat na uah nang kon sam ding ua, nang nonna ngaihkhiak sak in non hondam ding, chiin
Huchiin, ngaiin, Amon suante leh Moabte leh Seir tanga mi, Israelte, Aigupta gam akipan a hongpai khiak lai un, amau a sim uh na phal kei a, amau akipan a kihei mang jaw ua, amau ahih mang kei uh;
Ngaiin, kaluah ding uana honpiak gam akipan hondelh khe dingin ahon kuan uh
Aw ka Pathian uh, a tung ua vaihawm lou ding na hi maw?
Mi hu zahzah honsual ding a hong kuante lah nana sual thei dingdan mahmah kahi ngal kei ua; a lohna dan mahmah leng ka theikei uhi, nanglam ka hongnga zo tamai uhi, a chi a
Huan, Judate tengteng, a nau neu chikchik uh, a jite uh a tate utoh TOUPA maah a ding uhi.
Huchiin mipi lakah Jahaziel tungah TOUPA kha a hongtung a, huai mi bel Zekaria tapa ahi a, huai mi bel Benai tapa ahi a, huai mi bel Jeiel tapa ahi a, huai mi bel Asap suan Levi mi Matani tapa ahi a:
Huan, aman, Nou Juda gam a mi tengteng leh Jerusalem a om tengteng leh nang Jehosaphat, na nangaikhia un: TOUPAN na kiang uah hichiin a chi, Lau kei unla, huai mipi thupi mahmah te jiakin inleng lung lel sam kei un; kidouna noute kidouna ahi keia, Pathian kidouna ahi zo ngal a.
Jingchiangin vasual un; ngai dih ua, Ziz zot touhna ah a hong tou ua, Jeruel gamdai chin guam tawp lamah na va mu ding uh.
Hiai kidouna na sual uh a kiphamoh kei ding: kiphalh unla, adinin ding mai unla, nou lama pang TOUPA hotdamna tak en gige mai un, aw Juda mite leh Jerusalem mite aw: lau kei unla, lunglel sam kei un, jingchian in sual dingin kuan un, TOUPA lah nou lam ah apang ngala, a chi a.
Huchiin Jehosaphat bel a maia lei siin a kuna; huan, Juda mite tengteng leh Jerusalem mite tengteng TOUPA chibai bukin TOUPA maah a kun uhi.
Huan Kohat suan leh Kora suan Levite aw ngaih taka TOUPA Israelte Pathian phat dingin a hong ding ua
Huan, jingsangin jingkhangin a thou ua, Tekoa gamdai ah a lut ua; huan, a pai lai un Jehosaphat a dinga, Aw, Juda mite leh Jerusalem mite aw, ka thu ngaikhia un; TOUPA na Pathian uh ging unla, kip takin na ding diing uh; a jawlneite ging unla, lamzang takin na om ding uhi, a chi a.
Huan, mipite a hasot khit in sepaihte maa pai kawma TOUPA pahtawina leh a siangthou kilawm dan phat dinga lasami dingte a sep a: TOUPA kiangah kipahthu gen un, a chitna lah khantawnin a om sin ngala, chi un, a chi a.
Huan, la asak ua a phat tak un Amon suante, Moab suante, tanga mite Judate sual dinga hong kuante guktan ding mite TOUPAN a koih a; vuallelta uh.
Amon suante leh Moab suanten Seir tanga omte thah chimih vek leh hihman sipsip tumin a sualta mai ua; huan, Seir tang a mite a hih man khit un amau leh amau kihihman tumin a kisual ek mai jen ua.
Huan, Judaten gamdai etna mun sang a vatun uleh mipi lam a en ua; huan, ngai dih, misi luang lei ah apuk zengzung maia, khat lel leng a suakta a omkei uh.
Huchiin Jehosaphat leh a heutu gallak sum la dingin a va hoh ua, a lak uah sum leh pai te, puansilhte, suangmantam te a va mu ek mai ua, a puak zoh louh khop un a la ua, a tam petmaha, nithum tak gallak sum a sek uhi.
Huan, a ni li ni in Beraka guam ah a kikhawm ua, huailaiah TOUPA a pahtawi ua; huaijiakin tutan in huailai mun min dingin Beraka guam a chi ta uh.
Huchiin Juda mi leh Jerusalem mi tengteng apai nawn ua huan, Jehosaphatin Jerusalema nuam satak a pai dingin a ma uh a kai a; TOUPAN a melmate uh tung thua nuamsa taka a om sak jiakin.
Huchiin pekgingte, kaihgingte, pengkulte toh Jerusalem a TOUPA in a tung tout a uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Israelte melma a sual chih m chiha miten Pathian a lau ta uh.
Huchiin Jehosaphat gam bel galmuangin a omta a; a pathian a kimvel a mite laka galmuanna a piak jiakin.
Huchiin Jehosaphat bel Judate tungah a lal taa; kum sawmthum leh kum ngaa upa ahih in a lal pana; huan Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh kum nga a lal a; a nu min Azuba, Silhi tanu ahi.
TOUPA mit muha thilhoih hihin apa Asa lampi pialsan hetlou in a jui a;
Himahleh mun sangte paihmang ahikei a, mipiten leng api leh pute uh Pathian tungah a lungtang uh a nga tuan sam kei uh.
Huan, ngai dih ua, Jehosaphat thil hih tengteng a bul akipan a a tawp phain Hanani tapa Jehu tanchin gelhna ah atuang a, huai Israel kumpipate tanchin buah a tuang hi.
Huan, huai nungin Juda kumpipa jehosaphatin Israel kumpipa Ahazia a kithutuahpiha; huai min hoih lou takin thil a hih sek hi:
Huan, Tarsis lama pai ding long a bawl khawm ua, Ezion-geber ah longte a bawl uhi.Huchiin, Maresa mi Dodavahu tapa Eliezerin Jehosaphatin kiangah, Ahazia na thutuahpih jiak in TOUPAN na thilhih tup a honhihsiat sakta ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin longte a hihse vek ua, Tarsis ah a hoh theita kei kei uhi.
Huchiin, Maresa mi Dodavahu tapa Eliezerin Jehosaphatin kiangah, Ahazia na thutuahpih jiak in TOUPAN na thilhih tup a honhihsiat sakta ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin longte a hihse vek ua, Tarsis ah a hoh theita kei kei uhi.
Huan, Jehosaphat a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmua, a pute lakah a pu David khopi ah a vui uh; huan a tapa Jehoram a sikin a lalta hi.
Huan, aman unau, Jehosaphat tapate a neia, Azaria te, Jehiel te, Zekaria te, Azaria te, Mikael te, Sephatia tea hi uh.
Hiai tengteng Israel kumpipa Jehosaphat tapate vek ahi uh.
Huan, a pa un thil thupi taktak a piaa, dangkasik te, dangkaeng te, thil namtam pite, Juda gama kulh nei khuate toh; himahleh gamte pen Jehoram a piaa, a ta upapen a hih jiakin.
Huchiin, Jehoramin a pa gam a luahin a hongkihih hattaa, a unaute tengteng namsauin a hihlum veka, Israelte laka intek tampi toh.
Jehoram bel kum sawmthum leh kum niha upa a hihin a lal pana: Jerusalem lem ah kum giat a lal.
Ahab inkote hih bangin Israel kumpipate lampi a jui sam hi: Ahab tanu jiin a nei hi: huchiin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou tak a hih seka.
Himahleh, TOUPAN David inkote a hihmang nuam keia, David kianga thukhun jiak leh amah leh a suante tana khawnvak neihsak thak kana chiam khit jiakin.
Amah damlaiin Edomte Judate laka kipan a hel ua, kumpipa a kibawl tawm ua.
Huchiin Jehoram a sepaih heutute leh a kangtalai tengteng toh a vakuan khia a, janin a vakuana, amau leh kangtalai tunga heutute ummi Edomte a vasual hi.
Huchiin Edomte tu tanin Judate laka kipan a hel lailai uhi; huan, huai lai mahin Libna khua leng a laka kipan a hel teia: TOUPA, a pi leh pute uh pathian a lehngatsan jiakin.
Huan, Juda gam teng ah te munsang a bawla, Jerusalem mite a angkawmsaka, Judate a pi mang hi.
Huan, jawlnei Elija akipanin as kiangah lai a hongtunga TOUPA, na pu David Pathianin hichiin a chi, na pa Jehosaphat lempite na tawn keia, Judate kumpipa Asa lempite leng na jui sam keia,
Israel kumpipate lampi na jui jawa, Judate leh Jerusalema omte Ahab inkuan bangin ang na kawmsaka, na unau, napa inkuante nang sanga hoihjaw na thah lai jiakin.
Ngadih, TOUPAN na mite, na tate, na jite, na gante hipiin a gawt dinga;
Huan, gil natna thupi mahmah na nei dinga, ni tengin natna jiaka na gil a kiakkiaka, a kiak khit vek tanin, chiin.
Huchiin, Ethiopia mite kiang khawnga mi philistiate leh Arabia te lungsim Jehoram sual dingin TOUPAN a tokthou:
Huchiin, Judate bel a vasual ua, a gam uah a lut ua, kumpipa ina thil tengteng a la vek ua, a tapate, a jite uh leng; hichiin a tapa naupangpen Jehoahaz kia loungal a pa leng a nutsiat sak kei uhi.
Huan, huainungin TOUPAN hihdam theilouh gil natnain a gawta.
Huan, hichi ahia, a kum nihna a hongbeiin a natna jiakin a gil a kiakia taa, natna mulkimhuai takin a hongsita hi.
A miten a pa meipi a seh sak bang un a seh sak tei kei uhi.A lal tungin kum sawnthum leh kum nih ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum giat a lala, kuamah it louhin a sia, David khopiah a vui ua, kumpipate hanah bel ahi kei hi.
A lal tungin kum sawnthum leh kum nih ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum giat a lala, kuamah it louhin a sia, David khopiah a vui ua, kumpipate hanah bel ahi kei hi.
Hichiin Jerusalem miten a tapa naupang pen Ahazia a sikin kumpipa dingin a bawl ua; a ta upate tengteng lah sepaih hon, Araba mite toh a pan mun ua hongpai miten athat khin vek ngal ua.
Hichiin Juda kumpipa Jehoram tapa Ahazia a lalta hi.
Ahazia, bel a lal pattungin kum sawmli leh kum niha upa ahia, Jerusalem ah kum khat a lala, a nu min Athalia, Omri tanu ahi a.
Aman leng Ahab inkote lampi tot a tawn sama; a nu bel thil gilou taka mapinu ahi hi.
Ahab inkote hih bangmahin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou a hiha, a pa sih nungin a siatna dinga mipite ahi.
Amah leng a makaih un a oma, Ramoth-gilead ah suria kumpipa Hazel dou dingin Israel kumpipa Ahab tapa Jehoram kiangah a hoh a, huchiin Suriaten jehoram a nasuliam uhi.
Suria kumpipa Hazael a vasualnaa Ramaa a nasukliam uh hihdam dingin Jezreel ah a hoh a, Hichiin Juda kumpipa jehoram tapa Azaria bel Ahab tapa Jehoram a dam louh jiakin a veh dingin Jezreel ah a kuan hi.
Huchiin Ahazia jehoram kiangah a hoha, a manthatna pathian hih ahi a; Nimsi tapa jehu sual dingin Jehoram kianga ahoh jiakin.
Huai mi bel Ahab inkote hihmamg dinga TOUPA seh ahi ngala.
Huan, hichi ahia, Ahab inkote hihse dinga a sual laiin Judate intekte leh Ahazia unau tapaten Ahazia na a sep lai uh a mua, a thak vek a,
Ahazia a zong ua, a man ua, (Samari ah a bu a hi) Jehu kiangah a honpi ua, a that ua; huan, a lungtang tengtenga TOUPA zong sek Jehosaphat tapa ahi ngala, a chi ua, a vuiin a vui thoh uhi.
Huchiin Ahazia inkoten a gam uah thuneihna a neita kei uh.
Huan, Ahazia nu Athaliain a tapa asi chih a najakin a thou a, Juda kumpipa tengteng a that vek mawka.
Ahazia tapa Joas bel kumpipa tanu Jehosabeathin kumpipa tapa a thahte uh lak akipan a pi manga, donmi toh lupna dantan ah a selgu geih a.
Huchiin kumpipa Jehoram tanu Jehosabeath, siampu Jehoiadajiin (Ahazia sanggamnu ahi a) Athalia muh theih louh dingin a selgua, huchiin a that ta kei uh.Huan, a kiang ua tengin pathian inah kum guk a gukin a oma; huchiin Athalia a gam uah a lalta hi.

Himahleh, siampute leh nasemmi Levite kia ngallou kuamah TOUPA in ah lut kei un, amau bel a siangthou jiak un a lut ding ua, mipi tengteng bel TOUPA hungaiha a om ding uh ahi.

Huan, siampu jehoiada in sepaih za heutute TOUPA ina om kumpipa David tei leh lum neu leh lum liante a piaa.
Huan, mite galvan tawi chiatin intaklam sang a a kipanin vei lamsang tanin maitam leh in umin kumpipa a umsaka.

Huan, Athaliain mipi kumpipa pahtawia a kiphu motmot husa uh a jakin TOUPA in ah mipi lakah a vahoha;

Huan, hichi a honghi a, a gam a hongdin kip a len a pa that a sikha a thata.

Huan, Israel gama mi, mi hat hangsan nuai khat dangka talent jain a guai lai hi.

Hoh hile chin leng, hang takin kidouna ah gamtang in: huchilouinjaw Pathianin melma maah nang a honvuallel sak mai ding: Pathianin lah panpih theihna leh vuallelhsak theihna anei ngala, a hongchi a.

Huan, hichi ahi a, Amazia Edomte thata a hongpaiin Seir suante pathiante a honpuaa, a pathian dingin a pangsaka, chibai a buk a, gimlimte a halsak chiat hi.
Huaijiakin Amazia tungah TOUPA hehna a kuangtaa, a kiangah jawlnei a sawl a, huai miin a kiangah, Na khuta kipana a mite honkhe thei sam lou nam pathiante bangding mahmaha zong na hia? a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a kianga thu a gen laiin kumpipan, kumpipa vaihawmpa dingin nang kon bawl ua hia? dai main: bang dinga na hinna tan ding nahia? a chi a.
Huchiin jawlneiin, Pathianin hichibanga nahih jiak leh ka phatsak nangaihsan louh jiakin nang hihmang lungsimin a nei chih ka thei hi, a chi a, a daita hi.
Huchiin, Juda kumpipa Amaziain a phatsak a poma, Israel kumpipa Jehu tapa Jehoahaz ta joas kiangah, Hong dih, kima tuahin a kien ding, chiin mi a sawla.
Huan, Israel kumpipa Joasin Juda kumpipa Amazia kiangah, Lebanon tanga sidar sing kiangah, Na tanu ka tapa ji dingin nei sak dih, chiin a thukhaka; huan, Lebanon tanga gamsa a hongpaia, ling a hongchil puk gawp mai hi.
Nang ngai dih, Edom ka zou, na chi nguta, na lungsimin na kisa theia, na in ah om kinken ma in; nang leh Juda gam nangawna siatna, nang adia poi ding thil bangdia tok khe sin na hia?
Chiin mi a sawl sam a.
Himahleh, Amaziain a ngaikhe nuam keia; Edomte Pathiante azon jiaka, Juda gam a melmate uh khuta a piak theihna dinga Pathian hih ahi.

Huan, Judate tan Israelte sangin a hongse jawa; mi chih amau inlam chiat ah a paita uhi.

Huan, TOUPA ina leh kumpipa ina goukoih khawmnaa dangkaeng leh dangka leh tuiumbelsuan tengteng a omom a laa, hena kawltang dingte toh, huan, Samari kho lamah a pai nawnta hi.
Huan, Juda kumpipa Joas tapa Amazia bel Israelte kumpipa Jehoahaz tapa Joas sih nungin kum sawm leh kum nga a dam lai hi.

Pathian kilakna thei siam Zekaria dam sungin Pathian zongdingin a kibawl chintena: Pathian a zon sung tengin Pathianin a lamzang sak jel hi.
Philistiate sim dingin a kuan khiaa, Gat kulhte, Jabne kulhte, Asdod kulhte a hihchima; huan Asdod gamah leh philistiate lakah te khua a bawl hi.
Huan, Pathianin Philistiate lakah leh Gur-baala om Arabiate leh Meunimte lakahte a panpih a.
Huan, Amonten Uzia lakah siah a liau sek ua; huchiin Aigupta gam tanin a minthanna a nadalhtaa; a honghat mahmah jiakin.
Huan, Uziain Jerusalem an ning kongpi ah te, guam kongpi ah te, kulh kawina lai kongpi ah te in sang a lam laia, kulhin a um hi.
Huan, gamdai ah leng in sang a lama, gam tampi a neih jiakin tui te a let khe teptup maimaha, phailam leh phaijang te ah leng; huan, lou nei mite leh uain suk mite tang lamah leh gam hoih ahte a neia, louma lam limsak mi tak ahi.
Huan, Uziain sepaih kidou mi kumpipa sepaih heutu Heutu Hanani nuaia mi laigelhmi Jeiel leh heutu Maasei ten a seh bang jel ua apawlpawl a galkap mi a nei lai hi.
Mi hat hangsan chiat, a inkuan upate tengteng sangnih leh zaguk ahi uhi.
Huan, a nuai uah sepaih sin siamsa ngen nuaithum leh sang nih leh za nga melma laka kumpipa panpihmi gal sualmi taktak a om uhi.
Huan, Uziain sepaih tengteng a dingin lum te, tei te, sik lukhu te, sik puannak te, thal peu te, vaisuanglot a dingin suangte a kisakhola.
Huan, Jerusalem ah in sang leh kulh ning chiha koiha thal nanakapna leh suang lian kuamkuam a nanadenna ding, mi pilte theih khiak khawlte a bawla; amin gam chih mual chihah a thangtaa; a honghat mahmah tanin alama lamdanga panpihin a om hi.
Himahleh a honghat nungin a lungsim a hongsana, hoih lou hialin thil a hiha, TOUPA a Pathian tungah thil a hihkhialtaa; gimlim maitama gimlim hal dingin TOUPA biakin ah a lut maimah hi.
Huan, siampu Azariain a juia, mi hang taktak TOUPA siampu sawmgiat a tel tei ua;
Huan, kumpipa Uzia a kham ua a kiangah, Uria aw, TOUPA dinga gimlim hal na hih ding ahi kei hi, gimlim hal dinga hihtuam Aron tapa siampute hih ding ahi jaw hi; mun siangthou akipan pawt khiain; thil na hihkhial ahi hi; TOUPA pathian laka na thupina ding leng ahi tuan kei hi, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Uzia a hehtaa; gimlim halna ding mei lakna a tawia, huan, huchia siampute tunga a heh lai takin TOUPA in ah, gimlim halna chin ah siampute maah a a talah a hongphak kheta hi.
Huan, siampu heutu Azaria leh siampu tengtengin a en ua, ngaiin, a talah a hongphaka, huai akipanin a vik khe pah ua, ahi, TOUPAN a gawt jiakin amah leng kintak mahin a pawtkhe tahi.
Huchiin kumpipa Uzia bel a sih ni tanin a phaktaa, a phak jiakin a in tuamah a omtaa: TOUPA in akipan hihkhiakin a om taa, huchiin a tapa Jotham bel a gam ua mite vaihawmin kumpipa ina ukpa dingin a omta hi.
Huchiin, Uzia thilhih dang tengteng bel a bul akipana a tawp phain Amoz tapa jawlnei Isaiin a gelh hi.Huchiin, Uzia bel a pi leh a pute kiangah a ihmu a, kumpipa a kivuina muna a pi leh a pute lakah a vui uh.

Huchiin, Uzia bel a pi leh a pute kiangah a ihmu a, kumpipa a kivuina muna a pi leh a pute lakah a vui uh.
Amah jaw phak ahi ngala, a chi ua: huan, a tapa jotham a sikin a lalta hi.

Huan, mun sang ah te, tang ah te, singhing nuaiah te a kithoiha, gimlimte a hal sek hi.
Huaijiakin, TOUPA a pathian in Suria kumpipa khutah a piaa; a sual ua, a mite tampi slah a pih uh, Damaska ah a paipih uhi.
Huan, Israel kumpipa khuta piak ahi laia, aman tampi a that ahi.

Huan, Ephraim mi hat Zikriin kumpipa tapa maasei leh in sung upa Azrikam leh Elkan, kumpipa zom a thata.
Huan, Israel suanten a unaute uh nuainih, numei te, a tapa te uh, a tanu te uh salah a pi ua; gallak tam tak a laksak lai uh, gallak pen samari ah a tun uh.
Himahleh hualaiah TOUPA jawlnei a na oma, a min Obed ahi,; Samari-a hong paiding sepaihte a vaidawna, a kiang uah, ngai dih uh, TOUPA na pi leh pute uh Pathian Judate tungah a heh a, na khut ua honpia ei ve, heha na thahna un van a sun touta hi.
Huan, Juda leh Jerusalem mite sikhanu leh sikhapa bawl na tum ua: himahleh noute ngeiin leng TOUPA na pathian uh tungah na hihkhial tei uh ahi kei maw?
Huaijiakin, ka thu pom unla, na unaute uh sala na mat salte uh paisak nawn un; TOUPA hehna thupi tak main a tunguah a om hi. achi a.
Huchiin Ephraimte heutu khenkhat, Johanan tapa Azaria te, Mosillemoth tapa Berekia te, salum tapa Jehizkia te, Hadlai tapa Amasa ten kidouna akipana hongpaite a na khelh ua, a kiang uah.

Huchiin sepaihten milliante leh mipi maah salte leh gallak sumte a nusia uh.
Huan, a min uh loh louhte a hong thou ua, salte a pi ua, gallak thilin vuaktanga om teng puansilh a guan ua, a van ua, khedapte a bun sak ua, nek ding leh dawn ding a pia ua, thau te a nilh ua, a hatloute tengteng sabengtung ah a tuang sak ua, tumsing khua, Jerikoa a unaute uh kiangah a pai sakta ua: huan, amau Samari ah a kik nawnta uh.
Huai lain kumpipa Ahazia Suria kumpipat e panpih dia chial dingin mi a sawla;

Aman a lal pat kum kha khatnaah TOUPA in kongkhak te a honga, a jem hoiha.
Siampute leh Levite a pi luta, suahlam sang mun za laiah a pi khawmna, a kiang uah,
Nou Levite aw, ka thu ngaikhia un; noute kihihsiangthou phot unla, huan, TOUPA, na pi leh pute uh Pathian in hihsiangthou unla, mun siangthou akipan ninte pai khia un
I pi leh pute un thil a nahihkhialta ua, TOUPA Pathian mitmuhin thil hoihlou a nahih ua, a nalehngatsan ua, TOUPA omna a lehngatsan ua, ananung ngat ta uh.
Inlim kongkhakte a khak ua, khawnvakte a hihmit ua, Israelte Pathian mun siangthou ah gimlimte a hal kei ua, halmang thillatte leng a lan kei uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPA hehna Judate leh Jerasalem te tungah a oma, na mit ua na muh bang un, gam chih mual chiha sepsep ding leh lamdang sak ding leh nuihzat dingin a nabawlta ahi.
Ngai dih ua, i pi leh pute uh namsaua vuallelh sakin a naom ua, i tanu leh I tapate uh, I jite uh, huaijiakin salah a naom uh.
Ngai dih ua, a hehna mahmah a then theihna dingin TOUPA Israelte Pathian kiangah thukhun ka tum hi.
Ka naute aw don louin om kei un, TOUPA na sem nahi ua, a maa a nasema om ding leh gimlim halmi dingin nou a hontelta ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin Levi mi Amasai tapa Mahat te, Kohat mi Azaria tapa Joel te; Merari tapate laka Abdi tapa Kis te, Jehallelel tapa Azaria te, Gerson mi Zim tapa Jo ate, Joa tapa Eden te,

Heman tapate laka mi Jeheul leh Simei te; Jeduthun tapate laka mi Semai leh Uziel te a kuan khia uh.
A unaute uh a sam khawm ua, a kihihsiangthou ua, TOUPA thua kumpipa thupiak banga TOUPA in hihsiang dingin a lut ua.
Huan, siampute a hihsiang dingin TOUPA in sung gill amah a lut ua, TOUPA biakina thil nin a muh tengteng uh TOUPA in kongah a la khia uh.
Kha khatna ni khat niin a pan ua, huai kha ni giat niin TOUPA inlim a tung ua; huchiin ni giatin TOUPA in a hihsiangthou ua; kha khatna, ni sawm leh ni guk niin a zou vek uh.
Huchiin kumpipa Hezekia kiangah kumpipa in ah a lut ua, TOUPA in ka hihsiang vekta ua, halmang thillat latna maitam te, huaia tuiumbelsuan tengteng te, tanghou siahna dohkan te, huaia vanzat tengtengte leng.
Huan, kumpipa Ahazin a lal laia thil a hihkhelha, a paihmang tuiumbelsuan tengtengte leng la bawlzou vek ua, ka hihsiangthou lai ua; huan, ngai dih, TOUPA maitam ma lamah a om hi, a chi ua.

Huan, Aron tapa siampute TOUPA maitama lan dingin thu a pia hi.
Huchiin bawngtalte a gou ua; siamputen sisan a la ua, maitam a theh ua: huan, belamtalte a gou ua, a sisanin maitam a theh uh; huan, belam noute leng a gou ua, a sisanin maitam a theh uh.
Huan, keltalte khelh thoihna dingin kumpipa leh mipite kiangah a honkai nai ua, a tunguah a khut uh a nga ua;
Huan siamputen agou ua, Israel mi tengteng adinga lemna bawlna dingin a sisan un maitam ah khelh thoihna a lan ua: Israel mi tengteng adingin.

Huan, Levite bel David bawl thil tum ging chi toh a ding ua, siampute pengkul toh.
Huan, Hezekiain maitama halmang thillat lan dingin thu a piaa.
Huan, halmang thillat a honlat pat uleh TOUPA la pengkul leh Israel kumpipa David bawl thil tum ging toh a honsa pan lai uhi.
Huan, mipiten Pathian chibai a buk ua, la siamten la a sa ua, pengkul mutmiten a mut ua, halmang thillat lat khit masiah huchibangin a hih nilouh uh.
Huan, thillat a lat khit un kumpipa leh a kianga om teite tengtengin kunin Pathian chibai a buk uh.
Huan, kumpipa Hezekia leh milianten Levite bel David leh jawlnei Asaph phuah phatna lasa dingin thu a pia a.
Huan, nuamsa takin phatna la a sa ua, a kun ua, Pathian chibai a buk uh.
Huchiin Hezekiain, TOUPA adingin na kihihsiangthou ta ua, hongnai unla, TOUPA in ah kithoihna leh kipahthu genna thillat honglan dih ua leh, a chi a.

Thillat tengteng bawngtal zaguk, belamtal sang thum ahi.
Ahihhangin siampu a tawm lua ua, halmang thillat pen a sem seng kei ua; huaijiakin a unaute Leviten a kimansak ma un siampute a kihihsiangthou tanin a huh ua: (Levite siampute sangin kihihsiangthou thuah a ngentel zo ngal ua).
Huan, halmang thillatte a tam tela, halmang thillat chih adinga lemna thillat thau te, dawn ding thillat adia te leng a tam mahmah sam hi.
Huchiin TOUPA in nasep dan hoih takin a hih uh.Mipite adia Pathianin a bawl thil jiakin Hezekia leh mi tengteng a kipak mahmah ua; up louh pia thil hongom guih a hibehlap ngal a.

Kumpipa leh a miliante leh Jerusalema mipi tengtengin kha nihna ah, paikan ankuang neih a sawm uh.
Huai laiin a lui thei nai kei ua, siampu kihihsiangthoute a tam hun nai kei ua, Jerusalema mipi a kikaihkhop nai louh jiak un.
A thil sawm uh kumpipa leh mipite ngaihin a dika.
Huchiiin Israel gam tengteng, Beerseba akipana Dan phanin TOUPA Israelte Pathian adin paikan ankuang nei dinga Jerusalema hongpai dinga phuan dingin thu a hihkipta hi: a dan bang takin huchibanga tamin a hihngei nai kei uhi.
Huchiin lai taipihmite kumpipa leh a miliante uh lai tawiin, Israel leh Juda gam tengtenga pai dingin kumpipa thupiak bangin a pawt ua, Nou Israel suante aw, Suria kumpipate khut akipan pawta a damlai sunte lam a hongngat nawn theihna dingin TOUPA, Abraham te, Isaak te, Israel te Pathian lam hongnga nawn un.
Nou jaw na pi leh pute uh leh na unaute uh, TOUPA a pi leh pute uh Pathian tunga thil hihkhiala om, segawp dinga a donsaklouh na muhte uh bangin om tei kei un.
Na pi leh pute uh bangin genhak tei nawn kei unla, TOUPA kiangah kitulut jaw unla, khantawn adia a hihsiangthou, a mun siangthou ah honglut unla, TOUPA na Pathian uh na sem un, huchiin a hehna thupi tak na lak ua kipan a kiheimang sak ding hi.
TOUPA lam na hongngat nawn uleh na unaute uh leh na tate uh sala manmiten a hehpih ding ua, hiai gamah a hongpai nawn ding uhi: TOUPA na Pathian uh lah chingthei tak leh zahngai thei tak ahi ngala, amah lam na hong ngat peuhmah uleh a honnuse kei ding hi, chiin.

Huan, Pathian mi Mosi dan bang takin amau mun chiat ah a ding ua; huan, siamputen Levite akipana a tan uh sisan a theh uh.

Huan, Hezekiain siam tak maiin TOUPA kilawm tak phat Levite a nalungmuan hi.

Huan, Israel suante tengteng a gam uah amau khua lam chiatah a pai nawn uh.

Huan, TOUPA DANa tuang bangbangin jingsang lam leh nitak lam halmang thillat ding te, khawlni leh kha thak leh hunbi nei ankuang ading te kumpipa tantuan ading gan a sep lai hi.
Huan Jerusalema mipite TOUPA dana a kihihhatna ding un siampute leh Levite tantuan pe dingin thu a pe lai a.
Huan, thupiak a dalhjak takin Israel suanten a buh te, uain te, thau te, khuaiju te, a lou ua thil suak masapente a hongpe ek ua; huan, a bangkim uh sawma khat leng a hongpe ek uhi.
Huan, Israel suante leh Juda suante, Juda khuatea omten a bawng u leh belam uh sawma khat te, TOUPA a Pathian uh tantuam dia a piaksawn uh sawma khat te a honpia ua, a koih khawm ekok phet uhi.

Huan, Zadok mi siampu heutu Azariain a dawnga, Miten TOUPA ina thilpiak a hontawi tung ua kipanin I ne ne jel ua, I deihkhop ua, a om ekok lai hi; TOUPAN mite vual a jawl jela, hiaia om ekok laiteng I khamval uh ei ve, a chi a.
Huchiin Hezekiain TOUPA inah dantante bawl dingin thu a piaa; huchiin a bawlta uh.
Huan, thilpiakte sawma khat te, Pathian tuamte muanhuai takin a nawn lut ua: huan, a heutu uh Levi mi Konani ahi a, a unau Simei bel a om ahi.
Huan, Konani leh a unau Simei nuaiah kumpipa Hezekia leh Pathian ina heutu Azaria sehin endikmi Jehieal te, Azazi te, Nahath te, Asabel te, Jerimoth te, Jozabad te, Eliel te, Ismaki te, Mahath te, Benai te a om uhi.
Huan, Levi mi Imna tapa Kore, suahlam kongkhak ngakmi Pathian kianga lungsim ut thua thilpiak kempa leh TOUPA adia thilpiak kempa leh TOUPA adia thilpiak leh thil siangthou hawmpa ahi a.
Huan, a nuaiah Eden te, Miniamin te, Jesua te, Semai te, Amaria te, Sekani te, siampu khuaah nasep hunbi chiatah a unaute uh apawlpawla alian aneute kianga semmi a om ua:
Khangthua sut pasal kum thum chiang tunglam, ni tenga TOUPA ina nasep kul nei a pawl dandan bang ua hoh sekte sim louin.
Huan, a inkuan uh pipute gelhnaa siampua seh te leh Levi mi kum sawmnih chiang tunglam a pawl dan bang jel ua nasemmi dia sehte;
Huan, pipute gelhnaa tuang a ta neute tengteng uh, a ji te uh, a tapa te uh, a inkuan tengteng uh; a sep bi ua siangthou taka a kihihsiangthou jiak un.
Huan, Aron suan, kho chih kho puaa om siampute leh Levite suante gelhnaa tuang peuhmahte tantuan pe ding mi sehtuam a om uh.
Huan, huchibangin Juda gam tengtengah Hezekiain a hih a.
TOUPA a Pathian mitmuhin hoih leh dik leh muanhuai thil a hih seka.Pathian ina nasep lam thuah te, dan lam thuah te, thupiak lam thuah te, a Pathian zon thu ahte a hih peuhmah ah a lungsim tengtengin ahiha, a lamzang tou jel hi.
Pathian ina nasep lam thuah te, dan lam thuah te, thupiak lam thuah te, a Pathian zon thu ahte a hih peuhmah ah a lungsim tengtengin ahiha, a lamzang tou jel hi.
Huchibanga muanhuai taka thil a hih nung un Assurai kumpipa Senakerib a hongkuana, Juda gamah a hongluta, kulh nei khuate a honguma, lak a hongtum hi.
Huan, Senakerib a hongkuana, Jerusalem hongsual a tum chih Hezekiain a theihin
Kho po lama tuite hihtat dingin a miliante leh a mi hatte a thuhilha; huchiin a panpih ua.
Huchiin mi tampi a kikaikhawm ua, tui tengteng leh gamsunga luang suak luite a ching tan ua, Assuria kumpipate ahonglut ua, tui tampi bang dingin a hongnei mahmah ding ua, a chi uh.
Huchiin a kihang sak ua, kulh chipna tata a bawla, in sungte a lam hoiha, po lam kulhte leng.
Huan David khuaah Milo a hihkipa, galvante leh lumte tampi a bawl a.
Huan, kidounaa mipi heutute a bawla, khopi kongkhak mun za laiah a sam khawma,
Hat takin, hangsan takin om unla, Assuria kumpipa leh a heute mipi lau kei unla, lunglel sam kei un:
Amah lama pang sa sepaih ahi ua, ei honpanpih ding leh hon dou sak dinga ei lam pang bel TOUPA I Pathian uh ahi ngala, chiin lungmuanna thu a gena.
Huai nungin Assuria kumpipa Senakeribin (amah leh a sepaihte Lakis ah a om ua) Juda kumpipa Hezekia leh Jerusalema Juda mi tengteng kiangah,
Assuria kumpipa Senakeribin hichiiin a chi, Jerusalem lak bang ahia na up louhna uh?
Hezekiain, TOUPA i Pathianin Assuria kumpipa khut akipan honhunke ding, chiin gilkial leh dangtaka na sih maina ding un a honkhem ahi kei maw?
Hezekia mah ahi kei maw, a mun sangte leh a maitamte chimsaka Juda mi leh Jerusalema mite kianga, Maitam khatah Pathian na be ding ua, gimlim na hal ding uh, chia thu pepa?
Kei leh ka puten gam chih nam chih tunga ka thil hih uh na theikei ua hia?
Kua nam pathian ahia ka puten a hih man uh ka khut akipana a mite uh hunkhe thei oma, nou Pathianin leng ka khuta kipana a honhutkhiak theih tuamna ding?
Huaijiakin Hezekiain honkhem kei henla, huchibangin honkhem kei henla, amah um kei un; bang nam pathian leh bang gam pathian himhim a mite uh ka khuta kipan leh ka pute khuta kipan hunkhe thei a om kei ua; bangchiin na Pathian un ka khuta kipan a honhunkhe thei tuam mahmah dia? chiin Jerusalem ah a mite a sawl hi.
Huan, a miten huai sanga thupiin TOUPA Pathian leh a sikha Hezekia tungtang thu a hoihloulamin a gen uh.
Huan, Israelte TOUPA Pathian suk hehna lamsang leh a gense lam sangin lai a gelh nalaia, Gam chih, nam chih pathianten ka khuta kipan a mite uh a hunkhe theilou bangmahin Hezekia Pathian in leng ka khuta kipan a mite a hunkhe kei hial ding, chiin.
Huan, khua a lak theihna ding un a mulkimsakna ding leh lungjinsakna dingin Jerusalema kulha omte Juda pauin ngaihtakin a kikou khum uh.
Jerusalem Pathian mihing khuta bawl khovel pathian bang lel phetin a gen uh.
Huchiin kumpipa Hezekia leh Amoz tapa jawlnei Isaiin huaijiakin a thum ua, vana om a sam uh.
Huan, TOUPAN angel a sawla, huaiin Assuria kumpipa giahmuna mi hat hangsan tengteng, makai heutute a hihlum hi.
Huchiin zum mahmah mel puin a gam lamah a pai nawnta hi.
Huan, a pathian ina a vahoh laiin amah gila gahte mahmahin namsauin a na hihlumta uhi.
Huchibangin TOUPAN Hezekia leh Jerusalema mite Assuria kumpipa Senakerib khuta kipan leh mi dang tengteng khut akipan a humbita, a kim ua mite laka a veng hi.
Huan, mi tampiin Jerusalemah TOUPA ading thilpiak a hontawi ua, thil manpha pipite Juda kumpipa Hezekia a hong pia ua; huai akipanin nam chih mitmuhin pahtawiin a omta hi.
Huailaiin Hezekia bel si zou dingin a chinaa, TOUPA kiangah a thuma; huan, a nadawnga, chiamtehna a pia a.
Himahleh Hezekiain amah adinga hoih kihih dungjuiin a hih keia, a lungtang a hong kisaktheih jiakin: huaijiakin a tungah leh Judate leh Jerusalem tungah hehna a hongtung hi.
Ahihhangin Hezekiain a lungtang kisaktheihna kisikin a kiniamkhiak nawna, amah leh Jerusalema mite toh; huchiin Hezekia dam sungin TOUPA hehna a tunguah a hongtungta kei hi.
Huan, Hezekiain sum leh pai a nahaua, a nathupita mahmaha; dangkasik te, dangkaeng te, suangmantam te, gimlimte, lumte leh tuiumbelsuan hoih pipi koihkhawmna in a lama:
Buh te, uain te, thau te koih khawmna in leng a lam laia; huan, gan chiteng koihna leh belam huangte a bawl hi.
Huan, khuate leng a bawl laia, belam hon leh bawng hon a hau mahmah maia; Pathianin neizou takin a bawl hi.
Hezekia mahin Gihon lui tui saknung zopen a hubinga, David kho tumlam pangah a luang khe saka.
Huciin Hezekia a thilhih tengtengah a lamzang jel.
Babulon milianten palai a sawl ua a gama thil lamdang a dot thu uah a lungtang om tengteng a theih theihna dingin Pathianin a nusiain a zeet hi.
Hezekia thilhih dang tengteng te, a thilhih hoih te ngai dih, Amoz tapa jawlnei Isai kilakna bu, Juda kumpipa leh Israel kumpipate tanchin bu ah a tuang hi.Huan, Hezekia bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmua, David tapate han mun paitouhnaah a vui ua; Judate tengteng leh Jerusalema miten a sih niin thupitakin a gal uh.
Huan, a tapa Manasi a sikin a lal ta hi.
Huan, Hezekia bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmua, David tapate han mun paitouhnaah a vui ua; Judate tengteng leh Jerusalema miten a sih niin thupitakin a gal uh.
Huan, a tapa Manasi a sikin a lal ta hi.
Manasi bel a lal pattungin kum sawm leh kum nih ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga leh kum nga a lal.
Huan, TOUPA mitmuha thil hoihlou, Israel suante maa TOUPAN a delhkhiak Pathian theilou namten thil kihhuai tak ahih bang uh aman leng a hih tei sek a.
A pa hezekiain a hihchip nung mun sangte a bawl phaa, Baal te adingin maitam a bawl a, Aser limte a bawl a, van a om teng teng a biaa, a na uh a sem hi.
Huan, jerusalem ah khantawnin ka min a om ding, TOUPAN a chihna TOUPA in ah maitamte a bawla.
TOUPA in huangsung intual nih ah vana om tengteng adingin maitamte a bawla.
Hinom tapa guamah meiah a tate a lutsaka; aisan te a chinga, bum te a chinga, dawi aisan siam jawlte leh bumsiamte a guai seka; TOUPA mitmuha thil hoih lou a hehsak dingin a hih sek hi.
Huan Pathianin David leh a tapa solomon kianga, Hiai in leh jerusalem khua a Israel chi tengteng laka ka talah ka min khantawnin ka omsak ding, a nachihkhitsa Pathian in ah amah bawl, milim bawl tawm a koiha:
Thu ka piak tengteng leh dan tengteng, thuseh, thilhih ding mosi zanga ka piakte a zuih peuhmah uleh a pi leh pute uh ka piaksa gam akipan Israelte khe ka kalsuan khesak nawn kei ding, a chihna ah.
Huan, Manasiin Judate leh Jerusalema mite thil a hihkhialsaka; huchi in TOUPAN Israelte maa a hihman khitsa namte sangin thil a hihkhial jaw hi.
Huan, TOUPAN Manasi leh a mite kiangah thu a gen jela; himahleh a limsak kei uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN Assuria sepaih heutute a sawla, Manasi khainiangin a khih ua, Kol a bun sak ua, Babulon ah a paipihta uh.
Huan, mangbang taka a om laiin TOUPA a Pathian a zonga, a pi leh pute Pathian maah nakpi takin a kiniamkhiaka.
A kiangah a thuma, hehpih a loha, a ngetna a ngaihkhiak saka, Jerusalemah a gamah a pi nawnta.
Huan, huai nungin David kho po lamah Gihon tumlam pang guamah ngasa kongkhak lutna phain kulh a bawla, Ophel umsuakin sangpiin a dingsaka: huan, Juda khua kulh nei tengtengah heutu hangsan taktak a koih hi.
Huan, gam dang pathiante leh milim te, TOUPA in akipan a paimanga, huan, TOUPA in mual leh Jerusalema maitam a bawl tengtengte khua akipan a pai vek uh.
Huan, TOUPA maitam a bawla, lemna thillat kithoihna te, kipahthu gennate a lana, Judate bel TOUPA Israelte Pathian na sem dingin thu a pia a.
Mipite mun sangah a kithoih lailai ua; himahleh TOUPA a Pathian uh kiangah kia ahi zota.
Manasi tanchin dang tengteng, a Pathian kianga a thum thu te, TOUPA Israelte Pathian mina jawlneiin a kianga thu a gen te uh ngai dih, Israel kumpipate tanchin lakah a tuang hi.
A thumna te leh Pathianin a hehpihna leh a kiniamkhiak maa a gitlouhna tengteng leh mun sang a bawla Aser leh milim bawl tawm a bawlkhiakna mun tengteng leng ngai dih, Hozai tanchin gelhna bu ah a tuang vek ahi.
Huchiin Manasi bel a pi leh pute kiangah a ihmu a, amah in ah a vui ua; huan, a tapa Amon a sikin a lalta hi.
Amon bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum nih ahi a; Jerusalem a kum nih alal.
A pa Manasi hih bang mahin TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih lou a hiha; a pa Manasiin a bawl milim bawl tawm tengteng kiangah Amon a kithoiha, a sema.
A pa Manasi kiniamkhiak bangin TOUPA maah a kiniamkhiak tei keia.
Amon a gilou semsem maimah.
Huan, a sikhaten a sawm ua, amah in ah a hihlum uhi.Himahleh Amon sawmmi tengteng mipiin a that vek nawn ua; huan, mipiten a tapa Josia a sikin kumpipa dingin a bawlta uhi.
Himahleh Amon sawmmi tengteng mipiin a that vek nawn ua; huan, mipiten a tapa Josia a sikin kumpipa dingin a bawlta uhi.
Josia bel a lal pattungin kum giata upa ahi; Jerusalem a kum sawm thum leh kum khat a lala;
Huan, TOUPA mitmuhin thil hoih a hih seka, a pu David lampite a juia, taklam ah hiam, veilamah hiam a pialsan kei hi.
Kum giat a lal kum, naupang tak a hih laia kipan himin a pu David Pathian a zong pana; huan, kum sawm leh kum nih a lal kumin Juda gam leh Jerusalema mun sang te, Aser te, milim bawl tawm te, milim sun tawmte ahihsiang a.
Baal maitamte a mitmuhin a chimsak ua; huan, huaite sanga sang ni-limte a phuka; huan, Aser te, milimbawltawmte, milimsuntawmte ahihkham veka, a kiang ua kithoihmite huan tungah a theh jak vek hi.
Siampu guhte a maitamte uah a hala, Juda gam leh Jerusalem a hihsiang a.
Huan, huchibang mahin Manasi te, Ephraim te, Simeon te, Naphtali khua te tanin a hih vek hi.
Huan, maitamte a chimsak, Aser te, milim bawltawmte a hihkham gawpa, Israel gam tengtenga milimte a phuk veka, Jerusalem ah a pai nawn hi.
Huan, a lal kum sawm leh kum giat kum, a gam leh inte ahihsiang kumin Azalia tapa Saphan te, kho ukpa Maasei te, Joahaz tapa laigelhmi Joa te TOUPA a Pathian in bawl hoih dingin a sawla.
Huan, siampu Hilkia kiangah a hoh ua, kongkhak ngak Leviten Manasi mi te, Israel omlai te, Juda mi leh Benjamin mite, Jerusalema mite kiang akipan a nalakkhawm uh, Pathian ina a hong koih uh dangka a pia uh.
Huan, TOUPA in lammi nasemmite a pia ua; huan, TOUPA in nasemmiten in bawl mite leh jemmite a pia uh;
Juda kumpipaten a nahihsiat uh bawl hoihna dingin suang sek te, a pehna te leh a inkamte dingin sing leina dingin khutsiamte leh in lammite a pia uh.
Huan, miten muanhuai takin na a sem ua; a heutu uh, nasep ngaihtuahmite, Merari tapate laka Levi mi Jahath leh Obadi te, Kohat mi tapate laka mi Zekaria leh Mosulam te ahi ua; huan, Levi mi, mi dang, thil tum siam tengteng toh;
A puaka puak thoh mite heutu leng ahi uh, na chiteng semmite sep ding ngaihtuahmi ahi uh: laigelhmi te, heutu te, kongkhak ngakmite Levi mite laka mi ahi uhi.
Huan, TOUPA ina hong koih uh sumte a suah ua leh, siampu Hilkiain Mosi zanga a piak TOUPA dan bu a mukhia a.
Huan, Hilkiain laigelhmi Saphan kiangah, TOUPA in ah dan bu I mu kheta uh, a chi a.
Huan Hilkiain laibu Saphan a pia a.
Huan, Saphanin laibu kumpipa kiangah a paipiha, Na sikhaten hih dinga seh tengteng a hih uh.
TOUPA ina dangka om a bung khia ua, heutute leh nasemmite a pia uh, chiin thu a tuna.
Huan, laigelhmi Saphanin, siampu Hilkiain laibu a honpia, chiin kumpipa a hilh laia.
Saphanin kumpipa maah a sim hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, kumpipan dan thute a jakin, a puan a botkeka.
Huan, kumpipan Hilkia te, Saphan tapa Ahikam te, Mika tapa Abdon te, laigelhmi Saphan te, kumpipa sikha Asai te thu a piaa,
Kuan unlam dan thu na muh khiak tungtang thu uah kei leh Israel leh Juda gama mite adingin TOUPA honva dot sak dih ua; I pi leh puten hiai dan bua tuang banga TOUPA thu a nazuih louh jiak un I tunguah TOUPA hehna lah a hongom mahmah ngal a, chiin.
Huchiin kumpipan thu a piakmite leh Hilkia puansilh kempa Hasra ta Tokhat tap Salum ji jawlnei Hulda kiangah a vahoh ua, huai thu ah a vahoupih uh.
(Amah bel Jerusalem Misnea om a hi).
Huan, aman a kianguah, TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi; Ka kianga nou honsawlpa hilh unla, TOUPAN hichiin a chi,
Ngai dih ua, hiai mun leh a sunga omte tungah thil hoih lou ka tungsak dinga, Juda kumpipa maa a sim khiak uh, laibua tuang hamsia tengteng leng;
A khut thilhih ua honhehsakna ding ua honlehngatsana milim dangte dinga gimlim a hal jiak un hiai mun tungah ka hehna sun ahia, daihsak ahi kei ding, chiin.
Himahleh TOUPA thu dong dinga nou honsawlpa Juda dumpipa kiangah, hichi bangin chi un, TOUPA, Israelte Pathiain hichiin a chi: Na thu jakte tungtang thu ah,
Na lungtang hihnema a om jiaka Pathian maa na kiniamkhiaka, hiai mun tungtang thu leh a sunga omte tungtang thu na jaka, ka maa na kiniamkhiaka, na puan na bohkeka, ka maa na kah jiakin ken leng na thu kana ngaikhia hi.
Ngai dih, na pi leh na pute kiangah ka honhoh sak dinga, na han ah lungmuang takin na pai dinga, hiai mun leh a sunga omte tunga ka hontun sak ding thil hoih lou tengteng na mitin a mu kei ding, chiin, chiin, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa kiangah thu a tunta uhi.
Huchiin kumpipan mi a sawla, Juda gam leh Jerusalema upa tengteng a sam khawma.
Huan, kumpipa leh Juda mi tengteng leh Jerusalema mi tengteng te, siampu leh Levite, mipi tengteng a lian a neuin TOUPA in ah a hoh tou ua; TOUPA ina a muh khiak uh thukhun bua thu tengteng a bil ua jakin a sim hi.
Huan, kumpipa bel a munah a dinga, huai laibua tuang thukun thu hihkip dingin a lungtang tengteng leh kha tengtenga TOUPA jui ding leh a thupiakte, a thutheihsak te, a thusehte pom dingin TOUPA maah thu a khung uhi.
Huan, Jerusalem leh Benjamin mi tengteng huchibanga om dingin a chi ua.
Huan, Jerusalema miten Pathian, a pi leh pute uh Pathian thukhun bangin a hih uh.Huan, Josiain Israel gamin a huap tengteng akipan thil kihhuai tengteng a pai manga, Israel gama om tengteng TOUPA a Pathian uh na a semsak hi.
Huan, a dam sungin TOUPA a pi leh pute uh Pathian a zuih uh a pialsan kei uh.
Huan, Josiain Israel gamin a huap tengteng akipan thil kihhuai tengteng a pai manga, Israel gama om tengteng TOUPA a Pathian uh na a semsak hi.
Huan, a dam sungin TOUPA a pi leh pute uh Pathian a zuih uh a pialsan kei uh.
Huan, Josiain Jerusalem ah TOUPA adin paikan ankuang a bawla; paikan ankuang luina ding kha khatna, ni sawm leh ni li niin a gou hi.
Huan, siampute a nasep uh a seh saka, TOUPA ina nasepna na sem dingin a hasuan hi.
Huan, Israel mite sinsakmi, Pathian dinga hihtuam Levite kiangah, Israel kumpipa David tapa Solomon in lamah bawm siangthou koih un; na liangjang ua jawn a kiphamohta kei ding; TOUPA na Pathian uh leh a mi Israelte na sem ta un.
Huan, Israel kumpipa David gelh bang leh a tapa Solomon gelh bangin na inkuan intekpen dung jui jelin apawlpawlin kisa un.
Huan, na unaute uh inkuan intekpen dung jui jelin Levite tuama tantuan neiin mun siangthou ah om un.
Paikan ankuangluina ding gou unla, kihihsiangthou unla, Mosi zanga TOUPA gen bang hih dingin na unaute uh dingin bawl un, a chi a.
Huan, Josiain huaia mi om tengteng paikan ankuang adia lan dingin gan hon laka belam nou leh kel nou sing thum leh bawngtal sang thum a piaa: huaite bel kumpipa sum laka ahi hi.
Huan, a milianten mipi te, siampu te, Levite amau ut thua lan dingin a pia ua.
Pathian in heutu, Hilkia te, Zekeria te, Jehiel ten paikan ankuang dia lan dingin gan nou sang nih leh za guk leh bawngtal za thum siampute a pia uh.
Huan, Konani te, a unau Semai leh Nethanel te, Levite heutu Hasabi te, Zeiel te, Jozabad ten leng paikan ankuang dia lat dingin Levite gan nou sang nga leh bawngtal za nga a pia uh.
Huchiin nasepna a bawl ua, kumpipa thupiak bangin siampute a mun uah a ding ua, Levite a pawl dan bang jel un.
Huan, paikan ankuangluina ding a gou ua, siamputen sisan a theh ua, Leviten a hawk uh.
Huan, Mosi laibua tuang banga a inkuan khen dan uh dungjui jela TOUPA kianga lat dinga piak dingin halmang thillatte a lasawn ua.
Bawngtalte leng huchibang mahin a hih uh.
Huan, paikan ankuangluina ding a dan bangin a em min ua; huan, thillat siangthou sa bel, belte, bel khainaneite, bel gongzatein a ui ua, mi tengteng kiangah a paipih uhi.
Huan, huai khitiin amau leh siampute ding a bawl ua; Aron ta siampute halmang thillat leh sa thau lanin jan tanphin a baui ngal ua; huaijiakin Leviten amau leh Aron ta siampute ading a bawl uh ahi.
Huan, David leh Asaph leh Heman leh kumpipa jawlnei Jeduthun te thupiak bangin lasami Asaph tapate a mun uah a ding ua, huan, kongkhak ngakmite bel kongkhak chihah a om ua; a unau Leviten a bawlsak jiak un a na uh paisan a kiphamoh kei.
Huchiin kumpipa Josia thupaik banga paikan ankuang nei ding leh TOUPA maitama halmang thillat lan dingin huai ni mahin TOUPA nasepna thil tengteng a bawl uh.
Huan, Israel suan huailaia omten huai niin paikan ankuang anei ua, tnaghou silngou sohlouh ankuang leng ni sagih a nei lai uh:
Jawlnei Samuel dam lai akipan Israel gamah paikan ankuang huchibang himhim a nei ngei kei ua; Israel kumpipa kuamahin Josia leh siampute leh Levite leh Juda tengteng leh Israelten a neih bang uh nei a om sam kei uh.
Kum sawm leh kum giat Josia a lal kumin huai paikan ankuang a nei uhi.
Huai tengteng khia Josiain biakin a bawl khitin, Aigupta kumpipa Nako Karkemis sual dingin Euphrate luiah a pai toua; huan, Josiain a vasual hi.
Himahleh, aman, Nang Juda kumpipa, keil lehnang bang ahia I kihihna ding om? nang sual dingin ka hongpai keia, ka dou sa dou dingin ahi jaw ka hong, Pathianin kin dingin thu honpiaa, ka lama pang Pathian doudal kei dih, a hohhihmang kha ding hi, chiin palai a sawla.
Himahleh Josiain a kiksan nuam keia, a dou theihna ding in a kibawl lamdanga, Pathian kama kipana Neko thu gen a pom keia, Megido guamah nasual dingin a kuan hi.
Huan, thal kap miten Josia a kap ua; huan, kumpipan a sikhate kiangah, Honpai mang pih un, liamna thupi mahmah ka tuakta, a chi a.
Huchiin a sikhaten kangtalai akipan a la khia ua, a kangtalai dangah a koih ua, Jerusalem ah a paipih ua, a si a, a pi leh pute hanah a vui uh.
Juda mi tengteng leh Jerusalema miten Josia a sun uhi.
Huan, Jeremiain Josia a kaha; huan, lasami numei leh pasalten tutanin Josia a kahna la uh a gen lai lai uh.
Israel gamah danin a nei ua, ngai dih, kahna la ah atuangta hi.
Josia thilhih dang tengteng, a thilhih hoih te, TOUPA dan bua gelh bangjelin,A masa pen a nanungpente leng, ngai dih, Israel kumpipa leh Juda kumpipate tanchinbuah a tuang hi.
A masa pen a nanungpente leng, ngai dih, Israel kumpipa leh Juda kumpipate tanchinbuah a tuang hi.
Huchiin huai gama miten Josia tapa Jehoahaz a pi ua, Jerusalem ah a pa sikin kumpipa dingin a bawl uh.
Jehoahaz bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum thum ahi a, Jerusalem ah kha thum a lal.
Aigupta kumpipan Jerusalema a lalna a tawpsaka, a gam uh dangkasik talent ja leh dangkaeng talent khat a liau sak hi.
Huan, Aigupata kumpipan a unaupa Eliakim Juda leh Jerusalema kumpipa dingin a bawla, a min Jehoiakim chiin a khen sak hi.
Huan, Nekoin a unaupa Jehozhaz Aigupta gamah a pi hi.
Jehoiakim bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum nga ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum khat a lala: TOUPA a Pathian mitmuhin thil hoih lou ahih sek hi.
Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar amah sual dingin a hongkuana, Babulona pi dingin kol a bunsak hi.
Nebukadnezzarin TOUPA ina tuiumbelsuante leng Babulon ah a laa, Babulona a pathian biakin ah a koih hi.
Jehoiakim tanchin dang te, a thil kihhuai hihte leh a omdante ngaidih, Israel kumpipa leh Juda kumpipate tanchin bu ah a tuanga; huan, a tapa Jehoiakin a sikin a lalta hi.
Jehoiakin alal pattungin kum giat a ahia, Jerusalem ah kha thum leh ni sawm a lala, TOUPA mitmuh in thil hoih lou a hih sek hi.
Huan, kum a hong beiin kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin mi a sawla, TOUPA ina tuiumbelsuan hoih pipite toh Babulon ah a pi saka, a unaupa Zedekia Juda gam leh Jerusalema kumpipa dingin a bawl hi.
Zedekia bel a lal pattungin kum sawmnih leh kum khat ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum khat a lala:
TOUPA a Pathian mitmuhin thil hoih lou a hih saka; TOUPA kama kipana thu genpa jawlnei Jeremia lakah a kiniamkhiak nuam keia,
Pathian mina kichiamsakpa kumpipa Nebukadnezzar tungah a hel laia, paupengin a om a, TOUPA Israel Pathian lam nga lou dingin a lungsim a khauh sak hi.
Siampu heutu tengteng leh mipiten leng Pathian theilou mite bangmahin thil kihhuai pipite a hih ua; Jerusalema a hihsiangthou TOUPA inte leng a hihbuah uh.
Huan, TOUPA a pi leh pute uh Pathianin a kianguah theihtawpa phatuamngaiin mi a sawla, a mite leh a omna mun a lainat jiakin;
Himahleh Pathian mi sawlte a namusit ua, a thute a ngaineu ua, a mite tunga TOUPA hehna a hongthou a, hihlungdamnawnna mahmah om lou khopin a jawlnei a hihgim uhi.
Huaijiakin Kaldai kumpipa a tunguah a gamtang saka, aman a tangvalte uh a mun siangthou uah namsauin a thata, nungak leh tangval leng, tek leng, teksia leng lainatna himhim a neikeia; a khutah a pevek hi.
Huan, Pathian ina tuiumbelsuan tengteng, a lian leng, a neu leng, TOUPA ina sum koih khawm tengteng te, kumpipa sum koih khawm leh a miliante sum koihkhawmte nangawnin Babulon ah a la vek hi.
Huan, Pathian inte a hala, Jerusalem kulh te a chimsaka, huailaia in thupi tengteng a hala, huailaia tuiumbelsuan hoih tengteng a hihse veka.
Namsuan thah bang teng Babulon ah a pia, Persiate a honglal tak un amah leh a tapate sikhain a om uhi:
A khawlnite gamin nuamtaka a zat tana Jeremia kama gen TOUPA thu a tangtunna dingin: segawpa a om sungteng lah, kum sawmsagih tangtunna dingin, a khawlnite a tang ngala.
Huchiin Persia kumpipa Kura lal tung kumin Jeremia kama TOUPA thu a tun kim theihna dingin a gam tengtenga than khiak vek ding leh a gelha gelh dingin leng TOUPAN Persia kumpipa Kura lungtang a tok thou a,Persia kumpipa Kurain hichiiin a chi, Khovel gam tengteng TOUPA van Pathianin a honpia a; huan, Juda gama Jerusalem ah a in lamsak dingin thu a honpia ahi.
Na lak ua amah mite photphot kiangah TOUPA a Pathian om henla, vahoh tou hen, chiin.
Persia kumpipa Kurain hichiiin a chi, Khovel gam tengteng TOUPA van Pathianin a honpia a; huan, Juda gama Jerusalem ah a in lamsak dingin thu a honpia ahi.
Na lak ua amah mite photphot kiangah TOUPA a Pathian om henla, vahoh tou hen, chiin.
Persia kumpipa Kura kum khatna ah, Jeremia kama TOUPA thu hihzoh a hih theihna dingin, TOUPAN Persia kumpipa Kura kha a tokthoua, huchiin a gamsung tengteng ah thuphuan a bawl a, laigelhin leng a koih a.
Huchibangin Persia kumpipa Kurain a chi, TOUPA, van Pathianin, lei gamte tengteng kei a honpeta; Juda a om Jerusalem a amah in lamsak dingin kei thu a honpeta hi.
A mite tengteng na lak ua om om peuhmah, a kiangah Pathian om henla, Judaa om, Jerusalem ah hoh tou henla, TOUPA, Israel Pathian, (Pathian a hi) Jerusalema om in lam heh.
Huan kuapeuhmah, a khualchiahna koi mun peuh a nutsiat, a omna muna miten amah dangka leh dangkaeng, vante leh, gantatein panpih uhenla, Jerusalema om Pathian in adinga utthua thillat chih louh, chiin.
Huchiin Juda leh Benjamin intekpate inkote lupente leh, simpute leh, Levite, Pathianin Jerusalema om TOUPA in lam dia hoh tou dinga a kha uh a tohthohte tengteng, a thouta uhi.
Huan a kim a vel ua omte tengtengin a khut uh dangka tuiumbelsuante leh, dankaengte leh, vante, leh, gantate, leh thil manphatein a hihhat ua, uttaka piakte tengteng sim louin.
Kumpipa Kurain leng TOUPA ina tuiumbel suante, Nebukadnezzar in Jerusalem akipana a lakkhiaka, a pathiante ina a koihte a lakhe veka;
Huaite mahmah Persia kumpipa Kumpipa Kurain sumkempa Mithreda khutin a lakhe veka, Juda lal, Sesbazzar lakah a sim hi.
Huchiiin hiai thu a zah uh ahi: dangkaeng kuang sawmthum, dangka kuang sang khat, gimlim halna kuang sawmnih leh kua;
Dangkaeng noubem sawmthum, dangka noubem a hoih lou deuhte zali leh sawmkhat, huan tuiumbelsuan dangte sang khat.Dangkaeng leh dangka tuiumbelsuan tengteng sang nga leh za li ahi uh.
Saltangte lakate Babulon akipan Jerusalema pitouha a om lai un, hiaite tengteng Sesbazzarin a hontawi tou vek hi.
Dangkaeng leh dangka tuiumbelsuan tengteng sang nga leh za li ahi uh.
Saltangte lakate Babulon akipan Jerusalema pitouha a om lai un, hiaite tengteng Sesbazzarin a hontawi tou vek hi.
Huan hiaite pi manga om koltanna akipana pai tou, biala tate, Babulon lama kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a pi mang, Jerusalem leh Juda a, mi chih amah khua chiata hongkik nawnte ahi uh;
Zerubababel, Josua, Nehemia, Seraina, Reelaia, Mordekai, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum, Baana toh hongtonte, Israel mite laka pasal zah:
Paros tate sang nih za khat sawmsagih leh nih.
Sephatia tatte, za thum sawmsagih leh nih.
Arah tate, za sagih sawmsagih leh nga.
Pahath Moab tate, Jesua leh Joab tate, sang nih za giat leh sawm leh nih.
Elam tate, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Zattu tate, za kua sawmli leh nga.
Zakkai tate, za sagih leh sawmguk.
Bani tate, za guk sawmli leh nih.
Bebai tate, za guk sawmnih leh thum.
Azgad tate, sang khat za nih sawmnih leh nih.
Adonikam tate, za guk sawmguk leh guk.
Bigvai tate, sang nih sawmnga leh guk.
Adin tate, za li sawmnga leh li.
Ater tate, Hezekia tate, sawmkua leh giat.
Bezai tate, za thum sawmnih leh thum.
Jora tate, za khat leh sawmlehnih.
Hasum tae, za nih sawmnih leh thum.
Gibbar tate, sawmkualeh nga.
Beth-lehem tate, za khat sawmnih leh thum.
Netophah mite, sawmnga leh guk.
Anathot mite, za khat sawmnih leh giat.
Azmavet tate, sawmli leh nih.
Kiriath-arim Kephira, Beer-oth tate, za sagih leh sawmli leh thum.
Rama leh Geba tate, za guk swamnih leh khat.
Mikma mite, za khat sawmnih leh nih.
Beth-el leh Ai mite, za nih sawmnih leh thum.
Nebo tate, sawmnga leh guk.
Magbis tate, za khat sawmnga leh guk.
Elam dang tate, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Harim tate, za thum leh sawmnih.
Lod, Hadid leh Ono tate, za sagih sawmnih leh nga.
Jeriko tate, za thum sawmli leh nga.
Sena tate, sang thum leh za guk leh sawmthum.
Siampute: Jedai tate, Jesua inkote, za kua sawmsagih leh thum.
Immer tate, sang khat sawmnga leh nih.
Peshur tate, sang khat za nih sawmli leh sagih.
Harim tate, sang khat leh sawmleh sagih.
Levi mite: Jesua leh Kadmiel tate, Hodavi tate, sawmsagih leh li.
Lasa mite: Asaph tate, za khat sawmnih leh giat.
Kongkhak ngak mite: Sallum tate, Ater tate, Talmon tate, Akkub tate, Hatita tate, Sobai tate, a vek un za khat sawmthum leh kua.
Nithunum mite: Ziha tae, Hasupha tate, Tabbaoth tate;
Keros tate, Siaha tate, Padon tate;
Lebana tate, Hagaba tate, Akkub tate;
Hagab tate, Samlai tate, Hanan tate;
Giddel tate, Gahar tate Reaia tate;
Rezin tate, Nekoda tate, Gazzam tate;
Uzza tate, Pasea tate Besai tate;
Asan tate, Meunim tate, Nephisim tate;
Bakbuk tate, Hakupha tate, Harhur tate;
Bazlut tate, Mehida tate, Harsa tate;
Barko tate, Sesera tate, Tema tate;
Nezia tate, Hatipha tate,
Solomon sikhate tate: Sotai tate, Hassopheret tate, Peruda tate;
Jaala tate, Darkon tate, Giddel tate;
Sephatia tate, Hattil tate, Pokereth-hazzebaim tate, Ami tate.
Nithinim mite tengteng, Solomon sikhate tate, za thum sawmkua leh nih.
Huchiin hiaite Tel-melah, Tel-harsa, Cherub, Addan, leh Immer akipana paitoute ahi uh: himahleh a pipute inkote, a suan uh, Israel akipan ahi uhia chih a taklang theikei uh:
Delai tate, Tobia tate, Nekoda tate, za guk sawmnga leh nih.
Huan siampute tate: Habai tate, Hakkoz tate, Barzillai Gileadmi Barzillai tanute akipana ji pipa tate, amau min juia sakin a om hi.
Hiai khangthusutna a sim mite laka mingelhna a zong ua, himahleh a mu kei uh: huaijiak in buaha simin a om ua siamputna akipan dang koihin a om uhi.
Huan Tirsathain, siampu Urim leh Thummim toh a hongdin khiak mateng, thil siangthou penpente ne lou dingin amau a chi a.
Omkhawmte tengteng a vek un sing li sang nih za thum leh sawmguk ahia,
A pasal sikhate uleh a numei sikhate uh, sang sagih za thum sawm leh sagihte sim louin: huan pasal lasami leh numei lasami sang nih a nei uh.
A sakolte uh za sagih sawmthum leh guk ahi ua; sakolneute, za nih sawmli leh nga;
Sangawngsaute, za li sawmthum leh nga; a sabentung uh, sang guk za sagih leh sawmnih.
Huan pipute uh inkuantea lupente laka a khen, Jerusalem a om TOUPA ina a honglai ua ut taka Pathianin a muna ding dinga thillante:
Nasepna sumbawm ah a hihtheih dan un dangkaeng darik sing guk leh sang khat, dangka paun sangnga leh, siampute puansilh za khat.Huchiin siampute, Levi mite, mite laka a khenkhat leh lasamite leh, kongkhak ngakmite leh, Nithinim mite, a khopite uah a teng ua, Israel a khopite uah.
Huchiin siampute, Levi mite, mite laka a khenkhat leh lasamite leh, kongkhak ngakmite leh, Nithinim mite, a khopite uah a teng ua, Israel a khopite uah.
Huchia kha sagihna a hongtuna, khopitea Israel tate a om lai un, mite Jerusalem ah mi khat bangin a kikhawm khawm uh.
Huchiin Jozadak tapa Jesua leh, a unaute siampute leh, Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel leh, a unaute, a ding ua, Pathian mi Mosi dana a kigelh banga, a tunga halmang thillatte lan dingin, Israel Pathian maitam a lam uhi.
Huan maitam a kiangakna tungah a tung ua; gamtea mite jiakin a tunguah lah launa a om ngala: huchiiin a tungah TOUPA adingin halmang thillatte a lan ua, jing leh nitaka halmang thillatte ngei.
Huan a kigelh bangin, biakbukte ankuangluina a bawl ua, a hihdingzahin niteng halmang thillatte, dan dungjuiin, ni tenga sepding kiphamoh bangin a lan ua;
Huan a nungin halmang thillat gige, kha thakte thillatte leh, hihsiangthoua om TOUPA ankuanglui sehkhiakte tengteng leh, TOUPA adia uttaka utthua thillat lan mi chiteng.
A kha sagih a ni khat ni akipanin TOUPA adingin halmang thillatte a lan pan ua: himahleh TOUPA biakin suangphum a kikoih nai kei hi.
Sum leng suangsekmite kiang leh khutsiammite kiangah a pia ua; Kura Persia kumpipa akipana phalna a muh bang ua tuipi a, Joppa tana Lebanon tang akipan sidar singte honla dingin, Zidon ate kiang leh, Tura ate kiangah, sa te, dawnding te, leh thaute a pia hi.
Huchiin a kha nihnaa, Jerusalema Pathian ina a hongtun uh a kum nihnain, Sialteil tapa Zerubbabel leh, Jozadak tapa Jesua leh, a unaute siampute laka te leh Levi mite leh, koltanna akipana Jerusalem hongpaite a kipan ua; Levimite a sep ua kum sawmniha upa leh a tunglam TOUPA in nasepnaa heutute hi dingin.
Huchiin Pathian ina nasemmite heu dingin, Jesua a tapate leh a unaute, Kadmiel leh a tapate, Juda tapate, a ding khawm ta uhi: Henadad tapate, a tapate uh leh a unaute uh Levi mite toh.
Huan inlammiten TOUPA biakin suangphum a koih lai un, Israel kumpipa David thupiak bangin, TOUPA phat dingin, siampute pengkulte toh a puan uh a silh sak ua, Levi mite Asaph tapate dakkhutette a guan uhi.
Huchiin TOUPA phatna leh kipahna piaknain la a kisak sak chiat ua, Amah lah a hoih ngala, a chitna lah khantawnin Israel lamah a omgige ngala, Chiin.
Huchiin nakpia kikouin mite tengteng a kikou ua, TOUPA a phat lai un, TOUPA in suangphum koiha a om jiakin.
Himahleh siampute leh Levi mite leh pipute inkote laka mi tampi, a mit ma mahmah ua hiai in suangphum a kikoih laia, tua in masa mute putekte, aw ngaih takin a kap khia ua; huan mi tampi nuamsain ngaihtakin a kikou uhi:Huchiin miten nuamsakna kikouna husa mite kahna husa toh a theikak theikei ua: mite lah ngaih takin a kikou un, a husa lah gamla piah a kiza ngala.
