Huchiin miten nuamsakna kikouna husa mite kahna husa toh a theikak theikei ua: mite lah ngaih takin a kikou un, a husa lah gamla piah a kiza ngala.
Huchia Juda leh Benjamin melmaten saltangte taten TOUPA, Israel Pathian adingin biakin a lam uh chih a jak un;
Huai laiin Zerubbabel leh, pipute inkote lupente kiangah a hongpia nai ua, a kiang uah, Honlam pih le ung ake: noute bangin, na Pathian ulah ka zong ngal ua; Assuria kumpipa Esarhaddon hiailaia honpipa damlai nite akipan amah kiangah ka kithoih uhi, a chi ua.
Himahleh Zerubbabel leh, Jesua leh Israel pipute inkote lupenten a kiang uah, Ka Pathian uh adia in non lampihna ding uh bangmah na neikei uh; himahleh Persia kumpipa Kurain kou thu a honpiak bangin, Israel Pathian, TOUPA adingin kouten ka lam khawm ding uhi, a chi ua.
Huchiin gama miten Judaa mite khut a hatsak ta kei ua, inlamnaah amau a subuaita ua.
Persia kumpia Kura damlai tengteng, Persia kumpipa Daria lal lai tanpha hialin, a thiltup uh kalhse ding, amaute siatna dingin thuhilhmite a guai uhi.
Huan Ahasura vaihawm laiin, a vaihawm pattung laiin, Juda leh Jerusalema tengte hekna a gelh uh.
Huan Artaksarsi damlaiin Bislam te, Mithredath te, Tabeel te leh, a kithuahpih ten, Persia kumpipa Artaksarsis kiangah lai a gelh ua; huan laikhak gelhdan Suria laimala gelha, Suria paua bawlkhiak ahi.
Dansiam Rehum leh laigelhmi Simsaiin Jerusalem siatna dingin kumpipa Artaksarsi kiangah hichibangin laikhak a gelhta uh:
Dansiam Rehum leh, laigelhmi Simsai leh, a kithuahpihte un huchiin a gelhta ua; Dinai mite leh, Aphratchi mite, Tarpe mite, Aphar mite, Arki mite, Babulon mite, Susanchi mite, Deha mite, Elam mite leh
Sanppar lian leh thupiin a honpi khiaka, Samaria khopi leh luipi khena gam dang leh a dangdanga a koih namte.
Kumpipa Artaksarsis kianga a laikhak uh kopi tuh hiai ahi; Luipi khenlam leh, a dangdanga na sikhate.
Na kiang akipana hong tou Judate Jerusalem ah kou kiangah ahong uh chih kumpipa kiangah theihin om hen: khopi helhat leh hoihlou a lam lellel ua, a kulhbangte a zouta ua, a suangphumte a puahkhinta uh.
Kumpipan thei hen, hiai khopi lama a oma, a kulh bangte zoha a om lejaw, vanleiman te, sumsinnaleiman te hiam lamlianleiman te khawng a pe kei ding ua, a tawptawpin kumpipa siatna ahi ding.
Tuin inpia chi ne ka hih jiak un, kumpipa zahlakna muh kou adingin a kilawm keia, huaijiakin kumpipa tuh ka khak un, ahi ngeingei ka chita uhi;
Na pipute chiamtehna laibu sungah kizong hen: huchiin chiamtehna laibu sungah na mukhe dinga, hiai khopi khopi helhat, kumpipate leh bialte adia poikhoihhat chih leh, nidang lai mahin leng huai sung mahah helna a nabawlta uh na thei ding hi: huaijiaka hiai khopi kihihse gawp lah ahi ngala.
Hiai khopi a kilama, a kulhbangte hichibanga a kihihkhit lejaw, luipi khenlamah tan na neikei ding chih kumpipa ka hontheitel sak chinten uhi, chiin.
Huchiin dansiam Rehum leh, laigelhmi Simsai leh, Samaria leh, luipi khena gama teng a kithuahpihte dante tengteng kiangah kumpipan dawnna a khaka, Chibai, huchibang jelin.
Laikhak ka kiang ua na honkhak uh ka maah tel taka sim a hita.
Huan thu ka piaa, a kizong khina, nidang laiin hiai khopiin kumpipate tunga helna a bawla, huailaiah helpina leh helna a nakibawlta chih muhkhiakin a om hi.
Huailouin kumpipa thilhihthei taktak, luipi khen gam tengteng tunga vaihawm, Jerusalem tunga vaihawmte a naom ua; vanleimate, sumsinnaleiman te leh, lamlianleiman amau kianga piak ahi hi.
Huchiin keimahin thupiak ka bawl masiah, huai mite khawl ding leh, hiai khopi lam lou dingin, thupiak bawl un.
Huan hiaia zeol lou dingin pilvang un: bangdingin kumpipate siatna dingin hoihlouhna a khang dia? chiin.
Huchia kumpipa Artaksarsi laikhak kopi Rehum leh, laigelhmi Simsai leh a kithuahpihte uh maa a sim khit un, kintakin Jerusalem Judate kiangah ahoh ua, kihatsakna leh thilhihtheihna zangin amau thu a khawlsakta uhi.Huchiin Jerusalema Pathian in nasep a khawlta: Persia kumpipa Daria vaihawm kum nihna tanin a khawl hi.
Huchiin Jerusalema Pathian in nasep a khawlta: Persia kumpipa Daria vaihawm kum nihna tanin a khawl hi.
Huan jawlneite, jawlnei Haggai leh, Zekaria Iddo tapain Juda leh Jerusalema om Judate kiangah a thu a gen khol ua; a kiang uah Israel Pathian miin thu a genkhol uhi.
Huchiin Sialteil tapa Zerubbabel leh, Jozadak tapa Jesua a thou ua, Jerusalema om Pathian in a lam panta uh; huan amaute panpihin a kiang uah Pathian jawlneite a om uhi.
Huchihlai mahin a kiang uah Tattenai, luipi khena ukpipa leh Sethar-bozenai leh, a kithuahpihte uh a hong ua, a kiang uah hichibangin, Hiai in lam ding leh hiai kulhbang zou dingin nou kuan thu a honpiaa? a chi ua.
Huchiin kou a kiang uah hichibangin ka chi ua, Hiai inlam mite min bang ahia? chiin.
Himahleh Juda upate tungah a Pathian uh mit a tu a, a thu Daria kianga a hongtuna, huai tungtang laikhaka dawnna a hongkil nawn masiah, amaute a khawlsak kei uhi.
Laikhak kopi Tattenai, luipi khena ukpipa leh, Setharbozenai leh, a kithuahpih Abharsa mite, luipi khena omten kumpipa Daria a khak ua:
A kiangah laikhak a khak ua, huaiah hichibanga gelh ahi; Daria kumpipa kiangah, chibaibukna kim.
Kumpipan thei hen, Judia bialah ka pai ua, suang thupitea lam, Pathian thupi in ah, kulhbangte singte a kikoiha, hiai nasep thanopna toh a pai jela, a khut uah ma a sawm jel hi.
Huan huai upate thu ka dong ua, hichibangin a kiang uah, Hiai lam ding leh hiai kulhbang zou dingin nou kuan thu a honpiaa? ka chi ua.
Nang kianga tel mahmah gen thei dingin, aminte uh leng ka dong ua, huchia amau makaipena om mite min ka gelh khiak theihna ding un.
Huan hichibangin kou a hondawng uh, Van leh lei Pathian sikhate ka hi ua, hiai kum tampia nakilam sa, Israel kumpipa thupiin a lam leh a zohsa in ka lam uhi.
Himahleh ka pipute un van Pathian a nasuk heh nung un, amaute Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar, Kaldai mi khut ah a piaa, aman hiai in a hihsiaa, mite Babulon lamah a pimang hi.
Himahleh Babulon kumpipa Kura kum khatna kumin, kumpipa Kurain hiai Pathian in lam dingin thupiak a bawl hi.
Huan dangkaeng leh dangka tuiumbelsuan Pathian ina te leng, Nebukadnezzarin Jerusalema om biakin akipana a lak khiaka, Babulon biakina a lak lutte, huaite kumpipa Kurain Babulon biakin akipan a lakhiaa, mi khat Sesbazzar, ukpipa dia a bawl kiangah huaite a pe khia;
Huan aman a kiangah, Hiai tuiumbelsunate la inla, pai inla, Jerusalema om biakin ah koihin, a munah Pathian in am hi hen, a chi a.
Huchihlaiin Sesbazzar a honga, Jerusalema om Pathian in suangphumte a koiha: huai hun akipan tutanin lamin a om ngitngeta, hinapiin lah zoh ahi kei hi.Huaijiakin, tuin kumpipan hoih a sak leh, Babulona om, kumpipa laigelhte koihchingna in sung kizong henla, Jerusalema hiai Pathian in lam ding kumpipa Kurain thupiak bawlna hiam a bawl aleh, hiai thu-ah kumpipan a kipahna kou honkhak hen, chiin.
Huaijiakin, tuin kumpipan hoih a sak leh, Babulona om, kumpipa laigelhte koihchingna in sung kizong henla, Jerusalema hiai Pathian in lam ding kumpipa Kurain thupiak bawlna hiam a bawl aleh, hiai thu-ah kumpipan a kipahna kou honkhak hen, chiin.
Huchihlaiin kumpipa Dariain thupaik a bawla, Babulona goute koihkhawmna, laibute in sung a zong ua.
Huan Akbetana ah, Media biala om inpi ah laijial a kimu khiaa huaiah chiamtehna dingin hichibanga gelh ahi.
Kumpipa Kura kum khatna kumin, Kura kumpipan thupiak a bawla: Jerusalema Pathian in tungtang, a in lam hi henla, kithoihnate a latna mun uh leh, huaia suangphumte kiptaka koih hi hen; a sanlam tong sawmguk, a zatlam tong sawmguk;
Suang thupipi vual thum leh, sing thak vual khat toh: huan sumzatbei kumpipa in akipana piak khiak hi hen:
Huan Nebukadnezzarin Jerusalema om biakin akipana a lakkhiaka, Babulon lama a lak, Pathian ina dangkaeng leh dangka tuiumbelsunate piak nawn vek hi henla, Jerusalema om biakina koih nawn vek hi hen, a munah, huan Pathian in ah amaute na koih ding hi.
Huaijiakin, Tattenai, luipi khena ukpipa, Setharbozenai leh na kithuahpihte uh Apharsa mite, luipi khena omte, huai akipan gamla ah om un:
Hiai Pathian in nasepna subuai kei un; Judate ukpipa leh Judate upaten a munah hiai Pathian in lam uhen.
Huailouin hiai Pathian in lamna dinga hiai Juda upate kiangah na hih ding uh thu ka bawl hi: kumpipa vante akipan, luipi khena siah akipan mahmahin, hiai mite kianga sumzatnate thanopna chiteng toh a piak ding ahi, huchia dala a om louhna ding un.
Huan a taksapna te uh, bawngtal noute leh, belam talte leh, belamnoute, Van Pathian kianga halmang thillatte ding huit-buh te, chi te, uain te, leh thau te, Jerusalem aom siampute thu bangjelin, tatlak louin ni tengin amau piak ding ahi:
Huchia van Pathian kianga gim lim kithoihnate a lat theih ua, kumpipa hinna leh a tapate hinna adia a thum theihna ding un.
Thupiak ka bawl laia, kuapeuhmahin hiai thu a suklamdan leh, a in akipan inkam dohkhiak hi henla, huaiah amah dopkang touh leh hendenin om hen; hiai jiakin a in ekvuma bawl hi hen;
Huaimah hihlamdang ding, Jerusalema om hiai Pathian in hihse dinga a khut uh kuan sak ding kumpipate tengteng leh mite tengteng Pathian huailaia teng dinga a min omsakpan paithal vek hen.
Kei Dariain thupiak ka bawlta; thanopna tengteng toha hihin om hen, chiin.
Huchiin Tattenai, luipi khena ukpipa, Sethar-bozenai leh a kithuahpihte un, kumpipa Dariain a sawl jiakin, thanopna tengteng toh huchibangin a hihta uhi.
Huan Juda upaten in a lam ua ma a sawm jel ua, jawlnei Haggai leh Iddo tapa Zekaria genkholhna pansanin.
Huan Israel Pathian thupiak dangjui leh Kura leh, Daria leh, Persia kumpipa Artaksarsi thupiak dungjuiin in a lam ua a zouta uh.
Kumpipa Daria vaihawm kum gukna kuma om, Adar kha ni thumniin hiai in tuh zoh a hita hi.
Huan Israel tate, siampute leh Levi mite leh, saltanna ta dangten, hiai Pathian in latna nuam takin a neita uhi.
Huan hiai Pathian in latna ah bawngtal za khat, belam tal za nih, belamnou za li a lan ua; huan Israel tenteng adia khelhna thillat dingin, keltal sawm leh nih, Israel namte zah dungjuiin.
Huchiin Jerusalema om, Pathian nasepna adingin, siampute a kihawmna uah, Levi mite a muntan uah a koih uhi; Mosi laibua kigelh bangin.
Huan saltanna taten a kha khatna a ni sawmleh li niin paikan a tang ua.
Siampute leh Levi mite lah a kisiangsak khawm vek ngal ua; a vek un a siang ua: huchiin saltanna tate ading leh, a unaute uh siampute ading leh, amau mah adingin, paikan a gouta uhi.
Huchiiin saltanna akipana hongpai khe nawn, Israel tate leh, TOUPA, Israel Pathian zong dinga, gam khovelmite buahna akipan amau leh amau kihihkhe tuamte tengtengin, a neta ua, nuam takin ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh ankuangluina a bawlta uhi:TOUPAN lah amaute nuam a sa sakin, amau lamah Assuria kumpipa lungtang, Israel Pathian, Pathian in nasepnaa a khutte uh hatsak dingin a kiheisakta ngala.
TOUPAN lah amaute nuam a sa sakin, amau lamah Assuria kumpipa lungtang, Israel Pathian, Pathian in nasepnaa a khutte uh hatsak dingin a kiheisakta ngala.
Huan hiai thilte nungin, Persia kumpipa Artaksarsi vaihawm laiin, Serai tapa Ezra, Azarai tapa, Hilia tapa,
Sallum tapa, Zadok tapa, Ahitub tapa,
Amaria tapa, Azaria tapa, Meraioth tapa,
Zerahia tapa, Uzzi tapa, Bukki tapa,
Ahisua tapa, Phineha tapa, Eleazar tapa, Aron siampulian tapa:
Hiai Ezra Babulon akipan a pai tou a; huan amah Mosi dan, TOUPA Israel Pathian a piaksaa kivasa ahi a: a tunga TOUPA a Pathian khuta om dungjui bangin, a ngetna tengteng kumpipan a phalsak hi.
Huan kumpipa Artaksarsi kum sagih kumin, Jerusalem ah Israel tate laka a khen, siampute laka a khen, Levi mite, lasamite, kongkhak ngakmite leh Nithinum mite, a hoh tou ua.
Huchiin kumpipa kum sagih kum kha nganain Jerusalem ah Ezra a hongpaita hi.
Babulon akipan a kha khatna ani khat niin a kuan tou pantaa, a kha ngana a ni khat niin a Pathian khut hoih a tunga a om bangjelin, Jerusalem a hongpai hi.
Ezrain lah TOUPA dan zong ding leh, hih ding leh, Israel thusehte leh vaihawmte sinsak dingin a lungtang a koih kip ngala.
Tuin kumpipa Artaksarsiin siampu, laigelhmi, TOUPA thupiakte thute gelhmi leh Israel kianga a thusehte gelhmi Ezra kianga a piak laikhak kopi hiai ahi.
Artaksarsi, kumpipate kumpipan, siampu, van Pathian dan gelhmi, buching leh huchibang jelin, Ezra kiangah.
Thupiak ka bawl hi, huchia Israela mite laka amaute tengteng, ka gamsunga, a siampute uh leh Levi mite, amau uttuh petmaha Jerusalema pai dinga theihsakte, nang kiangah pai uhen.
Kumpipa leh a thudotmi sagihten, na khuta om na Pathian dan dungjuia, Juda leh Jerusalem tungtang thu dan dinga, nang a honsawl bang un;
A tenna Jerusalema om, Israel Pathian kianga manneiloua kumpipa leh a thudot miten a piaksate uh dangka leh dankaeng po dingin,
Babulon bial tengtenga dangka leh dangkaeng na muh tengteng, mite leh siamputen amau utthua thillat, Jerusalema om a Pathian uh in adia uttaka a lat uh tengteng toh;
Huaijiakin thanopna toh hiai sumin bawngtalte, belamtalte, belamnoute, na lei dinga, a anpiak thillatte uleh a dawnding thillatte uh toh, huchiin Jerusalema om na Pathian uh in maitam tungah huaite na lan ding hi.
Huan dangka leh dangkaeng omlai hih dingdan nang leh na unauten hoih na sak dandan uh, na Pathian uh deihlam bangin huai tuh hih un.
Huan na Pathian ina nasepna dinga tuiumbelsuan kon piak uh, Jerusalem Pathian maah piain.
Huan na Pathian in dinga kiphamoh dangdangte, piakna ding na neih dingte, kumpipa sum in akipanin pe khiain.
Huan kei, kumpipa kei Artaksarsi mahmahin luipi khena om sumkemmite tengteng kiangah thupiak ka bawl hi, huchia Ezra siampu, van Pathian dan laigelhmiin nou a honnget, thanuam taka hihjel a hih theihna dingin.
Dangka talent za khat, huit-buh tehna za khat, uain bath za khat, sathau bath za khat leh a zah gen louin chi nangawn.
Bangpeuhmah van Pathianin thu a piak, van Pathian in adingin hihin om jel hen; ajiak bel bangdingin kumpipa leh a tapate gam siatna dingin thangpaihna a om dia?
Huailouin leng ka honchi taktak uh hi, siampute leh Levi mite, lasamite, kongkhakngakmite, Nithinim mite hiam hiai Pathian in sikhate laka akua-akua tungtang ah, van leiman te, sumsinna leiman te hiam lamlian leiman te amau liau paih dan ahi kei ding hi.
Huan nang, Ezra, na khuta om na Pathian pilna juiin, thukhenmi leh vaihawmmi, tuipi khena omte mite tengteng vaihawm dingin sepin; na Pathian dante tengteng bang; huan huaite theiloute nou sinsak un.
Huan kuapeuh na Pathian dan leh, kumpipa dan jui lou, sihna chiang hizongleh, thanuam takin a tungah vaihawmna bawlin om hen, ahihkeileh, khakmangna hiam, van khakna hiam, suangkulhlutna tanin, chiin.
Jerusalema om TOUPA in kilawm sak dinga, kumpipa lungtanga hichi banga thil koih, I pipute Pathian, TOUPA nuamsain om hen;Kumpipa leh, a thudotmite leh, kumpipa lal thiolhihteite tengteng maa ka tunga chitna honpepa.
Huan ka tunga TOUPA ka Pathian khut dungjuiin hihhatin ka omta, huchiin ka kianga hoh dingin Israel akipan mi kizen tungtuan ka kaikhawmta hi.
Kumpipa leh, a thudotmite leh, kumpipa lal thiolhihteite tengteng maa ka tunga chitna honpepa.
Huan ka tunga TOUPA ka Pathian khut dungjuiin hihhatin ka omta, huchiin ka kianga hoh dingin Israel akipan mi kizen tungtuan ka kaikhawmta hi.
Huan hiaite a pipute uh inkote laka a lupenta ahi ua, huan hiai, kumpipa Artaksarsi vaihawm laia kei hon jui huaite khangthusuina ahi.
Phineha tapate lakah, Gersom: Ithamar tapate lakah Daniel: David tapate lakah, Hattus,
Sikania tapate lakah; Paros tapate lakah, Zekaria: huan amah toh pasalte khangthusuinaa suikhawmte za khat leh sawmnga hi.
Pahath-moab tapate lakah, Eliehoenai Zerahia tapa; huan amah toh pasal za nihte.
Sikania tapate lakah, Jahaziel tapa; huan amah toh pasal sawmngate.
Huan Adin tapate lakah, Ebed Jonathan tapa; huan amah toh pasal sawmngate.
Huan Elam tapate lakah, Jesai Athalia tapa; huan amah toh pasal sawmsagihte.
Huan Sephatia tapate, Mikael tapa Zebadia; huan amah toh pasal sawmgukte.
Joab tapate lakah, Obadia Jehiel tapa; huan amah toh pasal za nih leh sawm leh giatte.
Huan, Selomith tapate lakah, Josiphia tapa; huan amah toh pasal za khat leh sawmgukte.
Huan Bebai tapate lakah, Bebai tapa Zekaria; huan amah toh pasal sawmnih leh giatte.
Huan Azgad tapate lakah, Hakkatan tapa Johanan; huan amah toh pasal ja leh sawmte.
Huan Adonika tapate lakah, tuate a tawpna; huai hiaite a min uh ahi, Eliphelte, Jeuel, leh Simaia leh, amau toh pasal sawmgukte.
Huan Bigvai tapate, Uthai leh Zabbud; huan amau toh pasal sawmsagihte.
Huan Ahava phaa luang luipi tanin amaute ka kaikhawma; huan huailaiah ni thum ka giak uh: huan mite ka en vialviala, siampute, huaiah Levi tapate kuamah ka mu kei hi.
Huan Eliezer te, Simaia te, Elnathan te, Jarib te, Elnathan, Nathan te, Zekaria te, Misullam te, mi kizen tungtuan ka thukhaka; sinsakmite Joiarib leh Elnathan leng.
Huan kasiphia muna Iddo hausapa kiang ah amau ka sawl khiaa; Iddo kiangah leh, Iasiphia muna a unaute nithinimte kiang a gen ding uh ka hilha, I Pathian in ua dinga masemmi ei adia hontonpih dingin.
Huchiin I tung ua I Pathian khut hoih a om dung juiin pasal khat lungelsiam, Mahli tapate laka, Levi tapa, Israel tapa ei dingin a honpi ua; Siribia a tapa te leh a unaute, sawmlehgiat toh;
Huan Hasabia, amah toh Merari tapate laka Jesai toh, a unaute leh a tapate uh, sawmnih toh;
Huan Nithinim mite, David leh lalten Levi mite nasepna dingin a piakte uh, za nih leh sawmnih Nithinim mite: a vek un mina genkhiak ahi uhi.
Huan huailaiah, Ahava lui ah, anngawl ka phuanga, huchia eia ding leh I nauneute ading leh, I neih ilamte tengteng adia lampi tang amah laka zong dinga I Pathian uh maa ei leh ei I kiniamkhiak theihna dingin.
Lampia melma dou dinga ei honpanpih dia kumpipa kianga sepaih pawl leh sakol tungtuangmi nget lah ka zum ngala: hoihna dinga, amah zong tengteng tungah I Pathian khut a oma; himahleh amah mangngilhte tengteng siatna dingin a thlhihtheihna leh a thangpaihna a om hi, chia, kumpipa kianga thu I gen tak jiakin.
Huchiin an I ngawl ua hiai dingin I Pathian I ngen ngutngut ua: huchiin amah I ngenzou uh.
Huailaiin siampute laka pipente laka sawmlehnih, Sirebia, Hasabia, leh a kiang ua om a unaute uh laka sawm ka sehkhena,
Amau adingin dangka leh dangkaeng leh, tuiumbelsuan, kumpipa leh a thuhilhmite leh, a lalte leh huailaia om Israel tengteng lat ka buksaka:
A khut sung mahmah uah dangka talent za guk leh sawmnga leh dangka tuiumbelsuan talent za ka buk saka; dangkaeng lakah talent ja;
Huan dangkaeng noubem sawmnih, darik sang khat lakah; huan dal hoih mitanthei, dangkaeng bang a manpha bel nih.
Huan a kiang uah, TOUPA adin na siangthou ua, tuiumbelsuante a siangthou uh; huan dangka leh dangkaeng TOUPA, na pipute uh Pathian adia utthua thillat ahi uh.
TOUPA in dantante, Jerusalema siampute laka lupente leh, Levi mite leh, Israel pipute inkote lalte maa huaite na buk masiah uh, kiveng unla, amaute kem un, a chi a.
Huchiin siampute leh Levi miten dangka leh dangkaeng leh, tuimbelsuante buk a la ua, I Pathian in ua Jerusalema a puak ding un.
Huchihlaiin Jerusalem lama pai dingin, a kha khatna a ni sawm leh nih niin Ahava lui akipan I pawt khia ua: huan I Pathian khut I tunguah a oma, melma khut leh lampia bukmi akipan aman hontankheta hi.
Huan Jerusalem I hongtung ua huaiah ni thum I om uh.
Huan a ni li niin dangka leh dangkaeng leh tuiumbelsuante I Pathian in uah Uria siampu tapa Meremoth khutah bukin a oma; a kiangah Phineha tapa Eleazar a om; huan a kiang uah Jesua tapa Jozabad leh, Binnui tapa Noadia, Levi mite a om uh;
A zah leh a gikdan a vekin: huchiin huai laiin a gikdan tengteng gelh ahi.
Pimanga akipana hongpai, saltanna taten Israel Pathian kiangah halmang thillatte, bawngtal sawmlehnih Israel tengteng adingin, belamtal sawmkua leh guk, belamnou sawmsagih leh sagih, keltal khelhna thillat dingin sawmlehnih a lan uhi: hiaite tengteng TOUPA adinga halmang thillat ahi.Huan kumpipa thukhenmite kiang leh, tuipi khena ukpipate kiangah kumpipa thupiakte a pekhia uh: huan mite leh Pathian in a panpih uhi.
Huan kumpipa thukhenmite kiang leh, tuipi khena ukpipate kiangah kumpipa thupiakte a pekhia uh: huan mite leh Pathian in a panpih uhi.
Huchia hiai thilte hihkhita a omlaiin, lalte ka kiangah a hongpai nai ua, Israel mite leh, siampute leh Levi mite, gamtea mite a kipan amauleh amau a kikoihtuam kei ua, amaute kihhuainate, Kanan mite, Hit mite, Periz mite, Jebus mite, Amon mite, Moab mite, Aigupta mite leh Amor mite, dungjuiin a om uh, chiin.
Amau ading leh a tapate uh adingin a tanute uh lakah a lata ngal ua; huchiin chi siangthou gamte mite toh amau leh amau a kihelkhawmta hi: ahi, hiai tatlekna ah lalte khut leh vaihawmmite a pipen ahi uhi.
Huchia hiai thil ka jakin, ka puansilh leh ka puannak ka botkeka, ka khamula ka bot khiaa, lam dang sain ka tu suk maimah hi.
Huchihlaiin saltannaa amaute tatlekna jiaka, Israelte Pathian thute jiaka laua ling michih ka kiangah a hong kikhawm ua; nitaklam kithoih hun masiah lamdang sain ka tuta hi.
Huan nitaklam kithoih hun laiin ka zahlakna akipan ka thoua, ka puansilh leh ka puannak bohkeksa toh; huan ka khukdintaa, TOUPA ka Pathian lamah ka khutte ka jak khiaa;
Aw ka Pathian, na kianga dak tou dingin ka zumin ka zakta hi, ka Pathian: ka thulimlouhnate uh ka lu tunglam uah a pung deuhdeuha, ka mohna un vante a sunta hi.
Ka pipute uh damlai hun akipan tu ni phain nakpiin ka namohta ua; huchiin ka thulimlouhnate uh jiakin kou, ka kumpipate uh leh, ka siampute uh, gamte kumpipate khut ah, namsau ah, saltanna ah leh, lohna ah leh, mai zumna ah, hiai ni bangin piak khiakin ka naomta uhi.
Huan tuin sawtlou sung adin TOUPA ka Pathian ua kipanin hehpihna honglanga, suakta dinga omlai dia nutsiat dingin leh, a mun siangthoua omkipna honpe dingin, huchia ka Pathian un ka mitte uh a honsuk vak saka, ka tanna ua halhna neukha a honpiak theihna dingin.
Sikha lah ka hi ngal ua; huchipiin leng sikha ka hihna uah ka Pathian un a hon mangngilh keia, himahleh Persia kumpipate mitmuhin chitna a honpiaa, halhna honpe ding, ka Pathian uh in ding sak ding leh, huaia a siatna bawlpha ding leh, Juda leh Jerusalema kulhbang honpe dingin.
Huan tuin, Aw ka Pathian uh, hiai zohin bang ka chi ding ua?
Na thupiakte lah ka lehngatsanta ngal ua,
Na sikha jawlneite zanga, Tang dinga na paina uh, huai gam, gamtea mite nitna jiaka gam nin ahi, a kihhuainate uh, huaiin a kihhuainate uh tohkhatlam tawp akipan khatlam tawp tana hidimna jiakin.
Huaijiakin na tanute uh a tapate uh kiangah pe kei unla, a tanute uh leng na tapate uh adingin lasam kei un, a muanna uhiam a hauhsakna uhiam leng khantawnin zong sam kei uh: huchia na hat ua, gama a hoih na nek ua, khantawna na tate uh adia gouluah dia na nutsiat theihna ding un.
Huchia ka tat giloute uh jiaka leh ka mohna thupi mahmah jiak ua, ka tung ua hongtung tengteng zohin, nang ka Pathian un ka thulimlouhnate uh gunzah sanga hon gawt tawmjawa, hichi bang omlai non piak bang muin,
Na thupiakte bohse nawnin, hiai kihhuaite hih mite toh kituak in ka zom ding uam?
Omlai ding om lou khopa, suakta ding himhim leng omlou khopa na bawlgawp matan ka tunguah na heh sin kei dia hia?Aw TOUPA Israel Pathian, nang na diktata; a suakta omlaite na honnutsiat jiakin, hiai ni bang: ngaiin, ka mohna un na maah ka om uhi; hiai jiakin lah kuamah na maah a ding thei sin ngal kei ua.
Aw TOUPA Israel Pathian, nang na diktata; a suakta omlaite na honnutsiat jiakin, hiai ni bang: ngaiin, ka mohna un na maah ka om uhi; hiai jiakin lah kuamah na maah a ding thei sin ngal kei ua.
Huchia Ezra kapa Pathian in maia leisatnaa a kizata, a thuma, thupha a tawi laiin, Israel akipan pasal leh numei leh naupang tampi kikhawmte a kiangah hongkikaikhawm ua: mite lah a nak kah mahmah ngal ua.
Huan Elam tapate laka khat, Jehiel tapa Sekanianin a dawnga Ezra kiangah, I Pathian tungah I natalekta ua, gama mite numei lamdangte I nakitenpihta uh: hitamahleh hiai thil thu-ah Israel adingin lametna a om lai hi.
Huaijiakin tuin jite tengteng leh, amau akipana huchibanga piangte, ka toupa thihilh dungjuiin leh, I Pathian uh thupiak a laua lingte thuhilh dingjuiin, koih mang dingin I Pathian toh thu I khung ding uh; huan dan dungjuiin kihih leh
Thou in, a thu lah nanga ahi ngala, kou leng na kiangah ka om ding uhi: hangsan takin om inla, hihin, a chi a.
Huchiin Ezra a thoua, hiai thu dungjuia a hih ding un, siampute leh Levi mite laka pipente leh Israel tengteng a kichiamsak ta hi.
Huchiin a kichiamta uhi.
Huan Pathian in mai akipan Ezra a thou khiaa, Eliasib tapa Jehohanan dantan sungah a lut a: huan huailaia a thongpai laiin, tanghou a ne keia, tui lah a dawn kei hi: saltanna ate tatlekna jiakin a sun ngala.
Huan Juda leh Jerusalem tenga saltanna tate kiangah thu a puang khia ua, Jerusalem a kikaikhawm vek dingin;
Huan kuapeuh ni thum sunga hongpai lou, lalte leh upate thu bang jelin, a van tengteng laksak ahi dinga, amah mah saltanna omkhawmte akipana tuamkoih ahi ding.
Huchihlaiin Juda leh Benjamin mi tengteng Jerusalem ah ni thum sungin a kikaikhawm ua; a kha kuana ahi a, a kha ni sawmnih ni: huchiin mi tengteng teng Pathian in maia mun lian ah a tu ua, hiai thu lhe vuah pi jiakin a ling uh.
Huan Ezra siampu a dinga, a kiang uah, Na talek ua, Israel mohna khangsak dingin, numei lamdangte na kitenpih uh,
Huaijiakin tuin na pipute uh Pathian, TOUPA kiangah thupha tawi unla, a kipahlam hih un: gama mite akipan leh, numei lamdangte akipan kituam seh un, a chi a.
Huchiin kikhawmte tengtengin a dawng ua, aw ngaih takin, Ka tungtang uh na gen bagin, huchibangin ka hih ding uh, a chi ua.
Himahleh mite tampi ahi ua, vuah tampi zuk lai ahi, huchiin inpua ah ka ding theikei ua, hiai lah ni khat hiam nasep ahi kei hi: hiai thu-ah lah nakpi takin I natalekta ngal ua.
Tuin omkhawmte adingin I lalte ding sehin om henla, I Pathian uh thangpaihna ei akipana a kiheia, hiai thu hihbei a hih masiah, numei lamdangte kitenpihte I khopitea omte hun sehsate ah, khopi chitenga upate amau toh, huailaia vaihawmmite toh, hongpai uhen.
Asahel tapa Jonathan leh Tikva tapa Jahzeia kian hiai thu a sel uh: huan Meshullam leh Sabbethai Levi miin amaute apanpih uh.
Huan huchibangin saltanna akipan kiknawnten a hihta uh.
Huan siampu Ezra, a pipute uh inkote dungjuia, pipute inkote laka lupen kuatete hiam toh, leh a min te ua amaute tengteng, tuamseh khiakin a om ua; huchiin a thu entel dingin a kha sawmna ni khat niin a tuta uh.
Huan a kha khatna a ni khat niin numei namdang kitenpihmite tengteng a hih khin ua.
Huchiin siampute tapate lakah numei lamdang kiten pih muhin a oma: huaite, Jesua tapate, Jozadak tapa leh, a unaute, Maaseia te, Eliezer te, Jarib te, leh Gedalia te.
Huan a jite uh koih mang dingin pha a sa ua; a moh jiak un, a mohna adingin belamhon laka belamtal a lanta uhi.
Huan Immer tapate lakah; Hanani leh Zebadia.
Huan Harim tapate lakah; Maaseia, leh Elijal leh Semai leh, Jehiel leh, Uzzia.
Huan Pashur tapate lakah; Elioenai, Maasea Ismael, Nethanel, Jozabad leh, Elasa.
Huan Levi mite lakah; Jozabad leh, Simei leh Kalai (huai mah tuh Kelita a hi), Pethahia, Juda, leh Eliezer.
Huan lasamite lakah; Eliasib: huan konkhakngakmite lakah; Sallum leh, Telem leh, Uri.
Huan Israel lakah: Paros tapate lakah; Ramia leh, Izzia, leh Malkija leh Mijamin leh, Eleazar leh, Hasabia leh Benia.
Huan Elam tapate lakah; Mattania, Zekaria, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremot leh Elija.
Huan Zattu tapate lakah: Elionai, Eliasib, Mattania, Jeremot, Zabad, leh Aziza.
Huan Bebai tapate lakah; Jehohanan, Hanania, Zabbai, Athlai.
Huan Bani tapate laka; Mesullam, Malluk, leh Adaia Jasub Sial, leh Jeremot.
Huan Pahath-moab tapate lakah; Adna, Silal, Benaia, Maasea, Mattania, Bezalel, Binnui, leh Manasi.
Huan Harim tapate lakah; Eliezer, Issija, Malkija, Semai, Simeon;
Benjamin, Malluk Semaria.
Hasum tapate lakah; Mattenai, Mattatta, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasi, Simei.
Bani tapate lakah; Maadai, Amram, leh Uel;
Benai, Bedei, Siluhi;
Vania, Meremot, Eliasib;
Mattania, Mattenai, leh Jaasu;
Hani, leh Binnui, Simei;
Selemia leh, Nathan leh, Adaia;
Maknadebai, Sasai, Sarai;
Azarel leh, Selemaia, Semaria;
Sallum, Amaria, Joseph.
Nabo tapate lakah; Jeiel, Mattithia, Zabad, Zebina, Iddo leh Joel, Benaia.Hiaite tengteng ji lamdante a pi ua: huan a lak ua khenkhatten ji a nei ua huaite akipan tate a nei uhi.
Hiaite tengteng ji lamdante a pi ua: huan a lak ua khenkhatten ji a nei ua huaite akipan tate a nei uhi.
Hakalia tapa Nehemia thute.
Kisleu kha, kum sawmnihna kuma, Susan inpia ka omin, hichi a honghi a.
Hanania, ka unaute laka khat, a honga, amah leh Juda akipan mi kua te hiam; amaute kiangah saltanna akipana nutsiata omte, Juda suaktate tanchin leh Jerusalem thu ka donga.
Huan amau ka kiangah, Huai lai biala saltanna akipan omlaite gimthuakna thupi thuak leh simmohin a om uh: Jerusalem kulhbangte leng a chima, huan huai a kongpite leng meiin a kang, a chi ua.
Huan hichi ahi a, hiai thute ka jak laiin, ka tua ka kapa, ni bangzah hiam ka suna; huan van Pathian maah an ka ngawla ka thuma.
Aw TOUPA, van Pathian, Pathian thupi leh lauhuai, amah ita a thupiakte juite tunga thukhun theigige leh chitna nei gige:
Tuin na bilin honhungaih henla, na mitte hong kihong hen, huchia na sikha thumna, huai huna, sun leh jana, na sikhate Israel tate a dia, nangmah tunga ka hihkhelh uh, Israel tate khelhna thupha tawi kawma, ka thumna non ngaihkhiak sak theihna din: ahi, kei leh ka pa inkote ka khialta uhi.
Thanghuaitakin na tungah ka gamta ta ua, na thupiakte ka juita kei ua, na sikha Mosi kianga na thupiak, thusehte, leh vaihawmte.
Theigigein, ka honngen ahi, na sikha Mosi kianga thu na piak, Na tatlek uhlehm mite lakah ka honthehjak ding:
Himahleh ka kianga na hongkik ua, ka thupiakte na zuih ua na hih uleh, delhkhiaka na omna uh van tawp mun pekah himahleh, huai akipanin amau te ka kaikhawm dinga, huan ka min tenna dia ka mun telsa ah amau ka pi khawm ding, chiin.
Tuin hiaite, na thilhihtheihna thupi leh, na ban hata na tatsa, na sikhate leh na mite ahi uh.Aw TOUPA, ka honngen ahi, na min laudansiam nuamsa, na sikha thumna leh, na sikhate thumna na bilin hungaih hen: ka honngen ahi, tuniin na sikha lohchingsak inla, hiai mi mitmuhin a kiangah chitna piain.
(Kei bel kumpipa dawndingpepa ka hi. )
Aw TOUPA, ka honngen ahi, na min laudansiam nuamsa, na sikha thumna leh, na sikhate thumna na bilin hungaih hen: ka honngen ahi, tuniin na sikha lohchingsak inla, hiai mi mitmuhin a kiangah chitna piain.
(Kei bel kumpipa dawndingpepa ka hi. )
Artaksarsi kumpipa kum sawmnih, Nisan khain, a maa uain a om laiin hichi ahia, uain ka laa, kumpipa kiangah ka piaa.
A maah nidangin ka dah nai kei hi.
Huan kumpipan ka kiangah, Na chi lah a na ngal keia, bangdinga dah mel pu na hia?
Hiai bangmah dang ahi keia lungtang dahna ahi, a chi a.
Huaitakin ka lau mahmah a.
Kumpipa kiang ah, Kumpipa khantawnin dam hen: bangchin ka mel a dah lou dia, ka pipute hante omna, khopi, se gawpa oma, huai a kongpite meiin kangbei hi ven?
Ka chi a.
Huan kumpipan ka kiang ah, Ahihleh bang ahia na nget?
A chia.
Huchiin van Pathian kiangah ka thumta hi.
Huan kumpipa kiangah, Kumpipa kipah lam a hiha, na mitmuha na sikhain deihsakna a muh leh, Juda gamah, ka pipute hante omna khopiah ka bawl theihna dingin kei hon sawl lechin, ka chi a.
Huan kumpipan ka kiangah, (kumpinu leng a kiangah a tua, ) Na khualzinna bangtana sawt ahi dia?
Huan chikchiangin na hongkik nawn dia?
A chi a.
Huchiin honsawl kumpipa kipahlam ahia; amah hun ka pia hi.
Huailouin kumpipa kiangah, Kumpipa kipah lam ahih aleh, Juda gam tan ka tun matenga kei a honpaisak jel theihna ding un, luipi khena ukpipate kianga piak ding laikhakte honpe lechin;
In toh kizom kulh kongpite ading leh, khopi kulhbangte ading leh, ka lutna ding in adinga bawl ding inkamte bawlna dia sing a honpiakna dingin, kumpipa gammang kempa Asaph kinagah laikhak khat leng, ka chi a.
Huchiin kumpipan a honphalsaka, ka tunga ka Pathian khut hoih a om bangin.
Huchin luipi khena ukpipate kiang ka hongtunga, a kiang uah kumpipa laikhakte ka pia hi.
Huchiin kumpipan honjui dingin sepaihpawl heutute leh sakol tungtuangmite a sawl hi.
Huan Horon mi, Sanballat leh, sikha Tobia, Amon min ajak un, a lungkham sak mahmaha, Israel tate hoihna zong mi khat lah hongpai a om ngala.
Huchiin Jerusalem ah ka honga, huaiah ni thum ka omta hi.
Huan janin ka thou a, kei leh ka kianga om mi tawm chikte; Jerusalem adia hih ding ka lungtang sunga ka Pathianin bang ahia a koih mi kuamah ka hilh kei a: ka kiangah ganta, a tunga ka tuanna ganta chihlouh, leng a om kei hi.
Huan janin gulpi tuileh lam, ekvum kongpi lamah, guam kongpia paiin ka pawt khiaa, a chimsa, Jerusalem kulhbangte leh, meia kangsa kongpite ka velta hi.
Huan tuikhuk kongpi leh kumpipa dil ah ka hoha: himahleh ka nuaia om ganta paina ding mun a om kei hi.
Huan luita juiin janin ka pai toua, kulhbang ka vela; huan ka kik nawna, guam kongpi ah ka luta, huchiin ka kiknawnta hi.
Huchiin ka paina lam hiam, ka hih hiam vaihawmmiten a theikei uh; Judate kiangah leng, siampute hiam, miliante hiam, vaihawmte hiam leh nasep sem midangte kiangah leng ka gen nai kei hi.
Huan a kiang uah.
I dinmiun uh hoihlouh dan na mu ua, Jerusalem a siat khit dan, huaia kongpite meia a kat khit dan: simmoha I om nawn louhna dingin, kisa un Jerusalem bang I lam nawn ding uh, ka chi a.
Huan ka tunga hoih ka Pathian khut tanchin amau ka hilha; ka kianga a gen kumpipa thute leng, Huan amau, Thou niin lam ni, a chi ua.
Huchiin nasep hoih sem dingin a khutte uh a hatsakta uhi.
Himahleh Horon mi Sanballat leh, Amon mi, sikha Tobia Arabia mi Gesemin a jak un, a honnuihsan ua, a hon simmoh ua, Bang thil ahia na hih uh?
Kumpipa tunga hel ding na hi uhia? a chi ua.Huan amau ka dawnga a kianga uah, Van Pathian, aman kou a honlohching sak ding, huaijiakin kou a sikhate ka thou ding ua ka lam ding uh: himahleh nou Jerusalem ah tan na neikei ua, thuneihna leng, theihgigena leng, ka chi hi.
Huan amau ka dawnga a kianga uah, Van Pathian, aman kou a honlohching sak ding, huaijiakin kou a sikhate ka thou ding ua ka lam ding uh: himahleh nou Jerusalem ah tan na neikei ua, thuneihna leng, theihgigena leng, ka chi hi.
Huchiin siampu lian Eliasib a unau siampute toh a thou ua, belam kongpi a bawl ua; a hihsiangthou ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua; Meah insang tanin ahihsianghtou ua, Hananel insang tanin.
Huan amah zomin Jeriko miten a lam uh.
Huan amau zomin Imri tapa Zakkurin a lam hi.
Huan Hassena tapaten ngasa kongpi a hih ua; a inkamte akhung ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua, a kalhnate leh a kalhnatawnte.
Amau zomin Uria tapa, Hakkoz tapa, Meremotin a bawl phaa.
Huan amau zomin Mesullam Berekia tapa, Mesezabel tapain a bawlpha.
Huan amau zomin Baana tapa Zadokin a bawlpha hi.
Huan amau zomin Teko miten a bawlpha ua; himahleh a miliante un a Toupa uh nasepna ah a nakpan nuam kei uhi.
Huan kongpi lui pen Pasia tapa Joiada leh Besodeia tapa Mesullamin a bawlpha ua, a inkamte a khung ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua, a kalhnate leh, a kalhnatawnte.
Huan amau zomin Gibeon mi Melatia leh Meronoth mi, Jadon, Gebeon mite, Mizpah mite, luipi khena ukpipa laltutphah toh kizomten a bawl hoih ua.
Huan amah zomin Harhai, dangkaengsekmite, tapa Uzzielin a bawl hoih a.
Huan amah zomin gimlimbawlmite tapa Hananiain a bawl hoiha, kulhbang ja tanphain Jerusalem a bubitsak uhi.
Huan amaute zomin Jerusalem seh kim khata vaihawmpa, Hur tapa Rephaiain a bawlphaa.
Huan amau zomin Harumaph tapa Jedaiain, amah in sun hialin a bawlphaa.
Huan amah zomin Hasabnei tapa Hattusin a bawlpha a.
Malkija Harim tapa leh, Hasub Pahath-moab tapain a mun dang leh meipi insang a bawlpha uh.
Amah zomin Jerusalem seh kimkhata vaihawmpa, Hallohes tapa Sallumin, amah leh a tanute toh, a bawlpha ua.
Guam kongpi pen Hanun leh, Zanoaha tengten a bawlpha ua, a lam ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua, a kalhnate leh, a kalhnatawnte leh, ekvum kongpi lama kulhbang tong sang khat toh.
Huchiin Beth-hakkerem seha vaihawmpa, Rekab tapa Malkijain ekvum kongpi a bawl hoiha; a lama, a kongkhakte, a kalhnate leh, a kalhnatawnte a tunga.
Huan Mizpah seha vaihawmpa, Kol-hoze tapa Sallumin tuikhuk kongpi a bawl hoiha; a lama, a vuka, kongkhakte, kalhnate, leh kalhnatawnte leh, kumpipa huan kianga Sela dil bang, David khopi akipana suk pai leichial tanin a bawl hi.
Amah nungin Beth-zur seh kimkhata vaihawmpa, Azbuk tapa Nehemiain, David hante toh kimat mun leh, bawlsa dil chiang leh, mi hatte in chiang tanin a bawlphaa.
Amah nungin, Levi mite, Keilah seh kimkhata vaihawmpa Asabiain, amah seh a diing in a bawl hoiha.
Levi mite, Bani tapa Rehum-ten a bawlpha ua.
Amah zomin Keilah seh kimkhata vaihawmpa, Hasabiain, amah seha dingin a bawl hoiha.
Amah nungin a unaute uh, Keilah seh kimkhata vaihawmpa, Henadad tapa Bavaiin a bawl hoiha,
Huan amah zomin Mizpah vaihawmpa, Jesua tapa Ezerian, seh dang, kulhbang kawina taka galvan in tana pai touhna sunin a bawl hoiha.
Amah nungin Zabbai tapa Barukin seh dang, kulhbang kawina akipan siampu lian Eliasib in kongkhak chiang a bawl hoiha.
Amah nungin Hakkoz tapa Uria tapa Meremotin seh dang, Eliasib in kongkhak akipan Eliasib in tawpna chiang a bawlphaa.
Amah nungin, phaijang mite, siamputen a bawlpha uh.
Amau nungin Benjamin leh Hasubin a in pha un a bawl hoih ua.
Amau nungin Anania tapa Maaseia tapa Azariain amah in sikah a bawl hoiha.
Amah nungin Henadad tapa Binuiin seh dang, Azaria in akipan kulhbang kawina tan, leh a ning chiang, a bawl hoiha.
Uzai tapa Palalin kulhbang kawina sun chiang a bawl hoiha, kumpipa in tungnung jaw akipana hong ding khe tou insang, venna pisa kianga om toh.
Amah nungin Paros tapa Pedai leh tempul nasem Ophela tengteng suahlam pang tui kongpi leh insang lawkkhia jawn tan a bawlhoih uh.
Amah khitin Teko miten seh dang, Ophel kulhbang chiang phaa, insang thupi dingkhe tou sunin a bawlpha ua.
Siamputen sakol kongpi tunglam, michihin amah intung sun chiatin a bawlpha ua.
Amaute nungin Immer tapa Zadokin amah intung sun tou chiang a bawlphaa.
Amah nungin suahlam kongpi ngakpa Sekania tapa Semaiin, a bawlphaa.
Amah nungin Selemi tapa Hanani leh Hanun Zalaph tapa guknain seh dang a bawlpha uh.
Amah nungin Berekia tapa Mesullamin a dantan tung jawn a bawlpha hi.
Amah nungin dangkaengsekmite tapa Malkijain Nithinimte in leh, sumsinmite in chiang, Hammipkad kongpi jawn chiang leh, a ninga kahtouhna chiang a bawlpha hi.Huan a ninga kahtohna leh belam kongpi kikal dangkaengsekmite leh sumsinmiten a bawlpha uhi.
Huan a ninga kahtohna leh belam kongpi kikal dangkaengsekmite leh sumsinmiten a bawlpha uhi.
Himahleh hichi ahia, kulhbang i lam uh chih Sanballatin a jakin, a hehtaa, nakpi takin a thangpaia, Judate a kouta hi.
Huchiin a unaute leh Samari-a sepaih pawl maah thu a gen a, Hiai Juda jawngkhalten bang ahia a hih uh?
Kihihhat ding uhia? kithoih ding uh hia?
Ni khata tawpna bawl ding u hia?
A kangsa a hih chih muna piin, ninneng sunvum akipana suangte bawlthak ding uhia? achia.
Huchihlaiin Amon mi Tobia a kiangah a oma, aman, A lam uh, sehal khat kuan tou leh, a suang bang uh a lai chim ding, a chi a.
Jain, aw ka Pathian; simmohin lah ka om ngal ua: a honkouna uh amau lutungah kik sak inla, saltanna gama loh ding in amau pia in:
Huan a ginatlouhna uh khuh kenla, na ma akipan a khelhna uh nul mangin omsak ken: inlamte maah lah nang a honheh sakta ngal ua.
Huchiin bang ka bawl ua; huan bang tengteng asandan kim chiangin a kizomta hi: miten lah na sem dingin lungsim a ne ngal ua.
Himahleh hichi ahia, Sanballat te, Tobia te, Arab mite leh Amon mite, Asdo miten Jerusalem kulhbangte bawlphatnain ma a sawn tou jela, a kitapsiatna a kibawlpha, chih a jak un, a thangpai mahmah uhi;
Avek ua hong kuana Jerusalem dou ding leh, huaia buaina omsak dingin a kikum khawmta uh.
Himahleh i Pathian kiangah thumna i bawl ua, sun leh jana amaute vil ding i koih ua, a mau jiakin.
Huan Judain, Puakgik pote hatna a bahtaa, nineng tampi a om; huchiin kulhbang bawl theilou i hi uh, a chi a.
Huan i melmate un, A lak uh i hongtun ua, amaute i thah ua, nasep i khawlsak matan a theikei ding ua, muh leng a mu kei ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan hichi ahi a, amau kianga teng Judate a hongpai lai un, sawm vei i kiang uah mun tengteng akipan hondou ding uh ahi, a honchi ua.
Huaijiakin kulhbang nunglam muna mun niam penpen, mun awngthawlte ah, ka koiha, mite a inkuankuan uh dungjuiin a namsaute utoh, a teipite utoh, a thalpeute utoh ka koih hi.
Huan ka ena, ka thoua, miliante leh, vaihawmmite leh mipi dangte kiangah, Amau lau kei un: TOUPA thupi leh lauhuai theigige unla, na unaute uh, na tapate uh leh na tanute uh adingin galdou un, na jite uh leh na inte uh adingin ka chi a.
Huan hichi ahia, i melmaten i natheita ua, Pathianin a thusawm uh bang mahlou a suaksaka, kulhbang bawl dingin i vek un mi chih a nasepna mun ah i kilehnawnta uh chih a jak lai un.
Huchiin hichi ahia huai hun akipanin, ka sikhate laka a kimkhat nasepna ah a pang ua, alak ua kimkhatin teipi, lum leh thalpeu leh sik puannakte a len ua; huan vaihawmmite Juda inkote nungah a om vek uh.
Kulhbang bawlte leh, vangik puaten a puak lai un, michihin a khutte uh a khat nasepnaa na semin leh, a khut khat lama galvan tawiin;
Inlammiten, mi chihin a namsau a pangah khaisaa neiin, huchiin a lamtou jel uh.
Huan pengkul mutpa ka kiangah a om hi.
Huchiin miliante kiang leh, vaihawmmite kiangah leh mite laka a dangdangte kiangah, Nasep thupiin, a tama, kulhbang tungah i kikhenjak ua, kigamlat takin:
Koilai mun peuha pengkul ging na jakna uah, i kiang uah huailamah kuan un; i Pathian un gal hondou sak ding ahi, ka chi a.
Huchiin nasep i sem ua: a lak ua a kimkhatin jingsang kipat akipan aksite hongkilat matan teipi a tawi ua.
Huchibangmahin huai laiin mite kiangah, Mi chih a sikha toh Jerusalem sungah giak hen, jan chianga ei dinga galvil a hiha, sun chianga na a sep theihna ding un, ka chi a.Huchiin ken leng, ka unauten leng, ka sikhaten leng, kei hongjui galvil miten leng, i lak ua kuamahin i puante uh isuah kei ua, mi chih a galvan toh tui ah a hoh uhi.
Huchiin ken leng, ka unauten leng, ka sikhaten leng, kei hongjui galvil miten leng, i lak ua kuamahin i puante uh isuah kei ua, mi chih a galvan toh tui ah a hoh uhi.
Huchih laiin a unaute uh Judate dema nakpi taka kikouna mite leh a jite uh akipanin a hongomta a.
Kou, ka tapate leh ka tanute uh, tampi ka hi ua: ka nek ua ka hin theihna ding un, buhlehbal honpia un, chi lah a om ngal ua.
Ka loute uh, ka grephuante uh, ka inte uh ka juak uhi: kial jiakin, buhlehbal honpia un, chi kuate hiam leng a om uhi.
Ka loute uh leh ka grephuante ua dit dingin kumpipa siah dingin sum ka leitawi uh, chi mi khenkhatte leng a om ua.
Hinapiin ka sa uh ka unaute uh sa bang ahi a, ka tate uh lah amau tate bang: huan, ngai un, ka tapate uh leh ka tanute uh sikhate hi dingin tanna ah ka pi ua, ka tanute uh laka a khente tannaa piin a omkhin manhial uhi: panpih theihna ka nei het kei ua; mi dangten lah ka loute uh leh ka grephuante uh a nei ngal ua, chiin.
Huchia a kikouna uleh hiai thute ka jakin ka heh mahmah hi.
Huchih laiin ka kingaihtuaha, miliante leh vaihawmmite ka kiselpiha, a kiang uah, Mi chihin a unau lakah a pung na phut uh, ka chi a.
Huchiin amaute demna kikhawmpi thupi ka nei a.
huchiin a kiang uah, Khovelmite kianga juaka omsa, i unau Judate i theih bang un i tanta ua; huan nou na unaute uh juak un, i lak ua khota om ding uh ahi maw?
Ka chi a.
Huan amau a dai dide ua, thu khat leng a neikei uh.
Na thilhih uh a hoih kei: i melmate khovelmiten hon simmohna jiak un, i Pathian laudansiama na om ding uh hi lou hia?
Ka chi behlapa.
Huchibangmahin, ka unaute leh ka sikhate leh ken amau kiangah sum leh buhlehbal ka leitawi sak uhi.
Ka honngen ahi, hiai pung om sak kei ni.
Pe nawn un, ka honngen ahi, a kiang uah, tuni mahmahin a loute uh, a grephuante, a oliv huante u leh a inte uh, a sum uh a seh jana leng, buhlehbal, uain, leh sathau amau akipan na phut khiak uh.
Huan amau, Ka pe nawn ding ua, amau akipan bangmah ka ngiat kei ding uh; huchibangin ka hih ding ua, na chih bang mamahin, a chi ua.
Huan ken siampute ka sama, a kichiamna uh ka laa, huchia hiai thuchiam banga a hihna ding un.
Ken leng ka pheipi ka vuanga, Hiai thuchiam bawl lou peuhmah, a in akipan, a nasepna akipan Pathianin hichibangin vuang hen; hichibang taka vuan khiak ahi dinga, a hawm ding, ka chi a.
Huan khawmpite tengtengin, Amen, TOUPA phatin om hen, a chi uh.
Huchiin miten hiai thuchiam dungjuiin a hihta uhi.
Huailouin Juda gama a ukpipa ding ua seha ka om laia kipan, kumpipa Artaksarsi kum sawmnih akipan kum sawmthum leh nih chiang, huai bel kum sawm leh nih ahia, kei leh ka unauten ukpipa tanghou ka ne nai kei uh.
Himahleh kei maa ukpipa masate mite tunga mohsak theih ahi ua, amau akipanin tanghou leh uain a la uh, dangka sekel sawmli sim louin; ahi, a sikhate uh nangawnin mite tungah vai a hawm uhi: himahleh ken huchibangin ka hih keia, Pathian kihtakna jiakin.
A hi, Huailou leng hiai kulhbang nasepna ah ka pang nilouhlouha, gam himhim leng i lei keiuh: huan ka sikhate tengteng huailamah nasepna ah kaihkhawmin a om uh.
Huaibanah ka dohkan ah Judate leh vaihawmmite laka mi ja leh sawmnga, i kim i vel ua om khovelmite lak akipana i kiang ua hongpaite chih louh, a om uh.
Huan ni khat adinga bawlkholhsa bawngtal khat leh belam hoihhoih guk ahi ua; vasate leng kei adia bawlkhawlsain a om ua, huan ni sawm sunga khatvei uain chi chih akipan koih hoih: hinapiin hiai mite tunga tanna a gik jiakin, ukpipa tanghou hiaite tengteng jiakin ka phut kei hi.Aw ka Pathian, hoihna dingin, kei lam hontheigigein, hiai mite adia ka hih tengteng.
Aw ka Pathian, hoihna dingin, kei lam hontheigigein, hiai mite adia ka hih tengteng.
Huan huchi ahia, kulhbang ka lamkhina, huaiah khangkham a om nawnta kei chih, Sanballat leh Tobia leh, Gesem Arabia mi leh, i melma dangdangte kianga a kitut laiin; (huai hun tanin leng kongpi kongkhakte tung nai kei mahleng; )
Sanballat leh Gesemin ka kiangah mi a honsawl ua, Hongpaiin, Ona phaijanga khuate laka khat ah kimuh khawmna i nei ding, chiin.
Himahleh ka tunga gilou hih a ngaihtuah ua.
Huchiin a kiang uah sawltakte ka sawla, Na thupi ka sep lai ahia, huchiin ka hongpai suk theikei: bangdia ka nut siata, na kiang ua ka hong suk jiaka, nasep khawl ding ahi oi?
Ka chi a.
Huan hichibang ngenin li vei ka kiangah mi a honsawl ua; huan a ngeingeiin amaute ka dawng jel hi.
Huan Sanballatin ka kiangah hichibangin a ngaveina dingin a sikha a khuta laikhak honsa toh a honsawla;
Huaiah, Namte lak ah a kigena, Gasmuin a chi a, nang leh Judaten hel na tum uh; huai adingin kulhbang na lam hi: huchiin nang a kumpipa uh hi dingin, hiai thute dungjuiin,
Jerusalema nang tanchin gen dingin jawlneite leng na sepa, Juda ah kumpipa a om, chiin: huchiin tuin hiai thute dungjuiin kumpipa kianga tut ding ahi; Hucaijiakin hongkuan inla, kihouna i nei ding, chiin.
A kiangah mi ka sawla, Na gen banga huchibang thil hih a om keia, himahleh na lungtang akipan na lawmtawm ahi, chiin.
Amau lah, Hih louh a hihna dingin, nasepna akipan a khutte uh hatlouhsakin a om ding, chia honlausak a ut chiat ngal ua.
Himahleh tuin Aw Pathian, nang ka khutte hatsakin.
Khuma om, Mehetabel tapa Delai tapa Semai in ah ka hoha; huan aman, Biakin sungah, Pathian in ah i kikhawm dia, huchiin biakin kongkhakte i khak ding: nang that dia hong ding uh lah ahi ngal ua; ahi, janin nang that ding a hong ding uh, a chi a.
Huan ken, Mi kei bang a tai ding maw?
Huan kua ahia, huchia om kei bang, a hinna humbitna dia biakin sunga hoh nuam ding?
Ka lut kei ding, ka chi a.
Huan ka ngaihtuaha, huchiin, ngaiin, Pathianin amah a sawl keia; himahleh ka siatna dingin hiai genkholhna a genkheta hi: Tobia leh Sanballatin amah a guai uh.
Hiai adinga goih ahi, ka launa ding leh, huchi banga hiha, khiala, thutut gilou dinga thubuai a neih theihna ding ua, kei a honsimmoh theihna ding un.
Aw ka Pathian, Tobia leh Sanballat hiai nasepte uh bangjel leh jawlneinu Noadi leh, jawlnei dangte, lausak hontumte, theigige in.
Huchiin Elul kha ni sawmnih leh ni nganiin kulh bang zohin a omta hi, ni sawmnga leh nihin.
Huan hichi ahi a, i melmate tengtengin huai a jak un, i kim i vel ua om khovelmi tengteng a lauta ua, a mitmuh ngei uah nakpi takin a lunglelta uhi: hiai nasep lah i Pathian uh hih ahi chih a thei ngal ua.
Huailouin huai laiin Juda milianten laikhak tampi Tobia kiangah a khak ua, amau kiangah Tobia laikhakte a hongtung hi.
Amah Arah tapa Sekania tanu pasal a hih jiakin, Juda ah mi tampi amah lama kichiam lah a om ngal ua; huan a tapa Jehohananin Berekia tapa Mesulam tanu jiin a nei hi.Huailou leng ka maah a thil hoih hihte a gen ua, amah kiangah ka thute a tun jel uhi.
Huchiin Tobiain laikhakte kei honlausak dingin a khak hi.
Huailou leng ka maah a thil hoih hihte a gen ua, amah kiangah ka thute a tun jel uhi.
Huchiin Tobiain laikhakte kei honlausak dingin a khak hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, kulhbang lamkhit a hih a, kongkhakte ka tun khita, kongkhakngakmite leh lasamite leh Levi mite seh a hih khit nung un,
Ka unau Hanani, leh Hanania kulh ukpa kiangah Jerusalem kepna ka piaa: mi ginom ahi a, tampi sanga Pathian laudansiam a hih jiakin.
Huan a kiangah, Ni a sat mateng Jerusalem kongpite hon hi kei hen; huan galvila a din lai un, kong khakte khak uhenla, amaute kalhkhum un: huan Jerusalema tengte vengmi sep inla, mi chih amah dinmunah, mi chih amah in jawn chiat ah.
Huan khopi a jain a liana: himahleh huaiah mite a tawm ua, inte lah lam ahi kei uh.
Huchiin ka Pathianin ka lungtang miliante, vaihawmmite, mipite, kaikhawm dingin a koiha, huchia khangsutnaa sim a hih theihna ding un.
Huan a masapena honglang amaute khangsutna laibu ka mutaa, huaiah gelha om ka mu:
Hiaite bial naupangte ahi ua, Nebukadnezzar Babulon kumpipan a pimangte, huai pimanga omte laka saltanna kipana piakhe toute, Jerusalem leh Judaa kik nawn, mi chih amah khopia kik;
Zerubbabel, Jesua, Nehemia, Azaria, Raamia, Nahamani, Mordekai, Bilsan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, Baana toh hong paite.
Israel mite laka pasal zah: Paros tate, sangnih za khat leh sawmsagih leh nih.
Sephatia tate, za thum sawmsagih leh nih.
Ara tate, za guk sawmnga leh nih.
Pahath-moab, tate, Jesua leh Joab tate, sang nih leh za giat leh sawmlehgiat.
Elam tate, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Zattu tate, za giat sawmli leh nga.
Zakkai tate, za sagih leh sawmguk.
Binnui tate, za guk sawmli leh giat.
Bebai tate, za guk sawmnih leh giat.
Azgad tate, sang nih za thum sawmnih leh nih.
Adonikam tate, za guk sawmguk leh sagih.
Bigvai tate, sang nih sawmguk leh sagih.
Adin tate, za guk sawmnga leh nga.
Ater, Hezekia tate, sawmkua leh giat.
Hasum tate, za thum sawmnih leh giat.
Bezai tate, za thum sawmnih leh li.
Harip tate, za khat leh sawmlehnih.
Gibeon tate, sawmkua leh nga.
Beth-lehem leh Netophah tate, za khat sawmgiat leh giat.
Anathot mite, za khat sawmnih leh giat.
Beth-azmaveth, mite sawmli leh nih.
Kiriathjerim, Kephir, Beer-oth tate, za sagih sawmli leh thum.
Rama leh Geba mite, za guk sawmnih leh khat.
Mikma tate, za khat leh sawmnih leh nih.
Beth-el leh Ai mite, za khat sawmnih leh thum.
Nebo dang mite, sawmnga leh nih.
Elam dang tate, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Harim tate, za thum leh sawmnih.
Jeriko tate, za thum sawmli leh nga.
Lod, Hadid leh Ono tate, za sagih sawmnih leh khat.
Sena tate, sang thum za kua leh sawmthum.
Siampute: Jedaia tate, Jesua inkuan akipan, za kua sawmsagih leh thum.
Imer tate, sang khat sawmnga leh nih.
Pasur tate, sang khat za nih sawmli leh sagih.
Harim tate, sang khat leh sawmlehsagih.
Levi mite: Jesua, Kadmiel tate, Hodeva tate, sawmsagih leh li.
Lesamite: Asaph tate, za khat sawmli leh giat.
Kongkhakngakte: Sallum tate, Ater tate, Talmon tate, Akkub tate, Hatita tate, Sobai tate, za khat sawmthum leh giat.
Nithinim mite: Ziha tate, Hasupha tate, Tabbaoth tate;
Keros tate, Sia tate, Padon tate;
Lebana tate, Hagaba tate, Salmai tate;
Hanan tate, Giddel tate, Gahar tate;
Reaia tate, Rezin tate, Nekoda tate;
Gazzam tate, Uzza tate, Pasea tate;
Besai tate, Me-unim tate, Nephusesim tate;
Bakbuk tate, Hakupha tate, Harhur tate;
Bazlit tate, Mehida tate, Harsa tate;
Barko tate, Sisera tate, Tema tate;
Nezia tate, Hatipha tate.
Solomon sikhate tate: Sotai tate, Sophereth tate, Perida tate;
Jaala tate, Darkon tate, Giddel tate;
Sephatia tate, Hattil tate, Pakereth-hazzebaim tate, Amon tate.
Nithinim mite tengteng leh Solomon sikhate tate, za thum leh sawmkua leh nih.
Huan hiaite Tel-melah, Tel-harsa, Kerub, Addon leh Immer akipan pai toute ahi uh: himahleh a pipute uh inkote, hiam a chi uh hiam, Israel akipan ahi hia chih a ensak theikei uhi:
Delaia tate, Tobia tate, Nekoda tate, za guk sawmli leh nih.
Siampute akipan: Hobaia tate, Hakkoz tate, Barzillai tate, Gilead mi Barzillai tanute laka zi neipa, a min uh tama minsak.
Hiaiten khangthusuinaa sima omte lakah a mingelhna uh a zong uh, himahleh muhin a om kei: huaijiakin nin a sim ahi ua siamputna akipan koihkhiak.
Huan ukpipain a kiang uah, siampu khat Urim leh Thummim toh a hongsuah mateng thil siangthou penpente laka a nek louh ding uh ahi chih a gen a.
Omkhawmte tengteng a vek un sing li leh sang nih leh za thum leh sawmguk,
A pasal sikhate uh leh a nungak sikhate uh, sang sagih za thum sawmthum leh sagihte, sim louhin: huan pasal lasa leh numei lasa za nih sawmli leh nga a nei uhi.
A sakolte uh za sagih sawmthum leh guk; a sakolneute uh, za nih sawmli leh nga;
A sangawngsaute uh, za li sawmthum leh nga; a sabengtungte uh sang guk za sagih leh sawmnih.
Huan pipute inkote laka lupente lak akipan khenkhatte nasem dingin a kipia uh.
Ukpipain sumbawm ah dangkaeng darik sang khat, maiphiatkuang sawmnga, siampute puan za nga leh sawmthum a pia hi.
Huan pupute inkote laka lupente laka khenkhatten dangkaeng darik sang sawmnih leh, dangka puan sang nih leh za nih a pia uhi.
Huan mipitelaka adangdangte piak dangkaeng darik sang sawmnih leh dangka puan sang sawmnih leh, siampute puan sawmguk leh sagih ahi.Huchiin siampute leh, Levi mite leh, kongkhakngakte leh lasamite leh, mite laka a khente leh, Nethinim mite leh Israel tengteng a khopite uah a tengta uhi.
Huan a kha sagihna a hongtunin, Israel tate a khopite uah a om uhi.
Huchiin siampute leh, Levi mite leh, kongkhakngakte leh lasamite leh, mite laka a khente leh, Nethinim mite leh Israel tengteng a khopite uah a tengta uhi.
Huan a kha sagihna a hongtunin, Israel tate a khopite uah a om uhi.
Huchiin mite tengteng tui kongpi maia om mun lian ah mi khat bangina kikhawm khawmta ua; TOUPAN Israel kiang a a piak, Mosi dan laibu hontawi dingin laigelhmi Ezra kiangah thu a gen uhi.
Huan siampu Ezrain omkhawmte, pasal leh numei, theihsiamna toh za thei ding tengteng maah kha sagihna ni khat niin dan thu a honlata hi.
Pasal leh numeite, leh theisiam thei dingte maah, jing khang akipan sunlai tanphain tui kongpi maia om mun lian maah a simta hi; huchiin mite tengteng in dan laibu a bil uh a doh chiat uhi.
Huchiin huai ding maha a bawl uh, sing pulpit tungah laigelhmi Ezra a dinga; a sikah Mattithia lehm Sema leh, Anaia leh, Uria leh, Hilkia, leh Maaseia, a taklam pangah a ding ua; a veilam pangah, Pedaia leh, Misael leh, Malkija leh, Hasum leh, Hasabaddana, Zekaria leh, Mesullam.
Huan Ezrain mite mitmuhin laibu a honga; (mite tunglamah a om ngala; ) huan a hongtan, mite tengteng a ding uh:
Huan Ezrain TOUPA, Pathian thupi tuh a vualjawl a.
Huchiin mite tengteng a dawn ua, Amen, Amen, a khutte uh lik kawmin, a chi ua: huan a lute uh kunsak ua a maite ua lei siin TOUPA a beta uhi.
Jesua, Bani, Serebia, Jamin, Akkub, Sabbethai, Hodia, Ma-aseia, Kelita, Azaria, Jozabad, Hanan, Pelai, Levi miten mipite dan theisiam dingin a bawl ua: huchiin mite amau mun ah a ding uh.
Huan teltakin laibu ah, Pathian dan sungah a sim ua; a omdan a taklang ua, huchia laisim khiak a theihsiamna ding un.
Huan Nehemia, amah Tirsatha ahi a, leh siampu Ezra laigelhmi leh, Levite mite sinsakten, mite tengteng kiangah, Tuni TOUPA na Pathian uh adia ni siangthou ahi; dah kei unla kap kei un, a chi ua.
Dan thute a jak un lah mite tengteng a kap ngal ua.
A kiang uah, Pai unla, thau ne unla, a khum dawn unla, amah adia bangmah bawlkhawla omlou kiangah tantuante khak un: tuni lah i Toupa u adia ni siangthou ahi ngala: dah kei unla; TOUPA kipahna lah na hatna uh ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huchiin Leviten mite tengteng a daisak ua, Tuni siangthou a hihjiakin, dai n; dah sam kei un, chiin.
Huan mite tengteng ne ding leh, dawn ding leh, vualnopna thupi bawl dingin a paita ua, a kiang ua phuankhiaka om thute lah a theisaim ta ngal ua.
Huan a ni nih niin mite tengteng pipute inkote lupente, siampute leh, Levi mite, laigelhmi Ezra kiangah, dan thute ngaikhe dingin a kikhawm khawmta ua.
TOUPAN Mosi zanga Israel tate a kha sagihna ankuangluinaa aidakbuktea a tendan ding uh a thu a napiakdan dana kigelh a mu uh:
Mual ah kuan khia unla, Oliv hiangte leh, gam oliv leh muising hiangte leh, tum hiangte leh, sing vunsakte hiangte, a kigelh banga, aidakbuk bawlna dingin vala un, chia, a khopite tengteng uh leh Jerusalema a puankhiak theihna ding un.
Huchiin mite a pai khia ua, a vala ua, mi chihin a in tungah leh, a pisate uah leh, Pathian pisate ah leh, tui kongpia mun lian ah leh, Ephraim kongpia mun lian ah aidakbukte a kibawlta uhi.
Huan saltanna akipan hongpai nawnte omkhawmte tengtengin aidakbukte a bawl ua, aidakbute ah a tengta ua: Nun tapa Jesua damlai akipan huai ni tanphain Israel taten lah huchibangin ahih nai kei ua.
Huchiin nakpia kipahna mahmah a omta hi.Huailouin ni tengin ni masapen akipan ni tawpni tanin Pathian dan laibu sungah a sim hi.
Huan ankuangluina ni sagih a nei ua; a ni giatniin thuseh dungjuiin kikhopna thupi a omta hi.
Huailouin ni tengin ni masapen akipan ni tawpni tanin Pathian dan laibu sungah a sim hi.
Huan ankuangluina ni sagih a nei ua; a ni giatniin thuseh dungjuiin kikhopna thupi a omta hi.
Huan hiai kha ni sawmnih leh li niin Israel tate anngawl kawm leh, saiippuan silh kawm leh a tung ua lei kibuak kawmin a kikhawm ua.
Huan Israel chite mikhual tengteng akipanin a kituam seh ua, a ding ua a khelhnate uh leh, a pipute uh thulimlouhnate thupha a tawi uh.
Huan a mun uah a ding ua, TOUPA a Pathian uh dan laibu sungah ni khata a sehlina teng a sim ua; a sehlina teng thupha a tawi ua, TOUPA Pathian uh a beta uhi.
Huchihlaiin Levi mite, Jesua, Bani, Kadmiel, Sebania, Bunni, Serebia, Bani, Chenani te dohkan tungah a ding ua, TOUPA a Pathian kiang uah aw ngaih takin a kikou uhi.
Huailaiin Levi mite, Jesua te, Kadmiel te, Bani te, Hasabneia te, Serbia te, Hodia te, Sebania te, Pethahia ten, Ding unla khantawn akipan khantawn phain TOUPA na Pathian uh vualjawl un: huchiin vualjawlna leh phatna tengteng tunglama tawisanga om, na min thupia vualjawlin om hen.
Nang TOUPA na hi, nang kia mahmah; van, vante van, a sepaihte tengteng utoh, lei leh a tunga om thil tengteng, tuipite leh a sung ua om tengteng na bawltaa, a vek un na hawia; huan van sepaihten nang a honbia uhi.
Abram tela, Kaldaite Ur akipana amah pi khiaa, a kianga Abraham min pepa, TOUPA Pathian na hi a;
Na maa a lungtang ginom na mu a, Kanaan mite, Hit mi, Amor mi, Jebus m, Girgas mi te gam pe dinga amah toh thukhun bawlpa, a chite kiang nasana pe dingin, na thute bawlpichinga; nang lah na diktat ngala.
Huan Aiguptaa ka pipute uh gimthuakna na mu a, Tuipi Sana a kahna uh na jaa;
Huan Pharo tung leh, a sikhate tengteng tung leh a gama mite tengteng tungah chiamtehna leh thillamdangte na ensaka; amaute siatna dingin kisatheitakin a gamtang uh chih lah na thei ngal hi; tunia bangin, min na kimuh hi.
A ma uah tuipi na khena, huchiin gam hul tungah tuipi lakah a pai suak ua; amau delhte nang tuithuk sungate, tui hattak sunga suang bangin na pai lut hi.
Huailouin sunin meipi kitungin amaute na piaa; janin mei kitungin, a paina ding lampi ua vakna amaute kianga pe dingin.
Sinai vumah leng na hoh suka, van akipanin amau na houpiha, vaihawm dikte leh dan dikte, thuseh leh thupiak hoihte na piaa:
Amau kiangah na khawlni siangthou na theisaka, na sikha Mosi khutin, thupiakte leh, thusehte leh dan amaute na thupiakin na pia hi:
A gilkial un van akipan tanghou amaute na piaa, a dangtak un suangpi akipan amaute adin tui na pawt khe saka, huan amaute pe dinga na khut na lik gam nei ding a kuan dingin amaute thu na piaa.
Himahleh amaute leh a pipute un kisatheitakin a hih ua, a paupeng ua, na thupiakte a ngaikhe kei ua,
Thu a mang nuam kei ua, a lak ua na hih na thillamdangte leng a limsak sam kei uh; himahleh a kiuangsak ua, a helna uah a tanna ua kik nawn dingin heutu khat a sep uhi: himahleh nang ngaidam dia mansa, lainatnaa dim leh hehpihsiam, heh mengmenglou, chitna hau, leh amaute lehngatsan lou Pathian na hi a.
A hi, bawngnou sun a bawl lai un, Aigupta akipana nang honpikhepa hiai na Pathian ahi, a chi ua, nakpitaka thangpaihnate a bawl lai un;
Huchi hina piin nang na chitna tampi jiakin amaute gamdai ah na lehngatsan kei hi: sunin a tung ua kipan meipi kitung a pai mang keia, amaute pi dingin; vakna amau pe ding, jana mei kitung leng, a paina lam pi uah.
Amaute chil dingin na kha hoih leng na piaa, a kam ua kipan na manna na phallou keia, amaute a dangtak un tui na pia hi.
A hi, kum sawmli gamdai ah amaute na vaka, bangmah a tasam kei ua; a puansilhte uh a tul keia, a khepekte uh a bawk kei hi.
Huaibanah gamte leh mite amau na piaa, a tantuante uh dungjuia na piakkhiakte: Huchiin Sihonn gam, Hesbon kumpipa gam amahmah, leh Basan kumpipa Og gam a lata uh.
Vana aksite bangin a tate uh na pungsaka, gamsungah na pi luta, nei dingin a lut ding uh ahi chia, a pipute uh kianga a tanchin na gen mah.
Huchiin tate tuh a lut ua gam a neita ua, a ma uah gama tengte na satpuka, Kanaan mite, a kumpipate uh leh, gama mite, amau khut ah na pia hi, huchia a utdan ua a tung ua hih theihna ding un.
Huan khopi umte, gam hoih, a la ua, thil hoih tengtenga dim inte a nei ua, tuibel sekte, grephuante, oliv huante, a tama tam thei kungte: huchiin a ne ua, a vah ua ahongthau ua, na hoihna thupi jiakin kipahhuai a sa mahmah uh.
Hinapiin lah thu a mang kei ua, na tungah a hel ua, na dan a nung lam uah a pai ua, na kianglam amaute nga nawn sak dinga, amaute dema thugen na jawlneite a that ua, thangpaihna thupi mahmah a bawl uhi.
Huaijiakin a melmate uh khut ah amau na piaa, amau a hih genthei uh: a nuai ni ua na kianga hongkah lai un, van akipanin na jaa; na chitna tampi dungjuiin a melmate uh khut akipana amaute dondamte hondammite a kiang uah na pia hi.
Himahleh a tawldam nung un, na maah gilou a hih nawn ua: huaijiakin a melmate uh khut ah amau na nusiaa, huchiin amau a tunguah thu a nei ua: hinapiin ahongkihei ua, na kianga hongkah un, van akipan na jaa; na chitnate dungjuiin amaute tam veipi na hun khiaa;
Na dana amaute na pi lut theih nawnna dingin, amau na dem a: himahleh kisatheitakin a hih ua, na thupiakte a limsakkei ua, na vaihawmte tungah a khial zosop uhi, (huai min a hih aleh, huaiah ahing ding), liang a sawisak ua, a kiuangsak ua, a za nuam kei uh.
Himahleh kum tampi amaute na thuaktheia, na jawlneitein na kha zangin amaute na dema: ahihhganin a ngaikhe nuam kei ua: huaijiakin gamte mite khut ah amau na peta hi.
Huchinapiin na chitna tampi jiakin amaute na hih bei keuhkeuh keia, na lehngatsan gige kei; nang lah hehpihthei leh ching thei Pathian na hi ngala.
Huaijiakin tuin, ka Pathian uh, thupi Pathian hat leh kihtakhuai, thukhun leh chitna vompa, na maah, ka tung uh, ka kumpipate uh tung, ka lalte uh tung, ka siampute uh tung, ka jawlneite uh tung, ka pipute uh tung, na mite, Assuria kumpipate damlai akipana tuni tan, na mite tunga, nauveina bangmah thamlou bangin kilang kei hen.
Akoiabangin ka tung ua hongtung tengtengah nang lah diktakin na hih ngala, kou bel gilou takin ka hih uh:
Ka kumpipate uh hiam, ka lalte uh hiam, ka siampute uh hiam, ka pipute uh hiamin na dan a jui kei ua, na thupiakte leh na thutheihpihnate, amaute dema na theihpihnate lah a ngaikhe nuam sam kei uhi.
A gam uah lah nang na a sem kei ua, na hoih mahmahna jiaka amau na piak, a ma ua na piak gam lian leh hoih, a nasep gilou ua kipan in lah a kileh hei sam kei uh.
Ngaiin, tuniin sikhate ka hi ua, a gah nekna ding leh huaia hoihte neihna dia ka pipute uh kianga na piak gam a hihleh, ngaiin, a sungah sikhate ka hi uhi,
Huan ka khelhna jiak ua ka tung ua na koih kumpipate adingin a nak pun mahmah a: a thu thu un, ka pumpite uleh, ka gantate uh tunga thilhih theihna leng a nei ua, huchiin kou ka nak gim mahmah uhi.Huan hiaite tengteng huchibang hita zongleh thukhun muanhuai ka bawl ua, ka gelh ua; huan ka lalte uh, ka Levi mite uleh ka siampute un, huaiah suai a bawl uhi.
Huan hiaite tengteng huchibang hita zongleh thukhun muanhuai ka bawl ua, ka gelh ua; huan ka lalte uh, ka Levi mite uleh ka siampute un, huaiah suai a bawl uhi.
Huan suai bawlte hiaite ahi uh Nehemia Tirsatha, Hakalia tapa, leh Zedekia;
Seraia, Azaria, Jeremia;
Pashur, Amaria, Malkija;
Hattus, Sebania, Malluk;
Harim, Meremot, Obadia;
Daniel, Gennethon, Baruk;
Mesullam, Abija, Mijamin;
Maazia, Bilgai, Semaia: hiaite siampute ahi uh.
Huan Levi mite: huaite, Jesua Azania tapa, Binnui Henadad tapa, Kadmiel;
Huan a unaute uh, Sebania, Hodia, Kelita, Pelaia, Hanan;
Mika, Rehob, Hasabia;
Zakkur, Serebia, Sebania;
Hodia, Bani, Beninu;
Mite hausate: Paros, Pahath-moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani;
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai;
Adonija, Bigvai, Adin;
Ater, Hezekia, Azzur;
Hodia, Hasum, Bezai;
Harip, Anathot, Nebia;
Magpias, Mesullam, Hezir;
Mesezabel, Zadok, Jaddua;
Pelatia, Hanan, Anaia;
Hosia, Hanania, Hasub;
Hallohes, Pilha, Sobek;
Rehum, Hasabna, Maaseia;
Huan Ahia, Hanan, Anan;
Malluk, Harim, Baana.
Huan mipi laka adangte, siampute, Levi mite, kongkhakngakte, lasamite, Nithinim mite, leh gamtea mite laka kipana amau leh amau Pathian dan lama ki tuamsehte tengteng, a jite uh, a tapate uh, a tanute uh, mi chih theihna leh theihtheihna neite;
A unaute uh, a miliante uh lamah a belh chinten ua, Mosi Pathian sikhain a piak Pathian dana om ding leh, TOUPA i Toupa uh thupiak tengteng jui ding leh hih dinga, a vaihawmte leh a thusehte hih dingin hamsia leh kichiamna a bawl uhi;
Huan i tanute gama mite kianga pe lou ding leh, i tapate adia a tanute uh la lou dingin:
Huan gama miten khawlnia van hiam annek hiam juak ding a hontawi uleh, khawlni hiam, ni siang ni hiamin huaite i lei kei ding uh: huchiin kum sagihna lou hiate lak leh leiba chiteng sik i kidek ding uh.
Huailou leng i Pathian uh in nasepna dinga kum tenga sekel sih thumna kiba sak dingin, dante leng i kibawl ua;
Tanghou koih ading, anpiak thillat gige ading, halmang thillat gige ading, khawlnite, kha thakte, sehsa ankuangte ading, thil siangthoute ading, Israel adia lemna kithoihna bawlna dia khelhna thillatte ading, leh i Pathian in ua nasepna tengteng adingin.
Huan ai i san ua, siampute, Levi mite leh mite, sing thillat adingin, dana a kigelh banga, i Pathian uh TOUPA maitam tunga khul ding, kum tenga, hunte sehsa, i pipute inkote dungjuia, i Pathian in ua lak lut dingin:
Huan TOUPA ina, kum tenga, i lei theigah masapente, sing chitenga gah tengteng akipan gahmasapente, tawi dingin:
Dana kigelh bangin, i tapate laka piang masapen leh i gantate laka leng, i bawnghonte lak leh i belam honte laka nou masapente, i Pathian in ua nasem siampute kianga i Pathian in ua tawi dingin:
Huan i tangbuang mek masapen u leh, i vei thillatte uh leh, sing chiteng gah, uain leh thau, i Pathian uh ina dantante ah, siampute kiangah i tawi ding uh; huan i loumaa sawm-khatte Levi mite kiangah; amau, Levi miten lah, i singtang khopi tengteng uah sawm-khat a la ngal ua.
Huan Aron tapa Siampu, Levi miten sawma-khatte sawma-khat i Pathian in uah, dantante ah, sumbawm in ah a tawi tou ding uhi.Israel tate leh Levi taten buhlehbal vei, uain, thau, thillatmunsiang tuiumbelsuante, nasem siampute, kongkhakngakte leh lasamite omna, munsiangthoua a tawi ding uh lah ahi ngala: Huan i Pathian in uh i nuse kei ding uhi.
Israel tate leh Levi taten buhlehbal vei, uain, thau, thillatmunsiang tuiumbelsuante, nasem siampute, kongkhakngakte leh lasamite omna, munsiangthoua a tawi ding uh lah ahi ngala: Huan i Pathian in uh i nuse kei ding uhi.
Huchiin mite lalte Jerusalem ah a teng ua: mi dangten leng, khopi siangthou Jerusalema teng ding sawmte laka khat pi ding leh khopi dantea theihna seh kuate teng dingin ai a san ua.
Huan miten Jerusalema teng dinga uttaka amau leh amau kipe te tengteng vual a jawlta ua.
Huchiin Jerusalema teng bial sunga hausate heaite ahi uh: himahleh Juda khopite ah mi chih amau khopite uah michih a tan chiat uah amau a teng ua, huaite, Israel, siampute, Levi mite loeh Nithinim mite leh, Solomon sikhate tate.
Jerusalem ah Juda tate laka leh Benjamin tate laka kuate hiam a teng uhi.
Juda tate lakah: Athaia Uzzia tapa, Zedaria tapa, Amaria tapa, Sephatia tapa, Mehalalel tapa, Peraez tate lakah;
Maaseia Baruk tapa, Kol-hoze tapa, Hazaia tapa, Adaia tapa, Joiarib tapa, Zekaria tapa, Silon mi tapa.
Jerusalema teng Perez taqpate tengteng za li sawmguk leh giat pasal hangsan ahi uh.
Huan hiaite Benjamin tapate ahi uh: Sallu Mesullam tapa, Joed tapa, Pedaia tapa, Kolaia tapa, Maaseia tapa, Ithiel tapa, Jesaia tapa.
Huan a nungin Gabbai, Salai, za kua sawmnih leh giat.
Huan Joel Zikri tapa a heutu uh ahi: huan Juda Hassenua tapa khopi tunga nihna ahi.
Siampute lakah: Jedaia Joiarib, Jakin tapa,
Seraia Hilkia tapa, Mesullam tapa, Zadok tapa, Meraioth tapa, Ahitub tapa, Pathian ina vaihawm,
leh a unaute uh huai ina nasep sem, za giat sawmnihh leh nih: Huan Adaia Jeroham tapa, Pelalia tapa, Amzi tapa, Zekaria tapa, Pashur tapa, Malkija tapa,
Leh a unaute, pipute inkote hausate, za nih sawmli leh nih: huan Amasai Azarel tapa, Ahzai tapa, Mesillemot tapa, Immer tapa,
leh a unaute uh, mi hat hangsante, za leh sawmnih leh giat: huan a heutu uh Zabdiel, Haagedolim tapa ahi.
Huan Levi mite lakah: Semaia Hassub tapa, Azrikam tapa, Hasabia tapa, Bunni tapa;
Sabbethai leh Jozabad, Levi mite hausate laka, Pathian in polam nasepa houtu;
Huan Mattania Mika tapa, Zabdi tapa, Asaph tapa, thumnaa kipahthugen pankhe pipen ahi, Huan Bakbukia, a unaute laka nihna; huan Abda Sammua tapa, Galal tapa, Jeduthun tapa.
Khopi siangthou sunga Levi mite tengteng za nih sawmgiat leh li.
Huai banah kongkhakngakte, Akkub, Talmon, leh a unaute uh kongpite ngakte, za sawmsagih leh nih ahi uh.
Huan Israel laka omlaite, siampute laka, Levi mite, Juda khopite tengteng ah a om ua, mi chih a gouluahna chiat uah.
Himahleh Ophel ah Nithinim mite a teng uh: huan Ziha leh Gispa Nithimin mite tungah a om uh.
Jerusalema Levi mite heutu leng Bani tapa Uzzi ahi, Hasabia tapa, Mattania tapa, Mika tapa, Asaph tapate, Pathian in nasepnaa, lasamite;
Amau tungtang thu-ah kumpipa akipana thupiak, ni tenga a kiphamoh bangin, lasamite adinga dan kipsa lah a om ngala.
Huan Pethahia Mesezabel tapa, Juda tapa Zera tate laka mipite tungtang thu tengteng amah kumpipa khut ah a om a.
Huan khuate, a lute uh toh a hihleh, Juda tate laka a khenkhatte Kiriath-arba leh huaia khuate ah, Dibon leh huaia khuate ah, Jekabzeel leh huaia khotate ah a teng ua;
Jesua leh Molada leh, Beth-pelet ah;
Hazarsual leh, Beerseba leh huaia khuate ah;
Ziklag leh, Mekona leh huaia khuate ah;
Enrimmon leh, Zora leh, Jarmut ah;
Zanoa, Adullam leh a khotate uah, Lakis leh huai loute, Azeka leh huaia khuate.
Huchiin Beer-seba akipan Hinnom guam tanin giahbuk a bawl uhi.
Benjamin tate leng Geba akipanin a tengtou jel ua, Mikmas leh Aija ah, Beth-el leh huaia khuate ah;
Anathoth, Nob, Anania ah;
Hazor, Rama, Gittaim;
Hadid, Zeboim.
Neballat;
Lod, leh Ono, khutsiamte guam ah.Huan Levi mite lakah, Judaa hihdingte banghiam Benjamin toh a kizom hi.
Huan Levi mite lakah, Judaa hihdingte banghiam Benjamin toh a kizom hi.
Huan hiaite Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel toh tontou siampute leh Levi mite ahi uh, Jesua, Serai, Jeremia, Ezra toh;
Amaria, Malluk, Hattus;
Sekania, Rehum, Meremot;
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abija;
Mijamin, Maadia, Bilgah;
Semaia, Joiarib, Jedaia;
Sallu, Amok, Hilkia, Jedaia.
Hiai te siampute lak leh a unaute uh laka Jesua damlai a pipente uh ahi.
Levi mite mah leng: Jesua, Binnui, kadmiel, Serebia, Juda, Mattania, kipahthugenna tunga om, amah leh a unaute.
Bakbukia leh Unno leng, a unaute utoh, amau delhin dan suangah a om uh.
Huan Jesuain Joiakim a suanga, Joiakimin Eliasib a suanga, Eliasibin Joiada a suanga,
Joiadain Jonathan a suanga, Jonathanin Jaddua a suanga.
Huan Joiakim dam laiin siampute a om ua, pipute inkote lupente: Seraia laka, Meraia: Jeremia lakah, Hanania;
Ezra lakah, Mesullam; Amaria lakah, Jehohanan;
Malluki lakah, Jonathan; Sebania lakah, Joseph;
Harim lakah, Adna; Meraioth lakah, Helkai;
Iddo lakah Zekaria; Ginnethon lakah, Mesullam;
Abija lakah, Zikri; Miniamin lakah, Piltai;
Bilgah lakah, Sammua; Semaia lakah, Jehonathan;
Joiarib lakah Mattenai; Jedaia lakah, Uzzi;
Sallai lakah, Kallai; Amok lakah, Eber;
Hilkia lakah, Hasabia; Jedaia lakah, Nethanel.
Eliasib, Joiada, Johanan, Jaddua damlaiin Levi mite, pipute inkote lupena gelh ahi uh: Persia mi Daria lal laia, siampute tohin.
Levi tapate, pipute inkote lupente, Kronikil laibu ah, Eliasib tapa Johanan damlai tan hiala, gelh ahi.
Huan Levi mite hausate: Hasabia, Serebia, Jesua, Kadmiel tapa, amau delh a unaute uh, Pathian mi David thupiak dungjuiin, indan leh indan kisuin.
Mattania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mesullam, Talmon, Akkub te kongpite sek-ina dantan kem kongkhakngakte ahi uh.
Hiaite Jesua tapa Joiakim, Jozadak tapa damlai, Nehemia ukpipa leh Ezra siampu laigelhmi damlaia om ahi uh.
Huan Jerusalem kulhbang latna adin a omna tengteng uah Levi mite a zong khia ua, kipahna toh, kipahthugenna leh, lasak, dakkhutbet, tumgingte leh kaihgingte toha Jerusalema amaute honpi dinga, kipahna bawl dingin.
Huan lasamite tapate a kikai khawm ua, Jerusalem kimvela phaijang akipan leh Netophat mite khotate akipanin;
Beth-gilgal akipanin leng, Geba leh Azmaveth loute akipanin: lasamiten lah Jerusalem kimvelin khotate a na bawlta ngal ua.
Huchiin siampute leh Levi mite a kisiangsak ua: mite leh kongpite leh kulhbangte a siang sak uh.
Huchilaiin kulhbang tungah Juda lalte ka pi toua, kipahtugen leh a hona pai pawlpi nih ka sepa; huaiah pawl khat kulhbang tungah ekvum kongpi lamah a pai ua:
Huan amau nungah Hosai leh, Juda lalte lak a kimkhat,
Azaria, Ezra, Mesullam,
Juda, Benjamin, Semaia, Jeremia,
Leh siampute tapate laka kuate hiam pengkulte toh: Zekaria Jonathan tapa, Semaia tapa, Mattaria, tapa, Mikaia tapa, Zakkur tapa, Asaph tapa;
A unaute, Simaia, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Juda, Hanani Pathian mi David tumgingtheih te toh; huan a ma uah Ezra laigelhmi a oma:
Tuikhuk kongpi kiangah, a ma jawn tak uah, David khopi dohkang ah a pai tou ua, kulhbang tou paina ah, David in tunglam ah, suahlampanga tui kongpi phain.
Huan a lak ua pawl dang kipahthugente amaute tuak dingin a pai ua, kei amau nungah, kulhbang tunga, meipi insang tunglamah, kulhbang lian tanphain;
Huan Ephraim kongpi tungah, kongpi lui kiang, ngasa kongpi kianga, Hananel insang, Meah insang, belam kongpi tanphain: huan venna kongpi ah a ding kinken uh.
Huchiin Pathian in sunga kipahthugen bawl nihte leh kei, leh ka kianga vaihawmte laka a kimkhat a ding ua:
Huan siampute, Eliakim, Maasei, Miniamin, Mikai, Elioenai, Zekaria, Hanania, pengkulte toh;
Huan Maasei, Semai, Eleazar, Uzzi, Johohanan, Malkija, Elam leh Ezer.
Huan lasamiten ngaihtakin, a heutupa uh Jezrahia toh la a sa ua.
Huan huai niin kithoihna thupite a lan ua, nuam a sa uhi; Pathianin lah nuamsakna thupi toh amau nuam a sasak ngala; huchiin numeite leh naupangte toh a kipak uhi: huchiin Jerusalem kipahna gamla pi tana leng jakin a om hi.
Huan, huai niin thohlawm te, vei thillat te, hai thak masa pente, sawmakhatte koihkhawmna dantantea heutu, danin a seh banga, siampu leh Levite tantuan kho chihin a nahihzoh bang jel ua lakhawmmi dingte a sep ua; Judate bel nasemmi siampute leh Levite jiakin a kipak mahmah uhi.
Huan a Pathian uh indan leh siansakna indan a kem ua, huchibangin lasamite leh kongkhakngakmiten David leh, a tapa Solomon thupiak bangin a hihta uh.
David leh nidang laia Asaph dam laiin lasami heutupen leh Pathian kianga phatna leh kipahthugenna lasakte lah a om ngala.Huan Zerubbabel damlai leh Nehemia damlaiin Israel tengtengin, ni tenga a kul bangin lasamite leh kongkhakngakmite tantuan a pe jel uhi: huan Levi mite adingin a siangsak ua; huan Aron tapate adingin Levi miten a siangsak uhi.
Huan Zerubbabel damlai leh Nehemia damlaiin Israel tengtengin, ni tenga a kul bangin lasamite leh kongkhakngakmite tantuan a pe jel uhi: huan Levi mite adingin a siangsak ua; huan Aron tapate adingin Levi miten a siangsak uhi.
Huai niin mite jakin Mosi laibu sungah a sim ua; Amon mi leh Moab mi khantawnin Pathian khawmpi sungah a lut ding uh ahi kei chih, huai sunga kigelh a mu uhi;
Tanghou leh tuia Israel tate dawn loua, amaute hamsiat dinga, amaute siatna dinga Balaam a lak jiak un: ahihhangin i Pathian in hamsia vualjawlna a suaksak hi.
Dan a jak lai un, hichi ahi a, mipi kihel tengteng Israel akipan a kikhenkhe tuamta uhi.
Huan hiai main, siampu Eliasib i Pathian in ua dantante tunga seha ompa, Tobia toh kizomin,
Amah dingin dantan thupi a bawlkhola huaiah a malamin anpiak thillatte, begawte leh tuiumbelsuante leh, buhlehbal, uain, leh thaute sawmakhatte a koih ua, huaite bel Levi mite leh lasamite leh kongkhakngakmite kianga thupiaka piak ahi a; huchiin vei thillatte siampute adingin.
Himahleh hiai hunte khawngin, Jerusalem ah ka om kei: Babulon kumpipa Araksarsi kum sawmthum leh nih kumin kumpipa kiangah ka hoha, ni bangzah hiam nungin kumpipa phalna ka ngen ngala:
Huchiin Jerusalem ah ka honga, huan Pathian in pisate sung dantan amah adia a bawlsakna ah, Eliasibin Tobia adia gilou a hih dan ka theisiam hi.
Huchiin kei a hondah sak mahmaha: huaijiakin dantana kipanin Tobia in dong tengteng ka lawn khiaa.
Huan thu ka piaa, dantante a hih siang ua: huan huailaiah anpiak thillatte leh begaw toh, Pathian ina tuiumbelsuante ka honla nawn hi.
Huan Levi mite tante amau kiang ah piak nailouhin a om chih ka thei a; huchiin Levi mite leh lasamite, nasep semte mi chih a loulam ah a taijak uhi.
Huan kei tuh vaihawmmite toh kakiselta ua, Bang dinga Pathian mangngilha om ahia? ka chi a.
Huan amau ka kaikhawma, a mun uah ka koih a.
Huan Juda tengteng in buhlehbal leh uain leh thau sawmakhat sumbawm ah a hontawi uh.
Huan sumbawm adingin sumkemmite ka bawla, Selemia siampu te, Zadok laigelhmi te leh, Levi mite lakah: Pedaia: huan amua zomin Hanan Zakkur tapate, Mattania tapa: muanhuai sim ahi ngal ua, a nasep uh a unaute uh kianga hawm ding ahi.
Aw ka Pathian, hiai thu-ah hontheigige inla, ka Pathian in adinga ka nasep hoih ka hihte leh huaia zuihdingte nul khe ken.
Huai laiin Juda ah khawlnia kuate hiam uainsuknate chila, buhphalte hontawia, huaite toh a sabengtungte van guang ka mua; uain, grepgahte, theipite vanpuakgik chichih, khawlnia Jerusalem a hontawilut uhte leng: huan annekte a juak ni uh huai niin amaute demin thu ka gen hi.
Huaiah Tura mite leng a om ua, ngasa a hontawi ua, van chituamtuam toh, Juda tate kiang leh Jerusalem ah khawlniin a juak uhi.
Huchiin ken Judate miliante ka kiselpiha, a kiang uah, Bang thil gilou ahia hiai na hih ua, khawlni na hihnit uh?
Na pipute un huchibangin a hih kei ua hia, huan i Pathianin ei tung leh hiaikhopi tungah hiai hoihlou tengteng a hontun ahi kei maw? hinapi in nou lah khawlni hihninin Israel tungah thangpaihna tamsem na tun ua, ka chi a.
Huan Jerusalem kongpite khawlni maa a mial pat lain, hichi ahi a, kongkhakte khak dingin thu ka piaa, khawlni khit matan kihong lou dingin thu ka piaa: huan ka sikhate laka a khen kongpi tungah ka pangsaka, huchia khawl nia puakgik a hongkilak lut louh na dingin.
Huchiin khatvei hiam nihvei hiam sumsinmite leh van chiteng juakmite Jerusalem polamah a giak uhi.
Huan amaute demin thu ka gena, a kiang uah, Bang dinga kulhbang kima giak na hi ua? na hih nawn uleh, na tunguah khut ka kha ding, ka chi a.
Huan hun akipanin khawlni in a hong pai nawnta kei uhi.
Huan kisiangsak ding leh hongkuana kongpite ngak ding, khawl ni siangsak dingin, Levi mite thu ka piaa.
Aw ka Pathian, hiaiah leng kei hongtheigigein, na chitna letdan dungjuiin kei honhawiin.
Huai laiin Judate a Asdod, Ammon leh Moab numeite kitenpihte leng ka mua:
Huchiin a tate Asdod pau kimkhat a zang ua, Judate pauin a pau theikei uh, himahleh mi chih pau dungjuiin.
Huan amaute ka kiselpiha, ka hamsiat khuma, a lak ua kuate hiam ka khena, a mul uh ka bohkhiak saka, Pathian louin ka kichiam saka, Na tanute uh a tapate uh dingin na pe kei ding ua, na tapate uh ading hiam, noumau ading hiamin leng a tanute uh na la ding uh ahi kei, chiin.
