Israel kumpipa Solomon hiaitein a khial kei maw? ninapiin lah nam tampite lakah amah bang kumpipa a om keia, a Pathian itin a om a, Israel tengteng tungah Pathianin kumpipain a bawl hi: himahleh amah nangawn numei lamdangten a khialsak uhi.
Ahihleh hiai gilou mahmah khawng hih dingin, numei lamdangte kitenpiha i Pathian tunga talek dingin, na thu honjui ding ka hi umaw?
Huan Joiada tapate laka khat, siampu lian Eliasib tapa, Horon mi Sanballat tanu pasal ahia: huaijiakin keia kipan ka delh khia hi.
Aw ka Pathian, siamputna, siamputna thukhun, leh Levi mitea a hihnit jiak un, amau theigige in.
Huchiin mikhualte tengteng akipan in amaute ka sawpsianga, siampute a ding leh Levi mite adingin, mi chih a nasep uah, nasep dante ka sehsaka;Huan a hunte sehsaa sing thillat ading, leh gah masa adingin, Aw ka pathian, hoihna dingin kei hon theigige in.
Huan a hunte sehsaa sing thillat ading, leh gah masa adingin, Aw ka pathian, hoihna dingin kei hon theigige in.
Ahasura dam laiin hichi a honghi a, (hiai Ahasura bel India akipana Ethiopia tana, bial ja leh sawmnih leh sagih tunga vaihawm ahi: )
Huai laia, inpi Susana om, a gam laltutphah tunga a tut laiin,
A vaihawm kum thum kumin, a lalte leh a sikhate tengteng adingin ankuangluina a bawla; Persia leh Media thuneihna, bialtea miliante leh lalte a maah a om uh:
A gam thupi hauhsaknate leh a lalna sang zahtakhuaina ni tampi tak, ni ja leh sawmgiat tak a etsak laiin.
Huan hiai nite a chinin, kumpipan inpi Susan a om mite tengteng, a lian leh a neu, adingin, kumpipa inpi huan pisa ah, ni sagih ankuangluina a bawla;
Puan kang khaite, a hing, a dum, puanmalngat hoih leh sandup khauzangtea dangka zungbuhte leh suangpak khuamtea henden a om a: tutnanemte dangkaeng leh dangkaa bawl, suangchiang suangpak san, ngou, eng leh voma bawl tungah a om ua.
Huan dangkaeng haitein dawnding amau a pia ua, (haite a kibang kei vek uhi, ) kumpipa uain tampi, kumpipa khuttawiletna dungjui jelin,
Huan dan bang jelin dawnna a oma; kumahin a chiteitei theikei: huchibangin kumpipan lah a in heutute tengteng kiangah, mi chihin nuam a sak bang jel ua a hih ding un a sepkhinta ngala.
Kumpinu Vastiin leng kumpipa Ahasura ina om numeite adingin ankuangluina a bawl sam hi.
A ni sagih ni-a, kumpipa lungtang uaina kipaka a om lain, Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha leh Abagtha, Zether, leh Karka te, kumpipa Ahasura omnaa nasem michilgehte thu a piaa,
Kumpipa maa kumpi lallukhu toh Vasti hontonpiha, a kilawmna mite leh lalte ensak dingin: etin a hoih ngala.
Himahleh kumpinu Vastiin michilgehte zanga kumpipa thupiak hoh lou dingin a sela: huaijiakin kumpipa a heh mahmaha a sungah a hehna a kuang hi.
Huchih laiin hunte thei mi pilte kiangah kumpipan, (huchibang lah kuapeuh dan leh vaihawmna theite laua kumpipa omdan sek ahi him a:
Huan amah zomin Karsina, Sethar, Admatha, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena, leh Memukan, Persia leh Media lal sagihte kumpipa mai mute leh, gamsunga tumasate ahi ua: )
Michilgehte zanga kumpipa Ahasura chih a hih louh jiakin, dan dungjuiin kumpinu Vasti tungah bang i hih ding ua? a chi a.
Huan kumpipa leh lalte maah Memukanin a dawnga, Kumpinu Vasti kumpipa tungah kia thil diklou a hih ahi keia, himahleh kumpipa Ahasura bial tengtenga om lalte tengteng tung leh mite tengteng tungah leng a hih ahi.
Kumpipa Ahasurain a maa hongpai dingin kumpinu Vasti thu a pia, himahleh ahongpai kei, chih a kigenthang chiangin, hiai kumpinu thilhih numei tengteng kiang a tung dinga, a mit uah a pasalte uh simmohna lah suaksak ding ahi ngala.
Huan tuni-a kumpinu thilhih naja Persia leh Media lalten kumpipa lalte tengteng kiangah huchibangmah a gen ding uh.
Huchiin nakpi-a kisimmoh leh thangpaih na a hongkipan khe ding hi.
Kumpipa deihlam a hihleh, amah akipan kumpi thupiak pai khia henla, Vasti kumpipa Ahasura maah hongpai nawn het lou ding chih, hihlamdan theihlouh dingin, Persia mite leh Media mite dante laka gelhin om hen; huan kumpipan amah sanga hoihjaw mi dang khat adingin amah kumpi munlehmual pe leh.
Huan kumpipa thupiak a bawl ding a gamsung tengtenga a kithehjak chiangin, (a thupi ngala) ji tengtengin a pasalte uh kiangah zahtakna a pe ding uh, a liante leh a neute kiangah, chiin.
Huchiin thugenin kumpipa leh lalte a kipak saka; huchiin Memukan thu dungjuiin kumpipan a hihta.Aman lah huaia kigelh dungjuiin, kimpipa bial tengteng, bial chiteng leh mi chiteng kiangah a pau uh dungjuiin, laikhakte a khaktaa, huchi-a michih in amah in sung mahmaha dante a puak lut theiha, a mite pau dungjuia a thehjak theihna dingin.
Aman lah huaia kigelh dungjuiin, kimpipa bial tengteng, bial chiteng leh mi chiteng kiangah a pau uh dungjuiin, laikhakte a khaktaa, huchi-a michih in amah in sung mahmaha dante a puak lut theiha, a mite pau dungjuia a thehjak theihna dingin.
Hiai thilte zohin, kumpipa Ahasura thangpaihna lungkimsaka omin, Vasti, bang ahia a hih, a siatna dia bang ahia thupiak chih a theigige hi.
Huchiin a nasep sak kumpipa sikhaten a kiangah, Kumpipa adingin nungak siangthou tuailai melhoih kizong henla:
Huan kumpipan a gama bial tengtengah heutu sep hen, huaiten nungak siangthou tuailai tengteng Susan inpi ah, numeite in ah, Hegai kumpipa michilgeh numeite kempa ina a hongpi khawm theihna ding un; huchiin siansakna ding a thilte uh amau kipe leh:
Huan nungak kumpipa lungkimsak pen Vasti sikin kumpinu hi hen, a chi ua.
Huai thilin kumpipa a lungkim saka; huchibangin a hihta hi.
Susan inpi ah Juda mi khuhiam khat, a min Mordekai, Jair tapa, Simei tapa, Benjamin mi a oma;
Amah bel Jerusalem akipana salte Juda kumpipa Jekonia Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a pi manga omte toh pi mangin a om uhi.
Huchiin aman Hadassa, huai bel Esther, a pangak tanu ahi: aman lah pa a neikeia nu leng a neikei, huan huai nungak tuh a kilawmin a mel ahoih hi: a nu leh a pa a sih un, Mordekaiin amah a tanu mahmah dingin a la hi.
Huchiin hichi a honghi-a, kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl a kijakin, nungak tampi Susan inpi, Hegai ina kaihkhawma aom lai un, Esther kumpipa in, Hegai, numeite kempa in ah a hongpi ua.
Huchiin nungakin amah a lungkim saka, amah siamna a ngahta a; huan aman siansakna dingin a thilte amah a pe paha, a tantuante toh, amah piak dinga kilawm, kumpipa in akipan nungak sagih: huan amaha leh a nungakte numei te ina mun hoih penpen ah asuanta hi.
Estherin a mite a musak keia a tanaute leng a musak sam kei hi: Mordekaiin lah musak lou dingin amah thu a pe ngala.
Huchiin Mordekai bel nitengin numeite in mun maiah a om gigea, Estherin bangchiin a hih jela, bang a honghi dia chih thei dingin.
Huchi-a nungak chih kumpipa Ahasura kianga a valut hun uh a tun in, numeite adia dan dungjuia hih khinta a om nungin, kha sawm leh kha nih, (huchibangin lah a siansakna nite uh hihkimin a om ngala, huai tuh, mura thau toh kha guk, gim namtuite toh kha guk leh, numeite siansakna dinga thilte toh, )
Huailaiin hichibangin nungkanu tuh kumpipa kiangah a hong, numeite in akipan kumpipa ina hohpih dingin amah tuh a deihdeih piakin a om hi.
Nitaklamin a paia, a jingsangin numeite in nihna ah, kumpipa michilgeh Sasga, meite kimpa in ah a hong kika: kumpipa amah ah kipak napiin, kumpipa kiangah a honglutta keia, amah tuh mina sapin a om hi.
Huchi-a amah a tanu dinga lapa Mordekai pangak Abihail tanu, Esther kumpipa kianga a valut hun a hongtunin, Hegai kumpipa michilgeh, numeite kempaa seh chihngallouh bangmah a kan kei hi.
Huchiin amah ente tengteng mitmuhin Estherin deihsakna a ngaha.
Huchiin Esther kumpipa Ahasura kiang a kumpi in ah a kha sawmna, Tebeth kha a vaihawm kum sagihna kumin laklutin a omta hi.
Huchiin kumpipan numeite tengteng sangin Esther a it a, nungak siangthoute sangin a mitmuhin hehpihna leh deihsakna a mu hi; huchiin a lu tungah kumpi lallukhu a koiha, Vasti sikin kumpinu dingin amah a bawlta hi.
Huchih laiin kumpipan a lalte tengteng leh a sikhate tengteng adingin ankuang thupi, Esther ankuang mahmah a luitaa: bialte kiangah khawlna a bawla, kumpipa siamna bang jelin, thilpiakte a pia hi.
Huchi-a nungak siangthoute nih veina dia kaihkhawma a omlai un, Mordekai bel kumpipa kongpi ah a tu hi.
Estherin a tanaute amusak keia a mite leng a musak sam kei; Mordekai thupiak bangin a hiha, amah kianga khanletsaka a om bang takin.
Huailaia, Mordekai kumpipa kongpi-a a tutlaiin, kumpipa michilgeh laka nih, Bigthan leh Teres, kongkhak ngakte a heh ua, kumpipa Ahasura tunga khut kha dingin a zongta uhi.
Huan huai thil Mordekaiin a theia, aman khumpinu kiangah a theisak hi; huan Estherin Mordekai minin huaia kumpipa a hilhta hi.Huchiin a thu a kikan aleh, huchibang ahi ngei chih a kimu khiaa, a nih un sing dawnah khailupin a om ua: huan tanchingelhna laibuah kumpipa maah a kigelhta hi.
Huchiin a thu a kikan aleh, huchibang ahi ngei chih a kimu khiaa, a nih un sing dawnah khailupin a om ua: huan tanchingelhna laibuah kumpipa maah a kigelhta hi.
Hiai thilte nungin kumpipa Ahasurain Haman Agag mi Hammedatha tapa a kaisangsaka, malam a nawtsaka, a kianga om lalte tengteng tunglamah a tutphah a koih hi.
Huchiin kumpipa sikhate tengteng, kumpipa kongpi-a omte niamchikin a kun ua, Haman a zahtak mahmah uh: kumpipan lah amah tungtang thu huchibangin thu a peta ngala, Himahleh Mordekai a kun keia, amah zahna a bawl sam kei.
Huchihlaiin kumpipa sikhate, kumpipa kongpi-a omten, Mordekai kiangah, Bangdia kumpipa thupiaka talek na hia? a chi ua.
Huan hichi ahi a, ni tenga amah a houpih lai un, amau a ngaikhe keia, Mordekai thu pai ding hia pai lou ding chih thei dingin Haman a hilh uh: amah Juda mi ahi chih amaute lah a hilhta ngala.
Huchi-a Mordekai niam chika kun louin, amah a zahtak kei chih Hamanin a theihin, Haman a heh mahmah hi.
Himahleh Mordekai tung kiaa khutkhak bangthamlouin a ngaihtuaha; Mordekai mite lah amah a ensakta ngal ua; huchiin Hamanin Ahasura gam pumpi-a om Judate tengteng, Mordekai mite tana, hihgawp dingin a zongta hi.
Kumpipa Ahasura kum sawm leh kum nihin, kha khatna, Nisan khain, Pur a san ua, huai bel ai ahi, Haman maah, nitengin, kha tengin, kha sawmlehnih, Adar kha tanin.
Huan Hamanin kumpipa Ahasura kiangah, Mi kuate hiam kitheh jaka na gam bial sung tengtenga mite laka dalh a om ua; huan a dante uh mi tengteng dan toh a kibang keia; kumpipa dante lah a jui kei uh: huaijiakin amaute thuaktheih kumpipa punna ding ahi kei hi.
Kumpipa deihlam a hih leh, hihgawpa a omna ding un lai kigelh leh: huan kumpipa nasepnaa heutute khut ah ken dangka talent sang sawm ka pe ding, kumpipa sumbawmte a tawi lut dingin a chi a.
Huan a khut akipan kumpipan a zungbuh a suaha, Agag mi Hammedatha tapa Haman kiangah, Juda te melmapa kiangah a pia hi.
Huchiin kumpipan Haman kiangah, Dangka na kianga piak ahi, mipi leng, amau tunga pha na saksak hih dingin, a chi a.
Huchihlaiin a kha khatna, a ni sawm leh thum niin, kumpipa laigelhmite a sam lut ua, kumpipa heutuliante leh kumpipa bial chiha omte tengteng leh mi chiteng lalte Hamanin thu a piak peuhmah dungjuiin a kigelhta hi; bial chih kiangah huaia kigelh dungjuiin, mi chihteng kiang ah a pau bang jel un; kumpipa Ahasura minin a kigelha, kumpipa zungbuhin suai a kaisawn hi.
Huchiin, Adar kha, kha sawm leh nih a ni sawm leh thum ni mahmaha, ni khata, Juda mite tengteng a tek a khang naupang noute leh numeite hihgawp ding, that ding leh mangthang sak dingin, kumpipa bial sung tengteng ah dakin laikhakte a khak ua, a sum uh gallaka lak sak dingin.
Laigelh kopi, thupiak bial chitenga piak khiak dingin huai ni adia kimansaa a om theihna ding un, mi tengteng kiangah a suah uhi.Kumpipa thupiakin dakte kinoh takin a pawt khia ua, Susan inpi ah thupiak a kipekhiaa: huan kumpipa leh Haman dawn dingin a tu ua; himahleh Susan khopi a lungjing hi.
Kumpipa thupiakin dakte kinoh takin a pawt khia ua, Susan inpi ah thupiak a kipekhiaa: huan kumpipa leh Haman dawn dingin a tu ua; himahleh Susan khopi a lungjing hi.
Huchi-a kihih tengteng Mordekaiin a theihin, a puante a botkeka, vut toh saiippuan a silha, khopi laizangah a pai khiaa, kah ngaih leh nakpiin a kap a:
Huan kumpipa kongpi mai pha hialin a hongpaia: saiippuan silh mi kuamah lah kumpipa kongpi sungah a lut theikei hi.
Huchiin bial chitenga, koilai peuha kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl tunna ah, Judate lakah nakpi-a sunna, anngawlna, kahna, mauna a om hi; mi tampi saiippuan silhin, vut lakah a lum uh.
Huan Esther nungakte leh a heutute a hongpai ua huchiin a thu a mah a hilhta uhi; huchiin kumpinu a dah mahmah a: puansilh Mordekai silh dingin a khaka, amah akipana a saiippuan la khe dingin: himahleh a sang kei hi.
Huchihlaiin Estherin Hatak, kumpipa michilgehte laka khat a sama, amah vil dinga kumpipan a seh, Mordekai kianga hoh dingin thu a piaa, hiai bang thu ahi, bangdia hichi ahi chih thei dingin.
Huchibangin Hatak bel kumpipa kongpi maia om, khopi mun ja ah Mordekai kiangah a vapawt khiaa.
Huan Mordekaiin a tunga tung tengteng thu amah a hilha, Judate adia, maute hihsiatna ding, kumpipa sumbawmtea Hamanin dangka sum piak dinga achiam zah geih a hilh hi.
Huailou leng Esther kianga lak ding leh, a kianga phuan dingin amaute hihsiatna dinga Susana thubawl piak khiak laigelh kopi amah a pia a; kumpipa kianga vahoh ding a hilh din, a kianga thumna vabawl ding leh a mite adia, a maa ngetna vabawl dingin.
Huan Hatak a honga Mordekai thute Esther a hilh hi.
Huchihlaiin Estherin Hatak kiangah thu a gena, Mordekai ading thukhah a pia hi,
Kumpipa sikhate tengteng leh, kumpipa bialtea miten a thei kilkel uhi, mi kuapeuhmah, pasal zong numei zong, sap louha, kumpipa pisa sungnungzopena a hong u leh, amah adingin dank hat a oma, sihsak ding, a chi-a, kumpipan dangkaeng lalchiang a letkhumte chih louhngal: himahleh hiai ni sawmthum kumpipa kianga hongpai dingin sapin ka na omta kei hi, chiin.
Huan Esther thute Mordekai a hilh ua.
Huchihlaiin Mordekaiin Esther kianga dawnna vatun nawn dingin amau a chi a, Judate tengteng sangin, kumpipa in sunga nang na suahtak kingaihtuah het ken.
Nang hiai huna bangmah himhim gen lou-a na daih dide leh, mun dang akipanin Judate dingin panpihna leh lakkhiakna a hongomdinga, himahleh nang leh na pa inkote na mang ding uh: hun hichibang adia honglal na hih mel kuan a thei a?
Huchiin Estherin Mordekai kianga dawnna vatun dingin amau a chi a.
Kuan inla, Susana om Judate tengteng kai khawm inla kei dingin anngawl unla, nithum, jan hiam sun hiam: nek lah ne kei unla, dawn leng dawn kei un: huchi mahbangin ken leng ka nungakte toh an ka ngawl ding uh; huaichiangin kumpipa kiangah ka hoh ngeingei ding, dan bang jaw ahi keia: huchi-a ka man leh, mang ka hi mai ding, chiin.Huchiin Mordekai a kuana, Estherin amah thu a piak tengteng bangin a gamtata hi.
Huchiin Mordekai a kuana, Estherin amah thu a piak tengteng bangin a gamtata hi.
Huan hichi ahi a a nithum niin, Estherin a kumpi puansilh a silha, kumpipa in jawna, kumpipa pisa sungnungzopen ah a vading a: huan kumpipa bel in lutna jawna, kumpi in ah a laltutphah tungah a natu hi.
Huan hichi bang ahi a, kumpipan pisaa kumpinu Esther ding a muhin, a mitmuhin deihsakna a ngahta hi: huan kumpipan a khuta om dangkaeng lalchiang Esther lamah a sima.
Huchiin Esther a hong naia, lalchiang dawn a khoih hi.
Huan kumpipan a kiangah, Bang na deiha, kumpinu Esther? huan na ngetna bang ahia? piak na hi peuhmah dinga gam kimkhat tanin, leng, a chi a.
Huan Estherin, Tuniin kumpipa leh Haman amaha dia ka bawl annekna ah hongpai un, kumpipan hoih a sak leh, a chi a.
Huan kumpipan, Haman kinoh sak un, Esther gen banga hih a hih theihna dingin, a chi a.
Huchiin kimpipa leh Haman Esther annekna bawl ah a hong uh.
Huan uain annekna ah kumpipan Esther kiang ah, Bang ahia na thumna? phal a hih theihna dingin: huan bang ahia na ngetna? gam kimkhat tanin leng bawl ahi ding, a chi a.
Huan Estherin a dawnga Ka thumna leh ka ngetna hiai ahi;
Kumpipa mitmuha deihsakna ka muh aleh, ka thumna phal ding, leh ka ngetna bawl dinga kumpipa a lungkim leh, kumpipa leh Haman amau adia ka bawl ding annekna ah hong le uh, huan kumpipan a chih bangin jingchiangin ka hih ding, a chi a.
Huchiin huai niin nuamsa leh lung kipakin Haman a pai kheta a: himahleh Mordekai kumpipa kongpi-a om, amah dia ding lou-a tat leng tang lou Hamanin a muhin, Mordekai tungah a heh pha mahmah hi.
Huchiin leng Haman a kiip teiteia, in ah a paita; huan mi a sawla a lawmte leh a ji Zeresh a hontonpiha.
Huan Hamanin a kiang uah, a hauhsakna thupina leh, a tate tamdan leh, kumpipan a kaisang sakna thil tengteng leh kumpipa sikhate lalte tunga a masaksak tuam dan khawng a gen hi.
Hamanin, A hi, Estherin annekna a bawl ah mi kuamah kumpipa toh kei chih louhngal a hoh sak kei; huan jingchiangin leng kumpipa toh kei a honsam khawma.
Hitamahleh hiaite tengteng keia dingin bangmah a phatuam kei, Mordekai Judapa kumpipa kongpi-a tu ka muh laiteng, a chi laia.Huan a ji Zeres leh alawmte tengtengin a kiangah, Khailupna khuamtong sawmngaa sang kibawl henla, jingsang in nang kumpipa kiangah thugen inla huaia Mordekai khailup ahih theih na dingin; huchiin vualnuam takin kumpipa toh annekna ah hoh le uchin, a chi ua.
Huan hiaiin Haman a kipak saka; huchiin khailupna khuam a bawl sakta hi.
Huan a ji Zeres leh alawmte tengtengin a kiangah, Khailupna khuamtong sawmngaa sang kibawl henla, jingsang in nang kumpipa kiangah thugen inla huaia Mordekai khailup ahih theih na dingin; huchiin vualnuam takin kumpipa toh annekna ah hoh le uchin, a chi ua.
Huan hiaiin Haman a kipak saka; huchiin khailupna khuam a bawl sakta hi.
Huai janin kumpipa a ihmu theikei; tanchin chiamtehna laibu hontawi dingin thu a piaa, huan huaite kumpipa maah a sim uh.
Kumpipa michilgehte laka mi nih Bigthan leh Teres, kongkhak vengten, kumpipa Ahasura tunga khutkhak sawmte tanchin Mordekaiin a gen chih a kigelh muhin a om hi.
Huan kumpipan, Hiai jiakin Mordekai tungah bang zahtakna leh thupina hihin a om a? a chi a.
Huan kumpipa sikha amah nasemten, Amah ding bangmah hih a om kei, a chi ua.
Huan kumpipan, Pisaa om kua ahia? a chi a.
Huchiin Haman kumpipa in pisa ponungjaw ah, kumpipa kianga a bawlkholhsa khailupna khuama Mordekai khai ding gen dingin a honga.
Huan kumpipa sikhaten a kiangah, Ngaiin pisa ah Haman a ding thek hi, a chi ua.
Huan kumpipan, Hong lut heh, a chi a.
Huchiin Haman a honglut a.
Huan kumpipan a kiangah, Mi kumpipan a zahtak nop tungah bang kihih ding ahia? a chi a.
Huan Hamanin a lunngtangin, Kumpipan kei kiang sanga zahtak kua kianga bawl nuam jaw ahia? a chi a.
Huan Hamanin kumpipa kiagnah, Kumpipan a zahtak nop mi adingin,
Kumpipan a silh jel kumpi puansilh honla khia henla, sakol kumpipa tuan jelna leng, a lu janga kumpi lallukhu a koihna jel:
Huchiin puansilh leh sakol kumpipan lala thupi penpente laka khat khut ah pe khe leh, huaitea kumpipan zahtak a utpa a zep theihna ding un leh, khopi kongzing lakah sakol tungah tuangsak henla, a maah, Huchibangin kumpipan a zahtak noppa kiangah hihin a om ding, chiin phuang leng, a chi a.
Huailai takin kumpipan Haman kiangah, Kin inla, na chih bangin, puansilh leh sakol la inla, kumpipa kongpi-a tu jel Mordekai Judami tung mahmahah hihin: na gen tengteng bangmah vuaksuak kei heh, a chi a.
Huchiin Hamanin puansilh leh sakol a laa, Mordekai a jem-a, khopi kongzing lakah a tuang saka, a maah, Hichibangin kumpipan a zahtak nop mi tunga hih ahi ding, chiin, a phuangta hi.
Huan Mordekai kumpipa kongpi ah a hongpai nawna.
Himahleh Haman bel a in lamah kintakin a paia, sun leh a lutang khuhsain.
Huchiin Hamanin a ji Zeres kiang leh a lawmte tengteng kiangah a tunga thiltung tengteng a gen vek a.
Huaitakin a mipilte leh a ji Zeresin a kiangah, A maa na puk patna Mordekai Juda chi-a mi a hileh, amah na zou kei ding, himahleh a maah na puk ngut ding ahi, a chi ua.Amah toh a houlin san lai un, kumpipa michilgehte a hongpai ua, hongpita uhi.
Amah toh a houlin san lai un, kumpipa michilgehte a hongpai ua, hongpita uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa leh Haman kumpinu Esther toh annekna ah a hong ua.
Huan uain annekna ah a ni nihniin kumpipan Esther kiangah, Bang ahia na thumna, kumpinu Esther? huan a honphal sak ding uh: huan bang ahia na ngetna?
Gamkimkhat hial leng bawlin a om ding, a chi a,
Huan Esther kumpinun a dawnga, Aw kumpipa, na mitmuha deihsakna ka muha, kumpipa kipahna a hih leh, ka thumna ah ka hinna piakin om ningin, huan ka ngetna ah ka mite:
Juakin lah ka omta ngal ua, kei leh ka mite, hihgawpa om dingin, thaha om dingin leh mang dingin.
Sikhapa ding leh sikhanu dinga juaka om hi le ung jaw, melmain kumpipa siatna gunbawl theita kei mahleh, dai dide ding hi vengin, a chi a.
Huan kumpipa Ahsurain thu a gena huan kumpinu Esther kiangah, Kua ahia, kaw om ahia, huchibang a lungtang sunga tum ngam? a chi a.
Huan Estherin, Melma leh gal, hiai giloupa Haman mah, a chi a.
Huchiin kumpipa leh kumpinu maah Haman a lauta hi.
Huan uain annekna akipan a heh jiakin kumpipa a dinga inpi huan sungah a luta: huchiin kumpinu Esther kianga a hinna ngen dingin Haman a dingta hi; kumpipan a siatna dingin hoihlou a tup a om chih lah a thei ngala.
Huan kumpipa inpi huan akipan uain annekna mun ah a hongkik a; huchiin Esther omna tutphahnem tungah Haman a puka.
Huchiin kumpipan, In sunga ka maa kumpinu nangawn sual ding ahi hia? a chi a.
Kumpipa kam a kipana thu pawt bangin, Haman maitang a tuamsakta uhi.
Huailaiin kumpipa maa om jel michilgehte laka khat, Harvonain, En un, Hamanin Mordekai, kumpipa guma thugenpa adia a bawl, khailupna khuam tong sawmngaa sang, Haman in ah a ding hi, a chi a.
Huan kumpipan huai ah amah khailum un, a chi a.Huchiin Mordekai adia a bawlkholhsak khailupna khuam tungah Haman a khailumta uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa thangpaihna a daita.
Huchiin Mordekai adia a bawlkholhsak khailupna khuam tungah Haman a khailumta uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa thangpaihna a daita.
Huai niin kumpipa Ahasurain Judate melmapa Haman in kumpinu Esther kiangah a piaa.
Huan kumpipa maah Mordekai a honga; Estherin amah a dingin kua ahia chih a gen khinta ngala.
Huan kumpipan a zuihbuh a suaha, Haman akipana a lak, Mordekai kiangah a peta hi.
Huan Estherin Mordekai Haman inko tungah a koihta hi.
Huan Estherin kumpipa maah thu a gen nalaia, a khe bula pukin, Agag mi Haman giloubawl leh Judate siatna dinga a lunggel khitsa a lunggelna koih mang dingin khitui toh amah a ngen ngutngut hi.
Huchiin kumpipan Esther lamah a dangkaeng lalchiang a lena.
Huchiin Esther a thou-a kumpipa maah a dingta.
Huan aman, Kumpipa lungkimna a hiha, amitmuha deihsakna ka muha, kumpipa maa thil dika a lata, a muha lungkimhuai ka hih aleh, Haman Hammedatha Agag mi tapain laikhak a bawlte kumpipa biala om tengteng Judate hihsiatna dinga a gelh sutin om hen:
Huchilouin ka mite tunga gilou tung ding ken bangchibangin ka en ngam thei mahmah dia? ahihkeileh ka tanaute siatna ken bangchiin ka mu ngam dia? a chi a.
Huan kumpipa Ahasurain kumpinu Esther kiang leh Mordekai Juda mi kiangah, Ngai un, Judate tunga a khut a khak jiakin, Haman inkote leh, khailupna khuama a khialuppa uh amah Esther kiangah a peta hi.
Na deih bang un, kumpipa minin, kumpipa zungbuha sawnin, Judate kiangah leng laigelh un: laigelh kumpipa mina gelha, kumpipa zungbuha sawn lah, mi kuapeuhmahin a hihlamdang thei ngal kei a, a chi a.
Huan huailaiin kumpipa laigelhmite a sam ua, a kha thumna Siva khaa, a ni sawmnih leh thum niin; huan Judate tungtang thu Mordekaiin thu apiak bangin gamheutute kiang leh, India a kipan Ethopia phaa om bialte ukpipate leh lalte, bial ja leh sawmnih leh sagih, huaia gelhdan bangjela bial chiteng kiang, mi chiteng a pau uh dungjui jelin, a laigelh uh bang jela Judate, apau uh bang jelin a kiang uah gelhin a omta hi.
Huan kumpipa Ahasura minin a gelha, kumpipa zungbuh in a sawna, kumpipa nasepnaa kizang sek sakol man-gang, hoih taka vulhtea tuangin sakol tungah dakin laikhakte a khakta hi.
Huaiah kumpipan khopi chitenga om Judate kikhawm khawma, a hinna udia panga, amaute sual ding a nauneute uleh a numeite uh, a sum uh gallaka la dinga, kisa mite leh bial thilhih theihna hihse ding leh mangthang sak din phalna a pia a.
Kumpipa Ahasur bial tengteng ah ni khatin, huai bel, a kha sawm leh nih, Adar kha ahi a, a ni sawm leh thumni takin.
Bial chitenga piak ding chi-a thupiak, kigelh a kopi mite tengteng kiangah suahin a oma, huai ni chianga Judaten a melmate uh tunga phu la dinga mansaa a om theihna ding un.
Huchiin dak kumpipa nasepnaa zat sakol man-gangte tunga tuangte a pai khia ua, kumpipa thupiakin amau a nohin a khawksak ngal ua; huan thupiak pen Susan inpi-a piak khiak ahi.
Huchiin Mordekai bel kumpi puan dum leh kang, dangkaeng lallukhu thupi toh, puannaktual puanmalngat hoih leh sandup toh kumpipa ma akipan a pai khetaa: huan Susan khopi a kikou a, a kipak hi.
Huchiin Judaten koujanna leh kipahna, nuamna leh zahna a nei uhi.Huan bial chiteng leh, khopi chitenga, koilai peuha kumpipa thupiak leha thubawl paina peuhah, Judaten kipahna leh nuamna a nei ua, ankuangluina leh ni hoih.
Huchiin gama mite laka tampite Judate a honghi ua; Judate launa lah a tunguah a hongomta ngala.
Huan bial chiteng leh, khopi chitenga, koilai peuha kumpipa thupiak leha thubawl paina peuhah, Judaten kipahna leh nuamna a nei ua, ankuangluina leh ni hoih.
Huchiin gama mite laka tampite Judate a honghi ua; Judate launa lah a tunguah a hongomta ngala.
Huan a kha sawm leh nih, Adar kha, huaimah a ni sawm leh thum ni, kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl tangtunna ding a hongnai lai, Judate melmaten a tung ua vaihawmna neih a kilamet ni uh; hinapi-a lah a hilou lama a hongkilehbuta, Judaten amau mudahte tunga vaihawmna a honneih lai un;
Kumpipa Ahasura bial tengteng a khopite uah Judate, amau siatna zongte tunga khut kha dingin, a kikhawm khawm ua: kuamahin lah amaute a nangzou kei uh; mite tengteng tungah lah amaute launa a hongomta ngala.
Huchiin bialte-a lalte leh, gamukmite leh, ukpipate leh kumpina nasem ten, Judate a panpih ua; Mordekai launa lah a tunguah a hongom ngala.
Kumpipa in ah Mordekai a thupi-a, bial tengtengah a min a thang kheta hi: hiai mipa Mordekai lah a hongthupi semsem ngala.
Huchiin namsaua satin Judaten a melmate tengteng a that ua, thahna leh hihsiatnain, amaute mudahte tungah ahih ding bang uh a hihta uhi.
Huan Susan inpi ah Judate mi za nga a that uh a hihgawp uh.
Huan Parsandatha te, Dalphon te, Aspahtha te,
Poratha te, Adalia te, Aridantha te,
Parmaste te, Arisai te, Aridai te, Vajezatha te,
Judate melmapa Hammedatha tapa Haman tapate, a that ua; himahleh gallak ah a khut uh a nga kei uhi.
Huai niin Susan inpi-a thaha om zah kumpipa maah a hontawi uh.
Huan kumpipan kumpinu Esther kiangah, Judate Susan inpisungah mi zanga a that ua a hihsia uh, Haman tapa sawmte toh; kumpipa bial dangte ah bang a chi bawlta phet ding uamah: Khaile, bang na thum a? huan na kianga phal ahi ding: ahihkeileh bang ahia na nget lai? huan na kianga phal ahi, a chi a.
Huan Estherin, Kumpipa lungkimna a hih leh, jingchianga tuni-a thupiak bangbanga gamtang dingin Susana om Judate phal inla, Haman tapa sawmte khailupna khuam ah kikhai le uh, a chi a.
Huchiin huchibanga hih ding chiin kumpipan thu a pia: huan Susan ah thubawl a kipe khiaa: huchiin Haman tapa sawmte a khaita uhi.
Adar kha mah a ni sawm leh li niin Susana om Judate a kikhawm khawm ua, Susan ah mi za thum a that uh; himahleh gallak tungah a khut uh a nga kei uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa bialtea om Juda dangte a kikhawm khawm ua, a hinna uh a hum ua, a melmate ua kipan khawlna a nei ua, huan amau mudahte lakah mi sing sagih leh sang nga a that ua; himahleh gallak tungah a khut uh a nga kei uh.
Adar kha ni sawm leh thumniin hiai tuh hih ahi; huaimah a ni sawm leh li niin, a khawl ua, ankuanglui ni leh kipah niin a bawl uhi.
Himahleh Susana om Judate a kikhawm khawm ua a ni sawm leh thum niin, leh a ni sawm leh li niin; huaimah a ni sawm leh nga niin a khawlta ua, ankuanglui ni leh kipah niin a bawl uhi.
Huaijiakin kho neutea Judate, kho kulhbanga um louha tengten, Adar kha ni sawm leh li ni kipahna ni leh ankuanglui niin, ni hoih ni, leh a kuakua tantuan kikhakna niin a nei uhi.
Huan Mordekai hiai thilte a gelha, kumpipa Ahasura bial tengtenga om Judate, gamla leh naiate kiangah a khaka,
Kum sika, Adar kha ni li leh, huaimah ni sawm leh ni nga ni tang dinga hilhna dingin,
Judate a melmate ua kipan a khawlni uh, amau adia lungkhamna kipahna a honghihna kha, misi sunna ni hoih a honghihna kha bangin: huai nite ankuangluina leh kipahna ni-a aom ua, tantuante a kuakua a kikhak ua, gentheite kianga thilpiakte piakna a neih theihna ding un.
Huchiin Judaten a patkhitsa bang un leh, Mordekaiin amaute kianga a gelhkhitsa bangin hih dingin a theisiam uh.
Hammedatha tapa Haman, Agag mi, Judate tengteng melmapan Judate tengteng siatna ding amau hihse ding, a ngaihtuaha, amaute hihgawp ding leh, amaute hihse dinga, Pur, huai bel, aisan ahi, a na paih jiakin;
Hiamahleh a thu kumpipa ma a hongtunin, a ngaihtuah gilou, Judate siatna dia a ngaihtuah, amah lu tung mahmaha a kibut dingin laikhaktein thu a peta a; huchi-a amah leh a tapate khailupna khuama khai a omna ding un.
Huchibang a hih jiakin hiai nite Purim, Pur min juiin a sa uhi.
Huaijiakin hiai laikhak thute tengteng jiak leh hiai thu tungtang thu a muhsa uh, a tung ua hongtung jiakin.
Judaten a hihkip ua, amau tung leh, a suante uh tung leh, amaute huchi banga kizomkhawm bangte tengteng tungah a kisuanta uhi, huchi-a a pel lou hiala, huaia laigelh dungjuia leh, huaia hun sehsa dungjuia, kum chitenga hiai ni nihte a tan theihna ding un;
Huchi-a hiai nite a khang a khanga, a inkuankuana, bial chiteng leh khopi chitenga theihgige leh tana om theihna dingin; huchi-a hiai Purim nite Judate lak akipana a juau louha, huaite theihgigena leng a suante uh akipan a man louhna dingin.
Huchiin kumpinu Esther, Abiheil tanu leh, Mordekai Juda miin, hiai Purim laikhak nihna sukkipna dingin thuneihna tengtengin a gelhta uhi.
Huan Judate tengteng kiang ah, Ahasura gama bial ja leh sawm nih leh sagihte kiangah, lungmuanna leh thutak thute toh laikhakte a khakta a,
Hiai Purim nite a hun sehsa uha, Mordekai Juda mi leh kumpinu Estherin huaite pha a sak uh dungjui leh, amau ading leh a suante uh adia, anngawlna leh a kahna thu ua a nahihkip bang ua hihkip dingin.Huchiin Esther thupiakin hiai Purim thute a hihkipa; laibu ah a kigelhta hi.
Huchiin Esther thupiakin hiai Purim thute a hihkipa; laibu ah a kigelhta hi.
Huan kumpipa Ahasurain gam tungah leh, tuipi tuikulh gam tungah siah a bawlta hi.
Huchiin a thilhih theihna leh a hatna thilhihte tengteng leh, Mordekai, kumpipan amah a koihsangna, letna genna kim, Media leh Persia kumpipate chiamtehna laibu-a gelh ahi kei umaw?Mordekai Juda mi leh kumpipa zom, Judate laka lian, a u a nau mi tampiin a pom uh ahi ngala; a mite hoihna zong, leh a chite tengteng kianga lungmuan thu genin.
Mordekai Juda mi leh kumpipa zom, Judate laka lian, a u a nau mi tampiin a pom uh ahi ngala; a mite hoihna zong, leh a chite tengteng kianga lungmuan thu genin.
Uz gamah mi khat a oma, a min Job ahi; huan huai mi hoihkim leh tang ahi a, Pathian khitaa, hoihlou mudah.
Huan amah lakah tapa sagih leh tanu thum a piang ua.
A neihleh lam leng belam sang sagih leh, sangawngsau sang thum leh, bawngtal za nga leh, sabengtungnu za nga leh inkuan thupi mahmah ahi: huchiin hiai mipa suanlam tate tengteng lakah a thupipen ahi.
Huan a tapate a kuan ua a khat chiat in ah a niin ankuangluina a nei ua; huchiin mi a sawl ua a sanggamnumei thumte uh amau kianga ne ding leh dawn dingin a sam sak ua.
Huan hichi ahia, a ankuang lui san laitak un, Jobin mi a sawla amaute a hihsiangthoua, jingsangin beltakin a thoua, a vekua zah dungjuiin halmang thillatte a lan: Jobin lah, Ka tapaten thil a hihkhial un, a lungtangte un Pathian a gensia uh ahi thei hi, a chi ngala.
Huchiin TOUPA maa Pathian tapate a hongkilak ni uh a om a, huan a lak uah Setam leng a hongpai sama.
Huchiin TOUPAN Setan kiangah, kaw hongkipan na hia? a chi a.
Huan Setanin TOUPA a dawnga, Leia langkhat langkhat hoha, a sunga tou vaka suk vak vak ka hi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Setan kiangah, Ka sikha Job na ngaihtuah ngei hia? amah banga hoihkim leh mi tang, Pathian kihtaa hoihlou mudah leiah lah kuamah a om ngal kei a, a chi a.
Huchiin Setanin TOUPA a dawnga, Bangmah lou dia Jobin Pathian kihta ahi maw?
Amah kimvelin leh, a in kimvelin leh, a neih tengteng kimvelin, ning chitengah umna na bawl kei maw? a khut nasep na vualjawla, gamsungah a neihlehlam a pung hi.
Himahleh tuin na khut suahkhia inla, a neih tengteng khoihin, huchiin na maitangah nang a hon gense ding hi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Setan kiangah, Ngaiin, a neih tengteng nang thu ahi; amah mah tungah kia na khut kha ken, a chi a.
Huchiin Setan a kuan khetaa TOUPA ma akipanin.
Huan a tapate leh a tanuten a unaupa uh upapen ina a nek ua uain a dawn lai un ni khat thuin a hongtunga,
Job kiangah sawltak khat a honga, Bawngtalten lei a let ua, sabengtungte a kiangah a gamta ua:
Seba miten amau a delh ua, a pi mang uh; ahi, namsau hiamin sikhate a that ua; huan nang hilh dingin kei ke leuleu ka suakta hi, a chi a.
Huchia thu a gen laiin midang khat leng a honga, Van akipanin Pathian mei a kiaa, belamte leh, sikhate akang manga, amau a kangtum hi: huan nang hilh dingin kei keleuleu ka suakta hi, a chi a.
Huchia thu a gen lain, midangkhat a hong laia, Kaldai miten pawl thum a bawl ua, sangawngsaute a delh ua, a pi mangta uhi, huan namsau hiamin sikhate a that ua; huan nang hilh dingin kei keleuleu ka suakta hi, a chi a.
Huchia thu a gen laiin, midang khat mah a honga, Na tapate leh na tanuten a unaupa upapen ina a nek ua uain a dawn lai un:
Huan, ngaiin gamdai akipanin huih thupi a hongnunga, huai in ning lite a honnuaia, tangvalte tungah a chima, a si uh: huan nang hilh dingin kei keleuleu ka suakta hi, a chi a.
Huchihlaiin Job a thou a, a puannaktual a botkeka, a lu a metsianga, leitung dennain a kineia, Pathian a beta hi;
Huan aman, Ka nu sul akipan vuaktangin ka honga, huailamah vuaktangin ka kik ding: TOUPAN a piaa, huan TOUPAN a lamang ta hi; TOUPA min phatin om hen, a chi a.Hiai tengtengah Jobin a hihkhial keia, haihuaitakin Pathian leng a mohsa kei hi.
Hiai tengtengah Jobin a hihkhial keia, haihuaitakin Pathian leng a mohsa kei hi.
TOUPA Pathian tapate ahongkilak ni uh a om nawna, huan a lak uah Setan leng a hongpai sama TOUPA maa kilak ding in.
Huan TOUPAN Setan kiangah, Kaw hongkipan na hia? a chi a.
Huan Setanin TOUPA a dawnga, Leia langkhat langkhata hoha, a sunga tou vaka suk vak ka hi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Setan kiangah, Ka sikha Job na ngaihtuah ngei hia? amah banga hoihkim leh mi tang, Pathian kihtaa hoihlou mudah leiah lah kuamah a om ngal keia: amah siatna dingin hon tangsak mah lechin, a ginomna a len chinten hi, a chi a.
Huan Setanin TOUPA a dawnga, Vun sikin vun, ahi, mihingin a neih tengteng hinna sikin a pe ding hi.
Himahleh tuin na khut khainla, a guh leh a sa khoih lechin, huan na maitangah nang hon gense ding hi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN Setan kiangah, Ngaiin, Amah na khut ah a om hi; a hinna leltak hawiin, a chi a.
Huchiin Setan a pawt khiaa TOUPA ma akipanin, meima tumin a khepek nuai akipan a lujang tanin Job a gawta.
Huchiin aman kikhuatna dingin belpei a laa; huan meivu lakah a tuta hi.
Huchihlaiin a jiin a kiangah, Na ginomna len chinten lailai na hi hia?
Pathian gensia inla, siin, a chi a.
Himahleh a kiangah, Numei haite thugente laka khat bangin thu na gen.
Bang ahia?
Pathian khut ah hoih i mu dia, hoihlou leng i mu kei dia hia? a chi a.
Hiai tengtengah Jobin a muk in thil a hihkhial kei hi.
Huchia Job lawm thumten a tunga hiai hoihlou hongtung tengteng a jak un, amau mi chih amah mun akipanin a hong ua: Elipha Teman mi leh, Bildad Sua mi leh Zophar Naaman mi: huan amah kah ding leh amah lungmuan dingin hoh khawm dingin thuseh a bawl uhi.
Huan gamla pia a dak touh uleh, amah a theikei ua, huan nakpiin a kikou khia ua, a kapta uhi; huan a puannaktual uh michihin a botkek ua, a lu tang uah van lamah leivui a khita uhi.Huchiin a kiangah leitungah ni sagih leh jan sagih a tu ua, a kiangah kuamahin thu khat leng a gen kei uh: a lungkhamna a thupi mahmah chih lah a thei ngal ua.
Huchiin a kiangah leitungah ni sagih leh jan sagih a tu ua, a kiangah kuamahin thu khat leng a gen kei uh: a lungkhamna a thupi mahmah chih lah a thei ngal ua.
Hiai khitin Jobin a kam a kaa, a ni a hamsiat ta hi.
Huan Jobin a dawnga hichiin a chi hi:
Ka pianna ni leh jan, Pasal naupang paiin a om, a kichihna mangthang hen.
Huai ni mialna hihen; tunglam akipan Pathianin kah dah hen, a tungah leng khovak tang kei hen.
Khomial leh sihna limin amau adingin huai ngen uhen; a tungah meipi kai hen; khua nimsak tengtengin huai tuh lausak uhen.
Jan a hihleh, mial sah bikbek a tungah tu hen; kum nite lakah kipak kei hen; khate simna ah tel kei heh.
Ngaiin, huai jan hut hen; huaiah kipah aw hong kei hen.
Huai ni hamsiat amauten hamsiat uhen, leviathan tokthou dinga mansaa om te.
Huaia khomui aksite mial uhen: khovak zong henla, himahleh bangmah neikei hen; jingsang mitvunte leng mu sam kei hen:
Ka nu sul kongkhakte a khak louh jiakin, ka mit akipana buaina a sel louh jiakin.
Sul akipana bang dia silou ka hia? gil akipan ka hongpai khiak laia bangdia kha khah lou kahia?
Bangdia khukten kei honsang uh ahia?
Ahihkeileh bangdia ka tep ding, nawiten?
Tuchiangin na lum khina na dai mai ding lah ka hi ngala; ka na ihmuta dia; huchiin ka nakhawlta ding hi:
Lei kumpipate leh thudotmite, amau adinga mun siate bawlte toh;
Ahihkeileh dangkaeng nei lalte, a inte uh dangkaa dimsakte toh;
Ahihkeileh muh louha a hunloua piang bang na hilou ka hia, naungek khovak mu ngeiloute bang?
Huaiah mi gilouten sukbuai a tawpsan ua; huan huaiah mitawlte a khawl uh.
Huai ah suangkulha tangte nuamin a om khawm uh; nasep heutu aw a za kei uh.
Huaiah a lian leh a neu a om ua; huan a pu akipanin sikha a nuamlen.
Bangdia daha om kianga khovak piak ahia, khaa haksa sa kiangah hinna;
Sihna deiha, lah a tunlouhnate kiangah; huan gou sel guk zon sanga thupia zongmite kiang ah;
Han a tun lai ua, nakpitaka kipakte kiang ah?
Bangdia mi a lampi sela om kiang leh Pathianin a umsuak kianga khovak piaka om ahia?
Ka thumna lah an ka nek main a hongtunga, ka maunate tui banga leihbuakin a om hi.
Ka kihtak thil lah ka tungah a hongtung ngala, ka laulau lah ka tungah a hongtung hi.Nuam ka sa keia, muan leng ka muang kei, khawlna leng ka neikei hi; himahleh buaina a hongpai hi.

Huchihlaiin Elipha Teman miin a dawnga, hichiin a chi hi:
Min nang honhoulim pih tum leh na zadah diam?
Hizongleh pau louin kua a om thei dia?
Ngaiin, mi tampi na hilhtaa, huan khut hatloute na hihhatta hi.
A puklai mah na thuten a dingsaka, khuk hatloute na kipsak hi.
Himahleh tuin na tungah a hongtunga, na baha; nang a honkhoiha, na buaita.
Pathian an kihtakna na muanna hi lou hia, na lametna na lampite muanhuaina?
Theigigein, ka honngen hi, hoih hina pia, mangthang ngei kua ahia? ahihkeileh koilaiah ahia midik satkhiaka om?
Kei muh danin, thulimlouhna leilette ahi ua, buaina tuha, huaimah atte.
Pathian huin a mangthang ua, huan a hehna mutin himanin a om uhi.
Humpinelkai huham leh, humpinelkai hangsan aw leh, humpinelkai tuailai hate, a kitan ta.
Samat taksap jiakin humpinelkai tek a mangthanga, huan humpinelkai noute a dalhjak ua.
Tuin a gukin thil ka kiang a hongtunga, ka bilin huaia huauna a sangta hi.
Jan mengmuhna akipana ngaihtuahnate ah, mite nakpi taka a ihmut san lai un,
Launa ka tungah a hontunga, linna, huaiin ka guhte tengteng a singa.
Huailaiin ka mai maah kha a paia; ka chimul a ding ta hi.
Ka ding kinkena, himahleh huaia a kilatdan ka theikak theita keia; a lim tuh ka mit maah a oma; daihna a oma, huan aw ka jaa,
Pathian sangin sithei mihing a dik zo ding hia?
A Bawlpa sangin mihing siangthou zo ding hia? chiin.
Ngaiin, a sikhate ah muanna akoih keia; huan a angelte haiin a ngoh hi:
Tungman ina teng amaute hi diak na un chia, a suangphum leivuia oma, leikha maa chimsia:
Jingsang leh nitak kikalin hihsiatin a om ua: theihlouh hialin khantawnin a mangthang uhi.Amau sunga a puanin-khau uh bohkhiak touh hi lou hia? a si ua, huan pilna tel louin.
Amau sunga a puanin-khau uh bohkhiak touh hi lou hia? a si ua, huan pilna tel louin.
Tuin samin; nang hondawng kuamahmah a om a? huan misiangthoute lakah a kua pen lam na nga dia?
Lungjinnain lah mi hai a that ngala, huan thiknain mi mawl a hihlum sek hi.
Mihai zungkai ka mutaa; himahleh thakhatin a tenna ka hamsiat hi.
A tate bitna akipan gamla pi ah a om ua, huan kongpi ah hihgawpin a om uh, kuamah amaute suakta ding a om sam kei uhi.
Kua anlak ding ahia gilkialmiin a gaih khita, ling laka kipan nasana a lak khiak, thangin a sum uh duhin a kam lianpiin a ka hi.
Gimthuakna lah leivui akipanin a hongpawt keia, lei a kipanin buaina leng a hongdawn khe sam kei hi;
Himahleh mihing buai ding maha piang ahi, meiekte a tou len bangin.
Himahleh ken ahihleh, Pathian lamah ka zong dinga, huan Pathian kiangah ka thu ka koih ding hi.
Thil thupite hihpa leh zonkhiaktheihlouh; sim zohlouh thil lamdangte:
Lei tunga vuah pepa leh, loute tunga tui sawlpa:
Huchiin aman a niamsate tung sangah a koihtou a; huan misi sunte muanna ah a tawisang hi.
Zekhemhatte lunggelte bangmahlou a suaksaka, huchiin a khutte un a thiltup uh a hih theikei uhi.
Mi pilte a zekhemhatna un a mana: huan mihoihloute thugen akhupathalin a paihsak hi.
Sunlaiin khomialna a thuak ua, janlai bangin suntang laiin a mai maimah uh.
Himahleh a kam ua kipanin pabeite ahondama, mi hatte khut akipanin tasamte mahmah.
Huchiin gentheiin lametna a neia, huan, thulimlouhnain a kam a humsak hi.
Ngaiin, Pathianin a bawlhoih min nuam a sa hi; huaijiakin Bangkim hihthei sawina musit ken.
Aman lah meima a bawla, a tuama: a liamsaka, huan a khutin a damsak hi.
Buaina gukah a honsuakta sak dinga; ahi, sagih ah gilouin nang a honkhoih kei ding hi.
Kial chiangin nang sihna akipan a hontan ding; namsau thilhihtheihna akipan, kidou chiangin.
Lei jepna akipanin selin na om dinga; siatna ahongtun chiangin na lau sam kei ding hi.
Siatna leh kialna ah na nui dinga, lei gamsate na kihta sam kei ding hi.
Gama suangte toh na kithuahtheih ding jiak un; huan gama gamsate nang tohna kituak ding uhi.
Huan na puanin muangin a om chih na thei ding; huan na ganhuang na veh dinga, bangmah kimlou a om kei ding hi.
Na chite leng a thupi ding chih na thei dinga, huan na suante lei loupa bangin.
Kum chingin na han na juan dinga, a huna buh lak bangin.Ngaiin, hiai, i zongta ua, huchiin a om, jain, na hoihna dingin theiin.

Huchiin Jobin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Aw ka lungjinna kibuk peuhmah leh, huan ka tuahsiatna khaina ah kikoih khawm peuhmah leh:
Tuin tuipitea piaunel sangin a gikzo ding: huaijiakin ka thute leng a huham hi.
Thilbangkimhihthei thalte lah ka sungah a om ngala, gu huai akipana ka khain a dawn vek: Pathian mulkimhuainate kei dou dingin a kivual petmah uhi.
Loupa a neih laiin gam sabengtung a ham hia? ahihkeileh a annekding tungah bawngtal a ham hia?
Gim neilou chi tel louin a kine thei dia hia? ahihkeileh aktuida ah limna mawngmawng a om hia?
Ka khain amaute a khoih nuam kei; kei dingin an kihhuai bang ahi uh.
Aw ka nget tang thei leng jaw; ka thil deih Pathianin honphal lejaw:
Kei honhihgawp dingin Pathian deihlam hi lai henla; a khut zanin, kei honsat khe mai leh:
Huchiin lungmuanna ka nei lai mai dia; ahi, dawmlou natna ah ka kipak ding: Mi Siangthou thute lah ka kitheihmohbawl ngal kei a.
Ka hatna bang ahia, ka ngak ding? huan ka beina bang ahia, ka kuhkal ding?
Ka hatna, suangte hatna hi hia? ahihkeileh ka sa dalsik hia?
Keiah panpihna a om het kei hilou hia, huan kei akipan theihsiamna hawlmangin?
Bah dia mansaa om kiangah a lawmin Siamna a etsak ding ahi kei mo; huchilou-in Bangkimhihthei kihtakna a tawpsan ahi kei ding mo.
Luita bangin ka unaute a lepchiah uh; luita mangthang luanna bangin.
Huai tuh tuikhalin a voma; huai ah vuk a kisel.
A lum hun chiangin a tuimang ua, a sat chingin a mun ua kipan a mangthang uh.
Huai lampia khualzinte a pial ua, bangmah omlouhna munah a paitou ua, a mangthang uh.
Tema khualzinten a zong ua, Seba pawlten a lamen uh.
A kilamet hangun a zahlak uh; huai lamah avapai ua a hawmsuak uh.
Tuin lah bangmah na hi ngal kei ua; mulkimhuaina na mu ua, na lau uhi.
Kei honpia un? ahihkeileh na neihlehlam ua kipanin kei adingin thilpiak lan un, ka chi hia?
Ahihkeileh, nuaisiahhatmite khut ahipan hontan un, ka chi hia?
Hon sinsakin, huan ka dai ding: ka lamhaihna theisiam dingin hon bawlin.
Dikna thute hat hina mahmah e: Himahleh na miselnain bang a selphoua?
Thute selphou dinga um na hi uh hia?
Chimoh mi thugente huih bang ahi chih theiin.
A hi, paneiloute tungah ai na san ding ua, na lawm uh sumsinna vanin na bawl ding uh.
Tuin huaijiakin hehpihtakin hon en un; na ma uah ka juau ka gen sin ngal kei a.
Kik nawn un ka honngen ahi, diklouhna om kei hen; ahi, kik nawn un, ka thu a dik ahi.Ka lei ah diklouhna a om hia? thil hoihlou ka leiin a theikak theikei dia hia?

Lei tungah mihing adin kidouna a om kei mo? huan a nite kilohmi nite bang ahi ka hia?
Lim deih mahmah sikha bangin, a loh lamen kilohmi bangin:
Huaibangin bangmahlou khate nei dinga bawl ka hi, huan kei adingin jan chimhuaite seh ahi hi.
Ka lup chiangin, Chikchiangin ka thou dia? ka chi a; himahleh jan a sawt hi; huan khatlam khatlamah ni suah matan kilumlehnain ka dim hi.
Ka sa than leh leivui khalin a tuama; ka vun a kimata a puakkham thak hi.
Ka nite siamganmi khohthei sangin a kin jawa, lametna beia zatbei ahi.
Aw ka hinna huih ahi chih theigige in: ka mitin hoih a mu nawn kei ding hi.
Kei honmu mitin honen thei nawn takei dinga; na mitte ka tugnah a om ding ua, himahleh ka omta kei ding hi.
Meipi a mangthanga a omta kei bangin, huchiin kuapeuh Seola pai suk a hongpai tou nawnta kei uhi.
A in ah a kik nawnta kei dinga, a munin amah a thei nawnta kei ding hi.
Huaijiakin ka kam ka khou kei dinga; ka lungsim gimnaah thu ka gen ding; ka kha haksatna ah ka phun ding hi.
Tuipi ka hi hia, a hihkeileh tuipiganhinglian, huchia kei na honchin nak?
Ka lupnain honlungmuan dinga, ka tutna nemin ka phunna a jangkhaisak ding, ka chih chiangin;
Huaichiangin mangtein na honlau saka, mengmuhnatein na honmulkimsak hi:
Huchiin ka khain heklup leh sihna a tela, hiai ka guhte sangin.
Ka hinna ka chimtaka; ka hing gige kei ding: honom sak maimai un; ka nite lah bangmahlou ahi ngala.
Mihing bang ahi, amah na hihlet dinga, amah tunga na lungtang na koih dinga.
Jingsang tenga amah na veh dinga, mitphiat chiha amah na ettel ding?
Bangtan vei kei honlehngatsan lou ding na hia, bangtanvei ka chil ka nawmvalh matan honomsak maimai lou ding na hia?
Na khial hita leng, na tungah bang ka hiha, Aw mite chingpa nang? bangdia nang adia chiamtehna banga konkoih na hia, huchia keimaha dia puakgik ka hih maimah?Huan bangdia ka tatlekna ngaidam loua, ka thulimlohna la mang lou oi?
Kei tuin leivuia lum ding ka hi a; kuhkaltakin na honzong dia, himahleh ka omta kei ding.

Huchiin Bildad Sua miin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Bangtan hiai thilte gen ding na hia? huan bangtan na kama thute huih hat bang ding ahi ua?
Pathianin vaihawmna a hekkawi ahia? ahihkeileh Thilbang-kimhih theiin dikna a hekkawi ahia?
Na tate a tunga a khelh ua, hua a tatlekna uh khuta amaute a pikhiak a leh:
Pathian lam kuhkaltaka na zona, hua Thilbangkimhihthei kianga na thilnget na bawl leh;
Na siangthoua na dik leh; nang jiakin tuin ka khanglou mahmah dia, huan na diktatna omna a lohching sak ding hi.
Huan na kipatna neu mahleh, ahihhangin na tawpna na nunglam nakpiin a khang ding hi.
Huai jiakin ka honngen ahi, hun masa thu kan inla, a pipute un a na zonkhiak uh lamah kisuk in:
(Ei lah jana lel i hi ua, bangmah i theikei uh, leitungah i nite uh lah limliap ahi a: )
Amauten nang a honsinsak un, a honhilh un, a lungtang ua kipanin thute a gen kei ding ua hia?
Buannawi louin phaipek a khang khe thei ahia? tui louin loupa a khangthei ahia?
Hinga a oma, sat puk louh a hihlaiin, loupa dangte main a vuai nak hi.
Huaibangmahin Pathian manghilhte tengteng lampi ahi; huan pathianlimsaklou mi lametna a mangthang ding:
A muanna a kitam dinga, a kingakna maimomlen ahi hi.
A intung a ngai dia, himahleh a ding kei ding: huaiah a lenchinten dia, himahleh a pangsawt kei ding hi.
Ni suah main a hinga, huan a selte a huan tuamin a meng khia uh.
A zungte leivum kimah a jam ua, suangte omna mun ah a hing hi.
A mun akipan lakmang hi leh, huchiin amah a kitheihmohbawl dinga, Ka honmu ngeikei, chiin.
Ngaiin, hiai a lampi kipahna ahia, huan lei akipanin adangte a hongsuak ding uh.

Huan Jobin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Chihtaktakin huchi ahi chih ka thei hi: himahleh Pathian lakah mihing bangchiin a dik thei dia?
Amah kisel pih a utlam a hihleh, sang khata khat amah a dawng theikei ding hi.
Amah lungtangin a pila, hatnain a thilhihthei ahi: amah douin kua a kikhauhsakin, a lohchingta a oi?
Mualte a suana, a theikei ua, heha amaute a lumleh laiin.
A mun akipanin lei a singa, huan huaia khuamte aling uh.
Ni thu a piaa, huan a suak kei; aksite a bilhkhum ngiungeu hi.
Amah kian vante a phalhkhiaa, tuipi kihawt tungah a pai hi.
Aman Jangkhua, Zuheisuktun leh Siguk leh simlam aksi tamna munte a bawl hi.
Aman sui theih vuallouh thil thupite a hiha; ahi, sim zohlouh thillamdangte.
Ngaiin, ka kiangah a paia, amah ka mu kei: a pai lailaia, himahleh amah ka mu kei hi.
Ngaiin, samat a mana, amah kuan a kham thei dia?
Bang hih na hia? kuan a kiangah a chi dia.
Pathianin a hehna a lakik kei ding; Rahab panpihmite amah nuaiah a kun petmah uhi.
Bangchipheta tawm jawin amah ka dawngin, amah toh ngaihtuah dingin ka thute ka telkhe dia?
Amah, diktatta zongleng, ka dawng kei ding hi; ka gal kiangah thilngetna ka bawl ding.
Samta leng la, huan honna dawngta leh; himahleh ka aw a ngaikhia chih ka um kei ding hi.
Huihpiin aman a honkitamsaka, a san omlouin ka liamnate a pungsak hi.
Ka nak a honphal keia, himahleh thangpaihnain a hondimsak hi.
Hatna thu gen leng, ngaiin, Amah a hat hi: huan vaihawmna thu, kuan hun a pe dia?
Diktatta zongleng, ka kamin a honmohpaih hi: hoihkim ta zongleng, hoihlouin a hontelsak ding hi.
Hoih kim mahleng, ka kilimsak kei; ka hinna ka musit.
Khat ahi veka; huaijiakin, Hoihkim leh gilou a hihse tuak, ka chi
Jepnain thakhatin hihlum leh, mi hoih thuakna a nuihsan ding hi.
Lei mi gilou khuta piakin a om: huaia vaihawmmite maitangte a tuama; amah ahihkeileh, kua a hita dia?
Tuin ka nite laitaipihmi sangin a kinjaw: a tai mang ua, hoih a mu kei uh.
Long kinte bangin a pai mang uhi: muvanlai samat tunga ngumkiak bangin.
Ka phunna ka mang ngilh dia, ka mel lungkham ka pai dia, ka kipak ding, chi leng.
Ka lungkhamna tengteng ka laua, hoih non sa kei ding chih ka thei hi.
Mohpaihin ka om dia; ahihleh bangdia a thawna semgim ka hia?
Vuk tuiin kisilin, ka khutte huchitakin siangsak ngeitak leng;
Hinapiin guam sungah na honpai lut thou dia, huan keimah puanten a hon kih ding uh.
Kei bangin, amah lah mihing ahi keia, amah ka dawn theihna dingin, vaihawmnaa ka hoh khawm theihna ding un.
Ka kikal uah kou gel honmat theihna dingin, thulaigenmi a om kei hi.
Kei akipanin achiang la meng henla a kihtakhuainain kei honlausak kei hen:Huaichiangin thu ka gen dia, amah ka lau kei ding: keimah ah lah huchibang ka hi ngal kei a.

Ka khain ka hinna a chimtaka; ka utdandanin ka phun ding hi: ka kha thangpaihnain ka gen ding.
Pathian kiangah, Honmohpaih ken; bangdia honkinakpih na hia hontheisak in, ka chi ding hi.
Na nuaisiah nang adia hoih ahi maw, na khutte thilhih na muhsita, giloute thugen tunga na maitai?
Sa mitte nei na hi hia, ahihkeileh mihing muh banga mu na hi hia?
Na nite mihing nite bang hia, ahihkeileh na kumte mihing kumte bang,
Ka thulimlouhna na kana, ka khelhna na nungdelha,
Ka gilou kei chih na theih nakpia, na khuta kipan hon suaktasak ding a omlouh?
Na khutten a honsek un a honbawl kimvel sipsipa; tun kiheiin non hihse dia hia?
Theigige in, ka honngen ahi, tungman banga na honmek dan; leivui hontun nawn ding na hi hia?
Nawitui bangin na honsung khiain, nawituidat bangin na hontok kei maw?
Vun leh sain na hontuama, guhte leh thagui-tein na honphan khawm hi.
Hinna leh deihsakna na honphala, huan na kepnain ka lungsim a hawi hi.
Himahleh hiai thilte na lungtang sungah na sela; hiai bel na tup ahi chih ka thei hi:
Thil ka hihkhelh leh, huchiin non chiamteha, huan ka thulimlouhna akipan na honkhah kei ding hi.
Ka gitlouh leh, ka tung a gik hi; ka diktat leh, huchiin leng ka lutang ka sangsak kei ding, zahlaknaa dim ngalin leh ka gimthuakna enin.
Huan ka lutang a kiletsak leh, humpinelkai bangin nang non benga: huan ka tunga na lamdandan na hon ensak nawn hi.
Kei kalh na palaite na thaksaka, ka tunga na hehna na khangsaka; hondou ding sepaih hon thak non sawl hi.
Bangdia sul akipan kei honlakhia na hia oi leh? na si taleng, kuamah muh main.
Omlou mahbang bangta ding hiinga; sul akipana hana puaka omta ding hi inga.
Ka nite a tom kei maw? huchi ahihleh, tawpin, honom sak maimaiin, huchia neukhaa ka lungmuan theihna dingin.
Ka kik nawn louhna akipana ka pai main, khomialna gam leh sihna limliap gam mahmah ah:Mialna mahbanga, mialna sahna gama: sihna limliap gam, dan himhim omlouhna, khovak khomial banga a omna mun ah.

Huan zophar Naamanmi in a dawnga, huchiin a chi a:
Thu tampite dawn louh ding ahia hia? huan mi houlimnaa dim siamtansak ding hia?
Na kisaktheihnaten mite daisak ding hia? huan na simmoh chiangin, kuamahin nang honzahlaksak lou ding uhia?
Ka thuhilh a siangthoua, huan na mit uah ka siang hi, na chi ngala.
Himahleh Pathianin thugen maijen le jaw, nang demin a mukte hongleh;
Huchin pilna thugukte nang a honensak dinga, a theihna ah thuah tampi ahi chih: huaijiakin na thulimlouhna gun sanga tawmjaw na lakah Pathianin nang a honphut chih theiin.
Zonin Pathian na mu thei diam; hoihkimna ah Thilbangkimhihthei na mu thei diam?
Van bangin a sanga; bang na hih thei dia?
Seol sangin a thuka; bang na thei thei dia?
Huaia tehna lei sangin a saujawa, tuipi sangin a zajaw hi.
Paisuak henla, man henla, huan vaihawmna ah sam leh, huchiin kuan amah a dal thei dia?
Aman lah mi bangmahloute a thei ngala: ngaihtuah kei mahleh, thu limlouhna leng a mu hi.
Mihing theihsiamna beiin theihsiamna a nei ding, sabengtung nou mihinga a pian chiangin.
Na lungtang na koih dika, amah lama na khutte na jak leh;
Na khuta thulimlouhna a oma, gamlapia na koihkhiaka, gitlouhna na puanina na tensak kei leh;
Huchiin gensiatna ding omlouin na mai na daksak taktak dinga; ahi, na kip dinga, na lau kei ding:
Na haksatna na mangngilh ding jiakin; tui luang mangsa bangin na theigige ding hi:
Huan sunlai sangin na hinna a telzo dinga; khomial om mahleh, jingsang bang ahi ding hi.
Huan lametna a om jiakin, na kipta ding hi; ahi, amah tanchin na zong dinga, muangin na khawlta ding hi.
Lup leng na lum lai dinga, huan kuamahin nang honlausak kei ding uhi; ahi, mi tampiin nang a honzong ding uhi.Himahleh gilou mitte a juausuak dinga, taina ding lampi a neikei ding ua, huan a lametna uh kha khah ahi ding hi.
Himahleh gilou mitte a juausuak dinga, taina ding lampi a neikei ding ua, huan a lametna uh kha khah ahi ding hi.
Huchiin Jobin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Ginlelh vuallouhin mite jaw na hi hi peuhmah ua, huan nou toh pilnaa si ding hi.
Himahleh noute bangmahin theihsiamna ka nei hi; nou sangin ka niamzo kei hi: ahi, hiaite bang thilte kuan a theikei a?
Kei jaw mi a inveng adia nuihzabuk ka hi a, kei, huai Pathian sama, hua aman amah dawnpa, mi dik, mi hoihkim, nuihzabuk kana hi.
Omnuama om ngaihtuahnaah vangsiatna muhsitna a oma; ahihhangin, a khe uh teute adingin mansain a om hi.
Suamhatmite puaninte a lohchinga, Pathian hehsakte akip ua; a khut uh pathiana neite Pathian in tampi a pia.
Himahleh gamsate dongin, huan amau nang a honsinsak ding uh; huan huihkhuaa vasate, huchiin nang a honhilh ding uh:
Ahihkeileh lei kiangah thu genin, nang a honsinsak dinga; huan tuipia ngasaten na kiangah a phuang ding uhi.
Hiaite tengteng ah, TOUPA khutin a hihkhin chih kua ahia theilou?
Amah khut ah thil hing chiteng kha leh, mihing tengteng hatna a om hi.
Bilin thute a enchian kei maw, dangtungin a an achiam bangin?
Mi upate kiangah pilna a om, huan nite sauna ah theihsiamna a om hi.
Amah kiangah pilna leh hatna a om; aman thupha leh theihsiamna a nei.
Ngaiin, a kai puka, a kilam nawn theikei ding; mihing a khak binga, kuaman a hong theikei ding.
Ngaiin, tui a chinga a kang; a khahkhiaa lei a tum vek.
A kiangah hatna leh pilna a oma; khema omte leh khempa amaha ahi.
Thuhilhmite lohsamin a pi manga, huan vaihawmmite mihaiin a bawl hi.
Kumpipate kolte a suta, huan kawnggakin a kawng uh a gak hi.
Siampute lohsamin a pimanga, huan mi hatte a zou hi.
Muante thugen a suana, upate theihsiamna a la mang hi.
Lalte tungah muhsitna a buaka, mihatte kawnggak a phel hi.
Mial akipanin thil thukte a mukhiaa, huan sihna limliap khovakah a honla khia hi.
Namte a pungsaka, huan amau a hihsia: namte a theh-jaka, huan a lakhawm nawn hi.
Leia mite hausate lungtang a la manga, huan gamdaia lampi omlouhna ah amau a vakvai sak hi.Vakna beiin khomial ah a mai ua, huan zukhammi bangin amau a hoisak hi.
Vakna beiin khomial ah a mai ua, huan zukhammi bangin amau a hoisak hi.
Ngaiin, ka mitin hiai tengteng a muta hi, ka bilin huai a jaa a theisiam ta hi.
Na thei uh, huaimah ken leng ka thei hi: nou sangin ka niamzo kei hi.
Thilbangkimhihthei kiangah thu ka gen mahmah ding, huan Pathian toh houlim ka ut hi.
Himahleh nou jaw juau phuakte na hi ua, a phattuamlou daktolte na hi vek uhi.
Aw na vek un dai sipsip le uchin maw; na pilna uh hi ding hiven.
Tuin ka thusut ja un, ka mukte ngetna ngaikhia un.
Pathian adingin diktatloutakin thu na gen ding uam, amah adingin khemhat takin na houlim ding uam?
Ami na zahtak ding uam?
Pathian adin na sual ding uam?
Nou a honzonkhiak a hoih hia? ahihkeileh min mi a khem bangin, amah na khem ding uam?
Nou a honsal mahmah ding, a guka mite na zahtak uleh.
A hoih tungtuannain nou a honlausak kei dia hia, nou tungah a kihtakhuaina a ke kei diam?
Na thugen minthangte uh vut paunakte ahi, na kidalnate uh tungman kidalnate ahi.
Dai unla, thu ka gen theihna dingin, honomsak maimai un, ka tungah a hongtung ding hongtung heh.
Bangdingin ka hain ka sa ka lain, ka khut ah ka koih dia?
Aman honhihlum mahleh, amah ka ngak lai ding: ama ah ka lampite ka kemhoih lailai ding hi.
Hiai leng ka hotdamna ahi ding; pathianlimsaklou mi a maa hongpai lou ding a hih jiakin.
Ka thugen thanuam takin ja un, ka thuphuan na bil sung uah om hen.
Ngai un, tuin ka thu ka bawlhoihtaa; ka diktat ahi chih ka thei hi.
Kei hon kiselpih ding amah kua ahia? kei lah tuin ka dai dia kha ka khah ding hi.
Ka tungah thil nih hih kei phot le uchin, huan na mai akipan ka bu kei ding hi.
Kei akipanin gamla ah na khut kai kikin; huan na lauhuainain honlausak ken.
Huaichiangin honsam lechin, ka hondawng ding; ahihkeileh honpausak inla, hondawng in.
Ka thulimlouhnate leh khelhnate bang ahia?
Ka tatlekna leh ka khelhna hontheisakin.
Bangdia na mai sela na melma dia honbawl na hia?
Singnah mutleng na hihbuai dia hia? buhpawl keu na delh dia hia?
Nang lahkei demin thil kha taktak na gelh ngala, ka tuailai thulimlouhnate na honluahsak hi:
Ka khete leng kol na bunsaka, ka lampite tengteng na chiamteh hi; ka khenuai kimah gi na khunga.Mihing jaw thil muat bangin a mangthanga, nget nekgawp puansilh bangin.
Mihing jaw thil muat bangin a mangthanga, nget nekgawp puansilh bangin.
Mihing numei apan piang nite tawmchik ahia,
Pak bangin hong dawn khiaa, a vuai nawn pah, limliap bangin a taia, a om gige kei.
Huan mi huchibang tungah ma mit na hakin, nang toh vaihawmna ah kei non pi hia?
Thil nin akipanin kuan ahia thil siang la khe thei?
Kuamahin.
A nite sehsa ahi chih theiin, na kiangah a khate simna a oma, a kan theilouh dingin a gamgite na septa hi;
Amah en ken, a khawl theihna dingin, kiloh banga, a ni a hihkim matan.
Phuk paihin om mahleh, a hongsel nawn dinga, huaia ahiang nou a tawp kei ding, chih sing adin lametna lah a om ngala.
Huaia a zung lei ah upa mahleh, huaia a kungpi lei ah sita mahleh;
Himahleh tui gim jiakin a hongnou thak dia, singsuan bangin bawkte a honnei khe nawn ding hi.
Himahleh mihing a sia, a mang jel hi: ahi, mihingin kha a khaha, huan koiah a om a?
Tuipi akipan tuite a pai bangin, luipi bel a tula, a kang hi;
Huaimahbangin mihing a luma a thou kei hi: vante a om nawn louh matan, akhanglou kei ding uh, a ihmu uh leng a halhkhe sam kei ding uhi.
Aw Seol ah honna sel lechin aw, na thangpaihna aman masiah honna guk kep lechin, hun sehsa honna piain, kei hontheigige lechin aw;
Mi si leh, a hing nawn diam? ka galdouna leh nasepna ni tengteng ka ngak dinga, ka suahtakna a hongtun ma tanin.
Non na sam dia, huan ka hondawng ding hi: na khut nasep non lunggulh ding hi.
Himahleh tuin ka kalsuante na sima: ka khelhna peuhmah na chiamteh hi.
Ip sungah ka tatlekna bilhin a oma, huan ka thulimlouhna na gonggak hi.
Huan mual puk bangmahlou a honghi taktaka, a mun akipanin suangpi suanin a om hi;
Tuiten suang a kiamsak ua; huaia dimletten leia leivui a tai mang uh; huan mihing lametna na hihsia hi.
Khantawnin amah na zou a, a paia; a mel na lamdang saka, amah na sawl mang hi.
A tapate zahin a om ua, aman a theikei; hihniamin a om ua, himahleh aman amau ahi chih a theikei.Himahleh a tunga a sain natna a neia, huan a sunga a khain a sun hi.
Himahleh a tunga a sain natna a neia, huan a sunga a khain a sun hi.
Huchiin Elipha Teman miin a dawng a, hichiin a chi a:
Mi pilin theihna bangmahlou toh dawnna a bawlin, suahlam huihin a gilpi a dimsak sak diam?
Houlimna phatuamlou toh thu a ngaihtuahin, ahihkeileh hoih a hih theihna louh dinga thugente a ngaihtuah diam?
A hi, launa na hihmanga, huan Pathian maa kipiakzohna na dal lai hi.
Na thulimlouhnain lah na kam a sinsaka, zekhemhat mi lei na tel ngal a.
Nang mahmah kamin nang siamlouh ahontang saka, kei hilouin; ahi, nang demin nangmah mukte mahmahin a hontheihpih hi.
A piang mihing masapen na hi ahia? ahihkeileh tangte maa lakkhiaka om na hi maw?
Pathian thuhilh guk na za ta hia? huan pilna na kikoih hoih hia?
Ka theih louh uh bang na theia? koua omlou bang na theisiama?
Ka lak uah samkang leh mi upa mahmah a om tuaktuak, na pa sanga nakpia upajawte.
Pathian nepnate leh siamtaka honhilh thute nang adia neu lua uhia?
Bangdia na lungtangin nang honpi mang ahia?
Bang dia na mitte phia ahia?
Huchia Pathian dema na lungsim na heia, na kam akipana huchibang thute na pawtkhiak sak.
Mihing bang ahia, a sian ding? numei apan piang amah kua ahia a diktat ding?
Ngaiin, a mi siangthoute ah muanna a koih keia: ahi, a mitmuhin vante a siang kei uhi.
Mi kihhuai leh sia, mi thulimlouhna tui banga dawn, nak sian keina semin chia:
Ka honensak ding, honja in; huan ka muhsa ka phuang ding:
(Huai tuh mi pilten a pipute ua kipan na gen ua, a im kei uh;
Amau kiangah kia gam tuh piakin a oma, huan mikhual kuamah a lak uah a pai kei uh: )
Mi gilouin a damsung ni tengin natna a thuaka, nuaisiahhatmi adia khawlkhawm kumte zah mahmah.
Launa ging a bil ah a oma; hauhlaiin lokmi a tungah a hongpai ding hi:
Khomial akipan a hongkik ding chih a um keia, huan namsaua ngakin a om hi.
Tanghou zongin a tamvaka, Koia om ahia? chiin.
Khomial ni a kiang chinah mansain a om chih a theikei hi.
Dahna leh haksatnain amah a lausaka; kumpipa galdou dia mansa bangin, amah a zou uhi.
Pathian dou dinga a khut a likkhiak jiakin, Thilbangkimhihthei dou dinga kisathei taka a oma,
A lum, a tuamna sahtaknei toh amah doua a tai teitei jiakin;
A thaua a maitang a khuha, a gila thau a kholkhawma,
Khopi tulsaa a tena, kuamah ten tuak louhna inte, segawp ngiingei dingte a luah jiakin;
A hau kei dinga, a neihlehlam a om gige kei dinga; amah leiah zung a kai kei ding;
Khomial akipan a suakta kei dinga, meikuangin a selnoute a kangkeu dinga, a paklunlaite huchin a mut mang ding.
Amah kikhemin, banglou ah muang kei hen: bangmahlou lah a thukna hi ding ahi ngala.
A hun main hihzohin a om dia, huan ahiang nou kei ding hi.
Grepgui bangin a gah min lou a singpulh dia, oliv bangin a pak a pai khe ding.
Pathianlimsaklou kithuahpihna lah hut ding ahia, golhna puaninte lah meiin kangmang ding ahi ngala.Siatna a pai ua, thulimlouhna a suakkhe sak uh, huan a lungtang un khemna a opkeuh uh.
Siatna a pai ua, thulimlouhna a suakkhe sak uh, huan a lungtang un khemna a opkeuh uh.
Huan Jobin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Huchibang thil tampi ka zata hi: lungmuanmi chimtakhuai ngen na hi uhi.
Thu bangmahlouten tawp a nei ding uam? ahihkeileh dawng dinga nang honhihheh bang ahia?
Nou bangin kei leng ka pai thei sam hi; na kha uh ka kha muna om hileh, noute dema thute kaikhawma, ka lu hon sinkhum thei ding hi vengin.
Himahleh ka kamin nou kon hatsak dinga, ka muka muannain na lungkhamna uh kon nem ding.
Thu gen mahleng, ka dahna nepin a om keia: huan doh mahleng, hihnopin ka oma hia?
Himahleh a honchimtak saktaa: ka lawmte tengteng na hihgamta hi.
Huan kip takin na honlena, huai tuh kei demna theihpihna ahi: huchiin ka gawnna kei demin a thoua, ka mai tangah a theisak hi.
A hehnain kei a honbot keka, a honsawi hi; a ha a hon gawi khuma: ka tungah ka galin a mit a tathiam hi.
A kam uh lianpiin a honkat khum ua; simmoh takin biang ah a honbeng uh: kei dou dingin a kikai khawm ua.
Pathianin pathianlimsakloute kiangah a honpe khiaa, migiloute khut ah a honpai khia hi.
Om nuamin ka om, huan a honkitam jaksaka; ahi, ka ngawngin a honmana, a honpai nen hi: a muitum dingin a hontung tou lai hi.
A thalkapmiten ka kim ka velah a hon um ua, ka sisanguite a bottata, a hawi kei; leiah ka sinkha a sung khia hi.
Siatna tungah siatnain a honsesaka; galhat bangin ka tungah a tai.
Ka vun tungah saiip ka khuia, leivui ah ka kingata hi.
Kahnain ka mai a hoihta keia, ka mitvunte ah sihna limliap a om hi;
Ka khut ah hiamgamna omkei mahleh, huan ka thumna siangthou mahleh.
Aw lei, ka sisan khuh ken, huan ka kahnain khawlmun neikei hen.
Tu mahmahin, Ngaiin, a hontheihpih van ah a oma, kei hontheihpihpa tungsangah a om hi.
Ka lawmten honnuihsan ua, himahleh ka mitin Pathian lamah khituite a sungkhia hi;
Huchia Pathian laka mihing dikna a letkip theiha, a inveng laka mihing tapa dikna, a letkip theihna dingin:Kum tawm a hongtun chiangin lah ka kik nawn louhna ding lampi ah ka pai ta ding ahi ngala.
Kum tawm a hongtun chiangin lah ka kik nawn louhna ding lampi ah ka pai ta ding ahi ngala.
Ka lungsim hihgawpin a oma, ka nite a bei, kei dingin han mansain a om hi.
Ka kiangah musitmite a om taktak ua, a hehna uah ka mit a omgige hi.
Tuin thuchiam honpia in, nangmahmah toh kei adingin mohkhu honghi in; kei toh khutte beng ding kua a oma?
Theihsiamna akipan a lungtang uh na sel ngala: huai jiakin amau na hihlian kei ding hi.
Kuapeuh matdinga a lawmte heka, a neihlehlam tan tummi, a tate nangawn nit a juausuak ding hi.
Mite houlimna dingin a honbawl laia; huan tangpi kih ka honghita hi.
Lungkhamna jiakin ka mit leng a miala, huan ka hiangte tengteng limliap bang ahi.
Mi dikten hiaiah lamdang a sa ding ua, huan mihoih pathianlimsakloute dou dingin a kitokthou ding.
Himahleh mi diktat a lampi ah a pang zouzou dia, huan kuapeuh khut siangneite a hat semsem ding uhi.
Himahleh hongkik un, na vek un, huan tuin hong un: huchiin na lak uah mi pil ka mu kei ding.
Ka nite a beita, ka thiltupte a se gawpta hi, ka lungtang ngaihtuahte nasanin.
Jan sunin a kheng ua: khovakin khomial a naih, a chi uh.
Seol ka in bangin en leng; khomial ah ka tutnanem phahta leng;
Siatna kiangah, Ka pa na hi, chi leng; tangtel kiangah, ka nu leh ka sanggamnu na hi, chi leng;
Huchi hileh ka lametna koia om ahia?
Huan lamet nei hileng kuan honmusak dia?Seol mundai ah te paisukin leivui ah ka kik khawm ding ua adiam?
Seol mundai ah te paisukin leivui ah ka kik khawm ding ua adiam?
Huchiin Bildad Sua miin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Thute zonga bangtan thang kam ding na hia ua?
Ngaihtuah in, huaikhit chiangin ka pau ding uh.
Bangdia gamsa banga sima oma, na mitmuh ua sianglou honghi ka hi ua?
Nang na hehna kipumpei nang jiakin lei mangngilhin a om diam? ahihkeileh a mun akipatin suangpi suan khiakin a om diam?
A hi, migilou vakna mihsakin a om dinga, a meiek a tang kei ding.
A puanin ah vakna a mial dia, a tunga a khawnvak mihsak ahi ding.
A hatna kalsuante hihtuailuai ahi dia, huan amah thupha genin amah a paikhe ding hi.
Amah khe mahmahin lah len sungah amah a pai lut ngala, huan len ah a kiawksak hi.
Thangin a khetulah a man dia, thangin amah a len ding hi.
Leiah amaha dingin a ba selin a oma, lampi ah amah adin thang.
Kihtakhuaiten ning chiteng ah amah a lausak dia, a khetul ah a delhjui ding hi.
A hatna gilkial nekin a om dia, huan tuahsiatna a khawlna dingin mansain a om ding.
A pumpi hiangte a negai dinga, ahi, ahiangte sihna ta masapenin a negai ding.
A suan a puanin akipan zungkalh khiakin a om dia; huan lauhuainate kumpipa kianga piin a om ding.
Amaha hi lou a puanin sungah teng a om ding: a tenna ah kat theh jakin a om ding hi.
Nuailamah a zungte a keu dia, huan tunglamah ahiang sat khiak ahi ding.
Lei akipanin a theihgige a mangthang ding; huan kongzing ah min a neikei ding.
Khovak akipanin khomial ah hawllut ahi dinga, huan khovel akipana delh khiak.
A mite lakah tapa a neikei dia tapa tapa leng: a omna ah kuamah omlai a om kei ding hi.
Tumlama omten a ni lamdang a sa ding ua, suahlama omte hihlaua a om bang un.Huchibang mi diktatloute tennate ahi petmaha, huan hiai Pathian theilou mi mun ahi hi.
Huchibang mi diktatloute tennate ahi petmaha, huan hiai Pathian theilou mi mun ahi hi.
Huan Jobin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Bangtan ka kha hihbuaia, thutea honhihjan gawp ding na hi ua?
Hiai sawmvei tak na honkouta ua: ka tunga giloutaka na hih uh na zum kei ua.
Huan na na paikhialta mawng leng maw, keimah kianga ka diklouhna om gige hi.
Kei demin nou kiliansak petmah ve nuchin, ka minsiatna ka tungah gen ven uchin:
Pathianin ka thu ah honzouta chih tuin thei un, huan a lenin a honum suak hi.
Ngai un, Hiamgamna, chiin ka kikou khiaa, himahleh jakin ka om kei: panpih deihin ka kikoua, himahleh vaihawmna a om kei hi.
Ka pai theihlouhna dingin ka lampi a um a, huan ka paina dingte ah khomial a koih hi.
Ka thupina honsuahsaka, ka lu akipan lallukhu a la.
Ning chitengah a hon hihniama, ka mangta hi: huan, sing bangin ka lametna a bot khia.
Ka tungah a hehna leng a soua, amah adingin a galte laka khat bangin a honsim hi.
A sepaihpawlte a hongkuan khawm ua, ka siatna dingin a lampi uh a bawl uh, huan ka puanin kimvelin puanin a kai uh.
Kei akipanin ka unaute gamlapi ah a koiha, ka mel-theihte kei akipanin a mituam vekta uh.
Ka tanauten a honjuausanta ua, huan ka lawm theihngeiten a honmangngilhta uh.
Ka in tengte leh, ka sikhanuten, mikhual a honsa ua: a mitmuh un namdangmi ka hi.
Ka sikha ka sama, a hondawng kei, ka kamin amah khem mahleng leng.
Ka ji adingin muhthadahhuai ka hia, ka nu tate adingin, kihhuai.
Naupang neute nangawnin a honsimmoh ua; ka thoh leh, ka siatna dingin thu a gen uhi.
Ka lawm gilte tengtengin kei a honhua ua: huan amau ka itte ka tungah a hel uh.
Ka guh ka vun ah leh ka sa ah a belh bikbeka, huan ka ha vun toh ka suakta hi.
Honhehpih un, honhehpih un, Aw nou ka lawmte; Pathian khutin kei a honkhoihta ngala.
Bangdia Pathian banga nou honsawi na hi ua, ka saa bangdia lungkim lou na hi ua?
Aw ka thute tuin gelhin om le uh aw; Aw laibu ah kigelh lut le aw;
Sik leh ngen gelhna zumin khantawn adingin suangpia gelh hile uh aw;
Himahleh ka Tanpa a hing chih leh, leitungah a tawp chiangin a ding ding chih ka thei hi:
Huan ka vun huchibanga hihsiata a om khit nungin, himahleh ka sa akipan Pathian ka mu ding hi:
Keimah adingin amah keimahmahin ka mu dia, huan ka miten a en dia, midang hi louin.
Ka sungah ka lungtang a sidangta hi!
Amah bangchibangin i sawi ta phet diamah; na chih uleh, kei ah thu bul muhin a om chih theiin;Namsau kihta un: hehnain lah namsau gawtnate a hontun ngala, huchia vaihawmna a om chih na theih theihna ding un.
Namsau kihta un: hehnain lah namsau gawtnate a hontun ngala, huchia vaihawmna a om chih na theih theihna ding un.
Huan Zophar Naaman miin a dawng a, hichiin a chi a:
Huaijiakin ka ngaihtuahnaten kei dawnna a honpiaa, ka sunga om ka kinna thu jiak mahmahin.
Kei honzahlaksak salhna ka zataa, huan ka theihsiamna khain a hondawng hi.
Lei tunga mihing koiha a om nungsiah, hun lui thu hiai na theikei maw;
Gilou vualzohna a toma, huan pathianlimsakloute nuamsakna mitphiat kal sunglel ahi chih?
A hoihkimna vante phain tuangtou mahleh, a luin meipite pha mahleh;
Himahleh amah ek bangin khantawnin a mangthang dinga: Koia om ahia? amah muten a chi ding uh.
Mang bangin a lengmang dinga, huan muhin a omkei ding hi: ahi, jan mengmuh banga hawlmangin a om ding hi.
Amah mu mitin amah a muta kei ding hi; a munin leng amah a muta kei ding hi.
A taten gentheite deihsakna a zong ding ua, huan a khutten a hauhsakna ape nawn ding hi.
A guhte a tuailainain a dima, himahleh leivui ah amah toh a lum ding hi.
Gitlouhna a kam ah khum mahleh, a lei ah sel mahleh;
Sitin, paisak keiin, a kam sungah kem gige zo mahleh;
Himahleh a gila a an a kitoka, a sunga khuai gu ahi hi.
Hauhsaknate a nawmvalha, huan a lokhe nawn ding hi: Pathianin a gilpi akipanin apaikhe ding hi.
Khuai gu a tep dia: gul leiin amah a that ding.
Luipite, khuaiju leh nawituidat lui luangte a en kei ding hi.
Sepgim gah a pe nawn dia huan a nawmvalh suk kei ding hi; a muhsa ah kipahna a neikei ding.
Aman lah gentheite a nuaisiaha, a mangngilh hi; a lam louhpi in hiamgamtakin alata.
A deihgawlnain tawp aneihlouhjiakin, a kipahpih thil himhim a khol kei ding.
A nekgaihlouh bangmah omlai a om kei hi; huaijiakin a hauhnain a daih sawt kei ding.
A nian san lain haksa sakna a nei dia: gimthuak mi chiteng khut a tungah a hongtung ding.
A gilpi hihdim dinga a kisaklaiin, Pathianin a tungah a thangpaihna kihtakhuaina a khe dinga, a nek laiin a tungah a zusak ding hi.
Sik galvan akipan a tai dia, huan dal thalin amah a kap pailet ding.
A dok khiaa, huan a pumpi akipanin a hongpai khia: ahi a sinkha apat a mukzum te velvel hongpai khiaa launate a tungah a hongtung hi.
A gou dingin mialna tengteng kholkhawmin a om: mi mutlouh meiin amah a negai ding; a puanina nutsiata om a negai ding hi.
Vanten a thulimlouhna a taklang ding ua, huan lei amah dou dingin a thou ding.
A ina punna a paimang dinga, a vante a heh niin a luang mang ding hi.Hiai bel Pathian akipana mi gilou tantuan ahi, a gouluah dia Pathianin a sehsak.

Huan Jonin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Ka thugen hoihtakin ngaikhia unla, hiai na khamuanna thu uh hihen.

Migilou lemtheihna kei akipana gamlapia om ahi.

A thilhihtheihna letnain kei a honsel diam?
Ii; himahleh kei a honlimsak ding hi.
Huailaiah mi dikin amah thu a sutpih thei dia; huchiin ka vaihawmmi akipan suahtaksakin ka om tawntungta ding hi.

Ka khein a kalsuante a len kipa; a lampi ka juita, ka pial kei.

Nawi akipan pabei kai khia a om ua, huan gentheite thuchiam la:
Huchiin tasamte puanbeiin vuaktangin a vialvak ua, buhphalte gilkialin a pua uhi.

Ka mukten thutaklou a gen kei ding, ka leiin leng khemna thu a gen kei ding.

Inn a lam tuh maimom len bang ahia, vengmiin a bawl aidakbuk bang ahi.

Huailaia suangte saphir suang mun ahi a, huan dangkaeng nen a nei hi.
Huai lampi sasial ne vasain a theikei a, mu-akla mitin leng a mu ngei sam kei hi.

Himahleh ko ilaiah a pilna a kimu dia?

Mihingin a lampi a theikei hi; mihing gamah leng muhin a om kei hi.
Tui thukin, Ka kiangah a omkei, a chi a.
Dangkaenga muh theih ahi keia, huai man dingin dangka leng buk theih ahi kei hi.
Ophir dangkaeng toh a manphatna teh theih ahi kei ding, onik mantam hiam saphir toh hiam.

Ahihleh pilna koi akipana hongpai ahia?
Huan theihsiamna mun koia om hia?

Huan Jobin a gentehna thu a gen nawna, hichiin a chi a:
Aw nidanglai khate banga om hileng, Pathianin a honveh lai nite bangin;
Ka lu tunga a khawnvak a tana, amah vakna a khomiala ka vak lai;
Ka hoihlai nitea ka om banga, ka puanin tunga a Pathian thuguk a om laiin;
Ka kianga Thilbangkimhihthei a om laia, ka kima ka tate a om lai un;
Ka kalsuante bawngnawia sawp a hiha, suangpiin sathau luipite a honbut khiaklaiin:
Khopia kongpi juana ka pai laiin, kongzinga ka tutna ka bawl laiin,
Tangvalten a honmu ua, huan a bu ua: huan upate a thou ua a ding uh:
Lalte houlim a kidek ua, huan a kam uah a khut uh a koih uh:
Miliante aw a daia, huan a lei uh a kam dangtawng uah a belh hi.
Bilin a honjak laiin, hampha a honchia; huan mitin a honmuh laiin, pom a honchia;
A kap mi genthei, amah panpih ding kuamah neilou, pa bei leng ka suahtaksak jiakin.
Mangthang dinga mansa vualjawlna ka tungah a hongtunga: huan meithai lungtang kipah jiaka lasa dingin ka omsaka.
Diktatna ka silha, huan a hontuam hi: ka dikna puannak thupi bang leh suangmantam bang ahi.
Mittaw adingin mitte ka hi a, khebai adingin khete ka hi.
Tasam adingin pa ka hia: huan ka theihlouh thubul ka zong khia hi.
Diktatlou mi haijek ka hihtana, huan aha akipan a samat ka khahsak.
Huan ken, Ka bu ah ka si dinga, piaunel bangin ka nite ka pungsak ding, ka chi a:
Ka zungte tuite phain a dalh jaka, huan ka hiangah jankhuain daitui a kai:
Kei ah ka thupina a thak gige a, huan ka khut ah ka thalpeu a thak gige.
Miten a honngai ua, a ngak ua, ka thuhilh adingin a dai dide uh.
Ka thute zohin a pau nawn kei uh; huan ka thugen a tunguah a takkhia.
Huan vuah ngak bangin a honngak ua; huan vuah nanungte ading bangin lianpiin a kamka uh.
