A hi, a khutte uh hata, huaiin kei bang a honlohtak dia, huai a hatna uh beisaten?
Taksapna leh kialna in a tuikang ua; lei keu leh sia a kheuh uh,
Pawna annteh a lou ua; huan loukha zungte a an uh ahi.
Mite lak akipan hawl khiakin a om ua; guta nung bangin amau nungah a kikou ua.
Guama hengte ah a teng ngei ding ua, lei leh suangpi hawmte ah.
Pawn lakah a ham ua; lahou nuaite ah a kise-khawm uh.
Mihaite tate ahi ua, ahi, mi thulimloute tate; gama kipanin delhkhiak ahi uh
Huan tuin kei a la uh ka honghia ahi, amaua dingin houlimna ka hi.
A honkih ua, kei akipan a tuam din uh, ka maia chil siat a kidek kei uh.
Pathianin lah Ka khau a khaha, a honhihgim hi, huan ka maah kamkaihna a khahkhia uh.
Ka khut taklam pangah mipi thuzohlouhte a thou ua; ka khe a a nawlkhin ua, huchiin a siatna lampi uh ka maah a koih uh.
Ka lampi a hihsia ua, ka tuahsiatna a zong ua, kuaman a kham kei uh.
Awng zapia paisuak bangin a hong ua: siatna lakah ka tungah a kikhuk uh.
Launate ka tungah a hei ua, huih bangin ka minphatna a delhmang uh; huan meipi bangin ka hauhna a paimang hi.
Huchiin tuin ka sungah ka kha buakkhiakin a om; gimthuakna niten kei a honman uh.
Janin ka guhte a sawi, huan kei honseuh natna ten khawl chih a neikei uh.
Ka natna hi hat mahmahna jiakin ka puansilh a nina: ka puannak ngawng bangin kei a honggak hi.
Buannawi ah a honpai luta, huan leivui leh meivu bang ka honghi hi.
Na kiangah ka kikoua, huan non dawng kei hi: Ka dinga, huan kei non en maimaha.
Ka tunga khel dingin na kilumleta: na ban hatnain kei non sawi hi.
Huihah non domkang tou a, huai tungah na hontuang sak; huan huih ah non lumlet let hi.
Sihna na hontun ding chih lah ka thei ngala, huan mihing tengteng adia sehsa in ah.
Hitamahleh siatnaa pukgawp miin a ban jak lou ding hia?
Ahihkeileh a tuahsiatna ah panpihna ngenin kikou lou ding hia?
Buainaa om adingin ka kap kei maw?
Tasamte adingin ka kha a dah kei maw?
Hoih ka ngak chiangin, hoihlou a hongpaia; khovak ka ngak chiangin, khomial a hongpai.
Ka lungtang a buai, khawl a mu ngei kei; gimthuakna nite ka tungah a hongtung.
Hihvoma omin ka vialvak, himahleh ni hihvom hilou-in; khawmpi ah ka dinga panpih deihin ka kikou hi.
Sehalte unaupa ka hia, vakengsangte lawm ka hi hi.
Ka vun a voma, kei akipan a pilh uh, huan kholumin ka guhte a kang hi.Huaijiakin ka kaihging sunna a suaka, ka mutging mikapte aw.
Huaijiakin ka kaihging sunna a suaka, ka mutging mikapte aw.
Ka mit toh thukhun ka nabawlkhinta; bangchin nungak ka en theita dia oi?
Ahihleh tunglam Pathian akipanin ka tantuan bang a hita dia, tungsang Thilbangkimhihthei akipanin ka goutan?
Mi dikloute tungah tuahsiatna a tung kei mo, gitlouh nasemte tungah siatna?
Aman ka lampite a mukhin keiin, ka kalsuante a sim vek kei ahia?
Thujuau toh na oma, hua ka khe khem dinga nakinoh ahih leh;
(Bukna diktak ah honbuk dih ua, Pathianin ka thutakna thei hen! )
Ka kalsuan lampi akipan anapial hiam, ka lungtang-in ka mitte anajui hiam, huan ka khutte ah nin himhim anabelh hiam:
Huchi anahihleh, chi tuh ning, midangin ne hen; ahi, ka loua piang bulkalh khiak hi hen.
Ka lungtang numei lama khema anaoma, huan ka innveng kongkhaka ka nangaktak leh:
Huchi anahihtak leh ka jiin midan adingin an su henla, huan midangte amah tungah kun uhen.
Huchibang gitlouhna hoih hetlou lah ahi ngala; ahi, vaihawmmite gawt ding thulimlouhna ngei,
Siatna dinga kangbei leh, ka punna tengteng zungkalh ding mei hi ding lah ahi ngala.
Ka tunga phunna a neihlai ua, ka sikhapa hiam ka sikhanu hiam makhua namusita, nakhualsak lou ka hih leh;
Pathian a thohkhiak chiangin bang ka hihta dia?
Thu a kan hun chiangin bangin ka dawngta dia?
Kei sula honbawlpan amah a bawl kei mo?
Huan khatin a honbawl tuak ahi kei mo?
Migentheite a lunggulh uh ka napiak louha, ahihkeileh a vuaksuak dinga meithai mitte ka naomsak leh;
Ahihkeileh kei kiain ka an ka naneka, huaia pabeiin ananek kei leh;
(Ii, ka tuailai akipanin pa bang ka hi, ka kiangah ana khanglianta; huan ka nu sul akipan amah pipa ka nahita hi: )
Kuapeuh taksap jiaka mangthang hiam, ahihkeileh tasam khuhna neilou hiam ka namuh leh;
A kawngten kei a honna vualjawl louha, ka belam mula lumsaka ana om kei leh;
Kongpia panpihna ka muh jiaka pabeite siatna dinga ka khut ka nalik leh;
Huchi anahihleh, ka liang ka liangjang akipan kia henla, a guh akipan ka ban kitan hen.
Pathian akipan tuahsia lah keia dingin launa ahi ngala, A thupina lah ka tuak ngam ngal keia.
Dangkaeng lametpena ka nabawla, dangkaeng hoih kiangah, ka muanna na hi, ka nachihtaka;
Ka hauhna thupi jiaka hiam, ka khutin tam a nalam jiaka ka nakipaha;
A vak laia ni hiam, thupitaka pai pai kha hiam kana eta,
Huchia ka lungtang aguka khema a oma, ka kamin ka khut anatawptak aleh:
Hiai leng thulimlouhna vaihawmmite gawt ding ahi: tunga Pathian kianga najuauta hi ding ka hih jiakin.
Kei honmudah siatnaa ka nakipaha, ahihkeileh hoihlou a tunga a tun chianga ka nakipah uat aleh;
(Ka melma hamsiat ding leh a henna thum dingin ka kam ka nakhialsak kei);
Ka puaninaten, A ana kihihvah lou kua a oma, hon nachih kei ua leh;
(Kongzing ah mikhual ana giak ngei kei; khualzin adingin ka kongte ka nahongta)
Adam banga ka angsunga ka thulimlouhna na sela, ka tatlekna na khuh ka hiha,
Ajiak, mi tampi launa thupitak ka neihjiak ahiha, sungte hon muhdaina launa jiak a huchia dai didea, popawt lou ka nahih leh-
Aw, kei honja mi nei leng maw: (Ngaiin, hiaiah ka min gelh a om hi.
Thil bangkim hihtheiin hondawng hen; ) huan ka galin a gelh khiat matna nei leng maw:
Chihtaktakin ka liang jangah ka po dinga; lallukhu bangin kei ah ka kan den ding hi.
A kiangah ka kal suan zah ka phuang dinga; lal bangin ka kiang naiah ka hoh ding hi.
Ka kam kei dema a kikoua, huaia lei lehsate a kah khawm uleh;
Sum loua huai gahte ka nanektaka, ahihkeileh huaia a neite a hinna uh ka natansak aleh:Buh hilouin loulingneite, barli-buh hilouin loubualte pou jaw hen.

Huchibangin hiai mi thumte Job dawn a tawpta ua, amah mit a diktat a hih jiakin.
Huailaiin Buz mi Barakel tapa Elihu hehna a kuangkhia a, Ram innkuana mi: Job tungah a hehna kuangkhiaa, Pathian hizo loua amah siam a kitansak jiakin.
A lawm thumte tungah leng a hehna a kuangkhiaa, dawnna ding neiloua, hinapia lah Job a mohpaih jiak un.
Amah sanga a upatjawk jiak uh, Job kianga thugen dingin Elihuin a ngak a.
Huan hiai mi thumte kama dawnna a om kei chih a theihin, a hehna a kuangkhia hi.
Huchiin Buz mi Barakel tapa Elihuin a dawnga: Ka naupanga, huan nou na upa mahmah uh; huaijaikin ka daia, ka lungsim ka hon ensak ngam kei hi.
Huchiin ka chi, Niten thu a gen ding uh, huan kum tampiin pilna a sinsak ding hi.
Himahleh mihing lungsim a oma, huan Thilbangkimtheiin amaute theihsiamna a pia hi.
A pilte mi thupite ahi kei ua, vaihawmna theisiamte leng upate ahi sam kei uh.
Huaijiakin, hongngaikhia un; ken leng ka lungsim ka ensak ding, ka chi.
Ngai un, na thute uh ka ngaka, gen ding na zon khiak lai un, na thusutte uh ka ngaikhia.
Ahi, kon limsaka, huan, ngai un, kuamah Job thuzoh zou na om kei uh, ahihkeileh na lak uah, a thute dawng.
Pilna I muta, chi lou dingin pilvang un; mihing hilouin Pathianin amah a zou thei hi:
Aman lah kei siatna dingin a thute ahihkeia; ken leng nou thugente in amah ka dawng sam kei ding.
Lamdang asa ua, a dawng nawnta kei uh; gen ding thu khat leng a neikei uh.
Thu a genlouh jiak uh, a ding kinken ua, a dawn nawnlouh jiakin ka ngak diam?
Ken leng ka dawn ding ka dong hia, ka lungsim ka ensak sam ding hi.
Thuin lah ka dim ngala; ka sunga khain a honsawl teitei hi.
Ngai un, ka gilpi pawtkhiakna neilou uain bang ahi; khuainulhaite bangin puakjak dingin mansain a om hi.
Ka halh theihna dingin, ka pau ding; ka mukte ka hong dinga ka dawng ding hi.
Mihing himhim mihinna honzahtaksak kei un, ka hon ngen hi; kuamah kiangah leng maitangphatna min ka pe ding hi.Maitangphatna minte piak ding ka thei ngal keia; huchilouinjaw kei a honla zok ding hi.

Akoi abang hileh, Job, ka honngen hi, thugen ja inla ka thugen tengteng ngaikhiain.
Ngaiin, tuni, ka kam ka kaa, ka kamin ka pau hi.
Ka thuten ka lungtang dikna a genkhe ding uh; huan ka mukten a theih ngei uh chihtaktakin a gen ding uhi.
Pathian Khain a honbawla huan Thil bangkim hihthei huin hinna a honpai hi.
Na theih leh, hondawng in; ka maah na thute a kizomzomin koihin, na panna ah ding in.
Ngaiin, nang bangin Pathian lamah ka om hi: kei leng tungmana bawl ka hi.
Ngaiin, ka lauhuainain nang a honlausak kei ding, ka hahkatna leng na tungah a gik kei ding hi.
Chihtaktakin ka jakin na pautaa, huan na thute ging ka zata hi.
Ka siang hi, tatlekna bei; ka hoiha, kei ah thulimlouhna leng a om kei, chiin:
Ngaiin, kei demna ding a jiak a mua melmain a honsimta hi;
Ka khete kol a bunsaka, ka lampite tengteng achiamteh hi.
Ngaiin, ka hondawng ding, hiai na diklouhna ah; mihing sangin lah Pathian a lianzo ngala.
Bangdia amah dou na hia, Ka thute a bangmahmah lah a dawng kei ding, chiin?
Pathianin lah khatvei a gena, ahi, nihvei, mihingin limsak kei mahleh.
Jana mang ah, mengmuhna ah, mite tunga ihmut kip a kiak laiin, lupna tunga ihmut laite in;
Huailaiin mite bilte a honga, vaunatein amau a hihlaua,
Huchia a thiltup akipana mihing a lakkika, mihing a kipana kisaktheihna a satkhiak theihna dingin;
Aman kokhuk akipan a kha a kep kik saka, namsaua kipan a hinna.
A lupna tungah natnaa sawiin leng a om, huan a guhtea kinakna omgige tohin:
Huchiin a hinnain tanghou a kiha, huan a khain an lim.
Asa a tum manga, huchiin muh theihin a om kei; huan a kimulou a guhte hongdawk khia uh.
A hi, a kha kokhuk kiangah a hong naia, huan a hinna hihsemite kiangah.
A kianga angel, kamlet, sang khat laka khat, mihing kianga amah adia dik bang ahia chih etsakding a om leh;
Huchia amah adinga chingtheia, Kokhuka pai sukna akipan amahsuaktasak un, tatna ka muta,
A sa naupanga sangin nou jaw hen; a tuailai nite lamah kik nawnta hen, chi angel.
Pathian kiangah a thuma, huan amah dingin deihsak theihin a om hi; huchiin nuamna toh a mai a mua: huan a diktatna a kiangah a pe nawn hi.
Mite maah la asa a, Ka khialta a, a dik kana hekkawia thukin ka om kei!
Kokhuk sunga paisukna akipan ka kha a tanta a, huan ka hinna vakna a muta ding hi, achia.
Ngaiin, hiai thilte tengteng Pathianin, mihing lak ah hihna, nihvei, ahi thumvei.
Kokhuk akipan a kha pi kik dingin, huchia mihing vaknaa hihvaka a om theihna dingin.
Chiamteh hoihin, Aw Job, honngaikhia in: dai inla, thu ka gen ding.
Gending mahmah na neih leh, hon dawng in: Pau in, siam hontansak lah ka ut ngala.Na neih kei leh, kei honngaikhia in: dai inla pilna ka honsinsak ding hi.

Huailouin Elihuin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Ka thute ja un, nou mi pilte; nou theihna neite, bil hondoh un.
Dangtawngin ann achiam bangin, bilin thute a enchain hi.
A dik eia dingin I tel ding uh; I lak ua hoih bang ahia I thei ding uh.
Job in lah, Ka dika, huan Pathianin ka dikna a la mang, a chi ngala:
Ka dikna huchin hita mahleh juautheia sim ka hia; tatlekna bei himahleng, ka liamna hihdam theihlouh ahi.
Muhsitna tui banga dawn bei, Job bang mihing kua ahia?
Thulimlou nasemmite toh a hona pai, mi giloute toh om khawmmi.
Aman lah, Pathian laka ka kipahna ding bangmah ka lohtak kei, a chi ngala.
Huaijiakin, nou theisiammite, honngaikhia un: Pathianin, gilou bangchiin a hih ngei mahmah dia; huan Thilbangkimhihtheiin thulimlou bangchiin a hih mahmah dia.
Aman lah mihing thilhih amah kianga pe kik ding hi ngala, huan mi chiteng a lampite kianga pekik ding ahi.
A hi, mohkhuksakna thu ah, Pathianin giloutakin a hih kei dia, Thilbangkimhihtheiin leng vaihawmna a hihse sam kei ding hi.
Kuan ahia amah leitunga heututna pia?
Ahihkeileh khovel pumpi kuan ahia a thua koih?
Mihing tunga a lungtang a ngaka, amah lama a kha leh a hu a lakkhawm leh;
Sa tengteng a mangthang khawm ding ua, huan mihing leivui a suak nawn ding hi.
Theihsiamna na neih leh, hiai ja in: ka thute aw ngaikhia in.
Mi thudik huaiin vai a hawm ding hia?
Huan dik leh hat amah na mohpaih ding hia?
Kumpipa kianga, Na hoih kei chih a kilawm hia?
Ahihkeileh miliante kianga, Na gilou uh?
Chih.
Mi lalte mi hinna zahtak loua, mi genthei sanga mi hausate limsak zote kianga chih kilawm sem lou ding hia?
Amaute tengteng lah a khut nasep ahi ngal ua.
Mitphiat kallouin a si ua jankim lai mahmahin; mite a ling ua a pai mang ua, mihingkhut hilouin mihatte lakmangin a om uhi.
A mitte lah mihing lampite tungah a oma, huan a painate tengteng a mu hi.
Thulimlou nasemmite buk theihna ding, khomial a omkei a, sihna limliap leng a om sam kei hi.
Vaihawmna a Pathian maa a pai dingin, mihing a ngaihtuah lailai a kiphamoh ngal keia.
Lamte theihphak vual louhin aman mi hatte a hihjan veka, a mun uah midangte a tungkhia hi.
Huaijiakin a nasepte uh a thei hi; janin amau a lumleta, huchiin hihsiatin a om uhi.
Midang mitmuh mahmahin mi giloute bangin amau a gawt hi.
Amah zuihna akipan a pialkhiak ua, a lampitea a koi mahmah a limsaklouh jiakun:
Huchiin genthei kahna a kiang tung dingin a bawl ua, huan gimthuak kahna a ja hi.
Amah napau kei leh, huchiin kuan siamlouh a tangsak dia? huan aman a mai a sel leh, huchiin amah kuan a mu thei dia? namte kianga hih hiam, ahihkeileh, mihing kianga hih hiam zong a kibang hi:
Huchia pathiantheilou min vai a hawm louha, huchia mite thanga awksak ding kuamah a omlouhna dingin.
Kuapeuhin Pathian kiangah, Gawtna ka thuakta, ka gilou nawn kei ding,
Ka muh louh nang honsinsak in: gilou ka hih aleh ka hih nawn kei ding, a chi uhia?
A thukna na deih bangin a om diam, huchia na nial?
Kei hilouin, nang na tel ngeingei ding lah ahi ngala.
Theisiammiten ka kiangah, A hi, a chi ding uh, a honja mi pil chitengin,
Jobin theihna beiin thu a gena, huan a thute pilna bei ahi uh.

Huailouin Elihuin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Hiai na dikna hiin na ngaihtuah hia, ahihkeileh, keia mawng ahi, Pathian mai ah, na chi hia,
Kei adingin bang phattuamna a om dia? huan.
Ka khelh nak sal aleh, bang phattuamna ka neia? na chih?
Nang, leh na kianga na lawmte ka hondawng ding.
Vante lam en inla, mu in; huan vante, nang sanga sangjaw, en in.
Na hihkhelh leh, amah dema bang hih na hia?
Huan na tatleknate punsak hileh, amah tunga bang hih na hia?
Daktat hi lechin, amah bang na pia a?
Ahihkeileh na khut akipan bang a mu a?
Na gitlouhnain mi bang bangin a hihna thei a; huan na diktatnain mihing tapa a hih hampha thei hi.
Nuaisiahna tam mahmah jiakin a kikou khia ua; mi hat ban jiakin panpih deihin a kikou uh.
Himahleh kuamahin, Jan chia late pia, Pathian kei Bawlpa koia om ahia;
Leia gamsate sanga honsinsak tamjaw leh, vana vasate sanga hon pilsakjaw?
A chi kei uh.
Huailaiah a kikou ua, himahleh, mi gilou kisaktheihna jiakin, kuamahin dawnna a pe kei uh.
Chihtaktakin Pathianin bangmahlou aza kei dia, Thil bangkim hihtheiin leng a limsak sak kei ding hi.
Nang ngial houh: Amah ka mu kei, a thu maah a om, amah ka ngak hi, na chih vial.
Himahleh tuin, heha a veh louha, kiotsakna leng a limsaklouin jiakin;Huaijiakin Jobin bangmahlouin a kam a ka ahi; theihna beiin thu a tamsak ahi.

Elihu mahin a gen jela, huchiin a chi a:
Honna thuakzou zek inla, huan ka hon ensak ding; Pathian sikin lah banghiam khat gending ka nei ngala.
Gamla akipan ka theihna kon la dinga, huan diktatna kei Bawlpa tungah ka nga ding hi.
Diktakin ka thute lah juau ahi ngal keia: hoihkim khat lah ka kiangah a om hi.
Ngaiin, Pathianin thil a hihtheia, kuamah a musit kei: theihsiamna hatna ah thil a hihthei hi.
Gilou hinna a hawi keia: himahleh gimthuakte kiangah a dikna uh a pia hi.
Mi diktat akipan a mit a la kik keia: himahleh laltutphah tunga kumpipa toh amau khantawnin a koiha, huchiin hihletin a om uhi.
Huan sikkhautea gaka a om ua, gimthuakna guitea laka a om uleh;
Huchiin a thilhih uh amau a ensaka, huan a tatlekna uh, huchia kisatheitaka a na omna uh.
Thuhilhna lamah a bil uh leng a honsaka, thulimlouhna akipan kik dingin thu a pia hi.
Amah thu a ngaihkhiak ua, a na a sep uh leh, a nite uh hausaknain a hihbei ding ua, a kumte uh kipahnain.
Himahleh a ngaihkhiak kei ua leh, namsauin a mangthang ding ua, huan theihna beiin a si ding uh.
Himahleh amau lungtanga pathianilimsaklouhnaten hehna a khol khawm uhi: amau a hen laiin panpih deihin a kikou kei uh.
Tuailaiin a si ua, siangloute lakah a hinna uh a mangthang hi.
A gimthuaknain gimthuakte a suaktasaka, nuaisiah na ah a bil uh a honsak hi.
A hi, gakchihna om louhna mun, mun lian lamah dahna akipan nang a honpi mang ta ding a; huan na donkan tunga kilui thaunain a dimta ding hi.
Himahleh giloute vaihawmnain na dima: vaihawmna leh diktatnain nang nang a honlen hi.
Thangpaihna a om jiakin, pilvangin huchilouin jaw na kichinnain nang a honpi mangkha ding hi; tatna letnain leng nang honpialsak sam kei hen.
Dahna a na om louhna dingin, na hauhsaknate a hun diam, ahihkeileh na hatna thilhihtheihna tengteng?
Mite tengteng a mun ua sat khiaka a om lai un, jan deih ken.
Pilvangin, gilou limsak ken: gimthuakna sangin hiai lah na telta ngala.
Ngaiin, Pathianin a thilhihtheihnain sangtakin a hih: amah bang sinsakmi kua ahia?
Kuan amah a lampi thu a piaa? ahihkeileh, kuan, Diklouhna na bawlta, a chi thei dia?
Miten la a asak uh, a thilhih hihlian dingin theigige in.
Huaiah mite tengteng a en ua; huai mihing in gamla pi ah a mu hi.
Ngaiin, Pathian a liana, amah I theikei uh: a kumte zah zontheih ahi kei.
Tui takte aman a tawi khin ngala, huai a tuihu akipan vuah a ju:
Huai vanten a sungkhe suk ua, tampipiin mihing tungah a tak.
A hi, meipi kiphahte, a in vanpigingte kuamahmahin a theisiam dia?
Ngaiin, a kimah a khovak a jaka: huan tuipi nuai a tuam hi.
Hiaitein lah mite a vaihawmsak ngala; an tampi a pia hi.
Khophiain a khutte a tuama; huan chiamtehna khoh dingin thu a pia hi.Huai husain a tungtang thu a gena, ganhonten leng hongkuan tou huihpi tungtang thu.

Hiaiah leng ka lungtang a linga, a mun akipan suanin a om hi.
A awging leh a kam akipana ging paikhia nouten ngaikhia un.
Van pumpi nuaiah huai tuh a sawlkhiaa, huan a khophia lei tawpnate tannin.
Huai zohin aw a kikoua; a lalna awin vanpi a gingsaka: huan a aw jaka a om chiangin amau a len kei.
Pathianin a awin lamdangtakin vanpi a gingsaka; I theih theihlouh, thil thupite a hih jel hi.
Aman lah vuk kiangah, Lei ah kiain, a chi ngala; huchi mahbangin vuah malphin kiangah leng.
Mi chiteng khut a tuambita; huchia a bawlsa mite tengtengin huai a theihtheihna ding un.
Huailaiin gamsate a mun uah a lut ua, huan a kuate uah a om nilouh uh.
Simlam dantan akipan huihpi a honga: mallam akipan khovot.
Pathian huin tuikhal piak ahi: huan tuite nakna hihhaksatin a om.
A hi, meipi nawnna a posaka; a khophia meipi a phalhsak hi:
Huan amah piin a kivial heihei ua, tentheihna khovel maikaih tunga amaute thu a piak peuhmah a hihna ding un: S
Bawlhoihna ding hiam, a gam ading hiam, ahihkeileh chitna ding hiama, a hon paisakna ah.
Hiai ngaikhiain, Aw Job: Ding kinken inla, Pathian thilhih lamdangte ngaihtuah in.
Amaute tunga Pathianin a thupiak a koiha, a meipi khophia a tansak dan na thei hia?
Meipite kibukdiknate, amah theihna hoihkim thilhih lamdangte na thei hia?
Sim huih jiaka lei a daih sisip laia, na puansilhte a lum dan?
Amah toh van, suntawm limlang banga khauh, na phalh thei hia?
A kianga ka gen ding uh hon sinsak in; mialna jiakin lah ka thugen ding uh ka gelkhol theikei ua.
Thu ka gen ding chih amah hilh ding a diam? ahihkeileh mihingin valh khita om ut ding a diam?
Huchiin miten vantea om vak khovak a mu kei ua: himahleh huih a nunga, amaute a hihsiang hi.
Mal akipanin dangkaenga thupi a hongpaia: Pathianin lalna kihtakhuai a tungah a nei hi.
Thil bangkim hihthei thu ahihleh, mu theikei hang: thilhihtheihna ah a thupi pet mah hi: Huan vaihawmna leh dikna hauhna ah gim a thuaksak kei ding hi.Huaijiakin miten amah a lau ua: lungtanga pil kuamahmah a limsak kei hi.
Huaijiakin miten amah a lau ua: lungtanga pil kuamahmah a limsak kei hi.
Huchiin pingpei akipanin TOUPAN job a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Theihna bei thutea thuhilh hihmial hiai kua ahia?
Kipasalsakin tuin na kawng gakin; Hondong ding ka hi, ka kianga na gen ding ahi.
Lei kingaknate ka koih laiin nang koiah na oma?
Phuangin, theihsiamna nei na hih leh.
Huaia tehnate kua bawl ahi, thei na hih leh! ahihkeileh a tunga tehna khau kua zan ahia?
A nuai suangphumte kua phum ahia, ahihkeileh huai a ninga suang kua koih ahia;
Jingsang aksiten la a sak khawm ua, Pathian tapate tengteng kipah jiaka a kikou lai un?
Ahihkeileh kuan kongkhaktein tuipite a khak binga, gil akipan hongpawt khia banga, a hongpuahkhiak laiin.
Huaia puansilh meipi leh, khomial bikbek, huaia dinga tuamna puan ka bawla,
Huaia dinga ka thupiak bawla, kalhnate leh kongkhakte koiha,
Hiaitan na hongpai ding, himahleh a ban hilouin, ka chiha; huan hiailaiah a kiuangsak na tuikihotte lettangin a om ding uh, ka chih laiin?
Na nite a kipat nungsiah jingsang thu na piain, phalvak a mun thei dingin na bawlta hia;
Huchia lei tawpnate a mat theiha, huai akipana gilou sinkhiak a hihtheihna dingin?
Chiamtehna nuaia tungmanlei bangin mel a kikhenga; huan puansilh bangin thil tengteng ze neiin a dingkhia hi:
Huan gilou akipana a khovak uh lettang sak ahia, a ban liksang uh a kitan hi.
Tuipi nakte sungah na lut ta hia?
Ahihkeileh tuithuk tawpna ah na paita hia?
Sihna kongpite na kiangah taklatin a omta hia?
Ahihkeileh sihna limliap kongpite na muta hia?
Lei zatdan na thei siamte hia?
Phuang in, huai na theih vek leh.
Khovak tenna zotna lampi koiah a oma, huan khomial omna mun koisan ahia;
Huchia huai a gamgi tana na tonpi theiha, huchia huai a in tana lampite na theihna dingin?
Thei mah niteh maw, huailaia piangta lah hi ding china?
Hhuan na nite tamdan lah thupi mahmah hi dia!
Vuk koihkhawmna ah na lut ngeita hia, ahihkeileh gial koihkawm na muta hia.
Buaina hun adia ka sit, kidou leh kisat nia dia?
Bang lampi ah ahia khovak a kikhen a, ahihkeileh leitunga suahlam huih a dalhjak?
Kuan ahia tui tampi luanna dinga tuilam khuak, ahihkeileh kekkia adia lampi;
Mihing om louhna mun gam tunga vuah zusak dingin; mihing om louhna, gamdai tungah;
Lei kisia leh segawpsa lungkimsak ding; loupa hing nou khangkhesak ding?
Vuahin pa a nei hia?
Ahihkeileh daitui takte kua suan ahia?
Kua gil akipana tuikhal hongpai ahia?
Huan van daituikhal ngou, kua suahsak ahia?
Suang bangin tuite a taka, tuithuk maite a khal hi.
Siguk khaute na khihkhawm thei hia, ahihkeileh zuheisuktun khaute na phel thei hia?
Amah hunbi ah Aksilamvaka chiamtehnate na pikhe thei hia?
Ahihkeileh Jangkhua leh tate na pi thei hia?
Van thusehte na thei hia?
Huai lalna lei ah na dingkhesak thei diam?
Nang tui tampiin a khuh theihna dingin meipite kiangah na aw na suahkhe thei diam?
A pai theihna ding un khophiate na sawl khe thei hia?
Sunggil lamah pilna kuan a koiha?
Ahihkeileh lungsim kiangah kuan theihsiamna a pia a?
Pilnain kuan meipite a sim thei dia?
Ahihkeileh kuan van tuithawlte a bo khe thei dia.
A lompia leivui a luana, a sakte a kimat khawm ngiungeu lai un?
Humpinelkai adingin samat na betsak ding hia?
Ahihkeileh humpinelkai noute gilkial na hihdam ding hia?
A kua ua a boh ua, buk dinga a bukna mun ua a om nilouh lai un?Vaak ading a an kuan a pia a?
A noute Pathian kianga kikou a ann duh mana a vakvak lai un?
Vaak ading a an kuan a pia a?

Suangpia gam sathakten a suahsak hun uh na thei hia? ahihkeileh nou a neih lai uh na chiamteh thei hia?
A chinsak zah khate na sim thei hia?
Ahihkeileh a suahsak hun na thei hia?
A kun ua, a tate uh a suang uh, a lungkhamnate uh a pai khia uhi.
A tate uh deihhuai takin a om ua, gamlak ah a khang lian ua; a kuankhia ua, a hongkik nawn kei uh.
Kuan gam sabengtung a khah khiaa?
Ahihkeileh kuan gam sabengtung honte a phel a?
Loupa gam a inin ka bawla, huan chi gam a tenna munin;
Khopi buai nuanua a musita, hawlmi kikounate leng a za sam kei hi.
Mual dungte a gantatna mun ahia, huan thilhing chiteng a zong hi.
Na na sem gingin gam bawngtal a lungkim diam?
Ahihkeileh na anpiakna kiangah a omgige diam?
Leilehna ah khauin gam bawngtal na khih thei diam?
Ahihkeileh na nungah guamte a toktam diam?
A hatna a thupi jiakin, amah na muang diam?
Ahihkeileh a kiangah na sepgimna na khiat diam?
Na chi in a hontuta, na buhphuala buh a kaihkhawm theihna dingin amah na muang diam?
Ostrik-va kha kisathei takin a kijapa; himahleh a khavengte leh a multe a migi hia?
A tuite lah leitungah a nusiaa, leivui ah a lumsaka,
Khein a sikkham thei chih a mangngilha, ahihkeileh gamsain a sikgawp thei chih.
Amaha hi lou bangin, a noute siatna dingin a khauha: a sep gimna bangmahlou hita zongleh, a lau kei hi:
Pathian in pilna a ngolhsak jiakin, theihsiamna leng a pe sam kei hi.
Tungsang lama a kitawi sang chiangin, sakol leh a tungtuangmi a nuihsan.
Sakol a hatna na piak hia?
Mul nemin a ngawng na tuam hia?
Khaukhup bangin na tawmsak hia?
A hamna thupi a lauhuai ve.
Guam ah lei a tuana, a hatna ah a kipaka: mi kigalvante tuak dingin a pai khia.
Lauhuai a nuihsana, a lungdong keia; namsau leng a nungngat sam kei hi.
Amah ah thalbawm a ging lenglenga, teipi tezelzel leh chiangzum.
Kihtakhuaina leh hehnain lei a nawmvalha; Pengkul aw ahi chih leng a um sam kei hi.
Pengkul a gin tengin, Hah; a chi a, huan kidouna, heutute vanpiging leh kikou, gamlapi apan a thei.
Na pilnain mu sangpi a lengsakin, a khate simlamah a phalh hia?
Nang thupiakin muvanlai a tunglen in, tungsang ah a bu a sep hia?
Suangpi tungah a tenga, huailaiah giahna a neia, suangpi hengte ah leh kulh muanhuaite ah.
Huai akipanin matding a mu a; a miten gamla ah a mu hi.A nouten leng sisan a tep bei ua: huan thah omna mun ah, huailaiah a om hi.

Huailouin Toupan Job a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Kuapeuh awlmoh neilou in thil bangkim hihthei a kiselpih diam?
Kuapeuh Pathian kiselpih, huai tuh amah dawngsak un.
Huan Jobin Toupa a dawnga, hichiin a chi a.:
Ngaiin, Bangmah ka hi keia; bang ka hon dawng dia?
Ka kam ah ka khut ka koih.
Khatvei ka pauta a, ka dawng kei ding; ahi nihvei, himahleh ka pau nawn kei ding.
Huchiin Toupan Job pingpei akipanin a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Ki pasal sakin tuin na kawng gak in: nang akipan ka honphut dia, kei kiangah na honphuang ding hi.
Ka vaihawmna nangawn bangmahloua koih ding na hi hia?
Siam na tantheihna dia, kei honmohpaih ding na hi hia?
Ahihkeileh Pathian bangin ban na nei hia?
Huan amah bangin awin vanpi na gingsak thei hia?
Tuin nang hoihkim leh zahnain kijem in; zahna leh lalnain kivan in.
Na hehna dimlette sungkhia in; huan mi chih kisatheite en inla, hihniam in.
Mi chih kisathei en inla, kainiam in; huan a dinna uah migiloute tuanchil in.
Leivui ah amaute selkhawm in; mun daiah a mai uh kan in.
Huchiin na khut taklamin nang a hondam thei chih ka honthei ding.
Nang kon siam banga ka siam, tuin en in chingpi; bawngtal bangin loupa a ne.
En in tuin, a hatna a kawngah a oma, a gilpi thate ah a hatna a om hi.
Sidar sing bangin a mei a tangsaka: a pheite thaguite phankhawmin a om hi.
A guhte dal lawng ahi uh; a guh leh tangte sik tawn bang ahi.
Pathian lampitea a pipen ahi: amah bawlpa kiain a namsau amah kiang lam naih dingin a bawl thei ding.
Chihtaktakin mualten an amah a puak ua; gamsate tengteng mawlna munah.
Tuilili singte nuaiah a luma, pumpeng mun dai leh gam nawng ah.
Tuilili singten amah a limun a khuh ua; luite singnahkaiten amah a tuam kimvel vek.
Ngaiin, lui a dimlet leh, a ling kei: a kam chiang pha hialin Jordan khang mahleh, a muang hi.A kiven laiin kuapeuhin amah sikkawiin a man diam, ahihkeileh thangin a nak a vut pailet diam?
A kiven laiin kuapeuhin amah sikkawiin a man diam, ahihkeileh thangin a nak a vut pailet diam?
Ngakuaiin Ole na kai khe thei diam?
Ahihkeileh a khauin a lei na sawm tum thei diam?
A nak sungah khauhual na thun thei diam?
Ahihkeileh sikkawiin a haijek na vut pailet thei diam?
Na kiangah thil nget tampi a bawl diam?
Ahihkeileh na kiangah thu nemte a gen diam?
Khantawna dingin amah sikha dia na lak theihna dingin, nang toh thukhun a bawl diam?
Vasa toh bangin amah toh na mawl diam?
Ahihkeileh na sikhanute adingin amah na hen diam?
Ngamanmi pawlten amah sumsinna dingin a bawl ding uam?
Sumsinmite lakah amah a juak ding uam?
Sik lenin a vun na dimsak thei diam, ahihkeileh a lu ngalingte in?
A tungah na khut koih in; kidouna theigigein, huchibangin na hih nawn kei hial ding.
Ngaiin, amah lametna bangmahlou ahi: amah muh mahmahin mi paihkhiakin a om kei dia hia?
Amah hihhalh ngam khop dingin kuamah a hang kei: ka maa ding kua ahia leh?
Amah ka dit ding, ka kiangah kuan a pe masa aleh?
Van pumpi nuaia om peuhmah keia ahi.
A guhlehtang thu ah ka dai kei ding, a hatna mahmah leh, a pum kilawmna ah leng.
A paunsilh tungnung kuan a suahsak thei dia?
A kamkaih thuahnih sungah kua hongpai dia?
A mai kongkhakte kuan a hong thei dia?
A ha kimvelah lauhauina a om.
A lip hattakte a kisaktheihna ahi, suai khaksa tobangin khak khum ahi.
A kal ua huihzam a lut theihlouhna dingin, khatin a dang a naih mahmah.
Khat leh a dang a kizom ua, a kisoumat ua, huchiin khentheihlouhin a om uh.
A hahchhiauten a vaksak zola, a mitte jingsang mitvunte bang ahi.
A kam akipanin meisel kuangte a pawt khia, meiekte a tawm khia hi.
A nakvangte akipanin meikhu a pawta, hal siangna bel leh chiklak loupa kang akipan bangin.
A huin suang a kuangsaka, a kam akipanin meikuang a pawt khia hi.
A ngawng ah hatna a om gigea, a maah lauhuaina a lam hi.
Asa thate a kizom khawm ua: a tungah a kip ua; hihtat theihin a om kei uh.
A lungtang suang bangin a kip a; ahi, buhgawina suang nuainungjaw bang ahi.
Amah a thoh chiangin, mihatte a lau uh: lauluatna jiakin omdan ding a theikei uh.
Min amah namsauin sat leh, a phatuam kei hi; teipi leng, thal leng, sikmuk zum leng.
Buhpawl bangin sik a sima, sing muatsa bangin dal.
Thalin amah a taisak theikei ding: amah lakah vaisuanglot suangte buhpawl a suak hi.
Khetbukte buhpawl banga sim ahi: chiangzuma khohte a nuihsan hi.
A nuai lampangte belpei hiam ahi: buannawi tungah buh khetna chiang bangin a kiphah.
Tuithuk bel banga sou dingin a bawla: tuipi nuhtheih bawm bangin a bawl hi.
A nungah lampi a vangsaka; tuithuk samkang min a sa ding hi.
Lei tungah amah bang a om keia, lau loua bawl.A sang peuh thil chiteng a ena: kisathei tapate tengteng tungah kumpipa ahi.
A sang peuh thil chiteng a ena: kisathei tapate tengteng tungah kumpipa ahi.
Huchiin Jobin TOUPA a dawnga, hichiin a chi a:
Thil bangkim na hih thei chih leh nang thiltup kham theih ahi kei chih ka thei hi.
Hiai thuhilhna theihna telloua sel kua ahia?
Huaijiakin ka theihsiamlouh ka na genkhiaa, ka theih louh, kei adia lamdang lua thilte.
Ja in, ka honngen hi, huan ka pau ding; nang ka hon phut ding, kei lamah nang phuangin, nonchia.
Ka bil jaknain nang ka honjaa; himahleh tuin ka mitin nang a mu a,
Huaijiakin ka kikiha, leivui leh meivu ah ka kisik hi.
Huan hichi ahia, huchia TOUPAN Job kianga hiai thute a gen khitin, TOUPAN Elipha Teman mi kiangah, Ka hehna nang tung leh, na lawm nihte tungah a kuang ka sikha Job banga nouten ka tanchiin thildik na gen louh jiak un, a chi a.
Huaijiakin tuin, bawngtal sagih leh belamtal sagih la unla ka sikha Job kiangah hoh unla, noua dingin halmang thillat lan un; huchiin ka sikha Job nou adingin a thum dinga; amah vangin ka sang dia, huchiin na haina uh dungjuiin na tunguah ka hih kei ding; ka sikha Job bangin lah ka tanchin thildik na gen ngal kei ua, chiin.
Huchiin Elipha Teman mi leh Bildan Sua mi leh Zophar Naaman mi a kuanta ua, amau TOUPAN thu a piak bangin a hihta uhi: huan TOUPAN Job a sangta hi.
Huan TOUPAN Job koltanna, a lawmte adia thu a nget laiin a heita a: huchiin TOUPAN Job a maa a neih zahnih a peta hi.
Huailaiin a kiangah, a unaute tengteng leh, a sanggamnute tengteng leh, tumalama a meltheihte hisa tengteng leh, a in sunga tanghou amah toh nete a hongpai ua: amah a nem ua, a tunga TOUPAN hoihlou a tunsak tengteng tungtang thu ah amah a lungmuang uh: michiin leng amah sum nengneng leh, mi chihin dangkaeng zungbuh a pia uhi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Job tawpna lam a kipatna lam sangin a nak vualjawl jawa: huchiin belam sang sawmleh li, leh sangawngsau sang guk leh bawngtal sang khat leh, sabengtungnu sang khat a neia.
Tapa sagih leh tanu thum leng a nei a.
Huan a masapen, Jemima a chi a; a nihna min, Kezia; a thumna min, Keren-happuk.
Huan gamsung pumpi ah Job tanute banga melhoih a om kei uhi: huan a pa un a unaute uh lakah goutan amau a pia.
Huai nungin Job bel kum ja leh sawmli a dama, a tapate, leh a tapate tapate, khang li nasan a mu hi.Huchiin Job a sita a, a tek mahmah, nite a tam mahmah ngala.
Huchiin Job a sita a, a tek mahmah, nite a tam mahmah ngala.
Pathian limsakloute hoihsak banga om ngeilou-a, mi khialte lampi a leng ding lou-a, musitte tutphah a leng tu ngeilou mi tuh a hampha hi;
A kipahna tuh TOUPA danah ahi jawa; a dan thu tuh sun leh janin a ngaihtuah ngitnget hi;
Amah jaw tui luang kianga sing suan, a huna gah jel, a nah leng kai ngeilou bang ahi a; a thilhih peuhmah tuh a lamzang jel ding hi.
Pathian limsakloute bel huchibang ahi kei ua; buhsi huihin a mutleng mang bang ahi jaw uhi;
Huaijiakin mi Pathian limsakloute jaw vaihawmna maah a ding theikei ding uh, mi khialte leng mi diktatte kikhopna ah a ding thei sam kei ding uhi;TOUPAN mi diktatte lampi tuh a thei naknak ngala; mi khialte lampi bel a mangthang ding hi.
TOUPAN mi diktatte lampi tuh a thei naknak ngala; mi khialte lampi bel a mangthang ding hi.
Bangachia nam chih heh uh ahia, bangchia mi chihin thil phatuam lou ngaihtuah uh ahia?
Lei tunga kumpipate a kisa duamduam ua, heututen leng TOUPA leh a thaunilh tuh a sawm chiat ua,
A gaknate uh hihtat in, a khauhualte uh ei akipan I pai mang ding uh, chiin.
Van a tupa a nui dia: TOUPAN amaute a nuihsan ding;
Huai khit chiangin hehin a kianguah tuh a gen dinga, thangpai takin amau tuh a hih mangbangta ding hi:
Keimah mahin ka tang siangthou Zion ah ka kumpipa ka tusakta ahi, a chi a.
Thusehsa ka gen ding hi: TOUPAN ka kiangah, Nang jaw ka tapa na hi; a; tuniin ka honnei khia ahi;
Hon ngenin, huchiin na gouluah dingin nam chih ka honpe dia, kawlmong tawp tanin na gou dingin leng ka honpe ding;
Amaute tuh sik chiangin na hihkham dia; belvelten bel a paih khap bang un na pai kham dinga.
A chi-a.
Huchiin kumpipate aw, pilta unla: leitunga vaihawmte aw, thuzohin omta un;
Laudan siamin TOUPA na sem unla, ling khawmin kipan un;TOUPA tuh tawp unla, huchi keileh a heh dia, lam lakah na mangthang kha ding uh, a thangpai zok ding hi.
Amah a a ginna uh koihte tengteng a hampha uhi.
TOUPA tuh tawp unla, huchi keileh a heh dia, lam lakah na mangthang kha ding uh, a thangpai zok ding hi.
Amah a a ginna uh koihte tengteng a hampha uhi.
TOUPA, kei hondoute pung hina mahmah u e!
Kei honsualte tampi ahi uhi;
Amaha dingin Pathian ah panpihna himhim a om kei, chi-a, ka hinna tungtang thu gente tampi a om uhi.
Selah.
Himahleh, TOUPA aw, nang tuh ka kim ka velin ka phaw na hi a; ka lu dom kangpa na hi hi;
Ka awin TOUPA tuh ka sama, a tang siangthou akipanin a hondawng jel hi.
Selah.
Kei ka lum tuh ka na ihmuta a; ka khanglou nawna; TOUPAN a honna len gige ahi;
Hondou a, hon um suakte, mi sing khat nangawn ka kihta kei ding.
TOUPA aw, thou inla; ka Pathian aw honhondamin: kei a hondoute tengteng tuh a biang guh uah na khen pahpaha; Pathian limsaklou mite ha tuh na kikhong saka;Hotdamna tuh TOUPA-a ahi: Na vualjawlna tuh na mite tungah om hen.
Selah.

Selah.
Ka diktanna Pathian aw, ka honsap chiangin hondawngin; ka mangbat chiangin nang na honhihnavak jela: honhehpih inla, ka thumna honngaihkhiak sakin.
Mihing tate aw, ka thupina bang tan ahia zahlaknaa na suahsak ding uh?
Bangtan ahia thil bangmahlou tuh na thupi sak ding ua, juauthu na zon ding uh?
Selah
TOUPAN Pathian limsak mi amaha dingin a koih tuam chih thei jaw un: Amah ka sap peuhmah chiangin, TOUPAN a honngaikhe ding hi.
Kihta unla, thil hihkhial kei un: na lupna tunguah na lungtang uah na lungtang un ngaihtuah unla, dia sipsip un.
Selah
Diktatna kithoihna lan unla, TOUPA tuh gingtan un.
Hoihna himhim kuan ahia honmusak ding? chite tampi a om uhi.
TOUPA, nangmah mahin na mel vakin honsun vakin;
A buh leh a uain uh a hongkhan chianga a kipahna sang ua, kipahna thupijaw ka lungtang ah na omsak hi.Khamuang takin ka lum dia, ih leng ka ihmu ding: TOUPA, nangmah mah ahi kei kia a leng bit taka honom sak gige.
Khamuang takin ka lum dia, ih leng ka ihmu ding: TOUPA, nangmah mah ahi kei kia a leng bit taka honom sak gige.
TOUPA aw, ka thute ah na bil hondoh inla, ka ngaihtuahna ngaihtuah in;
Ka kumpipa leh ka Pathian, ka kikou aw ngaikhiain: na kianga thum ka hi ngala;
TOUPA aw, jingsangin ka aw na naza jel dinga; jingsangin ka thumna na maah ka gel hoih dimdiam dinga, ka honna hungaih jel ding hi.
Gilousalou kipahpih Pathian na hi ngal keia: mi khialte tuh na kiangah a tung kei ding hi;
Mi ki-uangsakte tuh na mitmuhin a ding theikei ding ua: gitlouhna na semte tengteng na hua hi;
Juau genhatte tuh na hihmang dinga: TOUPAN sisan suahhat leh khemhat mi tuh a kih nilouhlouh hi.
Kei bel, na hoihna phatnain, na inn ah ka honglut dinga: laudan honsiam kawmin na biakin siangthou lam ngain ka honbe jel ding hi;
TOUPA aw, ka melmate jiakin na diktat vangin honpi inla; na lampi tuh ka maah kichian sakin.
A kam uah ginomna himhim a om keia; a sunglam utuh gitlouh satlouhna ngen ahi: a gawl utuh han kihong ahi a; a lei un mi a phat khempeuh uhi;
Pathian aw, amaute tuh siamlouh tang sakin amau hoihsakna ngeite tuh pukna dingin zang uhen; a tatlekna tampi jiak un sawnkhianin; na tungah a hel ngal ua.
Nangmah a a ginna uh koihte tengteng bel nangmah ah kipak uhenla, na humbit jel jiakin nuamin kikou nilouhlouh uhen; na min itte leng nangmah ah kipak takin om uhen;Mi diktat tuh vual na jawl ding ahi ngala; TOUPA aw, amah tuh phaw bang in deihsaknain na umsuak ding hi.
Mi diktat tuh vual na jawl ding ahi ngala; TOUPA aw, amah tuh phaw bang in deihsaknain na umsuak ding hi.
TOUPA aw, hehin honsal kenla, thangpaiin honsawi sam ken.
Toupa aw, honhehpihin, ka gim gawpta ngala: TOUPA aw, hondam sakin; ka guhte khawng lah a na vekta ngala;
Ka hinna leng nakpitaka hihmangbatin a om hi: TOUPA aw, nang bangtan ahia non etsim ding?
TOUPA aw, hongkik nawn inla, ka hinna hondamin: na hoihna phatna jiakin honhondamin;
Sih nungin nang theihgegena a om ngal keia: Sheol ah kuan ahia na tunga kipahthu gen ding?
Ka mauna lamah ka bahta; jan tengin ka lupna tuh tui ah ka kilam saka; ka lupna tuh ka khituiin ka kawtsak jel hi;
Ka mit tuh lungkhamna jiakin a se hulhula; hondoute jiakin a hongtek deuhdeuhta a.
Nou, na gilou semte tengteng aw, honpaisan vek un; TOUPAN ka kahging a zata ngala;
TOUPAN hehpihna ka nget lah a ngaikheta a; TOUPAN ka thumna tuh a kipahpih ding hi;Hondoute tengteng tuh a zahlak un a mangbang mahmah ding ua; a kik nawm ding ua, thakhatin a hongzahlak guih ding uhi.
Hondoute tengteng tuh a zahlak un a mangbang mahmah ding ua; a kik nawm ding ua, thakhatin a hongzahlak guih ding uhi.
TOUPA, ka Pathian aw, nangmah ah ka ginna ka ngaa: hondelhte tengteng lakah honhondamin honhumbitin:
Huchilou injaw, humbitpa om louin humpinelkai bangin, ka hinna a bot nen kha ding hi.
TOUPA ka Pathian aw, huchi banga hih ka nahiha, ka khut a khelhna naom a hih a,
Ka lawm tuh khelhna a thuk ka na hih leh, (A hi, bangmahlou-a hondou tuh ka humbit a nahi jaw):
Melmain ka hinna delhin, delh pha mai hen aw; ahi, ka hinna tuh leiah chil pukin, ka thupina tuh leivui lakah koih mai hen.
Selah.
TOUPA aw, hehin thou inla, hondoute thangpaihna dou din kisa inla: kei dingin kihihhalhin; vaihawmna ding thu na peta hi;
Huchiin mi chih kikhawm khawmten honum suak uhen: huan, nang tuh a tunguah sang piin kik nawnin;
TOUPA michih mi chih vai a hawmsak jel: TOUPAN aw, keimah a ka diktatna leh ka lungsim hoihna om bang jelin vai honhawmsakin.
Giloute gitlouhna hongtawpta le aw, mi diktatte jaw hihkipin: Pathian diktatin lungtangte leh lungsimte a enchian jel hi;
Ka phaw tuh Pathian kiangah a om, amah jaw lungtang diktakpu hondampa ahi hi;
Pathian tuh vaihawmpa diktat ahi, ahi, ni tengin mi giloute tunga lunghihlouhna nei Pathian ahi.
Mi a kihei kik kei leh aman a namsau a tathiam ding; a thalpeu tuh a laia, a manta hi;
Sihna vanzatte tuh amah thahna dingin leng a bawl dimdiamta hi; a thalte thalte tuh kuangtheiin a bawla;
Enin, gilouhna a zinpih; ahi, thilhihkhelhna a paia, juauthu a piangsakta hi;
Kokhuk a bawla, thuk piin a tou-a, amah khuk-toh ah a keta hi;
A thilhihkhelhna tuh amah lutung mah ah a hongkik nawn ding, hiamgam taka a thilhih tuh amah sipmah ah a ke ding hi.TOUPA tuh a diktatna jiakin, a kiangah kipahthu ka gen ding: TOUPA tungnungpen min phatin leng la ka sa ding hi.
TOUPA tuh a diktatna jiakin, a kiangah kipahthu ka gen ding: TOUPA tungnungpen min phatin leng la ka sa ding hi.
TOUPA ka TOUPA aw, leitung tengteng-ah na min hoih hina tele!
Na thupina thu van tungahte khawng na koiha;
Melma leh phulami daihsakna dingin, nang hondoute jiakin naungekte leh nawine laite kama pawtin hatna na hihkip hi.
Na van, na khutsuakte, kha leh aksi na sehte khawng, ka ngaihtuah chiangin,
Miching bang ahia, huchitel na limsak?
Mihing tapa leng bang ahia, huchitela na veh?
Ka chi a.
Amah jaw Pathian sanga nuai zel phetin na bawla, thupina leh pahtawina na khusak ngala;
Na khutsuak tungahte khawng thu na nei saka; a khe nuai-ahte khawng bangmapeuhmah na koih a:
Belam leh bawng tengteng toh, ahi, gamsate khawng to-leng;
Tunga leng vasa leh tuipi ngasate, tuipi-a lampi tawn peuhmahte toh.TOUPA kou TOUPA aw, leitung tengtengah na min hoih hina tel e!
TOUPA kou TOUPA aw, leitung tengtengah na min hoih hina tel e!
TOUPA kiangah ka lungtang tengtengin kipahthu ka gen dinga; na thillamdang hih tengteng ka theisak ding hi;
Nangmah ah ka kipakin ka nuam ding a: nang Tungnungpen aw, na min phatin la ka sa ding hi.
Hondoute a taijak tak un, na maah a kipalpuk ua, a mangthang uhi;
Kei adia kilawm himahleh ka thu-ah nang kei na hon gum ngala; diktaka vaihawmin laltutphahah na tu a.
Nam chih na thihilha, gilou-saloute na hihmangthanga, a min uh leng khantawn khantawnin na thaimangta hi;
Doumite tuh a mangbang vek ua, khantawn adingin bangmah neilouin a omta uhi; na kho sukgamsate tuh, amaute theihgigena nangawn toh leng a mangthang hi.
TOUPA bel khantawn adingin kumpipain a tu a; a laltutphah tuh vaihawmna dingin a bawlta hi;
Aman tuh khovel kizen takin vai a hawmsak dinga, khentuam neilouin mi chih vai a hawm ding hi.
Nuaisiahte din TOUPA thu bukna ahi lai ding, buai hun chianga bukna;
Huchiin na min theiten a honmuang ding ua; nang jaw TOUPA, nangmah honzongte na paisan ngei ngal keia.
TOUPA, Zion a om phatin lasa unla; mite lakah a thil hihte hilh un;
Sisan suah thu dongtel jelpan amau lah a theigige ngala; migenthei kikou aw a mangngilh ngeikei hi.
TOUPA aw, honhehpih inla; sihna kongkhak akipan honkaikhe jelpa, honhote jiaka ka mangbatna enin;
Nangmah phatna tengteng ka theih sak theihna dingin: Zion tanu kongpi khawng ah, na honhotdamna ah ka nuam ding hi.
Nam chih tuh a kokhuk bawl uah a tum ua; a guka a len jak uah amau khe mah a awkta hi.
TOUPA tuh a kihilta a, vai a hawmta a: mi gilou-salou tuh amah khutsuak mah ah a awk nak hi.
Higgaion.
Selah.
Mi gilou-saloute tuh Sheol ah a kik nawn ding uh.
Nam chih Pathian manggilh hatte tengteng tuh;
Tagahte mangngilhin a om nilouh louh kei ding ua, gentheite lametna tuh khantawnin leng a mang sam kei ding hi.
TOUPA aw, thou dihve; mihing peuhmah vualzou kei hen: nam chih tuh na mitmuh ah vaihawm sakin om hen:TOUPA aw, amau lau sakin; nam chihin mihing lel ahi uh chih kithei uhen.
Selah.
TOUPA aw, amau lau sakin; nam chihin mihing lel ahi uh chih kithei uhen.
Selah.
TOUPA aw, bangachia gamla pi-a ding nak na hia?
Bangchia mangbat lai banga kisal nak?
Mi gilou-salou kisaktheihna jiakin mi gentheite delh ekin a om uhi; a thil gilou ngaihtuah khiakte uah amau mah awk uhen.
Mi gilou-salou in a lungtang utlam a suanga, mi huaihamin TOUPA a paikhia a, a musit nak hi.
Mi gilou-salou in kisaktheih mel puin, A phut kei ding, a chichi a.
A ngaihtuahna tengteng tuh, Pathian a om kei, chih ngen ahi.
A omdante tuh ckiklai peuhin leng a kip hima; na vaihawmnate tuh tunglam gamla pi-ah, a muh bat louhah, a om hi: Amah doute tengteng lah a nuihsan maimah ngala;
A lungsim in, Ka ling kei ding; khang tengteng phain leng mangbangin ka om kei ding, a chi hi.
A kam tuh hamselohna te, khemna te, engbawlna tein a dima; a lei nuaiah thilhihkhelh na leh siatna a om hi.
Kho tenga a guka tanna munahte khawng a tu jela; mun dai khawngah giloulou mite a that jel hi: a mitin bangmah hih theilou mi a guktan nak ahi;
Humpinelkaiin a kua a guktan bangin aman tuh mun dai ah a guktan jel hi; mi genthei man dingin a tang jela: mi genthei tuh a man ngeia, hichiin a lenin a kai mang naknak hi.
A khupboha, a kuna, bangmah hih theilou mite a mi hatte uh hihpukin a om naknak uhi;
A lungsim ah, Pathianin a mangngilh ahi: a mai a sela, chikmah chiangin a mu kei ding, a chi.
Toupa aw, thou in; Pathian aw, na khut honlikin: mi gentheite mangngilh ken;
Bangjiakin ahia mi gilou-salouin Pathian a muhsit, a lungsima, Na phut kei ding, a chih nak?
Muh jaw na mu khin thama; na khuta thuk ding thilhihkhial leh hihvuina na en ngala: bangmah hih theilou mi na kiangah a kikemsak jela; Pa neilou panpihpa na hi naknak hi.
Mi gilousalou ban sutan inla, mi gilou, gitlouhna zong khiain, na muh het louh mateng;
Toupa tuh khantawn khantawn adin KUMPIPA ahi a: nam chih amah gam akipanin a mangthangta uhi.
Toupa, kingainiamte deihna na ngaikhia a: a lungtang uh na kisa sak dinga, a bil uleng na za sak ding hi:Pa neiloute leh engbawlte, leitung min a engbawl nawn louhna ding un, a vai uh hawmsak dingin.
Pa neiloute leh engbawlte, leitung min a engbawl nawn louhna ding un, a vai uh hawmsak dingin.
Toupa ah ka ginna ka nga jela: bangchidan ahia ka hinna kianga, Na mual uah vasa bangin leng mang un:
En dih ua, lungtang diktakpu mial nuaia a kap theihna ding un, mi gilou-salouten thalpeu a lai ua, a thal utuh a khau ah a bulh chiat uhi;
Suangphumte hihsiata om leh, mi diktatin bang ahia a hih theih ding? na chih uh.
TOUPA tuh a biakin siangthou ah a oma, TOUPA tuh a laltutphah leng van ah a om; mihing tate a mitin a ena, a mitvunin a hihchian jel hi.
TOUPAN tuh mi diktat a hihchian jela: mi gilou-salou leh hiamgamna deihte bel a hinnain a ho nak hi.
Mi gilou-saloute tungah thangte a ke sak dinga; mei leh kat leh huih mulkimhuai tak tuh anou tan ding uh ahi ding hi.TOUPA lah a diktat ngala; diktatna a deih naknak hi mi diktatten a mel a mu ding uhi.
TOUPA lah a diktat ngala; diktatna a deih naknak hi mi diktatten a mel a mu ding uhi.
TOUPA, honpanpih in; Pathian limsak mi lah a om nawnta ngal kei ua; mihing tate lak akipan mi ginom lah a mangta ngal ua.
Mi chihin a innvengte kiangah thu bangmahlou maimai a gengen uhi: maitang phatna leh khemna lungtang puin thu a gen nak uhi.
TOUPAN maitang phatna muk tengteng a atkhe dinga, thu kisathei genna lei toh:
Amau tuh, I leiin I zou ding ua; I mukte tuh eimaha ngei a ka, kua ahia I tunga lal om? a chi uh.
TOUPAN tuh, Gentheite a simmoh jiak uleh, tagahte thum jiakin, ka thou pah ngal dia; a nuihsan tak uh bit takin ka omsak ding, a chi a;
TOUPA thute tuh thu siangthou tak ahi a; dangka leitunga haltuina meia etkhiaka, sagih vei hih siangthou zohsa bang ahi.
TOUPA aw, nang tuh amau na kem hoih dinga, hiai khangthakte lakah chiklai peuhin leng na humbit ding.Mihing tate lakah khelhna pahtawia a omin, mi gilou-salou a vialvak nak uhi.
Mihing tate lakah khelhna pahtawia a omin, mi gilou-salou a vialvak nak uhi.
TOUPA aw, bangtan ahia non mangngilh nilouhlouh ding?
Bangtan ahia kei akipana na mai na sel ding?
Ni tumin ka lungtang a lungkhamna neiin bangtan ahia ka lungsim a ka gelgel ding? bangtan ka melma ka tunga tawisan hi ding ahia?
TOUPA ka Pathian aw, ngaihtuah inla, hondawng dih ve: ka mit honhihvak sak inla, huchilouin jaw sihna ihmutin ka ihmu kha ding hi.
Ka melmain, Amah ka zouta, a chi kha ding hi; ka lin leh kei hondoute a kipak kha ding uhi.
Himahleh ken jaw na zahngaihna ka muang ahi; non hotdamna ah ka lungtang akipak ding:Ka tunga hoih taka a hih tak jiakin: TOUPA pahtawiin la ka sa ding hi.
Ka tunga hoih taka a hih tak jiakin: TOUPA pahtawiin la ka sa ding hi.
Mihai in a lungsimin, Pathian a om kei, a chi a.
A kigawp khin ua, thil kihhuai tak a hih ua; thil hoih hih himhim a om kei uhi.
Theisiama, Pathian zong mawngmawng a om u hiam, chiin, TOUPAN vanakipanin mihing tate a ensuk hi.
A hilou lamah a pialta vak ua, nintakin a na om chiatta ua; kuamah thil hoih hih himhim a om kei ua, khat lel leng a om kei hi.
Thilhihkhialte tengtengin theihna himhim a neikei ua hia?
Tanghou a nek bang un ka mite a nezou vek ua, TOUPA lah a sam ngei sam kei uhi.
Huaiah tuh lau tuntunin a om ua; Pathian tuh mi diktat suante laka a om jiakin;
Mi genthei suangtuahnate tuh na selphou jel uhi, TOUPA tuh a kihumbitna a hih jiakin.Israelte hotdamna tuh Zion akipanin hongpawt mahleh, aw!
TOUPAN a mite sala a om uh a pi kik nawn chiangin, huai hun chiangin Jakobte a nuamta ding ua, Israelte a kipakta ding uhi.
Israelte hotdamna tuh Zion akipanin hongpawt mahleh, aw!
TOUPAN a mite sala a om uh a pi kik nawn chiangin, huai hun chiangin Jakobte a nuamta ding ua, Israelte a kipakta ding uhi.
TOUPA, na puanin ah kua a hongzintung dia?
Na tang siangthou ah kua hongom ding?
Diktaka om, kizen taka hiha, a lungtanga thu taktak gen mi pen.
A leia mi gen ngeilou-a, a lawm tunga leng thil hihkhial ngeilou a, a invengte min leng gense ngeilou mi pen.
Mi gilou tak tuh a muhsitin a om naknak hi; TOUPA laudan siamte bel a pahtawi nak hi.
Amah adinga poi ding nangawn kichiam khina hih lamdang ngeilou mi.A pung delh dinga a sum leitawi sak ngeilou mi, a siam jaw siamlouh tangsak dinga golhna leng la ngeilou mi pen.
Huchi bang thil hihmi tuh, bangchik mahin a ling kei ding hi.
A pung delh dinga a sum leitawi sak ngeilou mi, a siam jaw siamlouh tangsak dinga golhna leng la ngeilou mi pen.
Huchi bang thil hihmi tuh, bangchik mahin a ling kei ding hi.
Pathian aw, honhumbitin: nangmah ah ka ginna ka koih ngala.
TOUPA kiangah.
Nang tuh ka TOUPA na hi a; Nang loungal hoihna himhim ka neikei.
Lei a mi siangthou omte jaw, amau jaw mi hoih, ka kipahna tengteng omna ahi uh, ka chi ahi.
TOUPA pathian dang khennaa zangte tuh, a lungkhamnate uh a pung ding: a sisan dawn kithoihna uh ken jaw ka lan kei dinga, ka mukin a minte uh ka lou sam kei ding hi.
TOUPA tuh ka goutan ding leh ka nou tan ding ahi: nang tuh ka tuam non hihkip sak jela.
Tehna khaute tuh mun nuam tak khawngah ka tuam dingin a keta ahi; ahi, gou hoih tak ka luahta ahi.
TOUPA, suangtuahsakpa, ka phat dinga: ahi, janchiang bangin ka lungsim honhilhpil jel hi.
TOUPA tuh ka maah ka omsak gige a; ka taklama a om jiakin ka ling kei ding hi.
Huaijiakin ka lungtang akipana, ka thupina a nuam hi: ka sa leng bit takin a om ding hi.
Ka kha lah Sheol kiangah na nuse sin ngal keia: Na mi siangthou muatna mu dingin lah na phal sin sam kei hi.Nang hinna lampi non theisak dinga; na maah nuam dimletna a om hi; na khut taklamah khantawn kipahna ding a om hi.
Nang hinna lampi non theisak dinga; na maah nuam dimletna a om hi; na khut taklamah khantawn kipahna ding a om hi.
TOUPA aw, ka dikna thu ja inla, ka kikou husa ngaikhia inla; ka thumna, juauthu genhat muka pawt hi lou-ah, bil na doh in;
Ka tungthu pukna tuh na ma akipana pawt hi henla; na mitin khentuam neih louhna en hen.
Ka lungtang na enchian a; janin na hongpha a; non endikta a bangmah na mu het kei a; ka kamin a genkhial kei ding ka chi chiltel ahi;
Mihing thilhih ah jaw, na muka thu pawt jiakin mihing ngongtat lampi-a pai lou dingin ka kikem hoih ahi;
Ka kalsuanten na lampi tuh a tawn ziahziaha, ka khete a tal ngeikei hi.
Pathian aw, ka honsam jela, nang lah non dawng dinga: kei lamah na bil hondoh inla, ka thugen ngaikhia in;
Nangmaha ginna koih peuhmahte kianga, na khut taklama amau sualte hondam jelpa aw, na chitna lamdang kilang sakin.
Mit laimu bangin honkem inla, na kha nuaiahte honbu sakin.
Mi gilou-salou honhihsiaa, hondou-a honum kim lakah.
Amaute tuh amau thau-a umin a om ua, a kam un kisathei takin thu a gen jel uhi;
Tuin jaw ka kalsuanna peuhmah uah a honum suakta a, leia honhihpuk dingin a mitte khawng uh ka tunguah a tusak uhi;
Amah tuh humpinelkai sa keih ut mahmah bang leh, humpinelkai lunlai mun dai peuha buk niloulouh bang lel ahi.
TOUPA aw, thou inla, amah maituah pih inla, kun sakin: ka hinna tuh mi gilou-salou lakah na namsauin humbit inla.
TOUPA aw, na khutin mihingte lakah, khovel mihingte lakah, humbitin; amau tuam jaw tu damsunga a neih uh ahi a, a gil uh na gouin na dimsak naknaka; tate lungkim hunt akin a nei ua, a sum zat val uh a tangekte uh a sihsan jel uhi.Ken jaw diktatna neiin na mel ka mu dinga; nangmah batna neia ka hah hun chiangin ka lungkim hun mahmah ding hi.
Ken jaw diktatna neiin na mel ka mu dinga; nangmah batna neia ka hah hun chiangin ka lungkim hun mahmah ding hi.
TOUPA, ka hatna aw, ka honit hi.
TOUPA tuh ka suangpi leh ka kulhpi leh, honhumbitpa ahi; ka Pathian ka suangpi kip tak ahi a, amah ah ginna ka koih ding; ka phaw leh ka hotdamna ki leh, ka insang ahi;
Phat tuak TOUPA ka sam dinga, huan hondoute lakah hotdamin ka om ding hi.
Sihna khauhualten a hongaka, Pathian limsaklouhna tuikhangten honlau sak a;
Sheol khauhualten a hongak suaka: sihna thangte ka kimvelin a om hi.
Ka lungkhama TOUPA tuh ka sama, ka Pathian ka sam hi.
Aman a biakin akipanin ka aw a ja a, a maa ka kikou husa tuh a bil ah a lutta hi.
Huaitakin lei a linga, a kisat ta a, a heh jiakin tangte leng a kingakna nangawn toh a kisatin a lingta hi;
A nak akipanin meikhu ajamtou lunglunga, a kama pawt meiin a kang juajua a, huaiin meihol leng a hihkuang phomphom hi.
Aman tuh vante leng a kunsaka, a hoh sukta a; a khe nuaiah te khawng mial bikbek a hongom hi.
Cherub tungah a tuanga, a lengta a, ahi, huih khuate-ah a leng vengveng hi.
Mial tuh a bukna munah, amah umna buktain, a bawla; tuia mialna, vana meipite mah;
A maa vakna jiakin a meipite athenga, gialte leh meiamte a ke toktok uhi.
TOUPA tuh van tung khawngah a ging dodopa, Tungnungpenin a aw a suaksaka; gialte leh meiamte a ke toktok uhi.
Huan, a thalte tuh a kap khia a, amau tuh a hihjakta hi; ahi, khua khawng a phe zolzol nilouha, ahihbuai vengvung hi.
Huaitakin, TOUPA aw, na tai dinga, na naka hu pawtin a mut ek jiakin, tui luannate a hongkilanga, leilung kingaknate hihlatin a omta hi.
Aman tuh tunglam akipanin a honsawka, honlena; tui tampi akipan honkai khia hi;
Kei galhat tak lakah honhumbita, honhote lakah leng; kei dingin a hat lojen ngal ua;
Amau tuh ka vangtah niin honsual ua, himahlen TOUPA ka ginpi pen ahi;
Aman tuh mun awngthawl takah honpi khiaa; ka tunga a kipah jiakin honhumbit ta ahi.
TOUPAN ka diktatdan bang ngeiin ka tungah a hiha; ka khutte a siangthoudan bang ngeiin a hondin ahi;
TOUPA lampite ka tawna, ka Pathian kiang akipan gilou takin ka pai mang ngei ngal keia;
A vaihawmna tengteng ka maah a om naka, a thu sehte tuh ka pai ngei ngal kei a;
Amah lakah gensiatbei leng ka hi a, ka siatna akipan ka kihuikhe jel hi.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN ka diktatdan bang jelin honna dinta a, ka khutte a mitmuha a sianthou bang jelin.
Mihehpihthei takte lakah hehpihtheitakin na kihihlang dinga; mihoihkimte lakah hoihkimin na kihihlang dinga;
Misiangthoute lakah siangthouin na kihihlang dinga; huan, genhakte lakah genhakin na kihihlang ding hi;
Gimthuak mite hondam ding na hih ngala; mikisatheite bel na hihniam ding hi;
Nang ka khawnvak na hondet sak ding ahi ngala: TOUPA ka Pathianin ka mialna a hihvak ding hi.
Nang hon panpihin gal ka delh ngala; ka Pathian panpih mahin kulh dai ka tawmkan ahi.
Pathian jaw, a lampi a hoihkima, TOUPA thu tuh etdik a hita hi; amaha ginna koih tengteng adingin amah tuh phaw ahi.
TOUPA lou Pathian kua a oma ahia?
I Pathian lou suangpi kua a oma ahia?
Hatna hontengsakpa leh ka lampi hihhoihkimpa Pathian mah;
Aman ka khe zukpi khe bangin a bawla, ka mun sangpi ahte khawng a honom sak hi;
Ka khutte uh gal kap dingin a chila, huchiin ka banten leng dal thalpeu a lai zou hial hi.
Nang na hotdamna phaw leng non piaa: na khut taklamin honkaia, na kingaihniamnain na honbawllianta hi.
Ka nuaia ka kalsuanna na hihliana, huchiin ka khete a teu kei hi;
Hondoute ka delh dinga, ka delh pha mai ding: hihmanthata a om masiah uh ka kihei kikta kei ding hi.
A thoh nawn theihlouhna ding un ka sat tan dia: ka khe nuaiah a puk ding uhi;
Nang kidouna adingin hatna ka taiah non tengsak ngala: honsualte tuh ka nuaiah na zouta hi.
Honhote ka hihmangthat theihna dingin, nang hondoute tuh honnung lehngatsan dingin na omsakta hi.
Amau tuh a kikou ua, himahleh hondampa ding kuamah a om kei uh: TOUPA mah tuh a sam ua, himahleh a dawng tuan kei hi.
Huaitakin leivui huih mutleng bang mai in ka sat nena: kholak buannawi bangphetin ka pai kheta hi.
Nang mite kilaina lakah non humbita; nam chih lutang dingin na honsiama, ka theih ngeilouh miten ka nek ka tak a bawlta ding uhi.
Ka tanchin a jak tak un ka thu a mang ding ua; mikhualte ka kiangah a kipe ding uhi.
Mikhualte a vul ding ua, a in sang ua kipanin ling kawmin a hongsuk ding uhi.
TOUPA tuh a hing hi; ka suangpi tuh phatin om henla; honhondampa Pathian tuh pahtawiin om hen:
Phu honlaksakpa leh, mi chih ka nuaia zoupa Pathian mahmah.
Amah hondoute lakah honhonkhia a: ahi, nang kei honsualte tunglamah non domkanga: mi hiamgamte lak akipan na honhumbit jel hi.
Huaijiakin, TOUPA aw, nam chih lakah kipahthu ka honhilh dinga, nang phatin la ka sa ding hi.Aman tuh hotdamna thupitak a kumpipa bawl kiangah a pejela; a thaunilhpa tungah, David leh a suante tung ngeiah, khantawnin a chitna a langsak ding hi.
Aman tuh hotdamna thupitak a kumpipa bawl kiangah a pejela; a thaunilhpa tungah, David leh a suante tung ngeiah, khantawnin a chitna a langsak ding hi.
Vanten Pathian thupidan a theisak ua; huihkhua lian takin a khutsuak a sulang hi.
Sunin sun kiangah thu a gen sawn jela, janin jan kiangah theihna a sulang sawnsawn hi.
Thugen himhim leh pau himhim a om keia; a aw uh bila jak theih ahi kei hi;
A tehna khau uh leilung luah tengteng ah jam suaksakin a oma; a thu uh kawlmong phain a thang kheta hi.
Huaite ah ni adingin puanin a jaka,
Huai ni tuh mouneipa dinga dantan akipan pawt bang ahi a, mi hat tak bangin, a taina lampi-a a tai ding tuh nuam a sa naknak hi.
A pawtna tuh kawlmong tawp akipanin ahi a, a tai kawina tuh a tawp lehlam tanin ahi a, a satdan theilou-a selguk himhim a om kei hi.
TOUPA dan tuh a hoihkima, hinna a halhsak jel hi; TOUPA thutheihsak tuh a muanhuaia, mi mawl a pilsak jeljel hi.
TOUPA thuzohna tuh a dika, lungtang a kipak sak naknak: TOUPA thupiak tuh a siangthou-a, mitte ahihvak naknak hi;
TOUPA laudansiam tuh a sianga, khantawna dingin a om hi: TOUPA vaihawmnate tuh a taka, a kizen kimvel vek ahi.
Huaite tuh dangkaeng sangin a deihhuai jaw ahi, ahi, dangkaeng siangthou tampi sangin leng: khuaiju leh khuaikhak sangin leng a khumjaw ahi.
Huai lou leng huaitein na sikha tuh taihilhin ka om jel hi; huaite zuih tuh kipahman thupi tak neihna ahi jel hi.
Kuan ahia amah diklouhnate theithei ding?
Diklouhna kiselte lakah honhui khiain.
Thil hihkhial teitei lou dingin na sikha honlen chinten inla; ka tungah amaute thunei sak ken! huchiin hoihin ka om dinga, tatlekna thupi tak lakah gensiat beiin ka om ding hi.TOUPA aw, ka suangpi leh hontanpa, ka kama thupawtte leh ka lungtanga ngaihtuahnate na mitmuhin kipahpihhuai hi hen.

Mangbat niin TOUPAN hondawng hen!
Jakob Pathian minin hon liahkhuh hen!
Mun siangthou akipanin panpihna honsawlsak henla, Zion akipanin honhihhat hen!
Na thillat tengteng tuh theigige henla, na halmang thillat tuh kipahpih hen!
Selah.
Na lungtang deihlam honpia henla, na lunggel tengteng honlohchingsak hen.
Na hotdamna ah nuamin la ka sa ding ua, ka Pathian min un ka puanjakte uh ka jak lai ding uh!
TOUPAN na ngetna tengteng honlohchingsak hen!
TOUPAN a thaunilh tuh a hondam chih tuin ka theita; a khut taklam hotdamna thain a van siangthou akipanin amah a hondawng ding hi.

TOUPA aw, kumpipa tuh na hatna ah a nuam dinga, na hotdamna ah nuamsa na zoujen inchia!
A lungtang deihlam lah na pia a, a muka a thil nget lah na phal lou kei hi.
Selah.
Hoihnaa vualzohnatein na dawn ngala: dangkaeng siangthou lallukhu na khusak hi.
Aman tuh hinna hon ngena, na piaa khantawn khawtawna damna.
Na hotdamna ah a thupina a lian mahmah ahi: pahtawina leh thupina tungah na nga jel hi.
Khantawna dingin vualjawlna liantak muin na bawl ngala: Na ma a nopsaknain na kipak sak hi.
Kumpipan TOUPA tuh a muang ngala, tungnungpen chitna jiakin a ling kei ding hi.
Na khutin nang hondoute tengteng tuh a zongkhe vek dinga: na khut taklamin nang hondoute a zongkhe ding hi.
Na heh hun chiangin amau tuh haltuina mei kuang lutlut bangin na bawl ding.
TOUPAN amau tuh hehin a valh khin dinga, meiin a kang mang mai ding hi.
A gahte uh lei akipan na hihmang dinga, a suante uh tuh mihing tate lak akipanin na hihmang behlap ding hi.
Na tungah thil gilou hih a tum ngal ua; thil gilou a ngaihtuah khia ua, a hihtangtung thei ngal kei uhi.
Nang amau tuh na kihei sak dek ngala, na thalpeu khaute tuh a maitang uah laisain na bawl ding hi.TOUPA aw, na hatnaah pahtawiin hongomin: huchiin na thilhihtheihna phatin la ka sa ding uhi.

Ka Pathian, ka Pathian, bangachia honpaisan?
Bangachia honpanpih dinga na gamlat mahmaha, ka thumna thute akipana na gamlat?
Ka Pathian aw, sunin ka kikou-a, himahleh na dawng tuan keia; janin leng ka kikou-a, ka dai tuan kei hi.
Himahleh, nang Israelte phatnaa tengpa aw, nang jaw na siangthou hi.
Ka pipute uh nang honna muang ua: a muang ua, huchiin nang na humbit jel hi.
Nang honsam ua, huchiin, humbitin a om jel ua: honmuang ua, huchiin zahlakin a om ngeikei uhi.
Kei jaw mihing himhim ka hi keia, tangtel phet ka hi a; mihingte gensiat leh mite muhsit ka hi.
A honmu peuhin honnuihsan ua, a muk uh a lawksak ua, a lu uh a sing uh;
TOUPA muang hi ven, aman amah humbit leh ake: a tunga a kipah jiakin humbit leh ake, a chi ua.
Nang tuh sul akipana honlakhepa na hi a: ka nu nawi tunga ka om laiin nang non gingta sakta hi.
Sul akipan himin nangmah tungah ngak ka nahi a: nang tuh ka nu gilsung himah ka Pathian na hi hi.
Hon gamlat mahmah ken; mangbatna ding anai ngala; panpihpa ding himhim a om tuan kei hi.
Bawngtal tampiin honum suak ua: Basan gama bawngtal hat takten hon um suak dedup uhi;
Humpineilkai duhgawl humham hat bangin a kam un honkamkat khum uhi.
Tui banga buak khiakin ka oma, ka guh tengteng leng a kilawi hi; ka lungtang tuh khuainun bang ahia, ka gil lakah a zul khinta hi;
Ka tha tuh belpei bangin a keu khina; ka lei leng ka dangtawngah a belh bikbeka; nang sihna leivuiah nonpi lutta hi.
Uiten a honum suak ngal ua: thil hoihlou hih omkhawmten hon um bit ua; ka khut leh ka khete a vut uhi.
Ka guh tengteng ka sim theia; amau lah honenin hon ensal ua;
Ka puansilhte a kihawm ua, ka puannak dingin ai a san uhi.
Nang bel, TOUPA aw, hon-gamlat mahmah ken! hon Hihhatpa aw, honpanpih dingin hongkin in!
Ka hinna tuh namsau lakah humbit inla; ka neih sun pentak tuh ui thilhihtheihna lakah humbit in!
Humpinelkai kam akipanin hon hondam inla; ahi, gam bawngtal ki akipanin ka kha hondam in!
Ka uanaute kiangah na min ka hilh dinga: kikhawmte lakah ka honphat ding hi;
TOUPA laudansiamte aw, amah phat un!
Jakob suan teng teng aw, amah pahtawi un: Israel suan tengteng aw, amah kihta un:
Aman gimthuakmi gimdan a musit ngal keia, a kih sam kei hi; a mai lah a lakah a sel kei hi; amah a sapin a ngaikhe jaw hi.
Kikhopna thupitaka ka honphat jelna jaw nang maha ahi: amah laudan siamte maah ka thuchiam ka tangtun ding hi.
Thunuailutten a ne ding ua, a tai ding uh: amah zongten TOUPA a phat ding uh: na lungtang uh khantawnin hingin om hen!
Kawlmong mi tengteng in leng a thei nawn ding ua, TOUPA lam a ngata ding uh: nam chiha chi chih na maah a kun ding uhi.
Gam tuh TOUPAA ahi a, nam chih tunga vaihawmpa ahi ngala.
Leia mi neizou tengtengten a ne un chibai a buk ding ua; leivui dia paisuak ding tengteng tuh a maah a hongkun ding uh, amau hinna hingsak gige theiloute.
Chi suanin amah nek leh tak a a bawl dinga; khangthak hongom nawnte kiangah TOUPA tanchin a hilh ding ua;A hongpai ding ua, nam hongpawt ding kiangah, A hihkhinta, chiin, a diktatdan a hontheisak ding uh.

TOUPA tuh honchingpa ahi a; ka tasam kei ding hi:
Aman loupa hingnou mitmet munah honkhual sak jela: khawlna tui gei peuh ah a honpi jel hi;
Ka hinna a hon bawlhoih sak jela, amah min jiakin diktatna lampi ah honpi jel hi.
A hi, sihna lim guam tawn mahleng, gilou himhim ka lau kei ding; khetbuk leh na chiangin hon khamuan jel hi.
Hondoute mitmuhin ka maah dohkan na bawlkhol a: ka lutang thau na hilhkhina, ka nou a dimlet hi.Pellou in hoihna leh chitna in ka damsung tengin honjui jel dinga; huchiin TOUPA inn ah khantawin ka om nilouhta ding hi.

Leitung leh a sunga thil om tengteng TOUPA-a ahi a; khovel leh a suanga tengteng toh;
Tuipi tungah amah muhkhiak ahi ngala, luipi tungah leng a hihkip ahi.
TOUPA tang ah kua a paitou ding, a mun siangthou ah kua a ding ding?
Khut siang leh lungtang siangthou nei a, a lungsim thuhimlou lama koih ngeiloua, khem tuma kichiam ngeilou mi.
Aman tuh TOUPA kiang akipan vualjawlna a mu dinga, a hondampa Pathian kiang akipan diktanna leng a mu ding hi.
Huai tuh amah zongmi suan ahi.

Thupina Kumpipa kua ahia?

TOUPA aw, ka lungsim na kiangah ka koih den jela.

A hi, nang honngak himhim kuamah zahlakin a om kei ding uh.

TOUPA aw, na lampite hontheisak inla; na lamtate tanchin honhilhin.
Na thutak ah hopi inla, hon hilhin.
Nang hon hondampa Pathian na hi ngala: nitumin kon ngak nilouh hi.
TOUPA aw, na lainatna leh na chitnate theigige in; tuma a na om tawntung sa ahi ngala.
Ka valnou lai khelhnate leh ka tatleknate theigige kenla; TOUPA aw: na hoihna jiakin, na chitna bang jelin hontheigige in.
TOUPA jaw a hoih in a dik ahi: huai jiakin mi khialte lampi a musak ding hi.
Thunuailutte tuh vaihawmna dikah a pi dinga: thunuailutte tuh amah lampi tanchin leng a hilh ding hi.
A thukhun leh a thutheihsakte juite adingin TOUPA lampi tengteng tuh chitna leh thutak ahi.
TOUPA aw, na min jiakin ka thu limlouhna ngaidamin, thupi tak ahi ngala.
TOUPA laudan siam mi kua ahia?
Huai mi tuh a lampi tel ding a musak ding hi.
A hinna tuh nuamsatakin a om ding; a suanten gam tuh a luah ding uhi.
TOUPA thuguk amah laudansiamte kiangah a om, a thukhun tuh amaute a theisak ding hi.
Ka mitin TOUPA lam a en gige a: aman ka khete len akipanin a lakhe ding ahi ngala.
Kei lam hongnga inla, honhehpihin; chim leh haksatakin ka om ngala.
Ka lungtang buainate a hongthupita a; ka mangbatna akipan honpi khiain aw.
Ka haksatna leh ka thuakdan ngaihtuah inla, ka khelhna tengteng ngaidamin.
Hondoute ngaihtuah dih, tampi ahi ua: nakpi petmahin a honhua behlap uhi.
Ka hinna vom hoih inla, hon humbit in aw: zahlakin honomsak kenla, nang ah ka ginna ka koih ngala.
Ka lungsim hoihna leh ka diknain honhumbitin.
Ka honngak nilouh ngala.Pathian aw, Israelte a mangbatna tengteng ua kipan tankhia in.

TOUPA aw, vai hon hawmsakin, lungsim hoihtak puiin ka om ngala, ginglah louin leng ka muang hi.
TOUPA aw, hon enchianin honsin inla; ka lungsim leh ka lungtang hihsiangthou in.
Na chitna ka maah a om ngala, na thutak ah ka om jel sam hi.
Mi bangmahlou phette kiangah ka tu ngeikeia; lepchiahte kiangah leng ka lut sam kei ding hi.
Thil hoihlou hihte kikhawmte tuh ka mudaha, mi gilousaloute kiangah ka ut kei ding.
Ka khutte gensiat beinain ka sil dinga, huchibangin, TOUPA aw, na maitam ka vel ding hi:
Kipahthu genna ka hihging theiha, na thil lamdang hih tengteng thute ka hilh theihna dingin.
TOUPA, na omna in ka ita, na thupina omna leng.
Ka hinna mi khialte lakah lakhawm kenla, ka hinna leng sisan suahhatte lakah lakhawm sam ken.
A khut uah ngaihtuah gilou a oma, a khut taklam uh golhnain a dim hi.

TOUPA ka vakna leh honhondampa ahi; kua ka lau dia?
TOUPA ka hinna insang ahi: kua ka kihta dia?
Thil hoihlou hihte, hondoute leh ka melmaten, ka sa nek tuma honsual lai un, a kisui ua, a puk chiat uh.
Sepaih pawlten honsual tumin hon-giahkhum mahle uh ka lungtangin a kihta kei ding; ka tungah kidouna hongsuak mahleh, huchi piin leng ka gingta chinten ding hi.
TOUPA kiangah thil khat ka ngena, huai mahmah ka zong ding; TOUPA kilawmdan mu ding leh, a biakinn a thu dong dingin ka damsung tenga TOUPA inn a ka om gige theihna dingin.
Mangbat niin a bukta ah hon koihkhian ding ahi ngala, a humbitna puanin ah honsel dinga; suangpi tungah honkha kai ding hi.
Tunah hondoute, honumsuakte tunglamah ka lu dopkangin a om ding; huchiin, a puanin ah nuam na kithoihnate ka lan dinga; la kasa ding.
TOUPA aw, ka aw-a ka honsap leh ngaikhia inla; honhehpih inla, dawn leng hondawngin.
Ka mel zong un, chi-a na gen laiin, ka lungtangin na kiang ah, TOUPA.
Na mel ka zong ding, kachi a.
Ka lakah na mai sel kenla; na sikha heh in hih mang ken, nang jaw hon panpihpa na hi gige a; hon hondampa Pathian aw, hon paikhe kenla hon paisan het ken.
Ka nu leh ka pan honpai santa ngal ua, hihmahleh TOUPAN honpom lai ding.
TOUPA aw, na lampi hon ensak inla; ka melma te jiakin lampi phei mahmah ah honpiin.
Hondoute ut-uta hih dingin honpe mahmah ken; theipih diklouten hon sual ua, nunsiat thu sekhe nakten.
Mi hing gamah TOUPA hoihna muh kigingta keileng ka bahta ding hi.TOUPA ngak nilouhin; hat takin om inla, na lungtang kihih hangin; ahi, TOUPA ngak nilouh in.

TOUPA aw, honsam ding hi ing; ka suangpi, kei lamah na bil ngongsak ken: huchilou injaw; nang nondaih san leh, kokhuka lutsukte bang lelin ka hongom kha ding hi.
Kon sapa, ka khutte na biakna mun siangthou lama ka jaak leh, hehpih ka ngetna awte ngaikhiain.
Mi gilou-salou lakah leh thilhihkhialte lakah honkai mang khawm ken; huaiten a invengte u kiangah lemna thu a gen vak na ua, himahleh a lungtang uahte thilhihkhelhna a theh ngal ua.
A thilhih bang zel un leh, a thilhihte gitlouh bangdan jelin thuk inla a khut ua a nasep bang jelin thuk inla; a gitlouh man uh mu sakin.
TOUPA nasepte leh a khuta a thilhih tuh a limsak louh jiak un aman amau bawlhoih louin a hihse ding hi.
Hehpih ka ngetna awte a ngaihkhiak jiakin TOUPA phatin om hen.

TOUPA tuh a hatna uh ahi a, a thaunilh adingin hotdamna insang ahi.Na mite hondam inla, na gouluah ding tuh vualjawl-in: amaute vak inla, khantawnin pom in.

Mi thilhihtheitak tate aw, TOUPA kiangah pia unla, TOUPA kiangah thupina leh hatna pia un.
TOUPA kiangah a min thupina pia unla; siangthou kilawmna silhin TOUPA chibai buk un.
TOUPA aw tuh tui tungahte a ginga: thupina Pathian tuh a hongging doldola, TOUPA mah tuh tui tampi tungah a hongging hi.
TOUPA aw tuh thilhihtheitak ahi a; TOUPA aw tuh thupi tak ahi.
TOUPA awin sidar singte a hihtan dinga; ahi, TOUPAN Lebanon tanga sidar singte a hihtan lemlum jel hi.
Bawngnou bangin amaute a diang saka: Lebanon leh Sirion tangte tuh gam bawngtalnou bang main.
TOUPA awin meikuangte a phelh jel.
TOUPA awin gamdai sing a linga: TOUPA Kades gamdai a lingsak jel hi.

TOUPA ka Pathian aw, kon sama, nang na honhihdamta hi.
TOUPA aw, nang ka hinna Sheol akipan na pi khia a; kokhuka ka paisuk louhnadingin nang na honhum hing jel hi.
A mi siangthoute aw, TOUPA phatin lasa unla, a min siangthou phat un.
A hehna tuh mitphiatkal phet ahi ngala; a deihsakna ah hinna a om hi; kahna giak dingin nitaklam chiah a honglut theia, jingsangin bel nuamna a hongtung nak hi.
Ken jaw nuam ka sak laiin, Chikmah chiangin ka ling kei ding, ka chi a.
TOUPA nang na deihsakna jiakin ka mual tuh na ding kipsak ta a; himahleh na mai na sela, ka hong mangbangta hi.
TOUPA aw, nang kon sama; TOUPA kiang mahah hehpihna ka ngen hi:
Kokhuka ka paisuk leh, ka sisan ah punna bang ahia om ding!
Leivuiin honphat ding hia? na thutak a gen sin maw?
TOUPA aw, ngaikhia inla, hon hehpihin: TOUPA, nang honpanpihpa hiin.
Ka sunna kei dingin lamna na suak saka; ka saiip puan non suahsaka, kipahna nontengsak hi.Ka thupina dai nilouh lou-a, nangmah phata la a sakna dingin TOUPA ka Pathian aw, khantawnin kipahthu ka honhilh gige ding hi.
Ka thupina dai nilouh lou-a, nangmah phata la a sakna dingin TOUPA ka Pathian aw, khantawnin kipahthu ka honhilh gige ding hi.
Toupa aw, nangmah ah ka ginna ka koih jela; chickmah chiangin leng zahlakin hon omsak kenla: na diktatna jiakin honhumbit in.
Kei lamah na bil hondoh inla; honhumbit menin: kei dingin suangpi kiptak, hon hondamna dingin bitna in hong hi in.
Nang tuh ka suangpi leh ka kulhpi nahi ngala; huaijiakin na min jiakin hon piin hon kaiin.
Ka awkna dinga aguka len a phah lak uah honkai khiain; nang ka insang na hi ngala.
Na khut ah ka kha kon kemsak hi: Toupa aw, thutak Pathian, nang non tanta hi.
Thil bangpeuh ginalou peuh ngaihtuahte tuh ka hua a; ken bel Toupa ka kamuang ahi.
Na chitna jiakin ka nuamin ka kipak dinga; ka mangbatna na mu gige ngala; ka hinna a mangbat laiin leng na theigige hi.
Huan, hondoumi khut ah nang non khumta keia; ka khe mun awng thawl takah na nga zota hi.
Toupa aw, honhehpihin, mangbangin ka om ngala; ka mit lungkham na jiakin a se huaihuai ahi, ka hinna leh ka pumpi nangawn.
Ka damsung lungkhamna in a mangbangta ngeia, ka kumte thum na in a beita hi: ka thulimlouhna jiakin ka tha a jaw a, ka guhte leng a segawp hi.
Hondoute jiakin ka min a hong seta a, ahi ka vengte lakah nakpi in a seta hi, ka meltheihte a dingin leng kihtakhuaipi ka hita hi: kho laka hon muten lah hon taisan ta ngal ua.
Misi a mangngilh bangtak un mangngilh in ka om a: bel kitam bang lel ka hita hi.
Mi tampi hon hekna ka za ngala, ka kima kihtakhuai om tuh hon sawm khawm lai un, ka hinna hon laksak a tum uhi.
Himahleh, Toupa aw, ka hon muanga: ka Pathian nahi ka chi a.
Ka hunte na khut ah a oma, hondoute khut a kipan leh hon sim mohte lakah honhumbit in.
Na melin na sikha hon sunvak in; na chitna jiakin hon hondam in.
Toupa aw, zahlakin hon omsak ken; kon sam ngala: mi gilousalou zahlak in om uhen la, Sheol ah dai dinden in om uhen.
Muk juautheite pau theilou in om uhen; huaiten tuh kisathei leh musit kawmin pau taltakin mi diktat te a gense jel uhi.
Na hoihna, nangmah laudamsiamte a dingin na kholkhawm tuh thupi natel e aw!
Mihing tate mitmuha muanna koihte a dinga na hih sak pen tak.
Amau tuh mihing omna lakah na humbitna mitmuh in na selgu dinga: lei selhatna lakah bukta ah na koih gu ding hi.
Toupa phatin om hen: a chitdan lamdang tak tuh khopi kiptak ah a hon musak ngala.
Kei lah, ka hamhaih in, Na itmuh a kipan paih mangin ka omta, ka na chi maimah a; himahleh ka hon sapa hehpihna kon ngetna awte nana za ngala.
A mi siangthou tengtengte aw, Toupa it un: Toupan mi ginom a humbit a, kisatheitaka gamta tuh nakpi tkain a thuk jel hi.Toupa lamen tengtengte aw, hattakin om unla, na lungtang uh hangsak un.
Toupa lamen tengtengte aw, hattakin om unla, na lungtang uh hangsak un.
A tatlekna ngaihdam a om a, a khelhna khuh a om in, nuam a sa hi.
Mi, Toupan thulimlouhna neia a seh louha, a kha a zekhemna him him om lou in nuam a sa hi.
Ka khelhna ka gen khiak louh laiin, nitum a ka mau nilouhna in ka guhte a tatkhin vekta hi.
Sun leh jan in na khutin non delh ngala: ka tui nawnna leng, khal nisa in thil ahih lamdang bangin, a hong lamdang hialta hi.
Selah.
Ka khelhna na kiang ah ka kithan a, ka thulimlouhna ka imta kei hi, Ka tatlekna Toupa kiangah ka pulak dinga, ka chi a; huchiin ka khelh thulimlouhna tuh na ngaidamta hi.
Selah.
Huaijiakin, Pathian limsak mi chihin zon muh baihlama na om laiin na kiangah thum chiat uhen; tui liante a honglet hun chiangin amau tuh a pha zou kei ding hi.
Nang tuh ka bukna mun na hi a: nang mangbatna lakah non hum bit ding hi; humbitna late in non umsuak sak ding.
Selah.
Na paina ah ka hon hilh pil dia, ka honchil ding: ka mit a hon en gige kawmin ka hon suangtuahsak jel ding hi.
Ngaihtuahna neilou sakol hiam, sabengtung hiam bang in om kenla: tuate vante tuh let kipna dinga sikbah leh kaihkhawlna khau ahi a, huchilouin na kiang naiah a hoingpai kei ding uhi.
Mi gilou-salou a dingin lungkhamna tampi a om ding: Toupa muang bel chitna in a umsuak zo ding hi.Mi diktatte aw, Toupa ah nuam in kipak unla: lungtang diktak pu tengteng aw, nuamin kikou un.

Mi diktatte aw, Toupa ah nuamin lasa un: midik adingin Pathian phat a kilawm him ahi.
Kaihgingin Toupa kiangah kipahthu gen unla; pekging gui sawm neiin amah phat in lasa un.
Amah pahtawiin la thak sa unla; husa thupi toh siamtak in tum un.
Toupa thu a dika; a thilhih tengteng muanhuai taka hih ahi ngala.
Diktatna leh vaihawmna dik a it naknaka; leitung Toupa chitnain a dim hi.
Toupa thuin vante siam ahi a; huaia omte tengteng leng a kama hu a siam ahi uhi.
Aman tuipi tuite bangkhat koih khawm bangin a bawl khawma: tui thukpi te tuh koihkhawmna in ah te khawng a koih hoih jel hi.
Leitungluah tengteng in Toupa laudan siam henla; khovela om tengteng amah lauin om uhen.
Aman a gen a, a hong omta a; thu a pia a, a hong om kipta ngala.
Toupan namchih lunggelna tuh bangmahlou in a om saka: mi chih ngaihtuahna te tuh bangmah phattuamna neilou in a siam hi.
Toupa lunggelna bel khantawnin a om kip dinga, a lungtanga ngaihtuahte khang tengteng tanin a om kip ding hi.
Toupa Pathin nei nam tuh a hampha uhi; amah gouluah dia a tel mite mah.
Toupan van a kipan in en a; mihing tate tengteng a mu naknak.
Lei a om tengteng a omna mun a kipanin a hon en jel hi.
Amaute tengteng lungtang sekpan a thilhih tengteng uh a enkhia hi.

Ka hinna in Toupa a suang dinga: thunuailutten huai a za ding ua, a kipak ding uhi.
Aw, Toupa hon phatpih unla, a min pahtawi chiat ni.
Toupa ka zonga huan aman hon dawnga, ka kihtaklam peuhmah lakah a hon humbit ahi.
Amah a en ua, huan, a hong vakta uhi; a melte uh chikmah in a zum kei ding.
Hiai mi genthei a kikou a, huan Toupan a ja a, a mangbatna tengtengah a honkhe ta hi.
Amah laudansiamte tuh, a kim a vel uah Toupa angelin a om khuma, a humbit jel.
Aw, Toupa hoihdan chiam him dih ua: amaha muanna koih mi a hampha hi.
A mi siangthoute aw, Toupa laudansiam un: amah laudansiamte a ding in taksapna himhim a om louh jiak in.
Humpinelkai lunlaite tuh a tasam un a gilkial naknak uhi: Toupa zongte jaw thil hoih himhim a tasam kei ding uhi.
Kisa un, naupangte, ka thu ngaikhia un: Toupa laudan ka honhilh ding hi.
Hoihna a muh theihna ding un, hinna deiha damsawt ut mi kua ahia!
Na lei tuh gilou lakah veng hoih inla, na muk tuh khemna thu genlou dingin veng hoih in.
Gilou paisan inla, thilhoih hih in; lemna zong inla, a delhin delh in.
Toupa mit in mi diktatte lam a en gige a, a bilin a sap uh za ding in a ngaikhe gige hi.
Toupa melin thilhihkhialte a dou naknaka, amau theih gigena tuh lei akipana hihmangthang dingin.
Mi diktatte a kikou ua, huan Toupan a naja a, a mangbatna tengteng uah a honkheta hi.
Toupan lungtang khasiate a vanaih jeljel a, lungsima kisik peuhmahte a hondam jeljel hi.
Mi dik haksatnate a tama, himahleh Toupan huai tengtengah a honkhe gige ahi.
A guh tengteng a kem hoih a, khat lel leng hihtan ahi kei hi.

Phaw neu leh phaw lian lenin, honpanpih dingin ding in:
Tei leng phawi inla, hon delhte lam na dalin: ka hinna kiangah, Na hondampa ka hi, chi in.
Ka hinna hihmang tuma zongte zahlak saka hihzumin om uhen: hon hihsiatna dinga thubawlte, taijak sakin gending theilou hialin om uhen.

Toupa angelin delh kawm jela, a lampi uh mial tak leh nal tak hi hen.

Theihpih diktatlou hialte a hong ding ua; ka thiltheih hetlouh thu ahte thu a hon dong ua.
Ka hinna in thil tan khop in thil hoih thil sia in a hondin hi.
Ken bel, a damlouh lai un, ka puansilh tuh saiip ahi a: ka hinna anngawlin ka hih genthei ngala; ka thumna tuh keimah angsung ngeiah a hongkik nawn hi.
Ka lawm hiam, ka unau hiam leng hi heh aw a tung ua ka omdan ding bang in ahi ka om: mi a nu kah bangin sunin ka kun hi.

Ankuang luina a nuihja chiamnuihna gente bang phetin a ha uh hon gawi khum uhi.
Toupa, nang bangtan ahia na et ding?

A lungsim un, Nuam e!
Huchi bang a keimaw i deih, chi kei uhen.
Amah i valh khinta, chi sam kei uhen.

Aw, nangmah theite tungah na chitna kitheisak zel inla; lungtang diktak pute tungah leng na diktatna langsak jelin.

Toupa tungah leng kipak in; huchiin na lungtang deihlamte a honpe ding hi.
Na omdan ding Toupa tungah nga inla; amah muang in, aman ahih vek ding.
Na dikdan vak bang in a suaksak dinga, na siamtandan leng sunlai bang maiin.
Toupa ah khawl inla, amah ngak nilouhlouh in; a omdana vangphatna mute jiakin kihihlungkham nuam dah in, ngaihtuahna giloute pichinmi jiakin.
Heh tawpsan inla, thangpaih kisik in: ki hihlungkham nuam ken, thil hihkhelh ah a hong ke maimah nak hi.
