Mi gilou-salou in mi diktat a sawma, a ha a gawi khum nak hi.
Toupan amah a nuihsan ding.
A ni a hongtung dek chih a theih jiak in.
Genthei leh tagahte hihpuk ding leh omdan dikte hihlum ding in mi gilou-salouten namsau a phawi ua, a thalpeute uh a lai uhi.
A namsau un amau lungtang a sun dinga, a thalpeute uh hihtanin a om ding hi.
Mi diktat thil tawmchik neih tuh mi gilou-salou tampi thil neih keihkuihte sangin a hoihjaw ahi.
Mi gilou-salou bante hihtanin a om dek ngala: mi dik bel Toupan a len gige ding ahi.
Toupan mi hoihkimte nite tuh a theia; a gouluah ding uh khantawna om gige ding ahi.
Hun hoihlou ah a zahlak kei ding ua; kial kum inleng a vah ding uhi.
Mi gilou-saloute bel a mangthang ding ua, Toupa doute leng loupa hing didep bang ahi ding uh; hihmanthat in a om ding ua, meikhu in a jammang ding uhi.
Mi gilou-salou in a leitawia, a pe nawn kei naka; mi dik in bel mi a hehpih a, a pe zo nak hi.
A vualjawlna muten gam a luah ding ua, a hamsiatte tuh hihmanthat in a om ding uhi.
Mi kalsuante tuh Toupa hihkip ahi a; a lampi ah a kipak nak hi.
Puk mahleh, lupden sakin jaw a om tel kei ding hi; Toupan a khutin a len gige ngala.
Naupang ka na hita a, tuin tek ka hong hita a, himahleh mi diktat limsaklouha a omlam ka mu ngeikei hi, a suante anngolh leng ka mu ngei sam kei hi.
Mi a hehpih gige a, a leitawi sak jela; a suante leng a hampha nak uhi.
Gilou paisan inla, thil hoih hih in; huchiin khantawnin teng gige in.

Mi dikten gam a luah ding ua, a sungah khantawn in a om ding uh.
Mi dik kamin pilna thu a gen naknak, a leiin vaihawm diktatna thu a gen gige hi.
A Pathian dan tuh a lungtang ah a oma; a kalsuan himhim a tolh kei ding hi.
Mi gilou-salou in mi diktat a enkhia a, hihlup a tum gige hi.
Toupan amah a khut ah a nose kei dinga, a vaihawm hun chiangin siamlouh tansak a phal sam kei ding hi.
Toupa tuh ngak inla, lampi tuh tawn in, huchiin gam luah dingin a hon pahtawi ding hi: mi gilou-saloute hihmanthata a om utuh na mu ding hi.
Mi gilou-salou nakpi taka thu neia, a pouna muna singnou dawng thenthon banga, ka biambuam lai ka mu a.
Himahleh lampi ah mi a va pai ua, huan, ngai dih, amah a na omtakei maimaha; ahi, ka zonga, himahleh muh theih ahi ta kei hi.
Mi gensiatbei chiamteh inla, mi diktak tuh en in, huchibang mite tawpna ding jaw khamuanna hi ding ahi ngala.
Talek te bel a kituaka hihsiat in a om chiat ding ua, mi gilou-salou tawpna ding tuh hihmanthat a hita ding hi.

Toupa aw, hehin hontai kenla; thangpaiin honsawi sam ken.
Na thalte tuh ka sa ah a tala, na khut tuh ka tungah a tu bukbuk ngala.
Na lunghihlouhna jiakin ka sa ah damlai himhim a om kei hi; ka thulimlouhna jiakin ka guhte ah damlai himhim a om sam kei hi.
Ka thulimlouhnaten ka lu a tum manga, puakgik tak bang, ka puak zoh vuallouh ahi.
Ka haina jiakin ka chikehte a uihin a se khinta hi.
Ka chi a na a, ka kun ngiungiaua; nitumin lungkham in ka mau ka mau hi.
Ka kawng a lum huthut veka; ka sa ah leng damlai himhim a om kei hi.
Ka baha, ka sidup keihkuiha; ka lungtang noplouhna jikain ka thum hithit hi.
Toupa ka deihlam tengteng na theia; ka thumna leng na lakah sel ahi kei hi.
Ka lung a phu dupdupa, hatna ka neita kei; ka mit vakna nasanin hon omlouh santa hi.
Hon itte leh ka lawmte ka natna lakah a kihuikhe jel ua; ka sanggamte leng gamla pi ah a ding uhi.
Ka hinna hihmang tuma zongten honmatna ding un thang a kam ua; ka siatna ding zongten leng thu hoihlou takte a gen nak uhi; nitumin khemna thute a ngaihtuah uhi.
Himahleh kei tuh bengngong bangin za louin ka om a; pau theilou mi kamka ngeilou bangin ka om hi.
A hi, mi pau za theilou, a kama taihilhna mawngmawng pawt ngeilou bang in ka om hi.
Toupa aw, nangmah kon lamen ngala; Toupa ka Pathian aw, nang non dawng hi.
Huchilou in jaw hon otsan dia, ka khe a teu takin ka tungah a kihihlian kha ding uh, ka chi ahi.
Ka puk dekdek ngala, ka lungngaihna leng ka maah a om gige hi.
Ka thulimlouhna tuh ka pulak dinga; ka khelhna jiaka lungngaiin ka om ding ahi.
Himahleh hondoute a halh ua, a hat uhi: diklou pi a hon hote kilawmlou piin a pung ua.
Thilhoih thil gilou a thuk nakte tuh thilhoih ka delh jiak in hondoute ahi uhi.
Toupa aw, honpai san mahmah kenla; ka Pathian aw, hon gamlat mahmah ken.Toupa hondampa aw, hon panpih ding in, kin meng in.
Toupa hondampa aw, hon panpih ding in, kin meng in.
Ka leia thil ka hihkhelh louhna dingin ka omdante ka veng hoih dinga; mi gilou-saloute ka maa a om sung teng uh ka kam mukgak nain ka gak ding ka chi.
Huchiin dai didein pau louin ka om a, a hoihlam ah leng ka dai dide a; himahleh ka lungngaihna tuh tohthohin a om zosopa.
Ka sung ah ka lung a sa vutvut; ka ngaihtuah ka ngaihtuah in mei tuh a kuang khia a; huan, ka leiin thu ka genta hi.
Toupa, ka tawpna ding leh, ka damchiang ding, bangchi ahi, chih, hon theisak inla; ka hinna bek in dan hontheisak in.
Ngaiin, ka damsung tuh khutpek tan phetin na siama; ka kum tuh na mitmuhin bangmah tham ahi keia; mi chih a hoih lai pen un a vek un bangmahlou lel ahi uhi.
Selah.
Mi chih nuamsa bangin a vak ngei ua; a mawk buai ngei nak uhi.
Gou a khawl khawm ua, a luah ding lah a theikei uhi.
Huan, Toupa, tunah bang ka ngak dia?
Nangmah ah ahi ka lametna a om.
Ka tatlekna tengteng lakah honhonkhia inla: mihai gensiat in hon omsak ken.
Nangmah hih a hih jiak in ka pau keia, ka kam leng ka ka kei hi.
Na hasotna ka kiang akipan honlak suansak inla; na khut khaka hihman ka hi hi.
Mi a tatlekna jiaka thuhilha na sawiin, a deihlai pen leikha bangin na hihse naka; mi chih bangmahlou lel ahi uhi.
Selah.
Toupa aw, ka thumna ngaikhia inla, ka kikou na ah na bil doh inla; ka khitui kia daihsan ken: na mikhual ka hi a, ka pipute tengteng bangin zintammi ka hi ngala.Aw, hiai a kipan ka pawta, ka omlouh paisuak vengveng main, ka halh nawnna ding in honhawi in.

Toupa ka ngakngaka: huchiin aman a ngeingaiha, ka kikou tuh a zata hi.
Manthatna kokhuk a kipan, buannawi diadua a kipan a honkhai khetou a: huan, ka khe tuh suangpi tungah a nga a, ka kalsuante a hihkip hi.
La thak ka kam ah koiha, i Pathian phatna: mi tampi in huai tuh a mu ding ua, a lau ding ua, Toupa a muang ding uh.
Toupa a muana nei a, ki sathei te leh thujuau a kipana kihemkhiate tuh a hampha hi.
Toupa ka Pathian aw, nang thillamdang na hihte leh koumau lam non ngiahtuahnate a tam mahmaha, huaite na maa hihlat zoh vual ahi kei ding.
Kithoihna leh thillat tungah kipahna himhim na neikeia; ka bilte non honsakta a; halmanga thillat leh khelhna dinga thillat na phut kei hi.
Huaitakin, ken, Ngaiin, ka hongpai hi; laibu jial ah ka thu gelh ahi.
Ka Pathian aw, na deihlam hih ka kipahlam tak ahi; ahi, na dan thu ka lungtang ah a om gige hi, ka chi a.
Kikhopna thupitak ah diktatna thu hoih ka tangkoupiha; Toupa aw, ngaiin, ka kam ka it kei ding chih na thei hi.
Na diktatna ka lungtang sungah ka im keia; na ginomna leh na hotdamna thu ka tangkoupih zo ding; Na chitna leh na takna kikhopna thupi taka mite lakah ka selkei ding hi.
Toupa aw, na lainatnate ka lakah it kenla; na chitna leh na takna in honhumbit gige in.
Thil hoihlou sim zohlouh in hon umsuak ngala, ka thulimlouhnaten hon delhphaa, huchiin ka dak theita keia; huaite tuh ka samzang te sangin a tamjaw a, ka lungtang a tawlta hi.
Toupa aw, hehpihtak in honhumbit inla; Toupa aw, honpanpih ding in kin in.
Ka hinna hihmang tuma zongte zahlak leh zum takin om chiat uhen; ka siatna tunga kipakte kik nawn in hih zuminom uhen.
Awihang, awihang!
Honchite a zahlak jiak un mangbang takin om uhen.
Nang hon zongte tengteng nangmah ah nuamtak leh kipak takin om uhenla; na hotdamna itten, Toupa pahtawiin om hen, chi gige uhen.Kei jaw genthei leh jawngsan ka hi a, himahleh Toupan honngaihtuah jela; nang hon panpihpa leh hon humbitpa na hia; ka Pathian aw, sawt hal mahmah ken.

Toupan amah humbitin a hihhing dinga, leiah vualjawl in a om ding; amah douten ututa a bawl dingin pe ken.
Toupan a gimna lupna munah a hihhat dinga; nang a chi a nat lai in a lupna na bawlsak vek jel hi.
Toupa aw, honhehpih inla, ka hinna hihdam in, na tungah thil ka hihkhial ngal a, ka chi a.
Hondouten, chikchiang in a siin, a min a mang de aw!
Chiin, hon gensia uh.
Huan a lak ua kuahiamin a hongveh laiin, thu bangmahlou maimai a gen jela; a lungtang in thulimlouhna a lakhawm naka; a pawt khiak takin mi a hilh jel hi.
Honhote tengteng in hon gensiain a kihuau ua: honhihsiatna ding uh a ngaihtuah ua.
Natna hoihlou takin a man kipta, tu-a lum a thou nawn ta kei ding a chi ua.

Honchi nilouhlouh ua.

Pathian lamen in; a melma damna jiakin amah ka honphat ding ahi ngala, hon panpihpa leh ka Pathian.

Gam luah dinga amau namsaua a lak uh ahi kei a, amau bana kihumbit leng ahi kei uhi; a tung ua na kipah jiakin na khut taklam leh, na ban leh, na mel vakin ahi jaw.
Pathian aw, nang ka Kumpipa na hi: Jakob humbitna dingin thu pia in.
Nangmah jiakin ka melmate uh ka si pai ding ua; na min jiakin honsualte ka chil ekek ding uhi.
Ka thalpeu ka muang kei dinga, ka namsauin honhondam sam kei ding.

Tun jaw nang non khah khia a, non hihzum a; ka sepaih honte u lakah lah na pawtkhe ngeikei hi.
Melmate lakah non taijak saka: honhoten sum a deihdeih uh a lauhi.
Nang nek ding a seh belam bang in non pia a; namchih lakah non hihdalh behlap hi.
Na mite bangmahlou in na khawngta a, a man uh lah a tam het kei hi.
Nang ka kim ua mite gensiatin non omsaka, ka kiangnai ua mite muhsit leh nuihsan in non omsak.
Nang namchih lakah a selam gentehna in non omsaka, michih laka mite lu sinsanin non omsak hi.
Ka zumna nitum in ka maah a om gige a, ka zahlaknain hon tuam zouta hi.

Lungtang thugukte a thei gige ngala.

Mihing tate sang in na mel a hoihjawa; hehpihna na muk a sun ahi; huaijiakin Pathian in khantawn adingin vual a honjawl ahi.
Aw, mihat, na namsau na kawngah vom in, na thupina leh na kilawmna toh.

Na thal a zuma; michih na nuaiah a puk jel uh: kumpipa melmate lungtang ah a tal hi.
Pathian aw, na laltutphah tuh khantawn in a om ding ahi: khentuam neihlouhna lalchiang tuh na gam lalchiang ahi.
Diktatna na deiha, gilou-salou na hua hi, huaijiakin, Pathian, na Pathian in, na lawmte sangin nakpi in nuamna thau a honnilhta hi.
Na puansilh tengteng tuh murra gimte, aloe gimte, sing gimte a nam vungvung a; saiha a bawl kumpipa ina kaihging chi tuamtuam ging hongpawtten a honhihnuam ahi.
Na numei hoihte lakah kumpipate tanute a pang sam ua; na taklam ah Ophir dangkaenga kijemin kumpinu a ding hi.
Ka tanu aw, ngaikhia inla, ngaihtuah inla, bildoh in; na mite leh na pa ina mite mangngilh in.
Huchiin kumpipan na melhoin a deih ding hi, amah tuh i Toupa ahi ngala; huan amah chibai buk jelin.
Tura tanu tuh thilpiak tawi in huaiah a om ding a; mi laka hausate ngeiin na hehpihna a ngen ding uhi.
Kumpipa insung a kumpipa tanu tuh a thupi zou hilhiala: a puansilh tuh dangkaenga zep kilawm ahi.

Mi khempeuhte aw, hiai ngaikhia unla; khovela om tengtengte aw, bil na doh un.
Mi neu leh mi lian, mi hau leh mi jawng in leng.
Ka kamin pilna thu a gen dinga; ka lungtang ngaihtuah tuh theihsiamna thu ahi ding hi.
Genteh thu ah ka bil ka doh dinga: ka thugil gen tuh kaihging in ka gentel ding hi.
Ni hoihloute ah, ka khetul bula thulimlouhna in honum suak inleng, bangdingin ka lau dia!

A dam gige a, muatna a muhlouhna ding in.

Ka mite aw, ngaikhia unla, thu ka gen ding hi; Israel aw, ngaikhia in, ka honhilhchian sak ding hi: kei Pathian, na Pathian ngeingei ka hi.
Na kithoihnate jiakin ka hontai kei ding; na halmang thillatte ka maah a om gige ngala.
Na in a kipan bawngtal himhim ka lakhe kei dinga, na ganhuang akipan keltalte leng ka la khe sam kei ding hi.
Gam nuaia sa chiteng kei a ahi ngala, tang sang khat tung a gan omte leng.
Tanga vasa tengteng ka thei veka: gamsate leng keia ahi.
Gilkial mahleng kon hilh kei ding: leilung leh a sunga thil om tengteng keia ahi ngala.
Bawngtal sa ka nein kel sisan ka dawn dia hiam!

Thuhilhna na hua a, ka thute na nunglamah na pai jel ngala.

Na kam tuh gilou kiangah na pia a.
Na leiin khemna a bawl gige hi.

Nou Pathian mangngilhte aw, hiai ngaihtuah dih ua!

Tunah a thil- khuak kilawm tengteng uh heita leh sekin a hihse chiat uhi.
Na mun siangthou a hal ua; na min omna leia tum khop hialin a hihbuahta uhi.
A lungsim un, A vekin i hihse ding, a chi ua: hiai gama Pathian kikhopna in tengteng a halse khinta uhi.

Pathian aw, melmain bangtan ahia hon gensiat ding?

Bangdingin ahia, na khut, na khut taklam na lak tak?

Himahleh, Pathian tuh nidanglai tana ka Kumpipa ahi, lei lai taka hotdamna siampa pen.

Sun nanga ahi a, jan leng nanga ahi.

Toupa aw, hiai theigige in, melmain a hon gensiata; nam haipiin na min a gensiat.

Amau tuh na huihpiin delh inla, na huih thupi takin hihlau in.

Ka phaw uh TOUPA a ahi ngala: ka kumpipa uh Israelte Mi Siangthou ahi.

Ka sikha David tuh ka mukheta a; ka thau siangthouin amah ka nilhtaa:
Ka khut a kiangah hihkipin a om dinga; ka banin amah a hihhat dinga; ka banin amah a hihat ding hi.

Amah galte a maah ka sat puk dinga, amah hote ka bawl ek ding.

A khut tuh tuipi-ah ka nga sak dinga, a khut taklam tuh luipite ah.
Aman, Nang ka Pa, ka Pathian, ka kihotdamna suangpi na hi, chiin, honsam ding.
Huan, ken amah tuh ta masain ka siam dinga, leia kumpipate lakah tungnungpenin ka bawl ding hi.
Ka chitna tuh khantawnin amah adingin ka kep hoih sak dinga, ka thukhun tuh a kiangah a om kip ding hi.
A chi suante tuh khantawnin ka omsak dinga, a laltutphah van om lai siahin ka omsak ding hi.
A taten ka dan a lehngatsan ua, ka vaihawmnate banga a om louh ua.
Ka thuseh a tatlekna a neih ua, ka thupiakte a kep hoih kei uleh.
A tatleknate uh chiangin ka hongkan dinga, a thulimlouhnate uh jepin ka hongkan ding hi.
Himahleh, ka chitna tuin a kiang akipan ka laksak vek kei dinga, ka ginomna tuh juau a suak din leng ka phal sam kei ding.
Ka thukhun ka suse kei dinga, ka muka thupawt leng ka hihlamdang sam kei ding hi.

A chi suante tuh khantawnin a om ding ua, a laltutphah ka maah ni bangin a om ding hi.

Na sikha thukhun tuh na kiha: a lallukhu leia pai khe hialin na hihniamta hi.

Na hehna a hihmanin ka om ua, na thangpaihna a hihmangbata leng ka om jiak un.
Ka thulimlouhnate uh na maah na koiha, ka khelhna gukte uh na mel vakah na koihta hi.
Ka damsung ni tengteng uh na hehna ah a mang jela: ka dam sung kumte uh tangthu bangin ka tawpsak uhi.
Ka damsung kumte uh kum sawmsagih a hi-a, hatna jiakin kum sawmgiat leng ahi thei hi; himahleh a sawtna tuh sepgimna leh lungngaihna lel a hi-a; a mang paha, kou leng ka leng mang jel uhi.
Kuan ahia na hehna thilhihtheihdan theia, nangmah kihtak dingdan banga na hehna theilou?

Aman tuh thangkammi thang lakah leh hi hoihlou tak lakah nang a honhondam ding ahi.
A khain a honkhuh dinga, a kha nuaiah na muang ding hi; a thutak tuh pho neu leh pho lian ahi.
Jana thil mulkimhuai na lau kei dinga. suna thal hongleng zong na lau kei ding hi:
Mialnuaia hi leng jel tuh na lau kei dinga, sun laia thil hihsia siatna tuh na lau sam kei ding hi.

Ka khe a teua, ka chihin, aw TOUPA, na chitnain a hon kai hi.
Ka lungsima ngaihtuah tampi ka neih laiin, na khamuannaten ka hinna a hihnuam jel hi.
Gitlouh-satlouhna laltutphah, dana thilhihkhelhna omsakin, nang honkithuahpihna a nei dia hia?
Mi diktat hinna sual tumin a pungkhawm duamduam ua, sisan gensiatbei tuh siamlouh a tangsak nak uhi.
Himahleh TOUPA tuh ka insang ahi a: ka Pahtian jaw ka kihumbitna suangpi ahi.Aman tuh amau khelhna ngei a tunguah a kesaka, amau hoihlouhna mahah a hihmangthang dinga; TOUPA I Pathianin a hihmang ding hi.

TOUPA Pathian a thupi mahmah jiakin, Pathian tengteng tungah Kumpipa thupitak ahi.
Amah khut ah lei mun thuktakte tuh a oma: mualdawn sang takte leng amaha mah ahi.

Aw hongpai unla, biain kun ni e: TOUPA honsiampa maah i khukdin ding uh.

Tuniin a aw na zak uleh,
Meribaa a hih bang un na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un, gamdaia Massah ni bangin:
Huailaiin na pipute un honkhem ua, honzeet ua, ka thilhih tuh a mu uhi.

Huan, nam chih gamte a kiang uah a piaksaka: amau tuh mi chih sepkhiaksa a luahta uhi.A thusehte a zuih theihna ding un, a dante tuh a vom hoihna dingin, TOUPA phat un.

TOUPA tuh phat un, Aw, TOUPA kiangah kipahthu hilh un; amah lah a hoih ngala: a chitna leng khantawna om ding ahi ngala.
Kua ahia TOUPA thilhih thupitakte gen theia a phatna tengteng theisak vek thei?
Vaihawmna kem hoihten nuam a sa uhi, chiklai peuha leng diktat taka hihmi toh.
TOUPA aw, na mite na deihsaknain hontheigige inla, aw, na hotdamna toh hongvehin;
Na mi telte hamphatna ka muhtheiha, na namte kipahna ah ka nopsak theiha, na gouluahte toh ka suan theihna dingin.
Ka pipute utoh thil ka na hihkhial ua, thilgilou ka hih ua, gilou takinka hihta uhi.
Ka pipute un Aigupta gama na thillamdang hihte a theisiam kei ua; na chitna thupitak a theigige ta kei ua; tuipi ah a hel zota ua, Tuipi San ah.
Huchi pipiin leng a mah minjiakin amau a hondamtaa, a thilhihtheihna thupitak a theihsakna dingin.
Tuipi San a taia, huchiin a kangta a; huan amau gamdaia pi paisuak bangin tui thukte ah a pi paisuakta hi.
Amau homi khut akipan a hondama, melma khut akipan a tanta hi.
Tuiten amau doute a khuh khina, khat leng dama pawt a om ta kei uhi.
Huai laiin a thute a gingta ua; a phatna la a sa uhi.
Himahleh a thilhihte tuh a mangngilh zok ua; a lunggelna tuh a ngak ngamta kei uhi;
Gamdai ah thil a lungulh mahmah ua, gam keu ah Pathian a zeetta uhi.
A thil nget uh a pia a; himahleh a hinna uah gawnna a lutsakta hi.
A giah mun uah Mosi a hazata ua, TOUPA mi siangthou Aron toh.

A pawl lak uah mei hihkuanin a hongoma, meikuang ah mi gilousaloute a kangmangta uhi.
Horeb tang ah bawngnou lim a siam ua, a lim sun tuh a beta uhi.
Huchibangin a thupina uh bawngtal loupa ne bangphet a suaksakta uhi.
Pathian a hondampa uh a mangngilhta ua, Aigupta gama thil thupi taktak.
Ham gama thillamdangte, Tuipi San dung athil mulkimhuaite hihte.
Huaijiakin, a hihmang kha dinga, chi-a, a hehna hihkik dingin a mi tel Mosi tuh a lutna dingah a maah na ding kei ngial le houh, a hihmang ding chih a gen hi.
A hi, gam deihhuai tak a ngaineu ua, a thu tuh a gingta nuam kei ua;
A puanin uahte khawng a phun zota ua, TOUPA aw tuh a ngaikhe nuam kei uhi.
Huaijiakin amau lamah a khut ajaka, amaute tuh gamdaia a hihpukna ding leh,
A chi suan dingte uh nam chih laka a hihpuka, gam china a hihjakna dingin.
Boal-peor lamah a velh ua, misi kianga thil latte tuh a ne samta uhi.
Huchibangin a thilhihte un amah a hihheh ua; huchiin a tunguah hi honlengta hi.
Huai laiin Phinehas a dinga, vai a hawma: huchiin hi tuh daihsakin a omta hi.
Huai tuh amah tunga diktatnaa seh ahi, khantawnin suan tengteng tanin.
Meribah tuite ah tekhawng leng amah a hihheh ua, huchiin amau jiakin Mosi tungah thilhoihlou a tung hialta hi.
A kha tungah a hel ua, a mukin kilawmlou pi thu a gen jiakin;
TOUPAN a kiang ua hihman thu a piak bangin mipite a hihmang kei ua.
Nam chih tuh a kihelpih ua, a thilhihte uh tuh a ching jaw ua;
A milim nate khawng uh a sem ua; huaite tuh amau adingin thang a honghita:
A hi, dawi kiangah tekhawng a tapate a tanute un a kithoih ua.
Sisan gensiatbei, a tapate uleh a tanute u sisan ngei a suahta ua, huaitein Kanaan gam milimte kiangah a kithoih uhi; huai gam tuh sisanin a na ninta hi.
Huchibangin a nasepte ua hihbuahin a om ua, a thilhihte un ang a kawmta uhi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA a mit tungah a thangpaitaa, a gouluah tuh a kih hi.
Huchiin amau tuh nam chihkhut ah a paia; amau hoten a tunguah vai a hawmta uhi.
Amau douten a nuaisiah ua, a khut nuai uah hihneuin a omta uhi.

Huchi pipiin leng aman, a kikou husa uh a jain, a mangbat uh a limsak ahi.
A thukhun tuh amau a theisak gigea a chitna thupidan bang jelin alungsim a kisikta hi.

Na deih takte humbita a omtheihna ding un, na khut taklaminhondam inla, hondawngin.
Pathianin a sianthouna ah hichibangin agena, Nuam ka sa dinga: Sekemkhua tuh ka hawm dinga, Sukkoth guam tuh ka hawmjak ding.
Gilead gam tuh keia ahi a; Manasi gam leng ka lu humbitna ahi a: Juda gam tuh ka lalchiang ahi.
Moab gam tuh ka kisilna bel ahia; Edom gamah ka khedap ka pai dinga; Philistia gam tuh ka kikou khum ding hi.
Khopi kulhnei ah kuan a honpi lut dia?

Pathian aw, nang honkhah khia hilou na hi maw?

Ka phat Pathian aw, dai nilouh ken:
Migilou-salou kam leh kam khemhat tuh ka tungah a hang ngal ua: amau tuh lei juautheiin ka kiangah thu a gen uhi.
Huatna thuin honum suak ua, bangmahlouin a hondou uhi.
Ka it jiakin a hondoute a honghita uhi: himahleh kei jaw thum thum dingin ka kipe chinten hi.
Aman thil hoih tuh thil gilouin honthuk ua, ka itna tuh huatna mahin a honthuk uhi.
Nang a tungah mi gilou koih inla: a tak lamah hekmi ding hen.
Vaihawmsaka a om chiangin siamlouh tangin pawt henla: a thumna tuh khelhna ah suak hen.
A damsung nite tuh tom henla; a heutu hihna midangin tang hen.
A tate tuh pa louin om uhenla, a ji mahleng meithaiin om hen.
A tate tuh mi vakvai honghiin, khutdoh uhenla; a nekding uh a mun gamsiate ah zong uhen.
A pung delha dangka leitawisakin a neih tengteng laksak vek henla; mikhualten a sepgim gah lok uhen.
A tunga chitna langsak jel ding kuamah om sam kei uhenla; a ta paneiloute hehpihpa ding kuamah om kei hen.
A suante hihmanin om uhen la; khangthak hongom nawnah a min uh nul mangin om hen.
A pipute uh gitlouh-satlouhna TOUPA kiangah theigigein om henla: a nu khelhna tuh nul mangin om kei hen.
Huaite tuh TOUPA maah om gige heh.
Aman a mau theihgigena lei akipan a hihmang theihna dingin.
Chitna latsak nadan a theihlouh ua, mi genthei tagah leh khasiate hihlup tuma a sawi zosop jiak un:
A hi, mi hamsiat tuh a utlam ahi a, huchiin amah tungah a hongtunga: mi vualjawl tuh a kipahlam ahi keia, huchiin amah gamlat piin a om hi.

Amau gensiat ka nahita a; honmuh tak un a lu uh a sing jel uhi.

Aman a thillamdanghihte a theigige saka: TOUPA tuh mi hehpihtheitak, chitna a dim ahi.

A in ah sum leh hauhsakna a oma: a diktatna tuh khantawna om ding ahi.
Mi dik adingin mialah vakna a hongpawt khiaa: amah mi hehpihtheipi, chitnaa dim diktat ahi.
Mi hehpiha leitawisak jel mi tuh hoihin a vuk naka; amah tuh kizen takin a khosa ding hi.
Bangchikmah chianga ling lou ding ahi ngala: mi diktat tuh khawntawna theihgigein a om ding hi.

Toupa phat un.
Israelte Aigupta gam akipan a pawt ua, Jakob inkuanpihte ngei melmak mi lak akipan a pawt lai un.
Judate tuh a mun siangthou a honghita ua, Israelte tuh a vaihawmna gam mah a honghita uhi.
Tuipiin huai tuh a mu a, a taimanga; Jordan lui tuh kiksakin a omta hi.
Tang liante tuh belamtalte bangin a diang ua, mual neute tuh belampa noute bangin.
Aw nang tuipi, bang na chi a ahia, na taimang tak?
Nang Jordan, bang a hi- a ahia, na kik nawntak?
Nou tang liante aw, bang na chi ua ahia, belampa noute banga na dian tak uh?

TOUPA aw, kou honpelou in, koumau honpe louin, na min thupina pe jawin, na chitna leh na thutak jiakin.
Bangachi-a nam chihin, a Pathian uh koia om ahia?
Chi uh ahia?
Ka Pathian u lah van ah a om ngala: a utut a hih ahi.
A milimte uh dangka leh dangkaeng ahi ua, mihing khutsuak ahi uhi.
Kam bang a nei ua, lah a pau kei ua; mit bang a nei ua, lah a mu theikei ua:
Bil bang a nei ua, lah a za theikei ua: nak bang a nei ua, lah gim aza theikei ua;
Khut bang a nei ua, bangmah lah a khoih theikei ua; khe bang a nei ua, lah a pai theikei ua; a dang un lah a pau thei sam kei uhi.
Huai bawlte tuh huaite bangin a om ding ua; ahi, huai muang peuhmah te.

TOUPAN nou honhihpung deuhdeuh hen, nou leh na tate uh toh.

Vante TOUPA vante ahi a; leilung bel mihing tate kiangah a pia ahi.
Misiten TOUPA tuh a phat kei ua, mun dai taka pai sukte himhimin lah a phat sam kei uh;Kou bel TOUPA tuh ka phat ta ding uh, tu akipana, khantawnin, TOUPA tuh phat un.

TOUPA ka it ahi, ka aw leh ka ngetnate a ngaihkhiak jiakin.
Kei lama a bil a hondoh jiakin ka damsung tengin amah ka sam ding hi.
Sihna khauhualten honviala, Sheol natnaten honmana: mangbatna leh lungkhamna ka na tuak hi.
Huaitakin TOUPA min tuh ka lou a: Aw TOUPA, hehpihtakin ka hinna humbitin, chiin.
TOUPA tuh mi hehpihtheitak leh diktattak ahi a; ahi, i Pathian uh mi lainatthei tak ahi.
TOUPAN mi mawlte tuh a humbit naka: hihniamin ka oma, aman honhondamta hi.
Ka hinna aw, na khawlna ah kik nawnta in; TOUPAN lah na tungah hoih takin a hihta ngala.
Ka hinna sihna lakah, ka mitte khitui lakah, ka khete pukna lakah na humbit ngala.
Mihing gamah TOUPA maah ka vak ding hi.
Ka gingta a, thu ka gen ding ahi: nakpi taka hihgimin ka om hi.
Ka lungvaiin, Mi tengteng juau ahi uh, ka na chita mawka.
Ka tunga a thilhih hoih tengteng jiakin TOUPA kiangah bang ahia ka piak thuk sam ding?
Hotdamna nou ka la dinga, TOUPA min kalou ding hi.
Ka thuchiamte tuh TOUPA lakah ka tangtun ding, ahi, a mite tengteng maah.
A mi siangthoute sihna tuh TOUPA theihin manpha pi ahi.
TOUPA aw, na sikha ka hi mahmah hi: na sikha, na sikhanu tapa, ka hi; non henna tuh na sutta hi.
Kipahthugenna kithoihnate tuh ka honlan dinga, TOUPA min tuh ka lou ding hi.

Aw, nam chihte aw, TOUPA phat unla; mi chihte aw, amah phat un.A chitna tuh i tunguah a thupiin; TOUPA thutak tuh khantawna om ding a hih jiakin.
TOUPA tuh phat un.

TOUPA tuh phat un.
Aw, TOUPA kiangah kipahthu gen un; amah lah a hoih ngala: a chitna leng khantawna om ding a hih jiakin.
A chitna tuh khantawnin a om ding chih, Israelten gen uhen.
A chitna tuh khantawnin a om ding chih, Aron inkuanpihten gen uhen.
A chitna tuh khantawnin a om ding chih, TOUPA kihtaten gen uhen.
Ka mangbatna akipanin TOUPA tuh ka sama: TOUPAN hondawnga, mun awngthawl ah honomsakta hi.
TOUPA tuh kei lama pang ahi a: ka lau kei ding: mihing in bang a honchih thei dia:
TOUPA tuh kei lama pang honpanpihte laka ahi: huaijiakin hondoute tungah ka thudeihtel tuh ka mu ding hi.
Mihing muan sangin TOUPA a muanna koih tuh a hoihjaw hi.
Mi liante gintak sangin TOUPA a ginna koih tuh a hoihjaw ahi.
Nam chihin honum suak ua; amau TOUPA minin ka hihmang ding.
Amau tuh honum suak ua; ahi, honum suak ua; amau tuh TOUPA minin ka hihmang ding hi.
Khuaite bangin honum suak ua; ling meiluang bangin mih sakin a omuh: amau tuh TOUPA minin ka hihmang ding hi.
Ka pukna dingin honsut ek na tum jualjuala: himahleh TOUPAN a honna panpih geih hi.
TOUPA tuh ka hatna leh ka la ahi: ka hotdamna leng a honghita hi.
Kipahna leh hotdamna husa tuh midiktatte puanin ah a om nak hi: TOUPA khut taklamin hang takin a hih nak hi.
TOUPA khut taklam tuh pahtawiin a om naknaka; TOUPA khut taklamin hang takin a hih naknak hi.
Ka si kei ding, ka dam ding hi, TOUPA thilhihte tuh ka theisak zo ding.
TOUPAN nakpi takin honthuzoha: sihna kiangah jaw honpe tel kei hi.
Diktatna kulh kongkhakte honhonsak un: huaite ah ka lut dinga.
TOUPA kiangah kipahthu ka hilh ding hi.
Hiai tuh TOUPA kongkhak ahi; mi diktatte tuh a lut ding uh.
Na kiangah kipahthu ka gen ding, nang hon dawngin, honhondampa na hita ngala.
Inlamte suang deihlouhpen a ning a suang phatuampen ana hita hi.
Huai tuh TOUPA hih a hi-a; I mitmuh uah a lamdang ahi.
Hiai TOUPA in seh tuh ahi, hiaiah i nuam un i kipak ding uh.
TOUPA aw, hehpih takin hondam inla.
TOUPA aw, hehpih takin vangphatna honsawlin.

TOUPA tuh Pathian ahi, aman vak a honpia a: kithoihna ding tuh khauhualin khih uhen, maitam ki khawngah mahmah.

A hi, amau diktatlouhna himhim a hih kei ua: a lampite ah a pai jel uhi.
Nang na thuzohna thute tuh thupiakin non pia a, phatuamngaihtaka ka zuih theihna ding un.

Huai hun chiangin ka zahlak kei dinga, na thupiakte tengteng khawk ka sak hun chiangin.
Lungtang diktak puin kipahthu ka honhilh ding hi.
Na vaihawmna dikte tuh kazil hun chiangin.
Na thuseh tuh ka jui dinga: aw, honpaisan den ken.

Na thu bang jela a omdan venghoihin.
Ka lungtang tengtengin kon zonga; aw, na thupiakte ka paisan jaw phal mahmah ken.
Na tunga thil ka hihkhelh louhna dingin na thu tuh ka lungtangah ka kem khawm hi.
TOUPA aw, nang nuam nasa hi; na thusehte honzil sakin.
Na kama na vaihawm pawt tengteng ka mukin ka theisakta hi.
Na thutheihsak lamah nuam ka saa, hauhsakna tengtenga nuam ka sak bang hialin.
Na thuzohna thute ka ngaihtuah ding a, na lampite ka limsak behlap ding hi.
Na thuseh tungte khawngah ka kipak dinga: na thu tuh ka mangngilh kei ding hi.
Ka hin theihna dinginna sikha tungah hoih takinhihin; huchiin na thu ka jui ding hi.
Na dan thu akipan thillamdang ka muh theihna dingin, ka mitte honhihvaksakin.

Ka hinna tuh kitam gawpin aoma, chiklai peuha na vaihawmnate a ngaih jiakin.
Mi kisathei, hamsiat thuakte tuh na taihilha, na thupiakte vakmangsan nakte mahmah.
Gensiatna leh muhsitna ka kiang akipan la mangin; na thutheihsakte lah ka jui ngala.
Mi liante leng a tu ua, honkalh ua; himahleh na sikhain na thusehte a ngaihtuah jaw ahi.
Na thutheihsakte ka kipahna ahi a, thupha honhilh te ahi uh.
Ka hinna tuh leivuiah a belh bikbeka; na thu bang jelin honhihhalhin.
Ka omdante ka hontheisaka, nang non dawnga: na thusehte tuh honzil sakin.
Na thuzohna lam tuh hontheisiam sakin: huchiin na thillamdang hih thute ka ngaihtuah ding hi.
Ka hinna lungkham jiakin a tuimang naka: na thu bang jelin honhihhatin.

Na thupiak lamah ka tai dinga, ka lungtang na hihlet hun chiangin.
TOUPA aw, na thuseh lampi tuh honensakin; huchiin a tawpphain ka tawn ding hi.

Na thupiak lampi-ah honpai sakin, huaiah ka kipak ngala.
Na thutheihsak lamah ka lungtang kihei sakin, huaihamna lamah hi louin.
Thil bangmahlou phet enlou dingin ka mit kaihei inla, na lampite ah honhihhalhin.
Na thu tuh na sikha kiangah hihkipin, huai tuh nangmah launa ahi.
Keia dia gensiatna ka kihtak tuh la mangin; na vaihawmte lah a hoih ngala.
Ngaiin, na thuzohna thute tuh theih ka ut gigea: na diktatna jiakin honhihhalhin.
TOUPA aw, na chitnate tuh ka kiangah hongpai hen, na hotdamna ngei, na thu bang jelin.
Huchiin, hon gensete dawnna ding ka nei dinga, na thu lah ka muang ngala.
Huan, thutak thu tuh ka kam akipan lakhe vek kenla; na vaihawmnate lah ka lamen gige ngala.
Huchiin na dan ka jui gige dinga, khantawn khantawnin.

Na thutheihsak thute kumpipate maah ka gen dinga, ka zum kei ding hi.

Na thupiak, ka it lamte ah, ka khutte ka jak dinga; na thusehte tuh ka ngaihtuah ding hi.
Na sikha kianga thuchiam tuh theigigein.

TOUPA aw, na thu bangin na sikha tuh na hihhoih jel hi.

TOUPA aw, na vaihawmte a dik chih leh, nang ginom takin ahi, non hihgim chih ka thei hi.

Ngaiin Israelte chingpa a lusuin a ihmu sam kei ding hi.
Toupa nangmah chingpa ahi: Toupa na taklama nang honliahpa ahi.
Sunin niin a honhai kei dia, janin khain leng a honsun sam kei ding hi.
Toupan gilou chiteng lakah a hon ching dia; na hinna a ching ding hi.Toupan na pawt leh na lut a ching dinga, tua kipana, khantawnin.

Toupa in ah hoh ni, ka kianga a chih lai un ka kipaka.
Jerusalem aw, na kulh kongkhak sungah ka khete uh a dinga hi.
Jerusalem, khopi banga lam kiptaka gawmkhawm:
Toupa min phat dingin huaiah namte a paitou jel ua, Toupa namte tuh, Israelte kianga thutheihsakna dingin.
Huaiah lah vaihawmna dingin laltutphahte tun ahi ngala, David inkuanpihte laltutphahte.
Jerusalem khamuanna dingin ngetsak un: nang hondeihte a navak uhi.
Na kulh sungte ah khamuanna om henla, na inpi ahte khawng navakna om hen.

Tua kipana, khantawnin.

Toupan Zion salte a pi kik nawn laiin, mang neita bang hial I hi ua.

Toupan thil thupitak honhihsaka; I kipak mahmah ahi.
Toupa aw, sala ka tang uh honpi kik nawn in, simlam luite bangin.

Himahleh na kiangah ngaihdamna a om ahi, kihtaka na om theihna dingin.

Toupa, David a haksat thuakna tengteng theihpih in;
Toupa kianga kichiam, Jakob mi hatpa kianga thu achiamdan;
Ka omna in ah ka lut het kei dia, ka lupna ah ka kah sam kei ding hi;
Ka miten a sin ka phal kei dinga ka mit vunte leng a sit uh ka phal sam kei ding;

Ngaiin, a thu tuh Sphratathan-ah ka ja ua; sing gamah ka muta uhi.
Amah omnate ah ka lut ding ua; a khe ngakna bulah chibai ka buk ding uhi.
Toupa aw, thou inla, na khawl mun dingah lutin; nang toh na hatna bawm toh.
Na siampute tuh diktatnain kivan uhenla; na mi siangthoute nuamsain kikou uhen.
Na sikha David jiakin na thaunilh mel tuh kiheisak nawn ken.

Toupan Zion lah a tel ngala; a omna dingin a deih hi.
Hiai khantawn adinga ka khawlmun ding ahi: hiaiah ka om nilouh ding; ka deihlam ahi ngala.
A nek ding tampiin vual ka jawl dia; a mi gentheite uh tanghouin ka taisak ding hi.

Toupan Jakobte amah adingin a tel ngla, Israelte a goutuam dingin a tel hi.
Toupa tuh thupi tak ahi chih leh, i Toupa tuh Pathian tengteng sangin a tungnung ahi chih, I thei ngala.
Toupan a ut peuhmah a hih jela, van khawngah, lei khawngah, tuipi khawngah, tuithukpi tengteng khawngah leng.
Aman meipite tuh kawlmong akipanin a paitou saka; khophiate vuahin a siam hi; a sunin akipante bangin huih a la khe jel hi.
Aman Aigupta gam ta masate a hihluma, mihing leh sate leng.

Aman nam tampi a hihluma, kumpipa thupi taktakte a thata.

A gam uh gouluah dingin a pia a, a mi Israelte goutan dingin.

Nam chih milimte tuh dangka leh dangkaeng ahi ua, mihing khutsuak ahi uhi.

A gam goutan dia pia: a chitna lah khantawnin a om sin ngala.
A sikha Israel goutan pepa kiangah: a chitna lah khantawnin a om sin ngala.
Aman I nam niam laiin hon theigigea: a chitna lah khantawnin a om sin ngala:

Babulon lui gei khawngah huailaiah i tu-a, ahi, i kap jela, Zion i ngaihtuahin.
Huaia muisumte khawngah i kaihgingte i khai ua.

Mi gam peuhah Toupa la bangchin i sa thei dia?
Jerusalem aw, ka honmangngilh aleh, ka khut taklamin a thilsiam mangngilh sam hen.
Kon theihgige kei aleh, ka lei ka dangtawngah belh bikbek hen; ka nopsakna pen sanga Jerusalem ka deih jawk ka leh.
Toupa aw, Jerusalem ni jaw Edom suante tungah a selamin theigige in: a suangphum nangawn leng chimsak un, chimsak un, chite.
Babulon tanu aw, hihmana om ding; ka tung ua na hih banga honthuk ding tuh kipakin a om ding hi.Na tanu noute honla saka, suangpa satna dia zangpa ding tuh kipak takin a om ding hi.

Na kiangah ka lungtang tengtengin kipahthu ka gen dinga: pathiante maah nangmah phatin la ka sa ding hi.
Na biakin siangthou lam ngain chibai ka honbuk dia, na chitna leh na thutak jiakin na min ka phat ding: na thu tuh na min mawngmawng sangin na hihlianta ngala.
Kon sap niin nang non dawnga, ka hinna hihhatin non hasuana.
Toupa aw, leia kumpipate tengtengin kipahthu a honhilh ding ua, na kama thupawtte lah a zata ngal ua.
A hi, Toupa omdan thute lain a sa ding ua: Toupa thupidan lah a thupi ngala.
Toupa tungnungtak ahi naa, mi neute a limsak jel hi: mi kisatheite bel gamlapi akipanin a thei hi.
Mangbatna lakah vak mahleng leng nang non hihhalh ding; hondoute heh sual dingin na khut na jak dinga, na khut taklam in non hondam ding hi.Toupan ka tungtanga a hih ding tuh a tangtun ding hi: Toupa aw, na chitna tuh khantawnin a om dinga; nangmah khut thilhihte tawpsan ken.

Toupa aw, nang ngentel takin non ensuaka, non theita hi.
Nang ka tut leh ka din na thei naknaka, ka ngaihtuahna tuh gamlapi akipanin leng na thei thei hi.
Ka pai leh ka lup non entel jela, ka omdan tengteng na thei vek hi.
Ngaiin, Toupa aw, nang na theih siang vek louh, ka lei ah thu himhim a om kei hi.
Nang ka nunglam leh ka mallamah non umsuaka, ka tungah na khut na koih lai hi.
Huchitela theihna kei dingin a lamdang lua a; a sang tela, ka pha zou kei hi.
Na kha kiang akipanin koiah ka pai dia?
Na ma akipan koiah ka tai mang dia?
Van ah kahtou ning chileng, huaiah lah na om ngala: Sheol ah lupna bawl ning chileng ngaiin, huaiah leng na om jel ngala.
Jing kha jakin, tuipi tawp pekah vaom ning chi leng;
Huaiah leng na khutin non pi dinga, na khut taklamin honlen ding ahi ngala.
Pellouin mialin honkhuh zouvek ding a, ka kima vak tuh jan ahi ding chi dek lengleng;
Mialin leng nang lakah bangmah a liah keia, jan lah sun bangin a vakjaw ahi: nang dingin mial leh vak a kibang salpsap hi.
Nangmah ngeiin ka lungsim na neia: ka nu gilsungah non phankhawm hi.
Na kiangah kipahthu kon hilh dinga; lauhuai tak leh lamdang pi-a bawl ka hih jiakin: na thilhihte lah lamdang tak ahi a; huai tuh ka hinnain a theitel mahmah hi.
A guka bawla ka oma, lei mun nuainungpena kilawmtaka bawla ka om laiin, ka guh ka tang nang lakah selin a om kei hi.
Ka lim kibawl kim nailou tuh na mitin a mu-a, na laibu ah ka hiangte tengteng gelh vek ahi, ani sima bawlin a om jela, khat leng a om nai louh laiin.
Pathian aw, na ngaihtuahnate kei adingin manpha hina tele! a gawmkhawmna thupi hina tele!
Sim dek mahleng, a tamdan tuh piaunel sangin a tam zo ding: ka khanloh aleh, na kiangah ka om nilouh naknak ahi.
Pathian aw, mi gilou-saloute na thah ngei dinga; huchiin sisan suah hat miten honpaisan ding.
Amau tuh gilou takin nang a hon gensia un, nangmah douten na min tuh a genthanghuai nak uhi.
Toupa aw, nangmah hote ka ho kei ahia?
Nangmah sualte tungah ka lung kim lou kei ahia?
Amau tuh huat petmahin ka huaa: hondoute dingin ka sep chiat hi.
Pathian aw, ngentel takin honen suak inla, ka lungtang thei in: honchian inla, ka ngaihtuahnate thei in.Huan, kei ah gilou-salou lam mawngmawng a om hiam om lou, en inla, khantawn lampi ah honpi in.

Toupa aw, mi gilou lakah honhumbit inla; mi ngongtat lakah honhum in:
Amau tuh a lungtang uah thilhihkhelhte a ngaihtuah ua: dou dingin a kikhawm gige uhi.
A lei uh gul bangin ahiamsak ua; a neh sung uah thangtom gu a om hi.
Selah.
Toupa aw, mi gilou-salou khut lakah honkem hoih inla; mi ngongtat lakah honhum in: amau tuh ka khe kalsuante sawnkawi a tum uhi.
Mi kisatheiten ka awkna dingin thang a guk kam ua, khauhualte toh; lam sikah len a phah ua; ka awkna dingin thangte a kam uhi.
Selah.
Toupa kiangah, nang jaw ka Pathian na hi: Toupa aw, hehpih ka nget awte na bil na doh in.
Toupa Pathian aw, non hotdamna hihhatpa aw, nang kisual ni chiah ka lu non khuhsaka.

Selah.
Honumsuakte lu tuh, amau muka thugilou a gen un khuh hen.
Meiamte a tunguah kia henla: meia paihin om uhenla; a thoh tak louhna ding un kokhuk thupi takah paihin om uhen.
Thu hoihlou genpa tuh lei ah hihkipin a om kei dinga: mi ngongtat hihse dingin thil hoihlouin a zong ding hi.

Toupa, kon sam hi, ka kiangah hongpai meng inla: kon sapin ka aw ah bil na dohin.
Ka thumna gimnamtui bangin na maah hih khiakin om henla; ka khut jak tuh nitaklam kithoihna bangin om hen
Toupa aw, ka kam bulah vengmi tusak inla; ka muk kongkhak veng in.
Gilou-salou thilte thilhihkhial mite hihpih dingin, ka lungtang thil hoihlou himhim lamah kiheksak kenla; a neklimte uh honen sak ken.
Mi diktatin honsat hen, migitna ahi ding; hontaihilh hen; himahleh migilouten ka lu thaunilh ngei kei hen, a nasep giloute uh huain ka thum gige ngala.
Amau mohpaih dingte kianga piakkhiak a hih chiangin, Toupa thu a dik chih a thei ding uh.
Min lei a leha a hihjan bangin a guhte uh hankoutangah hihdalhin a om ding.
Toupa Pathian aw, ka mitin nang lam lah a en ngal naka: nangmah ah ka muanna ka nga gige; ka hinna tuh vuaktangin nuse ken.
Ka awkna dinga thang a kam lak uah honhum in, thilhihkhialte thang lakah te toh.Ken ka khen laiin, migilou-salou tuh amau len ah te khawng kelut uhen.
Ken ka khen laiin, migilou-salou tuh amau len ah te khawng kelut uhen.
Ka awin, Toupa ka sama; ka awin Toupa kiangah hehpihna ka gen jel
A maah ka mangbat thu ka gena; a maah ka buaina ka theisak jel.
Ka kha ka sunga a bahlaiin, nangmah ngaiin ka lampi na theia.
Ka paina lampi-ah ka awkna dingin thang a guk kam uhi.
Ka taklamah om inla, en dih, kuamah honthei himhim a omta kei ua; ka kihumbitna a omta keia; kuamah himhimin ka hinna a limsakta kei uhi.
Toupa aw, kon sama; nang ka kihumbitna, mihing gama ka tantuam na hi, ka chi a.
Ka kikou husa ngaikhia in; nakpi taka hihniamin ka omta ngala.
Honsimmohte lakah honhumbit in; kei sangin a hat zo ngalua.Na min ka phat theihna dingin, ka hinna suangkulh akipanin pi khia in: mi diktatten honum suak ding ua; nang hoihtaka non hih ding jiakin.

Toupa aw, ka thumna ngaikhia inla; hehpih ka ngetna ah bil doh inla; na giomna jiak leh na jiakin hondawng in.
Na sikha tungah vaihawm ken; na mitmuh ah mihing himhim siamtang a om ding lah a om ngal kei ua.
Melmain lah ka hinna a simmoh ngala; ka hinna tuh leiah a sat puka: sawtpi-a sisate bangin, mun mial takte ah honomsak hi.
Huaijiakin ka kha tuh ka gil sungah a baha: ka lungtang tuh ka gilsungah a mangbangta hi.
Nidanglai nite tuh ka theigige a; na thilhih tengtengte ka ngaihtuah jela na khut nasepte tuh ka sut jel hi.

Selah.
Toupa aw, hondawng meng in, ka kha a bah dek hi; ka lakah na mai sel ken; huchilouin jaw kokhuk guama paisukta bang lelin ka naom kha ding hi.
Jingsangin na chitna thu hontheisak in; nang lah kon muang ngala; ka paina ding lampi hontheisak in; ka lungsim lah na kiangah ka koih kip jel ngala.
Toupa aw hondoute lakah hin humbit in; non nasel dingin na kiangah kongtai ahi.
Na deihlam hih honkisinsak in; ka Pathian lah na hi ngala: na kha hoih in lamphei ah honpi jel hen.
Toupa aw, na min jiakin honhihhalh inla: na diktatna jiakin ka hinna mangbatna akipan pikhia in.Na chitna jiakin hondoute hihmang inla, ka hinna hih mangbangte tengteng hihmang in; na sikha lah ka hi ngala.

Ka chitna leh ka kulhpi, ka insang leh honhumbitpa, ka phaw leh ka muanna ngakna ka nuaia ka mite zoujelpa ahi.
Toupa mihing kua ahia a hiha, na theih naknak?
Mihing tapa leng kua ahia a hiha, na ngaihtuah naknak?
Mihing jaw bangmahlou bang lel ahi a: a damsung nite lim mang jel bang ahi.
Toupa aw, na vante kunsakin hongpai suk inla: tangte koih in, huchiin a khukhe ding uhi.
Khua phesak inla, amau tuh dalhsakin: na thalte tuh kap khia inla, hihbuai gawp in.
Tunglam akipanin na khutin honsawk inla; honhonkhia inla, tuilian akipanin:
A kam un bangmahlou peuh a gen ua, a khut taklam utuh khut taklam diklou ahi.
Pathian aw, nangmah pahtawiin la thak ka sa dinga: pekging gui sawm nei toh nangmah phatin la ka sa ding hi.
Amah ahi, kumpipate kianga hotdamna piaa, namsau mi hihsethei laka a sikha David honkhepa pen.
Honhonkhia inla, mikhualte khut akipan honhumbit in, a kam un thu bangmahlou peuh a gen nak ua, a khut taklam uh khuttaklam diklou ahi.
Ka tate uh a hongvalnou ua sing nou didip banga a om ua; ka tanute u leng inpi omdan gel banga a ninga suangkhuak banga a om hun un;
Ka buhinte uh a dima, thil chichih a om phetphuta; ka belamte un leng nou a sang asanga tam.

Kumpipa aw, ka Pathian, kon pahtawi dinga; na min khantawn khantawnin ka phat ding hi.

Toupa tuh a thupi-a, nakpi taka phat ding ahi; a thupidan tuh suikhiak vual ahi kei hi.
Suan khatin suandang kiangah na thilhihte tuh a phat sawnsawn ding ua, na thilhih thupitakte tuh a theisak ding uhi.
Nangmah pahtawina kilawmdan thupitak lehm na thillamdang-hihte ka ngaihtuah ding hi.
Miten na thilhih mulkimhuaitakte hatdan a gen ding ua; ken leng na thupidan ka theisak sam ding hi.
Na hoihna thupitak a theih uh a gen ding ua, na diktatna tuh nuamsa takin lain a sa ding uhi.
Toupa mi hehpihthei, chitnaa dim; lungnel, chitna thupitak nei ahi.
Toupa bangkim tungah leng a hoih ahi; a chitnate tuh a thilsiam tengteng tungah a oma.
Toupa aw, na thilsiam tengtengin na kiangah kipahthu a honhilh ding ua; misiangthouten leng nang a hon phat ding uhi.
Na gam thupidan thu genin, na thil hihtheihna thu tuh houlimna dingin a honzang ding ua;
Mihing tate kianga a thilhih thupitakte leh, a gam kilawmna thupidan theisak dingin.
Na gam tuh khantawn gam ding ahi a, na thu neihna tuh suan omsung tengtengin a om gige ding hi.
Toupa tuh a thute ah a muanhuaia, a nasepte ah deihsak a siam hi.
Toupan pukte tengteng a len gige jela, kun kheukheua om tengteng a kaitang jel hi.

Israel kumpipa, David tapa Solomon paunakte:
Pilna leh hilhna theih ding; theisiamna thute theikak ding;
Thilhih pilhuaia hilhna mu ding, diktatna leh vaihawm leh hawmsiamna ah;
Mi mawlte kianga kivensiamna pe ding, tangval kianga theihna leh ngentelna;
Mi pilin a jak theiha, sinsiamnaa a pun theihna dingin; huan theihsiam miin thuphate a phak theihna ding;
Paunak leh lima thugen theisiam ding; mipilte thute, gentehna thugen theihhakte theisiam dingin.
Toupa kuhtak theihna kipatna ahi: himahleh mihaiin pilna leh hilhna a musit.
Ka tapa, na pa hilhna ja in, na nu dan mangngilh ken:
Na lu adingin deihhuai lungtangjem leh na ngawng vial ding khainiangte hi ding ulah ahi ngala.
Ka tapa, mikhialten a honzol ua leh, pha sakpih ken.
Honjui in, sisan I buk ding ua, a jiak beiin mi hoihte a gukin I tang ding uh, a chih uleh:
Seol bangin amaute a hingin I nawmvalh ding ua, huan, kokhuk sunga pai sukte bangin, a pumin:
Van manpha tengteng I mu ding ua, gallaktein I inte uh I dimsak ding uh;
Na tan kou laka ma sep lut dinga; sumbawm khat I nei khawm ding ua:
Ka tapa, lampi ah amau toh ton ken; a lampi ua kipan na khe kaikikin:
Gilou hih dingin a khe uh a tai ngala, huan sisan suah dingin a kinoh uhi.
Vasa himhim mitmuh in, len a kiphah thawn ngala:
Huan hiaiten amau sisan ngeia tang ua, amau hinna ngei a gukin a buk uhi.
Huchibangin michih punnaa duhgawlte lampi ahi hi; huaia neitute hinna a lak mang sak sek hi.
Kongzing ah ngaihtakin pilna a kikoua; mun liante ah a aw a suaha;
Mipi omkhawmte mun pipen ah a kikoua; kongpite lutna ah, khopi ah, a thute a gen:
Bang tan ahia, nou mi mawlten, mawlna na it ding uh?
Nuihsanmiten nuihsana amaute a kipah ding ua, mihaiten theihna a huat ding uh?
Ka salhna ah kihei unla: ngaiin na tunguah ka kha ka sung bo ding, na kianguah ka thute ka theisak ding hi.
Ka sap a, na nial jiakun: ka bante ka jaka, kuamahin a limsak kei uh;
Himahleh ka thupha tengteng bangmahlou in na koih ua, ka salhnate a bangmah na deih kei uh:
Ken leng na tuahsiatna ni un ka honnuihsan dia; na launa uh a hongtun chiangin kon chiamnuih ding;
Huihpi banga na launa uh a hongtun chiangin; pingpei banga na tuahsiatna uh a hongtun chiang in; lungkhamna leh dahna na tung ua a hongtun chiangin.
Huai hun chiangin kei a honsam ding ua, himahleh ka dawng kei ding; thanuam takin a honzong ding ua, himahleh a honmu kei ding uh:
Theihna a huat ua, Toupa kihtakna a zon louh jiak un:
Ka thupha laka bangmah a deih kei ua; ka salhna tengteng a musit uh:
Huaijiakin a lampi uh gah a ne ding ua, amau thusawmte ngeiin a vah ding uh.
Mimawlte nungtolhna in amaute a hihlum dia, mihaite hausaknain amau hihmang ding ahih jiakin.Himahleh kuapeuh kei honngaikhia bittakin a teng ding ua, gilou launa pang louin a muang ding uh.
Himahleh kuapeuh kei honngaikhia bittakin a teng ding ua, gilou launa pang louin a muang ding uh.
Ka tapa, ka thute na sana, ka thupiakte nanga na khol khawm leh;
Huchia pilna lama na bil na doha, theihsiamna lama na lung na suk leh;
Ahi, theihkakna na sap a, theihsiamna dinga na aw na suah leh;
Dangka banga huai na zona, gou sel banga huai na zon leh;
Huchiin Toupa kihtakna na theisiam dinga, Pathian theihna na mu ding hi.
Toupan lah pilna a pe ngala; a kam akipanin theihna leh theihsiamna a hong pai.
Midika dingin pilna hoih a khol khawma, muanhuainaa omte amaute ading in lum ahi;
Vaihawmna lampite a ven theihna dingin, a misiangthoute lampi ahawi theihna dingin.
Huchiin diktatna leh vaihawmna na theisiam dia, huan, hawmsiamna, ahi, lampi hoih chiteng.
Na lungtang sungah pilna a honglut sin ngala, huan na kha adingin theihna a nuam ding hi;
Ngentelnain nang a honveng dia, theihsiamnain nang a honkem ding hi.
Gilou lampi akipan honhun khe ding, mi thil hoihlou gente akipan;
Tanna lampite mangngilh, khomial lampite a pai ding;
Gilou hih ding kipaka, gilou hoihlouhnaa nuamsa;
A lampite ua kawia, a lampite ua diklou te;
Numei lamdang akipan nang honhun ding, mikhualnu a thute toha maitangphatnu akipan mahmahin;
Aman a tuailai lawm a nusia, a Pathian thukhun a mangngilh hi:
A inn in lah sihna lam a doha, a lampiten misite lam:
Amah kiang hoh kuamah a kik nawn kei ua, kuamahin hinna lampite a pha zou sam kei uhi:
Mi hoihte lampia na pai theiha, mi diktatte lampi na zuih theihna dingin.
Mi tangte gamsunga teng ding ahi ua, huan a sungah mi hoihkimte a om tawntung ding uh.Himahleh giloute gam akipan satkhiakin a om ding ua, huan lepchiah taka hihte huai akipan zungkalh khiakin a om ding uh.
Himahleh giloute gam akipan satkhiakin a om ding ua, huan lepchiah taka hihte huai akipan zungkalh khiakin a om ding uh.
Ka tapa, ka dan mangngilh ken; himahleh ka thupiakte na lungtangin kem hen:
Nite sawtna leh, damsung kumte leh muanna, nanga hongkibehlap ding ahi ngala.
Chitna leh thutak in nang honnuse kei hen: Na ngawng kimvelin vial inla; na lungtang dohkan tungah amaute gelh in:
Huchiin Pathian leh mihing mitmuhin deihsakna leh theihsiamna hoih na mu ding hi.
Na lungtang tengteng toh Toupa ah muang inla, nangmah theihsia, na ah kinga ken:
Na lampite tengteng ah amah thei inla, huan aman na lampite a pitang ding hi.
Nangmah mit ah pil ken la; Toupa kihta inla, gilou taisan in:
Na lai adingin damna ahi dinga, na guhte adingin guhngek.
Na vanin Toupa zahtak in, na punna tengtenga gahmasate tohin:
Huchiin hauhnain na pangte a dim dia, na belte uain thakin a dimlet ding hi.
Ka tapa, Toupa sawina musit kenla; a salhna leng chimtak sam ken:
Toupan lah a itte a sal ngala; pan a kipahna tapa a salh bangin.
Pilna mu mi leh theihsiamna mu miin nuam a sa hi.
Huaia vante lah dangka vante sangin a hoihzo ngala, huan huaia punna dangkaeng hoih sangin.
Rubi suang sangin a manpha jaw: huan amah toh na thil deihte na tehpih theikei ding.
A khut taklam ah nite sawtna a oma; a khut veilam ah hausaknate leh zahtakhuaina.
A lampite nuamna lampite ahia, a lampite tengteng muanna ahi.
Amah lenchintente adingin hinna sing ahi: amah nei den michihin nuam a sa uhi.
Toupan pilnain lei a mukhiaa; theihsiamnain vante a hihkipta hi.
A theihnain thuknate a kitama, huan vanten a daitui a taksak uh.
Ka tapa, na mitte akipan amaute paimang sak ken; pilna hoih leh ngentelna kem gige in;
Huchiin na kha adingin hinna ahi ding ua, na ngawng adingin kilawmna.
Huchiin bittakin na lampi ah na pai dinga, na khe a kisui kei ding hi.
Na lup chiangin, na lau kei dia: ahi, na lum dinga, na ihmut a lim ding.
Lau guihna kihta ken, a hongpai chiangin, giloute hihgawpna leng lau sam ken:
Toupa na muanpi ahi sin ngala, na khe laka omlou dingin a veng ding hi.
A mudingte akipan thilhoih it ken, hih dinga na khut thilhihtheihnaa a om laiin.
Na insakinkhang kiangah, na kianga na neih laiin, paiin, hong nawn in, huchiin jingsang chiangin ka pe ding, chi ken.
Na insakinkhang siatna ding gilou ngaihtuah ken, na kiangah bittakin a teng chih thei in.
A jiak beiin mi toh kina ken, gilou bangmah na tunga a hih kei leh.
Hiamgamna mi eng ken, a lampite laka bangmah tel ken.
Kilawmlou lah Toupa adingin kihhuai ahi ngala: himahleh a thuguk mi tangte kiangah a om.
Toupa hamsia migiloute in ah a om; himahleh mi diktatte tenna vual a jawl hi.
Aman nuihsanhatte a nuihsana, himahleh kingainiamte kiangah hehpihna a pia hi.Mi pilin thupina gou a luah ding; himahleh zumna mihaite kaisanna ahi ding hi.
Mi pilin thupina gou a luah ding; himahleh zumna mihaite kaisanna ahi ding hi.
Ka tapate, pa hilhna ja un, theihsiam na thei dingin limsak un:
Thuginpi hoih lah ka honpe ngala; ka dan taisan kei un.
Ka pa dingin tapa ka hi ngala, ka nu mitmuha nou leh it keleuleu.
Huan a honsinsaka, ka kiangah, na lungtangin ka thute lenden hen; ka thupiakte jui inla, huan hing in:
Pilna neiin, theihsiamna nei in: mangngilh ken, ka kama thute akipan lunglel ken:
Huai mangngilh kenla, nang a honhawi dinga; amah it inla, aman a hon kem ding hi.
Pilna thil pipen ahi; huaijiakin pilna la in: ahi, na muhsa tengteng toh theihsiamna la in.
Amah pahtawi inla, a man nang honkaisangsak ding: zahtakna a hontun dia, amah na kawi laiin.
Na lua dingin kilawmna kizepna a honpe dia: kilawmna manglukhu nang a honpe ding hi.
Aw ka tapa, ka gente ja inla, sang in; huchiin na damsung kumte a tam ding hi.
Pilna lampi ah ka honkisinsaktaa; tanna lampite ah ka honpita hi.
Na pai chiangin, na kalsuante haksain a om kei dia; na tai leh, na kisui puk kei ding.
Hilhna kip takin lenin; pai sak ken: amah vom in; amah lah na hinna ahi ngala.
Migiloute lampi ah lut ken, gilou mite lampi ah pai ken.
Pel khia inla, a kiangah pai ken; kiheisan inla, pai vengveng in.
Poi a khoih kei ngal uleh, a ihmu ngal kei ua; kuahiam a puksak kei uleh, a ihmutna uh lakmangin a om hi.
Gitlouhna tanghou lah a ne ngal ua, hiamgamna uain a dawn uhi.
Himahleh mi diktatte lampi khovak tung bang ahi, sunlaitak takna tang semsem.
Migiloute lampi khomial bang ahi: a kisuihna uh a theikei uh.
Ka tapa, ka thute limsak in; ka gente ah na bil doh in.
Na mitte akipan amaute lamang ken; na lungtang lakah vom in.
Amau mute ading in hinna ahi ngal ua, a sa uh adingin damna.
Thanopna tengteng toh na lungtang kem in; huai akipan lah hinna tuinakte a luang ngala.
Nang akipan kam hoihlou koih mang inla, nang akipanin muk kilawmloute gamlapiah koih in.
Na miten tang takin en uhenla, na etna na maah tang hen.
Na khe lampi pheisak inla, huan na lampi tengteng hihkipin omsak inKhut taklam ah hiam veilam ah hiam pial ken: gilou akipanin na khe suan in.
Khut taklam ah hiam veilam ah hiam pial ken: gilou akipanin na khe suan in.
Ka tapa, ka pilna limsak in; ka theihsiamna na bil doh in:
Ngentelna na vom theihna, na mukten theihna a kep theih ding un.
Numei lamdang mukten lah khuaiju a takkhe sak ngala, huan a kam sathau sangin a nal jaw:
Himahleh a tawpna nanung gamsai bangin a khaa, namsau hiamtuah bangin ahiam hi.
A khete sihna lamah a pai suka; a kalsuanten Seol a pom a len chinten;
Huchiin hinna lampi phei a mu kei hi: a lampite a kip keia aman a theikei hi.
Huaijiakin tuin, ka tapate, honngaikhia unla, ka kama thute akipan pai mang kei un.
Amah akipanin na lampi gamla pi ah suan mangin, a in kongkhak naiah hongpai ken:
Huchilouin jaw midangte kiangah na zahtakhuaina na pe kha ding a, na kumte gilou kiangah:
Huchilouin jaw na hatna in mikhualte a vah kha ding ua, gamdang mi in ah na seogimnate a om kha ding;
Huan, na sa leh na pumpi hihgawpa a om laiin na tawpna nanung ah na sun kha ding:
Huan, hilhna naza nuam lou hina tel ing e, ka lungtangin salhna namusitna tel e, na chi kha ding;
hon sinsakmite aw na mang keia, kei honhilhte lam leng ka bilin ka nadoh kei:
Omkhawmte leh kikhawmpite lakah gilou tengteng ah siatna ka nahita mahmah hi.
nangmah tuibem akipanin tuite dawn in, nangmah tuileh akipanin tuiluang laite.
Na tuinakneite sukthanghuai gawpa om ding hia, kongzing ahte na tui luite?
Nangmah ading kia hi uhenla, nang kianga mikhualte ding hi louin.
Na tuikhuk vualjawlin om hen; huan na tuailai ji ah kipak in.
Deihhuai sazukpi leh heksiam sakhipi bang.
A itna leh ngaihnatnain chik lai peuhin leng nang honlungkimsak gige hen; huan a itnaa vakin om gige in.
Bangdingin ahia, ka tapa, numei lamdang vaka om ding na hia, mikhual ang kawi ding na hia?
Mihing lampite lah Toupa mit maah a om ngala, huan aman a lampi te tengteng a pheisak hi.
Amah thulimlouhnaten giloute aman dinga, a khelhna guitea kanin a om ding hi.Hilhna taksap jiakin a si dinga; a khelhna thupina ah a pai khial ding hi.
Hilhna taksap jiakin a si dinga; a khelhna thupina ah a pai khial ding hi.
Ka tapa, na inveng adia moh khu dia na din leh, mikhual adinga na khut na kichiam leh,
Na kama thute a awk na hiha, na kama thute a mat na hih leh,
Tuin hiai hihin, ka tapa, nang leh nang kihonkhiain, na inveng khut sungah na hongom chih theiin; kuanin, nang leh nang kiniamkhiak inla, na inveng vangen ngutngut in.
Na mitte ihmu sak kenla, na mitvunte leng lusu sak sam ken.
Gamvakpa khuta sakhipi bangin kihonkhia in, thangkampa khuta vasa bangin.
Miksi kiangah hoh in, nang thadah; a lampite ngaihtuah inla, pil in:
Hausa, heutu, hiam vaihawmmi, neilouin,
Nipi chiangin a an a sutuaha, pawltak chiangin a an a kaikhawm hi.
Bang tan ihmu ding na hia, aw thadah?
Na ihmutna akipan chikchianga thou ding na hia?
Neukha ihmut lai, neukha lusuk, ihmu dinga neukha khutte khep:
Huchiin na gentheihna guta bangin a hongpai dia, huan na taksapna mi kigalvan bangin.
Mi phatuam lou, mi gilou; kam kiuangsak toh a vaka;
A mittein chiamtehna a bawla, a khetein thu a gena, a khutzung tein chiamtehna a bawl;
A lungtang sungah hoihlouhna a oma, gilou a gel gige; kilemlouhna a tuh naknak.
Huaijiakin a tuahsiatna thakhatin a hongtung dia; thakhata kek gawp in a om dia, a hihdamna beiin.
Toupan a muhdah thil guk a oma; ahi, amah adia kihhuai sagih a om hi:
Mit kiuangsakte, lei juauthei, mi hoih sisan suah khutte;
Ngaihtuahna gilou ngaihtuah lungtang, siatna hih dinga kin tai khete;
Juau thugen palai taklou, leh unaute laka kilemlouhna tuh.
Ka tapa, na pa thupiak juiin, huan na nu dan mangngilh ken:
Na lungtang tungah vial gige inla, na ngawng kimah khihin.
Na vak chiangin, nang a honpi ding: na ihmut chiangin, nang a honveng ding hi; huan na khanloh chiangin, nang a honhoupih ding.
Thupiak lah khawnvak ahi ngala: huan dan vakna ahi; huchiin hilhna taihilhna hinna lampi ahi:
Numei gilou akipan nang honkem ding, mikhual lei maitangphatna akipanin.
Na lungtangin a kilawmna lunggulh ken; a mitvuntein nang honman kei hen.
Numaei kijuaknu jiakin pasal tanghou thema matin a om hi: huchiin angkawmnun hinna manpha a zong sek hi.
Min a ang sungah mei a la thei diam, a puante a kang kei diam?
Ahihkeileh mi suangkuangthei sa tungah a vak thei diam, a khete a kang kei diam?
Huchibangin kuapeuh a inveng ji huan; kuapeuh amah khoih gawtlouh a om kei ding.
Miten guta a musit kei ua, a gil kiallaia a kha lungtaisak dinga a guk leh:
Himahleh muha a om leh, azah sagihin a din ding; a ina vantengteng a pe ding hi.
Kuapeuh angkawm theisiamna bei ahi: amah kha hihse dinga a hih ahi.
Liamnate leh zumhuaite a mu ding; huan a zahpihhuaina nulmang ahi kei ding.
Mullitna lah mi thangpaihna ahi ngala; huchiin phulak ni chiangin a hawi kei ding hi.Tatna a limsak kei dinga; thilpiak tampi pe lechin leng, lungdamin a om kei ding hi.
Tatna a limsak kei dinga; thilpiak tampi pe lechin leng, lungdamin a om kei ding hi.
Ka tapa, ka thute kemin, na kiangah ka thupiakte khol khawm in;
Ka thupiakte kem inla hing in; huan ka dan na mit tang bangin
Na khutzungte tungah vial inla; na lungtang suangpek tungah gelh in.
Pilna kiangah, ka sanggamnu na hi, chiin la, huan theihsiamna na tanaunu chiin:
Numei lamdang akipan nang a honkep theihna ding un, a thutea maitangphatnu mikhual akipan.
Ka in tohlet ah ka tohletkhakna ah ka en paisuaka;
Huan mi mawlte lakah ka ena, tuailaite lakah ka theikaka, tangval theihsiamna beipa,
A omnaning china kongzinga paisuaka, a in lam juana pai jelpa;
Khomuiin, ni nitaklamin, jan mial bibek leh khomial ah.
Huan, ngaiin, numei khat, kijuak puansilh silh, lungtang kivain a nakituahpiha.
Amah ahi lawlawa, a tum tuntuna; a khe a in ah a om gige kei:
Konhzinga om ton a oma, mun liantea a om ton a oma, ning chiteng a buk jel hi.
Huchiin aman a manta, amah a tawpta, huan zummoh maitang tohin a kiangah:
Lemna kithoihnate ka kiangah a om; tuiin ka thuchiamte ka peta hi,
Huaijiakin nang tuak dingin ka hongpai khiaa, na mel thanuamtaka zong dingin, ka honmuta hi,
Ka tutna nuam pialkhang phah ze hoihtea zep, ka phah khinta, Aigupta khau puan gialte toh.
Ka lupna murra, aloe, leh sinamonin ka namtui sakta.
Hongpai in, jingsang matan I itna dimset I la ding; itnain I kilungmuan tuah ding.
Ka pasal lah in ah a om ngal keia, khual gamla ah a zin hi:
Sum ip a kitawia; kha a lik chiangin in ah a hongpai ding, a chi a.
A thugen siamnain amah a kipe sakta, a muka maitangphatnatein amah a sawlmang ta hi.
Amah a jui paha, goh dinga bawngtal a pai bangin, hiam mihai bawlhoihna dia sikkhau khihmi bangin;
Thalin a sin a kap pailet tan; tang lama vasa a kintat bangin, huan huai tuh a hinna gun a hih a theikei hi.
Tuin, ka tapate, huaijiakin honngaikhia un, ka kama thute limsak un.
Na lungtang amah lampi lam ah awn kei henla, lampite lamah pai mang kei hen.
Amah lah tampi liamsain a pailumlettaa: ahi, a thahsate mi hat tampi ahi uh.A in Seol zotna lampi ahi, sihna dantante juana suk pai.
A in Seol zotna lampi ahi, sihna dantante juana suk pai.
Pilna a kikouin, theihsiamnain a aw a suah kei maw?
Lampia mun sangta tungah, lampite kisutna ah, a dinga;
Kongpite biangah, khopi lutna ah, kongkhaktea pai lutna ah, nakpiin a kikou a:
Noute, aw mite, ka sam: huan ka aw mite tapa kiangah ahi.
Aw nou mimawlte, kivensiamna theisiam un; huan, nou mi haite, lungtang theisiam nei un.
Ja un, thil hoihpenpente gen ding lah ka hi ngala; huan ka mukte honna thil dikte ahi ding hi.
Ka kamin thuthak gen ding ahi ngala; huan gitlouhna ka muk adingin kihhuai ahi.
Ka kama thute tengteng diktatna ah a om; huaiteah bangmah hei hiam kilawmlou hiam a om kei hi.
A theisiam kuapeuh adingin a kichian vek ua, theihna mu amaute adingin a dik hi.
Ka hilhna sang unla, dangka hilouin; dangkaeng hoihpen sangin theihna.
Rubi suang sangin pilna lah a hoihzo ngaka; huan deihhuai thilte tengteng huai toh tehpih theih ahi kei uh.
Kei pilnain kivensiamna ka tenna dingin ka bawla, huan theihna leh theihkakna ka mu hi.
Toupa kihtak gilou huat ding ahi; kisaktheihna leh, kiotsakna leh, gilou lampi leh kam hoihlou, ka hua hi.
Thupha keia ahi, theihna hoih: theihsiamna ka neia; hatna ka nei.
Kei jiakin kumpipaten vai a hawm ua, lalten dikna thu a pia uh.
Kei jiakin lalten vai a hawm ua, milianten, leia vaihawmte tengtengin.
Kei honitte amau ka ita; thanuam taka honzongten honmu ding uh.
Hauhsakna leh zahtakna ka kiangah a om; ahi, hauhsakna leh diktatna pangsawtte.
Ka gah dangkaeng sangin a hoihjaw, ahi, dangkaeng hoih sangin; ka sum muhna dangka hoihpen sangin.
Diktatna lampi ka juia, vaihawmna lampite lakah:
Kei honitte van ka luahsak theiha, a goubawmte uh ka dimsak theihna dingin.
Toupan a lampi kipattungin a honneia, nidanga a thilhihte main.
Khantawna kipan, a tunga kipan ahihkeileh lei om maa kipan koih kip ka hi.
Thuknate a om louh laiin, lak khiakin ka oma; luikhuk tuia dimte a om loh lai un.
Mualte a omkip main, tangte om main lak khiakin ka om:
Lei hiam, gamte hiam, ahihkeileh khovel leivui kipatna a bawl nai louh laiin.
Vante a hihkip laiin, huaiah ka om: tui thuk maikaiha bemvilvel a koih laiin:
Tunga vante a bawl kip laiin: tui thukte tuikhukte a honghat lai un:
Tuipi kianga a gi a piak laiin, huchia tuiten a thupiak tunga a tatlek louhna ding un: lei suangphumte achiamteh laiin:
Huailaiin a kiangah ka om, nasemmi heutu bangin: huan nitengin a kipahna ka hi a, a maa kipak gigein;
A tentheihna leiah; huan ka kipahna mite tapate kiangah a om hi.
Huaijiakin tuin, ka tapate, hon ngaikhia unla: ka lampite jui miten nuam a sa ngal ua.
Hilhna ja unla, pil un, huai tuh deilou kei un.
Mi kei honjain nuam a sa hi, ka kongpia niteng vangin, ka kongkhakte khuamtea ngakin.
Kuapeuh honmuin hinna a mu un, Toupa deihsakna tang ding ahi ngal ua.Himahleh kuapeuh ka tunga thilhihkhialin amah kha a hihdik kei hi: kei honhuaten sihna a it uhi.
Himahleh kuapeuh ka tunga thilhihkhialin amah kha a hihdik kei hi: kei honhuaten sihna a it uhi.
Pilnain a in a lamkhina, a khuam sagihte a phuta:
A gante a goutaa: a uain leng a helta hi; a dohkan leng a bawl khinta.
A nungakte a sawlkhe taa, khopi munsang penpente tungah a kikou a,
Mi mawl peuhmah, hiai lamah hong kihei hen: theihsiamna neilou amah tungtang ahihleh, aman a kiangah,
Hongin, ka tanghou ne unla, ka helsa ka uain dawn un, a chi hi.
Pai khia unla, nou mi mawlte, hing un; theihsiamna lampi ah pai un.
Musitmi bawl hoihin amaha dingin zumhuaina a mu: huan kuapeuh migilou salin amah adingin minsiatna a mu.
Musitmi sal dahin, nang a honho kha ding: mi pil salin, huan nang a honit ding.
Mi pil kiangah hilhna pe lechin, a pilzo lai dinga: mi diktat sinsakin,
Toupa kihtak pilna bul ahi: mi siangthou theihna theihsiamna ahi.
Kei jiakin na nite lah hihtam ahi dinga, na damsung kumte lah hihpun ahi ding hi.
Na pil leh, nangmah adia pil na hi.
Huan mi na muhsit leh, nang kian na po ding hi.
Numei hai a aphuai; mimawl ahia, bangmah a theikei.
Huan a in konhkhak ah a tu a, khopi munsangtea tutphah tungah,
A vial paite sam ding, a lampite ua pai jelte,
Mi mawlte, hiai laiah hongkihei heh: huan amah theihsiamna neilou tungtang ahihleh, aman a kiangah,
Tui gukte a khuma, aguka tanghou nak a nuam hi, a chi.Himahleh aman huailaiah misite a om uh chi a theikei; a mi sapte Seol thuk ah a om uh chih.

Solomon paunakte.
Tapa pilin pa kipak a bawl: Himahleh tapa hai a nu gikna ahi.
Gitlouhna sumten bangmah a lohtak kei: himahleh diktatnain sihna akipan a tankhia.
TOUPAN mi diktat kha a kialsih a phal kei ding; himahleh migilou akipan a tankhia.
Khut zeol zanga thilhihmi a honggentheia: himahleh mi thanuam khutin hauhsakna a bawl hi.
Nipi laia lakhawmpa tapa pil ahi: himahleh pawltak huna ihmupa zumhuaina omsak tapa ahi.
Midiktat lu tungah vualjawlnate a oma: himahleh migilou kam hiamgamna in a tuam hi.
Midik theihgigena a nuama: himahleh mi gilou min a muat mang ding.
Lungtanga pilin thupiakte a sang dinga: himahleh mihai haihama puk ding.
tang taka pai hoihtakin a paia: himahleh a lampite kilawmlousak theih in a om ding hi.
Amita chiamtehna bawlin lungkham na a omsaka; himahleh mihai haiham a puk ding.
Mi diktat kam hinna tuikhuk ahi: himahleh hiamgamna in gilou kam a tuam hi.
Huatna in kidouna a tokthou, himahleh itna in tatlekna tengteng a khuh hi.
Theihkak theihna neimi muk ah pilna muhin a om: himahleh chiang theihsiamna neilou mi nungjang a ding ahi.
Mi pilten theihna a khol khawm ua: himahleh mihai kamin siatna a neih.
Mi haisa hauhsakna a khopi muanhuai ahi: mi genthei siatna a gentheih uh ahi.
Mi diktat sepgimna in hinna a juana; gilou punna in khelhna lam.
Bawlhoihna limsak hinna lampi ah a om a: himahleh salhna donlou a paikhial hi.
Huatna sel juautheimukte a kipan ahia; huan mi gensiatna gen mihai ahi.
Thu tampite ah tatlekna a omlou keia: himahleh a mikte thuzoh in piltakin a hih ahi.
Mi diktat lei dangka hoihpen bang ahi: migilou lungtang a thamatna neuchik ahi.
Mi diktat mukten mi tampi a vaka: himahleh mihaite theihsiamna taksap jiakin a si uh.
Toupa vualjawl na in, hauhsakna a bawl a, huan huaiah lungkham na a behlap kei hi.
Gitlouhna hih mihai a dingin ki sukhalh na bang ahi: huan huchibang in theisiam mi a dingin pilna ahi.
Mi gilou launa, amah tungah a hongtung ding: midiktat deih phal in a om ding hi.
Pingpei in a honkhen chiangin, migilou a om nawn kei: himahleh mi diktat khantawn suangphum ahi.
zuthuk in ha a suksiat bangin meikhu in mit a susia a, huchibang mah in amah sawlte a dingin mi zongjaw tuh a om hi.
Toupa kihtakin nite a sausaka himahleh mi gilou kumte hihtom ahi ding.
Mi diktat lametna kipahna ahi ding, himahleh mi gilou lametna a mangthang ding.
Toupa lampi mi tante a dingin kulh muanhuai ahi; himahleh migilou nasemmite a dingin siatna ahi.
Mi diktat suan mang ahi ngeikei ding: himahleh mi gilou gamsungah a teng kei ding hi.
Mi diktat kamin pilna a hontun a: himahleh lei ginalou satkhiak iin a om ding.Mi diktat mukten laktuak bang ahia a theia, himahleh migilou kamin ginatlouhna a gen hi.
Mi diktat mukten laktuak bang ahia a theia, himahleh migilou kamin ginatlouhna a gen hi.
Bukna diklou Toupa a dingin kihhuai ahi, himahleh gikdan dik a kipahpih lam ahi.
Kisaktheihna a hongpai chiangin, zumna a hongpai; himahleh mi kiniamkhiakte kiangah pilna a om hi.
Mi tangte dikna in amau a pi ding, himahleh mi lepchiahte hoihlouhna in amau ahihse ding hi.
Thangpaih niin hauhsak a phatuam kei, himahleh diktatna in sihna a kipan a hunkhia hi.
Mi hoihkim diktatna in a lampi a seksak dia; himahleh migilou a gitlouhna ah a puk ding hi.
Mi tangte diktatna in amau a suaktasak dinga; himahleh lepchiah taka hihte amau poikhoihna a lakin a om ding uhi.
Mi gilou a sih chiangin, a lametna a mangthang ding: huan thulimlouh na lametna a mangthang hi.
Mi dktat buaina laka kipan suah taksakin a oma, huan a mun ah migilou a hongpai hi.
A kama Pathian limsaklou min a innveng a hihsia a: himahleh theihna jiakin mi diktat suahtaksakin a om hi.
Mi diktat adia a hoih jel chiangin.
Khopi a kipak a; huan gilou a manthat chiangin, kikouna a om.
Mi tang vualjawlna jiakin khopi tawisangin a om: himahleh mi gilou kama hihsiat in a om hi.
Kuapeuh a innveng musit pilna bei ahi: himahleh thiesiam mi a dai dide.
Tangthu genmi banga vialvakin thuguk a taklang: himahleh lungsim muanhuai in thu a im hi.
Kipina pil omlouhna munah, mite a puk ua: himahleh thupha gen tampi omna ah bitna om hi.
Kuapeuh mikhual adia a mohkhu kia ding in na asa ding himahleh mohkhu dia dinna hua a muang hi.
Numei deihtak huai in zahtak huai na anei gige: huan pasal hiamgam in hauhsakna anei gige.
Mi ching theiin amah kha a dingin a hihhoih a: himahleh mi gilou in amah sa ahih buai hi.
Mi gilou in khema loh a sang: himahleh diktatna in kipahmah muan anei hi.

Aisanin kiselna a dai saka, huan mi hatte kikalah a khen hi.

Na inveng in ah na khe vang sakin; huchilouinjaw a honchimtakin, a honmudah kha ding.
Mi a inveng siatna theihpih juaugen khetbuk leh, namsau leh, thal hiam ahi.
Buai huna mi ginomloua muanna ha tong bang leh, khepek guh kilawi bang ahi.
Mi kho vot laia puansilh suah bangin kuapeuh lungtang gik adinga lasa ahi.
Na melma a gil a kial leh, nekding tanghou amah pia in, huan a dang a tak leh, dawn ding tui amah pia in:
A lu tunga meiam sek khawm lah na hi ngala, huan TOUPAN ki pahman nang a honpe ding hi.
Mal huihin vuah a honzu sak paha; huchibangin migensiatna leiin heh mel a bawl hi.
In tung ninga ten, in sung jaa kiselhat numei toh tenkhawm sangin a hoih jaw.
Kha dangtaka dia tui vote bangin, huai banging am gamla akipan tanchin hoih tuh ahi.
Tuikhuk suknit leh, tuinak hihsiat bangin, huchibang mi diktat mi gilou maa lampi pia tuh ahi.
Khuaiju tampi nek a hoih kei: huchimahbangin mite dingin amau thupina zon khiak thupina ahi kei.Amah a lungsim thuzohna bei khopi chimsa leh bang neilou bang ahi.

Nipi laia vuk bangin leh, pawltak laia vuah bangin, huai bangin zahtakhuaina mihai adingin a kilawn kei hi.
Kawlgit a vakvai bangin, phialphiah a len lai bangin, huchimahbangin hamsia bulneilou a tangtung kei.
Zepna sakol ading, kamkaihna sabengtung ading, huan chiang mihaite nungjang ading.
Mihai a haina dungjuin dawng ken, huchilouinjaw nang leng amah na bang kha ding.
Mihai a haina bangin dawng in, amah kideihna ah a pil kha ding hi.
Kuapeuh mihai khuta thu khakin amah khete a tan khiaa, siatna ding a dawn hi.
Khebai khete a kikhai nelnel: huaibangmahin mihaite kam sunga gentehna ahi.
Suang chiankhawma suangmanpha ip bang in, huaibangin kuapeuh zahtak-huaina mihai kianga pai ahi.

Mihai leh mi vialvak guaimi, thalkapsiammi liamsak jelmi bang ahi.
Ui amah luak lama kik nawn bangin, huaimah bangin a haina sunzom mihai ahi.
Amah kideihnaa pil mi na mu hi?
Amah akipan sangin mihai akipan lametna a om jaw hi.
Thadahin, Lampi ah humpinelkai a om; humpinelkai kongzing ah a om, a chi.
Kongkhak a kopja ah a kihei jel bangin, huaibangin thadah a lupna tungah a om.
Thadahin kuang sungah a khut a thun; huaituh a kam tun nawn dingin a ngap kei hi.
Thadah amah kideihna ah a piljaw, a san pe thei ding mi sagih sangin.
Kuapeuh paisuak a, amaha hilou kinakna a kihihbuai, ui a bila man bang ahi.
Mihai meiekte, thal leh sihna pai bang in;
Huaibangin mi a inveng khema, Chiamnuih ka hika hia? chi bangin a om hi.
Sing taksap jiakin mei a mit a: huan huauhatmi om louhna ah, kinakna a bei hi.
Suangkuangtheite meisum sa a ding bangin leh sing mei a ding bangin: huchibang kinak hat mi kilanna uangsak ahi.
Huauhatmi thute an limtak bang ahi, huan gilpi sungnungpen ah a tumsuk hi.
Leibel limlangtuia luan bangin lungtang gilou muk a zolin a nal!
Mihuathatmiin a muk in a theh dalh a, a lungtang in khemna a pai.
Kilawmna thu a gen chiang in, amah um ken; a lungtang ah lah kihhuai sagih a om ngala:
A huatna zekhemna in kituam mahleh, khawmpite maah tangpi muh in a gitlouhna etsak ahi ding hi.

A langtanga salhna itna selguk sangin a hoihjaw.
Lawm liamna te a ginom: himahleh melma tawpna a loliap hi.

Ka tapa, pil in, ka lungtang kipak sak in, kei hontai ka dawn theihna dingin.
Mi pil in hoih lou a mua, a bu hi: himahleh mi mawlin a awlmoh keia, a thuak loh hi.

Huansiangna bel dangka ading ahi, huan meipi dangkaeng a ding, huchiin mihing phatnaa zeetin a om.
Mihai sum sungah buh taisate lakah sukin su mahlecin, huchipiin leng amah akipanin a haina a paimang kei lai ding hi.
Na belamhonte omdan thei dingin thanuam in, huan na ganhonte hoih takin en in:
Hauhsaknate lah khantawn ading ahi ngal keia; huan manglukhuin suan tengteng a daihzou hia?
Buhpawl puakin a oma, huan loupa nou a kilang, mualte loupate a kilakhawm ahi.
Belamnouten na puansilh ding honpe ding, huan kelten na lou man ding:Huan na an dingin, na inkote an dingin kel nawitul kiching a om ding hi; huan na nungakte vakna dingin.

Mi gilou kuamah delhlouhin a tai: himahleh mi diktat humpinelkai bangin a hangsan hi.
Gam tatlekna jiakin mi tampi huaiah lalte ahi: himahleh theisiam leh theihna nei mite jiakin huaia gam bel suksau ahi ding hi.
Mi taksap hau mi genthei nuaisiah vuahpi ju an nuse lou bang ahi.
Amau dan manghilh ten mi gilou a phat ua: himahleh huchibang dan juite amau tungah a thangpai uhi.
Mi hoihlouin vaihawmna a theisiam kei: himahleh amau TOUPA zong ten thil tengteng a theisiam uh.
A lampitea hoihlou mi hau sangin a thutaknaa om mi genthei a hoih jaw hi.
Kuapeuh dan jui tapa pil ahi: himahleh kuapeuh an hai mite toh kithuahin a pa a zumsak hi.
Kuapeuh a neih a nou leh a punga tamsakin mi genthei hehpih mi amah dingin a lakhawm hi.
Kuapeuh dan za lou dinga a bil kaihei tuh a thumna nasan kihhuai ahi.
Kuapeuh lampi giloua midik lamhaihsak, amah kokhuk mahmah ah amah a ke lut ding hi: himahleh mi hoihkimin gou hoih a luah ding hi.
Mi hausa amah ngaihin a pil a; himahleh mi genthei theihsiamna neiin amah a zong khia hi.
Mi diktat a vualzoh chiangin, thupina lian a om: himahleh mi gilou a thoh changin, mite a bu uh.
Kuapeuh a tatlekna khuk a lohching kei ding: himahleh kuapeuh huaite thuphatawia manghilhin chitna a mu ding uh.
Lauthei gige mi a hampha hi: himahleh a lungtang saksak gige siatna ah a ke ding hi.
Humpinelkai humham leh vompi hawk bangin; huaimah bangin mi gentheite tunga vaihawmmi gilou ahi.
Vaihawmmi theisiamna tasam tuh nuaisiahhatmi thupi ahi: himahleh kuapeuh huaihamna huain a nite a sausak ding.
Mi kuapeuh mi himhim sisana dim kokhuk sungah a tai lut ding; kuapeuhin len kei hen.
Kuapeuh tangtaka om suahtaksakin a om ding: himahleh kuapeuh a lampi tea hoihlou a pukzo ding hi.
Kuapeuh a gam leiletin tanghou tampi a nei ding: himahleh kuapeuh mi bangmahlou nung juiin gentheihna kiching a nei ding hi.
Mi ginomin vualjawlna a hau ding: himahleh kuapeuh hau dinga kintat gawt louhin aomkei ding.
Mite deihsaktuam neih ahoih kei: tanghou them jiakin mi a talek ding leng ahi sam kei hi.
Kuapeuh deihgawl-sumchit hausakna delhin a kinoha, huan a tungah taksapna a hongtung sin chih a theikei.
Kuapeuh mi deihsaknaa salin a leia maitangphathatmi sangin deihsakna tamsem a nungin a mu ding hi.

Kuapeuh genthei kianga pia a tasam kei dinga: himahleh kuapeuh a mit selin hamsia tampi a nei ding hi.Mi gilou a thoh chiangin, mite a bu ua: himahleh a manthat chiangun, mi diktat a pung hi.

Kuapeuh salhna om naka genhak thakhatin a puakjak dinga, hih damna om louin.
Mi diktatte a pun chiangun, mite a kipak uh: himahleh mi gillouin vaihawmna a puak chiangin, mite a thumthum uh.
Kuapeuh pilna itin apa a kipaksaka; himahleh kuapeuh kijuakte kithuahpihin a sum a mawkzatbei hi.
Kumpipan vaihawmnain gam a hihkipa: himahleh kuapeuh thilpiak phut teiteiin a hihsia hi.
Mi a inveng maitangphatin kalsuante adingin len a jak sak hi.
Mi hoihlou tatlekna ah thang a om: himahleh mi diktatin la a saa, a kipak hi.
Mi diktatin mi genthei thu a theihpih a: mi gilouin huai thei dingin theihsiamna a neikei hi.
Mi simmohhatten khopi a hal ua: himahleh mi pilten thangpaihna a heimang uh.
Mi pilin mi hai a kiselpih leh, a heh hiam a nui hiam, khawlna a om kei ding hi.
Sisan duhna dangtakin amah mi hoihkim a mudah: huan mi tang a hihleh, a hinna a zong uhi.
Mi haiin a hehna tengteng a gena: himahleh mi pilin a genkhe keia, a khemdai hi.
Vaihawmiin juauthu a ngaihkhiak leh, a sikhate tengteng gilou ahi uh.
Mi genthei leh nuaisiahhat a kituak khawm ua: TOUPA a nih tuak uh mitte a sukvaksak hi.
Kumpipa ginomtaka gentheite ngaihtuah, khantawnin a mangtutphah a kip ding hi.
Chiang leh salhnain pilna a pia: himahleh naupang amah thuthua omsakin a nu adingin zumna a omsak hi.
Giloute a pun chiangun, tatlekna a pung hi: himahleh mi diktatin a pukna uh a en ding hi.
Na tapa bawlhoihin, awlna a honpe ding hi; ahi, na kha adingin nuamna a honpe ding hi.
Mengmuhna om louhna ah, miten khamna a paikhia uh: himahleh kuapeuh dan jui, aman nuam a sa hi.
Sikha thutea bawl hoih in a om kei ding: a limsak kei ding thei mahleh.
A thutea man gang mi na mu hia? amah akipan sangin mihai akipanin lametna a omjaw hi.
Kuapeuh a naupan akipana a sikha nuamtattaka kemin a tawptawpin amah tapa honghiin a nei ding hi.
Mi hehin kinakna a tok thoua, huan mi thangpaiin tatlekna a hau hi.
Mihing kisaktheihnain amah a lai naim ding: himahleh kuapeuh lungsim kiniamkhiakin zahtatna a mu ding.
Kuapeuh gutami toh kithuahin amah kha a mudah hi: nakpitaka ngetna a jaa huan bangmah a gen kei.
Mihing kihtaknain thang a hontawia: himahleh kuapeuh TOUPAa a muanna koih a bit ding hi.

Massa mi Jakeh tapa Agur thute: Huai miin Ithiel kiangah, Ithiel leh Ukal kiangah:
Chihtaktakin kuamah sangin ka hai jawa, mihing theihsiamna ka neikei:
Pilna ka sin naikeia, Mi siangthou theihna leng ka neikei, a chi.
Van ah kua a kahtoutain a hongkum suka?
A khuttun sungah kuan huih a lakhawmtaa? a puansilhin kuan tuite a tuna?
Lei tawpna tengteng kuan a hihkiptaa? a min banga hia. huan a tapa min bang ahia, na theih leh?
Pathian thu chiteng ettel ahi: amaha muangte adingin lum ahi.
A thute ah behlap ken, a honsal dia, juautheia muhin na om kha ding hi.
Thil nih ka hon ngen: ka sih main huaite honkitheihmoh-bawl ken:
Bangmahlou leh juau keia kipan gamlapi ah suan in: Gentheihna hiam hauhsaknate hiam hon pe ken: kei a kiphamoh anin hon vak in.
Huchilouinjaw ka khamin, nang kon kitheihmawhbawlin, TOUPA kua ahia?
Ka chi kha ding hi.
Ahihkeileh, ka gentheiin, ka guin, ka pathian min thanghuaitakin ka bawl kha ding hi.
A pu kiangah sikha gense ken, huchilouinjaw nang a honhamsiat dia, mohtansakin na om ding.
A pa uh hamsiat suan khat a oma, a nu uh vualjawl lou.
Amau mittea siangthou suan khat a oma, ahi alah a nitna ua kipan silsiang louh ahi uh.
Suan khat aoma, Aw a mitte uh sanghah hina e: huan a mitkhu vunte sansakin a om hi.
A hate uh namsau bang, leh a hate uh temta bang suan khat a om uh, lei akipan migenthei leh, tasamte mite laka kipana nekbeina dingin.
Votin tanu nih a neia, honpia in, honpia in, chiin kikou ua.
Thil thum lungkimsak theih ngeilouh a om uh, ahi, li, Hun e. chi lou:
Han; leh sul hut; lei tuia hihlungkima om lou; huan mei, hun e chi lou.
Mit a pa nuihsan leh, a nu thuman musit, guam vaakten a tawm ding ua, muvanlai nouten a ne ding uh.
Thil thum kei adingin lamdang lua a om ua, ahi, ka theih louh li:
Huihkhuaa muvanlai lampi; suangpi tunga gulpi lampi; tuipi laka long lampi leh pasal nungak toh a lampi.
Huaimah bangin angkawmhat numei lampi ahi; a nea, zapiin a kamkaa, Gitlouhna ka hih kei, achi hi.
Thil thum jiakin lei a linga, huan thil li a puak zohlouh jiakin;
Sikha kumpipa honghih lai leh mihai an kham lai;
Numei huathuaitakin pasal a neiha, sikha nungakin a pi a luahin.
Lei tungah aneu thil li a om ua himahleh apil mahmah uh:
Miksite hatlou mite ahi ua, himahleh nipi laiin a nek ding uh a sutuah ua;
Kawlsajawte hatlou pawl tak ahi ua, himahleh suangpi hengte ah a in uh a bawl uhi:
Khaukhupten kumpipa a neikei ua, himahleh a honhonin a vekun kilemin a pai uh;
Inhikte na khuta na tawi theih ahi ua; himahleh kumpipate inpite ah a teng uh.
A paichiang ua thupi thil thum a om ua, ahi, apai chiangua thupi, li:
Humpinelkai, gamsa laklaka hatpenpen, bangmah ma ah a kihei mang kei hi;
Kidouna-sakol; keltal leng; huan kumpipa, a mite maa pai,
Na kiletsaka haitaka na gamtat leh, ahihkeileh ngaihtuahna gilou na neih leh, na kam tungah na khut koih in,Nawitui peiin mokhon a omsaka, nak hekin sisan a suahkhe sak: huchimahbangin thangpaihna paisuakin kilaina a omsak hi.
