Kumpipa Lemuel thute; a nun amah ahilh thu:
Bang ahia, ka tapa?
Huan bang ahia, Aw ka sul tapa?
Huan bang ahia, Aw ka thuchiam tapa?
Na hatna numeite kiangah pe kenla, kumpipate hihsia te kiangah leng na lampite pe sam ken.
Kumpipate ading ahi kei, Aw Lemuel, uain dawn kumpipate ading ahi kei; Zu khauh koia om ahia, chih leng lalte ading ahi sam kei.
Huchilouin jaw a dawn un, dan a manghilh un, gimthuak kuapeuh vaihawmna a kaikawi kha ding uh.
Mangthang dia mansa kiangah zu khauh pia un, khaa haksasa kiangah uain:
Dawn masak unla, a gentheihna manghilh sakun, a haksatna theigige nawn kei hen.
Pauttheilou a ding in na kam ka in, sukgawpa om mi huchibangte tengteng thu ah.
Na kam ka inlan, diktakin vaihawm in, gentheite leh tasamte kiangah vaihawmsak in.
Numei hoih kuan a mu dia? aman lah rubi suang tunglam pek ah a om ngala.
A pasal lungtangin amah a muanga, punna taksapna a neikei ding hi.
A damsung ni tengin amah a hih hoiha, a hihse kei.
Samul leh jija a zonga, a khutin kilawptakin na a sem hi.
Sumsinmi longte bang ahia: gamla akipanin a an a hontawia.
Jan ahih lai in leng a thou a, a inkote kiangah an a pia a, a sikhanute kiangah a sep ding uh.
Lou a ngaihtuaha, a leia; a khuta gahtein grephhuan a bawl hi.
Hatnain a kawng a gaka, a khutte a hatsak hi.
A sumsitna vante a phatuam hi chih a mu a; janin a khawnvak a mit kei hi.
A khutte muikhut ah a ngaa, huan a khutte muiah a nga hi.
Gentheite lamah a khut a jaka; ahi, tasamte lam a sawk hi.
A inkote jiakin vuk a kihta keia; a inkote tengteng lah puansan- auin a kithuam ua.
Puanphah zehoih mantam a kibawla; a puansilh puanmalngat leh sandup ahi.
Kongpite ah pasal theihin a oma, gama upate laka a tut laiin.
Puan hoih puansilh a bawla, a juaka; sumsinmi kiangah kawngakte a pekhia hi.
Hatna leh zahkaina a puansilh ahi; huan hun hongtung ding a nuihsan hi.
Pilnain a kam a kaa; huan siamna dan a lei ah a om hi.
A inkote lampihoih takin a ena, huan thadahna tanghou a ne kei hi.
A tate a thou ua, huan amah nuamsa a chi uhi; a pasalin leng, amah a phata,
Tanu tampiten hoih takin a hih ua, himahleh nang jaw amaute tengteng na khup vek hi, chiin.
Deihsakna khemnain a dima, huan kilawmna bangmahlou ahi: himahleh numei TOUPA laudan siam, phatin a om ding hi.A khuta gahte amah pia un; huan kongpite ah a thilhihten amah phat hen.

Thugenpa, David tapa, Jerusalem kumpipa thute.
Bangmahloute bangmahlou, bangmahloute bangmahlou, bangteng bangmahlouh ahi, Thugenpan a chi.
A sepgimna tengteng ni nuaia a sepgim akipan mihingin bang phattuamna a nei a?
Khang khat a paia, khang dang a hongtunga; huan khantawnin lei a om gige.
Ni leng a suak jela, huan ni a tum jel; huchiin a suahna a mun lamah a kiknawn pah.
Sim lamah huih a paia, mal lamah a kilehheia; a lampi ah a kivial hei ngitnget, huan huih a lam zuihah a kik nawn jel hi.
Luite tengteng tuipi ah a luang lut ua, himahleh tuipi a dim tuan kei: luite paina mun lamah, huailamah a pai nawn uh.
Thil tengteng gimnain a dima; mihingin a gen theikei: muhin mit a lungkim keia, jakin bil leng a lungkim sam kei.
A omkhinsa a hongom ding ahi a; huan hihkhitsa hiha om ding ahi a; huchiin ni nuaiah thil thak a om kei hi.
En dih, hiai a thak? chi-a miten a gen uh thil a om hia? a om khinsa ahi, i ma ua hunte ah.
Khang masate theihgigena a om kei; a hongom ding khang nanunglam theihgigena leng a om sam kei ding, a nung hongom dingte lakah.
Kei Thugenpa Jerusalem ah Israel tungah kumpipa ka hi a.
Huan van nuaia hiha omte tengteng tungtang pilnaa zong ding leh zong khe dinga ka lungtang suah ka hi: huaia kisuk dinga mite tapate kianga Pathianin a piak nakpi taka gimna ahi.
Ni nuaia hiha om nasepte tengteng ka mutaa; huan, ngaiin, bangteng bangmahlou a hi-a huih nung delh ahi.
A kawisa bawltang theih ahi kei: huan a kimlou sim theih ahi kei.
Keimah lungtang ka houlimpiha, Ngaiin, Jerusalema ka maa omte tengteng sangin pilna thupi ka honmuh saka; ahi, ka lungtangin pilna a neita, chiin.
Huan pilna thei ding leh, haina haitatna thei dingin ka lungtang ka suka: hiai leng huih nungdelh ahi chih ka thei hi.Pil mahmahnaah lah lungkham mahmahna a om ngala: huan kuapeuh theihna khangsakin lungkham a khangsak hi.
Pil mahmahnaah lah lungkham mahmahna a om ngala: huan kuapeuh theihna khangsakin lungkham a khangsak hi.
Ka lungtangin, Kisain, vualnopnain ka honentel dia; huaijiakin nuambawlnaah bualin; huan, ngaiin, hiai leng bangmahlou ahi, ka chi a.
Nuihzatna thuah, Hai ahi: vualnopna thu ah, Bang a hiha? ka chi a.
A damsung ua mite tapaten a hih ding uh bang ahia hoih ka muh theih matan, ka lungtangin pilna kei honpi kawmin, uaiina ka sa kipahsakdan leh, haina let chintendan ka lungtangin ka zonga.
Na sepna thupi ka bawla; inte ka kilama;
Grep huante ka kibawla; huante leh gamsitte ka kibawla, huaiteah thei chi chih ka suana:
Gammang singte khoihna hihkawt dingin, tui lite ka kibawla.
Pasal sikhate leh numei sikhate ka leia, ka insungah sikha te a piang ua; belamhon leh bawnghon leng ka haua, Jerusalema ka maa omte tengteng sangin:
Dangka leh dangkaeng leng, bialte akipan leh kumpipate akipan gou lamdang ka ki lak khawma: pasal lasamite leh numei lasamite, mite tapa kipahna, a tama tam meite ka kineiha.
Huchiin Jerusalema ka maa omte tengteng sangin ka thupiin, ka pung jaw a: ka pilna leng ka kiangah a om gige a.
Huan, bangpeuhmah ka mitin a lunggulh amau ka it kei hi: nuamsakna himhim akipanin ka lungtang ka len kei, ka sepgimnate tengteng jiakin ka lungtang lah a kipak ngala; huan hiai tuh ka sepgimna tengteng akipan ka tantuan ahi.
Huchiin ka khutten a bawl uh nasepte tengteng ka vela, semgima ka hih nasep gimna tengteng: huan, ngaiin, bangteng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi a, ni nuaiah bangmah phattuamna a om kei hi.
Huan pilna leh lungsimkimlouhna leh haina en dingin ka kiheia: kumpipa nunga hongpai mihingin bang hih thei ding ahia? a kihihkhinsa mahmah leng.
Huchiin, khovakin khomial a khen dandanin, pilnain haina a kheng ahi chih ka muta hi.
Mi pil mitte a lutang ah a om, huan mi hai khomial ah a vak hi: huchi hinapiin lah thu khat mi tengteng kiangah a tung a;
Huai laiin ka lungtangin, Mi haite kianga a hongom bangin, huchibangin kei kiangah leng a hongom ding; a hihleh bangdinga kei piljaw ka hia? ka chi a.
Huan, ka lungtangin hiai mah leng bangmahlou ahi, ka chita hi.
Mi pil, mi hai bangmaha, theihgigena lah khantawnin a om ngal keia: tunung chiangin a vek ua mangngilh khit ahi ding uh chih theiin.
Huan bangchi-a mi hai banga mi pil si ahia?
Huchiin hinna ka huaa; ni nuaia bawl thilhih keia dinga a haksat jiakin: bangteng lah bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi ngala.
Huan, ni nuaia ka sepgim ka sepgimna tengteng ka huaa: ka nunga hongom ding mi kianga ka nutsiat ngei ding ahi chih theiin.
Huan, kuan ahia mipil hia a hihkeileh mihai hia a honghih ding thei? ka sepgimna tengtenga ka sepgimna tungah thu a nei dinga, ni nuaia pilna ka etsakna ah.
Hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Huaijiakin ni nuaia sepgimna tengteng ka nabawltak tungtang thu-a ka lungtang lungdong sak dingin ka kipumhei hi.
Mi a sepgimna pilna leh, theihna leh, kivakna toh om lah a om ngala: himahleh huaia semgim lou mi kiangah a tantuan dinga nutsiahin a om ding hi.
Hiai leng bangmahlou leh gilou lianpi ahi.
Ni nuaia a sepgimna tengteng akipan leh, a lungtanga a kisukna tengteng akipan mihingin bang a neia ahia leh?
A nite tengteng ahi lungkhamna lel ahi ngala, a thuakna dahna; ahi, jan nangawnin a lungtang a khawl kei hi.
Hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Mihing adinga a neka a dawna, a sepgimnaa thilhoiha a kha a bualsak vala hoihjaw bangmah a om kei hi.
Hiai leng ka theia, Pathian khut akipan om ahi.
Kei sangin, kuan ahia ne theia, a hihkeileh kuan ahia nuamsakna nei jaw?Amah hihlungkim mi kiangah Pathianin pilna leh, theihna leh nuamsakna a pe ngala: himahleh mikhial kiangah, gimthuakna a pia hi, lakhawm ding leh khawl khawm dingin, huchi-a kuapeuh Pathian hihlungkim kianga a piak theihna dingin, Hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Amah hihlungkim mi kiangah Pathianin pilna leh, theihna leh nuamsakna a pe ngala: himahleh mikhial kiangah, gimthuakna a pia hi, lakhawm ding leh khawl khawm dingin, huchi-a kuapeuh Pathian hihlungkim kianga a piak theihna dingin, Hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Bang chiteng adingin hunbi a om, van nuaia thiltup chitenga dingin hun:
Pian hun leh sih hun; suan hun leh suansa boh khiak hun:
Thah hun leh hihdam hun; phel hun leh lam nawn hun;
Kah hun leh nuih hun; sun hun leh lam hun;
Suangte paih mang hun leh suangte lak khawm hun; kawi hun leh kawi kidek hun;
Zon hun leh mansuah hun; vom hun leh paihmang hun;
Bohkek hun leh khui hun; pau louh hun leh thugen hun;
It hun leh muhdah hun; kidou hun leh kilep hun.
A sepgimna na sempan bang phattuamna a neia?
Huaia kisawijawtna dinga Pathianin mite tapate kianga a piak haksatna ka muta hi.
Thil chiteng a huna kilawmin a bawla: a lungtang uah khovel leng a koihtaa, huchi hinapiin lah mihingin Pathian nasep a bul akipana a tawp pha a hihsa a mukhe theikei hi.
A damsung teng un kipah leh hoih hih sanga amau adia hoihjaw bangmah a om kei chih ka thei hi.
Huan, mi chihin a neka a dawna, a sepgimna tengtenga hoih nuam a sakpih tuh Pathian thilpiak ahi.
Bangpeuh Pathianin a hih, khantawnin a om ding chih ka theia: huaiah bangmah a kikoih theikei dinga, huaiakipanin bangmah mah a kila khe thei sam kei ding: Pathianin a hihkhintaa, huchiin a maah miten a lau ding uhi.
A omkhinsa pen; huan a om ding a om khinsa ahi: huan Pathianin a pai mangsa a zong hi.
Huchiin ni nuaiah, vaihawmna munah, gitlouhna a om chih leng ka mu hi; huan diktatna munah, gitlouhna huailaiah a om hi.
Ka lungtangin, Pathianin mi diktat leh mi gilou a ngaihtuah ding: thiltup chiteng leh nasep chiteng adingin lah hun a om ngala, ka chi a.
Ka lungtangin, Mite tapate jiakin ahi, Pathianin amau a ettel sina, amau mahmah gamsa bang lel a hihdan uh a kitheih theihna ding un.
Mite tapate tunga tung peuhmah lah gamsate tungah a tung ngala; thil khat ngei lah a tunguah a tunga: khat a sih bangin, huchibangmahin a dang a dang a sia; ahi, hu khat a nei khawm ua: huan mihingin gamsate sanga masakjawkna a neikei: bangteng lah bangmahlou ahi ngala.
Bangteng mun khat ah a pai ua; bangteng leivui akipan ahi ua, bangteng leivui ah a kik nawn uh.
Mihing kha tunglama a pai touh leh, gamsa kha nuailama leia a pai suk kua ahia thei?Huaijiakin mihing a nasepte-a a kipah ding sanga hoih jaw bangmah a om kei chih ka thei hi; huai lah a tantuan ahi ngala: amah nungin bang ahi dia chih mu dingin amah kuan honpi nawn ahia leh?
Huaijiakin mihing a nasepte-a a kipah ding sanga hoih jaw bangmah a om kei chih ka thei hi; huai lah a tantuan ahi ngala: amah nungin bang ahi dia chih mu dingin amah kuan honpi nawn ahia leh?
Huchiin ka kiheia ni nuaia nuaisiahna hiha om tengteng ka mu a: huan ngaiin, huchibanga nuaisiaha omte, lungmuanpa neiloute; huan amau nuaisiahte lamah thilhihtheihna a oma, himahleh lungmuanpa a neikei uh.
Huaijiakin misite a sikhinsate a damlai dama om laite sangin ka phat jaw:
A hi, a om khinsa nailou, ni nuaia nasep gilou hiha om mu khinsa nailoumi amau sangin ka ngaithupi jaw hi.
Huchiin sepgimna leh nasep siamna tengteng, hiai jiaka mihing a inveng hajata omna ka muta hi.
Hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Mihaiin a bante a khep khawma, amah sa a ne hi.
Khut dim nih sepgimna leh huih nungdelhna sangin, lungmuanna toh khut dim khat a hoihjaw hi.
Huchiin ka kiheia ni nuaia bangmahlou ka mu hi.
Amah kiaa om khat ka mu a, nihna a neikeia; ahi, tapa a neikei, sanggampa leng a neikei; hinapiin lah a sepgim tawpna a om keia, hauhsaknain a mitte leng a lungkim tuan kei hi.
Kua adia semgima, ka kha hoih tansak ka hia? a chi a.
Hiai leng bangmahlou ahi, ahi, nakpi-a gimthuakna ahi.
Khat sangin nih a hoihjaw; a sepgimna ua dinga kipahman hoih a neih jiak un.
Puk le uh, khatin a lawm phong ding a hih jiakin: himahleh a puk chianga amah kiaa oma, amah phong ding midang neilou tung a gik hi.
Huailouin, nih a lup khawm un, lumna a thei uh: himahleh khat kia bangchiin a lum thei dia?
Huan, mi khatin amah kiaa ompen zou leh, nihin amah a dou ding ua; huan khau zang guka hek a kitat mengmeng kei.
Kumpipate leh hai, thuhilhna sang thei nawn lou sangin tuailai genthei leh pil a hoihjaw hi.
Suangkulh akipana kumpipa hi dinga hongpai khia lah a hingala; ahi, amah gam mahmaha gentheisaa piang ahi.
Ni nuaia vaka hing tengteng, tuailaite toh a om uh a hih leh, a nihna, a munah a ding chih ka muta hi.Mi tengteng, a amaute tunga a omna mahmah, bei chih a om keia: hinapiinlah tunung chia hongom dingte amahah a kipak kei ding uh.
Chihtaktakin hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Mi tengteng, a amaute tunga a omna mahmah, bei chih a om keia: hinapiinlah tunung chia hongom dingte amahah a kipak kei ding uh.
Chihtaktakin hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Pathian ina na hoh chiangin na khepek kemin; za dinga pai lah mihaite kithoihna piak sangin a hoihzo ngala: gilou a hih uh chih lah a thei ngal kei ua.
Kam lawp kenla, Pathian maa thil himhim gen dingin na lungtang lawptawp kei hen; Pathian lah van ah a om a, nang lah leitungah na om ngala: huaijiakin na thute tawmsakin.
Mang lah thu leh la tampi toh ahongoma; huan mihai aw thu tampi toh.
Pathian laka thuchiam na chiam chiangin, pe dingin hal ken; mihaite tungah lah kipahna a nei ngal keia: na thuchiam pen piain.
Na chiama na piak louh sangin, na chiamlouh a hoihjaw hi.
Na kamin na sa thil a hihkhelh sak phal ken: angel maah leng, a dikkei chi sam ken: bangdingin na aw ah Pathianin a hehin, na khut nasep a hihse dia?
Huchibangin mangte tamna ah bangmahloute a tam thu tampite jiakin siatna hongom ngal naka: himahleh nangjaw Pathian kihta in.
Gentheite nuaisiahna leh, hiamgamnain bial sungah vaihawmna leh diktatna a lamang chih na muh leh, huai thu lamdang sa ken: sang sanga sangjaw khatin lah a limsak ngala; huan amau sanga sang om ahi.
Huailouin leia punna bangteng ading ahi: kumpipa ngei leng loumain a na a sepsak hi.
Kuapeuh dangka deihta dangkain a lungkim kei ding; kuapeuh hauhsakna punna deihta leng: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Van a khan chiangin, amau nete a khang uh; huan huai neimi adingin bang phattuamna a oma, a mittea huaite et chihngallouh?
Ne tawmin ne tam leh, semgim mi ihmut a lima; himahleh mihausa vahnain amah a ihmu sak kei hi.
Ni nuaia gilou hoihhetlou ka muh a oma, huai tuh, hauhsakna a neipan amah siatna dia a kep:
Huan huai hauhsaknate thuakna gilouin a mangthang hi; huan tapa a suan leh, a khut ah bangmah a om kei.
A nu gil akipana a hongpai leh, vuaktangin a pai nawn ding a hongpai bangin, a sepgimna, a khuta a puak mang theih, adingin bangmah a la kei ding hi.
Huan hiai leng gilou hoihhetlou ahi, a hongpai bang dan tengtengin, hichibangin a pai dinga: huih adinga a sepgimnaah bang punna a nei a?
A damsung tengin khomial ah an a nea, huan nakpi taka hih buaiin a oma, chinatna leh thangpaihna a nei hi.
Ngaiin, hoih leh kilawm hia ka muh min Pathianin amah a piak a damsung tenga a neka, a dawna, ni nuaia a sepgimnaa sepgimna tengtenga hoih nuam a sakpiha, huai tuh ahi: hiai lah a tantuan ahi ngala.
Mi chiteng leng amah kianga Pathianin hausakna leh neihzohna a piak, huaia nek theihna a piaka, a tantuan la ding leh a sepgimnaa kipak dingin; hiai Pathian thilpiak ahi.A dam lai nite lah a theigige lo kei dinga; a lungtang kipahnaa Pathianin amah a dawn jiakin.
A dam lai nite lah a theigige lo kei dinga; a lungtang kipahnaa Pathianin amah a dawn jiakin.
Ni nuaia ka muh gilou a oma, mite tungah a gik hi:
Mi Pathianin hausakna leh neihzohna leh, zahna a piaka, huchi-a a deihpeuha a kha adia bangmah taksap nei het lou-a, a hihhanga huaia ne dinga Pathianin thilhihtheihna a piak louha, mikhualin a nek jawkna: hiai bangmah lou ahi a, gilou natna ahi.
Mihingin ta za khat suang henla, kum tampi damin a kumte nite tampi pha leh, a kha lah hoihin dim kei ngalin, kivuina neikei ngal leh; amah dingin a hun lou-a pian a hoihjaw ka chi ahi:
Bangmahlou ah lah a hong hi-a, khomial ah a pai manga, huaia min khomialin a khuh hi;
Huailouin ni a mu keia theih leng a theikei; hiaiin a dang sangin a khawlna a neia:
A hi, kum sang khat gen tuan dam mahleh, hoih nuam a sak pih tuan kei: bang teng mun khat ah a pai kei umaw?
Mihing sepgimna tengteng a kam ading ahi a, himahleh a gilkialna a dim tuan kei.
Mi hai sangin mipilin bang phatuamna a nei aleh?
Ahihkeileh, mihing maa omdan thei, mi gentheiin bang a neia?
Lunggulhna tamvak sangin mitte muh a hoihjaw hi: hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
A naomkhinsa bangpeuh, sawtpi-a huai a min piaksa ahi, huan mihing ahi chih theih ahi: amah sanga hatjaw amah toh leng a kisual theikei ding hi.
Thil tampi bangmahlou pungsak a om ding chih theiin, mihing bang a hoih tuana?A damsung bangmahlou limliap banga a sukbei tengteng, a damsangin mihing adinga hoih kuan a thei aleh?
Ni nuaiah amah nungin bang a om dia chih kuan mihing a hilh theia ahia?
A damsung bangmahlou limliap banga a sukbei tengteng, a damsangin mihing adinga hoih kuan a thei aleh?
Ni nuaiah amah nungin bang a om dia chih kuan mihing a hilh theia ahia?
Nuhtheih mantam sangin min hoih a hoihjaw; huan mi pian ni sangin sih ni.
Ankuangluina ina hoh sangin, sunna ina hoh a hoihjaw: huai lah mite tengteng tawpna ahi ngala; huan mihingin a lungtang taka a ngaihtuah.
Nuih sangin lungkham a hoihjaw: mel lungkhamna ah lungtang kipahsakin lah a om ngala.
Mi pil lungtang sunna in ah a om; himahleh mi haite lungtang vualnopna in ah a om.
Mi adingin mihaite lasak jak sangin, mi pil taina jak a hoih jaw.
Bel nuaia lingte puak vengvung bangin, mihai nuihna huchibangin a om ngala: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Simmohnain mi pil a haisak mahmaha; thilpiakin theihsiamna a susia hi.
A kipatna sangin thil tawpna a hoihjaw: lungsima kisaktheih sangin lungsima dohtheih a hoihjaw hi.
Heh dingin na lungsimin mangang ken; hehna lah mihaite awm ah a khawl ngala.
Ni danglaite hiaite sanga a hoihjawkna a jiak bang ahia? chi ken; hiai thu lah pilhuaitakin na dong ngal keia.
Pilna gouluah bangin a hoiha; ahi, amau ni mute adingin a hoihzo tham hi.
Dangkasum khihumna ahi bangin, pilna lah kihumna ahi ngala: himahleh theihna hoihjawkna bel, pilnain a neimi hinna a hawisak hi.
Pathian nasep ngaihtuahin: aman a kawisaksa, kua ahia bawl tang thei ding leh?
Hauhsak niin nuamsa inla, huan vangtahniin ngaihtuahin: mihingin a nunga thil om ding a muh khiak louhna dingin, Pathianin khat lah a dang kiangah kihiang helhelin a bawl a.
Ka bangmahlou niin hiai tengteng ka muta hi: mi diktat a diktatnaa mangthang a oma, huan mi gilou a gilou bawlnaa a hinna hihsau a om hi.
Diktat lojen ken; kipilsak lojen sam ken: bangdia nang kihihse ding na hia?
Gilo lojen kenla, hai sam ken: na hun tun maa bangdia si ding na hia?
Hiai na let chinten a hoih hi; ahi huai akipanin leng na khut kai ken: kuapeuh Pathian kihta lah amute tengteng akipan honpai khe ding uh ahi ngala.
Khopi-a om vaihawmmi sawm sangin mi pil a dingin pilna a thupijaw hi.
Hoih hiha, khiallou, leitungah mi diktatna a om mahmah kei hi.
Thu kigen tengteng leng limsak khol dahin; huchilouin jaw na sikhain nang a honhamsiat na za kha ding hi:
Na lungtangin lah huchimahbangin nang leng midante na hamsiat mun chih a thei ngala.
Hiai tengteng pilnain ka enchian veka: Ka pil ding ka chia; himahleh kei akipan a gamla hi.
Alah a gamla, a thuk petpeta; kuan a mu khe thei dia?
Ka kipumheia, thei ding leh zong khe ding, pilna zong ding leh, thilte ziak zong ding, gitlouhna haina ahi chih thei ding leh, haina lungsimkimlouhna ahi chih thei dingin ka lungtang koih kipin a om hi:
Sihna sanga kha jaw tuh numei, a lungtang thangte leh lente hia, a khut henna khau hi tuh ahi chih ka muta.
Ngaiin, hiai ka mu khia, thugen tuin a chi: thil a omdan tak mukhe dingin thil akhat akhat ka buka,
tuin leng ka zong laia ka mu kei: pasal sang khat lak a mi tang khat ka mu, himahleh numei tengteng laka ah mitang ka mu kei.Ngaiin, Pathianin mihing hoihtakin a bawl chih, hiai kia ka mu-a; himahleh bawltawm tampi a zong khia uh.
Ngaiin, Pathianin mihing hoihtakin a bawl chih, hiai kia ka mu-a; himahleh bawltawm tampi a zong khia uh.
Mi pil banga om kua ahia? huan thil hilhchetna kua ahia thei?
Mihing pilnain a mai a vak saka, a mai takna a kikheng hi.
Kon thuhilh, Pathian thuchiam lam thu-ah, kumpipa thupiak juiin.
A omna mun akipan pai khe dingin mangang ken; thil golou ah engtat ken: aman lah a utut a hih sek ngala.
Kumpipa thuin thilhihtheihna a neih jiakin; Bang ahia na hih? kuan ahia a kianga chi thei ding?
Thupiak jui ten thil gilou a theikei ding uh; huan mipil lungtangin hun leh vaihawmna a theikhen jel:
Thiltup chiteng ah lah hun leh vaihawmna a om ngala; mihing haksatna lah a tungah a thupi ngala:
A hongom ding lah a thei ngal keia; bangchiin a om dia chih amah kuan a hilh thei dia leh?
Kha lentang dingin kha tunga thilhihtheihna nei mi a om kei; sihna ni tungah leng thilhihtheihna a nei sam kei: Huan huai kidouna ah panna a om kei: piaka om gitlouhnain amah a hunkhe sam kei ding hi.
Hiai tengteng ka mu-a, nasep chiteng ni nuaia hiha ka lungtang ka piaa: a siatna dingin mi khatin midang tunga thil hihtheihna a neih louh hun a om hi.
Huan giloute vuia om ka mu laia, huan han ah a hong ua; huchiin hihdikte mun siangthou akipan a pai mang ua, khopi-ah manghilhin a om uhi: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Gilou nasep kintaka gawtna a kibawl louh jiakin, huaijiakin mite tapate lungtang gilou hih dingin huaiah koih kipin a om hi.
Mikhialin golou za vei hihin, a nite susau mahleh, Pathian kihtamite amaua dingin a hoih ding chih ka thei mahmah hi, a maa laudan siamte:
Himahleh giloute adingin a hoih kei ding, a nite leng a sausak kei dinga, huai lah limliap bang ahi; Pathian maa laudan a siam louh jiakin.
Bangmahlou leitunga hiha om a oma; mi diktat omta bang hile zong, amah tunga migilou nasep dungjuiin a hongom nak hi; huailouin mi giloute omta bang hile zong, mi diktatte nasep dungjuiin a tunguah a hongom nak hi: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi ka chi hi.
Nek leh, dawna, vualnuama om kan, ni nuaia mihingin thil hoihjaw a neih louh jiakin, vualnopna ka phat hi: Pathianin amah ni nuaia a piak a damsung ni tengtenga a sepgimna ah amah toh a om gige ding ahi ngala.
Pilna thei ding leh, leitunga hiha om thulehla mu dinga ka lungtang ka suk laiin: (sun hiam jan hiama a mita ihmut muh louh lah a om ngala: )Huchiin Pathian thilhih tengteng ka mu-a, huchiin ni nuaia hih thilhih mihingin a mukhe theikei hi: zong khe dingin mihing nakpi takin pang lezong, a muh louh ding lai jiakin; ahi, huailouin, mi pilin thei kisa mahleh, a mu khe theikei ding hi.
Huchiin Pathian thilhih tengteng ka mu-a, huchiin ni nuaia hih thilhih mihingin a mukhe theikei hi: zong khe dingin mihing nakpi takin pang lezong, a muh louh ding lai jiakin; ahi, huailouin, mi pilin thei kisa mahleh, a mu khe theikei ding hi.
Hiai tengteng lah ka lungtangin ka vei ngala, hiai tengteng zongkhe dingin; mi diktatte, leh mi pilte leh a thilhihte uh Pathian khut ah a om ahi chih: itna ahi hia, muhdahna, mihingin a theikei; a ma uah a vekin a om hi.
Thil tengteng kibangin a vek ua kiangah a hongoma: mi diktatte leh mi giloute tungah tanchin khat a om hi; mi hoih kianga leh mi siang kianga leh mi sianglou kiangah; kithoih mi kiang leh kithoih lou mi kiangah: mi hoih a om bangin, mikhial a oma; a kichiampa, thuchiam kihtapa bangin.
Ni nuaiah hiha om tengteng ah hiai gilou ahi, bangteng tunga tanchin khat om: ahi nalaia, mite tapate lungtang gilouin a dima, a dam lai uh a lungtang uah lungsimkimlouna a om, huai nungin misite kiangah a pai uh.
Amah hinglaite tengteng toh kizoma om adingin lah lametna a om ngala: humpinelkai sisa sangin ui hinglai lah a hoihzo ngala.
Mihingteng a si ding uh chih la a thei ngal ua: himahleh misiin thil himhim a theikei, kipahman leng a neita kei uhi; amaute theihgigena lah a kimanghilha.
A itna uh bangin, a muhdahna u leh a enna uh tuin a mangtaa; ni nuaia hiha om thil himhim ah khantawnin tantuan a nei nawnta kei uhi.
Pai inla, nuamsakna toh na tanghou ne inla, lungtang kipak tohin na uain dawnin: Pathianin lah na thilhihte a sang khinta ngala.
Na puansilhte ngou gigein om hen; huan na luin nilhtheih tasam kei hen.
Na bangmahlou damsung ni tengtenga na it ji kiangah kipak takin om inla, huai aman ni nuaia a honpiak, na bangmahlou ni tengtengin: huai lah damsungin na tantuan ahi ngala, ni nuaia na sepgimnaa na sepgimna ah.
Na khutin hih ding bangpeuh a muh na theihtawpin hihin; na paina lam han sungah lah, nasep hiam, thilngahtuah hiam, theihna hiam, pilna hiam lah a om nal kei a.
Na kiheia, kitaitehna kinte ading ahi keia, galdouna hatte ading ahi tuan kei chih ka mu hi, tanghou leng pilte ading, hauhsakna leng theisiam mite ading, deihsakna khutsiamte ading hi tuan lou; himahleh hun leh phat amaute tengteng tungah a hongom sek hi.
Mihingin lah a hun leng a thei ngal keia: ngasate len gilou-a a kiman bang leh, vasate thanga a awk uh bangin, huchibangin mite tapate, amau tunga thakhata a hongtun guih laiin, hun gilou-a matin a om uhi.
Hichibangin pilna leng ni nuaiah ka mu a, ka kiangah thupiin a kilanga:
Khopi lianlou a oma, a sungah mi tawmchik; huan kumpipa thupiin a hongsiama, a laa, a douna dingin sepaih nasep thupi tak a bawla:
Huchiin huaiah mi pil genthei khat a om, a pilnain khopi a hunkhiaa; himahleh kuamahin hiai migenthei mah a theigige kei uh.
Huan, ken, Hatna sangin pilna a hoihjaw; mi genthei pilna muhsitin a oma, a thute ngaihkhiaksakin a om kei, ka chi.
Mihaite laka vaihawmmi kikou sang in awla mi pil thugente a kiza jaw hi.Kidouna galvante sangin pilna ahoihjaw; himahleh mikhial khatin hoih tampi a hihsia hi.
Kidouna galvante sangin pilna ahoihjaw; himahleh mikhial khatin hoih tampi a hihsia hi.
Thou sisain gimlim bawlpa nuhtheihna uih gim a sawl khe sak a: huchibangmahin haina neu chikin pilna leh zahna a buk zou nak hi.
Mi pil lungtang a khut taklam ah a oma; himahleh mi hai lungtang a khut veilam ah.
A hi, huaibanah, lampi-a mi hai a vak laiin, a theihsiamnain a juau sana, mi chiteng ah hai a hih dan a gen hi.
Vaihawmmi lungsim nang dou dinga a thoh leh, na mun taisan ken; kipiakin tatkhelkna thupite a lungkimsak.
gilou ni nuaia ka muh, vaihawmmi akipana diklouhna hongkipan khia bangin, a om a:
Haina nakpi-a zahtakhuaiin a kibawla, mun niamah hauhsakna a tu.
Sikhate sakol tunga tuang leh, lalte leitunga sikhate banga khea pai ka mu.
Kuapeuh kokhuk tou huai sungah amah a ke ding; kuapeuh dai phuvang; gulpin a kei ding.
Kuapeuh suang hemkhia huaiin a kihihna dinga; kuapeuh singa belh huaiah lauhuaiin a kibawl hi.
Sik a mola, ama min a tathiam kei leh, hatna tamsem a koih ding ahi: himahleh pilna thuzoh a phatuam hi.
Khima om maa gulpiin a keih leh, khimmi ah phatuamna a omta kei hi.
Mi pil kama thute hehpihtheiin a oma; himahleh mi hai mukten amah mah a nawmvalh ding.
A kama thute kipatna haina ahi: huan a houlimna tawpna lungsim kimlouhna gilou ahi.
Mi haiin leng thu a khangsak a: himahleh mihingin bang a om dia chih a theikei; huan amah nunga hongom ding, amah kuan a hilh thei dia?
Khopi-a hohna dan a theih louh jiakin, mi haite sepgimnain amaute laka michih a gimsak hi.
Aw gam, na tunga gik hi, na kumpipa naupang a hih laiin na lalten jingsangin a ne uh!
Aw gam, na kumpipa miliante tapa a hiha, na lalten, kham ding hi lou-a, hatna dinga a hun taka a nek lai un, nuam na sa hi.
Thadahna jiakin intung a chima; khut jawntatna jiakin in a keh hi.
Nuihna dingin ankuang a kiluia, uainin hinna a kipaksak; sum thil tengteng awnghukna ahi.Kumpipa, li hi lou, na ngaihtuahin hamsiat ken; huan na lupna dantan sungah mihausate hamsiat ken: huih khuaa vasaten na aw po ding ua, kha neiten a thu gen ding uh a hih jiakin.
Kumpipa, li hi lou, na ngaihtuahin hamsiat ken; huan na lupna dantan sungah mihausate hamsiat ken: huih khuaa vasaten na aw po ding ua, kha neiten a thu gen ding uh a hih jiakin.
Tuite tungah na tanghou paiin: ni tampi nunga mukhe ding lah na hi ngala.
Sagih kiangah tantuan piain, ahi, giat ngei kiangah; leltunga bang gilou hongom ding ahia chih lah na thei ngal keia.
Meipite vuaha a dim leh, leitungah a kihihawngthawl uh: huan sim lama sing a puk leh, hiam mal lamah, a pukna mun ah, huailaiah a om ding.
Huih ngeingaihmiin a tuh kei dinga; meipi limsakmiin a la kei ding.
Huih lampi hiam, amah nau toh omna gil sunga guhte bang hongchikhan uh ahia chih na theih louh bangin; bangteng hihpa Pathian thilhih na theikei hi.
Jingsangin na chi tuh inla, nitakin na khut ton maimah ken: koipen honglohching ding ahia, hiai hia huai hia, ahihkeileh honghoih tuaktuak ding uhia chih lah na thei ngal kei a.
Diktakin khovak a nuama, mitte adia ni muh thil nuam tak ahi.
A hi, mi kum tampi a dama leh, huaite tengteng ah kipah hen; himahleh khomial hunte theigige hen, tampi pha ding uh lah ahi ngala.
A hongom tengteng bangmahlou ahi.
Aw tangval, na tuailaiin kipakin: na tuailai nite ah na lungtangin honkipak sak hen, na lungtang lampite ah leh, na mitte muhin omin: himahleh hiai thilte tengteng jiakin Pathianin nang vaihawmnaa honpi ding ahi chih theiin.Huaijiakin na lungtang akipan lungkhamna suan khia inla, na sa akipan gilou koih mangin: tuailaina leh khan lutlai lah bangmahlou ahi ngala.

Na tuailai nitein nang honsiampa leng theigige in, ni hoihloute a hongtun ua kumte a hongnai ua, Amaute ah kipahna ka neikei, na chih hun a hong tun nailouh laiin.
Ni hiam, khovak leh, kha leh, aksite, hihmiala oma, meipite vuah zuk khita a kik nawn ma un:
In ngakte a kivuan ua, mi hatte a hongkun ua, a tawm tak jiak ua ansute a khawl ua, tawleta dak khete hihmiala a om ua,
Kong zinga kongkhakte khak a hihnai louh lai un; ansuk ging a ngaihlouha, vasa aw-a mi a thoha, tumgingtheih tanute tengteng suk niama a om nai louh lai un;
A hi, tung sanga om a kihta ding ua, a lampi ah launa a om ding; vaisuaklu sing a pak lun dinga, huan khaukhup tunggikna ahi dia, lingmin thuk a juau ding; mihing a in saua paia, sunmite kongzing kim khawnga a pai jiak un.
Dangka khau kiphela, dangkaeng noubem suktapa a oma, tuibel tuikhuka hihkeka a oma, tuibema kangtalaikhe hihtana a om nai louh laiin;
Huan, a om bangin leivui lei ah a kik nawna, kha bel a pepa Pathian kiangah a kik.
Bangmahloute bangmahlou, thugenmiin a chi; bangteng bangmah lou ahi.
Huai banah, Thugenpa a pil jiakin, mite theihna a sinsak lailaia; ahi, paunak tampi kizomzomin a ngaihtuaha, a zong khiaa, a koih hi.
Thugenpa thu pomtakte mukhe dingin a zonga, diktaka gelh khiaka omte, thutak thute ngei.
Mipil thute sutnazum bang ahi a, hoihtaka khetkip sikilhna te bang tuh Belamchingpa khat thugen lakkhawm piakte ahi.
Huan huailou leng, ka tapa, hilhin omin: laibu tampi bawl a hihleh tawp chihni a om kei hi.; huan zil tamna jaw sa bahna ahi hi.
Hiai thulela tawpna ahi; a vekin jakin a omta: Pathian laudan siam inla, a thupiakte juiin; hiai lah mihing hihding pumpi ahi ngala.Pathianin lah thilhih chiteng vaihawmnaa la lut ding ahi ngala, thil selguk chiteng, a hoih hia a hihkeileh a hoihlou toh.

Late la, Solomon-a.
Na kam tawpnatein hontawp lechin aw! na itna lah uain sangin a hoihzo ngala.
Na kinuhten gimlim hoihtak a neia; na min kinuh butkhiak bang ahia; huaijiakin nungaksiangthouten nang honit uh.
Honkaiin; nang kon deih ding uh: kumpipan a dantante sungah a hongpitaa: nang ah ka kipak un nuam ka sa ding uh, uain sangin na itna ka genkhe mun zo ding ua: diktakin nang a honit uh.
Ka voma, himahleh ka mel a hoih, Aw nou Jerusalem tanute, Kedar puaninte bang, Solomon puankhaite bang.
Ka vomjiakin hon en ken, niin a honhai jiakin.
Ka nu tapate ka tungah a thangpai ua, grephuante kemin a honbawl ua; himahleh kei mah grephuan leng ka kem kei.
Hon hilh ve, Aw nang ka khain a it, na gan honvakna mun, sunlaia na khawlsakna mun: bang dinga na kithuahpihte laka ganhon kianga maituam banga kei om ding ka hia?
Na theih kei leh, Aw nang numeite laka kilawmpen, ganhonte khapte juiin kuan khia inla, belamchingte puanin kiangah na kelnoute vakin.
Aw ka it, Pharo kangtalaite laka sakol toh ka honteha.
Na biangte samphekte toh a kilawm a, na ngawng suangmantam khite toh.

Saron pak ka hia, phaijang lilipak.

Nakpia kipahna toh a lim nuaiah ka tua, a gah tuh ka chepin a khum hi.
Annek khawmna inah a honpia, ka tunga a puanlap itna ahi.
Grepgimin honkhou unla, apul theiin honnem un: jawlngaiin ka chi a na ngala.
A khut veilam ka lu nuaiah a om, a khut taklamin a honpom.
Zuktal leh gama zukpite ka hon ngen hi, Aw Jerusalem tanute, ka it hihbuai kei unla, phawng kei un, a lungkim matan.
Ka ngaihnou aw! ngai un, a hong hi, mual tungahte a tawma, tang tungahte a diang hi.
Ka ngaihnou jaw zuktal hiam sakhi tuaiilai bang ahi: Ngaiin, ka kulhbang nung lam uah a dinga, tohlette ah a ena, a nannate ah amah a kimu sak.
Ka ngaihnouin thu a gena, ka kiangah Thou in, ka it, ka kilawmnou, hongpai mangin, a chi a.
Ngaiin, phalbi lah a beita ngala, vuah a theutaa, a paimang ta hi;
Lei tungah pakte hongkilanga; vasate lasak hun a hongtunga, i gam uah khumin aw a kizata hi;
Theipi kungin a gah hingte a min saka, grepguite a pak lun uh, a gimlimte uh a suaksak uhi.
Thou ve, ka it, ka kilawmnou hongpai mangin.
Suangpi heng khawng, mun sang munbu khawnga om, Aw ka vakhu, na mel honmusak inla, na aw lah a khm a, na mel lah a hoih ngala.
Sehalte, grephuan hihsia, sehal neute honmatsak ve; ka grephuan uh lah a paklun ngala.
Ka ngaihnou kei ahi, kei amah a ka hi: lili pak lakah a gan a vaka.Ni a nongnema, limliapte a man matan, ka ngaihnou aw, kihei inla Bether mual tunga zuktal hiam sakhi tuailai bangin omin.

Janin ka lupna tungah amah ka khain a it ka zonga: ka zong a, himahleh amah ka mu kei.
Ka thou dia, khopi kimah ka pai dinga, kongzingte leh lam liante ah, amah ka khain a it ka zong ding, ka chi a ka zonga, himahleh amah ka mu kei.
Khopia vialpai vengmiten a honmu ua: akiang uah, Amah ka khain a it na mu uhia? ka chi a.
Amaute ka paisan sawt lou chik ahi, huan amah ka khain a it ka muta: ka pai sak kei, ka nu in sunga, kei honpai nu dantansunga amah ka pi lut ma siah.

Ngaiin, Solomon lupna ahi; a kimah mi hat sawmguk, Israel mi hatte a kipan a om uh.

Kumpipa Solomonin Lebanon singin kangtalai a kibawla.

Ngaiin, na kilawm hi, ka it; ngaiin, na kilawm hi; na maituamna liah ah na mitte vahui bang ahi ua: na sam kel honbang ahi, Gilead mual pang khawnga kualte.
Na hate mulmet thak belamnu hon bang ahi ua, sil khit pheta hongpai tou te; huaiah amaute chiatin phik a nei ua, alak ua kuamah misisun a om kei uh.
Na mukte khausan au bang ahi ua, na kam a kilawma: na mit laivomte pomgranet them bang ahi na maituamna liah ah.
Na ngawng Davidin galvan koihna a lam insang bang ahi, lumbem neute sang khat kikhaina mun, mi hatte lum tengteng omna.
Na nawite zuktal nou nih phikte a bang ua, lili pak laka tate.
Ni a nema limliap a man mateng murra mualah leh, begaw tangah ka hoh ding.
Na kilawm hi, ka it; nangah ninbang a om kei.
Ka mou, Lebanon akipan hon juiin, Lebanon akipan kei toh: Aman a vuma kipan dakin, Senir leh Hermon Hermon vum a kipan, hompinelkaite kua akipan, gialbemte mual akipan.
Ka lungtang na tuahmangta, ka sanggamnu, ka mou; na mitte laka khatin ka lungtang na tuahmangta hi, na ngawnga khainiang khatin.
Na itna kilawm natele, ka sanggamnu, ka mou!
Na itna uain sangin nakpiin a hoihjaw!
Na kinuh gim, gimlim chiteng sangin a hoihjaw.
Na mukte, Aw ka mou, khuaikhak bangin a takkhiaa: na lei nuaiah khuaiju leh nawitui aom; na puansilh gim Lebanon gim a bang hi.
Huan um bing ka sanggamnu, ka mou ahi; tuinak huk, tuikhuk vuh.
Na tuaite pomgranet huan, gah manphate toh ahi; spiknardi singsuan toh henna-pak.
Spiknardi leh pak gimlim, kepbuk leh singnamtui begaw sing tengteng toh; murra leh aloe, gimlim pipen teng toh.

Khanglouin, Aw mallam hoih; huan hongin, nang simlam; ka huan tungah nungin, huchia huaia gimnamtuite a luankhiak theihna dingin.
Ka ngaihnou a huan sungah hongpai henla, a theigah manphate ne hen.
Ka huan sungah ka hongpai hi, ka sanggamnu, ka mou: ka murra ka gimnamtui toh ka lakhawmta: ka khuaikhak ka khuaiju tohka netaa; ka uain ka nawitui toh ka dawnta.
Aw lawmte, ne un; dawn un, ahi, tampi dawn un, Aw ka ngaihnou.
Ka ihmua, himahleh ka lungtang a hak: a kiu ka ngaihnou aw ahi, honhon in, ka sanggamnu, ka it, ka vahui, ka ninbanglou: ka lutang lah daituiin a dima, ka samtum lah jana tuitakin.
Ka puannak tung ka suahtaa: bang chiin ka silh nawn dia? ka khepekte ka siltaa; bangchiin ka hihnin dia?
Ka ngaihnouin kongkhak awngah a khut ahon golh luta, amah jiakin ka lungtang hihlinin a om hi.

Ka ngaihnou ka hontaa; himahleh ka ngaihnou a nakik nawna a na omta kei hi.
Thu a gen laiin ka khain a honjuausana: amah ka zonga, himahleh hondawng kei hi.

Hiai ka ngaihnou ahi a, hiai ka lawm ahi.
Aw Jerusalem tanute.
Na ngaihnou koilama pai ahia, Aw nang numeite laka kilawm penpen? amah na ngaihnou koilama kiheita ahia, amah ka honzon pih theihna ding un?

Tanuten amah a mu ua, nuamsa amah a chi uh; ahi, kumpinuten leh meiten amau amah a phat uh.
Jingsang banga dak khia amah kua ahia, khapi banga kilawm, ni banga siang, sepaihhon puanlap tobanga lauhuai?
Makhatang huanah ka pai suaka, guama singsuan hingte en dingin, grep a pakmumta hiam chih leh pomgranet a pakpalhta hiam chih en dingin.
Ahihkeileh ka thei ngeita hia, ka khain ka lunglutna ka mipite kangtalai lakah a hon koihta hi.Hongkik in, hongkik in, Aw Salam mi; hongkik in, hongkik in, ka honna et theihna ding un.
Bangdia Salam mi en ding na hi ua, Mahanaim mite lam banga?
Hongkik in, hongkik in, Aw Salam mi; hongkik in, hongkik in, ka honna et theihna ding un.
Bangdia Salam mi en ding na hi ua, Mahanaim mite lam banga?
Khedap tungneilou ah na khepekte kilawm hina mahmah e, Aw lal tanu: Na pheipi guhtuahte suangmantam bang ahi ua, nasemmi pil khut nasep bang.
Na lai nou bem bang ahi, huaiah uain hel a kitasam ngei keia: na gilpi huit-buh bum lili pak siat dim a bang hi.
Na nawite zuktal nou nih phikte a bang ua.
Na ngawng saiha insang a bang; na mitte Barthrabbim kongpi kianga, Hesbona om tuilite a bang uh; na nak Lebenona insang a banga Damaska lam muhsukna.
Na tunga na lutang karmel a banga, na lua sam sandup a bang; huai sampha lakah kumpipa sala matin a om hi.
Aw it, kipahna dingin nak kilawmin nak nop hina mahmah chia!
Hiai na san dan tum sing bang ahia, na nawite grep gah bomte bang.
Tum singah ka kal tou dinga, huai ahiangte ka len ding, ka chi a: na nawite grepgui gahbom bang hi henla, huan na nawi gim apul bang;
Huan na kam uain hoihpenpen bang, ka ngaihnou adia nemtaka pai suk, ihmute muka tolh paisuak.
Ka ngaihnoua ka hi a, a deihlam kei lam ah a om.
Hong in, ka ngaihnou, gamah i pai khe dinga; kho neute ah i giak ding.
Grephuan lamah jingkhangin i thou khe dinga; grepgui a pakmumta hia, apakpalh a kihongta hia i va en ding, huan pomgranet a pak kheta hia: huailaiah ka itna ka honpe ding hi.Jawlzongpakin gimnamtui a suak saka, ka kongkhak uah thei manpha chi chih, athak leh a lui a om, nanga dingin ka nakhol khawm, aw ka ngaihnou.

Aw ka nu nawi ne, ka unaupa bang hile chin maw! po lamah nang kon muh leh, ka hontawp ding; ahi, kuamahin a honmusit kei ding uh.
Nang ka hon pi dinga, ka nu in sungah kon la lut dinga, aman kei a honhilh ding; uain namtui ka hondawn sak dinga, ka pomgranet tuining.
A khut veilam ka lutang nuaiah a om dinga, huan a khut taklamin a hon pom ding.
Ka honngen ahi, Aw Jerusalem tanute aw, hihbuai kei unla, it phawng kei un, a lungkim masiah.
Gamdai akipana hong tou hiai kua ahia, a ngaihnou tunga kingai?
Apul kung nuaiah ka honphawnga: huailaiah na nun nang a honveia, huailaiah nang hon piangsak amah nauveiin a om hi.
Na lungtanga suai bangin, na bana suai bangin kei hon koihin: itna lah sihna bangin a hat ngala; han bangin a gilou a: huaia kuangte mei kuangte bang ahi uh, TOUPA meikuang mahmah.
Tui tampiin itna a phelh theikeia, tuikhangten a tum thei sam kei ding hi: itna jiakin min a ina van tengteng pe ding hita leh, nakpitaka muhsitin a om ding hi.
Sanggamnu neu ka nei ua, nawi a neikei: amah adia thu a kigen ni chiangin ka sanggamnu uh adingin bang ka hih ding ua?
Kulhbang hi le bel, amah tungah dangka insang neu khat ka lam ding ua: huan kongkhak hita leh, amah sidar singpekin ka sungkhum ding uh.
Kulhbang ka hi a, ka nawite huaia insang bang ahi uh: huchihlaiin mi muanna musa bangin a mit ah ka om hi.
Baal-hanmon ah Solomonin grephuan a neia; kemmite kiangah grephuan a khel saka; huaia a gah adingin mi chihin dangka sang khat nen a hontawi ding uh ahi.
Ka grephuan, keia ahi a, ka maah a om: nang, Aw Solomon, sang na nei ding, huan huaia theigah kemten za nih.
Nang huante suanga teng, kithuahpihte na aw a ngai ua, huai honza sakin.Kin mengin, ka ngaihnou, gimlim mual tunga zuktal hiam sakhi tuailai hiam bangin om in.

Amoz tapa Isaiin Judate kumpipa Uzzia te, Jothamte, Ahaz te, Hezekia te lal laia, Judate leh Jerusalem tugtang thu-a kilakna a muh thu.
Vante aw, ngaikhia unla, lei aw, bil doh in, TOUPAN thu a gen hi: Tapate ka khoia ka khanglian saka, ka tungah lah a hel ngal ua.
Bawngtalin a neitu a theia, sabengtungin leng a pu anpiakna a thei: Israelten bel a theikei uh, ka miten a ngaihtuah kei uh, chiin.
Ah! nam gilou thulimlouhna gikpi pua mite, chi thil hoihlou hihte, ta hoihlou pi-a gamta sekte ahi ua: TOUPA a paisan ua, Israelte Mi Siangthou a musit ua, kihihtuamin a nungtolhta uh.
Bang achia hel sansana, vuaka om lailai na hi ua oi?
Lutang a pumin a chi a naa, lungtang leng a pumin a gimta.
Khepek nuaia kipana lutang phain damlai himhim a om kei; chikeh, vuak sidup ek, meima nai la ngen ahi: huaite lah a mek bing kei ua, tuam leng a tuam sam kei ua, sathau leng a nuh kei uh.
Na gam uh loihin a omkhita; na khuate uh meiin a kangkhinta: na gam uh gam dang miten na mitmuh un a neikhin ua, gam dang mite hihsiat bangin a sekhinta.
Zion tanu tuh grep huana vennabuk bang leh, tangmai huana buk bang leh, khopi um suak banga nutsiatin a omta.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hihmanthat bang tawmchik honna sit sakta lou hileh Sodom bangin i omkhin thamta ding ua, Gamorra bangin i omkhinta ding uhi.
Sodom vaihawmte aw, TOUPA thu ja un; Gomorra mite aw, i Pathian dan thu-ah bil doh un.
TOUPAN, Huzahzaha na kithoihna uh kei dinga bang ahia a thamatna om?
Belamtal haltuma latte leh gan vakthaute thauin a honnimta; bawngpate leh belam noute leh kelpate sisan ah leng ka kipak kei, a chi.
Ka maa kilan dinga na hongpai un, ka biakin huangsuang intual sik kuan a honphuta?
Thilpiak bangmahloute hontawi nawn kei un; banghiam gimlim kei adingin thil kihhuaipi ahi; kha thakte, khawlnite, khawmpite na kichial khawmte mawkmawk uh ka iplah mahmah; thulimlouhna ahi, kikhopna thupitak leng.
Na kha thakte uleh hunbi neia na ankuangluinate uh ka lungsimin a hua hi: kei adin tunggikna ahi; ka thuak chimta hi.
Huchiin na khut uh na jak chiang un leng ka mit kon humsan dia: ahi, tamveipi na thum chiang un leng ka ngaikhe kei ding: na khutte ulah sisanin a dim ngal a.
Kisil unla, kihihsiang un; ka mitmuh phaklouh din na thilhihte uh a gitouhna koih mang un; gilou hih tawpta uh:
Thil hoih hih kisinta unla; vaihawmna diktat zong un, nuaisiahna thuakte panpih unla, pa neiloute vaihawm sak unla, meithai thu gensak un, a chi hi.
TOUPAN, Hongpai un, ngaihtuah khawm dih ve ni!
Na khelhnate uh san au bangin aom mahleh, vuk bangin a ngou ding; san dup bangin san khin mahleh belam mul bangin a om ding.
Gennoptak leh thumanga na om uleh, na gam thil hoihte uh na ne ding uh:
Ahihhangin na ut kei ua na hel uleh, namsau nekkhitin na om ding uh: TOUPA kamin huai thu a genta hi, a chi a.
Bangchidan ahia khopi muanhuaitak kijuak a hongsuah maimah, vaihawm diktatnaa dimnu hi sek hi a! amahah diktatna a om seka, tun lah tualthatmite!
Na dangka eksia a honghita, na uain lah tui toh hel a hita.
Na mi liante mihel hat, guta te pawmte ahi uh; mi chihin golhna a deih ua, thilpiak a delh nak uhi: pa neiloute a hawmsak sek kei ua, meithaite makhua khualna leng a kiang uh a tung ngei sam kei hi.
Huaijiakin, TOUPA, Sepaihte TOUPA, Israelte Mi Hatin hichiin a chi!
A! hondoute tungah ka hehna ka tangtungsak dia, ka melmate tungah phu ka la ding:
Huan, na tungah ka khut ka kha dinga, na eksia siang sipsipin ka hihmang ding, na sikgawm tengteng ka la mang vek ding:
Huan, na sung vaihawmtute a tunga a om bang un ka omsak nawn dinga, na sunga lemtheimite a masapena a om bang un ka omsak lai ding hi: Huai khitchiangin, Diktatna khopi, khopi muanhuai, a honchi ding uhi.
Zion tun vaihawmna diktata hotkhiak a hita dinga, a sunga mi piangthak nawnte leng diktatnaa hotkhiak ahi ding uhi.
Ahihhangin mihelte leh mikhialte hihsiatna a kituakin a om dinga, TOUPA paisanmite leng hihanin a om ding uh.
Na tosaw deihmahmahte uh a zumpihta ding ua, na huan telte ujiakin zakta takin na om sin uhi.

Ni nanungte ah hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA in omna tang tuh tang lian tung te ah hihkipin a om dinga, tangneu khakhate tungah leng tawisanin a om ding; huailaiah nam chihte tuh a hoh juajua ding uhi.
Huan, chi tampite a hoh ding ua, Hongpai unla, TOUPA tangah, Jakob Pathian in ah, i hohtou ding uh; huchiin aman a lamte tanchinte a honsinsak dinga, a lampite ah ia ai ding, a chi ding uh; Zion akipanin dan thu lah a hongpawt sin ngala, TOUPA thu Jerusalem akipanin a hongpawt sin hi.
Huan, aman nam chih laka vai a hawm dinga, chi tampi tak leng a taihilh ding: huan, a temsaute uh leilahna muksum dingin a sek ding uh: nam dangin nam dang tungah tamsau a likta kei dinga, kidou dan leng a kisinta kei ding uhi.
Jakob inkuanpihte aw, hongpai un TOUPA vakah i vak ding uh.
Suahlam akipana dan hongpawttea a nadim ua, Philistiate banga aisansiamte a hih ua, gam dang mite tate toh khut a kilet jiak un, Na mi, Jakob inkuanpihte, lah na paisanta ngala.
A gam uh dangka leh dangkaengin a dima, a sumte uhlah simseng vual ahi kei; a gam uh sakolin a dima, a kangtalaite ulah simseng vual ahi kei.
A gam uh milimin a dima; a khut ua a sep khiak uh, a khutzungte ua a bawl uh, a be sek uhi.
Mi neute hihniamin a om ua, mi liante leng niamsakin a om uh: huaijiakin amau ngaidam ken.
TOUPA kihtakhuaina akipan leh a kilawmna thupina akipan suangpi ah lut unla, leivui ah bu un.
Mihing kideihnate hihniamin a om dinga, mite kisaktheihna niamsakin a om ding, huai niin TOUPA kia tawisanin a om ding hi.
Sepaihte TOUPA ni lah kingaisang leh kisathei tengteng tungah leh tawisanga om tengteng tungah a om sin ngala; huchiin, niamsakin a om ding uh:

Tang lian sangpipite tungah, tang neu tawisanga om tengteng tungah,
In sang sangpipite tungah, kulh bang tengteng tungah

Huainiin TOUPA kia tawisangin a om ding.
Huan, milimte a mang vengveng ding hi.
Huan, lei nakpipi-a lingsak dinga a thoh hun chiangin, TOUPA kihtakhuaina akipan leh a kilawmna thupina a kipanin mite suangpi hawmte leh lei kohawmte ah a lut ding uh.

Mi hat leh kidousiamte toh; vaihawmmi leh jawlneimi leh, aisansiam leh, upate toh;
Sawmnga heutu leh, mi zahtakhuai leh, lemtheimi leh, khutsiam leh jawlaisiam te toh.
Huchiin a mi liante ding ua om dingin naupangte ka pe dinga, naungekten a tunguah vai a hawm ding uh.

Huaichiangin amah a pau khe dinga, kei jaw bawlhoihtuin ka om sin kei hi; ka in ah lah nekding a om keia, silh leh ten lah a om kei: mite vaihawmpain non bawl kei ding, chiin.

Mi giloute tung a gik hi!

Ka mite jaw, amau nuaisiahtute naupangte a hita ua, numeiten a tunguah vai a hawmta uh.
Ka mite aw, nou honpiten a honpi khial ua, na paina lamte a hihse sek uhi.
TOUPA tuh genpih dingin a hongding khiaa, mite vaihawm dingin a hongdingta hi.
TOUPAN a mite upate tungah leh amau mi liante tungah vai a hawm ding: TOUPA, Sepaihte TOUPAN, Noute na hi uh, grep huan ne gaite; mi tangahte akipan sum lak na in uahte ahi a om:
Bang achia ahia ka mite na at ua, tagahte mai na gawijan uh? achia.
Huai louin TOUPA, Zion tanute kisathei taka a om ua, dak vuau vuau leh mi en loplopa a pai ua, a pai un a pai lohloh ua, a khete uh a suan ging thuapthuap jiak un.
TOUPAN Zion tanute lujangah maimakhem a omsak dinga, TOUPAN a zhmohte uleng a dawksak ding a chi hi.
Huai ni chiangin TOUPAN akizephoihnate uh a laksak dinga, khebulhte, len lukhu te, hakklote;
Bilbah kai ngaihngaihte, taute. kikhuhna puante;
Lutang puante, khebulh khainiang te, kawnga tente, gimlim bawmte, kikauna te;
Min sawnna zungbuhte, nakbulhte;
Ankuangluina vante, puannak tualte, puan silhte, kawljalte;
Limlangte, puanmalngatte, dial te, kituamhoihna puante.

Ka itluat thu, a grep huan tungtang thu, ka itluat adingin lain ka sata mai ding. ka itluatin tang lei hoih mahmahah grep huan a neia:
A kimvelin lei a tou kuaka, a suangte a tom sianga, grep gui hoih pen a suana, a laiah in sang alama, huailaiah grep sukna khuk leng a tou a: huchiin, grep gaha gah dingin a lamena, ahihhangin grep taklou a honggah maimah.
Tuin, Jerusalem omte leh Juda mite aw, hehpihtakin kei leh ka grep huan kala thu honngaihtuah dih ve ua.
Tua grep huanah ka hihsa akanaval a tungah hih nawnlai lai ding bang bang om a hita maia?
Bangjiakin ahia, grep gaha gah dinga ka lametet toh, grep taklou-a gah maimah?
Tuin ngai un, ka grep huan tungah ka hih ding ka honhilh ding: a ling dai ka la mang dinga, nek gaihin a om ding; a suang dai ka chim sak dinga, sikdenin a om ding:
Huan, ka hihse vek dinga; sat nouin om ken chin, tohvuiin leng om sam ken teh; loulingnei leh khau lingneite a pou zo ding: meite leng a tunga vuah himhim zu sak lou dingin thu ka pe ding hi.
Sepaihte TOUPA grep huan tuh Israel inkuanpihte ahi a, Juda mite lah a kung deihhuai tak ahi ngal ua; vaihawmna diktat a lemena; a hihhangin, ngaiin, nuaisiahna a hongom zota ahi: diktatna a lemena, a hihhangin, ngaiin, kilou husa a hongom zota hi.
Gam laizanga amau kia a om theihna ding ua mi om samna ding mun himhim omlou khop hiala in leh in kizomsak jel leh, lou leh lou kizomsak jeilte tung a gik hi.
Sepaihte TOUPAN ka bilah hichi bangin a chi, In tampi, lian pipi kilawm pipi, a teng ding omlouin a hawm vek ngeingei ding.
Grep huan tin sawm munah bath khat kia suak dingin a kisa, buh chi homer khat tuhin ephah khat kia suak dingin lah a kisa ngala, chiin.
Ju delh dinga jingkhang pipi-a thou-a, uainin a kham gawp sak mateng jan sawt pipi tana om sakte a tung uh a gik hi.
Tumging leh kaihgingte, khuangta leh tamngaite, uain toh a ankuangluina uahte a om seka, himahleh TOUPA nasep a ngaisang sek kei ua, a khut thihihte leng, a nagaihtuah ngei sam kei uhi.
Huaijiakin ka mite jaw, thiehna a neih louh jiak un, sala piin a omta ua: a mi zahtakhuaite uh a gil uh a kiala, a mipite uh dangtakin a dang uh a keu khinta hi.
Huaijiakin Sheolin a gilkialna a na liansaka, a kam tuh leh vuallouh khopin a kataa: huchiin a thupinate uh, a mipite uh, a thupi mahmahnate un, a lak ua kipak taka omte toh a lut suk ngoingoi uhi.
Mi nuete kunsakin a om ua, mi liante niamsakin a omta uhi;
Sepaihte TOUPA bel vaihawmnaa tawisangin a om zoota, Pathian, Mi Siangthou tuh, diktatnaa hihsiangthouin a omta hi.
Huan, belam noute a tatna mun ua a ta bang un a ta diamdiam ding ua, mi thau pipite mun sesaa thilte vakvaiten a ne ding uh.
Juautheihna khautea thulimlouhna kaia, kangtalai khaujena kaih banga khelhna kai sekte tung a gik hi!
I muhna dingin hih meng henla, a thilhih ding hih kin leh; i theihna dingin Israelte Mi Siangthou lemtheih tuh hongaiin nongtung hen, chi gigete ngei.

Amau pila kingalhtuahte leh amau mit muha teite a tung uh a gik hi!
Uain dawn lama mi hat tak, ju hel lama thagui nei mite a tung uh a gik!
Golh nek jiaka mi gilou siamtangsak seka, mi diktat diktatna laksak sekte ngei.
Hauijiakin meikuangin buhpawl a liak bei dundun sek bangin leh loupa keu meikuanga a puk zungzung sek bangin a zung uh a muatna bangin a om dinga, a pak uh leivui bangin a tungkah lunglung ding: Sepaihte TOUPA dan a deih kei ua, Israelte Mi Siangthou thu a ngaihneu jiak un.
Huijiakin TOUPA a mite tungah a heh mahmaha, a tunguah a khut a lika, a vuaa, huchiin tangte khawng a ling vonvon ua, a luangte uh kongzing lakah ninbulom bangin a om venvon a.
Huchi tela a hihin leng a hehna lah a dai kei a, a khut a lik lailai hi.
Nam chih gamla taka mite adingin chiamtehna a tak khe dinga, kawl-monga kipan sam dingin a singsit ding: huchiin, ngaiin, amaute tuh kintakin a hongpai pah ding uh:
Amau lakah kuamah a gim kei ding ua, a kisui sam kei ding uh; kuamah a lusu kei ding ua, a ihmu sam kei ding uh; a kawnggak ulah phel kolin a om kei dinga, a khedap gakna leng a tan sam kei ding:
A thalte uh a zum mahmaha, a thalpeu tengteng uh laisain a om keukou a; a sakol chinte uh meisahsuang a banga, a kangtalai khete uh leng pingpei a bang hi.
A husa ging honhon uh humpinelkai humham bang mai ahi.
Humpinelkai lunlai humham bang maiin a ging honhon hi: ahi, a ging honhona, a samat ding uh a man ua, bittakin a pai mang pih ua, kuamahin a honkhe theikei hi.Huai niin tuipi ging hawhaw bangin a tunguah a ging hawhaw ding ua: Huchiin min gam a honet uleh, ngaiin, mial leh mangbatna ngen ahi a, vak lah huaia mitea hihmialin a om hi.
Huai niin tuipi ging hawhaw bangin a tunguah a ging hawhaw ding ua: Huchiin min gam a honet uleh, ngaiin, mial leh mangbatna ngen ahi a, vak lah huaia mitea hihmialin a om hi.
Kumpipa Uzzia a sih kumin TOUPA laltutphah sang tak tawisana tu ka mu a, a puansilh mong tualin baikin a dimsak vek hi.
A kiangah serafte a ding ua; kha guk chiat a nei ua, a kha nihte un a mai uh a khuh ua, nihin a khepekte uh a khuh ua, nihin a leng uhi.
Huan, Sepaihte TOUPA a siangthou hi, a siangthou hi, a siangthou hi, lei pumpi a thupinain a dim, chiin, a kikou tuahsek uhi.
Huchiin a kikou husain kongpi bul suangphum nasanin a ling sak dudupa, in tuh meikhuin a dimta hi.
Huaitakin, ken, Muk nin pu mi ka hi-a, muk nin pu mite laka om ka hih jiakin ka tung gik hina tele! mangthang ka hita ve; ka mitin lah kumpipa, sepaihte TOUPA, a muta ngala, ka chi hi.

Ngaiin, thulimlouhna lakmang a hita, na khelhna leng sawpsiang a hita, a chi a.

Huchiin, ken, kei hiaiah ka om, honsawl ve, ka chi a.

Huan, ken, TOUPA bangtan ahi dia? ka chi a.
Huan, aman, hondawnga.
Khopite a teng ding beia suksiata a oma, inte a mi beia a oma, gam hoih sipsipa a om,
TOUPAN mite gamla pi-a a suana, gamsunga mun paisansa tampi a om masiah.Huan, a sungah sawm lakah khat leng omlai om leh nek khitin a om behlap ding uhi: ahihhangin nahhi let tosaw phukkhit nunga a bul a om nilouh bangin chi siangthou a bul om nilouhlouh ahi, kachi.
Huan, a sungah sawm lakah khat leng omlai om leh nek khitin a om behlap ding uhi: ahihhangin nahhi let tosaw phukkhit nunga a bul a om nilouh bangin chi siangthou a bul om nilouhlouh ahi, kachi.
Huan, Uzzia tapa Jotham tapa Ahaz lal laiin hichi ahi.
Suria kumpipa Rezin leh Israel kumpipa Remalia tapa Peka Jerusalem sim dingin a kuantou ua; himahleh a zou kei uhi.
Huan, David inkuanpihte, Suria Ephraim toh a pang khawmta uh, chiin, a hilh ua, Huchiin a lungtang leh a khua leh tuite lungtang, gam nuai singte huiihin a mutling suausuau bangin, hilhiniin a hongomta hi.
Huchiin TOUPAN Isai kiangah, Nang leh na tapa Shear-jashuba, dil saknung zopen tuilakna tawpah, Puansawpmi Gam lamlianah, Ahaz dawn dingin kuan khia unla;
A kiangah, Pilvang inla om kinken in; meisel sum khu leh nih, Suria ton Rezin leh Remalia tapa hehna thupitak, khita kenla, na lungtang taikek kei heh.
Suriain, Ephraim leh Ramalia tapa toh nangmah tunga gitlouh a sawmtak jiakin, chiin a chi.
Juda dou dingin kuantou niin, vahihlau ni, eimah ading ngeiin i vazou dia, a laitakah Tabeel tapa kumpipain i tusak ding, chiin.
TOUPAN hichibangin a chi: A thu sawm uh a piching kei dinga, a vuaksuak ding.

Huan, TOUPAN Ahaz a houpih nawna.

Huan, aman, David inkuanpihte aw, tuin ngaihe dih ua; mihing hihgim thil neuchik din na sep uh ahi maw, ka Pathian nangawn hihgim na ut jel uh?
Huaijiakin TOUPA mahmahin chiamtehna nou a honpe ding; ngai un, nungak siangthou khat a gai dinga, tapa a nei dinga, a min dingin Immanuel a sa ding uh.
Aman thil hoihlou lam deihlouhnadan a theih chiangin leh, thil hoih lam deihnadan a theih chaingin bawngnawitui dat leh khuaiju a ne sek ding.
Naupang tuh hilh hoihlou lam deihlouna dan tuh thil hoih deihna dan a theih maiin leng kumpipa nih na gam huatte taisanin a om sin hi, a chi a.
Ephraimin Juda a nutsiat ni akipan tung ngei nai lou nite TOUPAN na tungah leh, na khua leh tuite tungah leh, na pa inkunpihte tungah a tungsak ding, Asuria kumpipa mahmah.
Huai ni chaingin hichi ahi dinga, TOUPA Aigupta lui naka thou om leh, Asuria gama khuai om, sam dingin a singsit ding.
Huchiin a hongpai ding ua, a vek un guamse lekluk ahte, suangpi hawm ahte, loulingnei tengteng ahte, gan tatna mun tengteng ah a tu dinh uh.
Huai ni chiangin TOUPAN mulmettem khelhin, Luipi khen gama Asuria kumpipa om zangin, lutang leh khe mul a met siang dinga; khamul leng a met mang vek ding.
Huchiin huai ni chiangin hichi ahi dinga, mi khatin bawngla khat leh belam nih kia a vul ding;

Huan, haui ni chiangin hichi ahi dinga, mun chih, grep gui sang, dangka sang man omna peuhmahte loulingnei leh khuallingnei omna lel a hita ding.
Gam pupi loulingnei leh khuallingnei ngen a honghihtak jiakin huaiah thal leh thalpeu tawiin a pai ding uhi.Huan, tang, tuipi-a tohsa tengah, loulingnei leh khualingnei kihtak jiakin na honpai kei dinga, bawngtalte tatsakna leh belam ngah ding lel a hita ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, tang, tuipi-a tohsa tengah, loulingnei leh khualingnei kihtak jiakin na honpai kei dinga, bawngtalte tatsakna leh belam ngah ding lel a hita ding hi, a chi a.

Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah a gen nawna,
Hiai chiten Siloah tui awla luang diahdiahte a deihlouh jiak un leh, Rezin leh Remalia tapa tunga akipah un,
Ngaiin, TOPAN Luipi tui, khuah mahmahte leh tem mahmahte (Asuria kumpipa leh a thupina tengteng), a tunguah a luang sak ding: huchiin a piau tengteng leng a let zoizoi ding:
Huan, Judate gam tuamin a luang lut dawdaw dinga; ngawng leng a tumpha hial ding; huan, a kha jakin, Immanuel aw, na gam vailam tengteng a khak vek ding.

Thu kikum unla, bangmah hi peuh kenteh; thugen unla, piching peuh kenteh: Pathian i kiangah a om ngala, chiin.
TOUPA khut hattakin hichiin ka kiangah a gen, hiai chite lampi-a ka pai tei louhna dingin honthuzoh ei ve:
Hiai chiten, Sawm a nei uh, a chih sek teng uh, Sawm a nei uh, chihpih kei un, a kihtak sek teng uzong nou jaw kihta kei unla, lau leng laupih sam kei un.

Mi mial nuaia vakten vak thupitak a mutu ua: sihna lim gama omte tung mahmah ah vak a hongvakta hi.

Samari khua Damaska khua bang hita lou ahi maw?

Aman, Ka khut hatnain ka hiht hi, ka pilna tohin; ka kizen ngala; chih chih gamgite khawng lah ka suana, a vaihawmna uh lah ka suta, laltutphaha tute lah mi hangsan hih bangin ka kai khia hi.
Ka khutin chi chih hausaknate lah vasa bu bangin a zong khiaa; min vasa tuia pi loihsansa a la uh bangin lei tengteng ka la khinvekta hi; ka jap hiam, kam ka hiam ham hiamhim hiam leng a om kei uhi, a chi vial ngala.

Huaijiakin TOUPA, Sepaihte, TOUPAN, a mi thaute lakah gawnna a sawl dinga; a thupina nuaiah mei kuang lai lel bangin mei tohin a om ding.
Huan, Israelte vakna mei a honghi dinga, a Mi Siangthou mah uleng meikuang ahi ding; huaiin ni khat thuin loulingneite leh khaulingneite a kangsakin a hihmangthang ding.
A gammang leh a lei hoih mun thupina leng, kha leh sa nasanin, a hihmang ding; huchiin, chiamtehna tawipen kia hun lai bang ahi ding.
A gammanga sing om sek laite naupang gelh tham pheta tawm a hita ding.
Huan, huainiin hichi ahi dinga, Israelte omzek laite leh Jakob inkuanpihte laka a damlaiten amaute thatpa a muang nawnta kei ding ua; TOUPA Israelte Mi Singthou, chihtaktakin a muang zota ding uhi.
A om zek lai.
Jakob om zeklaite, Pathian hattak kiang ah a kik nawn ding uh.
Na mi Israelte tuipi piaunel zahin om mah le uh, a om zek laite kia a kik nawn sin ngal ua; diktatna luan letna suksiatna lah tung dinga vaihawmpuk ahi.

Huaijiakin, TOUPA, Sepaihte TOUPAN, hichiin a chi, Ziona om ka mite aw, Aigupta gama a hih bang un khetbuk a nou honvuain achiang na tunguah lik mah leh, Asuria mi jaw kihta kei un.
Sawtlou chik nungin ka lungkimlouhna hongbei dia, ka hehna leng amaute hihmanthatna dia heiin a omta ding hi.

Huai niin hi chi ahi dinga, puakgik na liangjanga kipana lakmangin a om dinga, a hakkol leng na ngawngnga kipana lakmangin a om lai ding hi; thau nilh jiakin hakkol lah hihsiatin a omta dinga, chiin.

Jesai bul akipanin selnou a hongpawt dinga, a zungtea kipanin ahiang a hongkhang khe ding;
Huan TOUPA kha pilna leh theihtheihna kha, lemtheihna leh hatna kha theihna leh TOUPA launa kha a tungah a tu ding
Huchiin a kipahna a TOUPA launaah ahi ding A mita a muh bangin vai a hawm kei dinga a bil a a jal bangin leng a taihilh sam kei ding
Gentheite diktat takin vai a hawm sak zo dinga, lei mi thunuailutte adingin khentuam neilouin a taihilh sak lai ding hi; a kama khetbukin lei a khen dinga, a muka huin mi gilousaloute a that ding.
Huan, diktatna a kawnggakna ahi dinga, ginomna a taigakna ahi ding hi.
Huan, ngia lah belamnou toh a om khawmta ding ua, gialbem kelnou toh a bok khawm ta ding uh, bawng nou leh humpinelkai tuai lai leh gan vak thaute a om khawm ta ding ua; naupangnouin a pi zungzung ding hi.
Huan, bawng leh vompi a gamta khawm ding ua; a noute uh a bok khawm chiptep ta ding uh; huan humpinelkaiin bawngtal bangin buhpawl a neta ding.
Huan, nau nawitui ne lai thangtom ko geiah a om hiathiat dinga, nau nawitui nek tawpsain guldekpak ko geiah a khut a nga ding
Ka tang siangthou mawngmawngah kihihnat a omta kei dinga, kihihsiat leng a om nawnta kei ding, tuitein tuipi a khuh gige bangin, lei TOUPA theihnain a dim khin vek sinta hi.
Huan, huai niin hichi ahi dinga, Jesai zung mi chih chiamtehna dinga ding, amah mahmah nam chihin a dong ding ua, a khawlna mun lah thupi ding hi.
Huan, huai niin hichi ahi dinga, TOUPAN a si val om sun a mite, Asuria gam akipan bang, Aigupta gam akipan bang, Pathros gam akipan bang, Kus gam akipan bang, Elam gam akipan bang, Sinar gam akipan bang.
Hamath khua akipan bang, tuipi tuikulhgam akipan bang, a la nawndinga a nihveina dingin a khut a jak nawn ding.
Huan nam chih adingin chiamtehna a takkhe dinga, Israel delhkhiakte a pikhawm dinga, Juda dalhte kawlmong li akipan a pikhawm ding
Huchiin, Ephraimte hajatna a beita dinga, Judate hihbuaimite hihmanthatin a omta ding uh; Ephraimten Judate a haza nawnta kei ding ua, Judaten leng Ephraimte a hihbuai nawn kei ding uh.
Huchiin, amaute tuh tumlamah Philistiate liangjangah leng suk in a va tuang ding ua; suahlam mite a lok khawm ding uh; Edom leh Moabte tungah a khut uh a kha ding ua, Ammon suanten a thu uh a mangta ding uh.
Huan, TOUPAN Aigupta tuipi lei a hihse vek dinga, Luipi leng a huih sa huthutin a khut a sin khum dinga, luita khepek leng kawt louin a pai galkah ding.Huchiin, Aigupta gam akipan a pattouh ni-ua adinga lamlian a hongom bangin, a sibang om sun a mite adingin Asuria gam akipanin lamlian a hongom ding hi.

Huai ni chiangin hichi bangin na chi dinga.
TOUPA aw, kipahthu ka hon hilh hi; ka tungah na hehta mah lechin, na hehna lah a daita, nang honkhamuante neive.
Ngaiin, Pathian lah honhondampa ahi a; ka gingta dinga, lauin ka om kei ding; TOUPA Jehova lah ka hatna leh ka la ahi ngala, honhondampa leng ahi, chiin.
Huaijiakin hotdamna tuikhuk akipan nuamin tui na tai ding uh.
Huan, huai niin hichiin na chi ding.
TOUPA kiangah kipahthu hilh unla, a min lou unla, a thilhihte mi chih lakah theisak unla, a min pahtawiin a om chih gen un.
TOUPA pahtawiin lasa un; aman lah thil hoihpente a nahihta ngala; huai tuh lei tengtengah theihin om hen.Ziona omte aw, ngaihtakin kikou unla, kikou vengvung un, Israelte Mi Siangthou na lak ua om lah a thupi ngala, chiin.

Babulon kho puak gik Amoz tapa Isaiin a muh thu.
Mi liante kongpitea a lut theihna ding un tang mai velvul ah chiamtehna tak khia unla, ngaih takin amau sam unla, khutin hihdingdan hilh un.
Kei mahmahin ka mi sehte thu ka peta, ahi, ka mi hat tak, ka mi kinuamsakte, ka hehna tangtung sak dingin ka samta hi.
Tua! tanga mipi husa, mipi a tamatam husa bang mahmah!
Tua! nam chih gama mi om khawmte chiak vengvung husa! sepaihte TOUPAN gal sual dinga sepaihte kaikhawm eive.
Amaute, TOUPa leh a lungkumlouhna vanzat, gam gamlapi akipan, kawlmong tawpna mahmah akipanin gam tengteng hihse dingin a hong pai uhi.

Huaijiakin khut tengteng a hat kei ding a, mihing lungtang chiteng leng a zulmang ding:
Huan, a lau ding ua; damlouhna leh lungkumlouhnaten amaute a man dinga; numei nauvei bangmaiin a chi uh a na ding; lamdang kisa tuahin a om chiat ding uh; a melte uh meikuang mel bang ahi ding.
Ngaiin, gam hihse ding leh huailaia mikhialte a sunga kipata hihmangthang dingin TOUPA ni thupitakin, thangpaihna leh hehna thupi tak toh, a hongtung sin hi.
Van aksite leh aksimunkipte un a vakna uh a suaksak kei ding ua; ni lah a suah laiin mialsakin a om dinga, khain leng a vakna a vaksak sinta kei ahi.
Huan, khovel a gitlouhna jiakin ka gawt ding a, mi gilousaloute a thulimlouhna jiak un ka gawt sam ding.
Huan, mi kisathei paukhauh lah ka tawpsak dinga, mi kihtakhuai kisaktheinna lah ka niamsak lai ding hi.
Mi tuh dangkaeng siangthou sanga leng hak jawin ka bawl dinga, mihing mahmah lah Ophir dangkaeng siangthou sanga leng hak jawin ka bawl ding.
Huchiin tunga van ka kisingsak dinga, sepaihte TOUPA hehna jiakin, a hehna ni thupi tak niin, lei leng a omna mun kisuan thamin linsakin a om ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, sakhi delh ek bang leh belam kuamah hawlkhawm louh dingin mi chih amau chipihte lam chiat a nga ding ua, mi chih amau gam lam chiatah a taimang ding uh.
Muha om peuhmah dawt pailetin a om dinga, huan, mata om peuhmah namsaua sat paihin a om ding.
A naungekte uleng a mit muh un jan dimdem khopa lei satnaa zatin a om ding uh; a inte uh lohin a om dia, a jite uh leng mawksual tuakin a om ding uh.
Ngaiin, Mediate amau sual dingin ka tokthou dinga, huaiten dangka a limsak kei ding ua, dangkaeng leng a kipahpih kei ding uh.
A thalpeute un tangvalte a ansak dinga; mi gila gah hehpihna himhim a neikei ding uh; a mit un naupangte a hawi kei ding uh.
Huan, Babulon, gam chih thupina, Kaldaite kisaktheihpih thil hoihtak, Pathianin Sodom leh Gomorra a sukman lai bangin a om ding uh.
Chikchiang inleng huailaiah mi a om nawnta kei ding uh, suan om lai siah inleng a sunga om a om sam kei ding; Arab miten lah huailaiah a puaninte uh a kai sam kei ding ua; belam chingten lah huailaiah a belam honte uh a kualsak sam kei ding uh.
Gamdaia gam sate huailaiah a om ding ua; a inte uh thil hing ngui mahmahtein a dim dinga; vasangawngsaute huailaiah a teng ding ua, sathakte huailaiah a mawl leklek a ding uh.Huan, ngaite a insangte uah a ham ding ua, sihalte leng a inpi nuam mahmahte uah a ham ding uh; huan, a gawt hun ding a tung sinta a, a nite leng a suksauin a om kei ding hi.
Huan, ngaite a insangte uah a ham ding ua, sihalte leng a inpi nuam mahmahte uah a ham ding uh; huan, a gawt hun ding a tung sinta a, a nite leng a suksauin a om kei ding hi.
TOUPAN Jakobte a hehpih dinga, Israelte telin amau gam ngeingeiah lah a omsak sin ngala; Huan, gam dang miten amau a jui ding ua, Jakob inkuanpihte a lenkip ding uhi.
Huan, mi chihin amaute a pi ding ua, a mun ding uh a tun ding uhi; huchiin Israel inkuanpihten TOUPA gamah amau salpa leh salnuin a nei ding ua; amau sala neimite salin a honman ding ua; amaute simmohte tungah vai a honhawm ding uhi.
Huan, na lungkhamnaa kipan bang, na buainaa kipan bang, nasep haksapipi a honsepsakna ua kipante bangin TOUPAN nang a honkhawlsak ni chiangin hichi ahi ding hi.

Himahleh, Sheolah, kokhuk tawpah, pi khiak sukin lah na om sin ngala,
A honmu peuhin hon lim et ding ua, Hiai mi maw lei hihlinga, gam chih kisingsaka,
Khovel gamdai banga bawla, a kho omte hihmanga, a salte a inlam ua pai dia pawtsak ngei lou? chiin, na tanchin a sut ding uh.
Nam chih kumpipa tengteng, a vek un, amau in chiat uah thupi takin a ihmu ua,
Nang bel a hunlou-a piang kihhuaitak bangin leh, gal thah, namsaua sut pailet, kokhuka thante laka pai sukte puansilh bangin na han in akipan gamlapi-a paihkhiakin na omzota hi; luang sikden bang maiin.

Kumpipa Ahaz sih kumin hiai puakgik a hongomta.
Philistia gam pumpi aw, nangmah vuakna chiang a kitantak jiakin kipak ken: gul zunga kipanin guldekpak a pawt sin ngala, a gah tuh gul kuang leng thei a honghi ding hi.
Mi genthei ta masaten a ne un a ta ding ua, mi tangahte leng bit takin a om ding uh; huan, nang a zung bel kialin ka hihlum dinga, nanga om sunte thahin a om dng uh.
Kongkhak aw, mau tuaituai in; khopi aw, kikouin; Philistia aw, na pumin na zulmang khinta; mal lama kipanin lah meikhu a hongpawt ngala, a hun seh uah tuantual himhim a om ngei kei uh.Philistia nam palaite bangchi bangin i dawng ding ua?

Moab gam puakgik.
Jan khatin Moab gama Ar khua suksiatin a oma, bangmahlou-a bawlin lah a omta ngala; jan khat in Moab gama Kir khua suksiatin a oma, bangmahlou-a bawlin lah a omta ngala.
Dibon tanu, mun sangtea, kap dingin a hohtoutaa; Moabten Nebo leh Medeba a kah khum ua, a lu tengteng uh a giau veka, a khamul teng uleng metin a om vekta hi.
A kongzingte uah saiip puan a teng ua: a in tunguahte leh a kholak khawng uah mi chih nakpipiin a mau tuaituai uh.
Huan, Heshbonte leng a kikou ua, Elealehte toh; Jahaz kho lamin leng a aw uh a ja uhi: huaijiakin Moabte galvana kivante ngaihtakin a kikou ua; a hinna uh a sung uah a ling hi.
Moabte jiakin ka lungtang a kikou a; a mi hoihte uh Zoar khua leh Eglath-shelishijah ah a tai ua: Hornaim lampi ah siatna kikouin a kikou khia uhi.
Nimrim tuite lah hihsiatin a om sin ngal ua: loupa lah a vuai khina, loupa selnoute a vuaia, thil hing himhim lah a omta ngal kei hi.
Huaijiakin, a sum neih sunte u leh a koih hoihte uh Muisum Lui gal a kai mang pih uhi.
Kikou husa lah Moab gamgi kim khawngah a thang ngala; a mau tuaituai husa Eglaim khua a tungta hi.Dimon tuite lah sisanin a dim vek ngala: Dimon tungah thil thupi diak ka tungsak sin ngala, Moabte laka taikhiate tungah leh, huai gama om sunte tungah humpinelkai ka tungsak ding hi.
Dimon tuite lah sisanin a dim vek ngala: Dimon tungah thil thupi diak ka tungsak sin ngala, Moabte laka taikhiate tungah leh, huai gama om sunte tungah humpinelkai ka tungsak ding hi.
Gam vaihawmmi adingin belam noute Sela khua gamdai lama om akipanin Zion tanu tang ah khak un.
Huchiin, Moab tanute vasa a bu akipan dalha lengleng bangin Arnon lui kaite ah a om ding uhi.
Thu honhilh inla, vai hon hawmsak in: na lim sun laiin jan bangin bawl inla; delhkhiakte bu sakin; taimang mansak ken.
Moab laka mi delhkhiaka omte na kiang ah om uhen; amau adingin hihsemi mela kipan bukna mun hi hen: lepgumi lah bangmahlou-a- bawlin a omta ngala, hihsiatna a daitaa, nuaisiahnate gama kipana hihmanthatin a omta uh.
Huchiin laltutphah hehpihnaa hihkipin a om dinga, huai tungah, David puanin ah, mi khat, vaihawmin, vaihawmna diktat zongin, thil diktat kin taka hih pahin, chih taktakin a tu ding hi.
Moabte kisaktheihna thu, a kisathei mahmah uh chih, ka naja ua: a suahngal dan uleh, a kisaktheih dan ulah, a hehdan thu uh; a kiotsaknate uh bangmah ahi kei hi.
Huaijiakin Moabte tuh Moabte tungah a mau tuaituai ding ua, mi chih a mau tuaituai ding uh: Kirhareseth grep beu khase tuntunin na kah ding uhi.
Hesbon loute lah a tul khinta ngala, Sibmah grep gui toh: nam chih kumpipaten a kung hoih tata akitansak phengphung ua: Jazer kho tantanin a jam ua, gamdai ah a jam lut ua; ahiangte a jam dalh sengsunga, tuipi ah a jam galkah ta.
Huaijiakin Sibmah grep gui tuh Jazer kahin ka kah dinga: Heshbon leh Elealeh aw, ka khituiin ka honbuak ding: na nipi gahte tung leh na buh tungah kisual kikou husa a keta ngala.
Kipahna laksakin a omta, lou hoih taka kipanin leng nopna laksakin a omta a; grep huanah lasak himhim a omta kei dinga, husa noptuak himhim leng a om nawn sam kei ding: grep sukna khukte ah chila sukmi mi himhimin uain a chilkhe ta kei ding uh; grep laa kikou ka daisak ta.
Huaijiakin ka gilte lah Moab hehpihnain pekging bangin a ginga, ka gilsung lah Kir-heres hehpihnain pekging bangin a ging lai hi.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, Moab a kilat chiangin mun sanga kihihgima, thum dinga a mun siangthou a a hongpai chiangin a vuaksuak ding hi.
Huaite Moab tungthu TOUPAN tuma a gen ahi.Tuin bel TOUPAN, Kilohmi kum sima kum thum sungin Moab, thu pina, a mipi thupitakte nasanin, muhsithuaia omsakin a om dinga; a om sunt tawm chik mahmah, gen tham louh ahi ding uh, chiin a genta.

Aigupta gam puakgik, Ngaiin, TOUPA meipi hattak tunga tuangin, Aigupta gam a hongtungta, Aigupta gam millimte a maah a ling vonvon ding ua, Aiguptate lungtang lah a sung uah a zulmang mai ding.
Huan, Aigupta mite Aigupta mite mah sual dingin ka tokthou dinga; huchiin mi chihin amau unau sualin mi chihin amau insakinkhang sualin, a kikap ding uh; hua leh khua a kisual ding ua, gam leh gam a kisual ding uh.
Huchiin, Aiguptate kha a sung uah bangmahlou a bawlin a om dinga; a thusawm uh ka hihse ding; huchiin, milimte leh, bumsiamte thu a dong ding uh.
Huan, Aigupta mite heutu tatse tak khutah ka pekhe dinga; huchiin kumpipa hangsanin a tunguah vai a hawmta ding, TOUPA, sepaihte TOUPAN a chi hi.
Huan, tuipi tuite a kang ding ua, lui lah a luang mangin a kangtat ta ding.
Luite lah a namsia uh a; Aigupta gam tuiluangte lah a kiam hiaihiai ding uh, a kang tat mai ding a; phailuangte leh tui loupate a vuai khin ding hi.

Huan, a suangkhuamte hihjanin a om dinga, kiloh sek mi tengteng a lungsim un a lungkham ding uh.
Zoan khuaa mi liante a hai hial ding ua, Pharo mipil pente lemtheihna sa lemtheihna bang lel a hong hita: Pharo kiangah, Mi pil tapa, nidanglai kumpipate tapa ka hi, bangchi dana chi sek na hi ua?
Na mi pilte koia om ahi ua? amau honhilh pah ngal uhen; Aigupta gam tunga thil tung ding, sepaihte TOUPA sehte, thei uhen.
Zoan khuaa mi liante mi hai a hong hita ua, Noph khuaa mi liante khem in a omta uh; Aigupta namte ninga suangten Aiguptate lah a vak mang saktaa.
TOUPAN Aiguptate lakah phengphitna kha a omsakta; huchiin zukham mi a luaka a hoidoidoi bangin Aiguptate a nasep chiteng uah a paikawi sakta uh.
Aiguptate adingin lutangin hiam, meiin hiam, tum nahhiangin hiam, pumpengin hiam a sepsak theih a om nawnta kei ding hi.
Huai ni chiangin Aiguptate numeite bang ahi ding ua: Sepaihte TOUPA khut sin a tung ua aki sin jiakin a ling un a lau ding uhi.
Juda gama omte aiguptate adingin mulkimhuaitak a honghita ding ua, a min uh alohna peuh uah a kikta ding ua, amau tunga tung ding sepaihte TOUPA thuseh jiakin.
Huai ni chiangin Kanate paua pau leh, sepaihte TOUPA kiangah kichiamna thuchiam sekte, Aigupta gamsungah kho nga a om dinga: khat tuh Ni Khopi a chi ding uh.
Huai ni chiangin Aigupta laitakah TOUPA adingin maitam a om dinga, a gamgi-ah TOUPA adingin suangphuh a om ding.
Huai tuh Aigupta gama sepaihte TOUPA adingin chiamtehna leh theihna ahi ding: nuaisiahtte jiakin lah TOUPA a sam sin ngala ua, huchiin aman hondampa leh humbitpa a sawl dinga, aman amaute a honkhe ding.
Huchiin TOUPA Aiguptate theih a hita dinga, Aigupta miten huai ni chiangin TOUPA a theita ding uh: ahi, kithoihna leh thilpiakin a be ding ua, a tangtun lai ding uhi.
Huan, TOUPAN Aiguptate a vo ding a, a vo dinga, a hihdam lai ding; huchiin TOUPA kiangah a kik nawn ding ua, aman amaute ngetnate jain amaute a hihdamding hi.
Huai ni chiangin Aigupta gam akipanin Assuria gam phain lam lian a om dinga; huchiin Assuria mite Aigupta gamah a hoh ding uh; Aigupta leng Assuria gamah a hoh ding uh.
Aigupta miten Assuria mite toh Pathian a be khawmta ding uhi.
Huai ni chiangin Israelte Aiguptate leh Assuriate toh a thumna ahi ding ua, lei laizang takah vualjawlna ahi ding uh:Sepaihte TOUPAN, Ka mi Aiguptate leh ka khut suak Assuriate leh ka goutan Israelte vualjawlin om uhen, chiin, vual a jawl ngala.

Huan, amah, kilhna mun kiptaka a kilh ngiungeu bang un, ka hihkip ngiungeu dinga: huchiin amah tuh a pa inkuanpihte adingin laltutphah thupi mahmah ading ahi ding hi.
Huan, amahah a pa inkuanpihte thupina tengteng a bang vek ding ua, a tate leh a suante, tuiumbelsuan neu chiteng, belhbu tuiumbelsuan akipan tui koihna tuiumbelsuan tengteng tanin.Huai niin, kilhna, mun kip taka kilh ngiungeu-a omin a nangzou kei dinga; sat khiaka omin, a keta dinga, a tunga thil gik om lah hihmanthatin a omta dinga; TOUPAN huai lah a genta ngala, sepaihte TOUPAN a chi, chiin.

Tura kho puakgik.

Enin, Kaldaite gam; hiai mite a omta kei uh; Assuria miin gamdaia gamsate adingin a septa hi; a insangte uh a lam ua, huaia inpite a hihmang ua, in siain a bawlta.
Tarsish long liante aw, mau tuaituai un; na kulhte uh hihsiatin a om ta hi.
Huan, huai niin hichi ahi dinga, Tura khua, kumpipa khat kum sima, kum sawm sagih sung mangngilhin a om ding; kum sawmsagih man nungin kijuak laa a gen bang un Tura kho tungah a hongtung ding.
Nang kijuak mite mangngilhsa nung kaihging la inla, kho kimah vakin, kaihging kai inla, ka tampi sa in theiha na om nawn theihna dingin.
Huan, kum sawmsagih a man nungin hichi ahi dinga, TOUPAN Tura khua a pha dinga, huchiin huai minu a loh delhin a om nawn dinga, leitunga khovel gam tengteng lakah kijuakin a om ding.Huan, a sum muhkhiak leh a loh TOUPA adingin thil siangthou ahi ding; huailah kholkhawmin hiam, koihkhawmin hiam a om kei dinga, a sum muhkhiak TOUPA maa omte adingin ahi sin ngala, niang leh taia a nek ding uleh, puansilh thupi tak a neih theihna ding un.
Huan, a sum muhkhiak leh a loh TOUPA adingin thil siangthou ahi ding; huailah kholkhawmin hiam, koihkhawmin hiam a om kei dinga, a sum muhkhiak TOUPA maa omte adingin ahi sin ngala, niang leh taia a nek ding uleh, puansilh thupi tak a neih theihna ding un.
Ngaiin, TOUPAN lei a awngsakin, a sesak sina, a lumlet dinga, a omte a dalhsak sin hi.
Huan, vantang tunga om bangin siampu tungah leng a om ding; bawipa tunga a om bangin a pu tungah leng a om ding; bawinu tung a om bangin a pi tungah leng a om ding; a leimi tunga a om bangin, a khawngmi tungahleng a om ding; leitawisakmi tunga a om bangin a kianga apung pemi tungah leng a om ding.

TOUPA aw, nang lah ka Pathian na hi a; kon pahtawi ding, na min ka phat ding; thillamdang tak, nidanglaia vaihawmte, ginomte, ginomtak leh thutakin na hih ngala.

Huaijiakin mi hat mahmahten a honpahtawi ding ua, nam kihtakhuai mahmah khopiin a honkihta ding uhi.
Mi kihtakhuaite hu huihpiin bang a hongom chiangin, nang jaw mi genthei adingin bukna, tagah mangbang lai adingin bukna, huihpi laka kihumbitna, nisa liahna lah na hisek ngala.
Mun keua kho lum na daisak jel bangin, gamdang mite husa na daihsak bangin; kho lum meipi liaha daihsaka a om sek bangin, mi kihtakhuaite lasa daihsakin a om ding hi.
