Na misite a hing nawn ding ua; ka mi luangte a thou nawn ding uh.
Leivuia omte aw, halh unla, nuamtakin lasa un: na daitui lah khovak daitui bang ahi a, leiin lah misite a paikhe sin ngala, chih.
Kisa un, ka mite aw, na dantan sung uahte lut unla, na kongkhakte uh kikhak khum un: lunghihlouhna a ven masiah mitphiatkal phet bu un.Ngai un, TOUPA, a gitlouhna jiak ua leia omte gawt dingin a omnaa kipan a hong pawtkhe sin hi: lei mahin a sisan a hihlang dinga, a mi a thah te uh a khuhta kei ding hi.
Ngai un, TOUPA, a gitlouhna jiak ua leia omte gawt dingin a omnaa kipan a hong pawtkhe sin hi: lei mahin a sisan a hihlang dinga, a mi a thah te uh a khuhta kei ding hi.
Huai ni chiangin TOUPAN, a namsau hoihtaka hiam, lianpi, muanhuaitakin, leviathan gulpi hattak leh leviathan gulpi kivial ngeingoi a gawt dinga, tuipi-a dragon om leng a that ding.
Huai ni chiangin: Uain grep huan khat, huai pahtawiin lasa un.
Kei TOUPA lah a vengpa ka hi a; mitphiatkal tengin tui ka buak dinga, kuamahin a khoih louh ding un sun leh janin ka veng ding.
Keiah hehna a om kei hi: loulingnei leh khaulingneiten hondouin honsual him le u aw! amau sual din ka kuan dinga, mun khatah ka hal lunglung ding.
A hih kei lelah, hon kileppihna dingin ka hatna len hen: ahi, honkilep pih hen.
Hun hontung dingah Jakobten zung a kha ding ua; Israelten zung a kha ding ua; Israelte a mum un a pak ding uh: huchiin leitung gahin adimsak ding uhi.
Amah vote a vuak bang letin amah a vo sam ahia? a hih kei leh, amah thahte thahna bang letin amah thahin a om hia?
Amah na pai mangsak laiin a hun lelin amah na sela: suahlam huih nun niin a hu thupitakin amah a mutlengta hi.
Huaijiakin hiaiin Jakobte thulimlouhna silsiang ahi dinga, hiai a khelhna uh pai mangpihna gah ngen ahi: Asherim hiam, gimlim maitamte hiam ding nawn lou ding khopin maitam suang tengteng suang pak den khap zeizoi bangin a bawl uhi.
Khua kulhpi nei lah a lungjuanga, omna nutsiat leh paisan, gamdai bang ahi: huailaiah bawngnou a ta dinga, huailai mahah a kual dinga, a selte a ne ding.
A hiangte lah a vuai chiang un khiahin a om dinga; numeite a hongpai ding ua a hal ding uh: amau lah theihtheihna himhim neilou mi ahi ngal ua: huaijiakin amau bawlpan amaute a hehpih kei dinga, amaute sutuahpan amaute deihsakna himhim a neikei ding hi.
Huan, huai niin hichi ahi dinga, TOUPAN, Lui a kuang dima luang zoizoi akipanin, Aigupta luita phain, a gah a sat khe dinga, huchiin, Israel suante aw, khatkhata simin na om ding uhi.Huan, huai niin hichi ahi dinga, pengkul lianpi a mut ding ua: huchiin Assuria gama mangthang dekdekte leh, Aigupta gama delhkhiaka omte a hongpai ding ua: Jerusalem khuaa tang siangthouah TOUPA a be ding uhi.

Ephraimte zu khamhatte kisaktheihna lallukhu tung leh, a kilawmna uh thupi pak tul laitak, uain thazoha omte guam hausa tak lutang tunga om a tung a gik hi!
Ngaiin, TOUPAN mi hat thilhihthei tak a neia: aman, gial thupi tak ke phuakphuak, huihpi thil hihse lemlum bang leh, tuilian thupi let juajua bang maiin, leiah a pai ek ding.
Ephraimte zu khamhatte kisaktheihna lallukhu lah sik denin a om dinga:
A kilawmna uh thupi paktul laitak, guam hausa tak lutang tunga om, nipi maa theipi min masapen, a enmiin a muha, a khuta a om taka a nek khit mai sek bang ahi ding hi.
Huai ni chiangin sepaihte TOUPA tuh, thupina lallukhu leh, kilawmna lukhu te, a mi om sunte adingin ahi ding:
Vaihawm dinga tu adingin vaihawmna kha te, kulh kongkhak bula hon sualte nangkikmite adingin hatna ahi ding.
Himahleh huaite leng uain jiakin a kipek a kipek ua, ju jiakin a hoihoi ua: siampute leh jawlneite lah ju jiakin a kipek pek ua, uain valh khitin a om ua, ju jiakin a hoihoi ua: kilakna thu-ah a kipekpek ua, vaihawmna thu-ah a hoihoi uh.
Mun siang mahmah om lou khopin dohkan tengteng lah luak leh thil ninin a dim hi.

A hi, muk lamdang pumi zangin, pau tuamin hiai mite kiangah thu a gen zota ding:
Hiai lah khawlna ahi hi, tawlte khawlsak un: hiai lah kihihhalhna ahi hi, a chihte: himahleh amau lah a ngaikhe nuam ngal kei ua.
Huaijiakin, a pai ua, a thala a puk ua, a kitap gawp ua, thanga a awk ua, mata a om theihna ding un, TOUPA thu lah amaute adingin, thuzohna thu tunga thuzohna thu chian touh, thuzohna thu tunga thuzohna thu chian touh, dan tunga dan chian touh: hiaiah tawm chik buaah tawm chik chih ngetna ahi mai ding.
Huaijiakin, mi muhsithatte aw, hiai mite, Jerusalem khuaa omte, vaihawmsakte aw, TOUPA thu ja un:
Sihna toh thu i khungte Sheol ah thu i kichiamta; vuakna tuilian a luan suak hun chiangin lei phain jaw a luang kei ding; juauthute i kihumbitna dingin i zang ua, huau nuaiah lah i buta ngal ua, na chih jiakun.
Huaijiakin TOUPA Pathianin hichiin a chi ding; Ngaiin, suang, suang ettelsa, a kila suang manphatak phum kip mahmah, Zionah suangphum dingin ka lem hi; a gingtami jaw a kin kei ding.
Vaihawmna diktat a tansakna khau dingin ka zang dinga, diktatna lah a ulumkhai dingin ka zang dinga, gialin kihumbitna juau thute lah a phiat mang vek dinga, tuiten lah bukna a tum ding.
Huan, sihna toh na thu khun uh a kiphel dinga, Sheol toh na chiam u leng a piching kei ding, vuakna tuilian a luan suak hun chiangin.
Huai hun chiangin a sik denin na om ding uh.
A luan suak peuhmah chiangin nou a honla jel ding; a jingsang a jingsangin, sun leh janin, a luang suak sin ngala; thukhah omdan theihsiam lah thil mulkimhuai ngen ahi ding. chiin.
Lupna lah khekhuanna dingin a tom jojen ngala, puan thuah lah kilukhuhna dingin a neu lua hi.

TOUPA, sepaihte TOUPA akipan inlah ka za ngala.
Bil doh unla, ka aw ja un; ngaikhia unla, ka thugen ja un.

A tung a toh tam khitin mohuri te a theh dalh ka hia?
Zira te leng a theh ka hia? buhte a vualin, huitbuhte leng a mun sehsaah, vai buh te leng a nawljulah a tuh sek ka hia?
A Pathianin lah amah diktakin a thuzohin a sinsak ngala.
Mohuri lah buh chilna khawlin a chil ngei ngal kei ua, zira tungkah leng kangtalai khe a tuksak ngei kei uh; mohuri jaw chiangin a khen ua, zira bel khetbukin a khen zo sek uhi.
Tanghou bawlna buh lah gawijanin a om a, aman lah khantawnin a vo sin ngal keia, a kangtalai khe leh a sakolten dalhsak mah leh, a gawijan sak ngei kei hi.Huaite leng sepaihte TOUPA, lemtheihnaa mi lamdang mahmah leh pilnaa mi hoih mahmah akipana pawt ahi hi.

Ariel, Ariel, David puanin kaihna mun! kuamah kum gawm inla; ankuangluinate hongtung nawn hen;
Huai hun chiangin Ariel ka lungjing sak dinga, huchiin sunna leh kahna a om ding; huan amah kei adingin Ariel bang ahi ding.
Huan, nangmah sual tumin na kimah kon giah khum dinga, nangmah sual dingin umsuakna insangte ka bawl ding.
Huchiin, puksakin na om dinga, leinuaia kipanin thu na gen dinga, na aw lah leivui lakah awlawlin a gingkhe ding; na aw lah dawi aisansiam jawl aw bang lelin leinuaia kipanin a pawt ding hi, na pau lah leivui laka kipanin a hongpawt siausiau ding hi.
Himahleh nang hondou mipite jaw leivui nel mahmah bangin a om ding uh, mi kihtakhuai mipite leng buhsi mangthang sekte bangin a om ding uh; ahi, huai tuh mitphiatkal louin a hongom guih ding.
Van gingte, jinlingte, ging thupi mahmahte, pingpeite huihpite, hul mang thei meiin amah lah sepaihte TOUPA gawtin a om ding hi.
Huchiin Ariel dou nam tengteng mi pite, amah leh a insang sualmi tengteng leh amah hihlungjingte tengteng, ihmu mang bang lel ahi ding uh, jana kilakna bang lel.
Mi gilkialin mang a neihin an a ne a, ahihhangin a khangloua a bah lailaiin tui a duh lailai bang ahi ding hi; Zion tang sual, nam tengteng mipiute, huchibang ahi ding uh.

Lebanon lah lei hoih tak muna suahsakin a om sina, lei hoih tak mun lah gammanga seha a om sin?

Huaijiakin TOUPA, Abraham tan pen.
Jakob inkote tungthu ah hichin a chi hi: Jakobte jaw tuin a zahlak ta kei ding ua, a mai uh a mual nawn sam kei ding.
A ta uh, ka khut suakte, a lak ua a muh un, ka min a siangthousak zota ding uh; ahi, Jakobte Mi Siangthou a siangthousak ding ua, Israelte Pathian lah a kihtata ding uh.Khaa vakmangten leng a hontheisiam ta ding ua mi phunhatten sinsak thu a sinta ding uh.

TOUPAN, ta helhatte a tung uh a gik hi! huaiten lah mi a dong ua, kei lah hon dong kei uh, a khelhna tung ua khelhna a behlapna ding un, khuhnain a khuh ua, ka kha thuin lah a khuh tuan kei uh;
Pharo hatnaa kihatsak dingin leh, Aigupta lim bel dingin, ka kam dong tuan louin Aigupta gama paisuk tumin a kuan uh.
Huaijiakin Pharo hatna noute zahlakna a hita dinga, Aigupta lim na na belh uhlah na maizumna uh a hita ding.
A mi liante lah Zoan khuaah a om ua, a palaite lah Hanes khua a tungta ngal uhi.
Amau adia phattuamna himhim neilou mi, huhna hilou, phattuamna nei mi leng hi lou, maizumna leh minsiatna hizote, a vek un a zumpih sin uh, achi a.
Sim gama sate puakgik, Buaina leh lunglauna gam, humpinelkainu leh humpinelkaipa, ngandekpak leh gul kuang leng thei pawtna, a sum uh sa bengtung nou tungte ah, a gou uh sangawngsau nungvumte ah po sakin, amau adia phattuamna neilou mite kaingah piak dingin, a pai ton dapdap uh.
Aiguptain lah phatuamlou tak leh pannaneilou takin a panpih jel ngala; huaijiakin ahi, amah, Rahab tu kinkennu, ka chih.

Huaite lah mi helhatte, ta juautheite, ta TOUPA dan ngaikhe nuamloute ahi ngal ua;
Mutheimite kianga, Mu kei un, jawlneite kianga, Thil dikte honhilh khol kei un, thil nuam lam ka kiang uah gen un, khemna thu gen un, khemna thu gen khol un;
Lam lou ah pai un, lam sikah pial un, Israelte Mi Saingthou ka ma ua kipan hihmang un, chi ngitnget-te
Huaijiakin Israelte Mi Siangthouin hichiin ahi a. hiai thu na muhsit jiakun leh nuaisiahna leh phengphitna na muan ua, a tung ua na kingak jiak un.
Hiai thulimlouhna noute adingin suangbang sangpi selai, chim dekdek, puak engong, thakhata mitphialkal lou-a se gawp ding bang ahi ding hi.
Huchiin belvelmi bel a kitam gawp sak bang un, hawi om het lou-a kek nenin, a themnen lakah belpei thuka mei lakna ding hiam aw, tuikhuka tui dipna ding hiam aw, omlou khopin, a kitm nen sak ding, chiin.
TOUPA PATHIAN Israelte Mi Siangthouin lah hichiin a chi ngala.
Kik nawna khawla omin hotdamin na om ding ua; muang taka omna ah leh upna omnaah na hatna uh a om ding, chiin; himahleh nou lah na ut kei ua.
Hi lou e, sakol tunga tuangin i tai zozot ding uh, na chi zosop ua, huaijiakin na tai zozot ngei ding uh; Thil hat tak tungah i tuang ding, na chi ua; huaijiakin nou hondelh ding lah hat tak ahi ding uh.
Mi khat phawnin sang khat a taikek dudup ding ua; mi nga phawn in na taikek dudup ding uh; a tawpin mualvuma puankhai khai bang leh, tang tunga chiamtehna om banga nutsiatin na om ding uhi.
Huaijiakin noute TOUPAN a honhehpih theihna dingin a hongak dinga, huaijiakin noute a honlainat theihna dingin pahtawiin a om ding; TOUPA lah vaihawm diktatna Pathian ahi ngala; amah ngakte teng tengin nuam a sa uhi.
Mite lah Jerusalema Zion ah a omsin ngal ua; na kap nawn kei ding uh; na kahna husa uah aman a hon hehpih mahmah ding a; a jak takin a hon dawng ding hi.
TOUPAN lungkhamna an leh haksatna tui noute honpe mahleh, nou honsinsakmite a kibu nawn kei ding ua, na mit un nou honsinsakmite a mu zota ding;
Huan, taklama na pial un hiam, veilama na pial un hiam, na bil un na nunglam ua thu, Hiai lampi ahi, hiai-ah pai un, chiin, a za jel ding hi.
Huan na dangka uh milim bawl dangka chi-a zepna leh, na dangkaeng uh, milim sun dangkaeng tuia luanna lah na buahsak ding ua; thil nin bangin na paita ding ua, a kiangah, Pai mangin! na chi ding uh.
Huchiin, aman na buh chi uh leia na tuh ding uh adingin vuahtui a pe dinga; leia thil poute leng an din a pe ding, huailah hoihtak pung tak ahi ding; huai ni chiangin na ganta uh gantatna mun za pi ah a ta ding uh.
Bawngtal leh sabengtungnou leiletten an chisoh, ninluahna leh phajaha hihsiangsa a ne ding uh.
Huan, kithahna thupitak ni-a galvenna singte a chip niin, tang sang teng ah leh mual vum sang tengah luipite leh luite tui luang khawng a hong om ding.
Huailou leng TOUPAN a mite kihehna a tuama, a liamna ma uh a damsak ni chiangin, kha vak ni vak phain a omta dinga, ni vak a mun sagihin, ni sagih vak phain a omta ding hi.
Ngaiin, TOUPA min tuh, a hehna kuang juajuain, meikhu sah moimoiin jamtou ngoingoi lakah, gamla pi-a kipanin a hongpai hi; a mukte khawng lunghihlouhnain a dima, a lei lah thil kat mang hat mei bang ahi.
A hu lah, manna lohpi-a nam chih sep dingin, lui ngawng chiang pha hiala a kuanga let nawnaw bang ahi; huan mi chih kamah pi khelhsakna kaihgingna khau a om ding.
Huan, jana zehtan siangthou-a zeh a tan lai ua la a sak bangun, la a sa ding ua; TOUPA tanga Israelte Suangpi kiang tung dinga tamngai toh a pai lai ua lungtang nopsakna leng a nei ding uh.
Huan, TOUPAN a aw thupitak a kijasakta dinga, a hehna thupitak leh thil kat mang ching mei kuangin, a huihpi leh vuahpi leh gialin, a khut khak dana ensakta ding.
TOUPA aw jiakin Assuria mi, khetbuka mi khen nakpa, kitapjan sakin a om ding a hita ngala.
Amah lah chiang sehsaa TOUPAN a jep peuhmah chiangin khuangtate leh kaihgingte toh a jep ding; achiang lika kisuaknate ah amau a sual ding.Tophet lhat lah tumaa nana bawlkholhsa ahi ngala; ahi, kumpipa adingin bawlzoh siang ahi a; thu tak za takin a bawla; a thil sek khawm tuh mei leh sing tamtak ahi a; TOUPA a hu, kat lui luang bangin, a kang sak juajua hi.
Tophet lhat lah tumaa nana bawlkholhsa ahi ngala; ahi, kumpipa adingin bawlzoh siang ahi a; thu tak za takin a bawla; a thil sek khawm tuh mei leh sing tamtak ahi a; TOUPA a hu, kat lui luang bangin, a kang sak juajua hi.
Aigupta gama panpihna zong dinga hoh suka, sakolte tunga muanga, a tam jiak ua kangtalaite leh a hat mahmah jiak ua sakol tungtuang mite muanga Israelte Mi Siangthou lam bel en lou-a, TOUPA leng dong loute jaw a tung uh a gik hi!
Dong kei mahle uh amah leng pil tak ahi, thil hoihlou a hontung sak dinga, a thute laha khel nawn kei ding, thil hoihlou hihmite inkuan sual dingin a thou zo dinga, khialte panpihna dou dingin a thou ding.
Aigupta mite jaw, PAthian ahi kei ua, mi lel ahi uh; huchiin TOUPAN a khut a jak hun chiangin a panpihtu pen a pai ekek dinga, a panpihpen leng a puk dinga, a vek un a mangthang chiat ding uh.
TOUPAN lah hichiin ka kiangah a chi ngala.
Humpinelkai leh humpinelkai lun laiin sa a kham laiin belam chingmi tamtak a sual dingin a sap khiakin om mah le uh, a aw uh a lau kei ding ua, a bilap jiakun a kihta tuan kei ding bangin, sepaihte TOUPA jaw Zion tangah a mual pawnga sual dingin a hong paisuk ding hi.
Vasate a bu tung ua a leng leng bang un sepaihte TOUPAN Jerusalem khua a veng ding; a veng dia a tankhe dinga, a paikanin a humbit ding hi.
Israel suante aw, nakpi taka na helsan sa lam uh nga nawnta un.
Huai niin mi chihin amau dangka milimte, amau dangkaeng milimte, khelhna dinga noumau khuta na kibawltawmte uh lah a pai mang uh ahi ngala,
Huai hun chiangin Assuria mi bel, mi namsaua puk sak hi louin, nam sau hih puk sak hi louin, namsau hihpukin a om dinga; namsau mi te-a hi louin, amah a gai ding; huan, namsau laka kipan a tai mang dinga, a tangvalte lah siah liaumi a honghita ding uh.Huan, a suangpi lah thil mulkimhuai jiakin a mang dinga, a miliante lah chiamtehna jiakin a buaita ding, chiin, TOUPA, a mei Ziona omin leh, a haltuina mei Jerusalema omin, ahi.
Huan, a suangpi lah thil mulkimhuai jiakin a mang dinga, a miliante lah chiamtehna jiakin a buaita ding, chiin, TOUPA, a mei Ziona omin leh, a haltuina mei Jerusalema omin, ahi.
Ngaiin, kumpipa khat diktat takin kumpipain a tu dinga, mi lainten vaihawmna diktakin vai a hawm ding uh.
Huan, mi khat huihpi laka bukna mun bang leh, vuahpi laka bitna mun bang ahi ding, mun keua tui luangte bang, gam tultaka suangpi lianpi nuamsa bang tak.
Huchiin a mute mite a mial kei dinga, a zate bilin a ngaikhe ding.
Huan, sin-gammite lungin theihna thu a thei siam dinga, dang-awkte lei teltakin a pau thei ding.
Mi gilou tuh mi thilphal a chi nawnta kei ding uh, milepchiah lah mi siam a chi nawn kei ding uh.
Pathien zahlouhna thil hih ding leh.
TOUPA hekna dia thu diklou gen dingin, gilkialte sung hawmsak ding leh, dangtakte dawn ding hihmang dingin, mi gilouin lah gitlouhna thu a gen ngal dia, a lung lah thil a hih khial ding.
Mi lepchiah vante jaw hoih lou ahi a; tangahten thu dik a gen un leng mi gentheite juau thu-a hihmang dingin aman lah thil lah thil gilou hih a ngaituah jel hi.
Mi thilphal bel thilphal lam thilte a ngaihtuah: huchiin thilphal lam thilte ah a om gige ding.
Numei mawkomte aw, thou unla, ka aw ngaikhia un; tanu pilvangloute aw ka the genah bil doh un.
Numei pilvangloute aw, kum khat leh ni bangzah hiam nungin na buaita ding uh; grep loh ding lah a om ngal kei dinga, grep loh khawm dingah leng bangmeh a suak sam kei ding hi.
Nunei mawkomte aw, ling nun: mi pilvenagloute aw, buaitakin on un; kisuah unla, vuaktangin kibawl unla, na kawng uahte saiip puan teng un.
Lou deihte jiak leh grep gui gah nuamte jiakin a awm a tumtum ding uh.
Ka mite gam loulingnei leh khaulingneiin a buak ding; ahi, khopi nopsakhuai taka nopsakna in tengteng tungah:
Kumpipa in lah paisanin a om sin ngala; a mual pawng leh a galvanbuk lah khantawn kohawm ding leh, gam sanengtung kipahnate, ganhon tatna mun te ahi ding;
tung lama kipana kha ka tung ua suna a oma, gamdai lei hoih tak mun a suaha. lei hoihtak mun lah gammang banga sim a hih mateng.
Huai hunin vaihawm diktatna tuh gamdaiah a teng dinga, diktatna tuh lei hoih tak munah a om ding.
Huan, diktatna nasep tuh kituahna ahi dinga, diktatnaa thil pawt lah khantawna muang taka omna leh kitheihchetna ahi ding.
Huchiin ka mite bel galmuanga omnaah leh in kipakah te leh khawlna mun muanhuaitakahte a omta ding uhi.
Himahleh gammang bel hihpuk ding in gial a ke lomlom dinga; khopi lah hihniam mahmahin a om ding.Tui luanna piaua chi theh jel, bawngtal leh sanengtung khah jel te aw, nuam na sa uhi.
Tui luanna piaua chi theh jel, bawngtal leh sanengtung khah jel te aw, nuam na sa uhi.
Nang loh tuak ngei lou pi-a, aloka pang, lepchiah taka bawl tuak ngeilou pi-a, lepchiah taka pang, na tung a gik hi, Mi loh na tuak sam ding hi; lepchiah taka na hih khit chianain, na tungah lepchiah takin a hih ding uh.
Toupa aw, hon hehpihin; ka hon ngak nilouh uhi; jingsang tengin a ban uh honghi inla, buai hun chiangin leng hon hondampa honghi in.
Lum vengvung husain mi chih a taimang ta ua; nang na kisak hial chiangin nam chih hihdalhin a omta uh.
Na sum uh gallaka lak ding lungin thil a kaihkhawmin a om ding; khaupete a tawm duamduam uh bangin amaute tuh sum tungah a tawm duamduam ding uh.
Toupa tawisangin a omta; tunglamah lah a om ngala; aman Zion lah vaihawm diktakna leh diktatnain a dimsak ta hi.
Na dam sungin om kipna a om dinga. hotdamnate, pilnate, theihna te a om kikeih ding; TOUPA launa lah a gou ahi a.
Ngaiin, a pasalphate uh polamah a kikou ua; kituahna palaite lah a kap hohhoh uhi.
Lamliante lah a mualta ua, mi zin vialvakte lah a om nawn kei uh; amah lah thukhun a bohsiaa, khuate lah a musita, mi khawk a sa ta kei.
Gam lah a kapin a gima; Lebanon tuh a zumin a vuaia; Sharon lah gamdai bang a hita; Bashan leh Karmelin a nah uh a sing khia uh.
TOUPAN, Tun ka thou dinga, tun ka kisa dinga, tun tawi sangin ka omta ding.
Lou keu na pai ding ua, buhpawl na suang ding uh; na hu uh noumau kang mang ding mei ahi.
Mi chih lah chinai suang hal bang, loulingnei vat sa meia a paih bang uh, a chi ding uh, a chi a.
Gamlapi-a omte aw, ka thil hih bilin na ja un; naichika omte aw, ka thilhihtheihdan thei un.
Ziona mi gilou omten a lau ua; Pathian zahlou mite linnain a manta hi.
I lak ua kua ahia thil kat mang ching mei kianga om ding? i lak uah kua ahia khantawna kang zoizoi kianga om ding?
Diktattaka oma diktaka gen jelmi; nuaisiahnate punna himhim bangmaha ngailou-a golhna la nuamlou-a bil huma, gilou himhim en nuamlou-a mitsi jel mi;
Huai mi bel tunglamah a om dinga; a kidalna mun sang lah suangpi kidalnate ahi ding; a an lah a kianga piak ahi dinga, a tuite lah a om ngeingei ding.
Na miten kumpipa lah a kilawmnain a mu dinga, gam kiphalh za tak a hon en ding uhi.
A simmi koia omta ahia? siahliau tehmi koia omta ahia? galven insangte simmi koia omta ahia? chiin, na lungtangin thil mulkimhuai mahmah na ngaihtuah ding.
Mi hangtak, pau giltak na theihtheih louha pau mite, pau tuam na theihsiam louha pau mite, na mu nawnta kei ding.
I zehtanna khopi Zion en dih; na mitin Jerusalem omna muanhuaitak, puanin chikchianga leng suan louh ding, kaih gakna khet chik chiang aleng boh louh ding, a kaihna khau himhim kitat lou ding bang, a mu ding.
Huailaiah TOUPA, lui za pipi leh luitate omna mun, thupitakin i kiang uah a omzo ta ding; huai tui tungah kidouna long lianpi kalhna chiang neite himhim a pai kei dinga, long lian thupitak inleng a khen sam kei ding hi.
TOUPA lah i vaihawmpa ahi a, TOUPA lah dan hon pepa ahi a, TOUPA lah i kumpipa ahi; aman a honhondam ding hi.
Na khaute tuh kolsakin a om dinga; a puanjak peu bul uh lah a kipsak theikei ua, puanjak lah a jak theikei uh; huai laitakin gallak sum tampi hawmin a oma; khebaiten leng gallak sum a lata uhi.Huai khuaa mi omin, ka chi a na, chi kei dinga, a sunga mite tuh khelh ngaihdamin a om ding uhi.
Huai khuaa mi omin, ka chi a na, chi kei dinga, a sunga mite tuh khelh ngaihdamin a om ding uhi.
Nam chihte aw, bila za dingin hong nai un; mi chihte aw, ngaikhia un; leitung leh a sunga om tengtengin bilin ja uhen; khovel leh a sunga pata pawt tengteng toh.
TOUPAN nam chiteng tunga lungkimlouhna neiin a sepaihte uh tengteng tungah lah hehna a nei ngala; amau tuh a hihmang veka, thah din a peta hi.
A lak ua thaha omte paih khiakin a om ding ua, a luang namsia uh a paitou vutvut dinga, tangte tuh a sisan ua zulsakin a om ding uh.
Vana omte tengteng hihmanin a om ding ua, van tuh laibu jialchi a jial bang un jialin a om dinga, a omte tengteng tuh, grep gui akipan a nah a vuia a pulh jel bangin leh, theipi kung akipana a nah vuai a pulh jel bangin a vuai khin ua a pulh vek ding uh.
Ka namsauin vanah taitakin a dawnta ngala, ngaiin, huai tuh vaihawm dingin Edomte tungah leh ka hamsiat mite tungah a ke ding.
TOUPA namsau tuh sisanin a tai dinga, thaunaa thausakin a omta belam noute leh kelte sisanin, belampa gilthautein; TOUPAN Bozrah khuaah kithoihna a neia, Edom gamah leng thahna thupitak a nei hi.
Gambawngtalte leng kituaka sat paihin a om ding ua, bawngpate bawngtalte toh, a gam un sisan a kham dinga, a leivui uh thaunaa thausakin a om ding.
TOUPA phulak ni lah a hita ngala, Zion selna lam thu-a thukna kum.
A lui tuite long nai dia suahsakin a om dinga, a gam tuh longnai kang luahluah a suak ding hi.
Sun leh janin mihsak ahi kei dinga; a meikhu lah khantawnin a tungkah ngoingoi ding; suan om lai siah a siain a om nilouh dinga; khantawn in leng kuamahin a ngap kei ding uhi.
Tuivagik leh sakuhin huai gam a tang ding ua; simbu leh va-ak huaiah a om ding uh; siatna khau leh pomna sikmumkhat a tungah a khai ding hi.
A mi hoihte uh gam uk dingin a sam ding ua, himahleh huailaiah kuamah sap ding a om kei ding uh; a mi lian tengteng uh bangmah ahi kei ding uh.
A kumpipa un inah loulingneite a pou dinga, a kulhpi sung uah dailing leh lingnok a pou ding; sehalte omna ding leh vasa ngawngsaute adingin inumsung intual ahi ding hi.
Huan, gamdaia, gam sate ngiate toh a kituak ding ua, sathakin a lawm a sam ding; ahi, jan thil lauhuai piin huai laiah omna a bawl dinga, amah adingin khawlna mun ding a mu ding.
Huailaiah simbu thupiin bu a bawl dinga, a tui dia, a keuh dinga, a op khawm ding; ahi, huaiah mute koppih nei chiatin a om khawm ding ding uh.
TOUPA laibu-ah zong unla, sim un; huaite lakah khat leng kimlou a om kei dinga, khat leng koppih neilou a om kei ding; ka kam ngeiin thu a piaa, a kha ngeiin huaite a pi khawmta ngala.Aman lah amau adingin ai a sansaka, a khuta khaua tehin huai gam a hawmsak chiata; khanawnin a nei ding ua, suan om laiteng huailaiah a om ding uhi.
Aman lah amau adingin ai a sansaka, a khuta khaua tehin huai gam a hawmsak chiata; khanawnin a nei ding ua, suan om laiteng huailaiah a om ding uhi.
Gamdai leh phaksap gam a kipan dinga; gam keuin nuamsain pawn pak bangin a pak ding.
A pak lun dinga, kipak tak leh lasain nuam a sa ding; Lebanon thupi na a kiangah piak ahi ding, Karmel leh Sharon kilawmna toh; TOUPA thupina a mu ding ua, i Pathian kilawmna toh.
Khut hatloute hatsak unla, khuk jawte kipsak un.
Lungtang dawilokte kiangah, Hat takin om unla, lau kei un; ngai un, na Pathian uh phulakna toh a hongpai dinga, a honhondam ding, chi un.
Huai hun chiangin mittote mit hahsakin a om dinga bengngongte bil hihvakin a om ding.
Huai hun chiangin khebaite sakhi bangin a tawm ding ua, pautheiloute leiin nuamsa takin la a sa ding; gamdai ahte lah tuite a hongphul khe biabia sin ngala, gam keute ah luita tui a hong phulkhe buabua sin ngal ua.
Huchiin piaunel sa mahmah munte dil a hongsuak dinga, lei dangtak mahmah tuinak a hongsuak ding; sehalte tennaa, a lupna uah, loupa, tuilou leh sikhapat toh, a om ding.
Huan, huailaiah lamlian a om ding, kongpi toh, huai tuh siangthouna Lampi a chi ding uh; mi thanghuaiin lampi a tawn kei ding; ahihbangin huai mite adingin ahi zo ding; mi vialzinte, ahi, mi haite leng, huailaiah a mang kei ding uh.
Humpinelkai himhim huailaiah a om kei dinga, sa hing ne himhim huailaiah a pai tou sam kei ding uh, huailah muh ding leng a om kei ding; tatte bel huailaiah a pai tou ding uh;Huan TOUPA tatte a kik nawn ding ua, lasa khawmin Zion a tung ding uh, khantawna kipahna a lu tunguah a omta dinga; nuamsakna leh kipahna leh thumna a mangta ding hi.
Huan TOUPA tatte a kik nawn ding ua, lasa khawmin Zion a tung ding uh, khantawna kipahna a lu tunguah a omta dinga; nuamsakna leh kipahna leh thumna a mangta ding hi.
Huan, kumpipa Hezekia kum sawm leh kum lina kumin hichi ahi a, Assuria gam kumpipa Sennakerib tuh Juda gama khua kulhpi nei tengteng sim dingin a vahohtou-a a lata hi.
Huan, Assuria kumpipan Rabsakeh sepaihhon tampi piin Lakish khua akipanin Jerusalem khuaa kumpipa Hezekia kiangah a sawla.
Huan, dil saknung tuilakna kianga puansawpmi pawn lamlianah a dinga,
Huchiin kumpipa inkuanpihte tunga heutu-a om Hilkia tapa Eliakim te, laigelhmi Shebnate, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joa te kiangah a hong suk uhi.
Huan Rabsakehin a kiang uah, Hezekia kiangah hichiin gen un, Kumpipa thupitak Assuria kumpipain hichiin a chi, Na muanna kiangakna bang ahi maia?
Kidouna dinga na lemtheihna leh na hatna jaw thu lel ahi, ka chi; Kua muanga, ka tunga hel na hi maia?
Ngaiin, hiai sialluang chiang, kitan Aiguptate, muang neive; huaimin a muan aleh, a khutah a sun ding hi; Aigupta kumpipa Pharo jaw amah muang tengteng tungah hichibang ahi nakanak hi.
Ahihkeileh, ka kiangah, TOUPA i Pathian uh ahi ka muan uh, na chihleh, amah pen Hezekiain Judate kiangah leh Jerusalemte kiangah, Hiai maitam maah kia na biak ding uh ahi, chi-a, a mun sangte leh a maitamte lak mang sakpa hi lou hia?
Huchiin, hehpihtakin, ka pu Assuria kumpipa kiangah thu chiamin, huchiin ken sakol sang nih ke honpe ding, nang a tung ua tuangdingte na muh theihpeuh ding leh.
Bangchin, kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuang mite thu-ah Aiguptate tunga na muanna ngaa, ka pu sikha neupente laka heutu khat leng na nan zoh ding?
Huan, hiai hihse dinga sim dingin TOUPA panglou-a hong pai tou ka hi-a hia?
TOUPAN, ka kiangah, Huai gam sim dingin hoh tou inla, hihsia in, a honchi, chiin, a chi a.
Huan, Eliakim leh Shebna leh Joa ten, Rabsakeh kiangah, Hehpihtakin na sikhate Suria pauin honhoupihtain; huailah ka theithei ngal ua; kulh bang tunga mite jakin Juda pauin honhoupih nawn ken, a chi ua.
Himahleh Rabsakehin, Ka puin na pu kiang kiaah leh nang kiangah hiai thu gen dingin honsawl ahia?
Kulh bang tunga tute, noute toh amau ek ne ding leh amau zun dawn dingte kiangah, a honsawl a hizo kei maw? a chi a.
Huan, Rabsakeh a dinga, Juda pauin ngaihtakin a kikou-a, kumpipa thupi Assuria kumpipa thute ngaikhia un.
Kumpipan hichiin a chi, Hezekia khemin om nuam dah un; aman lah a honhumbit thei sin ngal keia;
Hezekiain, TOUPAN pellouin honhumbit ding; hiai khopi jaw Assuria kumpipa khuta piakin a om kei ding, chiin, thu gen mahleh, TOUPA tuh Hezekia gen jiakin muang nuam tuan dah un.
Hezekia thu ngaikhe kei un; Assuria kumpipan lah hichiin a chi ngala, Thilpiakin hon kituahpih unla, ka kiangah hongpai khia un; mi chihin a grep guia pat leh mi chihin a theipi kunga pat ne chiat unla, mi chihin a tuikhuka pat tui dawn chiat un.
Ka hongpaia, noumau gam banga buh leh uain omna gam, tanghou leh grep huante omna gama ka honpaipih ma tan.
TOUPAN honhumbit ding, chi-a, Hezekiain a honkhem khak leh pilvang un.
Nam chih pathian laka mi himhimin a gam uh Assuria kumpipa kiangah a humbitta ua hia?
Hamath leh Arpahte pathiante koia om ahi ta ua?
Sepharvaimte pathiante koia om a hita ua?
Huai Samari khua kei akipanin a humbit ta ua hia?
Huai gam pathian tengteng loaka kuaten ahi a gam uh keia kipana a humbit uh?
TOUPAN Jerusalem khua kei akipanin a humbit vial mahmah ding maw? chiin, a chi a.
Amau bel a dai dide ua, thu khat lelin leng a dawng kei uh; kumpipa thupiak, Amau dawng kei un, chih ahi ngala.Huchiin kumpipa inkuanpihte tunga heutu-a om Hilkia tapa Eliakim te, laigelhmi Shebna te, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joa te puansilh bohkek silhin Hezekia kiangah a hongpai ua, Rabsakeh thugente a hilh uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa inkuanpihte tunga heutu-a om Hilkia tapa Eliakim te, laigelhmi Shebna te, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joa te puansilh bohkek silhin Hezekia kiangah a hongpai ua, Rabsakeh thugente a hilh uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, kumpipa Hezekiain huai a jak takin a puansilhte a botkeka, saiip puan a silha, TOUPA inah a lutta.
Huan, a inkuanpihte tunga heutu-a om Eliakim leh, laigelhmi Shebna leh, siampute upate saiip puan silhin Amoz tapa jawlnei Isai kiangah a sawl hi.
Huan, a mau a kiangah, Hezekiain hichiin a chi, Tuni mangbatna leh muhsitna ni ahi; naupangte lah a pian hun uh a hita ngala, amau piangsak dingin hatna lah a om nawn ngal keia.
Rabsakeh a pu Assuria kumpipan Pathian hing gense dinga a sawl thu gente, TOUPA na Pathianin a bilin a za lai ahi kha ding, huchiin a thu gen, TOUPA na Pathian in a biala, a jakte ah, a honsal ding hi; huaijiakin a om sunte adingin na thumna lan tou in, a chi hi, a chi ua.
Huchiin kumpipa Hezekia sikhate Isai kiangah a hongpai uh.
Huan, Isaiin a kiang uah, Na pu kiang uah hichiin na chi ding uh ahi, TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Na thu jak, Assuria kumpipa sikhaten a hon-gensiatnate uh, kihta ken.
Ngaiin, a sungah kha banghiam ka omsak dinga, huchiin thuthang a za dinga, amah gamah a kik nawn ding; huchiin amah gam ngeiah namsaua puksakin ka omsak ding, a chi hi, chiin, a chi a.
Huchiin Rabsakeh a kik nawna, Assuria kumpipan Libnah khua akipan a pai kheta chih a thei khin ngala.

Ngaiin, Assuria kumpipaten gam tengteng suse vekin a tung ua a thilhihte uh nabilin na ja hi, huchiin nang penpen humbitin na om tuam ding hiam?
Nam chih pathianten, Gozante, Harante, Resephte, Eden ta Telassar khuaa om te, ka pipute sukmante, a humbit ua hia.

Huan Hezekiain palaite khuta kipanin lai a mu a, a sima, huchiin Hezekia TOUPA inah a va luta, TOUPA maah a phata hi.
Huan, Hezekia TOUPA kiang ah a thuma.
Sepaihte TOUPA, Israelte Pathian aw, cherubte tunga tupa, nang, nang kia, leitung luah gam tengteng Pathian na hi; nangman leitung leh van na bawl a.
TOUPA aw na bil hon doh inla, ngai dih ve; TOUPA aw na mit hak inla, en dih ve; Pathian hing gense dinga mite sawlpa Sennakerib thu tengteng ngai dih ve.
TOUPA, Assuria kumpipaten gam tengteng leh a lei uh a hihse ngei ngut ua, a pathiante uleng meiah a pai ua.
Huaite jaw Pathian ahi kei him ua, mihing khuta bawl sing leh suang, a hijaw uh; huaijiakin a hihmang uhi.
Huaijiakin, TOUPA ka Pathian uh aw, nang, nang kia, TOUPA na hi chih leitung luah gam tengtengin a theihna ding un amah akipanin honhumbitin, chiin.
Huai laiin Amoz tapa Isaiin Hezekia kiangah mi a sawla, hichiin a chi a, TOUPA Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi hi, Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib siatna ding nangawna ka kianga na thum jiakin hiai a tungtang thu TOUPAN a gen ahi hi;
Zion tanu nungakin a honmusita, a honnuih san hi; Jerusalem tanuin a lu a honsin khum.
Kua ahi maia na minsiatsakna gensiat? kua tungah ahia na aw na puamsaka, na mit na sansak?
Israelte Mi Siangthou tungah ngei.
Na sikhate zangin TOUPa na min sesaka, Ka kangtalai tampi toh tangsang sanna, LEbanon gam gil khawngah ka hontungtou ta hi; a sidar sing sang takte leh a meilah sing hoih te ka phuk ding; A mun sang pen, a lei hoihna gammangah ka lut ding.
Tuileh ka leta, tui ka dawn jela, ka khepek nuaiin Aigupta lui tengteng ka kangsak vek ding, na chi.
Ken nidanglaia patin huai ka hih ahi a, tumalama kipana ka suktuah ahi chih na za ka hia?
Khua kulhpi neite in chim khawm bang lela hihsepa na hih theihna dingin tuin ka tungsak hi.
Huaijiakin a sunga omte a hat lo kei ua, a lau ua, a zahlak uhi; pawn loupa bang lel leh, koupa hing bang lel, intungloupa hing bang lel, intungloupa bang leh, lou buh hoih ma bang lel ahi uh.
Ken bel na tut bang, na pawt bang, na lut bang, ka tunga na hehdan ka thei hi.
Ka tunga na heh jiak leh, na pau uang dan ka bila a honglut touh tak jiakin ka nakbulh nang nakah ka bulh dinga, ka sikkaihna leng na mukah ka bulh ding hi, na hongpaina lampi mahah ka honkik sak nawn ding, chih, chiin.

Huan, Juda inkuampihte laka dam sunte bel a suklama zungkaia, a tou lama gahin a om nawn ding.

Huaijiakin TOUPAN Assuria kumpipa tungtang thu-ah hichiin a chi, Amah hiai khopi a hongtung kei dinga, hiailaiah a thal leng a kap sam kei dinga, lum toh a kiangah leng a hongpai sam kei ding, a simna dingin lah lei kulh a bawl sam kei ding.

Huan, a tapa Esarhaddonin a sikin vai a hawm hi.

Huchiin Amoz tapa jawlnei Isai a kiangah a honga, a kiangah, Toupan hichiin achi, Na innkuanpihte omdan ding gel sak in; dam khe lou inlah si ding na ngala, chiin. a chi a.
Huchiin Hezekia bang lam ngain a oma, Toupa kiangah a thuma,
Toupa aw, na maa thutak leh lungtang hoihkim pu-a ka omjel dan leh na mitmuha thil hoih ka hih jel dan, hehpihtakin thei gige in, achi a.
Huan, Hezekia a kap huphup hi.
Huchiin Toupa thu Isai kiangah a hongtung a,
Kuan inla, Hezekia kiangah genin, Toupa, na pu David Pathianin hichiin achi, Na thumna ka jaa, na khituite leng ka mu-a: ngaiin, na damsung nite ah kum sawm le kum nga ka behlap ding.
Huan, nang leh hiai khopi Assuria kumpipa akipan ka humbit dinga: hiai khopi ka hum ding hi.
Huan, Toupan a thil gen a hih ngei ding chih, hiai nanga dingin Toupa akipan chiamtehna ding ahi ding:
Enin, inlimchiala lim, Ahaz dakbitheihnaa niam kiaksa, inlimchial sawm tanin ka kiksak nawn ding, a chi, chiin, chiin.
Huchiin, ni a niamna dakbitheihnaah inlimchial sawm tannin a kik nawnta hi.
Juda kumpipa Hezekia china, a dam nawn nunga a laigelh:
Ka damsung nite sun lai takin han kongpi-ah lut dingin ka kisaa: ka damsung kum omlai dingte suhin ka omta, ka chi hi.
Toupa, Toupa ngei, mi hing gamah ka mu nawnta kei dinga: khovela omte lakah mihing ka mu nawnta kei ding hi.
Ka omna suan in a oma, belamchingmi puanin bang in ka kianga kipana lak mang in a omta hi.
Puan gan min a puan a jial bangin ka hinna ka jial a; aman siambu akipan a hon teptan mot sina; nang ni khat leh zan khat thil thu-a hon hih tawp maimah ding nei ve ka chi.
Jingsang tan ka dai teiteia; humpinelkai bang in ka guh tengteng a sutan veka: nang ni khat leh jan khat thil thu-a hon hihtawp mai ding neive.
Lensiam hiam, vakang hiam bangin ka hamhama, vakhu bang in ka thumthuma, tunglam etnain ka mit a vaita hi; Toupa aw, nuaisiah a om kahi, nang ka tang in ding in.
Bang ka gen de aw?
Aman honhoupiha, amah mahin a hih pah ngal: ka hinna ningkitelna jiak in ka damsung kum tengtengin awl khakhain ka pai khiankhian ta ding.
Toupa aw, hichibang thil jiakin mihingte a hing jel uh, huaite kiaah ka kha hinna a om jel hi: huaijiakin hondam sak nawnin hon hihing sak nawn in.
Ngaiin, ka lungmuanna dingin ahi, ningkitelna thupitak ka naneih: himahleh nang, ka hinna na it jiak in, siatna kokhuk akipanin na humbitta; ka khelhnate tengteng lah na nunglamah na pai vekta ngala.
Hanin lah hon phat thei ngal keia, sihnain leng honpahtawi thei sam kei hi: kokhuka kumten na thutak a lemen theikei uh.
Mihingin, mihing in, amau ngeiin tuni-a ka hih bangin a honphat ding uh: pa in atate kiangah na thutak a theisak ding.
Toupa bel hon hondam dingin a mansa gige hi: huaijiakin I damsung tengteng in, Toupa inah, ka late tumgingguineite toh i sa ding.
Isaiin, Theipi gah lomkhat la henla, damdawi a tata tatte dingin a meimatumah tat hen, huchiin a dam ding, a na chi khinta.Hezekiain leng, Toupa inah ka hoh tou nawn ding chih theihna bang chiamtehna hong om ding ahia?
A nachikhinta hi.

A nachikhinta hi.
Huchihlaiin Baladan tapa Babulon kiumpipa Merodak-baladanin laite leh kipahman Hezekia kiangah a khaka: a chi ana chih leh a dam nawnta chih a najak jiak in.
Huchiin Hezekia a tunguah akipaka, a kianguah a thil manphate koihna in dangkate, dangkaengte, gimlim bangbang hiamte, sathau manpha takte, a galvan koihna insung tengtengte, a gou hoih laka om tengteng te a ensak: a in leh agam sunga om himhim Hezekiain a kiang ua a etsak louh bangmah himhim a om kei hi.
Huchihlaiin jawlnei Isai bel kumpipa Hezekia kiangah a honga, a kiangah, dena miten bang ahia a gen uh?
Koi akipan ahia na kianga a hong uh? a chi a.
Huan, Hezekia in, Gam gamlapi akipan, Babulon akipanin, ka kianga hong pai uh ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin aman, Na inah bang a en uh eita? a chi a.
Huan, Hezekiain, Ka in sunga om tengteng a en vek uh: ka gou hoih laka tebang ka etsak louh bangmah a om kei, chiin, a dawng.
Huchiin Isaiin Hezekia kiangah, Sepaihte Toupa thu theiin.
Ngaiin na in sunga om tengteng leh tuni tana na piputen a kholkhawmte uh Babulon khua paipihin a om vek ding; bangmah him him nutsiat in a om kei ding; hucibang nite a hong tung ding, Toupan achi.
Huan, na tapa, na gila hong gah ding, na suan dingte ngei laka mi, a pai mang pih ding uh; amau Babulon kumpipa inah michilgeh dingin a om ding uh, a chih, a chi a.Huchiin Hezekiain, Isai kiangah, Toupa thu na gen a hoih hi, a chi a.
Amah mahin, Ka damsung in lemna leh thutak a om sin ngala, a chi lai hi.

Amah mahin, Ka damsung in lemna leh thutak a om sin ngala, a chi lai hi.
Lungmuan un, ka mite lungmuan un, na Pathian un a chi.
Jerusalemte kiangah lungmuan lamsangin thugen unla, a galdouna uh hih zoh a hitaa, a khelhna uh ngaihdam ahi a, a thil hih khelh tengteng gun ding in Toupa khutta kipan amunihin a muta uh chih hilh un.
Tua!
Kikou awin, Gamdaiah Toupa lampi bawl unla, gam keu-ah I Pathian adingin lamlian kilualsak un.
Guam chih sansak ahivek dinga, tang chih mual chih niamsak ahi ding: lampi kawite tansak ahi dinga, a phokna lailai hihlual ahi ding:
Huan, Toupa thupina hihlat ahi dinga, mi tengtengin huai a mu diamdiam chiat ding uh: Toupa kamin lah a genta ngala, a chi a.
Tua! awin, Kikou in, a chi.
Huan, miin, bang thu gen din kaki kou dia? a chi-a.
Mi tengteng loupa bang ahi ua, a thupina tengteng uleng pawna pak bang ahi.
Toupa huin a mut jiakin loupa a vuaia, a pak a tul nak: mite jaw loupa bang ahi mahmah uhi.
Loupa a vuaia, a pak a tul jel: i Pathian thu ubel khantawn in a om gige ding, chiin, a chi a.
Zion kianga a tanchin hoih hilh mi aw, tangsang mahmahte khawngah vahoh tou un; Jerusalem kianga tanchin hoih hilh mi aw, ngaihtakin na aw suahin; suahin, lau ken; Juda khuate kiangah, En un, na Pathiah uh!
En un, Toupa Pathian mi hattak bang in a hongpai sin hi; a banin a sikin vai a hawm ding: en un, a kipahman lah a kiangah a om hi, a ditna leng amaah a om.
Aman belamchingpa bangin a belamhon a vak dinga, belamnoute a banin a pomkhawm dinga, a ang sunga koihin a paipih dinga, noukailaite bel awlawl in a pi hiathiat ding, chiin.
Kuan ahia tuite a khutpek kuak lela teha, tunga van khap lela teh a, leia leivui tehna khat lel a thun veka, tangte lah khaina lel a khaia, mualpawngte lah bukna lela buk?
Kuan ahia Toupa kha thilhih dan ding kawkmuh? ahih keileh kua ahia amah lemsehsak hi-a amah chi?
Aman kua a dong a, kuan ahia amah theisaka, vaihawm lampi ensaka, theihna hilha, theihsaimna lampi ensak ngei?
Ngaiin, namchih lah baltina tui tak khat bang lel ahi ua, buknaa banghiam nen bang lela seh ahi ua, ngaiin, aman lah tuikulh gante thilneu neuchikte bangin a dom jel hi.
Lebanon nangawn khul tham ahi keia, a gama gante leng halmanga kithoihnatham ahi sam kei hi.
Namchihte lah a maah bangmahlou bang ahi ua, amah ngaihtuahin bangmahlou sanga tawm jaw, huihkhua lel ahi uhi.
Pathian kua toh teh dia kisa na hi ua?
Ahihkaleh, bang lim ahia amah toh na teh ding uh?
Milim bawltawm zaw, nasem miin a sunga, dangkaeng sek min dangkaeng in a luan khum a, huai adingin dangka khainiangte a sunsak jel

Na lungsim un na theingei kei ua hia?
Na bil un na za ngei kei ua hia? a tunga kipan in hon hilh kei ua hia?
Lei pian chila kipanin na theisiam kei ua hia?
Amah jaw lei kualkhumna tunga tupa ahi, amah mitmuhin leitunga omte khaupe bang lel ahi uh, amah jaw tunga van puanin tung banga kai palha, Puan in omna ding a jak a, miliante bangmahlou suaksakpa ahi.
Amah leitunga vaihawmmite bangmahlou-a bawl nakpa ahi.
Ahia, suan ahi kei ua; ahi, a tuh ahi kei uh; ahi, a kung un leiah zung a kai kei: huailouin aman amau a muta, a vuai ua, pingpeiin buhsi a lak mang bangin a la mang nak hi.
Kua toh honteha, kua kimpih lela honsep dek na hi ua?
Mi siangthouin a chi
Tunglam khawngah na mit uh haksak unla, huai thilte khawng kua siam hiam en un; aman tuh sepaihte kizomzom in a pi khe jela, a min chiat un a sam jela; a hatna thupina jiak leh thilhihtheihna lama a hat jiakin khat lel leng kimlo a om ngei kei uhi.
Jakobte aw, Bangchia hichibanga chi na hi ua, Isrealte aw, bangchia, hichibanga thugen na hi ua, Ka lampi jaw Toupa laka sel ahi a, a honvaihawmsakna ka Pathian laka lak mang ahi, chih?
Na lungsim in na theingei kei ua hia?
Na bil un na za ngei kei ua hia?
Khantawn Pathian.
TOUPA kawlmong Siampa, a bah ngei keia, a gim ngei sam louhdan; a theihsiamdan zon khiak vual ahi kei hi.
Bahte kiangah thilhitheihna a pe jela; hatna him him neiloute a hatsak naknak hi.
Tuailaite nangawn leng a bah un a gim ding ua, tangvalte leng a puk zou ding uh:TOUPA ngakten jaw a hatna uh a thaksak nawn ding ua; muvanlaite bangin khain a leng tou ding ua; gim louin a tai ding ua; bah louin khein a pai ding uhi.
TOUPA ngakten jaw a hatna uh a thaksak nawn ding ua; muvanlaite bangin khain a leng tou ding ua; gim louin a tai ding ua; bah louin khein a pai ding uhi.
Tuikulh gahte aw, ka maah dai sisip unla; michihin a hatna uh thaksak nawm uhenla: hongpai nai chiat le uh; huai khit chiangin gen uhen: vaihawm dingin kinaih tuah chiat ni.
Suahlam akipan mikhat, diktatna jiak a khe bula a sap, kuan ahia kai halh?
Aman lah nam chih a maah a piaa, kumpipate tungah vai a hawmsaka; amau leivui bangin a namsau kiangah a piaa, buhsi huih mut leng bangin a thalpeu kiangah leng a pia hi.
Aman amaute a delha, bittakin a pai jela; a khea a pai nailouhna lampi-ah.
Atunga kipan suan tengteng samin, kuan ahia sema, hih khin?
Kei TUOPA, a masapen leh nanungpen kia ka om, a hihpa tak ka hi
Tuikulh gamten amu ua; a lau ua; kawlmongte a ling ua: a honnaiha, a hongpai ua.
Mi chihin amau lawmte a panpih ua; mi chihin a unaute uh kiangah, Khamuang takin om un, a chi chiat uh.
Huchiin, a bulhkipna lam thu-ah, A noih hi, chiin, khutsiam miin dangkaeng sekmi a hasuana, seka sekmum sekdou sekmi a hasuana: huan, a linlouhna dingin kilhna tein a kilh kipta.
Himahleh nou Isrealte ka sikha, Jakopte kamitel, ka lawm Abraham suante aw,
Nou, lei tawpna akipana ka mi pi, a nawl akipana ka mi sap, ka sikhate na hi ua, honpaikhe louin ka hontel jaw hi, ka honchihte aw,
Lau kei un, kei lah na kiang uah ka om ngala; mangbang kei un, kei lah na Pathian uh ka hi ngala: ka honhatsak dinga; ahi, ka honpanpih ding; ahi, ka diktatna khut taklamin ka honlen gige ding.
Ngaiin, na tung ua lungkimlou tengtengzahlak tak leh zum takin a om ding uh: nou honselte lah bangmahlou bang ahi ding ua, a mang ding uh.
Nou honselte na zong ding ua, namu tuan kei ding uh: nou hon doute lah bangmah lou bang ahi ding ua, thil omlou bang lel ahi ding uh.
Kei TOUPA na Pathian un, Lau kei un, ka honpanpih ding, chiin, na khut taklam ulah ka len sin ngala.
Nou Jakob tangtel leh Isreal mite aw, lau kei un, ka honpanpih ding, TOUPAN a chi, nou hon tanpa tuh Isrealte Mi Siangthou a hi
Ngaiin, buhsukna khawl thak mahmah, hiam mahmah, ha neiin ka honbawl ding; tangte khawng chilin na khen jan ding ua, mualpawngte lah buhsi bangin na bawl ding uh.
Na jap ding ua, huihin a mut leng dinga, pingpeiin a hih dalh ding: huan, noute TOUPA ah na kipak ding ua, Isrealte Mi Siangthoupa na hon suang ding uh.
Mi genthei leh tagahten tui a zong jel ua, a om ngal keia, a lei uh dangtakin a hul khinjel; kei TOUPAIN amau ka dawng dinga, kei Isrealte Pathianin amaute ka paisan kei ding.
Tangsang giau-ahte luite ka luangkhesak dinga, guam laizangahte tuinakte ka suaksak ding: gamdai dilin ka bawl dinga, gam keu leng tuinakin ka bawl ding hi.
Gamdaiah sidar singte, singgite, muite, thau singte ka suan dinga, gam keuah meilah singte, phante, singgelh chite ka suan khawm vek ding:
TOUPA khutin huaite a hih ahi chih leh Isrealte Mi Siangthouin a siam ahi chih a muh ua, a theih ua, a ngaihtuah ua, a theisiam theina ding un.
Na thu uh hong gen un, TOUPAN achi; Pathianin na chihna sanpen uh sulang un, Jakopte Kumpipan a chi.
Huaite sulang uhenla, thil hong tung dingte I kiang uah gen uhen; I ngaihtuah theina ding leh a tawpna ding I theih theina dingin, tuma thilte bang ahia gen un; ahihkeileh, thil hongtung dingte hontheisak un.
Pathian na hi uh chih ka theih theihna ding un tunungchianga thil hongtung dingte gen un; ahi, I mangbat chiatna ding un leh I et chiat ding un thil hoih hiam thil hoihlou hiam hih dih ua le.
Ngai un, bangmah nana hi kei uhi, na thil hih u leng bangmah ahi sam kei: nou hontelte lah mi kihhuaipi na hi uhi.
Mal lama kipan mi khat ka ding saka, amah a hontunga; ni suahna akipan ka min loupa; aman suang bulhkipna bawl bangin vaihawmmite a bawl dinga, belvelmiin bellei a chil mah bangin a chil ding hi.
I theih theihna ding un kuan ahia a tunga kipan gen ngei?
Amah jaw a dik hi, I chih theihna ding un kuan ahia gen khol ngei?
A hi gen himhim a om kei uh, ahi, theisak him him a omkei uh, ahi, na thugente uh za himhim a om kei uh.

Huan, ka etin leng mi himhim a om kei ua; amau ka dotin leng.

Ka sikha, ka let gige, ka tel, ka lungin a pahtak mahmah en dih ua: a tungah ka kha ka koihta: Jentelte kiangah piak dingin vaihawmna thu a hong pawt ding.
A kikou kei dinga, a aw leng a suaksak sam kei ding, kongzing ah a aw a kiza sak sam kei ding.
Sialluang gawpsa a kitan siangsak kei dinga, pat khu a mitsak kei ding: vaihawmna thutakin a la kei ding.
Lei tunga vaihwmna a omsak masiah, amah a bah kei dinga, a lungdong sam kei ding; huan, tuikulh gamten a dan thu a ngak nilouh ding uhi.
Pathian, toupa. van siampa leh phalhpa, lei leh a sunga kipana pawt tengteng hihlianpa, a tunga mite kiangah hatna pepa leh a tunga paite kiangah kha pepan hichiin a chi:
Kei toupain diktatnain ka honsama, na khut ka len dinga, ka honhumbit dinga, mite thukhun ding leh Jentelte hihvakpa dingin ka honsep dinga:
Mitdelte mit hihvak ding leh. mi tengte suangkulha kipan pi khe ding leh, mial laka tute suangkulh akipana pi khe dingin.
TOUPA ka hi; huai tuh ka min ahi: ka thupina mi dang kiangah ka pe kei dinga, phat ka lohna leng milim bawl tawmte kiangah ka pe sam kei ding.
Ngai un, tuma thilte a hongtungta, thil thakte gen ka hi: a pou main a thachin ka honhilh hi.
Tuipi-a hohsukte leh, a sunga om tengteng leh, tuikulh gamte leh, a tunga om tengteng aw, TOUPA pahtawiin la thak sa unla, kawlmong akipanin leng amah phatna lasa un.
Gamdai leh a khoiten a aw uh suaksak uhen, Kedarte omna khuaten; Suangpi khuaa omten nuamsain lasa uhenla, mual dawna kipanin kikou uhen.
TOUPA hih thupi uhenla, tuikulh gamten a phatna thu gen uhen.
toupa lah mihat mahmah bangin a pawt dinga, galdoumi bangin mulitna a tokthou ding: a kikou dinga, ahi, ngaih takin a kikou ding; amah doute tungah hat takin a gamtang ding.
Sawtpi ka daitaa; ka om kinkenin ka kidek teitei; tun jawm numei nauvei bangin ka kikou tuaituai dinga; ka nak honhonin ka nak huhu ding.
Tangte leh mualpawngte ka hihse dinga, a niam tengteng ka keusak vek ding; luite khawng tuikulh gamin ka bawl dinga, dilte ka kangsak ding.
Mittote a theih ngei louh uh lam ah ka honpi dinga; a theih ngei louh uh lampi ah ka pi ding: a ma uah mial vakin ka bawl dinga, lam kawinate leng ka tangsak ding.
Huai thilte ka hih dinga, amau leng ka nuse kei ding.

Ka sikha loungal kua mit a tawa?

Hon kithuah pihmi bangin kua mit a tawa?
TOUPA dikha bangin kua mit a tawa?
Thil tampi na mu-a, himahleh na lungsimin na vom gige kei; a bilte lah a kihonga, himahleh a za kei jel hi.
Dan lah a diktatna jiaka letsaka zah kaisaka om TOUPAN hoih a saa.
Himahleh hiaite jaw guta guk sak leh loh tuak mite ahi ua; guama ahi vek ua, suangkulha khum mangte ahi ua; sal ding ahi ua, kuamahin lah a humbit ngal kei ua, gallaka lak ding ahi ua, kuamahin, penawnin, a chi tuan kei uhi.
Na lak uah huaitea bildoh ding kua na om ua?
Hun hongtung ding adia ngaikhiaa za ding kua na om ua?
Kuain ahia Jakobte gallak dia lak dinga piaa, Isreal gutate kianga pia?
TOUPA, a tunga I khelhnapa un, a piak hilou hia?
Amah lampi ah lah a pai nuam ngal kei ua.
A dan thu lah a mang sam kei uh.Huaijiakin a heh mahmahna leh kibawlna tha amau tungah a sung buaa; huaiin amaute a kanga, himahleh a thei sam kei uh; huaiin amaute a hula, himahleh a lungsim un a ngaihtuah tuan kei uhi.
Huaijiakin a heh mahmahna leh kibawlna tha amau tungah a sung buaa; huaiin amaute a kanga, himahleh a thei sam kei uh; huaiin amaute a hula, himahleh a lungsim un a ngaihtuah tuan kei uhi.
Tuin jaw, Jakobte aw, Toupa nou honsiampa leh, Isrealte aw, nou honbawlpan, hichiin a chi; laukei un, ka hontanta hi; na min un ka honsama, keia na hi uhi.
Tuite na ngah tan lai un leng na kiang uah ka om dinga; luite na ngah tan lai un leng a hontum kei ding hi: meia na pai tan lai un leng ka honhun kei dinga; meikuangin leng a honliau kei ding hi.
Kei Toupa na Pathian uh, Israelte Mi Siangthou, nou honhumbitpa ka hi ngala; noute tatna ding in Aigupta gam ka piaa, Ethiopia leh Seba gamte na sik ding un ka pia hi.
Ka ngaihin manpha mahmah na hi ua, mizahtakhuai mahmah leng na hi uh hi, itleng ka honit jiakin, na sik un mite ka pe dinga, na hinna sik ding un mi chih ka pe ding hi.
Lau kei un, na kiang uah lah ka om ngala: na suante uh suahlam akipanin ka honpi dinga, tumlam akipanin ka honpi khawm ding hi;
Mal lam kiangah, Khah un, ka chi dinga; sim lam kiangah, Len kei un, ka chi ding; ka tapate gamlapi akipanin honpi unla, ka tanute kawlmong akipanin honpi un;
Ka min popeuhmahte leh ka thupina dinga ka siam peuhmahte; amau ka bawla, ahi, amau ka suktuah ahi uh hi.
Mit nei ngala mittote leh, bil nei ngala bengngongte, pi khia un.
Nam chih kikhawm uhenla, mi chih om khawm uhen: a lak ua kua ahia hiai gen theia, tumalam thilte hontheisak thei?
Siamtansaka a om theihna ding un a palaite uh honpi uhen: ahihkeileh bilin ja uhenla, thutak ahi, chi uhen.
Mi theiha, mi upa, amah kahi chih na theih theihna ding un, noute ka palaite na hi uh, ka tel ka sikha leng, Toupan a chi: ka om main Pathian himhim bawl a om keia, ka om nungin leng a om sak kei uh.
Kei, keimahmah, toupa ka hi; keimah loungal hondampa himhim a om kei.
Ken ka gena, ka hondama, ka theisaka, na lak uah gamdang Pathian himhim a omkei hi: huaijiakin noute ka palaite na hi uh, TOUPAN a chi, huan kei lah Pathian ka hi.
A hi, ni om nungsang kei amah ka hi; huchiin ka khuta kipan honkhe thei himhim kuamah a om kei uh; na ka sema, kuan ahia huai hei ding?
toupa, nou hontanpa, Israelte Mi Siangthouin hichiin a chi: Nou jiakin Babulon khuaah sepaihte ka sawla, huchiin, a vek un, Kaldaite, akipahna longpi uah taimangmi piin ka pi suk ding.
Kei toupa, na Mi Siangthou uh, Israelte siampa, Na Kumpipa uh ka hi, chiin.
Tuipi-a lampi bawlpa leh, tui thupi mahmah te a paina ding bawlpa, TOUPAN hichiin a chi;
Kangtalai leh sakol, sepaihte leh thilhihtheihna pi khepan (huaite a lum khwm zengzung ua, a thou nawnta kei ding uh; a chimit khin ua, khawnvak puan minsak bangin mihsakin a omta uh), chiin.
Tumalam thilte jaw theihgige kei unla, nidanglai thilte leng ngaihtuah sam kei un.
Ngai un, thilthak ka hih sin; tua kipanin a dawn ding; huai na theikei ding ua hia?
Gamdai nangawnah lampi ka bawl dinga, gam keu ah leng luite ka bawl ding.
Gamsaten leng honpahtawi ding ua, sehalte, vasa ngawngsaute tanin: gamdai a tuite ka om sak jiak leh, gamkeua luite ka om sak jiakin, ka mi, ka telte kianga dawn dinga piak ding.
Hiai mite kei adingin ka bawla; kei phatna a hihlang ding uhi.
Himahleh Jakobte aw, nou jaw non sam kei ua, isarel te aw, noujo nawn chimtak zota uhi.
Halmanga na thil lat uh gan noute non lak ngei kei ua; na kithoihnate un lah non pahtawi sam kei uhi.
Thil latin na ka honsemsak ngei keia, begawin leng ka honhihgim ngei kei hi.
Kawltu himhim dangkain non leisak ngei kei ua, na kithoihna thaute un leng na hon taisak ngei kei uh: na khelnate uh puak nasepte non sem sak jaw ua, na tatleknate un nou na honhihgim zota uhi.
Kei, kei mahmah, keimah leh keimah jiak lela na tatleknate uh nul mangjelpa ka hi; na khelhnate u leng ka theigige kei ding.
Hon theihpih un; ngaihtuah chiat ni: siam tansaka na om theihna ding un na thu gen un.
Na pu masapen un a khiala, na thugenmite uh leng ka tungah a talek uh.Huaijiakin mun siangthou-a mi liante ka hihbuah dinga, huchiin Jakobte hamsethuak dingin ka bawl dinga; Israelte muhdah din ka bawl ding hi.

Tuin jaw, Jakobte, ka sikhate aw, ka tel Israealte aw, ngaikhia unla:
toupa, nou honsiampa, sul akipana nou hon bawlpa, nou honpanpih ding pan hichiin a chi: Ka sikha Jakobte aw, ka tel nou Jesurunte aw, lau kei un.
Dangka tungah tui ka sung dinga, lei keu ah tuiluangte ka sung ding; na suante uh tungah ka kha ka sung dinga, na tate uh tungah ka vualzawlna ka sung ding hi:
Huchiin amau, tui luanna kianga singhiangkaite a pou bangin, loupa lakah a pou ding uh.
Mi khatin, toupa A ka hi, achi dinga; mi dang Jakob minin a kilou dinga; mi dangin a khuta, toupa, chi-a gelhin, Israel min a chi minin a zang ding chiin, a chi hi.
toupa, Israelte Kumpipa, amau tanpa sepaihte TOUPAIN hichiin a chi: Kei masapenpa ka hi a, nanungpenpa leng ka hi; keimah loungal Pathian himhim a om kei uh.
Nidanglaia mite ka seh nungsang kei hih bangin kuan a sam dia, huaite kuan a gen dia, kuan ahia kei sika kizom jela hihlang ding?
Thil hontung dingte leh hongon dingte gen hen.
Lau kei unla, kihta sam kei un; tumalamin na kiang uah ka gen khinin ka hontheihsak khin hi lou hia?
Huchiin noute ka palaite na hi uhi.
Keimah lou Pathian himhim a om ua hiam?
A hi, Suangpi himhim a omkei; khat lel leng a om ka theikei.
Milim bawl tawm bawlmite jaw a vek un huihkhua lel ahi un; a thil deihlam un a phatuam kei ding; a zahlakna ding himhim un amau palaite un leng a mu theikei ua, a thei sam kei uh.
Kuan ahia pathian bawl mahmah?
Ahihkeileh, kuan ahia bangmah dinga phatuam loupi milim bawl tawm sung mahmah?
Ngaiin, a pawlpi tengteng a zahlak ding ua; na semmite leng mihingte laka mi ahi uh: a vek un kikhawm vek uhenla, ding uhen; a lau ding ua, a zahlak khawm ding uh.
Siksekin heipi a sek jela, meihol ah a tholha sek ding bangin a seka, a ban hattakin a sek je; ahi, a gil a hong kiala, tha a hong zo jel; tui himhim a dawn keia, a bah nak hi.
Singlem bawl miin khau a kai gaka, pensilin a hiding a bawla, nawt mamnain a hidingdan a bawla, bem bawlnain a hiding a bawla, mihing lim bangin a bawla, ina om dingin mihing kilawmna bangin a bawl jel hi.
Sidar singte a kiphuka, se sing leh tosaw a laa, gammang sing laka khat amah tuama om dingin a hihkipa; meilahsing a suana, vuahin a vak hi.
Huainungin mi adinga meia khul ding a hita ding; huaia kipanin a laa, a kihihlum jel; ahi, a kuangsaka, tanghou a hai jel hi: ahi, pathian a bawla, a be jel hi; huai sing pen milim bawl tawm dingin a bawla, huai khupbohin chibai a buk hi.
Huai sing khenkhat meiah a khula; a khenkhat sa nekna dingin a zanga; sa a ema, a tai hi; ahi, mei lum a awia, Nuame, ka lumta, mei mel ka muta e. a chi a;
A val pathian dingin a bawla, a bawltawm milim mah: huai khupboha chibai bukin a biaa, a kiangah athuma, Honhondamin, ka pathian lah na hi ngala, a chi jel hi.
A theikei ua, a ngaihtuah sam kei uh; aman lah a mit uh a mitsisakta ngala; a theihsiam louhna dingun a lungtang uh leng a khaksakta hi.
Huchiin kuamahin a theikhe nawn kei ua, Khenkhat lah meiah ka khul ngala; ahi, a vamah leng tanghou bang ka hai a; sa leng ka ema, lah ka ne ngala: a val thil kihhuai dingin ka bawl ding hia?
Singa suak khupbohin chibai ka buk ding hia?
Hih dingin amauah theihna leh theihsiamna a om tuan kei hi.
Vuk kia a ne jela: a lungtang khema omin, a hinna a kihumbit theihlouhna ding leh, Ka khut taklamah juau a om ka hia?
Achih theihlouhna dingin, amah a kalsuansakta hi.
Jakobte aw, huai thilte theihgige un, Israelte aw, nou leng theigige un ka sikhate lah na hi ngal ua; kei bawl na hi ua; ka sikhate na hi uh: Israelte aw, ka mangngilhin na om kei ding uh.
Na tatleknate uh meipi hihmang bangin ka hihmang taa, na khelhnate uh mei hihmang bangin ka hihmang na lai hi; ka kiangah hongkik nawn un, nou lah ka hontanta ngala, chiin.
Vante aw, nuamsa takin lasa un, TOUPAN lah huaite a hihta ngala; lei nuailamte aw, kikou un, tangte aw, gamnuai leh a sunga sing om chiteng aw, lasa khe guih un: TOUPAN Jakobte a tantaa, Israelteah a kipahtawi sin ngala.
toupa, noumau hontanpa, sul akipana nou honbawlpan hichin a chi: Kei jaw toupa, thil tengteng siampa, keimah kiaa van kaipalhpa, liansakpa ka hi; kua ahia ka kianga om?
Kei lah juautheite chiamtehnate bangmahlou-a bawla, aisansiamte mi haia bawlpa, mi pilte nunglam ngasaka, a theihna uh haihuaia bawlpa.
A sikha thu hihkipa, a palaite lentheih tangtungsakpa, Jerusalem tungthu-a, Huailaiah mi a om nawn ding uh, chipa leh Juda gam kho tung thu-a, Bawlin a om nawn chiat ding uh, a siatna lailai ka bawl nawn ding, chipa.
Tui thuk mahmah kiangah, Kangtatin, na luite keng ka kangtat sak ding, chipa.Kura tungthu-a, Amah jaw ka belamchingpa a hi-a, Jerusalem tungthu-a, Bawlin a om nawn ding, chih leh, Pathian biakin kianga, Na suangphum lepin a om nawn ding, chi khop hialin ka deihlam tengteng a hih ding, chipa ka hi, chiin.
Kura tungthu-a, Amah jaw ka belamchingpa a hi-a, Jerusalem tungthu-a, Bawlin a om nawn ding, chih leh, Pathian biakin kianga, Na suangphum lepin a om nawn ding, chi khop hialin ka deihlam tengteng a hih ding, chipa ka hi, chiin.
Toupan a thaunilh, Kura, namte a maa phukpai ding leh, kumpipate kawnggakte phelsak ding leh, a maa kongkhakte honsak ding leh, kulh kongkhakte khak louha omsak dingpa, a khut taklam ka letpa kiangah, hichiin a chi:
Kei na maah ka pai dinga, a phok lailai ka kibang sak ding: dal kongkhak ka hihse vek dinga, a kalhna siktawnte ka tansak ding:
Huan, Toupa, na mina honsampa, Israelte Pathian ngei ka hi chih na theihtheihna dingin mial laka goute ka honpe dinga, mun daia sum selte leng ka honpe ding.
Jakobte ka sikhate leh Israelte ka telte jiakin na minin ka honsama; honthei ngei kei mahle chin na min ka honphuahsak hi.
Keimah Toupa kahi, adang himhim a om kei; keimah loungal Pathian himhim a om kei: hon thei ngei keimahlechin na tai ka honggaksak ding hi:
Keimah loungal a dang himhim a om kei chih ni suahna lama kipan leh tum lama kipana a theih theihna ding uh: kei jaw Toupa ka hi, a dang himhim a om kei.
Vak ka bawla, mial leng ka siam hi; kituahna ka bawla, gilou leng ka siam hi; kei jaw Toupa, huchibang thil tengteng hihjelpa ka hi, chiin.
Vante aw, tunglam akipanin takkhe sak un, van dumten diktatna hon sung suk uhen: hotdamna a dotkhiak sak theihna ding un lei kihong henla, diktatna toh pou khawm sak hen; kei Toupan huaite ka siam ahi.
Amah Bawlpa kinakpih mi tung a gik hi!
Belleiin a velmi kiangah, Bang bawlna hia?
A chi dia hia?
Ahihkeileh, na nasepin, A khutin siam himhim a neikei?
A chi dia hia?
A pa kianga, Bang suang na hia?
Chimi tung hiam, a nu kianga, Bang ahia na suan ding? chimi tung hiam a gik hi!
Toupa, Israelte Mi Siangthou, amau Bawlpan hichiin a chi: Thil hongtung ding thu hondong unla; ka tapate thu leh ka khut nasep thu ah thu hon pia un.
Lei ka bawla, a tunga mihing om leng ka bawla: keimahin ka khut ngeiin, van ka kai palha, a sepaihte leng thu ka pia,
Kura diktatna neiin ka ding saka, a lampi tengteng ka tangsak ding: aman ka khopi a bawl nawn dinga, a tatna man uh deih jiakin hi louin, kipahman deih jiak leng hi louin, ka salte a pawt sak ding, sepaihte Toupan a chi, chiin.
Toupan hichin a chi, Aigupta semgimte leh Ethiopia sumsinmi leh Savea-te mi sang pipite na kiang lam uah a hongpai ding ua, nou adingin a omta ding uh; nou a honjui ding ua; khainiang bulhin ahi a hongpai ding uh: huchiin khupbohin nou chibai a honbuk ding uh, Pathian noumauah a om ngut hi; a dang himhim a om kei, pathian dang himhim a om kei, chiin, na kiang uah hehpihna a ngen ding uh, chiin.
Israelte Pathian aw, Hondampa, Pathian kisel nakpa na hi ngut hi.
Zahlaktakin a om ding ua, ahi, a vek un zumtakin a om ding uh: milim bawlmite zumnaah a lut chiat ding uh.
Israelte bel khantawn hotdamnaa Toupan hotdamin a om ding uh: khantawn tanin leng na zahlak kei ding ua, na zum sak kei ding uhi.
Toupa van siampan (amah lah Pathian, lei bawla siampa ahi; aman lei a kipsaka, bangmahlou din a bawl keia, mihing omna dingin a bawljaw hi) hichiin a chi ngala: Kei Toupa ka hi; a dang himhim a om kei.
A gukin, gam mial munah, thu ka gen ngei keia; Jakob suante kiangah bangmah lou dingin honzong un, ka chi ngei kei: kei Toupan diktatna thu ka gen jela, thudik mahmahte ka gen jel hi.
Kikhawm unla hongpai un; nam chih kala gawtna pelte aw, hongpai nai chiat un: a sing milim bawl tawm tawia, mi hondam theiloupi pathian kianga thum jelten theihna himhim a neikei uh.
Gen unla, hon pawt khe sak un; ahi, kidong uhenla: tumasiah akipan kuan ahia theisak?
Nidanglaia kipan kuan ahia gen? kei Toupan ka hih ahi kei maw?
Keimah lou ngal Pathian dang himhim a om kei; Pathian diktat leh hondampa ka hi; keimah lou ngal a dang himhim a om kei.
Kawlmonga mi tengteng aw, kei lam hongnga unla, hotdamin om un: kei lah Pathian ka hi ngala, a dang himhim a om kei.
Khuk chih ka maah a khukdin ta dia, lei chihin leng ka kiangah kichiam in thu achiamta ding chi in kei lehkei ki lou in ka ki chiam ta, thu lah diktatna ngenin ka kam akipanin a pawttaa, a hongkik nawnta kei ding.
Min, Toupa kia ah diktatna leh hatna a om, chiin, ka tanchin a gen ding uh: amah kiang ngeiah mi a hongpai ding ua, a tunga lungkimlou tengteng zahlaktakin a omta ding uh, chiin.Israel suan tengteng Toupa ah ahi, siamtansaka a om ua, Toupa a suan ding uh, chiin.

Bel a kuna, Nebo a kihihniama; a milimte uh gamsa tung leh gan tungah a naomta ua: na thil vak pih vialvialte uh vanpuak lela bawl ahia, gamsa bah adingin vanpuak gik dia bawl ahi lel hi,
A nakihihniam un, a nakunta chiat ua, vanpuak gik lah a humbit thei ngal kei ua, amau mah lah sala piin a omzo ta uhi.
Jakob inkuanoihte leh, Israel inkuanpihte laka om sun tengteng aw, gil akipana kon puaka, sul akipana ka kithuahpihte aw, ka thu ngaikhia un:
Tekkuna na om tan pha un leng amah ka hi dinga, na lu ua kelsam a pou vek hun chiang in leng ka honpom ding hi: ken ka bawla, keimah mahin ka po ding; ahi, ken ka pom dinga, ka humbit ding.
Kibanga seh ka hihna dingun kua toh non teha, kua kimpihin non bawla, kua toh nonteh ding?
Zaip akipan dangkaeng bung khe jel, dangka buknaa buk jelten, dangkaeng sekmi achial ua, aman pathianin a bawla, huchiin, a khupboh ua, ahi, chibai a buk jel uhi.
A liangjang uah a pua ua, a paipih uh; a omnaa kipan a suan nawn kei ding: ahi, min amah a sam ding ua, himahleh a dawng theikei ding, a mangbatna ua kipan a honkhe theikei ding hi.
Talekmite aw, huai theigige unla, kipasalsak unla, theikhe nawn un,
Nidanga thil masate theigige un: kei Pathian ka hia, adang himhim a om kei uh; kei Pathian ka hi, kei bang himhim a om kei uh;
Ken a tawpna ding uh a tung akipanin ka gen a; Pha ka sak a ding suak dinga, ka deihlam tengteng ka hih vek ding, ka chi a:
Suahlam akipan vasa duhgawl tak, gamlapi-a kipanin ka mi seh ka sam ding a; ahi, ka genta, ka tangtungsak ding; ka na tumta, kahih ding.
Lungsim ki-uangsak, diktatna toh kigamlate aw, ka thu ngaikhia un:Ka diktatna ka hontawi naia, gamlaah a om kei ding, ka hondamnain leng sawt a hal kei ding; huchiin ka thupina Israelte adingin hotdamna Zion ah ka koih ding
