Huaiziakin TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Hiai mite kiangah puknate ka koih dinga, huaiah pate a tapate utoh a puk khawm ding ua, inveng leh a lawm leng a mangthang ding uh.
Huan, TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngai in, mallam gam akipan mite a hongpai uh, lei mun tawp akipan nam thupi mahmah a hongkuan khia hi.
Thalpeu leh teipi a tawi ua, hiamgam mahmah, zahngaihna himhim neilou ahi uhi, a husa uh thupi ging honhon bang ahia; sakol tungte a tuang ua, mi chih galkapmi banga kivanin, aw, Zion tanu, nang a hongsual sin uhi.
A minthanna uh I ja ua, I khutte a zo khinta, lunggimnain a honmanta, numei nauvei lunggimna bangbang.
Gam ah pai khe kei un, lampi ah leng pai sam kei un, huaiah lah melma namsau a om ngala, kilchih ah launa a om hi.
Aw, ka mi, ka tanu, saiip puan teng inla, vut lakah totolhin; tapa tangkhat sun bangin sun inla, kap vongvong dih, hihsemi I tunguah a hong tung guih sin ngal ua.
Ka mite laka chiamtehmi din leh zeetmi dingin ka honbawla, a omdan uh na theiha, na zeet theihna dingin.
A vek un helhat, paupeng mahmah gensiat chinga vial vak, dal leh sik bang ahi uh, hoihlou piin a gamtang ua,
Pumin a jap huhu a, mei ah suan a zul beia, hihsingthou tupna a thawn lel ahi, mi giloute lah paih mang ahi ngal kei ua.Miten dankasik ek hoihlou a chi ding ua, TOUPAN amaute a pampaih jiakin.
Miten dankasik ek hoihlou a chi ding ua, TOUPAN amaute a pampaih jiakin.
Toupa kianga kipana Jeremia kianga thu hongtung:
TOUPA in kongpi ah ding inla, huailaiah hiai thu puang inla, hichiin chi in: Nou Juda mi tengteng, TOUPA be dinga hiai kongpi a lutten TOUPA thu ngaikhia un.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Na omdan uleh na thilhihte uh bawlhoih unla, hiai munah ka honteng sak ding hi.
Hiai TOUPA in, TOUPA in, TOUPA in ahi, chih juau thute khawng um kei un:
Na omdan uleh na thilhihte uh na bawl hoih petmah ua, mi leh a inveng kikala thudik taka na vaihawm sak ua,
Nam dang mite, pa neiloute, meitheite na nuaisiah louh ua, hiai mun a midiktat sisan na suahlouh ua, na hoihlouhna ding ua pathian dangte na delh sam kei ua leh,
Hiai gam, tumasiaha na pipute uh kianga ka piak ah khantawn in ka hon tengsak ding hi.
Ngai un, Juau thu, phattuamna om hetlou na um jaw ua.
Gukguin, tualthatin, angkawmin, juaua kichiamin Baal kianga gimlim halin, pathian dang, na theih ngeilouhte uh delhin,
Huan, hiai in, ka min mahmaha loh ah ka maah hong dingin, hiai thil kihhuai tengtengte hih jel kawmin, Hotkhiak ka hita, na chi sin ua hia?
Hiai in ka min mahmaha loh, na mitmuh un suamhatte kokhuk bang lel ahi hia?
Ngai un, kei, kei mahmahin ka mu hi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
A tunga ka min ka tensakna, ka mun Shilo ah hoh dih ua, ka mi Israel gitlouhna jiaka ka thilhih va en un.
Tuin hiai thil tengteng na hih ua, jing pipia thoua na kiang ua thu ka gen ka gente na ngaihkhiak louh ua, nou ka honloha, na dawn louh ziak un:
Shilo tunga ka hih bangin hiai ka min loh, noumau leh na pipute uh kianga ka mun piak, na muan sek uh tungah ka hih sin ahi.
Na unau tengteng uh, Ephraim chi pumpi nangawn ka pai khia bangin ka mitmuha kipan nou ka honpai khe ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huaijiakin, hiai mite adingin thum kenla, kikou khiain thum kenla, ka kiangah leng ngetsak sam ken; ka honngai khe sin ngal kei a.
Juda khopite a leh Jerusalem kholaktea a thilhih uh na mu ka hia?
Naupangten sing a tom ua, a pate un mei a toh ua, numeiten, van kumpinu kianga lat ding tanghou a mek ua, pathian dangte dingin dawn ding thillat a tung khia ua, a honhehsakna lel ding un.
Kei ahi maw honhehsak uh? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: amau zumna dingin amau ahi jaw kei uh maw?
Huaijiakin Toupa Pathianin hichiin a chi: Ngaidih uh, hiai mun tungah te ka hehna leh thangpaihna ka sungkhe dinga; a kang dia, a mit kei ding.
Sepaihte TOUPA, Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi: Na kithoihnate uah halmang kithoihnate behlap unla, san e un.
Halmang thillate hiam, kithoihnate hiam tungthu ah jaw na pipute uh kiangah thu ka gen keia, Aigupta gam akipan ka pi khiak lain leng thu ka pe sam kei:
Ka aw ngaikhia unla, na Pathian uh ka hi dinga, nou leng ka mite na hi ding uh; na hoih theihna ding un na omdan ding uh ka honhilh tengteng jui un, chiin thu ka pe jaw hi.
Himaleh a ngaikhe kei ua, bil a doh sam kei uh: a lungtang gilou uh hihnangin amau thuthuin a om jaw uh, malam jawt sangin a nungtawn zota uhi.
Na pipute uh Aigupta gam akipan a pawt ni ua kipana tuni tannin ka nasemmi, jawlnei tengtengte jing pipia thouin na kiang uah ni tengin ka sawl jel a,
Himahleh a honngaikhe tuan kei ua, bil a doh sam kei uh: a lungsim uh a khauhsak ua, a pipute uh sangin a gilou zota uhi.
Huan, hiai thu tengteng a kiang ua nagen ding ahi: himahleh a hon ngaikhe kei ding ua; amau na sam dinga, a hondawng kei ding uh.
A kiang uah, Hiai nam TOUPA a Pathian uh aw ngaikhe loua, thununna tang lou nam ei ve ua, na chi dinga: thudik a mangthangta, a kam ua kipan paih mang a hita.
Na sam tan inla, pai mang inla, mun sang giau ahte kap khiain; TOUPAN lah a hehna tangmi suante a paikhiain a ngeingaihta ngal kei a.
Juda taten lah ka mitmuhin thilgilou a hih ngal ua, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: ka min lou in ah ninsak dingin a thil kihhuaite uh a koih khin uhi.
A tanute uh, a tapate uh hal dingin Ben-Hinem guam ah Taphet mun sangte a bawl ua; huaite ka thupiak ahi keia, ka lungsim ah leng a lut ngei sam kei.
Huaijiakin, ngaidih uh, nite a hongtung sin, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: huai guam pen, Tophet, chih ahi nawn kei dinga, Ben-Hinom guam, chih leng ahi sam kei ding; Kithahna guam, chih a hita ding: Tophet ah a vui ding ua, vuina ding mun a omta kei ding.
Mite luang tunga leng vasate leh gamsate an ahi ding; kuamahin a delh mang kei ding uh.Huan, Juda khopite ah leh Jerusalem kholakte ah nuamsa husate leh kipahna gingte, mouneipa awte, mou awte leng ka daisak ding: a gam lah a segawp sin ngala.
Huan, Juda khopite ah leh Jerusalem kholakte ah nuamsa husate leh kipahna gingte, mouneipa awte, mou awte leng ka daisak ding: a gam lah a segawp sin ngala.
Huai hun chiangin, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: Juda kumpipate guh te, a heutute guhte, siampute guhte, jawlneite guhte, Jerusalema tengte guhte a han ua kipan a la khe ding ua;
Ni te, kha te, vana om tengteng, a it ua, na a sep ua, a delh ua, a zon ua, chibai a bukte uh maah a phou khe ding uh: lak khawm ahi nawnta kei ding ua, vui ahi sam kei ding uh; leitung a ekvut lel ding ahi ding.
Hiai inkuan gilou mahmah omlai sun tengteng, ka hawljakna muna omlaiten hin sangin sih a tel zo ding uh, chih sepaihte TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huai lou leng a kiang uah hichiin na gen ding hi: TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Mi a puk un a thou nawn kei ding ua hia? mi a vak mangin a hongkik nawn kei dia hia?
Bangachia hiai Jerusalem mite, khantawn a nungtawn dinga a tolhpuk uh? khemna a len kip ua, kik nawn a ut kei uh.
Ka bil dohin ka ngaikhiaa, kuamahin thudik a gen kei uh, kuamahin, Bang ahia ka hih? chiin a thulimlouhna uh a kisik sam kei uh; mi chihin amau lampi a ngat chiat ua, kidouna muna sakol diang onon bang maiin.
Ahi, van a tuivapi in a hunbite a theia, vakhu te, lensiam te, tuivanelkai te, a hun geihgeihin a hongtung jel uh.
Ka miten bel TOUPA thu seh a theikei uh.
Bangchiin ahia, mi pil i hi ua, TOUPA dan i kiang uah a om, na chih uh? ngai un, laigelhmi kolom juautheiin, juauin a suaksakjaw uhi.
Mi pilte a zum un a lungdong ding ua, matin a om ding uh; ngai un, TOUPA thu a paikhia ua, amau ah bang pilna a oma ahia?
Huaijiakin a jite uh midangte kiangah ka pe dinga, a loute uh leng a honneimi dingte kiangah; mi chih, a neupen akipana a thupipen tanin enhat ahi uhi. jawlnei akipana siampu tanin leng mi chih khemhat ahi ngal ua.
Ka tanu, ka mite liam awlmohlou takin, A hoih aka, a hoih aka, chiin a thoih ua, lah a hoih het kei a.
Thil kihhuai a hih uh a zum uhia?
Ii, a zum het kei ua, a mel uh leng a san sam kei.
Huaijiakin pukte lakah a puk tei ding ua, amaute gawt hun chiangin paihkhiakin a om ding uh chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Amau ka hihmang vek dinga, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: grep guite a gah kei dinga, theipi kungte a gah sam kei ding; a nah leng a vuai dinga, amaute tum mang ding te ka sep khinta hi.
Bangdia tu lailai i hi ua? kikaikhawm unla, khopi kulhneite ah lut unla, huailaiah i mangthang diam ding uh; TOUPA tunga i gitlouh tak jiakin; TOUPA i Pathian un gu-tui dawnding honpiain manthatna ah a honkoih hi.
Muanna i zong ua, hoihna bangmah a hongtung kei, hihdamna hun ding leng, ngai in, lungdonna lel!
A sakol nak ging uh Dan a kipana jak ahia, a sakol uh ham ging in gam pumpi a ling a, a hongtung ua, a sunga om teng, a gai vek ua, khopi leh a sunga tengte toh.
Ngai un, na lak uah gulpi ka sawl dinga, gul gu nei, khoi jual vual louhte: huaiten nou a hontu ding ua, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Aw lungkhamna ah kilungmuan thei ngut leng aw! sunggil ah ka lungtang a bahkhinta hi.
Ngai un, gam gamlapi akipan, ka tanu, ka mite kap husa, Zion ah TOUPA a om ka hia? a sunga a Kumpipa om lou ahi maw? a milim bawl tawmte leh nam dang milimtein bangachia honhehsak ahi ua?
Buh lak hun a kikhelta, nipi a beita, hotdamin i om kei lailai.
Ka mite, ka tanu natna ah lah ka na ngala, ka sun-a, lungdonnain a honlen hi.Gileada singnai damdawi om lou hia? huaiah hihdammi a om ka hia? bangdia ka mite, ka tanu damtheilou ahia?
Gileada singnai damdawi om lou hia? huaiah hihdammi a om ka hia? bangdia ka mite, ka tanu damtheilou ahia?
Ka lu tui hiin, ka mit khitui nak hi maijen le aw, ka mi, ka tanu thahte adingin asun ajanin ka kap ding,
Gamdai ah khualbuk nei thei leng aw! ka mite paisanin, om mangsan leng aw; angkawmhat mi ahi vek ngal ua, khemhat omkhawm lel ahi uh.
A lei uh thalpeu bangin juauin a zang ua, gamah a khang lian ua, thutaka khang louin, gilou lamah a khang jel ua, kei honthei louin, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Noumau inveng lakah pilvang chiat unla, na unaute himhim uh muang kei un; unaute lah khemhat ahi ngal ua; invengte leng gensiat hat ahi uh.
Amau inveng chiat a khem ding ua, thudik leng a gen kei ding uh; a lei uh juau gen a kisin sak ding ua, thulimlouhna semin a gim sek uhi.
Khemhat lakah na tenga, a khemna uh jiakin kei a honthei nuam kei uh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huaijiakin sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaiun, amau ka tuisuak sak dia, ka zeet ding: ka mi, ka tanu jiakin bang dang ahia ka hih tak ding aw?
A lei uh sihna thal ahia, khemna thu a gen jel, min kamin a inveng kiangah kituahna thu gen mahleh, alungtang ah amah a tang giugiau sek hi.
Hiai thilhihte jiakin ka gawt kei dia hia? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: nam hichibang tungah phu ka la kei dia hia?
Tangte a dingin ka kap dia, ka mau vungvung ding, gamdai loupa munte ka sun dinga, kuamahpai nawn louhna dinga a kan khittak jiakin, gan husa miten a za nawnta kei ding ua, tunga leng vasate leh gamsate leng a taikek ua, a pai mangta uh.
Huan Jerusalem bel thilsia om khawm lelin ka bawl sin, sehalte tenna mun ahi ding; Juda khopite tengmi om louin ka hihgawp ding.
Hiai theisiam dingin mi pilpen kua ahi?
Phuang dinga TOUPA thugen nasangmi pen kua ahi?
Bangjiakin ahia gam a siat khita, kuamah pai louhna dinga gamdai banga a kat khit?
Huan, TOUPAN, Ka dan, a ma ua ka koih a paisan ua, ka pau kamsuak a mang kei ua, a jui sam kei ua,
a lungtang khauh uh juia, a pipute un a sinsak uh Baalte a delh jawktak jiak un;
Sepaihte TOUPA, Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi: Ngaiun, amau, hiai mite mahmah gamsai in ka vak dinga, tui kha leng ka dawn sak ding.
Nam, amau leh a pipute un leng a theih ngeilouhte lakah ka dalhsak dinga; ka hihmanthat vek mateng namsau ka delhsak ding.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaihtuah unla, numei kap mite hongpai dingin sam un, numei khutsiamte hongpai ding in sam lai un.
Hongkin uhenla, hongkah khum peuhmah le uh, ka khitui a luana, i mitte ua tui a pawt theihna din.
Zion a kipan kah husa jak ahi ngala, i naksiat khit tak dan uh: gen ding i thei mahmah kei ua, i gam i paisan jiak uleh, i tennate a paihkhiaktak jiak un.
Aw nou numeite aw, TOUPA thu ngaikhia unla, a kamsuak thu na bil uah lut henla, natanute uh kah sinsak unla, mi chihin a invengnu kiangah sunna la.
I tawlet uahte sihna kal lutin i kumpipa in uahte a lutta ngal a; inpo lama kipana naupang hihmang ding leh, kholak a kipan a tangval hihmang ding.
TOUPA thu pawtin hichiin a chi: Mi luangte gamlakah ekvut bangin a puk dinga, buh lami buh maih bangin; kuamahin a lakhawmta kei ding hi, chiin.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Mi pilin a pilna suang kei henla, mi hatin a hatna suang sam kei henla, mi hauin a sum leh pai suang sam kei heh.
A suang peuhmahin hiai suang uheh, kei TOUPA, chitnate, vaihawmdiknate, diktatnate leia zang sekpa ka hi chih a hontheiha, a theihsiamna tak; hiai thilte lah ka kipahlam ahi ngala, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngai un, nite a hongtung hi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi, zeksum hi ngal, sumlouh bang jaw ka gawt ding;Aigupta te, Juda te, Edom te, Amon tate leh Moab te leh gamdaia teng, baksam met giaute; nam tengtengte lah zeksumlouhte ahi ngal ua, Israel inkote tengteng leng lungtanga zeksumlouh ahi uhi.
Aigupta te, Juda te, Edom te, Amon tate leh Moab te leh gamdaia teng, baksam met giaute; nam tengtengte lah zeksumlouhte ahi ngal ua, Israel inkote tengteng leng lungtanga zeksumlouh ahi uhi.
Aw, Israel inkote aw, na kiang ua TOUPA thu gen ngaikhia un,
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Namte omdan ching kei unla, vana chiamtehnate jiakin leng lunglau sam kei un; namte lah huaite ah a lunglau sek nak ua.
Mite dante lah bangmahlou lel ahi ngala, Gamnuai ah sing a phuk ua, heipia mi khutsiam khutin asep ahi.
Dangkasik leh dangkaengin a jem ua, a tat louhna dingin sikkilhna leh sekin a kilh uh.
Leipia vasa lau ding milim bang ahi ua, a pau theikei uh.
Amau a pai theihlouh jiak un, puak suan a kiphamoh sek uh; amaute lau kei un, thil sia a hih theikei ua, thil hoih leng a hih thei sam kei uh.
Aw TOUPA, nang bang kuamah a om kei ua, na thupi-a, na min hatnain a thang lian hi.
Aw namte kumpipa, kuan ahia honkihta lou ding? huailah na tuakzou him ngala.
Namte mi pil tengteng lakahte, a gam himhim lak uah leng, nang bang mahmah a om kei uh.
Amau jaw mi mawl leh mi hai ahi ua, milim sinsakna bel sing lel ahi.
Tarsis a kipan dangkasik sek a honla ua, Uphaz a kipan dangkaeng leng, mi khutsiam bawl, dangkaeng sekmi khutsuak, a puansilh uah dumbuang leh sandup, mi khutsiam khutsuak vek ahi uhi.
TOUPA bel Pathian tak ahi, Pathian hing khantawn Kumpipa ahi hi, a hehin lei a linga, namten a hehna a nangzou kei uh.
A kiang ua hichibanga na chih ding uh ahi: Pathiante, lei leh van bawlte hi loupi lei a kipan a mangthang ding ua, vannuai a kipan a mang vek ding uh.
A thilhihtheihnain lei a bawla, a pilnain khovel a tungdinga, a lemtheihnain van a kaipalh hi.
A aw a suah leh, van ah tui a ging honhona, kawlmong a kipan meipi a kahtousaka, vuah zukna dingin khua a phesaka, a goubawm a kipan huih a nungsak hi.
Mi chih a mawl ua, theihna a neikei uh, dangkaeng sekmiin leng a lim sek a zumpiha, a milim sun lah juau lel ahi ngala, amau ah hu leng a om kei hi.
Bangmahlou lel ahi ua, khemna nasep lel, a gawtna uh hun chiangin a mang mai ding uh.
Jakob tantuan bel hichibang ahi kei, thil tengteng bul ahi ngala; Israel a gouluah nam ahia, a min sepaihte TOUPA ahi.
Aw nang, uma om lellelin, na puanthuah lei a kipan la khawmin,
TOUPAN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai un, tuin gam a tengte ka singkhe ding, a phawk thamun ka hihgenthei ding.
Ka natna jiakin ka tung a gik hi, ka liamna a na a, himahleh, Hiai hial haksatna ahi, ka thuak mai ding ahi, ka chi.
Ka puanin a seta, ka khau tengteng a kitat veka, ka kianga kipan ka tate a pawt ua, a om nawn kei uh: Ka puanin jak ding a omta kei uh, ka puanjak tungding dingte.
Belam chingmite a mawl ua, TOUPA a thudot nadan a theikei uh; huaijiakin a lamzang kei ua, a belam honte uh a dalhjak khinta.
Ngai un, husa a hongtung, mallam a kipan buaina thupi mahmah, Juda khopite hihgawpin, sehal tenna dinga suaksak dingin.
Aw TOUPA, mihing omdan bel, amah thu lel ahi kei chih ka theita hi: a tunga pai mihing ah, a pheikhai pi ding a om kei hi.
Aw TOUPA, honthunun inla, a hun lelin, heh louin, huchilouin jaw na honhihmang kha ding hi.Pautuam mi, nang thei ngeiloute tungah leh, na min lou ngeiloute tungah na hehna bungkhiain; Jakob a nekhin ua, ahi, a nekhin ua, a ne mang ua, a tenna gam a hihsia uhi.
Pautuam mi, nang thei ngeiloute tungah leh, na min lou ngeiloute tungah na hehna bungkhiain; Jakob a nekhin ua, ahi, a nekhin ua, a ne mang ua, a tenna gam a hihsia uhi.
Jeremia kianga TOUPA thu hongtung:
Hiai thukhun thute ngaikhia unla, Juda mite leh Jerusalema tengte kiangah gen un;
Huan, nang a kiang uah, TOUPA Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi: Hiai thukhun thute ngaikhe loumi hamse thuakin om hen:
Huai bel na pipute uh, Aigupta gam, sik haltuina a kipana ka pikhiak nia, ka pau kamsuak mang unla, thu ka honpiak tengteng hih un, chia ka thupiak tak ahi: huchiin ka mite nahi ding ua, kei na Pathian uh ka hi ding:
Na pipute uh kianga khuaiju leh nawituia luang gam kichiama piak ka chiam tak ka tangun theihna dingin tunia a om bangin, hichiin achia.
Huan, ken, Amen, Aw TOUPA, chiin ka dawng a.
Huan TOUPAN ka kiangah, Juda khopite ah leh Jerusalem kholakte ah hiai thu tengteng puang inla, Hiai thukhun thute ngaikhia unla, jui un.
Na pipute un Aigupta gam a kipan ka pi khiak nia kipana tu tanin ka paukam suak mang un, chiin ka theisak seka.
Himahleh a mang kei ua, bil a doh sam kei ua, mi chih, amau lungtang gilou bang jelin a omjaw uh.
Huaijiakin hiai thukhun thu, hih dinga thu ka piak, a hih louh tengteng uh a tunguah ka hontungsakta ahi, achia.
Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah, Juda mite leh Jerusalema tengte lakah phialgukna a om.
A pipute uh, ka thu ngaikhe nuam loute thulimlouhna lamah a kilehhei nawn ua; pathian dangte na sem ding in a kuan ua: Israel inkote leh Juda inkoten a pipute uh kianga ka thukhun bawl pen a hihseta uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaidih ua, a tunguah thil hoihlou, a pelh het louh ding uh ka hontungsak ding; a honsam ding ua, himahleh ka dawng kei ding.
Huan, Juda khopite leh Jerusalem a tengten pathian, a kiang ua gimlim a hal seknate uh a sam ding ua, himahleh a buai hun chiang un huaiten amau a humbit het kei ding hi.
Aw Juda, na pathiante lah nakhopi zah ahi ngal ua: thil zumhuai tak, Baal kianga gimlim halna ding maitam hialleng Jerusalem kongzing zah takin na nading sakta a.
Huaijiakin hiaite thumsak kenla, amau dingin ngetna hiam aw hiam suah sam ken; a buai hun chiang ua a hon sap uh leh ka ngaikhe sin ngal keia.
Thil kihhuai tak hih kawmin, ka deih mahmahin ka in ah tantuam bang ahia a neih? thukichiamte leh sa tanin na siatna ding uh a honpelsak thei ding ahia?
Na suang thei ua hia?
TOUPAN na min dingin oliv sing hing, gah hoih kilawmpi, a honchia, lum honhonin a tungah mei a toha, ahiangte leng a kitan khinta.
Sepaihte TOUPA, nang honphutpan, Israel inkote leh Juda inkote khelhna, Baal kianga gimlim lana, honhehsakna thil uh, amau adia a sepkhiak tung ua thil hoihlou ding thu na tungah a phuang kheta hi.
TOUPAN hontheisaka, ka theita: huchiin nang mahmahin a thilhihte uh na honkawkmuhta.
Kei bel belamnou nunnem tak, goh dinga pi bang ka hi, sing pen a gah toh, hihsia ni e, mihing gam a kipan amah jaw i hihmang vengveng ding uh, a min mawngmawng theih a hih louhna dingin, chia ka tunga a thil sawm uh ka nathei het kei.
Himahleh, aw sepaihte TOUPA, dik taka vaihawm sekpa, sunggil lam leh lungtang entel sekpa, a tung ua na phulak honmu sakin, ka tungtangthu lah na kiangah ka hon kemsak ngala.
Huaijiakin sepaihte TOUPAN Anathoth mi, na hinna zongpa, Ka khut ua na sih louhna dingin TOUPA minin thu gen ken, chimite tungtangah hichiin a chi:
Ngai un, amau ka gawt dinga, tangvalte namsauin a si ding ua, a tanute uh, a tapate uh kialin a si ding uh;si val himhim a om kei ding uh: Anathoth mite tungah lah thil hoihlou ka tun sin ngala, a gawtna kum ding mahmah uh.
si val himhim a om kei ding uh: Anathoth mite tungah lah thil hoihlou ka tun sin ngala, a gawtna kum ding mahmah uh.
Aw TOUPA, na kianga ka phun in leng, nang jaw na dik nilouhlouha; himahleh ka vuina thu pen ka gen himhim sin.
Bangchiin ahia mi thulimloute lam a lamzan sek nak?
Bang chiin ahia khemhat peuhmah nuamsaa a om nak uh?
Amau na phuta, ahi, zung a kaita ua, a khang ua, ahi, gah a suahta uhi: a muk uah na naia, a sunggil uah lah na gamla ngala.
Aw TOUPA, kei bel na hontheia, na honmua, nang lamah ka lungtang na entel seka, amaute belam goh ding bang maiin kaikhia inla, a gohna ni ding uh sep in.
Gamin bangtan ahia a sun dinga, gam pumpi antehlouhingte a vuai ding uh? a tengmite thulimlouhna jiakin gamsate a mang khin ua, vasate leng; I hun nanung uh a mu kei ding uh a chih jiak un.
Khea a pai mite na kitaitehpiha, nang a honbah khit sak uleh bangchiin ahia sakolte na kitaitehpih theih ding? muanna gamah bit takin om lechin leng, Jordan gam gammang ah bangchiin ahia na hih ding?
Na unaute, na pa inkuante ngeiin, amau mahmahin nang a honkhemta ngal ua; amau nang hondelhin ngaihtakin a hon sam ua, thu hoihtak gen mahle uh taksang himhim ken.
Ka inlehlou paisanin ka gouluah ding ka pai mangta; ka hinnain a it mahmahnu, a melma kiangah ka peta.
Ka gouluah ding gamnuai humpinelkai bang a honghita, ka siatna dingin a aw a suaha, huaijiakin ka mudah ahi.
Ka gouluah ding keia dingin sasial ne vasa gial ahi hia? sasial ne vasaten a kimvelin a sual ua hia? gamsa teng vakaikhawm unla, nekbei dingin honpi un.
Belamchingmi tampiin ka grephuan a hihsia ua, ka tan a sik den ua, ka tantuan nuam mahmah mai gamdai gamsegawp a suaksakta uh.
Gamsia in a bawlta ua, a segawpa, ka kiangah a vui hi, a gam pumpi a segawpa, himahleh kuamahin a donsak kei.
Gamdaia tang giau tengtengte ah, hihsemite a hongtungta ua, gam tawp khatlam a kipan leh khatlam phain TOUPA namsauin lah a nebeita ngala, muanna nei himhim a omta kei uh.
Buh chi a tuh ua, ling a la ua, a kihihgim gawp ua, punna lah a om tuan kei, TOUPA heh mahmah jiakin gah na suahte uh na zumpih ding uh.
Ka mi Israel kianga gouluah dinga ka piak khoihsemi, ka inveng giloute tengteng tungtangah TOUPAN hichibangin a chi: Ngai un, a gam ua kipan ka botkhe dinga, a lak ua kipan Juda inkote ka phawi khe ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, ka bohkhiak nungin amau ka hehpih nawn dinga, mi chih gouluah ding leh mi chih amah gam mahah ka honpi ding.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, Baal kianga ka mite kichiam a sinsak mah bang un, ka mina, TOUPA a hin-a a hin sung, chia kichiam a kisin ua, ka mite omdan ngentel taka a sin uleh ka mite lakah ka dingkhe sak ding.Ahihhangin a ngaihkhiak kei ua leh huai nam a bohin ka botkhe dinga, ka hihse ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.

TOUPAN ka kiangah hichiin a chi a: Puanmalngat kawnggak lei inla, kawtsak louin tengin.
Huchiin TOUPA thu bangbang in kawnggak ka leia, ka tengta hi,
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Kawnggak na lei, huai na ten la inla, thou inla, Euphrates lui juan inla, huaia suang hengkalah selin, chiin.
Huchiin TOUPAN thu a honpiak banginka kuana, Euphrates lui chin ah ka selta a.
Huan, ni tampi nungin TOUPAN ka kiangah, Thou inla, Euphrates lui juan inla, kawnggak ka honselsak lakhia in, a chi a.
Huchiin Euphrates lui lamah ka hohtaa, ka thaia, ka selna akipan kawnggak ka pholhkhiaa.
Ngai dih, kawnggak a na ngotkhin veka; bang ding mahin leng a phatuamta kei hi.
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga:
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: hichi mahbangin Juda kisathei pipi leh Jerusalem kiotsakna mahmahte ka hihse sin ahi.
Hiai nam gilou, ka thute ngaikhe nuam loua, amau lungsim paupeng juia pathian dangte nasem leh be dinga delh zomite kawnggak bangmah dinga phatuam lou bang ahi ding uh.
Kawnggak mi kawnga a belh gige bangin Israel inko pumpi leh Juda inko pumpi ka mite leh ka minthanna leh ka kilawmna leh ka thupina a honghih theihna ding ua ka kianga belh gige dinga ka bawl lah ahi ngal ua; himahleh a limsak kei uh.
Huan, hiai thu a kiang ua na gen ding ahi: TOUPA Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi: Hiang chiteng uain-in a dim ding, chiin.
Huan, amau na kiangah, Hiang chiteng uain-in a dim ding chih ka theih louh uh ahi maw? a chi ding uh.
Huan, a kiang uah, TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaiun, hiai gama teng tengteng, David tutphaha tu kumpipate, siampute, jawlneite leh Jerusalema teng tengtengte zukhamnain ka dimsak ding.
Amau ka kiphusak dinga, pate a tate utoh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: amau ka hihman louhna khop dingin amau ka hehpihin ka hoihin ka lainat kei ding.
Ngaikhia unla, bil doh un; kisathei kei unla, TOUPAN thu a khahta hi.
TOUPA na Pathian uh pahtawi unla, mialna a tunsak maa khomui tang tungate na khe uh a kipal main, vak na lamet lai tak un mial a suaksaka, mial bikbek dingin a bawl sin hi.
Ahihhangin na ngaihkhiak kei uleh na kisaktheihna uh jiakin mundaiah ka kap nilouh ding; ka khitui leng nakpi takin a luang gige ding, TOUPA belam hon sala kaih a hih jiak un.
Kumpipa leh a nu kiangah, Niam tut un, na lukhute ulah a keta ngala, na manglukhu thupi uh, chiin.
Sim khopite a bing khina, kuamah hon vual louhin; Juda tengteng sal dingin a tang ua, a vek khojang un a tang khin uhi.
Na mit uh dak tou unla, mallam akipana hongkuan en un.
Na belam hon neih koiah, huai na belam hon deihhuai tak?
Nangmahin lawm dia na bawlte na tunga a koih hun chiang un bangchin na chi dia? numei nauvei bang maiin na nasa ngial kei ding maw?
Bangjiakin ahia hiaite ka tunga a hongtun? chi sim na hih leh, na thulimlouhna jiakin ahi na nik lem a hiha na vuaktanna a kimuh.
Ethiopia mi vomin a vun a hihlamdangin gialbemin a jia a sel thei ahia?
Huchi ahihleh nou thil gilou hihhat sek ten leng thil hoih hih thei na ve uteh!
Gamdai huihin buhsi a mutleng bang maiin amau ka dalhsak ding.

Huchiin kei mahmahin na nik na mai khuh hial ka honlem sak dinga, na zumhuai a dawk ding.Gamlaka tangte a na angkawmnate, na huk kikou husate, na kiphalgai thupidante, huai na thilhih kihhuaite ka muta.
Aw Jerusalem, na tung a gik hi: hihsiang na hih ma bangtan hi ding ahia?
Gamlaka tangte a na angkawmnate, na huk kikou husate, na kiphalgai thupidante, huai na thilhih kihhuaite ka muta.
Aw Jerusalem, na tung a gik hi: hihsiang na hih ma bangtan hi ding ahia?
Khokheng tungtanga Jeremia kianga TOUPA thu hongtung:
Judain a sun-a, a kulh kongpite a ngui; leiah puan vom khuin a kun ua, Jerusalem kah ging a tungkah.
A mi hoihten a sikhate uh tui a tawisak ua, tuichin a juan ua, tui a mu kei ua, a tuibel uh hawmin a kik ua; a lungdong ua, gending a theikei ua, a lu uh a khuh ua.
Lei lah a khanga, gam puma vuahtui a om louh jiakin, leiletmite a lungdong ua, a lu uh a khuh ua.
A hi, zukpiin leng pawnah nou a neia, a taisan ve, lou hing a omlouh jiakin.
Gam sabengtungte mualvum khengah a ding ua, awle bangin huihkhua ngaiin a nak huhu ua; peh ding om louh jiakin a mit uh a mial dundun hi.
Ka thulimlouhna un honhek mahleh na min jiakin aw TOUPA hongkuan in; ka puknate uh lah a tamta ngala, na tungah mahmah thil ka nahih khial uhi.
Aw nang Israelte lamet, mangbat laia hondampa, bangdia hiai gama mikhual bang jena jan khat giaka zin bang lela om na hia?
Bangdia mi lungke gawp bang phet leh pasalpha, hondam thei kol lou bang lela om na hia?
Himahleh nang jaw, aw TOUPA, ka lak uah na om laia, na min ka pu ua, honpaisan ken.
TOUPAN hiai mite tungtang ah hichiin a chi: Vakmang a ut nak ua, a kalsuan uh a kidek kei uh; huchiin TOUPAN amau a pom keia, a thulimlouhna uh a theigige ta dinga, a khelhna uh a gawt ding.
TOUPAN ka kiangah, Hiai mite hoihna ding ngetsak ken.
An ngawl mahle uh a kikou uh ka ngaikhe kei dinga, halmang leh buhbal thillat lan mahle uh ka dawng kei ding; namsau te, kial te, hipi tein amau ka hihmang zo ding, a chi hi.
Huan, ken, Eh, Toupa Pathian, ngaidih, a kiang uah jawlneiten, Namsau na tuak kei ding ua, kial leng na thuak sak kei ding uh, hiai muhah muan mahmahna ka honpe zo ding hi, lah a chi sek ngal ua, ka chi a.
Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah, Jawlneiten ka mina juau a gen jel eive ua leh; amau ka sawl keia, thu ka khak keia, ka houpih sam keia, ka houpih sam kei hi.
Thil a muh khol louhte uh, aisan bangmaha pangloute leh a lungsim dohate uh honhilh eive ua, achia.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ka sawl khol louha ka min loua, Hiai gamah kial leh namsau a tung kei ding, chia genmi huai jawlneite namsau leh kialin a mangthang ding uh.
Huan, a thugen uh nana tang nam leng kial leh namsau jiakin Jerusalem kongzingah paihkhiak ahi ding ua, a tanute uh a tapate uhtoh, vuimi himhim a neikei ding uh.
A thulimlouhna uh amau tungah ka sung sin ngala.
Huan, a kiang ua hiai thu na gen ding ahi; Sun leh janin ka khitui luang hen, hul himhim kei hen, ka mi, ka tanu nungak siangthouin nakpia liamna a tuak hi, khutkhak na mahmah.
Ka gam pawt leh, maijen, namsaua thahte!
Khopi a alut leh, maijen, kialpi-misi! gam chihah jawlneite, siampute a tamvak chiat ua, a dan mahmah a theikei uh, chiin.
Juda pai khe siang na hi maw?
Zion kih na hi maw? kou dia hihdamna om lou bikbeka bangdia honthuaksak oi? muanna ka zong ua, hoihna bangmah a hongtung kei; hihdamna hun ding leng, ngaidih khaphamna lel.
Aw TOUPA, ka thulimlouhdan uh a kitheihmohbawl kei uhi, ka pipute uh ginatlouhna toh, na tungah lah ka hihkhialta ngal ua.
Na min jiakin honmusit kenla, na mangtutphah thupi minse sak kenla, ka kiang ua na thukhun theigigein hihse ken.Nam dang pathiante lakah vuah zusak thei a om uhia? ahihleh, vanin vuahpi a tungsak thei hia? aw TOUPA ka Pathian uh, huai pen nang na hi kei maw? hiai thil tengteng na hih ahi ngala, ka lamet uh nang na hi hi.

Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah hichiin a chi a: Mosi leh Samuel ka maah hongding mahle uh, ka lungsim hiai mite lam a ngatuan kei ding.
Ka muh phak louhah delhkhia inla, paimang uhen!
Huan, koiah ka pai ding ua? chia nang a hondot uleh hichiin a kiang uah na chi ding hi: Hichiin TOUPAN a chi: Sihna tuam sihna ah; namsau tuam namsau ah; kial tuam kial ah, saltanna tuam saltanna ah.
Thil li ka sehsak ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: hihlum dingin namsau, kei zan dingin ui, ne khin leh hihmang dingin tunga leng vasa leh gam sahangte.
Juda kumpipa Hezekia tapa Manasein Jerusalema a thilhih jiakin lei kumpipa gam tengteng laka vial sepsep dingin ka bawl ding.
Kuan a hon hehpih dia, aw Jerusalem? kuan hon lungkhampih dia? na omdan dong dingin kua a lampial dia oi?
Nang na honpai khiaa, na nungtawn tawna, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huchiin kisik ka chimtaka, na tungah ka khut ka lika, ka honhihmang ahi.
Gam pumpia kulh kongpite ah kijapnain amau ka japa, ta beiin ka bawla, ka mite ka hihmanga; a omdan uh a kihei san louh jiak un.
Tuipi piaunel sanga tamin a meithaite uh ka pungsak dinga, suntang laiin tangvalte siatna dingin a tunguah lokmi ka tungsaka, mangbatna leh thil mulkimhuai ka tungsak guih a.
Sagih suangnu a bahgawpa; kha tuh a khahta; sun a hih laiin a ni a keta, a zahlakin a lung buaia: huan a omlaite a melmate uh khut ah namsau thah dingin ka pe ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Nu ei, gam pumpia kituahlouhna mi leh kikalhna mia non na suan ka tung gik hina tele! ka leitawi sak keia, miten leng a honlaitawi sak kei uh; ahihhangin a vek un hamsia a honloh himhim ngal ua.
TOUPAN, chihtak ngialin thil hoih adingin ka honhihkip ding; chih tak ngialin saitna ni leh haksatna niin melma na kiangah khut ka dohsak ding, achia.
Min sik, mallama sik leh ngen a kitansak thei sin ahia?
Na khelhna tengteng jiakin na sum lah pai lah na gou thilte man beiin gallak dingin ka pe ding, na gam tawnin.
Na theih ngeilouh gamah namelmate na ka honsem sak ding.
Ka heh jiaka mei na tunga ampha ding lah a kuangkheta ngala, achia.
Nangman na thei hi, aw TOUPA; hontheigige inla, hongvehin, honsimmohte tungah phu honlak sak in.
Na dohzohna ken manthat loh kei leng; nang jiaka minsiat thuak ka hi chih theiin.
Na thute hihlat ahia, ka ne a, na thute keia dingin kipahna leh ka lungtang nopna ahi; aw TOUPA, sepaihte Pathian, na min lah ka puta ngal ua.
Nuamsip bawlmite lakah ka tel keia, ka kipahpih sam kei; nang khut jiakin ka tu tuama, lungkimlouhnain na hondimsak ngala.

Huchiin TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Na kihei leh a ngei kon bangsak ding, ka maah na ding nawn ding.
Thil ginalou akipan thil manpha ngen na genkhiak leh keimah kam bang na hi ding.
Amau nang lam hongnga uhenla, nang bel amau lam na nga ding ahi kei.
Hiai mite laka jaw ngen kulh bangin ka honbawl dinga, a honsual ding ua, himahleh a honzou kei ding uh, nang honhondam ding leh honkhe dingin na kiangah ka om ngala, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.Mi giloute khut a kipan ka honhonkhe dinga, mi lauhuaite khut akipan ka honpawtkhe sak ding.
Mi giloute khut a kipan ka honhonkhe dinga, mi lauhuaite khut akipan ka honpawtkhe sak ding.
TOUPA Thu ka kiangah a hongtunga:
Ji na nei ding ahi keia, hiai mun ah tanu tapate leng na nei ding ahi sam kei, chiin.
Tanu tapa hiai muna piangte leh hiai gama nu leh pa amaute suangte tungtang TOUPAN hichiin a chi a:
Hipiin a si ding ua, kuamah vui louh lah kuamah sun louhin a om ding uh; leitung ekvut bang lel ahi ding uh.
Namsaute, kialtein a mangthang ding ua, a luangte uh tunga leng vasate leh gamsate an ahi ding.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi hi: sunna in ah lut kenla, sun dingin hoh kenla, amau kah ken; hiai mite laka kipan ka lungmuanna ka hawkta ngala, chitna leh lainatnate toh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Hiai gamah mi lian leh mi neute a si ding ua; vui ahi kei ding ua; kuamahin a sun kei ding ua, a ki-at un a kimet giau loh kei ding uh.
Lusunmite a misi ngai uh lungmuan dingin kuamahin nek ding a lui kei ding ua, a nu luh hiam a pa uh hiam jiakin leng nepna nou dawn ding kuamahin a tun kei ding uhi.
Huan, ne leh dawn dingin a lak-ua tu dingin ankuangluina in ah na lut ding ahi kei.
Sepaihte TOUPA, Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi ngala: Ngai dih ua, na mitmuh un, na damsung un mou aw te, mouneipa aw te, nuamsakna husa te, kipahna ging te hiai mun ah ka daisak ding.
Hiai thu tengteng hiai mite kianga na hilh hun chiangin amau, Bangjiakin ahia TOUPAN ka tung ua hichi taka thil hoihlou a hon gen khiak? bang ahia ka thulimlouhna uh?
TOUPA ka Pathian uh tunga ka thilhihkhelh bang ahia? a hon chih uleh,
hichiin na chi ding hi: Na pipute un a honpaisan jiak uh ahi, pathian dangte a delh ua, a na uh a sem ua, a bia ua, a honpai san ua, ka dan a jui kei ua;
Huan nouten na pipute uh sanga lekluain na hih ua, ngai un, mi chihin noumau lungtang gilou paupeng na jui ua, Kei non ngaikhe kei ua;
Huaijiakin ka gam akipan noute leh na pipute un leng na theih ngeilouh uh gamah ka hondelhkhe ding, huaiah sun leh janin pathian dangte na na sem ding ua, ka honhehpih sin ngal keia, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huchiin, ngaidih ua, nite a hongtung sin hi, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi; Israel tate Aigupta gama kipana pikhepa a hin-a a hin sung, chita louin,
Mal lam gam leh a delh jakna gam tengteng a kipana Israel tate pikhepa TOUPA a hina a hin sung, a chi zota ding uh.
A pipute uh kianga ka piak, amau gam mahmahah lah ka pi kik nawn sin ngala.
Ngamanmi tampi ka thukhak dinga, amau a man ding ua; huai khitin gamvakmi tampi ka thukhak dinga, tang chiteng leh mual chitenga kipan amaute a beng khe ding ua, suangpi hengkala leng.
A omdan tengteng uah lah ka mit a tu nilouh ngala; keia kipan selin a om kei ua, a thulimlouhna uh leng ka mit akipan selin a om sam kei hi.
Huchiin a thil kihhuai luangte ua ka gam a hihnit u leh a kihhuaina ua ka goutan gam a dimsak jiak un a thulimlouhna uh leh a khelhna uh a zahnihin ka thuk ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Aw TOUPA, ka hatna leh ka kulhpi, mangbat nia ka kihumbitna, kawlmong akipanin namte a hongpai ding ua, Ka pipute un juau, thil ginalou, punna nei lah hilou kia loungal bangmah gouluahin a neikei uh.
Min pathiante a kibawlsak thei ua hia? huaite pathian ahi sam ua, a chi ding uh.Huaijiakin, ngaidih ua, tutungin amau ka theisak peuhmah ding; ka khut leh ka thilhihtheihna ka theisak ding, ka min TOUPA ahi chih a thei ding uh.
Huaijiakin, ngaidih ua, tutungin amau ka theisak peuhmah ding; ka khut leh ka thilhihtheihna ka theisak ding, ka min TOUPA ahi chih a thei ding uh.
Juda khelhna sik kolom leh suangmantam hiam muk zuma gelh ahi; a lungtang pek ua khuakin a om a, a maitam uahte leng;
Sing hing bul leh mualpawngte ah a tate un a maitamte uleh a Aserahte uh a theigige ngal ua.
Aw nang gama ka tang, gam dung tawna na khelhna jiakin na sum leh na gou tengtengte, na mun sangte toh gallak dingin ka pe ding.
Huai na tantuam ka honpiak na tan dinga, na gam theih ngeihlouh ah na melmate na ka hon semsak ding, ka hehna mei, khantawna kang ding lah na mut kuangta ngal ua.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Mihing muanga, mihing ban hatna muanga, TOUPA lehngatsanna lungtang neimi hamse thuakin om hen.
Gamaia loupa keu gaw bang ahia, thil hoih pawt ding himhim a mu kei ding.
Gamdai gamkei, chi gam, kuamah luah louh ah a teng zo ding hi.
TOUPA muangmi, a lametpen TOUPA hi bel a nuamsa hi.
Tui kianga sing phuh, lui geia zungkai, kho lum hongtung ding leng khawksa lou, a nahte hing gige ngal, khokhen kum khawksa lou, gah suan kikhelsak tuan lou bang ahi ding hi.
Lungtang bel thil tengteng sangin khemhat pen, hoihlou pumlum ahia; kuan ahia thei thei ding?
Kei TOUPA bel mi chih a om dan bang jel u leh a theilhih gah bang jela pe dinga lungsim enkhepa, lungtang enchianpa ka hi.
Mi, kilawmloua honghausa bel vengkeng, amah tui loupi keuhsak dia opkhum bang ahi, a dam laiin amah a tuamsan ding ua, atawptawpin mi hai a honghi maimah ding.
Ka mun siangthou omna bel mangtutphah thupi mahmah, a tunga kipana tawisanga om ahi.
Aw TOUPA, Israel lamet, nang honpaisan mi tengteng a zahlak ding uh; kei hon lehngatsan mite leia leivuia gelh bang lel ahi ding uh, TOUPA, hinna tuikhuk pen lah a paisanta ngal ua.
Aw TOUPA, honhihdam inla, huchiin ka dam dinga, honhumbit lechin, huchiin ka bit ding, ka phat gige lah na hi ngala.
Ngaiin, ka kiangah, TOUPA thu koiah? hongtung leh ake, a chi sek uh.
Thil hoihlou tungsak ding ka honphut keia, siatna ni lah ka deih het kei chih na thei hi; ka kama thu pawt lah na mai maa om ahi hi.
Kei ding in kihtakhuai hi kenla, mangbat nia ka kihumbitna na hi.
Honsimmohte zahlak uhenla, kei bel zahlak kei leng; amau bel lungjing uhenla, kei bel lungjing kei leng; mangbat ni a tunguah tun inla, nakpiin amau hih mangin.
TOUPAN ka kiangah hichiin a chi: Kuan inla, Juda kumpipate lutna sek leh pawtna sek, mipite tate kongpi ah leh Jerusalem konpite tengteng ah va ding inla;
Huan a kiang uah, Nou Juda kumpipate, Juda tengtengte, Jerusalema teeng tengteng hiai kongpi khawnga lut sekte aw, TOUPA thu ngaikhia un.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi hi: Na hinna uh pilvang mahmah dih ua, khawlniin puak neikei unla, Jerusalem kulh kongpi ah lutpih sam kei un.
Huan, khawlniin na in ua kipan puak na pokhe ding uh ahi keia, na himhim na sem ding uh ahi sam kei; na pipute uh kiang a ka thu piak bangin khawlni na tang siang thou zo ding uhi.
Amau jaw a ngaikhe kei ua, bil a doh kei ua; thununna a jak ua a tan louhna ding un a kigenhaksak jaw uhi.
Huan, TOUPA thu pawtin hichiin a chi: Khawksa taka na honngaihkhiak ua, khawlnia hiai khopia kongpia thil na puaklut louh ua,
Na himhim na sep louh ua khawlni na tan siangthou uleh, hiai khopi kongpi ah leh heutute, David tutphaha tu dingte kangtalaite leh sakolte ah tuangin a honglut ding ua, amau leh a miliante uh Juda leh Jerusalema tengte toh; huchiin hiai khopi ah mi a teng denta ding uh.
Juda khopi leh Jerusalem kim akipan, Benjamin gam akipan, gamniam gam akipan, tanggam a kipan leh Sim gam akipain a hongpai ding ua, halmang thillat leh kithoihnate buh leh bal thillat leh gimlimte, kipahna kithoihnate TOUPA in ah a hontawi ding uh.Himahleh khawlni tang siangthou ding leh khawlnia puak neilouh leh Jerusalem kulh kongpia lutpih louh ding thu ah na honngaihkhiak kei ua leh a kulh kongpite ah mei ka pawtsak dinga, Jerusalem kumpipa inte a kang bei dinga, a mit kei ding.
Himahleh khawlni tang siangthou ding leh khawlnia puak neilouh leh Jerusalem kulh kongpia lutpih louh ding thu ah na honngaihkhiak kei ua leh a kulh kongpite ah mei ka pawtsak dinga, Jerusalem kumpipa inte a kang bei dinga, a mit kei ding.
TOUPA akipana Jeremia kianga thu hongtung,
Thou inla, belvelmi in ah hohsuk inla, huaiah ka thute ka hon theisak ding, a chi a.
Huchiiin belvelmi in ah ka hohsukta a, a belbawlna khawl ah na a sem hi.
Tunga bel a bawl lai a honghoih kei leh belvelmiin hoih a sak bangin bel dang din a bawl nawn mai sek hi.
Huchiin TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna:
Aw Israel inkote aw, hiai belvelmi hih bangin nou ka honhih theikeia hia? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngaidih ua, belvelmi khuta tung bang lelin ka khut ah na om uhi, aw Israel inkote aw.
Chiklaiin leng nam hiam gam hiam tungtang thu ah, Ka hondokkhe dinga, ka honphel dinga, ka hon hihse ding, chiin na nagen zong hi leng,
Huai namin a tungthu ka gen jiaka a thil hoihlou a lehngatsan leh a tunga thil hoihlou hih ka tup ka kikhelsak ding.
Huan, chiklaiin leng nam hiam gam tungtang thu ah, ka honbawl dinga, ka hon dingsak dinga, chiin nagen zong hileng,
Ka paukam suak ngaikhe loua ka mitmuh a thilhoihlou a hih leh amah a dingin thil hoih hih ka tup ka kikhelsak sam ding.
Huaijiakin Juda mite leh Jerusalema tengte kiangah, TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaidih ua, na tunguah thil hoihlou ka ngaihtuaha, nou ka honsawm lai na hi uh, mi chihin a omdan hoihlou uh lehngatsan uhen la, na omdan uleh na thilhihte uh bawlpha un, vachi peuhmah in.
Himahleh amua jaw, Kilawm kei e!
Koumau phasak bangbangin ka omding ua, mi chih koumau lungtang gilou genhak bangjelin ka om ding uh, a chi sek uhi.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN chichiin a chi: Nam dangte dong him dih ua, hichibang mahmah kuan a theia?
Nungak Israelin thil lauhuai mahmah a hihta.
Lebanon vukin a mualvum a nose ngei ahia? gamlaa kipana tui vot hongluang sukte a kangtat ngei ahia?
Ka miten a honmangngilh ua, bangmahlou phet kiangah gimlim a hal ua, huaiten a tumalam lampi ua kipan a kisuisaka, lampipen hi lou lamkhem lam a jui uh;
A hihse gawpte uh-agam, khantawn a tek khum ding; kiviallehmin lamdangsain a lu uh a sing ua.
Suahlam hoihpi bangin melma maah ka thehjak ding, a vangtah ni un ka mel hilou, ka dek ka musak ding hi.
Huan, amau, Kisa un, Jeremia i sawm ding uh, siampu akipan lah dan a dai sin ngal keia, mi pil a kipan lah thudot a dai sam kei ding, jawlnei akipan lah thu a dai sam kei ding hi.
Kisa un, i gense gawpgawp ding ua, a thu mawngmawng i limsak kei ding, a chi ua.
Honlimsak inla, aw TOUPA, kei honngetna thu limsakin.
Gilou thil hoih ditna hia hi ngei? amau lah ka khaa dingin kokhuk a tou ngal ua.
Amau akipana na hehna heimang ding leh amaua dia thil hoih gen dinga na maa ka din sek theigigein.
Huchiin a tate uh kialpi kiangah pe khia inla, namsau hatna kiangah piain; huan a jite uh taneilouin, meithai uhen; a pasalte uh hipiin si uhenla, a tangvalte uh leng kidouna ah namsauin.
Simmite a kiang uh na tunsak guih laiin a in ua kipan kap husa thang khia hen: kei adingin kokhuk a tou ngal ua, ka khe awkna dingin thang a kam ngal ua.Himahleh nang aw TOUPA, kei honthat dinga a honsawmna tengteng uh na thei hi; a thulimlouhna uh ngaidam kenla, na mitmuhin a khelhna uh thai mang sam ken: Na maah kipuk uhenla, na ehih niin hih ekin.
Himahleh nang aw TOUPA, kei honthat dinga a honsawmna tengteng uh na thei hi; a thulimlouhna uh ngaidam kenla, na mitmuhin a khelhna uh thai mang sam ken: Na maah kipuk uhenla, na ehih niin hih ekin.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Kuan unla, belvelmi lei bel valei un; huan, mipite upate leh siampu laka upate pi inla;
Harsith kongpi lutna china Benhinem guam ah hoh inla, huaiah na kianga thu ka honhilh ding na phuang ding.
Hichiin na chi ding hi: Juda kumpipate leh Jerusalema tengte aw, TOUPA thu ja un.
Israel Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaidih ua, hiai munah a ja pehmah bilam khop hiala thil hoihlou ka hontun sin hi.
Miten a honpai san ua, hiai mun a hihnin un, amau leh a pate uh leh Juda kumpipaten leng a theih ngei nai het louh uh, pathian dangte kiangah gimlim a hal jiak uleh hiai mun mi hoih sisana a dimsak jiak un leh Baal kianga halmang thillat dinga a tate uh a halna ding ua Baal mun sangte a lamkhiak jiak un;
Huai jaw ka thupiak ahi keia, gen leng ka gen sam keia, ka lungsim ah leng a om ngeikei hi.
Huaijiakin, ngaidih, nite a hongtung sin, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi: huai nite chiangin hiai mun Topheth chih ahita kei dinga, Benhinom guam chih ahi sam kei ding; kithahna guam chih ahi zota ding.
Huan, hiai munah Juda leh Jerusalem thil tupte ka vuak suaksak dinga; huan, amau pen namsauin a melmate uh maah leh a hinna uh lak tummite khut ah ka puksak ding; a luangte uh tunga leng vasate leh leia gamsate an dingin ka pe ding.
Huan, hiai khopi lamdang sak ding leh tek khum dingin ka bawl dinga, a vialpai peuhin siatna a tuahte jiakin lamdang a sa ding ua, a tek khum lai ding uhi.
A tanute uleh a tapate uh sa ka nesak dinga; huan a melmate u leh a hinna uh lak tummiten a um ua a mangbat sak hun chiang un kuapeuhin a invengte uh sa a ne ding uh.
Huan, na paipihte mitmuhin bel na hihtam dinga, a kiang uah hi-chiin na chi ding.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Hichimahbangin hiai mite leh hiai khua ka hihtam ding; belvelmi bel min a kitam saka, bawl hoih nawn vual ahi lou bangin; huan, Tophethah a vui ding ua, vuina ding mun dang a om louh jiakin.
Huchi hialin hiai mun ka bawl ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi; huan hichibang mahin hiai khua Topheth banga bawl hialin, a sunga tengte tungah leng ka hih ding:
Jerusalem inte leh Juda kumpipate inte-in chiteng mahmah a tunga van lam thilte kianga gimlim halkhitna tengteng leh pathian dangte kianga dawn ding thillat butkhiaksana tengtengte Topheth mun bang hiala hihnit ahi ding hi.
Huan, Jeremia bel, TOUPAN thu gen dinga a sawlna mun Topheth akipan in a hongpaia; huan, TOUPA in um sungah a dinga, mipi tengteng kiangah hichiin a chi hi:Israelte Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaihdih ua, thilhoihlou ka gen tengteng hiai khopi leh a kho dang tengteng ah ka hontungsak sin hi: ka thu ngaikhe lou dinga a lungtang uh a khuahsak jiak un.
Israelte Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaihdih ua, thilhoihlou ka gen tengteng hiai khopi leh a kho dang tengteng ah ka hontungsak sin hi: ka thu ngaikhe lou dinga a lungtang uh a khuahsak jiak un.
Huan Immer tapa, TOUPA ina heutupa pen, siampu Pashurin Jeremiain huai thute a gen chih a naja a.
Huchiin Pashurin jawlnei Jeremia a khena, TOUPA ina Benjamin Kongpi saknunga koltanna ah a tangsaka.
A jingin Pashurin Jeremia a khahkhia a, huan Jeremiain a kiangah.
TOUPAN na min dingin Pashur a chi kei hi, Mager-missabib a honchi jaw hi.
TOUPAN lah hichiin a chi ngala: Ngai in, nanga ding leh na lawmte tengteng a dingin kihtakin ka honbawl ding: amau a melmate uh namsauin a puk ding ua, nang jaw na mitin na en lel ding.
Judate tengteng Babulon kumpipa khut ah ka pe vek ding: aman Babulon ah salin a pi dinga, namsauin a that ding hi.
Huai banah, khopi hauhna tengteng, a sepkhiak tengteng, a thil manpha tengteng leh Juda kumpipate gou tengteng a melmate uh khut ah ka pe dinga, amau a lik ding ua, a man ding ua, Babulon ah a pi ding uh.
Huan, nang Pashur, na in sunga om tengtengte toh sal ah na tang ding ua; Babulon ah na pai tei ding; huai ah na si dinga, huaiah vuiin na om dinga, nang leh na lawm juau thu na hilhsekte tengteng toh, a chi a.
Aw TOUPA, nang non nakhema, khema om keita ve, nang jaw kei sangin na hata, non zoua; nitumin nuihsat ka hita, mi kuapeuhin a honnuih san uhi.
Thu ka gen peuhmah chiangin, ka kikou khiaa, Hiamgamna leh siatna, chiin ka kikou; TOUPA thu bel kei adingin, nituma dem leh musit lohna kia ahi.
Amah ka kan kei dinga, a minin leng thu ka gen nawn sam kei ding, chi mahleng, ka guh sunga mei kang kikhumkhin bang maiin ka lungtang sungah lah a om ngal naka, ka pai kinken zou keia, ka pha zou mahmah kei hi.
Mi tampite phun gu ka ja, kil chih a lauhuai a om, Hek unla, i hek khawm ding uh, chiin.
Ka lawmte ka puk chiang tang gige ten, Khemin a om dia, i zou ding, a tungah i phu uh i la ding, a chi ua.
Himahleh TOUPA mihangsan kihtakhuai mahmah bangin ka kiangah a oma, a honsimmohte a puk ding ua, honzou kei ding uh.
Zahlaktakin a om ding ua, a lohchin sin louh jiak un.
Khantawna a minsiatna uh mangngilhin a om kei ding.
Aw sepaihte TOUPA, mi diktatte enchianpa, lungtang leh lungsim mu paisuak sekpa, a tung ua na phulak honmusak dih ve, ka tungtang thu lah ka honkemsakta ngala.
TOUPA kiangah lasa unla, TOUPA phat un; thil gilou hihmite khut akipan panpih deihte hinna lah a humbit ngala.
Ka piankhiak ni hamse thuakin om hen, ka nn a honpiaksak ni vualjawlin om dah hen.
Ka pa kianga, Tapa na neita hi, chih thu hontuna, hongkipaksakmi tak hamse thuakin om hen.
Huai mi lah, TOUPAN hehpih het loua a sukgawp khuate bangin om hen, jingsang lamin kikou husa ja henla, sun ahih chiangin galdou husa;
Sul sunga a honhihlup louh jiakin; huchi hihle bel ka nu ka han hi mai ding hia, a sulin khantawna honpai mai ding hi ven.Bangdia sul akipan hongpawt chitchiat ka hia, semgim leh lungkhama om dinga zahlak mawngmawnga ka damsung nite zang dingin?
Bangdia sul akipan hongpawt chitchiat ka hia, semgim leh lungkhama om dinga zahlak mawngmawnga ka damsung nite zang dingin?
Kumpipa Zedekia in Malkija tapa Pashur leh siampu Maasei tapa Zehpania Jeremia kianga a sawl laia Jeremia kianga TOUPA akipana thu hongtung,
Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin lah a hondouta ngala, TOUPAN a thilhih thupi tak a hihsek bangin a honhuh nuamin, a kik nawn sak mai kha diam chih TOUPA hondot sak dih ve, chiin.
Huan Jeremiain a kiang uah, Zedekia kiangah hichibangin vagen un: Israelte Pathian, TOUPAN hichiin a chi:
Ngai in, Babulon kumpipa leh Kaldai mi, kulh puaa nang honumpa na douna galvan zat ka kiksak sin ahi; huan, hiai khopi sungah amau ka pi khawm ding.
Keimah mahin leng heh leh lungkimlou mahmah leh thangpai takin ban jakin ban tha hat zangin nang ka hondou ding.
Hiai khua a teng mihingte leh gante ka hihlum dinga, hipiin a si ding uh.
Huai nungin, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi, kumpipa Zedekia leh a nungjuite leh mi dang hiai khuaa hi leh namsau leh kiala si loute, Babulon kimpipa leh a melmate uh khut ah leh amau that tummite khut ah ka pe ding.
Namsau hiamin a that dinga, a hehpih het kei dinga, a hawi het kei ding, a lainat sam kei ding.
Huan hiai mipite kiangah hichiin vagenin: TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngai un, sihna lampi leh hinna lampi ka honkoih saka.
Hiai khopi sunga om namsauin hiam kialin hiam hiin hiam a si ding uh; Kaldai mite nou honumpa kianga pawta kipiate bel a hing ding uh, a hinna uh kidouna kipahman ahi ding hi.
Hiai khopi hoihna ding hi lou, a siatna ding ka tum bilbel ahi; Babulon kumpipa khuta piak ahi dinga, aman meiin a hal ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Juda kumpipa inkote tungtang thu ah; TOUPA thu ngaikhia un,
Aw David inkote aw!
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Jingsangin vai dik takin hawm unla, simmohmi khut akipan loh thuakmi hun khia unla, huchilouin jaw ka hehna mei bangin a pawt dinga, kuamah phelh vual louh dingin a kang dia, na thil hihgiloute uh jiakin.
Ngaidih ua, guam janga tengte aw, nou guam jang suangpia tenga, Kuate ahia i omna ua honglut ding? chite aw, nou ka honlang ding hi.
TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.Na thilhih uh gah bang jelin ka hon gawt dinga, a gam gammang ah mei ka khah dinga, a kim tengteng a kangmang ding, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
Na thilhih uh gah bang jelin ka hon gawt dinga, a gam gammang ah mei ka khah dinga, a kim tengteng a kangmang ding, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Juda kumpipa in ah hoh suk inla, hiai thu vagen in.
Aw Juda kumpipa, David tutphah tunga tu, nang leh na nungjuite leh na mi hiai kongkhaka lutte toh, TOUPA thu ngaikhia unla, chiin:
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Diktak leh hoihtakin vai hawm unla; simmohmi khut akipan loh thuakmi hunkhhia unla; huan, mikhualte, pa neiloute leh meithai tungah te diklouhna hiam hiamgamna hiam ching kei un; hiai mun ah mi hoih sisan leng suah sam kei un,
Hiai thu jui ngei hi le uchin jaw, David tutphah tunga kumpipate kangtalaite leh sakolte tunga tuangin, amaute leh a nungjuite uh leh a mite uh hiai na kongkhakte uah a lut ngeingei ding uh.
Himahleh hiai thute na ngaihkhiak kei uleh, hiai in a segawp dinga, chiin, kei leh kei kilouin ka kichiam ahi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
TOUPAN Juda kumpipa inkuan tungtang thu hichibangin a gen hi: Nang jaw kei ading in Gilead bang, Lebanon mual vum bang na hi: himahleh gamdai ka honsuaksak ding, luahmi omlou khopi bang maiin.
Nang hihmang dingte, galvan nei chiatin, ka bawlkhol dinga; na sidar sing telte a phuk ding ua, meiah a khul ding uh.
Huan, nam dang tampiten hiai khopi a pal paisuak ding ua, mi chihin amau insakinkhangte kiangah TOUPAN hiai khopi thupi mahmah bangdia hichi taka hih hi ding ahia eita? a chi ding uh.
A Pathian uh TOUPA thukhun a lehngatsanua pathian dangte a biak ua, a na a sep jiak uh ahi, chiin a dawng ding uh.
Misi kah kei unla, sun sam kei un; paimangmi bel nakpi mahmahin kah un, a hongkik nawn sin ngal keia, a pianna gam a muh nawn louh ding jiakin.
Juda kumpipa Sallum, Josia sika vaihawmpa, hiai mun akipan paikheta tungtang thu bel TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Hiaiah a hongkik nawnta kei ding.
Sala a pi na mun uah, huailai mahah a si dinga, hiai gam a mu nawnta kei ding.
Diktatlouhnaa in lama, diklouhnaa a dantan tungnungte bawlmi, a thawna amah insakinkhangte tha zang, loh pe nuam loumite tung a gik hi;
In thupi mahmah ka kilam dinga, dantan tungnung zapite neiin, tohlette ka hong dinga, sidar singin ka thuap suak dinga, ze san ka nuh ding, chimi tung mah.
Sidar singa vuallehphai na khen jiakin, kumpipa kisa na hi maw! huan na pan a nein a dawna, diktakin vai a hawm ahi kei maw? huai tuh amah dingin a hoih ahi.
Mi genthei leh tasamte a vaihawm saka, huai tuh a hoih ahi.
Hiai tak na hontheihdan ding ahi maw? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Himahleh na huaihamnate adingin, mi hoih sisan suahna dingin, nuaisiahna ding leh hiamgamna ding leiin na mit leh na lungsim na pu ahi.
Huaijiakin Judate kumpipa Jehoiakim, Josia tapa tungthu bel TOUPAN hichiin a gen a: Aw ka unaupa, chiin hiam, Aw ka sanggamnu, chiin hiam amah a kah kei ding ua, Aw toupa, chiin hiam, Aw thupi pen, chiin hiam amah a sun sam kei ding uh.
Jerusamlem kulh po lama lot khiaka, paihin, sabengtung vuia vuiin a om ding.
Lebanon ah pai tou inla, kikouin, Basan ah na aw suah inla, Abarim akipanin kikou in, na mi itte tengteng a mangthangta ngal ua.
Na lohchinin na kiangah thu ka gena, nang lah ka ngaikhe kei ding, na chi a, ka kamsuak na ngaihkhiak louh na tuailai akipanin hiai na omdan ahi hi.
Na belampute tengteng uh huihin a kivak ding ua, na miitte sal din a tang ding ua, nang leng gitlouna tengteng jiakin zahlak tak leh mangbang tak in na hongom ngei ding hi.
Aw Lebanon tanga teng, sidar sing laka bu septu natna na tunga a hongtuna na honghehpihhuai dingdan mai jaw! numei nauvei na bang maiin.
A hina ka hin sung, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi; Juda kumpipa Konia, Jehoiakim tapa bel ka khut taklama sawnna zungbuh himahle chin, huai a kipan ka honbot ngeingei ding.
Huan, thah dinga nang hongzongmi khut ah, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar khut ah leh Kaldaite khut ah ngeingei nang ka honpe ding hi.
Na pianna hi lou gam dangah nang leh na nu nang honsuang ka honpai khe dinga, huaiah na si ding uh.
A lungsim ua kik nawn a ut mahmahna gam uah a kik nawn het kei ding uh.
Hiai Konia pen bel kitam gawp, simmohhuai ahi ka hia? bel a sunga lungkimna omlouhna ahi kai maw? bangdia amah leh a suante paihkhiaka gam a theih ngeilouh ua paihkhiaka a om uh?
Aw, gam, gam, gam, TOUPA thu ngaikhia in,TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Hiai mi ta neilou, a damsunga lohching lou ding mi ahi, a suante kuamah lohchinga, David tutphah tunga tu ding lah Juda gama vaihawm nawn ding lah a om sin ngal kei ua, chiin gelh in.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi, Hiai mi ta neilou, a damsunga lohching lou ding mi ahi, a suante kuamah lohchinga, David tutphah tunga tu ding lah Juda gama vaihawm nawn ding lah a om sin ngal kei ua, chiin gelh in.
I Gam tatna muna belam hihmangthanga dalhjaksak belamchingmite a tung uh a gik hi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA Israelte Pathianin ka mite chingpa belamchingmite tungtang thu ah hichiin a chi: Ka gan honte na dalhsak ua, na delh mang ua, na veh kei uh, ngai un, na thilhih uh gilou jiakin nou ka hongveh sin ahi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huan, ka gan hon om sunte ka delhjakna gam tengtenga kipan ka pi khawm nawn dinga, a huangsung uah ka hawl khawm dinga, gah nuam mahmah ahi ding ua, a pung ding uh.
Amau limsak ding amaua dingin belamchingmi ka koih dinga, a lau nawnta kei ding ua, a kuamahmah mang a om nawn sam kei ding uh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngaidih ua, David adin Hiang diktat ka suahsak hun ding a hong tung sina, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi; amah kumpipa in a tu dinga, pil takin a gamta dinga, gam pumpi ah dikna leh diktatna a tangtungsak ding.
A hun sungin Juda hotdam ahi dinga, Israel bit takin a om ding.
Huai a min dinga a sak ding uh hiai ahi, TOUPA i diktatna uh ahi, chih.
Huchiin, ngaidih ua, a hun a tung sin ta, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
Israel mite Aigupta gama kipana pikhepa TOUPA a hina a hin sung, chi nawn louin.
Mal lam gam leh a delhjakna gam tengteng akipan Israel inkote suante pikhiaa, pi kik nawnpa TOUPA a hina a hin sung, a chi zota ding uh.
Huan, amau gam ngei ah a teng ding uh.
Jawlneite tungtang thu pen, ka sungah ka lungtang a puakkham hi, ka guh tengteng a linga, zu kham bang mai ka hi, juin a zelh zoh mi bang maiin, TOUPA jiak leh a thu siangthou jiakin.
Gam angkawm honin a dima, hamsia jiakin gamin a sun-a, gamdai lou hing munte a keu khinta; a lampi uh a giloua, a hatna uh a dik kei hi.
Jawlneite leh siamputen Pathian khawk a sa kei ua, ka in sung mahmah ah leng a khelhna uh ka mu.
Huaijiakin amau adingin a paina lampi uh, jan khomial lampi nal bang ahi dinga, huailaiah delhin a om ding ua a tolhpuk ding ua, a tunguah thilhoih lah ka tungsaksin ngala, amaute gawtna hun, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
Samari jawlneite tungah kihhuai ka mu, Baal louin thu a gen ua, Israelte a pi mang ua.
Jerusalem jawlneihon tungah leng thil mulkimhuai kamu, ang a kawm ua, juauin a gamta ua, thilgilou hihte khut a hatsak ua, kuamahin a gitlouh uh kisik a tup louh loh uhi; kei dingin Sodom khuaa mite bang a honghi vek ua, a kho sunga mite tengteng leng Gomorrah khua a mite bang hial.
Huaijiakin jawlneihon tungtang thu ah sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngaidih ua, gamsaiin ka vak dinga, thil kha ka dawnsak dinga; Jerusalem a jawlneite kiang akipanin gam pumpi ah Pathian poisaklouhna lah a pawt ta ngala.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Jawlnei nakiang ua thugente thu ngaikhe kei un; bangmahlou a honsinsak ua.
TOUPA kama kipan hilou amau lungsim geltawmte a gen sek uh.
TOUPA thu musitmite kiangah, Nang dingin a hoih ding, a chi vial ua; huan, amau deihlam engtata hih teiteimite kiangah, Thil hoihlou bangmah na tungah a hongtung kei ding, a chi uh.
TOUPA thugelna ah kua apang ngeia, a thu sanga thei ding kua a oma? ahihleh a thu pen kuan ahia limsaka ngaikhia om?
Ngaidih ua, TOUPA huihpi, hehna a pawtta, ahi, pingpei huihpi; mi giloute lutang a nuai ding.
TOUPA hehna a mawk kik kei ding, a lungsima a tup chinten a tangtungsaka, a hih khit phot masiah; ni nanung lamahte non theichian ding uh.
Jawlneite bel ka sawl louhpiin a tai ua, a kiang ua thu ka gen louhin leng thu a gen uh.
Ka thugelnaa om tei hi le ujaw, ka thu ka mite kianga phuang ding hi ve un, a thilhih diklou ua kipan lehngatsak ding hi ve un.
Gamla pia om Pathian hi louin, Pathian nai gige ka hi hia? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Mun kiselah ka muh theihlouh dia bu theimi a om sin ua hia? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Lei leh vanah ka dim ahi kei maw? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Mang ka nei, mang ka nei, chia ka mina juau gen jawlneite thugen ka zata hi.
Jawlnei juau gen sek, amau lungtang kikhem tawma thu sekmite lungtang ah hiai bangtan ahia a om sin?
Amau bel a invengte uh kiangah a mang uh a hilh ua ka mite ka min mangngilh sak a tum ua, a pate un Baal jiaka ka min a mangngilh khit bang un,
Jawlnei mang neiin a mang gen hen, ka thu neimiin ka thu tak dik takin gen hin.
Buhpawl leh buhtangin kibatna bang a nei ua? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
A thu bel mei bang, sek suang seknenna bang ahi ka hia? chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huaijiakin, ngaiun, jawlnei hon, ka thu kiguksak tuah sekte ka dou ahi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngaidih ua, Jawlnei amah dangnal saka, TOUPAN a chi, chi sekte ka dou ahi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngaidih ua, mang juau leltak gena, hilha, a juau thute uh leh a kiotsakna thu ginaloute uh jiaka ka mite pimang jawlneite ka dou ahi, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi; ka sawl ngal keia, thu lah ka pe keia, hiai mipite a lohtak sak himhim kei ding uh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Hiai mipite laka mi kuain hiam, jawlnei kua hiamin, siampu kuahiamin, TOUPA puakgik bang ahia? chia a hondot leh hichiin na dawng ding hi, Noumau mah puakgik pen na hi uh, ka honpai mang sin; chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Jawlnei hiam, siampu hiam, mi kua hiam, TOUPA puakgik, chi a om uleh, huai mi leh a inkote ka gawt ding.
Huchiin mi kuapeuhin a insakinkhangpa kiangah leh kuapeuhin a unaupa kiangah, TOUPAN bangchiin a dawnga.
TOUPAN bang a gena? chiin na kidong ding uh.
TOUPA puakgik na loukha nawn kei ding ua, mi kuapeuh amah mah thu gen lah puakgik ahi din ngala.
Pathian hing, sepaihte TOUPA, i Pathian thu u lah na lehbulh khinta ngal ua.
Jawlnei kiangah, TOUPAN bangchiin nang a hondawnga?
TOUPAN bang ahia a gen? na chi ding.
Huan, TOUPA puakgik, na chih peuhmah uleh, TOUPAN hichiin a chi: TOUPA puakgik na chi ding uh ahi kei, chia ka honsawla, TOUPA puakgik chia thu na gen jiakin;
Huchiin, ngaiun, ka honmangngilh keuhkeuh dinga, ka honpai mang dinga, noute leh hiai khopi na kiang uleh na pate uh kianga ka na piaksa toh.Huan, khantawn demsiatna leh zahlak nilouhna mangngilh vuallouh na tunguah ka hontun ding.
Huan, khantawn demsiatna leh zahlak nilouhna mangngilh vuallouh na tunguah ka hontun ding.
Huan, TOUPAN a honensaka, ngaidih, thipi bawm nih TOUPA biakin maah a nakitunga, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin Judate kumpipa Jekonia, Jehoiakimtapa leh Juda heutute, mi khutsaimte leh siksekmite toh Jerusalem akipana Babulon sal dia a pi nungin.
Bawm khat ah theipi hoihtek, theipi min masa bang tak, a oma; bawm dangah bel theipi hoihlou hial, nek tak louh khopa sia a om hi.
Huan, TOUPAN ka kiangah, Bang ahia na muh, Jeremia? a chi a.
Ken, Theipi, theipi hoih, hoih mahmah; leh a hoihlou, nek tak louh khopa sia, ka chi a.
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung.
TOUPA Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi: Juda sal tangte, Kaldaite gama a thatna ding ua ka sawl khiakte, hiai theipi hoih bangin ka en sin hi.
A hoihna ding un a tunguah kamit ka tusak dinga, hiai gamah ka pikik nawn ding: amau ka dingsak dinga, ka phel kei ding; ka suan dinga, ka bot kei ding.
Huan, TOUPA ka hi chih na hontheihna dingin lungtang ka honpe dinga: ka mite ahi ding ua, a Pathian uh ka hi ding: a lungtang tengteng utoh ka kiangah a hongkik sin ngal ua.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Theipi sia, nek tak louh khopa sia bangin Juda kumpipa.
Zedekia leh a heutute uh leh Jerusalema nituang hiai gama om laite leh Aigupta gama tengte, ka lehngatsan ngeingei ding:
Haksa taka leitung gam tengteng laka sep lenlen dingin, ka delhmangna tengtenga gensiat leh tehpih leh tai leh hamsiat khum hi dingin ka tawpsan ding.Amau leh a pate uh kianga ka piak gam akipan valh khit a hih pha un a lak uah namsaute, kialte, a kianga ka piak gam akipan valh khit a hih pha un a lak uah namsaute, kialte, hite, ka sawl ding.
Amau leh a pate uh kianga ka piak gam akipan valh khit a hih pha un a lak uah namsaute, kialte, a kianga ka piak gam akipan valh khit a hih pha un a lak uah namsaute, kialte, hite, ka sawl ding.
Judate kumpipa, Jehoiakim, Josia tapa kum linaa Juda mite tengteng tungtanga Jeremia kianga thu hongtung: Huai hun bel Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kum khatna ahia,
Huai thu jawlnei Jeremiain Juda mi tengteng leh Jerusalema om tengtengte kianga a gen ahi.
Kum sawmnih leh kum thum sung tak, Judate kumpipa Josia, Amon tapa kum sawm leh kum thumna akipana tu tanin, TOUPA thu a hongtung seka, jing pipia thouin na kiang uah ka gengena, himahleh na ngaikhe kei uh.
Huan, TOUPAN na kiang uah a nasemmi jawlneite tengteng a sawla, jing pipia thouin a sawla, himahleh na ngaikhe kei ua, thei dingin na bil uh na doh sam kei uh;
Huai, jawlneiten, mi chih noumau lampi gilou akipan hongkik unla, TOUPAN na kiang ua leh na pate uh kianga nidanglai akipan khantawna dinga nou a honpiak gamah teng un:
Pathian dangte kiangah a na uh sem ding leh amau be ding leh na khut nasep ua ka lung kimlou sak dingin hoh kei un; huchiin, ka honhihna kei ding hi, a chi sek uh.
Himahleh nou dinga hoih lou dinga na khut nasep ua honhehsak dingin na honngaikhe kei ua, TOUPAN a chi.
Huaijiakin sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ka thu na ngaihkhiak louh jiak un, ngaihdih ua,
Mal lam nam tengteng ka thukhak dinga, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
Ka nasempa Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzer leng ka thukhak dinga, amaute hiai gam leh a sunga omte leh hiai kima nam om tengteng sual dingin ka honpi dinga; ka hihmang sipsip dinga, lamdangsak ding leh tek khum ding leh segawp nilouh dingin ka bawl ding.
Huan a kiang ua kipan naumsakna husa leh kipahna husate, mouneipa aw leh mou aw te, buh gawi husa ging leh khawnvak vak te ka la mang ding.
Hiai avekin a se dinga, lamdangsak ahi ding; huan hiai namte Babulon kumpipa na kum sawmsagih a sem ding uh.
Huan, kum sawmsagih a man hun chiangin Babulon kumpipa leh huai nam, kaldaite gam, a gitlouhna uh jiakin ka gawt dinga; khantawnin ka segawp sak ding, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi hi.
Huai gam tungah ka thu a tung ua ka gen tengteng, Jeremiain nam tengteng tunga a gen, hiai laibu a gelhsa tengteng ka tungsak ding hi.
Nam tuamtuam leh kumpipa thupi takten amautein na a kisep un, amau mahmahin leng amau na a hon sepsak sin ngal ua.
TOUPA Israelte Pathianin ka kiangah hichiin a chi: Ka khuta hiai hehna uain nou la inla, ka honsawlna ding nam teng dawnsakin.
A dawn ding ua, a hoi dongdong ding ua, a hai ding ua, a kiang ua ka sawl ding namsau jiakin chiin.
Huan, TOUPA khuta nou ka laa, TOUPAN honsawlna nam teng ka dawnsaka:
Huai bel hiaite ahi uhi: Jerusalem leh Juda khopite, huai kumpipate leh heutute, siatgawpna te, lamdangsak te, tek khum ding te, hamsiat te tang dingin, tua a omdan bang uh:
Aigupta kumpipa Pharo leh a sikhate, a heutute leh a mi tengtengte;
Milak-hel tengteng; Uz gama kumpipa teng; Philistia gama kumpipa tengteng, Askelon leh Gaza leh Ekron leh Ashdoda om sunte kumpipate;
Edom leh Moab leh Amon suante;
Tura kumpipa tengteng leh Sidon kumpipa tengteng leh tuipi gei kumpipate;
Dedan leh Tema leh Buz leh a bak sam uh mette tengteng;
Arabia kumpipa tengteng, Gamdaia teng nam kihelte kumpipate tengteng;
Zimri kumpipa tengteng; Elam kumpipa tengteng; Media kumpipa tengteng;
Mal lam kumpipa tengteng, a gamla leh a naia mi a kizom jelin; kumpipan a dawn ding hi.
Huan, a kiang uah sepaihte TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi: Dawn unla, kham unla, lau unla, kipuk unla kipuk unla thou nawn kei un, namsau na lak ua ka sawl ding jaikin, chiin.
Huan, na khuta nou pen dawn dinga a lak nop kei uleh hichiin na chi ding: sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Na dawn ngeingei ding uh; hiai,
Ka min tam khopi ah thil hoihlou ka hih pana, noute gawt louh hialin na om ding umaw? gawt louhin na om kei ding ua; leia teng tengteng tungah namsau ka kan sin ngala, chih sepaihte TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huaijiakin a tungah hiaite gen inla, a kiang uah hichiin chiin: TOUPA mun sang akipanin a thum ding, a tenna siangthou akipanin a aw a suah ding, a huang tungah nakpi petmahin a thum ding; grep sukmite bangin a kikou ding, lei luahte tengteng tungah.
Lei tawp phain husa a thang kik dinga, TOUPAN namte a langa, sa tengteng tungah vai a hawm sin, mi thugina lou jaw namsau kiangah a pe ding, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngai in, thil hoihlouin nam chih a honnuai sin hi, huihpi hat mahmah lei mun tawp akipanin a hongkuan sin hi.
Huai ni chia TOUPA thatten lei tawp akipanin lei tawp phain a khak ding ua; sun louh leh khop louh leh vui louhin a om ding ua; leitunga eklei lel ahi ding uh.
Belamchingmite aw kikou tuaituai unla, kap un, nou belam hon laka makaite aw, kitung buatbuat un, thaha na om ni u leh na dalhjak nite uh a hongtung petmahta hi.
Bel deihhuai bangin na puk ding uh.
Belamchingmiten taimangna lampi a neikei ding ua, belam hon laka makaitenleng pelhna lampi a neikei ding uh.
Belamchingmite kah husa, belam hon laka makaite mau ging toh, TOUPAN a tatna mun uh a suksiat lel jiakin.
Huang muanhuaite daihsak sipsipin a omta ua, TOUPA hehna mahmah jiakin.A bukna a pawtsanta, humpinelkai bangin, a gam uh lah a sekhinta ngala, nuaisiahna namsau lauhuai jiak leh, heh mahmahna jiakin.
A bukna a pawtsanta, humpinelkai bangin, a gam uh lah a sekhinta ngala, nuaisiahna namsau lauhuai jiak leh, heh mahmahna jiakin.
Juda kumpipa Josia tapa Jehoiakim lal pattungin hiai thu TOUPA kiang akipan a hongtunga,
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: TOUPA in huang sungah ding inla, Juda khopi tengteng Pathian be dinga TOUPA ina hongpaite kiangah a kiang ua gen dinga thu ka honpiak tengteng khat lel leng im louin gen vek in.
Michihin a omdan gilou uh paisanin a ngaikhe zenzen moh ding uhia, a thilhih gilou uh jiaka a tung ua thil hoihlou hih ka tup ka hep theihna dingin.
Huan, nang a kiang uah, TOUPAN hichiin a chi: non ngaihkhiak louh ua, ka dan na ma ua ka koih na zuih louh ua,
Jing pipia thoua amau ka sawl na kiang ua ka sawl ka nasemmi jawlnei thu na limsak kei uleh;
Hiai in Siloh bangin ka bawl dinga, leitunga nam tengtengte hamsia thuak dingin ka bawl ding, na chi ding hi.
Huan, siampute, jawlneite leh mipi tengtengin TOUPA ina Jeremiain hiai thu a gen a ngaikhia uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, mipi tengteng kianga gen dinga TOUPAN a piak tengteng a gen khitin, siampute, jawlneite leh mipi tengtengin amah a manta ua, Si peuhmah ni teh.
Bangdia TOUPA min loua, Hiai in Siloh bang ahi ding, hiai khopi luahmi om louin a segawp ding, chia gen na hia? a chi ua.
Huchiin TOUPA in ah mipi tengtengin Jeremia a boh lutlut uh.
Huan, Juda heututen hiai thu a jak un, kumpipa in a kipanin TOUPA in lutna kongpi thak ah a tu uh.
Huan, siampute leh jawlneiten heutute leh mipi tengteng kiangah, Hiai mi sitak ahi, khopi siat ding thu, na bil ua na jak bang un a gen khol ngala, a chi ua.
Huan, heutute leh mipi tengteng kiangah Jeremiain, Na thu ngaihkhiak khitsa uh tengteng bangin hiai in leh hiai khopi siat ding thu gen dingin TOUPAN kei a honsawl ahi.
Huaijiakin tuin na omdan uleh na gamtatdan uh bawl hoih unla, TOUPA na Pathian uh thu mang un; huchiin TOUPAN na tung ua thil hoih lou tung ding a phuankhiaksa a kikhelsak thei ding.
Kei ahihleh, na khut ua om keita ve.
Dik leh hoih na chih bangbang un hon bawl un.
Na honthah uleh, noumau leh hiai khopi leh khua leh tuite tungah mi hoih sisan na tungsak ngeisin uh chih thei mai un; a dikdikin na bil ua hiai thu tengteng gen dia TOUPAN na kiang ua honsawl ka hi hi, achia.
Huchiin heutute leh mipiten, siampute jawlneite kiangah, Hiai mi a sih ding ahi kei, TOUPA i Pathian muna i kiang ua thu gen ahi ve, a chi ua.
Huan, huai gam upa kuate hiam a hongding ua, mipi omkhawmte kiangah,
Mika, Moraseth miin Juda kumpipa Hezekia lal laiin thu a gena, huan, Juda mi tengteng kiangah, Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Zion lou banga leh ahi dinga, Jerusalem thil se omkhawm ahi ding, a in mual gammang mun sang bang ahi ding, achia.
Juda kumpipa Hezekia leh Judate tengtengin amah a that uhia?
TOUPA lauin TOUPA deihsakna a ngen ua, TOUPAN a tung ua thil hoihlou tung ding a phuan a kikhelsak ahi kei maw?
En jaw i tung ua thil hoihlou tungsak ding i hi ve ua.
Huan, mi dang, TOUPA mina thu gen Keriath-Jenrima mi Semei tapa Uria mah leng a oma, Jeremia thu gen tengteng mahbang in hiai gam leh khopi siat ding thu a gen hi.
Kumpipa Jehoiakim leh a mi thupite tengteng leh heutute tengtengin a jak un kumpipan hihlup a tuma; himahleh Uriain a jakin a laua, a taimanga, Aigupta gamah a paita hi.
Huan, kumpipa Jehoiakimin Aigupta gamah mi sawla, Akbor tapa Elnathan leh mi dangte toh;
Huan, Aigupta gam akipanin Uria a pi khia ua, kumpipa Jehoiakim kiangah a honpi ua, huaiin namsauin a thata, a luang vantang han ah a pailut ua, a chi ua.Himahleh Saphan tapa Ahikamin Jeremia a guma, huchiin hihlup ding in mipite kiangah piak ahita kei.
Himahleh Saphan tapa Ahikamin Jeremia a guma, huchiin hihlup ding in mipite kiangah piak ahita kei.
Juda Kumpipa Josia tapa Zekedia lal pattungin, TOUPA kiang akipanin hiai thu a hongtung.
TOUPAN ka kiangah hichiin a chi: Hakkolte leh a khaute bawl inla, na ngaawng ah bangin.
Huan, Edom kumpipa te, Moab kumpipa te, Amon mite kumpipa te, Tura kumpipa te, Sidon kumpipa te kiangah Juda kumpipa Zedekia kianga mi sawl, Jerusalema hongpaite khut ah khakin.
Hiai thute a pute uh kiangah gensakin: Hichiin Israel Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN a chi: hichiin na pute uh kianga na gen ding uh ahi:
Ka thilhihtheihna thupi tak leh ka ban jakin lei te, mihing te leh leitunga sate ka bawl veka, piak tuak ka chihte kiangah ka pia.
Tuin leng ka nasempa Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar khut ah hiai gam tengteng ka pe khinta hi, gamsate leng amah nasem dingin ka pelai hi.
Amah gam hun tak a tun main nam tengtengin amah leh a tapate leh a tapa tate na a sem ding ua, huai nungin bel nam tempite leh kumpipa thupi mahmahten amah sikha din a bawl ding uh.
Huan, hiai ahi dinga, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar hakkol po nuam lou leh a na sem nuam lou nam leh lalna gam namsau leh kial leh hipi amah khuta ka hihman vek masiah amau ka gawt jel ding.
Nouten a hileh na jawlneite uh, na aisansiamte uh; na mang te uh, na bumsiamte uh, na kiang ua, Babulon kumpipa na na sem kei ding uh, chia genmite ngaikhe kei un.
Na gam ua kipana gamla pia pi manga na om theihna ding un, na kiang uah juau thu a gen khol uh ahi: ka hondelh khiaka na man that na ding un.
Ahihhangin Babulon kimpipa hakkol puaa, na sem nuam nam bel a gam ngei uah ka omsak dinga, lei a let ding uh, huailaiah a teng gige ding uh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huan, Juda kumpipa Zedekia kiangah hiai thu tengteng bang jelin ka gena: Babulon kumpipa hakkol pua unla, amah leh a mite nasem unla, na hing ding uhi.
Babulon kumpipa nasem nuam lou nam tungtang TOUPAN a gensa bangin bangdia namsaute, kialte, hipitea nang leh na mite si ding na hi ua?
Huan, jawlnei na kiang ua, Babulon kumpipa na sem kei un, chite thu ngaikhe kei un; na kiang uah juau thu a gen lel uh ahi ngala.
Ka sawl lah ahi ngal kai ua, ka min sialin juau thu a gen nak ua, nou leh na kiang ua thu gen jawlneite ka delhkhiaa, na manthat theihna ding un TOUPAN a chi.
Siampute leh hiai mipite tengteng kiangah leng ka gen sama: TOUPAN hichiin a chi ahi: Jawlnei na kiang ua thu gen, Ngai un, TOUPA ina belsuante Babulon akipanin hontut ahi pah ding hi, chimite thu ngaikhe kei un, na kiang uah juau a gen uh ahi ngala.
Amaute ngaikhe het kei un; Babulon kumpipa na sem unla, na hing ding uhi; bangdin hiai khopi a segawp dia?
Himahleh jawlnei a hih ua, TOUPA thu a kiang ua om etmah ahihleh TOUPA in leh Juda kumpipa in leh Jerusalema belsuan nutsiata om laite Babulona tut ahih louhna dingin sepaihte TOUPA kiangah ngen le uh ake.
Sepaihte TOUPAN, khuam sangte, dal tuipangte, kingaknate leh hiai khopi a belsuan nutsiata om sunte,
Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin Juda kumpipa Jehoiakim tapa, Jekonia leh Juda leh Jerusalem a mi hoih tengteng Jerusalem akipana Babulon sala dia a pi laia a lak val tungtang thu hichiin a gen hi,
Ahi, sepaihte TOUPA, Israel Pathianin TOUPA in leh Juda kumpipa in leh Jerusalema belsuan nutsiata om lai tungtang thu a gen ahi:Babulon ah lak mang ahi ding ua, amaute ka hongveh masiah huailaiah a om nilouh ding uh; huan, amau ka la tou nawn dinga, hiai munah ka koih nawn dinga, chih TOUPA thu thu pawt ahi.
Babulon ah lak mang ahi ding ua, amaute ka hongveh masiah huailaiah a om nilouh ding uh; huan, amau ka la tou nawn dinga, hiai munah ka koih nawn dinga, chih TOUPA thu thu pawt ahi.
Huan, hichi a honghia, huai kum mahin, Juda kumpipa Zedekia lalpattung lam, a kum lina, kha ngana ah jawlnei Hanania, Azzur tapa Gibeon min siampute leh mipi tengteng maah, Toupa in ah, honhoupihna,
Sepaihte Toupa, Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi: Babulon kumipa hakkol ka hihtanta.
Kum nih sung vengvengin Toupa ina belsuan Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin hiai mun akipana a laka, Babylon tana a paipih tengteng, hiai mun mahmah ah ka hontun nawn vek ding.
Hiai mun ah Juda kumpipa Jehoiakim tapa, Jekonia leh Babulona hoh Juda sal tengteng ka pi nawn ding; Babulon kumpipa hakkol lah ka hihtan sin ngala, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Huan Jawlnei Jeremia in siampute leh TOUPA ina ding mipi tengteng maah jawlnei Hannania kiangah,
Jawlnei Jeremia ngeiin, Amen, TOUPAN huchibangin hih ngei heh; TOUPA ina belsuante leh saltannaa mi tengteng Babulon akipan hiai muna hontun dinga na gen TOUPAN hih ngei heh.
Ahihhangin mipi tengteng leh nang bila ka thu gen ngaikhiain.
Kei leh nang maa niganga jawlneiten gam tampi tungah leh lalna gam thupi pite tungah kidouna te, thil hoihlou te, leh hipi thu te a gen sek uh.
Jawlnei muanna thu genmi thi gen a hongtun hin chiangin, huai jawlnei pen TOUPAN a sawl ngei ahi chih aki thei mai ding, achia.
Huan, jawlnei Hananiain hakkol, jawlnei Jeremia puak a la a, a hihtana.
Huan, mipi tengteng maah Hananiain, Hichiin TOUPAN a chi: Hichibang ngeiin Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar hakkol kum nih sing vengvengin namte tengteng ngawng akipan ka hihtan ding achi a.
Huan, jawlnei Jeremiain a paisanta hi.
Huan, jawlnei Hananiain jawlnei Jeremia ngawng akipan hakkol a hihtan nungin Jeremia kiangah TOUPA thi a hongtunga,
Kuan inla, Hanania kiangah hichiin vachiin, Hichiin TOUPAN a chi: Sing hakkol na hihtana, a taing sik hakkol na bawlsak jaw ahi.
Hichiin Israel Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN a chi ngala, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar na a sep theihna ding un hiai nam tengteng sik hakkol ka po sak ding ahi: amah na a sem ding uh: gamnuaia gamsate leng amah ka pe lai ahi, chiin.
Huan, Jawlnei Jeremiain jawlnei Hanania kiangah, Ngaiin, Hanania, TOUPAN nang a honsawl peuhmah kei hi: Hiai mite juau na muangsak lel ahi jaw hi.
Huaijiakin hichiin TOUPAN a chi: Ngaidih, leitung akipan ka honhihmang vengveng ding: Toupa tunga helna thu na gen jiakin tukum mahmahin na si ding hi, a chi hi.Huchiin, huai kum mahin, kha sagihna ah jawlnei Hanania a sita hi.
Huchiin, huai kum mahin, kha sagihna ah jawlnei Hanania a sita hi.
Huan, Jawlnei Jeremiain Jerusalem akipana saltang upate, siampute, jawlneite, mi dangte, Nebukadnezzarin Jerusalem akipana Babulon a pi khit, a dam sunte kianga a laikhak khak thu hiaite ahi:
(Kumpipa Jekonia te, kumpinu te, michilgehte, Juda leh Jerusalem heutute, mi khutsiamte, siksekmite Jerusalem a paikhiat nung ua; )
Shalhan tapa, Elasa leh Hilkia tapa, Gemaria te khut ah a khak hi: (huaite bel Juda kumpipa Zedekiain Babulon gama Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kianga a sawlte ahi ih: )
Israel Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN saltang tengteng, Jerusalem akipan Babulon sal dia ka pisak sate kiangah hichiin a chi:
Inte lam unla, huaiah teng unla, huante bawl unla, a gahte ne unla, jite nei unla, tanute tapate nei unla;
Na tapate uh adingin jite neihsak unla, na tanute uh pasal neisak unla, tanu tapa a nei h theihna ding un: huaiah hong pung unla, kiam lam nawt kei un:
Sal dia ka hontansakna khopi hoihna ding zong unla, TOUPA kiang ah ngetsak un: amah hoihna ah nou leng hoihna na mu sin ngal ua,
Israel Pathian, sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Na lak ua jawlneite leh aisansiamten hon khem kei uhenla, a mang a mat uh leng ngaike sam kei un.
Ka min sialin juauthu na kiang ah a gen uhi: kei sawl ahi kei ua, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi ngala, Babulon adingin kum sawmsagih a chih tak in ka hong veh dinga, na kiang ua ka thichiam hoihtak ka tungsak dinga, hiai munah ka honkik nawn sak ding.
Nou lama ka lungsim putdan lah ka kithei ngala, na hun nanung tawp ua lametna honpe dingin thil hoihlou hihlouin hoihna ngaihtuah ka hi.
Huan, non kan ding ua, ka kiangah nong thum ding ua, ka hon ngaikhe ding.
Huan, non zong ding ua, na lungtang tengteng ua na honzon hun chiang un non mu ding uh.
Huan, na hon muh un ka om dia, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi, na omdan uh ka hei dinga, nam tengtengte laka ka hondalhsakna mun akipan ka honpi khawm nawn ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi; sal dia ka hon matsakna mun ngeiah ka hontungsak nawn ding hi, chih.
TOUPAN Babulon gamah leng jawlnei hinbawlsaka, na chi ngal ua.
