Zion lam ngain a kalsuanna ding uh a ding ding ua, Kisa un, khantawn thukhun manghilh nawn loh dingah TOUPA honglen un, a chi ding uh.
Ka mite jaw belam mang ahi ua; amau chingmiten a pi mang ua, mual ahte a pai mangsak ua, tangah te, mual dungahte a pai ua, a huang uh a manghilh khinta uh.
A mu peuhin a ne jel ua, a melmate un, I gilou kei, Toupa dikna omna a pipute uh lamet TOUPA hilhial tunga thil a hihkhelh jiak ahi, a chi ua.
Babulon sung akipanin tai khia unla, Kaldaite gam akipan pai khia unla, kel hon laka keltalte bangin om un.
Ngaidih ua, Babulon hongsual dingin mal gam akipan nam honpi thupi tak kikaikhawm ka tokthou dinga, amah dou dingin a kisa ding ua: huai akipanin lak ahi ding uh: a thalte uh lah galbawl siamtak vuaksuak ngeilou bang ahi ding uh.
Huan, Kaldai lokin a om ding, a lok mite a tai ngial ding uh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Kipak mahle uchin, nuamsa mahle uchin, aw ka goutan lok mite aw, lou lakah bawngla ta khialkhial bang leh sakoltal ham ngengek bang himahle uchin;
Na nu uh a hongzum mahmah dinga, nou hongsuangnu a hongzahlak ding hi.
Ngai un, namte laka nuainungpen, gamdai gam, gam keu, gam vuak ahi ding.
TOUPA hehna jiakin luahmi a om kei dinga, a sevek zo ding hi, Babulon hoh peuhmah a mulkim sak dinga, a siatna tengteng ziakin a tek ding uhi.
Thalpeu tawimi tengteng aw, Babulon um suakin kivual unla, kap unla, thalte chil kei un, TOUPA tungah lah a khialta ngal ua.
A kimvelin awng unla, amah leh amah a kipeta, a kulhte a puktaa, a bangte a chimta, TOUPA phu lakna ahi ngala, a tungah phu la unla, a hih bangbangin a tungah hih un.
Babulon akipan chi thehmi attan unla, buh lak laia kawite tawimi toh, nuaisiahna namsau lauin amau mite lam a juan chiat ding ua, amau gam chiat ah a atai ding uh.
Isreal bel belam dalh jak ahia; humpinelkaiten a delh mang ua; Assuria kumpipan amah a ne phota, a tawpin Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a guhte a haijanta hi.
Huaijiakin sepaihte TOUPA, Israelte Pathianin hichiin a chi: Ngai un, Assuria kumpipa ka gawt bangin Babulon kumpipa leh a gam ka gawt ding.
Huan, Israel a tatna ah ka pi nawn dinga, Karmel leh Bashan ah a ta dinga, Ephraim tangah leh Gilead ah amah a ta ding hi.
Huai nite chiang huai hun chiangin Israel thulimlouhnate a zong ding ua, muh ding a om kei ding; Juda thilhihkhelhte leng muh ding a om sam kei ding; omsun dinga ka koihte lah ka ngaidam sin ngala, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Merathim gam sual un, a gam leh Pekod luah mite mahmah; that unla, hihgam sipsip unla, thu ka honpiak bangbangin hih un, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huai gamah gal husa a om, siatna thupi mahmah husa toh.
Khovel pumpi sek a kitamin, nak kek nen hina tel e:
Aw Babulon, nang dingin thang kama, theiloua awk neita ve; muhkhiak leh matin na omta, TOUPA na sual ziakin.
TOUPAN a galvan bawm a hongta, a hehna vanzatte a lakhiaa, TOUPA, sepaihte TOUPAN Kaldaite gamah hih ding a nei hi.
Gamgi tawp pek akipanin honsual unla, a thil koihkhawmna inte hong vek unla, pai khawm unla, hihse vek un, a bangmah himhim hawi kei un.
A bawngtal tuaite hihlum vek unla, gohin om uhen.
A tung uh gik hina tel e!
A ni uh la a hongtungta ngala, amaute gawtna ni mahmah.
TOUPA i Pathian phu lak, a biakin phu lakna ngei Ziona gen dinga Babulon akipana tai khia leh tai mangte husa ngei:
Babulon sual dingin thal kap siam, thalpeu zangmi tengteng sam khawm un; a kimvelin buk bawl unla, kuamah suakta kei uhen; A thilhih bangbangin thuk un, a hihsa bang tengteng amah tungah hih un: TOUPA, Israel Mi Siangthou lah a tou ngam a.
Huaijiakin tangvalte a kholakte ah a puk ding ua, galkapmi tengteng huai niin a mangthang ding uh chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngai in, nang mi kisathei, ka hondou ahi, TOUPA, sepaihte TOUPAN a chi.
Na ni a hongtungta, na gawtna ding ni mah.
Huan mi kisathei a kisuiin a puk dinga, kuamahin a phong kei ding ua, huan, a khopite ah mei ka khah dinga, a kimvela om tengteng ka kang siangsak vek ding.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Israel tate leh Juda tate nuaisiahin a om khawmta ua; sala amaute pimite tengtengin amau a len chinten ua, a khah nuam het kei uh.
Amaute tanpha bel a hata; amin sepaihte TOUPA ahi.
Amah amau lama a panga, Babulona tengte hihbuaiin, khovela muanna a tut theihna dingin.
Kaldai mite tungah namsau a leng hi, Babulona tengte, a heutute uh leh a mi pilte uh tungah leng, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Mi juautheite tungah namsau, mi hai a hongsuak ding uh: a galkap mi tungah namsau, a lunglel khin ding uh.
A sakolte uh leh kangtalaite uh tungah namsau, a sunga mi kilak-hel tengtengte tungah leng, numei bang phet a honghi ding uh: a gou thil tungah namsau, lokin a om maimai ding uhi.
A tuite kangin a keu khina, milimte gam lah ahi ngal a, milimte lah a hailoh uhi.
Huaijiakin gamdai gam sahangte, ngiate toh huailaiah a teng ding ua, Ostritte leng huailaiah a teng ding uh; luahin a om ngei nawn kei ding; suan tengteng phain leng luahin a om kei ding.
Pathianin Sodom leh Gomora leh a kho insakinkhangte a hihsiat bangbangin; huailaiah kuamah a tengta kei ding ua, mihing ta kuamahin a veh nawnta kei ding uh, TOUPA thu pawtin a chi.
Ngai un, mal lam gam akipan mite a hong ua, leh mun tawpa kipan nam thupi tak leh kumpipa tampi a hongkuan uhi.
Thalpeu leh tei a tawi ua, hiamgam tak, zahngaihna himhim neilou ahi uh.
A husa uh tuipi ging huhu bang ahia, sakol tungah a tuang ua, mi chih galkapmi banga kivanin, aw, Babulon tanu, nang a hongsual sin uhi.
A husa uh jain Babulon kumpipa khut a zota, numei nauvei lainatna bangin, natna thupitakin a manta hi.
Ngai un, Jordan gam gammang akipan humpinelkai, kahna muna a hongtou bangin a hingpaitou dinga; amah akipanin amaute ka taimangsak pah ding; a tunga thu nei ding ka ut-ut ka sep ding.
Kei bang kua a oma!
Kuan sep ding.
Kei bang kua kua a oma?
Kuan ahia hunbi honsehsak ding?
Belamchingmi kua ahia ka maa ding ding?
Huaijiakin Babulon tungah TOUPA thu hilh, Kaldai mite tunga a thil seh ngaikhia un.
Gan hon noute ngei kaihmangin a om ding ua, gan kahna muna mite a mulkim sak ding.Babulon lakna husa ah lei a ling dinga, a kahna husa namte laka jak ahi ding hi.
Babulon lakna husa ah lei a ling dinga, a kahna husa namte laka jak ahi ding hi.
TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngai dih, Babulon tungah leh Kaldai mite tungah, hihse ding huihpi ka sawl sin ahi;
Japsiangmi ka sawl sin, Babulon tungah, amah japin a gam a jap siang ding ua, siatna niin umin a sual sin ngal ua.
Thalpeu zangmiin thalpeu lai louin, sik puannak silhin, din leng ding kei heh, a tangval hon khat leng hawilouin, a sepaih tengteng nuai mang un.
Kaldai gamah thahin a puk ding ua, a kholak uahte sut pailetin a om ding uhi.
Israel leh Juda bel a Pathian uh sepaihte TOUPAN a manghilh ngal keia, a gam uh Israel Mi Siangthou tungah khelhna in a dim naa.
Tai mang unla, Babulon kho sung akipan, mi chihin amah hinna humbit hen; a thulimlouhna man loh kei un, TOUPA phu lak hun lah ahi ngala, aman athuk ngeigngei sin hi.
Babulon bel TOUPA khuta dangkaeng nou, lei pumpi hihkhamna ahia, namten lung a mawl khin ta ahi.
Babulon bel a puk guiha, a mangta, amah kah ekek un, hihdam theih dingdan ahihleh singnai damdawi nuh chi laksak un.
Babulon hihdam ka tuma, a dam tuan ngal keia, amah nusiain eimah gam chiat uah pai ni, a mohnain van a suna van dum phaa dopkang ahi.
TOUPAN ka dikna a phuangta; kisa un, Zion ah I phuang ding uh, TOUPA I Pathian thil hih.
Thalte hiam unla, lumte len un, Media kumpipate lungsim lah TOUPAN a tokthoutaa, a thiltup lah Babulon hihsiat ahi ngala.
Huai lah TOUPAN phu lakna ahi ngala, a biakin phu mah.
Babulon kulh bul ah kidouna puanzak tak un, venna hihhatin, galvilmi koih un, galbuknate bawl unla, Babulon mite tuntang thu ah TOUPAN a gentak, a ngaihtuah in a hihkhinta ngala.
Aw nang, tui tamna muna tengmi, sum leh pai hau mahmah, na tawpna a tungta, na hinna khau a kitanta hi.
Sepaihte TOUPAN amah kilouin achiamta hi, Khaupe bang main mihingin ka hondimsak ngeingei ding, nakpiin a honot khum ding uh.
A thilhihtheihnain lei a bawla, a pilnain khovel a dingkhesaka, a lemtheihnain van a palhsak.
A aw a suah leh, vana tui a ging hawhawa, kawlmong akipan meipi a paitou saka, vuah zukna dingin khua a phe saka, a goubawm akipan huih a nungsak.
Mi chih a mual ua, theihna louin, dangkaeng sekmi chihin a lim sek pen a zumpih ua, a milim sun lah zuau ngen ahi ngala, amau ah nakna a om kei lai.
Bangmah lou phet ahi ua, khemna nasep lel, a gawtna hun chiangin a mang mai ding uh.
Jakob tantuan zaw hichibang ahi kei, thil tengteng bul ahi ngala; Israel a gouluah nam ahia, amin sepaihte TOUPA ahi.
Nang bel ka galdouna heipi leh vanzat na hi seka, nang hon zangin namte ka hihzana, nang zangin lalna gamte ka hihmang hi.
Nang honzangin sakol leh a tunga ka hihjana, nangmah zangin kangtalai leh a tunga tuang ka hihjana;
Nangmah zangin numei leh pasal ka hihjana, nangmah zangin putek leh tuailai ka hihjana, nangmah zangin nungak leh tangval ka hihjana;
Nangmah zangin belamching leh belamhon ka hihjana, nangmah zangin lou neimi leh bawngtal kop ka hihjana, nangmah zangin gam ukpipate leh upate ka hihjan sek ahi.
Nang mitmuh ngeiin Zion tunga a thil hoihlou hih tengteng uh Babulon leh Kaldai mite tungah ka thuk ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ngai in, lei pumpi hihsia, aw hihsetu tang lian, nang ka hondou ahi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi: Na tungah ka lik dinga, kawl sanga kipan ka honkhuk khe ding, tang kang mit khinsain ka honbawl ding.
Nang akipan suang ning ding leh suangphum ding lakkhiak ahi nawn kei ding; khantawnin na segawp zo ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Huai gamah kidou puanjak tak unla.
Namte laka pengkul mut un, amah dou ding namte kisa sak unla, Ararat te, Minni te, Askhenaz gam te, amah sual ding sepaih sep unla, khaupe juangjang bang maiin sakolte kaikhawm un.
Amah dou ding namte kisa sak un, Media kumpipate, ukpipate leh upate, a thuneihna gam tengteng toh.
Huaigam nat thuakin a linga, Babulon gam, tengmi om loua hihsiat dingin, Babulon tunga TOUPA thiltup a ding gige ahi.
Babulon galkapmiten galkap ding ngapta louin, a kulhpi a tawn maimah uh, a pasalphatna uh a khinga, numei bangmai ahong hita ua, a tenna munte a kang khina, a deidanna siktawn a kitan.
Thangkou taiin mi dang leng a ki tuahpiha, mi sawl inleng mi dang a tuaka, Babulon kumpipa kianga a khopi ning chih ah a manta uh chih hilh dingin.
Lui kannate a man ua, phailuangte a hal siang ua, kidou mite leng a lunglelta uh.
Sepaihte TOUPA, Israel Pathianin hichiin a chi: Babulon tanu phual sik ngil lai bang ahia, sawt lou nungin buhchil hun a tungah a hongtung ding.
Hon gaita, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin, hon hai jana, bel vuak lelin a honbawlta, gulpi bangin hon nawmvalhta, ka thil limten a gilpi a dimsaka, a honpai khe nawnta hi.
Kei leh ka sa tunga hiamgam thilhih, Babulon tungah om hen; ka sisan Kaldai mite tungah om hen, Jerusalem a chi ding.
Huaiziakin TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Ngai in, nang lamah ka pang dinga, na phu ka honlaksak ding, a tuipi ka kangsak dinga, a tuikhuk leng ka keugo sak ding.
Huan, Babulon bel hoihlou paihkhawm lel, sehal tenna mun, lamdang sak chiat leh tek khum, tengmi omlou mun a honghi ding.
A kikou ton ding ua, humpinelkai lunlai bangin, a ngiau tuaktuak ding ua, humpinelkai nou bangin.
A kham lungpuam lai un ankuang ka luisak dia, ka khamsak dia, kho theihet louin, khanglou het lou dinga a ihmut den theihna ding un, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Ka pi khe dinga, belam goh ding bangin, belamtalte keltalte bang maiin.
Shesak lak ahita ve: lei pumpi pahtawi sek matin a omta ve, namte lakah Babulon a segawm ve:
Babulon tuipiin a tumta, a kihawt thupi mahmah in a khuh khinta.
A khopi a segawptaa, gam keu, gamdai, mihing himhim ten louhna mihing ta kuamah phak louh gam a hongsakta.
Babulon bel ka gawt ding, a valh khitsa a kam a kipan a suah khe ding, namte bel a kiangah a luang khawm nawn kei ding uh, ahi Babulon kulhpi a chim ding.
Ka mite aw, a sunga kipan hong pawt unla, TOUPA hehna lauhuai mahmah akipan, mi chih a mau ki humbit chiat un.
Na lungtang uh bah kei hen, huai gama thuthang leng lau kei un; kum khatin thuthang ahong tung dinga, kum dangin thuthang a hong tung nawn sin ngala, kumpipa leh kumpipa kisualin gamah hiamgamna a om ding.
Huaijiakin, ngai un, nite a hongtung hi.
Babulon milim sektawmte tunga vai ka hawma, a gam pumpi a zumna ni ding; huan, a sungah a mi thahte a puk ding uh.
Huchiin lei leh van leh a sunga om tengtengin, Babulon tunga kipakin la a sa ding uh; mal akipan simmite a kiangah a tung ding uh ahi ngala, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Babulon in Israel mi thahte a puksak bangin Babulon ah gam chiha mi thahte a puk ding uh.
nou namsau pel mite aw, kuan unla, ding maimai kei un, gamla pia kipanin TOUPA thei gige unla, na lungsim uah Jerusalem lut hen.
Gensiatna thu ka jak jiak un ka zum ua, lungdon na in ka mai uh a tuam a, Toupa in a mun siangthoute ah pautheihlouh mite a honglutta ngal ua.
Huaijiakin ngai un, nite a hongtung hi, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi, a milim sek tawmte uh tunga vai ka hawmna ding leh a gam pumpi tunga mi liamte thumna ni ding ngei.
Babulon bel van sunin sang mahleh, a kulh sangte hihkip mahleh, a tungah ka kianga kipan hihsemi a hongtung himhim ding, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Babulon akipan kah husa leh Kaldai gam akipana siatna thupitak husa:
TOUPAN Babulon a sima, a husa uh thupi tak ahih daihsak hi.
A gamtat husa uh tui tampi ging hawhaw bang ahi, a awng juajua ua.
A tungah simmi a hongtung, Babulon ngei tungah, a mi hatte matin a om ua, a thalpeute uh a kitan gawpta, TOUPA bel thukna Pathian ahi ngala, a thuk ngeingei ding.
Huan, a heutute leh a mipilte, a ukpipate leh upate leh mi hatte ka khamsak ding; a lum den ding ua, a khanglou kei ding uh, chih, kumpipa, sepaihte TOUPA thu pawt ahi.
Sepaihte TOUPAN hichiin a chi: Babulon kumpipa kulh bang sah takte achim vek dinga, a kongpi sang takte a kang vek ding; a miten a thawnin a sem ua, namten mei ading lelin a kihihgim uh a na hi.
Juda kumpipa Zedekia lal kim linaa Babulon a hoh laia a kianga honsam, Serai Neria tapa, Maaseia tapa kianga Jawlnei Jeremia thupiak.
Serai bel kumpipa in sung heutupen ahia.
Huan, Jeremiain Babulon tunga siatna hongtung ding tengteng, Babulon tungtanga hiai thu gelh tengteng laibu ah agelh a.
Huan Jeremiain Seria kianga, Babulon na tun hun chiangin hiai thu tengteng sim ngeingei inla,
Aw TOUPA hiai nam tungtangah kuamah, mi leh sa leh, ten louhna ding suksiata omin, khantawn a kisegawp zo dingin thu na genta a, na chi ding.
Huan, hichi a honghi dinga, hiai laibu na sim khit chiangin suang toh gak khawmin Euphrates luiah pai lut inla,Babulon hichibang maiin a tum dinga, a tunga siatna ka hontut ding jiakin a thou nawn kei ding; a bah mahmah ding uh, chiin na gen ding ahi, a chi a.
Hichiteng Jeremia thu ahi.
Babulon hichibang maiin a tum dinga, a tunga siatna ka hontut ding jiakin a thou nawn kei ding; a bah mahmah ding uh, chiin na gen ding ahi, a chi a.
Hichiteng Jeremia thu ahi.
Zedekia bel a lal pattung laiin kum sawmnih leh kum khata upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawm leh kum khat a lala; a nu min Hamutal ahia, Libna khuaa Jeremia tanu ahi.
Huan, Jehoiakim hih bangbangin TOUPA mitmuhin thil gilou a hih hi.
TOUPA a heh mahmah jiakin Jerusalem leh Juda gamah a maa kipan a paih khiakna khopin thil a hontungtaa; Huchiin Zedekia Babulon kumpipa tungah a helta hi.
Huan, vai a hawm kum kuana ah hichi a honghia, kha sawmna, huai kha ni sawm niin Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar leh a sepaih hon tenteng Jerusalem dou dingin a hongkuan ua, buk a bawl khumta ua; a kim ah kulh a bawlta uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa Zedekia kum sawm leh khatna tanin khopi umin a omta hi.
Kha lina, huai kha ni kuana ah khopia kial a hongna mahmah taa, gam mipite adingin nekding mahmah a omta kei hi.
Huchiiin khopi kulh bang a sun vang ua, kidou mi tengteng a tai mang ua, kumpipa huana bang nih kikala kongpi pawtin, janin khopi akipan a taikhia ua; (Kaldai mite khopia om ahi uhi).
Himahleh Kaldan sepaihten kumpipa a delh ua, Jeriko phaizang ah Zedekia a pha ua, sepaih hon tengtengte a kiang akipan a dalh zak uh.
Huchiin Zedekia a man ua, Babulon kumpipa kiangah Hamath gama Riblah khua ah a paipihta ua; huan, aman a tungah vai a hawm a.
Huan, Babulon kumpipan Zedekia tapate a mitmuh ngeiin a thata; Riblah ah Juda heutu tengteng leng a that lai hi
Huan, Zedekia mit a khelkhiak saka, Babulon ah a paipihtaa; a sih ni tanin tan in ah a koih hi.
Huan, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kum sawm leh kuana, kha ngana, huai kha ni sawmna ah kumpipa vengpa pawl heutu, Babulon kumpipa maa ding sek, Nebuzaradan Jerusalem ah a hongluta.
Huan, TOUPA in leh kumpipa in a hala, Jesrusalem in tengteng toh, in thupi chitengte meiin a hal hi.
Huan, kaldai sepaih hon tengteng, kumpipa vengpa pawl heutu kianga omten Jerusalem kulhte a kimin a hihchim vek uh.
Huchiin vengpa pawl heutu Nebuzaradanin mipi laka genthei pawl pente khopia nutsiatte, Babulon kumpipa kianga kipesate leh mi khutsiam omsun tengtengte toh salin a pi vekta hi.
Himahleh vengpa pawl heutu Nebuzaradanin gama mi genthei pen khenkhatte grep huan kemmi leh vengmi dingin a nusia hi.
Huan, TOUPA ina dal khuamte leh a kingaknate, dal maiphiatkuang lian TOUPA inate Kaldai miten a hihtam gawp ua, dal tengteng Babulon ah a la uhi.
Belte leng, vutluah te, khawnvak mihsakna te, maiphiatkuangte, sikkeute, dal tuiumbelsuan tengteng a zat sekte uh a la vek uh.
Noute leng, meivu koih nate, maiphiatkuangte, belte, khawnvak koihnate, sikkeute leh belbulte; dangkaenga bawl huai dangkasikin vengmi pawl heutuin a la vek hi.
Khuam nih, dala bawl bawngtal sawm leh nih, maiphiatnakuang kingakna, kumpipa Solomonin TOUPA in adia a bawl, hiai tuiumbelsuan tengteng dal bel kikima teh ahi kei hi.
Huan, khuamte khuam khat san dan, tong sawm leh tong giat ahi-a, tong sawm leh tong nihin a kimvel zou phet ahi; a sah dan zung za delh ahia, a sung a hawm hi.
Huan, a tungah dal lu bawk a oma, a lu bawk san dan tong nga ahia, a lu bawk kimvelin dal ngena zep leh pomgranet ahia; khuam nih inleng hichimah bangin pomgranet a nei hi.
Huan, a sikah pomgranet sawmkua leh guk a oma, a kima a zepna pomgranet tengteng za khat ahi.
Huan, vengpa pawl heutuin siampu lian Serai leh siampu nihna, Zephani leh kongkhak ngakmi thumte a mana:
Huan, kidou mite tunga heutu dia seh leh mi sagih, kumpipa melmu sek mi, khopi-a omte leh sepaihheutu gelhmi, gam mite min kempa leh gam mipi laka mi sawmguk, khopi-a naomte khopi akipanin a pi khia hi.
Huan, Nebuzaradan, vengpa pawl heutuin amau a pia, Babulon kumpipa kiangah Riblah ah a hontuna.
Huan, Babulon kumpipan Hamath gama Riblah ah amau a bawleka, a hihlum vek hi.
Huchiin Juda nam a gam ua kipanin sala pi mangin a omta.
Hiaite Nebukadnezzarin mipi sala a pite ahi uh: kum sagihnaah Juda sangthum leh sawmnih leh thum;
Nebukadnezzat kum sawm leh giatnaah Jerusalem akipanin mi za giat leh sawmthum leh nih salin api,
Nebukadnezzar kum sawmnih leh kum thumna ah Nebuzaradan ventu pawl heutuin mi za sagih leh sawmli leh zaguk ahi uh.
Huan, Juda kumpipa Jehoiakin saltan kum sawmthum leh kum sagihna, a kha sawm leh kha nihna, huai kha ni sawmnih leh ni nga geihin hichi a honghia, Babulon kumpipa Evil-merodakin a vaihawm kum khatnaah, Juda kumpipa Jehoiakin lutang a dopkang saka, suangkulh akipan a pi khia;
A kiangah hoih takin a paua, Babulona a kianga om Kumpipate tutphah sanga sangin laltutphah a tun saka.
Huan a suangkulh puansilhte a kikhengsaka, a damsung ni tengteng a maah a nein a tata jel hi.Huan amah vakna ding a damsing ni tengteng, a sih ni tanin a ni teng tantuan Babulon kumpipain a pe gige hi.
Huan amah vakna ding a damsing ni tengteng, a sih ni tanin a ni teng tantuan Babulon kumpipain a pe gige hi.
Khopi mitea dim sek, bangchidana lungjuanga tu maimah ahia: bangchidana meithai banga hongom maimah ahia! namte laka thupi seka, bialte laka lalnu sek, bangchidana a mengsawm honghi ahia!
Janin nakpi takin a kapa, a khituite a biangah a om: a itte tengteng lakah amah nem ding kuamah a neikeia: a lawmte tengteng a tungah lepchiahtakin a gamta ua, a melmate a honghi uhi.
Gimthuakna jiak leh, saltanna thupi jiakin.
Juda saltannaah a paita hi; khovelmite lakah a tenga, tawldamna a mu kei: munkochik ahte amah sawite tengtengin a pha uh.
Kikhopna thupia kuamah a hongpai louh jiak un.
Zion lampiten a sun ua; a kongpite tengteng loihin a oma, a siampute a thum huthut uh: a nungak siangthoute gimthuakin a om ua, amah mah haksa thuakin a om hi.
A melmate lupen a hong hi a galte a lohching uh; a tatlekna tam luat jiakin Toupan lah amah gim a thuak sak ngala: gal maah a ta tuailaite saitanna ah a pai uh.
Huan Zion tate akipanin a letna tengteng a pai mangta; a lalte loupa hing mu lou zuktalte bang ahi ua, a delhmi maah hatna neilouin a pai uh.
A gimthuak ni leh a haksatniin Jerusalemin ni dang laia kipana om khinsa a thil nuamte tengteng a theigige: gal khuta a mite a puk lai un, amah kuamahin a panpih kei, galten amah a mu ua, a siatnaah a nuihsan uhi.
Nakpitakin Jerusalemin thil a hihkhiala; huaijiakin thil nin bangin a hongom hi: a vuaktanna a muh jiak un, amah zahtak sakten a musit ta uhi: ahi, a nak huthuta, nunglamah a kiheita hi.
A nitna a nik ah a oma; a beina na nung a theigige kei; huaijiakin lamdangtakin a hong kuma; lungmuang mi a neikei hi: ngaiin, Aw TOUPA, ka gimthuakna; melmapa lah kiliansak ngala.
Galin amahnu thil nuamte tengteng tungah a khut a jaka: a munsiangthou sungah khovelmi a honglut chih a mu ngala, huai tungtunga na kikhopna uah amau a honglut louh ding uh ahi chia thu na piak.
A mite tengteng a nak huthut ua, tanghou a zong ua; kha hihhalh dingin a thil nuamte uh sa khenna dingin a pia ua: Thei inla, Aw TOUPA, enin ka hong buah jiakin.
Nou dinga bangmah lou hi maw, nou honpai suaksante teng teng?
Ngai unla, en un, ka tunga hiha om ka lungkhamna bang lungkhamna himhim a om hiam? a heh mahmah laia TOUPAN a honhihgimna bang.
Tung sanga kipanin ka guhte ah mei a honsawla, amaute a zou a: ka khe adingin len a jaka, a honkinung lehheisan; segawp leh ni tuma bahin a honbawl ta hi.
Ka tatleknate hakkol a khuta khihin a om a; phial khawmin a om ua, ka ngawng jangah a hongtung ua; ka hatna a vuaksuak sak: amau ka dou zoh louhte, a khut uah TOUPAN kei a honpia a.
Ka laka ka mi hatte TOUPAN bangmahlouin a om sak; ka tangvalte mekgawpna dingin ka siatna dingin aman kikhoppi poimoh a sama: uain sukna bangin TOUPAN Juda tanu siangthou a sikdenta hi.
Hiai thilte jiakin ka kapa; ka mit, tuiin a tumaa; lungmuanding ka kha hihhalh ding lah keia kipan a gam la ngala; melma a vualzoh jiakin, ka tate lah amau kiaa nutsiatin a om uhi.
Zionin a khutte a jak khiaa; amah lungmuan ding kuamah a om kei uh; TOUPAN Jakob tungthu ah thu a piaa, huchia a kim vela omte a galte a honghihna ding un: Jerusalem a lak uah thil nin bangin a om hi.
Toupa a diktata: a thupiak lah ka helsan ngala; Ja un, ka hon ngen hi, nou mite tengteng, ka lungkhamna en un: ka nungaksiangthoute leh ka Tangvalte saltanna ah a pai uhi.
Ka itte ka sama, himahleh a honkhem uh: ka siampute leh ka upaten khopi sungah kha a khah uh, amau khate hihhalh dinga sa amau kizon ngalin.
Aw TOUPA, ngaiin; ka dah ngala; ka lungsim a mangbanga; ka sungah ka lungtang a kilumleta; nakpitakin lah ka helta ngala: polamah namsauin a thata, in ah sihna bang a om.
Ka thum aja ua: kuamah hongkhamuan ding a om kei uh; ka mangbatna ka melmate tengtengin aja ua, ahihjiakin a kipak uh: na phuan khiaksa ni na tun dinga, kei bang ahi ding uh.A gitlouhna tengtenguh na maah hongtung hen: ka tatlekna tengteng jiaka ka tung na hih bangin amau tungah leng hihin: ka thumna lah a tama, ka lungtang lah a bah ngala.
A gitlouhna tengtenguh na maah hongtung hen: ka tatlekna tengteng jiaka ka tung na hih bangin amau tungah leng hihin: ka thumna lah a tama, ka lungtang lah a bah ngala.
Bangchidana a hehna a TOUPAN Zion tanu meipia tuam ahia: Israel kilawmna van akipan leiah a paikhe ta a, a heh niin a khengakna a theigige kei hi.
Jakob tenna tengteng Toupana nawmvalha, a hehpih kei; a hehna ah Juda tanu kulh hatte a lai chima, lei toh a kilual in a koih hi; gam leh huaia lalte a hihninta.
A heh mahmah naah Israel ki tengteng a sat tan; melma maa kipan a khut taklam a la kikta: mei kuang, kimvel hul bei bangin Jakob a kang beita.
Melma bangin a thalpeu a laia, gal bangin a khut taklam toh a ding, mita dinga etnop huaite tengteng a that: Zion tanu puanin ah mei bangin a thangpaihna a sung bua hi.
TOUPA melma bang a hong hi, Israel a nawmvalh ta; a inpite tengteng a nawmvalh veka, a kulh muanhuaite a hihseta: Juda tanu ah sunna leh kahna a pungsak.
Huan hileh kilawm bangin, a biakbuk hiamgamtakin a la manga; a kikhopna mun a suseta: TOUPAN kikhawm thupi leh khawlni Zion ah mangngilhin a omsaka, a hehna thangpaihna in kumpipa leh siampu a musit hi.
TOUPAN a maitam a paimanga, a munsiangthou a kiha, ainpi kulhbangte melmate khutah a peta hi: kikhop thupi ni bangin TOUPA in sungah belam a bawl uh.
Zion tau kulhbang TOUPAN suksiat a tumta; khau a zana, suse lou dingin a khut ala kei hi: himahleh leichian leh kulhbang a kap saka; a kigawp tuaktuak uh.
A kongpite leiah a tum ua; a kalhna chiangte a hihsia a a kuaitan hi: dan om louhna namte lakah a kumpipa leh a lalte a om uh; ahi, a jawlneiten Toupa akipan meng a mu kei uh.
Zion tanu upate leitungah a tu ua, a pau kei uh; a lu jang ua leivui a khi ua; saiippuan a silh uhi: Jerusalem nungaksiangthouten lei lamah a lu uh a kun uh.
Khituiin a ka mitte a juaua, ka lungsim a mangbang, leitungah ka sin puak khiakin a oma, ka mite tanu siatna jiakin; khopi kongzingtea naupang tuailaite leh nawinelaite a sihbub jiak un.
A nute uh kiangah, Buhlehbal leh uain kaw om ahia? a chi ua.
Khopi kongzingte miliamte banga a sihbub lai un, a nute uh ang sunga a kha uh sun buaka a om laiin.
Na kiangah bang ka theisak dia?
Nang toh bang ka teh dia, Aw Jeursalem tanu?
Aw Zion tanu siangthou, kon lungmuang theihna ding in, nang toh bang ka kikim sak dia? na siatna lah tuipi bangin a thupi ngala: kuan nang a honhih dam thei dia?
Na jawlneiten bangmahlou leh haina nanga dingin mengmuhin a mu ua; na koltanna pi nawn dingin, na gitlouhna a mukhe kei uh: himahleh bangmahlou puakgik leh pimanga omna jiakte nang honmuh sak uh.
Honpai kheng tengtengin nang a khut a uh a honbet khum ua; Jerusalem tanu a tek khum ua; a lu uh a kun khum uh, hiai khopi miten kilawmna buching, lei tengtenga nuamsakna, a chih uh ahi maw? chiin.
Nang siatna dingin na melmate tengtengin a kam uh lianpiin a ka ua: hiai ni I ngakngak uh a himahmah hi; I mukhetaa, I muta uh.
TOUPAN a lunggel a hihtangtungta nidang laia a thu a piak a hihtangtunga; a paita, a hehpih kei: na tunga melma a kipak saka, na galte ki a tawisangta a.
TOUPA kiangah a lungtang a kikou a: Aw Zion tanu kulhbang, sun leh janin khitui luipi bangin luang suk sakin; khawl kipe kenla; na mit tang khawl sak ken.
Thou in, janin ki kouin, vente kipatnaah; TOUPA mai maah tui bangin na lungtang sung khiain; na ta tuailaite hinna adingin amah lamah na khutte lik touin. kong chiteng tunga gilkial jiak-a bah.
Aw TOUPA, en inla, ngaiin, hichibanga na hihna; numeiten a gah uh a ne ding uam, khuta oiha om naupangte?
TOUPA munsiangthou sungah siampu leh jawlnei thaha om ding uh hia?
Kongzingte ah leitungah tuailaite leh putek a um ua; namsauin ka nungaksiangthoute leh ka Tangvalte a puk uh: na heh niin amaute na thata; na thata, na hehpih kei.Kikhawmpi thupi lai bangin, mun cihah ka launate na sama, TOUPA heh niin kuamah suakta hiam, om hiam a om kei uh: huai ka donteia ka khoilette lah ka melmain a gaita hi.
Kikhawmpi thupi lai bangin, mun cihah ka launate na sama, TOUPA heh niin kuamah suakta hiam, om hiam a om kei uh: huai ka donteia ka khoilette lah ka melmain a gaita hi.
A hehna chianga gimthuakna mu mipa ka hi.
Khovak ah hilouin khovela aman a honpi a, a honvak sak.
Ni tumtumin ka siatna dingin a khut a hei ahei petmah hi.
Ka sa leh ka vun a upa saka; ka guhte a kitansak.
Ka siatna dingin a lama, khatna leh nauveinain a honum suak hia.
Sawtpia sisate bangin, mun mialte ah a honteng saka.
Ka pawt khiak theihlouhna dingin, ka kimvelin dai a kaia, ka khainiang a gik hi.
A hi, ka kaha, panpihna ka nget laiin, ka thumna a daltan.
Suang sekin ka lampite dai a kaitou peka, ka lam zuihte a kawisak hi.
Kei dingin amah vompi mibuk bang, mun guka humpinelkai bang ahi.
Ka lampite a kaiheia, a honbot nena; a hon bawlgawp hi.
A thalpeu a laia, a thal adia ngimding bangin kei a honbawl.
A thalbawma thalte ka sisan guijamah a lut saka.
Ka mite tengteng nuihsat ka honghia; ni tumtuma a la uh.
Hehnain a hondim sak ua, gamsaiin a honvak.
Suang tangin ka hate leng a kitamsak a, vutin a hontuam hi.
Muanna akipan gamla piah ka kha na suana; hauhsakna ka mangngilhta.
Ka hatna a manga, TOUPA akipan ka lametna, ka chi a.
Ka gimthuakna leh ka haksatna, gamsai leh khatna theigigein.
Ka khain amaute a theigige lailaia ka sungah a kun ngiungiau hi.
Hiai ka thei thaka, huaijiakin lametna ka nei.
TOUPA chitnate jiak ahi hihmanga i om louhna uh, lainatnate a juau ngei louh jiakin.
Jingsang tengin a thak jel ua; na ginomna a thupi.
TOUPA ka tantuan ahi, ka khain a chi; huaijiakin amah lametna ka nei ding.
Amah ngakte kiangah TOUPA a hoih, amah zong mi tungah.
Min TOUPA hotdamna a lameta a ngak vengveng a hoih hi.
Min a tuailaia hakkol a puak amaha dingin a hoih ahi.
Amah tunga a ngaktak jiakin, tangtut henla, dai sipsip hen.
Leivui ah a kam koih hen; huchia lametna a om theihna dingin.
Amah bengpa kiangah a biang doh hen; kounain amah dim vum hen.
TOUPAN lah khantawnin a delh kei dinga.
Dahna suak sak mahleh, a chitna tamdan dungjuiin lainatna a nei ding ahi ngala.
Kilawptakin mite tate a hihgim hiam a lungkham sak lah ahi ngal kei a.
Leia suangkulh tangte tengteng khenuai sik kham ding.
Tungnung Pen mai maa mihing thuneihna kai hei ding.
A thu mihing bawlsiat, TOUPAN pha a sa kei.
TOUPAN thu a piak louhin, hichi a honghi, chi kua ahia?
Tungnung Pen kama kipanin hoih lou leh hoih a hongpai kei maw/
Bangdinga mihing, a khelhna gawtna a dinga mi, phun ahia?
I lampite zongin enchain ni, TOUPA lamah kik nawn ni.
Vantea Pathian kiangah I lungtang uh I khutte uh lik tou ni:
Ka tatlek ua ka hel uh; na ngaidam kei hi.
Hehnain na khuha kou non delha; na thata, na hehpih kei.
Meipiin na kituama, huchia ka thumnain a pailet louhna dingin.
Mite lakah deihlouh leh ninneng bangin na honbawla.
Ka siatna dingin ka melmate tengteng un a kam uh lianpiin a ka uh.
Launa leh kokhuk ka tunguah a hongtunga, siatgawpna leh siatna.
Ka mite tanu suksiatna jiakin, ka mit tuiin a tum hi.
Khawllouin, ka mitin a buaka, a khawl kei hi.
Vana kipana TOUPAN a et suka, muh ma tan
Ka khopi tanute tengteng jiakin ka mitin ka kha a dah sak.
Vasa bangin hondelh bah ua, ajiak beia ka melma hiten.
Leikohawm sungah ka hinna a sat tat ua, ka tungah suang a khia uh.
Ka lutung ah tuite a luanga; sat khiakin ka om, ka chi hi.
Aw TOUPA, leikohawm niampen akipanin, na min ka sam hi.
Ka aw na jaa; ka kahna ah, ka nakna ah na bil sel ken.
Nang ka honsap niin nong pai naia: Lau ken, na chi hi.
Aw TOUPA, ka kha thu na hon gen saka; ka hinna na tanta.
Aw TOUPA, ka diklouhna na mu a, ka thu ngaihtuahin.
Ka tunga a phulakna tengteng uh leh a thusawm tengteng uh na muta hi.
A kouna uh na jaa, Aw TOUPA, ka siatna dinga a thusawm tengteng uh;
Ka siatna dinga ding te mukte leh, ni tumtuma ka siatna dinga a ngaihtuahna uh.
a tu uh leh a din touh uh nang enin; a la uh ka hi.
Aw TOUPA, a khut nasep uh dungjuiin, amau tungah thukna na pe ding hi.
Lungtang sakna amau na pe ding a, a tung ua na hamsia.Hehin amau na delh dinga TOUPA vante nuaia kipan amaute na hihgawp ding.
Hehin amau na delh dinga TOUPA vante nuaia kipan amaute na hihgawp ding.
Bangchidana dangkaeng mial ahia! bangchidana dangkaeng siangthou penpen lamdangta ahia!
Kongzing chiteng tungah munsiangthou suangte sunkhiak ahi.
Zion tapa manphate, dangkaeng hoih toh tehpih theih, bangchidana leibel, belvelmi khutnasepbanga ngaih hita ahia!
Sehalte nasanin a nawi uh a suah ua, ata tuailaite uh a tepsak uh: ka mite tanu jaw honggiloua, gamdai vasa mulneilou bangin.
Nawitep lai naupang lai dangtak jiakin a kam dangtawngah a belha: naupang tuailaiten tanghou a ngen ua, amah dingin kuamahin a balkham kei uh.
Nuam taka nete kongzing khawngah a mangthang uh: puansandupa khanglianten ekvut a kawi uh.
Ka mite tanu gitlouhna lah Sodom khelhna sangin a thupizo ngala, huai bel mitphiat kallouin a kizoua, amah tungah khut a kinga kei hi.
A miliante vuk sangin a siangthou jaw ua, nawitui sangin a ngou jaw uh, suangmantam sandup sangin a pumpi uah a sandup jaw ua, a tetna uh a saphir suangmantam bang ahi:
A mel uh suangkuangthei sangin a vom jaw a: kongzingtea theihin a om kei uh: a vun uh a guh uah a belh bikbeka; a keua, chiangkang a bang.
Namsaua thaha om dingte kiala thaha om dingte sangina hoihjaw uh; gama gahte duh jiakin hiaite lah a gawng gawp un, nakpiin a se khin uh.
Hehpihthei numei khutten amau tate a huan ua, ka mite tanu hihsiatna ah a an uh ahi.
TOUPAN a thangpaihna a hihpichingta, a hehna mahmah a sung khiaa; Zion ah mei a toha, huaiin huaia suangphumte a suse vek hi.
Leia kumpipaten a um kei ua, khovel a tengtengin leng, Jerusalem kongpi sungah gal leh melma a lut ding uh chih.
A jawlneite khelhna jiak leh a siampute ginatlouhna jiak ahi, huchibanga a lak taka midikte sisan suah a a om.
Mitto mite bangin kongzing khawngah a vakvai ua, sisana suknitin a om ua, huchiin miten a puante uh a lawng kei uh.
Pai mang un, Nin! pai mang un, pai mang un, lawng kei un, chiin amau a kikou khum ua: a tai mang ua, a vialvak lai un, miten namte lakah, hiai ah a om nawn kei ding uh, a chi uh.
TOUPA hehnain amaute a hawmjaka; amaute a limsak nawnta kei ding: siampute mina a zahtak kei ua, upate a deihsak kei uh.
I mitte I panpihna juau sosan lametna ah a vaikhina: I ngakna uah nam hondam theilou ding I na ngak ta ua.
I kongzingte ua i pai theih louhna dingin, I kalsuante a zong ua: I tawp uh a naia, I nite a kimta: I tawp uh lah a hongtungta.
Vana muvanlaite sangin ei hondelhte a man-gangjaw uh: mual tungahte a hon delh ua, gamdaiah a honna buak uh.
I nakvangte hu, TOUPA thaunilh, a kokhuk ua lakin a om ua; amah thu genin.
Alim nuaia namte lakah hing ding, I chi ua.
Nuamsa inla kipakin Aw Edom tanu.
Uz gama teng: nou lah nang phain leng a hongpai suak ding; na kham dinga vuaktangin na kibawl ding.Aw zion tanu, na thulimlouhna gawtna zoh a hita; saltanna ah nang a honpi mang nawnta kei ding: na thulimlouhna a hongveh ding, Aw Edom tanu; na khelhnate a mukhe dinghi
Aw zion tanu, na thulimlouhna gawtna zoh a hita; saltanna ah nang a honpi mang nawnta kei ding: na thulimlouhna a hongveh ding, Aw Edom tanu; na khelhnate a mukhe dinghi
Theigigein, Aw TOUPA, ka tung ua hongtung: a honkouna uh en inla, muin.
Ka gouluah uh mikhualte lama heiiin a oma, ka inte uh gamdangmite lamah.
Tagah leh pabei ka hi ua, ka nute uh meithaite bang ahi uh.
sum jiakin ka tui uh kadawnkhin ua; ka singte uh kou laka juakin a om hi.
A hondelhte ka ngawng jang uah a om ua, ka bah ua, khawlna ka neikei uh.
Aiguptate kiang leh, Assuriate kiangah, Tanghoua lungkimna dingin ka kipia uh.
Ka pipute uh a nakhial ua, aom kei uh; a gitlouhna uh kou ka pua uh.
Sikhaten ka tunguah vai a hawm ua: a khut ua kipana kou hon tankhe ding kuamah a om kei uh.
Ka hinna uh lauthawnna toh ka tanghou uh ka mu ua gamdai namsau jiakin.
Thuk bangin ka vun uh a voma nakpitaka kialna jiakin.
Ziona numeite a sual ua, Juda khopitea nungakte.
A khut un lalte khailupin a om ua, upate maite zahtakin a om kei hi.
Tangvalten khawl a pua ua, naupang te singnuaiah a kisui uh.
Kongpi akipan upate a khawl ua, a lasakna ua kipanin Tangvalte a khawl uh.
Ka lungtang kipahna uh a tawpa; ka lamnauh dahna a suak hi.
Ka lu ua kipan ka lallukhu uh a kiaa, ka tung uh a gik hi! ka khelh jiakun.
Hiai jiakin ka lungtang uh a baha; hiai thilte jiakin ka mitte uh a miala;
Suksiatna om, Zion mual jiakin; sehalte a tungah a vak uh.
Aw TOUPA, nang khantawnin na om gige; na laltutphah khang khata kipanin khang khat tanin a om hi.
Bangdinga khantawna kou honmanngilha, hichi tantan honnungngatsan na hia?
Nang lam hon ngasakin, Aw TOUPA huchiin bawlhoih nawnin ka om ding uh; nidang lai bangin ka nite uh thaksakin.Ahihkeileh non nialkhe hilhiala hia?
Ka tunguah na heh lomahmaha hia?
Ahihkeileh non nialkhe hilhiala hia?
Ka tunguah na heh lomahmaha hia?
Huan kum sawmthumna, kha lina, huai kha ni ngana ah Kebar luia saltangte laka ka om laiin hichi a hong hia, van a kihonga, Pathian kilaknate ka mu hi,
Huai kha ni ngana ah, huai bel kumpipa Jehoiakin saltan kum ngana, ahi a;
Kaldai gama Kebar lui ah, Buzi tapa siampu Ezekiel kiangah TOUPA thu a hongtunga; huaiah TOUPA khut a tungah a om hi.
Huan ka ena, ngaiin, mallam akipan huihpi thupi mahmah a hongkuana, meipi a sahasah, kuang zoizoi, a kim tengteng tanvak puappuap a sung mei lai takah sik-am banga am a om hi.
Huan huai lai akipanin thilhing li kibatpih a hongpawt khia ua, a kimuhdan uh hichibang ahi: mihing batna a nei uh.
Mai li a nei chiat ua, kha li a nei chiat nawn uh.
Huan a khete uh a tang ahia a; a khepek nuai lam uh bawngnou khepek bang ahi a; huan dalte mahmah bangin a vak khe jualjual jel uhi.
Huan a pang lite ua a kha nuai uah mihing khut bang a nei ua: huchiin a li un a mel u leh a khate uh hichi bangin a pu uhi;
A khate uh a kizom a; a pai un leng a kihei ngei kei ua, a majawn ua a pai ahi jel chiat uh.
A mel un a kibatpihte mihing mel bang ahi a, a li un a taklam pang uah humpinelkai mel a pu ua, a li un a veilam panguah bawngtal mel, bang a pu ua, ali un muvanlai mel bang a pu nawn ua, a mel uh huchibang ahi hi;
Huan a khate uh a jak khia ua, a kha nihte un a kijak zom chiat ua, nihin a pumpi uh a khuh uh,
Ma lamsangin a pai chiat ua, kha painalam ding ah a pai ua, a pai un leng a kihei ngei kei uh.
Thilhingte lakah suangkuangthei ampha bang, meisel bang mai asuk leh atouin a pai a; mei bel a ampha mahmaha, mei akipanin khopia a hongsuak khe jualjual hi.
Huan thilhingte khophe jualjual bangin a vial taita uhi.
Huan thil hingte ka et laiin, ngaiin, thil hingte jul ah a mel lite uh adingin leiah kangtalai khe khat jel ka mu a.
Kangtalai khe leh a tat vel dan berul suang jia bang maiin a langa, a li un latdan khat a nei ua, a lat dan uh leh a tat vel dan uh kangtalai khe khat sunga kangtalai khe dang om bang ahi hi.
A pai chiang un sik liin a pai thei ua, a pai un leng a kihei ngei kei uh.
A kangtalai khe kual lah sang tak leh mulkimhuaitak ahia; a li un kual, mita dim tetup mai a nei uhi.
Huan thilhingte a pai chiang un a jul uah kangtalai khete a pai tei sek uh: huan thil hingte lei akipan dopkanga a om uleh kangtalai khete leng dopkangin a om tei sek uhi.
Kha paina ding lam peuhmah ah a pai ua; huai lamah kha a pai ding ahi hi; huan, kangtalai khete a jul uah dopkangin a om ua, thilhing kha kangtalai khete ah lah a om ngala.
Huaite a pai chiang un hiaite a pai uhi: huaite a din chiang un hiaite a ding ua: huaite leia kipana dopkanga a om chiang un kangtalai khete amau julah dopkangin a om ua, thilhingte kha kangtalai khete ah lah a om ngala.
Huan thil hingte lu tungah van kibatpih a oma, kristal vak banga te mulkimhuai tak a lu tunguah a kiphalh zeizoi mai hi.
Huan van dim nuaiah a kha uh a kop khat thil hing dangte sunin a jak ua, a kha uh kop khat nawnin a pumpi uh a khuh uhi.
Huan a len uleh a kha ging uh tui tampi mahmah ging bang, Bangkimhihtheipa aw bang mai, mipi ging vengvung husa, sepaih hon husa bang maiin ka jaa; a din uleh a kha uh a kaisak uhi.
Huan lu tung ua van dum tungah aw a hongoma, a din uleh a kha uh a kaisak uhi.
Huan a lu tung ua van dum tungah laltutphah bang mahmah, saphir suang bang maia kimu a oma: huan laltutphah bang tak tungah mihing bang taka kilang a om hi.
Huan a kawng chiang tunglam khina jia bang maiin ka mua, a kawng hi leh kilawm chiang nuai lam mei bang mai hiin ka mu a, a vak kimvel lelaw hi.Vuah zuk nia meipi tunga sakhituihup lat dan bang tak a kima vak latdan ahi a.
Hiai TOUPA thupina latdan bang ahi.
Huan ka muhin kakhuppuka, thugenpa aw ka ja hi.
Vuah zuk nia meipi tunga sakhituihup lat dan bang tak a kima vak latdan ahi a.
Hiai TOUPA thupina latdan bang ahi.
Huan ka muhin kakhuppuka, thugenpa aw ka ja hi.
Huan ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, na khein dingin na kiangah thu ka gen sin hi, a chi a.
Huan ka kianga thu a gen laiin kha keiah a hongluta, ka khein a honding saka, huan kei honhoupihpa ka ngaikhia hi.
Huan ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, Israel tate kiangah, helhat nam, ka tunga hel sekte kiangah ka honsawl hi: amau leh a pipute un leng hiai ni pha nangawnin ka tungah a talek sek uhi.
Suan paupeng leh genhakte ahi ua, a kiang uah nang ka honsawl hi; huan, a kiang uah, TOUPA Pathianin hichiin a chi, na chi ding ahi.
Huan amau a ngaikhia uhiam, a ngaikhe kei uhiam (helhat lah a hingal ua), a lak uah jawlnei a om chih a theigige ding uhi.
Huan nang, mihing tapa, amaute kihta kenla, a thu uah leng lunglel sam ken, na kiangah khaulingnei leh loulingneite omin, aikam laka teng himah lechin: helhat mi hi mah le uh, a thu uh kihta kenla, a latdan uah leng lunglel sam ken.
Huan a ngaikhia uhiam, a ngaikhe kei uhiam, a kiang uah ka thu na gen ding ahi: helhat tak lah ahi ngal ua.
Himahleh nang mihing tapa, na kianga ka gen ngaikhia in; mi helhatte bangin helhat hi tei ken: na kam ka inla, ka honpiak ne in, a chi a.
Huan ka ena ngaiin, khutin a honsawka, huan ngaiin huaiah laibu jial a oma;Ka maah a phalha, a sunglam leh a polam gelh ahi; khanate, lusunna te tunggikna te gelhna a om hi.
Ka maah a phalha, a sunglam leh a polam gelh ahi; khanate, lusunna te tunggikna te gelhna a om hi.
Huan ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, na muh ne in; laibu jial ne inla, Israel inkote kiangah thu vagen in, achi a
Huchiin ka kam ka kaa, laibu jial a honne sakta hi.
Huan aman ka kiangah Mihing tapa, na gil ah pai inla, hiai laibu jial ka honpiakin na gilsung hihdim in, a chi a.
Huchiin ka netaa, a khumdan ka kamah khuaiju bang mai ahi hi.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Mihing tapa kuan inla, Israel inkote kiangah ka thute zangin vagen in.
Pau tuam leh pau haksa te kianga sawl na hi zo ngala;
Nam pau chi tuamtuam leh pau haksa mahmah a thu uh na theih theihlouhte kianga sawt na hi kei hi.
A kiang ua nang ka honsawlin pellouin na thu a ngaikhe mahmah dinguh.
Himahleh Israel inkoten a honngaikhe kei ding ua, kei lah honngaikhe sin ngal kei ua, Israel inkote tengteng lah taltang tak leh lungtang genhak mahmah ahi ngal ua,
Huan ngaiin, na mai amau mai lakah khauh takin, na taltang leng amau taltang lak atak takin ka honbawl hi.
Suang tak mahmah, meisuang sanga takin na tal ka bawla, lau kenla, a miet uah lunglel sam ken, helhat mi hi mah le uh, a chi a.
Huailou leng ka kiangah Mihing tapa, na kianga ka thugen ding tengteng na bilin ngaikhia inla, na lungtang ah khum in.
Huan kuan inla, na chipih saltangte kiang vatung inla; na ngaikhia uhiam, a ngaikhe kei uhiam.
Hichibang TOUPA thu pawt ahi hi, chiin gen inla, hilh in, a chi a.
Huchiin khain a hondomkangtaa, huan amuna kipana TOUPAN thupina a dinkhiak laiin, ka nunglamah jinling thawm ka ja hi;
Huai tuh thilhingte kha kisukha leh a kiangua kangtalai pei te, jinling thawm bang nei ahi uhi.
Huchiin khain a hontawi kanga, a honla mangtaa: heh mahmah leh utlou pipiin ka kuantaa, TOUPA khut lah ka tungah a hat ngala.
Huchiin, Telabiba saltang te, Kebar luia tengte kiang ka vatunga, a tutna uah ka tua; lamdanga sa takin huaiah ni sagih ka tuta hi.
Huan ni sagih beiin hichi ahi a, TOUPA thu ka kiang a hongtung a,
Mihing tapa, Israel inkote vilpain nang ka honsep ahi; huchiin ka kama thu na za dinga, kei sikin amau vauna na pe ding hi,
Mi gilou kianga ka thu, Na si mahmah ding ahi, ka chiha, huai mi gilou a hinna hum dinga a gitlouhna lampi paisan dinga vauna na neih louha, vauna thu leng na hilh sam louha, huai mi gitlouhnaa a sih leh a sisan moh nang lakah kon sik ngeingei ding hi.
Himahleh huai mi gilou na vaua, a gitlouhna a pai san louha, a gitlouhna lampi a lehngatsan sam kei leh a gitlouhna ah a si dinga, nang bel na hinna na humbit ahi zo ding hi.
Huan mi diktatin a diktatna lehngat sana gitlouhna a hiha, a ma a pukna ka koih a leh, a si ding: vauna na neih louh jiakin a khelhnaah a si dinga; a thil diktat hihsat theihgige ahi kei ding; a sisan moh ahihleh na laka kon sik ding hi.
Himahleh mi diktat khial lou dinga na vaua a khelh kei leh vauna a khawksak jiakin a hing ding; nang leng na hinna na humbit ding hi, achia.
Huan huaiah TOUPA khut ka tungah a oma, ka kiangah, Thou inla, phaijangah pai inla, huaiah ka honhoupih ding, a chi a.
Huchiin ka thoua, phaijangah ka paita hi.
Huan ngaiin, huaiah TOUPA thupina, Kebar luia ka muh thupina bang maiin a hongdinga, kei a khupin ka pukta hi.
Huchiin, keiah kha a hongluta, ka khein a honding saka, a honhoupiha, Pai inla, na inah kikhak khum in.
Nang jaw, mihing tapa, khauhualin a honkhih ding ua, ahon gak ding ua, a lak uah na pawt khe nawn kei ding.
Na lei na dangtawngah ka belhsak dinga, n apau nawn kei dinga, amaute salpa na hi nawn kei ding, helhat inkuan ahi ngal ua.Himahleh na kianga thu ka gen hun chiangin na kam ka honka sak dinga, a kianguah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi hi: A ngaikhiain ngaikhia henla, a ngaikhe louin ngaikhe kei mai heh, helhat innkuan lah ahi ngal ua, a chi hi, chiin na gen ding ahi.
Himahleh na kianga thu ka gen hun chiangin na kam ka honka sak dinga, a kianguah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi hi: A ngaikhiain ngaikhia henla, a ngaikhe louin ngaikhe kei mai heh, helhat innkuan lah ahi ngal ua, a chi hi, chiin na gen ding ahi.
Nang mihing tapa, teklei pek la inla, na maah koih in, huai tungah khopi Jerusalem khopi lim bawl in.
Huan a kima umin kulh khoh khum inla, mual pawng bawl khumin sepaih giahbukte bawl khum inla, kulh suk siatnate a kimin bawl khumin.
Huan nang sikpek la inla, nang mah leh khopi kikalah sik bang dingin tungin; huai lam masuan inla, umin a omdinga, nangmahin na um ding ahi.
Huai Israel inkote adia etsak kholhna ahi ding.
Huan nang bel na veilam pang delhin lum inla, a tungah Israel inkote gitlouhna nga in; a tunga nalup sung ni zah bang jel a gitlouhna uh n apuak ahi ding hi.
A gitlouhna kumte uh nanga dinga nite hi dingin lah ka septa ngala, ni za thum leh ni sawmkua ding: Huchibangin Israel inkote gitlouhna na po ding ahi.
Huan hiaite na khit hun chiangin na taklam pang delhin na lum leuleu dia, Juda inkote gitlouhna na po ding: ni sawmli nang din ka sepa, ni khat kum khat jel hi dingin.
Ban lem bebotin Jerusalem um lam nga inla, a tungthu gen khia in.
Huan ngaiin, khauhualin ka honkhuha, na um ni na khit masiah koi lamah leng na kihei ding ahi kei hi.
Buh te, buhman te, be te, behiang te, vai buhman te la inla, bel khatah koih inla, tanghouin bawlin; na pangkhat delha na lup sung teng, ni za thum leh saawmkua sung, huai tuh na ne ding ahi.
Na ann nek ding teh vek ding ahi, nikhatin shekel sawmnih ahi ding ahi: hunbi nei takin na ne ding hi.
Huan tuite leng teh vekin na dawn ding ahi, hin khat seh guk suaha seh khat ahi ding ahi, hunbi nei takin na dawn ding ahi.
Huan a mit muh ngei un mihing ek toh na kang dinga, buhman tanghou nekin na ne ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPAN, Hichibang an thanghuai Israel taten ka delh mang na ding namte lakah a ne ding uh, a chi a.
Huan ken.
A!
TOUPA PATHIAN, Ngai dih, ka hin hihnit ahi ngei keia, ka tuailai akipan tutanin leng, amah siha si hiam, gamsa keih hiam lah ka ne ngei nai ngal keia, sa kihhuai ka kamah leng a lut ngei nai sam kei hi, ka chi a.
Huan aman ka kiangah En in mihing ek sikin bawng ek ka hon pia, nek dingte hiaitein na bawl ding hi, a chi a.
Huailou leng ka kiangah, aman, Mihing tapa, ngai dih, Jerusalem ah, an hinna bul ka hihse dinga, a ann uh teh vekin lauthawng takin a nei ding uh; tui leng teh vekin, lungkhamtakin a dawn ding uh;An te, tui te tasama, lungkhamtaka ki-entuaha, a gitlouhna ua a thammang khitna ding un.
An te, tui te tasama, lungkhamtaka ki-entuaha, a gitlouhna ua a thammang khitna ding un.
Huan, nang mihing tapa, namsau hiam mahmah la inla, n alu leh na khamul metna dingin lumetmi temin zang in; huan bukna la inla, sam khen in.
Seh thuma khena seh khat uma a om sung nite a bei hun chiangin khopi laia meiah na khul ding ahi a, sehthuma khena seh khat nawn na la dia, a kimah nam sauin na sat nen ding ahi; huan, seh thuma khena seh khat nawn huih mutleng dingin na theh jak ding ahi, ken namsauin ka delh jui ding.
Huan tawmchik na la dia, na puannaktual mongah na tun ding ahi.
Huan hiaiate na la dinga, meiah na theh lut ding ahi, a kang ding; huai akipanin Israel inkote tengteng ah mei a hongpawt ding, a chi a.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Hiai Jerusalem khua ahi: namte lakah ka koiha, a kimah gamte a om hi.
Huan namte sang nakpi jawn gitlouhna hihin ka thugel tungah a hela, a kima gamte sanga thupiin, ka dan bawl tungahte leng a hel ahi.
Ka thugelte lah a pai khe ngala, ka dan bawlte banga leng a om sam kei hi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Na kima namte sanga buai hatjawin na oma, ka dan bawl bangin na om keia, ka thugelte leng na jui sam kei ua, namte adia ka thusehte na hih sam louh jiak un, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi:
Ngai un, kei nasanin leng ka honnang ahi, namte mitmuh ngeiin na lak uah vaihawmna ka tangtungsak sin hi;
Huan na kihhuaina tengtengte uh jiakin thil ka hih ngei nai louh, hih leng ka hih ngei nawn louh ding na tunguah ka hih sin hi.
Huchiin paten na sungah a tate uh a ne ding ua, taten leng a pate uh a ne ding uh; nanga mi om sun tengteng ka dalhsak vek ding.
Huchiin hiai TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi: Na nitna leh na kihhuainatea ka biakin na hihnit jiakin, a hina ka hin laiteng, ka honkiam sak dinga, ka mitin a honmaih het kei dinga, ka honhehpih sam kei ding hi.
Seh thuma khena seh khat hiin hiam, kialin hiam na lak uah a si ding uh; seh thuma khena seh khat nawn ka hihdalh dinga, namsauin ka delhjui ding.
Hichibangin ka hehna ka tangtung sak dinga, a tunguah ka hehna ka lungdam sak dinga, ka om nuamta ding hi: huan kei TOUPAN a tung ua ka hehna ka lungdam sak hun chiangin phatuam ngaitakin ka genta chih a thei khe ding uh.
Huailouin, na kima namte lakah leh vialvak tengtengte mitmuhin kho segawp leh simmohhuaiin ka honbawl ding hi.
Huchiin, thangpai tak leh heh mahmaha, nakpia taihilha, na tung thugelte ka tunsak hunin na kima namte mitmuhin nuihsat leh kouna leh hilhna leh mulkimhuai na hi ding: Kei TOUPAN ka chi ta hi:
A tunguah kialna thaltang hoih lou tak manna ding, noumau manna ding ka honke sak ding; na tunguah kialna ka uang sak dinga, na an uh, hinna bul ka hihse ding hi.Huan na tunguah kialna leh gamsa hangte ka honsawl dinga, talenau tanin a honlaksak ding uhi; huan hipi leh sisan suahna na lak uah a leng ding; huan na tunguah namsau ka hon lek dinga, ken ka chita hi, chiin.
Huan na tunguah kialna leh gamsa hangte ka honsawl dinga, talenau tanin a honlaksak ding uhi; huan hipi leh sisan suahna na lak uah a leng ding; huan na tunguah namsau ka hon lek dinga, ken ka chita hi, chiin.
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, Israel tang lam nga inla, a kiang uah thu gen inla, Israel tangte aw, TOUPA PATHIAN thu ngaikhia un;
TOUPA PATHIANIN tangte leh mualte kiangah leh guamte leh kuamte kiangah hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai un, kei, keimah mahin na tunguah namsau ka honlik dinga, na mun sangte uh ka hihse vek sin ahi.
Na maitamte uh a segawp dinga, na ni Pathian limte uh a kitam jan ding: huan, na mi thah luangte uh na milimte uh maah ka pai ding.
Huan Israel tate luang a milimte uh maah ka koih dinga, na guhte uh na maitam kim uah ka theh jak ding.
Na tenna mun tengteng uah khopi a se dinga, mun sangte a segawp ding; na maitamte uh hihsiat leh hihgawp a hih theihna ding un leh na milimte uh a kitap nena, a man theihna dingin leh na ni Pathian limte uh phuk paiha a om theihna ding un, na nasepte uh aman theihna dingin.
Huan mi thahte na lak uah a puk dingua, huchiin TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Himahleh gam chiha na dalhjak hun chiang un namte lakah namsau pelte a om ding jiak un a khen ka honhawi ding.
Huan nalak ua kipana pawtten sala a pina namte uh lakah kei a hontheigige ding ua, a angkawmna lungtang uh ka lak mangsak leh a mit uh, a milim lam ua angkawmte ka hihsiat sakdante a thei ding uh: huan, thil gilou a nahih jiak uleh a kihhuai jiakun amau mitmuh ngeiin leng kihhuai akisa ding uh.
Huan TOUPA ka hi chih a thei dingua, hiai thil hoihlou a kiang uah ka hih dinga, a mawkin ka chi kei chih a thei ding uh, chiin, a chi a.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi a: Na khut bengin n akhe pek inla, Maijen!
Israel inkote kihhuaina gitlouh jiak maw!
Namsauin, kialin, hipiin a puk sin ngal ua.
Gamla pia om hipiin a si ding ua, anaia om namsauin a puk ding ua, a val, uma omte kialin a si samsam ding uh; hichibangin ka heh mahmahna a tunguah k alungdam sak ding hi.
Huan tang sangte ah, mualvum tengtengte ah leh sing hing peuhmah nuaiah leh toso bawkpha chih nuaia a milimte uh kianga gimlim a latna mun ua a maitam kim ua a milimte uh laka a misi luangte uh a om hun chiangin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.Huan a tunguah ka khut ka lik dinga, gamdai akipana Diblah lama a tenna mun tengteng uah gam ka hihsiain ka hihgawp vek ding; huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
Huan a tunguah ka khut ka lik dinga, gamdai akipana Diblah lama a tenna mun tengteng uah gam ka hihsiain ka hihgawp vek ding; huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna
Nang mihing tapa, TOUPA PATHIANIN Israel gam kiangah hichiin a chi ahi: Tawpna, tawpna gam ning liah a hongtung hi.
Tu nang adingin tawpna ahi, na tungah ka hehna ka hontungsak dinga, na omdan bangjelin vai ka hon hawmsak dinga, na kihhuaina tengteng na tungah ka hontung ding.
Huan, ka mitin a honmaih kei dia, ka honhehpih sam kei ding hi: na omdante na tungah ka hontun zo dinga, huan, TOUPA ka hi chih naa thei ding uh,
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi hi: Siatna, siatna petmah, ngai dih, a hongtung hi.
Tawpna a hongtung hi, tawpna a hongtung hi, na tungah a hongthou ta, ngai in, a hongtung hi.
Aw gam luahpa, na siatna ding na tungah a hongtung hi, hun a hongtung hi, ni a naita hi; buaina, kipaka tang tunga kikouna ni hi lou.
Tuin ka hehna na tungah ka honbuak zok ding hi, na tungah ka hehna ka lungdam sak dinga; na omdan bang jelin ka honvaihawmsak ding hi; na kihhuaina tengteng na tungah ka hontun ding hi.
Huan ka mitin a honmaih kei dia, ka hon hehpih sam kei ding: na omdan bangjelin na tungah ka hontun dinga, na kihhuaina leng na lak uah a om ding: huchiin kei TOUPA gawt thei ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Ngai in, ni ngai in, a hongtung hi, na siatna ding a pawtta, chiang a pakta, kisaktheihna a pakmumta hi.
Hiamgamna gitlouhna chiang a suakta ahi; a kuamahmah a omta kei dinga, a husa, uhiam a hauhsakna uhiam leng: kuamah in a it sam kei ding uh.
Hun a hongtungta, ni a hongnai ta: a leimi kipak kei henla, a khawngmi leng dah kei hen: hehna lah a vek ua tungah a om ngala.
Khawngmi in, damlai mah leh, a thil khot lah a munawn sin ngal keia; kilakna lah a vek ua tung thu ahi ngala, kuamah a kik kei ding uh, kuamah a nuntakna thulimlouhna uah a nungta suak sam kei ding uh.
Pengkul a mut ua, bangkim a kimanta a; himahleh kidounaah kuamah a hoh kei ua; ka hehna lah a vek ua tungah a om ngala.
Inpua ah namsau, a sungah hipi leh kial: gama om namsauin a si dinga, khopia om kial leh hipiin a nekhin ding.
Himahleh a tai khete, a pawtna ding ua, tangte khawngah phaijang gam vakhu bangin a om ding uh; a vek un, lungjuang takin amau thulimlouhna chiatah.
Khut tengteng a zo dinga, khuk tengteng tui bangin a nem ding.
Saiip puan a teng ding ua, mulkimnain amau a tuam dinga, mel chitengah zumna a lang dinga, a lutang tengteng uh a giau khin vek ding.
A dangkasik uh leh a dangkaengte un TOUPA hehni chiangin a hunkhe theikei dinga, a hin uh a taisak kei dinga, a gil uh a vahsak sam kei dinga, a thulimlouhna uh pukna a hihkhit tak nak jiakin.
A kizepna kilawmna uh a kisaktheihpih ua, a kihhuaina milim un leh a nitna thil un a uak sak zo lel uh ahi; huai jiak mahin amaua dingin thil kihhuai dingin ka nabawlta hi.
Huan gallak dingin namdang khutah ka pe dia, leia mi giloute kiangah gallak dingin ka pe dinga, amau a na hihnin ding uhi.
Amaute ka nungngat san dinga, ka mun siang a hihnin ding uh: huan guta a hong lut dia, a hihnin ding uh.
Khainiang bawl un, gamlah sisan suah hat vaihawmnain a dima, khopi lah hiamgamnain a dim ngala.
Huaijiakin namdang giloupente ka honpi lut dinga a innte uh a neihsak ding ua; a hatna uh a, otpih uh ka hihtawp dinga, a mun siangte uh hihnitin a om ding hi.
Lungjinna a hongtunga, muanna a zong ua, lah a om het keia.
Siatna tungah siat semna, thuthang tungah thuthang a honom dinga, jawlnei lakah kilakna a zong ding ua, himahleh dante siampu lakah a mang dinga, upate lakah lah thudot a om kei ding hi.Kumpipa a dah dinga, heutu lungdonna puansilhin a kivan dinga, vantang khut leng a ling ding, a kiang uah a omdan thu un ka hih dinga, a thilhih bang jel un vai ka hawm sak ding; huan TOUPA ka hi chih a theita ding uh, a chi a.
Kumpipa a dah dinga, heutu lungdonna puansilhin a kivan dinga, vantang khut leng a ling ding, a kiang uah a omdan thu un ka hih dinga, a thilhih bang jel un vai ka hawm sak ding; huan TOUPA ka hi chih a theita ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, kum gukna, kha gukna, huai kha ni nga niin hichi ahi a, ka in a ka tuta, Juda upate ka maa a tut lai un TOUPA PATHIAN khut ka tungah a hongom a.
Huchiin ka ena, ngaiin, mi mei banga kimu a hongoma; a kawng chiang nuai lam hi dia kilawm mei bang ahi a; a kawng chiang tunglam bel khina banga, vak tak ahi.
Huan khut bang a hon sawk khiaa, ka tal samin a honmanta hi, khain lei leh van kalah a hondom kang taa, Pathian kilaknain Jerusalemah a honpi hi, Jerusalem mallam huang sungnung kongpi khakna chinah a hontuntaa, huailaiah mullitna lim tutna mun a oma, huaiin a mullit sak sek hi.
Huan, ngaiin, phaijanga ka muh bangjelin huaiah Israel Pathian thupina a om hi.
Huchiin aman ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, mallam ngain na mit suan dih ve leh, a chi a.
Huchiin mallam ngain ka mit ka suana, ngaiin, maitam kongpi mallam lutna ah hiai mullitna lim a naoma.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, a thilhih uh na mu hia?
Israel inkoten thil kihhuai mahmah, hiaia a hih ngei uh, ka in siangthou akipana gamlaa ka pai mangna dia a hih uh? ahihhangin thildang kihhuai jaw na mu nawn lai ding, a chi a.
Huan um sung lutnaah a honpi a; huan ka ena, bangah vang a naom a.
Huchiin ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, huai bang honkhuak dih, a chi a.
Huan ka khuak leh kongkhak a naom zen houh a.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Lut inla, hiaia khelhna kihhuai tak a hih uh en dih, a chi a.
Huchiin ka luta, ka mua, ngai in, thil hing chi chih limte, gamsa kihhuai limte, Israel inkote milim tengtengte bangah a kimvelin a natuang hi.
Huan a ma uah Israel inkuan, upate laka mi sawmsagihte a ding ua, a lai tak uah Sephan tapa Jaazania a dinga, mi chihin belhbu a tawi chiat ua; huan gimlim khu gim a jam tou ngoingoi hi.
Huchiin ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, Israel inkuan upate mial nuaia thilhih na mu hia?
Michihin milim dantana a hih uh?
TOUPAN a honmu keia, TOUPAN gam a paisanta aka, a chi ngal ua.
A thilhih uh kihhuai sem dang leng na mu nawn lai ding, ka kiangah a chi lai hi.
Huchiin TOUPA in mallam panglutna kongkhak ah a hon pia, huan, ngai dih, huaiah numeite Tamus ngaiin kapin a tu ua.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Aw mihing tapa, hiai na mu hia? hiai sanga kihhuai zo sem na mu nawn lai ding, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA in um sungnungjaw ah a honpi luta, ngaiin, TOUPA in siangthou kongkhak ah inlim leh maitam kikalah mi sawmnih leh nga TOUPA in siangthou lam nungngata, a maite uh suahlam ngain a naom ua, suahlam ah ni a na bia uhi.
Huchiin, aman ka kiangah, Hiai na mu hia, aw mihing tapa, a thil kihhuai hih uh, hiaia a hih uh Juda inkote dingin thil neu tham hia? gam lah hiamgamnain a hihdim ua, honhihsak nawn sem ua, a nak uh sawlin ahum ua;Huaijiakin ken leng heh takin ka hih sin ahi; ka mitin a maih kei dia, ka hehpih sam kei ding; aw ngaihtakin ka bilah hong kikou mahle uh ka ngaikhe kei ding, a chi a.
Huaijiakin ken leng heh takin ka hih sin ahi; ka mitin a maih kei dia, ka hehpih sam kei ding; aw ngaihtakin ka bilah hong kikou mahle uh ka ngaikhe kei ding, a chi a.
Huchiin bila ka jakin, Khopi kemmite mi chih hihmanna van tawiin hongnai uhen, chiin ngaihtakin a kikou a.
Huan ngai in, mallam kongpi tungnung paina akipanin mi guk a hongpai ua, mi chihin hihlupna van a tawi chiat ua; huan alai ua mi khat puan malngat silhin laituibuk a kuah hi.
Huan a lut ua, dal maitam chinah a ding uhi.
Huan Israelte Pathian thupina a omna cherub akipanin huai in kongpi chinah a pai toua; huan, puan malngat silh, laituibuk kuahpa a sama.
Huan TOUPAN a kiangah, Khopi phang inla, Jerusalem phang suakin; a sunga thil kihhuai hihsate jiaka tunggika kap sekte a tal uah chiamtehin, a chi a.
Huan mi dangte kiangah ka jak mahmahin, A nungah khopi phang suak unla, khut kha un, na mit un muh maih kei henla, hehpih sam kei un.
Putek te, tangval te, nungak te, naupangte leh nute that siang vek un.
Chiamtehna neite bel honnaih kei uh; ka mun siangthou ah pan un, a chi a.
Huchiin, biakinn konga upate in a panta uhi.
Huan, aman ka kingah, In hihbuah unla, a um sung te mi luangin dimsak unla: pawt un, a chi a.
Huan, a pawtta ua, khopi ah a gamtang ta uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, khopi ah a gamtat lai un kei bel nutsiatin ka naoma, a khupin ka puka.
Aw TOUPA PATHIAN, Jerusalem tunga na heh sun buak ah Israel om sunte leng na hihmang vek sin ahia? chiin ka kikou a.
Huchiin aman ka kiangah, Israel leh Juda inkote thulimlouhna a thupi tela ahi.
Gam sisanin a dima: TOUPAN bangmah a mu sama! a chi ngal ua.
Ken leng ka muh maih kei dinga, ka hehpih sam kei ding hi; a gitlouh uh a buk a bekin amau ka khusak ding, a chi a.Huan ngai in, puan malngat silha laituibuk kuahpan thu a tuna, Na honthu piak bangin ka hihkhinta, a chi a.
Huan ngai in, puan malngat silha laituibuk kuahpan thu a tuna, Na honthu piak bangin ka hihkhinta, a chi a.
Huchiin ka ena, ngai in, cherubte lu tunga van dum omah saphir suang hileh kilawm tak, laltutphah bang taka kimu a honglanga.
Huan aman puanmalngat silhpa kiangah, Cherub nuaia kangtalai kipeite kalah valut inla, cherubte kikala meivu na khut langnih dimin va luak inla, khopi tungah theh jakin, a chi a.
Huan ka mitmuh lai mahmahin a kuantaa.
Huan mi a hoh laiin cherubte inpi taklam pangah a ding ua; huan um sungnung pen meipiin a dimta hi.
Huan, TOUPA thupina cherubte akipan a pai toua, biakin kongpi tungah a vadingtaa, huai in meipiin a dima, um sung TOUPA thupina vakin a dimta hi.
Huan cherubte kha jap gingte um sung ponungjawah te leng Pathian Bangkimhihtheiin a honhoupih laia a om bang maiin a kijaa.
huan hichi ahi a, puan malngat silhpa kiangah, Cherubte kikala kangtalai kipei kikala kipan mei vala in, chia thu a piak leh, amah a valuta, kangtalai khe chinah a ding ta hi.
Huan cherubin, cherubte kikala kipanin, cherubte kikala mei om a sawka, a laa, puan malngat silhpa khutah a piaa, amah a nalaa, a pawt kheta hi.
Huan, cherubte bel a kha nuai uah mihing khut bang tak a honglanga.
Huan ka ena, ngaiin, cherubte sikah kangtalai khe li, cherub khat kiangah, kangtalai khe dang ka mu a; huan, kangtalai khe lat dan bel kraisolait suang jia bang ahi hi.
Huan a latdan un a li un kibatna khat a nei ua, kangtalai kha un kibatna khat a nei ua, kangtalai khe khat sunga kangtalai khe dang om bang mai ahi hi.
A pai chiang un sikliin a pai thei ua, apai un leng akihei ngei kei uh; himahleh a masa ngatna lam a jui jel uh, a pai un a kihei tuan kei uh.
Huan a pumpi uh a pumin a nungte u, a khutte uh, a khate u leh kangtalai khete leng a kimin mitin a dima, a li ua kangtalai khete leng.
A kangtalai khet bila ka jak mahmahin, kangtalai khe kipei, chih ahi.
Huan mi chihin mel li chiat a nei ua, mel khat cherub mel ahia, nihna mihing mel ahi a. thumna humpinelkai mel, lina muvanlai mel ahi a.
Huan cherubte a paitou ua; hiai bel Kebar lui geia thilhing ka muh ahi a.
Huan, cherubte a pai uleh kangtalai khete a kiang uah a pai teia, huan, cherubten leia kipan pai tou dinga a khate uh a jak uleh kangtalai kheten a lehngatsan ngei kei uh.
A din uleh hiaite a ding tei ua, a pai touh uleh hiaite a pai tei jel ua, thil hing kha lah amau ah a om ngala.
Huan TOUPA thupina inpi kongpi tunga kipan a pawt khiaa, cherubte tungah a dingtaa.
HUan cherubten a kha jak ua, a pawt un ka mit muh mahmahin lei akipan a pai tou ua; kangtalai khete a kiang uah a om jela: huan TOUPA in lutna suahlam kongkhak chinah a dingtaa; Israel Pathian thupina a tunguah a om hi.
Hiai bel Kebar luia Israel Pathian nuaia ka thil hing muh mah ahi; cherubte ahi uh chih ka thei hi.
MI chihin mai tuam li leh kha li a nei chiat ua, a kha nuai uah mihing khut bang mai a om hi.Huan a mel lam uh ahihleh Kebar luia ka muh melte bang mah, a latdan uleh amau mahmah leng ahi uhi; huan a majawn jel uah a pai chiat uhi.
Huan a mel lam uh ahihleh Kebar luia ka muh melte bang mah, a latdan uleh amau mahmah leng ahi uhi; huan a majawn jel uah a pai chiat uhi.
Huan khain a hondom kanga, TOUPA in suah lam lutna, suahlam muhna a hontuna: huan, ngai in, lutna kongkhak chinah mi sawmnih leh nga a naom ua: a lak uah Azzur tapa Jaazania leh Benai tapa Palatia, mipi heutute, ka mu hi.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, hiaite gitlouhna sawmkhete ahi ua, hiai khopi ah gitlouh sawmkhemite ahi uh.
Inn lam hun ahi naikei hi; hiai khopi sa-ui bel ahi a, eite a sa I hi uh, chite,
Huaijiakin thu gen inla, aw mihing tapa, a tunguah thu gen in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA kha ka tungah a hongtunga, aman ka kiangah, Gen in, TOUPAN hichiin a chi a: Hichinbangin na hih sek ua, aw Israel inkote aw, na lungsim ua thil hongtungte lah ka thei siang vek ngala.
Hiai khopi ah nasuante uh na pungsak huthut ua, a kongzingte lah na mi thah un na dimsakta ua.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: Na mi thah uh a laia na koihta uh a sa ahi ua; hiai khopi a sa-ui bel ahi, himah leh a lai akipan suankhiakin na om ding uhi.
Nam sau na kihta ua, na tunguah namsau ka hon tun ding, TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi:
A laia kipan ka honpawt khe sak dinga, nam dangte khutah ka honmansak dinga, na tung thu uh a ngaihtuah ding uh.
Namsauin na si ding ua, Israel gamgi lamah na tungthu uh ka ngaihtuah ding: huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih na theita ding uh.
Hiai khopi na sa-ui bel uh ahi kei dinga, nou lah a sunga sa na hi sam kei ding ua, Israel gamgi lamah na tungthu uh ka ngaihtuah dinga.
TOUPA ka hi chih na theita ding uh, ka dan bawl na jui kei ua, ka thu pawt leng na jui sam kei ua: na kim ua namte hih dan na jui zota uh, a chi, chiin.
Huan hichi ahi a, thu ka gen aleh Benai tapa Palatia a nasi ta maia, Huchiin ka khup puka, aw ngaihtakin ka kikoua.
A, TOUPA PATHIANIN: Israel omsunte chimihna na bawl sin ahia?
Ka chi hi.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah.
Mihing tapa, na unaute, na chi ua kuangte ngei leh Israel innkote tengteng, a vek un.
Jerusalem luah miten TOUPA akipan pai mang un, hiai gam koua dia piak a hita hi, a chihnate uh ahi ua.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Gamlapiah namte lakah ka suan manga, gam tampi ah ka hihdalh naa, sawtlou kalin a va tunna gam uah amau dingin mun siangthou ka hi ding, achia.
Huaijiakin TOUPAN hichiin a chi ahi: Nam dangte akipanin ka honpi khawm nawn ding a, na dalhna gam ua kipan ka honkaikhawm nawn ding.
Israel gam ka honpe ding hi.
Huan huailaiah a hongpai dingua, thil nin tengteng leh thil kihhuai huaia kipan a la mang ding uh.
Huan lungtang khat ka pe dinga, na sung uah lungsim thak ka koih ding: Huan a sa ua kipan lungtang sak ka la mang dinga, lungtang nem a kiang uah ka pe ding:
Ka dan bawlte a zuih ua, ka thusehte a vom ua, a hih theihna ding un, Huchiin ka mite ahi ding ua, kei leng a Pathian uh ka hi ding.
A mitna uh leh a kihhuaina laigil lungtang juitebel a khelh moh uh a buk a bekin amau ka khu sak ding, TOUPAN a chi
Huchiin cherubten a khate uh a jak ua, a kiang uah kangtalai khet e a oma, huan Israelte Pathian thupina a tunguah a om hi.
Huan TOUPA thupina khopi lai akipanin a pai toua, khopi suahlam panga tang sangah a vading ta hi.
Huan khain a hondomkangtaa, kilakanaah Pathian khain Kaldai gama saltangte kiangah a hontun hi.
Huchiin ka kilak na muhin a honpai touh santa hi.Huchiin saltangte kiangah TOUPAN thil a honet sak tengteng ka genta hi.
Huchiin saltangte kiangah TOUPAN thil a honet sak tengteng ka genta hi.
Toupa thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna, ka kiangah.
Mihing tapa, helhat innkuan, muhna ding bil neia, lah mu ngal lou, jakna ding bil neia lah za ngal loute lakah na om ahi, helhat inkuan ahi him ngal ua.
Huaijiakin, nang mihing tapa, saltannaa pai ding bangin na vante lomgak dimdiam inla, sun khovak ah a mitmuh mahmah un paikhia in: a muh mah mah uh na mun akipan mun dangah na pai khe ding ahi: helhat inkuan ahi ua, a kingaihtuah loh kha mai ding uah.
Huan na van sun khovakin a mitmuh mahmah uah saltang pai ding van lakin na lakhe dinga, nang mahmah leng mitmuh uah gam danga khak mang ding paiin na pai ding ahi.
A mitmuh mahmah uah kulh bang vangsak inla, huaiah lakhia in.
A mitmuh mahmah uah na po dinga, mialah napai khe ding ahi: lei na muh louhna dingin na mai nakhuh ding ahi; Israel inkote a dingin etsak kholhna din nang ka honbawl ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan a honthupiak bangin ka hihta; ka van saltang ding van bangin sun khovakin ka la khiaa, ka khutin in ka la khiaa, a mitmuh mahmah uah ka puaa.
Huan jingsangin TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtunga.
Mihing tapa, Israel inkuan, helhat inkuanten na kiangah.
Bang hih na hia oi? a honchi uh ahi keimaw?
A kiang uah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: hiai thuphuan Jerusalem heutute leh Israel inko pumpi, a omna uh mite tungthu ding ahi.
Nou adin etsak kholhna ka hi a, ka chih bang geiha a tung ua hih ahi ding; khak mangin, saltang dingin a pai mang ding uh, chiin.
Huan a lak ua heutu om sunin mial nuaiah a liangin a po dinga, a pai khe ding: a lak khiakna ding un bang vangsak ua, a mitin gam a muh nawn louh jiakin a mai a khuh ding ahi.
Amah ka lenin ka khuh dinga, ka thanga awk ahi ding: Kaldai gama babulon ah ka honpi ding a, muh jaw a mu kei ding; huaiah a si sin hi.
Amah panpih dinga a kianga om jelte leh a chingmite tengteng gam chihah ka hihjak dinga, namsau dokin ka delh ding.
Huan namte laka ka delh jaka, gam chiha ka hih dalh hun chiangin TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Himahleh namsau te, kial te, hipi te akipan mi tawm chik ka hawi ding; huaiten a hongpaina gam ua namte kiangah a kihhuaina tengteng a phuanna ding un; huan kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawn a,
Mihing tapa, na an ling vonvon kawmin ne inla, na tui lungjinga ling kawmin dawnin;
Huan gama mite kiangah TOUPA PATHIANIN Jerusalema tengte tungtang ah leh Israel gam tungtangah hichiin a chi ahi: A annte uh lau kawmin a ne ding ua, a tui uh lungjing takin a dawn ding ua, a gam a sunga tengte hiamgamna jiakin a sunga thil om tengteng akipan hihgawpin aom sin ngala.
Huan mi tenna khopite a in-gam dinga, gam hihsiatin a om dinga, huchiin TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh, chiin gen, achi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, Israel gama hiai paunak na neih uh bang chihna ahia.
A nite a sawt chian kilakna peuhmah a vuaksuak nawn mai jel, na chih uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Hiai paunakin a zang nawn ngei kei ding uh; ni lah a naitaa, kilakna chih tun dik ni ding, chiin a kiangah gen jawin.
Israel inkuante lakah kilakna hongvuaksuak himhim leh aisan hoih lama maitangphatna himhim a omtakei ding hi.
TOUPA lah ka hi ngala, ka gen dinga, ka gen tangtun ahi ngal dinga, sit ahi kei ding: Aw helhat inkuante aw, na dam lai mahmah un thu ka gen sin ahi, ka tangtung sak sin ngala, chih TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ka thu bangmah sit ahi kei dinga, ka thugen peuhmah hihtangtunin a om jel zo ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi chiin hilh in, a chi a.
TOUPA tuh ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Mihing tapa, ngai in, Israel inkotea min, Kilaaknaa muhte bel denchianga ding ahi a, a genkholhte leng gamla pia ding ahi, a chi ua.Huaijiakin a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ka thu bangmah sit ahi kei dinga, ka thugen peuhmah hihtangtunin a om jel zo ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi chiin hilh in, a chi a.
Huaijiakin a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ka thu bangmah sit ahi kei dinga, ka thugen peuhmah hihtangtunin a om jel zo ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi chiin hilh in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Mihing tapa, Israel jawlnei, mah lungtang kia akipana gen chingte tungah thu gen inla, TOUPA thu ngai un, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi.
Jawlnei hai, amau ngaihdan juia, bangmah lah mu ngal loute a tung uh a gik hi:
Aw Israel, na jawlneite kho Tulsa sehal bang lel a hita uh.
TOUPA nia kidounaa ding zou dingin a vana tak na phu ngam kei ua, Israel inkote human ah lah n aphatuam sam kei uh.
TOUPA thu pawt ahi chimiten bangmah lou lel leh gen kholhna lim lel a tang ua, TOUPA sawl ahi kei himhim uhi; a thu uh hi ngei ding bangin mite a gingta sak ua.
Kilakna hongvuaksuak lel na mu un, thu gen kholh dik lou na gen uh ahi kei maw?
TOUPA thupawt ahi na chi nawn ngal ua, kenlah ka gen het kei a.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Bangmah lou phet na gen ua juau lel na muh jiak un, ngai un, ka hon nang ahi, chih TOUpa thu pawt ahi.
Huan ka khutin bangmahlou mute leh juau gen kholmite a nang dinga, ka mite kidot khawmna ah a tel kei ding ua, Israel innkuante min gelhna ah gelhin a om sam kei ding; huchiin TOUPA PATHIANIN ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Galmuan om lou pia, Muan huai e, chia mite a pi mang jiak un leh mi bang bawla, sunu nuhmiten,
A ke nawn mai ding, vuahpi a hongzu dinga, nou gial lian pite aw, na hongke ding ua, huih thupiin a hihse ding, chiin.
Huan, Ngai un, bang a chip khit chiangin, Na sunu nuh uh koiah, a honchi kei ding ua hia?
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ka hehin huihpi thupiin ka hihsevek ding, ka hehin gial thupi tak hihmang dingin a hongke ding.
Huchiin sunu na nuh ngou bang uh ka chim sak dinga, lei phain a chim dia, huchiin a suangphumte a dawk hial ding hi: huan a chim dinga, bang chim ah hihmangin na om ding uh; huchiin TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Hichibangin bang tungah leh sunu nuhmite tungah ka hehna ka lungdam sak ding; huan, Bang a om nawn keia, a belmite leng a om nawn ta kei uh, ka honchi ding hi.
Huai bel Israel jawlnei Jerusalem tung thu gena, galmuanna om lou pia galmuanna musakmite ngei, a om nawn kei uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan, nang mihing tapa, na mite tanute, a lungtang lel ua genmite masuan inla, amau kalhin thu genin, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi:
Numei, mite bana sik bunsak lehmi hinnate mat belhna dinga mi lian mite lu khuhna khuimite a tung uh a gik hi: Nou hinna dingin ka mite hinna na man ding uh maw?
Buhman tawmchik leh tanghou them mu dinga si lou ding sisak ding leh hing lou ding hingsak dingin na juau gen uh ka miten a up jiak un ka mite lakah ka min a thanghuai ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi a: Ngai un, mi hinna, vasa banga man dinga na thil but sakte uh k amudah ahi; na bante uh ka bot dinga, na mi mat dingte uh hinna ka pawt sak vek ding; vasa banga na mat dingte uh hinna.
Na lukhuhnate uh leng ka botkek dinga, ka mite na khut ua kipan ka suakta sak ding, na mat theih ding un na khut uah a omta kei ding uh; huchiin TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Kei lungkham sak hi loua, mi diktatte lungtang juaua na hihnat jiak un leh mi gilou hingdama a omna dinga a khelhna lampia kipan kilehhei louhna dingin mi gilou khutte na hihhat ua,Huaijiakin bangmahlou lel, thu genkhawl diklou hiam jaw na mu nawn himhim kei ding uh; huan ka mite na khut ua kipan ka hun khe dinga, TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh, a chi, chiin gen in, achi a.
Huaijiakin bangmahlou lel, thu genkhawl diklou hiam jaw na mu nawn himhim kei ding uh; huan ka mite na khut ua kipan ka hun khe dinga, TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh, a chi, chiin gen in, achi a.
Huchiin Israel upa khenkhatte ka kiangah a hongpai ua, ka maah a tu ua.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtungta, ka kiangah
Mihing tapa, hiai miten a milimte uh a lungtang uah a la lut ua, a ma uah a thulimlouhna pukna uh a koih uhi; kei hondong ding uh ahi peuhmah ua hia?
Huaijiakin, amau houpih inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Israel inkuana mi chih a lungtang ua milim la luta, a ma ua a thulimlouhna pukna koiha, jawlnei kianga hongpai peuhmah kei TOUPAN a milim uh tamdan bang jelin ka dawng ding;
Israel innkote a milim uh jiaka honna omtuam san jiak ua a lungtang ua ka mat thehna dingin.
Huaijiakin Israel inkote kiangah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Hong kik unla, na milimte ua kipanin hong kik unla, na kihhuaina tengteng uh lehngatsan un.
Israel innko laka mi kuapeuh hiam, mikhual Israel gama teng tei hiam, keia kipana kihihtuam, a lungtang ua milim la luta, a ma ua thulimlouhna pukna koih kawma, a tung tang ua hondong dinga jawlnei kianga hoh kei TOUPA ngeiin ka dawng mai ding.
Huai mi ka masuan dinga, mi lamdanga sak dingin khantawn khantawn gen dingin ka mit elaka kipan ka hih mang ding; huchiin kei TOUPAN jawlnei ka khem ahi a, a tungah ka khut ka lik dinga, ka mi Israelte laka kipan ka hihmang ding.
Huan jawlnei khema omin thu gen henla, kei TOUPAN jawlnei ka khem ahi a, a tungah ka khut ka lik dinga, ka mi Israelte laka kipan ka hihmang ding.
Huan a thulimlouhna uh a po ding ua: jawlnei thulimlouhna amah dongmite thulimlouhna bang mai ahi ding.
Israel inkote keia kipa a man nawn louh ua, a tatleknate tengteng ua a kihihnit nawn sam louhna ding un, ka mite a hih jawk tak ua a Pathian uh ka hih theihna dingin, TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi, chiin gen in, a chi a.
TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hontunga.
Mihing tapa, gam miten tatlekna thil hiha, ka tunga thil hihkhiala, ken ka khut ka lika, a en uh, hinna bul ka hihsiata, a tung ua kial ka tunsaka, mi leh sa te ka honhihman leh hiai mi thum,
Noa, Daniel leh Job te hial leng hongomta bang hileh, a diktatna un amau hinna kia a humbit ding ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Gam sahangte a gam uh ka tuan suak saka, gam a hihsiat ua, a hongkigawpa, gam sa jiaka kuamah pai suak ding a om kei uleh
Hiai mi thumte om le uh, a hina ka hin laiteng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, a tanute uh, a tapate uh a humbit tuan kei ding uh: amau kia hotdamin a om ding ua, gam a se gawp ding.
A hihleh huai gamah namsau ka lik dia, Namsau, gamtang in, chileng mi leh sa ka gawi mang ahi dinga;
Hiai mi thumte om le uh; a hina ka hin laiteng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi a, a tanute uh, a tapate uh a humbit tuan kei ding ua, amau hinna kia humbitin a om ding.
Ahihleh, huai gamah, hipi ka honlen suaha ka hehna huai gam tunga ka honsun leh:
Noa, Daniel leh Job te hial leng na om le uh, a hina ka hin sung teng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, a tanu uhiam, a tapa uhiam a humbit kei ding ua, a diktatna un amau hinna ngei a humbit lel ding.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ngala: Jerusalem tunga ka vaihawmna na mahmah li, namsaute, kialte, gam sahangte, hipi te, mi leh s agawimang vek dinga ka hontun kim hun chiangin bangchia thupi ahi de aw?
Himahleh ngai in, huai laia om sun pi khiak dingte nutsiatin a om ding ua, tanute leh tapate leng: ngai un, a kianguah a hongpawt khe ding ua, a omdan uh a thilhihte na mu ding uh, huan Jerusalem tunga thil hoih lou ka hontut thu ah lungmuanin na om ding ua, a tunga ka hontut tengteng thu ah leng.A omdan u leh a thilhihte uh n amuh hun chiang un a honlungmuan ding uh; a tunga ka thilhih tengteng hih san neilouin ka hih kei chih na thei ding uh chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
A omdan u leh a thilhihte uh n amuh hun chiang un a honlungmuan ding uh; a tunga ka thilhih tengteng hih san neilouin ka hih kei chih na thei ding uh chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Huan TOUPA thu kiangah a hongtunga.
Mihing tapa, gammang nuaia sing laka Grep gui sing dang sangin bang ahi aleh?
A sing thil bawlna dia zat ahi hia?
Tuium-belsuan khaina dingin leng kuan a zang ngei aleh?
Ngaiin, meia paih lut ahi seka, toh dinga: mein a kang mang, a mong langnih, a kang khin mai sem, a laiah: a nei him ahia, phattuamna?
Ngaiin, a phatuam kei, abit lai nangawnin: phatuam sinkei na tele, a kat khit nungin.
