Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: gam nuai sing laka grep guite, toh dingin meiah ka khul mai mah bangin, Jerusalem luahmite ka bawl ding.
Amau ka masuan dinga, pawt mah le uh, meia kipan, a kang bei himhim ding, meiin, TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding ua, amaute ka masuan hun chiangin.Ka hihgawp sing ngei hi, a gam uh, thulimlouhna ahih jiak un chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi hi, chiin.
Ka hihgawp sing ngei hi, a gam uh, thulimlouhna ahih jiak un chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi hi, chiin.
TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Mihing tapa, Jerusalem a kihhuainate theikhe sak kiangah,
TOUPA PATHIANIN Jerusalem kiangah hichiin a chi ahi: Na pawtna gam leh na pianna gam Kanan mite gamahi a, na pa Amor mi ahi a, na nu Hit mi ahi.
Huan na pianna thu bel na pian niin nalaigui at ahi keia, chi nuh na tuak keia, tuam lum na hi sam kei.
Lainat dinga na tunga hiaite hih dingin kuamah mitin nang a honhehpih kei ua: gam laka paih khiak n ahita, na pian ni akipan kih-a om na hi ngala.
Huan na kianga ka hongin sisana talin ka honmua, na kiangah, Sisan ah om lechin leng, hing in, ka hon chia: ahi, ka honchi ahi; sisan ah om mahle chin hing in.
Gam thil pakmum bangin ka honkhangsaka, na sam a hong hoiha; vuak leh vuaktang lel na hi lailaia.
Huan na kianga ka hongpaia ka honetin, deihtak huai tham na honghi taa, ka puan ka honjawna, na vuaktang ka honkhuhta hi: ahi, na kiang ah ka kichiama, thukhun ah ka hon lutpiha, keia na hita hi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
Huchiin tuiin ka honsila, ahi, na sisan ka honhih siangsa sisipa, sathau ka honnuh hi.
Puan jemin ka honvana, sahamvun khedap ka honbunsaka, puan malngat hoihin ka honvana, sil puan ka honkhu sak hi.
Kizepna hoihin ka honjema, na khutah taute, na ngawngah dangkaeng khainiang te,
Na nakah nakbulhte, na bil ah bilbahte, na lu ah lallukhu hoih tak tein kahonjem hi.
Huchiin dangkaeng leh dangkasika zephoih na hitaa, na puansilh te puan malngat hoih tak leh sil puan leh puan khui kilawm ahi a: na nek tangbuang nel leh khuaiju leh sathau ahi, na kilawm mahmah, kumpinu leng na ching ta hi.
Na kilawmna namte lakah a thangkhia a, ka thupina kivanin na buchingta, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Himahleh na kilawmna muang lua a, na min thanna na huk loha, mi vialvak peuhmah kiangah na hukna na tangphala, akua peuh.
Na puansilhte suahin mun sangtena juna, huaiah kijuakin na panga, hichibang a om ngei nawn kei ding.
Ka dangkaeng leh ka dangkasik tuiumbelsuan hoih taktak ka honpiak na laa, pasal lim bawlna dingin na zang, na huk pihta hi.
Puansilh khui kilawmte na laa, amau na tuama, ka sathaute leh ka gimlimte a ma uah na tung hi.
Ka hon tanghou piak leng ka tangbuang hoih leh sathau leh khuaiju ka honvakna sekte gimlim dingin a ma uah na luia; hichi a honghi ta, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huailou leng na tanu, na tapa, na hon suansakte a kiang uah kithoihna dingin zat bei din na pia a: na hukna thil namai ahi ahia?
Ka tate na thaha, meipia pai luta a kiang ua na latte?
Na kihhuaina leh na hukna tengtengahna naupang laia vuaktanga na om leh n asisana na tal maimah laite khawng na thei nawnta kei.
Huan hiai na thulimlouhna tengteng khitin leng, hichi a honghi a (na tung a gik hi: TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi),
Mun kiphoute na kibawlna, kongzing chiteng ah mun sangte nalamah
Lam lu tengah na mun sang na lama, na kilawmna kihhuaiin na bawla vialvak peuhmahte kiangah na kilem dawka, na hukna a uang semsem nak hi.
Aigupta mi, na innveng, sami mahmah toh kingaihna khelhna leng na hihta; honheh sak dingin na hukna na uangsakta ahi.
Huaijiakin ngaiin, na tungah ka khut ka lika, na an ngeingei ka kiam saka, nang honmudah Philistia tanute, na hukdan zumpih mahmah seknute kiangah ututa a honbawl dingun ka honpeta hi,
Assuria mite kiangah leng na kijuaka, hun chih mahmah lah nei tel lou china; ahi, a kiang uah kijuakin na panga, na kham tuan sam kei hi.
Kanan gamah, Kaldai mite kiangah na hukna na uangsak lailaia, na kham tuan kei hi.
Nang lungtang seta namai e na tatdan numei genhak gilou mahmah mai thil na hiha, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Lam chih lua tanna buk na nabawlah te, kongzing chiha mun kidoh nabawl ah te loh na delh louh jiakin kijuak lel leng na hi kei hi.
Ji angkawm, pasalte sanga mi tuam deihzo nu:
Kijuak kiangah thil a pe sek ua, nang bel na lehpiak sek-a hondeihmi mi angah, gam chiha kipan a hongpai ua, a honluppih theihna ding un na nou zonak ahi.
Huan na huk thu a kuamahin a honzot louh midang toh na kibatlouhna uh ahi; nang a man na pe zosopa, kuamahin man a honpiak louh uh na danna hi.
Huaijiakin aw mi huknu, TOUPA thu ngaiin:
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: na kihhuaina buak khiak a hiha, nangaihte toh na kithuahna lam ua na vuaktanna suklat ahih jiak leh na kihhuaina milim tengteng jiak leh a kiang ua na piak na tate sisan jiakin:
Ngai in, nang honngaimi na nuamtatpihte tengteng leh na nangaih khitsa tengteng leh na muhdahte tengteng ka sam khawm dinga, he, na kimah ka pi khawm dinga, na vuaktanna tengteng a muh theihna ding un a kiang uah na vuaktanna ka hihlang ding.
Huan numei pasal khena, amah ta sisan suah tung thu a bangin kon vaihawm khum ding; hehna leh mullitna sisan na tungah ka tungsak ding.
A khut uah ka honpe dia, na mun kidohte a hihpuk ding ua, na mun sangte a chimsak ding ua; na puansilhte a suah ding ua, na suang mantamte a honsut ding ua, savuak leh vuaktangin a honnuse ding uhi.
Na tungah mipi a kai khawm ding ua, suangin a honsep ding ua, namsauin a honkui pailet ding uh,
Na inte meiin a hal ding ua, numei tampi mitmuhin na tungah vaihawmna a tangtungsak ding uh; na hukna ka tawpsak dinga, loh leng na pe ta kei ding.
Huchiin ka hehna na tangah ka lungdam sak ding, ka hon mullit na a daita ding, ka dai dide dia, ka heh ngei nawn kei ding.
Na tuailai nite na theihgige louha, hiai thiltea na bonvuisak jawk jiakin ngaiin, na tatdan dan, na tungah ka tung ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi: huan na kihhuaina tengteng behlapin hiai hukna na hih nawn kei ding.
Ngai in, paunak zang peuhmahin hiai paunak a zang ding uh, A tanin a nu a sun, chih.
Na nu, amah pasal leh tate mudahnu tanu na hi a, ki tanauna lamah bel, amah pasal leh tate mudahnu tanu na hi a, ki tanauna lamah bel, amah pasal leh tate mudahnu tanau na hi: na nu lah Hit mi ahia, na pa lah Amor mi ahi.
Huan, na tanau, na u bel Samari, na vei lama teng sek amah leh a tanute toh ahi uh; na tanau, na nau lah, na taklama teng sek Sodom leh a tanute ahi ua.
Himahleh amau omdan na jui keia, a kihhuaina bang uh na hih kei naa, na omdan tengtenga na thulim louh jawkdan ngaihtuahin huaite bangmah tham ahi kei.
A hina ka in sungteng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, nang leh na taten a hih bang uh na tanau Sodom leh a tanuten leng a hih het kei uh.
Na tanau Sodom thulimlouhna hiaite ahi: kisak theihnate, nek vah luatna te, amah leh a tanute nuamtat mawkmawk te ahi, mi gentheite leh tasamte a panpih tuan sam kei.
Huan mi uang ahi ua, ka maa thil kihhuai hihsa ahi uh; huchiin hoih ka sak bangin ka hihmangta ahi.
Samari in lah na khelhna kimkhat leng a hih sam kei; amau sanga na kihhuainate na nak hih jawk jiakin na hihsa na kihhuaina tengtengin na sangamnute siam na tang sak hi.
Na sanggamnute dikjawa na suklat jiakin nang mahin na zahlakna napuak ding ahi; amau sangin thil kihhuai uangjaw te na hiha, na khelhnate jiakin amau nang sangin a diktat jaw uhi; ahi, na sanggamnute siam na tansakna ah nang anen ahamin zahlakna na tang ding ahi.
Huan a omdan uh, Sodom leh a tanu om dante, Samari leh a tanu omdan te, amaute toh tonin nang omdan mahmah ka hei ding.
Amau dia lungmuanna na nahih seknaa na thilhihsa tengteng jiaka na zum theihna dingin.
Huan na sanggamnute, Sodom leh a tanute, Samari leh a tanute a omdan uh masa bangin a om nawn ding ua; nang leh na tanu leng na omdan uh masa bangin na om nawn ding uh.
Na thulimlouhna muh khiak a hih maa na kihihthupi nitein na sanggamnu Sodom na kamse khuahna ahi sek kei maw?
Tun jaw Suria tanu leh a kima mi tengteng, Philistia tanute na kima honsimmoh miten a hon-gense ek ta uhi.
Na hukna leh na kihhuaina na po jel ahi, chih TOUPA thu pawt a hi
Huchiin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: Thukhun bohsiain thuchiam na khawksak louhdan bang jelin na tungah ka hih tei sin ahi.
Himahleh na naupanglaia na kianga ka thukhun ka theigige dinga, na kiangah khantawn thukhun ka bawl ding.
Huchiin na sanggamnute ka pom hun chiangin na omdan te na honthei khe dinga. na kizumpih ding: amau lah na tanu dingin ka honpia, na thukhun jiakbel hi louin.
Na kianga ka thukhun ka hihkip ding, TOUPA ka hi chih na theita ding uh.Na thilhih tengteng ka honngaihdam vek hun chianginna theihgigea na zum jiaka na kam kat mahmah nawn louhna dingin, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Na thilhih tengteng ka honngaihdam vek hun chianginna theihgigea na zum jiaka na kam kat mahmah nawn louhna dingin, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kianga,
Mihing tapa, Israel inkote kiangah thuhaksa bawl khia inla, gentehnain gen in,
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi, chiin: Muvanlai lianpi, kha zapi, khaveng sau pi gial emum, mul bit tak Lebanon tangah a lenga, Sidar sing jik a tuaha.
A hiang jik nou pen a kitana, mi vialvakna gamah a lenpiha, sum sinna khopiah a phut a.
Huai gam hai chi leng a tuaha, lei hoihah a pawi pou a, tui tampi geiah a phut a, nahkai sing bangin a phut hi,
Huan a khanga, grep gui niam bilbial a honghi a, selte a honsuaha, ahiangte a hong dawntaa.
Muvanlai lianpi dang a om nawna, kha zapi leh mul bit tak a nei teia, huan, ngaiin, hiai grep kung amah lamah a zung a jama: a suanna mun akipanin amah lamah hiangte a pou khiaa, amah tuia a vak theihna dingin.
Hiangte a suaha, grep hoih tak a hih theihna dingin tui tampi geia lei hoiha phuh ahi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: A piching den dia hia?
A vuai maimah theihna ding in a nahte satkhiain, a zung toh a bot khe sin kei dia hia? a nah sel thak tengtengin leng a vuai loh ding; a zung toh bot khe dingin thilhihtheihna thupi tak hiam, muvanlai tampi hiam a kiphamoh tuan kei dia hia?
A hi, ngai in, phuh hileh leng a piching den dia hia?
Suahlam huihin a honnuai hun chiangin a vuai khin maimah kei dia hia?
A pouna mun mahah a vuai maimah ding chiin, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna, ka kiangah,
Helhat innkote kiangah gen in, hiai thil omdan a theikei ua hia?
Hilh in, ngai un, Babulon kumpipa Jerusalemah a hongpai a,
A kumpipa uh leh a heutu uh a mana, amah kiangah Babulonah a pia, kumpipa uh suan khat a mana, thukhun a bawl piha, thu achiam teitei saka, lalna gam a keniama, amaha a din khun len kawm kiaa a din theihna dingin.
A lalna gam a keniama, amaha a din khiak theih nawn louhna dingin a thukhun len kawm kiaa a din theihna dingin
Himahleh sakolte leh mi tampi honsawl dinga ngen dingin Aigupta gama palai sawlin a tungah a helta, A lohching ding hia? hichibang hihmi a suakta ding hia?
Thukhun lah hihse ngalin a pawt khe thou ding hia?
A hina ka hin laiteng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi; kumpipa, kumpipa dia bawlpa tenna ngeiah a kichiamnate musit leh, a thukhunte bohsiaa, amah kiang mahmahah Babulon ah a si ding hi.
Mi tampi hihlup dinga mualpawngte leh kulhte a bawl hun chiang un leng Pharo sepaih hon leh pawl thupi mahmah lengbangmah a hihsak theikei ding uh.
Thukhun bohsiain kichiamna a musit ta ngal ua: thu a kichiam nungin hiai thil tengteng a hih nawn ngala, a suakta peuhmah kei ding hi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: ka kichiamna a musita, ka thukhun a bohsiaa, a hina ka hon laiteng, amah tungah ka bung ngeingei ding.
Lenin ka khuh dinga, ka thang ah a awk ding, Babulonah ka honpi dinga, huchiin a bohsiatna, ka tung ngeia a bohsiatna te jiakin a mah ka sual ding.
Huan a pawl tengtenga taikekte tengteng namsauin a si ding ua, a om laite kawlmong chihah a dalh ding uh: huan kei TOUPAN ka genta chih a thei khe ding uh.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Sidar sang mahmah dawn ken ka la dinga, ka phut ding; a jikpi pena jik nou ka khiak dinga, tang sang kidoh takah ka phut ding.
Israel sana tanah k aphut dinga, hiangte a honsuak dinga, a honggah dinga, sidar thupi tak ahi ding; a nuaiah tungleng vasa chi chih a teng ding ua, ahiang limte ah a om ding uh.Huan gam sing tengtengin kei TOUPAN sing sangte ka niamsaka, sing niamte ka sangsaka, sing hingte ka keusaka, sing keute ka hingpha saka, ka chi nalai hi, a chi a.
Huan gam sing tengtengin kei TOUPAN sing sangte ka niamsaka, sing niamte ka sangsaka, sing hingte ka keusaka, sing keute ka hingpha saka, ka chi nalai hi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Israel gam tungtanga hiai paunak a zat uh banghcihna ahia, Paten grep thuk a ne ua, a tate uh ha a jau hi, chih?
A hina ka hin laiteng, Israel ah hiai paunak zat nawn chih na neikei ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Ngai un, hinna tengteng keia vek ahia, pa hinna keia a hih bang mahin tapa hinna leng keia ahi: kha khial peuhmah a si ding.
Himahleh mi a diktata, siang leh dik lel a hiha,
Mun sangtea ne loua, Israel inkote milim lam nga sam loua, numei kizen nai lou leng naih sam loua, kuamah tunga thil hihkhial loua,
leibami thil khamna koih penawn jawa, kuamah hiamgama lok loua, gilkial kianga nek ding piaa, vuaktang puan silh saka;
a pung delh dinga leitawi sak loua, a leitawi leng lasam loua, thil gilou hihdia a khut kideka, mi leh mi kikala vaihawmna dik taka hihpuaka.
ka dan bawlte juia, dik taka hiha, ka vaihawmnate a zuih leh, mi diktat ahi a, a hing ngei ding chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Himahleh tapa guktakching a suana, sisan suahmi a hiha, hiai bang himhim a hiha,
A hih ding zopena hih louha, mun sangtea a nek jawka, a innveng ji a hihbuaha,
Genthei leh tasam te a simmoha, a loha, a khamna koih a piak louha, milimte lam angata, thil kihhuai tengteng a hihta ngala, a si ngeingei ding, amah sisanmoha, a loha, a khamna koih a piak louha, milimte lam a ngata, thil kihhuai a hiha,
A pung delha ap piaka, a pung a lak lai leh, a hing ding hia? a hing het kei ding; hiai thil kihhuai tengteng a hihta ngala, a si ngeingei ding, amah sisan moh a puak ding ahi.
Huan, ngai in, tapa na nei tei taleh, a pa thil gilou hihsa tengteng a muha, laua,
Huchibang a hih tei tei louha, mun sanga anek louha, Israel inkote milim lamte a ngat louha, a inveng ji a hihnit louha,
Kuamah tunga thil a hihkhelh louha, khamnakoih bangmah la loua, kuamah lok loua, gilkialte nek ding pe jawa, savuakte a silh saka.
Genthei laka a khut a kidek saka, a nou leh a pung la loua, ka thupiakte zanga ka dan bawlte huimi a hih leh, a pa thulimlouhna jiakin a si kei dinga, a hing zo ngei ding ahi.
A pa bel khel taka mi a nuaisiaha, a unaupa hiamgama suala, a mite laka thil hoihlou a hih jiakin, ngaiin, a thulimlouhna jiakina si ding ahi.
Himahleh, Bangdia tapain apa thulimlouhna thuak lou ding? na chi nak uh?
Tapain dan a zuiha thil kizen a hiha, ka dan bawlte tengteng a zuiha, a hih lai leh, a hing ngeingei ding hi.
Kha khial a si ding: tapain a pa thulimlouhna a thuak kei dinga, pain leng tapa thulimlouhna a thuak sam kei ding; mi diktat diktatna amah mah tungah a om ding, mi gilou gitlouhna amah mah tungah a om ding.
Himahleh, mi gilouin a khelhna hih tengteng a lehngatsana, ka dan bawlte a zuiha, dan juia thil diktat a hih leh a hing ngei ding, a si kei ding.
Tatlekna a nahihsa himhim theihsak a hita kei ding: a na hihsa a diktatnaah a hing ding,
Mi gilou sihna ah kipahna himhim ka nei ahia?
A lampite a lehngatsana, a hinna zopen lou? chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi
Ahihhangin mi diktatin a diktana lampi a lehngatsana, thulimlouhnate a hiha, mi giloute hih bangjela thil kihhuaite a hinin a hing dia hia?
A thil diktat hih tatlekna hih ah leh a khelhna hihah, huai mahmah ah a si ding.
Himahleh, TOUPA hih dan a kibang gige kei hi, na chi sek uh.
Israel inkote aw, ngai un: ka hihdan a kibang gige kei maw? na hih dan uh a kibang kei gige jaw ahi kei maw?
Mi diktatin a diktatnate a lehngatsana, thulimlouhnate a hih leh huaiah a si dinga, thulimlouhna a hih ah a si ding.
Huailou leng, mi gilouin a khelhna a hihsa te lehngatsana, dan a zuiha, thil diktat a hih leh a hinna a humbit ding.
A kingaihtuaha, a tatlekna a nahihsa tengteng a lehngatsan jiakin a hing ngei ding, a si kei ding.
Himahleh Israel innkoten, TOUPA hihdan a kibang gige kei hi, a chi ua, Aw Israel innkote aw, ka hihdante a kibang gige ahi zo kei maw?
Nou hih dante bel a kibang kei gige jaw ahi kei maw?
Huaijiakin, awIsrael inkote aw, mi chih, noumau hihdan bang jelin vai ka honhawm sak dinga, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
Kihei unla, na tatlekna tengtengte uh lehngatsan un: huchiin thulimlouhna na puk siatna uh ahi sin kei ding hi.
Na tatlekna tengteng uh, na tatleksate uh pai mang vek unla, lungtang thak leh lungsim thak kibawl: Bang dingin na si ding ua oi, aw Israel innkote aw?Mi sihnaah lah kipahna mahmah ka neikeia, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi: huaijiakin kihei unla, hing un.
Mi sihnaah lah kipahna mahmah ka neikeia, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi: huaijiakin kihei unla, hing un.
Huailouin leng Israel heutute tungtangah sunna la phuah ahi:
Na nu bang ahia a hih? humpinelkaipi ahi; humpinelkaite lakah a kuala, humpinelkai lunlaite lakah a noute a vaklian a.
Huan a noute lakah khat a vakteia; humpinelkai lunlai a honghi: huan samat a siama, mite a gai.
Namten leng tanchin a ja ua: a kokhuk uah matin aom: huan Aigupta gamah sikkawiin amah a pi ua.
Huchiin a ngaka, a lametna a vuaksuak chih a theihin, a noute lakah a dang khat a la a, humpinelkai lunlaiin a bawl hi.
Huan humpinelkai lakah a pai touin a pai suk a, humpinelkai lunlai a honghi: huan samat a siama, mite a gai hi.
Huan a innpite uh a theia, a khopite uh a hihgawpa; huan gam tuh a segawpa, a humham husa jiakin, huaia tengteng.
Huchiin bialte akipanin ning chiha namten amah a dou ua: huan a tungah len uh a jak ua; a kokhuk uah matin a omta hi.
Huan sikkawitein bawm sungah amah a koih ua; Babulon kumpipa kiangah a pi ua; kulh muanhuaite sungah a pi lut ua, huchia Israel tangsangte tunga a aw a kijak nawn louhna dingin.
Na nu grepgui bang a ahi, na sisana, tuite kianga suan: tui tampite jiakin gahthei leh hiangtein a dim.
Huan vaihawmna pote lalchiang sikchiang khauh a nein, huan nahbawk pha lakah a sandan uh hihsangin a om hi, huchiin ahiang tampite u toh sangpia muhin a om uhi.
Himahleh thangpaihna a bohkhiakin a oma, leia paihin a oma, suahlam huihin a gah a mut keu: a kung khaukte a kitana, a keu; meiin a maute a kang beita.
Huan tuin gamdai ah, gam keu leh tui om lou ah phuh in a om,Huchiin ahianga sikchiangtea kipan mei a pai khia, a gah a hulbeia, huchiin amahah vaihawm dingin lalchiang ding sikchiang khauh a om kei hi.
Hiai kahla ahi, kahla ading ahi ding hi.
Huchiin ahianga sikchiangtea kipan mei a pai khia, a gah a hulbeia, huchiin amahah vaihawm dingin lalchiang ding sikchiang khauh a om kei hi.
Hiai kahla ahi, kahla ading ahi ding hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, kum sagihna, kha ngana, huai kha ni sawm niin Israel upa kuatehiam TOUPA thu dong dingin a hongpai ua, ka maah a tu uh.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, Israel upate houpih inla, a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Kei thudong dia hongpai na hi uh hia?
A hina ka hin laiteng, noute thudotin ka om kei ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chi in.
Amau na hawmsak kei dia hia?
Mihing tapa, hawmsak tanla, a pate uh kihhuainate theisakin;
Huan a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Israelte ka tel nia Jakob inkote telte kiangah ban jak hiala Aigupta gama a kiang ua ka kitheihsaka, a kiang ua ka khut ka jaka, Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi a, chia,
Huai nia Aigupta gam akipan pi khiaa, amaha dia gam kham, nawitui leh khuaijua luang gam, gam tengtenga kilawmpena pi lut dinga ka khut ka jak niin a kiang uah.
Mi chihin na mit ua muh thil kihhuai pai mang unla, Aigupta gama milimtein kihihnin kei un, kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi hi, chiin ka gen a.
Himahleh, ka tungah a hel ua, honlimsak himhim kei ua, mi chihin a mit ua muh thil kihhuaite leng a pai mang kei ua, Aigupta milimte leng a lehngatsan sam kei uh: Huaiah a tung ua ka hehna lungdam sak dingin Aigupta gamsung ngei ah a tunguah ka hehna ka leihbo na diamah, ka chi hi.
Himahleh, keimah min jiakin ka gamtang zotaa, a omna namte uh mitmuhin Aigupta gam akipan pi khiain a kiang uah ka kitheisaka, huai namte mitmuhin ka min gensiata a om louhna dingin.
Huchiin Aigupta gam pawt san dingin ka chitaa, gamdaiah ka honpi luttaa.
Huan ka dan bawlte amaute ka piaa, ka thugelte ka ensaka, huai min a zuih ua a hinna dingun.
Huailou leng kei leh amaute kikala chiamtehna dingin ka khawlnite amau ka piaa, kei TOUPA, amaute koihtuampa ka hi chih a theihtheihna dingun.
Himahleh Israel inkote gamdai ah ka tungah a hel ua, ka danbawlte a jui kei ua, ka thugelte, min a hiha a hinna ding takuh a pai khia ua, ka khawlnite leng nakpitakin a bohsia ua; Huchiin gamdai ah amau hihmang dingin ka hehna a tunguah ka leihna diamah, ka chi a.
Ka pi khiak laiin a theimite nam mahmah mitmuha hihsiata a om louhna dingun ka min jiakin ka gamtang zota ahi.
Huailouin huai gamdaiah ka gam piak, nawitui leh khuaijua luang gam, gam tengtenga kilawmpen ah ka pi lut kei ding, ban jak hialin ka chi a;
Ka thugelte a pai khia ua, ka dan bawlte a jui kei ua, ka khawlnite a bohsiat jiak un: a lungtang un a milimte uh a jui ngal ua.
Himahleh hihmang lou dingin ka mitin a muh maihta a, gamah leng ka hihmang vekta kei hi.
Huan gamdai ah a tate uh kiangah, Na pate uh dan bawl jui kei unla, a thugelte uh jui kei unla, a milimte un kihihnin sam kei un;
Kei TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hia, ka dan bawlte jui unla, ka thugelte vom unla, jui un:
Ka khawlni tang unla, kei leh noute kikala chiamtehna ahi dinga, TOUPA na Pathian uh ka hi chih na theihna uh ahi sin hi, ka chi a.
Himahleh a tate uh ka tungah a hel ua, ka dan bawlte a jui kei ua, ka thugelte, min a hiha a hinna ding tak, jui dingin a vom sam kei uh; khawlnite a bohseta ua; Gamdai ah ka hehna lungdamsak dingin a tunguah ka hehna ka leihna diamah, ka chi a.
Himahleh ka khut ka kideksaka, ka pi khiak lai atheimite nam ngei mitmuh a hihsiata a om louhna dingun ka min jiakin ka gamtang zota ahi.
Huailou leng, namte lakah amau ka dalhsak dinga, gam chih ah ka thelthang sak ding, gamdai ah ban jak hialin ka na chi a.
Ka thugelte a jui kei ua, ka dan bawlte a pai khia ua, ka khawlnite a bohsia ua, a pate uh milim lam a ngat jiakun,
Huailou leng, dan bawl hoih lou ka piaa, a hin louhna ding ua thugelte toh;
A thil tan uh, sul hongmi tengten mei a paihna uah amaute ka hihnina, ka lungjuang saka, a tawpa TOUPA ka hi chih a theihna ding un.
Huaijiakin mihing tapa, a kiang uah thu gen inla, a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Na pate un hialte ah a hon gense lailai uh ahi, ka tunga tatlekna thil ahih uahte.
Ban jak hiala amaute ka chiam gamah ka honpi lutin, tang sang leh sing buk lian a muh peuhmah uah a kithoihnate uh a lan ua, a thil lat uh hehhuai mahmahte a pia uh.
A gimlimte uh a bawl ua, a dawn ding thil latte uh a bungkhe ngal ua, chiin.
Huchiin ken a kianguah, Mun sanga na hoh nak uh bang na chihna uh ahia? ka chi a; huchiin a min adingin tuni tanin, Bamah, chih a hita hi.
Huchiin Israel inkote kiangah gen inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Na pate uh bang jelin noumau na kihihnin un a kihhuaina bang un hup mang na hi ding uh maw?
Na thil tan uh na lan un, na tate uh meiah na pai ua, tuni tanin na milimte tengteng un na kihihnin uh ahi kei maw?
Noute thudot ding ka hi ahia, aw Israel inkote aw?
A hina ka hin laiteng noute thudotin ka om kei ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
I kim ua nam dang pautuam mite banga singbul suangbul be ding I hi uh, na lungsim un na chi na ua, na hi het kei ding uh.
A hina ka hin laiteng, khut thagui hat takin, ban jak kawm leh heh suahin na tunguah ka lal ngeingei ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
Namte laka kipan ka honpi khe dinga, dalhsaka na omna gam ua kipan khut hat tak leh ban jak leh heh suahin ka honpi khawm ding.
Pau tuam mite gamdai gamah ka honpi lut dinga, ki maituahin I kisual ding uh,
Aigupta gam gamdaia na pate uh ka sual bang takin nou leng ka honsual ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan chiang nuaiah ka honlut sak dinga, thukhun delhkhumna nuaiah ka honpilut ding hi;
Huan na lakua kipan mi helte leh ka tunga talekmite ka khuah siang dinga, a omna gam ua kipanin kapi khe dinga, himahleh Israel gamah a lut het kei dinguh: huchiin TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Noute ahihleh, Aw Israel inkote aw, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ka thu na ngaihkhiak sin kei uleh tunung chiang inleng na milim na uh sem chiat maita unla; himahleh ka min siangthou bel na thilpiakte u leh na milimte un na hihnin ta kei ding uhi.
Ka tang siangthou, Israel sanna tang ah, huaiah Israel inkote tengtengin a vek un, huai gamah ka na a sem ding uh; huaiah amaute ka pakta ta dia, huaiah na thillatte uh na thilpiak hoih tatate uh, na thil tan tengteng uh ka deihta ding.
Namte lak akipan ka hon lak khiak hun chiangin leh gam chiha na dalhna ua kipan ka honpi khawm hun chiangin, gimlim dingin noute ka honsangta dinga, namte mitmuhin noute ah ka sianthoudan a langta ding, TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi hi.
Huan Israel gam, ban jak hiala na pate uh piak ka chiam gama noute ka honpi lut hun chiangin TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh,
Huan huaiah n aomdante u leh na thilhih uh, na kihihnitna tengteng uh na thei t ading uh; huchiin na thilhoih lou hih tengtengte uh jiakinnoute mitmuh ngeiin na kihta ding uhi.
Huan na omdan hoihloute uh bang hi loua, na thilhih uh thulimloute bang leng hi sam loua, ka min jiaka noute ka honpichin sak hun chiangin, aw Israel innkote aw, TOUPA kahi chih na thei ta ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, sim lam masuan inla, simlam ngain na thu khah inla, sim lam gammangpi lamah thu gen inla,
sim lam gammangpi kiangah, TOUPA thu ngai in, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai in, nangah mei ka toh dinga, nanga sing hing tengteng a kang bei dinga, sing keu peuhmah leng: mei kuang luahluah a dai kei ding, sim akipana mal tanin, matuah teng a kangvom ding hi.
Huan mi tengtengin kei TOUPA meikhahpa ka hi chih a mu ding ua, a mit kei ding, a chi hi, chi in, a chi a.Huchiin ken, A!
TOUPA PATHIAN, Gentehna thugenmi lel avele, honchi kei dia, ka chi a.
Huchiin ken, A!
TOUPA PATHIAN, Gentehna thugenmi lel avele, honchi kei dia, ka chi a.
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, Jerusalem maituah inla, a mun tante lam ngain na thu khah inla, Israel gam tungah thu gen in;
Israel gam kiangah, hichiin TOUPAN a chi ahi: Ngaiin, ka hondou ahi, ka namsau a pai akipan ka phawi dinga, na lak ua mi diktat leh diktatlou kibangsapin ka phuk ding.
Huchiin na lak ua mi diktat leh diktatlou ka phuk ding jiakin ka namsau a pai akipan a pawt dinga, sim lam akipan mal lam phain mihing tengteng a phuk ding hi.
Huan, mi tengtengin, kei TOUPAN ka namsau a pai akipan ka phawi ahi chih a thei ding uh, a kikhum ngei nawnta kei ding hi.
Huaijiakin nang mihing tapa, thum huthut inla khase takin a mit muh un thum in.
Huan, Bang dia thum na hia? a honchih uleh, Thu thang jiakin ahi, a hontung sin ngala, huaihunin lungtang chiteng a jul dinga, khut tengteng a zo dinga, lungsim chiteng a bah dinga, khuk tengteng tui bangin a zo ding; ngaiin, a hongtung hi, a tangtun ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi; chi in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kianga
Mihing tapa, thu gen inla, hichiin TOUPAN a chi ahi:
Namsau, namsau tat-hiam ahita, tetsak ahi ta, mi satna dinga tat-hiam a hita, tetsak ahi, khophia bangin!
I namsau lailai ding maw? ka tapa, chiang na simmoha, singa bawl peuhmah toh.
Tetsak ahi, leh dingin, ahi namsau tathiam tetsak ahi, thatmi khuta tuang ding in.
Mihing tapa, kikou inla; sehalham inla, ka mite tungahi ngala; Israel mi lian tengtengte tung mahmah: piak ahi ua, ka mite toh, namsau nuaiah; huaijiak in kikou inla, na pheipi beng in.
Hiai namsau midang tunga chiamtehsa ahi ngala, na ngaihsak kei hita leh bang suak ding-chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi hi.
Huaijiakin nang, mihing tapa, khut beng hialin thu gen in; thaha om dingtea ding namsau nihvei liksukin om hen, ahi, thumvei; tampi thah nading namsau ahi hi:
Lungtang zul, a pukna uh a pun nadingin, namsau te kong biang tengah ka giaksak hi; a! khopia bangin a te zolzol, sihna namsau.
Nakpiin gamtangin, tak lamah, gamtangin vei lam ah leng van jel inla, na majawn peuhmah ah leng.
Ken leng khut ka beng dinga, ka tangtun ngei ding, ka hehna, kei TOUPA hiai ka gent hi, a chi, chi in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, Babulon kumpipa namsau hongtun theihna dingin lampi nih nabawl in; huai lampi nihte gam khat akipanin a hongpawt khe ding uh ahi: lampi kawkmuhna bawl inla, khopi lutna khomual ah bawlin.
Lampi Ammon mite khua Rabbaha namsau hongtunna dingin sep inla, Juda gam lai Jerusalem kulh ah leng.
Aisan dingin Babulon kumpipa lampi ka ah a dinga, lampi nih kigawmna takah; thalte a sing loloka terephim a donga, sa sin a en a.
A aisanna a h a khut tak lamah Jerusalem a natuangta a, kulhsutsiatnate gal sual awng juajuate, kongpi jawa kulhsutsiatna te, mual pawng sunte, kulh bawlte toh.
Aisan vuaksuak lel bang ahi a, himahleh mata a omna ding ua a thulimlouhna uh theih khiakna lel ding ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi ahi: na thulimlouhna uh theih gigena dia na bawl jiak un na tatleknate uh a hongkilang, na thilhih tengteng uah na khelhnate uh a kimu kilkela, theihkhiak na honghih tak jiak un khuta mat na honghi ding uhi.
Huan, nang, Israel heutu, mi gilou si dinga liampa, na gitlouhna gawtna tawp ni a hongtung e;
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: Heutu lukhu pahihsak unla, lallukhu suhsak un, hiai a ngeiin a om kei ding: mi vuallelte tawi sang unla, mi liante vuallel sak un:
Ka lumlet ding, ka lumlet ding, ka lumlet ding; hiai leng a ngeiin a om kei ding, a neimi tak ding a hongpai mateng amah ka pe ding.
Huan nang mihing tapa, thu gen inla, hichiin chi in: TOUPA PATHIANIN Ammon tate tungtangah leh a gensiatna thu uah hichiin a chi ahi: Namsau, namsau phawi a hita, mi thahna ding leh hihmanna ding khophia banga tetsak a hita.
Kilakna taklou nang a honmu sak ua, juauin ai a honsan sak ua, Namsau bel mi gilou si dinga liam, a gitlouhna ni uh tawp hongtung dingte ngawng ah na golh sin, a honchih un a juau uh ahi.
A pai ah thun in, Na pianna siama na omna gam ngeiah na thu ka ngaihtuah ding.
Na tungah ka hehna ka sung dia, ka thangpaihna mei na tungah ka toh ding, mi nun se tak, hihman siam tak khutah ka honman sak ding.Meia sisan a bo ding, theih mahmah na hita kei ding, kei TOUPAN ka genta ngala, a chi, chi in, a chi a.
Meia sisan a bo ding, theih mahmah na hita kei ding, kei TOUPAN ka genta ngala, a chi, chi in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Huan, nang mihing tapa, sisan suah hat khopi na lang sin ahia? na lang sin ahia? a kihhuaina tengteng theisak dih ve:
Huan a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: khopi, a hun hongtunna dinga amah sunga sisan suah leh amah kihihnin dinga milim bawl:
Na sisan suahna ah mohna na pua a, na milim bawl ah na kihihnin ahi; na hunte na naisaka, na kumte na tung phialphiala; huaijiakin namte kiangah gen siat ding leh gam tengteng engbawl dingin ka honbawl ahi.
Na naiha mi leh na gamlata miten a honsimmoh dingua, nang, min siat pua leh buainaa dim mi:
Ngai in, Israel heutute mi chihin a thilhihtheihna bang jel ua sisan suah mai dingin nangmah ah a om uh ahi.
Nang ah min nu leh pa te a musit ua, nang ah mikhualte a nuaisiah ua, nang ah tagahte leh meithaite a mawkbawl uh.
Ka thil tante na musita, ka khawlnite na bohsia a.
Nang ah sisan suah dingin mi hekhathatte a om ua, nang ah tangsanga nete a om ua, nang ah hukna a ching uh.
Nang ah a pate uh vuaktanna lem sak a om ua, nang ah numei kizen louh lai luppih a om uh.
Huan min a innveng ji tungah thil kihhuai a hiha, mi dangin huk takin a mou a hihnina, mi dangin nang ah a sanggamnu, a pa tanu ngei a zahlaksak a.
Nang ah sisan suah dingin golhna a la ua, a nou leh a pung na laa; na inveng nuaisiahin huaiham takin na lepguk sak seka; kei mahmah leng na honmangngilha, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huaijiakin, ngaiin, na na lepgukna thu ahte, nanga sisan pawt thu ah te khut ka honbet khum ding.
Nang ka honsual ni chiangin na lungtangin a thuak zouin na khut a hat thei sin ahia?
Kei TOUPA ngeiin ka gentaa, ka hih lai ding.
Huan nam lakah ka hon hihdalh ding, gam chih ah kahon thehjak ding; nanga kipanin na nitnate ka hihmang vek ding.
Namte mitmuhin nangmah kihihnin na hi ding, huan, TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding, a chi, chi in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, Israel inkote ei adingin ek sia lel a honghita ua; a vek un haltuina mei laiah dalte, langvate, sikte, suante ahi uh, dangkasik ek sia lel ahita uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ek sia lel na honghih jiak un, ngai un, Jerusalem laiah ka honkhawm ahi.
Dangkasikte, dalte, sikte, suante, langvate haltuina meia a koih khawm ua, tuisak dinga a tunga mei a toh bang un ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna ah nou ka honkhawm ding, huaiah ka hon koih dinga, ka hontui sak ding.
A hi, ka honkhawm dinga, na tunguah ka hehna mei ka toh dinga, a laiah na tui khin ding uh.
Haltuina mei laia dangkasik a tui bangin nou leng, huai laiah na tui khin ding uh, kei TOUPAN na tunguah kahehna ka sung ahi chih na theita ding uh, achia.
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, a kiangah gen inla.
Gam khuah siang louh nahi, hehna ni chia vuahtui tang lou.
Humpinelkai in humhama a samat a zong bang maiin nangah jawlnei sawmnate a om ahi: mi hinnate a ne khin ua, goute leh thil manphate alaksak ua, a laiah meithai tampi a bawl uh.
A siampute leng nakpi takin ka dan ah a talek ua, ka thil tante a hihnin uh ahi, thiltante leh thil namai himhim a khen kei ua, mite lah thil siangthou leh siangthou lou a khen tuan sak sam kei uh; ka lak uah hihminsiatin ka om hi.
A laia heutute lah nge duh gawl nek ding zong bang lel ahi ua, sisan suaha mi hinnate hihmangin ginomlou taka alep theihna ding un.
Huan, a jawlneiten sunuin bang a nuh ua, kilakna bangmahlou lel a mu ua, juauin ai a san ua, TOUPAN bangmah a gen louhin leng, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi, a chi sek uh.
Gama mipiten nuaisiah a chingua, loh a hat ua, ahi, mi genthei leh tasamte a mawkbawl ua, dik lou takin mikhualte a nuaisiah nak uhi.
Gam ka hih siat louhna dingin a lak ua dai kai ding leh gam huma ka maa pang ding mi ka zonga, lah ka mu kei hi.Huaijiakin a tunguah ka hehna ka sung botaa, ka thangpaihnain meiin ka hal mangta ahi; a om dan ngei uh a tunguah ka thangpaihnain meiin ka hal mangta ahi; a om dan ngei uh a tunguah ka tungsak ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chi in, a chi a.
23 AHOLAH LEH AHOLIBAH HUKNA GENTEHNAIN NAMDANG ZOP GENSIAT
Huaijiakin a tunguah ka hehna ka sung botaa, ka thangpaihnain meiin ka hal mangta ahi; a om dan ngei uh a tunguah ka thangpaihnain meiin ka hal mangta ahi; a om dan ngei uh a tunguah ka tungsak ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chi in, a chi a.
23 AHOLAH LEH AHOLIBAH HUKNA GENTEHNAIN NAMDANG ZOP GENSIAT
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, numei nih, nu khat ta a om ua,
Aigupta gamah a huk mang ua, a tuailai neu ua huk ahi ua, huaiah a nawi a khoih ua, a tuailai nawi uh a mek sak ek uh.
Khat, a upa pen min Aholah ahi a, a sanggamnu bel Aholibah ahi; keia ahonghita ua, tapate tanute a suang ua.
Huan, a min uh, Aholah Samaria ahi ua; Aholibah bel Jerusalem ahi.
Huan Aholah keia a hih nungin a huk mang nawn a, a deihtak, a inveng, Assuria a nounou a;
Ukpipate, vaihawmmite, tangval iplahhuai mahmah ngen, sakol tung tuang mi, puan sandupa kijem te.
Hiai Assuria tangval hoihte tengteng lakah a kiphal gai ua, huan a nouhnouhte milim tengtengin a kihihnin nawn behlap a,
A tuailai neua kipan a nawite a khoihsak sek uh leh a luppih sek jiak un Aigupta akipanin a huk a tawp tuankeia, amau leng a hukna uh a tunguah a hihpiching uhi.
A deihtakte, Assuria, a nouhnouhte khut ngeiah ka mansak ahi.
Hiaiten a vuaktanna a lem dawk sak ua, a tanu leh a tapate a laksak ua, amah leng namsauin a that ua, numeite lakah a kikhemlauna pen uh a honghita, a tunga gel bang a mualsuahta.
Huan a sanggamnu Aholibahin hiai a mua, himahleh a u sangin a deihtak nouhnouhna ah a uang jawin, a hukna sangin a uang semsem lai hi.
Assuria mi, a inveng gam ukpipa leh vaihawmpa tangval etlahhuai tak ngen, sakol tung tuang mi, kilawm taka kivante a nounou hi.
Hihnitin a om chih ka mua, a nih un lam kibang a tawn lel uhi.
Huan a huknate a uang sak sema, pasal lim banga tuang, Kaldai mite lim, sanau taka zep,
a kawnga kawng gaka gak, dial kilawm tak khim, a vek ua lal mel pu tak, Kaldai gam, a pianna gam ua Babulon mite bang takte a muh jiakin.
Huan amau a muh takin a nounou a, a kiang uah Kaldai phain mi a sawla.
Huan Babulon mite a a kiangah, kingaihna lupnaah a hongpai ua, a hukna un a hihnin ua, a kihihkihhuai khinta ua, amau amah a nel mahmah uh.
Huchiin a hukna a hihlanga, a vuaktanna lem saka, a sanggamnun a honnel bangin aman leng a honnel ta hi.
Himahleh a tuailaia Aigupta gama a huk lai a theihgige jiakin a huk tuan semsem a.
Huan a angkawm mite, a sa sabengtung sa bang mai, a thil pawt, sakolte thil pawt bang mai,
Huchibangin na tuailai nawite a hon khoihsak ek lai na thei khe nawnta ahi.
Huaijiakin, aw Aholibah, hichibangin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi; Ngai in, nang honit, na lungsimin a nelsate ka tamsak dinga, kil chiha kipan ka pi khawm ding.
Babulon mite leh Kaldai mi tengteng, Pekod te, Shoa te, Koa te leh a kiang ua Assuria mi tengteng toh; tangval etlahhuai taktakte, ukpite, vaihawmmite, a vek un mi liante leh minthangte, a vek un sakol tung tuangin a hongpai ding uh.
Huan galvante, kidouna kangtalaite, kangtalaite leh mipi omkhawmin a hongsual ding ua; lum lian leh lum neu, dal lukhute toh na kimin a honum ding ua; huan a kiang uah vaihawmna ka kem sak dinga, a thu gel bang zel un na tungah a hihtangtung ding uhi.
Huan na tungah ka lunghihlouhna ka tung sak dinga, heh mahmahin nang a hon sual dingua, na nakte leh na bilte a tan ding ua, a dam sunte namsauin a si ding uh, na tanu leh na tapate a honlak sak ding ua, a damsunte meiin a kang lum ding uh.
Na puansilhte a honhawksak lai ding ua, na kizepna kilawm taktakte a la mang ding uh.
Na hukna leh Aigupta gam akipana na kizuakna a honhih tawpsak ding ua, huchiin amau lam ah na mit na leng sak nawn kei dia, Aigupta gam na theigige nawnta kei ding.
TOUPA PATHIANIN lah hichiin a chi ngala: Ngai in, na huat mahmah, nang hon nim takte khut mahmah ah ka honman sak ding.
Huat petmahin a honho ding ua, na sepgim gah tengteng a honlak sak ding ua, vuaktangin kihawmkhaiin a hontai san ding uh; na kizuakna vuaktanna, na hukna leh na kizuakna ngei hihlatin a om ding hi.
Hiai thilte na tungah a hongtung ding, nam dangte delhin na huk mang dinga, a milimte ua na kihihnit jiakin.
Na sanggamnu lampi na tawn teia, huaijiakin amah nou na khutah ka honpe ding.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Na sanggamnu nou thuk leh lian na dawn dinga, nuihsan leh simmohin na om ding:
Khamna leh lungkhamnain na dim dinga, lamdang sakna leh siatna nou, na sanggamnu Samari nou toh na dawn gai keuhkeuh dinga;
Na dawn dinga, a nou leng na tawp siang vek ding; na sam na phawi kei dia, na nawite na ham kek ding; ken lah ka chita ngala chih, TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Na honmangngilha na honna dal jiakin na hukna leh na kizuakna moh na po mai dinga hi.
Huailou leng TOUPAN ka kiangah a gen nawna, Mihing tapa, Aholah leh Aholibah na lang sin ahia?
A kihhuaina uh a kiang uah phuangin.
Ang a kawmta ngal ua, sisan a khut uah a banga, a milim kiangah ang a kawmta uhi; a tapate uh kei adia a suan uh a kiang ua kang mang dingin mei ah a pai ua.
Huailouin leng, ka kiangah hiai a chi uh ahi; amau mahin ka mun siangthou ahih nin ua, ka khawlnite uleng a bohsia uhi.
A milimte uh adia a tate uh a thah nung un, amau mahin ka mun siangthou hihnin dingin a lut sek ngal ua; huan ngai in, hichibangin ka insung mahmah ah a hih sek uhi.
Huan huailou leng, gamla pia mi hong dingin na thukhak ua, mi na sawl ua, ngai in, a hong ua, amau elin na kisil sianga, na mit na nuha, kizephoihna dangte na silha, lupna thupi takah na tua.
A maah dohkan na bawla, ka gimlim leh ka sathaute huaiah na lui sek ahi.
Huan huaiah mipi nuamtawl husa zak ahia, mi namai kia lou leng gamdai akipanin zu khamte a honpi ua, anih un taute a bun ua, lukhu kilawmte a khu uh.
Huan ken, Angkawmnu tek nunga kithuahpih nuam sin un aman a ngap peuhmah diam maw?
Ka chi a.
Huan kizuak kianga a hoh bang un a kiangah a lutta thou ua; huchiin numei huk Aholah leh Aholibah kiangah a lutta uhi.
Himahleh mi diktatten angkawmnute leh sisan suah hat numeite vai a hawm bang un a hawm sak ding ua, angkawmnute a hih ua, a khut ua sisan a ban jiakin.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ngala: Na tunguah mipi ka kaikhawm dinga, ka honlok sak dinga, ka honbawl sak ek ding.
Huan, mihonten suangin a deng ding ua, a namsau un a sat lum ding ua, a tanute uh, a tapate uh a that ding ua, a inte uh a halsak ding uh.
Hichibangin hukna gam akipan ka hihmang dinga, numei tengtengin na hukna uh chin louh hial dinga hi chih na theihna ding un.Huan na tunguah na hukna uh a honthuk ding ua, na milim khelhnate uh na thuak ding uh, kei TOUPA PATHIAN ka hi chih na thei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan na tunguah na hukna uh a honthuk ding ua, na milim khelhnate uh na thuak ding uh, kei TOUPA PATHIAN ka hi chih na thei ding uh, a chi a.
Kum kuana, kha sawmna, huai kha, ni sawm niin TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Mihing tapa, ni min, tuni ni min ngei gelhin; hiai ni ngeiin Babulon kumpipan Jerusalem a hongsual pana.
Huan helhat inko kiangah gentehna thu gen inla, a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi;
Sa-ui bel suang inla, suang thek inla, a sungah tui sung inla: sabakte kha inla, a sa hoih tengteng, a phei te, a liang te, a guhbawk hoih tatain hih dim in.
Gan honte laka a hoih tata la inla, a nuaiah singkhuah khul ek inla, sou bobolh heh; ahi, a guhbomte kiui heh.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Sisan suah hat khopi, saui bel, a sung kang gem, a gem dai ngei nai lou a tung a gik hi: tel tuanlouin, a sa bak khatkhatin thukin.
A sisan suah lah amah tungah a om ngala, leivui vuh theihna dia leia sun buak gentak louhin suangpi keu tungah a sungbo zota.
Phu la dinga hehna a hongkisak theihna dingin vuh louhin a sisan suah suangpi keu tungah ka sung ahi.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Sisan suahhat khopi a tung a gik hi: Kei mahmah in ka vum venvon ding.
Sing vum venvon unla, mei chih sa unla, sate ui min unla, sa tui chik takin, a guhte leng kang mang hen.
Huchiin bel a vuakin meivu tungah suan hi nilouh henla, a hongsa dinga, a dal a hongam dinga, a nitna a hongzul mang dinga, a kang khem a kat mang theihna dingin.
Chimtak khopa sualin leng a kang khem a siang tuan keia, meiin leng akang siang sam kei.
Na nitna hukna ahi a, ka honkhuaha, na sian tuan louh jiakin na tungah ka hehna ka lungdam sak ma teng chikchiang mah inleng na nitna akipan khuahsiang na hi nawnta kei ding hi.
Kei TOUPAN ka chita ahi, a hong tung mahmah ding, ken ka hih ding, ka nungkin kei dinga, ka hawi sam kei dinga, ka lunghei sam kei ding; na omdante leh na thil hih bang zelin vai a honhawm sak ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chi in, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna, ka kiangah,
mihing tapa, ngai in, thakhatin na mit taina pen ka honlaksak dinga, na sun dinga hi kei dia, na kah ding leng ahi sam kei, na khitui leng a kiak dinga hikei hi.
Asimin thum inla, misi sunna himhim nei ken, na dial khim inla, na khedap bulh inla, na muk hum kenla, mite an leng ne ken, a chi a.
huchiin zingsang lamin mipite kiangah thu ka gena, nitak lamin ka zi a si mai maha; huan, zingsang lamin a honthu piak bangin ka hi.
huan miten ka kiangah, hichibang na thilhihte kou ding in bang ahia a hih nah on hilh sin ka hia?
Achi ua.
huchiin a kiang uah, TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hong tungta.
Israel inkote kiang ah gen inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi ahi: ngai unla ka mun siangthou, na hatna suan pen uh, na mit taina pen uh, na deihlam pen uh ka hih niin sin ahi; huan na tanute uh; na tapate uh, nunglam a na nutsiatte uh namsau in apuk ding uh.
ka hih bang geihin na hih tei sin uhi; na muk uh na hum kei ding ua, mite an leng na ne sam kei ding uh.
na dialte uh leng na khim ding ua, na khedap uh na bun ding ua: na sun kei ding ua, na kap sam ke ding ua, na thulimlouhnate uah na mangthang ding ua, na kikah tuah ding uh.
huchibang in Ezekiel nou ading in etsakna ahi dinga. ahih dan bang zelin na hih ding uh ahi: hiai ahong tun hun chiang in TOUPA PATHIAN kahi chih na thei ding uh, achi ahi, ka chi a.
Huan, nang mihing tapa, amau a kipan ahatna te uh, athupi kipahnate uh, amit taina pente uh, alung lut pante uh, atanu uhleh atapate uh ka lak mang ni chiang in,
Huai ni mahmah chiang in a taikhia na kiang a hong pai dinga, ahong theisak sin kei dia hia?huaini chiang in tai khe kiang ah na kam na ka dinga, akiang thu na gen dinga, na dai mang maimah kei ding; huchiin amau ading in etsakna na hi dinga; huan TOUPA kahi chih a thei ding uh, a chi a.
huaini chiang in tai khe kiang ah na kam na ka dinga, akiang thu na gen dinga, na dai mang maimah kei ding; huchiin amau ading in etsakna na hi dinga; huan TOUPA kahi chih a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hong tunga, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, Ammon tate ma suan inla, atungtang thu uh gen in.
Huan Ammon tate kiangah, TOUPA PATHIAN thu ngai khia unla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi ahi: ka mun siangthou hihnita a oma, Israel gam hih gawpa a oma, zuda inkote sala pi a omlai ua, Awi ing e: Numei: na na chihjiak in,
Ngai in, suahlam mite kiang aha hong tan ding unka hon pe sin ahi; nang ah buk akoih ding ua, nang ah tenna a bawl ding uh; na theigahte a ne ding u, na nawi tui a dawn ding uh.
Rabba khua sangawngsau in dingin ka bawl dia, Ammon tate mun ganhon kualna mun ding in ka bawl ding; huchiin TOUPA kahi chih na thei ding uh.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi ngala: Israel gam tunga nakhut na bet a, na khe na peka, lungsim teng tenga a siatna tunga na kipah jiakin.
Ngai in, na tungah ka khut ka lik dinga, namte kiangah gallak ding in ka honman sak sin ahi; mite a kipan kahon phuk dinga, huai gam a kipan in ka hon hih mang vengveng ding, ka honhihse dinga, huchiin TOUPA kahi chih na thei ding, chiin.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi ahi: Moab leh Seirin, Ngai in, Zuda inkote nam dang bang ahi uh, achih jiak un.
Moab pang khat, khopite lampang, gamgi zul a khopi, a gamthupi na pente, Beth-Zeshimit te, Baalmeon te, Kiriathaim te kahong dinga,
Suahlam tate tan dingin Ammon tate kape dinga, Ammon tate namte laka theih gige ahih nawnlouhna ding un.
Moab gam tungah thugel ka tangtung sak dinga, huchiin TOUPA kahi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi a; Edom in Zuda inkote tunga phu la in nakpitak in thil a nahihkhial ahi, amah thu kiaa a tung ua phu alak jiakin.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hi chiin achi hi: Edom tungah ka khut kalik dinga, a lak ua kipan mi leh sate ka phuk mang vek ding; Teman a kipanin ka hih gawp dinga; Dedan phain namsau in asi ding uh.
Huan ka mi Israel te khut in ka phu lakna ka tungsak dinga, Edom tungah ka hehna bangzel leh ka thangpaihna bang zelin ahih ding ua, ka phulakna a na thei ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin in achi ahi: Philistia miten phulaa, khantawn kimelmaknaa, mi hihman utna lungsim sia puaa phua lak jiak un.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi ahi, ngai in, Philistia mite tungah ka khut kalik dinga, Kareth kho mite ka phuk vek dinga, tui gei a mi omsunte ka hihmang vek ding.Huan, heh mahmah in sal in a tunguah phu ka la dinga, huchia a tung ua ka phulakna ka tun sak hun chiang in TOUPA kahi chih a thei ta ding uh, achi a.
Huan, heh mahmah in sal in a tunguah phu ka la dinga, huchia a tung ua ka phulakna ka tun sak hun chiang in TOUPA kahi chih a thei ta ding uh, achi a.
Huan kum sawm leh khatna kha ni masapen in hichi ahi a, TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hong tung a,
Mihing tapa, Turain Jerusalem tung thu a, Nuam e, Namte kongkhak a seta,. keilamah aki hong, hihsiat gawp a aom vek jiak in, katan hoih dingahita, achih jiak in TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi hi,
Ngai in, aw Tura, ka hondou ahi, tuipiin akihawt a voktou bang main na tung a hongpai dingin nam tampi ka hon sawl ding.
Huan Tura kulh te a hihse ding ua, a insangte a chim sak ding ua, amah a kipan leivui tengteng a kheuh siang hiau dinga, leivui lel in ka bawl ding.
Tuilai a len phoukeuna mun ahimai ding ken ka chita ngal a, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi; huchiin namte adin gallak ahi mai ding.
Huan atanu gam a omte namsau a hihlup ahi ding ua, huchiin TOUPA kahi chih a thei ding uh.
Ngai in, Tura tungah babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar, Kumpipate kumpipa mallam a kipanin, sakolte toh sakol tung tuangmite, apawl leh mipi tampi mahmah ka honpi sin ahi.
Na tanute a that ding, gamah, namsau in; kulh abawl dinga, nang nanna ding in, nang douna dingin a bawl ding, mual pawngte, nang douna kidalna a bawl khe ding.
Kulhsuktsiatna a bawl, na kulh phelna ding, na insang achim sak ding, heipiin.
A sakol tam jiakin a hon tuam ding, leivuiin, khopi siata mite a lutsek bangin, na kongpi a hong lut tei hun chiang un, na kulhpi a liing ding sakol tungte husa leh kidou kangtalai husain.
Sakol khechinin achil seding, na kongzingte; na mite a that khin ding, namsauin; na hatna bangsang leiah a chim ding.
Na gouthil gallak in ala ding ua; na van tengteng a gubei ding uh; na kulhbang lei ah a chim sak ding ua, na inpinuam a hih se vek ding uh, na suangte, na singte, na leivuite tuilai ah a pai ding uh.
Ka khawl sak khin dinga, na lasak husate, na kaihging ging leng a dai den ding hi.
Suangpi keu lel in ka hon bawl dinga, len phoukeu na ding lel na hong hi ding hi, din sak nawn na hi kei ding, kei TOUPAN ka chita ngala, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi hi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN Tura khua kiangah hichiin achi a, na sunga kithahnate a om huna, miliam te a thum hun uh chiang in na puk ging in tuipi gei gamte a ling sin kei ua hia?
Tuipi tunga heutute tengteng a tutphah a kipan a paisuk ding ua, apuan thupite uh a koih ding ua, a puansilh zephoihte uh a suah ta ding ua; linnain a kivan zota ding ua, lei ah a tu ding ua, a lingling ding ua, lamdang a honsa ding uh.
Huchiin nang sunna la a phuak ding ua, na kiangah, khopi minthang, tuipi tung a hat, tui siam mitengteng tenna sek, a mah leh a sung a tengte tengteng, mi vial vak ten a hon lau theihtheih utoh, na siatna thupi hina tele:
Na pukna niin a ling uh, tuikulh gamte; tuipi tuikulh a lunglel ua, na man niin, a chi diing uh chiin.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achingala, khopi gam, kuamah luahlouh khopi bang a ka hon bawl hun chiang in, tui thukpi ah ka hon tum sak dinga, tui thupi mahmah in a hon tum ding hi;
Leinuai lam ah, nidanga segawpsa, khuk thuka paisa te kiangah ka hon teng sak dinga, kuamah in a hon luahlouh na ding un leh mihingte laka thupina na muh nawn hetlouh na dingin.Ka hon hih mang vengveng dinga, na om nawnta kei ding, min hon zong mah le uh leng, a hon muta keiding uh chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
Ka hon hih mang vengveng dinga, na om nawnta kei ding, min hon zong mah le uh leng, a hon muta keiding uh chih TOUPA PATHIAN thupawt ahi.
TOUPA thu ka kiangah hongtunga, ka kiangah,
Nang, mihing tapa, Tura kho suna la phuak inla,
Tura khua kiangah-Aw nang tuipi geia teng sek, tuipi gei gam tampite kianga sumsin, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a hon chi ahi: Aw nang Tura, ka kilawm buching na chi maw:
Na gam in tuipi lai a sun hi, nang hon bawlten a hon kilawm tungtuan sak mah ve ua;
Na singzat Senir meilahin a bawl ua; na long peu ding in, Lebanon sidar;
Bashan tosaw na longzapna ding in a bawl ua; Saiha suang phum na long pialkhang ding in tak sing, tuipi gam Kupra akipan.
Na long puan zak Aigupta puan malngat gial, nang chiamteh na ding in a natung hi, nang dia limzak dum buang, sandup, Elishah tui gei gam akipan;
Na longkalmi Sidon, Arvad mi ahi; na long hawlmite leng Zemir misiamte ahi ua;
Gebal upa leh mi khutsiam, na long bultuahmite ahi ua, tuipi long teng leh a miten, nang hongdawl dingin ahong zuan uh.
Na galbawlmi, na sepaih hon, Persia, Lud, Put mite ahi ua, a lum uh leh a dal lukhu uh nang ah a bang ua, nang kilawmsak te hi uhi.
Na sepaih hon Arvad mitoh a tuang ua, na kulhpi tungah, na insang Gammadim te galvilin, a lum uh a bang ua, na kulhpi kimvel in, nang kilawm sakte ahi uhi.
Na hauh jiak in, sum leh pai gou thil chiteng, Tarshish nang hondawlmi a honghi a, na van leiin a honlam hi, dangkasik, sik, langva, leh a suante leng.
Zavan, Tubal, Meshek, nang hondawl ten sal leh dal tuiumbelsuanin a hondawl ua, na van neih na dingin.
Beth-togar-maha miten sakol, kidouna sakol leh sabengtung in na van a lei zel uh.
Dedan mite nang hondawl mite ahi ua, tuigei munchih na sumsinna mun a honghi, saiha leh eboni ahon puak uhi.
Van na hauh jiakin, Edom nang hon dawl a honghia, Emeraldi suan, Puan sandup, puan zep, puan malngat, khibah, rubi suangtein nang a hon dawl uh.
Zuda leh Israel teng nang hondawlte ahi ua, Minnith buh leh Pannag, khuaizu, sathau leh sing naiin a hon dawl uh.
Na hauh jiakin, sum leh pai gou thil chiteng, Damaska nang hondawl a honghi a, Helbon uain leh belam mul kangin a hondawl hi.
Uzal uain hontawiin a lei zel ua, na vante, siktetak, singguithak leh kawltute na sumsinna.
Sakol tung phah puante in Dedanin nang a hondawl a.
Arabia leh kedar kumpipate nang hon dawlte ahi vek uh, Belam noute, belamtalte, keltaltein nang a hondawl uh.
Sheba leh Raamah sumsinmite nang hondawlte a honghi ua, gimlim hoihpente suangmantam chi chih leh dangkaengtein, nang a hondawl uh.
Haran, Kanneth leh Eden, Sheba leh Assuria leh Kilmad sumsinmite nang hondawlte ahi uh.
Huaite ahi uh, nang hondawl, puansilh hoih chi, puan dum buang leh puan zep, pialkhang phah ze kilawm toh, khauhual chip taka hekin, hiaitein nang a hondawl uh.
Tarsish long a vanpo nguanguan te ahi ua, Na honginbulin tuipi tungah na hong thupita.
Na long hawlpan tuipi kihawtah a honhawl luta, suahlam huihin nang a hon nuai mang, tuipi laiah.
Na sum lah pai, na vante, na sumsinna thil, na longmite, longhawlmi, bulhtuakmite, sumsin van khengmite, na galbawl mite tengteng, nanga om, na sunga om tengteng toh, na tum mang ding uh, tuipi laiah, na siat niin.
Na longhawlmite kikou husain na kima mite a ling uhi.
Longkalhna peu lenmite tengteng, longmite leh, tuipia hawlmite tengteng paisukin, a ding ua, luipiau ah.
Na tung thu ah a aw uh zak thamin a suah ding ua, khase takin a kap ding ua; a lu ua leivuite buak in, akitolh ding uh, vut lakah.
Nang jiakin kimet giau in, ateng ding ua, saiip puan; khase luain kapin nang a honsun ding uh, nakpi takin.
Nang honsunin a sam dingua, a kahla uh; Tua bang a oma-tuipi laiah paulehamlou suakta mai?
Na vanten tuipi akipan pawt in mi tampi a vak kham sek; lei kumpipate zaw na hausaka, na sum leh pai tam, na vanin.
Tuipi thuk a na siat niin, na sumsinna thil, na mi tengteng, a thel thang ua, nang toh.
Tui gei mite tengteng in mulkimhuai a hon sa ua; a kumpipate uh lah lauin a sibup ua, a mel uh leng a lamdang zou hial hi.Mite laka sumsinmiten nang a hon ihi khum ua, midangin launa na hong suak ta; Na kilang nawn ngei kei dial eh, chiin a honk ah khum uhi.
Mite laka sumsinmiten nang a hon ihi khum ua, midangin launa na hong suak ta; Na kilang nawn ngei kei dial eh, chiin a honk ah khum uhi.
TOUPA PATHIAN thu ka kiangah a hong ung nawna,
Mihing tapa, Tura heutupa kiangah gen inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: Na lungsim a kisathei a, Pathian ka hi a, tuipi laia Pathian tutmunah ka tu, na chi a: himahleh mihing lel na hia, pathian na hi kei a, pathian lungsim bang in kingaihtuah mahle chin:
Danial sang sangin na pil zawa, nalakah thu guk himhim a om theikeia;
Na pilna leh na lemtheihnain na nakihihhaua; na goubawm ah dangka leh dangkaeng na khuma;
Na pilna thupi mahmah leh na sumsainain sum na hihpunga; na hauh sak jiakin na lungsim a nakisaheitaa;
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi a; Pathian lungsim bang pua na ki ngaihtuah jiak in, ngaiin, pautuam mi, nam lauhuai tak na kiang ah ka hon sawl sin ahi:
Na pilna gah kilawm tungah a namsau uh a lek ding ua, na thupina a hihse ding uh.
Khuk thuk tak ah a hon sawl lut ding ua, tuipi laia a thahte uh sihin na si ding.
Nang honthatmi maah, Pathian ka hi, na chi lailai dia hia?
Nang hon liamsakmi khut ah pathian na hi kei a, mihing lel na hizaw.
Pautuam mite khut ah, zeksumlou sih in na siding; ka pau ta ngala, chih TOUPA Pathian thupawt ahi.
Huailou leng TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, Tura kumpipa sunna la phuah inla, a kiangah, Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi: Hoih buching tak, pilna a dim, kilawmna chiteng:
Pathian huan, Eden ah na tenga; suangmantam chitengin na kituama, sardion, topaz suang leh diamond, beril, onik, zasper, saphir, emeraldi, karbankul, aphum kipna leh a gelh kilawmna dangkaenga bawl te, nang siam nia bawlsa te.
Nang chingmi cherub sathau nilh nahi; Pathian tang singthou ah ka honomsaka, mei suangte lakah na vak.
Na hoih buching; siama na omni akipan, nanga diktatlouhna a om ma tengin.
Na sum sinna a pung hulhul; a hondiksak, hiamgamnain, khelhna ah na napukta hi; Pathian tang akipanin bangmahlouin ka hong paitaa; chingmi cherubin a hon delh khiaa, mei suangte laka kipan.
Na kilawmna jiaka hong kisatheiin, na thupinaa na pilna hihsiain, leiah ka honpala, kumpipate maah mualah ka honphoua-etnop din.
Na sumsin diktatlouh nate ah, na siatna jiak in, na mun siangthoute na hihbuaha, huaijiak in mei ka khah; na sunga kipan, ahong kang bei, leiah leivui ka hon suaksak; a hon mu sekte tengteng muhin.
Mite laka a hon thei peuhmah lamdangsak, launa na hongsuak ta; na om ngei nawn himhim kei ding, chiin.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, Sidon masuan inla, atung thu genin.
Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi: Ka hon nang ahi, aw sidon, ka hihlang ding, ka thupina; nangah TOUPA ka hihdan a thei ding ua, amah ah vai ka hawm hun chiangin, ka ensak mahmah ding, ka siangthouna.
A kongzing ah sisan leh hipi ka tungsak ding, a sung ah mi liam a puk ding ua; mun kil Chiha kipan namsauin.
Huan, TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Huchiin Israel inkote adin sun ding loulingnei a om nawn kei dinga, akim a amau musitmite lakah hihna ding ling a omta keiding; huan, kei TOUPA PATHIAN ka hi chih a thei ding uh
Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: Israel inkote a dalhna gam mite laka kipan ka pi khawm nawn hunin Zakob kiangah ka piak, a gam mahmah uah a teng ta ding uh.Huchiin bit takin a om ta ding ua; ahi, inte a lam ding ua; grep huan a bawl ding ua; bit tak in a om ding ua; a kim ua musit mite tengteng tung a vai ka hawmching in kei TOUPA a Pathian uh ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
Huchiin bit takin a om ta ding ua; ahi, inte a lam ding ua; grep huan a bawl ding ua; bit tak in a om ding ua; a kim ua musit mite tengteng tung a vai ka hawmching in kei TOUPA a Pathian uh ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
Kum sawmna, kha sawmna, huai kha ni sawmnihna ah TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtungta,
Mihing tapa, Aigupta kumpipa Pharo masuan inla, a tungah leh aigupta mitengteng tungah thu genin.
Gen inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN huchiin a chi ahi: Ngaiin, Aigupta kumpipa, Pharo luipite laiah olepi thupi tak, Ka luipi keia ahi, keimah ngei a dia kabawl, chipa ka hondou ahi.
Na haizekte ah ngakuaiin ka honman dinga; luipi a ngasate na lip dingin ka belsak dinga; luipi lai akipan nalip ah ngasate tengteng toh ka honbot khe ding.
Huan gamdai ah ka hong pai dinga, nang leh na luipia ngasa tengteng leng; gamlak ah na puk dia; na luang lawm a hikei dinga, vui na hi sam kei ding; gam sahangte lehtungleng vasate kiangah an dia honpe ding ka hi.
Israel inkote adia sialluang chiang lel na honghih jiakin Aigupta gamah teng tengtengin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Khuta honlet ua, a liangzang uh na tansaka, na satkhia a; hon ngaiua, a kawngte uh kitana tanglouin na omsaka.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichin in achi: Ngaiin, natungah namsau kahontun dinga, na laka kipan mi leh sa ka phuk mang ding.
Huan Aigupta gam, gam segawp leh kho sia ahi mai dinga, kei TOUPA kahi chih a thei dinguh.
Luipi keia ahi a, ka bawl ahi a, na chih jiakin.
Huaijiakin ka hon dou ahi, na luipi leng: Seveneh kulh akipanin Ethiopia gamgi phain Aigupta gam bel gam segawp leh kho siain ka bawl ding.
Mihing khe in asik ngei kei dinga, sate leng a pai ngei sam kei ding ua; kum sawmli sung in luahin a om sam kei ding hi.
Huan Aigupta gam segawpte lakah khatin ka bawl dinga, a khopite ka khopi siate lakah Kum sawmli a kigawp ding: Aigupa mite nam te lakah ka dalh sak dinga, gam chih a ka dalh sak ding.
TOUPA PATHIANIN in hichiin a chi ngala; Kum sawmli nungin a dalhna mite ua kipan Aigupta mite ka lakhawm nawn ding:
Aigupta mite omdan ka hei dinga, a pianna gam uh, Pathros gamah ka kiksak ding; huan huailaiah vuallel takin a lal ding uh.
Lalna gam vuallel pen ahi ding, namte lakah leng a kilalsak nawn kei dinga; Namdang tunga thu a neih nawn louhna dingun amau ka neusak sin ahi.
Amau lam nga peuhmah in a thulimlouhna uh a theikhiak pih sek jiakin Israelte muanpi ahi nawn ta kei ding uh; huan TOUPA PATHIAN kahi chih a thei ding uh, a chi, chi in, chiin.
Huan, huchi ahi a, kum sawmnihleh kum sagihna, kha khatna, huai kha nikhat niin TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzerin Tura tungah na thupitak tak sem ding in a sepaih hon achia, michih lu a giau loh a, mi chih liangzangin a dulhloh lai a; himahleh amah leh a sepaih honten a na sepna uah Tura akipan punna bangmah a mu tuan kei uh.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin chi ahi: ngaiin, Aigupta gam Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzer kiangah ka pe sina, a thil hauh ziazuate a la mang dinga, alok dinga, a gallak sak ding; huai tuh a sepaih honte loh ahi mai ding.
Kana a sep jiakun Aigupta gama loh ding uh ka pia ahi, TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi.Huai ni chiang in Israel inkote dingin ki ka mengkeh sak dinga; alak uah na kam ka ka sak ding; huchiin TOUPA kahi chih thei ding uh, chiin.
Huai ni chiang in Israel inkote dingin ki ka mengkeh sak dinga; alak uah na kam ka ka sak ding; huchiin TOUPA kahi chih thei ding uh, chiin.
TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtung nawna,
Mihing tapa, thu gen inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi hi:
Kikou un, Ehe ehe, tua ni tel: ni anai hi, TOUPA ni anai hi, mei kai ni, pautusm mite siat na ding.
A hong tung sin, namsau, Aigupta tungah; sinlainatna, Ethiopia tungah, Aigupta tungah mi thah a puk un; a thil hih ziazuate a la mang ding ua, a suangphumte a chimse ding hi.
Ethiopia, Pud leh Lud, nam chih om khawm, Kub leh gam tate tel teite tengteng, a puk ding uh, namsau in.
TOUPAN hichiin achi: Aigupta tungding mite leng a puk ding ua, a hanta suansek uh leng a vuallel ding; Migdol akipan Suene pha in namsau in a puk ding ua, TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi.
Gam hih gawp sate laka khat ahi dinga, a khopite leng khopi gawpsate laka ahi mai ding uh.
Aigupta gamah mei ka khak dinga, amau panpihmite tengteng ka hihsiat hun chiangin TOUPA kahi chih a thei ding uh.
Huai ni chiangin Ethiopia mi kigingloute lunglel sak ding in ka kiang akipan mi sawl longin a pai ding ua; huan Aigupta ni mahbangin lungtang mangbatna mahmah a tunguah a tungsam ding hi: ngai in, a hong tung lel lel hi:
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzer khutin Aigupta thil hauh ziazuate ka hiihmang ding.
Gam hihse ding in a mah leh a lawite, namte laka kihtak te tunsak ahi ding uh; Aigupta tungah a namsau uh a lik ding ua, gam mi luangin a dim sak ding uh.
Huan luipite ka kangsak dinga, gam mi giloute kiangah ka khawng ding; a gam leh a sung a om tengteng pautuam mite khut inn ka hih gawp ding: kei TOUPAN ka chita ahi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Milim te ka hihse dinga, Noph khua a kipan milimte ka hih mang ding, Aigupta ah heutu himhim a om ta kei ding uh: huan Aigupta gamah launa ka omsak ding.
Pathros ka hihgawp dinga, Zoanah mei ka khah dia; No khuaah ka tangtung sak ding.
Huan Aigupta kulh Sin kho tungah ka hehna ka lung dam sak dinga, No khuaa mipite ka phuk mang ding.
Huan Aigupta ah mei ka khah dinga, Sin khua buai takin a om dinga, No khua leng a chim vek ding: Noph khuain sun chiangin melma a nei nilouh ding.
Aven leh Pibeseth kho tangvalte namsauin a puk dingua, huai khuate sala piin a om ding uh.
Aigupta hakkol ka hihtana, a hatna akisaktheihpih sek ka hihbei hun Tehaphnehes khua ah ni a mial ding; amah zaw meipin a liah dinga, a tanute sala piin a om ding uh.
Hichibangin Aigupta gamah thu ka tangtung sak ding: huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
Huan hichi ahi a, kum sawmlehkhatna, kha khatna, huai kha nisagih niin TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, Aigupta kumpipa Pharo ban ka kitan saka, huan ngai in, namsau tawi ding ahat nawnna din damdawi nuh leh tuam a loh kei.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai in Aigupta kumpipa Pharo ka dou ahi, a ban a hoih lam leh a kitansa nunglamleng ka kitan sak dinga; huan, a khut a kipan namsau ka kitansak ding.
Huan Aigupta mite namte lakah ka dalhsak dinga, gam chih ah ka thelthangsak ding.
Huan Babulon kumpipa bante ka hatsak dinga, khut ah namsau ka tawisak dinga; Pharo bante bel ka kitansak dinga, a maah sihpih khop liam thumin a thum ding.
Huan Babulon kumpipa bante ka hat sak dinga, Pharo bante bel aluai khe ding; huan Babulon kumpipa khut ah ka namsau ka tawisaka, Aigupta kumpipa tunga a lik hun chiang in kei TOUPA kahi chih a thei ding uh.Huan Aigupta mite namte lakah ka dalhsak dinga, gamchih ah ka thelthangsak vek ding; huan, TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
Huan Aigupta mite namte lakah ka dalhsak dinga, gamchih ah ka thelthangsak vek ding; huan, TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chiin.
Huan hichi ahi a, kum sawm leh khatna, kha thumna, huai kha ni khat niin TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hong tunga;
Mihing tapa, Aigupta kumpipa Pharo leh a khua leh a mite kiangah gen inla: Thupina ah kua na banga ahia?
Ngai in, Lebanon hiang kilawm leh bawk, lim sah, sang kilawm, a dawn mei lakah a om hi.
Tuiin a honvaka, tuithukin a khang sak hulhul, a phuhna luiten a luan kual ua, gam sing chih vakna dingin a luang sak hi.
Huchiin gam sing teng zouin a sang tuana; ahiang a khang, ahiang a sau, tuipi vak, a mengkhe sak hi.
Bu a bawl ua, ahiang ah, tungleng vasaten; ahiang nuai ah sa chiteng in nau a nei ua; alim nuaiah a nam thupi teng a teng uhi.
Huchiin, a kilawm, a thupina, ahiangte sau sauna ah zel in; a zung lah tui tampi te kiangah a om ngal.
Pathian huana sidar sing ten a phazou kei ua; a bawk, meilah sing in adem zou kei hi; ahiang sesingin a pha zou sam kei; a kilawmna ah Pathian huana sing himhim amah a bang zoukei hi.
A hiang tamsakin ka bawl hoiha, Pathian Huana Eden sing tengin a haza uhi, chiin.
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: A hongsan mahmaha, meipi laka a dawn a lena, a lungtanga a sandan a kisaktheihpih jiakin,
Namte lakah mihat tak khut ah ka mansak ding: a thulimlouhdan bangin a gawt dinga, ka delh khe ding.
Huan pautuam mi namte laka kihtakhuai mahmahten a phuk ding ua, a nuse ding uh: tang ahte, guam ahte ahiangte a ke lemlum dinga, huai gam tuiluanna guam tengtengah ahiangte a kitan lemlum ding: khovel a mi tengteng a lim akipan a pawtkhe ding ua, amah a pai san ding uh.
A siatna ah tungleng vasa tengteng a teng ding ua, a bawk tungahte gamsate a om ding uh.
Hiai bel tui a vak sing tengteng a kisansak louh ua, a dawn uh meipi kala lengsak loua, tuia vak sing himhimin a sandan uh a suan sam louhna ding uh ahi: lei mun nuainungpena kokhuka pai suk ta, mihing tate lakah pai dingin, sihnaa matsak a hivekta ngal ua.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Sheola a pai suk niin tui thuktak amah ka sunsaka, a lui te ka khawlsaka; tui tampite a luang kei ua; Lebanon amah ka sunsak laia; gam sing tengteng amah jiakin a gim khin uh.
Namte leng a puk gingah ka lingsaka, kokhuk a paisuksate kianga Sheola ka paihkhiak niin; Eden sing tengteng, Lebanon sing hoih tata, tui a vak tengteng lei nuainungpen ah lungmuangin a omta uh.
Namsau a thahte kiangah Sheol ah a paisuk lai ua; ahi, namte laka, alimnuai a teng sek, akhut leh khe te ngei.Eden singte laka thupina leh letna ah kua ahia nang bang om?
Himahleh Eden singte toh lei mun nuainungpen ah paihkhiak na hi ding; namsaua thah, zeksumlouhte lakah na lum dinga hi.
Hiai bel Pharo leh a khua leh tuite ahi uh, chih TOUP A PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Eden singte laka thupina leh letna ah kua ahia nang bang om?
Himahleh Eden singte toh lei mun nuainungpen ah paihkhiak na hi ding; namsaua thah, zeksumlouhte lakah na lum dinga hi.
Hiai bel Pharo leh a khua leh tuite ahi uh, chih TOUP A PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan hiai ahi, kum sawmlehnihna, kha sawmlehnihna, huai kha ni khat nia TOUPA thu ka kianga hong tung:
Mihing tapa, Aigupta kumpipa Pharo sunna la phuak inla, a kiangah: Namte humpinelkai lunlai kibatpih: tuipia olepi na bang zaw hi; na naka tuite phuansakin, na khein na tok nina, aluite uh na ninsak vekta.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin achi: ka lenin ka honkhuh dinga, mi tampi toh, ka lenin nang a honman ngeingei ding uh.
Gamlak ah ka honnuse dinga, gamlakah ka honpai ding; tung a leng tengteng ka samkhawm ding, na tungah; nang in leipumpi gamsa, ka taisak ding hi.
Tang chih ah na sa ka lui dinga; na luangin guamte ka dimsak ding.
Na tenna gam tang tanin, ka sil ding, na sisanin; guam chih leng a dim ding, nangmahin.
Ka honchimih sak hun chiangin, van ka khuh in aksi ka mialsak ding; meipiin ni ka liah mang ding; khain a vakna a suah kei ding hi.
Na tungah van vakna teng ka mialsak ding; na gamah khomial ka leng sak ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Na theihlouh gama namte laka na siatna ka tunsak hun chiangin mi tampite lungtang ka lungzingsak ding.
A hi, mi tampi nangmah ah lamdangsain ka bawl dinga, a ma ua ka namsau ka leh hun chiangin nang jiakin a kumpipate uh leng mulkimhuai a sa un a lau mahmah ding uh; na puk niin mi chihin a hin uh tan lauin a lingling ding uhi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ngala: Babulon kumpipa namsau na tungah a hongtung sin.
Na mite ka puksak ding, galhatmite namsauin, namte laka kihtakhuai pente ahi uh, a hihse ding uh.
Aigupta mite thupina, a mipite tengteng a hihmang ding uh.
Tui tampi gei gamsa teng ka hihmang ding; mi kheten a ngap ninta kei ding; gamsa kheten leng a ngap nin sam kei ding hi.
Huchiin tui ka chim sak dinga, ka luang sak ding, luite, sathau bangin, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Aigupta gam ka hihse gawp dia, a hauhna tengtengah vuaktangin, a sunga tengte ka phuk mang hun in kei TOUPA kahi chih a thei ngei ding uh.
Hiai a kahla ding uh ahi; nam chih tanuten hiaia kahin Aigupta leh a mi tengteng a sun ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan hichi ahi a, kum sawmlehnihna, huai kha ni sawmlehnga niin TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtunga, ka kiang ah,
Mihing tapa, Aigupta mipite kah ekek inla, amah leh nam minthang tak tanute kokhuka pai suk khinte toh lei nuainung lamah paikhia in.
Kilawmna ah kua ahia khup?
Pai suk inla zeksumlouhte lakah lum in.
Namsaua thahsate lakah a puk ding ua, namsau kianga piak ahi khin ua, amah leh a mite tengteng kai mang un.
Sheola om galhat mi mahmahten amah leh a panpihmite a be ding ua; a paisuk ua, a lum nilouh ua, namsaua thah, zeksumlouhte.
Huailaiah Asshur leh a heute tengteng a om ua; a hante uh amah kimah a oma: a vek un thah, namsau a puk vek ahi uh.
A hante uh kokhuk thuk penah a oma, a han kimah a heute a om uh; a vek ua thah, namsaua a puk vek, mi hing gam galmuanglou sakmite ahi uh.
Huailaiah Elam leh a han kimah a heute a om ua; a vek ua, namsaua puk, lei nuainunga zeksumlouha pai suk.
Mi hing gam galmuanglou sakmite, a zahlakna uh kokhuka paipih sukte ahi uhi.
Mi thahte lakah amah leh a heute lupna a bawlsak ua, a hante amah kimah a oma; a vek un zeksumlouh, namsaua thah, ahi ua; a kihtakhuaina uh mi hing gam gallauna ahi nak a; kokhuka paisuk tate toh a zahlakna uh a pua ua, mi thahte lakah a om sak uhi.
Huailaiah Meshek leh Tubal, a heute uh toh a om ua; a hante uh amau kimah a om a; a vek un zeksumlouh, namsaua thah ahi uh; a kihtakhuaina un mihing gam a hihmang sek ngala.
Zeksumlouh, mi hat pukte, kidouna galvan toha Sheola paisuk tate, a namsau uh lukhama, a guhte uh tunga a lum omte kiangah a lum kei uh: amau lah mi hing gama mi hatte launa ahi ngal ua.
Nang zaw zeksumlouhte lakah kitan lemlumin na om dinga, namsaua site kiangah na lum ding.
Huailaiah Edom, a kumpipate leh a heutute tengteng a om ua: a hatna ua; namsaua thahte lakah a sial uh hi; zeksumlouh, kokhuka pai suksate kiangah lum uhi.
Huailaiah mallam heutute, a vek un, Sidon mi tengteng, thahte laka pai suksate a om ua, a hatna un mi a gallau sak sek naa, a zum ua, zeksumlouhin namsaua thahte lakah a lum ua; kokhuka paisuk khinte toh a zahlak khawmta uhi.
Pharoin a na mu dinga, a mite tengteng a lungmuan loh ding, Pharo leh a sepaih hon tengteng, namsau a thahte ngei leng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.Mihing gamah gallauna a lengsak a, zeksumlouh, namsaua thahte lakah a lum ding, Pharo leh a mi tengteng ngei, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, a chi a.
Mihing gamah gallauna a lengsak a, zeksumlouh, namsaua thahte lakah a lum ding, Pharo leh a mi tengteng ngei, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, na nam tate kiangah thu gen inla, akiang uah, Gam tunga namsau ka hontut leh gam miten a lak ua pat mikhat a tel khiak ua, galvilmi dia a koih uleh,
Aman gam tunga namsau hongtung a muh leh pengkul a mut dinga, mipite a kigalging sak ding;
Huchiiin kuapeuh pengkul ging zaa poisalou mi, namsau hongtungin man loh tamahleh, a sisan moh a mahmahin a po dinga hi.
Pengkul ging a zaka a poisaklouh jiakin a sisan moh a puak mai dinga hi: a napoi sak lebel a hin a humbit sin ahi.
Himahleh galvilmiin namsau hongtung a muha, a pengkul a mut louha, mipite a kigalgin louh ua, namsau a hongtuna, a lak ua mi kua hiamin a man loh leh a thulimlouhnain a mangthang dinga, a sisan phu galvilmi akipan ka la ding, chiin.
Huchibangin nang, mihing tapa, Israel inkote adia galvil dia ka honbawl na hi; huaijiakin ka kama thu pawt ngaikhia inla, ka kianga kipan kigalginna ding thu a kiang uah hilh in.
Mi gilou kiangah, Aw mi giloupa, si mahmah ding na hi, ka chiha, mi gilou a omdan paisan dinga na hilh kei leh migilou a gitlouhna ah a si dinga, a sisan phu bel nang akipan ka la ding.
Himahleh mi gilou a omdan paisan dinga na hilha, a omdan a paisan kei lai leh, a gitlouhna ah a si dinga, nang bel na hin na humbit ding hi.
Huan mihing tapa, nang Israel inkote kiang ah thu gen inla, Hichibangin na chi ua, ka tatleknate uh leh ka khelhnate un a hondelhkhuma, huai jiakin ka thanggawp uh ahi, bangchiin ka hing nilouh thei ding ua?
Na chi ua;
A hina ka hin laiteng, mi gilou sihna ah kipahna himhim ka neikeia, mi gilouin a omdan a paisana a hin ka kipahlam ahi zaw.
Na omdan hoih lou ua kipan kik un, kik un, Aw Israel inkote, bang dia si ding na hi ua? chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin genin.
Huan nang, mihing tapa, na nam tate kiangah gen inla, Mi diktat diktannain a tatlekna niin amah a humhumbit kei dinga, mi gilou gitlouhnain leng a thulimlouhna a lehngatsan niin a puksak kei dinga, mi diktat lah a khelhna niin a diktatnain a hing thei tuan sam kei ding.
Mi diktat kiangah, na hing ngeingei ding, chih ka genin, a diktatna muanga thil a hihkhelh leh a thil dik hih khat leng thei gige ahi kei ding; a thil hihkhelhsaah a si zo ding.
Huan migilou kiangah, ka chih nawn leuleuin, a gitlouhnate a lehngatsana a siang leh a dik a nahiha,
Mi gilouin mi koih khamnate a piak kika, a thil gukte apiak nawna, hinna dante a zuiha, thulimlouhna bangmah a hih kei leh a hing ngeingei dinga, a si kei ding.
Khelhna a nahihsa bangmahte theihgige ahi ta kei dinga, a siang leh a dik a na hihtaa, a hing ngeingei ding.
Himahleh na nam taten, TOUPA thilhih dan a kikim kei, a chih un amau hih dan a diktat kei zaw ahi ngala.
Mi diktatin a diktatna a lehngatsana, thil gilou a nahih leh huai jiakin a si mai ding.
Huan mi gilouin a gitlouhna a lehngatsana, a siang leh a dik a hih leh huai jiakin a hing ding.
Himahleh TOUPA hihdan a kikim kei, na chi ua, aw Israel inkote mi chih noumau hih dan bangbangin ka honlel sak dinga hi, a chi a.
Huan hichi ahi a, i saltan kum sawmlehnih, kha sawmna, huai kha ni nga niin Jerusalem akipan tai khia mi khat ka kiangah a hongpaia, khopi zoh a hita, a hongchi a.
Huan huai mi taikhia a hong tun ma nitak lamin TOUPAN ka tungah a khut a ngaa; zing lama ka kianga hongpaiin ka kam a honka sak mana, huchiin ka kam ka kaa, pau theilouin ka om ta kei.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hongtunga,
Mihing tapa, Israel gama mun segawpsa nunga omten, Abraham khat ahi a, gam a luaha; eite bel tampi i hi ua, gam gouluah dinga piak hita ve hang, chiiin a gen ua.
Huaijiakin a kiang uah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi: Sa sisan na ne ua, na milimte uh lamah na mitte uh na leng tou sak ua; sisan na suah ua, nouten gam na tang ding umaw?
Na namsau uh na muang ua; thilkihhuai na hih ua; mi chihin invengpa zi na na bawlgawp ua; nouten gam na tang ding uh maw?
Hichibanga a kiang ua na gen dinga hi, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi; A hina ka hin laiteng, mun segawpsa nunga omte namsauin a puk ngeingei ding ua, gam laka omte sahang kiang ah nek khit dia pe ding ka hi; kulh kip leh khuka omte hipiin a si ding uh.
Huan gam leng ka hihsiain, mulkimhuai takin ka bawl dinga; a thilhihtheihna, a kisktheihpih a beita ding; Israel tangte a segawp dinga, kuamah a vialvak nawn ta kei dinguh.
Thil kihhuai a hih jiak ua gam ka hihgawpgawpa, mulkimhuai taka ka bawl hun chiangin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Huan nang, mihing tapa, bang bulah kongpi ahte na nam taten a honngen susup ding ua, mi chihin a unaute kiangah, kisa dih ua: TOUPA kiang akipan thu pawt ingai khia ding uh, a kichi ding uh.
Huan a honhonin na kiangah a hongpai ding ua, ka mite bang maiin na maah a tu ding ua, na thu a ngaikhe ding ua, himahleh a zui tuan kei ding uh; a kam un itna thupitak a hihlang ding ua, a lungtang un bel punna lam a zuan ding.
Huan ngaiin, nang bel amau adingin itna la, kilawm taka sak leh tum bang na hi ding: na thute a ngaikhia ua, himahleh a zui tuan kei ding uh.Hiai a hongtun hun chiangin (Ngai in, a hong tunglellel hi, ) a lak uah zawlnei a om chih a thei ding uhi, achi hi, chi in, a chi a.
Hiai a hongtun hun chiangin (Ngai in, a hong tunglellel hi, ) a lak uah zawlnei a om chih a thei ding uhi, achi hi, chi in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiangah a hong tunga,
Mihing tapa, Israelte belamchingte tungah thu gen in, thu gen inla, a kiang uah, belamchingte kiang mahmahah, hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: Israelte belamching, amau kivak maimahte tung a gik hi: belamchingten belam te vak lou dinga hi uhia?
A thaute na ne ua, a mulin na kizem ua; a thauthau na gou ua, belamte lah na vak ngal kei ua.
Natna veite mangte na honpi sam kei uh; a mangte lah na zong kei ua; khauh tak leh namahmahin na thunun zaw uh.
Belampute a om louh jiak un dalhsakin a naomta ua; a nadalh ua, gam sahangte an lel a honghita uh.
Ka belamte tang chih leh mual chih ah a vak mang ua; ahi, ka belamte leitung tengteng ah a na dalh khin uh; limsakmi leh zongmi himhim a om kei uh, chiin gen in, a chi a.
Huaijiakin belamchingte aw, TOUPA thu ngaikhia un,
A hina ka hin laiteng, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, belamching a omlouh ua, belamchingten ka belamte a zon louh ua, belamchingten ka belamte a vak louh ua, amau a kivak zawksop jiakun ka belamte gam sahangte an lel a hong hi ua; ka belamte samat lel a honghi petmah uh.
huaijiakin nou belamchingte aw, TOUPA thu za un.
Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: ngai un, belamchingte ka dou ahi; a khut ua kipan ka belamte ka sut dinga, ka belamte a kepna uh ka tawpsak dinga, belamchingte leng amau a kivak ta kei ding uh; a angsung ua kipan ka belamte ka la khe dinga, amau dia nek dinga hih nawn louhna ding un, chiin.
Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ngala: ngai un, kei, keimah mahin ka zong dinga, ka zong khe ding.
