Belamchingin a belam dalhte laka a belam honte a zon lai bangin ka belamte ka zong khe ding; khonim ni leh mial nuaia a dalhna tengteng ua kipan ka zong khe ding,
Huan mite laka kipan ka la khe dinga; gam chiha kipan ka kaikhawm dinga; amau gam ngei ah ka pi lut ding; Israel tangte ah, lui geite ah, mi tenna mun tengtengte ah ka ta sak ding.
Loupa hoihtak munte ah ka ta sak dinga; a huangsung uh Israel tang sangte ah a om ding; huang hoih tak sung ah leng a om ding ua, Israel tang tunga loupa dawng munte ah a ta ding uh.
Kei mahmahin ka belamte ka vak dinga; ka kualsak kinken dinga, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
A mang ka zong dinga, delh mangte ka pi kik nawn dinga, a khe kitante uh ka tuam dinga, ka hatsak ding: a thau leh a hatte leng ka ching dinga; dik takin ka vak ding.
Huan nou tungthu a hihleh, aw ka belam honte, hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: ngai un, ka belamte kalthu ka gensak dinga, belamtalte, keltalte leng.
Gan tatna mun hoihtak tunga tat nou din thil bangthamlou banga langin, na tatna neih sun na chil se zosop uh ahi maw?
Huan tui chim mahmahte na dawn khit un na ngap nin mawkmawk maimah uh ahi maw?
Ka belamten na siksa uh a ne un, na ngah sa uh a dawn ding umaw?
Huaijiakin hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a kiang uah a chi ahi: Ngai un, kei, keimah mahmahin gan gawng te leh gan thaute kalthu ka ngaihtuah sak ding.
A hatloute na liang un leh na sikte un na phu ua, na khete un na pik ua, na dalhsak ua;
huaijiakin ka belamte ka humbit ding; samat lel ahi nawn kei ding ua, belamte kalthu ka gensak ding.
Huan a tunguah belamching khat ka koih dinga, ka nasempa David ngei; aman amaute a vak dinga; amah amau chingpa ahi dinga, amau a vak ding.
Huan kei TOUPA a PATHIAN uh ka hi dinga, ka nasempa David a tung ua heutu ahi ding; kei TOUPA ngeiin ka chita ahi.
Huan amau toh lemna thukhun ka bawl dinga, sahangte gam akipan ka hihmang ding: huan gamdai ahte leng bit takin a teng ding ua, gammang nuai ahte a ihmu hihit ding uh.
Amau leh ka tang kim munte ka vualzawl dinga; a hun geihgeihin vuah ka zusak dinga, vualzawl vuahte a zu ding hi.
Huan gama singin gah a suang dinga, leiin a punna a suah dinga; a gam uah bit takin a om ding uh; a hakkolte uh ka kitansaka, sikhaa bawlmite khut akipan ka hutkhiak hun chiangin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Nam dangte samat lel ahi nawnta kei ding ua, gam sahangte nek mang mai ahi nawn sam kei ding uh; bit takin a omzo ta ding ua, kuamahin a lausak ngei nawn kei ding uh.
Thilsuan min thang mahmah ka bawlsak dinga; huai gamah kialin a hihmang nawn kei dinga, nam dangte muhsitna leng a thuak nawn sam kei ding uh.
Huan kei TOUPA a Pathian uh a kianguah ka om chih a thei un, amau Israel inkote leng ka mite ahi uh chih a thei ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.Huan nou ka belamte, ka gan tatna muna belamte na hi ua; huan, kei na PATHIAN uh ka hi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Huan nou ka belamte, ka gan tatna muna belamte na hi ua; huan, kei na PATHIAN uh ka hi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtung nawna,
Mihing tapa, Seir tang masuan inla, a tungah thu gen inla, a kiang ah,
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai in, Aw Seir tang, ka hon dou ahi; na tungah ka khut k lik dinga, ka honhihgawpin mulkimhuai takin ka honbawl ding hi.
Na khopite ka suse dinga, na kigawp ding; huan TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding.
Na nitna uh gawtna nanungpena a siat ni ua Israel inkote namsau thilhihtheihna a na lata, na kinak pih gige jiakin,
A hin a ka hin laiteng, sisana dingin ka hon bawl dinga, sisanin a hon delh ding: sisan na huat louh zakin sisanin a hondelh ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Hichiin Seir tang bel mulkimhuaitaka bawlin ka sugawp ding; a tunga mi vialvak sekte ka tawpsak vek ding.
A tangte amah mi thahtein ka dimsak ding: na tangte ah, na guam leh na luiguam kuakte ah namsau a thahte a puk phengphung ding uh.
Ka hon sugawp den dinga, na khopite luahin a omkei ding: huan kei TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding.
TOUPA zaw a om gige naa, hiai nam nihte leh gam nihte kei a ahidinga, ka tangmai ding uh, na chih jiakin.
A hina ka hin laiteng chih, TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, na hehna bang zel leh na huatna jiaka hazatna na suklatdan bang zelin ka hih sin hi: na tung thu ka ngaihtuah hun chiangin a lak uah ka hih lang ding hi.
Hihgawpin a omta ua, ka kiangah piakin a omta uh, chia Israel tangte na gensiatna tengteng kei TOUPAN ka za vek chih na thei ding.
Ka tungah na kamin na kiliansakin ka tungah thu na tamsaka, ka za vek hi.
Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: Lei pumpi kipahna ding in ka honsugawp ding.Israelte gouluah a siat jiaka na kipah mahbang in na tungah ka hih ding: Aw Seir tang leh Edom tengteng, a vekin a kise gawp ding: huan TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Israelte gouluah a siat jiaka na kipah mahbang in na tungah ka hih ding: Aw Seir tang leh Edom tengteng, a vekin a kise gawp ding: huan TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Huan nang mihing tapa, Israel tangte kiang ah thu gen inla, Nou Israel tangte aw, TOUPA thu ngaikhia un.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi:
Na tungah na melmate'n, Ahah: nidang munsang tengtengte keia a hita, a chih jiak un thu gen inla,
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Nam om sunte a dinga kil chiha nang a honnek ua, a hon sukgawp jiak un leh mi kamtamte houlimna leh gensiata a hon omsak jiak un:
Nou Israel tangte aw, TOUPA PATHIAN thu ngaikhia un, TOUPA PATHIANIN tangte, mualte, luiguamte, guamte, leh mun sesate, khopi kigawpsa, a kima nam om sunte samat lel ding leh nuihsan dingte kiangah hichiin a chi ahi:
Huaijiak in TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Nam om sun leh Edom tengteng lungsim kipak tak a ka gam na nakiseh tawm ua; na honmusit mahmah ua, gallaka bawl mite tungah ka mullitna thangpaih mahmah in thu ka gen ngei ahi.
Huaijiak in Israel gam tungthu ah thu gen inla, tangte, mualte, luiguamte leh guamte kiangah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: ngai un, namdangte simmohna na thuak jiak un mullit mahmah leh thangpai tak in thu ka gen ahi:
Huaijiakin TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Na kim a namten amau zahlakna a po ngei ding uh chiin ka khut ka jak hi.
Nou bel, Aw Israel tangte aw, hiang na suah ding ua, ka mi Israelte adin gah na suah ding uh; a hongpai mai ngal sin ua.
Ngai un, nou lama pang ka hi ngala, nou lam ka nga dinga, git nawiin na om ding ua, chi tuhin na om lai ding uhi.
Na tunguah mihing ka pung sak dinga, Israel inkote tengteng, a vek un leng: mun sesate bawl phatin a om dinga, khopite luah in a om ding.
Na tunguah mi leh sa ka pungsak dinga, a pung un a lamzang ding uh: Na omdan masa bang in luahin ka honomsak dinga, atunga na omdan sang ua hoihin ka hon bawl ding hi: huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
A hi, na tunguah mi ka vak sak dinga, ka mi Israelte ngei; a hon luah ding ua, a goutan uh na hi dinga, tuban siah a tate uh na tansak ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: Nang mihingte ne mang, na mite tan sek na hi a honchih sek jiak un,
mihingte na ne bei nawnta kei dinga, na mite leng na tan ngei nawn sam kei ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi;
pautuam mite muhsitna ka honthuak sak nawn kei dinga, mite gensiat na thuak ngei nawn sam kei ding; na mite na tan ngei nawn samkei ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chi in, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtung nawn a,
Mihing tapa, Israel inkote amau gama a ten lai un a om dan u leh a thilhihte un a kihihnin ua; ka maa a omdan uh numei kizen louh laia a sianthou louhna bang mai ahi.
Huaijiak in gam tungah sisan a suah ua, a milimte ua a kihihnit jiak un a tunguah ka hehna ka lungdam saka.
Namte lakah ka dalh saka, gam chih ah a thehthangta ua: a om dan uh leh a thilhihte uh bang jelin a tung thu uh ka gensak a.
A vahohna namte kiang a tun un ka min siangthou a hihbuah ua; mite'n, Hiaite TOUPA mite ahi ua, gam akipan hongpawt khia ahi uh, a na chihna nak uah.
Himahleh Israel inkote'n a vahohna namte lak a a hihbuah uh, ka min siangthou ka lainat ahi.
Huaijiak in Israel inkote kiang ah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Aw, Israel inkote, noute ka honlainat jiak hilouin, na vahohna namte laka na hihbuah uh, ka min siangthou ka lainat jiak jawin hiai ka hih ahi.
Ka min thupitak, namte laka buah, a lak ua noumau ngeia hihbuah ka siangthousak sin ahi; huchiin a mitmuh ua noutea hihsiangthou a ka om hun chiangin TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Namte laka kipan ka hon pikhe dinga, gam tengtenga kipan ka hon kai khawm dinga, na gam mahmah uah ka hon pilut sin ahi ngal a.
Huan na tunguah tuichim ka theh dinga, na hongsiangthou ding ua, na nitna tengteng uh leh na milimte lak ua kipan ka hon khuah siang ding.
Lungtang thak ka hon pe dia, na sung uah kha thak ka koih ding: na sa ua kipan lungtang suang bang a sak ka la mang dinga, lungtang sa bang a nip ka hon pe zo ding hi.
Huan na sung uah ka kha ka koih dinga, ka dan bawlah ka hon vaksak ding a, ka thupiakte na kem ding ua, na zui ding uh.
Na pipute uh kianga ka piak gamah na teng ding uh; huan, nou ka mite na hi ding ua, kei na Pathian uh ka hi ding.
Na nitna tengteng ua kipan ka hon hunkhe dinga, huan buhlehbal ka sam dinga ka hon pungsak ding, na tunguah kial a ke nawnkei ding hi.
Sing gahte ka pungsak dinga, louma ka pungsak dinga, kial jiaka namte lak a zahlakna na thuakta kei ding uh.
Huchiin na omdan giloute uh, na thilhih hoihloute uh na honthei gige ding ua, na kihhuaina uh leh na thulimlouhna ujiakin noumau mitmuh mahmah in na kih ta ding uhi.
Nou jiak ahiai hih ka hikei chih na nathei mai un, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Aw, Israel inkote aw, na omdan jiak un zum unla, lamdang sa un.
Na thulimlouhna tengteng ua kipan ka honkhuah siang ni chiangin, khopite ka luah nawn sak dinga, mun sesa ka bawl nawn ding.
Huan gam sesa lehin a om dinga, tumalama mi vialvakte mitmuh a sesa nung himahleh.
Huan, hiai gam sesa nung Eden huan bang mai a honghi nawnta, a chi ding uh; huan khopi sia a, na nakigawpsate luah leh umin a om nawnta.
Huan na kim ua nam omlaiten kei TOUPAN mun siate ka bawl nawna, gam nanasekhinsa ka hihhoih nawnta chih a thei ding uh: kei TOUPA ka pautaa, ka hih ngei ding.
Huan TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Huailouinleng hiai Israel inkote ka honding sak dinga; gan hon bangmai a a mite uh hih pung ding in.Kithoihna ding gan hon, a ankuanglui sehsaa Jerusalem gan honte bang maiin; huchi bang in khopi sesa nung mipi tampiin a hongdim ding; huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Kithoihna ding gan hon, a ankuanglui sehsaa Jerusalem gan honte bang maiin; huchi bang in khopi sesa nung mipi tampiin a hongdim ding; huchiin kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA khut ka tungah a oma, TOUPA khain a honpi khiaa, guam lai takah honkoiha; huai guam guh ngen in a dima;
Huan a lak khawng uah a honpi vialviala; huan, guam ah atamatam guh a naom lemlom maia; huan, ngai dih, a keu ngen ahi.
Huan ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, hiai guhte a hing thei diam? a chi a.
Huan ken, Aw, TOUPA PATHIAN, nang na thei zo ding: ka chi a.
Huan aman ka kiang ah, thu gen inla, a kiang uah, Aw, nou guh keu te aw, TOUPA thu ngai un.
Hiai guhte kiang ah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai un, noute ah nakna ka lutsak dinga, na hing ding uh.
Huan noute ah thagui ka koih dinga, sa in ka hontuam dinga, vunin ka honkhuh ding; huan na sung uah nakna ka omsak dinga, na hing ding uh; kei TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh, chi in, a chi a.
Huchiin a hon thupiak bangin ka gentaa; huan ka gen leh husa a hongom a, ngaiin, a ging luiluia, guhte amau kizoppih chiat ah a kisutuah khawmta uh.
Huan ka et leh, ngaiin, amau ah thagui a hongoma, sain a tuama, vunin akhuhtaa; nakna bel amau ah a om nai kei.
Huchiin aman ka kiangah, Huih kiangah thu gen inla, mihing tapa, gen mahmah inla, huih kiangah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Aw, Nakna, kawlmong li akipanin hongpai inla, hiai mi thahte tungah nakin, a hin theihna ding un, chi in, a chi a.
Huchiin a honthu piak bang in ka gena, nakna amau ah a hongluta, a hingta ua, amau khe chiatin a ding ua, sepaih hon thupi tak a honghita hi.
Huchiin ka kiangah, Mihing tapa, hiai guhte Israel inko pumpi ahi ua: Ngai dih, amau, Ka guhte uh a keu khinin, ka lamet uh a bei khinta, phuk mang in ka omta uh, a na chi sek ua.
Huaijiak in thu gen inla, a kiang uah TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai un, a hante uh ka hong dinga, aw, Ka mite aw, na han ua kipan ka honkhah dinga; huan, Israel gamah ka honpi lut ding.
Huan na hante uh ka hona na han ua kipan ka honpawt sak hun chiangin, aw, ka mite aw, TOUPA ka hi chih na thei ding uh.
Huan noumau ah ka Kha ka koih dinga, na hing ding uh, na gam ngei uah ka hon koih dinga; huan, kei TOUPAN ka chitaa, ka hih lai dinga hi chih na thei ding uh, chih TOUPA thu pawt ahi, a chi a.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtung nawna,
Nang, mihing tapa, chiang khat la inla, a tungah, Juda leh a kithuahpih Israel tate, chih gelh in: chiang dang leng la inla, a tungah, Zoseph, Ephraim chiang leh a kithuahpih Israel inkote tengteng, chih gelh in.
Huan chiangte peh inla, na khut a khat a hih theihna ding in.
Hiaite bangchihna ahi ua, non kawkmuh sin ka hia? na nam tate un na kianga honchih u leh a kiang uah,
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai un, Joseph chiang, Ephraim leh a kithuahpih Israel chite khut a ka la dinga, huaite Juda chiang toh ka peh dinga, khat in ka bawl dinga, ka khutah khat a honghi ding, na chi ding hi.
Chiang, a tunga na gelhnate mahmah a mitmuh ngei uah na khutah a om ding.
Huan a kiang uah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai un, nam, a vahohnate uh laka kipan ka pi dinga, ning chih a kipan ka kaikhawm dinga, a gam uah ka pilut ding.
Huan huai gam, Israel tangte ah nam khatin ka bawl dinga, kumpipa khat a vek ua kumpipa ahi ding: huan, nam nih ahi nawnta kei ding ua, lalna gam nih in leng a kikhen nawn samkei ding.
A milimte uh, a thil kihhuaite uh, a tatleknate un leng a kihihnin ngei nawnta kei dingua: a puk ua a khelhna nak tengteng ua kipan ka honkhe dinga, ka khuah siang ding: huchiin ka mite ahi ding ua, huan kei a Pathian uh ka hi ding.
Ka nasempa David a tung ua kumpipa ahi dinga, a vek ua tungah belamching khat a om ding: ka thupiakte a mang ding ua, ka dan bawlte a jui ding ua, a zang ding uh.
Ka nasempa Jakob kianga ka gam piak, na pipute uh na tenna sek ah a teng ding ua; huaiah khantawn in a teng ding ua, amau leh a tate uh, a tate uh tate leng: ka nasempa David khantawnin a heutu uh ahi ding,
Huailou leng amau kiang ah lemna thukhun ka bawl dinga, amau adingin khantawn thukhun ahi dinga, a kiang uah kape dinga, amau ka pungsak dinga, a lak uah khantawnin ka biakbuk ka dingsak ding hi.
Ka bawkin leng a kiang uah a om dinga, a Pathian uh ka hi dinga, amau ka mite ahi ding uh.Huan a lak ua khantawn a dinga ka biakbuk a din hun chiangin kei TOUPA, Israel hihsiangthoupa ka hi chih namten a thei ding uh, chi in, chiin.
Huan a lak ua khantawn a dinga ka biakbuk a din hun chiangin kei TOUPA, Israel hihsiangthoupa ka hi chih namten a thei ding uh, chi in, chiin.
Huan TOUPA thu ka kiang ah a hongtung a,
Mihing tapa, Magog gama mi, Rosh leh Meshek leh Tubal heutupen Gog masuan inla, a tungah thu gen inla.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngaiin, aw Gog, Rosh, Meshek leh Tubal heutu pen, ka hondou ahi:
Ka honlehngat sak dinga, na haijekah ngakuaiin ka honkuai dinga, ka honkhai khe ding; na sepaih hon tengteng, sakol leh a tungtuang mite, galvan buchinga kithuam tengteng, pawl thupi tak, lum lian leh lum neu zanga namsau tawi chiatte tohin.
Persia, Kush, Put te toh, a vek ua lum leh sik lukhu neite;
Gomer leh a sepaih hon tengteng; Togarma inkote, mal tawpa mi leh a sepaih hon tengteng, na kianga mi tampipte toh leng.
Kigalging inla, ahi, na naman in, nang leh na kianga om khawm, na kithuahpih tengteng toh; huan amau vengpa na hi in.
Ni tampi nung in sap khawm na hi dinga, kum nanungte ah namsau akipan hotkhiak, nam tampite lak akipan lak khawmte omna gam, Israel tang se gige sekte na hon sual ding; namte lak akipan pi khiaka, tua a vek ua lungmuang taka a omna gam uh.
Huan na kuan tou dinga, huihpi bang maiin na hongtung dinga, meipiin gam a tuam moimoi bang mai na hi ding, nang leh na kianga sepaih hon tengteng leh na kianga mi tampite.
Huan hichiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: Huai ni chiangin hichi ahi dinga, na lungsim ah thil a honglut dinga, thil hoihlou na suangtuah ding;
Huchiin, Kulh neilou khuate gam ka sim dinga, mi bit tak a om hiathiat, a vek ua kulh lou a teng, kulh kongkhak leh a kalhna sik neiloute ka sual ding, na chi sim ding.
Gallak sum leh vante la ding leh mun sesa nung luah nawnmite leh namte lak a kipan pikhawmsa, gan hon leh vante haua, lei laizanga tengte tungah na khut lik na tum ding.
Sheba leh Dedan leh Tarshish sumsinmite leh a humpinelkai lunlai tengtengten na kiangah, Gallak la dingin na hong pai maw? honlok dinga na pawlte hon khawm na hi maw? dangkasik te, dangkaeng te, gan honte leh vante, thupitak suhsak a la mang ding na hi maw? a honchi ding uh, chiin.
Huaijiak in, mihing tapa, thu gen inla, Gog kiang ah, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Huai ni, ka mi Israelte bit tak a a om hun ding uh na theikei maw?
Mal lam gam tawp pek, na mun a kipan in na hongpai dinga, nang leh na kiang a mi tampi sakol tung tuang chiat, pawl thupi mahmah, sepaih hon thupi tak mai.
Meipiin gam a tuam lunglung bang maiin ka mi Israelte tungah na hong pai ding; hichi ahi dinga, ni nanungteah ka gam dou dingin honpi dinga, namten a hon thei ding ua, Aw, Gog, a mitmuh ua nanga hihsiangthou a ka om hun chiangin.
Huan TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: tumlama ka nasempa Israel jawlnei, huai lai kum tampi sunga thu nagen sekten amaute sual dinga ka honpi ding thu a gensek uh pa na hi hia? chiin, a chi a.
Huan huai niin hichi ahi dinga, Israel gam sual dinga Gog a hongkuan hunin ka hehna ka nak khu khe lunglung dinga, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Ka mullita ka thangpaih lai takin, Huai niin Israel gamah jin nakpi in a ling ngeingei ding;
Huchiin tuipi ngate, tungleng vasate, gam sate, leitunga vak ganhing tengteng, leitunga mihing tengteng ka maah a ling ding ua, tangte niamsak in a om ding a, kawlte a chim dinga, kulh bang chih lei ah a puk ding, chi in ka gen hi.
Ka tang tengtengah amah sualna dingin namsau ka kan ding; mi chih in namsauin a unaupa a dou ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan sisan pawt leh hipiin amah ka sual dinga; amah leh a sepaih honte leh a kianga mi tampite tungah vuahpi leh gial thupi leh mei katte ka zusak ding.Huan ka thupidan leh ka siangthoudan ka hihlang dinga, huan nam tampite mitmuh in ka kihihlang ding, huan, kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Huan ka thupidan leh ka siangthoudan ka hihlang dinga, huan nam tampite mitmuh in ka kihihlang ding, huan, kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Huan, nang, mihing tapa, Gog tungah thu gen inla, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Ngai in, Aw Gog, Rosh, Meshek leh Tubal heutu pen, ka hondou ahi:
Ka honlehngat sak dinga, ka honpi jel dinga, mal tawp pek akipan ka honpi khe dinga, Israel tangte ah ka hontun ding:
Na khut veilam akipan na thalpeu ka kitansak dinga, na khut taklam a kipan na thalte ka ke sak ding.
Israel tangte ah na puk dinga, nang leh na sepaih hon tengteng leh na kiang a mipi omte toh: vasa sa sial ne chi tengte kiang leh gam sahangte kiang ah nek khit ding in ka hon pe ding.
Gamlak ah na puk dinga; ken lah ka chita ngal a, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Magog leh tui gei gam a bit taka teng sekte tungah mei ka khah ding; huan, kei TOUPA ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Huan ka mi Israelte lak ah ka min siangthou ka hih lang dinga, ka min siangthou hihbuah nawn ka phal nawn ta kei ding: huchiin namte'n kei, TOUPA Israel Mi siangthoupa ka hi chih a thei ding uh.
Ngai un, a hongtung hi: hihtangtun in a om ngei ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi; hiai ni ahi ka nagen.
Huan Israel khopi a tengte a pawt khe ding ua, galvante a khul ding ua, a kang mang ding; lum lian leh lum neute, thal leh a peute, teipi leh chiang zumte kum sagih sung a khul ding uh.
Huchiin gam sing a pokei ding ua, gammang singte a phuk sam kei ding uh, galvante lah sing khul dingin a zang sin ngal ua; gallaklamite gallakin a la tei ding ua, a lokmite a lok thuk sam ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan huai niin hichi ahi dinga, Gog dingin Israel gamah vuina mun ka sep dinga, tuipi suahlam, Abarim guam ngei; huai in khualzinte a dal ding, Gog leh a lawite lah a vui sin ngal ua; huan, huai guam Hamon-gog guam a sa ding uh.
Huan Israel inkote'na gam uh khuah siangin kha sagih sung a vui ding uh.
A hi, a gam ua mi tengteng in a vui ding ua; pahtawia ka om niin ka minthanna ahi ding, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan a gam uh khuahsiang na din, luang vui louhte teng zongkhia a vui dingin nasep a nei ding mi a sep tuam ding uh, kha sagih bei nungin a zong pan ding uh.
Gam velmiten a vel un, mihing guhte a muh uleh chiamtehna a bawl ding ua, Hamon-gog guam a vuimiten a vui ma uh.
Huan Hamonah khopi min ahi ding.
Huchi bangin gam a khuah siang ding uh.
Huan nang, mihing tapa, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Vasa chi chihte leh sa chichihte kiang ah thu gen inla, Pung khawm unla, hong pai un, sa na nek ua sisan na dawn theihna ding un Israel tang a kithoihna thupitak, nou adia ka bawl kimah hong kikhawm un.
Mi thupi sate na ne ding ua, leia heutute sisan na dawn ding ua; belamtalte, belamnoute, kelte, Bashan gama bawngtal vak thau tengteng sisan toh.
Nou dia kithoihna ankuang ka lui thau, vah kikeihin na ne ding ua; a sisan kham khopin na dawn ding uh.
Huchiin sakolte, kangtalai kai mite, mi thupite leh galmi tengteng in ka ankuang ah na tai ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huchiin namte lak ah ka thupina ka koih dinga, nam tengteng in a thu gel hihpuksate leh a tungua ka khut khakdante a mu ding uh.
Huai ni a kipan Israel inkoten kei TOUPA a Pathian uh kahi chih a theita ding uh.
Huan namten Israel inkote a thulimlouhna jiak un salin a tang uh ahi chih a thei ding ua; ka tung a ginom louh mahmah jiak un amau tungah ka mel ka sel a, huchiin a melmate uh khut ah ka piaa, namsau in a puk vek uhi.
A sianthou louhna bang zel uleh a tatlekna bang zel un a tunguah ka hih tei a; amau a kipan ka mel ka sel ahi.
Huaijiak in TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Tun zaw Zakobte omdan ka hei dinga, Israel inkuan pumpi tungah zah ka ngai ding, ka min siangthou gum in ka thikthu ase ding.
Kuamah lausakmi om loua, a gam ua bit taka a ten hun un leng a tatlekna tengteng uh, ka tunga a tatlekna uh leh a zahlakna uh a po ding uh.
Mite lak a kipan ka pi khiak nawna, a melmate uh gama kipan ka kaihkhawma, amaua nam tampi mitmuh a hihsiangthou a ka om hun chiang in.
Huan namte laka sala ka tansak nawna, a gam ngei ua ka pi khawm nawn danah kei TOUPA a Pathian uh ka hi chih a thei ding uh; huaiah a lak ua khat lel leng ka nuse kei ding;Amau a kipan ka mel ka sel nawnta kei ding: Israel inkote tungah ka kha ka sungta ngala, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
Amau a kipan ka mel ka sel nawnta kei ding: Israel inkote tungah ka kha ka sungta ngala, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, chiin.
I saltan kum sawmnih leh ngana, huai kum bul kha ni sawmna, khopi siat nung kum sawmlehlina, huai ni mahmahin TOUPA khut ka tungah a hongoma, huaiah a honpi a.
Pathian kilakna ah Israel gamah a honpia, tang sang takah a honkoiha, huai simlam ah khopi dinsaksa bang tak a om a.
Huaiah a honpia, ngaidih, mi khat a na oma, a mel lat dan dal bangmai ahia; khauzang leh tehna chiang a tawia, kongpi ah a ding hi.
Huan, huai miin ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, na mitin en inla, na bilin doh in; ka honetsak ding lamah na lungsim nga chinten in; huai ka hon etsak ding hiaia konpi na hi ngala: na muh tengteng Israel inkote kiang ah phuang in, a chi a.
Huan ngai dih, in kimah kulh bang anaoma, huan huai miin tehna chiang, tong guk a sau a tawia, a tong khat bel tong khat leh khutpek bok chia ahi a; huan kulh bang sah lam a teha, chiang khep khat ahia, san lam leng chiang khep khat mah ahi.
Huchiin suahlam chial kongpi a hongtunga, a kalbi ah a pai toua; huan, kongpi lutna dantan a teha, chiang khep khat a ja ahi.
Huan vilna dantante a dunglam chiang khep khat, a vailam chiang khep khat chiat ahi; vilna dantan kikal tong nga chiat ahia; huan inpi lam kongpi sumtawng lama kongpi lutna dantan chiang khep khat ahi.
In pi lam sumtawng leng a teha, tong giat ahi.
A bangkate tong nih chiat ahi a, kongpi sumtawng in pi lamah ahi.
Huan suahlam kongpi vilna dantante langkhat langkhat ah thum tuaktuak ahi a, a thum un a kikim vek uh ahi: huan, bangkate leng langkhat langkhata te a kikim ahi.
Huan kongpi lutna vailam a teha, tong sawm ahi a; kongpi pai suakna vailam tong sawmthum ahi.
Huan vilna dantan maah deidanna langkhat ah tong khata sah tuaktuak a oma; huchiin vilna dantante langkhat langkhat ah tong guk tuaktuak ahi hi.
Huan, kongpi a teha, vilna dantan khat tung a kipana a langkhat tung phain tong sawm nih leh ngaa ja ahi, kongkhak leh kongkhak kizom chiatin.
Huan sumtawng leng a teha, tong sawmnih ahi a; kongpi sumtawng pua bel huang sung ahi kei hi.
Huan kongpi ponungpen a kipana kongpi sumtawng sung gil pen chiang tong sawmnga ahi.
Huan kongpi sung lamah a kimvelin dantante ah tohlet hon theihlouh a oma, a kikala khuamte ah leng; a sumtawngte ah leng, a sung lamah leng kimvelin tohlet a oma, a khuamte ah tum singlim a om chiat nawn hi.
Huan huang sung po nungjaw ah a honpi a; huan ngai dih, dantante a oma, huang sung a kimvelin suanglep ahi a; huan, suanglep ah dantan sawmthum a om hi.
Huan suanglep bel kongpi akipana lep ahi a, kongpi tan mah dinga lep ahi a, huai bel suanglep nuainungjaw ahi.
Huchiin kongpi nuai zopen jawna kipanin huang sungnung zopen po lam pha in a teha, a zatdan tong za khat ahi, a suahlam leh a mallam leng.
Huan, huang sung ponung zopen kongpi mal lampanga a dung leh a vai leng a teha.
Huan vilna dantante langkhat langkhat ah thum tuaktuak a oma, a bangkate leh a kongpi sumtawngte leng a masa bang vek ahi; a dung tong sawmnga ahi a, a vai tong sawmnih leh nga.
A tohlette a sumtawngtea tum sing limte suah lam kongpi a bang vek ahi; kalbi sagih a om toua; a sumtawng a sunglamah a om.
Huang sungnung zopen lutna ding kongpi bel kongpi dang jawnah a om jela, mal lamah leh suahlam ah leng; huan kongpi leh kongpi kikal a teha, tong ja ahi.
Huan, sim lamah a honpi nawna, huan, ngaiin, sim lam kongpi a naoma; huan, a teh dan ngeiin a bangkate leh a sumtawng a teha.
Huaiah a dangte bang mahin a kimvelin tohlette a oma, a sumtawng ah leng; a dung tong sawmnga ahia, a vailam tong sawmnih leh nga ahi.
Huan kalbi sagih a om toua, sumtawng a sun glamah a oma; huan langkhat langkhata bangkate ah tum sing lim a om jel hi.
Huan sim lamah huang sungnung lutna ding kongpi a oma, sim lam kongpite kikal a teha, tong ja ahi.
Huan simlam kongpi ah huang sungnungzopen ah a honpi a, tehna ngeiin sim lam kongpi a teha;
Vilna dantante, a bangkate sumtawngte tehna mahin; huai ah tohlette a oma, a sumtawng leng a kimvelin: a dunglam tong sawmnga ahi a, a vailam tong sawmnih leh nga.
Huan a kimvel ah sumtawngte a oma, a dung lam tong sawmnih leh nga, a vailam tong nga ahi.
A sumtawngte huang sung ponungzolam a ngaa; a bangkate ah tum sing lim a oma: a kahtouhnain kalbi giat a nei hi.
Huan suahlam ah huang sungnungzopen ah a honpiaa, a tehna ngei in kongpi a teha;
A vilna dantante, a bangkate, a sumtawngte tehna mahin: huai ah tohlette a oma, sumtawng ah leng a kimvelin: a dung lam bel tong sawmnga ahi a, a vai lam tong sawmnih leh nga.
A sumtawngten huang sung ponungzopen lam a nga a, a bangkate ah langkhat langkhatah tum sing lim a oma; a kahtouhnain kalbi giat a nei.
Huan mal lam kongpi ah a honpi nawna: a tehna ngeiin a teha; a vilna dantante, a bangkate, a sumtawngte;
Huaiah a kimvelin tohlette a oma: a dung lam tong sawmnga ahia, a vailam tong sawmnih leh nga.
A bangkate huang sung ponungzopen lamah a om a; a bangkate ah langkhat langkhatah tum sing lim a oma: a kahtouhnain kalbi giat a nei hi.
Kongpi sumtawng a kipan a lut theihin dantan a oma, huaiah halmang kithoihna ding a sil jel uh.
Kongpi sumtawng langkhat langkhat ah dohkan nih tuaktuak a oma; halmang kithoihnate, khelh jiaka kithoihna te, moh jiaka thil lat te gohna ding.
Mallam kongpi lutna kahtouhna polam sik khatah dohkan nih a oma; huan kongpi sumtawng langkhat ah leng dohkan nih a om nawna.
Huchiin kongpi sik langkhat ah donkan li a oma, a langkhatah dohkan li a om nawn; kithoihna gohna sek dohkan giat ahi.
Huan halmang kithoihna dia dohkan li, suang seka bawl, a dung lam tong khat leh a kimkhat, a vanglam tong khat leh a kim khat, a sanlam tong khat a om a: huaiah halmang kithoihna leh thil lat gohna ding vanzatte a koih jel uhi.
Huan a sunglam ah a kimvel in kuaika, khutpek khuha sau a bulh ua; dohkan tungte ah thillatte sa a om hi.
Huan huang sungnungzopen ah a honpi luta, huan, ngai dih, huang sungnungzopen ah dantan nih a naoma; khatpen mallam kongpi chinah, sim lam nga in a oma, khatpen sim lam kongpi chin ah mallam ngain a om hi.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Hiai dantan sim lam nga, a in kem siampute omna ahia;
dantan mallam nga maitam kem siampute omna ahi; hiaite Zadok tate, Levi tate laka a nasem dinga TOUPA hongnaih sekte ahi uh, a chi a.
Huan huang sung a teha, a dung lam tong zakhat, a vailam tong za khat, kimkot ahi; huan, maitam bel intual lai takah a om hi.
Huan a inpi sumtawng ah a honpitaa, sumtawng bangkate a teh chiata, a langkhat langkhatah tong ngaa sah tuaktuak a oma, a lutna tong sawm leh tong li-a ja ahi; a sik tuaka kongpi bangkate tong thum tuaktuak ahi.A sumtawng a dunglam tong sawmnih, a vailam tong sawm leh tong nih ahi a; lut touhna ah kalbi sawm a oma, bangka chin ah a langkhat langkhat ah khuam lian a om hi.
A sumtawng a dunglam tong sawmnih, a vailam tong sawm leh tong nih ahi a; lut touhna ah kalbi sawm a oma, bangka chin ah a langkhat langkhat ah khuam lian a om hi.
Huan biakin ah a honpi luta, a bangkate a teha, a sik tuak ah tong guk-a sah tuaktuak a oma, huai bel biakbuk vailam chia ahi.
Huan a lutna tong sawma ja ahia; a sik tuakah bangkate tong nga tuaktuak ahi; huan a sung a dung tong sawmli, a vai tong sawmnih ahi a.
Huan dantan sungnung ah a lut a, a lutna bangkate tong niha sah tuaktuak ahi a; a lutna tong guk a ja ahi a; a lutna bangkate tong sagih tuaktuak ahi.
Huan dantan sungnung a the a, a sungpi banah a dunglam tong sawmnih ahi a: a vai lam leng tong sawmnih ahi.
Huan ka kiang ah, Hiai mun siangthou pen ahi, a chi a.
Huan a inpi bang a teha, tong guka sah ahi; huan a sik chihah dantan tong lia ja chiat a om hi.
Huan chial thumte ah pangdantante a om ua, huchia huailai a letkipna a neihtheih louhna ding un, inlam banga letkipna neilouin.
Huan a pang dantante a hong san hiaihiaiin a za semsem jela; a bangte a zuih touh jel jiakin, a kimvelin a sungpi a naih hulhul jel ahi.
Huchiin dantan nuainung pen a kipana tungnung pen phaa pai dingin a laia kan tan ding ahi.
Huan inpi kimah suanglep vum omin ka mu a; pang dantan suangphum tehna chiang, tong guk hiala sau tana sang ahi.
Pang dantan polam bang tong ngaa sah ahi; pang dantan polam bang banah tong nga a awl lai hi.
Inpi suanglep vum leh huang sung dantante kikal a kimin tong sawmnih a ja ahi.
Pang dantan kongkhakte mun awl lama hon ahi a, khat mallama nga ahi, khat sim lama nga ahi: a kim a mun awl tong ngaa ja ahi.
Huan tum lama inpi phaitam mun awl banah in tong sawmsagiha ja ahi; huai in bang a kimin tong ngaa sah vek ahi a, a dung tong sawm kua ahi.
Huan inpi a tehin tong jaa sau ahi; inpi phaitam mun awl leh huai in bang sahdan sim telin tong ja ahi nawna;
A inpi intual mun awl tong jaa ja a ahi.
Huan in pi phaitam mun awl khen a in dung lam bel a teha, a pang tuaka bangte huapin tong ja ahi.
Huan a sungpi te, mun siangthoupen te, polam sumtawng te singpekin a thuap ua; a thum un a kimvelin hon theih louh tohlet leh inchial a neia; a in pi lutna kongpi tanin a pialkhang a kipan a tohlet pha a a puma singpek a thuap ahi, (tohlet leng thuap ahi lai).
Kongpi lu tungte, dantan siangthoupen te leh a polam toh, bang tengteng a sunglam leh a polam tanin.
Huaite cherub limte leh tum sing limtea zep ahi a, cherub leh cherub kikalah tum sing a om jela; huan, cherub bel mai nih nei chiat ahi.
Mihing mel bangin langkhata tum sing lam a ngaa, humpinelkai tuailai mel bangin langkhat a tum sing lam a nga nawna.
Hiaite in kimvel vekin a gelh uhi.
A pialkhang a kipanin kongpi tung phain cherub leh tum sing lim a zep vek ahi; in pi bang bel huchi vek ahi.
Sungpi kongpi biang khuamte bel a sah a zat kibang ahi.
Mun Siangthoupen maah singa bawl maitam bang tak a oma;
tong thum a sang, tong niha ja, a ningte, a taw te leh a pang te singa bawl vek ahi.
Huan aman ka kiangah, Hiai TOUPA maa dohkan ahi, a chi a.
A sungpi leh Mun Siangthoupenin kongkhak nih tuaktuak a neia.
Kongkhakin phel nih a nei tuaktuaka; a phel khat bel khep theih chiat ahi; kongkhak khatah phel nih, a dangah phel nih mah.
Bang a agelh mah bang un sungpi kongkhakte ah cherub leh tum sing lim a gelh chiat lai ua; sum tawng puaah sing pek sah mahmah a phalh uh.Huan sumtawng bang langtuakte leh sing pek phalhte ah tohlet hon theihlouh leh tum sing lim a om laia; a in pi pang dantan leh sing pek phalh leng huchibang mah ahi.
Huan sumtawng bang langtuakte leh sing pek phalhte ah tohlet hon theihlouh leh tum sing lim a om laia; a in pi pang dantan leh sing pek phalh leng huchibang mah ahi.
Huan huang sungnungzo malam pangah a honpi khiaa; mun awl jawn mal lam kulh khuam doh dantan ah a honpi luta.
Huan mal lampanga dantante tong jaa sau tong sawmngaa ja ahi a.
Huang sungnung zopen mun awl tong sawmnih lamnga leh huang ponung jaw suanglep lam doh inchial chial thum a om tuaktuaka.
Dantante kikalah tong sawm a ja, tong jaa sau paisuakna a oma, a kongkhakten mallam a nga hi.
Dantan tungnungte a kochikjaw a; in chial nuainungjaw leh a laitate sang in a inchialten mun lian a luah zo ngal ua.
Chial thuma lam ahi a, huang sung khuamte bangin khuam a nei ngal keia; huchiin a laita sangin a tungnungpen a kochik a, a laita leng a nuainung pen sangin a kochik zo lai hi.
Huan dantan pang po lam ah huang sung ponung zopen lam doh bang tong sawmnga a sau a om.
Huang sung ponung jaw-a dantante tong sawm ngaa sau ahi ngala: huan in pi jula pen tong jaa sau ahi.
Huan huai dantante nuaiah suahlam pangah huang sung ponungjaw a kipana lutna a oma, po lam bang kibansapna ah.
Sim lamah leng mun awl jawna kulh bang dohin dantante a om nawn a;
a ma a paina leng mallam dantante paina bang mah ahi a: a dung leh a vai te leng, a pawtkhiaknate, a lep khawm dante, a kongkhakten sim lam a nga chih kia loungal kibang vek ahi.
Huai dantante lutna ding pai suakna tawp suah lam bang chinah kongkhak a om hi.
Huan aman ka kiang ah, Sim lam leh mal lam dantan, mun awl hondohte dantan siangthoute ahi ua; thil siangthoute a koih khawm ua; nek ding latnate, khelh jiaka kithoihna te, moh jiaka kithoihna te a latna ding uh ahi: a mun bel mun siangthou ahi ngala.
Huai laia siampute a lut phot uleh, mun siangthou akipanin huang sung ponungjaw ah a pawt khe ding uh ahi kei; huailai ah a nasepna puansilhte uh a koih zo ding ua, puansilh siangthou ahi ngal ua; puansilh dang silh kiain vantang lakah a gamtang thei ding uh, a chi a.
Inpi sungnungzopen a teh khitin suahlam nga kongpi ah a honpi khiaa, a kim in a teha.
Tehna chiang in suahlam pang a teha, tong zanga ahia; a tehna chianga tehin.
Mal lampang a honteh nawn leuleua, tong za nga ahia, a tehna chianga tehin.
Sim lampang a teh nawna, tehna chianga tehin tong za nga mah ahi.
Huan tumlam a honteh nawna, a tehna chianga tehin tong za nga mah ahi.A pang liin a tehtaa: a dung lam tong za nga, a vai lam tong za nga ahi; a kimin kulh bang nei ahi a; huai mun siang leh siang lou deidanna dinga bawl ahi.
A pang liin a tehtaa: a dung lam tong za nga, a vai lam tong za nga ahi; a kimin kulh bang nei ahi a; huai mun siang leh siang lou deidanna dinga bawl ahi.
Huchiin kongpi ah a honpi a, suahlam kongpi ah.
Huan ngai dih, Israel Pathian thupina suahlam a kipanin a hongtunga; a husa tui tampi gingbang ahia, lei a thupinain a tanvak vek hi.
Kilakna ka muh a a lat dan, khopi hihse dinga a hongpai leh Kebar lui geia kilakna ka mun bangmah ahi a; huan, khupbohin ka pukta hi.
Huan suahlam nga kongpi ah a inpi sungah TOUPA thupina a luta;
huan Khain a hondom kanga, huang sungnung jawah a honpi luta; huan, ngaiin, TOUPA thupinain a in a dimsakvekta hi.
Huan mi khat ka kianga a din laiin mi kuahiam honhoupihin ka jaa, ka kiangah,
Mihing tapa, hiai ka laltutphah omna mun, ka khepek ngakna, Israel tate laka khantawna ka tenna ding mun ahi: ka min siangthou Israel inkoten amauin hiam, a kumpipate uh hiam, a hukna uleh a kumpipate uh luang vuinaa zangin a hihthanghuai nawnta kei ding uh;
a kongpi uh ka kongpi chin mahmaha bawlin, a kongpi biang uh ka kongpi biang jula koihin amau leh keimah kikal ah bang kia omsak in a thilhih kihhuaite un ka min siangthou a hihthanghuaita ua; huaijiakin ka hehnain amau ka hihmangta ahi.
Tua kipan in huknate, a kumpipa uh luangte keia kipana gamlapi ah koihmang leh uh; huan a lak uah khantawnin ka teng ding.
Huan nang mihing tapa, a inpi lim uh Israel inkote kiang ah ensak in; a thil hihkhelh uh a zumpih theihna ding un, a bawldan ding leng na nateh uhen.
Huan a thilhih tengteng uh a zumpih ua a inpi om dan te, a pawtkhiakna te, a lutna te, a geldan te, a zat dan te, a kepdan te ensak inla, a mitmuh mahmah uah gelh in; a dan pumpi leh a zatdan tengteng a vom ua, a zuih theihna ding un.
Hiai a inpi adia dan ding ahi: tang vum tung tam kim tengteng mun siangthoupen ding ahi; ngai dih, hiai inpi a dia dan ding ahi.
Huan tong a tehin hiai maitam letlam ahi, (tong khat chih tong khat leh khutpek tuam a hi), a kingakna tong khata sang, tong khata ja, a gei a kim a khap khata pawng jel ahi.
Huan maitam san lam hichibang ahi: leia a kingakna akipan a dohdan nuainungzo pen tong nih ahi a, a zat lam tong khat; a dohdan neuzo pen akipana a dohdan lian zo pen tong li ahi a, tong khat a ja ahi.
A maitam tung tam tong li a sang ahi nawna, maitam tung tam a kipanin ki li a ding hi.
Maitam tung tam a dung leh a vai tong sawm leh nih tuaktuak ahi; a dung avai kikim ahi.
A dohdan a dung leh a vai tong sawm leh li tuaktuak ahi; a dung a vai kikim ahi: a gei tong kimkhat ahi: a kingakna a kimin tong khat ahi; a kalbiin suahlam a ngat ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: A bawl khit chiang ua maitam zat dan ding hichi bang ahi: Halmang kithoihna ding te, sisan thehna ding te ahi.
Levi chi siampu Zadok suana mi, na honsep sak dinga honnaih sekpa kiang ah khelh jiaka kithoihna dingin bawngpa tuai na piak ding ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
A sisan na la dia, maitam ki lite leh a dohdan ning lite, a gei kimvel in na luan dinga; huchibangin maitam na hihsiangin na siangsak ding hi.
Khelh jiak a kithoihna bawngpa tuai na la dinga, mun siangthou po lama, huai dinga in a seh ua hal ding ahi.
Huan a ni nihna in keltal, dem bei, khelh jiaka kithoihna dinga lat ding ahi; huchiin maitam bel bawngpa tuaia a hihsiang bang mah un na siangsak ding ahi.
Maitam hihsiangpen na hih khit chiang un bawngpa tuai gensiat bei leh belamtal, gensiat bei, a hon laka na lan ding hi.
TOUPA ma ah na lan dinga, siampu in chi a soh dinga, TOUPA kiangah halmang adingin a lan ding.
Ni sagih sung ni teng khelh jiak a kithoihna dingin keltal na zang dinga hi; bawngpa tuai leh belamtal, a hon lak a, gensiat bei leng a zat ding uh ahi.
Maitam hihsiang leh siansaknain ni sagih a la dinga; huchiin maitam siangthou a hita ding ahiHuan huai nite a hihtangtun khit chiang un, a ni giat ni a kipanin siamputen na halmang kithoihnate uh leh lemna kithoihnate a maitam uah a lan ding ua, huan ka honna sang dinga, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, a chi a.
Huan huai nite a hihtangtun khit chiang un, a ni giat ni a kipanin siamputen na halmang kithoihnate uh leh lemna kithoihnate a maitam uah a lan ding ua, huan ka honna sang dinga, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi, a chi a.
Huan mun siangthou kongpi ponung jaw, suah lama ngaah a honpi kik nawna, khak a nahi a.
Huan TOUPAN ka kiangah, Hiai kongpi a kikhak thek dinga, a kihong kei dinga, kuamah a lut samkei ding uh; TOUPA, Israel Pathian a honglut khit jiakin; a kikhak thek dinga hi.
Lal bel TOUPA maa an ne dingin huailaiah a tu phet dinga; sumtawng kongkhak ah a lut dinga, huaimah ah a pawt nawn ding, a chi a.
Huan mal lam nga kongpi ah inpi intual ah a honpi a; huan, ka ena ngaidih, TOUPA in TOUPA thupinain a dim vek mai maha; huan khupbohin ka pukta hi.
Huan TOUPAN ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, TOUPA in zatdan leh a dan tengteng na kianga ka gen tungtang ah na bil doh inla, na mit suan inla, na lungsim ah chiamteh hoih dih: a inpi lut dan te, a mun siangthou a kipan pawtdante, na lungsim ah hoihtakin chiamteh in.
Huan helhat, Israel inkote ngei kiangah hichiin na gen ding ahi: TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Aw, nou Israel inkote aw, na kihhuaina tengteng uh behlap dinga pautuam mi,
lungtang leh sa zeksum louh, ka tanghoute, thaute na lat lai ua ka mun siangthou, ka in mahmah hihbuah dinga na pilutua, ka thukhun a na tatlek uh, na kihhuaina tengtengte uh na tawpta heh.
Huan ka thil siangthoute nou na kem kei ua, hiai pautuam mite ka mun siangthou ah nou sik a kemmiin na sep zota uh.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Pautuam mi kuamah, lungtang leh sa zeksumlouh, Israel tate lak a pautuam mi himhim ka mun siangthou ah a lut ding uh a hikei.
Levi chi, Israelte milim delha a vak mang lai ua kei akipana gamla pia paisaten bel a thulimlouhna uh a po ding uh.
Ka mun siangthou ah nasemmiin a pang ding ua; inpi kongkhakte a ngak ding ua; inpi sung ah na a sem ding uh: halmang kithoihnate, mipi a dia kithoihnate a gou ding ua; mipi nasep sak ding in a ma uah a ding ding uh.
A milimte uh maah a na uh a sep sak dingua; Israelte inkote a din thulimlouhnaa pukna a hih sek nak jiak un a tunguah ka khut ka lik dinga; a thulimlouhna uh a po ngei ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huchiin ka kiang ah siampu nasem dingin a hon naih ngeikei ding ua; ka thil siangthoute, thil siangthoupente a hong naih ngei samkei ding uh; a zahlakna uh leh a thil kihhuai hih sate uh a po zo ding uh.
A inpi kemmite dingin ka bawl dinga, nasepna tengteng leh hih ding om peuhmahte hih dingin.
Siampu Levi chi, Zadok ta, keia kipana Israel tate a vak mang lai ua ka mun siangthou kemmiten bel ka nasem dingin a hong naih phet ding uh; thau leh sisan lan dingin ka maah a ding ding uh, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Ka mun siangthou ah a lut ding ua, na honsep sak ding in ka dohkan a honnaih ding ua, kei honkemmiin a pang ding uh.
Huan, huang sungnungjaw kongpitea a lut un puannaktual malngatin a kithuam ding ua, huang sungnungjaw leh in sung lama na a sep sung un samul puan a silh ding uh ahi kei hi.
Dial malngat a khim dingua, puan malngat pheitom a bun ding ua, khua ul sak thei himhim a silh ding uh ahi kei hi.
Huan huangsung ponung jaw, vantang kianga a hong pawt khiak uleh a nasepna puansilhte uh a suah ding ua, dantan siangthou ah a koih ding uh, puansilh dang a silh ding uh; mipite a puansilh ua misiangthoua abawl tei louhna ding un.
A lute uh a met giau ding uh ahi keia; a sam uh leng a hawi sau ding uh ahi sam kei; a met lel ding uh ahi.
Siampu peuhpeuh huang sungnungzopen a lut chiang un uain a dawn ding uh ahi sam kei.
Meithai hiam maksa nung hiam jiin a nei ding uh ahi sam kei hi; Israel inkote chi, nungak siangthou hiam siampu sihsan meithai hiam a kitenpih jawk ding uh ahi.
Ka mite thil siangthou leh siangthoulou kibatlouhdan a hilh ding uh ahi; thil siang leh siang lou a khentuam sak ding uhi.
Thubuaite leng a ngaihtuah ding uh ahi; ka ngaihtuah bang jelin a ngaihtuah dinguh: Ka ankuanglui sehsa tengteng ah ka dante leh ka dan bawlsate a zuih ding uh ahi; ka khawlnite leng a tan ding uh ahi.
Amau kihihbuah ding in mi luang a naih ding uh ahi kei; himahleh nu hiam, pa hiam, tanu hiam, tapa hiam unaupa hiam sanggamnu pasal neilou hiam a din a kihihbuah thei ding uh.
Huan a kisiansak nungin amah adingin ni sagih sim sak nawn ding ahi.
Huang sungnungjawa mun siangthoua nasem dinga mun siangthoua a lut niin khelh jiaka kithoihna amah adingin a lan ding ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Goutan bangmah a neikei ding ua; a goutan uh tuh keimah ka hi ding.
Israel ah tan bangmah na pe ding uh ahi kei, a tan uh keimah ka hi.
Nek ding latte, khelh jiak a thil latte, moh jiak a thil latte a ne ding ua; Israel lak a thil siangthou peuhmah amaua ding ahi.
Gah masate lak a a hoihpen pente, na thil lat chiteng ua a hoihpen, na thillat tengteng ua siampute ading ahi: na in ua vualjawlna a tam den theihna ding in tangbuang meklom hoihpen siampu kiang ah na pe ding uh ahi.Siamputen sapul a neklouh ding uh ahi. vasa hiam gamsa hiam khut thuak hiam, amah siha si hiam a nek ding uh ahi kei hi.
Siamputen sapul a neklouh ding uh ahi. vasa hiam gamsa hiam khut thuak hiam, amah siha si hiam a nek ding uh ahi kei hi.
Huailouin leng goutan dinga gam nahawm hun chiang un gam seh siangthou, TOUPA kiang ah thilpiak na bawl ding uhi: a dunglam tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai lam tong sing nih, a pumin gam siangthou ahi ding ahi.
Hiai ah mun siangthou adin a dung leh a vai tong za nga tuaktuak, kimkot ahi dinga, huan, akimin tong za ngaa ja mun awl a om dinga hi.
Huan hiai tehsa akipanin a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga leh a vai tong sing khat na teh khe dinga, huaiah mun siangthou pen a om ding ahi.
Gam seh siangthou bel, siampu, mun siangthou a nasemmi, a nasem dinga TOUPA naih semmite ding ahi dinga, a in mun ding un leh mun siangthou dingin gam siangthou ahi ding ahi.
Mun dang a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing khat, Levi chi inpi a nasemmite tuam dingin, a tenna khopi dingin a omding ahi.
Gam seh siangthou lat sa julah khopi tan a vai tong za nga leh a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga na sep ding uhi, Israel inko pumpi adinga hi ding.
Huan, lal tan bel gam siangthou latsa leh khopi tan ma lamah tum lama tumlam ngain, suah lama suahlam nga in a om ding ahi.
A dung bel tumlam gamgi akipana suah lam gamgi phain, gam seh dang tan mah ahi.
Huai bel Israel gam a amah tantuam ahi ding ahi: huan, ka lalte'n ka mite a nuaisiah nawn kei ding ua, Israel inkote a nam tuamdan bang jelin gam a pe zo ding uhi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Aw, Israel lalte aw, hunta hen, hiamgamna leh kigapna tawp san vengveng unla; diktat tak a vaihawm leh dik taka hih chingta unla, ka mite delhkhiak nak pen tawp ta un, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Bukna dik, epha dik leh bath dik na zat ding uh ahi.
Epha leh bath a kikim ding uh ahi, bath homer seh sawma khena seh khat ta ahi dinga, epha leng homer seh sawm a khena seh khat ta ahi sam ding: homer a kipana teh khiak ding ahi ding.
Huan shekel bel gera sawmnih ahi dinga: shekel nga bel shekel nga geih ahi dinga, shekel sawm bel shekel sawm geih ahi dinga, na mina uh bel shekel sawmnga geih ahi ding ahi.
Huan hiai thillat nalat ding uh ahi ding; buh homer khat jelah epha seh guka khena seh khat leh buh man homer khat jelah epha seh guka khena seh khat na pe ding uhi:
Huan sathau latdan ding kor khat jelah bath seh sawma khena seh khat; kor bel bath sawm ahi ngala.
Israel gan tatna mun hoih a kipan belam hon lak a za nih zel ah a nou khat, nek ding lat dingin, halmang kithoihna dingin lemna thil lat dingin amaute hihsiangna bawlna dingin a lat ding uh ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Gama mi tengtengin Israel lal kiangah hiai thillat a pe ding uh.
Huan ankuangluina ah te, kha thak ah te, khawlni ah te, Israel ankuanglui ni sehsa tengteng ah halmang kithoihna te, nek ding latte, dawn ding lat te lanin a ngaihtuah dinga; khelh jiak a kithoihna te, nek ding latte, halmang kithoihna te, lemna thil latte Israel inkote kisiansak na dingin aman a tum sak ding ahi.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Kha khatna, huai kha ni khat niin bawngtal tuai gensiat bei na zang dinga, mun siangthou na siangsak ding ahi.
Huan siampuin khelh jiak a kithoihna sisan a la dinga, in pi kongpi biangah te leh maitam dohdan ning lite ah leh huang sungnung zopen kongpi bangka ah te a tat ding.
Huan huai kha ni sagih niin hihkhak hiam theihlouh jiak hiam a thilhihkhialmite ading in leng huchibang mahin na hih dinga, huchibang in in pi hihsianna na bawl ding ahi.
Kha khatna, huai kha ni sawm leh ni li niin paikan ankuang na tang ding ua; huan, ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uh:
Huai niin lalin amah leh agama mi tengteng adia khelh jiaka kithoihna dia bawngtal tuai a tum ding ahi.
Huan ankuanglui ni ni sagih sung tengin bawngtal tuai gensiat bei sagih leh belamtal sagih jel TOUPA adin halmang kithoihna dingin a tum ding, khelh jiaka kithoihna dingin ni tengin keltal khat toh.
Huan tanghou lat dingin bawngtal khat jelah epha khat, belamtal khat jelah epha khat leh epha khat jelah sathau hin khat atum ding ahi.Kha sagihna, huai kha ni sawm leh ni nga nia ankuangluina ah ni sagih sung huchibang mahin a hih ding a, khelh jiaka kithoihna te, halmang kithoihna te, tanghou latte leh sathau te a tum tum ding ahi, a chi a.
Kha sagihna, huai kha ni sawm leh ni nga nia ankuangluina ah ni sagih sung huchibang mahin a hih ding a, khelh jiaka kithoihna te, halmang kithoihna te, tanghou latte leh sathau te a tum tum ding ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin TOUPA PATHIANIN a chi ahi: Huang sungnungzopen kongpi suah lam nga pen nasep ni, ni guk sung a kikhak dinga, khawlni leh khathak niin bel a kihong ding ahi.
Huan lal bel kongpi sumtawng ah a lut dinga, kongpi bangka chin ah a ding dinga, siamputen a halmang kithoih leh lemna thil latte a bawlsak ding ua, lutna kongpi dantan ah Pathian a be ding; huchiin a pawtkhe dinga, kong bel nitaklam tana khakb louh ahi ding ahi.
Huan vantang in bel khawlni leh kha thakte ah kongpi lutna chinte ah TOUPA maah Pathian a be ding uh.
Huan khawlnia lalin TOUPA kianga halmang kithoihna a lat ding bel belam nou gensiat bei guk leh belamtal gensiat bei khat ahi ding;
huan belamtal khat jelah tanghou lat epha khat, belamnou pen ah bel a piak theih bangbang, leh epha khat ah sathau hin khat jel ahi ding.
Huan kha thak niin bawngtal tuai gensiat bei khat, belamnou guk leh belamtal khat ahi dinga, gensiat bei a hih vek ding uh ahi:
Huan tanghou lat a bawl dinga, bawngtaltuai ah epha khat, belamtal ah epha khat, belamnou pen ah a theih bangbang, leh epha khat jelah sathau hin khat ahi ding ahi.
Huan lal a lutin kongpi sumtawng ah a lut dinga, huaiah mah a pawtkhe nawn ding ahi.
Vantangte bel ankuanglui ni sehsaa TOUPA maa a hongpai uleh Pathian a be dinga mal lam kongpi a honglut sim lam kongpi ah a pawt khe ding uh; sim lam kongpi a honglut mal lam kongpi ah a pawt khe leuleu ding uh; a lutna kongpi uah a kik ding uh ahi keia, a ma lamah a pai jel zo ding uh ahi.
Huan a lut un lal bel a lak uah a lut tei dinga, a pawt un a pawt khe tei ding ahi.
Huan ankuanglui nite leh ankuangluipi ah te tanghou lat bawngtal tuai khat ah epha khat, belamtal khat ah epha khat, belamnou penah a piak theih bangbang, epha khatah sathau hin khat jel ahi ding ahi.
Huan lalin utthua thillat a lat sin leh halmang kithoihna hiam lemna thillat hiam TOUPA kianga utthua a thillat banga a lat sin leh suah lam nga kong a honsak dinga, khawlnia hih bangmahin, halmang kithoihnate leh lemna thil latte a bawl ding: huchiin a pawtkhe dinga, a pawt khiak nungin kong a khak ding uh.
Huan nitenga TOUPA kiang a halmang kithoihna dingin belamnou kumkhata upa, gensiat bei na zang dinga, jingsang in na zat ding ahi.
Huan jingsang tengin tanghou lat na bawl dinga, epha seh guka khena seh khat leh sathau hin khat seh thuma khena seh khat tangbuang nel mahmah nawnsakna din: huai bel khantawn a TOUPA kianga tanghou lat dan ding ahi.
Hichibangin halmang thillat gige dingin belamnou, tanghou latte, sathau te jingsang tengin na bawl ding ahi, chiin.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Lalin a tapate, kua kiangah leng, goutan bangpeuh a piak leh a tapatea ahi dinga, a gouluah uh ahi mai.
Himahleh a goutan a pen a nasemmi kuahiam kiang a apiak leh sal pawtna kum tan in a nei dinga, huai ah lal kiang ah a pe kik nawnding ahi; amah gou ngeingei bel a tapate a dinga hi ding.
Huailouin leng lalin mite goutan a suhsak dinga hi keia, a in leh lou ua kipan a delh kheding leng ahi sam kei; amaha mahmah pen a tapate kiang ah goutan a pe ding ahi: amau in leh loua kipan mite a vak jak louhna ding un, a chi a.
Huan kongpi pang a siampute a dia dantan siangthou mal lam ngaah a honpi luta; huan, ngai dih, a phaitam tum lam pangah mun anaoma.
Huan aman ka kiang ah, Hiai siamputen moh jiaka thillat leh khelh jiaka thil lat a huanna mun uh, tanghou lat omna mun ahi; huang sung ponungjawa a tawi khiak ua mite mi-siang dia a bawl louhna ding un, a chi a.
Huan huang ponungjaw ah a honpi khiaa, huang sung ning julah a honpai saka; huan, ngai dih, a huang sung ning chiatah huang a om nawna.
Huang sung ning li ah huang, bang nei, a dung tong sawmli, a vai tong sawmthum ana oma; huai a ningate a li un akikim vek uh.
Huai mun li sung lamah a kimvel in suang a vual in a lem ua, huai vual nuaiah a kimin huanna ding thuk a om a;Huan ka kiang ah, Hiaite huanna in, inpi nasemmiten mite kithoihna sa a huanna dingte uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan ka kiang ah, Hiaite huanna in, inpi nasemmiten mite kithoihna sa a huanna dingte uh ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin inpi kongkhak ah a honpi kika; huan, ngai dih, inpi kongpi chin nuaia kipan, suah lam ngain tui a hongluang khiaa; inpi suahlam nga ahi ngala; huan tui maitam sim lam inpi pang tak lam nuaia kipanin a hong luang khia.
Huan mal lam nga kongpi ah a honpi khiaa, inpua ah suahlam nga kongpi ponungjaw phain a honpi a; huan, ngai dih, taklam pang ah tui a hongluang khiaa.
Huan huai miin tehna khau tawiin suah lam ngaa paiin tong sang khat a teha; huan tui a honngap galkah saka, siakmit tan ahi.
Huan tong sang khat a teh nawna; tui a honngap galkah sak nawna, tui khuk tan ahi.
Huan, tong sang khat a teh nawn a; hongap galkah sak nawna, tui kawng tan ahi a.
Huan tong sang khat a teh nawna; huan, kangah galkah vual louh luipi a honghita a; tui a hong sang jel a, a ngaha ngah galkah vual louh, a leuha leuh tham luipi a honghita ngala.
Huan ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, hiai na mu hia? a chi a.
Huan luigei a kik nawn dingin a honpi kiktaa.
Huan ka kika, ngaidih, luigei tawnin, luigei langtuakin sing tampi anaom a.
Huan aman ka kiang ah, Hiai tui suahlam gam lama luang Araba gama luang lut ding ahi; tuipi ah a luang lut ding a, tuipi tui al tui siangthou a suaksakding.
Huan hichi a hong hi dinga; luite a luanna peuh uah ganhing chiteng in a dam loh ding ua, ngasate a om huthut ding uh: tuipi tui a siangthouna ding leh aluanna peuhmaha ganhingten a hin lohna ding un hiai lui a hong luang ahi ngala.
Huan hichi a hong hi dinga; a geiah ngamanmite a ding ding ua; Engedi a kipan Eneglaim phain len paihna mun ahi ding; a ngasa pen a chi bang jel un, tuipi lian ngasa bang maiin a tam mahmah ding uh.
Buannawi leh chiklakte bel a siangthou tei kei ding ua, chi khuk dinga nutsiat ahi ding.
A luigei ah a gei langnihin thei kung chichih a pou dinga, huaite a nah a vuai ngei keiin a gah lou ngei sam kei ding, mun siangthou a kipana lui hong luangkhia vak a hih jiakin kha chihin a gah ding: a gah nek ding ahi dinga, a nah bel hihdamna ahi ding.
TOUPA PATHIANIN hichiin a chi ahi: Hiai Israel nam sawm leh nam nih laka gam kihawm dan dinga hi hi: Joseph in tan nih a tang ding.
Kibang chiat in na tang ding uh ahi; na pipute uh kiang a piak dinga ka kichiamna sa ahi: hiai gam na gam tan un a puk sin ahi.
Hiai a gam pumpi gi ding ahi: Mallamah Tuipi Lian akipanin Hethlon paisuak in Hamath lutna guamah Zedad a tunga;
Berothah te, Damaska leh Hamath kigitna laia om Sibraim te, Hauran gamgi chin-a om Hazorhattikon phain.
Huchiin gamgi bel Tuipi Lian akipanin Damaska gamgi chin a Hazarenon phain ahi dinga: mal lamah Hamath gamgiin a gi ding.
Hiai mal lam gamgi ahi.
Huan suahlam ah Hauran leh Damaska kikal ah Gilead leh Israel gam kikal a Jordan lui dung a jui ding; mal lam gamgi akipanin suah lam tuipi ah Tamar a pha ding.
Hiai suah lam gamgi ahi ding hi.
Sim lamah Tamar akipanin Meiboth-kadesh tuite phain Aigupta lui juiin Tuipi Lian a tung ding.
Hiai sim lam gamgi ding ahi.
Tum lamah Tuipi Lian in a gi dinga, sim lam gamgi akipanin Hamath lutna guam jawn pha in.
Hiai tum lam gamgi ahi ding hi.
Huchiin hiai gam Israel nam dungjuiin na lak uah na hawm ding uh.
Huan hichi ahi dinga, na gamtan ding uh leh na lak ua nam dang teng, ji leh ta nei sate gam tan ding bel na hop ding uh ahi.
Amau lah Israel ta dia piang mawng bang ahi ding uh ahi; Israel namte lak ah noute bangin tan a neih ding uh ahi.Huan hichi a hong hi dinga; kua nam lak ah leng nam dang na nateng leh, huailaia a gam tan ding na seh sak ding uh ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan hichi a hong hi dinga; kua nam lak ah leng nam dang na nateng leh, huailaia a gam tan ding na seh sak ding uh ahi, chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Hiaite a nam minte uh ahi: Mal lam gamgi Tuipi Lian akipana Hethlon pai saukin Hamath lutna guam ah Damaska gamgi a Hamath kiang mal lam pang Hazar-enon phain, suah lam leh tum lam sangah tan khat Dante tan ahi a.
Dante tan toh a kigiin suah lam leh tumlam sangah tan khat Asherte tan ahi.
Asherte tan toh a kigiin suahlam leh tumlam sangah tan khat Naphtalite tan ahi.
Naphtalite tan toh a kigiin suahlam leh tum lam sangah tan khat Manassite tan ahi a.
Manassite tan toh a kigiin suahlam leh tumlam sangah tan khat Ephraimte tan ahi.
Ephraimte tan toh a kigiin suahlam leh tum lam sangah tan khat Reubente tan ahi a.
Reubente tan toh a kigiin suahlam leh tum lam sangah tan khat Judate tan ahi.
Judate tan toh a kigiin suahlam leh tum lam sang ah, thilpiak na lat ding uh a vai tong sing nih leh sang nga ahi dinga; a dung suahlam leh tumlam sangah tan dang bang mahin ahi a, a laia mun siangthou omin.
Thilpiak TOUPA kiang a na lat ding uh a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing nih ahi ding ahi.
Huan hiaiah siampute a din gam siangthou thilpiak ding ahi dinga; mal lam sangah a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga leh tum lam sangah a vai tong sing khat leh suah lam sangah a vai tong sing khat, sim lam sangah dung tong sing nih leh sang nga ahi dinga hi: a laia TOUPA mun siangthou omin.
Siampu siansaksa, Zadok tapate ka thu kemmite ding ahi ding.
Huaite bel Israel tate a vak mang lai ua Levi chite a vak mang teita uh banga vak mang teiloute ahi uhi.
Huan gam thilpiak pumpi akipan amaua piak tuam, mun siangthoupen ahi dinga, Levi chi tan toh a kigiin.
Siampu tan juljulah Levi chiten tan a nei ding ua, a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing khat ahi ding.
Huan a juak ding uh ahi keia, a khen ding uh leng ahi sam kei: a gam hoihna tata leng mi dang kiang a piak ding ahi kei hi: TOUPA adia siangthou ahi ngala.
Huan a vai tong sing nih leh sang nga ban ah tong sang nga vantang tan, khopi dinna ding, tenna in ding te leh khopuate adin ahi ding: khopi bel a laizang ah a om ding.
Huan a teh vialdan hichibangin ahi ding: A mal lampang tong sang li leh za nga, a sim lampang tong sang li leh za nga; a suah lampang tong sang li leh za nga, a tum lampang tong sang li leh za nga:
Huan a khopiin khopua a nei dinga; mal lampangin tong za nih leh sawmnga; sim lampang tong za nih leh sawmnga, suah lampang tong za nih leh sawmnga, tum lampang tong za nih leh sawmnga.
Huan a dunglam val lai thilpiak siangthou jula pen suahlamah tong singkhat, tum lamah tong sing khat ahi ding: thilpiak siangthousa juljul ahi ding ahi: huan, huaia thil pawtte bel khopi a nasemmite nek ding ahi ding.
Huan, khopi a nasemmi Israel nam tengtenga miten a lei a let ding uh.
Thilpiak pumpi a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing nih leh sang nga ahi ding; thilpiak siangthousa, dung leh vai kikim khopi tan toh na lat ding uh ahi.
Huan aval thilpiaksa siangthou leh khopi tan pang lang tuaktuak lal tan ahi dinga, suahlam sang ah thilpiak tong sing nih leh sang nga ban, gamseh dangte juljul lal tan ahi ding: huchiin thilpiak siangthousa leh inpi mun siangthou bel a laizang ah a om ding.
Huan Levi chi tan leh khopi tan lal tante kikalah a om dinga; lal tan Juda tan leh Benjamin tan toh a kigi ding.
Huan nam omlaite tungthu ah, suah leh tum lamsangah tan khat Benjaminte tan ahi ding.
Huan Benjaminte tan toh a kigiin suah leh tum lamsangah tan khat Simeonte tan ahi.
Simeonte tan toh kigiin suah leh tum lamsang Issakarte tan ahi a.
Issakarte tan toh kigiin suah leh tum lam tankhat Zebulunte tan ahi.
Zebulunte tan toh a kigiin suah leh tumlam sang tan khat Gadte tan ahi a.
Gadte tan sim lampang gamgi Tarmar akipanin Meribathkadesh tuite tanin Aigupta lui juiin Tuipi Lian a tung ding.
Hiai Israel namte goutan dinga gam kihawm dan ding leh a gam seh tuamte ahi uh chih TOUPA PATHIAN thu pawt ahi.
Huan hiaite khopi akipan pawtnate ahi uh; mal lam pang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum:
Khopi kongpite Israel nam min bang jela sak ding ahi a; mal lama kongpi thumte, Reuben kongpi khat, Juda kongpi khat, Levi kongpi khat;
Huan suah lampang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum: Joseph kongpi khat, Benjamin kongpi khat, Dan kongpi khat ahi dinga;
Huan sim lampang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum: Simeon kongpi khat, Issakar kongpi khat, Zebulun kongpi khat ahi ding;
Tum lampang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum: Gad kongpi khat, Asher kongpi khat, Naphtali kongpi khat, ahi ding.A kimvelin tong sing khat leh sang giat ahi dinga; huai ni a kipan in khopi min bel TOUPA omna mun chih ahi dinga hi.
A kimvelin tong sing khat leh sang giat ahi dinga; huai ni a kipan in khopi min bel TOUPA omna mun chih ahi dinga hi.
Juda kumpiap Jehiokim vaihawm kum thum kumin Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar Jerusalem ah a honga, a om a
Huan TOUPA Juda kumpipa Jehiokim a khut ah a piaa, Pathian ina tuiumbelsuan khenkhat toh; huan aman Sinar gamah a pathian in ah amaute a pita hi: huchiin tuiumbelsuante a pathian sumkoihna-in ah a la lut ta hi.
Huan kumpipan a michilgehte heutupa Aspenaz, Israel tate laka kuate hiam, kumpi chite a kipan leh milian te akipan honpi dingin a kiangah thu a gena;
Tuailaite amaua gensiatna om lou, himahleh hoihtaka deihsakna tang leh, pilna tengtenga siam theihna leh, pilna theihsiamna lungpilte, kumpipa inpia ding thei ding, huchibang mite; huchia Kaldai laisiamna leh pau amaute a sinsak theihna dingin.
Huchiin kumpipan amau ni teng tantuan dingin kumpipan an akipan leh a dawn uain akipanin a sehsaka, huchia kum thum vakthaua a om theihna ding un; huchia huai bei chianga kumpipa maa a din theihna ding un.
Huchiin hiaite lakah, Juda tate akipan, Daniel te, Hanania te, Misael te, leh Azaria te a om ua.
Huan michilgehte lalpan amau kiangah minte a pia a; Danial kiangah Beltesazar min a piaa; Hanania kiangah, Sadrak; huan Misael kiangah, Mesak; huan, Azaria kiangah, Abed-nego.
Himahleh Danialin kumpipa an hiam a dawn uain hiama kihih thanghuai louh a lungtangin a tum chiltela; huaijiakin michilgeh lalpa kiangah a ki hihthanghuai louhna dingin a ngenta hi.
Huchiin Pathianin Danial michilgehte lalpa mitmuhin deihsakna leh lainatna a musak a.
Huan michilgehte lalpan Danial kiangah, Ka toupa kumpipa na an uleh na dawn uh seppa ka kihta: bangdingin na khanvual pih uh tuailaite sanga na mel uh hoihloujawa mu ding ahia oi? huchiin kumpipa Jakab ka lutang na lauthawngsak dia hia? a chi a.
Huchiin Danialin sumkempa, michilgehte lalpan Danial, Hanania, Misael leh Azana tunga a sehpa kiangah:
Na sikhate ni sawm sung enchian in. ka honngen hi; nek dingin antehlouhing leh dawn dingin tui honpia uhen.
Huaichiangin na maah ka mel u leh amau kumpipa an nete tuailaite mel et hi hen; huan na muh bangin, na sikhate tungah hihin, a chi a.
Huchiin hiai thu ah amau thu a ngaikhiaa. ni sawm sung a enchian uhi.
Huan ni sawm a beiin tuailai kumpipa an nete tengteng sangin a mel uh hoihjawin a kilanga, a sa uh leng a thau jaw hi.
Huchiin sum kem pan a an u leh a dawn ding uh uain a la manga, amau kiangah antehlouhing a peta hi.
Huan hiai tuailai lite a hih uleh.
Pathianin amaute kiangah laisiamna leh pilna tengtenga theihna leh kivakna a piaa: huchiin Danialin mengmuhna leh mang tengtengah theihsiamna a nei hi.
Huankumpipan amaute honpi lut ding a chih nite a beiin. michilgehte lalpan amaute Nebukadnezzar maah a honpi hi.
Huan kumpipan amaute a houlim piha; a lak tengteng uah Danial te, Hanania te, Misael leh Azaria bang kuamah muhin a omta kei hi: huaijiakin kumpipa maah a dingta uhi.
Huchiin pilnaleh theihsiamna thu chiteng, amaute kumpipan a dotte ah. a gamsunga om mitkhialdawitawite leh bummite tengteng sangin a mUnsawma hoihjawin amaute a mu hi.Huan Danial kumpipa Kura kum khat kum tanpha hialin a paisuak ton hi.
Huan Danial kumpipa Kura kum khat kum tanpha hialin a paisuak ton hi.
Huan Nebukadnezzar vaihawm kum nih kum in Nebukednezzar in mang a neia; a lungsim a buai mahmaha, a ihmu theita kei hi.
Huan kumpipan mitkhialdawitawite leh, bummite leh, aisanmite leh Kaldai mite, kumpipa a mang hilh dinga sap dingin thu a piaa.
Huchiin a hong lut ua kumpipa maah a hong ding ta uhi.
Huchiin kumpipan a kiang uah, Mang ka neia, mang thei dingin ka lungsim a buai mahmah hi, a chi a.
Huan Kaldai miten kumpipa kiangah Suria pauin, Aw kumpia, khantawnin dam in; na sikhate mang tuh hilh inla a hilhchetna ka ensak ding uh, a chi ua.
Kumpipan a dawnga, Kaldai mite kiangah, A thil keia kipan a paikheta; mang ka kianga na hontheih sak kei ua leh hilhchetna toh, at nenin na om ding ua, na inte uh ekvum a honghi ding.
Himahleh mang leh a hilhchetna na theihsak ua leh, kei a kipanin thilpiakte leh kipahmante leh nakpitaka zahtakna na mu ding uh; huaijiakin mang leh a hilhchetna hon ensak un, a chi a.
A nihveina dingin amau a dawng ua, Kumpipan mang tuh honhilh henla, huan kou a hilhchetna ka ensak ding uh, a chi ua.
Kumpipan a dawnga, Kei akipanin a thil a pai kheta chih na muh jiak un, hun lei tum na hi uh chih ka thei tel hi.
Ahihhangin mang tuh ka kianga na kitheih sak kei u leh, nou adingin dan khat kia a om; hun a kikhen tana, ka maa thu juau leh sia gelkhol na hih jiak un; huaijiakin mang tuh honhilh unla, huan a hilhchetna na hon ensak thei uh chih ka thei ding, a chi a.
Kaldai miten kumpipa maah a dawng ua, Kumpipa thu ensak thei leitungah kumah a om kei; kumpipa hiam, toupa hiam, vaihawmmi kuamahin mitkhialdawitawi kuamahmah hiam, bummi kuamahmah hiam, Kaldai mi kuamahmah ah huchibang a dot ngei louh jiak un.
Kumpipa thil deih vangtak ahi, pathiante a omna uh sa toh hiloute chihlouhngal, midang kuamahin kumpipa maah huai a ensak theikei ding uh, a chi ua.
Hiai jiakin kumpipa a heh mahmaha a thangpai tuntuna, Babulon mi pilte tengteng hihmang dingin thu a peta hi.
Huchiin thupiak a pai khetaa, mi pilte a thah ding ahi ta ua; huan Danial leh a lawmte thah dingin a zong uhi.
Huchiin Danialin kumpipa veng sepaih zaheutu Ariok kiangah thuhilhna leh thupil toh dawnna a kik saka, Babulon mi pilte that dinga kuankhe pa kiangah.
Ariok kumpipa sepaih zaheutu a dawnga a kiangah, Bangdia kumpipa a kipan thupiak huchitela kin ahia? a chi a.
Huchiin Ariokin Danial kiangah a thil a kitheisak a.
Huan Danial a luta, amah adia hun sehsak dingin kumpipa a ngena, huchia a hilh chetna kumpipa a etsak dingin.
Huchiin Danial a in ah a paia, Hanania te, Misael te, Azaria te, a lawmte kiangah huai thil tuh a theisak ta hi;
Huchia amauten hiai thuguk tanchina van Pathian chitnate a nget theihna dingun; huchia Danial leh a lawmte Babulon a mi pilte lakate toh amanthat louhna ding un.
Huchiin jan mengmuhna ah Danial kiangah thuguk tuh taklatin a om ta hi.
Huan Danialin van Pathian a phat hi.
Danialin a dawnga, Khantawn khantawnin Pathian min phatin om hen; Pilna leh hatna lah amaha ahi ngala;
Huan aman hunte leh hunbite a hihlamdanga; kumpipate a suan khia, kumpipate a tung khiaa; mi pilte kiangah pilna a piaa, theihsiamna theite kiangah theihna a pia hi.
Thil thukte leh gukte a taklanga, miala om bang ahia aman a thei a, a kiangah khovak a om hi.
Na tungah ka kipaka, ka honphat hi.
Aw nang ka pipute Pathian, pilna leh hatna honpe pa, leh nang ka honnget uh tua ka kianga hontheisakpa; kumpipa thu lah ka kiang uah na hontheisak ta ngala, a chi a.
Huaijiakin Danial, kumpipan Babulon mi pilte hihse dia a sehpa, Ariok kiangah a hoh a; a vahoha a kiangah hichibangin a chi hi; Babulon mipilte hihmang ken; kumpipa maah honpi lut inla, huan kumpipa kiangah a hilhchetna ka ensak ding, a chi a.
Huchiin Ariokin kintakin kumpipa maah Danial a pi luta, a kiangah hichibangin a chi a; Juda saltangte lak ah mi khat ka mu a, aman kumpipa kiangah a hilhchetna a theisak ding, a chi a.
Kumpipan a dawnga Danial kiangah, a min Beltesazar hiven, Mang ka neih na hon theisak theiin, a hilhchetna na hon theisak thei maw? a chi a.
Danial in kumpipa maah a dawnga, Thuguk kumpipan a nget mipil hiin, aisanmite hileh, kumpipa kiangah a ensak theikei ding ua.
Himahleh van ah Pathian a oma aman thugukte a taklang hi; ni nanung lama bang ahia om ding kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kiangah a theisak ta hi.
Na lupna tunga na lutang mengmuhna leh na mang hiaite ahi;
Nang na hih leh aw kumpipa na lupna tungah na lungsim sungah na ngeihtuahnate a hongom ua; tunung chianga bang ahia hongom ding thu: huan amah thugukte na kianga taklangpan bang ahia hongom ding na kiangah a theisak ta ahi.
Himahleh kei bel, pilna ahing himhim sanga pilna ka neih tam jawk jiaka hiai thuguk ka kianga taklat ahi keia: himahleh a hilhchetna kumpipa kianga theihsak a hih theihna ding leh nang na lungtang ngaihtuahte na theihna ding a hijaw hi.
Nang, Aw kumpipa, namuta; ngaiin, milim thupi tak.
Hiai milim, hat tak mai, a tetna thupi mahmah, na maah a ding a; amel tuh a kihtakhuai mahmah hi.
Hiai milim a hih leh, a lutang dangkaeng hoih ahi a. a awm leh a bante dangka, a gilleh apheipite dal,
akhete sik, a khepekte sikkhenkhatleh tung khenkhat.
Suang khuta sek louh. huai milim a khepek sik, leh tung denga kitam nen sak dimdem tanin na mu a.
Huchiin sik toh, tung toh. dal toh, dangka toh, dangkaeng loh a kitam nen khawm vek ua: nipi buhphuala buhsi bang mai a hong hi ua; huchiin huihin amaute amut mang ua: huan huai milim deng suang pen mual thupi a hong suaka. lei pumpi a dimta hi.
Hiai mang ahi a; kumpipa maah a hilhchetna ka gen ding uh.
Nang.
Aw kumpipa, kumpipate kumpipa, van Pathianin a kianga gam te, thilhihtheihna te. hatna te, thupina te a piak. na hi a;
huan koipeuha mite tate a tenna uah, gama sate leh vana vasate na khut ah a honpia; amaute tengteng tunga lal dingin nang a honbawla: dangkaeng lutang na hi.
Huan nang nungin nanga sanga niamjaw gam dang khat a hong ding khe ding; huchiin lal gam thumna dang, leitung tengtenga thunei ding.
Huan gam lina sik bangin a hat dinga: sikin a kek nen saka thil tengteng a nuaisiah bang takin: huan sikin hiaite tengteng a delh jan angin, a kek nen sakin, a delh jan ding hi.
Huan khepekte leh khezung na muhte, a khen belvelmi tung leh a khen sik a hih leh, gam hawmjak ahi dinga; himahleh a sungah sik hatna a om dinga, sik buannawi tung toh helkhawmna muh-bangtakin.
Huan khepek khezungte akhen sik leh akhen tung hi pen a hihleh. huchibangin gam hatna chiang nei, kitapna chiang neia hi ding hi.
Huan sik buannawi tung toh kihel na muh pen a hihleh, mite chi toh a mau a kitok hel ding uh; himahleh a kikawi kip kei ding ua. sik tung toh a kigawm lou mah bangin.
Huan huai kumpipate dam laiin van Pathianin gam suksiata om ngei lou ding, a thuneihna mi dang kianga nutsiata om ngei sam lou ding, a honding khe sak dinga; himahleh hiai gam tengteng a kitam nen sak dinga, a suse vek dinga, amah bel khantawnin a ding ding hi.
Suang mual akipan khuta sek louh hongom khiaa, sik te, dal te, tung te. dangka te leh dangkaeng te a kitam sak dimdem na muh pen a hihleh; tunung chianga bang ahia hongom ding kumpipa kiang ah Pathian thupiin a thei sakta hi: huan mang tuh theihsa ahia, a hilhchetna a kichian hi, a chi a,
Huaitakin Nebukadnezzarin a maiin lei a sia, Danial a bia a. thillat leh gim namtui a kianga lan dingin amau thu a pia hi.
Kumpipan Danial a dawnga, Chihtaktakin na Pathian pathiante Pathian leh, kumpipate TOUPA leh, thugukte taklangpa ahi; hiai thuguk taklang dinga hihtheihna na neih jiakin, a chi a.
Huchiin kumpipan Danial a lian saka, thilpiak tampi a piaa.
Babulon bial pumpia heutuin a bawla.
Babulon mi pilte tengteng tunga ukpipa pen dingin.Huan Danial in Sadrak te, Mesak te, Abed-nego te Babulon bial thulehla tunga koih dingin kumpipa kiangah a ngena; himahleh Danial jaw kumpipa kongpi ah a om hi.
Huan Danial in Sadrak te, Mesak te, Abed-nego te Babulon bial thulehla tunga koih dingin kumpipa kiangah a ngena; himahleh Danial jaw kumpipa kongpi ah a om hi.
Nebukadnezzar kumpipan dangkaeng milim, tong sawmguka sanga, tong guka lian a bawla; Babulon biala, Dura phaijang ah a dingsak ta hi.
Huan Nebukadnezzar kumpipan bial-heutute, vaihawmmite, ukpipate, thukhenmite, sumkemmite, thudotmite, dansiammite leh bialte vaihawmmite tengteng va kai khawma, Nebukadnezzar kumpipan a din khiaksak milim kipahpihna bawlnaa hongpai dingin mi a sawl khiaa.
Huchiin bial-heutu, vaihawmmite, ukpipate, thukhenmite, sumkemmite, thudotmite, dansiammite leh bialte vaihawmmite tengteng kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a din khiak sak milim kipahpihnaah a hongkikhawm vek ua; huan Nebukadnezzar a dinkhiak sak milim mahah a ding uhi.
Huai takin tangkou ngaihtakin a kikou a, Na kiang ua thupiak ahi, Aw mite, namte, paute
Pengkul te, tamngai te, kaihging te, gosem te, nawtging te, tumging peng aih nei te, leh tumging chi chih ging na jak peuhpeuh chiang un, puk unla, kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a dinkhiak sak dangkaeng milim bia un.
Huan kuapeuh puk loua, belou meipi kuang juajua sungah huai hun mahmah a paih lut ding ahi, a chi a.
Huaijiakin huai laia, mite tengtengin pengkul te, tamngai te, kaihgingte gosem te, nawtgingte, leh tumging chi chih ging a jak un, mite tengteng, namte, paute, a puk ua, kumpipa Nebukadnezzarin a tun khiak dangkaeng milim tuh a beta uhi.
Huaijiakin huchih laiin Kaldai mi kuate hiam a hong pai nai ua, Judate a hong hek ta uhi.
A dawng ua kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kiangah, Aw kumpipa, khawntawnin dam in
AW kumpipa, nang thupiak na bawla, mi chitengin pengkul te, tamngai te, kaihging te, gosem te, nawtging te, tumging pengnih neite leh, tumging chi chih a jak chiang ua, a puk ding ua dangkaeng milim a biak ding uh chiin.
Huan kuapeuh puk loua be lou, meipi kuang juajuaah paih lut ding, chiin,
Babulon biala thulehla tunga na sehsa Juda kuate hiam a om ua, Sadrak te, Mesak te, leh Abed-nego te; hiai miten Aw kumpipa, nang a honlimsak kei ua; na pathiante na a sem kei ua na dinkhiak sak dangkaeng milim leng a be kei uh, chiin.
Huchiin Nebukadnezzarin heh leh thangpaiin Sadrak te, Mesak te, Abed-nego honpi dingin thu a piaa.
Huchiin hiai mite kumpipa maah a hon pi ua, Nebukadnezzar a donga a kiang uah, Aw Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego, ka pathian na nasep louh na ua, dangkaeng milim ka tunkhiak na biak louh uh, na tup mawng uhia? achia.
Tuin na kiman sak unla chik hun peuha pengkul te, tamngai te, kaihging te, gosem te, nawtging te, tumging pengaihnei te, leh tumging chi chih ging na jak chiang un puk unla milim ka tun khaik bia un, hoih takin; ahihhangin na biak kei ua leh, meipi kuang juajua sung ah huai hun mahin a honpai lut ding uh; huchiin ka khuta kipana nou hon honhunkhe ding huai pathian kua hi ding a hi?
Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-negoin a dawng ua kumpipa kiangah, Aw Nebukadnezzar, hiai thu ah ka hondawn uh a kiphamoh kei hi.
Huchi bang ding a hihleh, a na ka sep uh ka Pathian un meipi kuang juajua akipan kou a honhunkhe thei hi, huan na khuta kipan a honhunkhe ding hi, Aw kumpipa,
A hihkeia lehleng, na natheiin, Aw kumpipa, na pathiante na ka sem kei ding ua, na dinkhiak sak dangkaeng milim leng ka be sam kei ding uhi, a chi ua.
Huchiin Nebukadnezzar a thangpai petmaha, Sadrak, Mesak leh Abednego tungah a mel putdan a kikheng hial hi; huaijiakin thu a gena, meipi a sat ngeina gige sanga, a mun sagiha a satsak ding un thu a piaa.
Huan a sepaihpawl laka om mi hat kuate hiam thu a piaa, Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego hen dingin, leh meipi kuang juajua sunga pai lut dingin.
Huchiin hiai mite a pheitawm sau lian utoh, a samul puanak uh toh, puannak kawnggak nei utoh, leh a puan silh dangte utoh, meii kuang juajua lakah a pai lutta uhi.
Huchiin kumpipa thupiak a khawk mahmah jiak leh, meipi a sat mahmah jiakin huai mi Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego domte mei kuang in a hul lumta hi.
Hiai mi thumte, Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego te meipi kuang juajua lak ah honsain a puk uhi.
Huchihlaiin Nebukadnezzarin lam dang a sa mahmah: kin tak in a thou khiaa: amah thudotmite kiangah thu a gena, Mei lakah mi thum hgensain i pai lut uh ahi kei maw? a chi a.
Amau a dawng ua kumpipa kiangah, Kik, Aw kumpipa, achi ua;
A dawng a huan, Ngai un, mi li phelsaa om, mei lak khawnga vakin ka mua, bangmah a chi kei uh, a mi lina melputdan pathian tapa a bang hi, a chi a.
Huchiin Nebukadnezzar meipi kuang juajua gei chin ah a hongpaia; thu a gena, huan, Sadrak mesak leh Abed-nego, nou Pathian Tungnungpen sikhate, hongpawt khia unla, hiai lamah hongpai un a chi a.
Huchiin Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego, mei lak ah kipanin a hongpawt khia uhi.
Huan bial-heutute leh, vaihawmmite leh ukpipate leh kumpipa dantheimite, omkhawmten hiai mite, meiin a pumpi tunguah hihtheihna a neikeia, a lujang ua sam leng a kang dan keia, a puansilh uleng a lamdang keia, mei gim leng a nam kei uh chih a mu uhi.
Nebukadnezzarin thu a gena, Sadrak, Nesak leh Abed-nego Pathian, a angel sawla, amah muang a sikhate hunkhiaa, kumpipa thu hihlamdanga, amau Pathian loungal pathian himhim na a sep louh ua a biak louhna ding ua pumpite uh pepa, phatin om hen,
Huaijiakin thupiak ka bawl ahi, mi chih, nam chih, pau chih, Sadrak, Mesak leh Abednego Pathian gensiatnaa thil banghiam himhim gen, at nenin a om dia, a inte uh ekvuma bawl ahi ding hi: hichi banga hunkhe thei pathian dang a om louh jiakin, a chi a.Huchiin kumpipan Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego, Babulon bialah a kaisang saktai.
Huchiin kumpipan Sadrak, Mesak leh Abed-nego, Babulon bialah a kaisang saktai.
Bebukadnezzar kumpipa, mite tengteng, namte leh paute, lei tengtenga tengte kiangah; na kiang uah lemna hihpunin om hen.
Tungnungpen Pathianin kei lama a bawl chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte etsak kei adingin hoih leh a kilawm hi.
A chiamtehnate thupi hina mahmah e: a thillamdangte thilhihthei hina mahmah uh e: a gam khantawn gamahi a, a lalna a khang a khangin a om in.
Kei Nebukadnezzar ka in sungah ka khawla, ka inpi sungah ka luna,
Honlausak mang ka nei a; huan ka lupna tungah ngaihtuahnate leh ka lungtang mengmuhten honhihbuai uhi.
Huaijiakin hilhchetna ka kianga a kithihsak ding un, Babulon mi pil tengteng ka maa pi ding thupiak ka bawlta hi.
Huchiin mitkhialdawitawite, bummite, Kaldaimite leh asisanmite a hongpai ua: huan a ma uah ka mangka genta hi; himahleh a hilhchetna ka kiangah a kitheisak kei uh.
A hihhangin a tawptawpin ka maah, Danialm a min ka pathian min dung juiin, Beltesazar hi ven, amaha pathian siangthoute kha a omna: huchiin a maah mang tuh ka gentaa.
Aw Beltesazar, mitkhialdawitawite heutup, nang ah, [athian siangthoute kha a oma, thugk bangmahin nang a honhihbuai kei chih ka theih jiakin, ka manga ka muh mengmuhte leh a hilhchetna honhilh in, ka chia,
Ka lupna tunga ka lutang mengmuhte hichibang ahi: Lei lai ah, ngaiin, sing khat ka mua, huai sandan a thupi mahmah hi.
Huai sing a hongkhanga, a honghata, a sannain van a sun toua, lei tengteng tawp huaiah a kimu hi.
A nahte a hoih un, a gah pha mahmaha; huaiah tengteng adingin an a om hi: gama sate a nuai lim ah a om ua, vana vasate ahiangahte a teng ua, sa tengteng huaia kipanin a kivak uhi.
Ka lupna tungah ka lutang mengte ka mu a, ngaiin, van akipanin veng mi siangthou khat a hongpai suk hi.
Ngaih takin a kikoua, hichibangin a chi a: Sing tuh phuk inla, ahiangte sat khia inla, a nahte akipan vasate.
A hihhangin leia a zungte kithuahpih pen hawiin, sik leh dal guia henin, gama loupa nou lakah van daituiin kawt henla, a tantuan leia loupa lak sate toh hi hen.
A lungtang mihing akipan khenbin om henlam a kiangah sa lungtang piak hihen; huan hun sagih a tungah bei hen.
