Abraham suan: David suan Jesu Kris khangthu bu:
Abrahamin Issak a suanga; Isaakin Jakob a suanga; Jakobin Juda leh anaute a suanga;
Judain Tamar lakah Piriz leh Zira a suanga; Pirizin Erom a suanga; Eromin Aram a suanga
Aramin Aminadab a suanga, Aminadabin Nasen a suanga; Nasenin Salmon a suanga;
Salmonin Rahab lakah Boaz a suanga; Boazin Ruthi lakah Obed a suanga; Obedin Jessai a suanga.
Jessaiin kumpipa David a suang.
Huan kumpipa Davidin Uria ji lakah Solomon a suanga
Solomonin Rehoboam a suanga, Rehoboamin Abija a suanga, Abijain Asa a suanga;
Asain Jehosaphet a suanga Jehosaphetin Jeram a suanga, Jeramin Uzzia a suanga
Uzzianin Jotham a suanga; Jothamin Ahaz a suanga; Ahazin Hezekia a suanga;
Hezekianin Manassi a suanga; Manassiin Amon a suanga; Amonin Josia a suanga;
Babulon lama sala a pi lai un Josiain Jekonia leh a unaute a suang.
Huan, Babulon lama sala a pi nung un Jekoniain Salathiel a suanga; Salathielin Zerubbabel a suanga;
Zerubabelin Abiud a suanga; Abiudin Eliakim a suanga;
Eliakimin Azer a suanga; Azerin Zadok a suanga, Zadokin Akim a suanga, Akimin Eluid a suanga;
Eliudin Eleazar a suanga, Eleazarin Mathan a suanga, Mathanin Jakob a suanga;
Jakobin Joseph, Mari pasal a suanga; huai Mari lakah, Jesu Kris kichi a hong piangta.
Huchiin suan tengteng tuh Abraham apat David chiang suan sawm leh suan li ahi, David apat Babulon lama sala a pi tan un, suan sawm leh suan li ahi, Babulon lama sala a pi ua pat Kris tan suan sawm leh suan li ahi.
Huan, Jesu Kris hongpian dan tuh hichibang ahi; A nu Mari Joseph toh a kikham lai ua a omkhawm ma un, Kha Siangthouin a gaisak chih a natheita ua.
Huchiin, a pasal Joseph tuh, mi diktak ahi a, amah daisak a ut het keia, a gukin tawpsan a tum.
Himahleh, huai thute a ngaihtuah laiin, ngaiin, a mangin Toupa angel a kiangah a hong kilaka, Joseph, nang David tapa, na ji Mari neih lau ken, a nau pai Kha Siangthou laka ahi,
Tapa a nei dia, a min dingin Jesu na sa ding, aman a mite a khelhna ua kipan a hotdam ding jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPAN jawlnei kama.
Ngai in, nungak siangthou a gai dia, tapa a nei dia, a min dingin Immanuel a sa ding uh. chia a nagen a hongtun theihna dingin huai tengteng tuh a hongom hi.
Huai tuh, i kiang uah, Pathian a om, chihna ahi.
Huchiin, Joseph ihmu lai a thoukhia a, Toupa angel in a kianga thu a piak bangin a hiha, a ji tuh a neita a;Himahleh, tapa a neih masiah a kithuahpih kei; huan, a min dingin Jesu a sata.
Himahleh, tapa a neih masiah a kithuahpih kei; huan, a min dingin Jesu a sata.
Huan, kumpipa Herod a lal laia, Judia gama, Bethlehem khuaa Jesu a hongpianin, ngaiin, suahlam a kipan mi pilte Jerusalem khua ah a hongpai ua.
Koiah ahia Judate Kumpipa hongpian? suahlam ah a aksi ka mu ua, amah be dia hongpai ka hi uh, a chi ua.
Huan kumpipa Herodin huai a jak phetin a lungjing a, Jerusalemte tengteng leng a lung uh a jing sam ua.
Huchiin, siampu liante leh mite laigelhmite tengteng a sam khawm a, Kris pianna ding tuh a dinga.
Huan, amau tuh a kiangah Judia gama Bethlehem khua ah; hichiin jawlneiin a gelh a kei hiam.
Nang, Judia gama Bethlehem aw, Judia khopite lakah na neupen kei hial, Na sung akipana ukpa hongsuak ding ahi ngala, ka mi Israelte vengpa dingin, chih, a chi ua
Huai nungin Herodin a gukin mi pilte tuh a sama, ngentel takin aksi kilat lai a dong kheta a.
Huan, amau tuh Bethlehem khua ah a paisaka, Pai ta unla, naungek thu ngentel takin dong khia un, huan ken leng amah ka hongbiak theih samna dingin, na muh tak un, honghilh un, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa thu a jak un; a paita ua; huan ngaiin suahlama aksi a muh uh naunek omna tung jawn a tuna a khawl masiah a ma uah a paizel a.
Huan, aksi tuh amuh un, a kipak lo mahmah ua
Huan, in sungah a valut ua, a nu Mari kianga naungek tuh a mu ua, a bok ua, a bia ua; huan a gou bawm khawng uh a hong ua, a kiangah kipahna dangkaengte, begawte, murrate a lan ua.
Huan, Herod kianga kik nawnlou dingin a mang ua vauhilha a om jiak un, amau kho lamah lam tuam ah a paita uh.
Huan, a pai nung un, ngaiin, Toupa angel Joseph kiangah a mangin a kilaka, Thou inla; naungek leh a nu pi inla, Aigupta gamah taimang in, kon hilh nawn masiah huailaiah om gige in; Herodin naungek hihmang dia zong ding a hih jiakin, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a jan ajanin naungek leh a nu a pi a, Aigupta gamah a paita a.
Huan, Herod sih mateng hualai ah a om gige a; Toupan jawlnei kama, Ka tapa tuh Aigupta gam apat ka sam khia, chia a gen tuh a hongtun theihna dingin.
Huchihlaiin Herodin mi pilte khem a hih a kitheih tak in a heh mahmah a, mi a sawla, a hun lai tak thu ngentel taka mi pilte a dot khiak bangin, Bethlehem khua leh a kim tengtenga pasal naupang kum nih chiang nuai lam tuh a vek un a that a.
Huchihlaiin jawlnei Jeremiain
Rama khua ah husa a ja uh, kah khawng, misi ngaia mau vengvung khawng, Rakelin a tate a kah a, a om nawn louh jiak un a khamuan theih kei, chia a gen tuh a hongtung ta.
Himahleh Herod a sih nungin, ngaiin, Toupa angel Aigupta gamah Joseph kiangah a mangin a kilaka.
Thou inla, naungek leh a nu pi inla, Israel gamah pai in; naungek thah tumte a sihtak jiak un, a chi a.
Huchiin a thou a, naungek leh a nu tuh a pi a, Israel gamah a lut taa.

Huan, huchihlaiin Baptispa Johanin,
Kisik un! vangam a naita, chiin, Judia gamdai ah thu genin a hongpai a.
Amah ahi, jawlnei Isaiin.
Gamdaia mi kikou awin, Toupa lamlian sial unla a lampi khawng bawl tang un, a chi, chia a nagen.
Huan, huai Johanin sangawngsaw mul puan a silha, a kawng savun kawnggakin a gaka, a an tuh khaukhup leh khuaiju ahi.

a kianglamah a pai ua, a khelhna uh thupha tawiin Jordan lui ah amah kiangah Baptisma a tang ua.
Himahleh, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite tampi amah baptisma tang dinga hongpai a muh takin, a kiang uah, Gul suante! hehna hongtung ding taisan dingin kuan honthuhilh a?
Huchiin kisikna toh kilawm gah honsuang khia un;
Abraham ka pu uh ahi, chiin, kingaihtuah kei un, Pathianin hiai suangte khawng Abraham suantein a dingsak thei hi, ka honchi ahi.
Tua kipanin heipi sing bul tengah a koih ta uh; huchiin, sing chih gah hoiha gah lou peuhpeuh a phuk ua, mei ah a pai lut jel uh.
Ken jaw kisikna dingin tui in ka honbaptis ngei a, himahleh, amah ka nunga hong pai tuh keimah sangin a thupijaw a, a khedap tawi tak leng ka hi kei, Aman jaw Kha Siangthou leh meiin noute a hon baptis ding.
A khutin phazah a tawia, a phual a jap siang sipsip ding a, buhpang ah a buh a sung ding, a si bel mei mit theilouin a hal mang ding, a chi a.
Huchihlaiin a kianga baptisma tang dingin Jesu Galili gam akipan Jordan luiah Johan kiangah a hongpai a.
Johan in bel, Nang kei na honbaptis kiphamoh zopia, ka kiangah na hongzosop ahi maw? chiin, kham a tum a.

Huaizoh in, diabolin kho siangthou ah a pi luta, Pathian biakin tungzum ah a koiha

Huchiin Jesun a ngaihtuahte uh a thei a, bangdia na lung ua gilou ngaihtuah na hi ua? a chi a.
Na khelhnate ngaihdam hihen, chih leh, Thou inla, khein pai in, chih a koi a baihlam zaw
Himahleh Mihing Tapain leitung ah khelhnate ngaih dam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un, (zenga damloupa kiangah) Thouin, na lupna la inla, na inah pai in, achia.
Huchiin a thoua, a in ah a paita hi.
A hihhangin mipiin a muh un, lamdang a sa ua huchibang hihtheihna mihingte kianga pepa, Pathian a pahtawita uhi.
HUan, Jesu huai a kipanin a pai jela, siahpiakna mun a tu, mi khat, amin Matthai a mu a; huan, a kiangah, Honjui in, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a juita.
Huan, hichi ahia, ina ankuang a um laiin, ngaiin, siahkhonmite leh mikhialte tampi a hongpai ua, Jesu leh a nungjuite tuh a umpih chiat ua.
Huan Pharisaiten huai a muh un, a nungjuite kiangah, bangdia na heutupa un siahkhonmite leh mikhialte kianga ne ahia? a chi ua.
Himahleh, Jesun huai a jak takin, Mi hatten daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damtheilouten a kiphamoh jaw uh.
Huchiin, Kithoihna deihlou in zahngaihna ka deih hi, chih, a omdan vazil un, mi diktatte sam dia hongpai k ahi kei, mikhialte sam dia hongpai ka hizaw, achia.
Huchih laiin Johan nungjuite a kiangah a hongpai ua, Bangdia kou leh Pharisaiten an ngawl gige a, na nungjuiten ngawl lou uh ahia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Mou pite kianga a pasal ding a omlai teng mou piten a sun thei ua hia?
Himahleh, a pasal ding tuh a kiang ua kipana pi mang nite a hongtung dinga, huai hun chiangin an a honngawl ding uh.
Huan, kuamahin puan lui puan tuikhai louh themin a thuap ngei kei uh; a thuapna dingin puan tuh a kaikek zo ding, a hong nakkek zo sem ding.
Kuamahin uain thak savun uain-thawl luiah a thun ngei kei uh; huchilou injaw savun thawlte a puak kek dia, uain, tuh a bo dia, savun-thawl leng a hongse ding; huaijiakin uain thak tuh savun uainthawl thakah a thun jaw ua, huchiin hoihtakin a om tuaktuak, a chi a.
Huan a kiang ua a gen laitakin, ngaiin, vaihawmpa khat a hongpaia, chibai a buka, Ka tanu tu takin a si a; himahleh, hongpai inla, a tungah na khut koih lechin, honghing nawn ding, achia.
Huchiin, Jesu a thoua, a juita a, nungjuiten leng a jui sam uh.
Huan, ngaiin, numei khat, kum sawm leh kum nih si pawta damlou, a nungah a hongpai a, a puan mong a khoiha;
A puan mongkia khoih lengleng, hihdamin ka om mai ding, a lungsimin a chi a.
Huan, Jesu a kihei a, amah a mu a, Ka tanu, khamuang takin om in; na ginna na dampih hi, a chi a.
Huchiin, numeinu tuh huaidak a kipan a hongdamta.
Huan, Jesu vaihawmpa in ah a luta, tamngai tumte leh mipi thawmngaih vengvungte a va muhin.
Pawt un: naupang a si kei, a ihmu ahi jaw, achi a.
Huan, amau tuh amah a nuihsan maimah ua.
Himahleh, mipi tuh delh khiaka a om nung un, alut a, a khut ah a len a, naupang tuh a hongthouta a.
Huan, huai tanchin tuh huai gam tengteng ah a hongthang kheta.
Huan, Jesu huai a kipanin a pai jela, mittaw nihin, David Tapa, ka tunguah zahngai in, chia, kikou in a jui ua.
Huan, in a a lut leh, mittawte tuh a kiangah a hongpai ua; huan, Jesun a kiang uah.
Hiai hih theiin na hongingta uh hia? a chi a.
Amau tuh a kiangah, Gingta e, Toupa, a chi ua.
Huan, aman tuh a mit uh a khoiha, Na gintak bang un na tunguah tung heh, a chi a.
Huchiin, a mit uh a hong vakta a.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Kuamah theih louh dingin pilvang un, achi bilbela.
Himahleh, amau tuh a pawt ua, huai gam tengteng ah a tanchin a hihthangta uh.
Huan, a pawt laitak un, ngaiin, dawi mat pautheilou khat a kiangah a honpi ua.
Huan, dawi tuh a delh khiak takin pautheilou tuh a hongpauta a; Huan mipiten lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Israelte lakah hichibang a mu ngei kei uh, a chi ua.
Pharisaiten bel, Dawi lal vangin ahi, dawite a delh khiak nak, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kikhopnain khawng ua hilhin, Gam Tanchin Hoih tuh genin, dam louhna chiteng leh natna chiteng khawng hihdamin, kho lian leh kho neu tengteng a tawn vialviala.
Huchiin, mipiten a muhin, chingding neilou belamte banga gimthuak leh dalha a om jiak un a hehpihta mahmah a,
Huchiin, a nungjuite kiangah, Buh lak dinglah a tam mahmaha, himahleh, a semmite a tawm uh;huaijiakin a buh la ding a semdingte sawl dingin buh Neipa kiangah ngen un, a chi a.
huaijiakin a buh la ding a semdingte sawl dingin buh Neipa kiangah ngen un, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjui sawm leh nihte a kiangah a sam a, a kiang uah dawi ninte tunga thuneihna a pia a, amau hawlkhe ding leh, damlouhna chiteng leh natna chiteng hihdam dingin.
Huan, sawltak sawm leh nihte min tuh hiaite ahi: A masa penin Simon, Peter kichi leh a unau Andru te: Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unau Johan te,
Philip leh Bartholomai te: Thoma te leh siahkhon Matthai te: Alphai tapa Jakob leh Thaddia te;
Kanan mi Simon leh juausana mansakpa Juda Iskariot te.
Huai sawmlehnihte tuh Jesun a sawl khia a, a kiang uah hichin thu a pia a; Jentelte lam ah pai kei unla, Samasi mite khua himhim ah leng lut kei un;
Ahihhangin Israel nam belam mangte kaingah pai jaw un.
Huan, na pai un, vangam a hong naita, chiin, thu gen jel un.
Damloute hihdam unla, misite kaithou unla, phakte hihsiangthou unla; dawite hawlkhia un, a thawnin na mu ua, a thawnin pia un.
Na kawnggak uah khawng dangkaeng hiam, dangka hiam, dal dangka hiam tawi kei unla;
zinna a dingin kawljal hiam, puannak nih hiam, khedap hiam, chiangkhun hiam tawi sam kei un; nasemmi tuh a nek ding mutak ahi ngala.
Huan, kholianah hiam, khoneu ah hiam na lutna peuh ua nou hontung sak tak mi ding zong khia unla, na pawt nawn mateng uh huai ah tuh tung kinken un.
Huan, in a na lut ding un chibai buk un.
Huan, in a mite tuh chibai buk tak ahih uleh na khamuanna thu uh a tunguah hongtung heh; a tak kei uleh na khamuanna thu uh na tunguah hongkik nawn heh.
Huan, kuapeuh nou hon kipahpih lou a, na thu uleng a ngaihkhiak kei uleh, huai in a kipan hiam, huai a kipan hiam a na pawt chiang un, na khepek ua leivui tat khia un.
Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Thukhen ni chiangin huai khuate sangin Sodom leh Gomorra gam thuak ding tuh a dan a om zo ding.
Ngaidih ua, nge laka belam om bangin ka honsawl khia ahi: huchiin, gul banga pila, vakhu banga poi khoih lou in om un.
Himahleh, mihing lakah pilvang un: vaihawmmite a honmansak ding-ua, kikhopnain bangah a honvuak ding jiakun;
A hi, keimah jiakin gamukte leh kumpipate ma ah amaute leh Jentelte theihsakna dingin a honpi ding uh.
Himahleh, a honmatsak chiangun, Bang chi ding ahia, bang thu ka gen dia? chiin, lungkham kei un; na gen ding uh tuh a hun takin a hontheisak ding ahi ngala.
A genpa tuh noumau na hi kei ding ua, na Pa uh Khain noumau ah a gen zo ding ahi ngal a.
Huan, hihlup dingin unaupa leh unaupa a kimansak ding ua, pan leng a ta a mansak ding; taten leng a nu leh a pate uh a dou ding uh, a hihlumsak ding uh.
Ka min jiakin mi tengteng huat na hi ding uh; himahleh, a tawp phaa thuak ngap peuhmah tuh hotdamin a om ding.
Huchiin, hiai khuaa hon gawt chiangun, kho dangah taisan un; chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Mihing Tapa a hongpai main Israel khuate tuh na na sik suak kei ding uh.
Nungjui a heutu tungah a om kei; sikha leng a pu tungah a om kei.
Nungjui tuh a heutu banga a hongom leh, sikha tuh a pu banga a hongom tuh a hun e.
In neipa bawn, Beelzibul a chih uleh, a inkuanpihte tuh nak chihna tel un chia;
Huaijiakin, amaute kihta kei un; lang lou dinga sel bangmah a om kei, theih louh dinga im leng bangmah a om kei hi.
Miala nou ka honhilh vak ah na gen ding ua; bil bula na jak uh in tunga tuangin tangkoupih un.
Huan, sapum hihluma kha hihlum theiloute kihta kei unla; Gehenna a kha leh sapum hihmang theipa kihtajaw un.
Kawlgit nih dal dangka khatin a juak jel uh hi lou hiam? himahleh, a lak ua khat leng na Pa uh theih louhin lei ah a ke kei ding.
Na sam zangte uh nangawn leng sim vek ahi.
Huaijiakin lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin na manpha jaw uh ahi.
Huchiin, mite maa hon gum peuhmah tuh, ka Pa van a ma ah ka gum sam ding.
Himahleh, kuapeuh mite maa honkitheihmohbawl tuh, ka Pa vana ma ah ka kitheihmohbawl sam ding.
Lei tungah lem lengsak dinga hongpai hiam honsa kei un; lem lengsak dinga hongpai ka hi kei a, namsau leng sak dinga hongpai ka hi jaw.
Mi a pa dousak dingin, tanu a nu dousak dingin, mou a nu dousak dinga hongpai ka hi.
Mi a melma tuh amah inkuanpih te laka mi mah ahi ding.
Kuapeuh a nu hiam, a pa hiam, kei sanga it jaw tuh, ka mi hi tak ahi kei; kuapeuh a tanu hiam a tapa hiam kei sanga it jaw leng, ka mi hi tak ahi kei.
Kuapeuh a kros pua honjui lou tuh ka mi hi tak ahi kei.
Kuapeuh a hinna muin a tan dinga, keimah jiaka a hinna tanin a mu ding.
Kuapeuh nou honkipahpihin kei honkipahpih ahi a, kuapeuh kei honkipahpih tuh a honsawlpa kipahpih ahi.
Kuapeuh jawlnei tuh jawlnei a hih jiaka kipahpihin jawlnei kipahman a mu ding; kuapeuh mi diktat tuh mi diktat a hih jiaka kipahpihin mi diktat kipahman a mu ding.Huan, kuapeuh, hiai mi neu chikte laka khat kianga, nungjui a hih jiaka tuisik nou khat kia pia leng, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi.
A kipahman uh a tan kei hial ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, kuapeuh, hiai mi neu chikte laka khat kianga, nungjui a hih jiaka tuisik nou khat kia pia leng, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi.
A kipahman uh a tan kei hial ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Jesun a nungjui sawm leh nihte thu a piak zoh phetin huai a kipanin a khua khawng ua hilh ding leh thugen dingin a paita a.
Huan, Johanin, suangkulh sunga Kris thilhihte a najakin a nungjuite tuh sawlin a kiangah,
Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, a hihkeileh midang hungaih lai ding ka hi uhia? a chi saka.
Huan Jesun a kiang uah, Pai nawnta unla, thil na muh uh leh na jak uh Johan kiangah vahilh un.
Mittawte a mit uh a hong vakta, khebaite khein a hongpai ua, phakte a hongsiangthouta ua, bengngong te leng a bil uh a hongvakta, misite leng kaihthohin a omta ua; a jawngten leng Tanchin Hoih hilh a dongta uh.
Huan, kuapeuh ka tunga lunghihlouhna mu lou tuh a hampha uhi, chiin a na dawnga.
Huai mite tuh a paitak un, Jesun mipite kingah Johan thu a genta a, Bang en dinga gamdai a pai khia neita ua?

A hihkeikeh, bang en dingpena pai khia neita ua?
Puan nem silh maw?
Ngai un, puan nem silhte jaw kumpipate in ah eive a om uh.
A hihkeileh, bang jiakpenin ahia na pai khiak uh? jawlnei, en dngin maw?
A hi tawk vo oi, ka honchi ahi, jawlnei sanga leng thupijaw.
en dih, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl ahi, aman tuh na ma ah na lam a bawl ding. chih, a tanchin a gelh uh, hiai mipa ahi.
Chihtaktakin, ka honhilh ahi, Numei suan lakah Baptispa Johan sanga thupijaw a suak ngei kei; himahleh vangama mi neu deuh leng amah sangin a thupizo ngal ua.

Johan a hongpaia, a ne in a dawn kei a, dawi nei ahi, a chi ua.

Himahleh, pilna tuh a thilhihten siam a tan uh, a chi a.
Huan, a kisik louh jiakun, a thil thupi hih tamna pen khuate tuh a taita a.
Korazin, na tung gik e: Bethsaida, na tung gik e; noumau a thil thupi hihte Tura leh Sidon khua a hih hileh, saiip puan silha vut laka tuin akisikta ding uh.
Himahleh, ka honhilh ahi, thukhen ni chiangin nou thuak ding sangin Tura leh Sidon khua thuak ding a dan a om zo ding.
Huan, nang Kapernaum, van tana tawisang na hi dia hia?
Misi khua tan a vapai ding neive, nangmah a thil thupi tak hihte Sodom khuaa hih hileh, tutanin a om lai ding.
Himahleh, ka honhilh ahi, thukhen ni chiangin na thuak ding sangin Sodom gam thuakding a dan a om zo ding, a chi a
Huchihlaiin, Jesun a houpiha, Pa aw, leitung leh van Toupa, nang mi pil leh mi bengvakte kiangah hiai thu na ima, naungekte kianga na than jiakin ka honphat hi.
A hi, Pa, tua bang hih tuh, nang ngaihin a hoih ahi.
Ka Pan thil bangkim honkem sakta; Pa louin kuamahin Tapa a theikei; Tapa leh a kiang ua Tapain a kitheihsak utnate kia loungalin kuamahin Pa a theikei.
Nou sem gim leh puakgik po tengteng aw, ka kiangah hongpai unla, keiman khawlna konpe ding.
Ka hakkol pua unla, keia kipan zil un; thunuailut leh lungtanga kingainiam tak ka hi; huchiin, na kha ua dingin khawlna na mu ding uh.Ka hakkol a nuama, ka puak leng a jang ahi, a chi a.

Huchihlaiin, Jesun tuh Khawlniin buhlei khawng kanin a paia; a nungjuite tuh a gil uh a kiala, buhvui khawng a khiak ua, a neta uh.
Huan, Pharisaiten a muh un, a kiangah, En dih, na nungjuiten Khawlniin hih sianglou a hih uh, a chi ua.
Aman bel a kiang uah, Davidin a gilkial laia a lawmte toh a thil hih uh na sim kei ua hia?
Huchia Pathian in a a lut a, amah leh a lawmten nek sianglouh, siampute kia nek siang tanghou koih a nek thu uh?
Ahihkeileh, Khawlniin Pathian biakina siampu omten Khawlni a hihthang ua leng siamtanin a om jel uh chih dan thu ah na simkei ua hia?
Abang abang hileh, Pathian biakin sanga thupijaw hiai ah a om chih ka honhilh ahi.
Himahleh, Kithoihna deih louin, zahngaihna ka deih, chih, a omdan na natheita hi le uchin, mi siamtangte tuh siam louh tangsak lou ding hive uchin.
Mihing Tapa jaw Khawlni Toupa ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, huaia kipanin a paia, a kikhopna in uah a valuta.
Huan, ngaidih, mi khat khut jaw a na oma, Huan a hek theihna ding un.
Khawlnia hihdam a siang hia? chiin Jesu a dong ua.
Huan, aman tuh a kiangah uah, Noute lakah kuapeuhin belam khat nei unla, huai tuh Khawlniin kokhuk ah keta leh, kua ahia lena kaikhe lou ding?
Belam khat sangin mihing khat tuh bangchi lela manpha jaw ahia?
Huaijiakin Khawlniin hihhoih a siang hi, a chi a.

Himahleh, Jesun huai a theihin huaia kipanin a kihemmangta.
Huan, mitampiin amah a jui ua.
a nahihdam vek a, a tanchin than het louh ding a kiang uah a chi a.
Jawlnei Isaiin,
En dih, ka sikha ka tel, ka deih tak ka lungsimin a pahtak mahmah, a tungah ka Kha ka koih dia, huchiin, Jentelte kiang ah dika vaihawmna thu a gen ding.
A sel keidinga, a kikou sam keidinga, kongzing khawng ah leng kuamahin a aw a za sam kei ding uh.
Dika-vaihawmna a vualzohsak mateng sialluang gawp a hihtan khe kei dinga, thaumei kuang liakliak a hihmit sam kei ding.
Amah min ah Jentelten lametna a nga ding uh, chia a gen a hongtun theihna dingin.
Huchihlaiin dawi mat mittaw pautheilou khat a kiangah a honpi ua; huan, aman a na hihdama, huchiin, pautheilou tuh hongpau theiin, a honmu thei ta a.
Huan, mipi tengtengin lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Hiai mipa David Tapa hilou ahi maw? a chi ua.
Himahleh, Pharisaiten huai a jak phet un, Hiai min dawi lal Beezibul jiaklou in dawite a delhkhe kei ding, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a ngaihtuahte uh a natheia, a kiang uah, Koi gam leng amah kidoua mangthang nak; koi khua leng, hiam, koi inkuan khat leng amah kidou tuh, a ding khosuak kei ding.
Huan, Setanin Setan mah a delhkhiakin amah kidou hi ding hi a; a gam tuh bangchin a ding dia le?
Huan, kei Beelzibul jiaka dawite delhkhia ka na hih leh, na tate un kua jiakin ahia leh a delhkhiak uh?
Huaijiakin amaute tuh noute tunga thukhenmite ahi ding uh.
A hihhangin, kei Pathian Kha jiaka dawite delhkhia ka na hih leh, Pathian gam na kiang uah hongtungta ahi ding.
Huchi a hih keingalin, min mi hat tuh a gak masak phot kei leh bangchin ahia mi hat ina a lut dia a sum a laksak theih ding? huai nungin tuh a in tuh a lohsak mai ding ahi.
Kuapeuh ka lama pang lou tuh, hon dou ahi; kuapeuh honlak khawm pih lou tuh, a hihjak ahi.
Huai jiakin ka honhilh ahi, mi a khelhna chiteng uah leh Pathian a gensiatna chiteng ua ngaihdam a hin dinguh: Kha hilhial gensiatna tuh ngaihdamsak ahi kei ding.
Huan, kuapeuh Mihing Tapa kalh tuh a kalhna uh ngaihdamsak ahi ding: kuapeuh Kha Siangthou hilhial kalh jaw huai a kalhna uh, tu damsung in leng, hun hongtung ding ah leng, ngaihdamsak a hikei ding.
Sing tuh a hoih, a gah leng a hoih, na chih kei ngal uleh, sing tuh a sia, a gah leng a sia, chi vanglak un: sing tuh a gaha a kitheih ngal jiakin,
Gul suante aw, now gilou napiin bangchin ahia thu hoih na gan thieh ding uh?
Lungtang a dim val tuh kamin a gen jel ahi.
Mi hoihin a goubawm hoih a kipan thil hoihte a honla khia a, mi gilou in a gou bawn hoihlou akipan thil hoihlou a honlakhe jel.
Huan, ka honhilh ahi.
Miten thu gina lou a gen peuh mah uh, huai thu tanchin tuh vaihawm ni chiah a gen ding uh.
Na thuin siam a hontangsak dia, na thu mahin siam louh a hontangsak ding hi, a chi a.
Huailaiin laigelhmite leh Pharisaite laka mi kuate hiamin amah a houpih ua, a kiangah.
Heutupa, na kiang akipan chiamtehna muh ka ut uh a chi ua.
Aman tuh a kianguah.
Khangthak gilou tak leh angkawnhat takten chiamtehna a zong ua, himahleh, jawlnei Jona chiamtehna loungal tuh a kiang uah chiamtehna himhim piak ahi kei ding.
Jona ni thum leh jan thum ngapi gilsunga a om bangin.
Mihing Tapa ni thum leh jan thum lei gil sungah a om sam ding.
Ninevi khuaa mite tuh thukhen ni chiangin tulai khangthakte kiangah a ding sam dingua, siam louh a tangsak ding uh.
Jona thu gen jiakin a kisik ngal ua: ngai dih ua.
Jona sanga thupijaw hiai ah a om.
Sim lam kumpinu tuh thukhen ni chiangin tulai khangthakte kiangah a thou sam ding, siam louh a tangsak ding, Solomon pilna ngaikhe dingin bawn kawlmonga kipan a hongpai ngalin bawn kawlmonga kipan a hingpai ngala; ngai dih ua, Solomon sanga thupijaw hiaiah a om hi.
Huan, dawi nin mi sunga kipan a pawtin, khawlna zongin tui om louhna mun bangah a vak vak a, a mu ngal kei a.
Huan, Ka pawtna in mahah ka kiknawn mai ding, a chi a: huan, a vatun leh, a vuaka, zep hoih sain a va mu a.
Huai takin a vapaia, amah sanga gilou jaw dawi dang sagih a honpi a, huaiah a lut ua, a tengta ua: huai mihing omdan nanung tuh a masa sangin a honghoih kei zo nak ahi.
Tuamah bangin, tulai kangthak giloutakte tunga a hongom ding, chiin a dawnga.

huaijiak in a hon hilh peuhmah uh hih unla jui jel unla; amau thihhih bang jaw hih tuankei un, gen jaw a gen jel ua, a hih tuankei uh.

Na lak ua thupipen na sikha ua a om jawk ding ahi.
Kuapeuh kiliansak tuh a dai ding, kuapeuh kingaineu tuh pahtawi in a om ding.
Himahleh nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: vangam lampi mite na khak sak ngal ua: nou lah na lut ngalkei uh, mi a lut dingte lut ding leng na phalkei jel uh.
Laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: meithai inte na negai ngal ua, thumna saupi mikhemna ding in na bawl ua: huaijiak in mohna liansem na mu ding uhi.
Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisaite, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: phungkai khat lel leng bawl ding in tuipi leh gam na pai kimvel ngal ua, huan huchi bang a a hong om tak in, amah tuh noumau lehnih in gawtmun ta in na bawl jel uh.
Nou makai mittaw, Kuapeuh Pathian biakin lou a kichiam, huai bangmah ahikei; kuapeuh Pathian biakin a dangka-eng lou a kichiam jaw tangtunsak ding ahi, chite aw, na tung uh a gik hi:
Nou mihai mittawte aw: a bang a thupi jaw a dangka-eng hia, dangka-eng siangthousak Pathian biakin?
Huan, Kuapeuh maitam lou a kichiam tuh, bangmah ahikei: a tung a thil piak om lou a kichiam peuh bel tangtunsak ding ahi, na chi uh.
Nou mittawte aw, a bang a thupi jaw a, thil piak hia thilpiak siangthousak maitam?
Huchi in, maitam lou a kichiam peuhmah jaw maitam leh a tung a om tengteng lou a kichiam hi ahi;
huan, Pathian biakin lou a kichiam peuhmah jaw Pathian biakin leh a sung a teng pa lou a kichiam hi ahi:
huan, van lou a kichiam peuhmah leng Pathian tutphah leh a tung a tupa lou a kichiam hi ahi.
Nou laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: pudinate, mohurite, zirate sawm ah khat na pe jel ua, dan thu khawk jaw- diktatna te, hehpihna te, ginomna te- na limsak ngalkei ua; himahleh hiaite eive na hih ding uh, a dangte hihlou tuanlou in.
Nou makai mittawte, thousi khisiang a sangawngsau valhte aw!
Laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: nou leh kuang polam na hihsiang ua, a sung lah lepgukna leh kideklouhna in a dim ngal a.
Nou Pharisai mittaw, nou leh kuang sunglam hihsiang masa un, a polam leng a hong sian theihna ding in.
Laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh gik hi: han nuhngou, polam kilawmtak a lang, a sunglam lah misi guhte leh nin chiteng a dim bangte na hi ngal ua.
Nou leng huchi bang tak in polam ah mihing mitmuh in diktat tak in na lang ua, na sunglam u bel lepchiahna leh gitlouhna in a dim ngal a.
Nou laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: jawlneite han in na lam ua, mi diktat hante leng na jem ua.
I pipute damlai a na om hihta leng, Jawlneite sisan a suahna ua panglou ding hi hang a, na chi uh.

Na pipute uh tehna dan uh hihdim ngal mai un.

Huai tengteng tuh nau vei kipatna ahi.

Ngai un, ka hon hilhkholta ahi.

Khua, suahlam ah, a hong phia a, tumlam tan in leng a kilang nak, Mihing Tapa a hongpai nawnna tuh huchi bang ahi ding ahi.
Sapul omna munpeuh ah musanete leng a om khawm ding uh.
Himahleh, huai gimthuakna nite nungzek in, ni hihmial in a om dia, kha a vak nawnta kei dia, van a kipan in aksite a hong ke ding ua, van thilhihtheihnate hihlin ahi ding;
huai hun chiang in Mihing Tapa chiamtehna van ah a hong lang ding.

Huan, a angelte tuh, pengkul ging thupi toh, a sawlkhe ding, amau tuh a telte lei ning li te akipan, van tawp a kipan a lehlam tawp pha in, a khawm ding uh.
Huchi in, theipi kung ah a gentehna thu zil un: ahiang a hong nou a, a nah a hong sel in nipi a nai chih na thei uh;

lei leh van a mang dia, ka thu a hihleh a mang kei ding.

Huan, Noa damlai bang in Mihing Tapa hongpai nawnna tuh ahi ding.
Huai ni, thuchim tun ma khawng in, Noa long a a lut ni tan in, a ne un a dawn ua, zi leh pasal in a kinei ua;
tuichim a hongtung a, a vek ua a lak mang masiah bangmah a theikei uh; Mihing Tapa hongpai nawnna tuh huchi mahbang ahi ding.
Huai hun chiang in lou ah mi nih a om ding ua; khat tuh paimangpih in a om dia, khat tuh nutsiat in a om ding.
Numei nih buh gawinelna ah buh gawinel in a om ding ua, khat paimangpih in a om dia, khat tuh nutsiat in a om ding.
Huaijiak in kiging un, bangni in ahia na Toupa uh a hongpai ding na theihlouh jiak un,
Himahleh, hiai thei un, guta a hongpai hun ding innei in thei leh, a veng dia, a in a phen vang sak kei ding.
Huaijiak in nou leng kiging gige in om un, na ginlouh dak un Mihing Tapa a hongpai ding jiak in.
Sikha muanhuai, piltak, a pu'n a hun teng a a tan ding uh hawmsak ding a a inkuanpihte tung a heutu dia a koih, kuapen ahi dia le?
A pu a hongpai chiang a sikha huchi bang hih a a hon muh tuh a hampha ding.
Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, a neih tengteng tungah heutu di'n a koih ding.
Ahihhang in sikha gilou in, a lungtang in, ka pu a hong zokkei ding, chi in,
a sikha hihpihte na navota henla, nekham-takhamte kiang ah ne in dawnta leh:
huai sikha pu a gintaklouh ni in, a theihlouh lai in, a hongpai ding a,tum nih a hon suah ding a, mi lepchiahte tan bangbang a tangsak ding; huai ah tuh kah leh hagawi a om ding.
tum nih a hon suah ding a, mi lepchiahte tan bangbang a tangsak ding; huai ah tuh kah leh hagawi a om ding.
Huaihun chiang in vangam tuh nungak siangthou sawm, a khawnvak uh tawi a mouneipa dawn ding a pawtte toh teh a hita ding.
Huchi in a lak ua mi nga a hai ua, nga a pil uh.
A haite'n a khawnvakte uh a tawi un, a tui leng a tawi ngalkei ua;
a pilte'n bel a khawnvakte uh a tawi un, a um ah a tui leng a tawi uh.
Huan, mou neipa tuh a hong zekai jiak in a vek un a lusu ua, a na ihmuta ua.
Huan, janlai tak in, Ngai dih uh mouneipa a hong e: a dawn ding in hong pawt un: chi in, kikou ging a hong omta a.
Huaitak in nungak siangthoute tuh a thou vek ua, a khawnvakte uh tuh a kem ua.
Huan, a haite'n, a pilte kiang ah, Na khawnvaktui uh hon pe sam un; ka khawnvak uh mit din a kisa, a chi ua.
Himahleh, a pilte'n, Kou leh nou a ding in a kiching kei ding; a juakte kiang ah pai unla, lei jaw un, chi in, a dawng ua,
Huan, lei ding a a paimang kal un mouneipa tuh a hong tungta a; huchi in, a mansate tuh amah toh kitenna ankuang um ding in a lut ua; huan, kongkhak a khakta uh.
Huai nung in nungak siangthou dangte leng a hongtung ua, Toupa, Toupa, hon hon in, a chi uh:
Himahleh aman tuh, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, ka hon thei ngeikei, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huchi in, ki ging un, a ni leh a hun na theihlouh jiak un.
Mi, gam dang a pai dia kisa, a sikhate sam a, a sumte a kiang ua kemsak bang ahi ngal a:
Sikha khat kiang ah talent nga a pia a, sikha dang kiang ah talent nih a pia a, sikha dang kiang ah talent khat a pia a; a hih theih hun dingdan chiat un a pia a; huan, a paita a.
Huan, talent nga mupa tuh huai in a vasumsin pah a, talent nga dang a mu kheta a,
Huchimah bang in talent nih mupa'n leng talent nih dang a mu kheta a.
Talent khat mupa bel a va kuan a, lei a tou a, a pu dangka a selgu zota.
Huan, sawtpi nung in huai sikhate pu tuh a hongpai a, a mau toh a sum tanchin a hihfelta hi.
Huan, talent nga mupa a hongpai a, talent nga dang a hon tawi a, Pu, nang talent nga non kemsak a; en dih; talent nga dang ka mukhia e, a chi a.
A pu'n a kiang ah, Sikha hoih leh muanhuai, na hih hoih hi, tawmchik tungah na muanhuai a, tampi tungah ka hon omsak ding; na pu kipahna ah lut in, a chi a.
Huan, talent nih mupa leng a hongpai a, Pu, nang talent nih non kemsak a; en dih, talent nih dang ka mukhia e, a chi a.
A pu'n a kiang ah, Sikha hoih leh muanhuai, na hihhoih e, tawmchik tungah na muanhuai a, tampi tungah ka hon omsak ding; na pu kipahna ah lut in, a chi a.
Huan, talent khat mupa leng a hongpai a, Pu, mi chihhakpi na hi chih ka hon thei a; na tuhlouhna ah leng na at nak, na thehlouhna ah leng na khawm nak ahi;
huaiziak in ka lau a, ka vapai a, na talent lei ah ka selgu a; en in, nang a ngei na mu nawn hi, a chi a.
A pu'n a kiang ah, Sikha gilou leh zongjaw, ka tuh louhna ah leng ka at a, ka thehlouhna ah leng ka khawm nak chih na thei maw?
Huchi ahih ngal leh ka dangka sumsinte kiang a na koihtak ding hi a, huchia, ka hongpai a kei a tuh a pung toh ka muh nawn ding ahi veleh.
Huaiziak in a talent khat laksak unla, talent sawm neipa kiang ah pia un.
Kuapeuh a nei tuh piak behlap ahi ding a, a hong hau ding; kuapeuh a neilou tuh a neih sun nangawn laksak ahi ding.
Huan, sikha phatuamlou tuh polam mial ah paikhia un, huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding, a chi a, a dawng a.
Ahihhang in, Mihing Tapa, a angelte tengteng toh, a thupina a kivan a a hongpai hun chiang in, a thupina tutphah ah a tu dia;
a ma ah nam chih a kikhawm ding ua; belam chingpa'n kel lak a a belamte a khenkhia bang in amau tuh a khenkhe ding:
belamte tuh a taklam ah a koih ding a, kelte tuh a veilam ah a koih ding.
Huai hun chiang in Kumpipa'n a taklam a mite kiang ah, Ka Pa deihsakte aw, hongpai unla, khovel siam chil a pata nou a dia gam bawlsa luah un;
ka gil a kial in, nou nek ding non pia ua; ka dang a tak in, dawn ding non pia uh; mikhual ka hih in non zintun ua;
vuaktang ka hih in, puan non silhsak uh; ka chi a nat in, ka kiang a na hong jiak un, a chi ding.
Huai hun chiang in, mi diktatte'n, Toupa, Chik in ahia gilkial a kon muh ua nek ding kon piak uh? dangtak a kon muh ua, dawn ding kon piak uh?
Chik in ahia mikhual a kon muh ua, kon zintun uh? vuaktang a kon muh ua, puan kon silhsak uh?
Chik in ahia china in hiam suangkulh ah hiam kon muh ua, na kiang a ka hong uh? chi in, a dong ding uh.
Huan, Kumpipa'n a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka hon holh ahi, Hiai ka unau neupente lak a mi khat tung a na hih uh tuh, ka tung a hih na hi uh, chi in, a dawng ding.
Huaikhit in, a veilam a mite kiang ah leng, Hamsiat thuakte aw, khantawn mei diabol leh a sawltakte dia a bawl uah hon paimangsan un;
ka gil a kial in, nou nek ding non pekei ua; ka dang a tak in, dawn ding non pekei ua;
mikhual ka hih in, non zintunkei uh; vuaktang ka hih in, puan non silhsakkei ua; china leh suangkulh a ka om in, non vehlouh jiak un, a chi ding.
Huai hun chiang in amau leng, Toupa, chik in ahia gilkial ahiam, vuaktang in hiam, china in hiam, suangkulh ah hiam kon muh ua, na kon sepsaklouh uh? chi in a dong ding uh,
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, Hiai mi neupente lak a mi khat tung a na hihlouh utuh ka tung a hihlou na hi uh, chi in, a dawng ding.Huan, huaite khantawn gawtna ah a pai ding ua; mi diktatte tuh khantawn hinna ah a pai ding uh, a chi a.

Ni nih nung chiang in Paikan Ankuangluina a hong om ding chih na thei ua, Mihing Tapa kilhden ding in a mansak ding uh, ahi, a chi a.

Jesu tuh zekhem a mat a, a hihlup theihna ding un a kikum ua.

Huan, Jesu Bethani khua a, phak Simon in a a omlai in,
Numei khat alabasta bawm, thau gimlim mantampi tawi in, a kiang ah a hongpai a, an a umlai in a lu ah a sung a.
Himahleh, nungjuite'n huai a muh un a heh ua, Bangdia hichi bang a hihmangthang mawkmawk ahia?
Hiai thau man tampi zuak a, mi jawngte kiang a piak theih ahi ngal a, a chi ua.
Jesu'n tuh huai a theih in, a kiang uah, Numei bang dia hihbuai na hi ua? ka tungah thil hiohtak a hih ahi.
Mi jawngte khantawn in na kiang uah a om uh a keihiam, kei bel khantawn a na kiang ua om ka hikei.
Hiai thau gimlim ka sa a sun tuh, vui ding a hon bawl ding in a hih ahi.

leh a mansapa Juda Iskariot te bang ahi uh.

Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Isaiin nou mi lepchiahte thu a nagenkhol dik hilhial ve, Hiaiten a mukun a honpahtawi ua, a lungtangun lah hon gamlat ngial ngal uh.

Huan, amahmahin, a kiang uah, Na thugousiah khawng uh na zuih theihna ding ua Pathian thupiakte na deih louh ujaw, lem na thei hial ve ua:
Mosiin, Na nu leh na pa pahtawiin, Kuapeuh a nu hiam a pa hiam gensia tuh si mahmah heh, a chi ngal a;
Nou tuh hichi bangin na chi ua, Min, a nu hiam, a pa hiam kiangah, Non phatuampihna ding Korban a hita, a chih leh, (huai tuh, Pathian kianga piak, chihna ahi a),
A nu ading hiam, apa ading hiama bangmah hihsak na phal nawn kei nak uh.
Na thugousiah uh mi na piak sawnsawnna un Pathian thu bangmahlou na suah uhi; huai bang thil tampi na hih uh, a chi a.
Huan, mipite a sam nawna, a kiang uah, Na vek un ka thu ngaikhia unla, theisiam un:

Kuapeuh jakna dinga bil neiin, ja hen, a chi a.
Huan, mipite ina a lut san nungin a nungjuiten gentehna thu amah a dong chianta ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Nou leng huchitela theihsiamna neilou na hi u maw?
Bangpeuh polam akipana mihing sunga lut in tuh, amah a hihnin theikei chih na theikei ua hia?
A lungtangh sunga lut lou a, a gil sunga a lut jawk jiakin leh dailenna pawt khe mai a hih jiakin, a chi a.
(Huai tuh an chiteng a siang, a chihna a hi).
huan, amahmahin, Mihing sunga pata hongpawtin, huai ngeingeiin mihing a hihnin nak ahi.
Sung lama, mihingte lungtanga kipanin, ngaihtuahna gilou bang a hongpawt nak:
Kingaihna bang, guktakna bang, tualthahna bang, angkawmna bang, enna bang, gitlouhna bang, khemhatna bang, bevenna bang, hajatna bang, gensiatna bang, kisaktheihna bang, haihuainate khawng:
Hiai thil giloute tengteng tuh sung lama kipanin a hongpawt a, mihing a hihnin nak, a chi a.
Huan, a thou-a, huaia kipanin Tura leh Sidon uk ah a paita-a; huan, in ah a lut-a, kuamah theih a deih keia; himahleh a kisel thei ngal keia.
huchiin, numei khat, a tanu naupang chik dawi nin paiin, a tanchin a naza paha, a khe bulah a khupboh-a.
Numei tuh Grik mi ahia, pianna lam ah Suro-Phoinikimi ahi.
Aman tuh a tanu sunga kipana dawi delh khe dingin a ngena.
Huan, aman a kiangah, Tate hongvah masa uhen aw; tate tanghou lak-saka uite kianga paih kilawm lou hi, a chi a.
Aman a kiangah, Toupa, hihjaw ahi a, a hihhangin dohkan nuaia uiten leng tate tanghou nen khawng a ne jel sam vo oi, chiin, a dawng a.
huan, aman, a kiangah, Na thu gen jiakin paita ve le: dawi na tanu sunga kipan a pawtta hi, a chi a.
Huan, a in-ah a pai-a, a tanu, dawiin a pawt khiaksan, lupnaa lum a vamuta.
Huan, Tura gam akipanin a pawt nawna, Sidon khua tawn in Dekapoli gam pai kan jelin Galili dil a tungta a.
Huan, mi khat bengngawng, pau leng pau kichian theilou a kiangah hontonpih ua, a tunga khut koih dingin a ngen ua.
Huan, aman tuh mipi laka kipanin amah kiain a pi tuam a, a khut zungte bangin a bil sung khawng a khoih a, huan, chil a sia a, a lei a khoiha;
Huan van lam enin a ha huaia, a kiangah Ephatha, a chi a.
Huai tuh, Hong kihong in, chihna ahi.
Huchiin, a bilte khawng a hongkihonga, a lei gakna leng a hongkiphel a, chiantakin a pauthei ta.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, kuamah hilh louh ding a chi bikbeka; himahleh a nak kham phetin, a nak tangkou pih zo sem ua.Aman bangkim hoihtakin a hiha; bengngongte nangawn a pausak jel, a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Aman bangkim hoihtakin a hiha; bengngongte nangawn a pausak jel, a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huai ni khawngin, mipi tampitak a hongom nawn ua, nek ding bangmah a neikei ua, aman a nungjuite a sama, a kiang uah,
Mipi honte tuin ka kiangah ni thum a omta ua, nek ding bangmah a neih louh jiak un ka hehpih mahmah hi;
Anngawlin a in uah pai sak leng lam kalah a bah kha ding uh; khenkhatte khol houh a hongpaina uh a gamla mahmah ngala, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuiten, min hiai gamdai ah koia tanghouin ahia hiai khawngte a hihtai theih ding uh? chiin, amah a dawng ua.
Huan, aman, Tanghouphel bangzah na nei ua? chiin, amau a donga.
Huan, amau, Phel sagih, a chi ua.
Huan, mipite leia tu dingin thu a pia a; tanghouphel sagih a la-a, kipahthu a gen khitin a balkhama, ama ua lui dingin a nungjuite kiangah a piaa; huan, mipite ma ah a luita uh.
Ngasa tawmchik leng a nei ua; aman vual a jawl a, huaite leng a ma ua lui dingin thu a pia a.
Huchin, a ne ua, a kham chiat ua; a khamval nen u leng bawm sagih dimin a luak uh.
Amau tuh sang li khawng ahi ua; huan, aman amaute a paisakta hi.
Huan, amah tuh a nungjuite kiangah long ah a tuangpah ngala, Dalmanutha gam a tungta.
Huan, Pharisaite a hongsuak ua, amah zeetna dingin, amah laka van akipana chiamtehna zongin amah a selta uh.

Huan, amaute a pai sana, long ah a tuang nawna, gal khat lamah a paita a.

Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Pharisaite silngou leh Herod silngou lakah kiveng unla, pilvang un, a chi a.
Huan, amau, Tanghou i nei het kei, chiin, a kingaihtuah ua.
Huan, Jesun huai a theihin, a kiang uah, Bangdia tanghou na neih louh jiakua kingaihtuah na hi ua?
Tu nangawnin na theithei sam kei u-maw? theisiam sam loulai maw? na lungtang uh na taksakta ua hia?
Mit nei napiin na mu kei ua hia? bil nei napiin na za kei ua hia?
Theigige lou maw?

Huan, amau a kiangah, Sagih, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, akiang uah, Tu nangawnin na theisiam kei lai uh maw? a chi a.
Huan, Bethsaida a hong tung ua.
Huan, a kiangah mittaw a honpi ua, amah khoih dingin a ngen ua.

Huan, a hondak khia a, Mihing ka mu a; singpai bangin ka mu, a chi a.
Huan, a mitah a khut a koih nawna, huan, aman a en gegu a, a hongdam maimah a, bangkim chiantakin a mutheita.
Huan, Jesun, Khua ah leng lut ken, chiin, a in ah a paisakta.

Huan, aman a tanchin kuamah hilh louh ding a chi bikbek a.

Huai thute tuh chian takin a gen ahi.
Huan, Peterin amah a pi tuama, a tai a.

Huan, mipite, a nungjuite toh, a sam a, a kiang uah, Kuapeuhin honzuih a ut leh, amah kingaihsak louin, a kros puin honjui hen.

Min a hinna tangdin bang a pe thei dia?Kuapeuh tulai khangthak angkawm leh thil gilou chingte laka keimah leh ka thu zumpih tuh, Mihing Tapain, angel siangthoute toh a Pathupinaa kivana a hong hun chiangin, huai mi tuh a honzumpih thuk sam ding, a chi a.

Huchiin, a puansilhte leia puan sawpmi himhimin a sawp ngou theih louh khop hiala ngou velvolin a hongngouta a.

A lau mahmah jiakun, gen dingpen leng a theingal kei a.

Huan, amah a tu a, sawm leh nihte a sama, a kiang uah, Kuapeuhin masapen hih a ut leh mi tengteng sangin nanungpenin a om ding ahi, mi tengteng na semin a om ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, naupang chik khat a kaia, a lak uah a dingsaka: huan, a poma, a kiang uah,

Huan kuapeuh hon gingta neu chik chikte laka khat leng hihpuk tuh, a ngawng ah buh gawi janna suang lianpi oksakin tuipi ah khe le uh, amah adingin a hoih zo ding ahi.
Huan, na khutin a honhihpuk leh, tan khia in; melhema hinnaa lut nang adingin a hoihjaw, khutnih neia gawtmun mei mit theiloua pai sangin,
a than uh a sih louha, meikuang mih louhna ah.
Huan, na khein a honhihpuk leh, tan khia in; khebaia hinnaa lut nanga dingin a hoih-jaw, khe nih neia gawtmuna paiha om sangin,
a than uh a sih louha, meikuang mih louhna ah.
Huan, na mitin a honhihpuk leh, khel khia in; mit lang khat neia Pathian gama lut nanga dingin a hoihjaw, mit lang nih neia gawtmuna paiha om sangin,
a than uh sih ngei louhna leh mei mih ngei louhna ah.

huchiin, a nih un sa khat a honghi ta ding ua; huan nih ahi nawn ta kei ua, sa khat a honghi zota ding uh.

Huan, a khoih dingin a kiangah naupang neute a honpi ua; huan, nungjuiten a na tai ua.

Huan, amau a pom a, a tunguah a khut a koiha vual a jawlsakta a.

Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Bangdia hoih honchi? mi khat kia loungal kuamah hoih a om kei uh, huai tuh Pathian ahi.
Thupiakte khawng na thei vo oi - Tual that ken, Angkawm ken, Gu ken, Hek ken, Khem ken, Na nu leh na pa pahtawiin, chih khawng, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Sinsakpa huai tengteng ka naupan laia kipanin ka jui jel, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun amah a en a, a itta a, a kiangah, Hihding khat nei lai chia; pai inla, na neih peuhmah juak inla, tagahte kiangah pia in, huchiin vanah gou na nei ding; huan, hongpai inla, honjui in, a chi a.
Ahihhangin, huai thu ah a mel a hongmual a, lungkham takin a pai mangta; sum tampi nei mi a hih jiakin.
Huan, Jesun a en vialviala, a nungjuite kiangah, Sum haute Pathian gama lut haksat tuak namai e, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuiten a thugen lamdang a sa mahmah ua.
Jesun bel a dawnga, a kiang uah, Naute aw, sum muangte din Pathian gama lut a haksa thei ngei.
Mihausa Pathian gama lut sangin sangawngsau phim bila lutpaisuak a baihlam jaw, a chi a.
Huan amau tuh lamdang a naksak mahmah ua, a kiangah, Ahihleh, kua hotdam ahi thei dia? a chi ua.
Jesun amau a ena, Huaijaw mihing din hih vual ahi keia, Pathiana din bel hihvual louh ahi kei: Pathian adin bangkim hih theih ahi ngala, a chi a.
Peterin a kiangah, Ngai dih, kou bangkim paisanin kon jui ua, chiin, a hon gen pana.
Jesun, Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, kuapeuh keimah jiak leh Tanchin Hoih jiaka in hiam, unaupate hiam, unaunute hiam, nu hiam, pa hiam, tate hiam, gamte hiam, paisante tuh,
tu dam sung mahmahin, inte, unaupate, sanggamnute, nute, tate, gamte a leh jain, sawinate toh, mu lou ding mahmah a omkei; hun hongtung dinga khantawna hinna toh.
Himahleh, mi tampi masapena omte tuh nanungpen a honghi ding uh, nanungpente leng masapen a honghi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Jerusalem khuaa hohtou dingin lampi ah a om ua; Jesun a ma uh a kai a; amau tuh lamdang a sa mahmah ua; a honjuiten a kihta uh.
Huan, aman tuh sawm leh nihte a pi tuam nawn a,
Ngai dih ua, Jerusalem khua ah hohtou ding i hi ua; Mihing Tapa siampu liante leh laigelhmite kianga matsakin a om ding; huan, amau si dingin a tungah thu a hihpuk ding ua, Jentelte kiangah a pe ding uh;
Huan, amau tuh nuihza bawl nan a nei ding ua, chil a siat ding ua, a vo ding ua, a hihlum ding uh; huan, ni thum nungin a thou nawn ding, chiin, a tunga thil hongtung dingte amau a hilhta a.
Huan, Zebedai tapa Jakob leh Johanin amah a honnaih ua, a kiangah, Sinsakpa na kianga kon nget ding peuh uh non hihsak ka ut uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Nou adin bang honhihsak leng na ut ua? achia.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Na thupina ah na taklam ah khat, na veilam ah khat hontusak in, a chi ua.
Jesun tuh, a kiang uah, Na nget uh na theikei ua ahi.
Ka nou dawn ding na dawn theiding ua hia? ka baptisma tan ding leng na tang thei ding ua hia? a chi a.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Thei e, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, a kiang uah, Ka nou dawn ding na dawn ding ua, ka baptisma tan ding leng na tang ding ua:
himahleh ka taklam ah hiam, ka veilam ah hiama tut ding thu jaw kei piak ding a-hi keia, a bawlsakte uh ading ahi zo ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, sawmten huai a na jak un, Jakob leh Johan tungah a lungkimta kei hial ua.
Jesun amau a sama, a kiang uah, Jentelte tunga vaihawm dia a sehte uh a tunguah a lal mahmah ua, a mi liante un a tunguah thu a nei mahmah uh chih na thei uh.
Himahleh, nou lakah jaw huchi bang ahi kei ding; kuapeuh na lak ua mi lian hih ut tuh na nasem un a pang zo ding ahi.
Kuapeuh na lak ua masapen hih ut tuh mi tengteng sikhain a pang ding ahi.
Mihing Tapa hial leng na sepsaka om dingin a hongpai keia, na sem ding leh mi tampi tatna dinga a hinna pe dingin a hongpai ahi zo ngala, a chi a.

Huan, Toupa khutin amah a panpih ngala.
Huan, a pa Zakaria tuh, Kha Siangthouin a hongdima, a genkhol a,
Toupa, Israel Pathian, phatin om hen, a mite a honveha, tatna a siamsak a.
A sikha David inkuanpihte lakah hotdamna ki a honbawlsaktak jiakin;
Tang laia kipan a jawlnei siangthoute kama, a gen bangin.
I doute lakah leh honhote tengteng laka hotdam-a i om ding thu,
I pipute kianga achiam zahngaihna tangtungsak dingin leh a thukhun siangthou theigige dingin.
I pu Abraham kianga a kichiam a.
I doute laka a honbit saka, lau loua a na i sepna ding.
I dam sung teng a mit muha siangthou leh diktat taka omna dingin.
A hi, Bawi, nang jaw Tungnungpen jawlnei a honchi ding ua; a lampi khawng bawl dingin Toupa maah na pai ding ahi ngala.
A khelhnate uh ngaihdamna dia a mite kianga hotdamna theihna pe ding in.
I Pathian lungtanga hehpihna jiakin, huchia tunglam akipan i tunga ni a tan chianga.

Huan, hichi ahia, huai laia a om lai un, a nauneih a honghunta a.

Huan, a kiangah, Kuamah hilh ken, a hihhangin siampu kiangah vakiensak inla, na sianhonna ding Mosi seh bangin lan in, mite theihchetna dingin, a chi a.
Himahleh, a tanchin thu tuh a thang sansan a; mipi thupitak a thu za nuam leh a natnate uh hihdam utin a hongkikhawm kheukhou ua.
Himahleh, amah tuh gamdaiah a tuam pai a, a thum hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, huai lain, ni khat tuh, thu a hilh a.
Huan, akiangah Pharisaite leh dan siam te tuin a om ua, huaite tuh, Galili leh Judia gam kho teng akipana hongpai ahi ua; huan mi hihdamna dingin Toupa thilhihtheihna a kiangah a om.
Huan, ngai dih, lupna toh mijaw khat a honjawng ua; a maa koih dingin jawn lut a tum ua.
Huan, mipi jiakin jawn lutna dan a mu theikei ua, in tunga kipan, a lai takah, Jesu ma ah a lupna toh a khai khe suk ua.
Huan, a gindan uh a namuh in, a kiang ah, Mihing, na khelhnate ngaihdam a hita, a chi a.
Huan, laigelh mite leh Pharisaiten, Pathian gensia hiai mi kua ahia?
Pathian kia louin kuan ahia khelhnate ngaidam thei? chiin a ngaihtuah ua.
Huchiin, Jesun a ngaihtuah uh a theia, a kiang uah, na lungtang uah bang na ngaihtuah ua?
Na khelhnate ngaihdam a hita, chih leh, Thou inla, khein paita in, chih, a koipen a gen nuam jaw a?
Abang abang hitaleh, khovelah Mihing Tapain khelhnate ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un a chi a, (Jaw kiangah) Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na in ah paiin, ka honchi, a chi a.
Huchiin, a mit muh un a thou paha, a lupna a la a, Pathian phat kawmkawmin a in ah a paita.
Huan, a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Pathian a phat ua.
Tuniin thillamdang pitak i mu hi, a chi ua, a lau mahmah uh.
Huan, huaite khitin a pawta, siahpiakna muna tu, siahkhonmi khat a min Levi a mu a; huan, a kiangah, Honjui in, a chi a.
Huchiin, bangkim a paisana, a thou a, a juita.
Huan, Leviin a in ah Jesu adingin ankuang thupitak a luia; huchiin, siahkhonmi midangte toh mi tampiin amau a umpih chiat ua.
Huan, Pharisaite, a laigelhmite utoh a nungjuite tungah a phun ua, Bang dia siahkhonmite leh khialte kianga ne-a dawn na hi ua? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, a kiang uah, Mi damtheiten daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damtheilouten a kiphamoh jaw uh.
Mi diktatte sam dinga hongpai ka hi keia, mi khialte kisik dinga sam din hongpai ka hijaw, chi in a dawng hi.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Johan nungjuiten an a ngawl jel ua, a thum jel uh: Pharisai nungjuiten leng huchibang mahin a hih jel uh: himahleh, na nungjuiten a ne un a dawn gige uh, a chi ua.
Jesun a kiang uah, Mou pimite kianga a pasal ding a om lai siah mou pimite na ngawl sak thei ngei ua hia?
Himahleh apasal ding amau akipana pimang nite a hongtung dinga, huai ni chiangin jaw a ngawl ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah gentehna thu leng a gena: Kuamahin puan thak eu khiain puan lui a thuap ngei kei, thuap him taleh, a thakin a kaikek dia, a thak them leh a lui tuh a kituak tuan kei ding.
Huan, kuamahin uain thak savun uain thawl lui ah a thun ngei kei uh, thunta him le uleng, uain thakin savun thawlte a phukek dia, a bo dia, savun thawlte leng a se ding uh.
Uain thak tuh savun uain thawl thakah a thun zo ding uh ahi.Huan, kuamah, uain lui na dawn khinin leng, a thak a duh pah kei hi; a lui a hoihjaw, a chi ngala, a chi hi.

Huan, hichi ahi a, Khawlni khatin buh lei khawngah a pai suaka, a nungjuiten buh vuite a khiak ua, a khutpek un a nuai siang ua, a ne ua.
Huan, Pharisai kuate hiamin, Bangdia Khawlnia hih sianglou hih na hi ua? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, David a gilkial laia a lawmte toh a thil hih uh huai bangte leng na sim kei ua hia?
Huchia Pathian ina a luta, siampute loungalin a nek siang louh tanghou koih a laka, a lawmte kianga a piak sam thu, a chi a.
Huan, amahmahin, a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa jaw Khawlni Toupa ahi, a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Khawlni dangin kikhopna in ah a luta, thu a hilha; huan, huai ah mi khat khut taklam jaw a na oma.
Huan, laigelhmite leh Pharisaiten a hekna ding a muh theihna ding un, Khawlniin hihdam dingin a kisa hia kisa lou a simet ua.
Himahleh, aman, a lungsim uh a theia, khutjaw kiang ah, Thou inla, a laiah ding khia in, a chi a.
Huan a thou a, a ding khetaa.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Khawlniin hihhoih a sianga, hih siat? hotdam a sianga, hihlup? ka hondong ahi, a chi a.
Huan, a vek un a en velvela, a kiangah, Na khut zan khia in, a chi a.
Huan, a zan khiaa, a khut tuh a damta.
Huchiin a heh lo mahmah ua, Jesu tunga hihdingdan a kihouta uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huailaiin, a pawta, thum dingin tang ah a kuana, Pathian kiangah jan khuain a thum a.
Huan, khovak takin a nungjuite a sama; a lak uah nih a tela, a min uh leng sawltak a sa hi:
Huaite tuh Simon Peter a chih leh a unaupa Andru, Jakob leh Johan, Philip leh Bartholomai,
Matthai leh Thoma, Alphai tapa Jakob,
Simon, Zelot kichi leh Jakob tapa Juda leh a mansakpa Juda Iskariot ahi uh.
Huan, amau toh a pai khia a, mun jangah a dinga, a nungjuite mipite toh, Judia gam tengteng akipan leh, Jerusalem khua akipan leh, Tura leh Sidon kho lama tuipi gei akipan mipi tampitak a thu ngai nuam leh a damlouhnate uh hihdam utin a hongpai ua;
Huchiin, dawi nin bawlgawpte leng damsakin omta uh.
Huan, a kianga kipan thilhihtheihna pawtkhiaa, mi chih a hidam jel jiakin mipi tengtengin amah khoih a tum ua.
Huan, a dak khia a, a nungjuite enin a gena: Nou gentheite aw, na hampha uhi; Pathian gam noua ahi ngala.
Nou tua gilkialte aw, na hampha uhi, tai ding na hi ngal ua.
Nou tua kapte aw, na hampha uhi, nui ding na hi ngal ua.
Mihing Tapa jiaka miten a honhuat ua, honpampaih ua, hontai ua, na min uh a hoih kei chia a honpaih mang chiang un, na hampha ding uh.
Huai niin kipak unla, nuamin tawm un, ngai un, van ah na kipahman uh a om kikeih ngal a; huchi bangmahin a pipute un jawlneite tungah a hih uhi.
A hihhangin, nou mi haute aw, na tung uh a gik e; na khamuanna uh na mu khinta ngal ua:
Nou tua vahte aw, na tung uh a gik e; na gil uh hongkial ding ahi ngal a.
Nou tua nuite aw; na tung uh a gik e; lungkhama kap ding na hi ngal ua;
Mi tengtengin a honphat chiang un na tung uh a gik ding hi; huchimahbangin a pipute un jawlnei takloute tungah a hih uhi.
Ka thu ngaikhete aw, konhilh ahi, Na melmate uh it unla, a honhote a hoihna ding uh hih un,
Hamsia honlohte vualjawl unla, a honsimmohte thum sak un.
Biang langkhata honbengpa tuh a lehlam leng dohin; huan, na puan honlaksakpa kiangah na puannak leng it ken.
A honngen peuh kiangah pia un; huan, na van honlaksakpa kiangah ngen nawn ken.
Huan, min na tung ua a hih uh na deih ding bang jel un mi tungah leng hih sam un.
Huan, a honitte kia na it un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? mikhialten leng amau itte a it sam ve ua oi.
Huan, na tung ua hoihte tung kiaa na hoih un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? mikhialten leng huchibangmahin a hih jel ve ua oi.
Huan, muh nawn lametnate kiang kiaa thil na leitawi sak un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? mikhialten leng a ngeingei mu nawn dingin mikhialte kiangah a leitawisak sam ngal ua.
A hihhangin na melmate uh it unla, a hoihna ding un hih unla, leitawi sak un, lunglel het lou in; huchiin na kipah man uh a tam dia, Tungnungpen tate na hi ding uh; aman mi kipahnadantheiloute leh migiloute a hehpih naknak hi.
Na Pa un mi a hehpih bangin mi hehpih sam un.
Hawmsak kei un, huchiin hawmsakin na om kei ding uh; kuamah siamlouin sep dah un, huchiin siamlouhin na om kei ding uh; ngaidam un, huchiin ngaihdamin na om ding uh;
Pia un, huchiin, piakin na om ding uh, hoihtaka teha, hen gaka, sin gaka, let nawinawiin na angsung uah piakin na om ding uh.
Noumau tehna ngei maha tehsaka piak hi ding na hi ngal ua, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah, gentehnain a gen a, Mittawin mittaw mah a pi thei diam? a nih un kokhuk ah a ke khawm kei ding ua hia?
Nungjui tuh a heutupa tungah a om kei; himahleh mi chih a siamkim chiang un a heutupa bangin a om ding uh.
Huan, bangdia, na mita singtum om limsak loua, na unau mita ninneng neuchik om mu na hia?
Nangmah mita singtum om mu lou piin, na unau kianga, Unau, na mita ninneng neuchik om honla khesak ve, bangchia chi thei na hia?
Mi lepchiah: na mit apat singtum la khe masa in, huchiin na unau mita ninneng neuchik lak khiak ding tuh chiantakin na mu thei ding.
Sing hoih himhim gah siaa gah a om ngei kei; sing sia lah gah hoiha gah a om ngei sam kei.
Sing chih amau gah chiatah a kithei hi.
Min khau lingnei kungah theipi a lou ngei kei uh, lingnok lakah grep gah a loungei sam kei uh.
Mi hoihin a lungtang gou bawm hoih akipan thil hoihte a honla khe jela; mi gilouin a lungtang gou bawm sia akipan thil hoihloute a honla khe jel hi; a lungtanga dim val tuh a kamin a gen jel ngala.
Huan, nou bang dinga, ka gente hih loupi a, Toupa, Toupa, honchi nahi ua?
Mi chih ka kianga honga, ka thu jaa mang peuhmah kua bang ahi ua, ka honen sak ding:
In lammi, thukpia tou a, suangpi tou a, suangpi tunga suangphum lemmi bang ahi uh; huan, tui a hongkhanin, tui khauhin huai in tuha khoh a, a hihling theikeia, hoihtaka lam a hih jiakin.A hihhangin, jaa mang lou tuh, suangphum lou a, leitung maimaha in lammi ahi; huan, tui khauhin huai tuh a khoh a, a chim paha; huai in siatna tuh thupi tak ahi, a chi a.
A hihhangin, jaa mang lou tuh, suangphum lou a, leitung maimaha in lammi ahi; huan, tui khauhin huai tuh a khoh a, a chim paha; huai in siatna tuh thupi tak ahi, a chi a.
Huan, mite jaka a thu gen tengteng a khitin Kapernaum khuaah a luta,
Huan, sepaih zaheutu kuahiam a sikha deihtak a chi a na a, a si dekdeka.
Huchiin, Jesu tanchin a jak takin a sikha honghihdam dinga ngen dingin a kiangah Juda upate a sawla.
Huan, amau tuh Jesu kiang a vatung ua, limtakin a ngen ua,
Amah jaw hiai na hihsak tak ahi; ka nam uh a it a, ka kikhopna in uh leng amah honlamsak ahi, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Jesu tuh amau toh a hongpai a.
Huan, in a tun dekdekin sepaih zaheutun a kiangah, a lawmte a sawla, ka in sung na lutna tak ahi kei,
Huaijiakin na kianga hong tak hiin leng ka kisimkei, thu leltak gen lechin, ka naupang a dam mai ding.
Kei leng mi thua om ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte a om ua; huai mipa, hiai mipa, Pai in, ka chih leh a paia, mi dang kiangah leng, hongpai in, ka chih leh, a hongpai a; ka sikha kiangah leng, Hiai hih in, ka chih leh a hih jel, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun huai thu a jakin amah tuh lamdang a sa mahmah a, a kihei a, mipi amah juite kiangah, Ka honhilh ahi, Israelte lakah leng hichi tela ginna thupi ka mu kha mahmah kei, a chi a.
Huan, a misawlte in ah a painawn ua, sikha tuh damin a muta uh.
Huan, sawtlou chikin khua khat Nain kichi ah a hoha; a nungjuite leh mipi tampitak a kiang ah a hoh sam ua.

Huan, Toupan meithainu a muh takin, a hehpih mahmaha, Kap ken, a chi a.

Huan, huai mi tungtang thu tuh Judia gam tengtengah leh a kiang vel gam tengah a thang kheta a.

Huan, huailai takin Jesun chinate, hipi veite, dawi matte tampi a hihdama, mittaw tampite leng a mit uh a hihvaka.
Huan, a kiang uah, Pai nawnta unla, thil na muh uleh na jak uh Johan vahilh un; mittawte a mit uh a hongvakta, khebaite khein a hongpaita ua, phakte a hongsiangthouta uh, bengngongte leng a bil uh a hongvakta, misite kaihthohin a omta uh, ajawngten Tanchin Hoih hilh a tangta uh.
Huan, kuapeuh ka tunga lunghihlouhna mu loutuh a hampha hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Johan sawltakte a pai nung un Jesun mipite kiangah Johan thu a genta a, Bang en dinga gamdaia pai khia neita ua?

A hihkeileh, bang en dingpena pai khia neita ua?
Puan nem silhmi maw?
Ngai un, puan thupi silh leh mi nuamsate kumpipate in khawngah eive a om uh.
Ahihkeileh, bang en ding penin ahia na pai khiak uh?
Jawlnei maw?
A hi tawk vo oi, ka honchi ahi, jawlnei sanga leng thupijaw.
En dih, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl ahi, aman na ma ah na lam a bawl ding, chi-a, a tanchin kigelh, hiai mipa ahi.
Numei suan lakah Johan sanga thupi jaw a om kei; himahleh, Pathian gama mi neu pen leng amah sangin a thupi jaw, ka honchi a chi a.
Huan, mi tengtengin a jak un, siahkhonmite toh, Johan baptisma natangsa ahi ua, Pathian siam a tangsak uhi.
Pharisaite leh dan theimiten bel a kianga baptisma natangsa ahi kei ua, amaua dinga Pathianin a hoih dia a sehsak tuh a deih kei uh.
Huchiin Jesu mahin, Tulai khangthakte bang toh ka teh de aw? bangtobang ahi ua?
Naupang dawlmuna tua, Tamngai hon tumsak unga, lam lou uchina; kap huphup unga, nou lah kaptuan lou uchina, chia, kichi tuah bang ahi uh.

Himahleh, pilna tuh a ta tengtengin siam a tan uh.
Huan, Pharisaite laka mi khatin a kianga an ne din a deih a.
Huan, huai Pharisai in ah a luta, an a um a.
Huan, ngai dih, huai khuaa numei khat omin Pharisai in ah an umin a tu chih a theih takin alabasta bawmin thau namtui a hontawi a,
A nungah a khepek bul ah kap kawmin a dinga, a khituiin a khepek a sukawt a, a samin a nula, a khepek tuh a tawp a, thau namtuiin a nuh.
Huan, a sampa Pharisaiin huai a muhin, a lungsimin, Hiai mi jawlnei a hih leh akhoihnu numei kua ahia, mi bangchi ahia, theih tuaktak hi a, mi khial ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, a kiangah, Simon, na kiangah thu kamkhat gen ding ka nei, a chi a, a dawnga, Huan, aman, Bang ahia, Sinsakpa? a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, Dangka leitawi sak kuahiamin leibami nih a neia: khatin makhai za nga a ba a, khatin sawm nga.
Huan, a ditna ding a neikei a, a ngaidam tuaktuak ta.
Huchiin, huai mite a kuain ahia amah it zo ding? a chi a.
Simonin, A ngaihdam diak penin hiin ka gingta, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na chi dik, a chi a.
Huan, numei lam a nga a, Simon kiangah, Hiai numei na mu hia?
Na in ah ka honglutta, nang ka khepek silna ding tui nahon pe keia, aman tuh a khituiin ka khepek a sukawta, a samin a nula.
Nang tawp himhim non tawp kei; aman tuh ka honglut nungsiah ka khepek tawp a tawlnga kei.
Nang ka lutang ah thau non nilh kei; aman tuh ka khepek thau namtui a nilh.
Huaijiakin ka honchi ahi, A khelhna tampi ngaihdamin a omta; aman nakpitakin a it hi; a hihhangin, ngaihdam tawmin, neuchikin a it nak, a chi a.
Huan, numei kiangah, Na khelhnate ngaihdam ahi ta, a chi a.
Huan, a an umpihten, Mi khialte nangawn ngaidam kua ahia eita? a kichi ua.Huan, aman, numei kiangah, Na ginna hotdam na hih loh ahi, khamuang takin pai in, a chi hi.
Huan, aman, numei kiangah, Na ginna hotdam na hih loh ahi, khamuang takin pai in, a chi hi.
Anungin Jesu a paipaha, thu hilh leh Pathian gam Tanchin Hoih tun kawmin kho lian leh kho neute a tawn vialviala; a kiangah sawm leh nihte a om ua,
Numei kuate hiam dawi jawl dam nawnte leh china dam nawnte toh.
Huai numeite tuh Mari a sunga pat dawi sagih pawtna Magdalini a chih uh,
Herod sumkempa Chuza ji Jonna, Sussana leh mi dang tampite toh ahi uh; huaiten amau neihsain amah a khotuah jel uh.
Huan, mipi tampitak a hongkikhawm ua, kho chiha mi a kianga a hong un, gentehnain thu a gena:
Buhchithehpa a buh chi theh din a kuana; huan, a theh lain a khen lampi sikah a kia a, min a sik ua, tungleng vasaten a ne zouta uh.
Huan, a khen suang tungah a kia a; huan a pout akin a kawt louh jiakin a vuai pah a.
Huan, a khen loulingnei lakah a kia a, louin a pou tonpiha, a dep mangta.
Huan, a khen lei hoih ah a kia a, a hongpou a, a leh jain a gahta a, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a gen lain a kikou a, Kuapeuh jakna dinga bilneiin ja uheh, a chi hi.
Huan, a nungjuiten a kiang ah, Hiai gentehna thu bang chihna ahia? chiin, a dong ua.
Huan, Pathian gam thugukte nou theih dia piak ahia, mi dang kiangah bel gentehna kiaa gen ahi; mu napia a muh theihlouhna ding uleh za napi-a a theihsiam louhna ding un.
Huai gentehna thu hiai ahi: Buh chi tuh Pathian thu ahi.
Huan, lampi sika te tuh thu zasate ahi uh; huan, diabol a hongpaia, a gin louh ua, hotdam a hih theih louhna ding un a lungtang ua kipan thu tuh a lak mangsak jel.
Huan, suang tunga te tuh a jak tak ua thu kipak taka pom pahte ahi ua; himahleh zung himhim a neikei ua, sawtlou chik kia a ging ua, khem hunin a tawp san nak uh.
Huan, loulingnei laka kiate tuh thu zate ahi ua; himahleh a khosak jelna uah damsung khosak ngaihtuahnate, hauhsaknate, nuamsaknaten a depa, a gah piching kei nak uh.
Lei hoih ate bel thu jaa lungtang kizen leh hoih a kem kinken a, kuhkaltaka gah suahte ahi uh.
Kuamahin khawnvak dein belin a khuh kei uh, lupna nuaiah leng a koih kei uh; a lut peuhmahin a vak a muh theihna dingun a koihna ah a koih jaw uh.
Thang lou ding a im bangmah a om ngal kei a, theih louh ding leh lang lou dinga selguk bangmah a om sam kei.
Huchiin, bangchibangin ahia na jak uh pilvang un; kuapeuh a nei tuh piak behlap ahi ding a, kuapeuh a neilou tuh, nei a kichih sun leng lak sak ahi ding, a chi hi.
Huan, a nu leh a unauten Jesu lam a honnaih ua, himahleh mipi jiakin a kiang a hongtung theikei ua.
Huan, Na nu leh na unaute nangmah muh tumin inpua ah ding nilouh ve uh, chiin, a hilh ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Hiai Pathian thu jaa gingtate ka nu leh ka unaute ahi uh, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huailaiin ni khat tuh longah a tuanga, a nungjuite toh; huan, a kiang uah, Dil gal khat lamah I kai ding, a chi a.
Huchiin long a phel ua, a paita ua.
Huan, a pai lai un Jesu a ihmutaa; huan, dilah huihpi a hongnung suka, a long uh tuiin a dim dekdeka, lauhuai piin a omta uh.
Huan, a kiangah a vahoh ua, a phawng ua, Heutupa, Heutupa, mangthang ding ka kei umaw, a chi ua.
Huan amah a khanglou-a huih leh tuikihot a taita a; huan, a tawp ua, a daita mai uhi.
Huan, a kiang uah, Na ginna uh kaw om ahia? a chi a.

Huan, Gaili gam jawn Gerasinte gam a tung ua.
Huan, gama a pai khiakin, khuaa mi dawi mat kuahiamin a nadawna; huai mi tuh sawtpi puan himhim silh louin a oma, in himhim ah leng a om keia, han khawng ngen ah a om jaw a.
Huan, Jesu a muh takin a kikou a, a maah a khupboha, aw ngaih piin, Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpen Tapa, kei leh nang bang i kizolhna a om a? honhihgim mahmah lou dingin ka honngen ahi, a chi a.

Huan, aman, Nuai, a chi a, a sunga dawi tampi a lut jiakin.

Himahleh, a khenin, Dawi lal Beelzibul jiakin eive dawite a delh khiak jel, a chi ua.
Huan, a khenin, amah zeetna dingin, vana kipan chiamtehna a ngen ua.
Aman tuh a ngaituah uh ana thei a, a kiang uah, Koi gam leng amah kidou peuh a mangthang nak; inkuan khat leng amah kidou tuh a mangthang nak.
Setan leng amah a kidou leh, a gam bangchin a dingkhe dia? -Beelzibul jiakin dawite a delh khia, non chi ngal ua.
Huan, kei Beelzibul jiaka dawite delh khia ka na hih leh, na tate un kua jiakin ahia a na delh khiak jel uh?
Huaijiakin amau noute honvaihawmsak dingte ahi ding uh.
A hihhangin, kei Pathian khut zung jiaka dawite delh khe jel ka hih leh, Pathian gam na kiang uah hongtung khin ahi vele.
Mi hatin hiamzat kim tawia a in a ven sung teng, a sum bit takin a om gige a;
himahleh, a sanga hatjawin a honsuala, a zoh chiangin, a muan a galvan kim tuh a sut a, sum a lak sak tuh a hawmjak jel hi.
Kuapeuh ka lama panglou tuh, hondou ahi a, kuapeuh honlak khawm pih louin a hihjak ahi.
Dawi nin mi sung akipana apawtin, khawlna zongin tui om louhna mun peuhah a vak vak a; huan, khawlna himhim a mu kei a, ka pawtna in ah ka kik nawn mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, a va tunin phiat sianga zephoihin a mu a.
Huai takin a vapaia, amah sanga gilou jaw dawi dang sagih a honpi a, huaiah a lut ua, a om gige uh; huai mihing tuh a omdan nanung a masa sangin a honghoih keizo tham hi, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai thute a genlaiin, mipi lakah numei khat a kikou khia a, a kiangah, Nang honpai gil a hampha e, na nawi tep toh, a chi a.
Aman bel, A hi, himahleh Pathian thu jaa juite mi hampha ahi jaw uh a chi a.
Huan, mipite a kiangah hongkikhop lai un, Jesun, Tulai khangthakte jaw khangthak gilou ahi uh; chiamtehna a zong ua; himahleh Jona chiamtehna chih louh a kiang uah chiamtehna himhim piak ahi kei ding.
Jona tuh Ninevi khuaa mite adia chiamtehna a na hih bangin, Mihing Tapa leng tulai khangthakte din chiamtehna a honghi ding.
Thukhenni chiangin, Simlam kumpinu tulai khangthakte kiangah a ding sam dia, siamlouh a tang sak ding; Solomon pilna ngaikhe dingin bawn kawl mong a kipan a hong ngala; ngai un, Solomon sanga thupi jaw hiai ah a om ahi.
Thukhenni chiangin, Ninevi khuaa mite tulai khangthakte kiangah a ding sam ding ua, siamlouh a tang sak ding uh, Jona thu hilh jiakin a kisik ngal ua; ngai un, Jona sanga thupijaw hiai ah a om ahi.
Kuamahin khawnvak a det un in nuai tawngah a koih ngei kei uh, loh nuaiah a koih ngei sam kei uh, alut miten a vak a muh theihna ding uah a koihna ah a koih jel uh.
Na sapum khawnvak tuh na mit ahi; na mit a chim leh na sapum leng a vekin a vak suak nak hi; a chim keileh bel na sapum leng a mial vek nak hi.
Huchiin, na sunga vak om tuh mial a nahi kha ding e pilvangin.
Huchiin, na sapum koi laipeuh mial lou a a veka a vak khiak leh, khawnvak vak petpetin a tatvak bangin a vak khe vek ding, a chi a.
Huan, a gen laiin Pharisai khatin amah a kianga an ne dingin achiala; huchiin, a luta an a ne a.
Huan, Pharisaiin a an um a muhin, an nek maa a sil louh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah a.
Huan, Toupan, akiangah, Nou Pharisaiten nou leh kuang po lam na silsiang ngeitak ua; na sung lam ulah lepgukna leh gilouin a dim ngala.
Mi haite aw, polam bawlpan sung lam leng a bawl ka hia?
Himahleh, a sunga thil om tuh mi genthei kianga piak dingin zang un; huchiin, ngai un, nou adin bangkim siangthou khin ahi.
Nou Pharisaite aw, na tung uh a gik e: pudina, pardi leh anteh-louhing teng sawma khat na pia ua, diktatna leh Pathian itna na limsak ngal kei ua; himahleh huaite eive na hih ding uh, a dangte hih lou tuan lou in.
Nou Pharisaite aw, na tung uh a gik e: kikhopna in ah tutphah hoihpente leh dawl muna chibai bukte na ngaisang uh.
Na tung uh a gik hi: Han chih kithei lou, a tunga theiloua mi apai jelna bang uh, na hi uh, a chi a.
Huan, dantheimi khatin, a kiangah, Sinsakpa, hiai thu na gen tuh kou leng hontai na hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, aman, Dantheimite aw, nou leng na tung uh a gik: Puakgik, puak haksapipi mite na suan ua, nou lah tua puakgikte na khut zung khat un leng na khoih ngei ngal kei ua.
Na tung uh a gik: Jawlneite han in khawng na lam ua, na pipute uh thah ahi ngal ua.
Huchiin na pipute uh thilhihte na theihpih un na hoihsakpih uh ahi; amau a that ua, nou a han inte uh na lam ngal ua.
Huaijiakin, Pathian pilna inleng, A kiang uah jawlneite leh sawltakte ka sawl dia, a khen a that ding ua, a khen a sawi ding uh;
jawlnei tengteng sisan, leilung piantung akipan a suah, tulai khangthakte tungah phu a lak theih ding a chih;
Abel sisan suah akipan, Zakaria, maitam leh biakin kikala si sisan suah tannin; ahi, ka honhilh ahi, tulai khangthakte tungah phu a akila ding.
Nou dantheite aw, na tung uh a gik e: Pilna tabi na paimang pih ua; nou lah na lut ngal kei ua, mi lut ding lah na dal ngal ua, a chi a.
Huan, huaia kipan apawtin, laigelhmite leh Pharisaiten amah a tawng ua, thu chiteng gen sak teitei tumin leh,a pau khelh zenzena mat tumin a tang gige uh.

Huchih laia mipi sang tampi kiphumuimui zou hiala hongkikhop un, Jesun a masapenin a nungjuite kiangah, Pharisaite silngou, lepchiahna lakah pilvang un,
Lang lou dinga selguk bangmah a om ngal keia; theih louh dinga im leng bangmah a om sam kei.
Huaijiakin miala na gen peuh uh vaka jakin a om ding; dantan sunggila bil bula na thu gen uh intungvuma tangkoupihin a om ding.
Huan, ka lawmte aw, ka honhilh ahi, Sapum hihlum a, huai nunga bangmah dang hihnawn theiloute jaw, kihta kei un,
Ahihhangin kua ahia na kihtak ding uh ka honhilh khol ahi; a hihlup nunga leng Gihennaa paih theihna thu neipa kihta un.
Kawlgit nga dal dangka nihin a juak sek kei ua hia?
Himahleh, a lak ua khat leng Pathianin a mangngilh ngei ngal keia.
Na lu ua samzangte nangawn leng sim vek ahi uh.
Lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin na manpha jaw uhi.
Huan ka honhilh ahi, Mite maa hon gum peuhmah Pathian angelte maah Mihing Tapain a gum sam ding a.
Himahleh mite maa honkitheihmoh bawl peuhmah Pathian angelte maah kitheihmoh bawl a hisam ding.
Huan, Mihing Tapa kalha thugen peuhmah a genkalhna uh ngaihdam sak ahi ding a; himahleh Kha Siangthou hilhial gensia tuh a gensiatna ngaihdam sak ahi kei ding.
Huan, kikhopna in a mite, vaihawmte, heutute maa a honpi hun chiangun, Bang chiin, bang thuin ka dawng dia, bang thu ka gen dia chiin lungkham kei un;
huchih huntakin, bang ahia na gen ding uh, Kha Siangthouin a honhilh ding hi, a chi a.
Mipi laka khatin, Jesu kiangah, Sinsakpa, ka u kiangah gou honhawm sam dingin hilh in, a chi a.
Himahleh, aman, a kiangah, Mihing, noumau tungah kuan ahia kei thukhenpa hiam tanseppa hiam a honbawl? a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah, Pilvang unla, enna himhim lakah kiveng un; hauhna mihing dam san ahi kei hi, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah gentehna thu a gen a, Mi hau kuahiam a hongpung mahmah a,
huchiin a kingaihtuah a, Bangchi bangin ka hih de aw?
Ka buh leh bal koih khawmna ka nei ngal kei a.
Huan, Hichi bang in ka hih ding e; ka buhin te ka phel dinga, a sanga lianin ka lam dia, huai ah tuh ka buh leh ka van tengteng ka koih khawm ding.
Huan, ka kha kiangah, Kha, kum tampi sunga ding tampi na khol a; khawl inla, nein dawn inla, nuam takin omin, ka chi ding, a chi a.
A hihhangin, Pathianin a kiangah, Nang mihai, tu jan chiah na kha a honlak sak ding uh, huai nalam khiakte, kuaa ahi ta dia?
Amau adinga gou khola, Pathian lama haulou tuh huchi ahi nak uh, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuite kiangah, Huaijiakin ka honhilh ahi, Bang ka ne diam aw?
Chiin, na hinna thu uh leh, Bang ka silhin ka teng diam aw?
Chiin, na sapum thu uh lunghimoh kei un.
Nek ding sangin hinna a thupi jaw hi, puansilh sangin leng sapum a thupi jaw ahi.
Vaakte khawng ngaihtuah dih uh, buh a tuh kei ua, a at samkei uh; pang bang, buh in bang leng a neikei uh; himahleh Pathianin amau a vak ngala; nou tuh vasate sanga na manphat jawk dan uh.
Huan, nou lakah lunghimoh jiaka kuain ahia amah dunglam tong khata hihsang thei tuan?
Hiai lel leng hih theiloute bangin, bang dia thil dang lunghimoh nak na hi ua?
Lilite khandan ngaihtuah dih uh; na a sem kei ua, khau leng a khek kei uh; himahleh, ka honhilh ahi, Solomon hial leng a thupina tengtenga a kizepin, hiai lilite laka khat banga zepin a om kei.
Huchiin, gama loupa, tuni banga hinga, a jinga thuka khul nawn mai ding bawn, Pathianin hichi tela a zep leh, aw, nou mi gin tawmte aw, huai sangin puansilh honpe zo natel inchia:
Huan, na nek ding uh, na dawn ding uh, zong kei un; ginlahna lungsim neiin leng om sam kei un.
Khovela namten huai thil tengteng a zong uh; huai bang na kiphamoh uh chih na Pa un a thei gige ngala.
Amah gam zong jaw un, huchiin huai thilte leng a honpiak behlap ding ahi.
Pawl tawmte aw, lau kei un; nou kianga gam piak ding tuh na Pa uh kipah lamtak ahi.
Na neih peuh uh juak unla, mi gentheite kiangah pia un; vanah guta hohlouhna ah, leikha neksiat louh na ah, dangka ip lui theiloute, gou bei theiloute kibawl un.
Na gou omna peuh ua na lungtang uleng a om ding jiakin.
Na kawng uh gak unla, na khawnvak uh leng de sain om un;
min a pu uh kitenna ankuang luina akipana a hongpai chianga, kongkhak a honkiuh taka, na nahonthei pah dinga a na ngak nilouh bangun, om un.
A pu uh a hongpai chiangin sikha na ngak nilouha a muhte a hampha uhi; chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Aman a kawng a gak dia, amau tuh an um dingin a tu sakdinga, ana uh a sep sakding.
Jan laiin hiam, thoh hunin hiam a honga, huchi banga a honmuh, huai sikhate tuh a hampha uh.
A hihhangin, hiai thei un, guta a hongpai ding inneipan thei leh, a vengdia, a in a phen vang sak kei ding.
Nou leng mansa in om un, na gintak louhlai tak un Mihing Tapa hongpai ding ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Peterin, Toupa, hiai gentehna thu koumau kia hia non hilh, mi tengteng? achi a.
Huan, Toupan, sumkempa ginom, piltak, a puin a hun teng a a tan ding uh hawm sak dinga a inkuanpihte tunga heutua a bawl ding tuh kuapen ahi dia le?
A pu a hongpai chiangin sikha huchibanga hih a hon muhdingpa tuh a hampha.
Diktakin ka honhilh ahi, a neih tengteng tunga heutu dingin a bawl ding.
Ahihhangin huai sikhain, a lungtangin, Ka pu a hong zok kei ding e, chiin, a sikhanu, a sikhapa, na vo ta leh, nein dawnin na nakham leh.
huai sikha pu tuh, a gin louh niin, a theih louh laiin, a hong dinga, tum nih a honsuah dinga, mi ginom loute tan bang a tangsak ding hi.
Sikha a pu deihlam theigige na pia na nakiging tuan lou-a, a pu deihlama leng gamta loupan nakpitaka vuak a tuak ding.
A hihhangin, theiloupi-a vuakna thama gamtapan awlchika vuak a tuak ding.
Tampi piaka ommi peuhmah kiangah tampi phutin om ding; tampi a kepsakpa uh kiangah a tamsem a phut ding uh.
Khovela mei khe suk dinga hongpai ka hi; tu inleng kang pah leh china tel ing e!
Himahleh, baptisma tan ding ka nei, huai hihtangtun mateng tuh ka om nuam lou hina mahmah tel e:
Khovela lem leng sak dinga hongpai hiam honsa nahi umaw?
Hi dek lou, ka honhilh ahi, kidou leng sak dinga hongpai ka hi jaw.
Tunung chiangin inkuan khat ah mi nga a kidou ding uh, thumin nih, nihin thum.
A kidou dingua, pain a tapa, a tapain a pa; a nuin a tanu, a tanuin a nu; a piin a mou, a mouin a pi, a chi a.
Huan, mipi kiangah leng, Tumlama mei kai na muh uleh, vuah a zu ding, na chi pahngal ua; huan a hongzu ngei jela.
Huan, sim huih nung na muh chiang un, Khua lum ding ei ve, na chi uh, huan, a honglum ngei jela.
Nou lepchiah te aw, khovel leh van omdan leng na genchian thei ngal ua, bangchia tulai hun gen chian siam lou na hi ua?
Bang achia noumauin thu adik kikhen lou na hi ua?
Honhekpa toh thukhenpa kiang na zot laiun, lampi ah kilep theihna khat zong teitei in; huchilouin jaw thukhenpa mai ah honkai lut dinga, thukhenpan miman heutu honmansak dinga.
Miman heutupan suangkulh ah honkhum kha ding.Ka honhilh ahi, paihsasan khat nangawn na piak kim masiah, huai akipan na pawt kei hilhial ding, a chi a.
