Huan, huchih lai takin, kuate hiam a na-om ua, huaiten, Galili gama Pilatin a sisan uh a Pathian biakna sa gohte laka a hel sakte tungtang Jesu a hilh ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Huai Galili gamete huchibang thil a thuak jiak un Galili gama tengteng sangin mi gilou tuan hi un na gingta ua hia?
Hi lou e, ka honhilh ahi, nou leng na kisik kei uleh huchi bangmahin na mangthang vek dinguh.
Huan, Siloam insangin mi sawm leh giat a delhlupte leng, Jerusalem khuaa omte tengteng sangin mi gilou tuan hi un na gingta ua hia?
Hilou e, ka hon hilh ahi, nou leng na kisik kei uleh huchibang mahin na mangthang vek ding uh, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, hiai gentehna thu a gena; Kuahiamin a grep huanah theipi suan khat anei a: huan, a kungah a gah a hongzonga, khat leng amu kei a.
Huchiin, grep gui kemmi kiangah, Ngai in, kum thum sung hiai thei kung ah a gah ka va zong jela, khatleng ka mu kei; phuk in; bangdia mun dala om nilouh ahia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Toupa, tukum bek om henla, a kimin ka tou dinga, ekin ka phungvuh tadih dia;
huainunga a gah leh ahoih ding, a gah kei leh phuk mai in, achia.
Huan khawl niin aman kikhopnain khat ah thu a hilh a.
Huan, ngai in, kum sawm leh kum giat hatlouhna dawi mat numei khat a oma; huai mi tuh a kun kheukheu a, amah thuin a ding tang theikei hiala.
Huan, Jesun amah a muh takin a sama, akiangah, Numei, na hatlouhnain a honkhahta, a chi a.
Huan, atungah a khut a koiha; huchiin, thakhatin a tangpah ngala, Pathian a phatta a.
Huan, Jesun Khawlnia mi a hihdam jiakin kikhopna in heutu a heha, mipi a houpiha, a kiang uah, Mihing na sepna ding ni guk a om vo oi; huai sungin, kihihdam un, Khawlniin hi louin, a chi a.
Toupan a kiangah, Nou lepchiahte aw, Khawlniin na bawng u hiam na sabengtung uhiam a an neknaa kipan phelin, tui dawndingin na pi khe chiat jel uh hi lou hia?
Hiai numei, Abraham tanu ahi ngala, ngai un, Setanin kum sawm leh kum giat a mana, Khawlniin leng hiai gak tuh phel sak louh dan ahia hia? a chi a, a donga.
Huai thute a gen laiin a melmate tengteng a zum ua; mipi bel a thil thupi hih tengteng jiakin a kipak uh.
Huchiin, aman, Pathian gam bang ahia? bang toh leng ka teh dia?
Ankam chi tangkhat min a laka, a huana a theh bang ahi, huai tuh a hongpou a, sing a honghi a, tungleng vasate khawng ahiangah a giak uh, a chi a.
Huan, Pathian gam bang toh ka the dia? a chi nawna.
Silngou numeiin a laka, anbuang tehna thum laka a veka a thoh mateng a phumbang ahi, a chi a.
Huan, aman thuhilh kawm jelin, Jerusalem kho lam naihin kholian leh kho neute a tawn jela.
Huan, kuahiamin, a kiangah, Hotdamte tawm chik ahi ding u maw? a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, kong kochik ah lut tum teitei un; ka honhilh ahi, mi tampiin lut a tum ding ua, a lut thei ngal kei ding uh.
In neipa a thoha, kong a khak nungin, nou a puaa dingin, Toupa, kong honhonsak in, chiin kongkhak non kiuh chiang un, aman, Koi lam mi na hi ua, honthei lou ka hi, chiin, nou a hondawng dinga;
huai hun chiangin, nou, Na muhin kane ua, ka dawn ve ua oi, ka kongzing uah leng thu na hilh jel vo oi, na chi ding uh.
Huan, aman, Ka honhilh ahi, Koi lam mi na hi ua, ka hon theikei; nou thil gilou hihtengtengte aw, ka kianga pat pai mang vek un, a honchi ding.
Abraham, Isaak, Jakob leh jawlnei tengteng Pathian gam, sunga om na muh ua, nou po lama delhkhiak na hih uh na kitheih chiangun, na kap ding ua, ha na gawi ding uh.
Huan, suahlam leh tumlam, sim leh mal akipanin mite hongpai ding ua, Pathian gamah nein a dawn ding uh.
Huan, ngai un, nanungpente leng masapena om ding a om ua, masapente leng nanungpena om ding a om uh, a chi a.
Huai laitakin Pharisai kuate hiam a hongpai ua, a kiangah, Pawt inla, hiaia kipan pai mang in: Herodin honhihlup ut mahmah ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Huai sehal kiangah hiai thu vagen un: Ngai in, tuni toh, jingchiang toh dawite ka delhkhe dia, natnate leng ka hihdam dia a ni thum niin ka zou ding.
Abangabang hitaleh, tuni toh, jingchiang toh, a ni thumni toh ka pai jel ding ahi; Jerusalem kho po lamah jawlnei sih theih hilou ahi.
Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem: jawlneite that, na kianga honsawlte uh suanga na deng lum: akpiin a noute a kha nuaia a op khawmbangin na tate bangzah vei op khawm ka tum a?
Himahleh na ut kei.En in, na in a vuaka taisanin a om.

En in, na in a vuaka taisanin a om.
Huan, Ka honhilh ahi, Toupa mina hongpai a hampha, na chih ma siah non mu kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Khawlniin Pharisai vaihawmmi khat ina an ne dinga hoh in, a en khia ua.
Huan, ngai in, a ma ah damlou chibawk mi kua hiam a oma.
Huchiin, Jesun dan theimi leh Pharisaite a houpiha, a kiang uah, Khawlniin hihdam asiang hia, siang lou? a chi a.
Amau bel a dai dide ua, huan, aman damlou tuh a len a, a hihdama, a paisakta a.
Huan, a kianguah, Na lak uah na sabengtung u hiam, bawng hiam tuitohkhiakkhuk ah nake taleh, Khawlniin leng kua ahia kai khepah lou ding? a chi a.
Huai thu tuh a dawng theikei uh.
Huan, a mi sapte un tutnamun hoihpen a tel jel dan uh a mu a, a kiang uah gentehna thu a genta a:
Kitenna an ne dinga kuapeuhin a honsap chiangin tutnamun hoihpen ah tu kei un; huchilou injaw, na sang ua mi phajaw a na sam kha dia, huchiin, a honsampan,
Hiai mi tutna ding awn in, a hon chi dia; huan nang zumpiin tutnamun niam pen ah natu nawn phing ding ahi.
A honsap chiangin tutnamun niam pen ah na vatu zo ding a; huchiin a honsampa a hong chiangin, na kiangah, Lawm, tutnamum hoih deuh ah tu in, a honchi theiding.
Huchiin na anumpihte mitmuhin pahtawiin na om ding.
Kingaipha peuh a neu ding ua: kingaineu tuh pahtawiin a om ding uh, a kiang uah a chi a.
Huan, a sampa kiangah leng, Sunin hiam, janin hiam ankuang na lui chiangin, na lawmte, na unaute, na sanggamte, na inveng mihaute na sam kei ding; huchilou injaw a honsam thuk ding ua, a honthuk chitchiat kha ding uh.
Ankuang na lui chiangin, tagahte, piangsualte, khebaite, mittawte, na sam zo ding;
huchiin, huai bangten thukna ding a neih louh jiak un, na hampha ding; mi dikte thoh nawn chiangin thuk nawn na hih ding jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, a anumpih kuahiamin huai thu tuh a ja a, a kiangah, Pathian gama an ne ding tuh a hampha, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Mi kuahiamin janin ankuang thupi luina a bawla, mi tampi a sama;
huan, anek hunin, ami sapte kiangah, Hong ua, tuin bangkim manta, chi dingin a sikha a sawla.
Huan, a vek un thu khat satin paulam a nei chiat ua.
A masapenin, a kiangah, Lou ka leita a, a en dia ka hoh kipha moh hi; honhehpih inla, hon na ngai siam heh, a chi a.
Huan, midangin, Bawng tuak nga ka leita a, a siat a phat chiandingin ka kuan dinga, honhehpih inla hon na ngai siam heh, a chi a.
Huan, mi dangin, ji ka neita a, huaijiakin ka hoh theikei, a chi a.
Huan, sikhain, a pu kiangah, huai thute tuh a vahilh ta a.
Huan, inneipa tuh a heh a, a sikha kiangah, Pawt inla, kongzing khawngah, kawmkal khawngah pai mengmeng inla, tagahte, piangsualte, mittawte, khebaite hiai laiah honpilut in, a chi a.
Huan, a sikhain, Pu, non thupiak bangin ka hihkhina, himahleh mun awng lailaive aw, a chi a.
Huan, a puin, sikha kiangah, Pawt inla, lamlian khawng ah, dai khawng ah pai inla, ka in dimna dingin mi hon sawl lut teitei in.
Ka honhilh ahi, Mi ka sapte khatin leng ka ankuang lui achiam kei hial ding, a chi a, a chi a.
Huan, mipi thupi takte a kiangah a hoh sam ua; huchiin amah a kiheia, a kianguah,
Kuapeuh ka kianga hongin, a pa, a nu, a ji, a tate, a unau a sanggamnu, leh amah hinna nangawn toh a huat keileh ka nungjui ahi theikei ding.
Kuapeuh a kros pua honjui lou tuh ka nungjui ahi theikei ding.
Nou laka kuapeuhin in sang lam tum le uchin, amasain tuin, lam zohna khop sum na neih uleh neih louh thei dingin, aman ding dan kuaa hia sut lou ding.
Huchilou injaw, suang phum khin phota, a lam zoh theih kei leh, a en peuhin,
Hiai min a gel na a, a lam zou thei ngal keia chiin, a nuihsan kha ding uh.
Huan, kumpipa kuain ahia kumpipa dang dou dinga a kuan dingin, a masaa tu a, mi sing nih toh amah dou ding a hong tuh, mi sing khat toh a tuah ngam ding leh ding louh, mi dong lou ding?
Huchi a hihkei vanglakleh, kumpipa dang tuh gamla pia a om laiin, kituahna lam thuchiam ngen dingin palai a sawl ding.
Huchi bangmahin, nou lakah kuapeuh a neih tengteng paisan lou tuh ka nungjui ahi theikei ding.
Chi a hoiha, himahleh, chi leng a pen khitin, bangin a hih-al nawn ding ua?Leia dingin a hoih kei; ekvum dingin leng a hoih sam kei; min a pai khia uh.
Kuapeuh jakna dinga bil neiin ja hen, a chi a.
Leia dingin a hoih kei; ekvum dingin leng a hoih sam kei; min a pai khia uh.
Kuapeuh jakna dinga bil neiin ja hen, a chi a.
Huan, siahkhonmite leh mi khialte tengtengin a thu za dingin a kiang a honjuan ua.
Huan, Pharisaite leh laigelhmiten, Hiai miin mi khialte a khawla, a kianguah an a ne chiin, a phun tuaktuak ua.
Huchiin, aman a kianguah hiai gentehna a gen a:
Nou lakah kuapeuhin belam ja nei unla, a lak ua khat mangsak le-uchin, gamdai ah sawmkua leh kuate nusiain, amang pen na muh nawn ma siah uh kua ahia zong lou ding?
Huan, na muh nawn un tuh kipaktakin na liangjang uah na pua ua.
Huan, in natun tak un, na lawmte uleh na vengte uh na sam khawm ua, a kiang uah, Hon kipahpih un, ka belam mang ka mu nawnta, na chi uh.
Ka honhilh ahi, huchi bangmahin, mi dik sawm kua leh kua kisik tuanding neiloute tungah sangin mi khial khat kisik tungah vana mi a kipak zo ding uh.
Huan, numei kuapeuhin makhai sawm neiin khat mang sak leh, khawnvak dein, in phiatin a muh nawn masiah kua ahia hoihtaka zong lou ding?
Huan, a muh nawn intuh, a lawmte leh a vengte a sam khawma, Honkipahpih un, ka makhai mansak ka mu nawn ta, a chi a.
Ka honhilh ahi, huchi bangmahin, Pathian angelte maah, mi khial khat kisik tungah, kipahna om nak.
Mi kua hiamin tapa nih a nei a;
huan, a naupang zopenin, a pa kiangah, Pa, gou ka tansik honpia in, a chi a.
Huchiin, a sum tuh a kianguah a hawmta a.
Huan, ni sawt lou nungin a tapa naupang zopenin a tansik tengteng a la khawm veka, gam gamlapi ah a zinta a, huai ah nuam tat luain a sum a mawk zat mangta a.
Huan, a zat bei zoh vek takin, huai gamah kial thupitak a hongtunga; nek ding a hong kitasamta a.
Huchiin, huai gam mi khat a vabela; huaiin vok an pe dingin a lou lamah a sawla.
Huan, bangkhat hawng vokin a nekte ua kihihvah a ut mahmaha; kuamahin lah bangmah a pe ngal kei ua.
Huan, amah leh amah hongkiphawk khiak takin, Ka pa kianga kilohte an nek zoh louha nei a tamtam utoh, kei lah hiai ah gilkiala si ding hi mai vengin;
Ka thou dinga, ka pa kiangah ka pai dinga, a kiangah, Pa, vana tungah leh nangmah mitmuhin thil ka hihkhial; na tapaa seh tak ka hitakei hi;
na kianga kiloh khat bangin hon bawl samin, ka chi ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a pa kiangah a paita a.
Huan, gamlapia a omlaiin, a pan a namu a, a lainat mahmaha, a taia, a vapoma a tawp tonton a.
Huan, a kiangah a tapain, Pa, vana tungah leh nangmah mitmuhin thil ka hihkhial; na tapaa seh tak ka hita kei, a chi a.
Himahleh, a pan, a sikhate kiangah, Puan hoihpen honla khepah unla, silh sak un; a khutah zungbuh a khepekah khedap bun sak un;
bawngnou thau tak honla unla; gou un, i ne ding ua, nopbawlin i om ding uh;
hiai ka tapa a sia, a honghing nawnta ahi; a manga, i mu nawnta uhi, a chi a.
Huchiin kipaktakin a om panta ua.
Huan, a tapa upa jaw lou ah a oma; huan, in a hong tun kuanin bangpeuh tum ging leh lam husa a zata a.
Huchiin, a sikha khat a sama, Tuabang ahia? chiin, a donga.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na nau a hongtunga, dam takin a muh nawn jiakin na pan bawng nou thau tak a gou, a chi a.
Huan, a heha, a lut nuamta keia; huchiin, a pa hongpawt khia a, a khema.
Himahleh, aman, a pa kiangah, Ngai in, kum hichi zah na na sem inga, na thua lah talek ngei lou inga; ka lawmte toh kipahna ka bawlna dingin kelnou leng non pe ngei ngal keia.
Himahleh, hiai na tapa kijuakte kianga na sum ne mang vekpa a hongtun takin amah adingin bawngnou thau tak na nagoh sak viala, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, aman a kiangah, Ka tapa, ka kianga om gige hi china, ka neih tengteng leng nanga hi a.Kipak leh nuamtaka om ding ahi vo oi; hiai na nau a sia; a honghing nawna; a manga, i mu nawnta ahi ngala, a chi a, a chi a.
Kipak leh nuamtaka om ding ahi vo oi; hiai na nau a sia; a honghing nawna; a manga, i mu nawnta ahi ngala, a chi a, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a nungjuite kiangah hiai thu leng a gena: Mi sumhau kuahiamin sumkemmi a neia; huai min tuh a sum a zat bei sak mawkmawk thu ah a kiangah a hek ua
Huchiin, aman amah a sama, a kiangah, Na tungtang thu ka jak bangchi ahia?
Na sum kepthu hon pelut in; tuban siah sum kem in na pang thei nawn kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, sumkempan, a lungsimin, Ka Toupan ka sumkep hontawp ding hi a, bangchin ka hih dia leh? lei toh lah ka ngap kei a, khutdoh lah ka zum ngala.
Sumkep a hontawp hun chiangin a in ua honom sak dingin ka hihdingdan ka theita, a chi a.
Huchiin, a Toupa sum bate a sam chiata, masapen kiangah, Ka Toupa lakah bangzah na ba a? achia a.
Aman, Thau tehnadan za khat, achia a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na lai la inla tu meng inla, sawmnga gelh in, a chi a.
Huan mi dang kiangah, Nang bangzah na ba a? a chi a.
Aman.
Buh tehna dan za khat, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na lai la inla, sawmgiat gelhin, a chi a.
Huan, a Toupan sumkempa diklou tuh a lemtheih jiakin a phat a; vak tate sangin hiai khovel tate a tulai thu ua a piljawk jiakun.
Ka honhilh ahi, Sum lemin nou din lawmte bawl un, sum a bei hun chianga khantawna omnaa nou a honom sak na ding un.
Kuapeuh tawmchik tunga ginom lou tuh tampi tungah leng a ginom kei nak uhi.
Sum lem tunga bawn na ginom kei uleh, kuan ahia sum tak nou honkemsak ding?
Mi danga tunga bawn na ginom kei un, noumaua kuain ahia honpe ding?
Sikha kuamahin heutu nih na a sem kop theikei, khat huain khat a deih ding, a hihkeileh, khat gumin khat a musit ding, Pathian leh sum na na sem kop theikei ding uh a chi a.
Huan, Pharisai sum deihmiten huai thu tengteng a ja ua, a nuih san uh.
Huchiin, aman, a kianguah, Mi mitmuha kisiam tangsak na hi uh, himahleh, Pathianin na lungtang uh a thei a; mihing laka a pahtawi uh Pathian mitmuhin kihhuaipi ahi ngala.
Dan leh jawlneite thu Johan hong om tannin a oma; huainung siah Pathian gam Tanchin Hoih a gen ua, michih a pawnglut uhi.
Himahleh, dan thu sut vom neu chik leng a man sangin van leh khovel amanthat a baihlamjaw ahi.
Kuapeuh ji maa, zi dang nei tuh, angkawm ahi; kuapeuh mi ji maksa nei tuh angkawm ahi.
Huan, misumhau kuahiam a oma, puan sandup leh puan mal ngat a silha, nitengin nuamsa takin a om a.
Huan, a min Lazar, khutdoh khat meimaa pumdim, a kongkhak bulah a lum a,
mi sumhau dohkana khatehnen kia khawng nek a lunggulh a; ui khawngten lah a meima a liah sak sak uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, khutdoh tuh a si a, angelten a paipih ua, Abraham angsungah a koih ua.
Mi sumhau leng a sia, vuiin a omta a.
Huan, misi khua ah gim thuakin a oma, a dak tou a, gamla pia Abraham leh a angsunga Lazar om toh, a muta a.
Huan, a kikou a, Pa Abraham, ka tungah zahngai inla, Lazar hon sawl in, a khut zungmuk tui ah diah henla, ka lei hihvotna din; hiai mei kuangah ka gim mahmah ahi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Abrahamin, Ka tapa, nang na damlaiin, na thil hoih na mu a, huchi mahbangin Lazarin thil hoihlou a muh thei tanla; himahlah tunah amah jaw hiai ah khamuang takin a oma, nang jaw gim nei ve.
Tua louleng, hiai akipana noukianga pai tumte tuh a pai theih louhna dingun leh, kuamah huaia kipana koukianga a hongkai theih louhna dingun, kou leh nou kikal ah guam thupi tak koihdenin a om hi, a chi a.
Huan, aman, A hihleh, pa, amah ka pa in ah paisak ding bekin, ka honngen ahi;
sanggam pasal nga ka nei ngala; hiai gimna mun ah a hongpai kha ding uh, phatuamngaitakin vahilh leh, a chi a.
Abrahamin bel, Mosi leh jawlneite a neive ua oi; huai mite thu ngai le uh ake, a chi a
Huan, aman, Pa Abraham, hilou e; misi laka mi hilhial a kiang uah hoh zo leh a kisik ding uh, a chi a.Huan, aman, a kiangah, Mosi leh jawlneite thu a ngaih kei un jaw, misi laka mi thou nawn mahlehleng a taksang tuankei ding uh, a chi a, a chi a.

Huan, Jesun, a nungjuite kiangah, Puknate omlou thei ahi kei; himahleh, pukna omsakpa tung a gik hi:
Hiai mi neute laka khat leng hihpuk sangin, a hihpuk ding ngawngah buh gawi janna suang ok sakin, tuipi ah khiakin omleh, amah a dingin a hoihzo ding.
Pilvang un, na unauin thil a hih khelh leh taihilh in; a kisik leh, ngaidam in.
Ni khatin na tungah sagih vei thil hihkhialin sagih vei, ka kisik, chia, nang lama a hongkihei nawn leh, na ngaidam ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, sawltakten, Toupa kiangah, Ka ginna uh khangsak in, a chi ua.
Huan, Toupan, Ankam tangkhat bang ginna na neih uleh, hiai singtheimukung kiangah, Na kibot inla, tuipi ah na kisuan in, na chi ding ua, na thu uh a mang mai ding.
Himahleh, nou lakah kuapeuhin lei letin hiam, belam chingin hiam sikha nei le uchinla, a hongvaipai takin, An honum pah aw, kua ahia nou lakah na chi ding?
Ka nek ding honbawl sak inla, puan teng inla, ka neka ka dawn zoh masiah ka nek bawl in; huai khit chiangin nang na nein na dawn nake, na lak ua kua ahia na chi zo lou ding?
Na thu bang ua a hih jiakin na sikha kiang uah kipah thu na gen ngei u hia?
Huchi mahbangin nouleng na kiang ua thupiak tengteng banga na hih nung un, Sikha phatuam lou ka hi uh; kahih ding him uh ahi ka hih uh, chi un, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Jerusalem khuaa a pai sin lai in, Samari leh Galili gam a kheng a.

Huan, aman amau a muhin, a kiang uah, Siampute kiangah vakilak un, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, a pai lai un a hongsiangthou chiat ua.

huan, a khebul ah a khupboha, a kipahthu a gena; huai mi tuh Samari mi ahi a.
Huchiin, Jesun a dawnga, Mi sawm hong siangta hilou na hi umaw? kuate koi ah?

Huan, a kiangah, Thou inla, pai in; na ginna na dampih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Pharisaiten Pathian gam hongtun hun ding a dot jiak un, a kiang uah, Pathian gam muh theihin a hongtung kei;
En un, hiai ah: hiam, Pam ah: hiam, a chi kei ding uh; ngai un, Pathian gam tuh na lak uah a om, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, nungjuite kiangah, Mihing Tapa damlai ni khawng ni khat bek na muh nop ni uh a hong om ding, himahleh na mu kei ding uh.
Huan, na kiang uah, En un, pam ah: En un, hiai ah: a honchi ding ua; pai khe kei unla, amau leng jui kei un;
vannuai lehlama khua aphiata, vannuai lehlam tanphaa a vak zel bangin Mihing Tapa a hong niin a om ding ahi ngala.
Himahleh, huai main thil tamtak a thuak ding a, tulai khangthakte deihlouhin a omding ahi.
Noa dam laia thil omdan bangin, Mihing Tapa a hongpai nawn hun chiangin a om sam ding.
Noa longa a luta, tui a hongleta, a vekua a hihlup khit ni a tun masiah, a ne un a dawn ua, ji leh tain a kinei uh.
Huchi mahbangin Lota dam laiin a hongom a; a ne un a dawn ua, a lei un a juak ua, a suan un a lam uh;
himahleh, Sodom khua a kipan Lota a pawt niin vana kipanin mei leh kat a zu a, a vek un a hihlumta.
Huchi mahbangin Mihing Tapa a hongkilak niin a om ding.
Huai niin kuamah a sum in sunga oma, amah in tunga om, vala dingin kum kei heh; loua om leng pai kei hen.
Lota ji theigige un.
Kuapeuh a hin humbitna zongin a tan dinga kuapeuh a hin tanin a humbit ding.
Ka hon hilh ahi, huai janin lupna khatah mi nih a om ding ua, khat lakin a om dinga, khat nutsiatin a om ding.
Numei nih buh gawi janin a om ding ua, khat lakin a om dia, khat nutsiatin a om ding.
Pasal nih lou ah a om ding ua; khat lakin a om dia; khat nutsiatin a om ding, a chi a.Huan, amau, a kiangah, Toupa, koiah eita? a chi ua, a dong ua.

Huan, amau, a kiangah, Toupa, koiah eita? a chi ua, a dong ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Saluang omna peuhah musane leng a kikhawm ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, lungke louin a thum gige ding uh ahi chih theihna dingin akiang uah gentehna a gen a:
Koilai khua hiamah thukhenmi khat a oma, huai min Pathian a lau keia, mihing leng a khawksa kei;
huan, huai khuaah meithai khat a oma; aman, Ka lang tungah phu honlaksak in, chiin, a kiangah a hoh zihzeh a.
Huan, amah tuh sawt khop a ut keia; himahleh, a nungin a lungsimin, Pathian lau louin mihing khawksa kei mah leng;
hiai meithaiin honhihbuai jiakin a phu ka lak sak mai ding, huchilouin jaw, a hong zihzeh leh a honhih gim ek kha ding, a chi a.
Huan, Toupa mahin, Thukhenmi diktatlou thugen ja un.
A tunguah dohzou tadih mahleh leng a mitel, a sun a jana amah samte phu tuh Pathianin a lak sak kei dia hia?
Ka honhilh ahi, a phu uh a lak sak pah ding.
Himahleh Mihing Tapa a hongpai hun chiangin leitungah tuabang ginna a honmu nadiam? a chi a.
Huan, mi diktat hih kigingta a, mi dang tengteng musit kuate hiam kiangah hiai gentehna thu leng a gen a:
Mi nih Pathian biakin ah thum dingin a hoh tou ua; khat tuh Pharisai ahi a, khat tuh siahkhonmi ahi.
Pharisai tuh a dinga, amah kiain hichibangin a thum a: Pathian, mi dang, a negute, dikloute, angkawmte bang ka hih louh jiak leh, hiai siahkhonmi bang leng ka hih louh jiakin na tungah ka kipak hi.
Nipikal khat tengin nihvei an ka ngawl jel; ka neih teng sawm ah khat ka pe jela, a chi a.
Siahkhonmin bel gamla taka dingin, van lam leng a dak ngam keia, Pathian, kei mi khial, ka tungah zahngai in, chiin, a awm a kitum a.
Ka honhilh ahi, a masa sangin huai mipen tuh siam tangin a in ah a pai kheta.
Kingaithupi peuh a niam ding ua, kingainiam tuh pahtawiin a om ding, a chi a.
Huan, a khoih dingin a kiangah a naungekte uh a honpi ua; nungjuiten bel huai a muh tak un a natai ua.
Himahleh, Jesun amau a sama, Naupang neute ka kiangah honpai sak unla, kham kei un, Pathian gam huchibang mite a ahi ngala.
Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Kuapeuh Pathian gam naupang neuin a kipahpih banga kipahpih lou tuh a sungah alut keihial ding, a chi a.
Huan, vaihawmmi kuahiamin, a kiangah, Sinsakpa hoih, khantawn hinna tanna dingin bang ka hih dia? chiin, a donga.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Bangdia hoih honchi? mi khat kia ngallou kuamah hoih a om kei, huai tuh Pathian ahi.
Thupiakte na thei vo oi, Angkawm ken, Tualthat ken, Gu ken, Hek ken, Na nu leh pa pahtawi in, chihte, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Huai thu tengteng ka naupan chik a kipan ka jui jel, achia.
Huan, Jesun huai a jakin a kiangah, Tuin leng thil khat na sam hi; na neih tengteng juak inla, tagahte kiangah hawm in, huchiin vanah gou na nei ding; huan, hongpai inla, honjui in, a chi a.
Aman bel, huai thute a jakin a lungkham mahmah a, a hauh mahmah jiakin.
Huchiin, Jesun amah tuh a ena, Sum haute Pathian gama lut haksa na e:
Mi sumhau Pathian gama lut sangin sangawngsau phim bila lut suak a nuam jaw ahi, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu zaten, Huchi a hihin kua hotdamin a om thei dia? a chi ua.
Aman tuh, Mihing hih vual louh Pathian hih theih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Peterin, ngai in, kou ka in uh leh lou pai sanin kon jui ua, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Chih taktakin ka honhilh ahi, Kuapeuh Pathian gam jiaka, in hiam, ji hiam, unaute hiam, nu le pa hiam, tate hiam paisan photphot,
tu dam sung mahmahin a sanga tam jaw mu lou ding kuamah a om kei, hun hongtung lai dinga khantawna hinna toh, a chi a.
Huan, sawm leh nihte a kiangah api tuama, a kiang uah, Ngai un, Jerusalem khua a hoh tou ding i hi ua; jawlneite thu gelh tengteng Mihing Tapa tungah a tung ding.
Jentelte kiangah piakin a om ding a, nuihzabawlna din a zang ding uh, zumhuai takin a bawl ding ua, chil a siat ding uh;
Huan, a vo ding ua, a hihlum ding uh; huan, ni thum niin a thou nawn ding, a chi a.
Huan, huai thute himhim a theisiam kei ua, a thu gen tuh a lak uah selin a oma, bang gen ahia chih leng a theikei uh.

huai min tuh mipi pai ging a ja a, bangchi thu a hitaa chih a donga.
Huan amau, Nazaret Jesu a pai ahi chih a hilh ua.
Huchiin, aman, Jesu, David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai in, chiin, a kikou a.
Huan, a masaten dai dingin a tai ua, himahleh, David Tapa, honhehpih in, chiin, a kinak kou semsem a.

huan, a kiang a hongtun in, Na tungah bangchia ka hih ahia na deih? a chi a, a na donga.
Huan, aman, Toupa, muh theih ka ut, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Mu thei ta in, na ginna na dampih ahi, a chi a.Huan, thakhatin a mu thei pahtaa, Pathian phat kawm jelin amah a juita a; huan, mi tengtengin, huai a muh un, Pathian a phat uh.

Huan, Jesu Jeriko khua ah a luta, pai suak din a kisa a.
Huan, ngai in, mi khat a min Zakai a om a; huai mi tuh siahkhon heutu ahi a, amah leng a hau ngiala.
Huan, Jesu mi bangchi bang hiam chih, muh a tuma; amah lah a niam ngala, mipi jiakin, a mu theikei a.
Huchiin, a matai a, a en dingin theipi kung ah a kaha; huai lampi tuh a hontot ding ahi ngala.

Huan, a lakua kuahiamin Siampu Lianpen sikha a sata, a bil taklam a sat khiak saka.
Huan, Jesun, Hih nawn ken, a chi a.
Huan, a bil tuh a khoiha, a hihdamta hi.
Huan, Jesun, a kianga hong siampu liante Pathian biakin heutute leh upate kiangah, Temsau khawng, khetbuk khawng keng in, suamhat man ding bang hialin na hong pawt uh ahi maw?
Pathian biakina na kiang ua ni tenga ka om lai khawnga honmat tumin non sawk ngal kei ua; himahleh tu na tat hun uh ahi, mial thuneihna toh, a chi a.
Huan, a man ua, a pi ua, Siampu Lianpen in ah a pi lut tau a.
Huan, Peterin gamlapia kipanin a juia.

Huan, Pilatin huai a jakin, huai mi tuh Galili gama mi a hih leh hih louh a donga.

Nathanaelin a kiangah, Nang bang chidana honthei na hia? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Philipin nang honsap ma a, theipi bula na om laiin, ka honmu hi a chi a, a dawnga.
Nathanaelin a kiangah, Rabbi, Pathian Tapa na hi, Israelte kumpipa na hi, chiin, a dawnga.
Jesun a kiangah, Theipi bula nang ka honmu hi, na kianga ka chih jiakin na gingta ahi maw?
Hiaite sanga thil thupi jaw na mu lai ding, a chi a, a dawnga.Huan, Jesu mahin a kiangah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, van kihonga, Pathian angelte Mihing Tapa tunga kah leh kum na mu ding, a chi a.

Huan, ni thum niin, Galili gama Kana khua ah kitenna a om a, huai ah Jesu nu a om hi.
Jesu leh a nungjuite leng kitenna ah achial ua.
Huan, uain a beita a, Jesu nun a kiangah, Uain a tasamta u e, a chi a.
Huan, Jesuin a kiangah, Numei, nang non na theisak ding bang ahia om! ka hun a tungnai kei hi, a chi a.
Huan, a nun sikhate kiangah, Na kiang ua a gen peuhmah hih jel un, a chi a.
Huan, Jadate silsiang dan bangin suang tuibel guk, buk sawmli mun nih hiam, mun thum hiam ta chiat, huaiah a tung uhi.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Tuibelte tuiin dimsak un, a chi a.
Huan, a gong toh kikimin a dimsak chiat ua.
Huan, a kiang uah, Tuiin dim unla, nekbawl thusa kiangah paipih un, achia.
Huan, a paipih ta uhi.
Huan, nekbawl thusain, tui uain a hong suakta tuh achiama, a hongkipatna lam a theikei a, (tui dim sikhaten lah a thei ua), zi nei dingpa a samta a, a kiangah,
Mi chihin a tungin uain hoih deuh a hawm jel ua, a tamdeuh a dawn nungun, a hoihlou deuh a hawm uh; nang bel tutanin uain hoih na nakem lailaia, a chi a.
Jesun hiai a thillamdang hihpatna tuh Galili gam Kana khuaa a hih ahi; a thupidan a langsakta a; huan, a nungjuiten amah tuh a gingta uhi.

Huan, Jadate paikan Ankuangluina a naita a, Jesu Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou ta a.
Huan, Pathian biakina bawng khawng, belam khawng, vakhu khawng juak leh, dangka khengte tu a mu a.

huan, vakhu juakte kiangah, Hiai thilte hiai lai akipanin pai pih un, ka Pa in sumsinna in dingin bawl kei un, a chi a.
Huan, Na ina ka phatuamngaihnain a hon gai ding, chih gelh ahi chih, a nungjuiten a thei nawnta uhi.

Huan, Judaten, Hiai in kum sawmli leh guk lam ahi, nang ni thum sungin na tung ding ding maw? a chi ua.
Himahleh a sapum in thu gen ahi zo ngala.
Huai jiakin, misi laka kipana a thoh nawnin, huai thu tuh a genta chih a nungjuiten a thei nawnta ua; huan, laisiangthou thu Jesu thugen tuh a gingta uhi.
Huan, Paikan Ankuangluinaa, Jerusalem khuaa a om laiin, a thillam dang hihte a mu ua, mi tampiin a min a gingta ta uhi.
Himahleh, Jesu tuh a lak uah a kikangkoiha, mi tengteng a theia,mihing thu kuamah hilh chet a kiphamoh louh jiakin; Amah mahin mihing sunga om peuhmah tuh a thei ngala.

Huan, pharisaite laka mi, a min Nikodem, judate vaihawmpa khat a oma,
Huai mi tuh janin Jesu kiangah a honga, a kiangah, Rabbi, Pathiana kipana hongpai sinsakpa na hi chih ka thei uhi.
Pathian a kianga a om keiin hiai thil lamdang na hih bang kuamahin a hih theikei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Mi kuapeuh a pian thak kei aleh Pathian gam a mu theikei, a chi a.
Nikodemin a kiangah, Mi a tek nungin bang chin a piang thei dia?
A nu gila nihvei lutin a piang thei dia hia? a chi a.
Jesun a dawnga, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, kuapeuhmah tuia leh Khaa piang ahih kei leh Pathian gam a lut theikei.
Sa suan peuhmah sa ahi a, Kha suan peuhmah kha ahi.
Na pianthak ngeingei ding ahi konchih lamdang sa ken.
Huih a utnana ah a nunga, a ging na ja hi, himahleh koia kipana hongpai ahia, koiah ahia a hoh ding chihleng na thei ngal keia; kuapeuh Khaa piang tuh huchibang mahin a om hi, a chi a.
Huan, Nikodemin a dawnga, a kiangah, Hiai bangchin a om thei dia? a chi a.
Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Israelte sinsakpa na hi ngala, huaite na theikei maw?
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, kou ka theih uh ka gen ua, ka muh uh ka theisak uh; himahleh, ka thu theihsak uh na sang ngal kei uhi.
Khovela thil ka honhilh bawn ging louten, vana thil honhilh leng bang chin na taksang ding ua?
Van ah kuamah a kah ngei kei a, van akipana hongsukpa kia loungal, Mihing Tapa vana ompa tuh.
Huan, Mosiin gamdaia gul a khaikang bangin, Mihing Tapa khai kangin a om ding ahi;
kuapeuh a gingtain amah jiaka khantawna hinna a neihna dingin.
Banghanghiam chih leh, Pathianin khovel a it mahmah a, huchin a Tapa tang neihsun a pia hi, huchia kuapeuh amah gingta tuh a man that louh a, khantawna hinna a neih jawkna dingin.
Khovel siam louh tangsak dingin Pathianin Tapa khovel ah a sawl kei, khovel amah vanga a hin theihna ding in a sawl ahi jaw hi.
Kuapeuh amah gingta tuh siam louhin a om kei ding a, kuapeuh a gingta lou tuh, tu a patin siam louhin a om pah ngal hi, Pathian Tapa tang neih sun min a gintak louh jiakin.
Hiai tuh siam louhna ahi, vak khovel ah a honga, himahleh min vak sangin mial a it jaw uh, a thilhihte uh a gitlouh jiakin.
Kuapeuh thil gilou hih in vak a ho nak, vakah leng a hongpai kei hi; huchi lou in jaw a thilhihte a lang kha ding.
Ahihhangin, kuapeuh a dik hih tuh a thilhihte Pathian jiaka hih a ahi chih a latna dingin, vakah a hong jel hi, a chi a.
Huai khitin Jesu a nungjuite toh Judia gamah a hoh ua, huaiah Jesu a kiang uah a om nilouh a, a baptis jel hi.
Johan inleng Ainon ah, Salim kho kiangah a baptis sama, huaia tui a tam jiakin; huan, mi a hong ua, baptisma a tang duamduam uhi.
Huchihlaiin Johan suangkulh ah a khum nai ngal kei ua.
Huan, Johan nungjuite leh Juda khat, silsiang thu ah a na kisel ua.

Johanin a dawng a, Mihingin bangmah a nei theikei uh, vana mi piak a hih kei leh.
Kei Kris ka hi kei hi, a maa mi sawl ka hi, ka chih, noumau mahmah hontheihpihte na hi uhi.
Mou neipa tuh mou pasal ahi; himahleh, mouneipa lawm dinga a thu ja tuh, mouneipa aw jiakin a kipak mahmah a; en un ka kipahna a tungta ahi.
Amah a lian semsem dinga, kei bel ka kiam semsem ding hi.
Tung lama kipana hongpai jaw mi tengteng sanga tungnungpen ahi; leia kipan bel leia ahi a, lei thu a gen nak, vana kipana hongpaipa jaw mi tengteng sanga tungnungpen ahi.
A muh leh a jak peuh a theisak jel ahi; kuamahin a thu theihsak a taksang kei uh.
A thu theihsak taksangin, Pathian mi diktat ahi, chih a kipsak hi.
Pathian sawlin Pathian thu a gen hi; aman jaw teh chitchiatin Kha a pe ngal keia.
Pan Tapa a it a, a khutah bangkim a vekin a peta hi.Kuapeuh Tapa gingtain khantawna hinna a nei; himahleh, Tapa thu manglouin hinna a neikei ding a, Pathian hehna a tungah a om jaw hi, a chi a.

Judia gam a paisan a, Galili gamah a kik nawnta hi.
Huchiin Samari gam a kantan ding ahi a.

Jakob tuileh leng huaiah a om hi.
Huchiin, Jesu a pai gim jiakin tuileh geiah a tu a; sunannek hun khawng ahi a.
Huan, Samari numei khat tui tawiin a hongkuan a, Jesun a kiangah, Dawnding honpia in, a chi a.
A nungjuite lah nek ding leiin khua ah a hohta ngal ua.

Judaten Samari mite bangmahin a zang ngei ngal kei ua.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Pathian thilpiak leh, Dawn ding honpia in, na kianga chipa thei le tehjaw, nang a kianga ngen zota ding china, huchia aman tui hing honpe ta ding hi a, a chi a.
Huan, numeiin a kiangah, Pu, suahna ding bangmah lah na neikeia, tuileh a thukthuk toh, koia kipanin ahia huai tui hing na muh?
Ka pu uh Jakob sangin na thupijaw ahia?
Aman hiai tuileh honpia a, aman leng a dawna, a tate, a ganten leng, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Kuapeuh hiai tui dawn a dangtak nawn ding uh;
Kuapeuh a kianga ka piak ding tui dawn bel, a dangtak ngei kei ding; ken a kiang a tui ka piak ding tuh amah ah tuinak a honghi dinga, khantawn hin phain a kikhohtou ding, a chi a.
Huan, numeiin a kiangah, Pu, huai tui honpe ve, ka dangtak nawn louhna ding leh, hiai tantana tui tawi dinga ka hongkuan louhna din, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Na pasal va sam inla, hiaiah hongkik nawn in, a chi a.

Numeiin a kiangah, Pu, jawlnei na hi chih ka theita.

Nou, Buh lakna ding kha li a om lai, na chi uh hi lou hia?
Ngai un kon hilh ahi, dak unla lou khawng en un, tu mahmahin lak dingin a min ahi.
A lapain loh a mu a, khantawn hin tana om ding in gah a la, huchia a tuhpa leh a lapa a kipah tuak theihna dingun.
Khatin a tuha, midang in a la hi, chih thu, huai ah a dik ngel hi.
Na sep gim louh uh at dia honsawl ka hi; mi dangin a sem ua, nou a sepsa uh na sunzom uh ahi, a chi a.

Huan, ni nih nungin huaia kipanin a pawta.
Galili gamah a hohta a.
Jesu ngeiin, jawlnei jaw amah kho lamah pahtawiin a om ngei kei chih a theisaka.
Huchiin, Galili gam a hongtunin Galili gama miten a na kipahpih ua, Jerusalem khuaa ankuanglui laia a thilhih tengteng a muh tak jiakun; amau mah leng ankuangluina ah a hohsam ngal ua.
Huan, Galili gama Kana khua, tui uain a suahsak mun a hongtung nawnta a.

Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte na muh kei uh leh na gingta kei hial ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, upain a kiangah, Pu, ka ta sih main hongsuk tanla, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Pai nawnta mai in, na tapa damta hi, a chi a.

Huan, aman a kiang uah a dam tung lai a dong a.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Janin ni kihek lelin a khosik a daita ahi, a chi ua.
Huchiin, apan Jesun a kianga, Na tapa a damta hi, a chih lai ahi chih a theita a; huan amah leh a inkuanpihten a vek un, a gingta ta uhi.Huai tuh Jesun a thillamdang hih a nih veina ahi, Judia gam akipan Galili gama a hongin.

Huai thil nungin Judate ankuangluina a om a; Jesu Jerusalem khua ah a hoh tou a.
Huan, Jerusalem ah belam kongkhak kiangah dil a oma, huai tuh Hebru pauin Bethsaida a chi ua, inlim nga neia.
Huai ah damloute, mittawte, khebaite, jawte tampi a lum phengphung ua, tui hongtat ngakin.
Bang chiang hiamin huai dil ah angel a hoh suk a, tui a vatok a; huchiin, kuapeuh huai tui a kitoh khita valut masa penpen tuh, bangchibang natna nei hileh leng hihdamin a om jel hi.
Huan, huaiah kum sawmthum leh giat damlou mi kuahiam a om a.
Huan, Jesun a lum tuh a mu a, huchi bangin sawtpi a omta chih a thei a, a kiangah, Hihdam na ut hia? a chi a.
Huan, damloupan, Pu, tui kitohin dila honkoih ding mi ka neikei hi, ka hoh sungin mi dangin honmakhelh nak uh, achia, a dawng a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Thou inla, na awngphah la inla, khein paita in, a chi a.
Huan, thakhatin huai mi tuh a dam pah a, a awngphah a la a, a paita hi.
Huai ni tuh Khawlni ahi, Huchiin Judaten a dampa kiangah, Khawlni ei ve, na awngphah na lak a siang kei, a chi ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Honhihdampa ngeingeiin ka kiangah, Na awngphah la inla, khein paita in, honchi ahi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Na awngphah la inla, khein paita in, na kianga chipa kua ahia? a chi ua, a dong ua.
Himahleh, a dampan tuh kua ahia a hih a theikei a, huaia mipi a om jiak un Jesu a paimangta ngala.
Adenchiangin Jesun amah Pathian biakin ah a mu a, a kiangah, Ngaiin, na damta hi, khial nawnta ken, huchilou injaw thil hoihlou sem na tungah a hongom kha ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, huai mi tuh a vapai khia a, Judate kiangah a hihdampa Jesu ahi chih a hilh a.
Huchiin, Khawlnia huai thil a hih jiakin Judaten Jesu a engbawl ua.
Himahleh, Jesun amau a houpiha, a kiang uah, Ka Pan tutan phain leng na asem jel hi, ken leng ka sem jel, a chi a.
Huchiin, Judaten hihlup a tum semsem ua, Khawlni a tanlouh jiak kia leng ahi keia, Pathian amah Paa a bawl a, Pathian toh ki kima a kibawl jiakin leng ahi.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Tapain amahin bangmah a hih theikei, Pa thil hih a muh kia lou ngal; thil a hih peuhmah, Tapain leng a hih sam jel ahi.
Pain Tapa a ita, a thilhih peuhmah a kiangah a musak a; hiaite sanga thilhih thupijaw a kiangah a musak ding, lamdang na sak ding un.
Pain misite a a kithou a, hinna a piak bangin, Tapa inleng a utnana kiangah hinna a pia.
Pain kuamah vai a hawm sak ngei kei, vai tengteng Tapa a hawm sak zota;
mi tengtengin Pa zahna apiak bang un, Tapa leng zahna a piakna dingun.
Kuapeuhmah Tapa zah lou ten jaw, Pa a sawlpa leng a zah kei uhi.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh ka thu ja a, honsawlpa gingtain, khantawna hinna a nei; siamlouhin a om keia, sihnaa kipan a pawta, hinna ah a lut zota ahi.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, A hun a tung dekta, tuin leng a tung lellelta, huaihun chiangin misiten Pathian Tapa aw a za ding ua, a za peuhmah a hing ding uh.
Pain amaha hinna a nei bangin, Tapa leng amaha hinna neidingin a peta hi.
Huan, Mihing Tapa a hih jiakin, a kiangah thukhenvaihawmna thu a pia hi.
Hiai khawng lamdang sa kei un, a hun a tung dekta, huai hun chiangin han a om tengtengin a aw a za ding ua, a pawt vek ding uh;
thil hoih hihte tuh hinna tangin a thou nawn ding ua, thil gilou hihte tuh siam louh tangin a thou nawn ding uh.
Keimahin bangmah ka hih theikei; bila kajak bangbangin vai ka hawm jel; ka vaihawm tuh a dik ahi, keimah thu thuin om ka tum keia, honsawlpa thuthu ja ua om ka tup jel jiakin.
Keimah tanchin theisak leng, ka thu theihsak a dik kei ding;
ka tanchin theisak mi dang ahi, aman ka tanchin a theihsak tuh a dik chih ka thei hi.
Nou Johan kiangah mi na sawl ua, huan, aman, thutak tanchin honna theisak hi.
Thu theihsak ka san tuh mihing akipan ahi chihna ahi keia; himahleh na hinna ding un hiai thu tuh ka gen ahi.
Huai Johan tuh khawnvak kuangtak leh vak tak ahi, a vakah nuamsak tak dih na ut uh.
Himahleh, theihsakna ka neihjaw Johan theihsakna thu sangin a thupi jaw ahi: Pain thil hih zoh dinga a honpiak, ka thil hih ngeiin Pain honsawl chih ka tanchin a theisak hi.
Pa honsawlpan leng ka tanchin a theisakta.
Nou chiklai mahin a aw na za ngei kei ua, a mel leng na mu ngei sam kei uh.
A thu leng noumau ah na pai kei uh, a sawlpa na gintak louh jiakun.
Laisiangthou na phat sim ua, a sunga khantawna hinna oma na gintak jiakun: huai laisiangthou tuh ka tanchin theihpihna lah ahi ngala.
Himahleh, hinna nei dingin ka kiangah na hong nuam ngal kei uh.
Mihing pahtawina ka sang kei.
Himahleh nou kon thei hi, Pathian itna noumau ah na neikei uhi.
Ka Pa minin ka honga, nouten non kipahpih kei uh: mi dang amah minin hong leh, amah na kipahpih ding uhi.
Nou kipahtawi tuahna paktate aw, bangchin na gingta thei ding ua?
Pathian tak kiaa pawt pahtawina lah na zong kei ua.
Ken Pa kianga nou kon hek ding gingta kei un: nou honhek khat a om, na muan uh Mosi ngei.
Mosi na gingta hile-uchin kei leng hongingta ta ding hi uchina; aman ka tanchin ahi a gelh.Himahleh, a thu gelh lah na gingta ngal kei ua, bangchin ka thu na gingta ding ua? a chi a.

Bang achia ka pau omdan theilou?
Ka thu na laksawn theih louh jiak uh ahi.
Nou jaw na pa uh diabol kianga pawt na hi ua, na pa uh duhgawlna hih na ut uhi.
Amah jaw a tunga kipan tualthat ahi, thutak ah a om kei, a sunga thutak himhim a om louh jiakin.
Juau thu a genin amaha ngei a gen ahi; juauthei ahi ngala, juaupa leng ahi.
Thutak ka gen jiakin nou hon gingta lou na hi uhi.
Na lak uah kuan ahia gilou lamah siamlouh hontan thei om?
Thutak ka genin leng nou bang achia hon gingta lou?
Pathian apan pawtin, Pathian thu a pakta nak a; hiaijiakin na pakta kei uhi, Pathian apan pawt na hih louh jiakun, a chi a.
Huan, Judaten a kiangah, Samari mi dawi jawl na hi ka chi uh, ka chi dik ngel kei umaw? a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Jesun, Dawi jawl ka hi kei hi; ka Pa kapahtawi ahi jaw, nou ka min hihsia neive ua.
Himahleh, keimah kilawmna zong ka hi kei; a zongmi leh a ngaihtuahmi khat a om ahi.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, min ka thu a zop leh khantawnin sih ni mel a mu kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Judaten a kiangah, Dawi jawl na hi chih tuin ka theita uh.
Abraham a sita, jawlneite toh, nang.
Min ka thu a zop leh, khantawnin sihna achiam kei ding, na chi ngala.
Ka pu uh Abraham sangin na thupijaw ahia? amah leng a sita a, jawlneite leng a sita uh; kuaa kibawl na hia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, Keimah kipahtawi leng ka kilawmna bangding mah ahi kei; ka Pathian uh, na chih uh ka Pa, hon pahtawipa ahi; nou amah na thei ngal kei uhi;
ken jaw amah ka thei; Amah ka theikei, chileng, noumau bang a juau thei mah ka hi ding: huchiin amah ka theia, a thu leng ka jui jel hi.
Na pu uh Abraham, ka ni mu ding a hih jiakin a nuam mahmah a, huan, a mu pet maha, a kipak mahmah hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Judaten a kiangah, Nang kum sawmnga leng hi nai lou piin, Abaham na mu ahia? a chi ua.
Jesun a kianguah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Abraham om main leng ka om, a chi a.Huchiin a denna dingin suang a tawm ua; himahleh Jesu a bu a, Pathian biakin a kipan a pawtta.
Huchiin a denna dingin suang a tawm ua; himahleh Jesu a bu a, Pathian biakin a kipan a pawtta.
Huan, Jesun a pai kawmin a pian tunga kipan mittaw khat a mu a.
Huan, a nungjuiten a kiangah, Rabbi, mitto saa a pian kuan ahia thil hihkhial, hia mi hia, a nu leh a pan? a chi ua, a dong ua.
Jesun, Hiai min a hih khial kei, a nu leh a pan leng a hihkhail kei uh; Pathian nasepte a tung a latna ding ahi jaw.
Sun a hihlaiin honsawlpa na I sep ding uhi; jan hi dekdekta ahi, huai hun chiangin kuamahin na a sem theikei ding uh.
Khovela ka om sungin khovel vak ka hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huchibanga a gen khitin, leiah chil a sia a, chilin tungman a bawla, huan tungman tuh a mit ah a nuha, huan, a kiangah, Siloam dil ah vasil in, a chi a.
(Siloam tuh, Sawl, chihna a hi)
Huan, avapaia, a sila, mitvakin a hongkik nawnta hi.
Huchiin, a vengte leh tumaa khutdoha mumuten, Hiai mi tu kawma khutdoh dohpa ahi ka hia? a chi ua.
Midangin, Amah ahi vo oi, a chi ua.
Midangin, A hi kei, a kibatpih ahi jaw, a chi ua.
Aman, Huai amah ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Na mit bangchin ahia a hong vak? a chi ua.

Huan, amau a kiangah, Amah kaw om ahia? a chi ua.
Aman, Ka theikei, a chi a.
Huai maa mittopa tuh Pharisaite kiangah a honpi ua.
Jesun tungman a bawla, a mit a hihvak ni Khawlni ahi a.
Huchiin, Pharisaiten a mit a hongvak takdan a dong nawn ua.
Aman a kiang uah, Ka mit ah tungman a koiha, ka sil, ka mu theita maimah hi, a chi a.
Huan, Pharisai khenkhatin, Huai mi tuh Khawlni a tan louh jiakin, Pathiana kipan ahi kei, a chi ua.
Khenkhatin bel, Mi khialin bangchin hichi bang thillamdang a hih thei dia? a chi ua.
Huan, a kikhen ua, a kilangta uh.
Huan, mittopa kiangah, Na mit a hihvak, nang bangchi bangin amah na ngaihtuah? a chi nawn ua.
Huan, aman, Jawlnei ahi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Judaten a mit hongvak ta nu leh pa a sap masiah uh, mittaw a nahi hima, a mit a hongvakta chih, a tungtang thu a taksang kei uh.
Huan, a nu leh a pa kiangah, Hiai mi, na tapa uh mitto saa piang ahi na chih uh ahi hia?
Bangchin ahia tua a muh theih tak?
Chiin a dong ua.
Huan, a nu leh a pan.
Hiai tuh ka tapa uh ahi chih ka thei uh, mitto sain a piang chih leng ka thei uh;
himahleh, bangchin ahia tua honmuh theih tak chih ka theikei uh, a mit hihvakpa leng ka thei sam kei uh; amah dong un; piching a hina; amah thu aman gen leh ake, a chi ua, a dawng uh.
Judate a kihtak jiak un a nu leh a pan tuh huai thute a gen uhi; Judaten, huai ma himin leng, Amah jaw Kris ahi, chia gum a om leh, kikhopna in a nong ding chih a lemsa chit ngal ua.
Huai jiakin ahi, a nu leh a pan, Piching ahi, amah dong un, a chih uh.
Huchiin, mittopa a sam nawn ua, a kiangah, Pathian phatin hiai mi jaw mi khial ahi chih ka thei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Mi khial ahi hia hi lou ka theikei, thu khat ka thei, tumain ka mit a taw a, tuin ka mu theita hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, amau a kiang ah, Na tungah bangchin ahia a hih?
Na mit bangchin ahia a hihvak? a chi ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Denin kon hilhta a ka, na thei nuam ngal kei ua; bang achia thei nuam nawn na hi ua?
Nou leng a nungjuite hihsam na ut ua hia?
Chiin, a dawng a.
Huan, amau atai ua, Nang amah nungjui na hi, kou jaw Mosi nungjuite ka hi uh.
Pathianin Mosi a houpih chih ka thei uh, hiai mi phiangsan koia hongkipan ahia ka theihsak kei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, huai min a kiang uah, Huaipen tak ahi, a lamdanna, koia hongkipan ahia na theih louh uh, kamit lah a hihvak ngei ngala.
Pathianin mi khial thu a ngaikhe kei nak chih I thei uh; himahleh, kuapeuhin Pathian a limsaka, a deihlam a hih leh, Pathianin amah a ngaikhe nak hi.
Khovel om tunga kipan kuaman mitto saa piang mit a hihvak nawn chih a kithei ngei kei.
Hiai mi Pathian kianga pawt a hih keileh, bangmah a hih theikei ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Nang khial lumleta piang naka, nang non hilh vial maw? a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huchiin, amah tuh a delhkhe ta uh.

Huan, aman, Pu, amah kua ahia, ka gintak theihna din? a chi a, a dawnga.
Jesun a kiangah, Amah na mu khinta a, nang honhoupihpa ahi, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Toupa, ka gingta hi, a chi a, amah a bia a.
Huan, Jesun, Thukhen dingin hiai khovel ah hong ka hi, mittawte a mit uh a hong vakna ding leh, mitvakte a mit uh a hongtawtna dingin, a chi a.

Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh belam huanga kongkhaka lut lou a, lam danga kah lut, huai mi mah tuh guta leh suamhat ahi.
Kuapeuh kongkhaka lut tuh, belam chingpa ahi.
Kongkhak ngakpan amah a na honsak a; belamten a aw a ja uh; aman belamte a min un a sam chiat a, a pi khe jel hi.
Amaha tengteng a pawt sak takin, ama uh a kaia, belamten amah a juijel uh, a aw a thei ngal ua.
Midang jaw a jui kei ding uh, a tai mangsan zo ding uh; mi dangte aw jaw a theih louh jiakun, a chi a.
Hiai gentehna thu tuh Jesun a kiang uah a gen hi; himahleh, bang thu ahia a kiang ua a gen chih a theikei uhi.
Huchiin, Jesun a kiang uah a gen nawna, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, kei belam kongkhak ka hi.
Ka maa hongpai tengteng gutate; suamhatte ahi vek uh; himahleh, belamten a thu uh a ngaihsak kei uhi.
Kei kongkhak ka hi; keimaha mi a lut leh, humbitin a om dinga, a lutin a pawt dinga, nek ding leng a mu ding hi.
Guta jaw, gu ding leh hihlum ding leh hihse ding louin a hongpai kei; kei jaw hinna a neihna ding ua, tampitaka a neihna ding ua, hong ka hi.
Kei belamchingpa hoih ka hi; belamchingpa hoihin belamte din a hinna a pe nak hi.
Kiloh, belamchingpa tak hilou, belamte amaha hilouin, ngia hongpai a muhin belamte a taisan nak; huan, ngiain amau tuh a keia, huchiin a hihdalh hi.
Kiloh ahia, belamte adinga deihsakna himhim a neih louh jiakin a tai mang nak ahi.
Kei jaw belamchingpa hoih ka hi;
Pa in a hontheih leh ken Pa ka theih bangin keia ka thei hi, keia in leng honthei hi; huan, belamte din ka hinna ka pia.
Huan, hiai belam huanga lou, belam dangte ka nei; amau leng ka honpi ding, ka aw leng a za ding ua; huchiin hon khatin a om ding ua, a chingpa khat toh.
Hiai jiakin Pain kei honit ahi; lak nawn dinga ka hinna ka piak ding jiakin.
Kuamahin honlaksak kei ding, keimah thuthuin ka pe zo ding ahi.
Pe thei ka hi a la nawn thei leng ka hi.

A khenin, Hiai thu khawng dawi jawl thu hi kei e.

Jesun a kianguah, Ka honhilhta hi, na gingta tuan kei uh; ka Pa mina thil ka hih, hiaiten ka tanchin a theisak uhi.
Himahleh, na gingta ngal kei uh, ka belam laka mi na hih louh jiak un.
Ka belamten ka aw a ja uh, ken leng amau ka theia, amau a honjui jel uhi;
a kiang uah khantawna hinna ka pia; khantawnin a mangthang kei ding ua, kuamahin ka khut a kipan honsut sam kei ding.

Jesun a kianguah, Na Dan laibu uah, Pathiante na hi uh, ka chi, chih gelh ahi ka hia?

Pathian Tapa ka hi, ka chih jiakin, Pain a seha, khovela a sawlpa kiangah, Pathian na gensia, na chi uh ahi maw?
Ka Pa nasem ka hih kei leh, hon gingta kei un.

Huchiin, amah mat a tum nawn ua, himahleh a khut ua kipan a suaktata.

huchiin a sanggampa uh sih tunga khamuangsak dingin Judate tampi Martha leh Mari kiangah a hong ua.

Jesun, Suang hem un, a chi a.

Huan, Jesu a vandak a, Pa ka thu na ngaih khiak jiakin na tungah ka kipak hi.

himahleh, a khen Pharisaite kiangah a vahoh ua, a kianguah Jesu thilhihte a vahilh uh.

Hiai miin thillamdang tampi a hih ngala.

Huan, a lak ua mi khat Kaiaphain, huai kuma Siampu Lianpen ahi a, a kiang uah, Nou bangmah theikei uteh.
i chi tengteng manthat louhna dingin mi tengteng sika mi khat sih, nou a din a hoih chih leng na ngaihtuah kei uh, a chi a.
Huai thu tuh amah phuah tawmin a gen kei, huai kumin Siampu Lianpen ahi a, a chite uh sika Jesu a sih ding a genkhol ahi jaw hi.
Huai chite sik kia ahi keia, Pathian ta khovela dalhte tengteng pawl khata a pi khawmna dingin leng ahi sam hi.
Huchiin, huai ni akipan amah hihlum dingin a kihou jel uh.
Huaijiakin Jesu Judate lakah a langin a vak nawnta keia, huaia kipanin gamdai jul lama kho khat Ephraim a chih uah a vahoh zota hi; huaiah nugjuite toh a om nilouh ta uhi.
Huan, Judate Paikan Ankuangluina a naita a, mi tampi kisiangsak dingin, gam apat, Paikan Ankuanglui main, Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou ua.
Huchiin, Jesu a zong ua, Pathian biakin ah ding kawmin a kihou ua, Bang ahia na gintak uh?
Ankuangluina ah a hongkei ding maw? a kichi ua.Siampu liante leh Pharisaiten amah amat theihna ding un kuapeuhin a omna a theih uleh amaute theihsak ding thu a peta uhi.

Huan, Paikan Ankuangluina ding ni guk a om nalai a, Jesun misi laka kipana a kaihthoh Lazar omna Bethani khua a hongtung a.
Huan, huaiah amaha din nitakan a bawl ua, Marthain nek a bawl hi, Lazar bel a ankuang umpih khat ahi a.
Huan, Mariin buk kimkhat spiknardi that namtui manpha tak a hontawia, Jesu khete a nuih a, a samin a khete a nula, huchiin huai thau gimin in tuh a dimta hi.
Himahleh, Iskariot, Juda, a nungjui khat, a mansak dingpan,
Hiai thau namtui bangdia makhai zathuma juaka mi gentheite kianga pe zolou uh ahia? a chi a.
Mi gentheite a khotuah jiaka huai theu gen ahi kei; guta ahi a, dangka ip a kem a, a sunga koih a lak jel jiak ahi jaw.
Huan, Jesun, Hih hen aw.
Ka kivui ni-a dinga a sit a zang ahi, sen hen aw.
Mi gentheite na kiang ua om gige ahi ua, kei bel na kiang ua om gige ding ka hi kei, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu huaiah a om chih Juda mipi vantangin a na theita ua; huan, a hong ua, Jesu jiak kia hi louin, misi laka kipan a kaihthoh, Lazar mah leng a muh nop jiak uh ahi.
Huan, siampu liante Lazar leng hihlum dingin a kikou ua;
amah jiaka Judate tampiin a langkai san ua, Jesun a gintak jiakun.
A jingin, ankuangluinaa hong mipi tampiin, Jesu Jerusalem khua ah a hong ding chih a jak un,
tum nahte a tawi ua, a dawn dingin a vapawt ua, Hosanna, Toupa mina Israelte Kumpipa hongpai a hampha e, chiin, a kikou ua.
Huan, Jesun sabengtung nou a mu a, a tungah a tuang a.
Lau ken, Zion tanu; en in, na Kumpipa, sabengtung nou tunga tuangin, a hongding, chih gelh bangin.
Huai thute a tungin a nungjuiten a theisiam keu ua; himahleh, Jesu pahtawia a om nungin, a tanchin ah huai thu gelh ahi chih leh, a tungah huai thilte a na hih ngei uh chih a theita ua.
Huan, Lazar hana kipana a sapkhiakpa, misi laka kipan a kaihthoh laia a kianga mipi omten, a thu a theihpih uhi.
Huaijiakin ahi, mipiten leng amah a vadawn uh, huai thillamdang a hih chih a thei ngal ua.
Huchiin, Pharisaiten, Thei un, bangmah na hih theih louh uh, en un, khovelin amah a juita hi, a kichi ua.
Huan, ankuangluinaa Pathian be dinga hohtoute lakah Grik kuate hiam a om ua;
huan huaite Galili gama Bethsaida khuaa mi Philip kiangah a hong ua, a kiangah, Pu, Jesu mu nuam ung, a chi ua, a thum un.
Philipin Andru a honghilha; huan, Andru leh Philipin Jesu a honghilh uh.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa pahtawia a omna ding hun a tungta.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Buh tang leia a kiak a, a sih kei leh, amah kiain a om tawntung hi; a sihin bel, tampiin a gah nak hi.
Kuapeuh a hinna itin a magsak a; kuapeuh hiai khovela a hinna ngaineuin khantawna hinna ah a vom gige ahi.
Kuapeuhin ka na a sep leh honjui hen; ka omna ah ka nasempa leng a om ding hi; kuapeuhin ka na a sep leh Pain amah a pahtawi ding hi.
Tun ah ka kha a mangbang hi; bang ka gen dia?
Pa, hiai hun lakah honhondam in, ka chi dia hia?
Chi lou e.
Hiai dinga tu tana na om hiing a.
Pa na min pahtawi in, a chi a.
Huchiin vana kipanin aw hongsuaka, Ka pahtawita, ka pahtawi lai ding achia a.
Huan, mipi a kianga dingten huai a ja ua, Vanpi ging ahi, a chi ua; midangten, Angelin amah a houpih ahi, a chi ua.
Jesun a dawnga, Huai aw keia dia hongsuak ahi kei, noumaua ding ahi jaw.
Tu tuh hiai khovel vaihawmsakna hun ahi; tuin hiai khovel lal paih khiak ahi ding.
Huan, leia kipana khai kanga ka om leh, mi tengteng kei mah kiangah ka hip ding, a chi a.
Huai thu tuh a sih dingdan theihsakna dia a gen ahi.
Huan, mipin a kiangah, Kris khantawnin a om ding chih dan bu ah ka thei uh, Nang, Mihing Tapa khaikanga om ding ahi, bangchi chiha chi na hia?
Huai Mihing Tapa tuh kua ahia? a chi ua, adawng ua.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Vak na lak uah sawt lou a omtadih hi.
Vak na neih lai un vak ah khosa un, huchilouin jaw mialin honlap ding hi.
Kuapeuh miala khosain a paina a theikei.
Vak na neih lai un vak gingta un, vak tate na honghih theihna dingun, a chi a.
Huai thute Jesun a gena; huan, apaia, amuh louh dingun a buta.
A ma uah huchi tela tam thillamdang hih mahleh, amah a gingta tuan kei ua:
Toupa, ka thu gen uh kuan ahia gingta?
Toupa khut leng kua kiangah ahia latsaka a om? chih jawlnei Isai thugen a tun na dingin.
Hiai jiakin ahi a gintak theih louh uh, Isaiin.
Aman a mit uh a hihtaw a, a lung tang uh a hihkhauh a; huchilou injaw a mit un a mu khading ua, a lungtang un a thei kha ding uh, huan, hongkihei nawn khading ua, ken amau ka hihdam khading hi, chih, a gen nawn jiakin.
Isaiin a thupina a muh leh a tanchin thu agen jiakin huai thu a gen hi.
Himahleh, heutute laka nangawn tampiin Jesu a gingta ua; a hihhangin Pharisaite jiakin a kipulak nuam kei uh, huchilou injaw kikhopna in ah a nong kha ding uh:
Pathian pahtawina sangin mihing pahtawina a deih zo ngal ua.
Huan, Jesu a kikou a, Kuapeuh hon gingta tuh kei gingta ahi kei, honsawlpa gingta ahi jaw.
Kuapeuh kei hon mu tuh honsawlpa mu ahi.
Vak dia khovela hong ka hi a, kuapeuh kei hon gingta tuh miala a om louhna ding in.
Kuapeuh ka thu gen jain, gingta kei mahleh, ken siam louh ka tangsak kei: khovel siam louh tangsak dinga hong ka hi kei a, khovel humbit dinga hong ka hi zo ngala.
Kuapeuh kei hondeih lou a, ka thu gente pom louin, siamlouh tangsak khat a nei ahi, ka thu gen, huai thu mahmahin, ni tawpni chiah amah siamlouh a tang sak ding hi.
Keimah phuahtawmin ka gen ngal keia; Pa honsawlpan ka gen ding leh ka hih ding thu a honpe jaw ahi.Amah thupiak khantawna hinna ahi chih ka thei; huaijiakin thu ka gen, Pa honhilh bang jelin ka gen ahi, a chi a.
Amah thupiak khantawna hinna ahi chih ka thei; huaijiakin thu ka gen, Pa honhilh bang jelin ka gen ahi, a chi a.
Paikan Ankuanglui kipat main, Jesun, hiai khovel nusiaa Pa kianga a pai hun hongtungta chih a theia; hiai khovel amah-ate na itkhinin a tawp phain a it hi.
Huan, nitak annek laiin, diabolin Juda Iskariot, Simon tapa lungtanga Jesu juausana-matsak lungsim a koihsak khitnungin,
Jesun, Pa-in a khut ah thil bangkim a peta chih leh Pathian akipana hongpai ahia, Pathian kianga pai ding ahi chih theigigein,
A nitakan um tuh a dinga, a puante a koiha, kinulna puan a laa, tenga.
Huan, maiphiatkuangah tui a sunga, nungjuite khe a silta a, kinulna puan a tenin a nul jel hi.
Huchiin, Simon Peter kiangah a hong a.
Aman, Toupa, nang telin ka khe na sil dia hia? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Ka thilhih tunah na theikei: himahleh tunung chiangin na thei ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Peterin a kiangah, Ka khe na sil kei hial ding, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Kon sil kei leh ka kiangah tan na neikei ding, a chi a.
Simon Peterin a kiangah, Toupa, ka khe kia hilouin, ka khut leh ka lutang leng aw, a chi a,
Jesun a kiangah, Kisil khinsa a khe lou ngal sil a kiphamoh kei, a pumpiin a siang; nou na siang uh, na vek un jaw ahi kei, a chi a.
A mansakpa ding a thei ngala; huaijiakin, Na vek un na siang kei uh, a chi ahi.
Huchiin, a khe tuh a sila, a puante a laka, a tut nawn in a kiang uah, Na tung ua ka thil hih bang chhihna ahia?
Nou Sinsakpa leh Toupa non chi ua; na chi dik uhi, ka hi ngei tak a.
Kei Toupa leh Sinsakpan, na khe uh ka sil leh, nou leng na khe uh na kisil sak ding uh ahi.
Na tung ua ka hih bangin, nou leng na hih samna ding un, hihdingdan honhilh ka hi ngala.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Sikha a pu sangin a thupizo kei; sawltak leng a sawlpa sangin a thupizo sam kei hi.
Huai thilte na theih ua, na hih uleh hampha nahi uh.
Na vek ua thu ka gen kei a; ka telte ka thei; himahleh, huai tuh, Ka tanghou nepan ka tungah a khetul a likta, chih, laisiangthou a hongtun theihna ding ahi.
Tuin a hongtun main kon hilh ahi, a hongtun hun chia kei amah ka hi chih na gintak theihna ding un.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin, kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh ka sawl kipahpih tuh, keimah honkipahpih ahi; kuapeuh kei honkipahpih tuh, honsawlpa kipahpih ahi, a chi a.
Jesun huchi banga a genkhitin, a lungsim a mangbang a, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, na lak ua mi khatin kei honmansak ding, chiin a theisakta a.
Huan, nungjuiten a chihtuampen a theikei ua, a kien chiat ua.
Huan, a nungjuite laka khat, Jesun a itpa, dohkan sikah Jesu angsung ah kingaiin a om a.
Huan, Simon Peterin huai mi kiangah, Kua thu pen ahia a gen, honhilh dih, chiin a mitmei a.
Huan, Jesu awm ngai mahin a awn pheia, a kiangah, Toupa, kuapen ahia? a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, Tanghou them ka diah saka, ka piakpa ahi ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huchiin, tanghou them a diah nungin, Iskariot, Simon tapa Juda kiangah a pai a.
Huan, tanghou them a piak nungin Setan a sungah a lutta a.
Huchiin, Jesun a kiangah, Na hih ding hih meng in, a chi a.
Huan, dohkan sika miten kuamahin bang jiaka chi ahi chih a theikei uh.
A khenin, Judain dangka ip a vom jiakin, Jesun, Ankuangluinaa dingin i thil kiphamoh peuh lei in, a chi hiam, mi gentheite kiangah banghiam piak ding, a chi hiam a sa uh.
Huan, aman tanghou them a la a, a pawt khe pah a; huai tuh jan lai ahi.
Huchiin a pawt nungin, Jesun a gen a, Tuin Mihing Tapa pahtawiin a om, huna, amah ah Pathian leng pahtawiin a om ahi.
Amaha Pathian pahtawia a om leh amah leng Pathianin amah ah a pahtwi ding, a pahtawi pah ngal ding hi.
Naute aw, sawt lou chik na kiang uah ka omlai tadih a.
Nou non zong ding uh; huan, Judate kianga, Ka paina dingah nou na hongpai theikei ding uh, chih ka gen bangin, tuin huchi mahbangin na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Thuchiam thak kon pia ahi, kiit un; ken nou kon it bangin, nou leng kiit un.
Na kiit uleh, mi tengtengin ka nungjuite nahi uh chih huai ah a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Simon Peterin a kiang ah, Toupa, koia hoh ding na hia? a chi a, Jesun, Ka hohna dingah nang tuin non jui theikei ding; tunung chiah jaw nonjui ding, a chi a, a dawng a.
Peterin a kiangah, Toupa, bangdingin ahia tua leng kon zuih theih louh ding?
Nangmah jiakin ka hinna ka pai ding, a chi a.Jesun a dawnga, Keimah jiakin na hinna na pai ding maw?
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, nang thum vei non kitheihmohbawl main, ak a khuang kei ding.
Jesun a dawnga, Keimah jiakin na hinna na pai ding maw?
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, nang thum vei non kitheihmohbawl main, ak a khuang kei ding.
Na lungtang uh hihmangbatin om kei hen; Pathian na gingta ua, kei leng hon gingta un.
Ka Pa in ah tenna mun tampi a om; a om lou hileh, ka honhilhta ding ahi; nou ading mun khat bawl dinga va kuan dek kahi ngala.
Huan, nou adia mun ka vabawl chian ka hong kik nawn dinga, ka kiangah nou ka honla ding, ka omnaa nou leng na om theih samna dingun.
Ka hohna ding a lampi na thei uhi, a chi a.
Thomain a kiangah, Toupa, koia hoh ding na hia ka theikei uh, a lampi bangchin ka thei ding ua? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Keimah tuh lampi leh thutak leh hinna ka hi; keimah a pai lou kuamah Pa kiang a tung ngei kei.
Kei nontheihtak uleh ka Pa leng na theita ding uh; tu-a kipan amah na thei ua, muh leng na muta uh, a chi a.
Philipin a kiangah, Toupa, huai Pa tuh kou hon ensak tanla, huchiin koudin a hun ding, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Philip, hiai tanpi na kiang uah ka om a, huchiin leng honthei lou maw?
Kuapeuh kei mu tuh Pa mu ahi.
Huai Pa tuh kou hon ensak in, bangchi chiha na chih ahia?
Kei Pa ah ka om a Pa keimah ah a om chih na ging kei ahia?
Na kiang ua thu ka gen, keimah phuahtawm in ka gen kei; Pa keimah ah a om gige a, a thil a hih zo nak ahi.
Kei Paa ka om leh Pa keimaha a om hon gingta un; ahihkeileh thil hih jiak bekin hon gingta un.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh hon gingtain thil ka hihte a hih sam ding; hiai sanga thil thupi leng a hih ding, Pa kianga ka pai ding jiakin.
Huan, ka mina na nget peuhmah uh ka hih jel ding, Pa Tapaa pahtawia a om theihna dingin.
Nou ka mina bangpeuh non nget uleh, huai tuh ka hih jel ding hi.
Nou non it uleh, ka thupiakte na jui ding uh.
Huan, Pa ka ngen dia, aman Khamuanpa dang a honpe ding, khantawna na kiang ua om dingin; huai tuh thutak Kha ahi;
Khovelin huai a nei theikei hi, amah amuh louh a, a theih louh behlap jiakin; nou tuh amah na thei ua, na kiang uah a om gige ngala, noumau ah a om ding ahi.
Tagah din kon paisan kei ding hi; na kiang uah ka hongpaai nawn ding.
Sawt lou chikin khovelin honmu nawnta kei ding; himahleh nou jaw non mu ding uh; keimah ka hin jiakin nou leng na hing sam ding uhi.
Huai ni chiangin kei ka Paa ka om bang, nou, keimaha na om bang un, kei noumaua ka om bang na thei ding uh.
Kuapeuh ka thupiakte neia, jui tuh, kei honit ahi; kuapeuh kei honit tuh, ka Pain a it ding, ken leng amah ka it dinga, a kiangah kahihna ka kilak ding, a chi a.
Huan, Juda (Iskariot lou zopenin) a kiangah, Toupa, kou kianga na kilak dia, khovel kianga, na kilak louh se ding, bang achia? a chi a.
Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Min honit leh ka thute a jui dinga; ka Pan amah a it dia, a kiangah ka hongpai ding ua, a mah toh ka tengkham gige ding uh.
Kuapeuh honit louin ka thu a jui kei; na thu jakte uh keia ahi keia, Pa honsawlpaa ahi jaw hi.
Na kiang ua ka om takdih sungin, hiai thute kon hilh hi.
Huan, Khamuanpa, Kha Siangthou, Pain ka mina honsawl dingpan bangkim nou honsinsak dinga, na kiangua ka gen tengteng nou a honthei khe sak nawn ding hi.
Khamuanna kon nutsiat a; keimah khamuanna kon pia hi; khovelin a piak bangin kon pe keia.
Na lungtang uh hihmangbatin om kei hen, lau leng lau kei hen.
Ka pai mang ding a, na kiang uah ka hongpai nawn ding, kon chih dan bang na theita uh.
Nou honit hile uchin Pa kianga ka paiding jiakin na kipak ding uh ahi; Pa lah keimah sangin a thupizo ngala.
Tun ah a hongtun main ka honhilhta ahi, a hongtun chianga na gintak theihna ding un.
Na kiang uah thu ka gen nawn ngel kei ding, khovel lal a hongpai dek ngala; aman tuh keimah ah bangmah himhim a neikei hi;himahleh, ken Pa ka it chih leh, Pain thu honpiak bang jelin thil ka hih chih, khovelin a theihna ding uh ei ve.
Ding di ua, hiaia kipan i pai ding uh.
himahleh, ken Pa ka it chih leh, Pain thu honpiak bang jelin thil ka hih chih, khovelin a theihna ding uh ei ve.
Ding di ua, hiaia kipan i pai ding uh.
Kei grep gui dik tuh ka hi, ka Pa a Kempa ahi.
Keia hiang gah lou peuhmah a la manga; a gah peuhmah a hah siangthou a, a gah tam semna dingin.
Na kiang ua ka thu gen jiakin tun ah leng na sianghtou khin pah uhi.
Keimah ah om gige un, kei leng noumau ah ka om gige ding.
Hiang, grep guia a om gige kei leh amah in a gah theikei bangin, nou leng keimaha na om gige kei uleh, na gah theikei ding uh.
Kei a grep gui tuh ka hi, nou ahiangte na hi uh; kuapeuh keimaha om gige a, kei leng amaha ka om gige na, huai mah tuh tampiin a gah nak hi; keimah louin lah bangmah na hih theikei ua.
Mi keia a om gige kei leh, hiang banga paihkhiakin a om a, a vuai nak hi; huan, a tom ua, mei ah a pai ua, a kang nak hi.
Nou keimaha na om gige ua, ka thu leng noumaua a om gige leh, na ut peuh uh ngen un, nou adia hihin a om jel ding hi.
Hiai jiakin ka Pa tuh pahtawiin a om, tampia na gah un; huchiin ka nungjuite na hi ding uh.
Pan kei honit bangmahin kon it hi; ka itna ah om gige un.
Nou ka thupiakte na zuih uleh ka itna ah na om gige ding uhi, ken ka Pa thupiakte ka juia, a itnaa ka om gige mah bangin.
Ka kipah noumaua a om gige theihna din leh, na kipah uh a kimna dingin, hiai thu na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Hiai ka thupiak ahi, ken nou kon it bngin, noumau leng kiit unla.
Mihingin a lawm adia a hinna a piak vala itna thupijaw kumahin a neikei.
Thu kon piak peuhmah na hih uleh, ka lawmte na hi ding uhi.
Sikha kon chi nawnta kei dia; a pu thilhih sikhain a thei ngal keia; lawmte kon chi zota ding; Pa kianga ka thil jak tengteng na kiang uah ka hontheisakta ngala.
Nou non tel kei ua, ken kon tel jaw ahi, vagah ding leh na gah uh om gige dingin kon sep hi; ka mina Pa kianga na nget peuhmah uh nou a hon piakna dingin.
Na kiit theihna ding un hiai thu khawng kon pia ahi.
Khovelin nou a honhuat leh, nou a honhuat main keimah honho khinta chih na thei un.
Nou khovela hi le uchin, khovelin amaha a it ding; khovela kipan kon tel khiak jawk jiakin, khovelin nou a honhua ahi.
Sikha a pu sangin a thupizo kei, chih thu kon hilhta hi, theigige un.
Amau kei honsawi uleh, nou leng honsawi ding uh; ka thu jui hita le uh, noumau thu leng a jui ding uhi.
Himahleh, hiai thil tengteng ka min jiakin na tunguah a hih ding uh, honsawlpa a theih louh jiak un.
Kei hongpai keiin a kiang uah thu gen kei leng, khelhna neilou ding hi ua, himahleh tuin a khelhna uh paulap ding a neita kei uh ahi.
Kuapeuh kei honhuain, ka Pa leng a hua ahi.
Thil, midang kuamah hih ngei louhte, a lak ua hih lou hita leng, khelhna neilou ding hi ua, himahleh tuin amau kei leh ka Pa ka nih un honmuta uh, huat leng honhota uh ahi.
A dan laibu uah, amau a jiak om louin honhua uh, chih, thu gelhpen, a hongtunna dingin a hih uh ahi ve.
Huan, Pa kiang akipan Khamuanpa na kiang ua ka honsawl ding, Paa kipan thutak Kha a hongtun hun chiangin, aman keimah hontheihpihnathu a gen ding;nou leng theihpihte nahi uh, a tunga kipan ka kianga na om jiak un.
nou leng theihpihte nahi uh, a tunga kipan ka kianga na om jiak un.
Lungkiaa na paimang louhna ding un hiaite na kiang uah ka genta ahi.
Kikhopnain ahte a honnong sak ding ua; ahi, kuapeuh nou honhihlum tuh Pathian tunga thil hoih hihin a kithei ding; huchi bang hun a tung ding ahi.
Huai thilte a hih ding uh, Pa leh kei hontheih louh jiakun.
Hiai thu khawng na kiang uah ka genta hi, a hun a hongtun chia, kon hilh khinta chih na theih nawnna ding un.
Hiai thil khawng a tung akipan kon na hilh louh him na hi uh, na kiang ua ka omtak dih jiakin.
Tuin jaw honsawlpa kiangah ka pai dinga noute kuamahin, Koia hoh ding?
Chiin, non dong tuan kei uh.
Hiai thute na kiang ua ka gen jiakin na lungtang uh lungkhamnain a dimzo hialtaa a.
Himahleh, thutak ka honhilh ahi; ka pai nou dingin a hoih hi; ka pai keileh, Khamuanpa na kiang uah a hongtung kei ding; ka pai lebel na kiang uah ka honsawl ding hi.
Amah a hongtun chiangin, khelhna thu ahte, diktatna thu ahte, vaihawmna thu ahte khovel a siamlouh dan a theisak ding hi;
Khelhna thu ahte siam louh a tang ding uh, kei hon gintak louh jiak un; diktatna thu ahte siamlouh a tang ding uh;
Pa kiangah ka pai dinga, nou kei non muh nawn tak louh ding jiak un;
vaihawm thu ahte siamlouh a tang ding uh, hiai khovel lal siamlouha a puktak jiakin.
Na kiang ua thu gen ding tampi ka nei laia, himahleh tuin jaw na chin tadih kei ding uh.
Himahleh, amah, Thutak Kha a hongtun chiangin, thutak tengteng ah nou a honpi ding; amah phuahtawmin thu a gen dek ngal keia; a jak peuhmah a gen zo ding, thil hongtung dingte leng nou a hontheisak ding.
Aman kei honpahtawi dinga; keia a la dinga, nou kiangah a hontheisak ding ahi ngala.
Pan thil a neih tengteng keia ahi; huaijiakin, Keia a la dinga, na kiang uah a hontheisak ding, ka chi ahi.
Sawtlou chikin nou kei non mu kei ding ua; sawtlou chik mahin nou kei non mu nawn ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuite khenkhatin, I kianga a thugen bang ahi, Sawtlou chikin nou kei non mu kei ding uh, sawtlou chik mahin nou kei non mu ding uh, a chih, leh, Pa kianga ka hoh dek jiakin, a chih? a kichi ua.
Huan, amau mahin, hiai sawtlou chik, a chih bang chihna ahia? a thugen I theisiam kei uh; a chi ua.
Huan, amah dot a ut uh chih Jesun a thei a, a kiang uah, Sawtlou chikin nou kei non mu kei ding uh, sawtlou chik mahin nou kei non mu nawn ding uh, chia, hiai ka thugen na kidong umaw?
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Nou na khitui uh a ke dinga, na kap huahhuah ding uh, khovel bel a kipak ding; nou na lungkham ding ua, himahleh na lungkham uh kipah a suak ding hi.
Numeiin nau a veiin a lungkham naka, a hun a tuntak jiakin; himahleh, nau a suah takin a lunggimna a thei nawnta kei hi, khovela mihing hongpiang a kipah jiakin.
Huan, tuin nou na lungkham uh; himahleh ka honmu nawn dinga, na lungtang uh a kipak ding, na kipahna uh kuamahin honlaksak kei ding.
Huai ni chiangin nou kei bangmah nonngen kei ding uh.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin, kon hilh ahi, Pa kianga bangpeuh na nget uleh, keimah minin nou a honpe ding hi.
Tu tanin ka minin bangmah na ngen nai kei uh; ngen un, huchiin na mu ding uh, na kipah uh a kimna dingin.
Huai thu khawng a hem-in na kiang uah ka genta hi; a hun a tung dek, huai hun chiangin na kiang uah a hemin thu ka gen nawn ta kei dinga, chian takin Pa tanchin ka honhilh ding.
Huai ni chiangin keimah minin thil na ngen ding uh; Pa kiangh ken ka honnget sak ding ka chi kei hi.
Pain amah ngeiin nou a honit ngala, nou kei non it ua, Pa a kipan ka hi chih non gintak jiakun.
Kei Pa kianga kipana hongpawta, khovela hongpai ka hi a; khovel paisana, Pa kianga pai nawn ding ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuiten, Ngai dih tuin jaw tel takin thu na gena, a hem himhimin nagen ta kei hi.
Nang bangkim na theia, kuamah hondot na kiphamoh kei chih tuin ka theita uh; hiai jiakin Pathian kianga kipana hongpai na hi chih ka gingta uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiang uah, Tuin na gingta u maw?
Ngai un, a hun a tung, ahi, tun ah a tungta, huai hun chiangin noumau in chiat ah na dalh vek ding uh, keimah kiain non nuse ding uh; himahleh Pa ka kianga a om jiakin keimah kiain ka om tuan kei hi.Hiai thute na kiang uah ka genta hi, keimaha na khamuanna dingun.
Khovel ah gimthuakna na neiding uh, himahleh khamuang takin om un, ken khovel ka zouta, a chi a.
Hiai thute na kiang uah ka genta hi, keimaha na khamuanna dingun.
Khovel ah gimthuakna na neiding uh, himahleh khamuang takin om un, ken khovel ka zouta, a chi a.
Huai thute Jesun a gen khitin van lam ngain, Pa a hun a tungta; na Tapa pahtawi in, Tapain nang hon pahtawina dingin;
huchia mi tengteng tunga thuneia na bawlin, a kianga na piak peuhmahte khantawn hinna a piak theihna dingin.
Hiai khantawna hinna ahi, nang Pathian tak kia leh na sawl Jesu Kris theih.
Nang thil hihding non piak ka hih khina, khovel ah kon pahtawita hi.
Pa aw, khovel om maa na kianga kilawmna ka neihin, tuin nangmah kiang ngeingeiah hon pahtawi in.
Nang khovel akipana mi kei non piakte kiangah na min ka hihlangta; amau nanga ahi ua, nang amau kei non paik ahi uh; amau lah na thu a juita uh.
Nang thil kei non piak tengteng tuh, nanga kipan ahi chih tuin a theita uh.
Nang thu non piak a kiang uah ka peta ngala; huaite a kem ua, nanga kipan ka hi chih dik takin a theita uh, nang na honsawl chih leng a gingta uhi.
Amau dia ka nget sak jaw; khovel adia nget sak ka hi kei, nang non piakte ding ahi jaw; nanga ahi ngal ua.
Thil tengteng keia peuhmah nanga ahi a, nanga lah keia ahi a; amau jiakin pahtawi in ka om ahi.
Huan, kei jaw khovel ah ka omta kei ding, hiaite bel khovel ah a om ding uh; kei na kiangah ka hongpai dekta.
Pa Siangthou aw, nang kei non piakte na minin hum in, pumkhat a hih theihna ding un, eimah pumkhat I hih bangin.
A kiang ua ka om sungin, nang kei non piakte na minin ka huma; amau ka don a, a lak ua khat leng a mangthang kei hi, mangthang tapa loungal, laisiangthou a tun theihna dingin.
Himahleh, tuin na kiang ah ka hongpai dekta; khovel ah hiai thute ka gen ahi, ka kipah amau ua a neih kimna ding un.
Na thu a kiang uah ka peta hi; huan, khovelin amau a hua a, khovela a hih louh jiak un, kei khovela ka hih louh mahbangin.
Nang amau khovela kipan na lak khiak dinga ngen ka hi keia, mi gilou lakah na hum ding ka chi a hijaw.
Amau khovela ahi kei ua, kei khovela ka hi lou mahbangin.
Amau thutakin hihsiangthou in, na thu tuh thutak ahi.
Nang khovela kei non sawl bangin, ken leng amau khovel ah ka sawl hi.
Amau jiakin ka kihihsiangthou a, amau leng thutaka a sianthouna dingun.
Hiai khawngte a ding kiaa ngetsak ka hi kei, a thu jiakua kei hon gingta lai dingte dingin leng nget sak ka hi hi; a vek ua pumkhat a hihna ding un;
Pa, nang keimaha na om leh, kei nangmaha ka om bangin, amau leng eimaha a omna ding un; nang kei non sawl chih khovelin a taksan theihna dingin.
Huan, nang thupina non piak ken amu ka peta; amau pumkhat a hihna dingun, ei pum khat i hih mah nangin.
Kei amau ah, nang kei ah, amau pumkhata a om ua a buchin theihna dingun; nang kei non sawl chih leh, non it bangin amaute na it chih, khovelin a theihtheihna ding in.
Pa, nang kei non piakte, ka omnaa ka kianga omdingin ka deih; leilung pian maa itnaa nang non piak ka thupina a muh theihna ding un.
Pa diktat aw, khovelin jaw nang honthei keia, ken jaw kon thei hi; hiaiten leng nang kei non sawl chih a thei uh.Huan, a kiang uah na min ka theisaktaa, ka theisak ding, nang kei non itna bangbang na itna amaua a oma, kei leng amaua ka om theihna dingin, a chi a.

Amau a kiangah, Kou leng na kiangah ka hong sam ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan, a pawt khia ua, longah a tuang ua, huai janin bangmah a man kei uhi.
Huan, phalvakin Jesu piautak ah a dinga; himahleh a nungjuiten Jesu ahi chih a theikei uh.

Amau a kiangah, Nei lou, a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Long sik taklamah len pai le uchin khenkhat na man ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a pai ua, ngasa tam jiakin a kai khe zouta kei ua.

Huchiin, Toupa ahi chih Simon Peterin a theih takin, a puannak a tenga, (vuaktanga om ahi ngala), dilah a tawm kheta hi.

Huan, gama a suah tak-un, huai ah meihola mei tohsa a mu ua, a tunga ngasa leh tanghou em toh.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Tuin na ngasa mat uh a khen honla tou un, a chi a.

Huan, Jesu a hongpaia, tanghou a la a, a kiang uah a pia a, ngasate leng huchi bangmahin a pe sam a.

Samari gama mite kho tampi kianga Tanchin Hoih a gen jel in, Jerusalem khua ah a pai nawn uh hi.
Huan, Toupa angel khatin Philip a houpiha, Thou inla, simlama Jerusalem khua akipana Gaza kho sunsuk lampi huai gamdai ah hoh in, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a paita.
Huan, ngaiin, Ethiopia gama mi khat, Ethiopia kumpipa Kanda nuaia mi chilgeh laltak, a gou tengteng kempa, Jerusalem khua ah Pathian be dingin a hoh tou a,
a pai lamin a kangtalaia tu kawmin jawlnei Isai laibu a simsim hi.
Huan, Khain, Philip kiangah, Huai kangtalai vanaih inla, vakithuahpih in, a chi a.
Huan, Philip tuh mi chilgeh kiangah a vataia, jawlnei Isai laibu a sim a ja a, Na sim a omdan na thei hia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Kuamah honhilhchet louhin bangchin ka thei dia? a chi a.
Huan, a kianga tu paisuak dingin Philip tuh achialta a.

A vuallelh laiin a tungah thu gen a phal kei uh; a suante tanchin kuan a hongen ding ua? khovel akipanin a hinna a laksak ngal ua, chiin.
Huan, mi chilgehin, Philip a houpiha, a kiangah, Jawlneiin hiai thu khawng kua thu a genna ahia, amah thu hia, midang thu? ka hondong ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Philipin a gena, huai laisiangthou thu abul ah panin, a kiangah Jesu thu a hilh a.

Huan, Philipin, Na lungtang tengtenga na gintak leh, na hi thei, a chi a.
Huan, amah a dawnga, Jesu Kris tuh Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta, a chi a.

Aman tuh khamuanna Tanchin Hoih Jesu Kris kama genin, Israel suante kiangah thu a khaka (Jesu tuh mi tengteng Toupa ahi a),
Johanin a tangkou pihpih baptisma nungin, thu, Galili gam akipan a hongthang pana, Judia gam tengteng ah a thangsuaka, noumau leng na thei uhi;
Nazaret Jesu tungtang thu, huchia Pathianin amah Kha Siangthou leh thilhihtheihna a a vuh dan, amah tuh mi tunga hih hoih leh diabol gawt tengteng hihdamin a vialvak vaka, Pathian a kianga a om jiakin.
Judate gamah leh Jerusalem khua a a thilhih tengteng theihpih te ka hi uhi, amah lah sing dawnah khaiin a hihlumta ua.
Pathianin nithum niin a kaithou nawna, chiantakin a kitheisak hi,
ahihhangin mi tengteng kiangah ahi keia, Pathianin theihpih dia a seh kholhte kiang kia ah ahi koute, misi lak akipan a thohnawn nunga a kianga nea dawnte kiangah.
Amah tuh misi leh mihingte tunga Vaihawmpa dia Pathian seh ahi chih, mi kianga tangkoupih leh theisak dingin Pathianin thu a honpia hi.

Huchi bangin ni tampi a hih a.
Huchiin, Paula a lungkimta keia, a kiheia, dawi kiangah, Jesu Kris minin a sunga kipan pawt thu ka honpia, a chi a.
Huan, huchih laitakin, a pawt pah a.
Huan, a puten a summuhna uh a mang chih a theih tak un, Paula leh Sila a man ua, heutute maah dawl munah a kailut uhi.
Huchin, vaihawmte kiangah a pi ua, hiai mite Judate ahi uh, ka khua uh a hihbuai mahmah ua;

Toupa na ka sem hi; huchibangin a phatuam ding thu na kiang uah bangmah im ka neikeia, vantang lakah bang, in tengah bang thu kon hilh jel,
Judate leh Grikte kiangah leng Pathian lama lungsim ngat thu leh, i Toupa Jesu Kris lama ginna thu ka theisak jel ahi.
Huan, thei un, tuin, lungsima hoh lou theiloua ka kitheih jiakin, Jerusalem khua a hoh dia kisa ka hi, huaiah ka tunga thil hongtung ding khawng ka theikei;
Kha Siangthouin, Henna leh haksatnain nang hondawn hi, chiin, kho tengah a honhilh jel hi, tuate kia ka theih ahi.
Himahleh, ka kitaitehna lam ka maban tun ding leh, Toupa Jesu kianga huai nasepna ka muh, sem khin phot leng, ka hinna leng khiaklah tuakin ka sep kei hi.
Huan, thei un, nou tengteng, Pathian gam thu tangkoupih jela ka vakvaknaten ka mel na mu nawnta kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Huaijiakin, mi tengteng sisan ah ka hula hi chih tuniin ka hontheisak hi.
Pathian vaihawm tengteng avekin na kiang uah im ka nei hi.
Pathian saptuamte, amah sisana a leite, vak dingin, noumau leh na heute uh tengteng tungah pilvang un, Kha Siangthouin a tunguah nou heutuin a honbawl hi.
Ka pai nungin nge hangte na lak uah a honglut ding ua, pawlte a hawi kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Noumau laka mi nangawn, nungjui pawlte amau lama kai mang dingin thu tuam gen na hongom ding uhi.
Huaijiakin limsak unla; kum thum hilhial, khitui ke kawma, sun leh jana mi chih taihilh ka tawp louhdan, thei gige un.
Tunah Pathian leh a hehpihna thu kiangah nou ka honkemsak hi, huaiin nou a honbawllian theia, mi lungsim siangthoute lakah goutan a honneisak thei lai hi.
Kuamah dangkate, dangkaengte, puansilhte ka eng ngeikei hi.
Hiai khutten keimah leh ka lawmte taksap a khoihkhiak jel dan, noumau ngeiin na thei uhi.
