huan, huai thil ka piak lain, mipi bang louin buai louin, Pathian biakin ah kisiangsakin a honmu uhi.
Himahleh, huaiah Asia gama mi Juda kuate hiam a om ua, huaiten ka tungah thu a neih uleh, hiai na maah omin a honhek ding uh ahi.
Ahihkeileh, hiai mite ngeiin vaihawmte maa ka din lain, ka hihkhelh bang ahia a muh uh, gen uheh.
Hiai thu kam khat jiak houh ahih kei ngalleh, a lak ua dingin, Misi thohnawnna thu ah tuniin na ma uah salhin ka om ahi, ka chih, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Felikin Lam thu a theihtel deuh jiakin, Sepaih heutu lalpen Lisia a hongtun suk hun chiah na thu uh ka lem ding, chiin, a koih tadih a.
Huan, Paula deihbawl deuha, a lawmten a nektak a bawlsak uh kham loua, vensak dingin sepaih za heutu kiangah thu a pia hi.
Huan, ni bangzah hiam nungin Felik a hong nawna, a ji Drusilla Juda numei toh, Paula a samsaka, Kris Jesu ginna thu a ngaikhia a.
Huan, Paulain diktatna thute, kidek thute, thukhen-vaihawmna hongtung dingte a suipih detdet lain, Felikin lauhuai a sa mahmaha, pai nawn phot tadih inla, hun lem ka neih hun chiangin ka honsam ding, a chi a.
Paulain dangka a piak peuh a lamen a, huaijiakin a sam mun sima, a houpih zihzeh ahi.Himahleh, kum nih a bei nungin Porsia Festain Felik a honkhengta a; huan, Felikin, Judate lakah min hoih a deiha, Paula hensain a nuseta hi.
Himahleh, kum nih a bei nungin Porsia Festain Felik a honkhengta a; huan, Felikin, Judate lakah min hoih a deiha, Paula hensain a nuseta hi.
Huchiin, Festain gam tuh a ukta; huan, nithum nungin Kaisaria khua akipanin Jerusalem khua ah a hoh tou a.
Huan, siampu lalte leh Juda makaiten a kiangah Paula tungtang thu a selamin a na theisak uhi.
Jerusalem khua a pitou sak dingin hehpihna leng a na ngenngen ua; lampia na buka thah a tum uhi.
Himahleh Festain, Paula, tuh Kaisaria khua a kep ding hi, keimah leng huailam ah ka hoh pah ding.
Huaijiakin, huai miin gitlouhna a neih leh na lak ua thu nei peuhmahin honjui suk uhenla, hek uheh, chiin, a dawnga.
Huan, a lak uah ni giat hiam, ni sawm hiam val a tam keia, Kaisaria khua ah a paikhe sukta; huan, a jingin thukhenna tutphah ah a tua, Paula honpi dingin thu a pia hi.
Huan, amah a hongtunin, Jerusalem khua a mi Juda hongsukte a kim ah a ding ua, a tungah thubuai tampi gik taktak a gen a gen ua, a bulb el a suikhe thei sam kei uhi;
Paulain a siamna thu a gena, Judate Dan tungah khawng, Pathian biakin thu ah khawng, Kaisar tungah khawng leng, thil himhim ka hihkhial kei hi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Festain, Judate laka min hoih a deiha, Paula kiangah, Jerusalem khua a hoh touha, huailaia ka ma ahiai thu lep na deih hia? a chi a, a donga.
Paulain Kaisar thukhenna tutphah maa, vai hawm saka om dingin ka ding hi; Judate tungah thil bangmah ka hihkhial kei, nang leng huai lah na theichian mahmah ngala.
Migilou ka hiha, sihna khop hial thil hih ka hih leh, sih leng ka nial kei; himahleh hiaite honhekna uh a bul bangmah a om kei leh, kuamahin a kiang uah honpekhe theikei ding.
Kaisar kiangah ka tun ding, a chi a.
Huan, Festain a vaihawmpihte a houpih kimvel nungin, Kaisar kiangah tun na tum viala, Kaisar kiangah na hoh mahmah ding, chiin a dawng hi.
Huan, ni bangzah hiam nungin kumpipa Agrippa leh Barnisi tuh Kaisaria khua a hongtung ua, Festa chibai a buk uh.
Huan, ni tampi huaia a tam jiak un Festain Paula thubuai kumpipa kiangah a gena, Felikin mi tang kuahiam a nusia a;
Jerusalem khua a ka om lain siampu liante leh Juda upaten a tungtang thu a honhilh ua, siamlouh tansak a ngen uh.
Huan, ken, a kiang uah, a hekpa uleh a hekte a kimatuah ua, a hekna thu ua a siamna thu gen sam na lemtang a neih sam main, mi himhim gawt dinga khah Rome mite dan ahi kei hi, chiin, ka dawng hi.
Huan, hiai lai ka hongtun un, sawt hallouin a jingin thukhenna tutphah ah ka tu a, huai mi tuh honpi dingin thu ka pia hi.
1
Huan, a hekte a din lai un, ka gintak bang ngeiin a tungah gitlouhna thubuai bangmah himhim lah a gen kei ua;
a sabiak dante uleh, Jesu, mi khat sisa, Paulain, a hing nawn ahi, chiin, a gena, huchi ahih jiakin a tungah thubuaite a nei uh a nahi jaw hi.
Huan, ken huai thute ngaihtuah dingdan himhim ka theikeia, Jerusalem khua a hoha, huailaia huai thu lepsak a ut le hut louh ka donga.
Himahleh, Paulain Kumpipa lep dia sit a ngen zota a.
Huaijiakin Kaisar kianga ka hohsak theih masiah veng dingin thu ka pia a, a chi a.
Huan, Agrippain, Festa kiangah, ka na ut gige him ahi, a chi a.
Huan, aman, jingchiah a thugen na ngaikhe na ke, a chi a.
Huchiin, a jingin Agrippa leh Barnisi thupi takin a hong ua, thugenna in ah a lut ua, sepaih heutu lalte toh, khua a mi lian deuhte toh; huan, Festa thuin Paula tuh a pilut sak uh.
Huan, Festain, Kumpipa Agrippa leh hiailaia i laka om tengtengte aw, hiai mi na muh uh ahi, a tungtang thu a Judate tengtengin a vek ua, hing nawn lou ding chi a, kikoua, Jerusalem khua leh hiailaia ka kianga a hekna uh.
Himahleh, sihna ding khop bangmah a hih kei chih ka theia; huan, aman Kumpipa kianga tut a tup jiakin sawl ka tum ahi;
Himahleh, a thu gina takin bangmah gelh ding lah ka theikeia.
Huaijiakin na ma uah ka honpikhia ahi, Kumpipa Agrippa nangmah maa honpi tuan se ka hi a, etchet nungin banghiam bek gelh ding ka muh theihna dingin.Hentapa, Kumpipa kianga sawla, a tunga a hekna uh thu theih khawm sak louh jaw, haihuai hiin ka thei ngala, a chi a.

Huan, Agrippain, Paula kiangah, Na siamna thu na gen thei hi, achia.
Huan, Paulain a khut a jaka, a siamna thu a gen a;
Kumpipa Agrippa, Judaten a honhekna tengteng ua ka ka siamna thu tunia na maa ka gen ding jiakin kipakin ka kithei hi;
Hiai ka kipahna pen ahi, Judate lakah dan leh thubuai tengteng thu a na pil mahmah jiakin; huaijiakin muangtaka non ngaihkhiaksak dingin ka honngen ahi.
A tunga ka naupan laia kipan, ka chite lakah leh Jerusalem khua a ka omdan Judate tengtengin a thei uh.
A tunga patin ka tanchin a thei uh, huchia ka sabiak dan ua ngentel pen angeina a Pharisai hi inga, a ut uleh a hon genpih thei uh ahi.
Huan, Pathianin ka pipute uh kianga thu achiam lametna jiakin hiaiah tuin vaihawm sakin ka ding ahi,
huai thuchiam, ka nam uh sawmlenihin, sun leh janin Pathian na phatuamngai taka semin, muh a lamen uhi.
Kumpipa aw, huai lametna tungthu ah Judaten a honhek uhi.
Pathianin misite a kaithou chih bangchin gintak huailou a sep na hi ua?
Ken leng Nazaret Jesu min kalh lamin thil lampi hih leng hoihin ka nagingta naka.
Huai bang Jerusalem khua ah leng ka hih jel ahi; huan, siampu liante kiangah thu ka mu a, mi siangthoute laka mi tampi suangkulh ah ka khum jela; huan, a hihlup lai un, lemsa lamah leng ka napang jel ahi.
Huan, kikhopna in tengah ka sawi gige a.
Jesu thu gensiatsak ka tum teitei nak hi, huan, a tunguah ka gilou mahmah, gamdang kho pha hialin leng ka sawi jel ahi.
Huchibang hih dingin, siampu lalte thu muin leh, a sawlna lai uh tawiin, Damaska khua ah ka hoha.
Huan, i aw, Toupa, ka pai lain, sun annek hun ahi a, van akipan vak banghiam, ni vak sanga vakjaw, keimah leh ka paipihte kimah vakin ka mu a.
Huan, ka vek un lei ah ka puk ua, Hebru pauin, Saula, Saula, nang bangachia honsawi?
Sutna chiangzumte suih nanga dia na ahi, honchiin ka ja a.
Huan, ken, Toupa, kua na hia? ka chi a.
Huan, Toupan, Jesu, na sawi ka hi.
Himahleh, thou inla, dingin; hiai na thil muhte leh, na kianga ka hongkilakna dingte toh, huai na sem ding leh theihpih dia nang honbawl dingin na kiangah ka hongkilak ahi;
Mi tengteng leh Jentelte khut akipan ka honhum hing ding;
A mit uh hihvak dingin a kiang uah ka honsawl ahi, huchiin mial tuh vaklam a ngatsan ding ua, Setan thuneihna Pathian lam a ngatsan ding uh, khelhna ngaihdamna a muhna ding uleh a hon gintak jiak ua siangthou kaite laka goutan a neihna ding un, a chi a.
Huaijiakin, kumpipa Agrippa aw, vana mi kilak ka sel kei hi,
Atungin, Damaska khua a mite kiangah, huan Jerusalem khua ate kiangah, huan, Judia gam chih a mite kiangah leh, Jentelte kiangah leng, kisik minpu thama thil hiha, kisika, Pathian lam a ngatna ding un, ka hih zo jel ahi.
Huaite jiakin Judaten Pathian biakin ah a honman ua, hihlup a hontum ua.
Himahleh, Pathian kiang akipana panpihna ka muh jiakin tuni tanin mi neute leh mi liante kianga thu theisakin ka om nalai hi, jawlneite leh Mosiin hongtung ding a chih thu kia uh loungal thu dang gen louin.
Huchia, Krisin gim a thuak dinga, hua misi laka kipan a thohnawn jiaka mi tengteng kianga leh Jentelte kianga leng vak musakpa masapen ahi ding, a chih thu uh, a chi a.
Huan, huchibanga a siamna thu a gen lain, Festain, aw ngaihtakin, Paula, na hai ahi; na theih tamnain nang honhaisak hi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Paulain, Festa hoihpen, hai kei veng e; thu diktak leh thu piltak ka gen jaw ahi.
Hiai thu khawng kumpipan a thei vo-oi, a kiangah leng lau louin ka gen hi; hiai thil khawng bangmah a kiangah im ahi kei chih diktakin ka thei hi; hiaite, inning peuha hih ahi ngal keia.
Kumpipa Agrippa, jawlneite thu na gingta chih ka thei hi, a chi a.
Huan, Agrippain, Paula kiangah, sawtlou chik phet khema, Kristiana honbawl tum neive! a chi a.
Huan, Paulain, sawtin, sawt kei leh, nang kia ka chi kei, tuni a ka thu ja tengteng leng, keimah banga om dingin Pathian kiangah ka ngen ahi, kol khawngte bel bun tuan louin, a chita.
Huan, kumpipa toh, gamukpa toh, Barnisi toh, a kiang ua tute toh a ding chiat ua;

Huan, Adramitiam kho long, Asia gam tuipi piau a kho omte tawn ding ah, ka tuang ua, tuipi ah ka paita uhi; Masidonia gama mi Aristarkha, Thessalonika khua mi, ka kiang uah a oma.
Huan, a jingin Sidon khua ka tawn ua.
Huan, Juliain Paula a limbawl ngiala, kihihhalh dingin a lawmte kiangah a pawtsaka.
Huan, huai akipanin tuipi ah ka pai nawn ua, huihin a hilou lama honsawn hiakin Kupra tuikulh jul huih hatlouhna lam ah ka tai ua.
Huan, Silisia gam leh Pamphilia gam jul tuipi ka khen nung un, Lidia gama Mira khua ka tung ua.
Huaiah sepaih zaheutupan Aleksandria kho long Itali gam tawn ding a mu a; huaiah a hontuangsak a.
Huan, ni tampi tak awlawlin ka pai ua, Knida kho jawn haksapiin ka tung teitei ua, huihin hon sawnkik jiakin Salmoni juanin Krit tuikulh jul huih hatlouhna lamah ka tai ua.
Huan, haksatakin tui geigei ah ka pai ua, long khawlna kilawm a chih mun uh ka tungta ua; huai kiangah Lasia khua a om hi.
Huan, ni tampi a beitak jiakin leh, longa pai a lauhuai jiakin, (An Ngawl Ni a khengta ngala), Paulain amau a thuhilha, a kiang uah,
Pute aw, longa tua pai siatna leh manthatna thupitak tung ding ahi chih ka theia, a sum leh long tungah kia ka chi kei, eimah tungah kia ka chi ahi, a chi a.
Himahleh, sepaih zaheutuin Paula thugen sangin longpu leh long neipa thu a ging jawa.
Huan, phalbi douna dingin longkhawlna a ginat louh jiakin a tamjawin, huai akipana tuipi a pai khiaka, Phinisi khua tun teiteia, huailaia phalbi dou a sawmpih ua; Phinisi tuh Krit tuikulha longkhawlna khat ahi, mal sak leh sim sak lam ahi a.
Huan, sim huih awlawla a hongnun takin, a deihlam uh mu a kisa ua, sikkip a khai khia ua, Krit tuikulh gei juljul ah ka pai uhi.
Himahleh, sawtlou chik nungin gam lam akipanin huih hattak a hongnung sukta a, huai huih tuh Euroklidon a chi jel uhi.
Huan, long a honsawnkhata a, huihlam a ngat theihlouhtakin ka khahta ua, honmut leng honmut lengta a.
Huan, a min Klauda tuikulh neuchik petmah pansanin huih hatlouhna lamah ka tai ua, haksatakin long neu tuh ka bitsak thei geigei ua;
Huan, a kaihkhiak nung un panpihna khaute khawng a zang ua, long nuailam ah a vial ua, a khih ua, huan, puanjakna bangkim a puksak ua, huchilouin jaw Sirti a lenlut a lau ua, huchiin a honmut leng a honmut lengta hi.
Huan, a jingin, tuikihawtin honsep ek jiakin, longa van khawng tui lakah a paikhe panta ua.
Huan, a jing nawnin amau khut ngeiin long van a paikhe nawnta uhi.
Huan, ni tampi, nil eng, aksi leng a kimu keia, huihpi petmahin honnuaia, hin himhim ka lamen nawnta kei uhi.
Huan, an ne loua sawttak a om nung un, Paula a lak uah a dinga, Pute aw, Krit tuikulha phel loua, ka thu man a, hiai siat leh manthatna tun louh ding hina jena.
Himahleh, tunah leng khamuangtaka om dingin kon hasuan ahi; na lak uah kuamahin henna na mangsak kei ding uh, long jaw a mangthang ding.
Amah Pathiana ka hih, a na leng ka sep, amah angel tuh tujanin ka kiangah a hongdinga, ka kiangah,
Paula, lau ken, Kaisar maah na ding ding; huan, ngai in, longa na kianga pai tengteng leng Pathianin a honpia hi, honchi ahi.
Huaijiakin, Pute aw, khamuangtakin om un, Pathian ka gingta hi, honhilh bangbangin a om ding.
Himahleh, bang tuikulh hiam ah honlenkhe ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Adria tuipi ah huihin lehlam lehlam ag a honmutleng a honmut lenga, jan sawm leh jan li a chin janin, janlai hiamin, long miten koi gam hiam tung dekin a kithei ua;
Huchiin, tui thukdan a the ua, lam sawmnihin a thei ua, huan, sawtlou chikin a teh nawn ua, lam sawm lem lam ngain a thei ua.
Huan, longmeilam ah sikkip li a khia ua, huchilouin jaw suang se munah honlenkhe zenzen kha ding, chih, a lau ua; huan khovak kal a ngaklahta uhi.
Huan, longmiten long malama sikkipte kikhiak ding bawl khempeuhin, long neu tuh tuipi ah a khia ua, long taisan a tum ua.
Hiai lain Paulain, sepaih zaheutu leh sepaihte kiangah, hiaite longa om gige kei uleh bit kei nuteh, a chi a.
Huchiin, sepaihten longneu khaute a attat ua, a khahta uhi.
Huan, khovak kuanin, Paulain an ne dingin mi tengteng a sawla, tuni ni sawm leh li a hita, bangmah ne louin na ngak ua, na ngawl nilouh uhi.
Huaijiakin, an ne dingin ka honsawl chiat ahi; na damna ding uhi; na lak uah kuamah a samzang khat leng a mangthang kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a gen khitin tanghou a la a, mi tengteng maah Pathian kiangah kipahthu a genta a; huan, a balkhama, a ne panta hi.
Huan, amau leng khamuang takin a om ua, an a ne samta uh.
Huan, long a mi tuh ka vek un za nih leh sawmsagih leh guk ka hi ua.
Huan, an a nek kham khit un, buh tuh tuipi ah a pai ua, long a hihjang deuh uhi.
Huan, ni a suahin, koilai gamahia chih a theikei ua; himahleh, koilai longkhawlna hiam piautak nei khat a mu ua, huai tungah, a hih theih uleh, long taikhiak sak a tum uhi.
Huan, sikkip khihnate a attat ua, tuipi ah a nusia ua; tua lai mahin kaihheina khihnate a phel ua, malam puanjak tuh huih mut ding danin a kaitou ua; piautak a juanta uhi.
Himahleh, tuikihawt khauh nih kituahna munah ka lutkha zenzen ua, long tuh lei a susakta ua; huchiin, long malam a tang bikbekta a, hihtat zoh louhin a oma, a meilam bel tuikihawt a hat jiakin a kek gawp panta hi.
4
Huan, sepaihten hentate hihlup a sawm ua, huchilouin jaw tui liau galkai khattou a om kha ding ua, a taimang kha ding uh chih a lau ua.
Himahleh, sepaih zaheutuin Paula humhing a uta, a thiltup uh a kham a; tuiliau siam peuhmah tuipi ah tawm khiaka gam nakaimasak ding leh,mi dang, a khen singpek tung khawnga, a khen long van tung khawnga galkai dingin thu a pia hi.
Huchiin, a vek un gamah bittakin a galkai vekta uhi.
mi dang, a khen singpek tung khawnga, a khen long van tung khawnga galkai dingin thu a pia hi.
Huchiin, a vek un gamah bittakin a galkai vekta uhi.
Huan, ka galkai khit un, tuikulh min tuh Melita ahi chih ka theita uhi.
Huan, melmakten hehpihtak ngelin honna hehpih ua; vuah a hongzuk jiak leh vot jiakin mei a toh ua, ka vek un a honna kipahpih uhi.
Huan, Paulain sing lom khat a toma, mei ah a chiha, a sat jiakin gul a hongpawt khia a, a khut a tu a, a kipden a.
Huan, melmakten ganhing a khuta kikhai den a muh un, hiai mi tualthat ahi ding, tuipi akipanin taikhe mahleh diktatnain a hin a phalta lou ahi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, aman ganhing tuh mei ah a singkhia a, bangmah a chi kei hi.
Amau bel a bawk hiam, thakhata sia puk pah hiam dingin a gingta ua; huan, sawtpi a ngak nilouh ua, bangmah a chi kei chih a theih un a lungsim uh a kheng ua, Pathian ahi, a chi jaw uhi.
Huan, huai min kiangah huai tuikulh a hausapa a min Publia a oma, huai miin a hon naompiha, nithum kipaktakin a hontungsak hi.
Huan, Publia pa khosik leh santen veiin a nalum a; huan, Paula a kiangah a luta, a thuma, a tungah a khut a koiha, a hihdamta hi.
Huai a hih khitin huai tuikulh a mi dang natna nei peuhmah a hong ua; a dam chiatta uhi.
Huai miten nakpi takin a honna pahtawi ua; huan, ka pai ding un ka vante uh long ah a koih uhi.
Huan, kha thum nungin, Aleksandria kho long a min, Unau-Phik, a chih uh, phalbi tuikulh a omsa, huai long ah ka paita ua.
Huan, Sirakasi khua ka tawn ua, huaiah ni thum ka tam uh.
Huai akipanin ka pai kawi ua, Rejiam khua ka tung ua; huan, ni khat nungin sim huih a hongnunga, a jing nawnin Puteoli khua ka tung nawn uhi;
Huaiah unaute ka mu ua, a kiang uah ni sagih tam dingin a honkhou ua; huchibangin Rome kholam ah ka pai jelta uhi.
Huan, unauten, ka tanchin uh a jak tak un huai akipanin Appia Dawl leh Khualbuk thumte chiangah hongdawn dingin a hongkuan ua; Paulain huai mite a muhin Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gena, a muangta hi.
Huan, Rome khua a ka lut un Paula bel a vengpa sepaih kianga amah kia a om a phal ua.
Huan, ni thum nungin, Paulain Judate heutu deuh peuhmah a samkhawm a; huan, a kihoukhawm ua, a kiang uah.
Unaute aw, mi tengteng leh i pipute dan tungah bangmah ka hih louhin leng Jerusalem khua akipanin Rome khua a mite kiangah a honhentasak uhi.
Huan, amau a honetchet khit un sihna khop hial ka tungah bangmah a om louh jiakin khah a hontum ua.
Himahleh, Judaten huai a sel jiak un Kaisar kiang tun lou thei ka hita keia; himahleh, ka chite hekna neia hih ka hi kei ahi.
Huailam thua noumau honmu ding leh, honhoupih dingin ka honsam ahi; Israelte lamet ka kikoppih jiaka hiai khainiang bun ka hi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, na tanchin Judia gama kipan lain ka mu tuankei uh, unaute kuamahin hiaia hongom na tungah, thubuai bangmah leng a pulak kei ua, gen leng a gen ngeikei uhi.
Himahleh, hiai pawl jaw gam tengah gensiat ahi ngal ua, nang bangchin ahia na ngaih? theih ka ut uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, ni achiam ua, huai a tuna ah a kiangah mi tampi a hong ua; jinga kipanin nitaklam phain a kiang uah huai thu a hilhchiana, Pathian gam thu a theisaka, Mosi dan laibu thu leh Jawlneite laibu thuin Jesu lamah amau a thuzoh jel hi.
Huan, a khenin a thugen a gingta ua, a khenin a gingta kei uh.
Huan, a kituakta kei ua, Pualain thu a gen khitin a paikhe ta uhi.
A thugen tuh hiai ahi, Kha Siangthouin jawlnei Isai kama na pipute uh kianga a gen mah, a dik mahmah.
Hiai chite kiangah vagen in, Bilin jaw na za na ding ua, a ngaihna jaw na theikei hial ding ua; muh jaw na mu ding ua, theih jaw na theikei hial ding uh:
Hiai chite lungtang a na takta a, a bilte uh a nangong deuha, a mit uh leng a si ua, huchilouinjaw a mit un a mu ding ua, a bil un a za ding ua, a lungtang un leng a thei ding uh, akiheikik ding ua, ken ka hihdam kha ding hi, a chi a, a chihpen.
Huaijiakin Pathian hotdamna thu Jentelte kianga khakkhiak ahi chih thei un, amau jaw ngaih leng a ngaikhe ding uh, a chi a.
Huchia hiai thute a gen khit nungin, Judate tuh a pawtkheta ua, amau lakah nakpitaka kiselna a nei uhi.
Huan, Paula kum nih vengveng amah in khelhah oma, a kianga hoh peuhmah a nakipahpih a,Pathian gam thu a hilha, Toupa Jesu Kris thu leng hangsan takin a gen jela, kuamahin amah lah a kham kei uh.
Pathian gam thu a hilha, Toupa Jesu Kris thu leng hangsan takin a gen jela, kuamahin amah lah a kham kei uh.
Paula, Jesu Kris sikha, sawltak hi dinga sap, Pathian Tanchin Hoih lama khenkhiak,
huai tuh Pathianin tuma lama laisiangthoua a jawlneitea achiamsa,
A tapa, sa lama David suana piang tungtang tanchin hoih.
Siangthouna kha lam thua misi laka thohnawnnaa Pathian Tapa thilhihtheihna toh hi dinga genkhiak thu; Jesu Kris i Toupa ngei tuh,
a min jiaka ginna nam chih laka mi gingta sak dingin, amah jiakin hehpihna leh sawltak hihna i tangta hi;
huai lakah nou leng Jesu Kris sapte na hi uhi:
Rome khua Pathian deihtak, mi siangthoua om dinga sapte tengteng kiangah: Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Khovel tengtengah na ginna thu uh a than jiakin na vek ua tungah ka kipahnathu Jesu Kris jiakin ka Pathian kiangah ka gen masa phot ahi.
Ka thumnate ah, tawplouin na min uh ka lou nilouhlouh hi, chih, a Tapa Tanchin Hoiha ka khaa a na ka sep gige Pathian tuh kei hontheihpihpa ahi ngala;
Tu beka na kiang ua ka hongna dingin Pathian thuthua zin hun lemtang ka muh teitei theihna ding ngenin.
Na kipna ding ua kha lam thilpiak bang hiam nou ka honpiak theihna dingin nou honmuh ka ut thei mahmah ngala;
Huai tuh na ginna uh leh ka ginnaa i kikhamuan tuah theihna dingin, ka chihna ahi.
Huan, unaute aw, Jentel dangte kianga ka sep gim gah ka muh tak bangmahin, noumau lakah leng gahte ka muh theihna dingin na kiang uah tamvei pi hong ka tumta chih na theih louh uh ka deih kei hi; himahleh, tuma tengin dalin ka om gige nak hi.
Grik mite leh melmakte kiangah bat ka nei a; mi pil leh mi pilloute kiangah leng.
Huchiin, nou Rome khuaa omte kiang ah leng Tanchin Hoih gen ka ut mahmah hi.
Tanchin Hoih tuh ka zahpih keia; kuapeuh a gingta phota dingin hotdamna dinga Pathian thilhihtheihna ahi ngala; atungin Juda mi adin ahi a, huan, Grik mi adingin leng a honghi nawn hi.
Huaiah tuh gin semsemna dingin, ginnain Pathian diktatna latsakin a om; Ginna jiaka midiktat tuh a hing ding, chi-a gelh bangin.
Thutak diklou taka dalte Pathian limsaklouhna leh diktatlouhna tengteng tungah van akipanin Pathian hehna a hongkilangta ngala;
Pathianin a theihsak tak jiakin Pathian tanchin theihtheih ding tuh a lungsim uah chiangtaka theih sakin a om ngala.
Khovel siamtunga kipan a pianken muhtheihlouh, a tangtawn thilhihtheihna leh a Pathianna, thilsiam te achiantaka muh ahi; huaijiakin paulam ding a neikei uh;
Pathian theingala Pathian bangin a pahtawi kei ua, kipahthu leng a gen sam kei uhi; thil thulimlou a ngaihtuah zota ua, a lungtang hai uh a hongmialta hi.
Pil kisa khemin mihai a hongsuak ua,
sitheilou Pathian thupina sethei mihingte leh vasate, gamsate leh bokvak ganhingte limin a suaksak uhi.
Huaijiakin a sa uh zumhuaipia kibawltuah dingin a lungtang uh duhgawlna banga thilnin hih phalin Pathianin a lehngatsan hi.
Pathian thutak tuh juaua tangsakin, a Bawlpa biak sangin a bawl niain a na a sem zota uhi.
A Bawlpa tuh khantawna phat tuak ahi, Amen.
Huai jiakin Pathianin zahhuaipia huk phalin lehlam a ngatsan ahi; a numeite nangawn un leng a omdan pianpih uh danlou banga om dingin a kibawl lamdang ngal ua;
pasalten leng numei zatdan ngeina tawpsana, hukin a kienlah ua, pasal leh pasal zummoh thil hihin a om ua, a gitlouh man muh ding uh tuh a satung uah a mu uhi.
Huan, Pathian theih a ut louh jiak un, thil kilawmloute hih dinga a deih louhlam lungsim neih phalin Pathianin a lehngatsante;
Huchin diktatlouhna tengteng, gitlouhna tengteng, huaihamna tengteng, huatna tengteng khawng in, a nadim ua; hajatna te, tual thahna te, kiselna te, khemna te, nundan hoih lou tein a dim ua;
gensiatna te, migenna te, Pathian huat lam te, kisaktheihna te, kisatheimite, thil gilou bawlkhete,
nu leh pa thu mangloute, theihna beite, thuchiam susete, itna pianpih neiloute, hehpihna neiloute ahi ua.Huchi banga hihte tuh si tak him ahi uh chih Pathian dan tuh thei gigein, amau kiaa hih leng hi louin, mi dang hih jelte tungah leng a kipak uhi.
Huchi banga hihte tuh si tak him ahi uh chih Pathian dan tuh thei gigein, amau kiaa hih leng hi louin, mi dang hih jelte tungah leng a kipak uhi.
Huaijiakin, mihing aw, mi selhat kuapeuh himahlechin, pau lam himhim na neikei hi; midang na selna mahah nangmah leh nangmah siamlouh kitang sak na hi; nang selhatin leng huchibang thilte tuh na hih sam ngala.
Huchibang thil hih nakte tungah Pathian vaihawmna tuh diktak in a tung chih i thei ngala.
Mihing aw, huchibang thil hih nakte gensia, nang leng huchibang na hih sam ngal naka Pathian vaihawmna pelh na kigingta ahia?
A hihkeileh, Pathian hoihna tuh kisiknaa nang honpi dinga om ahi chih theilouin, a hoihna, a thuaktheihna leh, a dohtheihna hauhnate na ngaineu ahi a?
Na chihmoh leh na lungtang khauh jiakin, hehna leh Pathian vaihawmna diktat hongkilatna ni chiang adingin, na tungah hehna na kikhol khawm tawm ahi.
Pathianin mi chih a thil hih bang jel un a hawmsak dinga;
thil hoih hih teiteia, thupina leh pahtawina leh manthat theihlouhna zong mite kiangah, khantawn hinna a pe ding;
a hihhangin, genhaka, thutak jui lou a, gitlouhna jui zote tungah, hehna leh thangpaihna te, haksatna leh lungkhamna thupitakte a om dia;
mihing thil hihkhial tengteng kha tungah a om ding, Juda mi kha tungah a masa dia, huan, Grik mi kha tungah a om nawn ding.
Ahihhangin, thil hoih hih peuhmah kiangah thupinate, pahtawina te, khamuanna te piak ahi ding, Juda mi kiangah piak ahi masa dia, huan, Grik mi kiangah ahi nawn ding.
Pathianin mi deihsk tuam a nein gal keia.
Kuapeuh dan neiloua thil hihkhial tuh, dan louin a mangthang ding hi; huan, kuapeuhmah dan neia thil hihkhial tuh, dana vaihawmin a om ding.
Dan zami phette tuh Pathian mitmuhin mi dik ahi kei ua; dan juite tuh mi dik a hizo ding uh.
Dan neilou Jentelten amau pianpiha dan thilte a hih un, huaiten dan neikeimahleh uh, amau leh amau danin a kinei tawm ngal ua.
A lungtang uah dan thilhih gelh ahi chih a ensak uh, huai tuh a sia leh pha theihna un a theihpih hi; a lungsimte uh tuh a kisela, a thupukna-un siamlouh a tan hiam siam a tan hiam ahi ding,
ka Tanchin Hoih gen banga, mihingte thugukte Pathianin, Jesu Krisa, a ngaihtuah ni chiangin.
Himahleh, nang Juda kichi na hi a, dan na muanga, Pathian na suanga,
a deihlam na theia, thil hoihjaw te hoih na saa, dana hilhin na om a,
nangmah mah mittawte pipa, mial laka omte vakna hiin na kigingta a;
dan ah pilna leh thutak omdan na theih jiakin, mi pilloute hilhpilpa, naungekte hilhpain nakigingta hi;
huchibang na hih ngal leh, nang, midangte hilhpa, nangmah na kihilh ka hia?
Nang, mi guta lou dia hilhpa, nang nag u nak maw?
Nang, angkawm lou dia hilhpa, nang ang na kawm nak maw?
Nang, milim hopa, nang milim biakina thilte nag u nak maw?
Nang, dan suangpa, nang dana na tatlek jiakin Pathian na hihminse jel ahi maw?
A gelh bang ngei un Pathian min tuh noumau jiakin Jentelte lakah hihsiatin a om ta hi.
Dan juipa na hih leh zeksum a phatuam ngial hi; dana talekpa na hih lebel, na zeksum tuh sum louh bang phet a honghita hi.
Huaijiakin, zeksum lou miin dan thu sehte a zuih leh, a zeksum louh tuh sum banga sim ahi kei dia hia?
Huan, amau saa zeksum louhin dan a zuih kim uleh, nang, danthu gelh leh zeksum nei ngala, dana talekpa a honmohpaih kei ding ua hia?
Alang lela Juda mi hi jaw Juda mi tak ahi kei hi; a langa sa lela zeksum jaw zeksum tak leng ahi sam kei hi.Ahihhangin, a lang lel hi loua, Juda mi hi, Juda mi tak ahi; huan, zeksum tak tuh, lungsim lama sum ahi, lai thu phetah hi louin, kha ah ahi; huai miin tuh mihing phat a loh keia, Pathian phat a loh jaw ahi.
Ahihhangin, a lang lel hi loua, Juda mi hi, Juda mi tak ahi; huan, zeksum tak tuh, lungsim lama sum ahi, lai thu phetah hi louin, kha ah ahi; huai miin tuh mihing phat a loh keia, Pathian phat a loh jaw ahi.
Ahihleh, Juda min hamphattuamna bang ahia a neih tuan?
Zeksum leng bang ahi a phattuamna?
Koi lam peuhah a phattuam hi; Pathian thute a kiang ua kep saka a om jiak ahi pen.
Mi khenkhatten ginna neikei mahle uh, banga hi tuana eita?
A gintak louhna un Pathian muanhuaidan bangmah louin a bawl tuan ahia?
Bawl tuan lou hial; Pathian tuh mi diktak hita hen, mi chih tuh juauthei hi uheh; Nang na thu genin siam na tan theia, vaihawm na omin leng na zoh theihna dingin, chih gelh bangin.
Himahleh, i diktatlouhnain Pathian diktatna a hihlat hoih sem leh, bang i gen dia?
Pathianin mi a gawtin, mi diktat lou ahi hia?
(Mihing dan bangin ka gen a hi).
Hilouhial; huchibang hih leh, Pathianin khovel vai bangchin a hawm dia?
Himahleh ka juauthu gen jiaka Pathian thu dikdan amah hihthupi khophiala a lat sem ngal leh, bangachia kei leng mi khial banga siamlouh tan saka om lai ka hia?
Bang a chi a (hon hek ua, mi khenkhatin gen louhpi hon gen sak bang un).
Thil hoih a hongtun theihna dingin thil gilou i hih ding uh, chia i gen jawk louh?
Huchibang miten huchibang tuh siamlouh a tan dik him uhi.
Ahihleh amau sangin i hoih zo khol ua hia?
Hoihzo lou hial; Judate leh Grikte khelhna sikhaa om vekin tumalamin leng i ngohta vele;
Kuamah mi diktat himhim om kei uh, khat lel leng om het kei uh;
Kuamah theisiam himhim om kei uh, kuamah Pathian zong himhim om kei uh.
A hilou lamah a pial khinta ua, bangmaha phatuam lou in a naom khin vek ua, kuamah thil hoih hih himhim a om kei uh, khat lel leng a om kei uh.
A gawl uh han kihong ahia; a lei un khemna thu a gen ua.
A kam sung uah gul gu a om hi.
A kam uh hamse lohna leh thu khain a dima.
A khe uh sisan suah dingin a kin suan uhi;
A lampi uah manthatna leh gimthuakna a om a;
Khamuanna lampi leng a theikei uhi.
A mit uah Pathian laudansiamna himhim a om kei, chih gelh bangin.
Danin bangpeuh a gen, dan thuthua omte kiangah a gen ahi chi hi thei ngala; kam chiteng a chih theihna dingin leh khovela mi tengteng Pathian vaihawma a om theihna ding un.
Huchiin, dan thil hih jiakin mi kuamah a mitmuhin siamtangin a om kei ding uh; dan jiakin khelhna theih kimna a hongom ahi ngala.
Ahihhangin, tun bel dan leh jawlneite natheihsak Pathian dikna tuh dan tellou-a hihlatin a omta;
huai tuh Jesu Kris gintak jiaka, a gingtate tengteng adia Pathian diktatna ahi.
Lamdanna himhim a om kei:
mi tengtengin thil a hihkhelh ua, Pathian thupina a tan zohlouh nungun,
Kris Jesu-a om tatna jiakin, a hehpihnaa a thawna siamtansakin a om uh;
amah tuh a sisan jiaka thuphatawina hiin, ginnaa muh dingin Pathianin a luikheta.
Hiai tuh Pathian dikna latsakna ding ahi, aman a dohtheihna jiaka nidanglai khelhnate a paikan tak jiakin;
huan, amah ngei tuh a dika, chih leh Jesu-a ginna nei mi tuh siam a tangsak chih chetna dingin.
Na otna uh koia om ahia leh?
Posiahin a omta.
Bang danin ahialeh?
Thil hihna danin hia?
Hi lou hial, ginna danin ahi jaw.
Huchiin, dan thilhih hi louin, ginnaa min siam tangin i sep uhi.
Pathian, Judate Pathian ka hia?
Jentelte Pathian leng ahi sam ka hia?
Hi e, Jentelte-a leng ahi.
Pathian khat kia a hih jiakin; huan, aman zeksumte a ginna jiakun, huan, zeksumlouhte a ginna jiakun siam a tangsak ding.Huchi a hih leh dan tuh bangmah louin i bawl ua hia?
Bawl lou hial.
Dan tuh i hihkip jaw uhi.
Huchi a hih leh dan tuh bangmah louin i bawl ua hia?
Bawl lou hial.
Dan tuh i hihkip jaw uhi.
Ahihleh, Abraham sa dana I pu un, bang ahia a muh i gen ding?
Abrahamin thilhih jiaka siam a tan ngalleh, suan ding a nei ahi, Pathian maah jaw hi hetlouin.
Laisiangthouin bang a gena ahia?
Abrahamin Pathian a ging taa, huan, huai ginna tuh a diknaa seh ahi, chiin a gen ahi.
Huan, nasemmi loh tuh hehpihna a seh ahi keia, bata seh ahi jaw hi.
Ahihhangin, na sem loua, Pathian limsaklou siamtangsakpa gingta zomi ginna tuh, amah diktatna a seh ahi.
Mi, a thilhih ngaihtuah loua, Pathianin diktata a seh, vual a jawl sak thu David in leng,
A tatleknate uh ngaihdama om leh, a khelhnate uh khuha omte, a hampha uhi,
Toupan khelhna neia a seh louhte a hampha uhi, chia a gen bangin.
Ahihleh, huai hamphatna zeksumte tungah kia hia a om, zeksumloute tungah leng?
Abraham ginna a diktatna seh ahi, i chi ngala.
Huai bangchi seh ahia leh?
A zeksum nungin hia, a zeksum main?
A zeksum nungin ahi keia, a zeksum ma in ahi jaw hi.
Huchiin, zeksumlouh a hih laia ginna jiaka diktatna a muh chiamtehna dingin zeksum tuh a mu hi.
Huchi-a amah tuh zeksumlouhte, ahihhanga gingtaa diktatna sehsaka omte, tengteng pa ahih theihna ding.
Huan, huchimah banga, zeksumte, ahihhanga zeksum phet hilou-a i pa uh Abrahamin zek a sum maa ginna a neih bang ginna neite pa a hihtheihna ding ahi.
Abraham; leh a suante kianga, khovel gouluah ding ahi ding uh chih thuchiam jaw dana kinga ahi keia, ginna jiaka diktatna a kinga ahi jaw hi.
Dan nei mite gouluahte hi ding hile ubel, ginna bangmahin a phatuam keia, thuchiam leng thuchiam ahita kei hi.
Danin hehna a tun nak ngala; himahleh dan omlouhna ah tatlekna leng a om kei hi.
Huaijiakin, thuchiam tuh hehpihna a piak a hihtheihna dingin ginnaa kinga ahi, suante tengtengin thuchiam pellou-a a luah theihna dingun.
Dan nei mite kian a luah kei ding ua, Abraham neih bang ginna neiten leng a luah sam ding uhi; amah tuh i vek ua pa ahi ngala.
Nam tampite pain ka honbawlta, chia gelh bangin, misite hihhingpa leh thil omloute om bang a genpa a gin Pathian mitmuh ah eite paa bawlin a om hi.
Lamet tuaka a om louhin leng aman jaw lamen takin a gingta a, chi tampite pa a honghih theihna dingin: Tua bangin na suante a honghi ding uh, chia hilha a om bangin.
Huan, ginna kiplou tuan louin, a pumpi sisa banga om tuh a ngaihtuaha, (amah kum ja khawng mi ahi ngala), Sara ching leng a ngaihtuah sama.
Himahleh, ginna tasamin Pathian thuchiam a ging lel keia, Pathian a pahtawia,
A thuchiam a lohching sak thei chih leng a gingta mahmaha, a ginna a hongkip zota hi.
Huaijiakin a ginna tuh a diktatna a seh ana hita.
Huchiin, a ginna tuh a diktatna seh ahi chih amah jiak kiaa gelh ahi keia, eite jiakin leng ahi.
Jesu i Toupa misi laka kipana kaithoupa gingtate i hia.
I ginna tuh diktatna a seh ahi ding hi.Huai Jesu tuh i tatlekna jiaka matsaka om a, siam i tanna dinga kaihthoha om ahi.
Huai Jesu tuh i tatlekna jiaka matsaka om a, siam i tanna dinga kaihthoha om ahi.
Huaijiakin, ginna jiaka siamtansaka omin i Toupa Jesu Kris pansanin Pathian toh kilemin i om uhi.
Amah pansan mahin hiai hehpihna ah I lut ua; huaia dingin Pathian thupina i tan ding lametna ah kipakin i om uhi.
Huai kia leng hilou in, I gimthuakna ah leng kipakin I om uh, gimthuaknain kuhkalna a tuna,
Kuhkalnain theihtelna a tuna, theihtelnain lametna a tun chih theiin;
Huan, lametnain tuh honzahlaksak kei, huai Kha Siangthou i kiang ua honpiak pansana Pathian itna i lungtang ua suna a om tak jiakin.
I hat nai louhlaiin, a hun takin Kris tuh Pathian limsakloute sikin a hongsita ngala.
Mi dik sika sih, mi a ut ngel kei hial ding ua, mi hoih sikin bel mi kuahiam bekin sih a ngap khamoh kei ding.
Himahleh, Pathianin a hon itna a langsakta mi khialte i hih laia Kris I sika a sihna ah.
Huchiin, a sisana siamtan saka i om khit nungin, amah jiakin Pathian hehna laka kipan hotdamin i om mahmah ngei ding hi.
Melma i hih laia bawn a Tapa sihna jiaka Pathian toh nakitam khin i hih ngal un tuh, kitama i om khit nung un a hinna jiakin hotdamin i om sem ding hi.
Huchi kia leng ahi keia, kitamna tua honmu sakpa i Toupa Jesu Kris jiakin Pathian ah leng i kipak ahi.
Huchiin, mi khat jiakin khelhna khovelah a luta, khelhna jiakin sihna a luta, huchimahbangin mi tengtenga jelsuakta hi.
Dan om ma in khovel ah khelhna a om khin ngala; dan a om louh laiin khelhna tuh khelhna a sim ahi kei hi.
Himahleh, Adam oma kipan Mosi om phain Adam tatlekna banga thil hih khial loute tungah leng sihnain vai a hawm jel hi.
Adam tuh hongpai ding tehpihna ahi.
Himahleh, thilthawnpiak jaw tatlekna toh a kibang kei.
Mi khat tatlekna jiaka mi tampi a sih ua leh Pathian hehpihna leh mi khat Jesu Kris hehpihna thilthawnpiak tuh a kiching zosema mi tampi tunga vuhin a om.
Huan, thilthawnpiak tuh mi khat tatlekna gah toh leng a kibang sam kei.
Mi khat tatlekna tunga vaihawmna in siamlouh tansakna a tuna, mi tampi tatlekna tunga thilthawnpiakin bel siam tansakna a tun hi.
Mi khat tatlekna jiaka sihnain huai mi khat mah pansana vai a hawm leh, hehpihna kiningching mahmah leh diktatna thawnpiak tangten mi khat Jesu Kris pansanin hinna a vai a hawm zosem ding uhi.
Huan, mi khat tatleknain mi tengteng adinga siamlouh tansakna a tut mah bangin, mi khat diktatna thilhih-in mi tengteng adingin suahtakna leh hinna a hontun hi.
Banghanghiam i chih leh, mi khat thumanlouhna jiaka mi tampi mikhiala bawl ahih bangun, mi khat thumanna jiakin mi tampi mi diktata bawl ahi ding uhi.
Khelhna latsak sem nadingin Dan a hongom behlapa; Ahihhangin khelhna a khanna peuh ah hehpihna a khang sem,Huchia, khelhnain sihnaa vai a hawm bangtaka, hehpihna inleng i Toupa Jesu Kris pansana diktatna jiaka khantawn hinna donga vai a hawm theihna dingin.
Huchia, khelhnain sihnaa vai a hawm bangtaka, hehpihna inleng i Toupa Jesu Kris pansana diktatna jiaka khantawn hinna donga vai a hawm theihna dingin.
Bang i genta dia leh?
Hehpihna a khan sem theihna dingin khelhna ah i om nilouh ding ua hia?
Om nilouh lou hial ding.
Eite khelhna lama sisa, khelhna ah bangchin i hing thei lailai dia?
Eite Kris Jesu-a baptis luta om tengteng a sihna ah baptis lutin i om chih na theikei ua hia?
Huaijiakin a sihna a baptis luta omin amah toh vuikhawmin i om uhi, huchia Pa thupinain misi laka kipana Kris a kaihthohtak banga eite leng hinna thaka i khosak theihna dingin.
A sihna ki batpih a amah toh i kizop khit ngal un tuh, a thohnawnna kibatpihin leng i kizom sam ding hi.
I mihing lui a kiangah kilhdenin a om samta chih i thei; huchia khelhna pumpi hihmanthata a om theihna ding leh tua kipana khelhna sikhaa i om louhna dingin.
Kuapeuh sisa tuh, khelhna lakah a suakta ta ngala.
Huan, Kris kianga I suh sam tak aleh, a kiangah I hing sam ding chih I gingta ahi;
Kris tuh misi laka kipan kaihthohin a oma, a si nawn kei ding chih i thei ngal ua; sihnain amah tungah thu a neita kei hi.
A sihna tuh khelhna lam thu ah khantawna din khat vei kia a si ahi, a hinna bel Pathian lam thu ah a hing ahi.
Huchi mahbangin nou leng khelhna lam thu ah sisain kisep unla, Pathian lam thu ah bel Kris Jesu ah hingin kisep un.
Huaijiakin, na pumpi uh duhgawlna thu mang dingin na pumpi si thei uah khelhna vaihawm sak kei un.
Na pumpi hiangte uh leng diklouhna vanzat dingin khelhna kiangah pe phal sam kei un; a hihhangin misi laka kipan hing nawn bangin Pathian kiangah kipia unla, na pumpi hiangte uh leng dikna vanzat dingin Pathian kiangah pe phal jaw un.
Banghianghiam i chih leh, khelhnain na tunguah thu a nei takei ding, dan vaihawma om na hi kei ua, hehpihna vaihawma om na hi jaw uhi.
Bangchin ahi dia leh?
Dan vaihawm a om i hih kei ua, hehpihna vaihawma om i hih jawk jiakin i khial ding uh ahi diam?
Hilou hial ding.
Kua kiang peuhah leng a thu mang dinga a sikha dia na lut un tuh sihna khopa khelhna sikha hiam, dikna khopa thu mang sikha hiam, a thu na man uh sikha na hi uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Ahihhangin, khelhna sikha nahita mahle uchin, thuginpi huaia na kipiakna uh, lungtang taktakin na juita ua, Pathian kiangah kipahthu om heh;
Khelhna laka kipan suahtak sakin nong om ua, dikna sikhate na honghita uhi.
Na sa uh hat louh jiakin mihing danin thu ka gen hi; na sa hiangte uh nitna kiang leh, tatlekna dinga tatlekna kianga sikha dia na piak phal bang un, tuin na sa hiangte uh sangthouna dingin dikna kiangah sikha dingin pe phal un.
Khelhna sikhate na hih lai un dikna lakah na siang ua.
Tua na thil zahpih sate uah, huai laiin gah bang ahia nanamuh jel uh?
Huai thil tawpna jaw sihna a nahi nak ahi.
Tunah bel khelhna laka hihsianga omin, Pathian sikhate na honghih un, siangthouna mu khopin na gah uh na nei uh a keihiam, huai tawpna khantawna hinna toh.Khelhna man tuh sihna ahi ngala Pathian thilthawnpiak bel i Toupa Kris Jesu jiakin khantawna hinna ahi.
Khelhna man tuh sihna ahi ngala Pathian thilthawnpiak bel i Toupa Kris Jesu jiakin khantawna hinna ahi.
Ahihleh, unaute aw, danin mi a dam sung teng a tungah vai a hawm nak chih na theikei ua hia?  dan thei mite kiangah ka gen ahi.
Numei, pasal nei a pasal a dam sung teng dana a pasala henkhawmin a om ahi; himahleh, a sihin, pasal lamah dan akipan khahin a om ahi.
Hichiin, a pasal dam sunga mi dang a kitenpih leh, Angkawm, chih ahi ding hi; a pasal a sihin bel huai dan akipan khahin a oma, huchiin, mi dang nei leh leng angkawm ahi kei hi.
Huan, ka unaute aw, Pathian lama i gah theihna dingin midang, misi laka kipan kaihthoh ngeingei na kitenpih theihna ding un, Kris pumpi pansanin dan lamah hihsihin na omta uhi.
Sa a i om lai un dan jiaka khelhna utna hongsuakten, i sa hiangte ah, sihna khopa gah dingin, a sem naka.
Tuin bel honlenpa lakah sikhinin, dan akipan khahin i omta, laigelh lui bang lel hi loua, Khaa hinna thaka na i sep theihna dingin.
Bang i genta dia leh?
Dan khelhna hia?
Hi lou hial.
Himahleh, dan jiaka theih hi keileh, khelhna theilou ding hi ing a; danin, eng ken, chi kei leh, eng chih theilou ding hi inga.
Himahleh, khelhnain, thupiak jiakin, lemtan lai muin enna chiteng ka sungah a om saka.
Dan lou injaw khelhna si ahi.
Huan, tumalamin kei dan louin ka hinga; himahleh thupiak a hongom takin khelhna a honghalh a, kei ka sita hi.
Huan, hinna thuchiam nei thupiak tuh keidin sihna a honghi chih ka na theita.
Khelhnain thupiak jiakin, lemtan lai muin honkhema, thupiak zangin a honhihlumta hi.
Huchiin, dan tuh a siangthou ahi, thupiak leng a siangthou a, adika, a hoih ahi.
Ahihleh, thil hoih keia din sihna a honghi ahia?
Hilou hial.
Khelhna kei sin sihna a honghi zo ta ahi.
Huchiin, khelhna tuh khelhna ahi chih a lat theihna dingin thil hoih zangin a honhihlum ahi; thupiak jiaka khelhna tuh khelhna thupitak a honghih theihna dingin.
Dan tuh khalam thil ahi chih i thei ngal ua, kei bel sami khelhna a khotsa ka hi.
Thil ka hihpen, a dan ka theikei; ka thil hih jelpen, ka thihih utlam ahi ngal keia, ka thil huatlam tak ka hih zo nak ahi.
Ka hih ut louh lam ka hih ngalin, dan a hoih chih pompih ka hi ta hi.
Huaichiangin, ka thilhihpen keimah hih a hita keia, khelhna keimaha om hih ahi jaw hi.
Keimah ah, huai tuh ka sa ah, thil hoih himhim a teng kei chih ka thei: thil hoih hih utna jaw keimah ah a om na a, thil hoih ka hihthei kei.
Hoihna hih ka ut pen ka hih keia, khelhna hih ka ut louhpen, ka hih zo naka.
Ka utlouh lam pen ka hih ngal chiangin, a hihpa tuh kei ka hita keia, khelhna keimaha ompen ahi jaw hi.
Huchiin, hiai dan ka hontheita; thil hoih hih ka ut laiin gitlouhna ka kiangah a hongom nak ahi.
Ka lungsim taktakin Pathian dan tungah ka kipak ngal naka;
Himahleh, ka sa hiangte ah dan tuam a om chih ka thei, huaiin ka lungsim dan a dou a, ka sa hiangtea khelhna dan om kiangah salin a honpi nak hi.
Mi genthei hina lawmlawm ing e!

Huchiin, keimah takin jaw ka lungsimin Pathian dan ka sema, ka sain tuh gitlouhna dan a sem hi.
Huaijiakin, tun jaw Kris Jesu a omte adingin, siamlouh tansakna himhim a omta kei hi.
Kris Jesu a Hinna Kha dan in khelhna leh sihna dan akipan honsuakta sakta ngala.
Sa jiaka dan a hat louh a, ahihtheih vual louh tuh, Pathianin, amah Tapa ngei, khelhna sa gilou bang puin, khelhna thoihna dia honsawlin, sa a khelhna om tuh siamlouh a tangsakta ahi,
Sa dan juilou a Kha dan jui zote eimaha danin a ngiat diktatna tuh tangtuna a om theihna dingin.
Sa dana omten sa lam thilte a lunggulh nak uh; Kha dana omten bel Kha lam thilte a lunggulh nak uhi.
Sa lam thilte deih jaw sihna ahi ngala, Kha lam thil deih bel hinna leh khamuanna ahi;
Sa deihdan jaw Pathian douna a hih jiakin.
Huai tuh Pathian danin a om ngal keia, om leng a om theikei himhim ahi.
Huchiin, saa omten Pathian a kipaksak theikei uh.
Himahleh, Pathian Kha noumaua a om taktak leh, saa om na hi kei ua, Khaa om na hi jaw uhi.
Ahihhangin kuapeuh Kris Kha neilou jaw amaha ahi kei.
Kris noumaua om ngal leh, khelhna jiakin pumpi a si ahi; kha tuh dikna jiakin a hing ahi.
Himahleh misi laka kipan Jesu kaithou nawnpa Kha nou maua a om leh, misi laka kipan Kris Jesu kaithou nawnpan, noumaua om a Kha pansanin na pumpi sitheite uh a hihhing sam ding hi.
Huaijiakin, unaute aw, bat i nei; sa dana om dingin sa lakah bel ahi kei;
Sa dana na om u leh, na si mahmah ding uhi; ahihhangin pumpi thilhihte Kha a na hihlup jel u leh na hing ding uhi.
Pathian Kha pia om peuhmah te jaw, Pathian tate ahi ngal ua.
Laua om nawn dingin sikha hihna kha na tang uh ahi ngal keia; ta hihna kha na tang uh ahi jaw.
Abba!
Pa! chia, i kikou chiangin,
Kha mahmahin, eimah kha toh, Pathian tate i hi chih hontheisak hi;
Huan, tate i hih leh, gou luahpihte i hi hi; Pathian gouluahte, Kris luahpihte i hi a; a kianga pahtawia i om sam theihna dinga amah i thuakpih taktak leh.
Tulai a thuaknate peuh denchianga i tunga thupina hihlat ding toh tehpihthamin kasep kei.
Thilsiam tengteng ten, lamen mahmah in, Pathian tate honglatna a ngaklah mahmah ngal ua.
Thilsiam tengtengte thil thulimlou thuthua om sakin a omta uh; a ut ua om ahi kei ua, lametnaa a omsakpa jiak ahi jaw hi;
Thilsiam tengteng leng siatna sikhaa kipan suahtaksakin a om ding ua, Pathian tate noplenna thupia lut ding ahi ngal ua.
Thilsiam tengteng tu tanin thum leh nauveina thuakin a om uh chih i thei ngal ua.
Thilsiamte kia hilou-in, eite ngei, Kha gahmasa tengte leng, ta hihna kilatna, i pumpi tatna ngakin i lungsimin i mau sam ngal ua.
Hiai lametnaa hotdam i hi ngal ua.

Huchiin, nou Jentelte kiangah ka gen ahi.
Kei Jentelte kianga sawltak ka hih jiakin, ka nasepna pen ka pahtawi ahi,
Huchi-a ka chipihte ka hajat sak theih teiteina ding leh a lak ua khenkhatte ka hotdam theihna dingin.
Amau paih khiakna bawn khovel toh kituah nawn na ahihleh, amau deih nawn na ding sihna akipan hin nawna loungal bang ahi dia?
Huan, gah masa thillat, tangbuang mek them a sianthou leh huchimah bangin a beupi a siangthou hi; huan, a zungpi a siangthou leh ahiangte leng huchi mahbang ahi uh.
Huan, ahiang khenkhat te hih tana a om in, nang, oliv taklou, amau laka phuhlutin na oma, oliv singa hauhna zung kikoppih sam na hih manin,
Hiang dangte lakah kisathei ken.
Kisathei mahle chin, nang a zung vakpa na hi keia, huai a zung tuh nang honvakpa ahi jaw hi.
Huan, nang, Phutluta ka om theihna dingin hiangte hihtanin a om khinta vo oi, nachi dia.
Ahi, a gintak louhna jiak un hihtanin a om ua, nang na ginna jiakin na ding ahi, Uang kenla, lau jaw in:
Pathian in hiang taktepen bawn a hawi keingal leh, nang leng a honhawi tuan kei ding hi.
Huchiin, Pathian hoihna leh a thukhauhna ngaihtuah i: a pukte adingin a thukhauhna; nang adingin bel a hoihna, hoihnaa na om gige leh; huchi a hihkeileh, nang leng sat khiakin na om sam ding.
Huan, amau leng, gingta loua a om nilouh kei uleh, phuhlutin a om ding uh; Pathian in amau a phutlut nawn thei ngala.
Nang piandana oliv taklou akipana sat sup bawn, pian dan lou banga oliv sing hoiha phutluta na om leh, tua ahiang taktakte pen, amau oliv sing ngeingeiah phutlut ding nak hih natel unchia!
Unaute aw, hiai thuguk na theih louh uh ka ut keia, huchilou injaw na kipil sak ding uh: Jentelte buchinna a hongtun matan Israel mi khenkhatte tungah siatna a hongtung tadih ahi,
Huchiin, Israel mi tengteng hotdamin a om ding uh; Zion akipanin Hondampa a hong suak dinga, Jakob kianga kipan Pathian limsaklouhna a hihmang ding;
Huan, hiai a kiang ua ka thu khun ding ahi, a khelhnate uh ka lakmang chiangin, chih gelh bangin.
Tanchin Hoih lam ngaihtuah in, nou jiakin melma ahi ua; tel thu lam ngaihtuahin bel a pipute uh jiakin deihtakte ahi uhi.
Pathianin a thilthawnpiak ah leh a sapna ah a lungsim a khel ngei kei hi.
Nidanglaiin Pathian thu na ging kei ua, himahleh tuin amau a gin louh jiak un zahngaihna na mu ngal ua.
Huchi mahbangin, tuin, Pathian in nou a honhehpihna jiak a, zahngaihna a muh theihna ding un amau leng ging lou eita ve ua.
Pathianin a hehpih vek theihna dingin mi tengteng ginlouhnaah a khum vekta ngala.
Pathian pilna leh theihna hauhdan thuk hina tele!
A vaihawmnate theihtheih vual leh, a lampite sui theih vual hi keina tele!
Toupa lungsim kuan ahia thei?
Kuan a vaihawm saka?
A dit nawn dingin leng a kiangah kuan ahia thil pe masa?Amah akipan leh, amah jiak leh, amah adingin thil tengteng a hongom ahi ngal a; amah kiangah khantawnin thupina om hen.
Amen.
Amah akipan leh, amah jiak leh, amah adingin thil tengteng a hongom ahi ngal a; amah kiangah khantawnin thupina om hen.
Amen.
Huchiin, unaute aw, Pathian zahngaihna jiakin, kithoihna hing leh siangthou leh Pathian lungtuak dingin na pumpi uh kilan dingin ka hon ngen ahi; huai tuh na biakna dan ding him uh ahi.
Hiai khovel dan bangin om kei unla; Pathian deihlam a hoih leh, lungtuah huai tak leh, hoihkim, na theihtel theihna ding un, na lungsim uh a thaka omin honglamdang zota un.
Na lak uah kuamah na kilet sak ding hun val ua kilian sak louin, Pathianin mi chih kianga ginna hun a piak bang jela diktaka ngaihtuah zo dingin Pathianin honpiak hehpihna jiakin kon chi chiat ahi.
Pumpi khatah hiang tampi i nei ua, hiang tengteng nasep bel a kibang kei hi,
Huchi mahbangin, eite tampi himah lehang, Kris ah pumpi khat ihi ua: a tuamtuamin I kihiang tuah chiat uhi.
Hehpihna a honpiak dan bang jelin thilthawnpiak tuamtuam i nei chiat uh: thugen ding a hih leh i ginna toh kihunin i gen ding u;
Nasepna ding ahihleh, na i sem chiatchiat ding uh; thuhilhmin leng hilh hiathiat hen;
Taihilhmin leng taihilh geihgeih heh; thilpemin it louin pia heh; vaihawmmin thanuam takin hawm heh; mi hehpihin kipaktakin hehpih heh.
Itna ahihleh lepchiahna tel louin hi heh.
Gilou lam hua unla, hoih lam len chinten un.
Unaute it lamah, it takin kilainat tuah chiat un; pahtawi lamah, kideihsak tuah chiat un.
Thanop lamah, thadah kei un; Kha a vakna toh phatuamngaiin Toupa na sem un.
Lametna lamah, kipak unla; gimthuakna lamah, kuhkal unla; thumna lamah, thum teitei unla;
Misiangthoute taksapna ah taksap awnghu unla; mikhualte kipahpihin om nilouh un.
Honsawite vualjawl sak unla, vualjawl unla, hamsiat kei un.
Kipakte kipahpih unla, kapte kahpih un.
Ngaihtuah kibangin om chiat un, Kingaihtuah sang lo kei unla, mi neuneu kithuahpih jaw un.
Kipil sak kei un.
Kua gitlouh leng gilouin thuk kei un.
Mi tengteng muhin thil kilawm ngaihtuah un.
A theih liai leh, noumau lambek, mi tengteng toh kituakin om un.
Deihtakte aw, phu kila kei unla, Pathian tuh hehna awn jaw un, Phulak himhim kei lak ding ahi, ken ka thuk ding, Toupan a chi, chih gelh ahi ngala.
Huaijiakin, na melma a gilkial leh nek ding pia inla; adangtak leh dawn ding pia in; huchibang na hih leh a lu tungah meiam na sekkhawm ahi ding hi.Gitlouh zohin om kenla, hoihnain gilou zou jaw in.
Gitlouh zohin om kenla, hoihnain gilou zou jaw in.
Mi chih a tung ua vaihawmte thuthuin om heh.
Pathian thu louin kuamah vaihawm a om ngal kei ua; vaihawmmi-a omte Pathian seh ahi uh.
Huaijiakin, kuapeuh vaihawmmi sel tuh Pathian seh kalh ahi; a selten amau tungah vaihawmna a mu ding uhi.
Vaihawmmite thil hoih hihte dingin kihtakhuai ahi kei uhi; thil hoihlou hihte dingin bel kihtakhuai ahi uhi.
Ahihleh, vaihawmmi kihtaloua om na ut uhia?
Thil hoih hih le uchin a phat na loh ding uh;
Amah tuh na hoihna dingua Pathian nasemmi ahi ngala.
Himahleh, kihta un. temsau lah a mawk tawi ngal keia; amah Pathian nasemmi, thil hihkhial tunga heha phulami ahi ngal a.
Huaijiakin, Pathian hehna kihtakna jiak kia hilouin, na sia leh pha theihna jiakun leng vaihawmmi thuthuin na om ding him uh ahi.
Hiai jiakin siah leng na liau jel ve ua leh; huchibang thil ngei hih teitei dingin Pathian nasemmite ahi ngal ua.
Mi tengteng kiangah piak ding peuhmah pia un; leiman piakna dingpa kiangah leiman pia unla, siah liauna dingpa kiangah siah liau unla; kihtak dingpa leng kihta unla; zahtak dingpa leng zahtak un.
Kiittuahna loungal, kuamah bangmah ba kei un; amau mihinpih itpan dan a jui kimta ngal a.
Hiaite, Angkawm ken, Tualthat ken, Gu ken, Eng ken chih leh, thupiak dang om nalai himhimte, Nangmah na kiit bangin na invengte na it ding hi, chihin a khaikhawm vek ngala.
Itna in innvengte a hihse ngeikei a; huaijiakin itna jaw dan zuih kimna ahi.
Huailou in, tu bang hun ahia chih na thei ua, ihmu khanloh a hun mahmahta chih na thei uh.
Tun jaw i gintak tung lai sangin i hotdamna a nai zota ngala;
Jan a bei dekdektaa, khua a vak dekta hi; huaijiakin miala thil hihte paiin vak thuamin i kithuam ding uh.
Sun-a om bangin kilawm takin i om ding uh, zu dawn buai leh zu khama om louin, huk leh kingaihhata om louin, kilai leh kihajaa om louin.Toupa Jesu Krisin kithuam jaw inla, na sa duhgawlna uh pichin dingin bangmah kibawl kei un.

Huan, ginnaa hatlou mi, a ngaihdante gense louin ngai un.
Mi khatin thil bangkim ne thei din a kigingtaa mi hatlou inbel antelouhing kia a ne hi.
Bangkim neten a neloute simmoh kei henla; nelouten leng a nete gense kei heh; Pathianin amah a kipahpih khin ngala.
Mi dang sikha gensepa kua na hia? a din leh a puk amah toupa ading ahi.
Himahleh, amah jaw dinsakin a om ding, Toupan a dingsak thei ngala.
Mi khatin ni khat ni dang sangin a sep thupi tuama, mi dangin ni tengteng kibang chiatin a sep.
Mi chih amah lungsim ah kitheichian heh aw.
Ni tangpan Toupa pahtawina dingin a tang ahi.
Huan, bangkim nepan, Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gen jiakin, Toupa pahtawina dingin a nea; a neloupan leng Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gena, Toupa pahtawina dingin a ne kei a ahi.
Kuamah eimah adia hing i hi kei ua, kuamah eimah adia si leng i hi sam kei hi.
I hin leh, Toupa adingin i hinga; i sihin leng Toupa adia si ihi ngala: huaijiakin, i hin inleng, i sihin leng Toupaa i hi uhi.
Kris sihna leh honghinnawnna pen tuh, mi hing leh misi Toupa a hih theihna ding ahi ngala.
Himahleh nang bang achia na unau gensia na hia oi?
Ahihkeileh, nang bang achia na unau simmoh na hia oi?
Pathian thukhenna tutphah maah i vek un i ding ding ua.
Toupan, mi tengteng ka maah a kun ding ua, lei tengteng leng Pathian kiangah a kipulak ding uh, chiin, ka chiam ahi, achia, chih gelh ahi ngala.
Huchiin, i vek un Pathian kiangah eimah tanchin i gen chiat ding uh ahi.
Huaijiakin, kigense nawn kei ni, kuapeuhin a unau lampi ah kisuihna hiam dalna hiam koih louh tum jaw hen.
Amah mawngmawng ah sianglou bangmah himhim a om kei chih Toupa Jesu ah ka thei mahmah ahi; bangkhat siangloua sehpen bel, aseppa adingin a sianglou ahi hi.
Na bangkhat nek jiaka na unau lungsim a nat leh, itna danin na gamta kei ahi.
A sih sik Kris in a sih sakpa tuh na bangkhat nekin hihmang kei hen;
Huchiin, nou adia hoihna gilou lama genin om kei hen.
Pathian gam tuh nek leh dawn lam thu ahi ngal keia, diktatna khawng, kituahna khawng, Kha Siangthoua kipahna khawng ahi jaw hi.
Kuapeuh huai thu ah Kris nasem tuh Pathian kipahpih leh, mihing phatin a om nak ahi.
Huchiin, kituahna ding leh, kihihhat tuahna ding thilte i delh ding uh.
Na bangkhat nek jiakin Pathian nasep hihse ken.
Thil tengteng a siangthou ngei a, himahleh a bangkhat nekin mi a hihpuk leh a nepa adingin gilou ahi.
Na unau pukna ding a hih leh, sa nek louhte, uain dawn louhte, thil bangpeuh hih louh a hoih ahi.
Ginna na neih Pathian maah nangmah kia theihin nei maiin.
Amah hoih sak lama siamlouh kitangsak lou tuh a hampha hi.Ahihhangin, ginglelpan a nek leh, ginnaa a nek louh jiakin, siamlouh a tang ahi; bangpeuh ginna loua hih jaw khelhna ahi ngala.
Ahihhangin, ginglelpan a nek leh, ginnaa a nek louh jiakin, siamlouh a tang ahi; bangpeuh ginna loua hih jaw khelhna ahi ngala.
Huchiin, ei mi hatten, eimah kipahna zong louin, mi hatloute hatlouhnate i thuak pih ding uh ahi.
Eimah innvengte hihphatuamna dingin a hoihna ding un kipahsak i tum chiat ding uh.
Kris in leng amah kipahna a zong ngal keia; Nang hontaite taina tuh ka tungah a tuta, chih gelh bangin ahi jaw.
Laisiangthoua kuhkalna leh khamuanna mua lametna i neih theihna ding un, nidanglaia gelh peuhmahte eite hon hilhna dinga gelh ahi ngal ua.
Huchiin, kuhkalna leh khamuanna Pathianin, Kris Jesu gen bangin, lungsim munkhat puin honom sak hen:
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pathian leh a Pa, lungsim munkhat leh kithutuaka i pahtawi theihna dingin.
Huaijiakin, Krisin Pathian hihthupina dia a honkipahpih mahbangin, kipahpihtuah chiat un.
Huai ahi ka gen; pipute kianga thuchiamte hihkip dingin Kris tuh Pathian thutakdan theihsakna dingin zeksumte nasempa a honghita chih:
A hehpihna jiaka Jentelten Pathian a pahtawina ding un, Huaijiakin, Jentelte lakah kon phat dia, na min phatawina dingin la ka sa ding, chih gelh bangin.
Huan, Nou Jentel tengteng te aw, a mite toh kipak un, a chi nawna.
Huan, Nou Jentel tengteng te aw, Toupa phat un, mi tengtengin leng amah phat uhen, a chi nawna.
Huan, Isaiin, Jesai zung jam a hongpai ding a, Jentelte tunga vaihawm dingpa; amah ah Jentelten a lametna uh a nga ding uh, leng a chi laia.
Kha Siangthou thilhihtheihna jiaka lametna na hauh theihna ding un, lametna Pathian, na gin jiak un, kipahna leh kituahna chitengin honhihdim hen.
Huan, ka unaute aw, nou tungthu jaw, noumau mah hoihnain na dim ua, na kihasuantuah thei uh chih keimahtakin leng diktakin ka thei hi.
Himahleh Pathianin a honpiak hehpihna jiakin nou hontheihpih dingin koi kalkal hiamah hangtakin ka gelh ahi,
Jentelte laka Kris Jesu nasema ka om theihna dingin, ka Jentel piakte, Kha Siangthou hihsiangthou a hih ua, pom tak a hih theihna dingun.
Pathian Tanchin Hoih lamah siampu na ka sem ahi.
Huchiin, Pathian na ka sep lam thu ah Kris Jesu ah kisaktheihna ding ka nei ahi.
Krisin Jentelte thumang sak dingin, thugen leh thilhihin, keimah zanga a thilhihte loungal bangmah ka gen ngam ngal keia.
Chiamtehna te leh thillamdang te thilhihtheihna ah, Kha Siangthou thilhihtheihnaah Jerusalem khua leh a kim gam akipanin, Illirikam gam phain, Kris Tanchin Hoih gam chihah ka hilh kimta; keimah honzanga a thilhih tuh huchitel ahi.
Ahi, mi dang suangphum tunga lem ka hih louhna dingin, Tanchin hoih Kris min lohkhitna muna gen louin.
A tanchin gen ngei nailouhnaten a mu ding ua, za ngei nailouten a za ding uh, chih gelh bangin, gen ka tum jaw ahi.
Huaijiak takin ahi, na kiang ua hong ka kikhel sak naknak.
Tuin bel hiai gam kim khawngah sepna mun himhim ka neita keia, kum tampi na kiang ua hong utin leng ka omta a;
Spain gama ka hoh chiangin ka pai kawma nou honmuh ka kilamen ngala, noumau honkithuahpih kham photin, tua lama ka hohna ah nouten non vakhak suk uh leng ka lamen ahi.
Tuin bel, mi siangthoute nasem dingin Jerusalem khua ah ka hoh tadih dinga.
Masidonia leh Akaia gama miten lungdamtakin Jerusalem khuaa mi siangthoute laka gentheite adin sum a tuak chiat ta ngal ua.
Ahi, lungdam takin ahih ua ahi, a lak uah leng a ba gige him uhi; Jentelten a kha lam thilte uh a kikoppih ngal un, khovel lam thilin amaute taksap awng a huksak sam uh a kiphamoh him ahi.
Huaijiakin, huai tuh ka hiha, gah leng amaute dik taka ka muhsak nungin, noute hontawnin, Spain gamah ka pai jel ding.
Huan, na kiang ua ka hong chiangin, Kris vualjawlna kim puin ka hong ding chih ka thei hi.
Unaute aw, Pathian kianga non thum sakna uah, honthum pih teitei dingin Toupa Jesu Kris leh Kha Siangthou itna in nget petmahin ka honngen ahi;
Juda gama gingloute laka ka bit theihna ding leh, Jerusalem khua a dia huhna ka tawi misiangthoute kipahna lam tak a hihtheihna dingin.
Pathian hoihsak banga nuamtaka na kiang ua ka honga, i halh khawm vek theihna dingin.Lemna Pathian na vek ua kiangah om hen.
Amen.
Lemna Pathian na vek ua kiangah om hen.
Amen.
I sanggamnu, Phoibi, Kenkriai khuaa saptuamte nasem,
Toupa mina misiangthoute banga nana kipahpihna ding uleh, na huh uh a kiphatmohna peuha na nahuh ding un honmel theihsak ka ut ahi.
Amah mahin leng mi tampi a nahuha, kei ngei leng a honhuh jel ahi.
Kris Jesu-a honpanpihte Prisila leh Akuila chibai honbuk sak un.
Amau ka hinna adingin amau ngawng a peta ua: amau tung kiaah kipahthu ka gen kei hi, ahihhangin Jentel saptuam tengteng tungah leng, ka gen sam hi.
A in ua saptuam kikhawmte leng chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Ka deihtak, Epainita, Asia gama Kris gingta masapen, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Mari, nou dia semgim, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Ka chipih leh ka hentak pih, Andronika leh Junia, chibai honbuk sak un; amau tuh sawltakte laka minthang tak ahi ua, kei sanga Krisa om masa jaw ahi uh.
Ampliata, Toupa a ka deihtak, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Kris a I naseppih uh Urbana leh ka deihtak Stakhi chibai honbuk sak un.
Kris mi tak, Apelli, chibai honbuk sak un.
Aristobula inkuanpihte laka mite chibai honbuk sak un.
Ka chipih, Herodion, chibai honbuk sak un.
Narkissa inkuanpihte laka mi, Toupaa om, chibai honbuk sak un.
Triphaina leh Triphosa Toupa a semgimte, chibai hon nabuk sak un aw.
Deihtak Persi, Toupa a semgim mahmahsa chibai honna buk sak un.
Toupa a tel Rufa leh a nu, kei nu sam leng, chibai honna buk sak un.
Asinkaraita te, Phligon te, Herma te, Patroba te, Hermi te a kiang ua unau omte toh, chibai honna buk sak un aw.
Philologa leh Julia, Neria leh sanggamnu, Olimpa leh, a kiang ua mi siangthou om tengteng, chibai honna buk sak un.
Tawp siangthouin chibai kibuk un.
Kris saptuam pawl tengtengin chibai hon buk chiat uhi.
Huan, unaute aw, thuhilhnathu noumau hilh louh lama kikhenna leh pukna siamte apan kiveng ding leh kiheisan dingin kon ngen ahi.
Huchibang miten i Toupa Kris na a sem kei ua, amau gilpi na a sem jaw uhi; a kam phat uleh a kam siam un mi pilloute lungsim a khem nak uhi.
Na omdan uh mi tengteng lakah a thangkheta ngala.
Huaijiakin noumau tungthu ah ka kipak ahi; a hihhangin, hoih lamah na pil ua, gilou lamah na pil louh uh ka deih ahi.
Huan, lemna Pathianin na khepek nuai uah Setan a honsik den sak zok ding ahi.
I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na kiang uah om heh.
Ka naseppih Timothi leh ka chipih Lusia te, Jason te, Sosipater te khawngin chibai a honbuk uhi.
Kei, Tertia, hiai lai gelhin, Toupa minin chibai ka honbuk ahi.
Ka tunnapa Gaia leh, saptuam tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi.
Huaia sum kempa Erata leh, unaupa Kuartain chibai a honbuk uhi.
I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na vek ua kiangah om hen.
Amen.
Tuin, Amah, ka Tanchinhoih gen bang leh thuguk kilakna bangbanga Jesu Kris ka tangkoupih banga noute honhihhatthei-pa, -huai thuguk tuh tanglai sawtpi mahmah sung selguka na om himahleh.
