Unaute aw, mi takhial bangpeuh a hihlai phawkin naom leh, nou kha mite aw, Khemna ka tuak sam kha ding e, chia kiveng hoih kawmin, huchibang mi tuh nunnemna lungsim toh dingsak thak nawn un.
Na puakgikte uh kidawn chiat un, huchiin Kris dan thu na jui uh ahi ding.
Mi bangmah hi lou piin, mi lian kuama a kibawl leh, a kikhem tawm lel ahi ngala.
Mi chihin amah thilhih tuh enchian chiat jaw hen; huchia midang toh kiteha-ki-uangsak lou-a amahmaha suanhuai thil ahih theihna dingin.
Mi chihin amah puak po ding ahi ngala.
Huan, thuhilha omin thil hoih tengteng a hilhpa kiangah pe sam hen.

Khalama tuhin bel khaa kipan khantawn hinna a at ding.

Keimah khut mahmaha na kiang ua lai gol pipia ka hichi gelh en un.
Saa mel kilawmsak utte peuhmahin zeksuma om dingin nou a honsawl teitei nak ua; bangmah dang jiak leng ahi keia, Kris kros jiaka sawi a thuak louhna ding lel uh ahi.
Zeksumte nangawnin leng dan thu a jui tuan sam kei ua, na sa uah, suan ding a neih theihna dingun na zek uh kisum leh chih a ut lel uh ahi.
Ken jaw i Toupa Jesu Kris kros loungal ka suan louh dingdan, huai kros jiakin khovel kei adingin kilhdenin ka om hi.
Siamthak nawnna lou jaw, zeksum chih bangmah ahi keia, zeksumlouh leng bangmah ahi sam kei hi.

Paula, Pathian deihlama Kris Jesu sawltakin, misiangthou Ephesa khuaa om Kris Jesu-a mi ginomte kiangah:
Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pa leh Pathian phatin om hen.
Aman vanmun khawnga khalam vualjawlna chitengin eite kris ah honvualjawlta,
Amah maia siangthou leh dembeia om dinga leitung pian maa eite honnateltak bang ngeiin.
Aman a deiha a tup bangbangin, eite Jesu Kris vanga a tate hi dingin, itna jiakin honnasepkhol khinta,
Huchi-a It-a a honpiak hondeihsakna thupi mahmah pahtawina i hih theihna dingin.
A sisan jiakin Amah ah tatkhiakna, huai a hehpihna hauhdan bangbanga i tatleknate ngaihdamna ngei i tangta hi,
Tua hehpihna tuh chillou hialin aman eite a honpeta.
A thiltup, Kris-a a gelkhiak, bangbangin a deihlam thuguk tuh pilna leh theihsiamna ngenin eite hontheisakta ngala;
Huai a deihlam thilgel bel; hunbi hongkim chianga, thil tengteng-vana omte leh leitunga omte-Kris-a gawmkhawma a suktuah vek ding tuh ahi.
Amah deihlam, a lunggel bangbanga thilbangkim semkhepa tup bang ngeiin, amah mah-ah
Koute, Kris-a ana lamen masate, a thupina pahtawina dinga hing dingin sehkholhin kana omkhinta uhi.
Huan, noute, thutak thu, na hotdamna tanchinhoih uh ngaikhiaa gin leng gingtate leng, amah ah chiamsa Kha Siangthou-a chiamtehin na om uhi;
Huai Kha Siangthou bel i gouluah ding tatna kim i luah matenga, Pathian thupina dinga, khamna ahi.
Huaijiakin ken leng Toupa Jesua ginna na lak ua om, misiangthoute tengteng tunga na kitheihsak jel uh ka najakin,
Ka thumnate ah na min uh lou-in nou jiaka kipahthu gen ka tawp kei hi;
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pathian, thupina Pan Amah theihna lam thu-a pilna leh kilakna kha nou a honpiak theihna dingin,

Kris-a a sepzohtak, huchia amah misi lak akipana a kaihthoha, vanmun khawnga A taklama a tutsaka,

Nou leng na tatlekna uleh na khelhnate uh jiaka si na hih lai un a honhihhinga;
Huaite ah, tumalamin hiai khoveldan bangin na naom ua, huihkhuaa thuneihna lal, tua thumanglou tate sunga sem lelpa kha dan bangin.
Huai thumanglou tate lakah eite leng tumalamin sa duhgawlna hihin, i sa utnate bangin i om vek ua, midangte bangmahin thangpaihna taa piang him i hi uhi.
Himahleh, Pathianin hehpihna hauin a honitna thupitak jiakin,
Tatleknate jiaka si i hih hilhial laiin leng, Kris toh a honhihhinga (hehpihnaa hotdam na hita uh),
Kris Jesu ah amah toh a honkaithou-a van munte ah amah kiangah a hontusak hi:
Huchia hun hong tung ding te khawnga, Kris Jesu-a i tunga migitna neia, a hehpihna nak hauhdan tuh a etsak theihna dingin.
Ginna jiaka hehpihnaa hotdam na hi ngalua; huai leng noumaua suak ahi keia, Pathian thawnpiak ahi;
Thilhih jiak ahi kei, huchilou injaw min a suang kha ding uhi.
Thil hoih hih dingin Kris Jesu ah siamna omin, amah khut suak i hi ngalua; huai thil hoih hih tuh i khosakdan dingin Pathianin a bawlkhol ahi.
Huaijiakin, tumalama nou saa Jentelte, saa khuta sum, zeksum, a chihteun zeksumlouh, honchihte u aw,
Huchihlaiin, Kris lou-in Isrealte khua-leh-tui toh kimidangin khovel ah lametna neilou leh Pathian lou-a omin, thuchiam thukhun lakah mikhualin na om uh chih thei gige un.
Tun bel, Kris Jesu ah nou nidanglaia gamlapia omte, Kris sisana hihnaiin na hongomta uhi.
Amah tuh i kilemna ahi ngala; aman ei nihte tuh khata siamin i kikala kimelmakna banglai tuh a hihchimta,
Thusehte leh dan thupiakte a saa hihmangin; huchia nihte tuh Amaha mihing thak khata siama kilemna a bawl theihna dingin;
Huan, kros jiaka nihte tuh pumpi khata Pathian toh honkilemsak theiha, kimelmakna a beisak theihna dingin.
Huan, a hongpaiin, nou gamlapia omte kiangah lemna tanchin hoih honhilha, naichika omte kiangah leng lemna tanchin hoih a hilh sam hi.
Amah jiakin Kha kibanga Pa kiang lut theihna i nei tuaktuak uhi.

Huchi a hih jiakin, kei Paula, nou Jentelte jiaka Kris Jesu hentain,
Nou adinga Pathian hehpihna kepna na a honpiak lam na theita ngei ding ua;
Huchia thuguk ka kianga theihsaka a omdan, tumaa tom chika ka gelh bangin.
Huaia na sim un Kris thuguk ka theihdan na theithei ding uhi.

Huaituh hiai ahi, Tanchin Hoih jiakin Kris Jesu ah, Jentelte gouluahpihte, pumpi hiangte, thuchiam tanpihte ahi uhi.
A thilhihtheihna sepdan banga, a thawna piak Pathian hehpihna tuh a honpiak bang jelin huai tanchin hoih nasemtu dinga bawl ka hi.

Huan, Pathian thil bangkim siampaa tangtawna sela naom, thuguk thilseh tuh bang ahia chih mi tengteng musak dingin;
Huchia, Pathian pilna chiteng tuh vanmun khawnga lalnate leh thuneihnate kianga, saptuamte zanga, tu huna theihsak ahihna dingin;
Hiai tuh tangtawn thiltup, Toupa Jesu Kris Jesua a tup leh sep dan ahi.

A Honsapna pen lametna mun khata sap na hih mahbang un pumpi khat leh Kha khat kia a om;

Bangkim Pathian leh Pa khat kia a oma; amah tuh bangkim tungah a oma, bangkim a mu suaka, bangkim sungah a om hi.
Himahleh, Kris thilpiak tehna bang jelin hehpihna tuh i kiang chiat ah piak a om hi.
Huaijiakin ahi, Tung lama a kahtouh laiin matte tampi a pia, mihingte kiangah leng thilpiakte a pia, a chihna.
Huchiin, A kah tou, chih tuh, lei mun nuainung pente banga a hongsuk masak phot keileh, bangchi a hita ding leh?
Hongsukpen tuh, thil tengteng a hihdim theihna dingin, van tengteng tung peka kah toupa mah ahi.
Huan, khenkhatte sawltak hi dingin, khenkhatte jawlnei hi dingin, khhenkhatte Tanchin Hoih gen dingin, khenkhatte pastor hi dingin, khenkhatte thuhilh dingin a pia hi:
Huai tuh misiangthoute thopna ding, nasepna sepna ding, Kris pumpi lam touhna dingin:
Huai tuh ginna leh Pathian Ta theihna lama thukituaka, pichinga, Kris tangchinna latdan banga i vek ua i hongom masiaha ding ahi.
Huchi-a mihingte diklouhna zekhemna banga lepchiah pila khem tawmtawma oma thuhilhna huih chitenga langkhat langkhata sep leh mut lengleng, naupang i hih nawn louhna dingun.
Itnaa thutak gena, bangkima Amah, lupen, Kris ngeia i khanlet jawk ding uh ahi.
Amah akipan pumpi tengteng, kizopna chiteng sep jiaka, lemtaka suktuah leh kizomkhawma, hiang chihin sep dingdan bangtaka a sep chiangin pumpi a khanga itna ah amah leh amah akilam tou hi.
Tuin hiai ka genin Toupa ah kontheisak ahi, Jentelte a lungsim ginatlouhna uh pu-a a om bangun, na om nawn mahmah ding uh ahi kei;
Amau tuh a lungtang uh tak jiaka theihtheihlouhna jiakin Pathian hinna theihtheihna a pan posiahin a om uhi;
A khenggawpta ua, sianglou chiteng hihna lama huaihamin jautatna ah a kipumpiak uhi.
Nou jaw huchibangin kris thu na zil kei uhi!
A thu jaa amaha thuhilhna om khin na hih peuhmah uleh, jesua thutak a om bangin.
Na pianken lui uh, na nidanglai hindan uh segawpsa suahkhia unla,
Na lungsim Kha uah a thakin hongom unla,
Pianken thak, diktatna leh sianthounaa Pathian batpiha siampen silh un.
Huchiin, juaugen tawpsanin, noumau inveng kiangah thudiktak gen chiat un; kihiang tuah chiat na hi ngal ua.
Heh unla, khelh jaw khial kei un; na hehna uh niin tum pih kei hen.
Diabol leng mun awn sam kei un.
Gutain gu nawnta kei hen; tasam kianga piak ding a neih theihna dingin, a khuta thil hoih semin gim jaw hen.
Thu sia peuhmah na kam ua kipanin pawt kei hen; a khawk dan bang jela bawl hoih dingin thu hoih peuhmah pawt jaw hen, a ngaikhete adinga hehpihna a hohnghih theihna dingin.
Huan, Pathian Kha Siangthou tuh hihlungkham kei un, tatna nia dingin amahah chiamteh na hi uhi.

Huchiin, a ta deihtakte bangin Pathian omdan late hi un;
Huan, Krisin a honit a, namtui dinga Pathian kianga thilpiak ding leh kithoihna dinga i sika dia a kipiak bang mahin itnaah om un.
Himahleh, mi siangthoute hiha kilawm himin kingaih leh sianglou tengteng huaihamna toh, na lak uah loh khakin om kei hen.
Zahmohte, thuginalou gente, chiamniuh thu nangawn huaite bang a kilawm lou hi; huaite hih sangin kipahthu gen jaw un.
Kingaihhat leh mi thanghuai leh, mi huaiham himhimin (mi huaiham jaw milim bemi a hi) Kris leh Pathian gamah tanding himhim a neikei uh chih na thei mahmah ngal ua.
Kuamahin thuginalou peuhin honkhem kei uhen; huai thilte jiakin Pathian thangpaihna tuh thumanglou tate tungah a tung naknak ahi.
Huaijiakin amau kikoppih kei un.
Tuma lamin mial na hi ua, tun jaw Toupa ah vak na honghita uhi; vak tate bangin om un;
Vak gah tuh hoihna leh, diktatna leh, thutak tengteng ahi;
Toupa kipahna lamtak bang ahi hiam zong un.
Huan, mial thilhih gah nei ngei loute ah leng panna himhim neikei unla, pan naksangin a diklouhdan uh theisak jaw un.
A guka a thilhih nakte utuh a gen leng a zumhuai ngala.
Himahleh, thil bangkim a diklouhdan muhtheiha om tuh vak hihlat ahi nak hi; muhtheiha om peuhmah tuh vak ahi ngala.
Huaijiakin, Nang ihmu! hak inla, misi laka kipan thou in.
Huchiin, Krisin vak honpe ding, chih ahi.
Huan, mi pil loute banga om louin, mi pilte banga om jawin, na omdan uah pilvang un;
Nite a hoih louh jiakin hun na neih sungun atam theipen sem jel un.
Huaijiakin hai nuam dah unla, Toupa deihlam bang ahia chih thei jaw un.
Huan, uain khamin om kei un, huaiah tuh kideklouhna a om ngala; Khaa dimin om jaw un,
Phatna late, Pathian late, khalam latea kihoupih chiata Toupa kianga na lungtang tengteng ua ging kilawm bawl leh lasain, leh.
I Toupa Jesu Kris mina, Pathian, Pa ngei kianga, bangkim tunga kipahthu gen gigein.
Kris laudansiamin kiniamkhiak chiat un.
Jite aw, Toupa kianga na kiniamkhiak bang un, noumau pasalte kiangah kiniamkhiak un.
Kris tuh amah ngei pumpi hondampa hi a, saptuamte lutang a hih mahbangin, pasal tuh ji lutang ahi ngala.
Huchiin, saptuamte Kris kianga a kiniamkhiak mahbang un jite tuh bangkim ah a pasalte uh kiangah kiniamkhiak uhen.
Pasalte aw, na jite uh it un, Krisin saptuamte a ita, a sik ua a kipiak bangin,
Huchia amau tuh tuia sila thua a hihsiangthou theihna dingin;
Huan, huchia, saptuamte tuh ninbang lou leh, vuai lou leh, huchibang thil mawngmawng pu loua, siangthou leh gensiatbeia om jawa, amah leh amah tuh saptuamte thupi taka a kipiak theihna dingin.
Huchimahbangin pasalten leng amau pumpi mah bangin amau jite tuh a it ding uh ahi.
Amah ji itpa tuh amah kiit ahi.
Kuamahin amah sa mah aho ngei ngal keia, a vakin a deihthoh zo nak hi, Krisin saptuamte a vaka a deihthoh mah bangin;
A pumpi hiangte i hi ngal ua.
Huaijiakin pasalin a nu leh a pa paisanin a ji a len chinten dinga, huan, a nih un sa pumkhat a honghita ding uh.
Hiai thuguk tuh a thupi hi, himahleh ken jaw Kris leh saptuamte thu ahi ka gen.Abang abang hileh, nou laka kuapeuhmah in amah a kiit bang in a ji it hen; ji mahin leng a pasal zahtak dingin pilvang hen.

Naupangte aw, Toupa ah na nute uleh na pate uh thu mang un: huai tuh thil dik ahi ngala.
Na nu leh na pa zahtak in, (hiai tuh thupiak chiam nei masapen a hi),
Huchiin nang adingin a hoih dia, lei ah leng na dam sawt ding hi.
Huan, nou pate aw, na tate uh hihthangpai kei unla, Toupa thuzohna ah leh hilhna ah kem jaw un.
Sikhate aw, Kris thumang bangin laudansiam leh linga lungtang khatin sa dana na pute uh thu mang un:
Mihing hihkipakte maimah banga mitmei kia veng louin, Kris sikha banga lungtanga Pathian deihlam hih jawin,
Mihing nasem phet hi louin, Toupa nasem bang jawa chitaktak kawma nasemin,
Mi chihin thil hoih a hih chiat peuhmah uh Toupa kianga kipanin a ngei mah a mu nawn ding uh chih theiin, bawi hiam, bawi louin hiam himahleh.
Huan, nou heutute aw, huchimahbangin, amau leh noumau Heutupa tuh van ah a om chih leh, aman mi deihsak tuam a neikei chih theiin vau louin a tunguah hih sam un.
A tawppenin, Toupa ah leh a hatna thagui ah thilhihtheihna neiin hongom un.
Diabol zekhemnate na dou zoh theihna ding un Pathian galvan kimin kivan un.
I doute jaw sa leh sisan ahi ngal kei ua, lalnate leh, thuneihna te leh, tu -a omlel mial tunga khovel vaihawmte leh, van mun khawnga kha gilouhon omte ahi jaw uhi.
Huaijiakin, ni hoih loua na dou zohna ding un leh na hihzoh vek nung ua leng na din theihna ding un, Pathian galvan kim la un.
Huan, na kawng uh thutaka gakin, diktatna awmphaw zangin,
Lemna tanchin hoih vanzat tuh na khe ua bunin ding un:
Huaite ban ah ginna lum la unla, huaiin mi gilou thal kuangthei tengteng na hihmit thei ding uhi.
Huan, hotdamna lukhu leh Kha namsau, Pathian thu la unla.
Thumna leh ngetna chitengin bangchik laipeuhin leng Khaah thum un.
Huailam pangah tuh misiangthou tengteng adingin phatuamngai leh ngen bilbelin limsak un;
Tanchin hoih thuguk hangsan taka theisak dinga, ka kam ka kata thugen saka ka om theihna dingin kei dingin leng honnget sak un.
Ka gen ding bang hangsan taka ka gen theihna dingin.
Huai tanchin hoih palai khainiang bun ka hi.
Himahleh, nou leng bangchibanga ka om, ka tanchin na theihtheihna ding un, Taikika, Toupaa unau deihtak leh nasempa muanhuaiin bangkim a honthei sak ding.
Huaijiakin amah na kiang uah ka honsawl ahi, ka tanchin uh na theihna ding uh leh, aman na lungtang uh a khamuan sak theihna dingin.
Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu kris kianga kipan lemna leh ginna tel itna unaute kiangah om hen.I Toupa Jesu Kris tul loua itte tengteng kiangah hehpihna om hen.

Amen.
Paula leh Timothi, Kris Jesu sikhaten, Philippi khuaa om misiangthou tengteng kiangah heutute leh nasemte toh:
Hehpihna leh lemna i Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Kris akipan nou ah om hen.
Ka Pathian tungah kipahthu ka gen, nou kon theihgigena ah.
Na vek ua dinga, kipak taka thuma kon nget saksakna tengah,
Ni masapen apat tutan phaa tanchin hoih dalhna dia na kikhopna jiak ua kipakin.
Hiai thil mahmah gingta ing, amah noua nasep hoih panpan tuh Jesu ni tan phain a zoukim vek ding.
Na vek ua tungtang thua, ken hichibang lungsim ka neih tuh dik leng a dik him ahi, ka lungtanga kon neih jiakin; ka kolbutna leh tanchin hoih gupna leh hihkipna thua, hehpihna ka tanpihte na hi vek ngalua.
Kris Jesu hehpihna nou ngiingei ah nou tuh kon ngai mahmah chih Pathianin a hontheihpih hi.
Hiai ka thumna ahi: theihna leh theihkakna toh kithuaha na itna uh a khan sem sem;
Huchia thil hoih phapente na deih ua, Kris ni-a siangthou leh dembei,
Pathian thupina leh pahtawina dinga, Jesu Kris jiaka hongom dikna gahte-a dima na om theihna ding un.
Unaute aw, tuin ka tunga thil hongtungte, Tanchin hoih a khanna dia hongtung uh ahi chih na theih uh ka deih hi;
Huchiin inpi vengpawl tengteng leh adang tengteng kiangah Krisa ka kolbuhna tuh a kichianta hi;
Ka kolbuhna akipana Toupa muanna neiin unaute laka tampite tuh lau loua Pathian thu gen dingin nakpitakin a hong hangsan deuhdeuhta uhi.
Khenkhatten tuh hazatna jiak leh thangpaihna jiakin Kris tuh a tangkou pih ua; huan khenkhatten lah hoih a sak jiak in a gen ua:
Pawl khatten tuh itna jiakin, tanchin hoih dikdan gen dia om ka hihdan theiin, a gen ua;
Himahleh pawl dangin tuh kikhenna dingin Kris a tangkou pih ua, a taktak louin, ka kolbuhnaa ka thuakna behlap tumin.
Bang a poia?
Kong bangkima Kris a kigenkhiak phot leh, a khemkhem hiin a taktak hi lehzong huai ah ka kipak ahi.
Ahi, ka kipak jel ding.
Hiai ka thei ngala: Na thumna te u leh Jesu Kris Kha panpihna jiakin hiai tuh ka suahtakna hongsuak dinga,
Ka gingtak taktakna leh ka lametna bangin bangmah ah hihzumin ka om kei hial dia, himahleh ahi gigesa mahbangin tuin leng Kris tuh ka hinna hiam ka sihna hiamin ka pumpi ah hangsanna kim toh hihletin a om ngeingei ding.
Keia din jaw hin Kris ahi a, huan sih leng punna ahi.
Himahleh saa hin ka tan ding hita leh, huai tuh kei din sepgim gah tampi suahna hi ding ahi.
Ahihhnagin ka tel ding ka theikei hi.
Nih kaltehin hamhaihin ka oma.
Pai manga Kris kianga om utna lah ka neia; nakpitakin huai a hoih zo ngala.
Himahleh nou jiakin saa omphot tuh a kiphamoh jaw hi.
Huchiin hiai ginna ka neih jiakin, ka omphot ding chih ka thei hi; ahi, ginnaa na khanletna ding uh leh na kipahna ding un, na vek ua lakah ka omphot ding hi;
Huchia na kiang ua kong pai nawn ding jiaka Kris Jesu na suanna ding uh tam semsem keia na neihna dingun.
Na omdan uh Kris tanchin hoih toh kituak sak photphot un; honga, nou hongmua, ahihkeileh ka om louha leng kha khata na din kipdan uh leh lungsim khat neia tanchin hoih thuginnaa na pan dan uh, na tanchin uh ka jak theihna dingin.
Huan, bangmahah na melmate uh hihlauin om kei un.
Huai tuh amaua dingin manna ding kichetna teltak ahia, himahleh noua dingin hotdamna ding kichetna ahi, huan huai tuh Pathian akipan ahi.
Hiai tuh noua dia phal ahita: kris jiaka, amah gingta kia hilou-a, amah vanga na thuak sam ding uh;Keimaha na muh uleh na jak uh huai kidouna mah na dou ding uh ahi.

Huaijiakin Krisa thu kihilh ding a oma, itnaa kinep theihna ding a oma, kha toh kituahna bang a oma, kilainatna leh kihehpihna bang a om leh,
Ka kipahna honhihkim sak un, huchibang lungsim mah pu unla, hichibang itna mah nei unla, tup kibang leh lungsim khat neia omin.
Kikhenna ding hiam, ahihkeileh kithupisakna jiakin hiam, bangmah hih kei un; lungsim niam lakin, mi chihin amah sangin midang hoihsa jaw hen.
Na lak ua kuapeuhin amaha kia en louin, midanga leng en sam hen.
Kris Jesu a leng om, hiai lungsim tuh nei le uchin;
Amah tuh Pathian banga om hinapiin, Pathian toh kikima om tuh thil khiaklah dingin a sep keia,
Himahleh amah tuh a hongkihih awngthawla, sikha bangin a hongoma, mihing banga bawlin a hongoma;
Huchiin mihing mel a honpua, hongkihihneuin, si ding hial in leng thu bang a honmanga, ahi, Krosa sihna nangawn.
Huchi a hih jiakin Pathianin leng amah tuh nakpi takin a hihliantaa, amah tuh min laklaka min tungnung a peta hi;
Jesu mina mi tengtenga khukdina, vantung, leitung leh lei nuaia thil om tengteng,
Leh lei tengtengin Jesu Kris tuh Pa Pathian thupina dinga Toupa ahi chih theihna ding un.
Ka itte aw, hichi a hih ngalin, ka om lai kia hi loua, ka om louh lai banga leng, thu na man theihtak mahmah bang un, lau leh ling kawmin na hotdamna chiat uh sem khia un;
Amah lungtuak dia, noumaua honut sak leh honsemsak dia hihpa tuh Pathian ahi ngala.
Dawngdawng lou leh phunphun louin thil bangkim hih un:
Khangthak gilou leh khial, a lak ua khovela vakte banga na tennate lak ua, Pathian ta gensiatbei leh siangthou,
Hinna thu tuh tak lang na hih theihna ding un; huaia kipana ken Kris ni a hongtun chianga, A thawnin ka semgim keia, a thawnin ka tai gim kei, ka chih ngamna dingin.
A hi, na ginna thilaat tungua Pathian adia buakkhiaka om ding nahi tamah lengzong, ka dah kei, huan na vek un kon kipahpih hi:
Huai mahbangin, nou leng kipak unla; kei leng honkipah pih un.
Abang abang hileh, na omdan uh ka theiha lungmuanga ka om theihna dingin Timothi na kiang ua honsawl pah Toupa Jesu ah ka kilamen hi.
Hichibang lungsim pua, na hoihna ding uh awlmoh kuamah dang ka nei ngal keia.
Jesu Kris thilte zong louin, a vek un amau tuam chiat a zong ngal ua.
Himahleh amah tuh tain a pa na a sep bangin tanchin hoih genjakna ah kei a honseppih chih theihchetna amah ah na nei uhi.
Huaijiakin bangchibangin ka omdia chih ka hontheihchet peuhpeuh chiangin amah tuh honsawl khiak pah ka kilamen hi;
Himahleh keimah ngei leng ka hong zok ding chih Toupa ah ka kilamen hi.
Himahleh ka sanggam leh seppih leh sepaih pih leh na taksapna ua gamtang leh sawltak Epafrodita na kiang ua honsawl kiphamoh ka saa;
Na vek un a honngai mahmah ngala, a dam louh thu na jak un, a lungkham mahmah hi.
Si dektakin a china ngeia; himahleh Pathian in a tungah hehpihna a neia; amah tung kia leng hi louin kei tungah leng ahi sama, huchia lungkhamna ka neih sawnsawn luohna dingin.
Huaijiakin amah tuh ka honsawl teiteia, amah na muh chiang un na kipah ua, huchia kei leng ka dah luat louhna dingin.
Huaijiakin kipaktakin Toupa ah amah na nakipahpih unla; amah na nangaisang un;Kris nasepna ah amah tuh a hongsi deka, kei dinga na hihkim louhte uh honhih sak a tupna lamah aman tuh a hinna leng a khuai dektak ngala.

Huai louin, ka unaute aw, Toupa ah kipak un.
A ngeingei gelh kei adingin a chimtakhuai keia, nou adingin a hoih jaw hi.
Uite lakah kiveng un, na gilou semte lakah kiveng un, sa atgawp mite lak ah kiveng un.
Pathian khaa bia, Kris Jesu suang, zeksum diktak i hi ngal ua, huan pumpi ah suanding i neikei uhi.
Pumpi lam chilehang kei mahmahin suanding ka nei sem moh kei ding; mi himhimin pumpia suanding neia a kitheihin tuh, ken ka nei sem:
A ni giatnaa zeksum, Isreal chi, Benjamin nam, Hebru mi kholdiak, dan lam chi lehang, pharisai;
Phatuamngaihna lam chi lehang, saptuamte sawi; dan bu-a diktatna lam chi lehang, gensiatbei hi inga.
A hihi hitaleh, thil kei adia punna peuhmah Kris jiakin mannain ka simta.
Hi taktak hi, ka Toupa theihna manpha jiakin thil tengteng ka tanta hi.
Huan, thil tengteng ninneng bang phetin ka sima Kris ka tan theihna dingin,
Huan, Amaha ka om theihna dingin; dan thu-a kinga keimah diktatna hilou- a, Kris ginna jiaka om pen, ginnaa kinga Pathiana pan suak diktatna nei jawin;
Huchi-a, Amah leh a thohnawnna thilhihtheihna ka theiha, a thuaknate tanpiha, a sihnaa Amah batna ka neih theihna dingin;
Bangchihiam beka misi lak akipan thohnawnna ka ngah theih khak leh chiin.
Hiai tangkhinta ka hi keia, bukimkhinta leng ka hi kei; ahihhangin huai mah keia hihsak tumin ka delh teitei ahi, Kris Jesun keipen amaha honhihsaktak jiakin.
Unaute aw, tangkhintain ka kingai keia: ahihhangin thil khat bel ka hih- nunglama omte manghilhin malama om pen ka delh hi;
Kris Jesua Pathian sapna sang kipahman mu dingin phak chiamna tuh ka delh hi.
Huaijiakin i lak ua a piching deuhdeuh bekin huchibang lungsim i nei ding uh: huchia thil peuhpeuha lungsim dang na neih un tuh, huai tuh Pathian in nou a hontheisak ngei ding hi.
I hongtunna, i ngah chiangchiang uah muanhuaiin kip peuhmah ni uh.
Unaute aw, kei honching vek unla, huchibanga omte zuih dinga nonneihte uh tuh chiamteh un.
Tampi a omta ua, a tanchin uh ka honhilhhilhta hi, huan, Kris Kros melmate a hihdan uh, tuin leng kap kawmin ka honhilh hi,
A tawpna uh tuh siatna ahi a, a pathian uh tuh a gilpi uh ahi a, huan a thupina uh leng a daina uh ahi, leilam thil ngaihtuahte jaw.
I khovenghihna uh van ah ahi jaw a; huaia kipan mahin Toupa Jesu Kris hondampa tuh i nangak uhi;I pumpi thulim lou tuh amah thupina pumpi toh kibang dingin, a honbawl thak sak ding, thil bangkim amah thuthua a omsak theihna thilhihtheihnain.

Huchi a hih jiakin, ka unau it leh ngaih, ka kipahna leh ka lallukhute aw, Toupa ah kip takin ding un, ka itte aw.
Iodia ka thuhilha, Sintikhe ka thuhilha Toupaa lungsim kibang pu dingin.
A hi, nou leng ka honngen hi, hakkol puakpih muanhuaite, hiai numeite panpih un, Klimen toh leng, leh ka naseppih dangte hinna bua min tuangte toh leng, tanchin hoiha ka naseppihte ahi ngal ua.
Toupa ah kipak gige un: ka chi nawn ding hi kipak un.
Na migitna uh mi tengteng kiangah kithei hen, Toupa a nai hi.
Bangmahlou ah mangbang kei un; himahleh thil bangkim ah, thumna ngetna, kipahthugenna toh na ngetnate uh tuh Pathian kiangah theihsakin om hen.
Huchiin Pathian muanna, lungsim himhima theihzoh vuallouhin Kris Jesu ah na lungtang uh leh na ngaihtuahnate uh a honkep sak ngeingei ding hi.
Huai khit chiangin unaute aw, thil dik peuhmah, thil phathuai peuhmah, thil kilawm peuhmah, thil siangthou peuhmah, thil hoih peuhmah, thil minhoih peuhmah, hoihna himhim a oma, phatna ding a om aleh, huai thilte tuh ngaihtuah un.
Keimaha na thil theihte, tante, jakte leh muhte uh, huai thilte hih un: huchiin muanna Pathian na kiang uah om ding hi.
Hitamahleh nakpi mahmahin Toupa ah ka kipak hi, huchia tua kei na honawlmohna uh a thak nawntak jiakin: non limsak mahmah ua, himahleh hun kizen na neikei ua ahi.
Taksap jiaka hichibang thugen ka hi keia: bangchibangin om mahleng, huaia lungkima omdan ka thei kheta hi.
Jawndan ka siama, hauhsakdan leng ka siam: thil chih leh thil tengtenga gilvah leh gilkiala om theihna leh niang leh tasama om theihna thuguk ka thei kheta hi.
Amah honhihhatpa ah thil tengteng ka hih thei hi.
Huchia ka mangbatnaa non mangbatpih jiak un na hih hoih mahmah uhi.
Nou mahmah, nou Philippi-te ngeiin leng tanchinhoih om tunga kipat, Masidonia gama kipana ka pai nungin, nou chih louhngal saptuam dang kuamahin piak leh muh lamthu ah, honpe kei hial uh chih na thei uhi.
Thessalonika khuaah leng ka taksapna awng non huksak jel uha.
Thilpiak ka zon jiak ahi keia, himahleh nou adinga gah pung tuh ka zong ahi jaw hi.
A himhimin thil bangkim ka neia, ka haua: hihdimin ka oma, noumau apat bangbang hiam, gim namtui, kithoihna hoih, Pathian hihkipak, Epafrodita akipanin ka namuta hi.
Huaichiangin ka Pathianin Kris Jesu thupinaa a hauhna bangbangin na taksap tengteng uh a honpe ngeingei ding.
Tuin i Pathian leh i Pa uh kiangah khantawn, khantawnin thupina om hen.

Kris Jesua misiangthou tengteng chibai honnabuksak un, Ka kianga unau omten leng chibai honbuk uhi.

Amen.
Paula Pathian deihdana Kris Jesu sawltak leh Timothi i unauin.
Kolossa khuaa Kris mi siangthoute leh unau muanhuaite kiangah: Pathian i Pa kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna n akiang uah om hen.
Nou adinga thum gigein Pathian i Toupa Jesu Kris Pa kiangah kipahthu ka gen uhi,
Kris Jesu na gindan uh leh misiangthou tengteng tunga itnna na neihdan uh ka jak tak jiakun,
Huaibel nou adinga lametna vana koihkholha a om jiak ahi.
Huai lametna tanchin mah, tumain, tanchin hoih thutak thu ah na nazata ua;
Huai tanchin hoih tuh khovel tengteng ah gaha a khan jel mah bangin, na kiang uh hongtung a, chih taktaka Pathian hehpihna tuh na ngaihkhiak ua na jak ni ua kipanin, noumau ah leng gahin a khang jel ahi;
Huaimahbangin Epaphra i sikha hihpih ngaihtak laka na zil bang un, amah tuh kou sikin Kris nasempa muanhuai tak ahi a,
Aman tuh Khaa na itna uh a honhilh hi.
Huaijiakin, ka jak ni ua kipan kou leng noua dia thum leh nget ka tawp kei uhi; huchia khalam pilna leh theihna tengteng a a deihlam theihnaa hihdima nongom theihna dingun,
Huan, nasep hoih chitenga gaha, Pathian theihnaa hongkhanga, Amah kipah lamtaka Toupa a dia kilawmhima na hintheihna dingun.
Kipahna toh kithuah thuak-hatna leh kuhkalna nei dingin, A hatna thupi bangjela hihhatin hongom un;
Vaka misiangthoute gou luahpih dia honchingsak Pa kianga kipahthu genin.
Aman tuh mial thuneihna lak akipan honsuaktasakin, a Tapa ittak gamah honkaisakta;
Amah ah tuh i tatkhiakna uh i mu un i khelhnate ngaihdamna tak.
Amah tuh muh theih louh Pathian batpih, thilsiam tengtenga piang masapen ahi a;
Amah ah tuh bangkim siam ahi a, vana omte, leia omte toh, muhtheihte, muhtheihlouhte toh, laltutphahte leng, thuneihnate leng; bangkim amah siam ahi, amah ading maha siam ahi.
Huan, amah jaw bangteng om main leng a om him ahi, amah ah tuh bangteng a ding khawm chiat uhi.
Amah tuh pumpi (huai tuh saptuamte) lutang ahi a; bangkima tungnungpen a honghih theihna ding in, a bulpi, misi laka kipana piang masapen tuh ahi.
Amaha Pathian tangchinna tengteng a om Pa deihlam tak ahi ngala.
A kros sisana lemna nabawlin, amah ah bangkim amah toh a kilemsak hi; amah ngeiah leia thil omte leng, vana thil omte leng amah toh a kilemsak hi.
Huan, nou, tumalamin na lungsim uah a melma na hi ua, na thilhih gilou ua amaha kipana khena naom na hi ua, himahleh tuin aman,
A sihnain a pumpi ah amah toh noute a honkilemsakta hi, a maa siangthou tak leh, gensiatbei leh, mohsaktheihlouha a hondin sakna dingin,
Kingakna neia kip taka oma, tanchin hoih na jak ua lametnaa kipana suan manga om loua, ginnaa na om gige peuhmah uleh; huai tanchin hoih tuh van nuaia thil siam tengteng laka tangkoupih ahi a; kei Paula leng huai nasem dia bawl ka hi.
Nou jiaka tu-a ka gimthuaknate ah ka kipak hi; huan, a pumpi jiaka Krisin a gimthuaknate ban zom jel ka hi: a pumpi tuh Saptuam ahi.
Noua dinga Pathian nasepna kei kianga piaka om bangjelin huai saptuam nasempa ka honghita, Pathian thu bukim taka theisak dingin.
Huai Pathian thu tuh khantawn leh akhang akhanga kipana thuguk kisel pen ahi; tun bel misiangthoute kiangah latsakin a omta hi.
Amau kiangah, Jentelte laka huai thuguk thupina hauhsakna tamdan Pathianin theihsak a ut him ahi; huai thuguk tuh Kris noumaua om, thupina lametna pen tuh ahi:
Mi chih Krisa hoihkima ka piak theihna ding un, mi chih hilhin, mi chih pilna chitenga zilsakin, Amah tanchin ka gen jel uhi.Huchibang dingin, nakpi taka keimaha a sep sak thahatna tengteng zangin theih tawpin ka sem jel hi.
Huchibang dingin, nakpi taka keimaha a sep sak thahatna tengteng zangin theih tawpin ka sem jel hi.
Noumau leh Leodisia khuaa omte leh, saa ka mel mu lou peuhmahte adingin bangchibanga thupiin ahia nou adia ka kisuk na theih uh ka ut ngala;
Pathian thuguk a theihtheih ua, theihsiamna theihchetna kim hauhna tengteng lama, phan khawma a om ua, a lungtangte uh lungmuanga a om theihna dingin;
Pilna leh theihna gou tengteng tuh amah Krisa selguka om ahi.
Kuamahin paukamsiama a honkhem louhna ding un, huaite ka gen ahi.
Sain na kiang uah omta kei leng zong, kipak taka omin, na kizen dan uleh Kris na gin kipdan uh enin, khain na kiang uah ka om ngala.
Huaijiakin Kris Jesu, Toupa tuh na kipahpih bang un, amah ah om un.
Amaha zungkai leh lamtouha omin, a honzilsak bang un na ginna ua kiptaka omin, kipahthugenna hauin, amah ah om un.
Pilvang un, huchilouin jaw kuapeuhin Kris thu bang hi louin, mihing thugousiah leh khovel thubulte bang jawin a thupil uh leh khemna peuhin gallakin a honla kha ding uhi.
Amah ah Pathianna tangchinna chiteng tuh pumpi neiin a om gige ngala.
Amah ah tuh hinna tangchinna na neita ngal ua; amah tuh vaihawmna leh thuneihna tengteng lutang ahi.
Kris zeksumna ah sa pumpi suah vekin amah mah ah khuta zeksum hi lou, zeksum na hi ua;
Baptismaa amah toh vui na hita ngal ua, huaimahah misi laka kipana Pathian nasep gintak jiakin amah toh kaihthoh na hi uhi.
Huan, noute na tatleknate a leh na sa uh zeksum louhnaa si na hi ua, noumau ngei tuh amah toh a honhing sak ahi;
I tatlekna tengteng hongaidama, batna lai thupiaka gelh i tung ua om eimah hondou gige tuh a thaimangta ngala; huai ngei tuh krosa kilhlumin a la kheta hi.
Huan, lalna leh thuneihnate suankhiain, huai krosah huaite tuh zouin a langtangin theihsaknan a zangta hi.
Huchiin, nek thu ah hiam, dawn thu ah hiam, ankuanglui thu ah hiam, kha thak thu ah hiam, khawlni thu ah hiam, kuamahin hondem kei uhen;
Huaite tuh thil hongtung ding lim ahi a, a tak tuh Kris-a ahi.
Kuamahin amau deihthu lela thunuailutna leh angel biakna zangin, na kipahman uh honsuh sak kei uhen, a thil muhte uh pansanin, a sa lam lungsim jiak ua kisathei mawk mawkin,
Lutang tuh len chinten louin a om uhi.
Amah akipanin pumpi tuh a pumin a guhtuah leh thaguite a vak leh zop khawma omin, Pathian apan khanletnain a khang lian jel hi.
Khovel thubulte tuh Kris kianga na nasihsan sam uleh, bang achia khovela nungta lailai banga thupiakte laka na nakipelut na hi ua?
Mihingte thuchiam leh zilsakna, Lawng ken, Chiam ken.
Khoih ken, chihte huchi bang thil tengteng tuh zat kawma mangthang ding ahi.Huchibang thil tuh, ut banga biak leh, thunuailut leh, pumpi engbawl ah jaw hihtuak hileh a kilawm naa, himahleh sa deihlam zuih khamna lamah tuh bangmah himhim a phatuam kei hi.
Huchibang thil tuh, ut banga biak leh, thunuailut leh, pumpi engbawl ah jaw hihtuak hileh a kilawm naa, himahleh sa deihlam zuih khamna lamah tuh bangmah himhim a phatuam kei hi.
Huchiin, Kris toh kaihthoh khawma na omtak ngal uleh, tunglama Pathian taklama tu Kris omnaa thil omte tuh zong un,
Tung lama thil omte ah na lungsim uh nga un, leia thil omtea nga louin.
Na sita ua, tuin na hinna uh Pathian ah Kris toh selin a om hi.
Kris i hinna uh a hongkilak chiangin nou leng amah kiangah thupiin na kilak sam ding uhi.
Huchiin, noumaua leilam thil deihna omte hihlum un, kingaihnate, nitnate, huknate, utna giloute, huaihamnate; huaihamna tuh milimbiakna ahi ngala.
Huai thilte jiakin ahi, Pathian thangpaihna tuh thumanglou tate tunga a tun nak;
Nou leng tumalama huai thiltea na nuntak lai un, huaite ah na om jel uhi.
Tun jaw, nou leng hiai tengteng, hehnate, thangpainate, huatnate, gensiatnate, na kam ua pau zahmohte koih mang un.
Juau kihilh tuah kei un, mihing lui tuh a thilhih toh na suahkheta ua.
Mihing thakin na kivanta ngal ua; huai mihing thak tuh a siampa batpih banga theihnaa siamthakin a om lellel hi.
Huai ah tuh Grik mi leh Juda mi leh Juda mi, zeksum leh sumlouh, melmak mite, Skithia mite, bawite, bawiloute leng a om theih kei; Kris tuh bangkim hijawin, bangkim ah a om behlap lai hi.
Huchiin, Pathian mi tel, misiangthou leh deih takte bang in lainatna lungtang te, migitnate, kingaihniamna te, thunuailutnate, thuakzohnatein kivan un.
Kua peuhin kua tungah leng thubuai nei bang hile uchin, kithuakzou chiat in, kingaidam tuah unla, Toupan a honngaihdamtak bangin, kingaidam sam un.
Huan, huai tengteng tungah leng itna kisilhthuah un; huaiin thil bangkim kituak takin a gakkhawm hi.
Huan, Kris khamuannain na lungtang uah vaihawm hen, huchibang hi dingin pumpi khata sap na hi him uhi; kipahna dan leng thei un.
Kris thu tuh a hauhna tengtoh noumau ah omsak kiihkeih un, pilna chitenga kisinsak leh kihilh tuaha oma kipahna lungtang toh pathian kianga phatna la bang, Pathian la bang, khalam la bang saa omin.
Huan, na hih peuhmah uh, thugen ah hiam, thilhih ah hiam amah jiaka Pa Pathian kianga kipahthugen kawmin Toupa Jesu minin hih vek un.
Jite aw, Toupa ah a kilawm hun bang jelin na pasalte uh kiang ah kingainiam un.
Pasalte aw, na jite uh it unla, a lak uah hanhat kei un.
Naupangte aw, bangkim ah na nu u leh na pate uh thumang un, huai tuh Toupa pahtak lam ahi.
Pate aw, na tate uh hihnuak kei un, huchilou injaw a lunglel kha ding uh.
Sikhate aw, saa na heutute uh thu bangkim ah mang un, mihing hihkipakte lel banga mit nasem hi louin, lungtang sakhata Toupa kihta kawmin.
Na hih peuhmah uh, mihing ading banga hih louin, Toupa ading banga hihin, kilawp takin hih un;
A itna, gouluah ding tuh, Toupa akipanin na mu ding uh chih theiin, Toupa Kris nasem na hi uhi.Thil dik lou hihpan a thil diklou hih man a mu nawn ding hi; mi khentuamna himhim a om ngal keia.
Thil dik lou hihpan a thil diklou hih man a mu nawn ding hi; mi khentuamna himhim a om ngal keia.
Heutute aw, nou leng vanah Heutupa na neih uh theiin, na sikhate u tungah a dik a tang leh a kilawm hih un.
Thum ngitnget unla, huaiah tuh kipahthu gen kawmin limsak un.
Hena ka omlouh pen kris thuguk tuh gen dingin Pathianin thu adia kong a honhonsak theihna dingin, kou leng honthum sak un,
Ka gen ding bangtaka ka gen khiak theihna dingin.
Hun na neih sungun atam theipen sem jel unla, polama mite lakah pil takin om un.
Mi chih bangchibanga dawn chiat ding ahi ua chih na theihna ding un, na paukamsuak utuh, chi soh, hehpihna hi gige hen.
Toupaa unau ngaihtak, nasempa muanhuai, sikha hihpih Tukikalin ka tanchin tengteng nou a hontheisak ding hi.
Hiai jiak mahin, amah tuh na kiang uah ka honsawl ahi, ka tanchin uh na theihna ding uleh, na lungtang uh a hihkhamuan theihna dingin;
Onesima, unau muanhuai leh ngaihtak noumau laka mi mah toh.
Amau tuh hiai lama thil omdan tengteng a honthei sak ding uh.
Aristarkha ka hentakpihpan nou chibai a honbuk hi.
Marka, Barnaba tupain leng, chibai a honbuk hi (amah tungtang thu ah thupiakte na mu uh; na kiang ua a hongpai leh, na kipahpih un);
Jesu, Justa a chih un chibai nou a honbuk hi.
Huaite tuh zeksum mi ahi ua, huaite kia Pathian gam thu lamah ka seppih, a honkhamuante ahi uhi.
Epaphra noumau laka, Kris Jesu sikhain chibai nou a honbuk hi, aman tuh Pathian deihlam phot pichin leh gin bikbekna neia na din theihna ding un, a thumna ah nou adingin a kisuk gige hi.
Noumau ading bang, Leodisia khuaa omte ading bang, Hierapoli khuaa omte ading bangin phatuam a ngai mahmah chih ka theihpih ngel hi.
Luka daktor ngaihtak leh Demain nou chibai a honbuk uhi.
Leodisia khuaa unau omte, huaite chibai honbuk sak un.
Huan, hiai laikhak na lak ua na sim nung un, Leodisia saptuamte lakah leng sim sak un aw; nou leng leodisia khuaa pen nana sim sam ding ua.
Huan, Arkippa kiangah, nasepna Toupaa i muh pen tangtun dingin pilvang in, na chi un.Kei Paulain keimah khut ngeingeia hiai chibai honbukna kon-gelh ahi.
Ka kolbulhte theigige un.
Hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.

Paula leh Silvana leh Timothiin, Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Krisa Thessalonika khuaa om saptuamte kiangah.
Hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka thumna uah na min uh louin, nou tengteng jiakin Pathian kiangah kipahthu ka gen gige uhi,
I Pathian leh Pa maah, gin jiaka na thilhih dante uh, it jiaka na sepgim dante uh, Toupa Jesu Kris lametna jiaka na kuhkaldan bang uh mangngilh loua, theigigein.
Unau, Pathian ngaihtakte aw, nou a honteldan ka thei uhi;
Ka tanchin hoih uh thu kiaa na kiang uh tung louin thilhihtheihna leh Kha Siangthou leh nakpia theihchetna toh a hongtung zo ngala.
Noumau makhua ngaihtuahin na tunguah bangchibang mi ka nahita ua chih na thei uhi.
Huan, thu tuh, haksa thuak kawmin, Kha Siangthoua kipakin, na pom ua, koumau leh Toupa juite na nahi ua.
Huchiin Masidonia leh Akhaia gama gingta mi tengteng adingin zuihding na nahi uhi.
Toupa thu tuh noumau akipanin a thang kheta ngala, Masidonia leh Akhaia gamah kia hi louin, mun chih ah Pathian lama na gindan uh a thangta hi; huan, kou bangmah ka gen uh a kiphamoh kei hi.
Amau mahmahin hontheisak ngal ua: bangchibang kipahpihna na lak uah ka mu ua chih bang; huan, nou milimte akipana Pathian lam nong- ngattak dan uh, huchia Pathian hing leh dik na sem dingin,Huan, A Tapa, misi laka kipana a kaihthoh, thangpaihna hongtung ding laka honsuaktasakpa Jesu, vana pat nangak dingin, chih bang.

Unaute aw, na lak ua, ka lutna uh ana thawnta kei chih noumau mahin na thei ngal ua;
A thawn hih naksangin, huai malamin, na theihsa bangun, Philippi khua ah gimthuak leh zumhuai taka bawla ka om nungun, dalna thupitak lakah leng Pathian tanchin hoih na kiang ua gen dingin ka Pathian uah hangsanna ka nei jaw uhi.
Ka thugen uh juaua pawt ahi ngal keia, sianlouhnaa suak leng ahi keia, zekhemnain leng ahi sam keia;
Tanchin hoih kepsaka om dinga Pathian hoihsak mi ka hih bang ngei un, mihing hihkipak ding bang hiloua ka lungtang uh zeetpa Pathian hih kipak jawin, thu ka gen jel uh ahi jaw hi.
Chiklai peuh inleng kimaitang phatna thu hiam, huaiham khuhmangna ding thu hiam ka zong ngei kei uh chih na thei uh; Pathian hontheihpihpa ahi.
Kris sawltak ka hih jiakun mi adingin chimtakhuaipi hi thei mah le ung, mihing lakah-nou lakah leh midangte lakah leng, pahtawina ka zong ngei sam kei uhi.
Nu naupom, amah tate hawmthoh taka kem bangin, na lakuah nunnem takin ka om jaw uhi.
Huchiin, ittaka nou kon lunggulh tuntun jiakun, Pathian tanchin hoih kia hilou-in, koumau hinna leng honpiak hial ka ut mahmah uhi.
Unaute aw, ka sep tawl dan u leh ka sepgim dan uh na theigige uhi; na lak uah kuamah ka suktuailuai louhna ding un, sun leh jana nasemin, Pathian tanchinhoih nou ka honhilh uhi.
Nou gingtate tunga siangthou tak leh diktak leh dembeia ka omdan uh a hontheihpihte na hi uhi, huan, Pathian leng.
Na theih mah bangun, Pain amah tate tunga ahih banga hasuan leh khamuanin nou kontheisak uh,
Amah gam leh thupinaa nou honsamlutpa Pathian mi hi dia kilawmhima na hin theihna dingun.
Hiai jiakin tawp louin Pathian kiangah kipahthu ka gengen uhi, Pathian thu koumau akipana na muh uh, na san lai un leng, mihing thu sang bangin na sang kei ua; Pathian thu ahihna bangtaka na san jawk jiak un; huai tuh Pthiana ahi hima, gingta mi noumau sunga sem jel mah ahi.
Nou, unaute aw, Juda gama Pathian saptuam pawl Kris Jesua omte juite na nahi ua, amau tuh Judate laka thuak bang un, nou leng noumau gam mite lakah na thuak sam ngal ua.
Huai Judaten tuh Toupa Jesu leh jawlneite leng a that ua, kou leng a hondelh khia ua, Pathian a sulungkim kei ua, mi tengteng a kalh nak uhi;
Hotdam a hih theihna ding ua Jentelte kiang a thugen a honkham ua, a khelhna uh hih dim gige dingin; himahleh, thangpaihna tuh a khawk theihtawpin a tunguah a hontungta hi.
Ahihhangin, unaute aw, sawtlou kala dia noumau toh lungtang lama kikhen loua, pumpi lam kiaa kikhena i om takdih jiakin, kilawp taka na mel uh mu dingin ka pang sansan uhi.
Na kiang ua hongpai ka tum chiltel ngal ua.
Kei Paula ngei inleng nihvei tak hongpai ka natuma, himahleh Setanin a hondal nak ahi.
Ka lametna u hiam, ka kipahna u hiam, ka lallukhu suan u hiam bang ahia leh?

Huchiin, ka thuak zoh tak louh phet un Athen khuaah koumau kia nutsiahin om le ung hoih ka sa ua,
I unaupa uh.
Timothi, Kris tanchin hoih lama Pathian nasempa bel, nou honhihkip ding leh na ginna lam ua nou honkhamuan dingin, kon sawlta uhi.
Hiai gimthuaknate jiaka kuamah a linlouhna ding un.
Hiaite bang thuak dinga seh ka hi uh chih, noumau ngeiin na thei ngal ua.
Na kiang ua ka om lai un gimthuak ding ka hi uh chih ka honhilh khol ua; huchibang ngeiin a tungta hi, huai tuh na thei uhi.
Hiaijiakin ka thuak zoh tak louh nungin, khempan nou a honkhem puk kha dia, ka sepgimna uh a thawn kha ding, chiin, na gindan uh ka natheihna dingin mi ka honsawl ahi.
Himahleh, Timothi tuh noumau akipana tua ka kiang uh a hongtunin, non muh ka ut mahmah sang un nou leng honmuh ut mahmahin hehpihtakin na hontheigige uh chih thu leh, na ginna uh leh na itna tanchin uh kipahhuai takmai a honpuaka;
Huchi a hih jiakin, unaute aw, ka mangbatna uleh gimthuakna tengteng ah, na ginna jiak un na tung thu uah lungmuanin ka omta uhi;
Tun tuh ka hingta uhi.
Toupaa na din kip phot uleh.
I Pathian ma uah na tung ua ka kipahna tengteng jiak un noumau lamthu ah Pathian kiangah bangchibang kipathu ke gen thei zojen ding uam aw;
Na mel uh ka muh theihna ding uleh, na ginna lam ua na taksap awng uh kon huksak theihna ding un sun leh jana nakpi taka thumin?
Huchiin, i Pathian, i Pa ngei un, i Toupa Jesuin leng, na kiang lam uah honpi hen.
Huan, noumau lama itna ka hauh bang un, noumau lamah kiit tuah chiatna leh mi tengteng lamah itna Toupa nou honhihkhang jelpan honhau sak hen;Huchia, i Toupa Jesu a misiangthou tengteng toh a hongpai chainga, i Pathian leh a Pa maa na lungtangte uh siangthouna lamah gensiatbeia om dinga nou a honhihkip theihna dingin.
Huchia, i Toupa Jesu a misiangthou tengteng toh a hongpai chainga, i Pathian leh a Pa maa na lungtangte uh siangthouna lamah gensiatbeia om dinga nou a honhihkip theihna dingin.
Huchiin, unaute aw, a tawppenin, na om dingdan u leh Pathian na hihkipahdan ding uh, tua na omdan bang uh, koumaua kipana na lak bang un na hauh semna ding un Toupa Jesu ah ka honngen un ka honhasuan uhi.
Toupa Jesu jiakin bangthute khawng ahia ka honpiak uh na thei ngal ua.
Pathian deihlam, na siangthouna ding uh hiai ahi: kingaih tawpsan unla;
Siangthou leh zahtakhuaia noumau ji kem siam chiata,
Pathian theilou Jentelte banga huk lamsanga ut louin.
Huai lam thu ajaw kuamah takhial in a unau tungah thil hoihlou hih kei hen; Toupa tuh huhchibang thilhihte tengteng phulapa a hih jiakin-kou leng ka honhilh khol un ka hontheisak khinta uhi.
Pathianin sianglou dingin a honsam keia, siangthou dingin a honsam ahi zo ngala.
Huaijiakin a nialin tuh mihing nial ahi keia, Pathian, noua Kha Siangthou honpepa nial ahi jaw hi.
A hihangin, unaute itdan lam thu gelh sak na kiphamoh kei ua, kiit tuah chiat dingin noumau ngei Pathian hilhin na om ngal ua.
Masidonia gama unau om tengteng tungah huai tuh na hih ngei uhi.
Himahleh, unaute aw, na hauh semsemna ding un ka honhasuan uhi;
Kamsiam deuha om leh, noumau na chiat limsak leh, thu ka honpiak bang ua na khut ua sep ngei na tupna ding un;
Huchiin polama mite tungah kilawm takin na om thei ding ua, bangmah na kitasam theikei ding uhi.
Himahleh, unaute aw, mi dang lametna himhim neiloute banga na lungkham louhna ding un, ihmute tungtang na theih louh uh ka deih kei uhi.
Jesu a si a, a thou nawnta chih i gingta ua, huchimahbangin Jesua ihmu khinsate tuh Pathianin amah toh hontonpih ding ahi ngala.
Hiai tuh Toupa thuin na kiang uah ka gen uhi; eite Toupa hongpai phaa hingdama naom laiten, ihmu khinsate tuh i makhelh kei hial ding hi, chih.
Toupa mahmah kikou aw toh, angel tungnungpen aw toh, Pathian pengkul ging toh, van akipana hongpai suk ding ahi ngala, huan, Krisa siasate a thou masa phot ding ua;
Huai khit chiangin eite hingdama naom laite, huihkhua ah Toupa tuak ding in amau toh mei lakah lak touhin i om ding ua; huchiin khantawnin Toupa kiangah i omta ding hi.Huaijiakin hiai thutein kikhamuan tuah chiat un.
Huaijiakin hiai thutein kikhamuan tuah chiat un.
Ahihhangin, unaute aw, a hun leh a ni lam thute himhim gelh sak na kiphamoh kei uhi.
Toupa ni tuh jana guta bangin a hongtung ding chih noumau ngeiin chiantakin na thei ngal ua,
Muanna leh bitna, chia a gen lai tak un numei nauvei bangin thakhatin manthatna a tunguah a tung dinga, a suakta kei hial ding uhi.
Himahleh, unaute aw, nou jaw, huai niin guta banga a honbingphawn dingin mialah na om kei uh;
Vak tate leh sun tate na hi vek ngal ua; jana mi i hi kei ua, miala mi leng i hi sam kei hi.
Huai jiakin, midang te bangin i ihmu kei ding uh, hak niin, limsak jaw ni.
Ihmute tuh janah ahi a ihmut uh; zukhamte leng janin ahi a kham uh.
Himahleh, ei bel suna mi i hih jiakin, ginna leh itna lum tawiin, hotdam lametna tuh lukhua zangin limsak jaw ni.
Pathianin thangpaihna thuak ding hi louin, Toupa Jesu Kris jiaka hotdamna mu ding jawin a honchi ahi ngala.
I hahin leng, i ihmutin leng, amah toh i hin khawm theihna ding in amah tuh i sih sikin a si hi.
Huaijiakin, kihasuan chiatin, kitungding tuah chiat un, na hih naknak mahbang un.
Himahleh, unaute aw, na lak ua semgim leh, Toupaa na heutu ua omleh, nou honhilhte thei dingin ka honngen ahi;
A na sep jiak ua itna ngaithupi mahmah dingin.
Kituakin om un.
Huan, unaute aw, kon hasuan uhi, danbangloua omte hilh unla, lungkete hasuan unla, hatloute panpih unla, mi tengteng lakah thuakzou takin om un.
Kuamahin kua gitlouh leng gitlouhna thuk lou dingin pilvang un; thil na kihihsak tuahna lam uah leh mi tengteng tunga na hih sakna lam uah leng, a hoih lamlam jui jaw un.
Nuam gige un;
Tawp louin thum un;
Bangkim ah kipahthu gen gige un; haui tuh noumau lam thu ah Kris Jesu ah Pathian deihlam ahi ngala.
Kha tuh phelh kei un;
Thugente simmoh kei un;
Bangkim enchian jaw unla, a hoihlam peuhmah len chinten unla;
Gilou lam peuhmah ah kihemkhai un.
Huan, lemna Pathian ngeiin nou honhihsiangthou sipsip hen; huan, na kha uh leh, na lungsim uh leh, na pumpi uh i Toupa Jesu Kris hongpai chiangin, gensiatbeiin humbit in om suak sipsip hen.
Nou honsampa a muanhuaia, hih leng a hih ding hi.
Unaute aw, honthum sak un.
Unaute tengteng tawp siangthouin chibai honna buk sak un.
Hiai lai a hih leh unau tengteng kiangah sim dingin Toupa minin ka honngen hi.I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Amen.
I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Amen.
Paula leh Sivana leh Timothiin, Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Krisa Thessalonika khuaa saptuamte kiangah:
Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Unaute aw, noumau tung thu ah Pathian kianga kipahthu gengen ding him ka hi uh: huai tuh hihtuak him ahi, na ginna uh nakpi taka khanglianin, na vek ua na kiit tuah chiatna utuh a khang tuantuan ngala;
Huchiin, min nou a honsawina tengteng uleh gim na thuaknate khawng uah na kuhkal dan uleh na gindan uh-huaijiakin Pathian saptuam pawlte lakah kou ka honsuang uhi.
Huaite tuh Pathian gama dia seh kilawmhima bawla na om theihna ding ua Pathian vaihawm diktat chiamtehna kichiantak ahi, huai gam jiaka thuak nahi uhi;
Pathianin diktathuaiin a septa ngala, huchia nou honhihgimte gimthuak naa a thuka,
Toupa Jesu vana kipana angel hatte toh meikuanga hongkilak chianga, nou hihgima omte kou toh khawlnaa honthuk nawna,
Pathian theilou mi eh i Toupa Jesu tanchin hoih taksangloute tunga phu a lak ding tu'.
Aman tuh tangtawn manthatna gawtna leh Toupa omna leh a thilhihtheihna thupina akipana posiahna a thuak ding ua,
Huai nia a misiangthoute-a hihthupi-a om ding leh ka hon thu theihsak uh gintak jiaka huchibanga gingtate tengtenga lamdangsaka om ding amah a hong pai chiangin.
Huchia hihthupi leh lamsang sak a hih theihna dinga i Pathianin nou a honsapnaa sap tuak him a honsak theihna dingin leh, hoih utna chiteng leh ginna nasep chitenga thilhihtheihnaa a honlohchinsak theihna dingin, nou adin kon thumsak gige uhi;Huchia i Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna bang jela i Toupa Jesu min tuh noumaua hihthupia a oma noumau leng amaha hihthupia na om theihna ding un.
Huchia i Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna bang jela i Toupa Jesu min tuh noumaua hihthupia a oma noumau leng amaha hihthupia na om theihna ding un.
Himahleh, unaute aw, i Toupa Jesu Kris hongpaina leh amah tuak dinga i vakikhopna ding thu ah,
Toupa ni tuh a tungkhinta chihna khain hiam aw, thu jiakin hiam aw, kou akipana laikhak jiak khawngin hiam aw, na lungsim uh a lin pah louhna dingin leh na buai tuan louhna ding un ka honngen uhi.
Kuamahin bangmahin honkhem kei uhen; puksanna tak a hongtun masak phota, khelhna mipa, mangthang tapa ngei a hongkilat keileh huai ni tuh tung lou ding ahi ngala.
Amah tuh Pathian a hihsak peuhmah uleh, sabiak tengteng douin, a tung ua om tumin a kihihthupi ding: huchiin Pathian temple-a tuin Pathian banghialin a kitung khe ding hi.
Na lak ua ka om laiin leng tuabang thu ka honhilh jel chih na theigige kei ua hia?
Amah hun tuam kiaa a hongkilat theihna dingin bangin ahia tua kham na thei uhi.
Danloua omna thugukin tuin leng a sem lelel ngala; himahleh lakmanga a om masiah tua a khampan huchibangin a kham ding hi.
Huai lakmang chiangin dana talekpa tuh a honkilangta dia, Toupa Jesun amah tuh a kam hatnain a hihlum dia, a hongpaina leh kilaknain a hihmang ding hi.
Huai dana talekpa a hongpaina tuh Setan sepdan bang jelin, thilhihtheihna chiteng, chiamtehna chiteng, juau thillamdang chiteng toh,
Mangthang lellelte dingin khemna gilou chiteng toh ahi ding; hotdama a om theihna ding ua thutak itna tuh a pom louh jiak un.
Huaijiakin juau thu a ginna ding un, Pathianin diklouhna nasep a kiang uah a honsawl ding.
Thu tak ging loua diktatlohnaa kipak zoten siamlouh a tan vek theihna ding un.
Unau, Toupa ngaihtakte aw, Kha hihsiangthou leh thutak gingtaa hotdama om dingin a tunga kipan Pathianin nou a hontel jiakin na tungthu uah jaw Pathian kiangah kipahthu gen jel ding him ka hi uhi.
Huchimahbang dingin aman tuh ka tangchin hoih un nou a honsam hi, i Toupa Jesu Kris thupina tang dingin.
Huchiin, unaute aw, ding kip unla, thugousiah thugenin hiam, kon laikhak uhiama nou kon hilhte uh tuh, leh kip un.
Huchiin, i Toupa Jesu Kris mah leh Pathian i Pa, eite honitpa leh hehpihna jiaka khantawna khamuanna leh lametna hoih honpepan,Na lungtangte uh hihkhamuangin, thil hihhoih leh thugen chiteng ah hihkip hen.
Na lungtangte uh hihkhamuangin, thil hihhoih leh thugen chiteng ah hihkip hen.
A tawppenin, unaute aw, Toupa thu tuh, noumau laka a om bangin, khanga hihthupia a om theihna ding leh,
Migenhakte leh mi giloute laka ka bit theihna ding un, honthum sak un; mi tengtengin lah ginna a nei vek kei ua.
Himahleh, Toupa tuh a muanhuaia, aman tuh a hihkipin mi gilou lakah nou a honveng ding hi.
Kon thupiak peuhmah uh na hih zou ua. na hih jeljel uleng Toupa ah ka honum uhi.
Huan, Toupan na lungtangte uh Pathian itna ah leh Kris kuhkalna ah pi lut hen.
Huan, unaute aw, ka lak ua kipana thugousiah a muh bang ua om loua, dan lou banga om unau tengteng laka kihemkhe dingin i Toupa Jesu Kris minin thu ka honpia uhi.
Noumau mahmahin non zuihdan ding uh na thei ngal ua; na lak uah dan lou bangin ka gamta ngei kei uhi.
Kuamah khuta kipanin a mawkin na tanghou uh leng ka ne ngei kei uhi; na lak ua kuamah kon tuailuaisak louhna ding un sun leh jana gimtak leh tawl taka sem kawmin ka ne phet uhi;
Huai thu neihna ka neihlouh jiak uh hilouin, noumau zuih dingin ka omdan uah zuih ding konpia uh ahi jaw.
Na kiang ua ka om lai un leng, hiai thu ka honpia uhi: kuapeuhin na a sep nop keileh, nek leng ne kei hen, chih.
Na lak ua khenkhat dan lou banga om nakte tungtang ka za ngal ua, huaiten tuh na himhim a sem kei ua, a lawptawp jaw uhi.
Huchi a hih chiangin, huai bang mite tuh sem hiathiat ding leh, amau tanghou ne dingin Toupa Jesu Kris ah thupiain ka hasuan uhi.
Unaute aw, nou jaw thil hoih hih chimtak kei un.
Huan, kuapeuhin hiai ka laikhak ua ka thu uh a zuih keileh, huai mi tuh na kithuahpih het louhna ding un chiamteh un, a zum theihna dingin.
Himahleh, melma bangin jaw bawl kei un, unau bangin hilh jaw un.
Huan, lemna Toupa ngeiin khantawnin banglam peuhah nou lemna honpia hen.
Toupa tuh na vek ua lakah om hen.
Kei, Paulain, keimah khut ngeiin hiai chibaibukna ka gelh hi; hiai tuh ka laikhak tengah chiamtehna ahi; hichibang tuh ka gelh dan ahi.I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na vek ua kiangah om hen.
Amen.
I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na vek ua kiangah om hen.
Amen.
Paula, Pathian in Hondampa leh Khrist Jesu, I Lamet, thupiak banga Kris Jesu sawltak in:
Ginna a ka ta taktak Timothi kiang ah: Pathian I Pa leh, Kris Jesu I Toupa kiang a kipan, hehpihna, zahngaihna, lemna hong om hen.
Masidonia gama ka hoh dek laia konnget bangin Ephesa khua ah om gige in, huchia mi khenkhat thugin tuam himhim sinsak lou dinga na hilh theihna dingin.
Huan Pathian lama phattuamna, ginnaa ompen hiloua, kiselna leh gintakthu gen khawng omsak lel tangthu lel khang thu sui zohlouh peuh buaipih sam lou dinga na hilh theihna dingin:
Eiten thuhilh ding I kep pen bel lungtang siangthou leh sialehphatheihna siang leh ginnah taktak akipana pawt itna ahi zaw ngala.
Mi khenkhatten hiaite pialsanin thuginalou genna lamah a vakmangta ua.
A thu gen uh leh thil ahi-a agente uleng bang ahia chih theiloupe in, dan hilhmite hih a ut nak uhi.
Dan jaw a hoih chih I thei ngal ua, min a zat hoih peuhmah uleh.
Ahia lah, dan jaw mi dikatte adinga bawl ahi keia, dan kalhte leh dan lou a omte ading, Pathian limsakloute leh khialte mi siangthouloute leh Pathian zahloute, pate that khawng leh nute that khawng, mihing that khawng.
kingaihhat khawng ading, tawkohuk khawng a ding, mihing gukhat khawng a ding, juauthei khawng a ding, kichiam khemkhem khawng a ding leh
phat tuak Pathian tanchinhoih thupi hilhna dik ka kiang a kepsak bang kalha om thil dang himhim a dinga leng bawl ahi jaw hi.
A honhihhatpa Kris Jesu I Toupa kiangah kipahthu ka gen hi, muanhuai a honsak a, a nasempa dia a hon chih tak jiakin;
tumalamin Pathian gensepa leh sawipa leh hihsemi nahita mahleng; himahleh, ginglou pia theilou a hih ka hih jiakin ahi, zahngaihna ka namuh tak;
huan, I Toupa hehpihna tuh, gina leh Kris Jesua itna in nakpi takin a dimletta.
Kris Jesu khialte hondam dingin khovel ah a hongpai chih tuh ataksanhuai in a laktuak mahmah hi.
A lak ua khialpen ka hi;
himaleh, hiai jiakin ahi zangaihna ka na muh: Jesu Kris in a dohzohna kim akhialpen keimaha a latsak theihna ding ahi, huai tuh tubansiah khantawna hinna muhna dinga Amah hon gingta ding-te adia etsakna hi ding in.
Kumpipa khantawna om, setheilou, muhtheihlouh, Pathian tak kia, khantawna zahtak leh thupiin om hen, Amen.
Ka tapa Timothi aw, na tungtang genkholhnate toh kituakin, hiai mohpuakna leh thuhilhna konpia, huchia huai thute-a hilha om a, kidouna hoih na dou heihna ding in,
ginna leh sialehpha theihna siang tak len chinten in, Mi khenkhatten huai sialehpha- theihna tuh paikhia in ginna lamah long sia bangin a kekseta uhi;huaite lakah tuh Himenai leh Aleksandar a tel ua; Pathian gensiat louh a chin theihna ding un amau tuh Setan ka peta hi.
huaite lakah tuh Himenai leh Aleksandar a tel ua; Pathian gensiat louh a chin theihna ding un amau tuh Setan ka peta hi.
Huchiin, a masapen in, thilnget thumnate, thumna himhimte, thumsaknate, kipahthu genna te, mi tengteng ading a bawl sak dingin ka hon hasuan hi;
Kumpipate leh thuneite tengteng ading inleng; Pathian limsak leh zahtakhuai taka kituaka khamuang a I om theihna dingin.
Huaituh I Hondampa Pathian theih in a hoih in, a kipahhuai hi;
Aman tuh mi tengteng hotdama om ding leh thutak thei dingin a deih hi.
Pathian khat kia a om, Pathian leh mihing kikal ah Palai khat kia a om nawn,
Amah tuh mihing ahi, Khris Jesu, mi tengteng tatna dia kipiapen; huai heihpihna tuh a huntaka piak ahi.
Hiai hihding a tangkoupihpa ding leh sawltaka seh ka hi (thu taktak ka gen, ka juai kei); ginna leh thutak a Jentelte hilhpa a seh ka hi.
Huchiin, pasalten mun chiha khut siangthou jakin, thangpailou leh kisellouin thum le uh ka deih ahi.
Tua bangmah in numeite zumthei leh omdan siamin puansilh kilawm lelin kivan le uh; sam phek hiam, dangkaeng hiam, tuikepsuang hiam, puan mantam taktak khawng a kivan louin:
Ahihhangin numei Pathian limsak kichite a kihun lelin thil hih hoihin kivan le uh, ka deih hi.
Numei in thumang hiathiatin om dinden in zil hen.
Ahihhangin, numeiin thu a hilh jaw ka phal kei, pasal tunga thuneih leng ka phal sam kei, dai dindenin om jaw hen.
Adam tuh siam masak ahi a, huai nungin Evi siam ahi ngala.
Huan, Adam tuh khemin a om keia, numei bel khemin a om a, tatlekna ah a pukta hi.Himahleh, omdan siamna toh ginna leh itna leh siangthounaa a om gige leh, numei tuh nau a pianna jiakin hotdamin a om ding hi.
Himahleh, omdan siamna toh ginna leh itna leh siangthounaa a om gige leh, numei tuh nau a pianna jiakin hotdamin a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh saptuam heutua pan utin nasep hoih a ut ahi, chih a dik ahi,
Huchiin, saptuam heutu tuh gensiatbei, ji khat nei, kidek thei, navak tak, mi diktat, mi paktakdan siam, thuhilhsiam,
uain kham hatlou, mi vuak hatlou mi nunnem hi zaw ding, selhatlou, sum deihta lou,
zahtakhuai taka tate kepsiam, amah insung vaihawm kizen taka hihsiam mi hi ding ahi;
min amah insung vaihawm nangawn kizen taka a hihsiam kei ngalin, bangchin ahia Pathian saptuamte a kep theih ding?
Gingthakmi ahi ding ahi kei, huchilou in jaw kisatheiin a om dia, diabol siamlouhtansakna ah a puk kha ding.
Huaite louleng, polama mite phatin a om nalai ding ahi, huchilou in jaw, gensiata a omin, diabol thang ah a awk kha ding.
Huchimahbangin, saptuam upate tuh mi zahtakhuai ahi ding uh ahi; kamtamte, uain haite, lepna nina huaiham mite ahi ding uh ahi kei;
sia leh pha theihna sianga ginna thuguk kemmi ahi zaw ding ahi.
Huan, huaite leng chetin om masa uhen, huai nungin gensiatbei a honghih uleh, saptuam upa na sem uhen.
Huchimahbangin a numeite uh leng mi zahtakhuai ahi ding uhi, gensiathatte hi louin, kidekthei leh bangkima muanhuai ahi ding uhi.
Saptuam upate tuh ji khat nei a tate uleh amau insung vaihawm navak tak a hih mi hi uhen.
Saptuam upa na hoihtak a semten amau adingin phattak hihna aloh ua, huan Kris Jesu-a om ginna a muanna leh hangsanna thupitak amu ngal ua.
Sawtlouchik chiang a na kianga hongpai lamenin hiai thu khawng na kiangah ka gelh ahi;
himahleh ka hong om sawt khak leh Pathian inkuanpihte laka mi bangchibangin ahia a om ding uh chih na theihna dingin ka gelh ahi; Pathian inkuanpihte tuh Pathian hing saptuamte, thutak khuam leh kingakna tuh ahi uhi.I gen uh, I Pathian biakna thuguk tuh selvuallouhin a thupi ahi: Pathian tuh sa a muhtheih a latsakin hongoma, Kha a siamtansak, angelte muh, namte laka tangkoupih, khovela mite gin, thupina a pitouh ahi.
I gen uh, I Pathian biakna thuguk tuh selvuallouhin a thupi ahi: Pathian tuh sa a muhtheih a latsakin hongoma, Kha a siamtansak, angelte muh, namte laka tangkoupih, khovela mite gin, thupina a pitouh ahi.
Himahleh, tunungchiang in mi khenkkhatten; pimangna kha te leh dawite thu hilhna limsakin, ginna tuh a hon tawpsan ding uh chih Kha in kichiantakin a gena; huai tuh
mi zuaitheite lepchiahna jiakin ahi; huai mi juautheite tuh amau sia leh pha theihna ngeia sik-ama bik bang ahi uhi,
kiten a kham ua, nekding ante, thutak theia gingta ten kipah thu gen a san ding ua Pathian in a siamte mah nek louh ding a chi nak uhi.
Pathian thilsiam chiteng tuh a hoih ngala, kipahthu gena san ahih khit phot leh bangmah deihlouh ding ahi kei;
Pathian thu leh thumna a hihsiangthou ahi khinta ngala.
Huaite unaute na theihsak leh, Kris Jesu nasempa hoihtak, ginnaleh thuhilhna hoih tutana na zuih thu a vaklian nahi ding hi.
Ahihhangin, Pathian zahlouhna leh tangthu bulbal neilou bang deih ken.
Huan, Pathian limsak dingin kithuzoh in;
Pumpi kithuzohna a hihleh a phatuam zeka; Pathian limsakna ichihleh khantawn in, hinna, tua omsa leh hong om nawn ding piak chiamna aneih jiakin thil tengteng ah a phatuam hi.
Hiai thu tuh a muanhuai in a laktuak mahmah hi.
Huchiin Pathian hing imuan ziakin I semgim ua, ipang teitei ahi ngala; amah tuh mi tengteng Hondampa ahi-a, a gingtate Hondampa ahi tuanse hi.
Hiai thute pia inla, thuhilh in.
Na naupanna kuamahin sit kei hen; thugen lam ah, tatdan lamah, itna lamah, siangthouna lam ah gingtute zuih ding hizaw in.
Ka hongpai masiah simkhawng, thuhilh khawng limsak in.
Nang mah a om thilpiak, thu genkholhnaa piak, upate khut ngaka Pathian in nang a hon neihsak tuh limsak lou ken.
Mi teng teng kiang a na phattuamna a lat theihna dingin huaithilte ah thanuam inla, huaite ah kizang zou in.Nangmah leh na thuhilh ah pilvang inla; huai thilte hihin om gige in; huchibang hih in nang mah leh na thuzate na hondam ding hi.
Nangmah leh na thuhilh ah pilvang inla; huai thilte hihin om gige in; huchibang hih in nang mah leh na thuzate na hondam ding hi.
Putek deuhte tai kenla, pa bangin thuhilh zawin; tangval deuhte unau bangin;
pitek deuhte nu bang in; nungak deuhte siangthou takin sangam numei bangin.
Meithai, meithai takatakte zahtak in.
Himahleh, meithai kuapeuhin tate hiam, tute hiam aneih uleh, huaiten tuh amau insung lamah Pathian limsakna mohpuakna thei masa uhela, amau nu-le-pa te uh kem uhen; huai tuh Pathian kipah lamtak ahi ngala.
Meithai taktak amah kiaa om intuh, Pathian tungah lametna aneia, sun leh jan a ngenin a thum gige hi.
Ahihhangin, meithai ama nopna lela kipia zaw, adamlai nangawn in a si ahi.
Gensiat bei a a om theihna ding un huai thu bang leng pia in.
Himahleh kuapeuh in amah mite ading a angaihtuah sak kei a, ama inkuante khol houh a ngaihtuahsak keileh, ginna tuh azuausana, ginglou mi sangin a gilou zaw ahi.
Meithai kum sawmguk chiang nuailam mi hi lou, mikhat ji hisa, meithaia gelh theih ahi.
Thil hih hoih lam a mi phata tate vaktei khina, mikhualte na zintun khina, misiangthoute khe na silta a, mangbangte na dawnzang khina, thil hoih peuhmah thanuam tak a na hih khin a hih peuhmahleh.
Himahleh, meithai nungaklaisimte zaw gelh ken; Kris lam a a hong kiplouh un pasal neih a ut nak uhi;
A gin tung na uh a paih ziak un siamlouh tang in a om nak uhi.
Huan, huailou leng, in teng ah a ban pawt ua, a tha uh a dah nak hi; thadah kia leng hilou in, thugen louh ding gen in, kamtam leh mite thilhih lai a vaihawm sak nak uhi.
Huchiin, methai nungaklaisimte zaw pasal nei uhenla, tate nei uhenla, insung khosak ngaihtuah uhenla, gensiatna ding lemtang himhim melma musak kei le uh kadeih hi.
Tuin leng mi khenkhat in setan lam naihin a pialsanta ngal ua.
Gingtami numei in methaite neita leh, dawnzang hen; saptuamte tuh hihbuai in om kei hen; meithai taktakte a dawnzang theihna ding un.
Saptuam upa vaihawm hoihte tuh a lehnih a thupi tuak a seh hi uhen.
Thuhilh leh thu a semgimte tuh hihthupi tuaka seh nawn sem hi uhen.
Laisiangthou in, Bawngtalin buh a chil lain a muk hen ken, a chi a.
Nasemmi tuh a loh mutak ahi, a chi nawna.
Saptuam upa a hekna uh tuh, theihpih nih hiam kama lou zaw la ken.
Mikhialte tuh mi tengteng maah taihilh in, midangten leng a lau theihna ding un.
Deihsak tuam neilou a, khentuam nei a bangmah hih lou-a hiai thute zui ding in Pathian leh Khris Jesu leh angel telte mitmuh in phatuamngai takin ka hontheisak hi.
Kuamah tungah khut nga pah kenla, midang khelhna bangah leng kikum ken; ki hih siangthou gige in.
Tui kia dawn kenla, na gilpi ziakin leh na damlouh nak ziakin uain neu khakha zang zel in.
mi khenkhat khelhna tuh a lang gige a, vaihawmna atun nak hi; mi khenkhat khelhnate bel a khawnung in a hong kilang.huchibang mahin thil hoih hih kilangsa a om a, huchibang loute leng sel theih ahi kei hi.
huchibang mahin thil hoih hih kilangsa a om a, huchibang loute leng sel theih ahi kei hi.
Parthian min leh a thuhilhna thu gensiata om louhna ding in sikha hakkol bat peuhnaten amau pute bangkima hihthupi tuak in sim uhen.
Huan gingta mi pu a neiten unau ahih ziakun, ngaineu kei uhen, a hihhangin, phattuamna mute leh deih takte a hih ziak un a na uh sepsak semsem uhen.
Huai thute hilh inla, hasuan in.
Mi kuapeuh in thuhilhna dang ahilha, thutak (I Toupa Jesu Kris thu) leh, Pathian limsak lam thuhilhna hoih asak kei leh,
amah a kisathei ahi, bangmah theilou ahi, theihnaksang in kisel leh thukalh lamah a hai zawta a, huchibang a kipanin, ennate, kilainate, gensiatnate,
hoihlou lama ginnate, selhat nate asuak nak hi; huchibang selhat mite tuh lungsimse nei leh thutak neilou mi, Pathian limsak pen punna khattou sa mi ahi uh.
Lungkimna toh kithuah Pathian limsakna tuh punna thupi tak ahi.
Khovel ah bangmah I lut pih keia, bangmah I pawtpih thei sam kei ding hi.
Himahleh, nekding leh silh ding nei in, huaikhawng ah I lungkim ding uh.
Ahihhangin, hauhsak tumte tuh, khemna ah te, thang ah te, haihuai leh hihsethei duhgawlna tampi bang ah a puklut nak uhi, huaiten tuh siatna leh manthatna ah mite a hih tumnak hi.
Dangka sum deihtak zaw gilou chiteng bul ahi ngala; huaituh khenkhatten a eng ua, ginna a pai mangsan ua, amau leh amau lungkhamna tampiin a kisunlet tektok uhi.
Himaleh, nang Pathian mipa aw, huai thilte taisan inla, diktatna bang, Pathian limsakna bang, ginna bang, itna bang, thuaktheihna bang, kingaihniamna bang delh zel in.
Ginna kidouna hoih sual inla, khantawn hinna tuh len chinten in; huai tang dinga sap na hi hi; theihpih tamtakte mitmuhin gupna hoih tuh na gumta hi.
Pathian, thilbangkim hihhingpa leh Khris Jesu, Pontia Pilat maa gupna hoih gumpa mitmuhin thu ka honpia hi;
Toupa Jesu Kris hong kilat nawn ma siah huai thupiak tuh siangthou tak leh gensiatbeia kem dingin.
Huai kilakna tuh amah hun takah phattuak Thuneipa tak kia, kumpipate Kumpipa, toupate Toupan a lak ding ahi;
Amah kia in sihtheihlouhna a nei a, vak naih theih vuallouhna ah a om a, amah tuh kuamah in a mu ngeikei ua, muh leng amu thei samkei uhi; amah kiangah khantawnin thupina leh thilhihtheihna om hen.
Amen.
Hiai khovel a mihaute khawng kisathei lou ding leh sum muanhuailou a muanna nga loua, thil tengteng kipahna ding a tampia honpepa Pathian tunga nga zaw ding in hilh in.
Thil hoih a hih ding uh, thil hoih hiha a hauh ding uh, thilphala a siam ding uh ahi;
huchia amaua dinga tunung adinga suangphum hoih phuma hinna, huai hinna hi taktak tuh a let kip theihna ding un.
Timothi aw, na kianga kepsaka om kem hoih in; Pathian zahlouhna thu gen mawkmawk leh kikalhna, dikloupia pilna kichi, nungngatsan in:huai tuh mi khenkhatin nei ki chiin ginna lam ah a paikhialta uhi.

Paul, Kris Jesua hinna om chiamna thugenna lama Pathian deihdana Kris Jesu sawltakin,
Ka ta deihtak Timothi kiang ah: Pathian leh Kris Jesu a I Toupa kianga kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna, lemna hong om hen.
Sun leh zan khawllou a ka thumnatea nang hon theigigein, ka pi ka pu a kipan a sialehpha theihna siangtak neia a na ka sep gigepa, Pathian kiangah kipah thu ka hilh hi.
Kipaka ka dim theihna ding in hon muh ka ut mahmah a, na khitui theigige in.
Ginna taktak nangmah a om tuh ka theigige ngala, huai ginna atung in napi Loisi ah a oma, na nu Iunisi ah leng a oma, nangmah ah leng a om chih diktak in kathei hi.
Huaijiakin ka khut ngak ziaka Pathian thilpiak nangmah a ompen mutkuang dingin kahon theisak ahi;
Pathian in launa kha a honpe keia, thilhihtheihna leh itna leh kithuzohna tak neihna a honpe zaw ngala.
Huchiin, I Toupa thu theihsak tuh zumpih kenla, kei a hentapa hon zumpih sam ken.
Tanchinhoih ziaka gimthuak Pathian thilhihtheihna dungzuiin hon thuakpih zaw in.
Aman tuh I thilhihte bang hilou in, amah seh leh ama hehpihna bang zaw in a hon hondam a, sapna siangthou in a hon sam hi; huai hehpihna tuh leilung pianma a Kris Jesu-a a honpiak a hita.
Himahleh I Hondampa Kris Jesu kilakna ziakin tuin hihlatin a omta hi.
Aman tuh sihna hihmang in, tanchinhoihin hinna leh manthat theihlouhna a hihlangta.
Huai tanchinhoih theisak dinga tangkoupihpa leh sawltak leh sinsaktu-a seh ka hi.
Hiai ziakin ahi, hiai thilte leng kana thuak.
Himahleh ka zum kei; ka ginpa tuh ka thei a, akiang a ka kepsak tuh huaini a ding in a vom hoih thei chih diktakin ka thei ngala.
Kris Jesua om ginna leh itna nei in, thudikte ka kama nazakte tuh zui chinten in.
I sunga om Khasiangthou in nang hon kepsak thutak kem hoih in.
Asia gam a om tengteng ten a hon nungngatsan uh chih na thei a; alak ua Philgella leh Harmojini a pang uhi.

Huaziakin, Kris Jesu a hotddamna tuh khantawna thupina toh a muhsam theihna ding un, telte ziakin bangkim ka thuak gige hi.
Hiai thugen a dik hi: asihna a isih khit ngalleh, ahinna ah ihing ding hi;
ithuakleh avaihawmna ah vai ihawm sam ding hi; Amah iki theihmohbawl leh Aman leng hon kitheihmohbawl ding hi;
Eite muanhuailou in om mahleng Amahzaw muanhuai in a om gige hi- Amah leh amah akitheihmawhbawl thei ngalkei a.
Hiai theisak inla, thute leltak tunga akisel louhna ding un Toupa muh in phatuamngaitakin theisak in; huai kiselna tuh bangmah a phatuam kei a, angaikhete ading in siatna ahizaw nak hi.
Nasemtu, zumnading neilou, thutak thudiktaka zang, Pathian pomtak hiding a nangmah kipe ding in theihtawpsuah in kizil in.
Ahihhangin, Pathian zahlouh lam thugen mawkmawkte khawng nungngat san in; huchibang mite tuh Pathian limsaklouhna lam ah a pai gamla semsem ding ua,
athu untuh meima sia nek bangin a nezel ding; alak uah tuh Himenaia leh Phileta a pang uhi;
huaimiten tuh, thawhnawnna a omkhinta, chi in, thutak lam a paikawisan ua, mikhenkhatte ginna ahihmang sak uhi.
Himahleh, Pathian suangphum kip tuh ading nalai a, hiai chiamtehna tuh a nei hi: Toupan amah ate athei, chihleh Toupa min lou peuhmah in diktatlouhna paisan hen, chih.
Himahleh in thupi ah tuh tuium belsuan dangkaeng leh dangka a bawlte kia a om kei a, sing leh bellei a bawlte bangleng a om hi; khenkhatte manphataka a zat a om a, khenkhatte tuh manphalou tak a zat leng a om sam hi.
Huaziakin, mi huai thil giloute lak a akihep leh, tuium belsuan mahpha taka a zat ding, siangthou, Toupa zattak, nasep hoih chiteng dia mansa, ahi ding hi.
Himahleh valnou duhgawlnate khawng taisan inla, lungtang siangthou a Toupa lou peuhmahte lak a diktatnate, ginnate, itnate, lametnate delh in.
Himahleh kidounate a suaksaknak chih thei in, kiselna haihuai leh pillou ah pang nuam ken.
Toupa sikha in a dou ding ahi kei a, mitengteng tung a siam tum in, thuhilh siam in, gitlouh tunga thuakzou thei in,
a dou ding a kibawlte tuh thunuailuttakin a thuhilh zaw ding ahi.

Mi amau ki itte bang, dangka deihta te bang, kiuangsakte bang, kisatheite bang.
Pathian gensete bang, nulehpa thu mangloute bang, kipahna dan theiloute bang, siangthouloute bang,
itna pianpih neiloute bang, buaina bawlte bang, hekte bang, kidektheiloute bang, mi huhamte bang, hoih deih hetloute bang,
zuautatte bang, kingaisang bang, thunung khualloute bang, Pathian itsang a amau kipahna kia itzawte bang hiding ahingal ua;

zilsam napia, thutak theipha ngeiloute ahi uhi.

abilte uh thutak lamah a ngawngsak ding ua, tangthu lam naih in a pial ta ding uhi.

Amen.
Paula, Pathian sikha leh Jesu Kris sawltak, Pathian telte phatuamsak ding- ginna leh Pathian limsakna toh kithuah theihna leh
khantawna hinna lametna ah; huai khantawn hinna tuh Pathian zuaugen theilouhin khovel omma in achiama;
himahleh, amah huntakah athu ah thugenna zangin a hihlangta, huai thugenna thugenna tuh Pathian I Hondampa tupiak bangzel a kepsak ka hi.
Tita, vantang ginna a ka ta taktak kiangah: Pathian leh Kris Jesu I Hondampa kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna om hen.
Hiai ziakin ahi huai Kret tuikulha nang kon nutsiah, thil hihzoh louhte na hihzoh theihna ding leh, thu ka hon piak banga kho tenga upate na seh theihna dingin;
kuapeuh gensiatbei, Ji khat nei, tate Pathian gingta, nopsak bawlluatna lam sang a gensiat loh lou, dan banglou a omlou, nei ahih peuhmah uleh.
Saptuam heutu tuh Pathian sum kempa ahih ziakin gensiatbei ahih ding ahi; migenhak, lunggam, uaiin khamhat, mivuakhat, punna nin a huaiham mi hiding hilou ahi;
mi kipahpih dan siam, hoihlam deih, lungsim diktak, midiktat, misiangthou, kidekthei mi hizaw ding ahi;
thuhilhna diktak lamah leng mi ahasot theihna ding leh, selhatmite siamlouh atansak theihna ding in thuhilhna bangzel thu muanhuai tuh lenkip mi ahi nawn lai ding ahi.
Dan banglou a om, thu genmawkmawkte leh ki khemte mi tampi a om ngal ua, zeksumte lak a mi ahi deuh tuam uhi;
huaite kam tuh humsak ding ahi, punna niin deih ziak a thuhilhlouh ding hilhin, mite a inkuankuan uh a tokgawp uhi.
Amaulaka mi amau Jawlnei khat in houh, Kret tuikulh a mitetuh zuaitheite, gamsa giloute, thadah, anhaite ahi uh, chi'n a gen hi.
Huai thugen tuh adik ahi.
Huaziakin naktakin taihilh in, ginna a adik theihna ding un.
Judate tangthu khawng leh thutak nungngnatsan nak a thupiak limsakloute,
Misiangthoute ading in bangkim a siangthou hi; himahleh minin leh gingloute adingin siangthou himhim a omkei hi, alungsim uh a sia lehpha theihna him uh leng a nin ta hi.Pathian ithei, chi in, apang ua, himahleh, kih huaite, thumangloute, thilhoih peuhmah hihlam a Pathian deihlouh lamte ahi ua, a thilhih un a pampaih nak ngal ua.
Pathian ithei, chi in, apang ua, himahleh, kih huaite, thumangloute, thilhoih peuhmah hihlam a Pathian deihlouh lamte ahi ua, a thilhih un a pampaih nak ngal ua.
Nang zaw thuhilhna hoih toh kituak thu gen in.
Putekte tuh kidek thei, zahtakhuai, lungsim hoihtak, ginna leh itna leh kuhkalna a diktak hi ding in hasuan in.
pitekte leng huchimahbang in, siangthouna toh kimeh, khoheia zahdan siam ding leh, hekhatlou, uaiin hai lou, thilhoihte zilsakte hizaw dingin hasuan in.
Nungakte tuh, apasalte uh itding leh, atate uh itding leh, lungsim hoihtaka a om ding a a hilh theihan ding un,
Nungakte tuh, a pasal uh it ding leh, a tate uh it ding leh, lungsim hoihtaka om dinga ahilh theihna ding uh.
Huchibangmah in, tangvante tuh lungsim hohtak pu ding in hasuan in.
Thil bangkim a thil hoih hih lam a zuih ding a ki hihlang in: thuginpi a siatna omlou, hoihna tak dan hihlang in.
Thugen dik dan gensiat vuallouh tekhawng lehlam a pangte lak a mi na tungthu a thusia gen ding neilou a a zum theihna dingin.
Sikhate, sel loua, apute uh thuthu a om ding leh bangkim a a kipahna ding ua om ding in hasuan in:
Pathian I hondampa thuhilhna thu bangkim a kilawmsak theihna ding un, khut ommawh louin, muanhuai a na hoih tengteng hihlang zaw ding in.
Mitengteng kiang ah hotdamna hongtung in Pathian hehpihna a hong tungta ngal a;
Pathian limsaklouhna leh khovel duhgawlna khawng tawpsan in, tulai khovel ah kidek leh diktattak leh Pathian limsak in I om ding chih theihsak in;
lametna kipahhuai- i Pathian thupi tak Hondampa Jesu Kris thupina kilakna tuh ngak in;
Aman tuh tatlekna tengteng lak a kipan in a hontat theihna dingin leh, chi tel tuam, thilhoih hih a phatuam ngai, amaha dinga a hih siangthou theihna dingin, I sik in a kipeta hi.Thunei takin huaithute tuh hilh inla, hasuan inla, taihilh in.
Kuamah in nang hon musit kei uhen.
Thunei takin huaithute tuh hilh inla, hasuan inla, taihilh in.
Kuamah in nang hon musit kei uhen.
Vaihawmte leh thuneite lak a kitahlut dingdan bang, thuman dingdan bang, thilhoih chiteng hihngap dingdan bang,
kuamah gensiatlouh dingdan bang, vuallem loua omlouh dingdan bang, mitengteng lak a thunuailutna chiteng hihlang a, nunnem ding bang in amaute theikhethak saknawn in.
Eileng nidanglai in haitakte, thumangloute, khema omte, utna leh kipahna chiteng semte, gilou leh hazat hat a omte, kihhuaite, kihawtuahte ihi ngal ua,
Himahleh Pathian, I hondampa migitdan leh mihing tung a aitdan a hong kilat lai in,
Diktatna a eiten thil ina hihte ziak hilou- in, a chitna bangzel a pianthakna a sawpin leh Khasiangthou- a thaksakna in eite a hon hondamta hi.
Huai Khasiangthou tuh Jesu Kris I Hondampa vangin nakpitakin itung ah a sung bawta hi,
Huchia, ahehpihna a siamtansak a oma, lametna a tangtawn hinna gou luahte ihih theihna ding in.
Hiai thugen a dik ahi.
Hiai thilte na phut chiltel kon deih ahi, huchia Pathian gingta sa ten thil hoih hih ding a a pilvan theihna ding un; hiaite tuh mihingte a ding in ahoih in a phatuam uhi.
Himahleh dotna haihuaite, khangthu suina te, kiselnate, dan thu a kilaina te zaw nungngat san zel in; huaituh thil phatuamlou leh bangmahlou ahi ngal a.
GInna tuam neimi zaw khatvei nihvei hilh nungin deih ken;
Huchibang mi tuh a lampial in a gilou ahi chih nathei uh, amah mah siamlouh kitangsak ahi ngala.
Artema hiam, Taikika hiam, na kiang a ka hon sawl chiang in, Nikopoli khua ah ka kiang ah hongpai teitei in; hiailai a phalbi zat ka tum ngal a.
Zena, dan theipa, leh Apoloin bangkim a taksap louhna ding un, a zinna uah phatuamngai takin masuan in.
I miten leng, gahlou a a om louhna ding un, taksapna khawktakte a ding in thilhoih hih zel ding in zil uhen.Kakiang a om tengteng in chibai a hon buk uhi.
Ginna a kei honitte chibai honna buk sak in.
Na vek ua kiang ah hehpihna om hen.
Amen.

Na vek ua kiang ah hehpihna om hen.

Paula, Kris Jesu hentapa leh, I unaupa Timothi in.
Ka deihtak leh ka sepgimpih uh Philemon kiang ah,
Ka sanggamnu uh Apphia kiang ah, ka sepaih pih uh Arkipka kiangah, leh na ina saptuam kikhawmte kiang ah leng;
Pathian I Pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah awm hen.
Ka thumna peuh ah na min lou gige in, ka Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen gige hi;
Toupa Jesu lamah leh misiangthou tengteng lam a itna leh ginna na neih tuh za in;
Na ginna ki kawppihna, noumau a om thilhoih chiteng theih kimna lam ah, Kris lam a a hawng phattuam theihna ding in.
Unaupa aw, nangmah ziak a misiangthoute lungtang a hawng halh tak ziakin na itna ah ka kipak in ka kha a muang mahmah hi.
Huaziakin, akilawm hun hih ding in nang thu hawnpiak Kris a kingap mahmah leng leng.
Itna ziakin (Paul putek hial ka hi a, tun ah Kris Jesu hentapa leng kana hita na a) a nget in ka hon ngen zaw ahi:
Ka ta Onesima, kolbun kawm a ka neihkhiak amah a ding in na kiang ah ka ngetsak ahi.
Amah tuh tuma in nang a ding in a phatuam kei a, tun zaw kei leh nang a ding in a phatuam ta hi;
Amahtak, ka lungtang mahmah, na kiang ah ka hon sawl kik nawnta hi.
Amahtuh tanchinhoih a kawl ka butna a nangmah sika na a hawn sepsak theihna ding in ka kianga awmsak niloh ka ut mahmah a;
Himahleh, na hehpihna tuh hehpihsak teitei bang hilo in, na thuthu bang ahihtheih zawkna ding in, na thu lo in bangmah hih ka ut kei hi.
Sawtlo kalnang a hawn khen tuh khantawn a amah na neih tawntung na gau ahi kha mai ding hi,

Huchi in, lawma na hawn sim leh, keimah bangin amah na na kipahpih in.
Huan, natung a thil banghiam a hihkhelh a, na banghiam khattou abat leh keimah bat in bawl in.
Kei Paul in keima khut ngeia ka gelh ahi.
Kei mah in ka ditsak ding ahi; ka lak a nangmahngei in leng bat na neihsam dan hawn hilh zaw kahi kei hi.
Ahi, unaupa aw, nangmah ziakin Toupa ah ka kipahna hawn neisak inla, Kris ah leng ka lungtang hihhalh in.
Ka gen sang a thupi zawtham in na hih ding chih ka theih ziakin, nawnna man gingta in na kiang ah ka gelh ahi.
Abang abang hileh, huaikia hih louin, tunna ding hawnna suktuah sak in; na thumnate uh ziakin na kiang ua piak ka hi ding chih ka kigingta ngal a.

Pathian, nidang laia pi leh pute kiang a seh tampi leh lamchiteng a Jawlneite a thu nagen pan,
tulai hun nanung ah eite kiang ah a Tapa ah thu a hon genta hi.
Huai mi tuh bangkim gouluahpa ding in a siam a, huai mi mah in khovelte leng a siam hi;
