Amah tuh, a sa put laini khongin, sihna laka amah hondam theipa kiangah nakpitaka kikou leh khitui ke kawmin thumnate leh ngetnate a lana, a kihtakdan a siam jel jiakin ngaihkhiakin a om hi;

Huchiin, Pathianin thuchiam gouluah dingte kiangah a thiltup lamdan tuan theihlouhdan nakpi mahmaha theihsak utin, kichiamna tuh a palaisaka;

Huai Melkisedek, Salemkumpipa Tungnungpen Siampu, Abraham kumpipate that hongpai na dawn a vualzawlpa,
Abraham in bangkim ah sawmakhat a pia.
Amin khiakna genchian in amasa pen in Diktatna Kumpipa, azom nawn in Salem Kumpipa ahinawna; huaituh Lemna Kumpipa chihna ahi.
Amahtuh pa neilou in, nu neilou in, khangthu bei, ompatni neilou hintawpni leng neisamlou in.
Pathian tapa bang a siam tangtawn a siampu hi gige ahi zaw hi.
Huchi in, chikhah Abraham in a galllak hoihpeuhmah laka sawmakhat apiakna pa, huaimipa thupi dan ngaihtuah dih ua.
Levi suante laka siampuna tang peuhmah in dan thu bangin mite lak ah sawmakhat lak ding thu amu ngei uhi, huaituh a unaute uh lak ah ahi, huaite tuh Abraham khal a pawt hisam mahle u leng.

Himahleh, sel vuallouhin a neujaw tuh thupi zaw vualzawl sak in a om hi.
Huan, hiai ah mihing si zel ten sawmakhat a mu ua, huai ah bel, ahing nilouh, chi a, a thu a theisak un a mu ahi.
Huan, Levi, sawmakhat lazelpa nangawn in, Abraham khut ah sawmakhatte a peta, chih theih ahi;
Melkisedek in a na dawn lai in apakhal ah a om lai- ngal a.
Huchiin, Levi ten siampu hihna ziaka bukimna muhtheih na hi leh (huainuai ah miten tuh dan thu ana mu ngal ua), Aaron omdan bang a bawl louh Melkisedek omdan bang a siampu dang hong om bang kiphamawh ding ahia?

Hiai a thu agenpa namtuam mi ahi ngal a, huai nam laka a mi tuh kuamah maitam ah a gamtang ngeikei uhi.
I Toupa lah Juda nam lak a hong suak ahi chih a kichian ngal a: Huai nam thu ah tuh Mosi in siampu te lam thu bangmah a gen kei hi.
Huan, Melkisedek bang a siampu dang hong suah tuh nakpi takin I thugen pen a kichian nawn diak hi;
Amahtuh sa thupiak dan thu bang a siam bang hilou, hin tawpneilou thil hihtheihna bang zaw a, siam ahi.
Nang zaw, Melkisedek omdan bang a khantawn a siampu na hi chih theihsak ahi ngala.
Ahatlouh leh a phattuamlouhna ziakin thupiak awm masa tuh paihkhiak ahi.
(Dan thu in bangmah a hihkim ngal kei a).
Lametna hoih zaw, Pathian I naihna zel tuh, pilutin a om zawta hi.
Huan, kichiamna tellou lou-in amah tuh Siampu a bawl ahita hi:
Amau zaw kichiamlou a siampu a siam ahi ngal ua; amah bel, nang zaw khantawna Siampu na hi, chi in, Toupa a kichiam a, ka khelkik kei ding, chi a a kiang a genpa khut ah kichiam in:
Huchitaka thupi in Jesu tuh thukhun hoih zaw hihkip pa a hong hita hi.
Huan, amau zaw sih ziaka omden theilou ahih ziakun, siampu a siam a tam ngei ua;
Amahbel khantawna a om gige ziakin, a Siampu hihna tuh khen theih vuallouh in a nei zaw hi.
Huchiin, amaha Pathian kianga hongpaite tuh a tawp dong in a hondam thei ahi, amau thumsak in khantawna a hin gige ziak in.
Huchibang Siampu Lianpen, misiangthou, zulhzau lou, ninbanglou, khialte laka omtuam, vante sang a tungnung zaw a, siam, tuh eia ding in a kilawm him hi.
Aman tuh huai siampu lianpente lat bang in, niteng in amah khelh ziak a kithoihna lan masa phawt a, huainung a mite khelhna ziaka lat a kiphamoh kei; Amah a kilat laitak in setden ding in khat vei in ana hihkhinta ngal a,Dan thu in, mihing hatlouhna neite tuh, siampu lianpen ding in a sep zel a; ki chiam thu, dan thu nung a a hong om in bel, Tapa, khantawna ding a hihkim khitsa tuh, asep zouta ahi.
Dan thu in, mihing hatlouhna neite tuh, siampu lianpen ding in a sep zel a; ki chiam thu, dan thu nung a a hong om in bel, Tapa, khantawna ding a hihkim khitsa tuh, asep zouta ahi.
Huchiin, I thugente lakah tuh a poimohpen hiai ahi: huchibang Siampu Lianpen van khawng banga Thupipen mangtutphah taklama vatu a;
Mun siangthou leh biakbuk taktak, mihinglam hilou, Toupa lam jawa nasempa tuh I nei chih.
Siampu Lianpen peuhmahte thilpiak leh kithoihnate lan ding a seh ahi ngal ua; huchiin hiai Siampu Lianpenin leng bang hiam bek lat ding a neih a kiphamoh ahi.
Leia om lai hile jaw, siampu mawngmawng hi lou ding ahi, dan thu bangjela thilpiak lante na om masa a naom jiak un.
Huaiten tuh van thilte etsakna leh a lim na asem jel ua.
Mosi biakbuk lam dia a kisak lai a Pathian hilh a aom bang in; Mual vuma zuihding a honmuh sak bang un bangkim siam ding in pilvangin, a chih.
Tunbel thukhun hoih jaw sem palai a hihdan bangjel in, nasepna hoih jaw A na tangta, huai thukhun tuh thuchiam hoih jaw tunga kinga leh bawl ahih jiakin.
Huai thukhun masa tuh dembei na hileh, a nihna adia mun zong lou mah ding hi ve un.
Amau demin hiaite a gen ngala, Ngaiin, nite a hong tung dek, Toupan a chi, huaini khong chiangin Israel inkuante leh, Juda inkuante kiangah thukhun thak ka siam ding:
A pi leh pute uh Aigupta gam akipana pikhe dinga a khut ua ka let nia a kiang ua ka khunpen bang hilou in; ka thukhun ah lah a om gige ngal kei ua, huchiin amau thu ka limsak ta keia, Toupan achi.
Huai ni khawng nung chiangin Israel inkuante kianga thu ka khun ding tuh hiaite ahi.
Toupan achi; a lungsim uah ka thupiakte ka koih dia, a lungtang uah ka gelh nalai dia, huan amau adingin Pathian ka hi dia, keia dingin amau tuh ka mite ahi sam ding uhi;
Huan, michihin, Toupa theiin, chiin, amah khopih leh amah unau a thuhilhta kei ding uhi; a neupen akipanin a lianpen tanin a vek un a honthei chiat ding uhi.
A tatlek nate uah jah kangai dia, a khelhnate uleng ka theigige nawnta kei ding, chiin.Thukhun Thak, chia agen jiakin a masa tuh a luisakta ahi.
Huchiin, na luia na upata tuh a mang thei ahita hi.
Thukhun Thak, chia agen jiakin a masa tuh a luisakta ahi.
Huchiin, na luia na upata tuh a mang thei ahita hi.
Huan, thukhun masa mahin leng Pathian nasepna dan te leh mun siangthou, hiai khovel mun siangthou tuh a nei ahi.
Biakbuk a bawl ua, tuah masak tuh khawnvak koihna bang, dohkan bang tanghou- koihnabang omna ahi; huai tuh Mun Siangthou achi uhi.
Huan, puanjak nihna khenah biakbuk, Mun Siangthoupen achih uh a oma;
huailaiah dangkaeng gimlim halna bawm leh, thukhunna bawm dangkaenga luan a oma, huai thukhunna bawm tungah Manna omna dangkaeng belbang, Aron chiang sel bang, thukhunna bang a omhi;
a tunglamah jahngaihna tutphah liahin, thupina Cherubte a om ua; huaite khawng tuin jaw a kim sipsip in I gen theikei ding uh.
Huan huai thilte tuh huchibangabawl a nahi ua, Siamputen Pathian na semin, biakbuk tuahmasak ah a lut jel uh;
a zom ah tuh Siampu Lianpen kia kumtengin khatvei, sisan tawi lou louin a luta; huai tuh amah khelhna ading leh mite khelhna adingin alan jel ahi.
Kha Siangthouin hiai a theisak: Mun Siangthoua lutna lam a kilang naitadih keia, biakbuk tuah masak tuh adin laiteng, chihpen;
(huai tuh tulai hun genteh na ahi).
Huai bang jelin thilpiak leh kithoihnate leng a lan jel uh, a hihhangin huaiten sia leh phatheihna lam ah a bemi a hihkim theikei hi:
huai tuh (nekdingte, dawndingte, silhding tuamtuamte, toh) sa lam dante kia, bawlhoih hun ma adinga, chih ahi.
Himahleh, Kris bel thilhoih hongom dingte Siampu Lianpen dinga hongpaiin, biakbuk, khuta lamlouh (huai tuh hiai thilsiamte laka ahi kei chihna ahi),
thupi leh kim jaw pai tanin, eia dinga khantawna tatkhiakna mu khinin kelte leh bawngnoute sisan jiak hilouin, amah sisan jiak jawin, Mun Siangthouah setden dingin khatveiin ana lutta ngala.
Kel leh bawngpate sisan leh, bawngla vu, minin tunga thehin bawn sa siang khopa a hihsiangthou ngalleh,
Kris, khantawna Kha jiaka gensiatbeia Pathian kianga kilan sisanin, Pathian hing nasem dingin na sia leh pha theihna uh thilhih sisa lakah nak hihsiangthou natel inchia!
Huan, hiaijiakin, amah tuh thukhunthak palai ahi, thukhun masa nuaia tatleknate laka kipan tatna dinga mi a na sihtak jiakin sapten tuh khantawna gouluah ding thuchiam a tang thei ding uhi.
Thusiah omna peuhah a siahmi sihna leng a om teitei ding ahi ngala.
Mi a sih nungun thusiahin thua neingal naka, a siahmi adamlai teng bel thu himhim a neikei hi.
Huchiin thukhun masa leng sisan louin a hihkip kei uhi,
Dan thupiak peuhmah tuh Mosiin mipi tengteng kianga a phuan nungin, bawngnoute leh kelte sisan tuh, tui toh, samulkhau sandup toh, husop toh a la a, laibu ngei leh mi tengteng leng a theha,
Huai tuh Pathianin na kiang ua a piak kip thukhun sisan ahi, chiin.
Huailou leng, biakbuk leh nasepna van tengteng huchibang mahin sisanin a theh samta hi.
Huan, dan thuin bangkim phial sisana hihsiangthouin a om a, sisan suahlouin ngaihdamna himhim a om kei hi.
Huchiin, vana thil om batpihte tuh huaitea hihsiangthoua om ding him ahi, van thil taktakte bel huaisanga kithoihna hoihjawtea hihsiangthoua om ding ahi.
Kris tuh khuta lam mun siangthou, a tak batpih ah a lut ngal kei a; tunah Pathian maah I sik ua ding dingin van ngei ah, a lut jaw ta hi.
Himahleh, Siampu Lianpen kum tenga amah sisan lou, sisan tawi kawma Mun Siangthoua lut jel bangin, amah bel amah kilan dingina lut sam kei;
huchi hita kei leh, leilung piantung akipan tam veipi a thuakta ding hi; himahleh, tulai hun tawp ah kithoihna dinga kizang tawmin khelhna hih mangna dingin khatvei in setden din amah hong langta ahi.
Huan, mihinga dingin khatvei sih seh ahi, huai nungin vaihawmna aom ding.huchi bangmahin Kris leng, mitampi khelhnate paipih dinga khatvei lata omkhinin, hotdamna mu dinga, amah nangakte kiangah, khelhna panglouin nihveina ah a honglang nawn ding hi.
huchi bangmahin Kris leng, mitampi khelhnate paipih dinga khatvei lata omkhinin, hotdamna mu dinga, amah nangakte kiangah, khelhna panglouin nihveina ah a honglang nawn ding hi.
Dan thuin thil hoih, hongom dingte a taktak lohkhiakna neilouin, a limkia aneih jiakin, kumtenga kithoihna ngeingei alat jelte un, a honnaih mite bangchik mahin a bukimsak thei ngei kei hi.
Huchi hita kei leh, lat tawp thamta lou ding uhia?
Abemite khatvei a hihsiangthou pahngal hile uh, khelhna kitheihna lah nei nawnlou ding hi ua.
Himahleh, huai kithoihna ah kum tengin khelhnate theihnawnna a hongom nak hi.
Bawngpate leh kelte sisanin khelhnate lamang thei vual ahingal keia.
Huchiin, khovela ahonglut laiin, Kithoihna leh thillat na deih keia, keia dingin pumpi non bawlsak jawa:
Halmanga pumpiaknate leh, khelhna dinga kithoihnate khawngah kipahna himhim na neikei hi.
Huaitakin, ken, Pathian aw, ngaiin, Laibu jiala ka tungthu gelh ahih bangin, Na deihlam hih dingin ka hongpai, ka chia, achi a.
A tungah, Kithoihna te, thillatte, halmanga pumpiaknate, khelhna dinga kithoihnate na deih keia, huaiahte kipahna na nei sam kei, a chi a, (huaite tuh danthu banga lat ahi a),
huaitakin, Ngaiin, na deihlam hih dingin ka hongpai, a na chita a, A nihna a tunding theihna dingin a masapen a lamangta ahi.
Huai deihlamin, Jesu Kris pumpi khatvei thu a lat pah jiakin, hihsiangthouin I omta hi.
Huan, siampu chitengin kawla nisuak sima na semin, khelhnate bangchik mah a hihmang theilou kithoihna ngeingei lan gige in, a ding uhi.
Amah bel, khantawna dinga khelhnate adia kithoihna khat kia alat nungin, Pathian taklam ah a vatuta jaw hi,
huai nungsiah tuh, a melmate a khepek ngakna asiama hih masiah uh a ngak nilouh a.
Thillat khat kiain hihsiangthou sate khantawna dingin hihkim ta ngala.
Huan, Kha Siangthouin leng a hoh theisak sam a:
Huai ni khit chiangin a kiang ua thu ka khun ding tuh hiaite ahi, Toupan achi: a lungtang uah ka thupiakte ka koih dinga, a lungsim uah ka gelhna lai ding, chia a gen khitin,
A khelhnate uh leh a tatleknate uh ka theigige ta kei ding, a chi ngala.
Huchiin, huchibangte ngaihdamna omna peuh ah khelhna adingin thillat a om nawn kei ahi.
Huchiin, unaute aw, Jesu sisan jiaka Mun Siangthoua lutngamna neiin,
Lam a honbawlsak, lam thak leh hing ah, puanjak (huai tuh a pumpi chihna ahi) kantan in,
Pathian inkuante tunga Siampu thupi tak ineih jiakin,
I lungtanga sia leh pha theihna sianglou thehsiansaka oma, I pumpi leng tuichima sila omin, ginna a theih chetna kimneiin lungtang tak mah puin I naih ding uhi.
I lamet thugin, ling-lou in I pomkip ding uh, thuchiampa lah a muanhuai ngala;
huan, itna leh thil hoih hiha kitokthou dingin ikingaih tuah tek ding uhi;
khenkhat hih dan banga I kikhopnate uh tawpsan louin, kihasuan tuah jaw ni; nituh hongnai hulhula na thei un kihasuan tuah semsem un.
Thutak theihna kim itan nunga thil I hihkhelh teitei ngal injaw, khelhnate adia kithoihna a om tak het louh jiakin,
vaihawmna lauhuai mulkimhuai tak bang hiam leh, doumite kangmang ding thangpaihna mei maban neiin I om zota ding hi.
Mosi dan thu khawksa lou mi tuh theihpih mi nihtou thumtou hiam thum lainat omlouin asi jel uhi.
Pathian Tapa sikdena, thukhun sisan amah hihsiangthouna pen thil namaia bawla, hehpihna Kha hihvui mi tuh, huaimi sanga bangchi pheta gawtna thupijaw ahia, thuak taka naseh uh?
Phulakna himhim keimah lak ding ahi, keimahin ka thuk ding, chih leh, Toupan a mite a vaihawmsak ding, chi nawnpa lah I thei ngal ua.
Pathian hing khuta puk tuh thil mulkimhuai taka hi.
Himahleh, tuma lama hihvaka na om nung ua thuakna buaina thupi tak na thuak lai nite uh thei nawn un;
Kong khatah jaw muhsit leh haksatna bang leng thuakin etnopa bawlin na om ua, kong khat ah jaw huchibanga bawla omte tuh thuakpihte na honghi uhi
Kolbunte tuh na lainat ua, gou hoihjaw, omden ding hi behlap, noumauin na neih uh kitheiin na van honlaksakte uh leng kipak takin na nathuakzouta behlap uhi.
Huchiin, na ginna uh, kipahman piak thupi tak nei ding ngei, paimang kei un.
Pathian deihlam na hih nungun thilchiam tuh na muh theihna ding un kuhkalna na kiphamoh uhi.
Sawtlou nung chiangin hongpai dingpa hongpai ding ahi, sawt a halta kei ding.
Himahleh, ka mi diktat tuh ginnain a hing ding; a nungtolh le bel, ka khain amah ah kipahna himhim a neikei ding, chih.Himahleh, ei jaw mangthang dinga nungtolh pawla pang I hi kei ua; hinna humbit dinga ginna nei pawla pang I hi jaw uhi.
Himahleh, ei jaw mangthang dinga nungtolh pawla pang I hi kei ua; hinna humbit dinga ginna nei pawla pang I hi jaw uhi.
Huan, ginna tuh thil lamette om ngeia theihna, thil muhlouhte theihchetna ahi.
Huaiah tuh nidanglai miten phat aloh ngal ua.
Ginnain khovelte tuh Pathian thu a suktuah a hita chih I thei ua, huchiin thil muh theihte leng thil langtheitea siam ahi kei hi.
Ginnain Abelin Kaina sangin kithoihna hoihjaw Pathian kiangah a lana, huai jiakin mi dik hihna a mu chih, Pathianin a thilpiakte a pomna ah a theisaka; huan huai ginna jiakin aman tuh sih khit nungin thu a gen nalai ahi.
Ginnain Enok leng sihna chiamlou dinga lakmangin ana oma; huan, Pathianin alakmang jiakin muhtheih ahita keia; lakmanga aom main Pathian pahtak lam mi ahi, chih theihsakna amukhinta him hi.
Himahleh, ginna louin amah pahtak lammi hihvual ahi kei; Pathian kianga hongpaiin, amah tuh a om chih leh, a zong mite lohchingsakpa ahi chih, gin ding ahi.
Ginnain Noa tuh thil muh nailouhte lam thu ah Pathian hilha naomin, Pathian laudan siamin, a inkuansung hotdamna dingin longa bawla; huaiin khovel siamlouh a tangsakta a, ginna jiaka om diktatna gouluahpa ahong hi hi.
Ginnain Abraham tuh sapa a om laiin a gouluah ding muna lut dingin pai khiakna ding thu a muta a; huan, a paina lam ding leng theilouin a pai kheta a.
Ginnain gam chiam ah mi gama tam bang lelin a natamta nilouha, thuchiam kikhat gouluahpih ding Isak leh Jacobte toh puanin ahte a om ua;
Khua suangphumte nei, Pathian lam leh, bawl tuh, a ngak nilouh a.
Ginnain Sara ngeiin leng, chiampa tuh muanhuai asak jiakin, teknungin leng chi pai theihna amu hi.
Huchiin, pasal khat, amah lah misi bang mai, akipan vana aksite banga tam, tuipiaua piaunel banga sim zohlouh suante a hongsuakta uhi.
Hiai mi tengtengten thilchiamte tangkhin hilou-in, himahleh huaite gamlapia galmuha nakipahpih hi jawin, leh lei ah jaw khualzin leh mikhual lel ahi uh chih kithei gigein, amaute tuh ginna neiin ana sita uh hi.
Huchibanga thu na genten amau gam ding a zong uh chih ahih lang mahmah uhi.
A pawtsan gam uh lung gulh hile uh bel kikna hun lem muta mahmah ding ahi ngal ua.
Himahleh, tun bel gam hoihjaw sem deih ana hi ua, huai tuh vana om ahi; huchin Pathian, a Pathian uh chiha om tuh a zum kei hi; amau dingin khopi khat anangaihtuahsakta ngala.
Ginnain Abraham tuh zeta omin, Isak a lana; huan thuchiamte kipak taka sangpan tuh a tapa neihsun alan hi, huai lah
Isak ah na suante aki minloh ding, a chihpen ahia.
Pathianin misi lak akipan nangawna kaithou theiin a sepa; huchiin gentehnadana genin, amah tuh misi laka kipan mu nawn ahi ngei nguta.
Ginnain Isakin thil hongtung dingte thu ah leng Jacob leh Esau vual a jawl a.
Ginnain Jacobin, a sih ding kuanin, Joseph tate vual a jawl tuaktuaka; achiangkhun dawna kingaiin Pathian a bia hi.
Ginnain Josephin, a sih ding kuanin, Isreal suante pawt ding thu a gena; a guhte vui ding tungtang ah thu a pia hi.
Ginnain Mosi, a pian laiin, ngaungek mel hoihtak ahi a chih jiak un, kha thum sung a nu leh a pa selin a oma; kumpipa thupiak leng a lau kei uhi.
Ginna in, Mosi in a hopichin nung in, Pharo tanu, tapa a lawh a utkei a;
sawtlou kal a dia khelhna nawpna kipahpih sangin Pathian mite tawh sukgentheihna thuak a tel zawta hi;
Kris a muhsitna uh tuh Aigupta gam goute sang a sum thupizaw in angai a; kipahman piak ding tuh a et ziakin.
Ginna in kimpipa thangpaihna tuh laulou in Aigupta gam a paisan a, muhtheihlouhpa a muh ziak in a thuak teitei hi.
Ginna in Paikan Ankuangluina leh sisan thehna a bawl a, ta masa hihmangthangpan amaute a khoih louhna ding in.
Ginna in gam hula pai bangin Tuipi San a kai a; Aigupata ten tua bang a hih a tm sam ua, valh zawh in a omta uhi.
Ginna in Jeriko khawkulh ni sagih a um nung un a chimta hi.
Ginna in Rahab kizuaknu gingloute lakah a mangthang khawm ta kei, enkhete im neilou a a pahtak ziakin.
Huan, bang kagen nalai dia?
Gideon thute, Barak thute, Samson thute, Jeptha thute leh, David thute, Samuel thute, Jawlneite thute gen ni chile hang, hun in hon chinlou ding ahi ngala;
Huaiten tuh ginna in gamte ala ua, thudik a vaihawm a zawng ua, thuchiamte atang ua, humpinelkai kamte a chihsak ua;
mei thil hihtheihna a hihmit ua, namsau hiam nangawn a pel ua, hatlouhna a kipan hattak a bawl in a om ua, kidouna bang ah mihat minthang ana hi ua, namdang kidou pawlte bang a taikek sak uhi.
Numeiten a misite uh thounawn a mu ua; khenkhatte gim thuaksak in a om ua, thawhnawnna hoih zawsem a tan theihna ding un khahkhiakna a deih kei ua;
midangten leng nuihza bawlna leh vuak bang a thuak ua, ahi, huailou leng, kawlbut leh hentakna bang a tuak ua;
suang a den in a awm ua, singatna a attan in a awm ua, khemna a tuak ua, namsau a satlup in a awm ua; Belam vun leh kel vun silh in a vakvai ua; genthei takin, gimthuakin, sawi in a awm ua-
Khawvel a mau tenna tak hilou mite- gamdai ah bang, tang a bang, guam ah bang, leikua ah bang, a vak avak uhi.
Ahia, hiaitetengteng in, a ginnaziakun phat nalawh khin mahleuhleng thil chiam pen ana tang kei uhi;aziakbel, Pathianin eia ding a thil hawihza muhkhawlh a neih ziak a, ei tellou-a amaute hih bukima a awmlouh ding uh ahihziak ahi.
aziakbel, Pathianin eia ding a thil hawihza muhkhawlh a neih ziak a, ei tellou-a amaute hih bukima a awmlouh ding uh ahihziak ahi.
Huaijiakin, huchitela theihpihte-meipi thupi umsuaka I om theiin, honhihnok peuhmah leh khelhna eimaha belhte koihmang ni, huan, ima ua kitaitehna ding om ah kuhka ltakin tai ni.
Jesu, I ginna siampa leh hihkippa, a maa kipahna om jiaka zahlaknate ngaineua krosa thuakpa, Pathian mang tutphah taklama vatu, Amah lam enin.
Nakha lam ua na bah ua, nalung kiak louhna dingun, mikhialte apana huchibanga selkalhna thuakpa tuh ngaihtuah dih ua leh.
Khelhna douna sisan suak hialin na pangnai tadih kei ua; hasotna thu, tate taihilh banga nou hontaihilhna, na namangngilhta uhi.
Ka ta, Toupa sawina ngaineu kenla, a taihilha na om inleng lungke tuan ken;
Toupan a itte sawi naka, ta a kipahpih tuh a vo nak hi. chih.
Na thuak ujaw noumau ding ahi; tate tunga hih bangin Pathianin na tunguah a hiha; pa sawi louh ta kua a om ngeia?
Ta chihna teng loha, sawina pen loh loua na om unbel, ta tak hilouin, sawn na hi ua kei dia.
Huailou leng eite hon sawi ding, I sa pate uh inei uhi, huaite lah jahtak ngal hanga; huai sanga thupijaw in, I hinna dingin, khate Pa thuthu in I om kei ding ua hia?
Amau jaw ni sawtlou chik, hoih a sak bangjel un a honsawi ngei ua, aman bel, a siangthouna I tan sam theihna dingin, I hoihna dingin a honsawi jaw ahi.
Huan, sawina himhim thuaklaiin kipahhuai in a lang keia, khasiathuai takin a lang jaw hi, thuaknungin tuh huchia sawijawta omte dingin gah khamuanhuaitak, diktatna tak a suah sak jel ahi.
Huchiin, khut kaikhete liktou unla, khut jawte toh;
Huan, khebai kilawisak loua, hihdama a om jawkna dingin, na khete uh dingin lamtang bawl un.
Mi tengteng toh kituahna leh siangthouna delh un, huai siangthouna louin kua mahin Toupa a mu kei ding uhi:
Pilvang takin enun, huchilouin jaw Pathian hehpihna ngah zoulou kuahiam a om dinga, khakna zung banghiam hongsela nou honhihbuaiin, huaiin tuh mi tampi hihnitin a om ding ua;
kingaihhat hiam, Esau banga Pathian zahlou mi hiam a hawngawm kha ding hi.
Amantuh a tamasahihna an khatvei nek in khawngta hi.

pengkul ginnate, thugen ging awmnate tung nahi ngal kei ua; hua ging za tentuh thudang himhim a kiang a gen nawnlou ding in angen ua;
sa nangawn in huai tang a khawih aleh suang a denlup in a awm ding ahi, chih, thupiakpen a thuak thei ta ngalkei ua;

Peter, Jesu Kris sawltak in, Ponto gamte Galatia gamte, Kappadosia gamte, Asia gamte, Bithinia gamte a dalh-te,
thumang ding leh Jesu Kris sisan theh tang ding a Kha hihtuam, Pa Pathian theihkholh bang a telte kiang ah: Na tunguah hehpihna leh lemna hihkhanin omhen.
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pathian leh Pa tuh phatin om hen, Aman tuh a hehpihna thupi tak bang jelin, misi lak akipan Jesu Kris thohnawnna jiakin lametna hing mu dingin a honsuang nawna,
goutan sethei lou, nin bang lou, tul theilou, vana noua dinga sit muhna dingin;
hotdamna, hun nanunga lang dinga zohsa mu dingin, ginna jiakin Pathian thilhihtheihnaa ven na hi uhi.
Huaiah nakpi takin na kipak uhi, tuin (a kiphatmoh leh) khemna chiteng jiakin lungkham tadih mahle uchin;
na ginna uh zeetna, dangkaeng meia zeet nung nangawna mangthang jel sanga manpha jaw, Jesu Kris kilak chiangin phatna leh pahtawina leh thupina ding a honghih theihna ding in.
Mu ngeilou piin leng amah na it ua, tuin mu kei mahle uchin leng, amah na gingta ua, kipahna gen tuan theih louh leh thupitakin na kipak mahmah jel uhi;
na gintak pen uh, na kha uh hotdamna tak, muin.
Huai hotdamna thu tuh huai jawlneite hehpihna na kiang ua hongtung ding thu genkholten, a Kankan ua, siamnel takin a zong khia ua:
Kris kha amaua omin Kris thuakna ding leh, huaizoha thupina honjui dingte a theihkholh sak laiin, bang hun ahia, bangchibang hun ahia, a theihsak chih zonkhiak tum in.
Huai thuin amau nasep kisep louin, noumau nasep a sem jaw uh chih a kiang uah theihsak ahita, huai thute tuh van akipana sawlkhiak Kha Siangthou panpih in tanchinhoih nou honhilhten tuin a honhilh ua, huai thilte tuh angelten leng vel a ut uhi.
Huajiakin na lungsim puan uh tengin pilvang unla, Jesu Kris kilak chiangin hehpihna nou a honpuak ding tak lungke lou in lamen jel un;
ta thumangte bangin, na theihlouh lai ua na nidang lai duhgawlna uh banga omlou in;
nou honsampa a siangthou bangin nou leng na tatdan tengteng uah hong siangthou jaw un;
Noute na siangthou ding uh ahi, kei ka siangthou ngala, chih gelh ahi.
Huan, khentuam neiloua michih nasep bang chiata ngaihtuahpa tuh Pa banga na loh uleh, hiailaia na tam laiteng un laudansiam in om un;
na pipute uh piaksawn, na awmdan uh bangmah hilou khawng a kipan, thil sethei, dangka leh dangkaeng a tat na hikei ua,
Belamnou gensiatbei leh ninbanglou sisan bang a, Kris sisan pha a tat nahi zaw uh chih nathei ngalua;
Amahtuh leilung pianma in sehkhawlh in a om ngeitak a, himahleh, hun nanungte ah noumau ziakin kilak in a om hi;
Amahziakin misilak akipan kaithoupa leh a thuipina pepa Pathian gingtate na hi uhi, na ginna uhleh na lametna uh Pathian a aom theihna ding in.
Unaute it taktak dinga thutak juia na kha uh na hihsiangthou tak jiak un lungtanga phatuamngai takin kiit tuah chiat un;
chi sethei lakah hi louin, Pathian thu hing gige leh om gige ah, chi se theilou laka piang thak na hi zaw ngal ua.
Mi tengteng tuh loupa bang ahi ua, a thupina tengteng uleng loupa pak bang ahi.
Loupa tuh a vuaia, a paka pulha,Toupa bel khantawnin a om gige ahi, chih ahi ngala.
Huaituh ahi, tanchin hoih thu nou a honhilh uh.
Toupa bel khantawnin a om gige ahi, chih ahi ngala.
Huaituh ahi, tanchin hoih thu nou a honhilh uh.
Huchiin gitlouhna tengteng, zekhemna tengteng, lepchiahna tengteng, hajatna tengteng, gensiatna teng teng tawpsan unla.
naungek suak thakte bangin khalam nawitui bangmah toh hel louh lunggulh un, huaia hotdamna muh donga na khan theihna ding un.
Toupa tuh mi hehpihthei tak ahi chih na chiam khin thamta uhi.
Amah tuh suang hing, mihingte deihlouh ngei, Pathian theih a bel tel leh manpha ahi.
Amah kiang a hongpaiin, noute leng suang hingte bangin khalam in a leptouhin na om ua, Jesu Kris jiakin Pathian kipahlam kithoihna lan dingin siampu siangthoute hong hi dingin.
Huajiakin, laisiangthou ah, Ngai un, Zion ah a ninga suang kiphamohpen, tel manpha tak ka lem hi; amah gingtate tuh a zahlak kei ding uh, chih a tuang ahi.
Huchiin, nou a gingtate adingin manpha pi ahi, agingta loute adingin bel, In lamte suang deih louhpen, huai mahmah a ninga suang phatuampen a honghita.
Pukna suang leh dalna suangpi toh, Thu tuh a jui kei ua, a kisui puk naknak ngal ua; huchibanga hih dinga seh ahi namah ua.
Himahleh, mial akipan pawta, vak lamdang taka lut dinga nou honsampa hoihna tuh na muhsak theihna ding un, nou jaw chi tel, kumpi siampute, nam siangthou, Pathian mite ngei na hi ngal ua;
nidanglaiin nam himhim na hi kei ua; tun jaw Pathian namte na hita uhi; nidang laiin zahngaihna namukei ua, tun jaw zahngaihna na muta uhi.
Deih mahmahte aw, mikhual leh khualzin nahih ziakun kha dou naknakpa sa utnate tawpsan dingin nou kahon ngen hi;
Jentelte lak a na tatdan uh kilawmtak hihen, huchiin thil hihkhialte bang a, a hon gensiatna lam uah na thil hihhoih uh amuhte uh jiakin veha a om chiang un Pathian a pahtawi thei ding uhi.
Toupa jiakin mihing dan bawl peuhmah ah lut un; tungnunga om kumpipa kiang ah hiam,
thil hihkhialte tung a thuk ding leh, thil; hihhoihte phat ding a sawlsawn gam upate kiang ah leng.
Hiaituh Pathian deihlam ahi ngala, mihaite haina tuh thil hoih hih in na hih dai ding uhi;
nuamlen na hi ua, himahleh na noplenna uh khelhna khuhna ding a zanglou in, Pathian sikha a omna dingin zangzaw un.
Mi tengteng pahtawi un.
Unaute it un; Pathian laudan siam un.
Kumpipa tuh pahtawi un.
Sikhate aw, laudan siam in nou hon heute thuthu in om un mihoih leh mi nunnem te lakkia hilou in, migiloute lak ah leng.
Min Pathian theihna ziakin thuaklouh dingding thuak in lungkhamna a thuak teitei leh; tuabang Pathian pahtak lam ahi ngala.
Nou na khelh ua, khut khak na thuak un, kuhkal takin thuak mahleuchin leng phatna bang naloh ua?
Ahihangin thil na hihhoih ua, na thuak ua, kuhkal taka nathuak uleh, huai tuh Pathian kipahpih lam ahi.
Kris mah inleng nou a hon thuaksak jiakin, tuabang hih ding a sap na hi uhi; a khap a na juihna ding un juih ding a hon nutsiat ahi.
Aman tuh thil himhim a hihkhial kei a, a kam ah zekhemna leng a om sam kei;
mi koua a om laiin, akou thuk kei a, a thuak lai in a vau kei hi; diktat taka ngaihtuah pa kiang ah akipe zaw hi.
Khelhna lama sikhin a diktatna lama ihin theihna ding in amahmah in tua sing ah asa in ikhelhnate a pua hi; amah vuakna golhte ah hihdam in na omta uhi.Belam mang bangin na mang ua, tun zaw nou hon chingpa leh heupa kiang ah na kik nawnta uhi.
Belam mang bangin na mang ua, tun zaw nou hon chingpa leh heupa kiang ah na kik nawnta uhi.
Huchimahbangin, nou jite aw, noumau pasalte thuthu in om un, huchiin alakua khenkhatin Pathian thu um kei mahle uh na tatdan uh zohin a om ding uhi,
laudan siam kawma na tatdan siangthou uh en in.
Na kivatnauh pawlam kivatna samphekte, dangkaeng khi awhte, puansilha kivatte bang hilou in,
lungtang a mihing thuguk lungsim thu nuailut leh nunnem puansilh setheilou a kivat hizawleh, huaituh Pathian mitmuh in a manpha mahmah hi.
Huchibang in tuma lam a numei siangthou Pathian gingtate leng amau pasalte thuthu a om in a kivan ngei jel ua.
Sara in Abraham tuh, toupa chi a athua a om bang in.
Thilhoih hih a, khem launa himhim laulou a na om uleh Sara tate nahi ding uhi.
Nou pasal te aw, huchibang mah in, numei zaw bel kitambaih zaw ahihjiakun leh, hehpihna hinna tanpihte ahih jiakun, pahtawi kawm in theihna bang jel in najite uh kiang ah om un, na thumnate uh dal a a om louhna ding in.
Atawppen in, navekun lungsim munkhat in om unla, ki lainat tuah unla, thunuailut in om un.
Khelhna khelhna in thuk kei unla, salhna salhna in thuk sam kei unla, vualzawl zogeih un.
Hiaijiakin sap nahi ngal ua, vualjawlna tang ding in.
Hinna it ut leh nihoihte mu ut in khelhna lak ah a lei venghoih leh, a muk leng zekhemna thu genlou ding innveng hoih hen.
Gilou nungngat san in thilhoih hih hen; kituahna zong in delh zel hen.
Toupa mit tuh midiktatte tungah a tu a, abil leng a thumna lam uah a doh zel a, ahihhangin Toupa mel tuh thil hihkhialte tungah a nim nak, chih ahi ngala.
Thil hoih lam a phatuam nangaih uleh, na pawi khoih ding uh kua a om dia?
Himahleh, diktatna jiaka na thuakta bang na hih uleh, na hampha ding uhi.
A kihtakhuaina uh kihta kei un;
ahihhangin na lungtang uah Kris tuh Toupa in bawl un; noumau a om na lamet pen uh hon dong peuhmah dawng ding in mansa gige in om uh, himahleh thunuai lut tak leh laudan siam tak kawm in:
sia leh pha theihna siang tak nei un, huchiin nou a hon gensiatna lam uah, Kris a na omdan hoihtak uh gen thanghuaite tuh hih jahlakin a om thei ding uhi.
Thil gilou hih ziaka thuak sangin Pathian hoihsak lam ahih leh thil hoih hih jiak a thuak tuh a hoihjaw ngala.
Pathian kiang a hon pi theihna ding in Kris in khehnate jiakin khatvei a thuakta ngala, midiktat-in mi diktatloute sik in a thuak a; sa ah hihsih in a om a, kha ah tuh hih hin in a omta hi;
huain suangkulh a kha omte kiang a thu ava tangkou pih a,
huaimiten nidanglai a Noa damlai a long bawl sungteng a, Pathian thuakzawhna in a ngak lai in thu amang kei ua; huai long ah mi tawmchik, huaituh mi giat tui apan humbit in a om uhi.
Huan, huai etsakna baptisma in, sapum nitna siansakna dan hilou in, Pathian mai a sianlehpha- theihna siansakna dan hizaw in, Jesu Kris thohnawnna ziakin tu in nou hon hukheta hi.Amahtuh van a pai in Pathian taklam ah a om a; angelte, thuneihnate, thil hihtheihnate amah thuthu-a omsak in a omta hi.
Amahtuh van a pai in Pathian taklam ah a om a; angelte, thuneihnate, thil hihtheihnate amah thuthu-a omsak in a omta hi.
Huchiin, Kris in a saa a thuak jiakin, nou leng huchi bang lungsimin kivan sam un; saa thuak khinsain gilou a tawpsanta ngala;
huchiin, tunung saa a omlai teng, mihing duhgawlna lam banga omta louin, Pathian deihlamin a omta hi.
Jentelte utlam hihna- huknate, sa utna te, uaiin haina te, zu dawn khamna te, milim biakna kihhuai takte hiha omna tumalama teng hunta hen aw;
huaia amau nuam bawl luatna banga nouten tu-a na bawlsam louh uh lamdang a sa ua, nou a hon-gense nak uhi;
amau tuh mihing leh misite ngaihtuah dinga mansa kiangah a tanchin uh a gen ding uhi.
Hiai jiakin ahi, misite kianga leng tanchin hoih gen a hih, saa om mihingte banga ngaihtuahin om mahle-uh, khaa bel Pathian banga a hin theihna ding un.
Himahleh, thil tengteng tawpna tuh a naita, huaijiakin na thum theihna ding un lungsim diktak puin pilvangun.
Bangkimteng sangin phatuamngai takin kiit tuah chiat unla; itnain gilou tampi a khuh jel ngala.
Phun louin kizintun tuah unla;
mi chihin thilpiak na muh bang jel un, Pathian hehpihna chiteng kem hoihte bangin, huaitein na kisep sak tuah chiat un.
Mi kuapeuhin thu a gen leh Pathian thute bangin gen hen; mi kuapeuhin na a sep leh Pathianin hatna a piak bang jelin sem hen; huchiin Jesu Kris jiakin Pathian tuh thil bangkimah pahtawiin a om thei ding, thupina leh vaihawmna tuh khantawna amaha ahi ngala.
Amen.
Deih takte aw, na lak ua zeetna thupi tak hongom, noumau zeetna dinga na tung ua hong tung, thil lamdang na tung ua tung bangin lamdangsa kei un.
Kris thuaknate bangah thuakpihte na hihdan bang jel un kipak jaw un; huchiin a thupinaa a hongkilak chiangin noumau leng nuamtakin na kipak thei ding uhi.
Kris min jiaka tai nahih uleh, na hampha uhi; thupina kha leh Pathian kha tuh na tunguah a om ngala.
Himahleh, na lak uah kuamahin tualthatmi a hih jiakin hiam, mi dangte thil hih gensakmi a hih jiakin hiam thuak kei hen.
Ahihhangin, Kristian a hih jiakin thuakta leh zum kei hen; huai min jiakin Pathian pahtawi jaw hen.
Vaihawmna tuh Pathian inkuanpihte ah pat a hunta ngala; huan, eite ngeia a pat masak leh, Pathian tanchin hoih thumang loute tawpna tuh bangchi phet ahi de aw?
Huan, mi diktat nangawn hotdam liailiai a hih in tuh, Pathian limsaklou leh mi gilou tuh koiah a lang ding?Huai jiakin, Pathian hoihsak banga thuakten tuh thil hoih hihin a khate uh Siampa muanhuaitak kiangah kemsak hen.
Huai jiakin, Pathian hoihsak banga thuakten tuh thil hoih hihin a khate uh Siampa muanhuaitak kiangah kemsak hen.
Huchiin, na lak ua saptuam upate tuh, kei, na upat pih uh, Kris thuaknate theipa thupina honglang ding tangsam dingin ka honhasuan ahi;
Na lak ua Pathian pawlte om tuh kem un; hih ding a hih jiak hi louin, Pathian thu banga ut kawm jawin, punna thanghuai deih jiak leng hi louin, lungsima deih taktak jawin,
na tante uh tungah kilal sak tuan louin pawlte zuih dinga kibawl jawin, kem un.
Huan, Belamchingpapen a honglat chiangin, thupina lallukhu tul theilou na mu ding uhi.
Huchibang mahin, nou valnou deuhte aw, upate nuaiah lut un.
A hi, na nek ua na kisepsak tuah chiat dingin thunuailutnain kithuam un; Pathianin kisatheite a dou a, kingaineute bel hehpina a pe naknak hi.
Huaijiakin, a hun taka nou a honpahtawi theihna dingin, Pathian khut hat tak nuaiah kihihniam unla,
Aman a honlimsak gige jiakin na mangbatna tengteng uh amah tungah nga vek un.
Pilvang unla, limsak un; na melma uh Diabol, humpinelkai humham bangin a nek theih ding zongin a vial vakvak hi;
na unau uh khovela omte tungah huchibang thuaknate a tung sam chih theiin, ging kip taka omin, amah dou un.
Huan, hehpihna tengteng Pathian, a khantawn thupina tang dinga Krisa nou honsampa ngeiin, sawtlou kal na thuak nung un a siam hoihkimin, a hihkipin, a honhihhat ding hi.
Amah kiangah vaihawmna khantawnin om hen.
Amen.
Ka unaupa muanhuai tak ka chih Silvana khutin, noumau hasuan leh, huai tuh Pathian hehpihna taktak ahi chih theiin, tom chikin na kiang uah ka gelh ahi; huai ah tuh ding kip un.
Babulon khuaa om noumau banga telnun chibai a honbuk ahi; huchibangmahin ka tapa Markain leng chibai a honbuk ahi.itna tawpnaa tawpin chibai kibuk un, Na lak ua Krisa om peuhmahte kiang ah lemna om hen.

itna tawpnaa tawpin chibai kibuk un, Na lak ua Krisa om peuhmahte kiang ah lemna om hen.
Amen.
Simon Peter, Jesu Kris sikha leh sawltakin, Jesu Kris i Pathian leh Hondampa diktatna jiaka ginna mantam tak i tan bang tang samte kiagah:
Pathian leh i Toupa Jesu Kris theihna ah na tunguah hehpihna leh lemna hihkhanin om hen.
Amah thupina leh hoihna jiaka honsampa, a tanchin theih jiakin a Pathian thilhihtheihnain hinna leh Pathianlimsak na lam thuah thil tengteng a honpe ngala.
Huaite jiakin a thuchiam manpha tak leh thupi petpette tuh honpia ahi; huchiin utna jiaka khovela siatna hongom tuh taikhiak santa in; huai thuchiam manpha tak leh thupi petpette jiakin Pathian omdan na kikoppih thei sam ding uhi.
A hi, huai jiak takin, thanop himhim suahin, na ginna uah hoihna hel unla, na hoihna uah theihna hel unla,
na theihna uah kidekna hel unla, na kidekna uah kuhkalna hel unla, na kukhalna uah Pathianlimsakna hel unla,
na Pathianlimsakna uah unaute itna hel unla, na unaute itna uah itna hel un.
Huaite noua a hiha, a khanjel ngalleh, i Toupa Jesu Kris theihna lamah thadah lou leh gah loulouin nou a honbawl nak hi.
Kuapeuh huai thilte neilou tuh mittaw ahi, naichik ate kia a mu theia, a nidanglai khelhnate silsiang sakna tuh a mangngilhta ngala.
Huaijiakin, unaute aw, nou a honsapna leh a hontelna hihkip dingin thanop suah semsem un; tuate na hih uleh chiklai mahin na puk kei ding uhi;
huchiin, Jesu Kris i Toupa leh Hondampa khantawn gama lutna a honmu sak lo mahmah ding uhi.
Huaijiakin, huai thilte theiin, thutak na kiang ua om na kipna uah, huai thilte tuh nou hontheihpih dingin ka mansa gige ding hi.
Huan, hiai pumpi-a ka om laiteng noumau hontheihpihin hontohhalh gige hoih ka sa ahi;
i Toupa Jesu Krisin hontheihsak bangin kapumpi koih mangna ding a tung zok ding chih ka thei ngala.
A hi, ka pai khiak nungin huai thilte na theihgige theihna ding un, ka kisuk ding hi.
I Toupa Jesu Kris thilhihtheihna leh a hongpai na thu ka hontheihsak laiun, tangthu pil taka ngaihtuah khiak phet juite ka hi kei ua, a thupina mute ka hi jaw uhi.
Aman tuh Pa Pathian kiangah kipanin pahtawina leh thupina a mu a, huchihlaiin thupina thupitak akipanin hichibang aw a kiang a hongtung, Hiai ka tapa deihtak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi, chiin.
Huan, tang siangthoua a kianga ka om jiak un huai aw tuh van akipana hong suak koumau ngeiin ka ja uhi.
Huchiin genkholhna thu kip nawn sem i nei uhi.
Khua a hongvaka, jingsolaksi tuh na lungtang ua a hongsuah masiah hiai thu khawnvak mun miala vak a limsak bang ua, na limsak uleh na hih hoih ding uhi,
Laisiangthoua thu gen kholh himhim eimah kihilhchian ding ahi kei chih thei masa phot unlaThu genkholh himhim mihing thua pawt ahi ngei ngal keia, miten Kha Siangthou sawlin, Pathian kianga kipanin a gen zo nak uhi.
Thu genkholh himhim mihing thua pawt ahi ngei ngal keia, miten Kha Siangthou sawlin, Pathian kianga kipanin a gen zo nak uhi.
Himahleh, mite lakah jawlnei takloute leng a hongpawt ua, huchibangin na lak uah leng heute takloute a hongom ding uh, amau tuh, amaute leipa Toupa hilhial tawpsanin mi hihsethei gintuamte a gukin a honlut pih ding ua, amau tungah thakhatin manthatna a tungsak ding uhi.
Huan, mi tampiin a jautatna lam thil uh a honching teisam ding ua, amau jiakin lam dik tuh gensiat ahi ding hi.
Huan, sum en jiakin juauthuin sumsinna ding nou a honzang ding uh; himahleh nidanglaia a tung ua thupuk tuh a khawl keia, a manthatna uh leng a ihmu kei hi.
Angelten thil a hihkhelh lai un Pathianin a hawi keia, gawtmun ah a paia, vaihawm dingin guamkhukthuk mial ah a khum zo ngala;
huan, amah limsakloute omna khovel ah tuichim tung sakin, nidanglai khovel tuh a hawi keia, himahleh, Noa diktatna thugenpa, mi dang sagih toh a hondamta hi;
Sodom leh Gomorra khuate tuh amah limsak lou hongom dingte etsakna dingin a zanga, vut suak sakin, hihmang thangin siamlouh a tangsakta a;
huan, Lota mi diktat, mi giloute omdan huk tak jiaka lungkham mahmahpa tuh a hondamtaa;
(Huai mi diktat tuh a lak ua a omin, a mitin a mu a, a bilin a jaa, dan lou banga a thilhihte un a lungsim diktat tuh ni tengin a hihna mahmah ngala).
Toupan amah limsakmite tuh khemna apat hotkhiakdan leh, diktatloute tuh vaihawm ni adinga gawt kawma hawi dan a thei;
utna thanghuai lama sa banga om leh, vaihawm sakna musitmite ngial houh vaihawm nia dinga gawt kawma hawi dan a thei sem ahi.
Haihan leh chihhak ahi ua a thupite a gensiat un leng a ling kei uhi;
angel hatna leh thilhihtheihna neiten bawn, amaute dema Toupa maa gense ngei lou hi ua.
Himahleh, hiaiten bel ganhing ngaihtuahna neilou, mata hihman dinga sa kiaa piangte bangin, thil a theih louhte uh a gensia ua,
amau siatnain a se ngei ding uh, thil hihkhel mana thil gilou thuakin.
Sunlaia ankuanglui buai nuamsa mi ahi uhi.
Na kiang ua ankuang a lui un, amau kikhemna ankuanglui a hih jiak un, thanghuaina gensiatna ahi uhi;
mit angkawma dim, khelhna tawpsan theiloute a nei ua; mi kip loute a khem puk ua; enhat lungsim a pu ua; hamsiat thuak tate ahi ua;
Boer tapa Balaam, thilhih khelhna loh deihpa lampi tuh a tot tak jiak un lam dik a pai san ua, a vak mangta uhi;
himahleh amah tuh a tatlekna jiakin taihilhin a omtaa; sabengtung pau theilou mihing pauin a hongpaua, jawlnei haina tuh a kham hi.
Hiaite tuh tuikhuk tui om lou leh, tuimei huihpi mut leng ahi ua; amaute adingin nuailam mial sah meuhmouh sit a hita hi.
Thu ginalou chiak jena genin giloua omte laka kipana tai khe laitakte tuh sa utna ah huknain a khempuk nak uhi.
Amau tuh siatna sikha hi kawm piin mite tuh sikha suahtakna thu achiam nak uh; mi zoha a omna mahin, huai mahin sikhain a siam nak ngala,
Toupa leh Hondampa Jesu Kris a theih jiak ua khovel thanghuainate a taikhiak san nung ua, huai maha a tan nawn ua, zoha a om nawn phing ua leh, a omdan nanung uh tuh amasa sangin a honghoihta kei jaw ahi ding hi.
Diktatna lampi pen theih nunga, thupiak siangthou a kiang ua kep sak thu nungngatsan sangin, diktatna lampi theilou hita le uh amau adingain a hoihzo ding ahi ngala.Ui amah luak lamah a kiknawna, vopi kisil siangsa leng buannawi ah kisil dingin a kik nawna, chih, paunak diktak bang thu tuh amau tungah a hongtungta ahi.
Ui amah luak lamah a kiknawna, vopi kisil siangsa leng buannawi ah kisil dingin a kik nawna, chih, paunak diktak bang thu tuh amau tungah a hongtungta ahi.
Deihtakte aw, tua na kiang ua ka gelh laikhak nihna ahi a. huaite gel ah nou theihkhiakthak nawnnain na lungsim siang uh ka tokthou hi.
Jawlnei siangthoute thugen kholh leh, na sawltakte uh kama Toupa leh Hondampa thupiak na theihgige na ding in,
Hiai thei masa un, ni nanungte ah, misimmohhatte tuh amau utna banga omin, simmoh kawmin a hongpai ding ua,
a hongpai nawnna thuchiam koi ah?
Siam tunga kipan bangkim a om ngeingei bang un pi leh pute ihmut ni akipanin a om jela, a honchi ding uhi.
Hiai khawngte a kitheihmohbawl jel uh, Pathian thuin nidanglaiin vante a hongom a;
huan, leitung, tuia kipan leh tui zanga bawl ahia, huai tui mahin a tuma, a mangthangta chih.
Himahleh, tua vante lah lei omte tuh huai thu mahin Pathianlimsaklou mite vaihawm leh manthat ni adinga sitin, meia dinga khol khawm a hita hi.
Himahleh, deihtak aw, hiai thu kamkhat pen mangngilh kei un, Toupa ngaihin ni khat tuh kum sang khat bang ahi, kum sang khat leng ni khat bang ahi, chih.
Mi khenkhat in zekai a sak bang un Toupa jaw a thuchiam lamah a zekai kei hi; kuamah manthat deih loua, mi tengteng hongkisik deihin, noumau lamah a dohzou ahi jaw hi.
Himahleh, Toupa ni jaw guta bangin a hongtung ding; huai ni chiangin van khawng nakpi taka gingin a mangthang ding, thilbulte khawng meia hai tuiin a omta dinga, lei leh a sunga nasep omte, a kang bei ding uhi.
Tua thilte tuh huchibanga mangthang vek ding uh ahi chih na theih un, omdan siangthou leh Pathian limsakna lamah mi bangchi bang hi ding na hi ua,
Pathian ni hongtunna ding lamen leh phatuamngai taka deihin.
Huai ni a tun jiakin van khawng hongkangin a mangthang dia, thilbulte leng meia hai tuiin a omta ding.
Himahleh, a thuchiam bang in van thak leh lei thak, a sunga diktatna omte khawng i lamen ahi.
Huaijiakin, deihtakte aw, huaibang thilte na lamet jiak un nin bang lou leh gensiatbeiin, khamuang taka na om uh a honmuh theihna ding in, thanop suah un;
huan, i Toupa dohzohna hotdamnain sim un. i unaupa deihtak Paulain leng, a kianga pilna piak bang jela, na kiang ua a gelh bangin;
a laikhak tengteng ah, tua thute genin. tua mahbangin a gelh hi.
Huaiah tuh tuh theih hak thukte a oma, huaite tuh mi pil lou leh mi kip louten, laisiangthou dang a ngaikawi bang un a ngaikawi ua, amau leh amau kihihmannan a zang nak uhi.
Huchiin, deihtakte aw, nouten tua thute na natheih kholh jiak un pilvang un, huchilou injaw mi giloute diklouhnaa pi manga omin, na kipna ua kipan na puk kha ding uhi.Ahihhangin, i Toupa leh Hondampa Jesu Kris hehpihna leh theihna ah hongkhang unla.
Tu leh khantawnin amah kiangah thupina om hen.

Hinna thu, a tunga kipana na omkhinsa, kouten ka jak uh, ka mit ua ka muh uh, ka et kilkel ua, ka khut ua ka khoih uh-
huai hinna tuh latsakin a hongomtaa, kouten ka muta ua, huan huai khantawn hinna Pa kianga om leh koute kiangah latsaka omta tuh noute kiangah konphuang uhi-
kouten ka muh sa uh leh ka jaksa uh mah noute kianga zong konphuang uhi, huchia nouten zong koute toh kithuahna na neih theihna dingun; koute kithuahna bel Pa toh a Tapa Jesu Kris toh kithuahna ahi.
Noute na kipahna uh a bukimna dingin hiai kongelh uhi.
Huan, thukhah a kianga kipana ka jak uh na kiang ua ka honhilh sawn uh tuh hiai ahi, Pathian jaw vak ahi a, amah ah mial himhim a om kei hi chih.
Miala om napiin, Amah ka kithuahpih, chi lehang juau i gen ahi, thutak leng i jui kei uhi;
a hihhangin, amah tuh vaka a om bangin ei leng vaka om i hih leh i kithuah chiat ua, huan, a Tapa Jesu sisanin i khelhna tengteng a honsil siang sak jel ahi.
Khelhna ka neikei, chi lehang eimah leh eimah i kikhem a, thutak tuh eimahah a om kei hi.
i khelhnate thupha i tawi leh, i khelhnate, ngaidam ding leh, i diktatlouhnate tengteng silsiang dingin amah tuh a muanhuaiin a diktat ahi.Thil ka hihkhial kei, i chih leh, amah juautheiin in i bawl ua, a thu leng eimahah a om kei hi.

Ka naute aw thil na hihkhelh louhna dingun hiai thute na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Huan, kuapeuhin thil a hihkhelh aleh, Pa kianga hon genpihpa, Jesu Kris Mi diktat i nei hi;
A mah tuh i khelhnate thupha tawina ahi; eimah khelhna kia hi louin, khovel tengteng khelhna thupha tawina leng ahi.
Huan, a thupiakte jui i hih leh, huaiah amah i thei chih i kithei hi.
A thupiakte jui loua, Amah ka thei, chimi tuh amah mi juauthei ahi, thutak amah ah a om kei hi.
Kuapeuh a thu jui peuhmah amah ah Pathian a itna a kim petmahhi.
Amah ah i om chih hiaiah i kithei ahi.
Amah ah ka om gige, chi mi tuh amah om bangin a om sam ding ahi.
Deihtakte aw, thupiak thak jaw na kiang uah ka hon gelh keia: thupiak lui, a tunga kipana na neih uh ka hongelh jaw ahi.
Huai thupiak lui tuh na thu theihsa pen uh ahi.
Himahleh, thupiak gelh zong hi sam na veng, huai tuh amah ah leh noumau ah a lang ahi, mial a man lellel jiakin leh, vak taktak tuh tua a hongvak tak jiakin.
A unau ho napia, Vakah ka om, chimi tuh tutanin leng mialah a om gige hi.
A unau itmi tuh vakah a om gige a. amah ah kipalpaihna dingsan himhim a om kei hi.
A unau homi bel mialah a oma, mialah a khosaa, mialin a mit a tawt sak jiakin a paina leng a theikei hi.
Naute aw, amah min jiaka na khelhnate uh ngaihdam a hihtak jiakin na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Pate aw, amah, a tunga kipana om gige na theih jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Tangvalte aw, Pathian thu noumau ah a om gige a, mi gilou tuh na zohtak jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Naute aw, Pa na theih jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Pate aw, amah a tunga kipana om gige na theih jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Tangvalte aw, na hat ua, Pathian thu noumau ah a om gige a, mi gilou na zohtak jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Khovel it kei unla, khovela thil omte leng it sam kei un.
Mi kuapeuhin khovel a it leh, Pa a itna amah ah a om kei hi.
Khovela thil om tengteng, sa utnate, mit utnate, dam sung thupina limte khawng Pa akipan ahi keia, khovel akipan ahi zo ngala,
Khovel, a utnate toh, a mangthang lellel ahi.
Pathian deihlam hihmi bel khantawnin a om gige ding hi.
Naute aw, hun nanungpen hita e, Kris doupa a hongpai ding chih na jak bang un, tuin leng Kris doumi tampitak a hongpawtta uhi; huaijiakin hun nanungpen a hita chih i thei uhi.
Amau tuh i lak ua kipanin a pawt ua, himahleh eimah mi tak ahi kei uh; eimah mi tak hi le uh i kiang uah a om sam jel ding uh ahi ngala; himahleh a vek un eimah mi tak ahi kei vek uh chih a lat chetna dingin a hon pawtsanta uhi.
Mi siangthou kianga kipan thaunilhna na tang ua, bangkim na thei uhi.
Thutak na theih louh jiak ua ka gelh ahi kei, na theih jiak uh leh, thutaka juau bangmah a pawt ngei louh jiakin ka gelh ahi jaw.
Jesu tuh Kris ahi chih gingta lou mi vala juauthei kua a oma?
Kris doumi tuh Pa leh Tapa gingta lou mi ahi hi.
Kuapeuh Tapa gingta louin Pa leng a sang tuan kei; Tapa gingtain bel Pa leng a sang hi.
Nou jaw, a tunga kipana na jak uh, noumau ah om sak gige un.
Huai atunga kipana na jak uh noumaua a om gige leh, nou leng Tapa ah Pa ah na om gige ding uh.
Huan hiai ahi amah ngeiin thil a honchiam pen- khantawn hinna.
Huai noumau honpimang tumte thu mah na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Nou jaw, amah kianga kipan a thaunilhna na tan uh noumau ah a om gige a, kuamah hilh na kiphamoh kei uhi; amah thaunilhnain thil tengteng thu a honhilh jawk jiakin leh, diktat ahi a, juau leng a hih louh jiakin, huaiin nou a honhilh bangin amah ah om gige un.
Huchiin naute aw, amah ah om gige un; huan, amah tuh hongkilak mahleh, a hongpaiin a mahah zum louin hangtakin i om thei ding hi.Amah tuh mi diktat ahi chih na theih uleh, mi kuapeuh diktatna hih tuh amaha suak ahi chih na thei uhi.

Ngai un, Pa honitna thupi hina tele!
Pathian tate chiha i om; tuachibang i hi him uhi; Hiai khawng jiakin khovelin a honthei kei hi, amah a theih louh jiakin.
Deihtakte aw, tunah Pathian tate i hi ua, bangchin ahia i om ding chih bel a kithei tadih keia; amah a hongkilak chiangin, amah bangin i om ding chih bel i thei hi, amah tuh a om ngeingei bang takin i mu ding ahi ngala.
Kuapeuh amah tunga lametna nei peuhmah, amah a siangthou bangin a kihihsiangthou nak hi.
Kuapeuh thil hihkhial tuh dan ah leng a talek hi; khelhna tuh dana tatlekna ahi ngala.
Amah tuh khelhnate lamang dingin a honglangta chih na thei uhi; amah ah khelhna bangmah a om ngal keia.
Kuapeuh amaha om gigein thil a hihkhial kei hi; kuapeuh thilhihkhialin amah a mu kei, thil leng a theikei hi.
Tate aw, kuamah khemin om kei un.
Diktatna hihmi tuh a diktat hi, amah a diktat mahbangin.
Thil hihkhialmi tuh diabola pawt ahi; diabolin atunga kipan thil a hihkhial ngala.
Pathian Tapa honglat napen tuh diabol nasepte a hihmanthat theihna dingin ahi.
Kuapeuh Pathiana suakin, Pathian chi amaha a om gige jiakin thil a hihkhial kei, Pathian suak a hih jiakin, thil a hihkhial theikei hi.
Hiaiah Pathian tate leh diabol tate a theihtheih hi; kuapeuh diktatna hih lou tuh Pathiana suak ahi kei, a unau it lou leng Pathiana suak ahi sam kei hi.
Hiai tuh a tunga kipana thukhah na jak uh ahi ngala, i kiit tuah chiat ding uh ahi chih;
Kaina, gilou pa akipanpa amah unau thatpa banga om lou in.
Bang jiakin ahia a thah tak?
Amah thil hihte a gilou a, a unau thil hihte a dik jiakin.
Naute aw, khovelin nou a nonhuat leh lamdang sa kei un.
Unaute i it jiakin sihna akipanin i pawt ua, hinna ah i lutta chih i thei uh.
Kuapeuh itna neilou tuh sihna ah a om gige lai hi.
Kuapeuh a uanu hua tuh tualthat ahi; tualthatmi kuamah khantawn hinna pai himhim a om kei uh chih na thei ngal ua.
Hiaiah itna bang ahia chih i thei hi, aman tuh ei adingin a hinna a piak tak jiakin; en leng unaute adingin i hinna i piak sam ding ahi.
Himahleh, kuapeuhin khovel sum neiin, a unau tasamin mu taleh, amah tuh lainat tuan kei leh, Pathian itna amaha bangchin a om ding?
Naute aw, thu kiain it kei ni, lei kiain leng it sam kei ni, thilhih leh chihtak takin hi jaw hen.
Hiaiin thutaka suak i hi chih i kithei dinga, amah ma ah i lungtangte i muangsak thak ding hi.
i lungtangin siamlouh a hontangsak peuhmah chiangin; banghang hiam i chih leh Pathian jaw i lungtangte sangin a lian jawa thil bangkim a thei hi.
Deihtakte aw, i lungtangin siamlouh a hontansak kei leh, Pathian lamah i hang ahi:
A thupiakte i juih ua, a mit muhna thil kipahhuai i hih jel jiakin i nget peuhmah amah akipanin i mu jel ahi.

Hiaiah Pathian Kha na thei ding uh, bang kha peuh Jesu Kris sain ahongpai chih gum tuh, Pathian akipan ahi;
Bang kha peuh Jesu gum lou tuh, Pathian akipan ahi kei; huai tuh Kris doumi kha, hongpai ding na jak uh ahi; tuin khovel ah a om khinpah hi.
Naute aw, Pathian akipan na hi ua, tuate na zouta uhi; noumaua om tuh khovela om sanga a thupijawk jiakin.
Amau tuh khovela ahi ua; huaijiakin khovela bangin a pau ua, khovelin a thu uh a ngaikhe naknak.
Eite Pathian akipan i hi ua, Pathian theimiten i thu angaikhe jel uhi; Pathian akipanlou miten i thu a ngaikhe kei naknak uh.
Hiai khawnga Thutak Kha leh thutaklou kha i thei uhi.
Deihtakte aw, i kiit tuah chiat ding uh; itna Pathiana suak ahi ngala, mi chih itna nei peuhmah tuh Pathianaa suak ahi khin uhi, Pathian a thei lai uhi.
itna neilouin Pathian a theikei; Pathian lah itna ahi ngala.
Hiaiah Pathian itna i tung ua a honglangta, amah vanga i hin theihna dingin Pathianin a Tapa neihsun khovela a honsawlna ah;

Deihtakte aw, Pathianin huchi tela a honit leh, eite leng i kiit tuah chiat ding hi.

Amah ah i om gige chih leh amah eimau ah a om gige chih hiaiah i thei, a Kha a honpiak tak jiakin.
Huan, Pain Tapa khovel Hondampa hihna neiin a honsawl chih i muta ua, i theisak uhi.
Kuapeuh Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi, chia gum tuh, amah ah Pathian a om gige a, amah leng Pathian ah a om gige a, amah leng Pathian a om gige hi.
Pathianin eimaua dia itna a neih tuh i thei ua, i gingta lai uhi.
Pathian itna ahi; itnaa om gige tuh, Pathian ah a om gigea, Pathian leng amahah a om gige ahi.
Hiaiah i tunguah itna a kimta, vaihawm nia ding lau loua i om theihna ah; amah om banga khovela i om jiakin.
itan ah tuh launa himhim a om kei, itan kimin lauhna a delhkhe zo jel hi, lauhna in gawtna hon-ngaihtuahsak; a laumi tuh itna ah a kim tadih kei ahi.
Aman a honit masak jiakin, i it uhi.
Min, Pathian ka it, chiin, a unau ho ngal leh, amah tuh juauthei ahi; a unau a muhsa bawn a it ken, Pathian a muh ngei louhpi bangchin a it thei dia?Amah kianga kipanin hiai thupiak i nei uh, Kuapeuhin Pathian a it leh, a unau leng a it sam ding ahi, chih.

Kuapeuh Jesu tuh Kris ahi chih gingta tuh Pathian suahsak ahi; kuapeuh a suaksakpa itin a suahsak leng a it nak.
Hiaiah Pathian tate i it chih i thei, Pathian i ita, a thupiakte i zuihin.
Pathian i itna tuh hiah ahi, a thupiakte i zuihna; a thupiakte tuh a haksa ngal keia.
Pathian suahsak peuhin khovel a zou jel ngala; hiai ahi khovel tunga vualzohna, i ginna.
Jesu tuh Pathian Tapa ahi chih gingmi kia ngal lou, kuan khovel a zou jela?
Hiai ahi, tui leh sisana hongpaipa, Jesu Kris; tui kiaah hi louin, tuiah leh sisan ah ahi jaw.
Theisakpa tuh Kha ahi, Kha tuh thutak a hihjiakin.
Theihpihtu thum a om uhi, Kha leh tui leh sisan; huai thumte tuh akituhtuak uhi.
Mihing theihsakna bawn i san leh, Pathian theihsakna a thupi zo ngala; Pathian theihsakna tuh hiai ahi, Ka Tapa tanchin ka theisakta, chih ahi ngala.
Pathian Tapa gingmi amah ah theihna aneia Pathian gingloumin amah tuh juautheiin abawl ahi, Pathianin a Tapa tanchin a theihsak tuh a gintak louh jiakin.
Theihsakna tuh hiai ahi, Pathianin khantawna hinna a honpia a, huai hinna tuh a Tapa ah a om hi.
Tua Tapa neiin hinna a nei hi; Pathian Tapa neilouin hinna a neikei hi.
Khantawnin hinna na nei uh chih na theihna ding un, nou Pathian Tapa min gingtate kiangah hiai thu ka gelh a hi
Hiaipen amah tunga i hanna ahi, bangpeuhmah amah deihlam banga i nget leh, aman a honngaihkhiak sak nakna ah;
Huchiin, bangpeuhmah i nget tuh a honngaih khiaksak chih i thei leh, a kianga i thil nget tak tuh i muta chih i thei hi.
Kuapeuhmahin a unau, sihna khop hi lou khelhna hihin mu leh, a nget sak ding, huchiin Pathianin a ngenmi kiangah sihna khop hi lou khelhna hihte adingin hinna a pe ding hi.
Sihna khop khelhna a oma; huchi bang lamah a nget sak ding ka chi ahi kei hi.
Diktatlouhna tengteng tuh khelhna ahi; sihna khop hi lou khelhna leng a om sam hi.
Kuapeuh Pathian suahsakin thil a hihkhial kei chih i thei hi; Pathian Suahsakpan amah a kem gige a, giloupan khoih leng a khoih theikei him ahi.
Huan, Pathian akipan i hih ua leh, khovel pumpi tuh giloupa thuthuin a om chih i thei hi.
Huan, Pathian Tapa tuh ahongpaia, Mi diktat tuh theithei dingin theihtheihna a honpia chih i thei behlap uhi; huan, eite, a Tapa Jesu Krisa i om in, Mi Diktat ah i om uhi.
Amah tuh Pathian dik tak ahi a, khantawn hinna leng a nei hi.Naute aw, milim lakah kihemkhia un.

Upain numei hoih tel leh a tate amau chihtakpeta ka itte kiangah; kei mah kia ka hi keia, thutak thei peuhmahte leng ahi uhi;
Thutak eimaha om gige, khantawn leng i kianga om ding a hih jiakin:
Pa Pathian leh, Toupa Jesu Kris, Pa Tapa kianga kipan, hehpihnate, zahngaihnate, lemnate thutak leh itnain i kiang uah a om ding hi.
Pa kianga kipana thupiak i muh bangin na ta kuate hiam thutaka oma ka muh jiakin ka kipak mahmah hi.
Numei hoih, na kianga thupiak thak gelh bang hi louin, a tunga kipana i neih bangpen gelh jawin, i kiit tuah theihna dingin nget pet mahin ka hon ngen ahi.
Huan, hiai tuh itna ahi, amah thupiak bang jela i om.
Thupiak, atunga kipata na jak uh tuh hiai ahi, huaiah na om ding uhi.
Khemmi tampi Jesu Kris sain a hongpai chih gum loumite khovelah a hongpawtta ngal ua.
Tuabang mite ahi, khemmi leh Kris doumi.
i sepkhiaksate na mansak louh ua, a man a kima na muh theih jawkna ding un, kiveng hoh un.
Kuapeuh huai thukihilhna thua om gige loua, talekin, Pathian a neikei; huai thukihilhna thua a om gigein bel, huaiin tuh Pa leh Tapa a nei kop ahi.
Kuapeuh huai thukihilhna thu honpo loua, na kiang ua a hongpai leh, na in uah tungsak kei unla, paukam hoihin leng kha kei un;
Paukam hoiha khami tuh a thil hihkhelhah a pang sam ngal hi.
Na kiang ua thu tampi gen ding ka neih jiakin lai lah laituia gelh ka ut keia; na kipahna uh a kim thiehna dingin na kiang ua honga, kimatuaha kihou ka lamen jaw hi.Na sanggam nu tel tate un chibai a honbuk uhi.

Upain deihtak Gaia thutaka ka it kiangah:
Deihtak, na khain vualjawlna a muh bangin, bangkima vualjawlna na muh leh na dam theihna dingin ka thum jel ahi.
Unaute hongpaiun, na hinna takdan a hontheihsak lai un, ka kipak mahmah ngala, thutaka na om taktak jiakin.
Ka tate thutakah a om uh chih ka jak kana kipahna thupi jaw himhim ka neikei hi.
Deihtak, unaute mikhual hi mahle uh, a tung na hih peuhah muanhuai takin na hih jela:
Huaiten saptuamte maah na itna a thei sakta uhi; amau tuh a zinna ua Pathian mi hihtuak hima na makaih leh a hoih ding hi;
Amah jiaka Jentelte kianga kipan bangmah la louin a pawt ngal ua.
Huchiin, thutak seppihte i hih theihna dingin huchibang mite tuh eiten i kipahpih ding ahi.
Saptuamte kiangah thu neukha jaw ka gelhta; himahleh, Diotriphi a lak ua tungnun ut nakpan a kipahpih ngal keia.
Huaijiakin. ka hongpai aleh, a thilhihte tuh ka thei khe sak nawn dinga, i tunguah thu giloou gena a kimtamdan; huai leng hun a sa keia, amah ngeiin unaute a kipahpih keia, a kipahpih nuamte leng a khoua, saptuamte laka kipan a delhkhia hi.
Deihtak, gilou jaw ching ken, hoih ching jaw in.
Thilhoih hihmi tuh Pathian laka ahi; thil gilou hihmin Pathian a mu ngei kei hi.
Demetria-in mi tengteng phat a hoha, thutaka phat nangawn a loh behlap hi; ahi, en leng i phat ahi; i phatna tuh a dik ahi chih na thei hi.
Na kiangah thu tampi gelh ding ka neia, himahleh, laitui leh laigelhnain na kianga gelh ka ut kei hi;
Sawtlou nung chiangin honmuh ka lamen jaw hi, huchiin kimatuahin i kihou ding.
Khamuanna na tungah om hen.I lawmten chibai a honbuk uhi.
A min uh lou chiatin lawmte khawng chibai honbuk sak in.
I lawmten chibai a honbuk uhi.
A min uh lou chiatin lawmte khawng chibai honbuk sak in.
Juda, Jesu Kris sikha leh Jakob unauin, Pa Pathiana deihtak, Jesu Kris adinga sit, sapte kiangah:
Hehpihnate, lemnate, itnate na tunguah hihkhanin om hen.
Deihtakte aw, i kikop hotdamna thu na kiang ua gelh ka tup teitei lain, misiangthoute kianga ginna khatvei kepsak lamah phatuam ngai taka pang dinga honhasuan dingin na kiang ua lai gelh a kiphamoh chih kana theia.
Mi kuatehiam a guka hong lut a om ngal ua, nidang laia pan hiai siamlouhtanna dia sehte; huaite tuh Pathian hehpihna akaikawiin, i Heutupa leh i Toupa neih sun, Jesu Kris tuh a kitheihmohbawl behlap uhi.
Huan, bangkim khatveiin thei vek mahle uchin, Toupan Aigupta gama kipana mite a suahtaksaka, huai nung gingtaloute tuh a hihmanthat dan nou hontheihsak nawn ka ut ahi.
Huan, angel te amau sawltak hihna jui loua, a omna ngeingei uh paisan zote tuh, ni thupi vaihawmnaa dinga mial nuaia khantawn henna hen kawmin a sit ahi.
Sodom leh Gomorra, a kiang kim ua khuate toh, huchibangmaha kingaihnaa kipumpiaka, gitlouhna leklua a delh sam tak jiak un, khantawna meia gawtna thuaka, theihsakna dinga suankhiaka a om bang un.
Himahleh, huaiten leng, huchi bang mahin, a deihthusam bang un sa tuh a hihthanghuai ua, vaihawm sakna a musit ua, thupinate a gense nak uhi.
Himahleh, Mikael angel tungunngpenin bawn, diabol toh a kisel ua, Mosi luang thua a kinak lai un a tungthu gen sakin amah a gense ngam kei hi, Toupan hontai jaw hen, a chi zota hi.
Huai miten bel thil a theih louh peuhmah uh a gense jel ua; huan ngaihtuahna neilou ganhingte banga theihsiamna pianpih a neihte un, huai lampang mahmah ah a kihehse naknak uhi.
A tung ua a gik hi!
Kaina lampi a jui ua, punna delhin Balaam mohnaah hahtaiin a tai ua, Kora thukalhna ah a mangthangta uhi.
Hiaite tuh ahi uh, na itna-ankuangluina ua hihmelhemtu leh lauhuai kiselte- amau mah kikem, angsung ngaihtuaha, maingaltaka tathangte; mei tuipai lou, huih mut lengte ahi ua; phavanga sing, gah lou, nihvei sisa, a zung toh bohkhiakte ahi ua;
Tuipi kihawt vonvon, amau zahlakna thankhia ahi ua; aksi vialvak, amau dia khantawna mial bingbikbek sit sakte ahi uhi.
Huan, Enok, Adam akipana sagihnain hiaite tungtang nagenkholin, Ngai un, Toupa tuh a mi siangthou singkhatte toh a hongpai ahi, chiin,
mi tengteng tunga vaihawm ding leh, Pathian limsak loute tengteng Pathian limsak louhna na Pathian limsak loutunga a sep tengteng uah leh, Pathian limsak loumikhialten a tunga thukhauh tak a gen tengteng ua siamlouh tangsak dingin.
Huaite tuh phunhatte leh ngohhatte ahi ua, amau utna bengjel in a om ua, a kamte khawng un leng kiotsakna thu a gen gawpgawp a, punna deih manin i a deih uhi.
Himahleh, deihtakte aw, noujaw i Toupa Jesu Kris sawltakten thu a genkholhte uh theigige un;
hunnanungah te Pathian limsak loulam amau utna bang jela omin, nuihsanhatte a hongom ding uhi, chih na kiang ua a gendan khawng uh.
Huai mite tuh sa mi, Kha neilou, pawl tuamte bawlte tuh ahi uhi.
Himahleh, deihtakte, nou jaw na ginna siangthou uh tunga noumau leh noumau kilem touin, Kha Siangthoua thumin,
khantawn hinna neihsakna khop i Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna tuh ngak kawmin, Pathian itna a kikem hoih un.
Khenkhatte, ginglaha omte tuh hehpih unla;
Khenkhatte, meia kipanin la khe zok unla, hondam un; khenkhatte, a sa thanghuai banna uh puansilh lam leng kihin, lau kawmin hehpih un.
Tuin, na puk louhna ding ua honveng thei leh, a thupina ma taka nakpi taka nuamsaa nin bangloua nou hon koih theipa,Hondampa Pathian tak kia kiangah, i Toups Jesu Kris jiakin, hun himhim om ma leh tu leh khantawn dongin, pahtawinate thupinate, vaihawmate, thuneihnate om hen.
Amen.
Hondampa Pathian tak kia kiangah, i Toups Jesu Kris jiakin, hun himhim om ma leh tu leh khantawn dongin, pahtawinate thupinate, vaihawmate, thuneihnate om hen.
Amen.
Jesu Kris kilakna, Pathianin a sikhate kiang a lak dinga amah a piak, thil hongom pah mahmah dingte: Huan aman tuh a sikha Johan kiangah a angel sawlin chiamtehnain a theisaka;
amah Johanin tuh Pathian thu leh, Jesu Kris tungtang thu leh, thil tengteng a muhte tuh a theisak ta.
Huan genkholhna thute sima, hiai genkholhna thute jaa, huaia thil kigelhte juite tuh hampha uhi; a hun a naita ngala.
Johanin Asia gama om saptuam sagihte kiangah: Hehpihna leh lemna na kiang ua om hen: Amah omlel leh, omsa leh, hongpai ngei dingpa akipan; leh a laltutphah maa om Kha sagihte akipanain,
leh Jesu Kris, theihpihpa ginom, misite laka piang masapen leh leitunga kumpipate vaihawmpa akipanin.
Ei honita, i khelhna akipana a sisanin hon sawppa amah kiangah;
leh lalgam hi ding a honbawla, a Pathian leh a Pa kianga siampute hi ding a honbawl, amah kiangah thupina leh vaihawmna, khantawn, khantawnin om hen.
Amen.
Ngai in, meipi toh a hong pai hi; huan mi chitengin amah a mu ding ua, amah sunten leng; huan leitunga nam tengtengin amah a kah ding uh.
Hi ngei, Amen.
Kei Alpha leh Omega ka hi Toupa Pathian, omlel leh omsa leh hongpai ding, Bangkimhihtheiin a chi hi.
Kei Johan, Jesua om haksathuakna leh lalgam leh kuhkalnaa, na unau u leh na tanpihpa uh, Pathian leh Jesu tungtang thu ah, tuikulh gam Patmos kichi ah ka oma.
Toupa niin Khain ka oma, huan ka nunglamah aw ngaihtakin, pengkul ging bang maiin,
Na thil muhte laibu ah gelh inla, saptuam sagihte kiangah khak in: Ephesa khuaah, leh Smarna khuaa, leh Pergamam khua ah, leh Thaiatira khua ah, leh Sardi khua ah leh Philadelphia khua ah, leh Leodisia khua ah, chiin, ka zata hi.
Huan, kei honhoupih huai aw muh tumin ka kiheia.
Huchia ka kihei aleh dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagih ka muta a.
Huan, huai tuikuang koihna laiah kuahiam mihing tapa toh kibang, a khepek phaa puan silh, a awm khawnga dangkaeng gaknaa kigak tuh ka muta hi.
Huan, a lu leh a sam tuh samul kang bangin a kanga, vuk bangin; huan a mit tuh meikuang bang ahi;
huan, a khe khawng tuh sumsan nawttet bang ahi a, meipia hal siangsa bangin; huan a aw tuh tui tampi ging bang ahi.
Huan a khut taklamin aksi sagih a tawia; huan a kam a kipanin namsau hiamtak hiamtuah a suak khia a; huan a mel tuh ni a sat sanlai bang ahi.
Huchia amah ka muh takin, kei tuh misi bangin a khe bulah ka pukkta a.
Huan aman a khut taklam ka tunga koihin, Lau ken; a masapen leh a nanungpen leh.
Mi Hing ka hi; huan ka hongsi a, huan ngaiin khantawnin ka hing hi, sihna leh misi kho tahbi ka nei hi.
Huaijiakin na thil muhsate leh thil om lelte lah tununga thul hongom dingte gelh in;Ka khut taklam a aksi sagih na muhte leh dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagihte thuguk.
Aksi sagihte tuh saptuam sagihte angelte ahi ua; huan tuikuang koihna sagihte tuh saptuam sagihte ahi uhi, a chi a.
Ka khut taklam a aksi sagih na muhte leh dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagihte thuguk.
Aksi sagihte tuh saptuam sagihte angelte ahi ua; huan tuikuang koihna sagihte tuh saptuam sagihte ahi uhi, a chi a.
Ephesa khua saptuamte angel kiangah hichi bangin gelh in: A khut taklama aksi sagih tawi dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagih laia vial vakpan hiah thite a chi hi:
Na thil hihteleh na sepgim dan leh na kuhkaldan leh, mi giloute na ngaihmoh dan leh hi loupia, amau sawltak kichite na zeta, amau tuh juauthei ahi uh chih na muhkhiak dan ka theia;
Huan thuakzohna neiin, ka min jiakin na thuak teiteia, huchiin na bah kei hi.
Himahleh hiai thu ah demna kon nei hi; na itna masapen na tawpsan thu ah.
Huaijiakin na pukna laitak theigige inla, kisik inla, na thilhih masapente hih nawn in; huchilouin jaw na kiangah ka hongpai dia, a omaa kipanin na tuikuang koihna ka suan ding, na kisik kei leh.
Himahleh hiai thu ah na hoih, Nikol pawlte thilhihte na hua, a huai tuh ken leng ka hua hi.
Saptuamte kianga Kha thugen tuh bil nei peuhin ja uhen.
A vualzoupa kiangah, amah kiangah Pathian Paradisa om, hinna sing a nek dingin ka pe ding, a chi, chiin.
Huan Smarna khuaa saptuamte angel kiangah hichi bangin gelh in: A masapen leh a nanungpen, huai si a hing nawntain hiai thile a gen hi:
Na gimthuakdan bang. na jawndan bang (himahleh na hausa na), hi loupia, Judate hia kigente, Setan kikhopna in hizote, gensiatna bang ka thei hi.
Na thuak pah ding thilte kihta ken; ngai in, zeeta na om theihna ding un diabolin na lak ua a khenkhen suangkulh ah honkhum pah ding; huan ni sawm sung gimthuakna na nei ding uhi.
Sih phain ginom in, huan hinna lallukhu kon pe ding.
Saptuamte kianga Kha thugen tuh bil nei peuhin ja uhen.
A vualzoupa tuh sih nihna hihnatin a om kei ding, a chi, chiin.
Huan Pergamam khuaa saptuamte angel kiangah hichi bangin gelh in: Namsau hiamtak hiamtuah neiin; hiai thilte a gen hi:
Na tenna leh Setan laltutphah omna leng ka thei hi; ka min tuh kiptakin na kema, Antipa ka palai mi ginom, Setan tenna a, na lak ua thaha a om lain leng, non ginna na tawpsan tuan kei hi.
Himahleh demna zek kon nei, huai laia mi khenkhat Balaam sinsakna juite na ompih jiakin, Israel tate maa kipukna koih ding leh milimte kianga kithoihna thilte ne ding leh kingaihna khelhna hih dingin aman tuh Balak a thuhilha.
Huchi bangmahin Nikol pawlte sinsakna jui, mi khenkhat mah na ompih hi;
Huai jiakin kisik in; huchilouin jaw na kiangah ka hong pai pah dia, huan amau tuh ka kama namsauin ka hondou ding hi.
Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen tuh bil nei peuh in ja uhen.
A vualzoupa kiangah mana selguka ka pe ding, huan suangpek ka pe dia, huai suang tungah tuh, min thak, a neipa chih louh ngal theih louh a kigelh, a chi, chiin.
Huan, Thaiatira khuaa saptuamte angel kiangah hichi bangin gelh in: Pathian Tapa, meikuang bang mit neia sumsan nawttet bang khe neipan, hiai thilte a gen hi:
Na thilhihte leh na itna leh na ginna leh na nasepna leh na thuakzohna ka thei hi, huan a masapen sangin na thilhih nanungzpte tuh a tam jaw hi.
Himahleh hiai thuah demna kon nei hi, huai numei Jezebel, jawlnei kichinu khawk na sak louh jiakin; aman tuh ka sikhate kingaihna khelhna hih ding leh milimte kianga kithoihna thilte ne dinga khemin a hilha.
Huchiin amah a kisikna dingin hun ka pia a; huan a mingaihna khelhna tuh a kisik nuam tuan kei hi.
Ngai in, amah tuh damlou-lupna ah ka pai ding, huan amah angkawmteng leng gimthuakna thupi ah ka pai ding, a thilhihte uh a kisik tuan kei uleh.
Huan hiin a tate ka that dia; huan saptuamte tengtengin tuh lungsim-kiheinate leh lungtang theipa, kei ka hi chih a thei ding uhi; huan na thil hihte bangbang un na lak ua mi tengteng tuh ka pe ding hi.
Himahleh, nou, Thaiatira a om midangte hiai thuhilh neiloua, Setan thil thukte bang theilou tengteng kiangah tunggikna dang himhim na tunguah kon behlap kei ding, ka chi.
Abang abang hileh na na-neihpen uh, ka hong mateng, lenkip un.
Huan a vualzoupa leh a tawp phaa ka nate kempa amah kiang ah tuh namte tunga thuneihna, ka pe ding;

Huan Sardi khuaa saptuamte angel kiangah hichi bangin gelh in: Pathian Kha sagih leh aksi sagih neipan hiai thilte a gen hi: Na thilhihte ka thei, si napiin hing min na pua.
Kivengin, thil om sunte, si dia kisate, tungding nawn in; ka Pathian maah na thilhihte bangmah zohsa himhim ka mu kei hi.
Huaijiakin, na muhdan leh na jakdan thei gige in; kem inla, kisik in.
Huchia na kiven keileh, guta bangin ka hongpai dia, bangchik hunin ahia nang kon phawn ding chih na theikei ding.
Himahleh, Sardi khua ah min tawm chik, apuante uh nin sak lou na neia; amau tuh puan ngou silhin kei toh ka vak khawm ding uh, huchi kilawm him a hih jiak un.
A vualzoupa tuh, huchibangin puan ngou-in a kijem dia, huan bangchi mahin hinna laibu akipat a min ka hihmang kei ding, huan ka Pa ma leh angelte maah a min ka pauhial ding.
Saptuam kiang Kha thugen tuh bil nei peuhin ja uhen, a chi, chiin.
Philadelphia khuaa saptuamte angel kiangah kichi bangin gelh in; Huai siangthoupa, huai dikpa, huai David tahbi neipa, huai hon tuh kuamahin a khak theih louhpa leh huai khak tuh kuamahin a hon theih louhpan hiai thilte a gen hi:
Na thilhihte ka thei, ngai in, na maah kuamah khak theih louh kong honsain ka koih; huan thilhihtheihna neuchik na neia, huan ka thu na kemta a, huan ka min na pai keia.
Ngaiin, juau lel gena, hi lou napia, huai Judate hia kigente, Setan omkhawmnaa te tuh ka honpia hi, ngaiin, amau ka honpai sak dia, na khe bul ah ka kun sak ding, kon itdan a theihna ding un.
Ka dohzohna thu na kep jiakin, zeeta na om chiangin ken leng ka honkem ding, huai hun tuh khovel pumpi tunga hongtung ding ahi, leitunga teng tengteng leng zeet dingin.
Ka hong pai pah dia: kuamah in na lallukhu a lak louh na dingin, na neihpen tuh kem kinken in.
A vual zoupa tuh, ka Pathian biakin ah khuamin ka pang sak dia, huan huaiah kipanin a pai khe nawn kei ding, amah tungah tuh ka Pathian min bang, ka Pathian khopi Jerusalem thak, ka Pathian akipana vana hongpai khe suk in bang leh, keimah min thak bang ka gelh ding.
Saptuamte kianga Kha thugen tuh bil nei peihin ja uhen, a chi, chiin.
Huan Leodisia khuaa saptuamte angel kiangah hichibangin gelh in: Theihpihpa ginom leh dik, Pathian thilsam bul Amenin hiai thilte a gen:
Na thilhihte ka thei, lum la lum lou vot la vot louin na om a: na lum leh lum inla, na vot leh vot vanglak lechin!
Lum la lum lou, vot lah vot lou a, na om pelhpulh jiakin, ka kam akipanin kon se khe ding.
Mi genthei nuamsa lou, jawng, mitdel leh vuaktang na hihlam kithei loua, ka hausa, hausaknate ka neita, bangmah ka kitasam kei na chih jiakin:
Kei akipatin dangkaeng meia hihsiangthou lei dingin kon thuhilh, na honghauhsak theihna dingin; puan ngoute bang na honsilha, na vuaktang zumhuaina a dawk louhna ding in; huan na muh theihna dingin na mita nuh ding mitlou leng leiin.
Ka itte tuh ka thuhilhin, ka sawia; huai jiakin phatuamngai inla, kisik in.
Ngaiin, kongkhaka dingin ka kiu hi: min ka aw a jaka kong a hon leh, a kiangah ka lut dia amah toh nitakan ka ne dia, aman leng kei toh a ne ding.
A vualzoupa tuh ka laltutphah tungah ka kiangah ka tu sak ding, kei leng ka vualzou a, laltutphah tunga ka Pa toh ka tut bangin.Saptuamte kianga Kha thugen tuh bil nei peuhin ja uhen, a chi, chiin, a chi.

Hiai thilte nungin, ka et leh, huan ngai in, vana kongkhak a kihonga, ka aw jak masapen aw pengkul ging bangin kei a honhoupiha, Hiai lamah hongtou in, huan tunung chianga thil hongom dingte kon mu sak ding, achia.
Huaiphetin kei tuh Khain ka omta a; huan ngaiin van ah tuh lal tutphah a hongkitungta a, huan laltutphah tungah mi khat a tuta a;
Huan a tupa tuh jasper leh sardia suang bangin a kimu a; huan huai laltutphah kimvel ah sakhituihup, emeraldi suang bang maia kimu ajama.
Huan, huai laltutphah kimvel ah laltutphah sawmnih leh li a oma; huan huai laltutphahte tungah upa sawmnih leh li tu kamuta a, puan ngoua kijemin, dangkaeng lallukhu a khu chiat ua.
Huan huai laltutphah kipanin khophia peuh, aw peuh, van-ging peuh, a hongsuaka.
Huan mei khawnvak sagih, laltutphah maah a kuang a, huaite tuh Pathian Kha sagihte ahi uhi;
Huan huai laltutphah maah Kristal banga siang limlang tuipi a oma.
Huan laltutphah kimvel ah ganhing nunglam leh malam mita dim a om ua.
Huan a ganhing khatna humpinelkai bang ahi a, huan a ganhing nihna bawngnou bang ahi a, huan a ganhing thumnain mai, mihing mai bang a neia, huan a ganhing lina mupi lenglai bang mai ahi.
Huan huai ganging li, kha guk nei chiatte, a kimvel leh a sunglama mita dimte: huan amau tuh sun leh jan khawl louin, Siangthou, siangthou, siangthou Toupa Pathian Bangkimhihthei, omsa leh omlel leh hongom ding, a chi ua.
Huan huai amah laltutphah tunga tupa leh, huai amah khantawn khawntawna hingpa kianga gan hingten, thupina leh zahomna leh kipahna thu a piak chiang un,
huai amah laltutphah tunga tupa maah, huai upa sawmnih leh lite a khupboh ua, huan huai amah khantawn khantawna hinpa tuh a bia uhi, huan laltutphah maa a lallukhute uh koikhin,Nang ka Toupa uh leh ka Pathian uh, thupina leh zahomna le thilhihtheihna mu tuak na hi; thil tengteng nang na siama, huan nang thu jiakin om leh siam ahi uhi, a chi ua.
Nang ka Toupa uh leh ka Pathian uh, thupina leh zahomna le thilhihtheihna mu tuak na hi; thil tengteng nang na siama, huan nang thu jiakin om leh siam ahi uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, amah huai laltutphah tunga tupa khut taklam ah laibu a sunglam leh a polama kigelh chiamtehna sagiha chiamteh ka mutaa.
Huan angel hat khatin aw ngaihtaka, Kua ahia laibu tuh honga, huai achiamteha phel tham? chia genkhai ka muta a.
Huan vantung hiin, leitung hiam, a hihkeileh lei nuaiah leng huai laibu hong thei hiam, ahihkeileh a tung en thei kuamah a om kei a.
Huan huai laibu hongtham hiam, a hihkeileh huai a tung en tham, kuamah a om louh jiakin kei tuh ka kap kapa:
Huan upate laka khatin ka kiangah, Kap ken, ngai in, himpinelkai, Juda nam a, David Zungin, laibu th hong thei ding leh huai achiamtehna sagihte leng phel thei dingin a vual zouta, a chi a.
Huan, huai laltutphah leh huai gan hing lite leh huai upate lai ah thahsa hileh kilawm, Belamnou, ki sagih leh mit sagih nei, ding ka mu a, huan huai mit sagihte tuh Pathian kha agih, leitung tengtenga sawlkhiakte ahi uhi.
Huan, amah a hongpaia, huan laltutphah tunga tupa khut takalama kipan laibu tuh a la a.
Huan huai laibu a lak takin, gan hing lite leh upa sawmnih leh lite, gosem khat chiat leh dangkaeng belhbute gim namtuia dim chiat tawiin, Belamnou maah a khupboh ua, huai gim namtiu tuh misiangthoute thumna ahi.
Huan la thak khat a sa ua, Laibu tuh la a, huaia achiamtehna te phel tham na hi: thahin na omta a, chi chih leh pau chih leh mi chih leh nam chiha mite Pathian adinga na sisana na leitak jiakin.

thaha om, Belamnou-in hatna khawng, hauhsakna khawng, thilhihtheihna khawng zahtakhuaina khawng, thupina khawng, vualjawlna khawng mu tham ahi, chiin nakpiin a kikou ua.

Huan, Belamnou-in chiamtehna sagihte laka khat a phel lai ka mua, huan ganging lite laka khatin, aw, van ging bang main, Hongpai in, a chih ka zata a.
Huan ka et leh, ngaiin, sakol kang leh a tunga tupa thalpeu tawi ka muta a; huan amah kiangah lallukhu piakin a oma; huan amah tuh vualzou kawm leh vualzou jel dingin a hongpai kheta a.
Huan achiamtehna nihna a phel lain, ganhing nihnain, Hongpai in, a chih ka ja a.

Huan achiamtehna ngana a phel lain, Pathian thu jiak leh a zuih uh theihsakna jiaka amau thaha omte, maitam nuaiah ka muta a:
huan amau tuh aw ngaih taka kikouin, Toupa Tungnungpen aw, siangthou leh dik, bangtan ka sisan man uh amau leitunga tengte tunga thuk lou leh vaihawm loua om ding na hia? a chi ua.
Huan amau kiangah puan ngouthupi piakin aom chiat ua: huan amau tuh a sikha- hihpihte uleh a unaute uh, amau banga thaha om dingte a hongkim mateng un, na khawl tadih un chia hilhin a om uhi.

Huan aman ka kiangah, Hiaite gimthuakna thupi akipan hongpai ahi uh, huan a puan thupi uh sawpin, Belamnou sisanin ahih ngou uhi.

A gil uh kial nawn kenchin, a dang uh leng tak nawn himhim kenteh amau tuh niin kang kenchin, satnain leng a hihgim nawn kei ding hi.Belamnou huai laltutphah laka om tuh a Belamchingpa uh a hih ding jiakin, amau tuh hinna tuh tuhkhuk ah a pi ding a; huan Pathianin a mit ua kipan khitui tengteng a nul hulta ding hi, a chi a.

Huan Pathian maa angel sagih dingte tuh ka muta a, huan amau kiangah pengkul sagih piakin a omta a.
